40001001	Pe rusu cemeya ge Zeso Krist ne, ne ge wuwa no ge pe rusu ge gan ga̰a̰l Daviɗ ne zì, ge mbo no ge Abraham ta ya:
40001002	Abraham too Isak, Isak too Jakob no, Jakob too Juda mage na na̰ van ma no,
40001003	Juda too Perez mage Zera no, num na̰ Tamar. Perez too Esrom no, Esrom too Aram no,
40001004	Aram too Aminadab no, Aminadab too Nason no, Nason too Salmon no,
40001005	Salmon too Buwaza no, ne na̰ Rahab. Buwaza too Obeɗ no, ne na̰ Ruɗ.
40001006	Obeɗ too Jese no, Jese too gan ga̰a̰l Daviɗ no, Gan ga̰a̰l Daviɗ too Salomo̰ no. Ne na̰ kaa wal Uri gwale.
40001007	Salomo̰ too Robowam no, Robowam too Abiya no, Abiya too Azaf no,
40001008	Azaf too Jozafaɗ no, Jozafaɗ too Yoram no, Yoram too Oziyas no,
40001009	Oziyas too Yotam no, Yotam too Akaz no, Akaz too Ezekiyas no,
40001010	Ezekiyas too Manase no, Manase too Amon no, Amon too Zoziyas no,
40001011	Zoziyas too Yekoniyas mage na na̰ van ma no, ge sok ge nda ge Babilon ma haa ge Izrayel van ma pagal, àa ɔwabe num ge pool mbo kaɗ ge maa suwal yà no.
40001012	Guwa̰ ge àa ɔwabe num mbo suwal Babilon yà go, Yekoniyas too Salasiyel no, Salasiyel too Zorobabel no,
40001013	Zorobabel too Abiyu no, Abiyu too Eliyakim no, Eliyakim too Azor no,
40001014	Azor too Sadog no, Sadog too Akim no, Akim too Eliyuɗ no,
40001015	Eliyuɗ too Eleyazar no, Eleyazar too Matan no, Matan too Jakob no,
40001016	Jakob too Jozef no, ne ge kaa zok ge Mari, Mari mbe ge Zeso ge àa tol ne Krist, Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne wuwa ge ne zì.
40001017	Doŋ pe mbe ma no mɔɗwag, ge Abraham ta ya ɗiŋ mbo ya Daviɗ ta go, àa wol pɔgwa ndà. Ge Daviɗ ta go ɗiŋ deɗ-ɗa ge sok ge àa ɔwabe num mbo suwal Babilon yà go, àa wol pɔgwa ndà me. Ge sok ge àa ɔwabe num mbo suwal Babilon yà go ɗiŋ deɗ-ɗa ge Krist, Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne ta go, àa wol pɔgwa ndà iya.
40001018	Ḛ kuwa go tolla ge Zeso Krist ne dee ya pe gyana de. Mari ge ne na̰, ndu son a̰me ɗu ge àa tol ne Jozef ka dwam nee ne. Sok ge àa gale wa ya be kaɗ-ɗa dagre, see emel no, ge pool ge On̰om ge Harcal ta.
40001019	Jozef ge ka dwam ne kaa ndu ge temel ne, be ɓyare na ke kṵwa̰ ne pagal ɗoo, ne see daŋso to. Ka ɓyare vin̰a ge go na ɔwabe tene gezi ge ne ta chala jan.
40001020	Sok ge ka dwaɗ ge fare mbe ma pagal, ndii! Malayka ge Bagezok ne a̰me ɗu dyan tene ge ne ta gaw ge kin̰a zì, jan ne go: «Jozef ge gan ga̰a̰l Daviɗ Baŋ, kaa ge mo chiya voo to, ame mo gwale Mari, ago, van ge no ne laa zì, mbo ge pool ge On̰om ge Harcal ne ta ya.
40001021	Kuwa go, ne mbo tol van son, mo mbo hon ne dḭḭl Zeso, ago, a ne sḛ mbo mon na nda ma ne ge num kaŋ keeya ge sone ma zì ya.»
40001022	Ge sego, kaŋ mbe ma dee ya keeya tetem ndwa huy fare ge Bagezok dee jin̰a ge na ndu ge zwagre na wa, wa zì go:
40001023	«Kuwa go, van kale ge na na̰ tok jan mbo hee emel, mbo tol van son, àa mbo tol ne dḭḭl Emanuwel, ge ne pe wan go: “Dok go ɓanna ge nè.”»
40001024	Guwa̰ ge Jozef kore ge dwam se go, mbo ya kee tèmel ge wa hoɗɗa ge malayka ge Bagezok ne ma pagal tem, ame Mari kaɗ zok.
40001025	Ɗaŋɗe, ɓan ge ne to ɗiŋ ge go ne mbo tol na van son mbe ya se. Jozef hon ne dḭḭl go Zeso.
40002001	Zeso too ge suwal Betlehem diŋ, ge no ge suwa ge Jude ne go, ge zaman ge gan ga̰a̰l Heroɗ ne go. Ḛ kuwa, nda ge zwam ma, àa ɗege ge mbii ya, àa deɗ-ɗa ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ,
40002002	àa ele sok go: «Gan ga̰a̰l ge Yahuɗ ma way ge too jin̰al ge diya de? Ago, i kuwa gùwa̰ ge ngay ne tolla ge mbii ya go, i mbo ya no ndwa uware ne.»
40002003	Sok ge gan ga̰a̰l Heroɗ za̰a̰ fare mbe go, mbo ya iigi digi, nda ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ-ge ma peɗ mbo ya iigi digi waɗme.
40002004	Ge sok mbe go, kwate ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way mage Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma ya se mɔɗwag, ele num go: «Gan ga̰a̰l ge Yahuɗ ma way, ge wa tii ke ge ne pe mbiya tol ge diya de? Ne ge àa tol ne go Krist, Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne .»
40002005	Àa gwan ge ne janna go: «Ge suwal Betlehem diŋ, ge no suwa ge Jude ne go. Ago, i dee ya kuwa ano mbe ge fare ge Nda ge zwagre Dok wa njaŋe ne na maktub zì pe go:
40002006	“Mo Betlehem ge no suwa ge Juda ne go, A fareba go, mo be hoɗege jiyale ge suwal ga̰a̰l ge Juda ne ma buwal zì to. Ago gan ga̰a̰l mbo waɗ ge mo zì, Mbo kaɗ Ba ge koy mbi ɓase Izrayel van ma ne.”»
40002007	Ge sok mbe go, Heroɗ tol nda ge zwam mbe ma ya chala jan, ele num go, num ngay na dwam ge num ee pe kuwa gùwa̰ mbe ndaaya go tem.
40002008	Sok ɓyare teme num mbo suwal Betlehem go, jan num go: «Ḛ mbo hale fare ge van jiyale ne mbe pe kwaɗa, sok ge ḛ seɗ ne ya, ḛ ke mbi ne kuwaya ndwa go, mbi sḛ waɗme, mbi wa mbo uware ne.»
40002009	Guwa̰ ge àa za̰a̰ gan ga̰a̰l go, àa kan ta mboya. Ḛ kuwa, gùwa̰ ge àa kuwa ne ge mbii ya mbe gwan dyan tene ya num ndwa go, gaa ɗeme num ɗiŋ mbo ya mḛḛ ge zok ge van jiyale no ne diŋ pagal nga.
40002010	Sok ge àa kuwa gùwa̰ ga̰a̰l mbe mbo ya mḛḛya go, àa kee laa saal gḛḛ.
40002011	Àa waɗ zok mbe diŋ, àa kuwa van jiyale mage ge na na̰ Mari, àa guu maa ko ma ge ne ndwa se, ndwa uware ne. Guwa̰, àa hage maa galam ma wa, àa ɔwabe bobo ge yee gḛḛ ma ya se, ndwa go dinar, ɔwara ge huu tii mage ɔwara ge àa tol ne mir ya, àa hon ne num.
40002012	Sok ge àa ɗege ɓyare vin̰a gwan mbo maa suwal yà, Dok wuwage num ge kin̰a zì go, num guwa̰ ge Heroɗ ta yà to. Ge sok mbe go, àa mbo ya hee vin̰a ge ɗogle.
40002013	Sok ge nda ge zwam ma ɔwabe zum gwan mbo maa suwal yà, malayka ge Bagezok ne a̰me ɗu dyan tene ge Jozef ta kin̰a zì, jan ne go: «Ɗege digi, wa̰a̰ van jiyale mage na na̰, chiya mbo Ejypt, mo kaɗ ya go ɗiŋ ge go mbi guwa̰ ya gwan jan mo fare. Ago, Heroɗ mbo ɓyare van jiyale mbe pe ndwa hun ne gezi.»
40002014	Ge sok mbe go, Jozef ɗege digi ɗaal zì, wan van jiyale mage na na̰, àa ge num ɔwabe zum mbo Ejypt.
40002015	Sok ge àa dee yà, àa gaa kàɗɗa da̰a̰reya go Heroɗ suu ne mbḛḛ. Kaŋ mbe dee ya keeya tetem ndwa huy fare ge Bagezok dee jin̰a ne, ge na ndu ge zwagre na wa, wa zì go: «Mbi too mbi van ne wuwa zum ge Ejypt diŋ.»
40002016	Sok ge Heroɗ kuwa go nda ge zwam ma lase na lase, ne twam juliliya mbo ya waɗe kon pagal. Hoɗ na wa go, a hṵṵ nda jabso van ge soɗob ma ge del zi go gwan-na se, ge no ge suwal Betlehem mage suwal van ge na ziya go ge ma diŋ peɗ, ge dwam ge nda ge zwam ma ngay na ne pagal tem.
40002017	A go mbe no, Jeremi, Nda ge zwagre Dok wa fare ge dee jin̰a num ge zḛḛ ya kaal day ma wa huy no:
40002018	«Nda za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l fiyaso ge suwal Rama diŋ, Fiyaso fyalla ge kirgi ta mage sḭḭ mballa jɔjwag, A Rachel ka fyalla ne ge na van ma pe, Kuri laa eyalla ge dape, gaa be van.»
40002019	Guwa̰ swày ge Heroɗ ne go, ḛ kuwa malayka ge Bagezok ne gwan dyan tene ge Jozef ta kin̰a zì ge Ejypt go,
40002020	jan ne go: «Ɗege digi, wa̰a̰ van jiyale mage na na̰ Mari, ḛ ge num gwan mbo ge suwa ge Izrayel ne yà. Ago nda ge ka ɓyare hun van jiyale mbe ma suu ya go.»
40002021	Jozef ɗege digi, wan van jiyale mage na na̰, àa ge num gwan-na ge suwa ge Izrayel ne go.
40002022	Sok ge za̰a̰ go Arkelayus kee muluk ne ge Jude pagal ndwa go Izrayel suwa lee ge ham-ge go, ge na ba Heroɗ byalam go, voo waɗ ge ne zì, daa gwan ee na ko mbo ge suwa mbe ya to. Guwa̰, Dok gwan wuwage ne fare ge kin̰a zì, ɔwabe mbo ge Galile yà, ndwa go Izrayel suwa lee ge chiya-ge go.
40002023	Mbo ya kàɗɗa ge suwal ga̰a̰l ge àa tol ne Nazareɗ go, ndwa go fare janna ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma way ma wa huy: «Àa mbo tol ne van Nazareɗ.»
40003001	Del ma guwa̰ bergete, Yohana ba ge kee nda baptem zuɗ-ɗa zum, ka oy fare ge babur pul ge Jude ne go.
40003002	Ka janna go: Sok ge Dok kee muluk mbyaɗɗa go, ḛ seŋe ta se, ḛ ho fareba ge Fare ge Kwaɗa ta.
40003003	A ne sḛ ge Nda ge zwagre Dok wa Ezay ka faa ne fare ne, sok ge ka janna go: «Ano, a ka̰a̰l ge ndu ge oy no ge babur pul go nee ne, jan go: Ḛ ca vin̰a ge Bagezok pe, Ḛ haa vin̰a ma temel ge ne pe me.»
40003004	Yohana sḛ kaa ge ba̰a̰ ge àa kê ne ge jambal ge jujul zi susu ge na ta, kaɗ ge hoo dab vwalla ge na pul go me. Ka wal tene ge tere mage daram nùm ge ful zige ma.
40003005	Nda ge kaa ge Jerusalem diŋ ma, ge suwa ge Jude ne go ma peɗ, ge mangaɗam Urdun wa go ma peɗ me, àa ka mbo ya ge ne ta.
40003006	Ne sḛ ka kee num baptem ge mangaɗam Urdun se, guwa̰ ge àa ka jan maa sone ma zum go.
40003007	Sok ge Yohana kuwa go Farisi mage Saduki ma ka mbo ya gḛḛ ge na ta kee baptem, jan num go: Rusu ge dḭḭ ta ge gole go ma, a huɗi hate ḛ chiya twam ge Dok ne ge mbo no ya voo ne de?
40003008	Ḛ mbo mboya ge jwab ge ngay go, ḛ seŋe ta ja se ge ḛ kaŋ keeya ge sone ma go.
40003009	Ne kaa ge ḛ duwa ge ḛ pagal zì go, Abraham daa ḛ baŋ ne kade to. Ago mbi jan ḛ ne no, koo ge njal mbe ge ḛ kuwa num no ma ta, Dok ge pool seŋe num Abraham baŋ ma.
40003010	Ḛ kuwa go sariya ge Dok ne ndaa ja zì guwa dinna ge cay ee ya ee zoo ge ɔwara ma pe go go, ɔwara ge diige peɗ ge tol ndwa ge kwaɗa to ma, àa chal ne gezi, àa dol ne ge ol zì.
40003011	Mbi, mbi kee ḛ baptem mam se ge ee ḛ seŋe ta ya se ge ɓul mɔɗwag pe, ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge mbo no ge mbi guwa̰ ya, a pool gḛḛ waɗe mbi. Mbi be mbyaɗ ndage ne tyako ma ge ne ko zì to. Ne sḛ mbo kee ḛ baptem ge On̰om ge Harcal mage ol.
40003012	A ge ta̰a̰l in̰ale swa ge na tok go, mbo in̰ale na swa gezi mɔɗwag, gisi mboo mbo kan ne ge ol ge piri to zì yà, ɗaŋɗe, kwate na swa ndwa ge hal se.
40003013	Ge dwam a̰me go ɗu, Zeso ɗege ge suwa ge Galile ne go, mbo ya ge Yohana ta mangaɗam Urdun wa go, ndwa go ne ke na baptem.
40003014	Ɗaŋɗe, Yohana vin ne to, jan ne go: Mbi ɓyare zoo go mo ke mbi baptem ne. Mo sḛ gwan mbo ya ge mbi ta ne de!
40003015	Zeso gwan ge ne janna go, vḭḭ go, ano mbe no, ne kee ge sego, ago sok keeya go mbe go, nè huy kaŋ ge Dok ɓyare ge nè ta ma wa. Ge sok mbe go, Yohana vin kee ne baptem.
40003016	Sok ge num tok aa ge baptem keeya mbe go gaw, Zeso ndee ge mam se ya digi, kuwa pḭḭ ma hageya gezi, On̰om ge Dok ne siri ya se dinna ge maale go, mbo ya kaɗ ge ne pagal.
40003017	Ḛ kuwa, nda za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l a̰me faa fare mbe ma no ge pḭḭ ma zì ya go: Mo mbi Van ne, mbi laa wa̰a̰ mo gḛḛ, mbi sḛ kee tii gḛḛ ge mo pe.
40004001	Guwa̰ gaw, On̰om ge Dok ne gene Zeso ɗiŋ ge babur pul yà, ndwa go Ba ge ho̰o̰l he ne pe.
40004002	Guwa̰ ge wa̰a̰ mam njuwal dwam warndà ɗaal mage gyala go, camal ɗege kee ne.
40004003	Ba ge hee nda pe mbo ya ge ne ta, jan ne go: Kaɗɗa go fareba mo Dok Van ne, ho mo wa go, njal mbe ma no, num seŋe kaŋ zam.
40004004	Zeso gwan ge ne janna go: Njaŋeya ge Dok ne jan go: «A be kaŋ zam ɗeŋew mbo ee ndu duwana kaɗ ge ndwa ne to, Ɗaŋɗe, ge fare ge diige peɗ ge ndage no ge Dok wa zì ya ta.»
40004005	Guwa̰, Ba ge ho̰o̰l gene ne ge suwal ga̰a̰l ge harcal diŋ yà, ee ne ge zok ge Dok ne sok a̰me ge haal waɗeya pagal digi.
40004006	Sok mbe go, jan ne go: Kaɗɗa go fareba mo Dok Van ne, doo tene ya se, ago Njaŋeya ge Dok ne jan go: «Mbo hoɗ na malayka ma na wa ge mo pe, Àa mbo wan mo ge maa tok digi caɗ, Ge go mo ko chiya ge njal sok van a̰me ta to.»
40004007	Zeso jan ne go: Ge sok a̰me ge ɗogle ge Njaŋeya ge Dok ne mbe zì, jan go: «Mo mbo hee Bagezok Dok ge amo pe to.»
40004008	Ba ge ho̰o̰l gene ne ge njal a̰me ge haal waɗeya pagal digi yà iya, ngay ne muluk ge dunin̰a ne ma peɗ, ge maa kaŋ kwaɗa ma.
40004009	Jan ne go: «Kaɗɗa mo guu mo ko ya ge mbi ndwa se uware mbi, mbi mà hon mo ano mbe ma no peɗ.»
40004010	Zeso jan ne go: «Wa̰a̰ tene gezi yà Saytan ! Ago Njaŋeya ge Dok ne jan go: “Mo mbo uware Bagezok Dok ge mo ɗu. Mo kee ne sḛ ɗu kikiɗ tèmel.”»
40004011	Ge sok mbe go, Ba ge ho̰o̰l n̰a ne, malayka ge Dok ne ma mbo ya ge ne ta, àa ɗege kee tèmel hon ne me.
40004012	Guwa̰, Zeso za̰a̰ go àa wan Yohana, ba ge kee nda baptem ya ge daŋay zì. Sok ge za̰a̰ fare mbe go, ɗege mbo kaɗ ge suwa ge Galile ne yà.
40004013	Daa kaɗ ge suwal Nazareɗ diŋ to, mbo kaɗ ge Kapernawom yà, suwal ga̰a̰l ge no guwa ge mangaɗam ga̰a̰l ge no suwa ge Zabulon mage Neftali ne buwal ge nga go.
40004014	A ndwa go fare ge Nda ge zwagre Dok wa Ezay ne ge dee jin̰a wa huy:
40004015	«Ḛ za̰a̰, nda ge no pe rusu ge Yahuɗ ma way zì to, Ge kaa no ge suwa ge Zabulon mage Neftali ne go ma, Ge no vin̰a pul ge mbo mangaɗam ga̰a̰l wa yà, Ge no mangaɗam Urdun wa lee gene yà ma, Galile, suwa ge nda ge no pe rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma way!
40004016	Ɓase ge ambi ge kaa no ge tṵṵ ge ɗeɗeg zì ma, Kuwa kɔn̰al ge monna ge Dok ne ya go, Num ge kaa no ge suwa ge tṵṵ ge swày ne zì ma, Kɔn̰al a̰me zen ja ge num pagal.»
40004017	Ge sok mbe go gaw, Zeso ee pe oy fare, ka janna go: Ḛ seŋe ta se, ago, sok ge Dok kee muluk ge ḛ pagal mbyaɗ-ɗa go.
40004018	Dwam a̰me go ɗu, Zeso ka mboya ge mangaɗam ga̰a̰l ge Galile ne wa go, kuwa nda ge swaɗ soso ma zi dol kuwal, àa kaa na̰ van, ge ɗu dḭḭl Simo̰ ge nda chiya ne dḭḭl Piyer, Andre ge ne na̰ van me.
40004019	Jan num go: «Ḛ gaa kàre mbi pe. Ajo̰o̰ ḛ nda ge wan sini ma ne, mbi mbo seŋe ḛ nda ge gene nda duwana ma ya mbi ta ma.»
40004020	Ge sok mbe go gaw, àa n̰a maa kuwal ma, àa kàre ne pe ya.
40004021	Sok ge mbo zḛḛ ya kaal nde, kuwa nda ge swaɗ soso ge ɗogle ma zi, àa kaa na̰ van, Jak mage Yohana ɓanna ge maa ba Zebede kàɗɗa ge faa go zoo maa kuwal ndwal ma.
40004022	Tol num waɗme, ge sok mbe go gaw, àa n̰a maa ba ge faa yà, àa kàre ne pe ya.
40004023	Guwa̰, Zeso ka mbo oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge muluk ge Dok ne ge suwa ge Galile ne go peɗ, ka hate nda ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way ma zì, ka zon nda ge ka kee tuguɗi mage sulugu ge diige pe peɗ, ge ɓase ma buwal zì.
40004024	Ne kaŋ ge kê mbe, ee nda faa ge ne dḭḭl ge suwa ge Siri ne go peɗ. Ge sok mbe go, àa ka gene ne nda ge ka kee tuguɗi pe hini-hini mage ka za̰a̰ yal ma ya, ge nda ge on̰om ge sone ma no num zì ma, ge suu mbuɗuɗum ma, ge looɗol ma ya me, ne sḛ ka zon num.
40004025	Go mbe no, nda mbo ya ɓase nɔnɔg ge Zeso pe go, ge suwa ge Galile ne ya, ge Dekapol ya ndwa go suwal ga̰a̰l ge wol ma, ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem ya, ge suwal gegene ge no ge suwa ge Jude ne go ma ya, ge suwa ge no mangaɗam Urdun wa lee gegene yà ma ya me, àa ka kàre ne pe.
40005001	Sok ge Zeso kuwa ɓase mbe ge nɔnɔg ma go, ndee ge njal sok a̰me ge haal digi, kaɗ na pe se. Ne nda ge ame hateya ma ndaa ta ya ge ne ta zì guwa.
40005002	Sok mbe go, ee pe hate num fare.
40005003	Zeso ɗege janna go: Laa saal a ge num ge ndil ta hoɗegeya maa on̰om zì ma pe, ago muluk ge Dok ne num way ne.
40005004	Laa saal a ge num ge seɗ tiɗiya no ma pe, ago Dok mbo iyal num laa.
40005005	Laa saal a ge num ge no suul ma pe, ago Dok mbo hon num suwa ge na kee wa tii ge num pe ge na ɓul mɔɗwag.
40005006	Laa saal a ge num ge no camal mage mam njuwal ge temel taɗ ma pe, ago num dul wa ma mbo ee se.
40005007	Laa saal a ge num ge kuwa nda a̰se no ma pe, ago Dok mbo kuwa num a̰se waɗme.
40005008	Laa saal a ge num ge kee fare ge Dok ne ge dul wa kɔn̰al ma pe, ago àa mbo kuwa Dok ndwa.
40005009	Laa saal a ge num ge ɓyare go halas kaa ge sok ma go peɗ ma pe, ago Dok mbo tol num na van ma.
40005010	Laa saal a ge num ge njoɗ yal ge temel taɗ ma pe, ago muluk ge Dok ge ne num way ne.
40005011	Sok ge àa kaɗ ka sal ḛ, àa ka kee ḛ yal, àa ka jan fare ge sone ge diige pe peɗ ndwa vḛḛne ḛ dḭḭl ge mbi pe, ḛ ke laa saal.
40005012	Ḛ ke laa saal, ḛ kaɗ fafan̰, ge dape, poɗɗa ge ɓaŋlaŋ da̰a̰re ḛ go ge pḭḭ ma zì yà. Nda ge zwagre Dok wa ge ḛ ndwa zḛḛge ma, àa kê num mbe go waɗme.
40005013	Ḛ dinna ge nuwam go ge nda pe peɗ dunin̰a zì. Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa nuwam camam gaa daa ya to no, a ge da ta ɗoo, ndu wa mbo gwan ge ne camam ya de? Gaa go àa ka̰a̰ ne gezi, nda duwana ma mbo vin̰a ge ne pagal.
40005014	Ḛ dinna ge kɔn̰al go, ge nda ge dunin̰a zige ma pe peɗ. Suwal ga̰a̰l ge àa sḭḭ ne ge njal pagal digi, ne wayya to.
40005015	Ge mojo̰o̰ lampe go, nda dun ne digi go àa kubi ne ge sòo zì to, ɗaŋɗe, àa ee ne ge kaŋ ee lampe pe pagal ndwa go ne kɔn̰al zḛḛ ge nda ge zok zige ma ta mɔɗwag.
40005016	N̰a kaŋ keeya ge ḛ ḛ ma kaa kɔn̰al ge nda ta peɗ, sok kuwa kaŋ keeya ge ḛ ḛ ge kwaɗa mbe ma go, nda duwana ma sale nè Ba ge no pḭḭ ma zì yà.
40005017	Zeso gwan jan num go: Ne kaa ge ḛ duwa go mbi mbo ya gul eeya ge Moyiz ne mage hateya ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma way ma to. Mbi be mbo ya gul num to, ɗaŋɗe, mbi mbo ya huy num wa.
40005018	Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no, zḛḛ ge go pḭḭ mage suwa burmi gezi, eeya koo fare ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma jin̰a num ma wa van a̰me go fyalag mbo kale gezi to baɗ, ḛ kuwa go num wa mbe ma mbo huy ne mbḛḛ.
40005019	A ge pe no, ndu ge mbo hele wa yuwaleya van a̰me ɗu ge no ge eeya ma zì pagal ya, koo hate nda duwana ma num ke mbe go waɗme, mbo kaɗ ndu ge waɗe jiyale ne ge muluk ge Dok ne zì yà. Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge mbo kaɗ-ɗa mboya ge num pagal, hate nda duwana ma num waɗme, mbo kaɗ ndu ge waɗe ga̰a̰l ne ge muluk ge Dok ne zì yà.
40005020	Ago mbi jan ḛ ne no, kaɗɗa ḛ kee fare ge temel taɗ waɗe nda ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne mage Farisi ma to ɗe, ḛ mbo waɗ ge muluk ge Dok ne zì to baɗ.
40005021	Ḛ ge kuwaya go, àa jin̰a ḛ baŋ ma go: «Mo mbo hun swày to. Ndu ge mbo hun swày ya, àa mbo kun sariya ne pagal.»
40005022	Kaɗɗa ge mbi, mbi jan ḛ go, ndu ge diige ge ne laa mbo hoɗ-ɗa ge na van ta, àa mbo dol ne ge sok njoɗ yal zì. Ndu ge mbo jan na na̰ van ya go Raka ! Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge kun sariya ma mbo kun sariya ge ne pagal. Ndu ge mbo sal na na̰ van ya go: Dale! Dok mbo dol ne ol ge be piriya to zì.
40005023	Kaɗɗa go mo gene ya mo bobo ge twal tuwaleya go, ge sok mboya go, mo seɗ go mo na̰ van dwaɗ sone go mo pagal,
40005024	n̰a mo bobo sok mbe go, ge twal tuwaleya ko se, mbo, mo ɓyare vin̰a ge ḛ eyal ta buwal guy, guwa̰, mo wa ɗege hon mo bobo mbe go.
40005025	Za̰a̰ tene avun cab ge mo kon ge huur, sok ge ḛ ge ne no gale ge vin̰a zì. Kaɗɗa go to, mo kon ge huur mbe mbo ɓyan mo ge ba ge kun sariya tok zì, ba ge kun sariya sḛ ge pool ɓyan mo ge asagar ma ga̰a̰l ge koy zok daŋay wa tok zì, asagar ma ga̰a̰l sḛ dibi mo ge daŋay zì me.
40005026	Fareba mbi jan mo ne no, be ge mo poɗ kaŋ ge mbiya mo zuu tene papandaŋ to, mo mbo waɗ ge zok daŋay zì ya zum to baɗ.
40005027	Ḛ ge kuwaya go, àa jin̰a ḛ baŋ ma go: «Mo mbo kee zina to.»
40005028	Kaɗɗa ge mbi, mbi jan ḛ go, ndu ge diige ge ndil ndu gwale ya, ne ene kaɗ ne pagal, kee zina ya kee zoo ge na dul wa zì ge ne.
40005029	Kaɗɗa mo sok a̰me ge mo duul ta ge ee mo ne deɗɗa, koo ne kaa mo ndwa matoson, zagle ne, mo dol ne gezi yà kaal ge mo. A kwaɗa ge mo pe, mo gaa ge ndwa lee ɗu, ge go mo sḛ ge ɓul mɔɗwag, àa doo mo ge sok njoɗ yal zì yà.
40005030	Kaɗɗa mo sok a̰me ge mo duul ta ge ee mo ne deɗɗa, koo ne kaa mo tok matoson, kṵṵ ne, mo dol ne gezi yà kaal ge mo. A kwaɗa ge mo pe, mo gaa ge tok lee ɗu, ge go mo sḛ ge ɓul mɔɗwag, àa doo mo ge sok njoɗ yal zì yà.
40005031	Ḛ ge kuwaya waɗme go, àa jin̰a ḛ baŋ ma go: «Ndu ge diige ge yan na gwale ya, ne ho̰ ne lawayta ge ngay go na yin̰a ne yan.»
40005032	Kaɗɗa ge mbi, mbi jan ḛ go: «Ndu ge diige ge yan na gwale ya, kaɗɗa na yin̰a ne ge zina pe to, ee ne kee zina. Ndu ge hee gwale ge àa yin̰a ne yan ya, kee zina waɗme.»
40005033	Ḛ ge kuwaya iya go, àa jin̰a ḛ baŋ ma go: «Kaŋ ge mo kee wa tii sok guni tene ge Bagezok ndwa se go mo mbo kee num ma peɗ, a ngaɗ go mo huy num wa.»
40005034	Kaɗɗa ge mbi, mbi jan ḛ go: Ne kaa ge ḛ guni ta to baɗ, koo ge pḭḭ, ago a sok ge Dok kaa no na hòol muluk pagal ne,
40005035	koo ge suwa, ago, a ne sok ee na ko ne, koo ge Jerusalem, ago a suwal ga̰a̰l ge gan ga̰a̰l nee ne.
40005036	Guni tene ge mo pagal to baɗ, ago mo be mbyaɗ seŋe mo pagal susu ɗu saal koo pisil to.
40005037	Kaɗɗa ḛ vinna kee a̰me, ḛ jin̰a bàŋ go, i kee ne ke, kaɗɗa ḛ kee to, ḛ jin̰a guwa go, i kee ne to. Fare ge ɗogle ge ḛ kan pagal ma mbo ge Ba ge zwam ta.
40005038	Ḛ ge kuwaya go, àa jin̰a ḛ baŋ ma go: «Ndu ge ɓaa na kon ndwa, àa ɓaa ne ndwa, ge hal na kon kin̰a, àa hal ne kin̰a waɗme.»
40005039	Kaɗɗa ge mbi, mbi jan ḛ go: Ne kaa ge ḛ poo kaŋ keeya ge laa pisil ma ge kaŋ keeya ge laa pisil to. Kaɗɗa ndu poɗ mo ya ge na tok guwa̰ ge mo gasa matoson go ndwa sen mo, seŋe ne lee magul waɗme.
40005040	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me ɓyare kaŋe mo ndwa ame mo ba̰a̰ kanna ge pul zige, n̰a ne mo ba̰a̰ ge yee gḛḛ waɗme.
40005041	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me ee mo ge pool mbo kilometr ɗu, mbo kilometr zi ge ne dagre.
40005042	Ho̰ ndu ge kaɗe mo, kuri ndu ge mbo ya mo ta ɓyare wul to.
40005043	Ḛ ge za̰a̰ ya go, ḛ baŋ ma ka janna go: «Mo laa wa̰a̰ mo rusu ma ɗeŋew, mo kuri mo kon ge ho̰o̰l gezi.»
40005044	Ɗaŋɗe mbi, mbi jan ḛ go: Ḛ laa wa̰a̰ ḛ nda ge ho̰o̰l ma. Ḛ ke kaɗeya ge num ge njon̰ ḛ ma pe.
40005045	Go mbe no, ḛ mbo kaɗ dinna ge ḛ Ba ge no pḭḭ ma zì yà go. Ge dape, ndaa gyala ge nda ge laa pisil mage kwaɗa ma pagal, suwa mam ge nda ge temel mage temel to ma pagal waɗme.
40005046	Kaɗɗa ḛ laa wan nda ge num laa wa̰a̰ ḛ ma ɗeŋew ɗe, ḛ mbo seɗ mà tok kon̰a de? Koo nda ge chal siyal ma puy, àa kee mbe go waɗme ɗe!
40005047	Kaɗɗa ḛ san wa ḛ na̰ van ma ɗeŋew ɗe, ḛ kee ma̰ kaŋ ge ciciliŋ de? Koo nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma puy, àa kee mbe go waɗme ɗe!
40005048	Ḛ kaa nda ge mbyaɗɗa tab ma ge mojo̰o̰ ḛ Ba ge no pḭḭ ma zì yà go.
40006001	Zeso gwan jan go, ḛ koy ta ge ngay temel ge ḛ ḛ ge nda duwana ma ndwa go, ge dwaɗɗa ge go num dore ḛ. Kaɗɗa go to, ḛ mbo seɗ poɗɗa ge ḛ Ba ge no ge pḭḭ ma zì yà ta to.
40006002	Sok ge mo ɗege mbaa ndu ge hoɗegeya a̰me go, kaa ge mo sun ne tuŋ ge mo ndwa zḛḛ dinna ge nda ge mbuɗi nda ndwa ma kee ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way ma zì, ge vin̰a kin̰a ma go go to me. Àa kee ano mbe ndwa go maa see doreya ge nda duwana ma ta. Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no: Àa seɗ maa tok kon̰a ma ya seɗ zoo.
40006003	Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge mo ɗege mbaa ndu ge hoɗegeya a̰me go, ne kaa ge mo tok magul kuwa kaŋ ge mo tok matoson zige to.
40006004	Go mbe no, mo mbaaya mbe wa kaɗ wayya zì. Mo Ba ge kuwa kaŋ ge mo kee ne wayya zì mbo poɗ mo.
40006005	Sok ge ḛ kaɗ kee kaɗeya go, ḛ ke ge mojo̰o̰ nda ge mbuɗi nda ndwa ma kee go to. Num laa wa̰a̰ kee kaɗeya mḛḛya digi ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way ma zì, ge vin̰a ga̰a̰ ma go ndwa go nda duwana ma kuwa maa. Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no: Àa seɗ maa tok kon̰a ma ya seɗ zoo.
40006006	Kaɗɗa ge mo, sok ge mo ɗege kee kaɗeya, guwa̰ tene ge mo zok wa zì, wa̰a̰ zok wa ya ge mo pagal, kaɗe ge mo Ba ge ndu kuwa ne to ta, mo Ba ge kuwa kaŋ ge mo kee ne wayya zì mbo poɗ mo.
40006007	Sok kee kaɗeya go, ne kaa ge mo zuli fare ge bàŋ kay ma se janna dinna ge nda ge kuwa Dok to ma go to. Àa dwaɗ go Dok za̰a̰ maa ge fare janna ge maa way ge gḛḛ ma ta.
40006008	Ne kaa ge ḛ ke dinna ca ge num sḛ ma kee go to. Ago zḛḛ ge go ḛ kaɗe ne a̰me, ḛ Ba kuwa kaŋ ge ḛ ɓyare ne kuwa.
40006009	Ḛ kuwa go ḛ mbiya kee kaɗeya pe gyana de: «I Ba ge no pḭḭ ma zì yà! N̰a mo dḭḭl ne kaa harcal .
40006010	N̰a mo muluk ne mbo ya. N̰a ndu ge diige ne ke laa ɓyareya ge amo Ge suwa pagal dinna ge a kee no ge pḭḭ zì yà go.
40006011	Ho̰ i kaŋ zam mà ge mbyaɗ dwam.
40006012	Pore i n̰aal ma dinna ge i pore nda ge ke i n̰aal ma go waɗme.
40006013	N̰a i deɗ ge pe heeya zì to. Ɗaŋɗe, mo̰o̰ i ge Ba ge zwam tok go. [Ago muluk, pool ge ɓaŋlaŋ, pateya me, Àa amo ma ne ge zaman ma go peɗ. Amin !]»
40006014	Mbi jan ḛ ano mbe ge dape, kaɗɗa ḛ pore ḛ ka̰a̰m n̰aal ge kee ḛ num ma ya, ḛ Ba ge no pḭḭ ma zì yà mbo pore ḛ waɗme.
40006015	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ḛ pore num ya to, ḛ Ba ge no ge pḭḭ ma zì yà mbo pore ḛ n̰aal ma to baɗ.
40006016	Sok ge ḛ wan mam njuwal, ḛ suwa̰me ḛ ndwa ma dinna ge nda ge mbuɗi nda ndwa ma go to. Àa suu maa ndwa ma se leɗeɗ, ndwa ngay nda go maa wa̰a̰ mam njuwal. Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no: Àa seɗ maa tok kon̰a ma ya seɗ zoo.
40006017	Sok ge mo ɗege wan mam njuwal, usi mo ndwa gezi, mo naŋe mo pagal nùm,
40006018	ne kaa ge mo ngay nda go mo wa̰a̰ mam njuwal to, ɗeŋew mo Ba ge no sok wayya zì kuwa nee ne. Ne ge kuwa kaŋ ge mo kee ne sok wayya zì mbo poɗ mo.
40006019	Ne kaa ge ḛ kwate kaŋ gan ma ge ta pe ge suwa pagal to. Ago àa ge pool wan kaareya koo wagal zam num, àa vḛḛne gezi. Kaɗɗa go to puy, chala ma zuɗ zok, àa ɔwabe num.
40006020	Ɗaŋɗe, ḛ kwate kaŋ gan ma ge pḭḭ zì yà. Ge sok mbe yà, àa kaare to, buli zam num koo chala ma zuɗ zok mbo chel num to me.
40006021	Ago, sok ge mo kaŋ gan ma no ne go, mo dwaɗɗa ma mɔɗwag gaa sok mbe yà waɗme.
40006022	Ndwa a dinna ge lampe go ge ndu duwana pe. Kaɗɗa mo ndwa tuguɗi to, mo sḛ duul ge ɓul mɔɗwag a ge kɔn̰al go.
40006023	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa mo ndwa tuguɗi, mo duul ge ɓul mɔɗwag a ge tṵṵ ge ɗeɗeg zì. Kaɗɗa kɔn̰al ge mo zige a tṵṵ ge ɗeɗeg ne, tṵṵ ge ɗeɗeg mbe ge mo zige kaɗ pisil mà ndwa gyana ga de?
40006024	Ndu a̰me ge kaɗ moor ge nda zi diŋ to, ago mbo seŋe ge ɗu na guwa̰, ne laa wan gegene. To puy, mbo mbarge tene ge ɗu, mbo kuri gegene me. Ḛ ge pool kee tèmel ge Dok mage bware pe go jwàg to.
40006025	A ge pe mbi jan ḛ no go: «Ne kaa ge ḛ iigi ta ge kaŋ ge mbiya ḛ zamma mage njoɗɗa pe ɗoo, ḛ wa mbo kaɗ ge ndwa to, koo ge ba̰a̰ ge mbiya ḛ laa ḛ pe pe to me.» Kàɗɗa ge ndwa ge ndu duwana ne waɗe kaŋ zam to de? Sḛ duul ge ne ne waɗe ba̰a̰ to de?
40006026	Ḛ ndi njoole ge ɗege no pḭḭ zì ma gale! Àa zare kaŋ rusu to, àa syaɗ a̰me to me, koo àa kwate a̰me ge hal ma se to, go no puy, ḛ Ba ge no pḭḭ zì yà ka wal num. Ndwa gyana ga ge ḛ waɗe num no de?
40006027	A huɗi ne ge ḛ buwal zì sok iigi tene go ɗoo, wa seɗ vin̰a ge dol dwam ya koo ɗu ge dwam kàɗɗa ge Dok ho̰ na num ma pagal de?
40006028	Ge dape, ḛ wa ka iigi ta ge fare ge ba̰a̰ ne pe de? Ḛ kuwa buu ge don no ge ful zì ma wa folla ma kale gale! Àa kee tèmel to me no, àa paare ba̰a̰ to me,
40006029	go no puy ɗe, mbi jan ḛ go koo gan ga̰a̰l Salomo̰ sḛ ge na pagal, ge kaŋ kwaɗa ge na no ge num ma peɗ puy, be kan ba̰a̰ ge siŋli dinna ge a̰me ɗu ge num buwal zige go to.
40006030	Kaɗɗa Dok nuusi buu ge don no ful zì ma siŋli mbe go, num ge nè kuwa num no màno ma, kin̰are àa goole num kan ol zì, go mbe no, ne sḛ ge pool hon ḛ ba̰a̰ ge siŋli waɗeya ma to de? Ḛ nda ge hoɗ fareba hoɗege guwa ma!
40006031	Ne kaa ge ḛ sṵṵ ta, sok janna go: I mà mbo zam da de? Koo i mà mbo njoɗ da de? Koo ge i mà seɗ ma̰ kaŋ ge kan ge i ta de to?
40006032	Ago, ḛ Ba ge no pḭḭ ma zì yà ge kuwaya go ḛ ɓyare kaŋ mbe ma ɓyare peɗ. Kaŋ mbe ma no peɗ, a nda ge kuwa Dok to ma iigi ta ge num pe ne.
40006033	Ɗaŋɗe, kaŋ ge waɗe, ge ḛ mbiya kee ne, a yan muluk ge Dok ne pe mage ngay temel ge ne ne. Kaŋ gegene mbe ma no peɗ, Dok mbo hon ḛ num waɗme.
40006034	Go mbe no, ne kaa ge ḛ iigi ta ge dwam ge kin̰are pe to, ge dape, dwam ge kin̰are ge na fare ma waɗme. Dwam ge diige mbiya tene ge na yal ma.
40007001	Ḛ kṵṵ sariya ge ndu a̰me pagal to, ndwa go Dok sḛ kṵṵ ḛ sariya to me.
40007002	Ago Dok mbo kun sariya ge ḛ pagal ge mojo̰o̰ ḛ kun sariya no ge nda pagal go me. Àa mbo kee ḛ kaŋ ge ḛ kee nda gegene ma ne me.
40007003	Kee pe gyana, mo wa ka kuwa sugu ge no mo na̰ van ndwa zì ɗag ɗoo, mo wa kuwa ɔwara murguli ge no mo ndwa zì to me de?
40007004	Koo kee pe gyana mo wa jan mo na̰ van go: N̰a mbi hee sugu van ge lerbeŋ ge no mo ndwa zì gezi, zane no, mo ge ɔwara murguli ge mo ndwa zì me de?
40007005	Ge mbuɗi nda ndwa, ee pe ndage ɔwara murguli ge mo ndwa zige gale ɓiya, guwa̰ go mo wa kuwa gyana ge mbo ndage sugu ge mo na̰ van ndwa zige me.
40007006	Kaŋ ge go na harcal, ḛ doo juu ma ne to, ne kaa ge num seŋe ta ya ḛ pagal gàn ḛ to. Ḛ ka̰a̰ kaŋ ge yee gḛḛ ma gezi to, a dinna ge ḛ mà kan yìn̰a ma ya ge kosoŋ ma ko pul se go, ne kaa ge num ndaa num ge maa ko se to.
40007007	Ḛ kaɗe kaŋ ge ḛ ɓyare, àa mbo hon ḛ ne, ḛ yin̰a kaŋ ge ḛ ɓyare pe, ḛ mbo seɗ ne, ḛ dabe zok wa, àa mbo hage ḛ ne.
40007008	Ago ndu ge diige ge ele a̰me, àa hon ne ne hon, ndu ge ɓyare a̰me seɗ ne seɗ, ndu ge dabe zok wa, àa mbo hage ne ne.
40007009	A huɗi ne ḛ buwal zì, sok ge ne van ele ne katugum go ɗoo, wa hee njal hon ne de?
40007010	Koo sok ele ne sini go ɗoo, wa ɔwabe bwam hon ne de?
40007011	Go mbe no, ḛ ge sone ma zoo me, kaɗɗa ḛ kuwa kaŋ ge kwaɗa ma hon ḛ van ma kuwa, ḛ Ba ge no pḭḭ ma zì yà mbo hon num ge ele na kaŋ ge kwaɗa ma gyana ga de?
40007012	Kaŋ ge ḛ ɓyare go nda ke ḛ num ma peɗ, ḛ sḛ ma waɗme, ḛ ke nda num mbe go me. Ago, a eeya ge Moyiz ne mage fare ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma njaŋe num ma ne, ndwa go nda mbo ge num pagal.
40007013	Ḛ wuwa zok wa ge gwarse, ago zok wa ge a̰a̰l gene nda mbo banna, vin̰a ge gene nda mbo ne yà fiyal. Nda ge hee vin̰a mbe ma gḛḛ.
40007014	Ɗaŋɗe, zok wa ge gwarse gene nda mbo ndwa ge fareba zì, vin̰a ge gene nda mbo ne yà ɓermem. Nda ge hee vin̰a mbe ma hoɗege guwa.
40007015	Ḛ koy ta kwaɗa ge nda ge kee ta nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma ta. Àa mbo ya ge ḛ ta ge diir ge tame ma way, zane no, àa bagomso ge kacage ḛ ma ne.
40007016	Ḛ mbo kuwa num ge num kaŋ keeya ma ta. Àa hel on̰or ndwa tolla ma ge ɔwara kore ma ta hel de? Koo fere ndwa tolla ma ge ɔwara kilbiŋ ma ta hel me de?
40007017	Ɔwara ge kwaɗa ge diige tol ndwa ge kwaɗa ma, ɗaŋɗe, ɔwara ge buusul ge diige tol ndwa ge buusul ma me.
40007018	Ɔwara ge kwaɗa mbyaɗ tol ndwa ge buusul ma to, koo ɔwara ge buusul tol ndwa ge kwaɗa ma to me.
40007019	Ɔwara ge diige ge tol ndwa ge kwaɗa to, àa chal ne, àa dol ne ol zì.
40007020	Go mbe no, ḛ mbo kuwa nda ge kee ta nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma ge num kaŋ keeya ma ta.
40007021	A be num peɗ ge tol mbi go: Bagezok, Bagezok ma mbo waɗ ne ge muluk ge Dok ne zì to. Ɗaŋɗe, àa num ge kee laa ɓyareya ge mbi Ba ge no pḭḭ ma zì yà ne ma ɗeŋew.
40007022	Ge dwam kun sariya go, nda gḛḛ mbo ka tol mbi go: Bagezok, Bagezok! Àa ka jan mbi go: I dee be ka jan ka̰a̰l ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma way ge mo dḭḭl to de? I dee be ka yan on̰om ge sone ma zum ge mo dḭḭl to de? A be ge mo dḭḭl ta ɗoo, i ka kee kaŋ ajab ma no gḛḛ-gḛḛ me to de?
40007023	Sok mbe go, mbi mbo jan num zum waŋ go: Mbi be kuwa ḛ to baɗ, ḛ wa̰a̰ ta ge ziya yà kaal ge mbi, ḛ nda ge kee n̰aal ma!
40007024	Ago, fare mbe ge mbi hate ḛ num ya ma no, ndu ge diige ge ame num ya, ka kee tèmel ge num pagal, mbo kaɗ dinna ge ndu ge zwam ge sḭḭ na zok ge gon̰ pagal go.
40007025	Sok ge mam suwa njanjal, mam muni soor ya ge zok mbe ta, sa̰a̰m ka poɗ ne, ɗaŋɗe, zok mbe be gul se to, ge dape, ne pe doo ge gon̰ pagal.
40007026	Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge diige ge za̰a̰ num za̰a̰ cuɗ, kee tèmel ge num pagal to, mbo kaɗ dinna ge ndu ge dàle ge sḭḭ na zok ge kafeɗem pul go go.
40007027	Sok ge mam suwa njanjal, mam muni soor ya ge zok mbe ta, sa̰a̰m ka poɗ ne, zok mbe gul se ge ɓul mɔɗwag.
40007028	Sok ge Zeso aa na fare hateya mbe ma go, ɓase mbe ge nɔnɔg ma ka kee ajab ge ne fare hateya mbe ma pe.
40007029	Ago, ka hate num ge pool ge Dok hon na ne, be ge mojo̰o̰ num Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma hate go to.
40008001	Sok ge Zeso ndee ge njal digi ya se, ɓase mbe ge nɔnɔg ma ɗege kàre ne pe.
40008002	Ndi! Ndu ge kṵṵ swàm a̰me zuɗ ge suwa̰me ya, mbo ya guu na ko ge ne ndwa se, jan ne go: Bagezok, kaɗɗa mo vinna, mo ge pool zon mbi, mbi wa haɗ kɔn̰al.
40008003	Zeso ee na tok ge ne ta, jan ne go: «Mbi vinna go, see zonna.» Ge sok mbe go gaw, ndu ge kṵṵ swàm mbe haɗ kɔn̰al, ne bol haɗ somndol mbambala me.
40008004	Guwa̰, Zeso jan ne go: Za̰a̰ mbi kwaɗa, ne kaa ge ndu a̰me za̰a̰ fare mbe to, gaa go mo mbo ngay tene ge ba ge kee tuwaleya ta, mo hon bobo ge Moyiz ho na wa ge ne pe ndwa go, ne kaa sayda ge nda ta peɗ go, mo zon-na go.
40008005	Sok ge Zeso ɗege waɗ mbo ge suwal Kapernawom diŋ, ga̰a̰l ge asagar ge kis ma way mbo ya ge ne ta,
40008006	kaɗe ne go: Bagezok, mbi ndu ge tèmel fii diŋ yà looɗeya, njoɗ yal ya gḛḛ.
40008007	Zeso jan ne go: Mbi mbo mbo, mbi mà zon ne.
40008008	Ga̰a̰l ge asagar ge kis ma way gwan ge ne janna go: Bagezok, mbi be mbyaɗ ge go mo waɗ mbi zok wa to, ago ho mo wa gagag, mbi ndu ge tèmel mà seɗ zonna.
40008009	Ago, mbi sḛ waɗme, mbi ge ga̰a̰l ma ge mbi ndwa zḛḛ, mbi kaɗ ge asagar ma ge mbi pe se me. Mbi jan a̰me ya go: Mbo sok gene yà go! Ne sḛ mbo ɓal. Ndu gegene: Mbo ya go go! Mbo yà me. Mbi jan mbi ndu ge tèmel ya go: Ke mbi kaŋ gegene mbe no! Kee ne ɓal.
40008010	Sok ge Zeso za̰a̰ ne fare mbe ma go, kee ajab gḛḛ, jan num ge ka kàre na pe ma go: Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no: Mbi be seɗ ndu ge hoɗ fareba ge na dul wa zì ya ge go mbe pe ɗu to koo ge Izrayel suwa pagal mɔɗwag.
40008011	Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no, rusu ge ɗogle ma mbo mbo ge lee mbii mage lee kuu ya, àa mbo ɓan kàɗɗa dagre ge ḛ baŋ ma, Abraham, Isak mage Jakob ge taabul ge ɗu wa go, ge muluk ge Dok ne zì yà.
40008012	Ɗaŋɗe, rusu ge muluk mbe ee ge num pe ma, àa mbo kan num zum yà, ge sok ge tṵṵ ge ɗeɗeg ge nda oy fiyaso mage sul kin̰a no ne go.
40008013	Guwa̰, Zeso jan ga̰a̰l ge asagar ge kis ma way mbe go: Guwa̰ mo yà, ge hoɗ fareba ge mo pagal, kaŋ ge mo ele, mà kee mbe go tem. Sok ge Zeso jin̰a ne fare mbe go gaw, ne ndu ge tèmel mbe seɗ zonna.
40008014	Guwa̰, Zeso hee vin̰a mbo ge Piyer yà. Sok ge dee yà, seɗ ne tisi ge gwale, mbɔgwam dol ne ya se.
40008015	Wan ne tok, ne duul kan ne, guwa̰, ɗege digi ndwa kee kaŋ zam hon ne.
40008016	Guwa̰ ge gyala dḭḭ se go, àa gene ne nda ge no ge on̰om ge sone ma ya gḛḛ-gḛḛ. Ge ne fare janna ma ta gagag, ee on̰om ge sone mbe ma waɗ zum ge num mbe ma zì, zon nda ge tuguɗi ge ɗogle ma peɗ waɗme.
40008017	Kê ano mbe ndwa huy fare ge Nda ge zwagre Dok wa Ezay dee jin̰a ne go: «He i yal ma ge na pagal go, zo̰o̰ i ge i tuguɗi ma zì no me.»
40008018	Sok ge Zeso kuwa ɓase ma vee maa se, hoɗ na nda ge ame hateya ma na wa go, maa ha mbo mangaɗam ga̰a̰l wa lee gene yà.
40008019	Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne a̰me ɗu, gwan tene ya ge ne ta zì guwa, jan ne go: Ba ge hateya, mbi mbo kàre mo pe, ge sok ge mo mbo mbo ya num go ma peɗ.
40008020	Zeso gwan ge ne janna go: Bole ma ge maa tàal ma, njoole ge pḭḭ zige ma ge maa zok ma me. Ɗaŋɗe, Mbi, Van ge Ndu ne be sok a̰me ge paa na pagal zì.
40008021	Ndu a̰me ɗu, ge ne nda ge ame hateya ge ɓase ma buwal zì, jan ne go: Bagezok, n̰a, mbi gale mbuu mbi ba ɓiya.
40008022	Ɗaŋɗe, Zeso gwan ge ne janna go: N̰a nda ge suu suu paŋ ma mbul maa swày ma, mo sḛ, kare mbi pe ya.
40008023	Guwa̰, Zeso nde ge faa ga̰a̰l go, ne nda ge ame hateya ma nde ge ne pe go waɗme.
40008024	Ndi! Sa̰a̰m labreya dol-la ge mangaɗam ga̰a̰l pul go gaw. Sḭ̀ḭl ɗege kan mam ya faa go. Ano puy, Zeso dwam se.
40008025	Ne nda ge ame hateya ma mbo ya kore ne digi, àa jan ne go: Bagezok mo̰o̰ i, i mbo go swày.
40008026	Ne sḛ gwan ge num janna go: Ge dape, ḛ wa ka ndaɗ voo go de, ge hoɗ fareba hoɗege ma? Ge sok mbe go, ɗege digi, ngwabe sa̰a̰m mage sḭ̀ḭl, sok mbo ya mḛḛya cub.
40008027	Nda peɗ ka ke ajab, àa ka ele ta, ta buwal zì go: Hii! A huɗi ne go ɗoo, sa̰a̰m mage mangaɗam ga̰a̰l ma wa ka za̰a̰ ne go de?
40008028	Sok ge Zeso mage na nda ge ame hateya ma dee ge mangaɗam ga̰a̰l wa lee gene yà, ge suwa ge nda ge Gadara ma way go, nda a̰me ma zi ge no ge on̰om ge sone ma ge maa zì ma waɗ ge tugul ge sok mbul ta ne zì ya, àa ka mbo ya ge ne ndwa zì. Num laa kaa ol ge go ndu a̰me tal tene kale ge vin̰a mbe go to.
40008029	Ndi! Àa ɗege oy digi ge ka̰a̰l ndaal go: Dok Van ndo! Mo ɓyare da i ta de? Mo mbo ya go go iigi i be ge go i sok gale mbyaɗ to peɗ de?
40008030	Zane no, vwag kosoŋ ma wa ya ɓyare kaŋ zam, ge ziya yà kaal nde ge num.
40008031	On̰om ge sone ma ka gwarge ta Zeso ta, àa ka jan ne go: Kaɗɗa mo yan i, vḭḭ go i wuwa ge vwag ge kosoŋ ma way mbe no zì.
40008032	Vin num, jan num go: Ḛ mbo! Àa ndage ya zum ge seger ge zi mbe ma zì mbo waɗ ge kosoŋ ma zì. Ge sok mbe go gaw, vwag ge kosoŋ ma way ge na ɓul mɔɗwag njeɗ soo ge wa kal digi ya mbo mangaɗam ga̰a̰l se yà, àa puu gezi mɔɗwag.
40008033	Nda ge ka koy kosoŋ ma sok kuwa ano mbe go, àa chiya mbo suwal ga̰a̰l diŋ yà wan nda fare pe ge kaŋ ge maa kuwa num ma peɗ, ge zonna ge nda mbe ge zi ge kaa ge on̰om ge sone maa zì ma way me.
40008034	Sok mbe go gaw, nda kan ge suwal ga̰a̰l diŋ ya mɔɗwag mbo ya ge Zeso ndwa zì. Sok ge àa kuwa ne, àa jan ne go: I kaɗe mo kaɗe, n̰a i suwa, mo mbo sok ge ɗogle.
40009001	Guwa̰ ge àa tele Zeso go, a ge na nda ge ame hateya ma ndee faa ga̰a̰l go, àa gwan-na haaya mbo suwal ga̰a̰l ge ne sḛ kaa ne diŋ swag go.
40009002	Sok ge àa dee ya diŋ, nda a̰me ma in ndu ge looɗeya a̰me ya fiiya saŋal go ge ne ta. Sok ge Zeso kuwa hoɗ fareba ge num way, jan ndu ge looɗeya mbe go: Ee mo dul wa se, mbi van! Mbi pore mo sone ma ya go.
40009003	Ge fare mbe no pe, nda ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne a̰me ma ɗege jan ta ta buwal zì go, ndu mbe jan fare ge sone kakatag ya ge Dok pagal ba!
40009004	Ajo̰o̰ Zeso ka kuwa num dwaɗɗa ma kuwa, jan num go: Ge dape, ḛ wa kaɗ ge dwaɗɗa ge sone ma ge ḛ dul wa ma zì go de?
40009005	Jan ndu ge looɗeya mbe go: Mbi pore mo sone ma go me no, ɗege digi mḛḛya mo ko ma pagal me ɗe, a ge diige dṵṵl gḛḛ ne zoo de?
40009006	Ge sego, mbi kee ḛ kuwaya go, Van ge Ndu ne ge pool ge suwa pagal ge pore nda duwana ma num sone ma. Guwa̰, jan ndu ge looɗeya mbe go: Ɗege digi, he mo daŋ, mbo mo yà.
40009007	Ne sḛ ɗege digi, dol tene mbo na yà.
40009008	Sok ge ɓase ma kuwa kaŋ mbe ge ke, voo wan num, àa ɗege sale Dok ge ne ho̰ nda duwana ma pool ge go mbe no pe.
40009009	Guwa̰ ge Zeso ɗege ge sok mbe ya, ge sok mboya go, kuwa ndu a̰me ɗu ge àa tol ne Mata kàɗɗa ge na sok tèmel ge chal siyal ne go. Zeso jan ne go: Mbo ya mbi pe go. Ne sḛ ɗege ge na sok mbe go, mbo ge ne pe yà.
40009010	Deɗ-ɗa dwam a̰me go go, Zeso mage na nda ge ame hateya ma ka zam kaŋ zam ge Mata diŋ. Nda ge chal siyal ma gḛḛ, ge nda ge kee sone ma me, àa mbo ya zam kaŋ zam ge num ge na nda ge ame hateya ma ge sok mbe go.
40009011	Sok ge Farisi ma kuwa ano mbe go, àa jan ne nda ge ame hateya ma go: Kee pe gyana ḛ Ba ge hate nda wa ka zam kaŋ zam ge nda ge chal siyal mage nda ge kee sone ma me de?
40009012	Sok ge num fare janna mbe ma dee ya Zeso tɔgwa zì, jan num go: A be nda ge duul pool ma ɓyare Ba ge zon nda pe ne to, ɗaŋɗe, àa num ge tuguɗi ma. Mbi be mbo ya ge nda ge temel ma pe to, ge num ge ke sone ma pe.
40009013	Ke kwaɗa go, ḛ mbo hale fare ge Dok jin̰a num ge Maktub ge na ne zì ma pe go: «Mbi ɓyareya go nda duwana ma kuwa ta a̰se, be tuwaleya ge àa kee num hon mbi ma to. Kaɗɗa ge mbi, mbi be mbo ya ge nda ge temel ma pe to, ɗaŋɗe, ge num ge kee sone ma pe.»
40009014	Ge sok mbe go, nda ge ame hateya ge Yohana ba ge kee nda baptem ne a̰me ma gwan ta ya Zeso ta zì, àa ele ne go: I sḛ ma ɓanna ge Farisi ma, i wan mam njuwal go ɗaɗag me, mo nda ge ame hateya ma daa wan mam njuwal to ge ma̰ fare pe de?
40009015	Zeso gwan ge num janna go: Gwale jin̰al obe kondore ma ge pool kee kiimi, teg ge num kondore gale no go ge num de? Sok ge gwale jin̰al obe mbo kaɗɗa to, sok mbe go, àa wa ɗege wan mam njuwal go.
40009016	Ndu a̰me ge hee ba̰a̰ wa ge jin̰al dyan ba̰a̰ ge kamal ge ne go de? Kee ne ya mbe go ɗe, ba̰a̰ wa ge jin̰al mbe mbo taabe ba̰a̰ ge kamal ya ge na ta mɔɗwag, ne ndwal mbe mbo gwan a̰a̰le se waɗeya.
40009017	Koo ndu a̰me ge kan on̰or jìn̰al ge jin̰al ge ɗutulu ge kamal zì go de? Kaɗɗa na kan ne ya mbe go, ago on̰or jìn̰al ge jin̰al fol ɗutulu mbe gezi. On̰or jìn̰al mage ɗutulu mbe vḛḛne gezi jwàg. Ɗaŋɗe, ɓyare go àa ka̰a̰ on̰or jìn̰al ge jin̰al ge ɗutulu ge jin̰al zì. Go mbe no, àa wa kaɗ koyya kwaɗa go.
40009018	Sok ge Zeso ka jan num fare mbe ma go, ga̰a̰l a̰me ɗu zuɗ-ɗa, mbo ya guu na ko ne ndwa se, jan ne go: Mbi van ge gwale suu kee ya swag, mo mà mbo ja ee mo tok ge ne ta, mà tan.
40009019	Zeso ɗege digi, a ge na nda ge ame hateya ma ɓan mboya dagre ge ne.
40009020	Sok mboya go, gwale a̰me ɗu ge swàm kan ge ne ta, ge kee ya del wol pɔgwa zi ge ne, seŋe tene ge Zeso guwa̰ ya, mbo ya taɗ ne ba̰a̰ wa.
40009021	Ke ano mbe ge dape, kaa ge hoɗ fareba go, na mà dabe ya ne ba̰a̰ wa guwa puy, na mà seɗ zonna.
40009022	Zeso seŋe tene se, sok ge kuwa ne, jan ne go: Ee mo dul wa se, mbi van, hoɗ fareba ge mo zon mo ya go. Ge sok mbe go gaw, gwale mbe seɗ zonna.
40009023	Sok ge Zeso dee ya ge ga̰a̰l mbe diŋ, kuwa nda ge sun gal ge swày ne ma, ge ɓase ge ka kirgi ta ge fiyaso ma me,
40009024	jan num go: Ḛ wa̰a̰ ta gezi, ago van kale mbe be suu suu to, fii dwam. Àa ɗege man ne.
40009025	Sok ge yin̰a ɓase ma ya zum, waɗ van kale pagal zì yà, wan ne tok, van kale mbe tan.
40009026	Kṵwa̰ ge fare mbe ne dasare ge sok ma go peɗ.
40009027	Guwa̰ ge Zeso ɗege ge sok mbe ya, ɓaal ma zi ka kàre ne pe, àa ka oyya go: Gan ga̰a̰l Daviɗ Baŋ, kuwa i a̰se nde no de!
40009028	Sok ge dee ya zok diŋ, ɓaal mbe ma waɗ-ɗa ne pe diŋ. Zeso ele num go: Ḛ hoɗ fareba ya go go mbi ge pool kee kaŋ mbe ge ḛ ele mbi ne no de? Àa gwan ne vinna go: O̰o̰ Bagezok!
40009029	Sok mbe go, ee na tok ge num ndwa ma go, jan num go: Ge fareba hoɗɗa ge ḛ ḛ ma pagal, ḛ see zonna.
40009030	Num ndwa ma tyan gezi gaw. Guwa̰, Zeso mḛḛre num ol kekeŋ go, num koy ta kwaɗa, ne kaa ge ndu a̰me za̰a̰ fare mbe to.
40009031	Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge àa wuwa ya zum gaw, àa ɗege dasare kaŋ ge Zeso kê mbe ge sok ma go peɗ.
40009032	Ge sok waɗ zum ge ɓaal mbe ma way go, àa ka gene ndu ge no ge on̰om ge sone na zì ge ɗel taɗɗa se ya ge Zeso ta.
40009033	Sok ge yin̰a on̰om mbe ge sone ge ne zì, ndu ge ɗel taɗɗa mbe ɗege faa wa. Ɓase ma mbo ya kee ajab, àa ka janna go: Kaŋ ge go mbe pe be kee ge Izrayel van ma buwal zì dwam ɗu to.
40009034	Ɗaŋɗe, Farisi ma ka janna go: A ga̰a̰l ge on̰om ge sone ma way hon ne pool ge yan on̰om ge sone mbe ma ne.
40009035	Zeso ka zwagre tene mboya ge suwal ga̰a̰l mage suwal jiyale ma diŋ peɗ, ka hate nda ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way ma zì, ka oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge muluk ge Dok ne pe, ka zon tuguɗi mage sulugu ge diige ma pe peɗ.
40009036	Sok ge kuwa ɓase ma mbwaɗɗa lulum na pe go, àa kaɗ taneya kakatag, ndwa suuya se leɗeɗ dinna ge tame ge be ba ge koy maa ma go, kuwa num a̰se.
40009037	Ge sok mbe go, jan na nda ge ame hateya ma go: Ɓase mbe ma dinna ge gaaso ge danjan̰ ge zo̰o̰ zon go, ɗaŋɗe, nda ge kee ne tèmel ma hoɗege.
40009038	Ago ḛ kaɗe Bagezok, ne teme nda ge kee tèmel ma ya ge na gaaso zì.
40010001	Guwa̰, Zeso tol na nda ge ame hateya ge wol pɔgwa zi ma ya se, hon num pool ge yan on̰om ge sone ma, ge zon tuguɗi mage sulugu ge diige pe ma peɗ me.
40010002	Nda ge ame hateya ge wol pɔgwa zi mbe ge seŋe ya nda ge temeya ma dḭḭl ma no: Ge zḛḛge, Simo̰ ge àa tol ne Piyer, Andre ge ne na̰ van, Jak ge Zebede van mage na na̰ van Yohana,
40010003	Filib mage Bartelemi, Tomas mage Mata ndu ge chal siyal, Jak ge Alfe van mage Tade,
40010004	Simo̰ ge iyal kyarga ge na suwal pe, Yudas ge àa tol ne Iskariyoɗ, ne ge mbo dee yaɗ Zeso ya gezi me.
40010005	Num mbe ge wol pɔgwa zi ge Zeso too num ya ma, sok teme num go, ho num na wa no go: Ḛ mbo no! Ḛ mbo ge nda ge no pe rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma ta to, ḛ waɗ ge suwal ga̰a̰l ge nda ge Samari ma way ma diŋ to me.
40010006	Ne kwaɗa go, ḛ mbo ge Izrayel van ma ta, num ge no ge tame ge ba̰a̰ ma go.
40010007	Sok anna oy fare go, ḛ ka jan nda go, sok ge Dok kee muluk mbyaɗɗa go.
40010008	Ḛ zo̰o̰ nda ge kee tuguɗi ma, ḛ ta̰a̰ nda ge swày ma, ḛ zo̰o̰ nda ge kṵṵ swàm ma num haa kɔn̰al, ḛ yin̰a on̰om ge sone ma me. Ago ḛ see pool mbe boo, ḛ zo̰o̰ nda boo me.
40010009	Ḛ he koo dinar, koo bware saal, koo silay ge ḛ patar ma zì to,
40010010	koo galam ge mbo gɔswal, koo ba̰a̰ ge eya ta, koo tyako ge ɗogle to, koo hee calaŋ. Ago ndu ge kee tèmel hoɗege na kaŋ zam to.
40010011	Sok ge ḛ mbo waɗ-ɗa ge suwal ga̰a̰l koo ge jiyale a̰me diŋ, ḛ ele fare pe kwaɗa, ḛ mbo ge ndu ge mà vin tene ya ame ḛ na diŋ, ḛ kaɗ ne diŋ ɗiŋ ḛ dwam waɗ zum go.
40010012	Sok waɗ ge ndu mbe diŋ go, ḛ jin̰a nda ge zok diŋ-ge ma go, halas ne kaa ge zok no diŋ.
40010013	Kaɗɗa àa ame ḛ ya, ago halas mbe kaa ge num diŋ. Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa àa kuri ḛ ya, ḛ wa guwa̰ ya ge ḛ pagal.
40010014	Sok ge àa mbo ame ḛ ya to, àa vin fare ge ḛ jan maa ma to me ɗe, sok waɗ zum ge zok mbe diŋ koo ge suwal ga̰a̰l mbe diŋ go, ḛ poy ḛ ko kuci ma ge sok mbe ma go, ndwa ngayya go, ḛ kuri num kuri babaɗ.
40010015	Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no: Ge dwam ge Dok mbo dee ɗege ya kun sariya go, mbo ee dṵṵl ge yan̰a ge nda mbe ma no pagal, waɗe nda ge suwa Sodom mage Gomor ge na dee tii num wal gezi ma way ma.
40010016	Ḛ za̰a̰ mbi kwaɗa, mbi teme ḛ no, ḛ mbo kaɗ dinna ge tame ma go ge bagomso ma buwal zì. Ḛ kaa zwam yaŋ-yaŋ dinna ge bwam ma go, ḛ kaɗ suul dinna ge maale ma go me.
40010017	Ḛ koy ta kwaɗa ge fare ge mbo seɗ ḛ ya ma pe. Nda a̰me ma mbo wan ḛ, àa gene ḛ nda ge kun sariya ge no zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way ma zì ma ndwa se yà, àa mbo dwagle ḛ ge bol me.
40010018	Àa zwal ḛ bibil mbo goformo̰ mage gan ga̰a̰l ma ndwa se yà, ge mbi pe. Go mbe no, ḛ mbo kee sayda ge ambi, ge num ta, ge nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma ta me.
40010019	Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge àa mbo kaɗ-ɗa ka gene ḛ ge sok sariya ma go, ne kaa ge ḛ ele ta go, i mà mbo faa ma̰ fare de to. Fare ge mbiya ḛ faa num ma, ḛ mbo seɗ num sok mbe go gaw.
40010020	Ago, ḛ sḛ ma mbo faa ne to, ɗaŋɗe, a On̰om ge ḛ Ba Dok ne sḛ mbo paa fare ge ḛ mbo faa num ya ma ne, ge ḛ wa zì.
40010021	Nda a̰me ma mbo ɓyan maa na̰ van ma gezi nda tok go, ba a̰me ma mbo ɓyan maa van ma mbe go waɗme. Van a̰me ma mbo ɗege ho̰o̰l digi ge maa ba ma, àa mbo ɓyan num gezi me.
40010022	Nda mbo kuri ḛ gezi peɗ, ge mbi pe. Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge mbo wan tene deŋel ya ɗiŋ mbo wa yà, mbo seɗ monna .
40010023	Sok ge àa mbo ɗege ya njon̰ ḛ ge suwal ga̰a̰l a̰me diŋ, ḛ chiya mbo ge suwal ga̰a̰l ge ɗogle yà. Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no: Van ge Ndu ne mbo mbo ya seɗ ḛ, be ge ḛ an suwal ga̰a̰l ge Izrayel ne ma diŋ mɔɗwag to peɗ.
40010024	Àa hon ndu ge ame hateya ga̰a̰l waɗe na ba ge hate na to koo moor waɗe na ndu ge zok to me.
40010025	Ndu ge ame hateya mbiya kaɗ dinna ge na ba ge hate na go. Moor kaɗ dinna ge na ndu ge zok go me. Kaɗɗa àa ndi mbi, Bagezok dinna ca ge Belzebul go, àa mbo sal ḛ ge kàre mbi pe ma ndwa gyana ga de?
40010026	Go mbe no, ne kaa ge ḛ chiya ndu a̰me voo to baɗ. Ago kaŋ a̰me ma ge way no ge sego ma peɗ mbo dyan zum ge kɔn̰al go. Kaŋ ge kee ge ɗimil zì ma, nda mbo kuwa num benna kɔn̰al.
40010027	Fare ge mbi jan ḛ ne ge chala zì jan no, ḛ fa ne zum ge nda ta peɗ. Fare ge mbi wuwase ḛ ne no, ḛ sṵṵ ne tuŋ.
40010028	Ḛ chiya nda duwana ma voo to, àa ge pool hun ndu, ɗaŋɗe, àa mbyaɗ hun ne on̰om to. Kaɗɗa ndu ge ḛ chiya ne voo go ɗe, a Dok ɗu, ge dape, a ge pool hun ndu, gwan dol ne ge sok njoɗ yal zì yà.
40010029	Nda yaɗ njoole ban zi gezi ge silay ɗu pe bàba to de? Go no puy, be laa ɓyareya ge Dok ge ḛ Ba ne to, a̰me ɗu deɗ-ɗa suwa pagal se to.
40010030	Kaɗɗa ge ḛ sḛ ma ɗe, koo susu ge ḛ pagal digi ma, Dok kuwa kuwa go num go gyana ga de.
40010031	Kaɗɗa na mbe go, ḛ chiya ndu a̰me voo to, ago koo njoole ban ma kaa gyana ga de puy, ḛ waɗe num waɗe.
40010032	Go mbe no, ndu ge diige ge mbo wan na wa ya ngangaɗ ge nda duwana ma ndwa se go, na ge ambi ne, mbi sḛ mbo jan zum waŋ waɗme go, ne ge ambi ne, ge mbi Ba ge no pḭḭ ma zì yà ndwa se yà.
40010033	Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge diige ge mbo kuri ya gezi babaɗ ge nda duwana ma ndwa se go, na ge ambi ne to, mbi sḛ mbo jan zum waŋ waɗme go, mbi kuwa ne to, ge mbi Ba ge no pḭḭ ma zì yà ndwa se yà.
40010034	Ḛ ta mà dwaɗ go, mbi gene ya halas ge suwa pagal mekyala de ɗe, mbi be gene ya halas to, ɗaŋɗe, mbi gene ya ho̰o̰l.
40010035	Ago mbi mbo ya ee ho̰o̰l ge van son mage na ba buwal zì, van gwale mage na na̰ buwal zì, van gwale mage na tisi ge gwale buwal zì me.
40010036	Nda ge mo zok diŋ-ge ma guwa mbo seŋe mo nda ge ho̰o̰l ma ne.
40010037	Ndu ge ne laa wan na ba koo na na̰ waɗe mbi, be mbyaɗ kaɗ ndu ge ambi to. Ndu ge ne laa wan na van ge son koo ge gwale waɗe mbi, be mbyaɗ kaɗ ndu ge ambi to me.
40010038	Ndu ge mbo hee na kaŋre ya to, ka dwaɗ tene, hee dṵṵl ge kàre mbi pe to, be mbyaɗ kaɗ ndu ge ambi to.
40010039	Ndu ge mbo kaɗ-ɗa kwacware ndwa ge na ne, mbo ban ne gezi. Ndu ge mbo hon tene ya gezi, ge mbi pe, mbo seɗ ndwa ge fareba.
40010040	Ndu ge ame ḛ ya na diŋ, ame mbi. Ndu ge ame mbi ya me ɗe, ame Ba ge teme mbi ya.
40010041	Ndu ge mbo ame ndu ge zwagre Dok wa ya na diŋ, hon ne hormo ge ndu ge zwagre Dok wa go, àa mbo poɗ ne poɗɗa ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma way. Ndu ge mbo ame ndu ge temel ya ge na diŋ, hon ne hormo ge ndu ge temel ne, àa mbo poɗ ne, poɗɗa ge nda ge temel ma way me.
40010042	Ndu ge diige, ge mbo hee ya kob mam eyalam gagag, hon ɗu ge jiyale mbe ma buwal zì, ndwa go ne mbi ndu ge ame hateya ne, fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no, mbo hoɗege na tok kon̰a go fyalag to baɗ.
40011001	Guwa̰ ge Zeso ho̰ na nda ge ame hateya ge wol pɔgwa zi ma yuwaleya go, ɗege ge sok mbe go, ndwa mbo hate nda mage oy fare ge suwal ga̰a̰l ma diŋ.
40011002	Ajo̰o̰ Yohana wa ya daŋay zì puy ɗe, tèmel keeya ge Krist, Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne fare ma deɗ ne tɔgwa zì yà. Sok mbe go, Yohana teme na nda ge ame hateya ma mbo ele ne go,
40011003	ne daa ndu ge nda no ge kuwaya go, ne mbo ya mon Izrayel van ma ne ɗer ɓade? Koo ndu mbe gale mbo ya de?
40011004	Zeso gwan ge num janna go: Ḛ guwa̰ mbo wan Yohana fare ge ḛ za̰a̰ mage kaŋ ge ḛ kuwa num no ma pe go:
40011005	Ɓaal ma kuwa sok no, giɗi ma mbo vin̰a no, nda ge kṵṵ swàm ma haɗ-ɗa kɔn̰al mage num bol haɗ-ɗa somndol no, gisil ma za̰a̰ fare no, nda ge suu ma tan-na no, nda ge a̰se ma za̰a̰ Fare ge Kwaɗa no me.
40011006	Laa saal a ge ndu ge mbi mbo kaɗ-ɗa kaŋ chal ko ge ne pe to.
40011007	Guwa̰ ge nda ge ame hateya ge Yohana ne ma guwa̰ mboya go, Zeso ɗege faa ɓase ma fare ge Yohana ne, ele num go: Sok ge ḛ mbo ge babur pul yà, ḛ mbo ndil ndu ge tuguɗi a̰me ge dḭḭ ge kɔn̰a go, ge sa̰a̰m fii ne se, ka gwan ge ne ya digi bàŋ de?
40011008	Kaɗɗa na mbe go to, ḛ mbo ndil sḛ ma̰ kaŋ tem de? Ndu a̰me ge ka̰a̰ ba̰a̰ ge siŋli ma de? Ḛ za̰a̰ gale! Nda ge kan ba̰a̰ ge siŋli ma kaɗ ge zok ge gan ga̰a̰l ma way ma diŋ.
40011009	Go mbe no, ḛ mbo ndil ma̰ kaŋ sḛ tem de? Nda ge zwagre Dok wa a̰me de? Ḛ ɓyare kuwa ndu ge zwagre Dok wa de? Mbi jan ḛ go, ndu ge ḛ kuwa ne waɗe ndu ge zwagre Dok wa waɗe.
40011010	Ago, Dok jin̰a ge na maktub zì ge ne pe go: «Kuwa, mbi doo yà mbi ndu ge vin̰a ndwa go ne nuusi vin̰a ge mo pe, ge mo ndwa zḛḛ.»
40011011	Zeso gwan jan go, fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no, Yohana ba ge kee nda baptem ciciliŋ waɗe nda ge wuwa no ge laa zì ma kakaɗag. Go no puy ɗe, ndu ge fare a̰me pe to peɗ, ge mbo seɗ vin̰a ya waɗ muluk ge Dok ne zì, mbo kaɗ ciciliŋ waɗe ne.
40011012	Ge dwam ge Yohana ba ge kee nda baptem ee pe oy fare ge muluk ge Dok ne pe ya day ɗiŋ màno, àa kee muluk ge Dok ne mbe ho̰o̰l, nda duwana ge kee fare pool ma ɓyare harge ne ge maa pool me.
40011013	Ago, Eeya ge Moyiz ne mage nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma peɗ ka faa fare ge muluk mbe pe, zḛḛ ge go Yohana dee ya ee pe jan nda ne fare.
40011014	Kaɗɗa ḛ vin mbi ya, maktub ge Dok ne ma ɓyare faa fare ge Yohana ne, sok ge àa ka janna go Eli mbo gwanna ne.
40011015	Kaɗɗa ndu ge tɔgwa ge za̰a̰ fare mbe ma, ne za̰a̰ num kwaɗa.
40011016	Guwa̰, Zeso jan go: Ge sego, mbi mà mbo jan ma̰ fare ge nda ge doŋ pe ge màge mbe no ma pe de? Àa dḭḭ ge mojo̰o̰ nda jabso a̰me ge kaɗ no kee vḛḛso dàa se ma go, a̰me ma ka oy maa ka̰a̰m gegene ma janna go:
40011017	I sṵṵ gal go ḛ mà ndal kaŋ ne wa go de puy, ḛ ko be hee digi to. I mbaa baŋay no puy ɗe, ḛ be gwan kee kiimi to peɗ.
40011018	Ago, sok ge Yohana mbo ya, be ka zam kaŋ zam koo njoɗ on̰or jin̰al ge nda gegene ma go to, ndwa kee laa ɓyareya ge Dok ne. Ge ano mbe no pe, nda ka janna no go, ne ge on̰om ge sone ge na zì.
40011019	Mbi, Van ge Ndu ne, sok ge mbi mbo ya, mbi ka paa mbi tok dagre ge nda duwana ma, sok zam kaŋ mage njoɗ kaŋ go. Nda a̰me ma ka janna go, ḛ ndi ndu ge vagal mage fere jìn̰al mbe ɗoo me, gwan kee kondore ge nda ge chal siyal mage nda ge kee sone ma. Go no puy, andaŋ ge Dok ne haa temel ge kaŋ keeya ge ne ne ma ta go.
40011020	Ge sok mbe go, Zeso ɗege mḛḛre nda ge no suwal ga̰a̰l ge na kê kaŋ ajab ge num diŋ gḛḛ ma ol kekeŋ, ge dape, num be vin seŋe ta ya se ge Dok ta to.
40011021	Jan num go: Woo ge ḛ ḛ, ḛ nda ge suwal Korazḛ mage Betsayda ma! Daa no go mbi kê kaŋ ajab mbe ma ge nda ge laa pisil ge suwal Tir mage Sido̰ diŋ-ge ma buwal zì, ge mojo̰o̰ mbi kee num ya ge ḛ suwal ma diŋ no go ɗe, àa dee seŋe ta ja se ge maa sone keeya ma go, sok kan kacigri mage ɔwabe siyam kanna ge maa pagal digi.
40011022	Ɗaŋɗe, fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no: Ge dwam kun sariya go, Dok mbo ee dṵṵl ge yan̰a ge ḛ pagal waɗe nda mbe ge suwal Tir mage Sido̰ ma way ma.
40011023	Kaɗɗa ge ḛ ge suwal Kapernawom ma ɗe, ḛ dwaɗ go Dok mbo hee ḛ suwal pḭḭ digi ya caɗ ɗaŋ de? Ḛ kee hày ya go, mbo ɓyan ḛ ɗiŋ ge sok kàɗɗa ge nda ge swày ma way se yà. Ago, kaŋ ajab ge mbi kê num mbe ma daa kee ge nda ge suwal Sodom diŋ-ge ma buwal zì, suwal mbe wa daa ya mḛḛya be burmiya gezi.
40011024	Ɗaŋɗe, fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no: Ge dwam kun sariya go, Dok mbo ee dṵṵl ge yan̰a ge ḛ pagal waɗe nda mbe ge suwal Sodom ma way ma.
40011025	Guwa̰, Zeso hee na ka̰a̰l digi kee kaɗeya, jan go: Bagezok, Dok Ba ge kee muluk no pḭḭ zì yà mage suwa pagal, mbi kee mo mersi ge mo n̰a kaŋ mbe ma wayya ge nda ge andaŋ mage nda ge no ge kuwaya ɗugul ma ndwa zḛḛ, ge mo dyan num ja ge nda ge no ge mojo̰o̰ nda jabso go ma ta no pe.
40011026	Baa, mbi kee mo mersi ge dape, a laa ɓyareya ge amo ne.
40011027	Zeso gwan jan num go, mbi Ba hon mbi kaŋ ma ya mɔɗwag. Ndu ge kuwa Dok Van tyatyaɗ, a Dok Ba ɗu. Ndu ge kuwa Dok Ba tyatyaɗ me ɗe, a Dok Van sḛ ɗu me, ndu ge Van ɓyare tyan ne ndwa gezi ge na Ba ta me.
40011028	Ḛ ge tane ya kakatag sok in kaŋ dṵṵl go ma peɗ, ḛ mbo ya mbi ta, mbi mbo hon ḛ ɗwabeya.
40011029	Ḛ doo mbi zug ḛ ka̰a̰l go, ḛ ame mbi hateya ma, ago ḛ mbo seɗ go, mbi suul, mbi be ndu ge fare ne to, ḛ mbo seɗ ɗwabeya ge ḛ sḛ ma pe me.
40011030	O̰o̰, mbi zug inna mbo kaɗ haŋle to, dṵṵl ge mbi mbo ee ne ya ḛ pagal, ne inna mbo kaɗ fogol haraw.
40012001	Guwa̰ swag, deɗ-ɗa ge dwam sabaɗ a̰me go ɗu, Zeso mage na nda ge ame hateya ma ka kale mboya ge gaaso ge geme ne ma pul zì. Sok ge camal wa̰a̰ num, ne nda ge ame hateya ma ɗege hal swa pagal ma sulla.
40012002	Sok ge Farisi a̰me ma kuwa num kee ano mbe go, àa mbo ya jan Zeso go: Mo kuwa kaŋ ge mo nda ge ame hateya ma kee ne go ɓade! Àa kee kaŋ ge vin̰a tele go, ndu kê ne dwam sabaɗ go to.
40012003	Ɗaŋɗe, Zeso gwan ge num janna go: Ḛ be isi maktub ge Dok ne pul sok ge jin̰a fare ge Daviɗ kaŋ ge ke ne to de? Dwam a̰me go ɗu, sok ge camal wa̰a̰ num ge na nda ma go,
40012004	wuwa ge gur seɗ ta ge Dok ne zì no, zâ dupḛ ge àa nuusi num ge Dok pe ma no ɓanna ge na nda ma. Zane no, àa be ee dupḛ mbe ma ge num pe to, ɗeŋew, a nda ge kee tuwaleya ma ne ge vin̰a ge zam num.
40012005	Koo ḛ be isi maktub ge Dok ne pul ge no eeya ge Moyiz ne ma zì go, nda ge kee tuwaleya ma, sok kee maa tèmel ma ge dwam sabaɗ go, ge zok ge Dok ne zì, àa hele eeya ma pagal, be ge fare wan num to kade?
40012006	Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no: Kaŋ a̰me ge ne hormo waɗe zok ge Dok ne ge go go.
40012007	Fare ge Dok jin̰a ne ge na Maktub zì go: «Mbi ɓyare kuwa a̰se, be tuwaleya to, daa go ḛ wa̰a̰ ne pe kwaɗa, ḛ daa mà wan mbi nda ge ame hateya ge tok fare zì to mbe ma ge sariya to.»
40012008	Ago mbi, Van ge Ndu ne, mbi ne ge pool ge faa fare ge dwam sabaɗ pagal.
40012009	Guwa̰ ano mbe no go, Zeso ɗege ge sok mbe go, mbo ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way zì yà,
40012010	kuwa ndu ge tok looɗeya a̰me ɗu ge zok mbe zì. Ge sok mbe go, nda a̰me ma ele Zeso go: Vin̰a a̰me hage go ge eeya ge Moyiz ne pagal go, àa zo̰o̰ ndu ge dwam sabaɗ go de? Àa ele ne fare mbe ndwa go maa wa wan ne ge fare.
40012011	Gwan ge num janna go: Mà kaɗɗa go ndu a̰me ge ḛ buwal zige, a ge tame ɗu, ne tame mbe deɗ ge tugul se ge dwam sabaɗ go no, mà mbo wan ne ya digi to de?
40012012	Ndu duwana waɗe kaŋ kogor ndwa gyana ga de! Go mbe no, vin̰a hage hage ge eeya ge Moyiz ne pagal go, àa kê ndu kwaɗa ge dwam sabaɗ go.
40012013	Sok mbe go, Zeso jan ndu mbe go: Mwaɗe mo tok se yà. Ne sḛ mwaɗe na tok se yà, ne tok mbe mbo ya zonna, haɗ pool ge ne tok gegene go.
40012014	Sok kuwa ano mbe go, Farisi a̰me ge kaa sok mbe go ma waɗ zum seɗ ta. Àa mbo ya vwal wa ge Zeso pagal ndwa seɗ fare ge ban ne gezi.
40012015	Sok ge Zeso za̰a̰ num fare mbe ma go, n̰a sok mbe, mbo. Ɓase ma kàre ne pe ya, zon nda ge ka kee tuguɗi ma mɔɗwag me.
40012016	Ɗaŋɗe, Zeso mḛḛre num go, ne kaa ge num jin̰a fare ge na ne mbe zum to.
40012017	Kê ano mbe ndwa huy fare ge Dok dee jin̰a ndu ge zwagre na wa Ezay ne go:
40012018	«Za̰a̰ gale! Ano a mbi ndu ge tèmel ge mbi taa nee ne, Ndu ge mbi laa wa̰a̰ ne gḛḛ, ge mbi sḛ za̰a̰ tii ge ne pe ne, Mbi mbo biri ne ge mbi On̰om, Mbo jan nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma vin̰a ge mbi haɗ ndu temel taɗ.
40012019	Mbo ka pee fare koo goɗ tene ge nda to, Ndu mbo ka za̰a̰ ne oyya ge vin̰a ma pul go to.
40012020	Mbo kee nda ge tuguɗi mage nda ge no pool to ma fare ge pool to. Go mbe no ca, mbo hal tiiya ge ngwageya se gezi to, Koo piri lampe ge ne kɔn̰al haɗɗa tḭḭl to, Ɗiŋ ge go nda duwana ma dee ya ge vin̰a ge mbi haɗ ndu temel taɗ go.»
40012021	Pe rusu ge dunin̰a zige ma mɔɗwag mbo ee maa jobreya ma ge ne pagal me.
40012022	Guwa̰ go, àa gene Zeso ndu ge ɓaal ge ɗel taɗɗa se ge no ge on̰om ge sone na zì ya. Ge sok mbe go, yan on̰om mbe zum, ndu mbe mbo ya seɗ zonna ge go gaa za̰a̰ fare mage faa wa.
40012023	Ɓase ma peɗ kee ajab, àa ka ele ta ta buwal zì go: A ndu mbe ge nda tol ne go, gan ga̰a̰l Daviɗ Baŋ ne ɗer ɓade?
40012024	Sok ge Farisi ma za̰a̰ num fare mbe ma go, àa ɗege janna go: Ndu mbe yan on̰om ge sone ma ge pool ge Belzebul, ga̰a̰l ge on̰om ge sone ma way ho̰ ne ta.
40012025	Ajo̰o̰ Zeso ka kuwa num dwaɗɗa ma kuwa, jan num go: Muluk ge diige, ge ne nda ma kee ta ho̰o̰l ge ta ta buwal zì burmi gezi. Nda ge no suwal ga̰a̰l ge ɗu koo ge zok ge ɗu diŋ ma kaɗ-ɗa kee ta ho̰o̰l, suwal ga̰a̰l koo zok mbe vḛḛne gezi.
40012026	Mà kaɗɗa go, on̰om ge sone ge no Saytan muluk zì ma kee ta ho̰o̰l ɗe, ago ne pool va se vaa, kee pe gyana ne muluk mbe mà gwan mḛḛ digi de?
40012027	Kaɗɗa mbi sḛ yan on̰om ge sone ma ge pool ge Belzebul, ga̰a̰l ge on̰om ge sone ma way ta, ḛ van ma yan num ge huɗi ta no me de? A ge pe, kaŋ keeya ge num way ma ngay go, fare ge ḛ jan num mbe ma, num ge maa vin̰a go to.
40012028	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ne On̰om ge Dok ne ho̰ mbi pool ge kee kaŋ mbe ma ne, ɓyare ḛ kuwa go, Dok kee muluk go ge sego ḛ buwal zì.
40012029	Ndu a̰me ge vin̰a ge waɗ ge ndu ge pool zok diŋ ɔwabe ne kaŋ ma to. Zḛḛ ge go ne ɔwabe ne kaŋ ma, ɓyare go ne vuwa ndu ge pool mbe se vwal ɓiya, ne wa ɗege seɗ vin̰a ge ɔwabe ne kaŋ ma go.
40012030	Kaɗɗa ndu sal tèmel ge mbi kee, a ho̰o̰l ge mbi, ndu ge ɓan nda duwana ma pagal digi dagre ge mbi to, ɓasare se num.
40012031	Ge ano mbe no pe, mbi jan ḛ go: Dok mbo pore nda duwana ma num kaŋ keeya ge sone ge diige ge àa kee num no ma, koo num fare janna ge sone kakatag ge diige ge àa jan num no ma me. Ɗaŋɗe, mbo pore num ge jan fare ge sone kakatag ge On̰om ge Harcal pagal ma to baɗ.
40012032	Dok mbo pore nda ge jan fare sone kakatag ge Van ge Ndu ne pagal ma, ɗaŋɗe, mbo pore num ge jan fare sone kakatag ge On̰om ge Harcal pagal ma to baɗ. Ne sḛ mbo pore num koo ge zaman ge màge no go koo ge zaman ge Dok ne ge mbo no ya ma go to baɗ.
40012033	Ɓyare go ḛ vḭḭ go ɔwara ge kwaɗa ne ndwa tolla kaɗ kwaɗa me, koo ḛ vin go ɔwara ge sone ne ndwa tolla kaɗ sone me. Ago, a ge ndwa tolla ge ɔwara ne ta, ḛ deɗ-ɗa kuwaya no go ne kwaɗa koo ne sone.
40012034	Maŋan̰ van ma! Ajo̰o̰ ḛ nda ge sone ma ne, fare ge kwaɗa mà ndage ge ḛ wa zì ɗaŋ de? Ago fare ge ndage no ge mo wa zì ee nda ne kuwa fare ge mo dul zige.
40012035	Ndu ge kwaɗa fare ma kaɗ kwaɗa, ge dape, ne dul wa kwaɗa me. Ndu ge sone fare ma kaɗ sone, ge dape, ne dul wa sone me.
40012036	Ɗaŋɗe, mbi jan ḛ ne no: Ge dwam kun sariya go, nda duwana ma mbo wan fare ge bàŋ yag ge diige ge maa jin̰a num ma pe peɗ ge Dok ndwa se.
40012037	Ago, mo mbo seŋe ndu ge temel koo ndu ge sariya wan ne, ge fare ge ndage no ge mo wa zì ma ta.
40012038	Guwa̰ ano mbe go, nda ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne a̰me mage Farisi a̰me ma mbo ya ele Zeso fare go: Ba ge hateya, i ɓyare go mo ke kaŋ ngayya a̰me ɗu, ge wa mbo ee i kuwaya go, Dok hon mo pool mbe ne.
40012039	Zeso gwan ge num janna go: Ḛ ge doŋ pe ge màno mbe go ma, ḛ nda ge kee sone mage mbo laa ɓyareya ge Dok ne pagal to ma, ḛ gwan ɓyare kaŋ ngayya a̰me ge Dok ta ya! Gaa ɗeŋew go, àa kê ḛ kaŋ ngayya ge àa dee kê Nda ge zwagre Dok wa Jonas ne pe.
40012040	Ago, dinna ge ndu ge zwagre Dok wa Jonas kê dwam taa gyala mage ɗaal ge sini ge ga̰a̰l laa zì go, Van ge Ndu ne mbo kee dwam taa gyala mage ɗaal ge suwa laa zì mbe go me.
40012041	Go no me, ge dwam kun sariya go, nda ge suwal ga̰a̰l Niniv ma mbo kan fare ge nda ge doŋ pe ge màno mbe ma pagal, ndwa go maa seŋe ta se sok za̰a̰ fare ge ndu ge zwagre Dok wa|Nda ge zwagre Dok wa Jonas dee oy maa ne go. Ge sego, mbi jan ḛ go, ndu ge waɗe Jonas no ge go go no.
40012042	Ge dwam kun sariya go, gan ga̰a̰l ge gwale ge kee muluk no ge suwa ge lee ham-ge go, mbo ɗege digi kan fare ge nda ge doŋ pe ge màno mbe ma pagal, ge dape, ne sḛ dee mbo ge sok kaal ya ge gan ga̰a̰l Salomo̰ ta ndwa za̰a̰ fare andaŋ ge waɗ ge ne wa zì ma. Ge sego, mbi jan ḛ go, ndu ge waɗe gan ga̰a̰l Salomo̰ gale no go go no.
40012043	Sok ge on̰om ge sone ndage zum ge ndu zì ya, aa babur pul nanna na pagal, ndwa ɓyare sok ɗwabe tene. Sok ge seɗ sok to, jan tene go: Mbi gwan ge sok ge mbi mbô no ge ne ya. Sok ge gwan-na, seɗ ndu mbe ge zok ge a̰me no ne zì to go, pul pella ɗaɗaŋ, kaŋ ma nuusiya kwaɗa,
40012044	vin tene go, na gwan mbo ge na sok kàɗɗa ge wal, ge na n̰a ne yà. Sok ge guwa̰ ya, seɗ go a̰me ne zì to, ne kɔn̰al, ne nuusiya kwaɗa me,
40012045	ago, ne guwa̰ mbo ɔwabe na ka̰a̰m ge sone waɗe na ma ya ɓỳala, àa ge num ɓan-na mbo kaɗ ɗagleya ge ndu mbe zì. Go mbe no, kàɗɗa ge ndu mbe ne ge guwa̰ go ge kaɗ sone kakatag waɗe ne kàɗɗa ge wal. Mbo kaɗ mbe go ca, ge nda ge doŋ pe ge màno mbe ma pe me.
40012046	Zeso gale sok jan ɓase ma fare go, ne na̰ mage ne na̰ van ma yan-na. Àa mbo ya mḛḛya zok wa zum, àa ka ɓyare vin̰a ge go maa wa jan ne fare.
40012047	Guwa̰, [ndu a̰me ɗu ge ɓase ma buwal zì, jan ne go: Mo na̰ mage mo na̰ van ma mḛḛ go zum, àa ɓyare go maa jan mo fare]
40012048	Ɗaŋɗe, Zeso gwan ge ne janna go: A huɗi mbiya kaɗ mbi na̰ mage mbi na̰ van ma ne de?
40012049	Guwa̰, tare na tok ge na nda ge ame hateya ma ta, jan ndu mbe go: Za̰a̰ gale, num mbe ma no, àa mbiya kaɗ mbi na̰ mage mbi na̰ van ma ne.
40012050	Ago, ndu ge diige ge kee laa ɓyareya ge mbi Ba ge no pḭḭ ma zì yà ne, mbiya kaɗ mbi na̰ van ge son ne, kaɗ mbi na̰ van ge gwale mage mbi na̰ me.
40013001	Dwam mbe go, Zeso waɗ ge zok diŋ ya zum, mbo ge mangaɗam ga̰a̰l ge Galile ne wa yà.
40013002	Nda kwate ya ɓase nɔnɔg ge ne ta ge go ne sḛ ndee mbo kaɗ ge faa ga̰a̰l pul-la. Ɓase mbe ma gaa mḛḛya ge mam wa go.
40013003	Hate num fare ma gḛḛ ge fare sḭḭ, jan num go: Ḛ za̰a̰ gale, ge dwam a̰me go ɗu, ba ge gaa kaŋ a̰me zuɗ mbo dol swa ge na gaaso zì.
40013004	Sok ge ka cigi swa go, swa ndwa a̰me ma deɗ ge vin̰a kin̰a ma go, njoole ma mbo ya coɗ num gezi.
40013005	Gegene ma deɗ ge sok her ma go, sok ge suwa no go gḛḛ to. Àa tyal digi vun cab, ge dape, àa be seɗ suwa ge maa tòo ma wa mbo se ya ɗugul to.
40013006	Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge gyala dee ge num pagal, àa looɗe, àa fin̰a gezi, ge dape, num tòo ma kaa digi dɔfwal.
40013007	Gegene ma deɗ ge kore ma buwal zì, kore ma don digi, àa kage num se me.
40013008	A̰me ma deɗ ge suwa ge kwaɗa go, àa kan pagal: Swa pagal ɗu tol ndwa kis, gegene warmenengal, gegene tapool ɗu me.
40013009	Kaɗɗa ndu ge tɔgwa ge za̰a̰ fare mbe ma, ne za̰a̰ num kwaɗa.
40013010	Guwa̰, Zeso nda ge ame hateya ma gwan ta ya ge ne ta zì, àa ele ne go: Ge dape, mo wa ka kee fare sḭḭ ma ndwa hate ɓase ma fare de?
40013011	Gwan ge num janna go: Dok hage ḛ ndwa ma ya gezi ge kuwa fare ɗimil ge na muluk ne, ɗaŋɗe, be hage nda gegene ma ndwa to.
40013012	Ago, ndu ge no go ge a̰me, àa mbo gwan hon ne ge kon pagal iya, ndwa go ne zuli se ceɗeɗ, ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge no be a̰me, koo ne ne ge fyalag ge no ne tok go puy, àa mbo ame ne ne gezi.
40013013	A ge pe, mbi kee fare sḭḭ ma hate num no, ge dape, àa ndil sok go ɓame, ɗaŋɗe, àa kuwa sok to, àa za̰a̰ fare go ɓame, ɗaŋɗe, àa wan fare a̰me pe ɗu to me.
40013014	Go mbe no, kaŋ mbe ma deɗ ja keeya tetem ndwa ngayya go, fare ge Dok dee jin̰a num ge Ezay, ndu ge zwagre na wa, wa zì ma, num fare ge fareba ma ne go: «Ḛ mbo ka za̰a̰ fare ɓa, ḛ wan fare pe to, Ḛ mbo ka ndil sok ɓa, ḛ kuwa sok sḛ to.
40013015	A fareba go, ɓase mbe ma haɗɗa nda ge pagal ndaa ma, Àa daa ɓyare za̰a̰ fare to, Àa ke ta ya nda ge ɓaal ma, Àa daa ɓyare kuwa sok to, Àa ame fare daa maa dul wa ma zì to, Ge go num wa seŋe ta ya se ɗoo, mbi wa zon num to me.»
40013016	Guwa̰, Zeso jan na nda ge ame hateya ma go: Laa saal ge ḛ pe, ge dape, ḛ ndwa ma gaa ya kuwa sok, ḛ tɔgwa ma za̰a̰ fare me.
40013017	Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no, nda ge zwagre Dok wa mage nda ge kee laa ɓyareya ge Dok ne ma gḛḛ, kee ene gḛḛ ndwa kuwa kaŋ ge ḛ kuwa num no ma, za̰a̰ fare ge ḛ za̰a̰ num no ma me, ɗaŋɗe, àa be seɗ vin̰a ge kuwa num koo za̰a̰ num to me.
40013018	Guwa̰, Zeso jan na nda ge ame hateya ma go: Ḛ za̰a̰ fare sḭḭ ge ndu ge dol swa ne mbe pe wanna no.
40013019	Kaŋ rusu ge dee ge vin̰a kin̰a go ma, ngay diir ge nda ge za̰a̰ fare ge muluk ge Dok ne ma way, àa wan ne pe to. Ba ge zwam kṵwa̰ɗe ya, hee fare ge num ame maa dul wa zì mbe gezi.
40013020	A̰me ge dee her pagal ma, àa num ge za̰a̰ fare ge Dok ne ma, àa ame ne ge laa saal gaw,
40013021	ɗaŋɗe, àa n̰a ne vin̰a ge kee tèmel maa zì to. Sok ge iigiya koo njon̰n̰a ma deɗ-ɗa num pagal ge fare ge Dok ne mbe pe, àa tigri ge guwa̰.
40013022	Kaŋ rusu ge dee ge kore buwal zì ma, àa nda ge za̰a̰ fare ge Dok ne ma, guwa̰ go, iigiya mage yan kaŋ seɗɗa ge dunin̰a ne pe ma mbo ya kale ge num pagal go, àa dàa mbo mboya ge jwab to.
40013023	Kaŋ rusu ge dee suwa ge kwaɗa go ma, àa nda ge za̰a̰ fare ge Dok ne ma, àa koy ne kwaɗa, àa ka mbo mboya ge jwab: A̰me ma tol ndwa kis, gegene ma warmenengal, ge ɗogle ma tapool ɗu me.
40013024	Guwa̰, Zeso kee ɓase ma fare sḭḭ ge ɗogle, ndwa hate num fare ge muluk ge Dok ne pagal, jan num go: Kaŋ ge kee no muluk ge Dok ne zì, a ge mojo̰o̰ ndu dol geme na gaaso zì go.
40013025	Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge nda gale no dwam se, ne ndu ge ho̰o̰l mbô ya dol yumur ge ne geme ma buwal zì no, doo tene mboya no.
40013026	Sok ge geme tiya digi, haɗ ga̰a̰l, mbô ya kan na pagal, yumur mbô ya kan mbe go waɗme.
40013027	Nda ge tèmel ma mbô ya ele maa ndu ge zok fare go: Mo daa doo geme ge mo gaaso zì me, yumur daa gwan mbo ge dii ya de?
40013028	Gwan ge num janna go, a ndu ge ho̰o̰l a̰me kê kaŋ mbe ne. Ne nda ge tèmel ma gwan ge ne fare eleya go: Mo ɓyare go i mbo ndage num gezi de?
40013029	Gwan ge num janna go: To, mà kaɗɗa ḛ ndage yumur gezi, ḛ ge pool ɓan num ndageya ge geme ma dagre.
40013030	Ḛ n̰a num donna dagre ɗiŋ mbo ge sok siyal yà. Sok kan siyal go, mbi mbo jan nda ge syaɗ geme ma go: Ḛ gale saa gezi yumur ɓiya, ḛ vwal num digi ndwa tilla gezi, guwa̰, ḛ wa gaa syaɗ geme kan mbi hal se go.
40013031	Zeso gwan kee num fare sḭḭ a̰me ge ɗogle, jan num go: Muluk ge Dok ne fare dḭḭ ge sugu ge nda tol ne mutard ndwa go, ge ndu ge gaa kaŋ hê ne, doo ne ge na gaaso zì no go.
40013032	A fareba go, sugu mutard ndwa hoɗege jiyale ne, ge kaŋ rusu gegene ma pe go peɗ. Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge don digi, waɗe sugu gegene ge àa dol num no ge gaaso zì ge zamma pe ma waɗe, seŋe ga̰a̰l ge ɔwara go, ge go njoole ge pḭḭ digi ma gaa mbo ya ee maa vum ma ge ne tok ma digi.
40013033	Zeso gwan kee num fare sḭḭ ge ɗogle mbe no go: Muluk ge Dok ne fare dḭḭ ge jìn̰al hore ge ndu gwale hee ne, kan ne ge swam peɗem koro taa ndwa zì go, ɗiŋ mbo ɗege ne digi ge ɓul mɔɗwag.
40013034	Zeso ka kee fare sḭḭ sok hate ɓase ma fare mbe ma no go, be hate num fare a̰me guwa̰ zum ge fare sḭḭ ma ta to,
40013035	ndwa huy fare ge Nda ge zwagre Dok wa dee wuwage ne go: «Mbi mbo hage mbi wa jan fare ge fare sḭḭ ma ta, Mbi mbo ben kaŋ ge dee way se sok ge dunin̰a pe doo ya go day ma zum.»
40013036	Guwa̰, Zeso mage na nda ge ame hateya ma n̰a ɓase ma yà, àa gwan-na diŋ. Ne nda ge ame hateya ma gwan ta ya ne ta, àa ele ne go, ne wa̰a̰ maa fare sḭḭ ge yumur ne ge do̰o̰ gaaso zì pe nde.
40013037	Ɗege wan num fare pe go: Ndu ge zare geme ge mojo̰o̰ Van ge Ndu ne go,
40013038	gaaso ge mojo̰o̰ dunin̰a go, geme ndwa ge àa zare num ma ge mojo̰o̰ nda ge no ge muluk ge Dok ne pe ma go, yumur Ba ge zwam ndu ne.
40013039	Ndu ge ho̰o̰l ge zare yumur mbe a Ba ge ho̰o̰l, siyal syaɗɗa a dunin̰a pe aaya, nda ge syaɗ geme ma malayka ge Dok ne ma.
40013040	Go mbe no, àa mbo ɔwabe nda ge ba ge zwam ne ma, àa kan num ge ol zì ge dunin̰a pe aaya go.
40013041	Van ge Ndu ne, mbo teme na malayka ma ya, àa mbo ɔwabe num ge no kaŋ chal ko ge maa ka̰a̰m pe ma, ge nda ge kee n̰aal ma, ge ne muluk zì ya gezi.
40013042	Àa mbo kan num ge ol ge hihiɗig zì. Ge sok mbe zì, nda mbe ma mbo ka fyalla, àa ka sul maa kin̰a ma me.
40013043	Ɗaŋɗe, nda ge kee laa ɓyareya ge Dok ne ma mbo ka zenna ge gyala go ge muluk ge maa Ba Dok ne zì. Kaɗɗa ndu ge tɔgwa ge za̰a̰ fare mbe ma, ne za̰a̰ num kwaɗa.
40013044	Muluk ge pḭḭ zì yà ge ma fare gwan ge mojo̰o̰ kaŋ gan ge njonjon̰ ge àa way ne ge gaaso zì go. Ndu ge deɗ ne pagal gwan dwage ne wayya. Ndu mbe seŋe gwan diŋ ge laa saal gḛḛ, mbo yaɗ na kaŋ ma gezi peɗ, gwan-na yaɗ gaaso mbe me.
40013045	Muluk ge Dok ne fare gwan ge mojo̰o̰ ndu ge seŋe na tok ge ɓyare yìn̰a ge kê ge njal sergeleŋ ge yee gḛḛ ma yaɗɗa go.
40013046	Sok ge seɗ a̰me ge yee gḛḛ mbe go, gwan diŋ mbo yaɗ na kaŋ ma gezi peɗ, gwan-na yaɗ ne.
40013047	Muluk ge Dok ne fare gwan ge mojo̰o̰ kuwal ge àa doo ne mangaɗam ga̰a̰l se go, wan sini ma ya pe hini-hini.
40013048	Sok ge kuwal kageya se rigib ge sini, nda ge swaɗ soso ma zwal ne ya wa kal digi, àa kaɗ se twaɗ sini ma. Ge kwaɗa ma, àa kan num ge kɔkɔlay zì, ge sone ma, àa kan num gezi.
40013049	Mbo kaɗ mbe go ca ge dunin̰a pe aaya go. Malayka ma mbo caɗe nda ge laa pisil mage nda ge kee laa ɓyareya ge Dok ne ma buwal.
40013050	Àa mbo kan nda ge laa pisil ma ge ol ge hihiɗig zì. Ge sok mbe zì, àa mbo ka fyalla, àa ka sul maa kin̰a ma me.
40013051	Guwa̰, Zeso ele na nda ge ame hateya ma go: Ḛ wan fare sḭḭ ge mbi hate ḛ num fare ma pe ya go peɗ de? Àa vin ne.
40013052	Sok mbe go, jan num go: A ge pe, ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ge diige ge seŋe ya, ndu ge ame hateya ge muluk ge Dok ne pe, a ge mojo̰o̰ ndu ge zok ge ɔwabe kaŋ ge jin̰al mage kaŋ ge wal ma, ge na sok way kaŋ gan ma zì ya go.
40013053	Guwa̰ ge Zeso hate nda fare ge fare sḭḭ ma ta go, ɗege ge sok mbe go mbo.
40013054	Sok ge guwa̰ ya ge na suwal diŋ, ɗege hate fare ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way zì. Nda ka kee ajab ge ne hateya mbe ma pe, àa ka ele ta go: See na andaŋ mbe ge dii ya de? See pool ge kee kaŋ ajab mbe ma ge dii ya me de?
40013055	Daa be ndu ge pel zok pagal van ne no to de? Ne na̰ daa be Mari to de? Jak, Jozef, Simo̰ mage Jude ma daa be ne na̰ van ge soɗob ma ne no me to de?
40013056	Ne na̰ van ge gwale ma daa ne ge nè buwal zì no peɗ ɓade? Daa gwan seɗ andaŋ mage pool ge go mbe ge dii ya de?
40013057	Go mbe no puy, àa vin ne fare ge maa sḛ zì to. Ge sok mbe go, Zeso jan num go: Ndu ge zwagre Dok wa seɗ hormo seɗ ge sok ma go peɗ. Seɗ hormo to ge nda ge na suwal diŋ-ge mage na zok diŋ-ge ma ta ɗeŋew.
40013058	Ge suwal Nazareɗ diŋ, Zeso be gwan kee kaŋ ajab ma gḛḛ to, ge dape, àa be hoɗ fareba ge ne ta to.
40014001	Ge zaman mbe go, Heroɗ kaa gan ga̰a̰l ne ge suwa ge Galile ne pagal. Sok ge za̰a̰ fare ge kaŋ ajab ge Zeso ka kee num ma go,
40014002	jan na nda ma go: Ndu mbe kaɗ mà se Yohana ba ge kee nda baptem ne! A ne ta̰a̰ ne ge nda ge swày ma buwal zì ya, a ge pe, see pool ge kee kaŋ ajab mbe ma no.
40014003	Gan ga̰a̰l Heroɗ duwa fare mbe no ge dape, dee wal, wa̰a̰ Yohana, ba ge kee nda baptem, fee ne ge zul no, doo ne ge daŋay zì no, ge na na̰ van Filib gwale ge wal Herodiyaɗ fare pe,
40014004	ndwa go, Yohana ka jan ne go: Eeya ge Yahuɗ ma way be hon vin̰a go, mo kaa zok ge mo na̰ van gwale to, teg ge ne sḛ gale no go ge na ndwa.
40014005	Ge fare mbe no pe, gan ga̰a̰l ka ɓyare vin̰a go, àa hṵṵ Yohana gezi, ɗaŋɗe, ka chiya ɓase ma voo, ge dape, àa kuwa kuwa go, Yohana Nda ge zwagre Dok wa ne.
40014006	Deɗ-ɗa go, ge vḛḛso ge dwam tolla ge gan ga̰a̰l Heroɗ ne go, Herodiyaɗ van ge gwale zuu ya ndal kaŋ ge nda ge àa too num ya ge vḛḛso pe ma ndwa go no. Ne kaŋ ndalla mbe mbo ya kee gan ga̰a̰l Heroɗ sḛ tii gḛḛ.
40014007	Ge sok mbe go, guni tene sok kee wa tii go go, kaŋ a̰me ge van gwale mbe ma ele na ne ya, na mà hon ne ne.
40014008	Ge fare ge ne na̰ yuwale ne ya pagal, van gwale mbe mbo ya jan gan ga̰a̰l go: Mbi ɓyare go, mo ho̰ mbi ya ge sego Yohana ba ge kee nda baptem pagal ge bugur go.
40014009	Sok ge za̰a̰ fare mbe go, gan ga̰a̰l mbo ya wan kiimi. Ɗaŋɗe, ge ne gunin̰a ge guni tene ge nda ge na too num ya ma ndwa go pe ɗe, hoɗ na asagar ma na wa go: Ḛ ke kaŋ ge van gwale ele ne mbe avun cab,
40014010	ḛ mbo daŋay zì yà, ḛ vyan Yohana pagal ya.
40014011	Àa mbo, àa kee mbe go tem. Àa gene ne pagal ya ge bugur go, àa hon van gwale ne, ame ne mbo hon na na̰.
40014012	Nda ge ame hateya ge Yohana ne ma mbo ya hee Yohana duul, àa mbo mbul ne. Guwa̰, àa mbo wuwage Zeso fare ge ne swày ne.
40014013	Sok ge Zeso za̰a̰ fare mbe go, ɗege yalaŋ ge sok mbe go, ndee faa ga̰a̰l go mbo ge sok ge ndu no go yà to. Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge nda kuwa go num ɓyan-na zum yà, àa ɗege ge maa suwal ma ya kàre num pe, àa ka kereya ge mam wa go me.
40014014	Sok ge Zeso ndee ge faa se ya digi, kuwa ɓase ma tabeya didib, kuwa num a̰se. Ge sok mbe go, zon nda ge ka kee tuguɗi ge num buwal zì ma me.
40014015	Sok yan gasamal, ne nda ge ame hateya ma mbo ya ne ta, àa jan ne go: Sok kale ya go, ndu ge sok mbe go to, n̰a ɓase ma mbo ge suwal van ge jiyale guguwa ma yà yaɗ maa kaŋ zam ma.
40014016	Zeso gwan ge num janna go: Be kee kwaɗa ge go àa n̰a num mboya to. Ḛ sḛ ma ɓyare num kaŋ zam ne.
40014017	Àa gwan ge ne janna go: Ge no i tok go fyalag, a dupḛ ma nuwan̰, sini suwaya ma zi me.
40014018	Gwan ge num janna go: Ḛ gene mbi num ya.
40014019	Guwa̰ go, hoɗ ɓase ma na wa go, num kaa se ge sugu tɔgwal pagal. Ɔwabe dupḛ ge nuwan̰ mage sini ge zi mbe ma, hee na ndwa pḭḭ digi kee mersi hon Dok, siɗi dupḛ ma se hon na nda ge ame hateya ma, àa gene num mbo vaa ɓase ma.
40014020	Ndu ge diige zam kaŋ huriya. Àa ɔwabe kaŋ zam pe ge gaa ma gwal wol pɔgwa zi.
40014021	Ge nda ge zâ kaŋ ma buwal zì, nda soɗob kaa guwa mbo dudubu nuwan̰ go, be isi nda zaab mage nda jabso ya zì.
40014022	Fare mbe guwa̰ gaw, Zeso terse na nda ge ame hateya ma go, num ndee faa go haa mbo mam wa lee gene, ge na ndwa zḛḛ yà, guwa̰, na wa gaa n̰a ɓase ma mboya.
40014023	Guwa̰ ge n̰a ɓase ma mboya go, mbo ge njal pagal digi ndwa mbo kee kaɗeya. Sok ge ɗaal wuwa ya se, a ne sḛ gaa sok mbe go ne hini ɗu.
40014024	Zane no ɗe, faa ga̰a̰l ge ne nda ge ame hateya ma ndee go, deɗ-ɗa ge mam tuwal zum yà kaal ge wa kal, sḭ̀ḭl wa ya ka poɗ ne lee gene me-lee gene me, ge dape, sa̰a̰m ka kwal-la ge num ndwa zì.
40014025	Lee aaram pagal, sok mbo ge na nda ge ame hateya ma ta yà, Zeso ka mboya ge mam pagal.
40014026	Sok ge àa kuwa ne ya mboya mam pagal go, voo wan num, àa ɗege oyya digi batraŋ, àa ka janna go: A kḭḭ a̰me ne!
40014027	Ge sok mbe go gaw, Zeso jan num go: A mbi ne, ḛ ee ḛ dul wa se, ḛ chiya voo to.
40014028	Piyer hee fare, jan ne go: Bagezok-goo, kaɗɗa na mo sḛ ne, ho mo wa go, mbi mbo mo ta yà ge mam pagal.
40014029	Jan Piyer go, ne mbo ya na ta! Piyer kan na ko ge faa go, ɗege mbo ge Zeso ndwa zì yà ge mam pagal go.
40014030	Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge ndi sok na ziya, kuwa sḭ̀ḭl ge sa̰a̰m labreya ka mbeɗe ne, voo wan ne, ɗege tḭḭn̰a, oy Bagezok ge ka̰a̰l ndaal go: Mo̰o̰ mbi!
40014031	Zeso paa na tok avun cab, wan ne, jan ne go: Ge dape, mo wa ka tumri tene go de! Ndu ge hoɗ fareba hoɗege guwa!
40014032	Sok mbe go, àa ndee faa go, sa̰a̰m mḛḛ be kwalla.
40014033	Nda ge ame hateya ge kaa faa go ma mbo ya guu maa ko se uware Zeso, àa jan ne go: Fareba mo Dok Van ne.
40014034	Sok ge Zeso mage na nda ge ame hateya ma dee ya ge mangaɗam ga̰a̰l wa lee gene go, àa mbo ya yabe maa faa ge suwa Jenezareɗ wa kal se.
40014035	Nda ge suwal mbe diŋ-ge ma, sok ge àa kuwa go ne Zeso ne, àa ee tèmel mbo wuwage nda ge maa ziya ge ma, àa gene ne nda ge ka kee tuguɗi ma ya kakaɗag.
40014036	Nda ge kaa tuguɗi ma fyal ge Zeso ta go, ne mà kaɗ ge go ne n̰a maa taɗ na ba̰a̰ wa go nde de. Num peɗ ge ka taɗ ne ba̰a̰ wa ma ka seɗ zonna.
40015001	Guwa̰ swag, Farisi mage nda ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne a̰me ma ɗege ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem ya ndwa seɗ Zeso. Sok ge àa dee ya, àa ele ne go:
40015002	Ge dape, mo nda ge ame hateya ma wa ka mboya ge nè baŋ ma kaŋ keeya ma pagal to de? Ge dape, àa wa ka zam kaŋ be usi maa tok ma de?
40015003	Ɗaŋɗe, gwan ge num janna go: Ge dape, ḛ sḛ ma wa ka hele wa yuwaleya ge Dok ne ma pagal ndwa kee kaŋ keeya ge ḛ baŋ ma way ma de?
40015004	Ago, Dok ho na wa go: «Ho̰ mo ba mage mo na̰ hormo, ndu ge mbo sal na ba koo na na̰ ya, a ngaɗ go àa hṵṵ ne gezi.»
40015005	Kaɗɗa ge ḛ sḛ ma ɗe, ḛ hate nda go, ndu ge pool jan na ba koo na na̰ go: Kaŋ ge mbi tok go, ge mbi ɓyare mbaa ḛ ge ne, mbi mbege ne ya gezi ge Dok pe.
40015006	Mbi daa gwan hee ne mbaa mbi ba koo mbi na̰ to. Go mbe no, ḛ gul go fare ge Dok ne ma ndwa kee kaŋ keeya ge ḛ baŋ ma way ma.
40015007	Ḛ ge mbuɗi nda ndwa ma! Ezay jin̰a fare ge ka̰a̰l ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma way mbe ḛ pagal tem, sok ge jin̰a go:
40015008	Dok jin̰a go: «Pe rusu mbe uware mbi ge na wa wala boo, Ɗaŋɗe, ne dul wa kaal ge mbi.
40015009	Àa uware mbi bàŋ kay, Ago, àa hate eeya ge nda duwana ma way ma, Dinna ge mojo̰o̰ num mbi wa yuwaleya ma ne go.»
40015010	Guwa̰, Zeso tol ɓase ma ya, jan num go: Ḛ peɗ ḛ za̰a̰ mbi, ḛ kuwa fare mbe no gezi kwaɗa.
40015011	Kaŋ ge haɗ ndu duwana seŋre ge Dok ndwa se, a be kaŋ ge waɗ ge ne wa zì to, ɗaŋɗe, a fare ge ndage no ge ne wa zì ya zum.
40015012	Sok mbe go, ne nda ge ame hateya ma gwan ta ya ne ta zì, àa jan ne go: Mo ge kuwaya go, fare ge mo jin̰a mbe kê Farisi ma yal to de?
40015013	Gwan ge num janna go: Mbi Ba ge no pḭḭ ma zì yà mbo mbugi ɔwara ge diige ge na ɗḭḭ ne to gezi.
40015014	Ḛ n̰a num: Àa ge mojo̰o̰ ɓaal ge ɓyare wan maa ka̰a̰m ɓaal ge ɗogle ma ɔwara go! Sok ge ɓaal wan na kon ɓaal ɔwara, num sḛ ma jwàg gaa deɗ tugul se.
40015015	Guwa̰, Piyer hee fare, ele ne go: Mà kaɗ ge go mo wan i fare sḭḭ mbe pe zum nde de.
40015016	Zeso gwan ge num janna go: Ḛ sḛ ma puy, ḛ wan fare mbe pe zane to no me de?
40015017	Ḛ gale wan pe go, kaŋ ge waɗ ndu wa zì, mbo ne laa zì, seŋe ya njoo to de?
40015018	Ɗaŋɗe, fare ge ndage ge ndu wa zì ya, a fare ge mbo no ge ne dul wa zì ya ne, a ne ge haɗ ndu seŋre ne ge Dok ndwa se.
40015019	Ago, dwaɗɗa ge sone mbe ge ee ndu hun swày, ee ndu kee zina, ee ndu kaɗ gwale ge zam tene, chel kaŋ, kee sayda ge hày mage jan fare ge sone kakatag ma ge ta pagal, mbo ge ndu dul wa zì ya.
40015020	Kaŋ keeya ge sone mbe ma no peɗ haɗ ndu duwana seŋre ne ge Dok ndwa se. Ɗaŋɗe, zam kaŋ be usi tok haɗ ndu seŋre Dok ndwa se to.
40015021	Guwa̰, Zeso ɗege ge sok mbe go, ɔwabe tene mbo ge suwa ge Tir mage Sido̰ ne yà.
40015022	Gwale ge dwag mbe ge no rusu ge Kana ma way zì, ge kaa no suwa mbe go, mbo ya Zeso ta. Ɗege ka oy ne go: Bagezok ge gan ga̰a̰l Daviɗ Baŋ, kuwa mbi a̰se nde! Mbi van ge gwale ge on̰om ge sone ge na zì, za̰a̰ ne yal gḛḛ!
40015023	Ɗaŋɗe, gwan ge ne fare a̰me janna ɗu to. Ne nda ge ame hateya ma gwan ta ya ne ta zì, àa ka gwarge ta jan ne go: Yin̰a ne, ne mbo, ago kee kṵwa̰ gḛḛ sok kàre nè pe go.
40015024	Ɗaŋɗe, Zeso gwan ge ne fare janna go: Dok teme mbi ya ɗeŋew ge Izrayel van ge dḭḭ ge tame ge ba̰a̰ go ma pe.
40015025	Ge fare mbe no pagal, gwale mbe mbo ya guu na ko ge ne ndwa se, jan ne go: Bagezok chiya mbi kṵwa̰ nde.
40015026	Gwan ge ne janna go: Be kee kwaɗa ge àa hee kaŋ zam ge nda jabso way, àa dol juu van ma ne to.
40015027	Gwale mbe jan ne go: A fareba Bagezok, go no puy, juu ma zam kaŋ pe ge deɗ ge maa ba ma taabul digi ma zam.
40015028	Sok mbe go, Zeso jan ne go: Gwale! Mbi kuwa ya go fareba hoɗɗa ge amo mbiya mbyaɗ tab. Dok ho̰ mo kaŋ ge mo ɓyare ne. Sok mbe go gaw, ne van ge gwale mbe seɗ zonna.
40015029	Zeso ɗege ge sok mbe go, mbo ge mangaɗam ga̰a̰l ge Galile ne wa yà, ndee ge njal sok a̰me ge haal digi, kaɗ na pe se.
40015030	Nda mbo ya ɓase nɔnɔg, àa gene giɗi ma, ɓaal ma, gisil ge ɗel taɗɗa ma, nda ge ko looɗeya mage nda ge kee tuguɗi ge ɗogle ma ya gḛḛ-gḛḛ ge ne ta, ne sḛ zon num me.
40015031	Sok ge ɓase ma kuwa gisil ge ɗel taɗɗa ma faa wa, giɗi ma seɗ zonna, nda ge ko looɗeya ma mbo vin̰a, ɓaal ma kuwa sok, àa kee ajab, àa ɗege sale Dok ge Izrayel ma way me.
40015032	Guwa̰, Zeso tol na nda ge ame hateya ma ya ge na ta, jan num go: Mbi ɓyare ngay kuwa a̰se ge ambi ge ɓase mbe ma ta, ge dape, màno àa kee ya dwam taa ge mbi ziya be a̰me zam. Mbi n̰a num gwan diŋ ge camal to, num ndwa mà haɗ piibi num ge vin̰a zì.
40015033	Ne nda ge ame hateya ma ele ne go: Nda mbe ma no ɗem, i seɗ kaŋ zam ge mbyaɗ num mà ge dii, ge sok babur mbe no go de?
40015034	Zeso ele num go: Ḛ go ge dupḛ ma gyana ga de? Àa gwan ge ne janna go: I go ge dupḛ ma ɓỳala, sini zaaso a̰me ma kwaɗa lag me.
40015035	Sok mbe go, Zeso hoɗ ɓase ma na wa go, num kaa maa pe suwa se.
40015036	Guwa̰, hee dupḛ ge ɓỳala mage sini zaaso mbe ma, kee mersi hon Dok, siɗi num se, hon na nda ge ame hateya ma num, àa gaa vaa ɓase ma.
40015037	Àa peɗ, àa zam kaŋ mbyaɗɗa, ne nda ma kwate kaŋ zam pe ge gaa ma gwal pul ɓỳala.
40015038	Ge nda ge zâ kaŋ ma buwal zì, nda soɗob kaa dudubu ndà, be isi nda zaab mage nda jabso ya zì.
