40015039	Guwa̰ ge n̰a ɓase ma mboya go, ndee faa go, mbo ge suwa ge Magadan ne yà.
40016001	Farisi mage Saduki a̰me ma mbo ya Zeso ta ele ne fare ndwa hee ne pe. Àa jan ne go, ne ke kaŋ ngayya a̰me ɗu ge ee maa kuwaya go, ne pool mbe mbo ge Dok ta ya.
40016002	Ɗaŋɗe, Zeso gwan ge num janna go: Sok ge gyala din se, pḭḭ kaɗ kàal, ḛ jan go: Sok kaɗ kin̰are karaŋ.
40016003	Sok yan-na aaram hewow, ḛ jan go: Mam mà suwa, ago pḭḭ digi pisil ngingil. Ḛ kuwa kaŋ ge pḭḭ digi ma buwal vaaya ɗag, ɗaŋɗe, ḛ ge pool ge kuwa kaŋ ngayya ge sok ge màno ne ma buwal vaaya to wa!
40016004	Ḛ ge doŋ pe ge màno mbe go ma, ḛ nda ge kee sone mage mbo laa ɓyareya ge Dok ne pagal to ma, ḛ gwan ɓyare kaŋ ngayya a̰me ge Dok ta ya! Gaa ɗeŋew go, àa kê ḛ kaŋ ngayya ge àa dee kê ndu ge zwagre Dok wa|Nda ge zwagre Dok wa Jonas ne pe. Guwa̰ ge jin̰a num fare mbe go, n̰a num, dol tene mboya.
40016005	Sok haa mbo mangaɗam ga̰a̰l wa lee gene ya go, Zeso nda ge ame hateya ma vyale ya be hee dupḛ ma ge maa tok go.
40016006	Guwa̰ ge àa dee yà, Zeso jan num go: Ḛ koy ta kwaɗa ge jìn̰al hore ge Farisi mage Saduki ma way ta.
40016007	Ne nda ge ame hateya ma ka ele ta ge ta buwal zì go, jan fare mbe go, ge nè ɔwabe dupḛ ma ya ge nè tok go to pe de.
40016008	Zeso kuwa go num jan ta fare go ta buwal zì, jan num go: Ge dape, ḛ wa ka jan ta ge ta buwal zì go: Ne ge i he dupḛ ya i tok go to pe de? Hoɗ fareba ge ḛ ḛ zane hoɗege ba!
40016009	Ḛ wan fare mbe ma pe to iya de? Ḛ dwaɗ fare ge dupḛ ge nuwan̰ ge àa vaa nda dudubu nuwan̰ ma num ma, pe ge gaa ma, ḛ kwate num digi gwal pul gyana ga de?
40016010	Koo ge dupḛ ge ɓỳala ge àa vaa nda dudubu ndà ma num, pe ge gaa ma, ḛ kwate num digi gwal pul gyana ga me de?
40016011	Ḛ kuwa ya ge sego, fare ge mbi daa jin̰a ḛ, ne be fare ge dupḛ ma way pagal to kade, ɗaŋɗe, mbi jin̰a ḛ go: Ḛ koy ta kwaɗa, ge jìn̰al hore ge Farisi mage Saduki ma way ta.
40016012	Ge sok mbe go, nda ge ame hateya ma kuwa go, ne daa jin̰a maa fare be ge fare ge koy ta ge jìn̰al hore ge dupḛ ne pagal to, ɗaŋɗe, ge hateya ge Farisi mage Saduki ma way ta.
40016013	Guwa̰, Zeso ɗege mbo ge suwa ge Sezare ge Filib ne yà ɓanna ge na nda ge ame hateya ma. Sok ge àa dee yà, ele num fare mbe no: Nda jan go zum ge mbi, Van ge Ndu ne pe gyana tem de?
40016014	Àa gwan ge ne janna go: A̰me ma jan go go, mo Yohana ba ge kee nda baptem ne, gegene ma go, mo Eli ne, ge ɗogle ma me ɗe, mo Jeremi koo ɗu ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma buwal zige ne.
40016015	Zeso ele num go, ḛ sḛ ma jan go, mbi huɗi ne de?
40016016	Simo̰ Piyer gwan ge ne janna go: Mo Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne, Ndu ge Dok taa nee ne, Dok Ba ge hon nda ndwa Van.
40016017	Sok mbe go, Zeso jan ne go: Laa saal ge mo pe, Simo̰ ge Jonas van, ago, a be ndu duwana tâ mo fare mbe ne to, a mbi Ba ge no pḭḭ ma zì yà.
40016018	Ge sego, mbi jan mo go: Mo dḭḭl Piyer ndwa go njal, mbi mbo kwate ɓase ge ambi ma ge njal mbe pagal. Koo sok kàɗɗa ge nda ge swày ma way pool go fyalag ge kee num a̰me mbo kaɗ to.
40016019	Mbi mbo hon mo lakle ge muluk ge Dok ne wa ma: Kaŋ ge mo mbo tele ne ya ge suwa pagal, mbo kaɗ teleya ge Dok ta pḭḭ ma zì yà. Kaŋ ge mo mbo hage ne vin̰a ya ge suwa pagal, mbo kaɗ hageya ge Dok ta pḭḭ ma zì yà me.
40016020	Guwa̰, Zeso hoɗ na nda ge ame hateya ma na wa ndaa kaka go, ne kaa ge num jin̰a ndu a̰me go na Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa nee ne to.
40016021	Sok mbe go, Zeso ee pe ben na nda ge ame hateya ma fare pe zum kɔn̰al waŋ, ne mbiya go, na mbo Jerusalem, na za̰a̰ yal gḛḛ ge Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme num ma, ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way mage Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma tok go, na see swày, dwam taa guwa̰, na ta̰a̰ digi me.
40016022	Guwa̰, Piyer wan ne ya zum gezi caɗ, ɗege mḛḛre ne go: Ɓyare go mo jin̰a fare ge go mbe ma to, Dok cage mo, Bagezok! Ne kaa ge fare ge go mbe see mo to.
40016023	Ɗaŋɗe, Zeso seŋe tene se, jan Piyer go: Wa̰a̰ tene gezi yà kaal ge mbi Saytan ! Mo kaŋ chal ko ne ge mbi pe, ago mo dwaɗɗa ma be dwaɗɗa ge Dok ne ma ne to, ɗaŋɗe, àa dwaɗɗa ge nda duwana ma way ma ne.
40016024	Guwa̰, Zeso jan na nda ge ame hateya ma go: Kaɗɗa ndu ɓyare mbo ya ge mbi pe go, ne duwa tene to, ne he dṵṵl ge in na kaŋre, ne kàre mbi pe me.
40016025	Ago, ndu ge diige ge mbo kaɗ-ɗa ka kwacware tene ge ndwa ge na ne, mbo ban ne gezi. Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge diige ge mbo hon tene ya gezi, ge mbi pe, mbo seɗ ndwa ge fareba.
40016026	Kaɗɗa ndu duwana seɗ kaŋ gan ge suwa pagal ma ya mɔɗwag, kaɗ go ne ban ndwa ge na ne gezi no, mbo mbaa ne ge da de? Koo mbo hon da ge mbiya ɗoo, wa gwan seɗ ndwa ge na ne mbe ya de?
40016027	Ago, Van ge Ndu ne mbo mbo ya ge pateya ge na Ba ne zì ɓanna ge na malayka ma. Ge sok mbe go, mbo poɗ ndu ge diige ge ne fare keeya pagal tem.
40016028	Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no: Nda ge no ge sego sok mbe go ma, a̰me ge num buwal zige ma mbo suu to, zḛḛ ge go num kuwa Van ge Ndu ne mbo ya kee muluk ge nda duwana ma pagal.
40017001	Guwa̰ ge dwam kale menengal go, Zeso wan Piyer, Jak mage na na̰ van Yohana, mbo ge num ge njal a̰me ge haal pagal digi yà, gezi yà hini caɗ ge nda ge ɓase ma.
40017002	Ne diir mbo ya eya ge num ndwa zì. Ne ndwa ɗege ka seeya dinna ge gyala see go, ne ba̰a̰ ma seŋe saal taɗag dinna ge kɔn̰al go.
40017003	Ne nda ge ame hateya ma ɗege tan ta ɗe, Moyiz mage Eli wa ya ka siɗigi fare ge ne ɓal.
40017004	Sok mbe go, Piyer hee fare jan Zeso go: Bagezok-goo, a kwaɗa ge go nè kaɗ ge sok mbe no go. Kaɗɗa mo vin vin, mbi ge pool ɗùu gur ma taa, ɗu ge mo pe, ɗu ge Moyiz pe, ɗu ge Eli pe me.
40017005	Ḛ za̰a̰ gale, a ge Zeso sok jan ta fare go, pḭḭ ge saal taɗag mbo ya laa num se. Ka̰a̰l a̰me ɗege faa fare mbe ma no ge pḭḭ mbe zì ya go: Ano, a mbi Van ne, mbi laa wa̰a̰ ne gḛḛ, mbi sḛ kee tii gḛḛ ge ne pe me. Ḛ ke tèmel ne fare janna ma pagal.
40017006	Sok ge nda ge ame hateya ge taa ma za̰a̰ fare mbe go, voo wan num gḛḛ ge go, àa deɗ se ndwa kubiya ge suwa pagal.
40017007	Ɗaŋɗe, Zeso gwan tene ya num ta, dabe num, jan num go: Ḛ chiya voo to! Ḛ ɗege digi.
40017008	Sok ge àa hê maa ndwa digi ndil sok, Zeso gaa ya ne hini ɗu.
40017009	Sok ge àa ka ndee ge njal pagal digi ya se, Zeso hoɗ num na wa go: Ḛ jin̰a ndu kaŋ ge ḛ kuwa ne mbe to, ɗiŋ ge go mbi, Van ge Ndu ne, mbi gale ta̰a̰ ne ɓiya ge nda ge swày ma buwal zì.
40017010	Guwa̰, nda ge ame hateya ma ele ne fare mbe no go: Ge dape, Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma wa ka janna go, Eli mbo mbo ya zḛḛ gale ne ɓiya de?
40017011	Gwan ge num janna go: A fareba, Eli mbo mbo ya ne nuusi kaŋ ma peɗ ge maa byalam ma go.
40017012	Ɗaŋɗe, mbi jan ḛ go: Eli mbo dee ja sok zoo, àa be kuwa go ne huɗi ne de to, àa kê ne yal ge maa laa ɓyareya pagal no tem. Go mbe no me, àa mbo kee mbi, Van ge Ndu ne sḛ yal mbe go waɗme.
40017013	Guwa̰, nda ge ame hateya ma kuwa gezi hetel go, sok jan maa fare ge Eli ne go, Zeso zane ka jan maa fare ge Yohana ba ge kee nda baptem ne.
40017014	Sok ge Zeso mage na nda ge ame hateya ge taa ma mbo ya se ge ɓase ma ta, ndu a̰me ɗu mbo ya guu na ko ge ne ndwa se, jan ne go:
40017015	Bagezok, kuwa mbi van ge son a̰se nde, ge dape, mbuɗuɗum pil ne zazan̰, ka dol ne ndwa wowol, ge ol zì de koo ge mam se de.
40017016	Mbi gene ne ya ge mo nda ge ame hateya ma ta, num pool be mbyaɗ ge yan ne to.
40017017	Zeso ɗege num pagal, jan go: Ḛ nda ge doŋ pe ge màge mbe ge no be hoɗ fareba mage kee sone ma! Mbi gaa kaɗ ge ḛ dagre ɗiŋ mbo diya ga de? Mbi in ḛ dṵṵl ma mbo diya ga me de? Ḛ gene mbi van mbe ya.
40017018	Guwa̰ ge àa gene ne van mbe ya, Zeso ngwabe on̰om ge mbuɗuɗum mbe, ne sḛ ndage zum, ge sok mbe go baba, van mbe seɗ zonna.
40017019	Guwa̰, nda ge ame hateya ma mbo ya ge Zeso ta hini jan, àa ele ne go: Ge dape, i wa mbyaɗ yan on̰om ge mbuɗuɗum mbe zum to de?
40017020	Zeso gwan ge num janna go: A ge hoɗ fareba hoɗege guwa ge ḛ ḛ pe. Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no: Koo kaɗɗa go ḛ ge hoɗ fareba hoɗege guwa ge mojo̰o̰ sugu ge àa tol ne mutard ndwa go puy, ḛ ge pool hoɗ njal ḛ wa go, ne ndage ge sok mbe no go, mbo ge sok ge ɗogle yà, a ngaɗ go ne ke mbe go tem. A̰me ge tane ḛ ndwa mbo kaɗ to.
40017021	[Ɗaŋɗe, on̰om ge sone ge go mbe pe no, waɗ zum ge kaɗeya mage wan mam njuwal ta mbḛḛ.]
40017022	Dwam a̰me go ɗu, Zeso mage na nda ge ame hateya ma wa ya mɔɗwag ge suwa ge Galile ne go, Zeso jan num go: Àa gaa ɓyan mbi, Van ge Ndu ne ge nda duwana ma tok go,
40017023	àa mbo hun mbi, ɗaŋɗe, dwam taa guwa̰, Dok mbo tan mbi ge swày se. Ge fare mbe no pagal, kiimi ge ga̰a̰l kale wan ne nda ge ame hateya ma gaw.
40017024	Sok ge Zeso mage na nda ge ame hateya ma guwa̰ ya ge suwal Kapernawom diŋ, nda ge chal siyal ge zok ge Dok ne pe ma mbo ya ge Piyer ta, àa ele ne go: Ḛ Ba ge hateya poɗ siyal ge zok ge Dok ne pe poɗ ɗer ɓade?
40017025	Piyer vin, jan num go, poɗ ne poɗ. Sok ge wuwa zok diŋ yà, Zeso hee fare zḛḛ, ele ne go: Mo dwaɗ gyana ge fare mbe no pagal de, Simo̰? A huɗi ma mbiya poɗ gan ga̰a̰l ge suwa pagal ma siyal ne de? A num van suwal ma koo gɔswal ma de?
40017026	Simo̰ gwan ne janna go, ne van gɔswal ma. Ge ne fare mbe pagal, Zeso jan ne go: Van suwal ma zane poɗ a̰me to.
40017027	Ɗaŋɗe, ge go ne seŋe kaŋ chal ko ge num ta to pe ɗe, mbo sol kòo mangaɗam ga̰a̰l se, sini ge zḛḛge ge mo ma min ne ya, hage ne wa digi, mo mà seɗ bware ge poɗ nè ge mo pagal jwàg, he ne mo hon num.
40018001	Sok mbe go gaw, nda ge ame hateya ma gwan ta ya ge Zeso ta zì, àa ele ne go: A huɗi ge waɗe ga̰a̰l ne ge muluk ge Dok zì yà de?
40018002	Zeso tol van jiyale a̰me ya ɗu, ee ne mḛḛya ge maa tuwal zì,
40018003	jan num go: Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no, kaɗɗa go ḛ seŋe ta ya se, ḛ kaɗ dinna ge nda jabso go to, ḛ mbo waɗ ge muluk ge Dok ne zì to.
40018004	Go mbe no, ndu ge diige ge mbo gwan na pagal ya se dinna ge ndu jiyale mbe no go, mbo kaɗ ndu ge waɗe ga̰a̰l ne ge muluk ge Dok ne zì yà.
40018005	Ndu ge diige ge mbo ame van jiyale ya ɗu ge na diŋ, ge mbi pe, ago ame mbi sḛ ge mbi pagal.
40018006	Nda jabso mbe ge ho fareba mbi ta ma no, ndu ge mbo ee a̰me ya ɗu deɗɗa ge sone zì, ne nde-nde ge àa vwal njal ga̰a̰l ge ne ka̰a̰l zì, àa ɗigli ne ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam se yà.
40018007	Guwa̰, Zeso jan na nda ge ame hateya ma go: Woo ge ḛ ge no suwa pagal ma pe! Ago kaŋ chal ko ge ee ḛ mbo deɗ ge sone zì ma mbo kaɗ gḛḛ ge ḛ pe! A ngaɗ go kaŋ ge gene ko challa ya ma num kaa, ɗaŋɗe, woo ge ndu ge fare ge ee nda deɗɗa mbe ma mbo mbo ya ge ne ta.
40018008	Kaɗɗa mo tok koo mo ko ee mo ne mbo deɗ ge sone zì, kṵṵ num gezi, mo dol num gezi yà kaal. A kwaɗa ge mo pe go mo seɗ ndwa ge fareba tok duul, ko duul, ge go mo kaɗ ge mo tok mage mo ko ma jwàg, àa mbo dol mo ge ol ge ɗiŋ ge din zì.
40018009	Kaɗɗa mo ndwa ee mo mbo deɗ ge sone zì ne, zagle ne, mo dol ne gezi yà kaal. A kwaɗa ge mo pe go mo seɗ ndwa ge fareba ndwa lee ɗu, ge go mo kaɗ ge mo ndwa ma jwàg, àa mbo dol mo ge sok njoɗ yal zì.
40018010	Ḛ koy ta kwaɗa ge sen ndu jiyale a̰me ɗu ge num mbe ge deŋe ta no mbi ta ma buwal zige. Mbi jan ḛ go, malayka ge koy num ma ge vin̰a ɗaɗag ge mbo ge mbi Ba ge no pḭḭ ma zì yà ndwa se yà.
40018011	[Ago Ndu ge Dok teme ne ya mbo ya mon nda ge ba̰a̰ ma.]
40018012	Mà kaɗɗa go, ndu ge tame ma kis (100), ɗu ge num buwal zige ban no, kee mà gyana de? Mà n̰a ge kis wa gezi ɗu pɔgwa wa gezi ɗu (99) ma ge sok haal digi, mo mbo ɓyare ge ɗu ge ba̰a̰ mbe to de?
40018013	Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no, kaɗɗa seɗ ne ya, kee laa saal gḛḛ ge ne pe waɗe ge kis wa gezi ɗu pɔgwa wa gezi ɗu ge gaa ma.
40018014	Go mbe no ca, ḛ Ba ge no pḭḭ ma zì yà ɓyare go, nda jabso mbe ge deŋe ta na ta ma, a̰me ɗu ba̰a̰ to.
40018015	Kaɗɗa mo na̰ van kee sone ya ge mo ta, mbo ne ta mo sḛ hini ɗu, mo jan ne, ne sone ge kê, kaɗɗa kuwa na sone ya, mo gwan ge ne ja kee baan dagre ge mo.
40018016	Kaɗɗa kuwa na sone ya to, guwa̰ ne ta ge na̰ van ɗu koo zi ge mo pe go. «Mo kee ano mbe ndwa go, àa nuusi fare ma peɗ ge nda zi koo nda taa ndwa se.»
40018017	Gwan kuwa na sone ya ge num ndwa se to, jin̰a ɓase ge Krist ne ma fare mbe, gwan kuwa na sone mbe ya num ndwa se to iya ɗe, ndi ne ge mojo̰o̰ ndu ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to mage ndu ge chal siyal go.
40018018	Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no, kaŋ ge ḛ mbo tele num ya ma peɗ ge suwa pagal, àa mbo kaɗ teleya ge Dok ta pḭḭ ma zì yà, kaŋ ge ḛ mbo hage num vin̰a ma ya peɗ ge suwa pagal, àa mbo kaɗ hageya ge Dok ta pḭḭ ma zì yà me.
40018019	Iya ɔwale, mbi jan ḛ no, kaɗɗa ḛ buwal zì, nda zi vin ta ya kaɗe Dok ge fare a̰me pe ge suwa pagal, mbi Ba ge no pḭḭ ma zì yà, mbo hon num kaŋ mbe.
40018020	Ago, kaɗɗa ḛ vin ta ya nda zi koo taa kee kaɗeya ge mbi dḭḭl, mbi ge ḛ buwal zì me.
40018021	Sok mbe go, Piyer gwan tene ya ge Zeso ta zì, ele ne go: Bagezok, mà kaɗɗa go mbi na̰ van kaɗ ka dwage sone keeya ge mbi ta no, mbi mbiya pore ne ndwa gyana ga de? Mbi mà pore ne ya ɗiŋ mbo ndwa ɓỳala no mbiya to de?
40018022	Zeso gwan ge ne janna go: Mbi jan mo go ndwa ɓỳala bàŋ to, ɗaŋɗe, ndwa ɓỳala pe wol, ta ndwa ɓỳala, ge kon pagal.
40018023	A go mbe no, sok ge Dok mbo ɗege ya kee muluk, ne fare keeya mbo kaɗ ge mojo̰o̰ gan ga̰a̰l a̰me ɗu ge ɓyare go, na ame digi na wul ma ge na nda ge tèmel ma tok go.
40018024	Sok ee pe ame na wul ma go, àa gene ne ya, ne ndu ge tèmel a̰me ɗu, ge ne bware no gḛḛ ne pagal, ge ne sḛ mbyaɗ poɗ ne to.
40018025	Ajo̰o̰ na kaa be a̰me ge poɗɗa ɗe, gan ga̰a̰l mbe hoɗ na wa go, àa yiya ne gezi ɓanna ge ne gwale, ne van ma, ge kaŋ ge ne diŋ-ge ma peɗ ndwa poɗ ne wul mbe.
40018026	Sok mbe go, ndu ge tèmel mbe mbo ya guu na ko ne ndwa se, jan ne go: Gan ga̰a̰l, mà kaɗ ge mo da̰a̰re mbi dwam ge dogle ɗoo, mbi wa seɗ vin̰a ge poɗ mo kaŋ mbe ma ge ɓul mɔɗwag nde de.
40018027	Sok ge gan ga̰a̰l kuwa ano mbe go, kuwa na ndu ge tèmel mbe a̰se, pore ne, ne wul mbe, n̰a ne mboya.
40018028	Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge ndu ge tèmel mbe wuwa ya zum go, seɗ na kon ge tèmel a̰me ɗu ge na wul no fyalag ge ne pagal, wan ne, cemse ne ka̰a̰l ormol zì ndindiŋ, jan ne go: Poo mbi mbi wul.
40018029	Ne kon ge tèmel mbe guu na ko ne ndwa se kaɗe ne go: Mà kaɗ ge mo da̰a̰re mbi dwam ge ɗogle ɗoo, mbi mà seɗ vin̰a ge poɗ mo nde de.
40018030	Ɗaŋɗe, kuri, mbo dol na kon ge tèmel mbe daŋay zì, ɗiŋ ge go ne poo na na wul mbe mbḛḛ.
40018031	Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge ne ka̰a̰m ge tèmel ma kuwa kaŋ ge ne kê mbe, num laa vḛḛne gḛḛ, àa mbo gan ga̰a̰l ta jan ne fare ge maa kon mbe kê num ma mɔɗwag.
40018032	Sok mbe go, gan ga̰a̰l ee tèmel tol na ndu ge tèmel ge na wul no ne pagal gḛḛ mbe ya, jan ne go: Mo ndu ge laa pisil ne, mbi daa pore mo ge mo wul ma mɔɗwag, ge mo fiya tene mbi ta pe kade.
40018033	Mbiya go mo sḛ waɗme, mo kuwa mo kon ge tèmel a̰se dinna ge mbi kuwa mo a̰se go to de?
40018034	Gan ga̰a̰l laa mbo ya vḛḛneya, ge ne twam juliliya zì, hoɗ na wa go, àa doo ne daŋay zì za̰a̰ yal ɗiŋ ne poɗ kaŋ ge na pagal ma mɔɗwag mbḛḛ.
40018035	Zeso sok aa na fare go, jan num go: Mbi Ba ge no pḭḭ ma zì yà mbo kee ndu ge diige mbe go, kaɗɗa ne pore na na̰ van ya ge na dul wa zì ya mɔɗwag to.
40019001	Sok ge Zeso aa na fare hateya ma go, ɗege ge suwa Galile go, mbo ge suwa Jude lee ge no mangaɗam Urdun wa lee gene yà.
40019002	Nda mbo ya ɓase nɔnɔg ge ne pe go, ge sok mbe go, zon num ge ka kee tuguɗi ma, ge nda mbe ma buwal zì.
40019003	Ge dwam a̰me go ɗu, Farisi a̰me ma mbo ya ge Zeso ta ndwa hee ne pe, àa ele ne go: Vin̰a a̰me hage go ge eeya ge Moyiz ne pagal ge ndu son pe go, ne yin̰a na gwale ge fare a̰me pe de?
40019004	Zeso gwan ge num janna go: «Ḛ be isi kaŋ ge no Njaŋeya ge Dok ne zì to de? Ge pe dolla ge Dok doo nda duwana ma go, kee ndu son mage ndu gwale jwàg.»
40019005	Jin̰a no go: «A ge pe no, ndu son mbo n̰a na ba mage na na̰, mbo mbarge ge na gwale, num sḛ ma jwàg mbo seŋe ge ndu ɗu go.»
40019006	Go mbe no, àa daa nda zi to, ɗaŋɗe, àa gaa ge ndu ɗu go. Ne kaa ge ndu saa kaŋ ge Dok vuwa ne to.
40019007	Guwa̰, Farisi a̰me mbe ma mbal Zeso fare janna go: «Ge dape ɗoo, Moyiz wa hoɗ ndu son na wa go, ne ho̰ na gwale lawayta ge saaya sok yan ne go de?»
40019008	Gwan ge num janna go: A ge dul wa ndaa ge ḛ ḛ ma pe, Moyiz ho̰ ḛ vin̰a ge yan ḛ gwale ma no, ɗaŋɗe, ge pe dolla ge Dok doo nda duwana ma go, be kaɗ go to.
40019009	A ge pe, mbi jan ḛ ne no: «Ndu ge diige ge yan na gwale ya, kaɗɗa ɗeŋew ge ne kê zina pe to, gwan san ge ɗogle, kee zina.»
40019010	Zeso nda ge ame hateya ma jan ne go: Kaɗɗa fare ge ee ndu yan na gwale ɗu new, ne nde-nde go ndu kaɗ zok to.
40019011	Gwan ge num janna go: A be nda peɗ ge wan fare ge mbi jin̰a ḛ ne mbe pe ne to, ɗeŋew num ge Dok tyan num ndwa ma ya gezi ge fare mbe pagal.
40019012	Ago, nda a̰me ma go, àa too zaa ge maa na̰ ma laa zì ya day, gegene ma seŋe ajibaŋ ge kaŋ ge nda duwana ma kê num ma ta, ge ɗogle ma mbege ta be kaɗ zok ge fare ge muluk ge Dok ne pe. Ndu ge vin tene ya ame fare hateya mbe no, ne ame ne.
40019013	Guwa̰, nda a̰me ma gene Zeso nda jabso a̰me ma ya, ndwa go ne ee na tok ma num pagal kee num wa tare, ne kaɗe ge num pe me. Ɗaŋɗe, ne nda ge ame hateya ma ɗege mḛḛre num.
40019014	Sok mbe go, Zeso jan num go: Ḛ n̰a nda jabso, num mbo ya ge mbi ta, ḛ kaa ge be tele num to. Ago, muluk ge Dok ne, a ge num ge dḭḭ ta ge nda jabso mbe ge go ma pe.
40019015	Kee num wa tare sok ee na tok ma ge num pagal, guwa̰, ɗege ge sok mbe go, mbo.
40019016	Ge dwam mbe go baba, bogol a̰me ɗu mbo ya Zeso ta jan ne go: Ba ge hateya, a ma̰ kaŋ ge kwaɗa ge mbi mbiya kee nee ne, ndwa seɗ ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din ge Dok ta de?
40019017	Gwan ge ne janna go: Ge dape mo wa ele mbi fare ge ndu ge no kwaɗa pagal de? Ndu ge kwaɗa ɗu, a Dok. Kaɗɗa mo ɓyare seɗ ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din ge Dok ta, koy ne wa yuwaleya ma.
40019018	Bogol mbe ele ne go: Ge diige ma de? Zeso gwan ge ne janna go: «Hṵṵ swày to, ke zina to, chee kaŋ to, ke sayda ge hày to.»
40019019	Ho̰ mo ba mage mo na̰ hormo: Mo laa mbo wan mo kon ge mo sḛ go.
40019020	Bogol mbe jan ne go: Wa yuwaleya ano mbe ma no peɗ, mbi mbo go num pagal, a ma̰ kaŋ ge ɗogle ge mbi mbiya kee nee ne iya de?
40019021	Zeso gwan ge ne janna go: Kaɗɗa mo ɓyare kaɗ ndu ge mbyaɗɗa tab ge Dok ɓyare go, mbo, yiya mo kaŋ gan ma gezi mɔɗwag, va a̰se ma num bware mbe, go mbe no, mo mbo seɗ kaŋ gan ge pḭḭ ma zì yà. Guwa̰, mbo ya, mo kàre mbi pe me.
40019022	Sok ge za̰a̰ fare mbe ma go, bogol mbe ndwa mbo ya suu se leɗeɗ, dol tene mboya ago kaa gan njonjon̰.
40019023	Guwa̰, Zeso jan na nda ge ame hateya ma go: Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no, a haŋle ge go ndu ge pwal wuwa ge muluk ge Dok ne zì.
40019024	Mbi jan ḛ ne no iya: A fogo waɗeya, ge jambal ge jujul zi waɗ ge libra ndwal zì, ge go ndu ge gan waɗ ge muluk ge Dok ne zì.
40019025	Sok ge ne nda ge ame hateya ma za̰a̰ fare mbe go, àa kee ajab gḛḛ, àa jan go: A huɗi ge pool seɗ monna ne ɗaŋ de?
40019026	Zeso ndil num bàa, jan num go: Kaŋ mbe ndil haŋle ge nda duwana ma ndwa zì, ɗaŋɗe, Dok ge pool kee kaŋ ma peɗ.
40019027	Ge sok mbe go, Piyer hee fare, jan ne go: O̰o̰, i n̰a i kaŋ ma ya ya peɗ, i kàre mo pe ya no. Mbo kaɗ gyana ge i pe de?
40019028	Zeso gwan ge num janna go: Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no: Sok ge kaŋ ma peɗ mbo seŋe ya jin̰al, Van ge Ndu ne mbo kaɗ ge na hòol gan ge pateya pagal, ḛ ge wol pɔgwa zi ge ka kàre mbi pe ma, ḛ mbo kaɗ ge hòol gan ge wol pɔgwa zi ma pagal ndwa kun sariya ge vuwal pe ge wol pɔgwa zi ge Izrayel van ma way ma pagal me.
40019029	Ndu ge diige ge n̰a na zok ma, na na̰ van ge soɗob ma, ge zaab ma, na ba, na na̰, na gwale, na van ma, na gaaso ma ge mbi pe, mbo seɗ poɗɗa ndwa kis kon pagal waɗeya, gwan seɗ ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din ge ne pagal iya.
40019030	Ɗaŋɗe, nda gḛḛ ge no zḛḛ ge sego ma mbo gwan guwa̰, ge no guwa̰ ya ge sego ma gḛḛ mbo seŋe ya zḛḛ me.
40020001	Ago, muluk ge Dok ne fare dḭḭ ge fare sḭḭ ge ndu ge zok ge wuwa zum aaram vḛḛ, ndwa ɔwabe nda ge kee tèmel ma kan na gaaso on̰or zì go.
40020002	Sok ge see a̰me ma kwaɗa lag, za̰a̰ tene ge num go, na poɗ ndu ge diige bware ge tèmel dwam ɗu ne. Guwa̰, teme num mbo kee tèmel ge na gaaso on̰or zì.
40020003	Gwan waɗ-ɗa zum ge gyala horom ndaal go, kuwa nda a̰me ge ɗogle ma anna zok buwal zì be kee tèmel a̰me.
40020004	Jan num go: Ḛ mbo kee tèmel ge mbi gaaso on̰or zì waɗme, mbi mbo poɗ ḛ kaŋ ge mbiya tem.
40020005	Ge sok mbe go, àa vin, àa kan ta mbo kee tèmel ge ne gaaso mbe zì. Ndu ge zok mbe gwan waɗ-ɗa zum ge gyala pɔgwa taɗ go, guwa̰, ge gyala swa saa go, kee kaŋ mbe ma ge na ka kee wal go.
40020006	Deɗ-ɗa ge gyala tok gasamal go guwa, sok ge wuwa zum iya, seɗ nda a̰me ma mḛḛya ge zok buwal zì iya, ele num go: Ge dape, ḛ wa kaɗ mḛḛya ge aaram day ge sok mbe go be kee a̰me de?
40020007	Àa gwan ge ne janna go: Ago ndu be mbo ya wan i kee tèmel to. Jan num go: Ḛ mbo kee tèmel ge mbi gaaso on̰or zì waɗme.
40020008	Sok ge gyala dḭḭ se go, ndu ge gaaso on̰or mbe jan na ndu ge ndil nda ge kee tèmel ma go: Too nda ge kee tèmel ma ya, mo poɗ ndu ge diige ne bware. Ee pe poɗɗa ge num ge mbo ya kee tèmel guwa̰ ma ta se ya, mo wa mbo ya aaya ge num ge mbo ya zḛḛ ma ta.
40020009	Guwa̰ ge ndu ge diige ge num ge mbo ya kee tèmel gyala tok gasamal guwa ma see maa poɗɗa ge bware ge tèmel dwam ɗu ne go,
40020010	sok ge gaa go àa poɗ num ge mbo ya zḛḛ kee tèmel ma, ndu ge diige kaa ge dwaɗɗa go na seɗ mà gḛḛ waɗeya. Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge diige mbo ya seɗ poɗɗa ge mojo̰o̰ nda ge guwa̰ ge ma see go waɗme.
40020011	Guwa̰ ge àa ame maa bware ma go, àa ɗege tunna ge ba ge gaaso pagal.
40020012	Àa ɗege janna go: Num ge mbo ya guwa̰ mbe ma kee ler ɗu boo, mo poo num no cḛḛ ge mojo̰o̰ i ge za̰a̰ yal mḛḛya gyala hogol ndwa go, ge aaram day kee tèmel ma no go me.
40020013	Ba ge gaaso gwan ge ɗu ge num buwal zige janna go: Kondore, mbi be za̰a̰ mo yal to, nè daa be za̰a̰ ta ne, ge bware ge tèmel dwam ɗu ne pagal to de?
40020014	Ame mo bware ndwa, mo mbo. Mbi vḭḭ tene poɗ ndu ge mbo ya guwa̰ dwab ge mojo̰o̰ mbi mà poɗ mo ya mbe go.
40020015	Mbi ge vin̰a ge kee kaŋ ge mbi ɓyare ge mbi bware sḛ to de? Koo mo kee yil ge mbi kê nda gegene ma kwaɗa pe de?
40020016	Guwa̰, Zeso gwan jan na nda ge ame hateya ma go, nda gḛḛ ge no zḛḛ ge sego ma mbo gwan guwa̰, ge no guwa̰ ya ge sego ma gḛḛ mbo seŋe ya zḛḛ me.
40020017	Ajo̰o̰ Zeso mage na nda ge ame hateya ma ka mbo mbo Jerusalem, ge vin̰a zì, tol na nda ge ame hateya ge wol pɔgwa zi mbe ma ya gezi ge na ta, jan num go:
40020018	Ḛ kuwa ge sego, nè mbo go Jerusalem, àa mbo ɓyan mbi, Van ge Ndu ne ge ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way mage Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma tok go. Àa mbo wan ne ge sariya ge ee ne mbo swày,
40020019	àa mbo ɓyan ne ge nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma tok go ndwa go num lasage ne, num keme ne ge bol, num pee ne ge ɔwara kaŋre ta digi. Ge dwam ge taa pagal, mbo tan digi.
40020020	Guwa̰, Zebede gwale mbo ya ge Zeso ta ɓanna ge na van ma, guu na ko ne ndwa se ndwa ele ne kaŋ a̰me ɗu.
40020021	Zeso ele ne go: Mo ɓyare go mbi ke mo da de? Jan ne go, ke mbi wa tii go, mbi van ge zi mbe ma no, num mbo kaɗ kee muluk ge mo, sok ge mo mbo kaɗ-ɗa ge mo hòol muluk pagal. Ge ɗu ge mo tok matoson pagal go, gegene ge mo tok magul pagal me.
40020022	Zeso gwan ge num janna go: Ḛ wan kaŋ ge ḛ ele mbi ne pe to. Ḛ ge pool ge njoɗ kob ge yal za̰a̰ya ne ge mbi mbo njoɗ ne ya de? Àa gwan ge ne janna go, i ge pool njoɗ ne.
40020023	Zeso jan num go: A fareba go, ḛ mbo njoɗ kob mbe ge mbi mbo njoɗ ne ya. Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ge fare ge kaɗ ge mbi tok matoson mage mbi tok magul pagal ne ɗe, a be mbi fare ne to. Ɗeŋew a mbi Ba tal nda ge sok mbe ee ge num pe ma ne.
40020024	Sok ge Zeso nda ge ame hateya gegene ge wol ma za̰a̰ fare mbe go, àa mbo ya seŋe twam ge na̰ van ge zi mbe ma ta.
40020025	Go mbe no, Zeso tol num ya mɔɗwag ge na ta, jan num go: Ḛ kuwa kuwa go ɓase ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma, num gan ga̰a̰l ma kee num liliɗ, num ga̰a̰l ma ka luguy num me.
40020026	Go mbe no, mbo kaɗ go to ge ḛ buwal zì. Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge diige ge ɓyare go na kaɗ ga̰a̰l ge ḛ buwal zì, mbo seŋe ndu ge kee tèmel hon ḛ.
40020027	Ndu ge diige ge ɓyare go na kaɗ ḛ ndwa zḛḛ, mbo seŋe ge ḛ moor sḛ go.
40020028	A ge pe, mbi, Van ge Ndu ne, mbi be mbo ya go nda ke tèmel hon mbi to, ɗaŋɗe, mbi sḛ kee tèmel hon nda ne, mbi hon tene gezi ndwa zuu nda gḛḛ ge num sone ma go me.
40020029	Sok ge Zeso wuwa ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jeriko diŋ ya zum ɓanna ge na nda ge ame hateya ma, ɓase ma nɔnɔg ka kàre ne pe.
40020030	Deɗ-ɗa go, ɓaal ma zi wa ya kàɗɗa ge vin̰a kin̰a go. Sok ge àa za̰a̰ go ne Zeso kale ne, àa ɗege oyya go: Bagezok, gan ga̰a̰l Daviɗ Baŋ, kuwa i a̰se nde!
40020031	Ɓase mbe ge nɔnɔg ma ka mḛḛre num go num dibi maa wa, ɗaŋɗe, àa gwan ka oyya digi ge ka̰a̰l ndaal go: Bagezok, gan ga̰a̰l Daviɗ Baŋ, kuwa i a̰se nde no de!
40020032	Go mbe no, Zeso mbo ya mḛḛ se, tol ɓaal mbe ma ya, ele num go: Ḛ ɓyare go mbi ke ḛ da de?
40020033	Àa gwan ge ne janna go: Bagezok, n̰a go i ndwa ma hage.
40020034	Zeso kuwa num a̰se, ee na tok ge num ndwa ma go, sok mbe go gaw, num ndwa ma gaa kuwa sok, àa gaa kàre ne pe.
40021001	Zeso mage na nda ge ame hateya ma yan-na guwa ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem. Sok ge àa dee ya ge njal ge ɔwara oliv ma do̰o̰ no ne pagal digi kin̰a go, ndwa mbo waɗ Betfaje diŋ, suwal van ge no Jerusalem ziya, teme na nda ge ame hateya ma zi,
40021002	jan num go: Ḛ mbo ge suwal van ge no ge nè ndwa nga diŋ yà, bàŋ go velgeteg, ḛ mà seɗ kwar na̰ vwalla se, ge na van na ziya go, ḛ saa num, ḛ gene num ya mbi ta.
40021003	Kaɗɗa ndu mà ele ḛ fare a̰me ya, ḛ mà gwan ge ne janna go: A Bagezok ɓyare num ne, ge sok mbe go, mà n̰a ḛ mboya ge num.
40021004	Fare mbe dee ya keeya ndwa huy fare janna ge Nda ge zwagre Dok wa ne ma:
40021005	«Ḛ jin̰a nda ge suwal ga̰a̰l Siyo̰ diŋ-ge ma go: Ḛ kuwa, gan ga̰a̰l yan ja ḛ ta no, Suul lɔlɔgwaɗ kàɗɗa kwar na̰ pagal digi, Ge kwar van pagal, kwar van na̰, Kaŋ kogor ge in kaŋ dṵṵl.»
40021006	Nda ge ame hateya ma mbo, àa kee ge mojo̰o̰ Zeso ho maa na wa mbe go.
40021007	Àa gene kwar na̰ mage na van ya jwàg. Guwa̰, àa kan maa ba̰a̰ ma ge num guwa̰ digi, àa ee Zeso kaɗ na pe num pagal me.
40021008	Ge sok mboya go, nda gḛḛ ge ɓase nɔnɔg ma buwal zige ma zen maa ba̰a̰ ma ge vin̰a pul go, gegene ma chal ɔwara tok ge tɔgwal ma ya, àa tiɗ num ge vin̰a pul go me.
40021009	Nda kaɗ ne ndwa zḛḛ cùb, gegene ma kaɗ ge ne guwa̰ go me. Àa ka oyya digi ndaal go: «Hosana, gan ga̰a̰l Daviɗ Baŋ Dok ke wa tare ge ndu ge mbo ya Ge dḭḭl ge Bagezok ne pagal. Hosana, Dok ge pḭḭ ma zì yà ge.»
40021010	Sok ge Zeso wuwa ya Jerusalem diŋ, suwal ga̰a̰l mbo ya haɗ digi go giliw, nda ɗege ele ta go: Ndu mbe no ɗa, a huɗi ne de?
40021011	Ɓase ma ka gwan ge num janna go: A Zeso Nda ge zwagre Dok wa ge suwal Nazareɗ ge no suwa ge Galile ne go ne.
40021012	Guwa̰, Zeso waɗ ge zok ge Dok ne zì yà, yan nda ge ka ee kaŋ yaɗɗa mage num ge yaɗ kaŋ ma ya zum peɗ. Pugi taabul ge nda ge eya bware ma way ma ya se, dol kaŋ kàɗɗa ge nda ge yaɗ tugtug gezi ma way ma se me.
40021013	Jan num go: Njaŋe ge maktub ge Dok ne zì go: «Àa mbo tol mbi zok go, zok kee kaɗeya. Ɗaŋɗe, ḛ me ɗe, ḛ seŋe ne ya sok way ta ge chala ma way no.»
40021014	Sok mbe go, ɓaal mage giɗi ma mbo ya zok ge Dok ne zì ge ne ta, ne sḛ zon num me.
40021015	Sok ge Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way mage Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma kuwa ne kaŋ keeya ge ajab mbe ma, ge nda jabso oyya ge àa ka oyya ge zok ge Dok ne mbe zì go: Hosana, Daviɗ Baŋ, num laa vḛḛne gaw.
40021016	Àa jan ne go: Mo za̰a̰ fare ge àa jan mbe ma go ɗer ɓade? Zeso gwan ge num janna go: O̰o̰ ḛ be isi maktub ge Dok ne sok ge jan go: «Mo nuusi vin̰a nuusi ge go, koo nda jabso mage num ge pam wa go ge ma uware mo to de?»
40021017	Guwa̰, n̰a num, waɗ ge suwal ga̰a̰l diŋ ya zum mbo suwal Betani, ndwa go ka dwam ya mbe go.
40021018	Kin̰are aaram, sok gwan-na ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ go, camal wan ne.
40021019	Kuwa fere mḛḛya ge vin̰a kin̰a go, kun ne ta zì yà, ɗaŋɗe, seɗ go ne gàa ma ne ɗeŋew, jan fare ge ne pagal go: A gaa no mbo zḛḛ, mo daa gwan tol ndwa to baɗ. Ge sok mbe go gaw, fere mbe fin̰a huyum.
40021020	Sok ge nda ge ame hateya ma kuwa kaŋ mbe ma go, àa kee ajab, àa ele ta go: Daa kee pe gyana fere mbe wa fin̰a vun go gaw de?
40021021	Zeso gwan ge num janna go: Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no, kaɗɗa ḛ ge hoɗ fareba, ḛ tumri ta to me ɗe, ḛ mbo kee kaŋ ajab ge mbi ngay ne no fere ta ɗeŋew to, ɗaŋɗe, sok ge ḛ mbo jan njal ge ɔwara oliv ma do̰o̰ no ne pagal digi mbe ya go: Ndage tene ge sok mbe no go, mbo dol tene ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam se yà, ano mbe mbo kee go tem.
40021022	Kaɗɗa ḛ ge hoɗ fareba, ḛ mbo seɗ kaŋ ge diige pe peɗ ge ḛ mbo ele ne ya, sok kee kaɗeya go.
40021023	Guwa̰, Zeso waɗ ge zok ge Dok ne zì yà, ɗege hate nda. Ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way mage Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme num ma gwan ta ya ne ta zì guwa, àa ele ne go: Mo see vin̰a ge kee kaŋ mbe ma ge huɗi ta de? A huɗi ho̰ mo pool ge kee num ne de? Zeso gwan ge num janna go:
40021024	Mbi sḛ waɗme, mbi mà ele ḛ fare ɗu, mà kaɗɗa ḛ gwan ge mbi vinna ya ɗe, mbi mà jan ḛ ge ma̰ pool ɗoo, mbi kee kaŋ mbe no de.
40021025	A huɗi ho̰ Yohana vin̰a ge kee nda baptem ne, a Dok koo nda duwana ma de? Sok mbe go, àa ɗege pee ta ta buwal zì, àa ka janna go: Mà kaɗɗa nè gwan ge ne vinna ya go: A Dok ho̰ ne vin̰a ne, mà jan nè no go: Ge dape ḛ wa hoɗ fareba ge ne ta to de?
40021026	Kaɗɗa nè mà janna go: «See ne ge nda duwana ma ta», ɓase ma mà ɗege nè pagal. Ago, num sḛ ma peɗ ge kuwaya go Yohana ndu ge zwagre Dok wa|Nda ge zwagre Dok wa ne.
40021027	Go mbe no, àa gwan ge Zeso janna go: I wan pe to. Ne sḛ gwan jan num go: Mbi sḛ waɗme, mbi jan ḛ go, mbi see pool mbe ge kee kaŋ mbe ma ge dii de to me.
40021028	Zeso gwan jan num go iya: Ḛ dwaɗɗa fare no pagal gyana de? Ndu a̰me ɗu kaa ge van ma zi, mbo ya ge zḛḛge ta, jan ne go: Mbi van, màno, mbo kee tèmel ge gaaso ge on̰or ne zì.
40021029	Ne van mbe gwan ge ne janna go: Mbi ɓyare to. Guwa̰ swag, eya fare, mbo gaaso mbe.
40021030	Ndu mbe mbo ya ge na van ge zi ta, hoɗ ne na wa ge mojo̰o̰ na jin̰a na van ge zḛḛge go. Ne sḛ gwan na ba janna go: Mbi mbo mbo baa, ɗaŋɗe, mbo gaaso mbe to.
40021031	Ge num ge zi mbe ma buwal zì, a huɗi ke laa ɓyareya ge na ba nee ne de? Àa gwan ge ne janna go: A ge zḛḛge. Zeso jan num go: Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no, nda ge chal siyal mage nda zaab ge zam ta ma mbo waɗ muluk ge Dok ne zì ḛ ndwa zḛḛ.
40021032	Ago Yohana mbo ya ngay ḛ vin̰a ge temel taɗ, ḛ be hoɗ fareba ne ta to. Ɗaŋɗe, a nda ge chal siyal mage nda zaab ge zam ta ma vare gwan hoɗ fareba ne ta ne zoo, ajo̰o̰ ḛ kuwa kaŋ mbe ma ge ḛ ndwa puy, ḛ be seŋe ta se ndwa hoɗ fareba ne ta to.
40021033	Zeso gwan jan num go, ḛ za̰a̰ fare sḭḭ a̰me ge ɗogle no: Ndu a̰me ɗu ɗḭḭ on̰or, vê ne zì ge gulum no, câ tugul ge njal zì ge ɓerse on̰or pe no, ɗû acagaɗa ge haal ge gaaso mbe pe koyya no me. Guwa̰, hon nda ge kee tèmel gaaso on̰or ma ne wanna, dol tene mbo gɔswal kaal ndiɗ.
40021034	Sok ge sok hel on̰or mbiya, teme na dore ma ge nda ge kee tèmel gaaso on̰or mbe ma ta yà, ndwa go num ame na na on̰or ndwa ya.
40021035	Nda ge gaa on̰or mbe ma wan ne nda ge tèmel mbe ma, àa iyal ge ɗu, àa hun gegene, àa mbal ge taa gezi ge njal.
40021036	Go mbe no, gwan teme na nda ge tèmel ge ɗogle ma ya gḛḛ waɗe nda ge na teme num ya wal ma. Nda ge gaa on̰or mbe ma kee num yal ge mojo̰o̰ àa kê ge wal mbe ma go ca.
40021037	Ge guwa̰ dwab, teme na van ge son ge num ta yà, ka dwaɗɗa go: Ajo̰o̰ a mbi van ne gaw ɗe, àa mà hon ne hormo nde.
40021038	Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge nda ge kee gaaso on̰or tèmel ma kuwa ne van ya mboya, àa jan ta ta buwal zì go: A ndu ge zam ne joo ne no, ḛ mbo nè ya, nè hṵṵ ne, ne joo mbe wa gaa nè.
40021039	Sok mbe go, àa wa̰a̰ ne no, àa mbo ge ne ge gaaso on̰or guwa̰ zum yà no, àa hṵṵ ne gezi no.
40021040	Zeso ele ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way mage Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme num ma go: Ge sego mà kaɗɗa go ndu ge gaaso on̰or mbe mbo ja no, kee num mbe ge kee gaaso on̰or tèmel mbe ma gyana de?
40021041	Àa gwan ge ne janna go: Mbo puu num mbe ma gezi be kuwa a̰se, hon na gaaso on̰or mbe wanna ge nda ge kee gaaso on̰or tèmel ge ɗogle ma tok go, ge mbiya hon ne, ne ne ndwa, sok ge siyal ma go tetem.
40021042	Zeso jan num go: «Ḛ be isi ge Njaŋeya ge Dok ne zì go: Njal ge nda ge sin zok ma doo ne gezi, A ne gaa ya njal ge gag ge zok keŋ pe ne, Ano mbe mbo ge Bagezok ta ya, A kaŋ ajab ne ge nè kuwa ne no.»
40021043	A ge fare mbe ma no pe, mbi jan ḛ no go: Àa mbo ame muluk ge Dok ne mbe ge ḛ tok go, àa hon ne rusu ge ɗogle ge mbiya tol van ge kwaɗa ma ge muluk mbe pe.
40021044	Ndu ge diige ge mbo deɗ-ɗa ge njal mbe pagal, mbo hal na sok ma kɔkɔcwa, kaɗɗa ne dee ge ndu pagal ne me ɗe, mbo roɗ ne gezi njaɗaɗ me.
40021045	Guwa̰ ge ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way mage Farisi a̰me ma see go Zeso ke na fare sḭḭ mbe ma ge maa pagal,
40021046	àa ɗege ɓyare vin̰a ge ee maa tok ne pagal, ɗaŋɗe, àa ka chiya voo ge ɓase ge nɔnɔg ma pe, ge dape, ɓase mbe ma ka ndil Zeso ge Nda ge zwagre Dok wa go.
40022001	Zeso gwan ɗege jan ɓase ma fare ge fare sḭḭ iya, jan num go:
40022002	Muluk ge Dok ne dḭḭ ge mojo̰o̰ gan ga̰a̰l a̰me ɗu, ge nuusi vḛḛso sanna ge na van ge son pe go.
40022003	Teme na nda ge tèmel ma go, num mbo tol nda ge see tolla ge vḛḛso sanna ne pe ma ya, ɗaŋɗe, nda mbe ma kuri go maa mbo ya to.
40022004	Gwan teme na nda ge tèmel ge ɗogle ma iya, hoɗ num na wa go: Ḛ mbo jan nda ge see tolla ge vḛḛso sanna ne pe ma go: Ḛ kuwa gale, mbi nuusi kaŋ zam ge vḛḛso ne ya go, mbi hun nday pool mage mbi kaŋ kogor ge so̰o̰l ma ya se, kaŋ ma nuusi go peɗ, ḛ mbo ya ge vḛḛso sanna go.
40022005	Ano peɗ puy, nda ge see tolla ma ndil num fare mbe solom, ndu ge diige dol tene mbo na gaaso de, koo mbo seŋe na tok de.
40022006	A̰me ma kan-na ge nda ge tèmel mbe ma ta, àa wan num, àa kee num yal mamaɗ, àa hun num gezi me.
40022007	Gan ga̰a̰l laa vḛḛne, teme na vwag twam mbo puu nda mbe ge hṵṵ swày ma gezi, àa til num suwal ga̰a̰l gezi mɔɗwag.
40022008	Guwa̰, jan na nda ge tèmel ma go: Kaŋ zam ge vḛḛso sanna pe nuusi ya go, ɗaŋɗe, num ge see tolla ge vḛḛso mbe pe ma be wan ndwa zam ne to.
40022009	Ɓyare ḛ mbo ge vin̰a ga̰a̰ ma go, nda ge ḛ mà seɗ num ya ma peɗ, ḛ too num mbo ya vḛḛso sanna go.
40022010	Ne nda ge tèmel mbe ma kan ta ge vin̰a ma go sasar, àa kwate nda ge maa seɗ num ma ya mɔɗwag, nda ge sone mage nda ge kwaɗa ma me. Sok kwateya ge vḛḛso sanna ne mbo ya huyya ge nda.
40022011	Sok ge gan ga̰a̰l wuwa ya ge zok ge vḛḛso sanna ne zì, ndwa ndil nda ge àa too num ya ma, kuwa ndu a̰me ɗu be ba̰a̰ ge vḛḛso sanna ne ge na ta.
40022012	Ele ne go: Kondore, mo kee pe gyana mo wuwa ya ge sok mbe zì no be ge ba̰a̰ sanna ge vḛḛso ne ge mo ta to de? Ndu mbe kuwa fare a̰me ge janna to.
40022013	Sok mbe go, gan ga̰a̰l jan na nda ge tèmel ma go: Ḛ vuwa ne tok mage ne ko ma, ḛ mbeɗe ne mbo dol ge tṵṵ ge ɗeɗeg zum yà, sok mbe mbo kaɗ sok kirgi ta ge fiyaso mage sul kin̰a ma ne.
40022014	Zeso gwan jan num go, nda ge àa too num ya ma gḛḛ, ɗaŋɗe, nda ge àa tal num ma hoɗege guwa.
40022015	Ge sok mbe go, Farisi ma mbo seɗ ta ndwa wan Zeso, ge fare ge mà ndage ya ge ne wa zì ma ta.
40022016	Àa teme maa nda ge ame hateya ma ɓanna ge Heroɗ nda ma ge ne ta. Àa jan ne go: Ba ge hateya, i kuwa kuwa go mo ndu ge fareba ne, mo kaŋ hateya ma fare ge fareba ma ne peɗ ge vin̰a ge Dok ne pagal, be ge go mo chiya ndu a̰me ndwa voo to. Ago mo vare nda to.
40022017	Jin̰a i mo dwaɗɗa gale: Vin̰a hage hage ge eeya ge nè ne ma pagal go, àa poo siyal hon Sezar koo tele tele de?
40022018	Ajo̰o̰ Zeso ka kuwa num dwaɗɗa ge sone mbe ma zḛḛ wal ɗe, gwan num janna go: Ḛ mbe ge mbuɗi nda ndwa ma, ge dape ḛ wa ka hee mbi pe go de?
40022019	Ḛ ngay mbi bware ge nda poɗ siyal ge ne gale. Àa ngay ne silay ɗu.
40022020	Ele num go: Pagal mage kaŋ njaŋeya ge ne ta mbe ma huɗi ne ma ne de?
40022021	Àa gwan ge ne janna go: A Sezar ne ma ne. Sok mbe go jan num go: Kaŋ ge go na Sezar nee ne ɗe, ḛ ho̰ ne ne. Kaŋ ge go na ge Dok nee ne ɗe, ḛ hon Dok ne kaŋ me.
40022022	Sok za̰a̰ ne fare janna mbe ma go, àa kee ajab. Àa swaɗ ne, àa mbo maa mboya.
40022023	Dwam mbe go baba, Saduki ma, num mbe ge hate go tanna ge nda ge swày ma way to ma, gwan ta ya Zeso ta zì, àa ele ne fare mbe no:
40022024	Ba ge hateya, Moyiz njaŋe i ge na eeya ma zì go: «Kaɗɗa go ndu suu ya be van, ɓyare go ne na̰ van hee gwale kumu mbe, ne kê na na̰ van ge suu rusu.»
40022025	Ndi nda a̰me ma kaa ge i buwal zì ta pe go nda soɗob ɓỳala na̰ van ge ba ɗu mage na̰ ɗu. Ge pul sway san gwale, wan suu be n̰a van a̰me ɗu to, ne gwale gaa, ne na̰ van hee ne.
40022026	Ge zi mbe wan suu, ge taa, ɗiŋ deɗ-ɗa ge ɓỳala ta.
40022027	Guwa̰, gwale mbe wan suu ge num pe ya waɗme.
40022028	Ge dwam tanna ge nda ge swày ma way go, gwale mbe mbo kaɗ ge diige gwale ne ge num mbe ge ɓỳala ma buwal zì de? Ago num sḛ ma mɔɗwag kaa zok ge ne.
40022029	Zeso gwan ge num janna go: «Fare ge ḛ jan go nda ge suu ma mbo tan to ɗe, a ge na vin̰a go to, ge dape, ḛ wan Njaŋeya ge Dok ne koo pool ge ne ne kaŋ ge mbiya keeya pe to.
40022030	Ago, ge dwam tanna ge nda ge swày ma way go, nda soɗob mbo kaɗ ge gwale ma to, koo nda zaab kaɗ ge obe ma to me, ɗaŋɗe, àa mbo kaɗ dinna ge malayka ge Dok ne ma go ge pḭḭ zì yà.
40022031	Kaɗɗa ge fare ge jin̰a ge tanna ge nda ge swày ma way pagal ɗe, mbi ge kuwaya tyatyaɗ go ḛ isi ne ya, fare ge Dok jin̰a ḛ ne go:
40022032	“Mbi, mbi Dok ge Abraham ne, Dok ge Isak ne, Dok ge Jakob ne me.” Ago Dok mbe, a Dok ge nda ge swày ma way ne to, ɗaŋɗe, A Dok ge nda ge ndwa ma way ne.»
40022033	Ɓase ge ka za̰a̰ ne ma peɗ ka ke ajab ge ne fare hateya mbe ma pagal.
40022034	Sok ge Farisi ma za̰a̰ go, Saduki ma daa be seɗ fare ge janna ge Zeso wa byalam go to ɗe, àa kwate ta se.
40022035	Ɗu ge num buwal zige, ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne, ele ne fare mbe no ndwa hee ne pe go:
40022036	Ba ge hateya, a wa yuwaleya ge diige ge no eeya ma zì waɗe na ka̰a̰m ge ga̰a̰l ne de?
40022037	Zeso gwan ge ne janna go: «Mbiya go mo laa wa̰a̰ mo Bagezok Dok ge amo, ge mo dul wa mɔɗwag, ge mo sḛ mɔɗwag, ge mo dwaɗɗa mɔɗwag me.»
40022038	A wa yuwaleya ge zḛḛge ne, waɗe ge ga̰a̰l ne me.
40022039	Kuwa ge zi ge dḭḭ ne no me: «Mbiya mo laa wan mo kon ge mo sḛ go.»
40022040	Kaŋ ge wa yuwaleya mage nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma hate num ma peɗ, àa seɗ num ge eeya ge zi mbe ma no zì.
40022041	Ajo̰o̰ Farisi ma kwate se kwate, Zeso ele num fare mbe no:
40022042	«Ḛ dwaɗ ge Krist, Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne pagal gyana de? Ḛ dwaɗ go ne huɗi baŋ ne de?» Àa gwan ge ne janna go: «A Daviɗ Baŋ ne.»
40022043	Zeso jan num go: «Ge dape ɗoo, On̰om wa ee Daviɗ tol ne go Bagezok de? Sok ge jin̰a go:
40022044	Bagezok Dok jin̰a mbi Bagezok go: “Mbo ya kaɗ ge mbi tok matoson pagal go, Ɗiŋ ge go mbi ee mo nda ge ho̰o̰l ma Gwan maa pagal ge mo ko pul se.” »
40022045	«Mà kaɗɗa go Daviɗ sḛ ge na pagal tol ne Bagezok no, kee mà pe gyana Krist, Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne wa gwan kaɗ ne baŋ de?»
40022046	Ndu a̰me ɗu seɗ fare ge gwan ge ne byalam go to. Ge dwam mbe go day, ndu a̰me daa be tal tene ele ne fare a̰me ɗu to baɗ.
40023001	Guwa̰, Zeso jan ɓase ge ka za̰a̰ na mage na nda ge ame hateya ma go:
40023002	Nda ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne mage Farisi ma nda ge wan nda eeya ge Moyiz ne mbe ma pe zum ma ne.
40023003	Kaɗɗa na mbe go, ḛ ke kaŋ ge àa hate ḛ num ma, ḛ mbo ge num pagal me. Ɗaŋɗe, ḛ ke kaŋ ge num sḛ ma kee go to. Ago àa hate fare mbe ma hate cuɗ, àa kee tèmel ge num pagal to me.
40023004	Àa haɗ eeya ma ya se fiyal danjan̰, àa ee dṵṵl ge neneg mbe ya ge nda duwana ma gaŋ wa go ge go num mbyaɗ in ne to. Ɗaŋɗe, num sḛ ma ge maa pagal mbyaɗ ee maa tok ya zì mbaa num to peɗ.
40023005	Kaŋ ge àa kee num ma peɗ, àa kee num ndwa go nda kuwa maa. Àa fyaɗe maa warga ma se buu, àa a̰a̰le maa ba̰a̰ ga̰a̰l ma wa zum mbe go me.
40023006	Num laa wa̰a̰ sok kàɗɗa ge nda ge hormo ma way ge sok vḛḛso zam kaŋ zam ma go, sok kàɗɗa ge nda ndwa zḛḛge ma ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way zì.
40023007	Num laa wa̰a̰ wa sanna ge hormo ge sok ɓase ma go, nda ka tol maa waɗme go, ba ge hateya.
40023008	Kaɗɗa ge ḛ ɗe, ḛ vḭḭ go àa ka tol ḛ ba ge hateya to, ago, ḛ ba ge hateya ɗu kikiɗ, ḛ sḛ ma mɔɗwag ḛ na̰ van.
40023009	Ḛ too ndu a̰me suwa pagal go Baa to, ago, ḛ ge ba ɗu kikiɗ, ne ge no ge pḭḭ ma zì yà.
40023010	Ne kaa ge ḛ vḭḭ go àa ka tol ḛ ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme nda to, ago, ḛ ge ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme ḛ ɗu kikiɗ, a Krist, Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne .
40023011	Ndu ge mbiya kaɗ ga̰a̰l ge ḛ buwal zì, ɓyare go ne seŋe ndu ge kee tèmel hon ḛ .
40023012	Kaɗɗa ndu yan ga̰a̰l pe, Dok ge pool gwan ge ne nda guwa̰ ya ɗaɗa, kaɗɗa na gwan na pagal ya se, Dok mbo hee ne digi me.
40023013	Woo ge ḛ, nda ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne mage Farisi mbe ge mbuɗi nda ndwa ma! Ago ḛ tele nda go vin̰a be waɗ muluk ge Dok ne zì. A fareba ḛ sḛ ma waɗ ne zì to, a ge pe, ḛ n̰a nda ge ɓyare waɗ ne zì ma vin̰a to no me.
40023014	[Woo ge ḛ ḛ, nda ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne mage Farisi mbe ge mbuɗi nda ndwa ma! Ago ḛ zam kumu ma tok, ḛ kee kaɗeya ge twala lindiŋ go nda kuwa ḛ. Ge ano mbe no pe, Dok mbo ee dṵṵl ge meg ge ḛ pagal waɗeya.]
40023015	Woo ge ḛ, nda ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne mage Farisi mbe ge mbuɗi nda ndwa ma! Ḛ aa sok ma ya nanna ge ḛ pagal, ndwa fin̰al digi me no, mam ga̰a̰l nuwam se me, ndwa ḛ see ndu go ɗu, ne dee ya mbo ya ge eeya ge Moyiz ne ma pagal. Sok ge ḛ seɗ ne ya, ḛ seŋe ne van ge sok njoɗ yal ne, ndwa zi waɗe ḛ sḛ ma.
40023016	Woo ge ḛ, ɓaal ge ɗeme nda ma, ge jan go: Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me guni tene ya ge zok ge Dok ne, isi to. Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ndu a̰me guni tene ya ge dinar ge zok ge Dok ne zige, isi isi.
40023017	Ḛ kaa dàle, ḛ gwan kaɗ ɓaal to ɗaŋ! A ge diige mbiya waɗe na kon ge ga̰a̰l ne de, dinar koo zok ge Dok ne ge haɗ dinar harcal de?
40023018	Ḛ jan go go iya: Ndu a̰me ge guni tene ya ge twal tuwaleya, isi to. Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ndu a̰me guni tene ya ge bobo ge doo no twal tuwaleya pagal digi, isi isi.
40023019	Ɓaal ma, a ge diige mbiya waɗe na kon ge ga̰a̰l ne de, bobo koo twal tuwaleya ge haɗ bobo harcal de?
40023020	Ndu ge guni tene ge twal tuwaleya, guni tene ge twal tuwaleya mage kaŋ ge no ne pagal digi ma mɔɗwag.
40023021	Ndu ge guni tene ge zok ge Dok ne, guni tene ge zok ge Dok ne mage Dok ge kaa no ne zì waɗme.
40023022	Ndu ge guni tene ge pḭḭ, guni tene ge hòol muluk ge Dok ne mage Ba ge kaa no hòol muluk mbe pagal me.
40023023	Woo ge ḛ ḛ, nda ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne mage Farisi mbe ge mbuɗi nda ndwa ma! Ago ḛ hon Dok ḛ kaŋ wa ge mbiya fare to ge mojo̰o̰ gefere, gasan̰ mage zul go ma go ɓame, zane no, ḛ vyale kaŋ ge ḛ mbiya kee num ge ciciliŋ ge no eeya ge Moyiz ne zì ma go, ndwa go: Temel taɗ, kuwa a̰se mage hoɗ fareba. A kaŋ ge ḛ mbiya kee num ma ne, be ge ḛ vyale gegene ge gaa ma to me.
40023024	Ge ɓaal mbe ge ɗeme nda ma! Ḛ dol ndwa keceɗ hee sùsù ge deɗ jìn̰al pagal ma gezi, ɗaŋɗe, ḛ uɗi jambal ge na ɓul mɔɗwag.
40023025	Woo ge ḛ ḛ, nda ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne mage Farisi mbe ge mbuɗi nda ndwa ma! Ago ḛ usi gezi seɗe mage sufra guwa̰ ɗag, zane no, ḛ dul wa ma pella zì cɔcwag ge dwaɗɗa ge sone mage kaŋ ge bàŋ yag ge ḛ ene ee no ge num pagal ma.
40023026	Farisi ge ɓaal ma, ḛ ee pe usi seɗe mage sufra pul guy, ge go guwa̰ ge num way wa haɗ kɔn̰al waɗme.
40023027	Woo ge ḛ, nda ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne mage Farisi mbe ge mbuɗi nda ndwa ma! Ḛ dinna ge sḭḭ ge saal taɗag ge nda ndil num siŋli ge guwa̰ zum go, zane no, num pul ma zì huyya ge kal ge nda ge swày ma way, ge kaŋ huri ge diige pe peɗ.
40023028	Ḛ sḛ ma dinna ca mbe go me, ḛ ndil temel ge ndwa, ḛ dul wa ma zì pella ge ndwa mbuɗiya mage kaŋ keeya ge n̰aal kakatag ma.
40023029	Woo ge ḛ ḛ, nda ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne mage Farisi mbe ge mbuɗi nda ndwa ma! Ago ḛ sin tugul mbul ta siŋli ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma pe me no, ḛ ɗebce sḭḭ ma siŋli ge nda ge temel ma pe me,
40023030	ḛ ka janna go: Daa no go, i kaa ge i baŋ ma zaman ma ya, i dana mà ɓan dagre ge num ndwa kan swàm ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma way se to.
40023031	Go mbe no, ḛ kaŋ keeya mbe ma kee sayda ne ge ḛ sḛ ma pagal go, ḛ nda ge hṵṵ nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma van ge soɗob ma ne.
40023032	A kwaɗa! Ḛ huy kaŋ ge ḛ baŋ ma ke ma wa ɗaŋ!
40023033	Bwam ma, pe rusu ge dḭḭ ta ge gole go ma! Gyana, gyana, ḛ dee wa mbo ɓuu gezi ge sariya ge wan nda a̰me ma ee num mbo sok njoɗ yal zì mbe go de?
40023034	Ḛ za̰a̰ gale, mbi mbo teme ḛ nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma, nda ge andaŋ mage Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma ya, ḛ mbo hun a̰me ma, ḛ pel num ɔwara kaŋre ta digi, ḛ mbo keme gegene ma ge bol ge ḛ zok kee kaɗeya ma zì, ḛ ka njon̰ num ge suwal ga̰a̰l ma diŋ peɗ me.
40023035	Ano mbe kee ndwa go, nda ge be fare maa pagal mbe ge num swàm kan no se suwa pagal ma peɗ, ge swàm ge Abel ndu ge temel ta ya day, ɗiŋ deɗ-ɗa ge swàm ge Zakari ge Berkiya van ne ta go, ne ge ḛ hṵṵ ne ge sok ge harcal mage twal tuwaleya buwal zì, num kaa ge ḛ pagal.
40023036	Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no, fare mbe ma no peɗ, num dṵṵl mbo deɗ ge ḛ ge doŋ pe ge màno mbe no pagal.
40023037	Nda ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ-ge ma! Nda ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ-ge ma! Ḛ ge hun nda ge zwagre Dok wa mage mbal nda ge temeya ma gezi ge njal, ndwa gyana ga ge mbi ɓyare kwate ḛ ya mbi ta, dinna ge baare na̰ kwate na van ma ge na faa pul zì go, ano peɗ puy, ḛ be vin sok mbe to.
40023038	Ḛ kuwa, Dok swaɗ zok ya ge ḛ tok go, mbo gaa pṵṵl.
40023039	Ago mbi jan ḛ ne no, ḛ mbo da gwan kuwa mbi ndwa to baɗ, ɗiŋ ge go ḛ jin̰a ge ḛ wa zì go: «Dok ke wa tare ge ndu ge mbo ya ge dḭḭl ge Bagezok ne pagal!»
40024001	Guwa̰ ge Zeso ɗege ge zok ge Dok ne zì ya, sok waɗ-ɗa zum go, ne nda ge ame hateya ma gwan ta ya ge ne ta zì ndwa ngay ne zok ge Dok ne mbe sinna ge sḭḭ siŋli.
40024002	Ɗaŋɗe, gwan ge num janna go: Ḛ kuwa zok na̰ ge ɓaŋlaŋ mbe ya kade? Fareba, mbi jan ḛ ne no: Ago njal ge àa sḭḭ zok mbe ge num ma, a̰me ɗu mbo gaa ge na kon pagal digi to, àa mbo gul num ya se ge ɓul mɔɗwag.
40024003	Zeso mbo ya kaɗ na pe ge njal ge ɔwara oliv ma do̰o̰ no ne pagal digi kin̰a go. Ne nda ge ame hateya ma mbo ya ge ne ta hini jan, àa ele ne go: Jin̰a i gale, fare ge mo wan i ne mbe no, dee ma̰ del ɗoo wa mbo keeya de? A ma̰ kaŋ ma mbo ngay gwanna ge amo mage dunin̰a pe aaya ne de?
40024004	Zeso gwan jan num go: Ḛ koy ta kwaɗa, ne kaa ge ndu a̰me n̰aame ḛ to.
40024005	Ago nda gḛḛ mbo hee mbi dḭḭl, àa ka janna go: A mbi Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne, Ndu ge Dok taa nee ne, àa mbo ee nda gḛḛ n̰aameya.
40024006	Ḛ mbo kaɗ-ɗa za̰a̰ twam mballa ma ge ḛ tɔgwa, ḛ ka za̰a̰ kṵwa̰ ge twam mballa ma way, ge sok kaal yà ge ma, ḛ iigi ta to. A ngaɗ go, kaŋ mbe ma dee ya keeya, ɗaŋɗe, a be dunin̰a pe aaya gale ne to.
40024007	Ago, suwal ma mbo ka mbal ta ta buwal zì, muluk ma mbo ɗege ho̰o̰l ta ta buwal zì waɗme. Ge sok a̰me ma go, camal baktar ma mbo ka deɗ-ɗa, suwa mbo ka ndaɗɗa me.
40024008	Kaŋ mbe ma mbo kaɗ dinna ge yal ge twàl ne deɗ ndu gwale go.
40024009	Sok mbe go, nda duwana ma mbo kee ḛ yal, àa ka hun ḛ me. Rusu ge ɗogle ma peɗ mbo kuri ḛ gezi, ge mbi pe.
40024010	Ano mbe ma mbo kaɗ kaŋ ee nda n̰a vin̰a hoɗ fareba gezi, àa ee fare ta pagal, àa kuri ta gezi.
40024011	Nda ge ḛ buwal zige ma gḛḛ mbo kee ta nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma, àa mbo n̰aame nda gḛḛ me.
40024012	N̰aal mbo kaɗ gḛḛ ge go nda gḛḛ mbo haɗ eyalam ge laa wanna ge maa way ma zì.
40024013	Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge mbo wan tene deŋel ya ɗiŋ mbo wa aaya yà, mbo seɗ monna .
40024014	Àa mbo oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge muluk ge Dok ne mbe ge dunin̰a zì mɔɗwag, ndwa go ne kaa kaŋ sayda ge rusu ge ɗogle ma ta peɗ. Guwa̰ go, dwam pe aaya wa mbo ya.
40024015	Ḛ ge isi maktub ge Dok ne ma, ḛ kuwa fare mbe pe gezi kwaɗa! Sok ge ḛ mbo kuwa ge sone kakatag ge vḛḛne kaŋ, ge Nda ge zwagre Dok wa Daniyel fâ ne fare, mbo ya kàɗɗa ge sok ge harcal, ge ne sḛ mbiya kaɗ ne go to go,
40024016	sok mbe go, num ge mbo kaɗ-ɗa ge suwa ge Jude ne go ma, num chiya mbo njal ma zì yà.
40024017	Ndu ge mbo kaɗ-ɗa ge zok pagal digi, ne kaa ge be ndee ya lee zok pul diŋ ndwa hee a̰me ge na tok go to .
40024018	Ndu ge mbo kaɗ-ɗa ge gaaso zì, ne kaa ge ne guwa̰ ya diŋ ndwa ɔwabe na ba̰a̰ ge kon pagal ge to me.
40024019	A ma̰ yal ne ge nda zaab ge mbo kaɗ-ɗa ge emel mage mbo kaɗ-ɗa hon maa van ma pam ge dwam mbe go ma pe ne de!
40024020	Ḛ ka kee kaɗeya, ndwa go ḛ dee ya chiyaya ge somo̰ pagal go to, koo ge dwam sabaɗ go to me.
40024021	Ago, ge sok mbe go, iigiya ma mbo kaɗ gḛḛ. Mbo kaɗ iigiya ge ndu gale see ne pe dwam ɗu to, ge pe dolla ge dunin̰a ne ya day ɗiŋ màno. Ndu mbo gwan seɗ iigiya mbe no pe, zḛḛ daa to baɗ me.
40024022	Daa na go, Dok chiya dwam mbe ma ya zì to, ndu a̰me ɗu mà seɗ vin̰a ge ɓuuya to. Ɗaŋɗe, mbo chal dwam mbe ma ya zì ge na nda ge talla ma pe.
40024023	Ge dwam mbe ma go, kaɗɗa ndu a̰me jan ḛ ya go, ḛ za̰a̰: Krist, Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne no ge go go no koo ne no, ḛ ho fareba ge num fare janna mbe ma ta to.
40024024	Ago, nda ge kee ta krist ma ɓanna ge nda ge kee ta nda ge zwagre Dok wa go ma mbo mbo ya. Àa mbo kee kaŋ ngayya ge ga̰a̰l ma, ge kaŋ haŋle ma keeya ge go ee nda ge Dok taa num ma n̰aameya.
40024025	Mbi jan ḛ fare ma ya zḛḛ kakaɗag, ḛ duwa kwaɗa.
40024026	Àa kaɗɗa ka jan ḛ go: Ḛ kuwa gale, Van ge Ndu ne ge babur pul yà go, ḛ mbo to. Koo àa jan ḛ go: A ge zok dwamma zì go, ḛ ho fareba ge num fare janna mbe ma ta to.
40024027	Gwanna ge Van ge Ndu ne ya mbo kaɗ dinna ge mam see ge mbii ya ɗiŋ mbo deɗ ge kuu ya go.
40024028	Sok ge kaŋ suu no go, boge ma tabe ya ge sok mbe go .
40024029	Guwa̰ ge dwam ge yal ge ɓaŋlaŋ mbe ma way go gaw, gyala mbo daa gwan zen to, saba mbo daa gwan hon kɔn̰al ge na ne to, gùwa̰ ma mbo deɗ ge pḭḭ ma zì ya se, kaŋ keeya ge Dok ne ge ɓaŋlaŋ ge no pḭḭ digi ma mbo ba̰a̰le se me.
40024030	Ge sok mbe go, kaŋ ge ngay gwanna ge Van ge Ndu ne, mbo dyan zum kɔn̰al, ge digi zì. Rusu ge suwa pagal ma peɗ mbo ɗege fyal fiyaso ge kirgi ta, àa mbo kuwa Van ge Ndu ne mbe, mbo ya ge pḭḭ ge laaya gutub zì digi, ge pool ge ɓaŋlaŋ, ge pateya ge na ne zì me.
40024031	Sok ge burji mbo sun-na, Dok mbo hoɗ malayka ma na wa go, num mbo ge suwa keŋ ge ndà ma go, kwate na nda ge talla ma, ge pḭḭ wa lee ge ɗu go, mbo aa pḭḭ wa lee gegene yà.
40024032	Ḛ za̰a̰ fare sḭḭ ge àa kee no ge ɔwara fere pagal. Sok ge ɔwara ɗege ɗufiya, ne dɔgwa ma haɗ pisil, ḛ kuwa kuwa go, ne gyala pul ne, ago mamasege gaa guwa.
40024033	Ḛ sḛ ma waɗme, sok ge ḛ mbo kuwa kaŋ mbe ma ya peɗ keeya ge ḛ ndwa go, ḛ kuwa go, Ndu ge Dok teme ne ya gaa guwa ge gwan-na, dinna ge ndu yan-na mḛḛya zok wa go da̰a̰reya go.
40024034	Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no: Nda ge doŋ pe mbe go ma mbo suu peɗ to, ge go kaŋ mbe ma peɗ num dee ya keeya.
40024035	Pḭḭ mage suwa mbo kaɗ to, ɗaŋɗe, mbi fare janna ma mbo kaɗ ɗiŋ ge din.
40024036	Kaɗɗa ge fare ge dwam mage ler ne ɗe, ndu a̰me ɗu ge kuwa num to. Koo malayka ge Dok ne ma, koo Mbi sḛ ge Dok teme mbi ya puy, mbi kuwa ne to. Ɗaŋɗe, a Dok ge mbi Ba ɗu ɗeŋew kuwa nee ne.
40024037	Gwanna ge Van ge Ndu ne ya, mbo kaɗ dinna ca ge kaŋ ge kê ge dwam ge Nowe ne ma yà go.
40024038	Ago, ge dwam ge mam yḛḛreya ne ma ndwa zḛḛ, nda duwana ma ka zamma, àa ka njoɗɗa, àa ka kaɗ zok, àa ka san maa van ge soɗob ma gwale, àa ka hon ge gwale ma zok kàɗɗa ɗiŋ ge go dwam ge Nowe waɗ ge faa ga̰a̰l zì mbe dee ya.
40024039	Nda duwana ma be ka pee ta ge fare a̰me pagal to, ɗiŋ ge go mam yḛḛreya dee ya, ne puu kaŋ ge on̰ ma gezi peɗ. Sok ge Van ge Ndu ne gwanna ya mbo kaɗ dinna ca ge ne dwam mbe go.
40024040	Ge sok mbe go, nda soɗob zi mbo kaɗ-ɗa ge gaaso zì, àa mbo hee ɗu, àa n̰a gegene me.
40024041	Nda zaab zi mbo kaɗ-ɗa nan swa ge njal zì dagre, àa mbo hee ɗu, àa n̰a gegene me.
40024042	Ajo̰o̰ ḛ kuwa dwam gwanna ge ḛ Bagezok ne ya to ɗe, ɓyare go ḛ kaa jejew.
40024043	Ḛ kuwa ano mbe kwaɗa, daa go ndu ge zok ge kuwaya go, ler go ga ge ɗaal mbe no zì chala mà mbo ya chel na ɗe, daa mà kaɗ ge na ndwa, n̰a na zok, àa zuɗ ne to me.
40024044	A ge pe no, ḛ sḛ ma waɗme, ḛ kaa jejew. Ago Van ge Ndu ne, mbo mbo ya ge ler ge ḛ dwaɗ ge ne pagal to go.
40024045	Mà kaɗɗa go ndu ge tèmel ge n̰a wa to, gwan kaɗ ndwa ndaa go no, ne ndu ge zok n̰a mà ne ge na zok pagal, ndwa go ne ka vaa na ka̰a̰m ge tèmel ma kaŋ zam, ge dwam ma pagal tetem to de?
40024046	Laa saal go ge ndu ge tèmel mbe pe, dwam gwanna ge ne ndu ge zok ne ya, kaɗɗa na seɗ ne ya tèmel ta keeya mbe go!
40024047	Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no, mbo ee ne, ne gaa ge kaŋ kwaɗa ge na ne ma wa go peɗ.
40024048	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa go na ndu ge tèmel ge sone ne, a ge pool dwaɗ na dul wa zì go: Mbi ndu ge zok pagal gale wan go na sok mbe ya wan,
40024049	mà ɗege ya iyal na ka̰a̰m ge tèmel mbe ma, ka an̰n̰a ge kaŋ zam mage buyya ge jin̰al ɓanna ge num mbe ge din gyala ge fereya ma no,
40024050	ne ndu ge zok mbe mà mbo ja tan ne tugcug ge dwam mage ler ge ne sḛ dwaɗ ne pagal to go,
40024051	mbo njaa ne mamaɗ, dol ne ge sok ge nda ge mbuɗi nda ndwa ma njoɗ yal no ne zì, sok ge fiyaso mage kin̰a sulla ma no ne go me.
40025001	Go mbe no, muluk ge Dok ne mbo kaɗ dinna ge fare ge van kale ge wol ma way go, num ge hê maa lampe ma ndwa mbo ge gwale jin̰al obe ndwa zì yà.
40025002	Ago, ge num mbe ge wol ma buwal zì, nuwan̰ kaa nda ge dàle ma, ge nuwan̰ gegene ma kaa nda ge zwam ma me.
40025003	Ge sok hee maa lampe ma go, ge dàle ma mbô be nùm ge maa tok go.
40025004	Nda ge zwam ma me ɗe, àa hee maa lampe ma, àa mbô ge nùm ge maa faal ma zì me.
40025005	Ajo̰o̰ gwale jin̰al obe pagal wa̰a̰ gḛḛ ɗe, van kale mbe ma mɔɗwag mbô ya lwageya, àa dol dwam galgatag.
40025006	Ge ɗaal ga̰a̰l zì, àa za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l oyya kolol go: Na! Gwale jin̰al obe yan ja no, ḛ wuwa ya zum mbo ne ndwa zì!
40025007	Sok mbe go gaw, van kale mbe ma mɔɗwag kore digi, àa dun maa lampe ma digi.
40025008	Guwa̰ swag, nda ge dàle ma ele ge zwam ma go: Ḛ ho̰ i ḛ nùm nde, ago i lampe ma piri go piri.
40025009	Nda ge zwam ma gwan ge num janna go: Nùm mbe mbyaɗ nè mɔɗwag to, ke kwaɗa go, ḛ mbo ge nda ge seŋe tok ma ta, ḛ yaɗ ge ta pe me.
40025010	Sok ge àa mbô ɓyare nùm go, gwale jin̰al obe yan-na num guwa̰, num mbe ge kaa nuusiya ma waɗ ge sok vḛḛso sanna zì dagre ge ne. Àa dibi zok wa ya maa pagal ge kòko.
40025011	Guwa̰ go fyalag, van kale gegene mbe ma yan-na waɗme, àa tol sok go: Bagezok, Bagezok, hage i zok wa.
40025012	Ɗaŋɗe, gwale jin̰al obe gwan ge num janna go: Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no, mbi kuwa ḛ to.
40025013	Zeso gwan jan num go, ajo̰o̰ ḛ kuwa dwam koo ler to ɗe, ḛ kaa jejew.
40025014	Muluk ge Dok ne mbo kaɗ dinna ge ndu ge ɗege mbo gɔswal go. Sok ɗege mbo gɔswal go, tol na nda ge tèmel ma ya na ndwa se, n̰a na kaŋ kwaɗa ma ge num tok go.
40025015	Hon ndu ge diige kaŋ ge ne pool pagal tem. Hon ndu ge zḛḛge bware ge àa tol ne tala̰ nuwan̰, ndu ge zi, tala̰ zi, ndu ge taa tala̰ ɗu, dol tene mbo gɔswal.
40025016	Sok ge ndu ge tèmel ge zḛḛge see na tala̰ mbe ge nuwan̰ ma gaw, mbo seŋe na tok ge num, seɗ bware tala̰ ya ta pagal nuwan̰ me.
40025017	Ndu ge zi, kee ge mojo̰o̰ na kon ge zḛḛge go, seɗ bware tala̰ ge ɗogle ma ya ta pagal zi me.
40025018	Ndu ge see bware tala̰ ɗu mbo al sok ge suwa zì, way bware tala̰ ge na ndu ge zok ne mbe se.
40025019	Num ndu ge zok mbe kee ya kaal nde, kan na ko, ɗege ele na bware ma pe.
40025020	Ndu ge see bware tala̰ nuwan̰ mbo ya ge na ndu ge zok ndwa se, ge bware tala̰ ge ɗogle ma ta nuwan̰, jan go: Mbi ndu ge zok-goo, mo ho̰ mbi dee bware tala̰ nuwan̰, ge sego, mbi seɗ ge ɗogle ma ja pagal no ta nuwan̰.
40025021	Ne ndu ge zok jan ne go: A gag, ndu ge tèmel ge kwaɗa, mo n̰a wa to. Mo kaa ndu ge ɗeŋer ge kaŋ ge hoɗege guwa ma zì, mbi mbo ee mo kàɗɗa ge kaŋ ge gḛḛ ceɗeɗ ma wa go. Mbo ya kee laa saal ge mbi dagre.
40025022	Ndu ge see bware tala̰ zi mbo ya na ndu ge zok ndwa se waɗme, jan ne go: Mbi ndu ge zok-goo, mo ho̰ mbi dee bware tala̰ zi, ge sego, mbi seɗ ge ɗogle ma ja pagal no ta zi me.
40025023	Ne ndu ge zok jan ne go: A gag, ndu ge tèmel ge kwaɗa, mo n̰a wa to, mo kaa ndu ge ɗeŋer ge kaŋ ge hoɗege guwa ma zì, mbi mbo ee mo kàɗɗa ge kaŋ ge gḛḛ ceɗeɗ ma wa go. Mbo ya kee laa saal ge mbi dagre.
40025024	Ndu ge see bware tala̰ ɗu yan-na guwa̰ dwab, ge na ndu ge zok ndwa se, jan ne go: Mbi ndu ge zok-goo, mbi kuwa kuwa go mo ndu ge ndwa ndaa ne, mo syaɗ kaŋ ge mo zare ne to, mo kwate kaŋ ge mo in̰ale ne to me.
40025025	A ge pe, voo wa̰a̰ mbi no, mbi mbo way mo bware tala̰ ge ɗu kikiɗ mbe ge suwa se no. Na! Mo kaŋ no, ame ne.
40025026	Ne ndu ge zok gwan ge ne janna go: Ndu ge tèmel ge laa pisil, ge uwal sabtag! Mo kuwa kuwa go, mbi syaɗ kaŋ ge mbi zare ne to. Mbi kwate kaŋ ge mbi in̰ale ne to me.
40025027	Ke kwaɗa daa go, mo mbo kan mbi bware tala̰ mbe ge sok koy bware zì yà. Mbi daa gwan-na no ɗe, mbi daa mà mbo ame ne ya zum ge mam.
40025028	Ḛ ame ne bware tala̰ ge ɗu mbe gezi ge ne tok go ɗaŋ, ḛ hon ne ndu ge bware tala̰ wol ne.
40025029	Ago ndu ge no go ge a̰me, àa mbo gwan hon ne ge kon pagal iya, ndwa go ne zuli se ceɗeɗ. Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge no go be a̰me, koo ne ne ge fyalag ge no ne tok go puy, àa mbo ame ne, ne gezi.
40025030	Kaɗɗa ge ndu ge tèmel ge mbaa a̰me pe to mbe no, ḛ doo ne ge tṵṵ ge ɗeɗeg zum yà, sok ge nda oy fiyaso mage sul kin̰a no ne go.
40025031	Sok ge Van ge Ndu ne mbo gwan ja ge pateya ge na ne, ɓanna ge na malayka ma peɗ, mbo kaɗ ge hòol muluk ge na ne ge pool pagal.
40025032	Pe rusu ge suwa pagal ma peɗ mbo twage ya ne ndwa se. Mbo caɗe nda duwana ma se pe zi, ge mojo̰o̰ ba ge koy kaŋ kogor ma caɗe tame mage ɓin̰a ma buwal se go.
40025033	Mbo kwate tame ma ge na tok matoson pagal, ɓin̰a ma ge na tok magul pagal me.
40025034	Ge sok mbe go, gan ga̰a̰l mbo jan nda ge mbo kàɗɗa ge na tok matoson pagal ma go: Ḛ mbo ya, ḛ ge Dok kê ḛ wa tare ma, ḛ za joo ge muluk ne mbe ge àa ee ne ge ḛ pe ge dunin̰a pe dolla ya day.
40025035	Ge dape, camal kê mbi, ḛ ho̰ mbi kaŋ zam no. Mam njuwal kê mbi, ḛ ho̰ mbi mam njoɗɗa no. Mbi kaa gɔswal ḛ buwal zì, ḛ ame mbi ḛ zok ma diŋ no.
40025036	Mbi kaa swala, ḛ lâ mbi pe no. Tuguɗi ka kee mbi, ḛ mbo ndil mbi no. Mbi kaa ge daŋay zì, ḛ mbo kuwa mbi ndwa no.
40025037	Ge sok mbe go, nda ge kee laa ɓyareya ge Dok ne ma mbo gwan ge ne janna go: Bagezok, a ge mà sok go ɗoo, i kûwa no go mo camal, i ho̰ mo kaŋ zam no de? Koo i kûwa mam njuwal ka kee mo ɗoo, i ho̰ mo mam njoɗɗa no de?
40025038	A ge mà sok go ɗoo, i kuwa no go mo gɔswal ne, i ame mo i zok ma diŋ no de? Koo ge mà sok go swala ɗoo, i lâ mo pe no de?
40025039	A ge mà sok go ɗoo, i kuwa mo kee tuguɗi no de? Koo lee dii ge daŋay zì ɗoo, i mbo kuwa mo ndwa no me de?
40025040	Gan ga̰a̰l mbo gwan ge num janna go: Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no, ɗaɗag ge ḛ ka kee ne ge num ge hoɗege jiyale dinna ge mbi na̰ van ma buwal zì ma, ḛ ka kee ne mbi.
40025041	Guwa̰ go, mbo jan nda ge mbo kaɗ-ɗa ge na tok magul pagal ma go: Ḛ ge Dok vḛḛne na wa no ḛ pagal ma, ḛ wa̰a̰ ta gezi yà kaal ge mbi, ḛ mbo ge ol ge ɗiŋ ge din ge àa nuusi ne, ge Ba ge ho̰o̰l mage na malayka ma pe zì yà.
40025042	Ago, camal kê mbi, ḛ be hon mbi kaŋ zam to. Mam njuwal kê mbi, ḛ be hon mbi mam njoɗɗa to.
40025043	Mbi kaa gɔswal ḛ buwal zì, ḛ be ame mbi diŋ to. Mbi kaa swala, ḛ be hon mbi a̰me laa pe to. Mbi kê tuguɗi mbi kaɗ daŋay zì me, ḛ be mbo kuwa mbi ndwa to me.
40025044	Sok mbe go, num sḛ ma mbo gwan ne janna waɗme go: Bagezok-goo, a mà sok go ɗoo, i kuwa no go mo camal, i kuwa mam njuwal kee mo no, koo mbo ya gɔswal, koo swala, koo kee tuguɗi koo daŋay zì, i chiya mo kṵwa̰ to no de?
40025045	Go no me, mbo gwan ge num janna go: Fareba mbi jan ḛ no, ɗaɗag ge ḛ ka kee ne ge num ge hoɗege jiyale ma ta to, ḛ ka kee ano mbe to mbi.
40025046	Num mbe ma no, àa mbo mbo ge yal njoɗɗa ge ɗiŋ ge din zì. Ɗaŋɗe, nda ge kee laa ɓyareya ge Dok ne ma seɗ ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din me.
40026001	Guwa̰ ge Zeso aa na fare hateya mbe ma go peɗ, jan na nda ge ame hateya ma go:
40026002	Ḛ kuwa kuwa go vḛḛso ge Paska ne gaa dwam zi, ge go àa wa ɓyan Van ge Ndu ne gezi, ndwa go àa pee ne ge ɔwara kaŋre ta.
40026003	Ge sok mbe go, ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way mage ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme Yahuɗ ma way ma seɗ ta kee kwateya ge ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe, ge àa tol ne Kayf diŋ.
40026004	Àa za̰a̰ ta go maa wa̰a̰ Zeso ge maa zwam a̰me ɗu, maa wa hun ne gezi.
40026005	Àa ka jan ta go: Kaɗɗa ne go puy ɗe, ne kaa ge dwam vḛḛso ge guguɗu go gaw to, ndwa go, ɓase ma mà haɗ ɗege ho̰o̰l ya ge maa pagal.
40026006	Ajo̰o̰ Zeso kaa ge suwal Betani go, ge Simo̰ ge dee kṵṵ swàm diŋ,
40026007	gwale a̰me ɗu mbo ya ge ne ta zì guwa. Kaa ge koblo ge àa ca ne ge njal Albatr huyya ge idiir ge yee gḛḛ ge na tok go. Kan idiir mbe ge ne pagal sok ge ne sḛ wa ya zam kaŋ zam go.
40026008	Sok ge nda ge ame hateya ma kuwa ano mbe go, num laa hoɗ, àa ka janna go: A ma̰ kaŋ vḛḛneya ge go mbe ne de?
40026009	Ne kwaɗa daa go, àa yaɗ idiir mbe gezi, àa vaa nda ge a̰se ma ne bware mbe to de?
40026010	Ɗaŋɗe, Zeso za̰a̰ num fare mbe, jan num go: Ḛ daa kee gwale mbe yal ge dape de? Ḛ n̰a ne cɔgwaɗ, kee kaŋ ge gag ge mbi pe.
40026011	Ago nda ge a̰se ma go ge ḛ buwal zì ɗaɗag, ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ge mbi ɗe, mbi mbo kaɗ kaal tata ge ḛ buwal zì to.
40026012	Sok suusi idiir mbe ge mbi duul ta go ɗe, nuusi zḛḛ duul swày ge ambi, ge mbulla pe.
40026013	Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no, sok ge no dunin̰a zì ma peɗ, ge àa mbo kaɗ-ɗa ka oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge num go ma, àa mbo ka faa kaŋ ge gwale mbe kê ne waɗme, ndwa go ne gaa ge kaŋ dwaɗ pagal go ge nda ta peɗ.
40026014	Sok mbe go, ɗu ge nda ge ame hateya ge wol pɔgwa zi ma buwal zige, ge àa tol ne Yudas Iskariyoɗ, ɗege mbo seɗ ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ma,
40026015	jan num go: Ḛ ɓyare hon mbi da ɗoo, mbi wa ɓyan Zeso ge ḛ tok go de? Àa mbo ya hon ne bware walam tapool ɗu.
40026016	Ge sok mbe go, ɗege ɓyare vin̰a ge jwab ndwa ɓyan ne gezi.
40026017	Ge dwam ge zḛḛge ge vḛḛso ge dupḛ ge be jìn̰al hore na ndwa zì ne go, Zeso nda ge ame hateya ma ele ne go: Mo ɓyare go i mbo nuusi mo sok ge zam kaŋ zam ge Paska ne ge diya de?
40026018	Gwan ge num janna go: Ḛ mbo ge ndu ge ano mbe no ta, ge suwal ga̰a̰l diŋ yà, ḛ jan ne go: Ba ge hateya jan go: Mbi dwam ge njoɗ yal mbyaɗ go, i ge mbi nda ge ame hateya ma mbo zam kaŋ zam kee vḛḛso ge Paska ne ge mo diŋ.
40026019	Nda ge ame hateya ma kee ge mojo̰o̰ Zeso ho maa na wa go, àa nuusi kaŋ zam kee vḛḛso ge paska ne.
40026020	Sok ge sok yin̰a gasamal, Zeso mage na nda ge ame hateya ge wol pɔgwa zi ma kaɗ se zam kaŋ zam ge taabul wa go.
40026021	Sok ge àa ka zam kaŋ zam go, jan num go: Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no, ɗu ge ḛ buwal zige mbo ɓyan mbi gezi ge nda tok go.
40026022	Ge sok mbe go, ne nda ge ame hateya ma ndwa mbo ya suu se leɗeɗ ge go, ndu ge diige ɗege ele ne go: A mbi de, Bagezok-goo?
40026023	Gwan ge num janna go: Ndu ge paa na tok no ge mbi dagre ge kaŋ zam pagal, a ne sḛ mbo ɓyan mbi gezi ne.
40026024	A ngaɗ go, mbi, Van ge Ndu ne, mbi mbo swày, dinna ge Njaŋeya ge Dok ne ma jin̰a go. Ɗaŋɗe, woo ge ndu mbe ge mbo ɓyan Van ge Ndu ne ya gezi pe. Nde-nde àa tol ndu mbe dana to baɗ.
40026025	Yudas ge mà ɓyan ne ya gezi, hee fare, jan go: A mbi de, Ba ge hateya? Zeso gwan ge ne janna go: Mo sḛ jan ne ya go.
40026026	Sok ge àa ka zam kaŋ zam go, Zeso hee dupḛ, guwa̰ ge kê mersi hon Dok go, siɗi ne se, hon na nda ge ame hateya ma ne, jan num go: Ḛ ame, ḛ zam, ano mbe no, a mbi sḛ duul ne.
40026027	Guwa̰, hee kob ge on̰or jìn̰al ne kee mersi hon Dok, hon num ne, jan num go: Ḛ peɗ ḛ njoo ne.
40026028	Ago, ano a mbi swàm ne, swàm ge wa tii vwalla nee ne, ge mbo kan-na se ge nda pe peɗ, ndwa pore num sone ma.
40026029	Mbi jan ḛ no: A gaa mbo zḛḛ no, mbi mbo daa gwan njoɗ on̰or jìn̰al mbe to baɗ, mbi gaa dee mbo njoɗ on̰or jìn̰al ge jin̰al ge ḛ dagre ge muluk ge mbi Ba ne zì yà.
40026030	Guwa̰ ge àa mbaa kaŋ ge sale Dok ge no Maktub ge kaŋ mballa ma way zì go, àa kan ta mbo ge njal ge ɔwara oliv ma do̰ ne pagal digi yà.
40026031	Sok mbe go, Zeso jan num go: Ge ɗaal mbe no zì, ḛ peɗ, ḛ mà n̰a mbi, ago Njaŋeya ge Dok ne ma jan zì go: «Mbi mbo iyal ba ge koy tame ma go par, go no, tame ma mbo ɓasare se.»
40026032	Guwa̰ ge Dok mbo tan mbi ya digi, mbi mbo mbo ndaage ḛ ge suwa ge Galile ne yà.
40026033	Piyer jan ne go: Kaɗɗa nda gegene ma n̰a mo ya peɗ puy ɗe, mbi n̰a mo to baɗ.
40026034	Zeso jan ne go: Fareba mbi jan mo ne no, ge ɗaal mbe no zì, zḛḛ ge go baare too fiyaso, mo mà ee mo wa ndwa taa go mo kuwa mbi to.
40026035	Piyer gwan ge ne janna go: Kaɗɗa mbiya go mbi mbo swày dagre ge mo puy, mbi mbo jan ge mbi wa zì go mbi kuwa mo to, to baɗ. Ne nda ge ame hateya gegene ma peɗ jan mbe go waɗme.
40026036	Guwa̰, Zeso mage na nda ge ame hateya ma mbo ya sok a̰me go ɗu, ge àa tol ne Jeɗsemane, jan num go: Ḛ kaa ge go go, mbi mbo gezi yà ndwa kee kaɗeya.
40026037	Tol Piyer mage Zebede van ge zi ma, àa ge num mbo. Sok mboya go, ɗege za̰a̰ yal na sḛ zì, ka iigi tene.
40026038	Sok mbe go, jan num go: Mbi duul suu ya se leɗeɗ, iigiya ge mbi seɗ ne ya mbi sḛ zì mbe no, ee mbi mbo swày. Ḛ kaa go go, ḛ kaɗ jejew ge mbi dagre me.
40026039	Guwa̰, mbo zḛḛ ya nde, kubi na pul ge suwa se, kee kaɗeya go: Baa, kaɗɗa vin̰a go, n̰a ler ge yal mbe no, ne kale gezi ge mbi pagal. Peɗ puy ɗe, ne kaa mbi laa ɓyareya to, ɗaŋɗe, mo laa ɓyareya.
40026040	Gwan-na ge nda ge ame hateya ma ta, seɗ num fii dwam. Tol Piyer, jan ne go: Mo gwan fii go dwam zoo de? Mo pool ge wan tene kàɗɗa ge mo ndwa ler ɗu ge mbi dagre to peɗ de?
40026041	Ḛ kaa jejew, ḛ kee kaɗeya me, ne kaa ge ḛ dee pe heeya zì to. Ago ḛ ge dwaɗɗa ge kee kaŋ ge kwaɗa ma ɓa, ɗaŋɗe, ajo̰o̰ sḛ duul tuguɗi ɗe, ḛ ge pool ge mḛḛ Ba ge ho̰o̰l ndwa zì to.
40026042	Guwa̰, gwan mbo gezi yà nde ge ndwa zi, ka kee kaɗeya jan go: Baa, kaɗɗa na ngaɗ go, mbi mbiya ɓuu ge yal mbe no zì to, n̰a laa ɓyareya ge amo ne huy ne.
40026043	Gwan gwan-na iya, seɗ num, àa fii dwam ya galgatag ge go num ndwa ge kan zum go fyalag kaɗ to.
40026044	N̰a num, gwan mbo gezi yà iya, kee kaɗeya ge ndwa taa, sok dwage fare ge na jin̰a num da wal mbe ma.
40026045	Guwa̰, gwan-na ge num ta, jan num go: Ḛ go gale dwam ta fiiya baba de? Ḛ ɗwabe ta ɗaŋ! Sok mbyaɗ-ɗa go, ge àa ɓyan Van ge Ndu ne ge nda ge sone ma tok go.
40026046	Ḛ ɗege digi, nè mbo, ndu ge ɓyan mbi gezi yan ja no.
40026047	Zeso wa gale be aa to peɗ, Yudas, ɗu ge nda ge ame hateya ge wol pɔgwa zi ma buwal zige, zuɗ-ɗa ge nda nɔnɔg ge na pe go. Ɓase mbe ma mbô ya ge kasagar mage calaŋ ma ge maa tok go. Nda ge teme num ya ma, a ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way mage ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme Yahuɗ ma.
40026048	Yudas ge ɓin̰a Zeso gezi, za̰a̰ tene zḛḛ ge ɓase mbe ma, ge fare a̰me ge na mà mbo ya keeya ge ne, jin̰a num go: Ndu ge mbi mà buu ne ya zì ge komreya ɗe, a nee ne, ḛ wa̰a̰ ne.
40026049	Sok ge àa dee ya gaw, Yudas mbo ya ge ne ta zì guwa, jan ne go: Ba ge hateya, mo kê gyala gyana de! Buu ne zì me.
40026050	Zeso jan ne go: Kondore, kaŋ ge mo mbo ya ge ne pe keeya ɗe, ke ne ɗaŋ. Ge sok mbe go, nda mbe ma mbo ya ge ne ta zì, àa paa maa tok, àa wan ne.
40026051	Ndu a̰me ɗu ge kaa ge Zeso ma dagre, ndage na kasagar ge na vum zì ya gaw, kun ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe, ne ndu ge tèmel tɔgwa gezi.
40026052	Sok mbe go Zeso jan ne go: Guwa̰ ge mo kasagar ge na vum zì, ago nda ge mbo hee kasagar ya hun swày ma peɗ, àa mbo seɗ swày ge kasagar me.
40026053	Mo dwaɗ go mbi ge pool tol mbi Ba ɗoo, teme mbi malayka ma ya waɗe vwag wol pɔgwa zi ge sego to de?
40026054	Kaɗɗa na mbe go, kee mà pe gyana, fare ge Njaŋeya ge Dok ne ma jin̰a num ma wa ma mà mbo huyya de?
40026055	Sok mbe go, Zeso jan ɓase ma go: Ḛ zuu ya zum ge kasagar ma, ge calaŋ ma ḛ tok go, ndwa wan mbi dinna ge àa wan ndu ge fiiri vin̰a go ɗaŋ de! Dwam ma mɔɗwag mbi kaa ge ḛ buwal zì, mbi ka hateya ge zok ge Dok ne zì, ḛ be wan mbi to me ɗe.
40026056	Ɗaŋɗe, fare mbe kee ndwa go fare ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma way ge no Njaŋeya ge Dok ne zì ma wa huy. Sok mbe go, ne nda ge ame hateya ma peɗ chiya, àa n̰a ne.
40026057	Nda ge wa̰a̰ Zeso ma gene ne ya ge Kayf, ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe diŋ, sok ge nda ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne mage nda ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme Yahuɗ ma kwate no ne go.
40026058	Piyer ka kàre ne pe ge guwa̰ se ya kaal nde ɗiŋ waɗ-ɗa ge ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe zok pul diŋ. Sok ge wuwa zok pul diŋ yà, kaɗ ge nda ge koy zok wa ma ta se, ndwa ndilla go fare mbe pe mà mbo aa gyana de.
40026059	Ago ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ma ɓanna ge Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge kun sariya ma peɗ ka ɓyare vin̰a ge ee fare ge hày a̰me ma ge Zeso pagal, ndwa hun ne gezi.
40026060	Ajo̰o̰ nda ee fare ge hày ma gḛḛ ge ne pagal puy ɗe, àa be seɗ fare a̰me ge ne ta ɗu to. Guwa̰ go dwab, nda zi yan-na, àa ka janna go.
40026061	Ndu mbe no jan go: Na ge pool gul zok ge Dok ne se, na gwan ge ne sinna digi ge dwam ge taa ma pul zì.
40026062	Ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe ɗege digi, ele ne go: Mo fare a̰me ge gwanna ge fare ge àa ee num ya ge mo pagal go ga mbe ma byalam to de? Àa ee ma̰ fare ma ge mo pagal de?
40026063	Ɗaŋɗe, Zeso kaɗ wa daal. Ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe, gwan jan ne go: Mbi ele mo fare ge dḭḭl ge Dok ge hon nda ndwa ne zì, jin̰a i gale: Mo Krist, Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne, ge Dok Van ne ɗaŋ de?
40026064	Zeso gwan ge ne janna go: «Mo jan ne ya go. Ɗeŋew mbi jan ḛ go, a gaa mbo zḛḛ no, ḛ mbo kuwa, Van ge Ndu ne, kàɗɗa ge tok matoson ge Ba ge pool waɗe-waɗe ne pagal, mbo mbo ya ge pḭḭ ge laaya gutub ma zì, ge pḭḭ zì ya.»
40026065	Sok mbe go, ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe taabe na ba̰a̰ ma gezi ge na ta, jan go: A jan fare ge sone kakatag ya ge Dok pagal no ɗe! Nè gwan ɓyare ma sayda ma iya de? Ḛ sḛ ma za̰a̰ fare ge sone kakatag ge ne jin̰a mbe ya go.
40026066	Ḛ dwaɗ gyana ge ne fare mbe de? Àa gwan ge ne janna go: Mbiya go ne mbo swày.
40026067	Sok mbe go, àa too watwa ge ne ta, àa ka yaa ne tɔgwa pul zì, àa ka sil ne ge maa tok guɗumul ma, àa jan ne go:
40026068	Krist, Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne ngay i gale, a huɗi kee mo kaŋ mbe ne de?
40026069	Ge fare mbe ma ndwa zì, Piyer go kàɗɗa ge zok pul zum yà. Moor kale a̰me ɗu mbo ya ne ta, jan ne go: Mo waɗme, mbi ka kuwa mo dee ɓanna dagre ge Zeso, ndu son mbe ge suwa Galile ne.
40026070	Ɗaŋɗe, ee na wa ge nda ndwa go peɗ, jan go: Mbi wan fare ge mo ɓyare janna mbe pe to.
40026071	Guwa̰, ɗege mbo ndwa zok wa waɗɗa ge zok pul ge zum-ge ne yà, moor kale ge ɗogle kuwa ne, jan nda ge kaa no ge sok mbe go ma go: Ndu mbe no kaa dagre ge Zeso Krist ge suwal Nazareɗ ne.
40026072	Ɗaŋɗe, gwan ee na wa iya, sok guni tene go go: Mbi kuwa ndu mbe ge ḛ faa ne fare no to.
40026073	Guwa̰ go swag, nda ge kaa sok mbe go ma gwan ta ya Piyer ta zì guwa, àa jan ne go: A fare ge fareba ne, mo ɗu ge num mbe ge wol pɔgwa zi ma buwal zige ne, mo ka̰a̰l ge faa fare ee ne go i kuwa mo.
40026074	Sok mbe go, Piyer ɗege kabe fare ma se batraŋ, guni tene go: Mbi kuwa ndu mbe no to. Ge sok mbe go gaw, baare tol fiyaso.
40026075	Piyer pagal dwaɗ fare ge Zeso jin̰a na ne go: [Zḛḛ ge go baare mà mbo tol fiyaso, mo mà ee mo wa ndwa taa go mo kuwa mbi to] sok mbe go, waɗ ge zok pul diŋ ya zum, fyal fiyaso ge kirgi tene.
40027001	Sok ɓaa ya gezi, ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way mage Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme num ma mbo ya seɗ ta ge Zeso fare pagal, àa za̰a̰ ta go maa hṵṵ ne gezi.
40027002	Guwa̰ ge àa vuwa ne go, àa gene ne mbo ɓyan ge goformo̰ Pilaɗ tok yà.
40027003	Sok ge Yudas, ndu ge ɓin̰a Zeso gezi za̰a̰ go sariya wan ne ya go, fare mbe kee ne yal, gwan ge silay tapool ɗu mbe ma ya hon ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way mage Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme num ma.
40027004	Jan num go: Mbi kee sone, sok ɓyan ndu ge be fare na pagal gezi go. Àa gwan ge ne janna go: Be paa i zì daa to, ano a mo fare ne.
40027005	Yudas kan num, num silay ma ge zok ge Dok ne pul se yà, chiya mbo kan tàal ge na ka̰a̰l zì, hun tene gezi.
40027006	Ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ma ɔwabe silay mbe ma, àa jan ta go: Nè wa yuwaleya ma hon nè vin̰a ge gwan ge num kanna ge zok ge Dok ne sok koy bware zì to, ndwa go a yee ge swàm nee ne.
40027007	Guwa̰ ge àa vḭḭ ta ge fare mbe no pagal, àa mbo yaɗ gaaso ge ndu ge sin il ne, ge bware mbe ndwa go ne gaa sok mbul ta ge nda ge gɔswal ma pe.
40027008	A ge pe no, àa tol gaaso mbe ɗiŋ màno go, ne gaaso ge swàm nee ne.
40027009	A mbe go no, fare janna ge Nda ge zwagre Dok wa Jeremi ne ma wa huy no, sok ge jin̰a go: Àa ɔwabe silay ge tapool ɗu ma, bware ge Izrayel van ma duwa honna ge ne pagal ne,
40027010	àa ho̰ num ge yee ge gaaso ge ndu ge sin il ne pagal, dinna ge Bagezok ho mbi na wa ne pagal, ndwa jan num ne go.
40027011	Àa gene Zeso ge goformo̰ ndwa se yà, ne sḛ ele ne go: Mo gan ga̰a̰l ge Yahuɗ ma way ne ɗaŋ de? Zeso gwan ge ne janna go: Mo jan ne no.
40027012	Sok ge ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way mage Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme num ma ɗege ee fare a̰me ma ne pagal go, gwan ge num fare janna pagal ɗu to.
40027013	Sok mbe go, Pilaɗ jan ne go: Mo za̰a̰ fare ge àa ee num no mo pagal ma go ɓade?
40027014	Ano peɗ puy, Zeso gwan ge ne fare janna, ge fare eleya a̰me pagal ɗu to baɗ, ano mbe kee goformo̰ ajab gḛḛ ge be to.
40027015	Ge vḛḛso ge Paska ne ma go tatab, goformo̰ ha̰a̰le dol ndu ɗu zum ge daŋay zì, ge laa ɓyareya ge ɓase ma way pagal.
40027016	Sok mbe go, ndu ge daŋay a̰me ɗu, ge nda ka faa ge ne dḭḭl, àa ka tol ne Barabas.
40027017	Ajo̰o̰ nda kwate ya gḛḛ go, Pilaɗ ele ɓase mbe ma go: Mbi ɓyare dol ndu ɗu ge daŋay zì ya zum, ḛ ɓyare go mbi doo ḛ ya zum huɗi, Barabas koo Zeso ge àa tol ne Krist, Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne de?
40027018	Ago, Pilaɗ kaa ge kuwaya tyatyaɗ go, ne yil ee num ne ɓyan na Zeso ya gezi.
40027019	Ne sḛ gale sok kee sariya go, ne gwale ee tèmel ya, àa jin̰a ne go, ne pa tene ge ndu mbe fare zì to, ne ndu ge temel ne. Ago, mà ɗaal no, kin̰a vuuɗi na gḛḛ ge ne pe.
40027020	Ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way mage Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme num ma paa fare ge ɓase ma zì num ele go, àa doo maa Barabas, àa hṵṵ Zeso gezi me.
40027021	Goformo̰ hee fare jan num go: A huɗi ge num ge zi mbe ma buwal zì, ḛ ɓyare go, mbi doo ḛ ne ya zum ge daŋay zì ya ne de? Àa gwan ge ne janna go: Barabas.
40027022	Goformo̰ Pilaɗ jan num go: Ḛ ɓyare go mbi ke ge Zeso ge àa tol ne Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne gyana de? Àa gwan ge ne janna mɔɗwag go: Pee ne ge ɔwara kaŋre ta digi.
40027023	Goformo̰ gwan ele num go: «Kee ma̰ sone de?» Àa gwan oy digi ge ka̰a̰l ndaal waɗeya go: «Pee ne ge ɔwara kaŋre ta!»
40027024	Sok ge Pilaɗ kuwa go fare mbe tane na go ndwa me no, ɓase ma haɗ sok ya digi sḭ̀ḭl giliw me ɗe, zal mam, usi na tok ma ge ɓase ma ndwa go peɗ, jan go me: Mbi tok ge swày ge ndu ge temel mbe no ne zì to. Ano gaa ḛ fare.
40027025	Ɓase ma peɗ gwan ge ne janna go: N̰a ne swàm kaa ge i ge i van ma pagal!
40027026	Sok mbe go Pilaɗ dol num Barabas ya digi, guwa̰ ge àa dwagle Zeso ge bol baba, ɓyan num ne go, num mbo pel ne ge ɔwara kaŋre ta digi.
40027027	Asagar ge goformo̰ ne ma gene Zeso ge ne sok kun sariya zì yà, àa kwate ta ya peɗ vee ne se me.
40027028	Àa fwage ne ba̰a̰ ma ge ne ta gezi, àa kan ne ba̰a̰ ga̰a̰l kapoɗ ge kàal sasaw ge ne ta.
40027029	Àa tiɗ balme ge gumi, àa kubi ne ge ne pagal, àa hon ne kɔn̰a ge ne tok matoson zì me. Guwa̰, àa guu maa ko ma ge ne ndwa se, àa ka jan ne go: I sa̰a̰ mo wa, gan ga̰a̰l ge Yahuɗ ma way.
40027030	Àa ka too watwa ge ne ta, àa ka ɔwabe kɔn̰a, àa ka warge ne ge ne pagal digi.
40027031	Guwa̰ ge àa lasage ne go, àa fwage ba̰a̰ ga̰a̰l kapoɗ ge ne ta gezi, àa gwan ge ne ba̰a̰ ma kanna ge ne ta, àa gene ne mbo pella ge ɔwara kaŋre ta digi.
40027032	Sok ge àa wuwa ya zum ge suwal ga̰a̰l diŋ ya, àa seɗ ndu a̰me ɗu ge suwal Siren ne ge àa ka tol ne Simo̰, àa ee ne ge pool in ɔwara kaŋre ge Zeso ne.
40027033	Sok ge àa dee ya ge sok ge àa tol ne Golgota go, ge ne pe wanna no go: Sok ge dḭḭ pagal kal,
40027034	àa hon ne on̰or jìn̰al kirgiya ge kaŋ a̰me zwala babag njoɗɗa. Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge tare ne go, kuri ne be njoɗɗa .
40027035	Guwa̰ ge àa pee ne ge ɔwara kaŋre ta digi go, sok ɓyare vaa ta ne ba̰a̰ ma go, àa ee daŋ ta buwal zì, ndwa kuwaya go, ne huɗi seɗ ne ba̰a̰ ma mà ne de. [Ano mbe kee ndwa go, Nda ge zwagre Dok wa fare ge dee jin̰a ma wa huy: Àa vâ ta mbi ba̰a̰ ma, àa ee daŋ ge mbi ba̰a̰ ga̰a̰l kapoɗ pe no].
40027036	Guwa̰, àa gaa kàɗɗa sok mbe go koy ne.
40027037	Àa njaŋe kaŋ a̰me byalga go pella ne pagal digi, ndwa ngay kaŋ ge ee go, àa kṵṵ sariya swày ge ne pagal. Njaŋe digi go: Ndu mbe no a Zeso ne, gan ga̰a̰l ge Yahuɗ ma way.
40027038	Sok mbe go, àa pel nda ge fiiri vin̰a ma zi ge ne waɗme, ge diige ge na kaŋre ta, ɗu ge ne tok matoson go, gegene ge ne tok magul go me.
40027039	Nda ge ka kale mboya ge sok mbe go ma ka pisigi maa pagal, àa ka sal Zeso,
40027040	àa ka janna go: Mo ge gul zok ge Dok ne se, mo gwan sin ne digi ge dwam ge taa ma pul zì baba, mo̰o̰ tene sḛ gale ɗaŋ! Kaɗɗa mo Dok Van ne, ka̰a̰ mo ko ge ɔwara kaŋre ta digi ya se.
40027041	Ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ma, nda ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne mage Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme num ma ka lasage ne waɗme, àa ka janna go:
40027042	Mon nda ge ɗogle ma ɗag, ne mo̰o̰ tene sḛ gale ɗaŋ! Kaɗɗa na gan ga̰a̰l ge Izrayel ma way ne, ne ka̰a̰ na ko ge ɔwara kaŋre ta digi ya ge sego, i mà hoɗ fareba ge ne ta.
40027043	Isi ge Dok pagal ɗeŋew ɗe, kaɗɗa Dok laa wa̰a̰ ne wan, ne mo̰o̰ ne ge sego ɗaŋ. Kaɗ jan dana go: Mbi Dok Van ne.
40027044	Nda ge fiiri vin̰a ge àa pee num kaŋre ta ne ziya ma puy, àa ka sal ne mbe go waɗme.
40027045	Sok mbo ya saa se tṵṵ ɗeɗeg ge suwa pagal peɗ, ge gyala pɔgwa go ɗiŋ mbo gyala swa saa.
40027046	Sok ge gyala swa saa mbiya go: Zeso oy ge ka̰a̰l ndaal go: Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani, ne pe wanna go: Dok ge mbi, Dok ge mbi, ge dape, mo wa seŋe mbi mo guwa̰ go de?
40027047	Nda a̰me ge kaa sok mbe go ma za̰a̰ ne, àa ka janna go: Ḛ za̰a̰ a tol Eli go ne chiya na kṵwa̰ ba!
40027048	Ndu a̰me ɗu ge num buwal zige, chiya gaw mbo hee chifo̰ ya, paa ne ge on̰or jìn̰al ge haɗ-ɗa ka̰a̰mal pagal, tyal ne ge kɔn̰a wa zì, tare ne ne digi yà njoɗɗa.
40027049	Ɗaŋɗe, nda gegene ma jan ne go: N̰a ne gale, nè ndi go, Eli mà mbo ya mon ne de.
40027050	Zeso gwan oy digi ge ka̰a̰l ndaal, ne on̰om ndage me.
40027051	Ge sok mbe go gaw, ba̰a̰ ge vâ zok ge Dok ne pul, taabe tene se buwal zi ge digi ya ɗiŋ mbo se, suwa ndaɗ, njal ma mbo ya wage ta se,
40027052	tugul swày ma wa hage ta gezi, nda ge ho fareba ge dee suu ma gḛḛ mbo ya tan digi.
40027053	Guwa̰ ge Zeso tanna ne go, àa waɗ-ɗa zum ge maa tugul swày ma zì ya, àa mbo ge suwal ga̰a̰l ge harcal diŋ yà, àa dyan ta ge nda ndwa go gḛḛ.
40027054	Sok ge ga̰a̰l ge asagar ge kis ma way mage na nda ge maa ge num kaa dagre koy Zeso ma kuwa suwa ndaɗɗa mage kaŋ ge kê ma peɗ go ɗe, voo ge ɓaŋlaŋ mbo ya wan num, àa ka janna go: «Fareba, ndu mbe no, a Dok Van ne.»
40027055	Nda zaab kaɗ sok mbe go gḛḛ, num ge kàre Zeso pe ge Galile ya ndwa mbaa ne ge tèmel ma, àa mḛḛ ge zum ya kaal day ndil sok.
40027056	Ge num buwal zì, Mari ge Magdala ne kaa, Mari ge Jak mage Jozef na̰ ɓanna ge Zebede van ma na̰ kaa me.
40027057	Sok ge gyala wa ya be dinna se, ndu ge seɗ kaŋ a̰me ɗu ge suwa Arimate ne, ge àa tol ne Jozef, ge kaa ndu ge ame hateya ge Zeso ne waɗme, deɗ-ɗa me.
40027058	Mbo ge Pilaɗ ta yà, kaɗe ne, ne mà kaɗ ge hon na Zeso duul swày nde de. Sok mbe go, Pilaɗ hoɗ na wa go, a ho̰ ne ne.
40027059	Jozef hee duul swày mbe, warge ne ge pakta jin̰al zì,
40027060	mbo ee ne ge tugul mbul ta ge àa gale câ ne jin̰al ge njal zì. Guwa̰, viŋri njal ge ga̰a̰l ya ɗu, mbo ya dibi tugul mbe wa digi ge ne, dol tene mbo ya me.
40027061	Mari ge suwal Magdala ne mage Mari gegene go kàɗɗa sok mbe go, ge tugul wa nga.
40027062	Sok yan kin̰are, ajo̰o̰ na dwam ge mbo ya nuusi vḛḛso ge paska nee ne ndwa go dwam ge menengal, ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way mage Farisi ma ɓan dagre mbo seɗ Pilaɗ,
40027063	àa jan ne go: Bagezok, i dwaɗ ge fare a̰me ge ndu ge hày gḛḛ mbe dee jin̰a ne pagal, sok ge gale wa ya ge na ndwa nè buwal zì go go: Dwam taa guwa̰, mbi mbo tan digi.
40027064	Ho mo wa go, asagar ma num koy tugul swày wa ɗiŋ dwam taa, ne kaa ge go ne nda ge ame hateya ma mbo ya chel ne duul swày ɗoo, num mbo jan ɓase ma go: Tanna go ge swày se! Num hày kunna ge guwa̰-ge mbe, mbo kaɗ sone gḛḛ waɗe ge wal .
40027065	Pilaɗ jan num go: Ḛ sḛ ma go ge nda ge koy sok ma, ḛ mbo ɓyare vin̰a ge koy tugul mbe wa, ge mojo̰o̰ ḛ ɓyare go.
40027066	Àa kan ta mboya, àa mbo ndilla go tugul wa koy go, àa nuusi ne wa dibiya ɓereɗ, àa n̰a asagar ma ne wa go.
40028001	Guwa̰ ge dwam sabaɗ ne go, dwam ge zḛḛge, ndwa go Dumas aaram pe vḛḛ, Mari Magdala mage Mari gegene mbo ge sḭḭ pagal-la.
40028002	Suwa kale ɗege ndaɗ ndaɗɗa ge sone, malayka a̰me ge Bagezok ne, mbo ya se ne ge pḭḭ zì ya, mbo ya viŋri njal gezi ge tàal wa go, kaɗ na pe ne pagal.
40028003	Ne diir kaa dinna ge mam seeya go, ne ba̰a̰ kaɗ saal taɗag dinna ge kakḭḭli sa̰a̰m go.
40028004	Sok ge asagar ge koy sok ma kuwa ne, voo wan num, àa ɗege ndaɗɗa, num kḭḭ mbo ya ndageya cɔcwaɗ.
40028005	Ɗaŋɗe, malayka jan nda zaab mbe ma go: Kaɗɗa ge ḛ ɗe, ḛ chiya voo to, ago, mbi kuwa kuwa go ḛ ɓyare Zeso ge àa pee ne ɔwara kaŋre ta digi.
40028006	Daa ge sok mbe no go to, tanna ya ge swày se dinna ge àa jin̰a ḛ ne mbe go tem. Ḛ mbo ya ndil sok ge ne duul swày ee go.
40028007	Ḛ haa ta avun cab mbo jan ne nda ge ame hateya ma go, ne tan-na ge nda ge swày ma buwal zì. Ge sego mbo ya da̰a̰re ḛ ge Galile yà. A ge sok mbe yà go, ḛ wa mbo kuwa ne. A fare ge mbi mbo ya jan ḛ nee ne.
40028008	Àa ɗege ge sḭḭ pagal avun cab, voo ka kee num me no, laa saal ɓyare ka dol num se me. Àa chiya ndwa mbo jan ne nda ge ame hateya ma fare ge kwaɗa mbe.
