40028009	Zeso mbo ya tan num tugcug, jan num go: «Mbi sa̰a̰ ḛ wa», àa mbo ya ne ta zì guwa, àa guu maa ko ma se ndwa uware ne.
40028010	Sok mbe go, Zeso jan num go: «Ḛ chiya voo to, ḛ mbo jan mbi na̰ van ma go, num mbo ge suwa Galile yà, ne ge sok mbe yà go, num wa mbo kuwa mbi.»
40028011	Sok ge àa gale no vin̰a zì, asagar ge koy sok a̰me ma cub deɗ-ɗa ge suwal ga̰a̰l diŋ yà, àa wan ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way, kaŋ ge kê mbe ma pe peɗ.
40028012	Num sḛ ma tol kwateya avun cab ɓanna ge Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme num ma ndwa za̰a̰ ta fare a̰me ma pagal. Àa hon asagar ge koy sok ma bware gḛḛ.
40028013	Àa yuwale num, num wa̰a̰ nda fare pe go: «Ne nda ge ame hateya ma mbo ya ge ɗaal zì yalaŋ, num chee ne duul no, i fii ya dwam galgatag.»
40028014	Mà kaɗɗa fare mbe deɗ-ɗa ge goformo̰ tɔgwa zì yà puy, i mà kuwa fare ge jan ne, ge go fare mbe dṵṵl gaa ge ḛ pagal to.
40028015	Asagar mbe ma ame bware, àa kee dinna ge fare ge àa yuwale maa num ma pagal tem. Fare mbe kṵwa̰ dasare se ge Yahuɗ ma ta, ge dwam mbe ya day ɗiŋ màno.
40028016	Nda ge ame hateya ge wol pɔgwa ɗu ma mbo ge suwa Galile yà go, ge njal ge Zeso dee ngay maa ne pagal digi.
40028017	Sok ge àa kuwa ne, àa ɗege uware ne. Ano puy, a̰me ma ka tumri ta.
40028018	Zeso mbo ya num ta zì guwa, jan num go: A hon mbi pool ge kee muluk ya mɔɗwag, ge pḭḭ zì yà, ge suwa pagal me.
40028019	Ḛ mbo ge rusu ge ɗogle ma ta peɗ, ḛ seŋe num mbi nda ge ame hateya ma, ḛ kee num baptem ge dḭḭl ge Ba ne, ge Van ne, ge On̰om ge Harcal ne ta me,
40028020	ḛ hate num koy fare ge mbi ho ḛ wa num pagal ma peɗ. Ḛ kuwa go, mbi go ge ḛ dagre dwam ma mɔɗwag, ɗiŋ dunin̰a pe aaya.
41001001	12 Fare ge maktub mbe no ne, faa Fare ge Kwaɗa ge Zeso Krist ge Dok Van ne.
41001002	Ano mbe ee pe ge mojo̰o̰ Nda ge zwagre Dok wa Ezay njaŋe ne ge na maktub zì go. Njaŋe zì go, Dok jin̰a go: «Kuwa, mbi teme mbi ndu ge vin̰a Ge mo ndwa zḛḛ yà, ndwa go ne nuusi mo vin̰a.
41001003	Ano a ka̰a̰l ge ndu ge oy no ge babur pul go nee ne, jan go: Ḛ ca vin̰a ge Bagezok pe, ḛ haa vin̰a ma temel ge ne pe me!»
41001004	Ge fare janna mbe no pagal, Yohana zuu ya ge babur pul go no, ka kee nda baptem no, ka oy fare no go: Ḛ seŋe ta se, mbi wa kee ḛ baptem ndwa go Dok wa pore ḛ ge ḛ kaŋ keeya ge sone ma go gezi.
41001005	Nda ge kaa no ge suwa ge Jude ne go ma peɗ, ge nda ge kaa no suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ ma peɗ me, àa ka mbo ya za̰a̰ ne no, àa ka jan maa sone ma zum no, ne sḛ ka kee num baptem ge mangaɗam Urdun se no me.
41001006	Yohana ka̰a̰ ba̰a̰ ge àa kê ne ge jambal ge jujul zi susu ge na ta, kaɗ ge hoo dab vwalla ge na pul go. Ka wal tene ge tere mage daram nùm ge ful zige ma.
41001007	Ka oy fare janna go: Ndu a̰me mbo ge mbi guwa̰ ya, ne pool waɗe mbi waɗe, mbi be mbyaɗ hugi se saa ne tyako tàal ma to.
41001008	Mbi, mbi kee ḛ baptem ge mam se, ɗaŋɗe, ne sḛ mbo kee ḛ baptem ge On̰om ge Harcal .
41001009	Dwam a̰me ɗu, Zeso ɗege ge suwal ga̰a̰l Nazareɗ diŋ, ge suwa ge Galile ne go, mbo ya ge Yohana ta. Yohana kee ne baptem ge mangaɗam Urdun se.
41001010	Sok ge ka ndee ge mam se ya, kuwa pḭḭ ma hageya gezi, On̰om ge Harcal siri ya se ne pagal dinna ge maale go.
41001011	Nda za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l a̰me ge pḭḭ ma zì ya, janna go: Mo mbi Van ne, mbi laa wa̰a̰ mo gḛḛ, mbi sḛ kee tii gḛḛ ge mo pe.
41001012	Sok mbe go gaw, On̰om ge Dok ne ee ne mbo ɗiŋ ge babur pul yà.
41001013	Sok ge kê dwam warndà ge sok mbe go, Saytan ka hee ne pe. Kaa ge sok ge kavaar ma no go, malayka ge Dok ne ma mbo ya ge ne ta, àa ka kee tèmel hon ne me.
41001014	Guwa̰, àa wan Yohana, ba ge kee nda baptem, àa dol ne ge daŋay zì. Sok mbe go, Zeso ɗege, mbo ge suwa ge Galile ne yà, ka oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge Dok ne,
41001015	ka janna go me: Sok ge Dok mbo ya kee muluk ḛ pagal mbyaɗ-ɗa go, ḛ seŋe ta se, ḛ ho fareba ge Fare ge Kwaɗa ta.
41001016	Sok ge ka kale mboya ge mangaɗam ga̰a̰l ge Galile ne wa go, kuwa Simo̰ mage na na̰ van Andre, àa wa ya dol kuwal, ago, àa kaa nda ge swaɗ soso ma ne.
41001017	Jan num go: Ḛ gaa kàre mbi pe. Ajo̰o̰ ḛ nda ge wan sini ma ne, mbi mbo seŋe ḛ nda ge gene nda duwana ma ya ge mbi ta ma.
41001018	Ge sok mbe go gaw, àa n̰a maa kuwal ma, àa kàre ne pe ya me.
41001019	Sok ge mbo zḛḛ yà kaal nde, kuwa Zebede van ma: Jak mage na na̰ van Yohana, àa wa ya kàɗɗa ge faa go zoo maa kuwal ndwal ma.
41001020	Sok ge ka̰a̰ na ndwa kuwa num, avun cab, tol num, àa n̰a maa ba Zebede ge faa yà ɓanna ge nda ge àa wa̰a̰ num ya kee maa tèmel ma, àa kàre ne pe ya me.
41001021	Àa ɗege ge sok mbe go, àa mbo suwal ga̰a̰l Kapernawom yà. Ge dwam sabaɗ go, Zeso waɗ ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way zì, ka hate nda me.
41001022	Nda ge ka za̰a̰ ne ma ka kee ajab ge ne fare hateya mbe ma pe, ago, ka hateya ge pool ge Dok ne, be ge Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma go to.
41001023	Ge sok ge ka hate fare go, ndu a̰me ɗu ge kaa ge on̰om ge sone na zì wa ya ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way zì. Ka oyya go:
41001024	Zeso ge suwal Nazareɗ ne, mo ɓyare da ge i ta de? Mo mbo ya ndwa ban i gezi de? Mbi kuwa mo kuwa tyatyaɗ. Mo Ndu ge Harcal ge Dok teme ne ya ne.
41001025	Zeso ngwabe ne ol kekeŋ, jan ne go: Zane mo wa, wuwa zum ge ndu mbe zì.
41001026	On̰om ge sone mbe ka pil ne zazan̰, sok ndage zum ge ne zì go, ka oy digi ge ka̰a̰l ndaal me.
41001027	Voo mbo ya wan nda ge kaa sok mbe go ma peɗ, ge àa gaa ele ta ta buwal zì go: Ḛ gale ndi ɗoo me! Hon na hateya mbe ge pool ɗoo! Koo on̰om ge sone ma puy, hoɗ num na wa ge pool ɗoo. On̰om mbe ma me, àa ka gwan maa pagal ge ne pe se ba!
41001028	Sok mbe go, ne dḭḭl mbo ya dasare ge suwa ge Galile ne pagal peɗ.
41001029	Sok ge wuwa ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way zì ya zum, mbo ge Simo̰ mage Andre yà ɓanna ge Jak mage Yohana.
41001030	Sok ge àa dee yà, mbɔgwam dol Simo̰ tisi ge gwale ya se. Avun cab, àa jan Zeso ne fare.
41001031	Gwan tene ge ne ta zì, wan ne tok digi mḛḛya, mbɔgwam jay ge ne ta, ne sḛ ɗege kee kaŋ zam hon num.
41001032	Guwa̰ ge gyala dḭḭ se go, àa gene ne nda ge kee tuguɗi mage nda ge no ge on̰om ge sone maa zì ma ya peɗ me.
41001033	Nda ge suwal ga̰a̰l diŋ-ge ma peɗ kwate ya ge zok mbe wa go.
41001034	Ge sok mbe go, zon nda ge kee tuguɗi ma gḛḛ, ge ka njoɗ yal ge tuguɗi ma pe hini-hini me. Yan on̰om ge sone ma gḛḛ gezi waɗme, ɗaŋɗe, be n̰a on̰om ge sone ma jan fare to, ge dape, àa kuwa kuwa go ne Zeso ne.
41001035	Lee aaram pagal, sok gale wa ya pisil pupurum, Zeso waɗ zum ge suwal diŋ, mbo ge sok babur a̰me, ge kṵwa̰ no go to yà, ɗege kee kaɗeya.
41001036	Simo̰ ɓanna ge nda ge kaa dagre ge ne ma ɗege haa ta ɓyare ne pe.
41001037	Sok ge àa see ne, àa jan ne go: Nda peɗ ɓyare mo go.
41001038	Gwan ge num janna go: Ḛ mbo nè sok ge ɗogle, ge suwal van ge jiyale guguwa ma diŋ. Ɓyare go mbi oy fare ge suwal mbe ma diŋ waɗme, ago, mbi mbo ya ge ano mbe no pe.
41001039	A mbe go no, a̰a̰ ge suwa ge Galile ne pagal no peɗ, ka oy fare ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way ma zì no, ka yan on̰om ge sone ma gezi no me.
41001040	Guwa̰, ndu ge kṵṵ swàm a̰me ɗu mbo ya ge ne ta, guu na ko ge ne ndwa se, gwarge tene ge ne ta, jan ne go: Kaɗɗa mo vinna, mo ge pool zon mbi, mbi wa haɗ kɔn̰al.
41001041	Zeso kuwa ne a̰se, ee na tok ge ne ta, jan ne go: Mbi vin-na go, see zonna, mo haɗ kɔn̰al.
41001042	Sok mbe go gaw, ndu ge kṵṵ swàm mbe seɗ zonna, ne bol haɗ somndol mbambala, haɗ kɔn̰al me.
41001043	Guwa̰ go, Zeso ndiri ne tɔgwa ge fare mbe ma pagal,
41001044	jan ne go: Fare mbe no, ne kaa ge mo jan ndu a̰me ne to, ɗaŋɗe, mbo ngay tene ge ba ge kee tuwaleya ta, mo hon ne kaŋ ge kee tuwaleya, ge eeya ge Moyiz njaŋe ne pagal, ndwa go nda kuwa peɗ go mo zon-na go, mo haɗ-ɗa kɔn̰al. Guwa̰ ge jin̰a ne fare ge ndaa kaka mbe go, n̰a ne mboya.
41001045	Ndu mbe, sok ge wuwa ya zum gaw, ɗege oy fare mbe digi ge ka̰a̰l ndaal, dasare fare mbe ge nda ta peɗ, kaɗ ge go Zeso daa gwan seɗ vin̰a ge waɗ ge suwal ga̰a̰l a̰me diŋ daa to. Gaa kàɗɗa ge suwal guwa̰ zum yà, sok ge nda kaa no num go to ma go. Nda ka mbo ge sok ma ya peɗ ge ne ta.
41002001	Dwam ma kwaɗa lag guwa̰, Zeso gwan-na ge suwal Kapernawom diŋ. Nda za̰a̰ go ne go zok diŋ.
41002002	Àa mbo ya twageya gḛḛ waɗeya ge go sok daa gwan gaa go fyalag koo ge zok pul diŋ, koo ge ndaa wa pagal zum to baɗ. Sok ge kuwa go nda twage ja gḛḛ, ɗege hate num fare ge Dok ne.
41002003	Nda a̰me ma ndà in ndu ge looɗeya a̰me ya ge Zeso ta.
41002004	Ajo̰o̰ àa be seɗ vin̰a ge waɗ ge ndu mbe ge ne ta zì yà to, ge ɓase ma pe ɗe, àa ndee zok pagal digi, àa zuɗ zok pagal, ge sok ge ne mḛḛ no go nga. Ge ndwal mbe go, àa siri ndu ge looɗeya ge digi ya, fiiya ge na saŋal go ge tàal mbo ya ge ne ndwa se.
41002005	Sok ge Zeso kuwa hoɗ fareba ge num way go, jan ndu ge looɗeya go: Mbi van, mbi pore mo, mo sone ma ya go.
41002006	Nda ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne a̰me ma kwaɗa lag, ge kaa ge sok mbe go ma dwaɗ ge maa dul wa ma zì go:
41002007	Ndu mbe daa jan fare go mbe ge dape de? Jan fare ge sone kakatag ya go ge Dok pagal. A huɗi ne ge pool ge pore sone ma, be ge Dok sḛ ɗu to de?
41002008	Ge sok mbe go waɗ, Zeso kuwa dwaɗɗa ge num way ma ge na on̰om zì, jan num go: Ge dape ḛ wa kaɗ ge dwaɗɗa ge go mbe ma ge ḛ dul wa ma zì de?
41002009	Jan ndu ge looɗeya go: Mbi pore mo, mo sone ma ya go me no, ɗege digi hee mo saŋal mo mbo me no, a ge diige dṵṵl gḛḛ ne zoo de?
41002010	Ge sego, mbi kee ḛ kuwaya go, Van ge Ndu ne ge pool ge pore sone ma ge suwa pagal.
41002011	Guwa̰, jan ndu ge looɗeya mbe go: Ɗege digi, he mo saŋal, mo mbo ge mo yà.
41002012	Ge sok mbe go gaw, ɗege digi hee na saŋal, waɗ-ɗa zum ge nda ndwa go peɗ. Nda ge kaa sok mbe go ma peɗ kee ajab, àa ka janna go: I be kuwa kaŋ ge go mbe no pe keeya dwam ɗu to. Dok mbiya saleya.
41002013	Zeso waɗ ge zok diŋ ya zum, gwan mbo ge mangaɗam ga̰a̰l ge Galile ne wa yà. Ɓase ma peɗ ka mbo ya ge ne ta, ka hate num me.
41002014	Guwa̰ ge aa na hateya go, sok gwanna ge ne ne ya go, kuwa Levi ge Alfe van kàɗɗa ge na sok tèmel ge chal siyal ne go. Jan ne go: Mbo ya mbi pe go. Levi ɗege ge na sok mbe go, mbo ge ne pe yà me.
41002015	Guwa̰ go, Zeso mbo ya zam kaŋ zam ge Levi diŋ. Nda ge chal siyal ma gḛḛ ɓanna ge nda ge kee sone ma, àa mbo ya zam kaŋ zam ge num ge na nda ge ame hateya ma ge sok mbe go. Àa kaa ɓase sok kàre ne pe go.
41002016	Nda ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ge no ɓan pagal ge Farisi ma way zì ma, sok ge àa kuwa ne zam kaŋ dagre ge nda ge chal siyal ma ɓanna ge nda ge kee sone ma me ɗe, àa jan ne nda ge ame hateya ma go: Ge dape, ḛ Ba ge hate nda wa ka zam kaŋ zam ge nda ge chal siyal ma, ge nda ge kee sone ma me de?
41002017	Sok ge num fare janna mbe ma dee ya Zeso tɔgwa zì, jan num go: A be nda ge duul pool ma ɓyare Ba ge zon nda ne to, ɗaŋɗe, num ge sḛ duul tuguɗi ma. Mbi be mbo ya ge nda ge temel ma pe to, ɗaŋɗe, ge num ge kee sone ma pe.
41002018	Nda ge ame hateya ge Yohana ba ge kee nda baptem ne mage Farisi ma ka wan mam njuwal . Ge dwam a̰me go ɗu, nda mbo ya ge Zeso ta, àa ele ne go: Ge dape, nda ge ame hateya ge Yohana ba ge kee nda baptem ne mage Farisi ma way ma wa ka wan mam njuwal, mo nda ma wa ka wan mam njuwal to de?
41002019	Gwan ge num janna go: Gwale jin̰al obe kondore ma ge pool ge wan mam njuwal sok ge gwale jin̰al obe no go ɓanna dagre ge num de? Ajo̰o̰ gwale jin̰al obe go gale dagre ge num, be kee kwaɗa go num wan mam njuwal to.
41002020	Dwam ma mbo mbo ya ge go gwale jin̰al obe kaɗ to. Ge dwam mbe ma go, àa mbo gaa wan mam njuwal.
41002021	Iya ɔwale, mbi jan ḛ go: Ndu a̰me ge hee ba̰a̰ wa ge jin̰al, dyan ne ge ba̰a̰ ge kamal ta go de? Kaɗɗa go na kee ne ya mbe go ɗe, ba̰a̰ wa ge jin̰al mbe mbo taabe ge kamal ya ge na ta mɔɗwag, ne ndwal mbe mbo gwan a̰a̰le se waɗeya.
41002022	Ndu a̰me ge kan on̰or jìn̰al ge jin̰al ge ɗutulu ge kamal ma zì to. Kaɗɗa na kan ne ya zì mbe go ɗe, ago on̰or jìn̰al ge jin̰al fol ɗutulu mbe gezi. On̰or jìn̰al mage ɗutulu mbe vḛḛne gezi jwàg. Ɗaŋɗe, ɓyare go àa ka̰a̰ on̰or jìn̰al ge jin̰al ge ɗutulu ge jin̰al zì.
41002023	Ge dwam sabaɗ a̰me go ɗu, Zeso mage na nda ma ka kale mboya ge gaaso ge geme ne wa go. Sok mboya go, ne nda ge ame hateya ma ka orbe geme pagal ma sulla.
41002024	Sok ge Farisi ma kuwa num, àa ele ne go: Ge dape, mo nda ma wa ka kee kaŋ ge àa ho̰ vin̰a go àa ke num dwam sabaɗ go to ma de?
41002025	Gwan ge num janna go: Ḛ be isi kaŋ ge Daviɗ kê ne, sok ge dee ya ge hoɗegeya zì to de? Sok ge camal wa̰a̰ ne, ne sḛ ɓanna dagre ge na nda ma,
41002026	wuwa ge gur seɗ ta ge Dok ne zì no, zâ dupḛ ge àa nuusi num ge Dok pe ma no, ho̰ na nda ma no waɗme to de? Nè yuwaleya ma ho̰ vin̰a go, nda ge kee tuwaleya ma za dupḛ mbe ma ne ɗeŋew. Ano mbe kee ge zaman ge ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe Abiyatar ne go.
41002027	Gwan jan num go: Àa ee sabaɗ ge ɗwabeya ge nda duwana ma way pe, àa be kee nda duwana ma ge sabaɗ pe to.
41002028	Ḛ kuwa go mbi, Van ge Ndu ne, mbi ne ge pool ge faa fare koo ge dwam sabaɗ pagal.
41003001	Guwa̰, Zeso gwan waɗ ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way zì yà, ndu a̰me ge tok looɗeya wa ya ge sok mbe go.
41003002	Nda ge kaa sok mbe go ma ka ndilla go, ne mà zon ndu mbe ge dwam sabaɗ go de? Kaɗɗa ne mà zon ne ya dwam sabaɗ go ɗe, ago maa wa wan ne ge fare.
41003003	Zeso jan ndu ge tok looɗeya go: Ɗege digi mo mḛḛ ya ge sok mbe no go, ge nda tuwal zì go.
41003004	Gwan ele nda ge kaa sok mbe go ma go: Eeya ge Moyiz ne ma ho̰ vin̰a go, àa ke ndu kwaɗa koo àa ke ne sone ge dwam sabaɗ go de? Àa mo̰o̰ ndu on̰om koo àa n̰a ne suuya de? Ɗaŋɗe, ndu a̰me gwan ge ne fare janna ge ne fare mbe pagal to.
41003005	Ge sok mbe go, ne laa mbo ya hoɗɗa, caɗ num ol bel ge dul wa twagreya ge num way pe. Ne laa mbo ya vḛḛneya, jan ndu mbe go: Mwaɗe mo tok se yà. Ne sḛ mwaɗe na tok se yà, ne tok mbo ya seɗ zonna.
41003006	Farisi ma waɗ ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way zì ya zum, àa ge Heroɗ Antipas nda ma seɗ ta avun cab, ndwa seɗ fare ge ban Zeso gezi.
41003007	Zeso mbo ge mangaɗam ga̰a̰l wa yà ɓanna ge na nda ge ame hateya ma. Nda ɓase nɔnɔg ka kàre ne pe. Nda mbe ma mbo ge Galile ya,
41003008	ge Jude ya, ge Jerusalem ya, ge Idume ya, ge mangaɗam Urdun wa lee gene ya, ge suwal van ge no ge Tir mage Sido̰ ziya ge ma ya me. Ɓase ge nɔnɔg mbe ma ka mbo ya ge ne ta, ge za̰a̰ya ge àa ka za̰a̰ kaŋ keeya ge ne ne ma pe.
41003009	Jan na nda ge ame hateya ma go: Ḛ ee faa van ge jiyale ɗu ge mbi pe, ne kaa ge ɓase ma terse mbi zì to.
41003010	Ajo̰o̰ na ka zon nda gḛḛ, num peɗ ge ka kee tuguɗi ma ka harge ta ndwa go maa see vin̰a ge taɗ ne.
41003011	Nda ge kaa ge on̰om ge sone ge maa zì ma, sok ge àa ka kuwa ne go, àa ka deɗ ge ne ndwa se, àa ka oyya go: Mo Dok Van ne.
41003012	Ɗaŋɗe, mḛḛre num ol kekeŋ go, ne kaa ge num jin̰a fare ge na ne mbe zum to.
41003013	Guwa̰, ndee mbo njal pagal digi yà, tol nda ge na laa ɓyare num ma, àa mbo ya ge ne ta me.
41003014	Twaɗ nda wol pɔgwa zi ge num buwal zì, hon num dḭḭl go, nda ge temeya ma, ndwa go num gaa kàɗɗa dagre ge na,
41003015	na wa ka teme num mbo oy Fare ge Kwaɗa. Hon num pool ge yan on̰om ge sone ma gezi me.
41003016	Num ge wol pɔgwa zi mbe ma dḭḭl ma no: Simo̰ ge àa chiya ne dḭḭl Piyer,
41003017	Jak mage na na̰ van Yohana, àa Zebede van ma ne, ge àa chiya num dḭḭl go: Mam ban̰n̰a van ma ge ne wa grek no go Bowanerges.
41003018	Gwan tal Andre, Filib, Bartelemi, Mata, Tomas, Jak ge Alfe van, Tade, Simo̰ ge iyal kyarga ge na suwal pe.
41003019	Yudas Iskariyoɗ, ne ge yiya Zeso gezi me.
41003020	Ge guwa̰ go, Zeso mage na nda ge temeya ma gwan-na ge zok diŋ, ɓase ma gwan-na twageya didib iya, ge go àa seɗ vin̰a ge zam a̰me ge maa wa zì to.
41003021	Sok ge ne sele ma za̰a̰ fare mbe go, àa mbo ya wan ne, ago àa ka janna go: Ne pagal kee ne kee.
41003022	Nda ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ge mbo ge Jerusalem ya ma kaa ge sok mbe go, àa ka janna go: Zeso ge Belzebul ge na zì. A ge ga̰a̰l ge on̰om ge sone ma way ta, yan on̰om ge sone ma no.
41003023	Zeso tol num ya, ɗege jan num fare ma ge sḭḭ go: Saytan ge pool ge yan na kon Saytan de?
41003024	Kaɗɗa nda ge kee muluk no ge suwal ge ɗu go ma ho̰o̰l ge ta, muluk ge num way mbe ge pool mḛḛya to.
41003025	Kaɗɗa nda ge zok ge ɗu diŋ-ge ma ho̰o̰l ge ta, zok ge num way mbe ge pool mḛḛya to.
41003026	Kaɗɗa Saytan nda ma ho̰o̰l ge ta ta buwal zì, ne pool va se vaa me. Ne vin̰a ge mḛḛya to, aa aa ge ne pe.
41003027	Ḛ kuwa kuwa waɗme go ndu a̰me ge ɗogle ge vin̰a ge waɗ-ɗa ge zok ge ndu ge pool ne diŋ, pal ne a̰me to. Zḛḛ ge go ne paa ne kaŋ kwaɗa ma, ɓyare go ne vuwa ndu mbe ge pool se vwal ɓiya, wa ɗege seɗ vin̰a ge pal ne kaŋ ma guwa̰ go.
41003028	Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no: Àa mbo pore sone ge nda duwana ma mbo kee num ya ma peɗ ɓanna ge fare janna ge sone kakatag ge mbo waɗ-ɗa ge num wa zì ma ge Dok pagal.
41003029	Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge diige ge mbo jan fare sone kakatag ya ge On̰om ge Harcal pagal, mbo seɗ poreya to baɗ. Ago, kee sone ge be seɗ poreya ge ɗiŋ ge din.
41003030	Ge dape, àa ka janna go: A ge on̰om ge sone ge na zì.
41003031	Sok mbe go, Zeso na̰ mage ne na̰ van ma yan-na, àa mḛḛ ge zok wa zum, àa teme ndu mbo tol ne ya.
41003032	Ɓase ge vê ne se ma jan ne go: Mo na̰ ɓanna ge mo na̰ van ge soɗob mage gwale ma ɓyare mo go zum.
41003033	Gwan ge num janna go, mbi jan ḛ ne no: A huɗi ma ne, mbi na̰ mage mbi na̰ van ma de?
41003034	Guwa̰ go, dol na ndwa ge ɓase ge vê na se ma pagal, jan go: Mbi na̰ mage mbi na̰ van ma ne no.
41003035	Ndu ge diige ge kee laa ɓyareya ge Dok ne, ne sḛ mbi na̰ van ge son ne, kaɗ mbi na̰ van ge gwale mage mbi na̰ me.
41004001	Zeso gwan ee tene hate nda iya ge mangaɗam ga̰a̰l ge Galile ne wa go. Nda kwate ya ɓase nɔnɔg ge ne ta, ɓase ge num way ee ne ndee ge faa yà, ɓase mbe ma gaa tabe mḛḛya ge wa kal digi.
41004002	Ndiri num hateya ge fare sḭḭ ma zì, ka jan num ge na hateya ma zì go:
41004003	Ḛ za̰a̰ gale, ge dwam a̰me go ɗu, ba ge gaa kaŋ a̰me ɗu zuɗ mbo dol swa.
41004004	Sok ge ka cigi swa go, swa ndwa a̰me ma deɗ ge vin̰a kin̰a ma go, njoole ma mbo ya coɗ num gezi.
41004005	A̰me ma deɗ ge sok her go, sok ge suwa no go gḛḛ to, àa tyal digi avun cab, ge dape, àa be seɗ suwa ge maa tòo ma wa mbo se yà ɗugul to.
41004006	Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge gyala dee ge num pagal, àa looɗe, àa fin̰a gezi me, ge dape, num tòo ma kaa digi dɔfwal.
41004007	A̰me ge ɗogle ma me ɗe, àa deɗ ge kore ma buwal zì, kore ma don digi, àa kage num se, àa be gwan seɗ vin̰a ge tol ndwa to.
41004008	Ge cùb ma deɗ ge suwa ge kwaɗa go, àa don digi, àa mbal van, àa gasage se, àa kan maa pagal zum, àa zon ndwa. Swa pagal a̰me ma tol ndwa hoɗege guwa, gegene ma gḛḛ nde, gegene ma gḛḛ-gḛḛ.
41004009	Guwa̰, jan go: Kaɗɗa ndu ge tɔgwa ge za̰a̰ fare mbe ma, ne za̰a̰ num kwaɗa.
41004010	Guwa̰ kaal nde, sok ge gaa hini go, ne nda ge ame hateya ge wol pɔgwa zi ma ɓanna ge nda ge ka mboya dagre ge ne ma mbo ya ge ne ta zì, àa ele ne fare ge fare sḭḭ mbe ma pagal.
41004011	Jan num go: Dok hon ḛ kuwaya ge wan fare ɗimil ge muluk ge na ne pe ya go, ɗaŋɗe, deɗ ge nda ge ɗogle ma tɔgwa zì peɗ ge fare sḭḭ ma go,
41004012	ndwa go: «Àa ndil sok go maa kuwa kaŋ mbe kwaɗa, Ɗaŋɗe, àa mbyaɗ kuwa ne to. Àa ɓyare go maa za̰a̰ fare mbe pe kwaɗa, Ɗaŋɗe, àa mbyaɗ wan ne pe to. Daa no go àa za̰a̰ fare mbe za̰a̰, Àa daa mà seŋe ta ya ge Dok ta, Dok daa mà pore num, num sone ma gezi.»
41004013	Jan num go iya: Kaɗɗa go ḛ wan fare sḭḭ mbe no pe to, ḛ mà mbo wan fare sḭḭ gegene mbe ma pe peɗ gyana de?
41004014	Ba ge gaa kaŋ ge cigi swa, cigi fare ge Dok ne.
41004015	Suwa ge vin̰a kin̰a go ge, ge kaŋ rusu dee ge ne go, ngay diir ge nda ge za̰a̰ fare ge Dok ne ma way. Sok ge àa kaɗ za̰a̰ ne go, avun cab, Saytan mbo ya pal fare ge àa za̰a̰ ne mbe ge num dul wa zì gezi.
41004016	A mbe go ca, suwa her pagal ge kaŋ rusu dee ne go, a diir ge nda ge za̰a̰ fare ge Dok ne ma way, àa ame ne avun cab ge laa saal,
41004017	ɗaŋɗe, àa n̰a ne vin̰a ge kee tèmel ge maa zì to, àa nda ge mḛḛ no go cɔcwab ma ne. Sok ge iigiya mage njon̰n̰a ma deɗ-ɗa ge fare ge Dok ne pe, àa seɗ ko challa ge sok mbe go avun cab.
41004018	Suwa ge kore do̰o̰ ge ne pagal, ge kaŋ rusu dee ge num buwal zì ma, a diir ge nda ge za̰a̰ fare ge Dok ne ma way,
41004019	ɗaŋɗe, àa kaɗ ge dwaɗɗa ma, àa ka yan kaŋ seɗɗa ge dunin̰a ne ma pe, ene ge kaŋ ge ɗogle ne ma waɗ ge num zì, àa njii fare ge Dok ne ge no ge num dul wa zì digi, àa daa gwan mbo mboya ge jwab to.
41004020	Suwa ge kwaɗa, ge kaŋ rusu dee ge ne go, ngay diir ge nda ge za̰a̰ fare ge Dok ne ma way, àa ame ne ge maa zì, àa tol ndwa ma gḛḛ me: Swa pagal ɗu tol ndwa tapool ɗu, gegene ma warmenengal, ge ɗogle ma kis.
41004021	Zeso gwan jan num go iya: Ndu ge pool dun lampe digi, kubi ne ge sòo zì koo ee ne ge saŋal pe zì de? To, ee ne ge kaŋ ee lampe pe pagal.
41004022	Ago, kaŋ ge way no ge sego ma peɗ mbo dyan zum ge kɔn̰al go. Kaŋ ge kee ge ɗimil zì ma, nda mbo kuwa num benna kɔn̰al.
41004023	Kaɗɗa ndu ge tɔgwa ge za̰a̰ fare mbe ma, ne za̰a̰ num kwaɗa.
41004024	Gwan jan num go iya ɔwale: Ḛ duwa kwaɗa ge fare ge ḛ za̰a̰ ne pagal. Àa mbo kee ḛ kaŋ ge ḛ kee nda gegene ma ne me, àa mbo gwan kee ḛ waɗeya nde.
41004025	Ago ndu ge no go ge a̰me, àa mbo gwan hon ne ge kon pagal iya, ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge no be a̰me koo ne ne ge fyalag ge no ne tok go puy, àa mbo ame ne, ne gezi.
41004026	Zeso gwan jan num go iya: Muluk ge Dok ne mbo kaɗ dinna ge ndu cigi kaŋ rusu ge gaaso zì go.
41004027	Koo ne fii dwam koo ne kaa ge na ndwa, ɗaal mage gyala, kaŋ rusu tyal digi, ka donna be ge ne sḛ kuwaya.
41004028	Suwa sḛ ge na pagal tyal kaŋ rusu ya digi tyal: Zḛḛ wal, gale kaɗ zam, guwa̰, ɔwabe na pe kal digi, kan na pagal zum, seŋe guɗigi, gaa zon ndwa kun̰ug.
41004029	Sok ge swa ndwa zon go, gaa ne salla ge ngwaɗiŋ. Ago, a sok kan siyal mbiya ne.
41004030	Zeso gwan jan num go iya: Nè mà mbo ngay muluk ge Dok ne dinna ge ma̰ kaŋ go iya de? Koo a ge ma̰ fare sḭḭ ta ɗoo, nè wa mbo ngay ne de?
41004031	A dinna ge sugu ge nda tol ne mutard ndwa go. Sok ge àa zare ne ge suwa zì, ne sḛ kaŋ rusu ge hoɗege jiyale ne ge kaŋ rusu gegene ma pe go peɗ.
41004032	Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge àa zare ne se go, tyal digi, don ga̰a̰l waɗe sugu ge àa dol num no ge gaaso zì ge zamma pe ma waɗe peɗ. Dol na tok ma zum fiyal ge go njoole ge pḭḭ digi ma peɗ mbo ya ee maa vum ma ge ne soŋon̰ tok digi.
41004033	Ka hate num fare sḭḭ mbe ma go, num dee ya kuwa num pe kwaɗa.
41004034	Ka hate num fare ma peɗ ge fare sḭḭ. Sok ge ne sḛ gaa hini ge na nda ge ame hateya ma, wan num fare sḭḭ mbe ma pe zum peɗ.
41004035	Ge gyala tok gasamal ge dwam mbe ne go, Zeso jan na nda ge ame hateya ma go: Ḛ ha nè mangaɗam ga̰a̰l wa lee gene yà.
41004036	Sok ge n̰a ɓase ma, ne nda ge ame hateya ma gwan ge ne ya, ge faa ge ne kaa daa wal ge ne go. Faa ga̰a̰l ge ɗogle ma wa ya yabeya ge ne ziya waɗme.
41004037	Àa ɗege ya haaya, sa̰a̰m ge ga̰a̰l ɗege labreya, sḭ̀ḭl ka poɗ faa, ka ndàa mam ya ge ne go, gaa guwa ge ɗimiya.
41004038	Zeso sḛ ka fii dwam ge faa pe ya, ɓya na pagal ge kaŋ ɓya pagal. Ne nda ge ame hateya ma kore ne digi, àa jan ne go: Ba ge hateya, mo fii go gyana de? Mo kuwa go nè mbo swày no to de?
41004039	Ne sḛ kore, mḛḛ digi, ngwabe sa̰a̰m, jan mangaɗam ga̰a̰l ge Galile ne go: Zane, mḛḛ go ga! Sa̰a̰m mbo ya mḛḛya cub, sḭ̀ḭl iyal se halas.
41004040	Guwa̰, jan num go: Ge dape, ḛ wa ka chiya voo gḛḛ go de? Ḛ zane gale go be hoɗ fareba ge ḛ zì de?
41004041	Ge sok mbe go, voo ge ɓaŋlaŋ wan num, àa ka jan ta ge ta buwal zì go: Ne sḛ huɗi ne ge go koo sa̰a̰m mage mangaɗam ga̰a̰l ma wa ka za̰a̰ ne wa go de?
41005001	Zeso mage na nda ge ame hateya ma haa ge mangaɗam ga̰a̰l wa lee gene yà, àa deɗ-ɗa ge suwa ge Geraza ma way go.
41005002	Sok ge Zeso ka̰a̰ na ko ge faa go gaw, ndu a̰me ge no ge on̰om ge sone ma na zì zuɗ ge sḭḭ ma buwal zì ya, mbo ge ne ndwa zì yà.
41005003	Ndu mbe sok kàɗɗa ge sḭḭ ma buwal zì. Koo ndu kaa ge zul puy ɗe, mbyaɗ feɗ ne se to.
41005004	Ago, kaa ge ɓyala ge walam pella ge na ko zì ɗaɗag, ne tok ma kaɗ vwalla se ge zul ma me. Ɗaŋɗe, ka hal zul mage ɓyala ge walam ma hal, ndu a̰me ge pool ge wan ne se be kaɗ to baɗ.
41005005	Ɗaal mage gyala, ka giwli anna ge sḭḭ ma buwal zì, ge njal ma pagal digi. Ka oyya, ka koɗ tene ge njal ma ta ɗiŋ seɗ jwaŋ ma.
41005006	Kuwa Zeso ge zum ya kaal day, ɗege soo ya, mbo ya guu na ko ge ne ndwa se.
41005007	-
41005008	Oy digi ge ka̰a̰l ndaal, jan ne go: Mo Zeso ge Dok ge digi vyaw Van, mo ɓyare da mbi ta de? Ge dḭḭl ge Dok ne zì, mbi kaɗe mo go, mo iigi mbi to. Ago Zeso ka mḛḛre ne mḛḛre, ka jan ne no go: On̰om ge sone, wuwa zum ge ndu mbe zì.
41005009	Ele on̰om ge sone mbe go: A tol mo gyana de? Gwan ge ne janna go: Mbi dḭḭl «Vwag twam jan», ago i ɓase.
41005010	Àa kaɗe ne ge aa ta go, ne kaa ge ne yin̰a maa ge suwa mbe no go to.
41005011	Zane no ɗe, kosoŋ ma vwag ɗu wa ya zam zam ge njal ta guwa.
41005012	On̰om ge sone ma gwarge ta ge kaɗeya ge ne ta, àa jan ne go: Ge go i mbo sok ge ɗogle to ɗe, n̰a i wuwa ge kosoŋ mbe ma no zì.
41005013	Hon num vin̰a, on̰om ge sone ma ndage zum ge ndu mbe zì, àa mbo waɗ ge kosoŋ ma zì. Ge sok mbe go gaw, àa ɗege soo ge digi ya mbo kan ta ge mangaɗam ga̰a̰l ge Galile ne se yà. Àa njoɗ mam gezi. Gḛḛ ge num way kaa guwa ge dudubu zi go.
41005014	Nda ge ka koy num ma jay maa pe soo, àa mbo dasare fare mbe no ge suwal ga̰a̰l mage suwal ge jiyale ma diŋ. Nda ka mbo ya ndil kaŋ ge kê.
41005015	Àa mbo ge Zeso ta, àa kuwa ndu ge kaa ge on̰om ge sone ma ge na zì kàɗɗa angal eeya se cɔgwaɗ, ge ba̰a̰ kanna ge na ta. Ge sok mbe go, voo mbo ya wan num.
41005016	Num ge kuwa kaŋ ge kê mbe ge maa ndwa ma, ka wan maa ka̰a̰m fare ge zonna ge ndu mbe ge no ge on̰om ge sone ma na zì mbe ne me no, fare ge see vwag ge kosoŋ ma way pe me.
41005017	Ge sok mbe go, àa kaɗe Zeso ge aa ta, àa jan ne go: Ɗege zum ge i suwa go.
41005018	Sok ge ka gwan mbo ndee ge faa go, ndu ge on̰om ge sone ma ndage ge ne zì, ka kaɗe ne ge aa tene go, ne n̰a na mboya dagre ge na.
41005019	Zeso be vin ne to, jan ne go: Guwa̰ mbo ge mo yà, ge mo ka̰a̰m ma buwal zì yà, mo wan num fare ge Bagezok kê mo num ma pe peɗ. Ne ngay kuwa a̰se ge na ne ge mo ta pe gyana de?
41005020	Ge sok mbe go, dol tene mboya, ka dasare fare ge Zeso kê na num ma peɗ ge nda ta ge Dekapol diŋ ndwa go suwal ga̰a̰l ge wol ma. Nda ge ka za̰a̰ ne ma peɗ ka kee ajab.
41005021	Sok ge Zeso guwa̰ ge mam wa lee gene yà ge faa, ɓase ma nɔnɔg mbo ya twageya ge ne ta iya. Ne sḛ gaa kàɗɗa ge mangaɗam ga̰a̰l ge Galile ne wa go.
41005022	Ge sok mbe go, ɗu ge ga̰a̰l ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way ne ma buwal zì, ge àa tol ne Jayrus, kuwa ne, mbo ya guu na ko ge ne ndwa se,
41005023	kaɗe ne ge aa tene, jan ne go: Mbi van ge gwale ge jiyale wa ɓyare yà dibiya, mbo ya mo kee kaɗeya ge ne pagal nde, ndwa go ne see zonna, ne kaa ge ne suu to.
41005024	Zeso mage ne ɗege ya dagre, ɓase ge nɔnɔg ma ka kàre ne pe ya, gḛḛ ge num way kaa ge go ne seɗ vin̰a ge daa mboya kwaɗa ge num buwal zì to me.
41005025	Ge sok mbe go, gwale a̰me ɗu waɗme ge kee ya del wol pɔgwa zi ge swàm na ta,
41005026	ge njoɗ yal ya gḛḛ ge nda ge kee jiyam ma tok go pe hini-hini, ban kaŋ ge na tok go ma ya kakaɗag, be seɗ zonna to. Go no puy ɗe, ne yal mbe ka zam zḛḛ zḛḛ.
41005027	-
41005028	Sok ge mbo ya za̰a̰ fare ge Zeso ne go, ago ka dwaɗ ge na dul wa zì go: Daa no go mbi see vin̰a ge taɗ ne ba̰a̰ ɗeŋew puy ɗe, mbi mà seɗ zonna. Ɓirsi ge ɓase ma buwal zì yà, ɗiŋ mbo taɗ ne ba̰a̰ ge guwa̰.
41005029	Ge sok mbe go gaw, swàm ge ka kan ne ta mbe ɔwabe, kuwa ge na duul ta go na seɗ zonna ya go ge na yal mbe zì.
41005030	Zeso kuwa ge na sḛ zì gaw go, pool a̰me ndage ya zum ge na zì. Seŋe tene se ge nda buwal zì, ele sok go: A huɗi taa mbi ba̰a̰ ne de?
41005031	Ne nda ge ame hateya ma gwan ge ne janna go: Mo gwan ele go a huɗi taa mo ne de no, mo kuwa kuwa go sok yagle nè go yagle to de?
41005032	Ndil sok ge na ziya ndwa kuwa ndu ge kê kaŋ mbe.
41005033	Sok ge gwale kuwa go ne ndil sok ge na ziya go, voo wan ne, ka ndaɗɗa ririg me. Ajo̰o̰ na kuwa go na zon-na go, mbo ya guu na ko ge ne ndwa se, wan ne fare ge fareba ge yal ge na see pagal mɔɗwag.
41005034	Ɗaŋɗe, Zeso jan ne go: Mbi van, hoɗ fareba ge amo zon mo ya go. Mbo ge halas, mo seɗ zonna ya go ge yal ge amo zì.
41005035	Gale sok faaya go, nda a̰me ma waɗ ge ga̰a̰l ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way Jayrus diŋ ya, àa mbo ya jan ne go: Mo van ge gwale wa dibiya yà, kaa ge mo lwage Ba ge hateya daa to.
41005036	Ɗaŋɗe, Zeso be ee na tɔgwa ge num fare janna mbe ma ta to. Jan ga̰a̰l ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way go: Iigi tene to, ɗeŋew go mo kaa ge hoɗ fareba.
41005037	Ge sok mbe go, be vin go ndu a̰me mbo ya ge na pe go to, ɗeŋew Piyer ɓanna ge Jak mage na na̰ van Yohana.
41005038	Sok ge Zeso yin̰a ya guwa ge ga̰a̰l ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way zok ɗe, kuwa nda ɔwabe ya mḛḛya digi ge maa ko cim, àa ka lomen̰a, àa ka fyalla.
41005039	Sok ge wuwa ya diŋ, jan num go: Ge dape, ḛ wa ka kee kṵwa̰ mage fyalla gḛḛ go de? Van kale mbe be suu suu to, ɗaŋɗe, fii go dwam.
41005040	Ge ne fare janna mbe ma no pagal, àa ka coɗ ne. Ge sok mbe go, yan nda zum peɗ, tol van ba mage ne na̰ ɓanna ge na nda ge ame hateya ge taa ge maa ge num mbo ya dagre ma, àa waɗ mbo ge zok ge àa doo van no ne zì.
41005041	Wan van kale tok, jan ne go: Talita kumi! Ne pe wanna go: Van kale, mbi jan mo go mo ɗege digi!
41005042	Ge sok mbe go gaw, van kale za̰a̰me digi, ɗege gaa mboya, ago kaa ge del wol pɔgwa zi. Sok ge àa kuwa ano mbe no go, àa daa gwan kuwa fare ge janna to, àa gaa kee ajab.
41005043	Zeso hoɗ num na wa ndaa kaka go, ne kaa ge ndu a̰me ɗu za̰a̰ fare mbe to. Gwan jan num go, num ho̰ van kale mbe kaŋ zam.
41006001	Zeso ɗege ge suwal Kapernawom go, gwan mbo ge Nazareɗ yà, suwal ga̰a̰l ge na do̰o̰ ge ne diŋ. Ne nda ge ame hateya ma ka kàre ne pe.
41006002	Sok ge dwam sabaɗ mbiya go, Zeso ɗege hate fare ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way zì. Ɓase ge ka za̰a̰ ne ma ka kee ajab, àa ka janna go: See na fare mbe ma ge dii ya de? See na andaŋ mbe ge dii ya de? See na pool ge kee kaŋ ajab mbe ma ge dii ya me de?
41006003	Daa be ndu ge pel zok pagal ge Mari van, ge Jak, Joze, Jude mage Simo̰ ma na̰ van ne no to de? Ne na̰ van ge gwale ma daa ne ge nè buwal zì no peɗ ɓade? A ano mbe ma ee num ne go, num ho fareba ge ne ta to.
41006004	Ɗaŋɗe, Zeso jan num go: Nda ge zwagre Dok wa seɗ hormo seɗ ge sok gegene ma go peɗ. Seɗ hormo to ɗeŋew ge na suwal diŋ, ge na sele ma buwal zì, ge na zok diŋ me.
41006005	Be daa gwan kee kaŋ ajab a̰me ge ɗogle ma ge sok mbe go to, ɗeŋew kee kaɗeya ge nda ge kee tuguɗi a̰me ma pagal, zo̰o̰ num no.
41006006	Kee ajab ge hoɗ fareba to ge num way pe. Guwa̰, n̰a num, ɗege gaa mbo hate nda ge suwal van ge jiyale ge no ge suwal Nazareɗ ziya go ma diŋ peɗ me.
41006007	Ge dwam a̰me go ɗu, Zeso tol na nda ge ame hateya ge wol pɔgwa zi ma ya, ee pe jan num go, num mbo ta pe go zi zi mbo oy fare. Hon num pool ge yan on̰om ge sone ma.
41006008	Sok mbe go, hoɗ num na wa go: Ne kaa ge ḛ he a̰me ge ḛ tok go ge vin̰a pe to, koo kaŋ zam, koo galam ge mbo gɔswal, koo bware kàal, ḛ hee calaŋ ɗeŋew.
41006009	Ḛ pa tyako ma ge ḛ ko zì. Ɗaŋɗe, ne kaa ge ḛ ɔwabe ba̰a̰ kanna ma zi to.
41006010	Gwan jan num go: Suwal ge diige ge ḛ mbo mbo ya ge ne diŋ, zok ge mbo ame ḛ ya, ḛ kaa ne diŋ ɗiŋ ḛ dwam waɗ zum go.
41006011	Kaɗɗa nda ge suwal mbe diŋ-ge ma ame ḛ ya to, àa za̰a̰ ḛ to me, ḛ wuwa zum ge sok mbe go. Ge sok waɗ zum ge ḛ ḛ go, ḛ poy ḛ ko kuci ma ndwa sayda ho̰o̰l ge num pagal.
41006012	Guwa̰ go, nda ge ame hateya ma mbo oy fare ge Dok ne ge nda ta, àa ka jan num go: Ḛ seŋe ta se, ḛ eya ḛ kaŋ keeya ma.
41006013	Àa yan on̰om ge sone ma gḛḛ ge nda zì. Àa ka naŋe nda ge kee tuguɗi ma nùm, nda gḛḛ ka seɗ zonna me.
41006014	Ge sok mbe go, gan ga̰a̰l Heroɗ mbo ya za̰a̰ fare ge Zeso ne, ge dape, ne dḭḭl tol-la ge sok ma go peɗ. Nda ka janna go: Yohana ba ge kee nda baptem ta̰a̰ ne ge nda ge swày ma buwal zì ya, a ge pe, see pool ge kee kaŋ ajab mbe ma no.
41006015	Nda a̰me ma ka janna go ne Eli ne, ge cùb ma, ne ndu ge zwagre Dok wa ne, ge mojo̰o̰ nda ge zwagre Dok wa gegene ge wal ma go.
41006016	Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge Heroɗ za̰a̰ fare mbe go, jan go: A Yohana mbe ge dee ka kee nda baptem ge mbi kṵṵ ne pagal ta̰a̰ ne ge swày se ya.
41006017	Duwa fare mbe no ge dape, a ne sḛ wa̰a̰ Yohana, ba ge kee nda baptem ne, doo ne ge daŋay zì no feɗɗa se ge zul. A ge ne na̰ van Filib gwale Herodiyaɗ ge ne sḛ hê ne pe.
41006018	Ago Yohana ka jan ne go: Àa be hon vin̰a go mo he mo na̰ van gwale to.
41006019	Herodiyaɗ, gwale ge Heroɗ hê ne, wa̰a̰ Yohana ge na laa zì ge fare mbe pe, ka ɓyare vin̰a go na hṵṵ ne gezi. Ɗaŋɗe, be seɗ vin̰a to.
41006020	Ago, gan ga̰a̰l Heroɗ ka hon Yohana ga̰a̰l, kaa ge kuwaya go ne ndu ge temel ne, ne kaɗ ndu ge harcal ne me. Ka eyan ne gezi ge yal ma go, sok ge kaɗ za̰a̰ ne fare ma go, kaɗ ge iigiya ma ge na zì. Go no puy ɗe, kaɗ ge ene ge gwan ka za̰a̰ ne.
41006021	Dwam a̰me go ɗu, Herodiyaɗ seɗ vin̰a ge kwaɗa ndwa kee laa ɓyareya ge na ne, ge dape, kaa vḛḛso dwam tolla ge gan ga̰a̰l Heroɗ ne. Heroɗ kee kaŋ zam vḛḛso ge na dwam tolla pe. Tol ga̰a̰l ge kee tèmel ge na ma ya: Asagar ma ga̰a̰l ma ɓanna ge nda ga̰a̰l ge pwal ge suwa Galile go ma peɗ me.
41006022	Ge sok kee vḛḛso mbe go, Herodiyaɗ van ge gwale waɗ-ɗa zì, ɗege ndal kaŋ, ne kaŋ ndalla mbe kee Heroɗ mage na nda ge na too num ya ma sḛ tii. Ge sok mbe go gaw, gan ga̰a̰l jan van gwale mbe go: Ele mbi kaŋ ge mo ɓyare, mbi mà mbo hon mo ne.
41006023	Guni tene ge ɓase ma ndwa go, jan van gwale mbe go: Kaŋ ge mo mà ele mbi ne ya, mbi mà hon mo ne. Koo ne kaa ge go mbi caɗe mo mbi muluk lee ɗu puy, mbi mà caɗe mo ne.
41006024	Sok ge za̰a̰ fare mbe go, van gwale mbe waɗ-ɗa na na̰ ta zum, jan ne go: Mbi ele da de? Gwan ge ne janna go: Mbo jan ne go: «Mbi ɓyare Yohana ba ge kee nda baptem pagal.»
41006025	Haa tene gwan ge gan ga̰a̰l ta, jan ne go: Mbi ɓyare go, mo ho̰ mbi ya ge sego Yohana ba ge kee nda baptem pagal ge bugur go.
41006026	Sok ge za̰a̰ fare mbe go, gan ga̰a̰l mbo ya wan kiimi ge dape, be kaɗ ge dwaɗɗa ge hun Yohana to. Ɗaŋɗe, ge ne gunin̰a ge guni tene ge na nda ge na too num ya ma ndwa go pe ɗe, daa be gwan eya fare to.
41006027	Avun cab, teme asagar ɗu, hoɗ ne na wa go, ne gene na Yohana ba ge kee nda baptem pagal ya.
41006028	Asagar mbe mbo, mbo vyan Yohana pagal ge daŋay zì ya, gene ne ya ge bugur go. Hon van gwale mbe ne, ne sḛ ame ne mbo hon na na̰ ne me.
41006029	Sok ge nda ge ame hateya ge Yohana ne ma za̰a̰ fare mbe go, àa mbo ya hee ne duul, àa mbo mbul ne.
41006030	Zeso nda ge temeya ma gwan-na ge ne ta, àa wan ne kaŋ ge maa kê ma pe peɗ, ge kaŋ ge maa hate nda num ya ma peɗ me.
41006031	Jan num go: Ajo̰o̰ nda mbo ya mbi ta mage gwanna gḛḛ go ɗe, nè seɗ vin̰a ge zam kaŋ to. Ɓyare go ḛ mbo gezi yà kaal nde, ḛ wa seɗ vin̰a ge ɗigli ta.
41006032	Àa kan ta mbo ndee ge faa go ndwa mbo gezi yà kaal, ge sok ge ndu no ge ne go to yà.
41006033	Nda gḛḛ kuwa num mboya, àa kuwa tyatyaɗ go ne num ne, àa chiya ge suwal ga̰a̰l ma diŋ ya peɗ, àa mbo deɗ ge Zeso mage na nda ge ame hateya ma ndwa zḛḛ yà.
41006034	Sok ge ka̰a̰ na ko ge faa se ya digi, kan na ndwa kuwa nda tabeya didib, àa kaɗ dinna ge tame ge be ba ge koy maa ma go, kuwa num a̰se, ee pe hate num fare ma gḛḛ me.
41006035	Ajo̰o̰ sok kale ya, gyala gaa guwa ge dinna, ne nda ge ame hateya ma gwan ta ya ne ta, àa jan ne go: Sok mbe babur ne, ndu ge ne go to, sok kee ya gasamal.
41006036	N̰a num, num mbo ge suwal van ge jiyale ge ne ziya go ge ma yà, ge gaaso ma zì me, ndwa mbo ɓyare maa kaŋ zam ma yaɗɗa.
41006037	Zeso gwan ge num janna go: Ḛ sḛ ma ge ḛ pagal, ḛ ho̰ num kaŋ zam ne. Ɗaŋɗe, àa gwan ge ne eleya go: Mo dwaɗ go i mà yaɗ dupḛ ja ndwa silay saal kikis zi puy no, mà mbyaɗ num zamma de?
41006038	Sok mbe go, gwan ge num fare eleya go: Ḛ dupḛ ma go gyana ga de? Ḛ mbo ndilla gale. Àa mbo, àa gwan-na jan ne go: I go ge dupḛ ma nuwan̰, sini ma zi me.
41006039	Guwa̰ go, hoɗ na nda ge ame hateya ma na wa go, num ee nda se kàɗɗa vaaya popolow ge sugu tɔgwal pagal.
41006040	Àa sare ta se kàɗɗa nda ge kis ma, nda ge warnuwan̰ ma me.
41006041	Zeso ɔwabe dupḛ ge nuwan̰ mbe ma ɓanna ge sini ge zi ma, hee na ndwa pḭḭ digi kee mersi ge kaŋ zam mbe pe. Siɗi dupḛ ma se, hon na nda ge ame hateya ma num ndwa go, num vaa ɓase ma. Guwa̰ go, hon num sini ge zi ma, àa vaa ta num ge maa buwal zì peɗ waɗme.
41006042	Ndu ge diige zam kaŋ huriya.
41006043	Àa ɔwabe dupḛ mage sini pe ge gaa ma huy gwal wol pɔgwa zi.
41006044	Ge nda ge zâ kaŋ mbe ma buwal zì, nda soɗob kaa dudubu nuwan̰.
41006045	Guwa̰ go cab, Zeso jan na nda ge ame hateya ma go num ndee ge faa go, num ha ge na ndwa zḛḛ, mbo Betsayda, ge mam wa lee gene yà. Na sḛ wa gaa n̰a ɓase ma mboya.
41006046	Guwa̰ ge n̰a ɓase ma go, ndee mbo ge njal pagal digi ndwa mbo kee kaɗeya.
41006047	Sok ge ɗaal wuwa ya se, faa ga̰a̰l deɗ-ɗa ge mam tuwal zum yà, Zeso sḛ gaa yà ne mḛḛya hini ɗu ge wa kal digi.
41006048	Kuwa go na nda ge ame hateya ma za̰a̰ go yal ge sok ɗiibi faa go, ge dape, sa̰a̰m ka ya ge num ndwa zì. Lee aaram pagal sok mbo ge num ta yà, ka mboya ge mam pagal, yan ge num ta yà guwa, ka ɓyare ge mojo̰o̰ na kale num kale go.
41006049	Sok ge àa kuwa ne mboya ge mam pagal, àa ka dwaɗɗa go ne kḭḭ a̰me ne, àa ɗege oyya ge ka̰a̰l ndaal.
41006050	Ago, num sḛ ma peɗ kuwa ne, voo wan num, àa haɗ digi batraŋ. Ge sok mbe go gaw, Zeso jan num go: A mbi ne, ḛ ee ḛ dul wa se, ḛ chiya voo to.
41006051	Guwa̰ go, ndee ge num ta faa go, sa̰a̰m eyal se me. Àa ka kee ajab gḛḛ ge maa sḛ zì.
41006052	Ago, àa be wan kaŋ ngayya ge dupḛ ma way pe to, ge dape, num dul wa ma twagre twagre.
41006053	Sok ge àa dee ge mangaɗam ga̰a̰l wa lee gene ya ge suwa ge Jenezareɗ ne go, àa yabe faa ya wa kal zì.
41006054	Sok ge àa ka̰a̰ maa ko ge faa se ya digi, nda kuwa gaw go ne Zeso ne.
41006055	Sok ma peɗ ge nda ka za̰a̰ ya go ne go, àa chiya ge suwal ma ya peɗ, àa ka gene ne nda ge kee tuguɗi ma ya, ge maa kaŋ fiiya ma go.
41006056	Sok ma peɗ ge Zeso ka mbo ge num go ma, suwal van ge jiyale ma, suwal ge ga̰a̰l ma koo ge gaaso ma zì, nda ka gene maa nda ge kee tuguɗi ma ya eeya ge sok ge nda kaɗ twageya ge num go ma go. Àa ka gwarge ta ge ne ta go, ne n̰a nda ge kee tuguɗi ma taɗ na ba̰a̰ wa go nde. Num peɗ ge ka taɗ ne ba̰a̰ wa ma ka seɗ zonna me.
41007001	Dwam a̰me go ɗu, Farisi ma ɓanna ge nda a̰me ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma ɗege ge Jerusalem ya, àa mbo ya ge Zeso ta.
41007002	Ge sok mbe go, àa kuwa ne nda ge ame hateya a̰me ma zam dupḛ be usi maa tok ma ge mojo̰o̰ maa hada ee go to.
41007003	Ago Farisi ma ɓanna ge Yahuɗ ma peɗ, be ge àa usi maa tok ma gezi kɔn̰al yaɗaɗ to ɗe, àa zam kaŋ zam to, ge dape, àa mḛḛ maa ko ge kaŋ keeya ge maa baŋ ma way ma pagal.
41007004	Sok ge àa gwan ge sok kee suk ma ya, àa gale haɗ ta kɔn̰al yaɗaɗ ɓiya, àa wa ɗege zam kaŋ zam go. Àa ka hon kaŋ keeya ge maa baŋ ma way ge ɗogle ma hormo waɗme, dinna ge kob ma, kṵṵri ma ɓanna ge seɗe ge fool kàal ma usiya ma go.
41007005	Ge sok mbe go, Farisi ma ɓanna ge Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma ele ne go: Ge dape, mo nda ge ame hateya ma wa ka mboya ge nè baŋ ma kaŋ keeya ma pagal to de? Ge dape, àa wa ka zam kaŋ be usi maa tok ma ge mojo̰o̰ nè hada ma ee go to de?
41007006	Zeso gwan ge num janna go: Ezay jin̰a fare ge ka̰a̰l ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma way mbe ge ḛ pagal tem, nda ge mbuɗi nda ndwa ma! Dok jin̰a go: «Pe rusu mbe uware mbi ge na wa wala boo, Ɗaŋɗe, ne dul wa kaal ge mbi.
41007007	Àa uware mbi bàŋ kay, Ago àa hate eeya ge nda duwana ma way ma, Dinna ge mojo̰o̰ num mbi wa yuwaleya ma ne go.»
41007008	Go no, ḛ n̰a wa yuwaleya ge Dok ne ya gezi, ḛ gaa mḛḛ ḛ ko go ge hateya ge nda duwana ma way ma ne pagal.
41007009	Gwan jan num go: Ajo̰o̰ ḛ ha̰a̰le ta ya koy kaŋ keeya ge ḛ baŋ ma way ma, ḛ seŋe wa yuwaleya ge Dok ne ya ḛ guwa̰.
41007010	Ago Moyiz jin̰a go: «Ho̰ mo ba mage mo na̰ hormo. Ndu ge mbo sal na ba koo na na̰ ya, a ngaɗ go àa hṵṵ ne gezi.»
41007011	Ɗaŋɗe ḛ sḛ ma ɗe, ḛ hate nda go: Kaɗɗa ndu jan na ba koo na na̰ ya go: Kaŋ ge mbiya mbi mbaa mo ge ne, a Korba̰, ndwa go a bobo ge mbi ee ne ge Dok pe ne.
41007012	Kaɗɗa ḛ n̰a ne ya keeya mbe go, ne sḛ seɗ vin̰a ge mbaa na ba koo na na̰ to,
41007013	go mbe no, ḛ ho̰ ga̰a̰l kaŋ keeya ge ḛ baŋ ma way ma, ḛ kee tèmel ge eeya ge ḛ baŋ ma way ma ne pagal, ḛ n̰a fare ge Dok ne ya deɗ-ɗa se. Ḛ gwan kee kaŋ ge ɗogle ge go mbe ma pe go gḛḛ, ndwa ɗeŋre eeya ge ḛ baŋ ma way ma ne digi.
41007014	Guwa̰, gwan tol ɓase ma ya, jan num go: Ḛ peɗ ḛ za̰a̰ mbi, ḛ kuwa fare mbe no gezi kwaɗa.
41007015	Kaŋ ge haɗ ndu duwana seŋre ge Dok ndwa se, a be kaŋ ge mbo ge zum, waɗ ge ne wa zì to, ɗaŋɗe, a fare ge ndage no ge ne wa zì ya zum.
41007016	Kaɗɗa ḛ ge tɔgwa ge za̰a̰ fare mbe ma, ḛ za̰a̰ num kwaɗa .
41007017	Sok ge Zeso n̰a ɓase ma, gwan mbo ge diŋ yà, ne nda ge ame hateya ma ele ne fare ge fare sḭḭ mbe pagal.
41007018	Jan num go: Ḛ sḛ ma puy, ḛ wan fare mbe pe zane to no me de? Kaŋ ge ndu zam ne, haɗ ne seŋre to. Ḛ wan ano mbe no pe to ɗaŋ de?
41007019	Ago, mbo ge ne dul wa zì yà to, ɗaŋɗe, mbo ge ne laa zì, ndu mbe gwan gaa mbo en ne njoo gezi yà. Ge fare mbe ma no ta, Zeso jin̰a zum waŋ go, kaŋ zam ma peɗ harcal ge zamma.
41007020	Gwan jan num go iya: Kaŋ ge ndage no ge ndu duwana wa zì ya, a ne haɗ ne seŋre ne.
41007021	Ago, a ge dul wa ge ndu duwana ne zì ya, dwaɗɗa ge sone ge ee ndu kaɗ: Gwale ge zam tene, chel kaŋ ma, hun swày ma,
41007022	kee zina ma, kee ene ge bware pe ma, kee laa pisil ma, mbuɗi nda ndwa ma, kee batraŋ ma, kee ene ge mo sele kaŋ pe ma, jan fare ge sone kakatag ma, kee pagal ga̰a̰l ma, jan fare ge dàle ma, ndage ya zum no.
41007023	Kaŋ ge sone mbe ma no peɗ, àa num ndage ne ge ndu duwana zì ya, àa haɗ ne seŋre ne me.
41007024	Zeso ɗege ge sok mbe go, mbo ge suwa ge Tir ne yà. Waɗ ge zok a̰me diŋ ɗu, ɓyare go ndu a̰me ɗu kaa ge ne kuwaya to, ɗaŋɗe, ne vin̰a ge kaɗ wayya ge nda duwana ma ndwa zḛḛ baba to.
41007025	-
41007026	Gwale a̰me ɗu ge za̰a̰ fare ge Zeso ne faaya, ne van ge gwale kaa ge on̰om ge sone ge na zì. Mbo ya guu na ko ge Zeso ndwa se, jan ne go: Mbi kaɗe mo kaɗe, yin̰a on̰om ge sone ge mbi van ge gwale zì gezi nde. Ne sḛ mbe van Grek ne, too ge Siri go, ge suwa ge Fenesi ne go.
41007027	Zeso jan ne go: N̰a nda jabso ge zok diŋ-ge ma, num zâ kaŋ zam huri ta ne gale ɓiya. Be kee kwaɗa ge go, àa hee kaŋ zam ge nda jabso way, àa dol juu van ma ne to.
41007028	Gwale mbe gwan ge ne janna go: Bagezok-goo, ge mojo̰o̰ mo jin̰a no go tem, ɗaŋɗe, juu van ge no ge taabul pe se ma, àa zam kaŋ zam ge fwage no ge nda jabso tok digi ma zam.
41007029	Ge sok mbe go, jan ne go: Ge fare janna ge amo mbe no ta, guwa̰ mbo mo yà, on̰om ge sone ndage ya yà zum ge mo van ge gwale zì gezi.
41007030	Sok ge guwa̰ ge na diŋ yà, seɗ na van ge gwale se fiiya cɔgwaɗ ge saŋal go, on̰om ge sone ndage ya zum ge ne zì.
41007031	Zeso gwan ɗege ge suwa ge Tir ne go, kale mboya ge suwal ge Sido̰ mage Dekapol ndwa go suwal ga̰a̰l ge wol ma pagal, mbo ya ge mangaɗam ga̰a̰l ge Galile ne wa go.
41007032	Àa gene ne gisil a̰me ge ɗel taɗɗa ya ɗu, àa kaɗe ne go, ne ke kaɗeya ge ne pagal ndwa go ne wa seɗ zonna.
41007033	Ge sok mbe go, wan ne ge ɓase ma buwal zì ya zum gezi caɗ, paa na tok van ma ge ne tɔgwa pul ma zì, guwa̰, kee watwa ge na tok go, taɗ ne ɗel ge ne me.
41007034	Guwa̰ go, hee na ndwa pḭḭ digi, kan on̰om, jan go me: Efata, ne pe wanna go: «Hage tene gezi.»
41007035	Ge sok mbe go gaw, ne tɔgwa ma hage, ne ɗel saa se, ɗege faaya gezi kɔn̰al yaɗaɗ me.
41007036	Zeso hoɗ num na wa go, ne kaa ge num jin̰a fare mbe zum to. Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge a ka dwage num fare mbe janna go puy ɗe, num sḛ ma gwan ka dasare ne se janna zḛḛ zḛḛ ge nda ta.
41007037	Àa ka kee ajab gḛḛ waɗeya ge ne kaŋ ngayya ge ne ka kee num ma pe peɗ. Àa ka janna go: Koo gisil ma, koo nda ge ɗel taɗɗa ma puy, ee num faa wa me ba!
41008001	Ge dwam a̰me ge ɗogle go, ɓase ma gwan-na twageya nɔnɔg ge Zeso ta, kaŋ zam be kaɗ go karag ge ɓase mbe ma pe to. Zeso tol na nda ge ame hateya ma, jan num go:
41008002	Mbi ɓyare ngay kuwa a̰se ge ambi ge ɓase mbe ma ta, ge dape, màno àa kee ya dwam taa ge mbi ziya be a̰me zam.
41008003	Kaɗɗa mbi n̰a num mboya camal, àa seɗ pool ge mbo deɗ diŋ yà mà to, ago a̰me ge num buwal zige ma ɗege ge sok kaal ya.
41008004	Ne nda ge ame hateya ma gwan ge ne janna go: Nda mbe ma no ɗem, nè kee mà pe gyana, nè wa seɗ kaŋ zam ge mbyaɗ num, ge sok babur mbe no go de?
41008005	Zeso ele num go: Ḛ go ge dupḛ ma gyana ga de? Àa gwan ge ne janna go: I go ge dupḛ ma ɓỳala.
41008006	Ge sok mbe go, hoɗ ɓase ma na wa go, num kaa maa pe suwa se. Guwa̰, hee dupḛ ge ɓỳala mbe ma, kee mersi hon Dok, siɗi num se, hon na nda ge ame hateya ma num, ndwa go num vaa ɓase ma. Àa ame, àa kee tem ge mojo̰o̰ ne jin̰a maa go.
41008007	Àa kaa ge sini van a̰me ma kwaɗa lag, guwa̰ ge Zeso kê mersi ge num pe go, jan go: Ḛ ame, ḛ gwan vaa ɓase ma.
41008008	Àa zam kaŋ zam mbyaɗɗa, ne nda ma kwate kaŋ zam pe ge gaa ma gwal pul ɓỳala.
41008009	Nda ge kaa sok mbe go zam kaŋ ma, ɓase ge num way mbo guwa ge dudubu ndà go. Guwa̰ go, Zeso n̰a num mboya.
41008010	Guwa̰ ge n̰a num go gaw, ndee ge faa go ɓanna ge na nda ge ame hateya ma, àa mbo ge suwa ge Dalmanuta ne yà.
41008011	Farisi ma zuɗ ge sok a̰me ya ɗu, àa ɗege pee ta ge Zeso. Sok ɓyare hee ne pe go, àa ele ne go, ne ke maa kaŋ ngayya a̰me ɗu ge ngay go ne pool mbe mbo ge Dok ta ya.
41008012	Kan on̰om, jan go: Ge dape, nda ge doŋ pe mbe ge go ma wa ka eleya go, àa ke maa kaŋ ngayya a̰me ɗu de? Fareba, mbi jan ḛ ne no, àa mbo kee kaŋ ngayya a̰me ge nda ge doŋ pe mbe ge mà no ma pe to.
41008013	Guwa̰ n̰a num, gwan ndee faa go, haa mbo ge mam wa lee gene yà.
41008014	Nda ge ame hateya ma vyale ya be hee dupḛ ma ge maa tok go. Ɗaŋɗe, àa kaa ge dupḛ melaw ɗu ge maa pe faa go.
41008015	Zeso hoɗ num na wa, jan num go: Ḛ koy ta kwaɗa ge jìn̰al hore ge Farisi ma way ta, ge gan ga̰a̰l Heroɗ ne ta me.
41008016	Ge sok mbe go, ne nda ge ame hateya ma ka jan ta ge ta buwal zì go: Ne sḛ jan fare mbe ge nè no be dupḛ ge nè tok go to pe de?
41008017	Kuwa fare ge àa jan ta ne no ge ta buwal zì, jan num go: Ge dape, ḛ wa ka jan ta go, ḛ be dupḛ de? Ḛ zane gale kuwa fare mbe go to no de? Ḛ wan ne pe to me de? Ḛ dul wa ma twagre twagre de?
41008018	Ḛ ndwa ma kuwa sok kuwa ɗer ɓade? Ḛ tɔgwa ma za̰a̰ fare za̰a̰ ɗer ɓade? Ḛ pagal ma dwaɗ fare dwaɗ ɗer ɓade?
41008019	Sok ge mbi ka siɗi dupḛ ge nuwan̰ ma se, ge nda ge dudubu nuwan̰ ma pe, ḛ kwate kaŋ pe ge gaa ma digi gwal pul gyana ga de? Àa gwan ge ne janna go: I kwate num digi gwal pul wol pɔgwa zi.
41008020	Sok ge mbi ka siɗi dupḛ ge ɓỳala ma se, ge nda ge dudubu ndà ma pe, ḛ kwate kaŋ pe ge gaa se ma digi gwal pul gyana ga iya de? Àa gwan ge ne janna go: I kwate num digi gwal pul ɓỳala.
41008021	Zeso jan num go: O̰o̰ kaɗɗa na mbe go ɗe, ḛ gale wan fare mbe ma pe go to no de?
41008022	Zeso mage na nda ge ame hateya ma ɗege mbo suwal Betsayda. Sok ge àa dee yà, nda a̰me ma gene ne ndu ge ɓaal ya, àa kaɗe ne go, ne taa ne ge na tok, ndwa go ne wa seɗ zonna.
41008023	Zeso wan ndu ge ɓaal mbe tok, gene ne ge suwal guwa̰ zum yà. Guwa̰, kee watwa ge na tok wa go, kee ne, ne ndwa ma zì, kan na tok ma ge ne pagal, ele ne go: Mo kuwa sok go de?
41008024	Hage na ndwa zum, jan go: Mbi kuwa nda go, ɗaŋɗe, àa dinna ge ɔwara ma go, àa ka mboya me.
41008025	Gwan ee na tok ge ne ndwa ma go, ɓaal seɗ zonna, gaa kuwa sok ge zum yà kaal.
41008026	Sok mbe go, jan ne go: Guwa̰ mbo ge mo yà, ne kaa ge mo wuwa ge suwal mbe zok buwal zì yà to.
41008027	Zeso mage na nda ge ame hateya ma ka mbo dagre ge suwal van ge jiyale ge no suwa ge Sezare ge Filib ne ziya guguwa ma diŋ. Ge sok mboya go, ele num no go: Nda ele ta ge mbi pe go, mbi huɗi ne de?
41008028	Àa gwan ge ne janna go: Nda a̰me ma jan go go, mo Yohana ba ge kee nda baptem ne, gegene ma go, mo Eli ne, ge ɗogle ma me ɗe, mo ɗu ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma buwal zige ne.
41008029	Ele num go: Ḛ sḛ ma jan go mbi huɗi ne de? Piyer gwan ge ne janna go: Mo Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne, Ndu ge Dok taa nee ne.
41008030	Ge sok mbe go, mḛḛre num ndaa kaka go, ne kaa ge num jin̰a ndu a̰me fare ge na pe mbe zum to.
41008031	Sok mbe go, Zeso ee pe hate na nda ge ame hateya ma fare, jan num go: Mbiya go, Mbi, Van ge Ndu ne, mbi za̰a̰ yal gḛḛ, Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme num ma, ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way mage Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma kuri ne gezi, ne see swày, ge dwam taa guwa̰, ne ta̰a̰ digi me.
41008032	Ka jan num fare mbe ma no ge kɔn̰al go waŋ. Ge sok mbe go, Piyer wan ne ya zum gezi caɗ, jan ne go: «Ɓyare go mo jin̰a fare ge go mbe ma to.»
41008033	Ɗaŋɗe, seŋe tene se, ndil na nda ge ame hateya ma, mḛḛre Piyer ol kekeŋ, jan ne go: Wa̰a̰ tene gezi yà kaal ge mbi, Saytan, ago mo dwaɗɗa ma be dwaɗɗa ge Dok ne ma ne to, ɗaŋɗe, àa dwaɗɗa ge nda duwana ma way ma ne.
41008034	Guwa̰ go, tol ɓase ma ɓanna ge na nda ge ame hateya ma, jan num go: Kaɗɗa ndu ɓyare mbo ya ge mbi pe go, ne duwa tene to, ne he dṵṵl ge in na kaŋre, ne kàre mbi pe me.
41008035	Ago, ndu ge diige ge mbo kaɗ-ɗa ka kwacware tene ge ndwa ge na ne, mbo ban ne gezi. Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge diige ge mbo hon tene ya gezi ge mbi pe, ge Fare ge Kwaɗa ge ambi pe me, mbo seɗ ndwa ge fareba.
41008036	Kaɗɗa ndu duwana seɗ kaŋ gan ge suwa pagal ma ya mɔɗwag, kaɗ go ne ban ndwa ge na ne gezi no, mbaa ne ge da de?
41008037	Mbo hon da ge mbiya ɗoo, wa gwan seɗ ndwa ge na ne mbe ya de?
41008038	Ago ndu a̰me ge mbo ngwabe tene ya, be kee sayda ge ambi, ge doŋ pe ge nda ge mbo laa ɓyareya ge Dok ne pagal to ma mage sone keeya ma buwal zì, mbi, Van ge Ndu ne, mbo wan ne ndwa ge daŋso waɗme ge dwam gwanna ge na ne ya go, ge pateya ge na Ba ne zì ɓanna ge malayka ge harcal ma.
41009001	Gwan jan num go iya: Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no, nda ge no ge sego sok mbe go ma, a̰me ge num buwal zige ma mbo suu to, zḛḛ ge go num kuwa Dok kee muluk ge na ne ge pool ɓaŋlaŋ.
41009002	Guwa̰ ge dwam kale menengal go, Zeso wan Piyer, Jak mage Yohana, mbo ge num ge njal a̰me ge haal pagal digi yà, gezi yà hini caɗ ge nda ge ɓase ma ta. Ge sok mbe go, ne diir mbo ya eya ge num ndwa zì.
41009003	Ne ba̰a̰ ma seŋe saal taɗag, seeya cicim ge go ndu a̰me ge no ge suwa pagal, ge mbyaɗ usi ba̰a̰, wa haɗ saal taɗag ge ne pe go to.
41009004	Àa tan ta ge Eli mage Moyiz wa ya siɗigi fare ge Zeso.
41009005	Ge sok mbe go, Piyer hee fare, jan Zeso go: Rabbi, ndwa go Ba ge hateya, a kwaɗa ge nè kaɗ go go, nè ɗùu gur ma taa, ɗu ge mo pe, ɗu ge Moyiz pe, ɗu ge Eli pe me.
41009006	A ndwa go, be seɗ fare ge na janna to, ge dape, voo wa̰a̰ ne gḛḛ ɓanna ge na ka̰a̰m ge zi ma.
41009007	Guwa̰, pḭḭ a̰me mbo ya kulbi num se, ge pḭḭ mbe zì ya, àa za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l a̰me janna go: Ndu mbe no, a mbi Van ne, mbi laa wa̰a̰ ne gḛḛ, ḛ ke tèmel ne fare janna ma pagal.
41009008	Boo go helo, nda ge ame hateya ma ndil sok ge maa ziya ɗe, nda ge zi ma to, ɗaŋɗe, Zeso gaa ya ne hini ɗu mḛḛya ge num ziya.
41009009	Sok ge àa ka ndee ge njal pagal digi ya se go, Zeso hoɗ num na wa ge kaŋ ge num kuwa ya pagal go, ne kaa ge num jin̰a ne zum ge ndu a̰me ta to, ɗiŋ ge go mbi, Van ge Ndu ne, gale ta̰a̰ ne ɓiya ge nda ge swày ma buwal zì.
41009010	Àa koy fare mbe cɔgwaɗ, ɗaŋɗe, àa ka ele ta ge ta buwal zì go: Tanna ge nda ge swày ma buwal zì, ge ne sḛ jin̰a ne no, ne pe wanna gyana de?
41009011	Guwa̰, àa ele ne fare mbe no go: Ge dape, Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma wa ka janna go, Eli mbo mbo ya zḛḛ gale ne ɓiya de?
41009012	Gwan ge num janna go: A fareba, Eli mbo mbo ya zḛḛ gale ne ɓiya ndwa nuusi kaŋ ma peɗ ge maa byalam go. Mbi ele ḛ go, ge dape, Njaŋeya ge Dok ne ma wa jan fare ge mbi pagal go, Van ge Ndu ne mbo za̰a̰ yal ma gḛḛ, nda sen ne me de?
41009013	Ɗaŋɗe, mbi jan ḛ go, Eli mbo ya, àa kê ne yal ge maa laa ɓyareya pagal no tem, dinna ge Njaŋeya ge Dok ne ma wuwage fare ma ge ne pe go.
41009014	Sok ge Zeso mage na nda ge ame hateya ge taa ma dee ya ge maa ka̰a̰m gegene ma ta zì guwa, àa kuwa ɓase ma mḛḛya nɔnɔg ge num ziya. Àa ge Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma wa ya ka pee ta fare.
41009015	Sok ge ɓase ma kuwa Zeso gaw, àa kee ajab, àa chiya ge ne ndwa zì yà mbo kun ne.
41009016	Ele na nda ge ame hateya ma go: Ḛ ge num pee ta go, ge ma̰ fare pagal de?
41009017	Ndu a̰me gwan ge ne janna ge ɓase ma buwal zì ya go: Ba ge hateya, mbi gene mo ya mbi van ge no ge on̰om ge sone ge na zì. On̰om ge sone mbe tele ne be faa wa.
41009018	Ge sok ge diige ge deɗ ne go, dol ne ge suwa se, van wa ka zam hore gigib, ka sul na kin̰a, mbo ya twagre digi zayndaŋ me. Mbi kaɗe mo nda ge ame hateya ma no go, num yin̰a ne zum, num pool be mbyaɗ ge yan ne to.
41009019	Zeso jan num go: Nda ge be hoɗ fareba ma, mbi gaa kaɗ ge ḛ dagre ɗiŋ mbo diya ga de? Mbi in ḛ dṵṵl ma mbo diya ga me de? Ḛ gene mbi van mbe ya.
41009020	Àa gene ne ne ya. Sok ge on̰om mbe kuwa Zeso gaw, deɗ van mbe keeya, van mbe deɗ se, ka viŋri tene ge suwa zì, ne wa ka zam hore gigib.
41009021	Zeso ele ne ba go: Tuguɗi mbe see ne ma̰ del de? Gwan ge ne janna go: Ge ne jiyale ya day.
41009022	Ɗaɗag, on̰om mbe ka dol ne ge ol zì de, ge man se me de, ndwa ban ne gezi. Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa mo ge pool ge kee a̰me, kuwa i a̰se, mo chiya i kṵwa̰ me.
41009023	Zeso jan ne go: Ge dape, mo wa jan go, kaɗɗa mbi ge pool kee ano mbe no de, mbi jan mo ne no, kaŋ ma peɗ kee kee ge ndu ge hoɗ fareba ya pe.
41009024	Avun cab, van ba oy digi ge ka̰a̰l ndaal, jan go: Mbi hoɗ fareba ya go, chiya mbi kṵwa̰, mbi tuguɗi ge hoɗ fareba ge ambi zì.
41009025	Sok ge Zeso kuwa ɓase ma ya chiya ya ge maa ta, ngwabe on̰om ge sone mbe jan ne go: Mo on̰om mbe ge tele van be faa wa mage za̰a̰ fare, mbi hoɗ mo mbi wa no: Wuwa zum ge van mbe zì, daa gwan gwan-na waɗ ne zì to baɗ.
41009026	Ge sok mbe go gaw, on̰om mbe ee luuluu, ee van ndaɗɗa, waɗ zum ge ne zì. Van gaa dolla twagreya zayndaŋ ge mojo̰o̰ ndu ge suu suu go. Kaŋ mbe ge kee, ee nda gḛḛ janna go, van mbe suu suu.
41009027	Ɗaŋɗe, Zeso wan ne tok, ne sḛ ɗege ya digi mḛḛya.
41009028	Sok ge wuwa zok diŋ yà, ne nda ge ame hateya ma ele ne hini jan go: Ge dape i wa mbyaɗ yan on̰om mbe no zum to de?
41009029	Jan num go: On̰om ge mbuɗuɗum ge go mbe pe no, àa yan ne zum ge kaɗeya ta ɗeŋew.
41009030	Zeso mage na nda ge ame hateya ma ɗege ge sok mbe go, àa kale mboya ge Galile pagal, ne sḛ be ɓyare go ndu a̰me ɗu ne kuwa sok ge na no go to,
41009031	ge dape, ka hate na nda ge ame hateya ma. Sok hate num go, ka jan num go: Àa mbo ɓyan mbi, Van ge Ndu ne ge nda duwana ma tok go, nda mbe ma mbo hun mbi. Dwam taa guwa̰ ge mbi swày ne go, mbi mbo tan digi ge nda ge swày ma buwal zì.
41009032	Ɗaŋɗe, nda ge ame hateya mbe ma be ka wan fare janna mbe pe to, àa ka chiya voo ge ele ne fare me.
41009033	Zeso mage na nda ge ame hateya ma deɗ-ɗa ge suwal Kapernawom diŋ, sok ge àa wuwa ya ge zok diŋ, Zeso ele na nda ge ame hateya ma go: Ḛ ka pee ta daa ge vin̰a zì ya, ge ma̰ fare pagal de?
41009034	Àa kaɗ wa daal, ago àa ka pee ta ge vin̰a zì ya go, ne huɗi sḛ mbiya kaɗ ga̰a̰l ne maa buwal zì de?
41009035	Ge sok mbe go, kaɗ se, kwate na nda ge ame hateya ge wol pɔgwa zi ma ya ge na ta, jan num go: Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me ɓyare go na kaɗ ge nda ndwa zḛḛ, ne kaa ndu ge gaa nda pe dwab mage ndu ge kee tèmel hon na ka̰a̰m ne peɗ.
41009036	Wan van jiyale a̰me ya ɗu, ee ne mḛḛya ge maa tuwal zì. Guwa̰ ge bu ne ge na ta zì go, jan num go:
41009037	Ndu ge mbo ame van jiyale a̰me ya ɗu dinna ge ne sḛ mbe no go, ge na diŋ, ge mbi pe, ago ame mbi sḛ ge mbi pagal. Ndu ge ame mbi ya, be ame mbi sḛ ɗeŋew to, ame Ba ge teme mbi ya waɗme.
41009038	Yohana jan ne go: Ba ge hateya, i kuwa ndu a̰me ɗu ka yan on̰om ge sone ma zum ge mo dḭḭl, i ɓyare tele ne no, ge dape, kàre nè pe to.
41009039	Zeso jan ne go: Ḛ daa gwan tele ne to. Ago ndu a̰me ge kee kaŋ ajab ge mbi dḭḭl, daa gwan jan fare a̰me ge sone ge mbi pagal guwa̰ avun cab to.
41009040	Ago, ndu ge sal tèmel ge ḛ kee ne no to, a ge nè pe go.
41009041	Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no: Ndu ge diige, ge mbo hon ḛ mam njoɗɗa ya kob ɗu, ge dape ḛ ge Krist, Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne ne ma ne, mbo seɗ tok kon̰a mbḛḛ.
41009042	Ge nda jabso ge ho fareba ge mbi ta ma buwal zì, ndu ge mbo ee a̰me ya ɗu deɗɗa ge sone zì, ne nde-nde ge àa vwal njal ga̰a̰l ge ne ka̰a̰l zì, àa dol ne ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam se yà.
41009043	Kaɗɗa sok a̰me ge mo duul ta ge kaŋ ge ee mo ne deɗɗa, koo ne kaa mo tok, kṵṵ ne gezi. A kwaɗa ge mo pe go mo seɗ ndwa ge fareba tok duul, ge go mo kaɗ ge mo tok ma jwàg, mo wa mbo waɗ ge sok njoɗ yal zì yà, sok ge ol piri to go.
41009044	[A sok ge chabso ge zam nda ma suu zì to ne, kaɗ sok ge ol piri zì to ne me.]
41009045	Kaɗɗa sok a̰me ge mo duul ta ge kaŋ ge ee mo ne deɗɗa, koo ne kaa mo ko, kṵṵ ne gezi. A kwaɗa ge mo pe go mo seɗ ndwa ge fareba ko duul, ge go mo kaɗ ge mo ko ma jwàg, mo wa mbo waɗ ge sok njoɗ yal zì, sok ge ol piri to.
41009046	[A sok ge chabso ge zam nda ma suu zì to ne, kaɗ sok ge ol piri zì to ne me.]
41009047	Kaɗɗa mo sok a̰me ge mo duul ta ge ee mo ne deɗɗa, koo ne kaa mo ndwa ee mo deɗ ge sone zì ne, zagle ne gezi. A kwaɗa ge mo pe ge mo mbo kaɗ dagre ge Dok ge ne muluk zì ndwa lee ɗu, ge go mo kaɗ ge mo ndwa ma jwàg, mo wa mbo waɗ ge sok njoɗ yal zì yà.
41009048	A sok ge chabso ge zam nda ma suu zì to ne, kaɗ sok ge ol piri zì to ne me.
41009049	Ago, àa mbo ɗiyage ndu ge diige ge ol, go mbe no, mbo kaɗ dinna ge kaŋ ge no ge nuwam ge na ndwa zì go.
41009050	Nuwam kaŋ ge kwaɗa ne, ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa nuwam ban camam ge na ne ya, a ge da ta ɗoo, ḛ wa mbo gwan ge ne camam ya iya de? Nuwam go ge ḛ buwal zì, go mbe no, ḛ kaa halas ge ta ta me.
41010001	Zeso ɗege ge sok mbe go, mbo ge suwa ge Jude ne yà, haa mbo mangaɗam Urdun wa lee gene yà. Ge sok mbe yà, ɓase ma gwan kwateya ge ne ta, ne sḛ ɗege hate num, ge na dana hate din go.
41010002	Farisi a̰me ma mbo ya ge ne ta ndwa hee ne pe, àa ele ne go: Vin̰a a̰me hage go ge eeya ge Moyiz ne ma pagal ge ndu son pe go ne yin̰a na gwale de?
41010003	Gwan ge num janna go: Moyiz ho ḛ na wa ge fare mbe pagal gyana de?
41010004	Àa jan ne go: Moyiz ho̰ vin̰a go àa njaŋe lawayta ge saa sanna ne, kaɗɗa ndu ɓyare yan na gwale.
41010005	Ne sḛ jan num go iya: A ge dul wa ndaa ge ḛ ḛ ma pe, Moyiz njaŋe ḛ wa yuwaleya mbe no.
41010006	Ɗaŋɗe, ge pe dolla ge kaŋ ma way go, Dok kee ndu son mage ndu gwale.
41010007	A ge pe no, ndu son mbo n̰a na ba mage na na̰, mbo mbarge ge na gwale,
41010008	num sḛ ma jwàg mbo seŋe ge ndu ɗu go. Go mbe no, àa daa nda zi to, ɗaŋɗe, àa gaa ge ndu ɗu go.
41010009	Ne kaa ge ndu saa kaŋ ge Dok vuwa ne to.
41010010	Sok ge àa mbo ya ge zok diŋ, ne nda ge ame hateya ma gwan ele ne fare, ge fare mbe pagal.
41010011	Jan num go: Ndu ge diige ge yan na gwale ya, gwan san ge ɗogle, kee zina .
41010012	Kaɗɗa ndu gwale n̰a na obe ya mbo san ge ɗogle, kee zina waɗme.
41010013	Nda a̰me ma gene Zeso nda jabso a̰me ma ya ndwa go ne ee na tok ma ge num pagal kee num wa tare . Ɗaŋɗe, ne nda ge ame hateya ma ɗege mḛḛre num.
41010014	Sok ge Zeso kuwa num go, ne laa hoɗ, jan num go: Ḛ n̰a nda jabso, num mbo ya ge mbi ta, ḛ kaa ge be tele num to. Ago, muluk ge Dok ne, a ge num ge dḭḭ ta ge nda jabso mbe ge go ma pe.
41010015	Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no: Ndu ge mbo gwan ge na pagal ya ge Dok pe se, dinna ge van jiyale go, ndwa go ne kee muluk na pagal, a ne sḛ ɗeŋew mbo waɗ ne muluk zì.
41010016	Guwa̰, wan nda jabso mbe ma ya ge na ta zì, ee na tok ma ge num pagal ɗu ge ɗu, kee num wa tare me.
41010017	Sok ge Zeso ɗege mboya, ndu a̰me ɗu chiya ya ne ndwa zì, mbo ya guu na ko ge ne ndwa se, ele ne go: Ba ge hateya ge kwaɗa, a ma̰ kaŋ ge mbiya mbi kee nee ne ndwa hon mbi vin̰a ge mbo kaɗ ge ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din ge Dok de?
41010018	Zeso jan ne go: Ge dape, mo wa tol mbi ndu ge kwaɗa de? Ndu a̰me ge kwaɗa ɗu to, ɗeŋew Dok.
41010019	Mo kuwa wa yuwaleya ma kuwa: Hṵṵ swày to, ke zina to, chee kaŋ to, ke sayda ge hày ge ndu pagal to, lase ndu a̰me wa, mo wa ame ne kaŋ to, ho̰ mo ba mage mo na̰ hormo.
41010020	Ndu mbe gwan ge ne janna go: Ba ge hateya, mbi mbo go num pagal peɗ ge mbi bogol ya day.
41010021	Zeso ndil ne ɗer, ne fare deɗ ge ne laa zì, gwan jan ne go: A̰me ɗu hoɗege mo go gale iya: Yiya mo kaŋ gan ma gezi mɔɗwag, va a̰se ma num bware mbe, go mbe no, mo mbo seɗ kaŋ gan ge pḭḭ ma zì yà. Guwa̰, mbo ya, mo kàre mbi pe me.
41010022	Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge ndu mbe za̰a̰ fare mbe ma go, ne ndwa mbo ya suu se leɗeɗ, daa za̰a̰ tii to, dol tene mboya, ago kaa gan njonjon̰.
41010023	Zeso ndil sok ge na ziya go, jan na nda ge ame hateya ma go. A haŋle ge go nda ge no ge kaŋ gan ma wuwa ge muluk ge Dok ne zì!
41010024	Nda ge ame hateya ma kee ajab ge ne fare janna mbe ma pe. Ɗaŋɗe, gwan jan num go: Mbi van ma, a haŋle ge go ndu wuwa ge muluk ge Dok ne zì.
41010025	A fogo waɗeya, ge jambal ge jujul zi waɗ ge libra ndwal zì, ge go ndu ge gan waɗ ge muluk ge Dok ne zì.
41010026	Àa gwan kee ajab waɗeya, àa ka jan ta, ge ta buwal zì go: Kaɗɗa na mbe go, a huɗi ge pool seɗ monna ne ɗaŋ de?
41010027	Zeso ndil num bàa, jan num go: Ano mbe ndil haŋle ge nda duwana ma ndwa zì, ɗaŋɗe, a haŋle ge Dok ta to, ge dape, a ge pool kee kaŋ ma peɗ.
41010028	Piyer ɗege jan ne go: O̰o̰, i n̰a kaŋ ma ya ya peɗ, i kàre mo pe ya no.
41010029	Zeso gwan ge ne janna go: Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no, ndu a̰me ɗu ge mbo n̰a na zok, na na̰ van ge soɗob ma, ge zaab ma, na na̰, na ba, na van ma, koo na sok ma ya ge mbi pe, ge Fare ge Kwaɗa pe,
41010030	ndu mbe mbo seɗ poɗɗa ndwa kis ge zaman ge màge no zì ndwa go zok ma, na̰ van ge soɗob ma, ge zaab ma, na̰ ma, van mage sok ma. Mbo za̰a̰ yal waɗme, ɗaŋɗe, mbo seɗ ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din ge zaman ge mbo no ya go.
41010031	Ɗaŋɗe, nda gḛḛ ge no zḛḛ ge sego ma mbo gwan guwa̰, ge no guwa̰ ya ge sego ma gḛḛ mbo seŋe ya zḛḛ me.
41010032	Guwa̰, Zeso mage na nda ge ka kàre na pe ma kan ta ge vin̰a go mbo Jerusalem. Ne sḛ ka mbo ge num ndwa zḛḛ, ne nda ge ame hateya ma kaa ge iigiya, ɓase ge ka kàre ne pe ma kaa ge voo me. Zeso gwan tol na nda ge ame hateya ge wol pɔgwa zi ma ya gezi iya, ɗege jan num fare ge mbo seɗ na ya ma.
41010033	Ḛ kuwa ge sego, nè mbo go Jerusalem, àa mbo ɓyan mbi, Van ge Ndu ne, ge ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way mage Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma tok go. Àa mbo wan ne ge sariya ge ee ne mbo swày, àa mbo ɓyan ne ge nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma tok go me.
41010034	Nda mbe ma mbo lasage ne, àa too watwa ge ne ta, àa keme ne ge bol, àa hun ne me. Ge dwam taa guwa̰, mbo tan digi.
41010035	Zebede van ma, Jak mage Yohana gwan ta ya ge Zeso ta zì guwa, àa jan ne go: Ba ge hateya, i ɓyare go mo ke i kaŋ ge i mà ele mo ne ya.
41010036	Gwan ge num janna go: Ḛ ɓyare go mbi ke ḛ da de?
41010037	Àa gwan ge ne janna go: Sok ge mo mbo kaɗ-ɗa ge muluk pateya ge amo pagal, vḭḭ i go, ndu ge ɗu kaa ge mo tok matoson pagal go, gegene mo tok magul pagal me.
41010038	Zeso gwan ge num janna go: Ḛ wan kaŋ ge ḛ ele mbi ne pe to. Ḛ ge pool ge njoɗ kob ge yal za̰a̰ya ne ge mbi mbo njoɗ ne ya, koo kee baptem ge njon̰n̰a ne ge mbi mbo kee ne ya de? Àa gwan ge ne janna go: I ge pool ge kee num.
41010039	Gwan ge num janna go: A fareba go, ḛ mbo njoɗ kob ge mbi mbo njoɗ ne ya, kee baptem ge mbi mbo kee ne ya me.
41010040	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ge fare ge kaɗ ge mbi tok matoson mage mbi tok magul pagal ne ɗe, a be mbi fare ne to. Ɗeŋew Dok tal nda ge sok mbe ee ge num pe ma ne.
41010041	Sok ge nda ge ame hateya gegene ge wol ma za̰a̰ fare mbe go, num laa ɗege hoɗɗa ge Jak mage Yohana ta.
41010042	Zeso tol num ya mɔɗwag ge na ta, jan num go: Ḛ kuwa kuwa go ɓase ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma, num gan ga̰a̰l ma kee num liliɗ, num ga̰a̰l ma ka luguy num me.
41010043	Ɓyare go ge ḛ buwal zì ne kaa go to. Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge diige ge ɓyare kaɗ ga̰a̰l ge ḛ buwal zì, ne seŋe ndu ge kee tèmel hon ḛ.
41010044	Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge diige ge ɓyare go na kaɗ ḛ ndwa zḛḛ, mbo seŋe ge ḛ moor sḛ go.
41010045	Ago mbi, Van ge Ndu ne, mbi be mbo ya go nda ke tèmel hon mbi to, ɗaŋɗe, mbi sḛ ke tèmel hon nda ne, mbi hon tene gezi ndwa zuu nda gḛḛ ge num sone ma go me.
41010046	Zeso mage na nda ge ame hateya ma, ɓanna ge ɓase ma ge na pe go nɔnɔg deɗ-ɗa ge suwal Jeriko diŋ. Sok kale mbo waɗ zum yà go, ndu ge ɓaal a̰me ɗu ge àa tol ne Bartime, ge Time van, wa ya kàɗɗa ge vin̰a kin̰a go kaɗe kaŋ.
41010047	Sok ge za̰a̰ go ne Zeso ge suwal Nazareɗ ne kale ne, ɗege oyya ge ka̰a̰l ndaal go: Zeso ge Daviɗ Baŋ, kuwa mbi a̰se!
41010048	Nda gḛḛ ka mḛḛre ne go ne dibi na wa, ɗaŋɗe, gwan ka aa na pe oyya digi ndaal waɗeya go: Gan ga̰a̰l Daviɗ Baŋ, kuwa mbi a̰se nde no de!
41010049	Zeso mḛḛ se jan go: Ḛ too mbi ne ya. Àa tol ndu ge ɓaal mbe ya, àa jan ne go: Ee mo dul wa se, ɗege digi, tol mo go.
41010050	Ɓaal fwage na ba̰a̰ ga̰a̰l kapoɗ, cigi ne gezi yà, za̰a̰me digi avun cab, mbo ge ne ta yà.
41010051	Zeso ele ne go: Mo ɓyare go mbi ke mo da de? Ndu ge ɓaal gwan ge ne janna go: Ba ge hateya, n̰a go mbi kuwa sok.
41010052	Zeso jan ne go: Mo ge pool mboya, hoɗ fareba ge amo, mon mo ya go. Avun cab ne ndwa hage, gaa anna ge Zeso pe go.
41011001	Zeso ma yan-na ge njal ge ɔwara oliv ma do̰o̰ no ne pagal digi go, ge suwal van ge zi ma, Betfaje mage Betani, ge no Jerusalem ziya guwa ma. Ge sok mbe go, Zeso teme na nda ge ame hateya ma zi ge maa ka̰a̰m buwal zì, hoɗ num na wa go:
41011002	Ḛ mbo ge suwal van ge no ge nè ndwa nga diŋ yà. Sok waɗ ge ne diŋ yà go gaw, ḛ mà seɗ kwar van vwalla se, ge ndu gale ndâ ne dwam ɗu to. Ḛ saa ne, ḛ gene ne ya.
41011003	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me mà ele ḛ ya go: Ḛ kee ano mbe no ge dape de? Ḛ guwa̰ ge ne janna go: A Bagezok ɓyare nee ne. Ge sok mbe go gaw, mà n̰a ḛ mboya ge ne.
41011004	Àa kan ta mboya, sok ge àa dee yà, àa seɗ kwar van vwalla se ge zok ge vin̰a kin̰a go ge a̰me wa zum. Àa saa ne ya.
41011005	Nda a̰me ge kaa ge sok mbe go ma ele num go: Ḛ daa kee da no de, ḛ saa kwar van mbe ge dape de?
41011006	Àa gwan ge num fare janna ge mojo̰o̰ Zeso ho maa na wa ya go. Guwa̰, àa n̰a num mboya.
41011007	Àa gene Zeso kwar van mbe ya, àa kan maa ba̰a̰ ma ge ne guwa̰ digi, Zeso kaɗ na pe ge num pagal.
41011008	Nda gḛḛ zen maa ba̰a̰ ma ge vin̰a pul go, nda gegene ma tiɗ ɔwara tok van ge tɔgwal ge maa chiya num ge gaaso zì ya ma se me.
41011009	Nda ge ka mbo ge ne ndwa zḛḛ ma, nda ge ka kàre ne pe ma me, àa ka oyya go: Hosana! Dok ke wa tare ge ndu ge mbo no ya ge dḭḭl ge Bagezok ne pagal!
41011010	Dok ke wa tare ge muluk ge mbo no ya pagal, muluk ge nè Ba Daviɗ ne. Hosana! Uwareya kaa ge Dok ge no pḭḭ digi yà vyaw pagal.
41011011	Zeso waɗ-ɗa ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ, mbo ge zok ge Dok ne zì. Sok ge aa ge kaŋ ma ndilla ge na ziya go peɗ, ajo̰o̰ sok kale ya gasamal, ɗege mbo Betani ɓanna ge na nda ge ame hateya ge wol pɔgwa zi ma.
41011012	Sok yan kin̰are, sok ge àa ka waɗ ge Betani diŋ ya zum, camal ɗege kee ne.
41011013	Sok ge ka̰a̰ na ndwa kuwa fere ya mḛḛya ge na dɔgwa ma pisil twalab, mbo ge ne ta yà, ndwa ndilla go na mà seɗ a̰me ge zamma ge ne digi de. Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge dee ne ta zì yà guwa, see no go ne gàa ma ne ɗeŋew, ago a be sok ge fere ma zon go ne to.
41011014	Zeso jan go: A gaa no mbo zḛḛ, mo daa gwan tol ndwa ge ndu zam ne to baɗ. Ne nda ge ame hateya ma za̰a̰ ne fare mbe.
41011015	Àa gwan-na ge Jerusalem diŋ, Zeso waɗ ge zok ge Dok ne zì. Ɗege yan nda ge ka ee kaŋ yaɗɗa ne zì mage num ge yaɗ kaŋ ma zum. Pugi taabul ge nda ge eya bware ma way ma ya se, dol kaŋ kàɗɗa ge nda ge ka yaɗ tugtug gezi ma way ma ya se me.
41011016	Be n̰a ndu a̰me waɗ zum ge zok ge Dok ne zì, ge a̰me ge na tok go to.
41011017	Guwa̰, hate num fare mbe no go: Daa njaŋe ge maktub ge Dok ne zì go: Àa mbo tol mbi zok go, zok kee kaɗeya ge pe rusu ma pe peɗ to wa? Ɗaŋɗe, ḛ me ɗe, ḛ seŋe ne ya sok way ta ge nda ge chala ma way no.
41011018	Ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way mage Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma za̰a̰ fare mbe, àa ɓyare vin̰a ge go maa ban ne gezi. Ago, àa ka chiya ne voo, ge dape, ɓase ma gaa za̰a̰ ne ɗu.
41011019	Sok ge gyala dḭḭ se go, Zeso mage na nda ge a̰me hateya ma waɗ ge suwal ga̰a̰l diŋ ya zum.
41011020	Àa dwam, sok yan kin̰are, aaram pe vḛḛ, àa gwan-na kaleya ge vin̰a mbe go, ne nda ge ame hateya ma kuwa fere mbe fin̰a ya, ge pagal digi ɗiŋ mbo ge ne tòo ma se yà.
41011021	Piyer pagal dwaɗ fare ge Zeso jin̰a ne dana, jan ne go: Ba ge hateya, kuwa, fere ge mo vḛḛne mo wa ge ne pagal mbe fin̰a ya no.
41011022	Ge sok mbe go, gwan ge num janna go: Ɓyare go ḛ kaa ge hoɗ fareba ge Dok ta.
41011023	Fareba, mbi jan ḛ ne no, ndu ge mbo jan njal ge ɔwara oliv ma do̰o̰ no ne pagal mbe ya go, ndage ge sok mbe no go, mbo dol tene ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam se yà, kaɗɗa na tumri tene ge na dul wa zì to, kaɗ ge hoɗ fareba go fare ge na jin̰a ne mbe kee kee, Dok mbo kee ne kaŋ mbe.
41011024	A ge pe, mbi jan ḛ ne no: Kaŋ ge diige pe peɗ ge ḛ mbo ele ne ya ge sok kee kaɗeya go, ḛ kaa ge hoɗ fareba go ḛ seɗ ne ya go, àa mbo hon ḛ ne.
41011025	Ɗaɗag ge ḛ ɗege digi kee kaɗeya, kaɗɗa ḛ laa hoɗ ge ndu a̰me ta, ḛ pore ne. Go mbe no, ḛ Ba ge no ge pḭḭ ma zì yà wa pore sone ge ḛ kee ma go.
41011026	[Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ḛ pore ne ya to, ḛ Ba ge kaa no ge pḭḭ ma zì yà, mbo pore sone ge ḛ kee ma to waɗme.]
41011027	Zeso mage na nda ge ame hateya ma gwan-na ge Jerusalem diŋ, àa waɗ ge zok ge Dok ne pul diŋ. Sok ge Zeso ka anna ge ne pul diŋ go, ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ma, ge Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma ɓanna ge Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme num ma mbo ya ge ne ta.
41011028	Àa ele ne go: Mo see vin̰a ge kee kaŋ mbe ma ge huɗi ta de? A huɗi ho̰ mo pool ge kee num ne de?
41011029	Zeso gwan ge num janna go: Mbi mà ele ḛ fare ɗu, mà kaɗɗa ḛ gwan ge mbi vinna ya ɗe, mbi mà jan ḛ ge ma̰ pool ɗoo, mbi kee kaŋ mbe no de.
41011030	Ḛ guwa̰ ge mbi vinna gale, A huɗi ho̰ Yohana vin̰a ge kee nda baptem ne, a Dok koo nda duwana ma de?
41011031	Sok mbe go, àa ɗege pee ta ta buwal zì, àa ka janna go: Mà kaɗɗa nè gwan ge ne vinna ya go: A Dok ho̰ ne vin̰a ne, mà jan nè no go: Ge dape ḛ wa hoɗ fareba ge ne ta to de?
41011032	Ɗaŋɗe, mà kaɗɗa nè janna go: «A nda duwana ma teme ne ya ne» me ɗe? Go no, àa be day jan ne ano mbe to ndwa go àa ka chiya ɓase ma voo, ago nda peɗ kaa ge kuwaya go, Yohana Nda ge zwagre Dok wa ge fareba ne.
41011033	Sok mbe go, àa gwan ge ne janna go: I wan pe to. Ne sḛ jan num go: Mbi sḛ waɗme, mbi jan ḛ go, mbi see pool mbe ge kee kaŋ mbe ma ge dii de to me.
41012001	Guwa̰, Zeso ɗege jan ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ma, ge Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma ɓanna ge Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme num mbe ma fare ge fare sḭḭ go: Ndu a̰me ɗu ɗḭḭ on̰or, vê ne zì ge gulum no, câ tugul ge njal zì ge ɓerse on̰or pe no, ɗû acagaɗa ge haal ge gaaso mbe pe koyya no me. Guwa̰, hon nda ge kee tèmel gaaso on̰or ma ne wanna, dol tene mbo gɔswal kaal ndiɗ.
41012002	Sok ge sok kan siyal ge on̰or ne mbiya, teme na ndu ge tèmel a̰me ya ɗu, ge nda ge kee gaaso on̰or tèmel ma ta, ndwa go na see na ne ndwa.
41012003	Sok ge ne dore mbe dee yà ge num ta, àa wan ne, àa iyal ne, àa n̰a ne mboya tok bàŋ.
41012004	Sok ge ne ba ge temeya kuwa go, ne guwa̰ ya tok bàŋ, teme na ndu ge tèmel a̰me ge ɗogle yà iya ge num ta. Sok ge ne ndu ge tèmel mbe dee ge num ta yà, àa wan ne, àa poɗ ne pagal se kɔkɔm, àa sal ne mamaɗ me.
41012005	Sok ge ne ba ge temeya kuwa go num iya ne iyalla ge sone, teme ndu ge taa ya ge num ta. Àa wan ne, àa hun ne gezi. Guwa̰, gwan teme nda ge ɗogle ma ya gḛḛ-gḛḛ, àa iyal a̰me ma, gegene ma, àa hun num.
41012006	Ndu ge gaa guwa̰ dwab, a ndu ge gaaso mbe van sḛ, ne laa wa̰a̰ ne gḛḛ, teme ne ge num ta yà, ka dwaɗ go: Gegene mbe no, ajo̰o̰ a mbi van ne, àa mà hon ne hormo.
41012007	Sok ge nda ge kee gaaso on̰or tèmel ma kuwa ne van ya mboya, àa jan ta ta buwal zì go: A ndu ge zam ne joo ne no, ḛ mbo nè ya, nè hṵṵ ne, joo mbe wa gaa nè ne.
41012008	Sok ge dee ya num ta zì, àa wa̰a̰ ne no, àa hṵṵ ne gezi no, àa doo ne duul swày ge gaaso on̰or guwa̰ zum yà no.
41012009	Zeso ele num go: Ba ge gaaso on̰or gaa kee num gyana de? Mbo mbo ya, mbo puu nda ge kee gaaso on̰or tèmel mbe ma gezi, hee gaaso on̰or mbe hon nda ge ɗogle ma ne wanna.
41012010	Mbi ge kuwaya tyatyaɗ go ḛ isi fare mbe ya go, ge Njaŋeya ge Dok ne zì. Jin̰a zì go: «Njal ge nda ge sin zok ma doo ne gezi, A ne gaa ya njal ge gag ge zok keŋ pe ne,
41012011	Ano mbe mbo ge Bagezok ta ya, A kaŋ ajab ne ge nè kuwa ne no.»
41012012	Sok ge ga̰a̰l ge Yahuɗ ma way mbe ma see go Zeso kê na fare sḭḭ mbe ma ge maa pagal, sok mbe go, àa ɗege ɓyare vin̰a ge ee maa tok ne pagal, ɗaŋɗe, àa ka chiya voo ge ɓase mbe ge nɔnɔg ma pe. Àa n̰a ne, àa kan ta mboya.
41012013	Ga̰a̰l mbe ma teme Farisi a̰me ma ya ɓanna ge Heroɗ nda ma, ge Zeso ta ndwa hee ne pe go, maa wa za̰a̰ fare ge ne wa zige.
41012014	Sok ge àa dee ya ne ta, àa jan ne go: Ba ge hateya, i kuwa kuwa go mo ndu ge jan fare ge fareba ne. Mo chiya ndu a̰me ndwa voo to, mo vare nda to me. Mo hate vin̰a ge Dok ne ge fareba pagal. I ɓyare ele mo go, vin̰a hage hage ge eeya ge nè ne ma pagal go, àa poo siyal hon Sezar de? Jin̰a i gale: Mbiya go i poɗ ne koo i poɗ ne to de?
41012015	Ajo̰o̰ na kuwa ndwa mbuɗiya ge num way kuwa ɗe, gwan ge num fare janna go: Ge dape ḛ wa ka hee mbi pe ge fare go de? Ḛ gene mbi silay ya ɗu mbi ndi ne gale.
41012016	Àa gene ne silay ya ɗu. Ele num go: Pagal mage kaŋ njaŋeya mbe ge ne ta ma huɗi ne ma ne de? Àa gwan ge ne janna go: A Sezar ne ma ne.
41012017	Sok mbe go, jan num go: Kaŋ ge go na ge Sezar nee ne, ḛ ho̰ ne ne, ge go na ge Dok nee ne, ḛ ho̰ Dok ne kaŋ me. Ge ne fare janna mbe ta, àa gaa a̰a̰le maa wa ndil ta.
41012018	Saduki ma, num mbe ge hate go tanna ge nda ge swày ma way to ma, gwan ta ya Zeso ta, àa ele ne go:
41012019	Ba ge hate nda, Moyiz ho̰ i na wa ge maktub ge Dok ne zì go: «Kaɗɗa ndu son mage ndu gwale kaɗ zok ya, ndu son wan suu, n̰a kumu be van, ago ne na̰ van hee gwale kumu mbe, ne ke na na̰ van mbe ge suu rusu.»
41012020	Ḛ za̰a̰, nda a̰me ma kaa ta pe go nda soɗob ɓỳala na̰ van ge ba ɗu mage na̰ ɗu. Ge pul sway san gwale, wan suu be n̰a rusu a̰me.
41012021	Ge zi ame kumu mbe, gwan suu be n̰a rusu a̰me. Ge taa ame ne, gwan suu mbe go waɗme. Fare mbe pe mbo ya kee na̰ van ge ɓỳala mbe ma mɔɗwag.
41012022	A̰me ɗu ge num ge ɓỳala mbe ma buwal zì, be n̰a rusu ge gwale mbe to. Ge num guwa̰ go peɗ, gwale mbe wan suu ge num pe ya waɗme.
41012023	Ajo̰o̰ go num mbe ge ɓỳala ma mɔɗwag kaa zok ge ne, mbo kaɗ dee ge diige gwale ne ge dwam tanna ge nda ge swày ma way go ɗaŋ de?
41012024	Zeso jan num go: Ajo̰o̰ ḛ wan Njaŋeya ge Dok ne koo pool ge ne ne kaŋ ge mbiya keeya pe to ɗe, a ge pe, fare ge ḛ jan go nda ge suu ma mbo tan to ɗe, a ge na vin̰a go to.
41012025	Ago, ge dwam tanna ge nda ge swày ma way go, nda soɗob mbo kaɗ ge gwale ma to, koo nda zaab kaɗ ge obe ma to me. Ɗaŋɗe, àa mbo kaɗ dinna ge malayka ge no ge pḭḭ zì yà ma go.
41012026	Kaɗɗa ge tanna ge nda ge swày ma way ɗe, mbi ge kuwaya tyatyaɗ go ḛ isi ne ya ge maktub ge Moyiz ne zì. Fare ge Dok jin̰a ne num ma, ge kore za̰a̰l zì ya go: «Mbi, mbi Dok ge Abraham ne, Dok ge Isak ne, Dok ge Jakob ne me.»
41012027	Ago Dok mbe, a Dok ge nda ge ndwa ma way ne, a be Dok ge nda ge swày ma way ne to. Koo nda ge suu wal ma, àa ge ndwa ge Dok ta. A ge pe, ḛ n̰aame no.
41012028	Ɗu ge Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma buwal zì, ge kaa sok mbe go, za̰a̰ Zeso mage Saduki ma fare pee ta mbe, seɗ go ne guwa̰ num fare janna kwaɗa. Sok ge guwa̰ tene ya ge ne ta zì, ele ne go: Wa yuwaleya ge ne fare no walay nde ge na ka̰a̰m ge diige de?
41012029	Zeso gwan ge ne janna go: Wa yuwaleya ge ne fare no walay nde ge na ka̰a̰m no: «Ḛ za̰a̰ Izrayel van ma, Bagezok, Dok ge nè ne, a ne sḛ ne melaw ɗu kikiɗ Bagezok.
41012030	Mbiya go mo laa wa̰a̰ mo Bagezok Dok ge amo, ge mo dul wa mɔɗwag, ge mo sḛ mɔɗwag, ge mo dwaɗɗa mɔɗwag me.»
41012031	Ge zi no: «Mo laa mbo wan mo kon dinna ge mo laa wa̰a̰ tene go.» Wa yuwaleya a̰me ge ɗogle ge walay waɗe num ge zi mbe ma no to.
41012032	Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne, jan ne go: A kwaɗa Ba ge hate nda, mo jin̰a fare ge fareba: Ago a Dok sḛ ne melaw ɗu, ndu a̰me ge ɗogle dinna ge ne go to.
41012033	Mbiya go mo laa wa̰a̰ ne, ge mo dul wa ɗu, ge kaŋ keeya ge amo ma zì peɗ me. Mo laa wa̰a̰ mo kon dinna ge mo sḛ go. Ago, ano mbe no, waɗe tuwaleya ge tilla mɔɗwag ma peɗ, ge tuwaleya gegene ma peɗ, ge nè mà kee num ya hon Dok ma waɗe.
41012034	Zeso kuwa go, ne guwa̰ na vinna mbe ge andaŋ, jan ne go: Mo kaal ge muluk ge Dok ne to. Àa ngwabe, ndu a̰me da gwan tal tene ele ne fare a̰me ɗu ge guwa̰ to baɗ.
41012035	Zeso ɗege hate nda fare ge zok ge Dok ne zì, ele num go: Ge dape, Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma wa ka janna go Krist, Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne, ne Daviɗ Baŋ ne boo de?
41012036	Daviɗ sḛ ge na pagal, On̰om ge Harcal ee ne janna go: «Bagezok Dok jin̰a mbi Bagezok go: Mbo ya kaɗ ge mbi tok matoson pagal go, Ɗiŋ ge go mbi ee mo nda ge ho̰o̰l ma Gwan maa pagal ge mo ko pul se.»
41012037	Daviɗ sḛ ge na pagal, tol Krist, Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne go, na Bagezok-noo, kee mà pe gyana, ne Bagezok mbe wa gwan seŋe kaɗ ne baŋ de? Tabeya ma kaa ge ene ge za̰a̰ Zeso.
41012038	Ge sok hate nda go, Zeso ka jan num go: Ḛ koy ta kwaɗa ge Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma ta, num laa wa̰a̰ anna ge ba̰a̰ ga̰a̰l ma ndwa ngay ta, wa sanna ge hormo ge sok ɓase ma go,
41012039	sok kàɗɗa ge nda ndwa zḛḛge ma, ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way ma zì, sok kàɗɗa ge nda ge hormo ma way ge sok vḛḛso zam kaŋ zam ma go me.
41012040	Àa aa nda zaab ge kumu ma tok zamma ge num zok ma diŋ, àa ka kee kaɗeya twala lindiŋ ndwa ngayya go maa nda ge kee Dok kwaɗa ma ne. Ge kaŋ keeya ge go mbe pe, Dok mbo wan num ge sariya ge ndaa kaka.
41012041	Guwa̰, Zeso mbo ya ge zok ge Dok ne zì, kaɗ ge kaŋ ge nda dol bware ne zì ndwa nga. Ka ndil ɓase ma dolla ge àa dol bware no ge kaŋ dol bware mbe zì. Nda ge pwal ma ka ɓyan maa tok pe zum gḛḛ, ge sok dol bware go.
41012042	Gwale kumu a̰me ɗu ge gaa ɔg go, mbo ya waɗme, kan na soŋo van ma zi, ge ne zì. A be bware ge gḛḛ ne to peɗ.
41012043	Sok mbe go, Zeso tol na nda ge ame hateya ma, jan num go: Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no, gwale kumu ge gaa ɔg go mbe no, ho̰ kaŋ waɗe num ge ɓyan maa tok pe no zum ge kaŋ dol bware zì ma.
41012044	Ago, nda gegene ma peɗ ho̰ kaŋ wa boyo ge maa bware ma way boo, ɗaŋɗe, ne sḛ ho̰ kaŋ ge no na tok go ge ɓul mɔɗwag, kaŋ mbe ge na kaa no ge ne pe ndwa dol dwam.
41013001	Sok ge Zeso wuwa ge zok ge Dok ne zì ya zum, ɗu ge ne nda ge ame hateya ma buwal zige, sok ndil zok ge Dok ne go, dore ne, jan ne go: Ba ge hateya, ndi zok mbe gale, ne siŋli go me! Àa sḭḭ ne ge njal ge siŋli ma ɗoo!
41013002	Zeso gwan ge ne janna go: Zok na̰ ge ɓaŋlaŋ ge mo kuwa ne mbe no, mbo gul se ge ɓul mɔɗwag. Njal ge àa sḭḭ ne ge num ma, a̰me ɗu mbo gaa na kon pagal digi to.
41013003	Mbo ya kaɗ na pe ge njal ge ɔwara oliv ma do̰o̰ no ne pagal kin̰a go, ge zok ge Dok ne ndwa nga. Ge sok mbe go, Piyer, Jak ɓanna ge Andre mage Yohana, àa mbo ya ge ne ta hini jan, àa ele ne fare go:
41013004	Jin̰a i gale, fare ge mo daa jin̰a ne mbe no, dee ma̰ del ɗoo wa mbo keeya de? A ma̰ kaŋ ma mbo kee ne ge wa mbo ngay ya go, kaŋ mbe ma peɗ, num gaa guguwa ge keeya de?
41013005	Ge fare eleya mbe no pagal, gwan ge num janna go: Ḛ koy ta kwaɗa, ne kaa ge ndu a̰me mbo ya n̰aame ḛ to.
41013006	Ago nda gḛḛ mbo hee mbi dḭḭl, àa mbo ya ge ne, àa mbo ka janna go: A mbi Krist ne. Ge num fare janna mbe ma no ta, àa mbo ee nda gḛḛ n̰aameya.
41013007	Sok ge ḛ mbo kaɗ-ɗa ka za̰a̰ twam mballa ma ge ḛ ta guwa, ḛ ka za̰a̰ kṵwa̰ ge twam mballa ma way ma, ge sok kaal ya ma me, ḛ iigi ta to. A ngaɗ go kaŋ mbe ma num dee ya keeya, ɗaŋɗe, mbo gale kaɗ gwanna ge Ndu ge Dok taa ne, nee ne to.
41013008	Ago suwal ma mbo ka mbal ta ta buwal zì, muluk ma mbo ɗege ho̰o̰l ta ta buwal zì waɗme. Ge sok a̰me ma go, suwa mbo ka ndaɗɗa, camal baktar ma ka deɗ-ɗa me. Àa mbo ka deɗ-ɗa dinna ge yal ge twàl ne deɗ ndu gwale go.
41013009	Kaɗɗa ge ḛ sḛ ma ɗe, ḛ koy ta kwaɗa, ge fare ge mbo seɗ ḛ ya ma pe. Nda a̰me ma mbo wan ḛ, àa gene ḛ mbo ge nda ge kun sariya ma ndwa se yà. Àa mbo keme ḛ ge bol, ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way ma zì, àa zwal ḛ bibil mbo goformo̰ mage gan ga̰a̰l ma ndwa se yà, ge mbi pe. Go mbe no, ḛ mbo kee sayda ge ambi ge num ta.
41013010	Ago, zḛḛ gale ɓiya, ɓyare go àa oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge rusu ge suwa pagal ma ta peɗ.
41013011	Sok ge àa mbo wan ḛ ya ndwa ɓyan ḛ ge nda ge kun sariya ma tok go, ne kaa ge ḛ iigi ta zḛḛ, ge fare ge ḛ mà mbo ya faa ne pe to. Ɗeŋew, ḛ mbo faa fare ge Dok mbo hon ḛ ne ya ge sok mbe go. Ago, ḛ sḛ ma mbo faa fare ne ge ḛ pagal to, a On̰om ge Harcal mbo faa fare ne ge ḛ byalam go.
41013012	Nda a̰me ma mbo ɓyan maa na̰ van ma gezi ge nda tok go, ba a̰me ma mbo ɓyan maa van ma mbe go waɗme. Van a̰me ma mbo ɗege ho̰o̰l digi ge maa ba ma, àa mbo ɓyan num gezi me.
41013013	Nda mbo kuri ḛ gezi peɗ, ge mbi pe. Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge mbo wan tene deŋel ya ɗiŋ mbo wa yà, mbo seɗ monna .
41013014	Ḛ ge isi maktub ge Dok ne ma, ḛ kuwa fare mbe pe gezi kwaɗa! Sok ge ḛ mbo kuwa ge sone kakatag ge vḛḛne kaŋ ya, mbo ya kàɗɗa ge sok ge harcal ge ne sḛ mbiya kaɗ ne go to go, sok mbe go, num ge mbo kaɗ-ɗa ge suwa ge Jude ne go ma, num chiya mbo ge njal ma zì yà.
41013015	Ndu ge mbo kaɗ-ɗa ɗwabe tene ge na zok pagal digi, ɓyare go ne ndee ya se, ne wuwa zok zì hee a̰me to, ɗaŋɗe, ne chiya caɗ.
