41013016	Ndu ge mbo kaɗ-ɗa kee tèmel ge na kaŋ kyarga zì, ɓyare go ne guwa̰ ya ge diŋ ndwa ɔwabe na ba̰a̰ ga̰a̰l to, ɗaŋɗe, ne chiya caɗ.
41013017	A ma̰ yal ne, ge dwam mbe ma go, ge nda zaab ge mbo kaɗ-ɗa ge emel mage ge mbo kaɗ-ɗa hon maa van ma pam ma pe de!
41013018	Ḛ ka kee kaɗeya ndwa go yal mbe dee ya ge ḛ pagal ge somo̰ pagal go to.
41013019	Ago, ge dwam mbe ma go dee, iigiya ma mbo kaɗ gḛḛ. Mbo kaɗ iigiya ge ndu see ne pe dwam ɗu to, ge pe dolla ge Dok doo dunin̰a ya day ɗiŋ màno. Ndu mbo gwan seɗ iigiya mbe no pe, zḛḛ daa to baɗ me.
41013020	Daa na go Bagezok chiya dwam mbe ma ya zì to, ndu a̰me ɗu mà seɗ vin̰a ge ɓuuya to. Ɗaŋɗe, chiya num ya zì, ge nda ge na ne, ge na taa num ma pe.
41013021	Ge dwam mbe ma go, kaɗɗa ndu a̰me jan ḛ ya go: Na! Krist, Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne no ge go go no, koo jan ḛ ya go: Na! Ano yà no, ḛ ho fareba ge ne fare janna mbe ma ta to.
41013022	Ago, nda ge kee ta krist ma ɓanna ge nda ge kee ta nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma mbo mbo ya. Àa mbo ka kee kaŋ ngayya mage kaŋ haŋle ma keeya ge go, ee nda ge Dok taa num ma n̰aameya.
41013023	Mbi jan ḛ fare ma ya zḛḛ kakaɗag, ḛ koy ta kwaɗa.
41013024	Guwa̰ dwam ge yal ɓaŋlaŋ mbe ma way go, gyala mbo daa gwan zen to, saba mbo hon kɔn̰al ge na ne to me.
41013025	Gùwa̰ ma mbo deɗ ge pḭḭ ma zì ya se, kaŋ keeya ge Dok ne ge ɓaŋlaŋ ge no pḭḭ digi ma mbo ba̰a̰le se.
41013026	Ge sok mbe go, nda mbo kuwa Van ge Ndu ne zuɗ-ɗa ge pḭḭ ge laaya gutub zì, ge pool ge ɓaŋlaŋ, ge pateya ge na ne zì me.
41013027	Mbo hoɗ na malayka ma na wa go, num mbo ge suwa keŋ ge ndà mage suwa wa ndegeɗe ma yà, mbo kwate na nda ge talla ma deɗ-ɗa ge sok ge ɗu go.
41013028	Ḛ za̰a̰ fare sḭḭ ge àa kee no ge ɔwara fere pagal. Sok ge ɔwara ɗege ɗufiya, ne dɔgwa ma haɗ pisil, ḛ kuwa kuwa go, ne gyala pul ne, ago mamasege gaa guwa.
41013029	Ḛ sḛ ma waɗme, sok ge ḛ mbo kuwa kaŋ mbe ma ya keeya ge ḛ ndwa go, ḛ kuwa go, Van ge Ndu ne gaa guwa ge gwan-na, dinna ge ndu yan-na mḛḛya zok wa go da̰a̰reya go.
41013030	Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no: Nda ge doŋ pe mbe go ma mbo suu peɗ to, ge go kaŋ mbe ma peɗ num dee ya keeya.
41013031	Pḭḭ mage suwa mbo kaɗ to, ɗaŋɗe mbi fare janna ma mbo kaɗ ɗiŋ ge din.
41013032	Kaɗɗa ge fare ge dwam mage ler ne ɗe, ndu a̰me ɗu ge kuwa num to. Koo malayka ge Dok ne ma, koo mbi sḛ ge Dok teme mbi ya puy, mbi kuwa ne to. Ɗaŋɗe, a Dok ge mbi Ba ɗu ɗeŋew kuwa nee ne.
41013033	Ge ano mbe no pe, ḛ kaa jejew, ḛ ka kaɗeya, ago ḛ kuwa dwam ge kaŋ mbe ma mbo keeya go to.
41013034	Kaŋ mbe ma mbo kaɗ dinna ge fare ge ndu ge ɗege mbo gɔswal ne go. Sok ɗege mbo gɔswal go, n̰a na zok ge na nda ge kee na tèmel ma tok go. Hon ndu ge diige tèmel ge ne mbiya kee ne, hoɗ na wa ge ndu ge koy na zok wa ta go, ne doo na ndwa ge na zok pagal.
41013035	Mbi jan ḛ ne no, ɓyare go ḛ kaa jejew, ne kaa ge go ndu ge zok mbo ya tan ḛ tugcug to. Tamekyala gasamal de, ɗaal ga̰a̰l de, aaram pagal de, koo aaram de.
41013036	Kaɗɗa na mbo ja tan ḛ tugcug, ne kaa ge ne see ḛ fii dwam to.
41013037	Fare ge mbi jan ḛ ne no, mbi jan ne ge nda pe peɗ. Ḛ kaa jejew.
41014001	Dwam gaa zi, ge go vḛḛso ge Paska mage vḛḛso ge dupḛ ge be jìn̰al hore na ndwa zì wa mbo keeya. Ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way mage Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma ka ɓyare vin̰a go, maa kee pe gyana maa wa wan Zeso ge maa zwam a̰me ɗu ɗoo, maa wa hun ne gezi de.
41014002	Ago àa ka jan ta go: Ɓyare go nè wa̰a̰ ne ge dwam vḛḛso go to, ɓase ma mà haɗ ge ɗege ho̰o̰l ya ge nè pagal.
41014003	Sok ge Zeso kaa ge suwal Betani go, ge Simo̰ ge dee kṵṵ swàm diŋ, gwale a̰me ɗu waɗ-ɗa diŋ, seɗ ne wa ya zam kaŋ zam. Gwale mbe kaa ge koblo ge àa ca ne ge njal Albatr ge na tok go, huyya ge idiir ge yee gḛḛ, ge ɗiyage-ɗiyage, ge àa tol ne go nar. Hal koblo mbe wa gezi, suusi ne ge ɓul mɔɗwag ge Zeso pagal.
41014004	Nda ge kaa ge sok mbe go ma, a̰me ge num buwal zige ma, sok kuwa gwale mbe kaŋ ge kee, num laa mbo ya vḛḛneya, àa jan ta go: Idiir ge yee gḛḛ ge go mbe no, ne sḛ vḛḛne ne gezi ge dape de?
41014005	Ne kwaɗa daa go àa yaɗ ne gezi waɗe silay kikis taa, àa vaa nda ge a̰se ma ne to de? Num laa mbo ya hoɗ ge ne ta.
41014006	Ɗaŋɗe, Zeso jan num go: Ḛ hoɗ ḛ laa ge ne ta ge dape de? Ḛ n̰a ne cɔgwaɗ. Kee kaŋ ge kwaɗa ge mbi pe.
41014007	Ago nda ge a̰se ma go ge ḛ buwal zì ɗaɗag, ḛ ge pool ge kee num kwaɗa ge ḛ ɓyare go, ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ge mbi ɗe, mbi mbo kaɗ kaal tata ge ḛ buwal zì to.
41014008	Kee kaŋ ge na pool mbiya keeya tem, idiir ge ne suusi ne no ge mbi duul ta, nuusi zḛḛ duul swày ge ambi, ge mbulla pe.
41014009	Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no, sok ge no dunin̰a zì ma peɗ, ge àa mbo kaɗ-ɗa ka oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge num go ma, àa mbo ka faa kaŋ ge gwale mbe kê ne waɗme, ndwa go ne gaa ge kaŋ dwaɗ pagal go ge nda ta peɗ.
41014010	Yudas Iskariyoɗ, ɗu ge na ka̰a̰m ge ame hateya ge wol pɔgwa zi ma buwal zige, ɗege mbo seɗ ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ma, ndwa ɓyan Zeso gezi ge num tok go.
41014011	Sok ge ɗege wan num fare pe, àa kee laa saal sok za̰a̰ ne go. Guwa̰, àa kee wa tii go maa ho̰ ne bware. Sok mbe go, Yudas ɗege ɓyare vin̰a ge jwab ndwa ɓyan ne gezi.
41014012	Ge dwam ge zḛḛge ge dupḛ ge be jìn̰al hore ne go, dwam ge àa vyan tame van ma kee tuwaleya ge vḛḛso ge Paska ne pe, Zeso nda ge ame hateya ma ele ne go: Mo ɓyare go i mbo nuusi mo sok ge zam kaŋ zam ge Paska ne ge diya de?
41014013	Sok mbe go, teme na nda ge ame hateya ma zi, jan num go: Ḛ mbo ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ yà, ḛ mà seɗ ndu son a̰me ɗu in mam ge kṵṵri, ḛ kàre ne pe.
41014014	Zok ge mà waɗ-ɗa ne diŋ, ḛ wuwa ne pe yà, ḛ jan ndu ge zok mbe go, Ba ge hateya jan go: Zok ge na mà mbo zam kaŋ zam kee vḛḛso ge Paska ne ɓanna ge na nda ge ame hateya ma diya de?
41014015	Mà mbo ngay ḛ zok pul ge a̰a̰l ge zok ge na kon pagal digi-ge yà, nuusiya ge na kaŋ ma mɔɗwag zì ɓal. A ge sok mbe go, ḛ wa mbo nuusi nè kaŋ zam vḛḛso ge Paska pe.
41014016	Nda ge ame hateya ge zi mbe ma kan ta mboya, àa deɗ-ɗa ge suwal ga̰a̰l diŋ, àa seɗ kaŋ ma ge Zeso jin̰a maa num mbe go tetem, àa nuusi kaŋ zam kee vḛḛso ge Paska pe.
41014017	Sok ge sok yin̰a gasamal, Zeso mage na nda ge ame hateya ge wol pɔgwa zi ma yan-na.
41014018	Sok ge àa kaa ge taabul wa go zam kaŋ zam, Zeso jan num go: Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no, ḛ ge ḛ zam kaŋ zam no dagre ge mbi ma, ɗu ge ḛ buwal zige mbo ɓyan mbi gezi ge nda tok go.
41014019	Ne nda ge ame hateya ma ndwa mbo ya suu se leɗeɗ. Ndu ge diige ɗege ele ne go: A mbi de?
41014020	Gwan ge num janna go: A ɗu ge ḛ ge wol pɔgwa zi ma buwal zige, ge paa na tok no dagre ge mbi, ge seɗe ge ɗu go, mbo ɓyan mbi gezi ne.
41014021	A ngaɗ go, mbi, Van ge Ndu ne, mbi mbo mbo swày dinna ge Njaŋeya ge Dok ne ma jin̰a go. Ɗaŋɗe, woo ge ndu mbe ge mbo ɓyan Van ge Ndu ne ya gezi. Nde-nde àa tol ndu mbe dana to.
41014022	Sok ge àa ka zam kaŋ zam go, Zeso hee dupḛ, guwa̰ ge kee mersi hon Dok go, siɗi ne se, hon num ne, jan go: Ḛ ame, ano mbe no a mbi sḛ duul ne.
41014023	Guwa̰, hee kob ge on̰or jìn̰al no ne zì, kee mersi hon Dok, hon num ne, àa peɗ, àa njoɗ ne me.
41014024	Jan num go: Ano, a mbi swàm ne, swàm ge wa tii vwalla nee ne, ge mbo kan-na se ge nda pe peɗ.
41014025	Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no: Mbi mbo daa gwan njoɗ on̰or jìn̰al to baɗ, mbi gaa dee mbo njoɗ on̰or jìn̰al ge jin̰al, ge muluk ge Dok ne zì yà.
41014026	Guwa̰ ge àa mbaa kaŋ ge sale Dok ge no Maktub ge kaŋ mballa ma way zì go, àa kan ta mbo ge njal ge ɔwara oliv ma do̰o̰ no ge ne pagal digi yà.
41014027	Jan num go: Ḛ peɗ, ḛ mbo n̰a mbi, ago njaŋe ge maktub ge Dok ne zì go: «Mbi mbo hun ba ge koy tame ma, go no tame ma mbo ɓasare se.»
41014028	Guwa̰ ge Dok mbo tan mbi ya digi, mbi mbo mbo ndaage ḛ ge suwa ge Galile ne yà.
41014029	Piyer jan ne go: Kaɗɗa nda gegene ma n̰a mo ya peɗ puy ɗe, mbi mbo n̰a mo to.
41014030	Ne sḛ gwan ge ne janna go: Fareba mbi jan mo ne no, mà ɗaal mbe no zì baba, zḛḛ ge go baare too fiyaso ge ndwa zi, mo mà ee mo wa ndwa taa go mo kuwa mbi to.
41014031	Ɗaŋɗe, Piyer gwan dwage ne janna digi ge ka̰a̰l ndaal go: Kaɗɗa ne mbiya go, mbi mbo swày dagre ge mo puy, mbi mbo jan ge mbi wa zì go, mbi kuwa mo to, to baɗ. Ne nda ge ame hateya gegene ma peɗ ka janna mbe go me.
41014032	Zeso mage na nda ge ame hateya ma mbo ya ge sok a̰me go ɗu, ge àa tol ne Jeɗsemane, jan num go: Ḛ kaa ge go go, mbi mbo kee kaɗeya.
41014033	Tol Piyer, Jak mage Yohana, àa ge num mbo. Sok mboya go, ɗege za̰a̰ yal na sḛ zì, ka iigi tene.
41014034	Jan num go: Mbi duul suu ya se leɗeɗ, iigiya ge mbi seɗ ne ya mbi sḛ zì mbe no, ee mbi mbo swày, ḛ kaa go go, ḛ kaɗ jejew me.
41014035	Guwa̰, mbo gezi yà nde, kubi na pul ge suwa se, kee kaɗeya go: Kaɗɗa vin̰a go, n̰a ler ge yal mbe kale ge mbi pagal gezi.
41014036	Gwan jan go: Abba, Baa, kaŋ a̰me ɗu ge tane mo be keeya to, to, cigi kob ge yal njoɗɗa ne mbe no gezi ge mbi pagal. Kaɗɗa na go to puy, kee kaŋ ge mo laa ɓyare ne keeya, ɗaŋɗe, ne kaa be laa ɓyareya ge ambi to.
41014037	Gwan-na ge na nda ge ame hateya ma ta, seɗ num fii dwam. Tol Piyer jan ne go: Simo̰, mo gwan fii go dwam zoo de? Mo pool ge wan tene kàɗɗa ge mo ndwa ler ɗu to de!
41014038	Ḛ kaa jejew, ḛ kee kaɗeya me, ne kaa ge ḛ dee pe heeya zì to, ago ḛ ge dwaɗɗa ge kee kaŋ ge kwaɗa ma ɓa, ɗaŋɗe, ajo̰o̰ sḛ duul tuguɗi ɗe, ḛ pool ge mḛḛ Ba ge ho̰o̰l ndwa zì to.
41014039	Guwa̰, gwan mbo gezi yà nde ge ndwa zi, ka dwage Dok na fare mbe ma janna ge na kaɗeya zì.
41014040	Gwan gwan-na iya, seɗ num, àa fii ya dwam galgatag ge go num ndwa ge kan zum go fyalag kaɗ to. Àa daa be kuwa fare ge maa gwan jan ne to.
41014041	Gwan mbo kee kaɗeya ge ndwa taa, gwan-na ge num ta, jan num go: Ḛ go gale dwam ta fiiya baba de? Ḛ ɗwabe ta ɗaŋ! A̰me be gaa to, sok mbyaɗɗa go, àa gaa ɓyan Van ge Ndu ne ge nda ge sone ma tok go.
41014042	Ḛ ɗege digi, nè mbo, ndu ge ɓyan mbi gezi yan ja no.
41014043	Zeso gale sok jan fare go, Yudas, ɗu ge nda ge ame hateya ge wol pɔgwa zi ma buwal zige zuɗ-ɗa ge nda ɓase ge na pe go. Ɓase mbe ma mbo ya ge kasagar mage calaŋ ma ge maa tok go. Ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ma ɓanna ge nda ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne mage Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme num ma teme num ya ne.
41014044	Yudas ge ɓin̰a Zeso gezi, za̰a̰ tene zḛḛ ge ɓase mbe ma, ge fare a̰me ge na mà mbo ya keeya ge ne. Jin̰a num ya go: Ndu ge mbi mà buu ne ya zì ge komreya ɗe, a nee ne, ḛ wa̰a̰ ne, ḛ mbo ge ne, ḛ koy ne ge ḛ ndwa pe zì keceɗ.
41014045	Sok ge àa dee ya gaw, Yudas mbo ya ge ne ta zì guwa, tol ne go: Rabbi ! Buu ne zì me.
41014046	Ge sok mbe go, nda mbe ma paa maa tok, àa wan ne.
41014047	Ndu a̰me ɗu ge kaa ge Zeso ma dagre, ndage na kasagar ge na vum zì, kun ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe ndu ge kee ne tèmel tɔgwa gezi.
41014048	Sok mbe go, Zeso hee fare, jan num go: Ḛ daa zuu ya zum gyana ge kasagar ma, ge calaŋ ma ge ḛ tok go ndwa wan mbi dinna ge àa wan ndu ge fiiri vin̰a go de!
41014049	Dwam ma mɔɗwag mbi kaa ge ḛ buwal zì, mbi ka hateya ge zok ge Dok ne zì, ḛ be wan mbi to me ɗe, ɗaŋɗe, ano mbe dee ya keeya ndwa huy fare ge Njaŋeya ge Dok ne jin̰a num ma wa.
41014050	Ge sok mbe go, nda ge àa ge num kaa dagre ma peɗ chiya, àa n̰a ne.
41014051	Bogol a̰me ɗu ka kàre ne pe, kaa ge ladara ɗeŋew laaya ge na ta. Àa ɓyare go maa wan ne waɗme,
41014052	ɗaŋɗe, swaɗ na ladara mbe ge num tok yà, jay na pe soo, gaa chiyaya swala.
41014053	Àa gene Zeso ya ge ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe ndwa se. Ge sok mbe go, ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way mage Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme num ma ɓanna ge Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma kwate ya se.
41014054	Piyer ka kàre ne pe ge guwa̰ ya kaal nde ɗiŋ waɗ-ɗa ge ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe zok pul diŋ. Sok mbe go, kaɗ se ɔwal ol ge nda ge koy zok ge Dok ne wa ma ta.
41014055	Ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ma ɓanna ge Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge kun sariya ma peɗ ka ɓyare vin̰a go maa see fare eeya ge Zeso pagal, ndwa hun ne, ɗaŋɗe, àa seɗ fare a̰me ge ne ta ɗu to.
41014056	Ago, nda gḛḛ ka kee sayda ge hày ma ge ne pagal, ɗaŋɗe, sayda ge num way mbe ma be deɗ-ɗa ge sok ge ɗu go to.
41014057	Guwa̰ dwab, a̰me ma ɗege digi, àa kun fare hày mbe no ge ne pagal. Àa jan go:
41014058	I za̰a̰ ne janna go: Mbi mbo gul zok ge Dok ne mbe ge nda duwana ma sḭḭ ne ge maa tok gezi. Ge dwam ge taa ma pul zì, mbi mbo sin ge ɗogle ge nda duwana ma mbo sin ne ya ge maa tok zì to.
41014059	Ɗaŋɗe, koo num sayda keeya mbe ma puy, àa be deɗ-ɗa ge sok ge ɗu go to.
41014060	Sok mbe go, ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe ɗege digi ge ɓase ma tuwal zì, ele ne go: Mo fare a̰me ge gwanna ge fare ge àa ee num ya ge mo pagal go ga mbe ma byalam to de? A ma̰ fare ge nda mbe ma ee num no ge mo pagal ne de?
41014061	Ɗaŋɗe, Zeso kaɗ wa daal, gwan ge fare a̰me ɗu to. Ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe ele ne fare ge ɗogle go: Mo Krist, Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne, Van ge i uware nee ne ɗaŋ de?
41014062	Zeso gwan ge ne janna go: Mbi nee ne. Ḛ mbo kuwa mbi, Van ge Ndu ne kàɗɗa ge mbi Dok, Ba ge pool waɗe-waɗe tok matoson pagal. Ḛ mbo kuwa mbi mboya ya ge pḭḭ ge laaya gutub ma zì.
41014063	Sok mbe go, ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe taabe na ba̰a̰ ma gezi ge na ta, jan go: Nè gwan ɓyare ma sayda ma iya de?
41014064	Ḛ za̰a̰ ne fare janna ge sone kakatag ya go ge Dok pagal. Ḛ dwaɗ gyana de? Àa vin ta mɔɗwag go sariya wan ne ya go ndwa mbo swày.
41014065	A̰me ma cub ɗege too watwa ge ne ta, àa vwal ne ndwa, àa ka sil ne ge maa tok guɗumul, àa jan ne go: Ngay i gale, a huɗi kee mo kaŋ mbe ne de? Nda ge koy zok wa ma ɗege ge ne ta yaaya.
41014066	Ge fare mbe ma ndwa zì, Piyer gale wa ya kàɗɗa ge zok ge pe se ge, pul ge zum-ge go. Moor kale a̰me ɗu ge ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe moor kale ma buwal zì, mbo ya,
41014067	kuwa ne, wa ya ɔwal ol, ndil ne go ɗer, jan ne go: Mo waɗme, mbi kuwa mo dee ɓanna ge Zeso ge Nazareɗ ne.
41014068	Ɗaŋɗe, ne sḛ ee na wa, jan go: Fare mbe ge mo jan ne no, mbi wan ne pe to. Guwa̰, waɗ mbo ge zok wa ge ga̰a̰l zum yà [baare tol fiyaso.]
41014069	Moor kale mbe gwan kuwa ne, ɗege jan nda ge kaa no sok mbe go ma go: Ndu son mbe no, kaa ge ne nda ma buwal zì. Gwan ee na wa.
41014070	Guwa̰ swag, nda ge kaa sok mbe go ma gwan jan Piyer go: A fare ge fareba ne, mo ɗu ge ne nda ma buwal zige ne waɗme, ago mo van Galile ne.
41014071	Sok mbe go, Piyer ka jan digi ge ka̰a̰l ndaal go: Ndu mbe ge ḛ faa ne fare no, mbi kuwa ne to. Kaɗɗa mbi kun hày, mbi guni tene no: N̰a wa vḛḛneya ge Dok ne kaa ge mbi pagal.
41014072	Ge sok mbe go gaw, baare tol fiyaso ge ndwa zi, Piyer pagal dwaɗ fare ge Zeso jin̰a na ne go: Zḛḛ ge go baare mà mbo tol fiyaso ndwa zi, mo mà ee mo wa ndwa taa go mo kuwa mbi to. Sok mbe go ɗege fyalla.
41015001	Aaram pe vḛḛ, ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ma kwate ɓanna ge Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme num mage Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma, ndwa go, Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge kun sariya ma peɗ, ndwa za̰a̰ ta ge fare a̰me pagal ɗu. Sok ge àa za̰a̰ ta go, àa vwal Zeso ya, àa gene ne ya, àa ɓyan ne ge Pilaɗ tok yà me.
41015002	Ge sok mbe go, Pilaɗ ele ne go: Mo gan ga̰a̰l ge Yahuɗ ma way ne de? Zeso gwan ge ne janna go: Mo jin̰a ne no.
41015003	Ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ma ee fare ma gḛḛ-gḛḛ ge ne pagal.
41015004	Pilaɗ gwan ele ne go: Mo za̰a̰ fare ge àa ee num no ge mo pagal ma ya go peɗ de? Fare a̰me ɗu ge mo gwan ge num janna ge pagal ndwa ben tene to de?
41015005	Ɗaŋɗe, Zeso be gwan jan fare a̰me ɗu to baɗ. Fare mbe kee Pilaɗ yal.
41015006	Ge vḛḛso ge paska ne|Paska ne (Dwam vḛḛso ge) ma go tatab, Pilaɗ kaɗ dol ɓase ma ndu ge daŋay zì ya zum ɗu, ge laa ɓyareya ge num way pagal.
41015007	Zane no ɗe, ndu a̰me ɗu ge àa tol ne Barabas wa ya ge daŋay zì ɓanna ge nda ge kee ho̰o̰l ge muluk ge Rom ne ma. Sok kee ho̰o̰l mbe go, àa hṵṵ swày no.
41015008	Ɓase ma mbo ya ge Pilaɗ ta, àa jan ne go, ne kee maa kaŋ ge ne ha̰a̰le kee maa ne ge vḛḛso ge paska ne go.
41015009	Pilaɗ gwan ge num janna go: Ḛ ɓyare go mbi doo ḛ digi gan ga̰a̰l ge Yahuɗ ma way de?
41015010	Jin̰a go mbe ge dape, kaa ge kuwaya tyatyaɗ go, ne yil ee ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ma ne go, num ɓin̰a na Zeso ya gezi.
41015011	Ɗaŋɗe, ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way suti ɓase ma digi go, num jin̰a Pilaɗ ne doo maa ya digi zoo Barabas.
41015012	Pilaɗ gwan hee fare ele num go: Ḛ ɓyare go mbi kee ge ndu ge ḛ tol ne go gan ga̰a̰l ge Yahuɗ ma way gyana de?
41015013	Àa gwan oy digi ge ka̰a̰l ndaal go: Pee ne ge ɔwara kaŋre ta.
41015014	Pilaɗ ele num go: Kee ma̰ sone de? Àa gwan oy digi ge ka̰a̰l ndaal waɗeya go: Pee ne ge ɔwara kaŋre ta!
41015015	Sok mbe go, dol Barabas ya digi ndwa eyal ɓase ma laa. Guwa̰ ge dwagle Zeso ge bol go, hon asagar ma ne ndwa go num mbo pel ne.
41015016	Asagar ma wan Zeso, àa gene ne goformo̰ sok kun sariya zì yà. Àa tol asagar gegene ma ya ge maa ta.
41015017	Àa kan ba̰a̰ ge gan ga̰a̰l ma way ge kàal sasaw ge ne ta, àa tiɗ balme ge gumi tok van ma, àa kubi ne ge ne pagal.
41015018	Guwa̰, àa ɗege coɗ ne janna go: I sa̰a̰ mo wa, gan ga̰a̰l ge Yahuɗ ma way!
41015019	Àa ka keme ne ge ne pagal go ge kɔn̰a, àa sen watwa ge ne ta, àa guu maa ko ma se, àa kubi ta se, ndwa uware ne.
41015020	Guwa̰ ge àa lasage ne go, àa fwage ba̰a̰ ge gan ga̰a̰l ma way ge kàal sasaw mbe ge ne ta gezi, àa kan ne, ne ba̰a̰ ma, àa gene ne suwal guwa̰ zum yà ndwa mbo pel ne ge ɔwara kaŋre ta.
41015021	Ndu a̰me ɗu ge suwal Siren ne, ge àa tol ne Simo̰, a Alekzandr mage Rufus ba ne. Sok jaɗ ge gaaso ya, ka kale mboya ge sok mbe go, asagar ma wan ne, àa ee ne ge pool in kaŋre ge Zeso ne.
41015022	Àa gene Zeso ya ge sok a̰me ge àa tol ne golgota go, ge ne pe wanna no go: Sok ge dḭḭ pagal kal.
41015023	Àa hon ne on̰or jìn̰al kirgiya ge drog ge àa tol ne go mir, ɗaŋɗe, kuri ne be njoɗɗa.
41015024	Àa pel ne ge ɔwara kaŋre ta digi, guwa̰ ge àa pee ne go, sok ɓyare vaa ta ne ba̰a̰ ma go, àa ee daŋ ndwa go ndu ge diige see kaŋ ge daŋ mà deɗ ne ya.
41015025	Àa pee ne gyala horom ndwa go ler wa gezi ɗu ge aram.
41015026	Fare ge ee num kun sariya swày ge Zeso pagal, àa njaŋe ne ge byalga ge àa pee ne ge ne kaŋre pagal digi go: Ano a gan ga̰a̰l ge Yahuɗ ma way ne.
41015027	Àa pel nda ge fiiri vin̰a ma zi ge maa kaŋre ma ta, ge ne ziya ma go, ɗu ge lee matoson go, gegene ge lee magul go me.
41015028	[Ago mbe no, fare ge Njaŋeya ge Dok ne jin̰a go: Àa isi ne ge nda ge kee sone ma buwal zì, wa huy no.]
41015029	-
41015030	Nda ge ka kale mboya ge sok mbe go ma ka pisigi maa pagal, àa ka sal ne, àa ka janna go: Woo! Mo ge jan go: Mo gul zok ge Dok ne se, mo gwan sin ne digi ge dwam ge taa ma pul zì baba, ge sego, mo̰o̰ tene sḛ gale ɗaŋ! Ka̰a̰ mo ko ge ɔwara kaŋre ta digi ya se.
41015031	Ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ma ɓanna ge Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma ka coɗ ne waɗme, àa ka jan ta ge ta buwal zì go: Mon nda ge ɗogle ma ɗag, ne mo̰o̰ tene sḛ gale ɗaŋ!
41015032	N̰a Krist, Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne, gan ga̰a̰l ge Izrayel ma way ka̰a̰ na ko ge ɔwara kaŋre ta digi ya ge sego, ndwa go i wa kuwa, i wa hoɗ fareba ge ne ta me! Nda ge àa pee num dagre ge ne ma ka sal ne waɗme.
41015033	Sok ge gyala pɔgwa taɗ mbiya go, sok mbo ya saa se tṵṵ ɗeɗeg ge suwa pagal peɗ, ɗiŋ mbo gyala swa saa.
41015034	Sok ge gyala tok gasamal ler taa mbiya go, Zeso oy digi ge ka̰a̰l ndaal go: Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani? Ne pe wanna go: Dok ge mbi, Dok ge mbi, ge dape, mo wa seŋe mbi mo guwa̰ go de?
41015035	Nda a̰me ge kaa sok mbe go ma za̰a̰ ne, àa ka janna go: Ḛ za̰a̰ a tol Eli go ne chiya na kṵwa̰ ba!
41015036	Ndu a̰me ɗu ge num buwal zì, chiya mbo hee chifo̰ ya, paa ne ge on̰or jìn̰al ge haɗ-ɗa ka̰a̰mal pagal, tyal ne ge kɔn̰a wa zì, tare ne ne digi yà, ndwa go ne suwa̰me ne njoɗɗa, jan go: Nè ndi gale, Eli mà mbo ya ndage ne ge kaŋre digi ya se de!
41015037	Guwa̰, Zeso oy digi ge ka̰a̰l ndaal, ne on̰om ndage.
41015038	Sok mbe go, ba̰a̰ ge vaa zok ge Dok ne pul taabe tene se buwal zì, ge digi ya ɗiŋ mbo se.
41015039	Ga̰a̰l ge asagar ge kis ma way, ge mḛḛ ge Zeso ndwa nga, sok kuwa ne suuya mbe go ɗe, jan go: Fareba, ndu mbe no, a Dok Van ne.
41015040	Nda zaab a̰me ma kaa ge sok mbe go, num sḛ ma waɗme, àa ka ndil sok ge zum-ma kaal. Ge num buwal zì, Mari ge suwal Magdala ne, Salome, Mari ge Jak ge jiyale mage Joze na̰.
41015041	Num sḛ ma nda ge dee ka kàre ne pe mage kee ne tèmel ma ne, sok ge kaa ge Galile yà. Nda zaab a̰me ge ɗogle ma gḛḛ-gḛḛ, ge àa ɓa̰a̰ ya mboya dagre ge ne, ge Jerusalem diŋ ya ma kaa ge sok mbe go waɗme.
41015042	-
41015043	Sok ge gyala gale wa ya be dinna, Jozef, ndu ga̰a̰l ge hormo ge no ga̰a̰l ge Yahuɗ ma way ge kun sariya ma buwal zì, ge ne suwal no Arimate, ne ge ee na jobreya no ge muluk ge Dok ne ge mbo no ya pagal, yan-na. Ajo̰o̰ ne dwam ge nda nuusi ta ge vḛḛso sabaɗ pe ne ɗe, wan na dul wa mbo ge Pilaɗ ta, ndwa ele ne duul swày ge Zeso ne.
41015044	Sok ge dee ne ta yà, jan ne go Zeso suu ya go. Pilaɗ kee ajab sok ge za̰a̰ go ne suu ya go. Tol asagar ma ga̰a̰l ya ge na ta, ele ne go Zeso suu ge daa day de.
41015045	Sok ge asagar ma ga̰a̰l wa̰a̰ ne fare pe, hon Jozef vin̰a go, ne mbo hee ne duul swày.
41015046	Jozef mbo yaɗ pakta lwaga lalan̰ ya, mbo ya ndage Zeso duul ge kaŋre digi ya se, warge ne ge pakta ge lalan̰ mbe zì, ee ne ge tugul swày ge àa ca ne njal zì. Guwa̰ go, viŋri njal ya, mbo ya dibi tugul mbe wa.
41015047	Mari ge suwal Magdala ne ɓanna ge Mari ge Joze na̰ ka ndil sok ge àa ee ne duul no ge ne go.
41016001	Sok ge gyala dḭḭ se go, vḛḛso ge sabaɗ ne aaya, Mari ge suwal Magdala ne, Salome ɓanna ge Mari ge Jak na̰ ma mbo yaɗ idiir ge huu tii ma ya, ndwa go maa wa mbo suusi num ge Zeso duul swày ta.
41016002	-
41016004	Dumas aram, sok ge gyala hê na pe ya digi ndaaya go, àa kan ta mbo ge sḭḭ pagal yà. Ge vin̰a zì, àa ka ele ta ge ta buwal zì go: A huɗi mà mbo viŋri nè njal ge tugul wa go gezi ne de? Sok ge àa dee yà, àa tan ta go njal na̰ ge ga̰a̰l meg ge dibi tàal wa go viŋri ya gezi.
41016005	Àa waɗ ge tàal zì yà, àa kuwa van dore ɗu kàɗɗa ge maa lee matoson go, ge ba̰a̰ ga̰a̰l saal taɗag ge na ta. Voo mbo ya wan num.
41016006	Ɗaŋɗe, jan num go: Ḛ chiya voo to, mbi kuwa kuwa go ḛ ɓyare Zeso ge suwal Nazareɗ ne, ge àa pee ne ge ɔwara kaŋre ta digi. Daa ge sok mbe no go to, tan-na yà, ḛ ndi sok ge àa fii ne go no.
41016007	Ge sego ḛ mbo, ḛ mbo jan Piyer mage ne nda ge ame hateya gegene ma go, ne mbo ya ge num ndwa zḛḛ yà, ge suwa ge Galile ne yà. A ge sok mbe yà, ḛ wa mbo kuwa ne, dinna ge ne sḛ dee jin̰a ḛ ne go.
41016008	Sok mbe go, àa waɗ ge tugul zì ya zum, àa chiya zum yà, ge sok chiyaya go, voo wan num, àa ɗege kee bagre, num kḭḭ mbo ya ndageya cɔcwaɗ, àa tane be jan ndu fare.
41016009	Sok ge Zeso ta̰a̰ Dumas aaram go, ngay tene zḛḛ gale ge Mari ge suwal Magdala ne ta, ne ge ne sḛ dee yin̰a on̰om ge sone ma ɓỳala ge ne zì zum.
41016010	Ne sḛ mbo wuwage nda ge kàre ne pe ya ma, ge gale no ge sok kee kiimi mage sok fyalla go ma.
41016011	Sok ge àa za̰a̰ ne janna go, na kuwa Zeso, ne ge na ndwa, àa be hoɗ fareba ne fare janna mbe pagal to.
41016012	Guwa̰, Zeso ngay tene ge diir ge ɗogle ge na nda ge ame hateya ge zi ge ka mbo ful zì ma ta.
41016013	Nda ge ame hateya ge zi mbe ma gwan-na ge suwal diŋ, àa wuwage maa ka̰a̰m gegene ma waɗme, ɗaŋɗe, àa gwan kuri be hoɗ fareba num ta.
41016014	Zeso ngay tene ge guwa̰ dwab ge na nda ge ame hateya ge wol pɔgwa ɗu ma ta, àa wa ya zam kaŋ zam. Mḛḛre num ge dul wa twagreya mage hoɗ fareba to ge num way pe. Ge dape, àa be hoɗ fareba ge nda ge kuwa ne tanna digi ma fare ta to.
41016015	Guwa̰, jan num go: Ḛ mbo ge dunin̰a zì peɗ, ḛ oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge ambi ge nda ta peɗ me.
41016016	Ndu ge mbo hoɗ fareba ya, àa kee ne baptem, mbo seɗ monna . Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge mbo kuri ya be hoɗ fareba, àa mbo wan ne ge sariya ge gene ne mbo swày.
41016017	-
41016018	Nda ge mbo hoɗ fareba ya ma: Ge dḭḭl ge ambi zì, àa mbo yan on̰om ge sone ma zum, àa mbo faa wa ge ɗogle ma, àa mbo wan bwam ma ge maa tok, àa njoɗ jiyam ge hun nda ma, go no puy, a̰me mbo kee num to. Àa mbo kee kaɗeya sok ee maa tok ma ge nda ge kee tuguɗi ma pagal, num sḛ mbe ma mbo seɗ zonna. Ano mbe ma no, a kaŋ ge mbo ngayya ma ne go, num nda ge ho fareba ge mbi ta ma ne.
41016019	Guwa̰ ge Bagezok Zeso aa num na fare ma janna go, Dok hee ne, mbo ge ne ge pḭḭ zì yà, mbo kaɗ ge ne tok matoson pagal.
41016020	Guwa̰ ge n̰a na nda ge ame hateya ma go, àa kan ta mbo oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge sok ma go peɗ. Pool ge Bagezok ne kaa dagre ge num. Ka ee num kee kaŋ ajab ma ndwa ngayya go, fare ge num jan mbe ma no, nda kuwa go, num mbo ge na ge Zeso ta ya.
42001001	Ba ge hormo gḛḛ Tewofil, ajo̰o̰ nda gḛḛ ɗege ceme fare, ndwa njaŋe kaŋ ge ka kee ge nè buwal zì ma,
42001002	dinna ge nda ge kuwa kaŋ mbe ma ge maa ndwa, ge pe eeya ya day, àa seŋe nda ge oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ma no, àa dee ya wan nè num pe no,
42001003	mbi vḭḭ tene no go, mbi sḛ waɗme, sok hale fare mbe ma pe kwaɗa hetel go, ge num pe eeya ya day, mbi nuusi mo num njaŋeya ge maa vin̰a go jeɗemer.
42001004	Mbi kee ne ndwa go mo dee ya kuwaya tyatyaɗ go, hateya ge mo see num mbe ma no, num hateya ge fareba ma ne.
42001005	Ge zaman ge Heroɗ ne go, gan ga̰a̰l ge kaa ge suwa ge jude ne pagal, ba ge kee tuwaleya a̰me ɗu, ge àa ka tol ne Zakari, ge doŋ pe ge Abiya ne go, ne gwale wuwa ge rusu ge Aaro̰ ne zì me, àa ka tol ne Elizabeɗ.
42001006	Num sḛ ma jwàg kaa nda ge temel ma, ge Dok ndwa se, àa ka mboya jɔbɔl ge eeya mage wa yuwaleya ge Bagezok ne ma pagal.
42001007	Ɗaŋɗe, àa kaa be van ge dape, Elizabeɗ ba̰a̰ gisil, num sḛ ma jwàg sabe ya gḛḛ ge be tol van to.
42001008	Sok ge ga̰a̰l dee Zakari mage na ka̰a̰m ge gòŋ ma go, ne dwam kee tèmel tuwaleya a̰me go ɗu, ge zok ge Dok ne zì,
42001009	ge mojo̰o̰ nda ge kee tuwaleya ma ha̰a̰le keeya go, deɗ-ɗa go daŋ dee ne, ndwa waɗ ge sok ge harcal ge Bagezok ne ziya yà, mbo ɗusi ɔwara ge huu tii ma.
42001010	Sok ge àa ɗege ɗusi ɔwara ge huu tii mbe go, ɓase ma kaɗ tabeya zum didib, àa ka kee kaɗeya me.
42001011	Ge sok mbe go waɗme ɗe, malayka ge Bagezok ne dyan tene ge ne ta, mḛḛya ge twal tuwaleya ge àa til ɔwara ge huu tii ma no ne pagal, lee ge matoson go.
42001012	Sok ge Zakari ka̰a̰ na ndwa kuwa ne, iigi digi, voo mbo ya wan ne.
42001013	Ɗaŋɗe, malayka mbe jan ne go: Zakari, chiya voo to, ago Dok za̰a̰ mo kaɗeya ma ya go. Mo gwale Elizabeɗ mbo tol mo van son ɗu, mo mbo hon ne dḭḭl Yohana.
42001014	Mbo ee mo kee laa saal mage kàɗɗa fafan̰, nda gḛḛ mbo kee laa saal ge ne tolla pe.
42001015	Ago mbo kaɗ ndu ge ngaraŋ ne ge Bagezok pe, mbo njoɗ on̰or jìn̰al koo jìn̰al ge ɗogle a̰me ge fere nda to me, On̰om ge Harcal mbo biri ne iya ge na na̰ laa zì ya day.
42001016	Mbo gwan ge Izrayel van ma ya gḛḛ ge Bagezok Dok ge num way ta.
42001017	Mbo mbo ya ge mojo̰o̰ temeya ge Dok ne go, ge on̰om mage pool ge Eli kaa ge num ma, ndwa gwan ge ba mage van ma dwaɗɗa ma ya ge sok ge ɗu go, ee nda ge birtiŋ ma dwaɗɗa ge mojo̰o̰ nda ge temel ma dwaɗ go, ee ɓase nuusiya guwa ge ame Bagezok.
42001018	Zakari jan malayka go: A ge ma̰ kaŋ ta ɗoo, mbi wa mbo kuwaya go fare ge mo jan ne fare ge fareba ne de? Ago mbi haɗ-ɗa sabar iya, mbi gwale puy ne del ma kee ya gḛḛ me.
42001019	Malayka gwan ne fare janna go: A mbi Gabriyel, gorpol ge Dok nee ne. Ne sḛ teme mbi ya jan mo fare, ndwa wuwage mo Fare ge Kwaɗa mbe no.
42001020	Ajo̰o̰ mo be hoɗ fareba ge fare janna ge ambi mbe ge Dok mbo huy num wa ya ge maa sok ma go tem ma pagal to ɗe, za̰a̰ gale: Mo ɗel mbo taɗ, mo mbo ɗege faa wa ge sok ge fare mbe ma wa mbo huyya ne mbḛḛ.
42001021	Ɓase ma sok da̰a̰re Zakari go, àa ka kee ajab ge ne pagal wanna ge wa̰a̰ kaal ge sok ge harcal zì yà pe.
42001022	Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge wuwa ya zum go, seɗ wa ge faaya to, gaa kaa num na tok, ne ɗel gaa se taɗɗa baba, num sḛ ma kuwa go ne see fare taaya a̰me ge zok ge Dok ne zì ya.
42001023	Dwam ge ne tèmel keeya ma wa huy go ɗe, gwan mbo na diŋ yà,
42001024	Guwa̰ ge fare mbe ma way go, ne gwale Elizabeɗ hee emel. Ka way tene ge na emel mbe ɗiŋ saba nuwan̰, ka jan na laa zì go:
42001025	Ḛ ndi kaŋ ge Bagezok kee ya ge mbi ɗoo me, ge sok ge na vḭḭ tene ndage mbi ge daŋso zì go tem, ge nda duwana ma buwal zì ba!
42001026	Elizabeɗ waɗ ja na saba ge menengal zì, Dok teme malayka Gabriyel ya ge suwa ge Galile ne go, ge suwal ga̰a̰l ge àa tol ne Nazareɗ diŋ.
42001027	Teme ne ge van gwale ge na na̰ tok jan ta, ne ge ndu son a̰me ge àa ka tol ne Jozef, ge no rusu ge Daviɗ ne zì ka dwam ne. Van gwale ge na̰ tok jan mbe dḭḭl kaa Mari.
42001028	Waɗ-ɗa ge ne ta diŋ, jan ne go: Wa sanna mo ta, Bagezok ngay kwaɗa keeya ge na ne ya mo ta, a ɓanna dagre ge mo.
42001029	Fare mbe ma iigi ne digi giliw, ka ele tene go wa sanna ge go mbe ma pe wanna gyana de?
42001030	Malayka gwan jan ne go: Chiya voo to, Mari, ago Dok ngay kwaɗa keeya ge na ne ya go mo ta.
42001031	Kuwa go, mo mbo hee emel, mo mbo tol van son ɗu, mo mbo hon ne dḭḭl go Zeso.
42001032	Mbo kaɗ ndu ge ciciliŋ ne, Dok ge no pḭḭ ma zì yà mbo tol ne na van. Bagezok Dok, mbo hon ne pool ge kee muluk ge ne baŋ Daviɗ kaa go.
42001033	Mbo kee muluk ge rusu ge Jakob ne pagal ɗiŋ ge din, ne muluk mbe mbo aa to baɗ.
42001034	Mari gwan ge Malayka janna go: Ano mbe mà deɗ-ɗa keeya pe gyana de? Ago mbi be kuwa ndu son ɗu to me ɗe!
42001035	Malayka gwan ne fare janna go: On̰om ge Harcal mbo kee na tèmel ma mo zì, Dok ge pool ge no pḭḭ ma zì yà mbo kulbi mo se ge mojo̰o̰ soŋon̰ go. A ge pe, mbo ee nda tol ne Dok Van, sok ge van ge harcal mbe mbo tol-la go.
42001036	Kuwa go Elizabeɗ ge mo pe rusu waɗme, a sabe ya no puy ɗe, a go ge emel, van son ge na laa zì, ne mbe ge nda ka dwaɗɗa go ne ba̰ gisil, wuwa ya ge na saba ge menengal zì no.
42001037	Ago, kaŋ a̰me ge haŋle ge Dok ta to.
42001038	Sok mbe go Mari jan ne go: Moor kale ge Bagezok ne no, mbi vin go go Dok kee na laa ɓyareya ge mbi ta ge mojo̰o̰ mo jan mbi ne no go. Malayka n̰a ne, mbo.
42001039	Ge dwam mbe ma guwa̰ swag, Mari haa tene vun cab, ndwa mbo suwal ga̰a̰l a̰me yà, ge no suwa ge Juda ne sok a̰me ge njal ma no ne go.
42001040	Sok ge dee yà, waɗ-ɗa ge Zakari zok diŋ, hon Elizabeɗ na wa sanna ma.
42001041	Ɗeɗ-ɗa go, sok ge Elizabeɗ za̰a̰ Mari ka̰a̰l san na wa, van ɗege n̰aɗe tene ne laa zì. On̰om ge Harcal mbo ya biri Elizabeɗ.
42001042	Sok mbe go, oy digi ge ka̰a̰l ndaal go: Mo go ge wa tare ge nda zaab buwal zì, wa tare go ge van ge mo laa zige pagal me.
42001043	Mbi daa huɗi ne ge go, mbi Bagezok na̰ wa mbo waɗɗa ge mbi ɗiŋ de?
42001044	Kuwa gale, sok ge mo ka̰a̰l dee ya mbi tɔgwa zì, sok san mbi wa go, van ɗege n̰aɗe tene ge mbi laa zì no ndwa kee laa saal.
42001045	Laa saal ge mo pe, ge dape, mo hoɗ fareba go go, Bagezok Dok huy fare ge na wuwage mo num ma wa huy.
42001046	Sok mbe go, Mari jan go: Mbi sḛ uware Bagezok.
42001047	Mbi ge laa saal fafan̰ ge mbi on̰om zì, Ge Dok, mbi Ba ge monna pe,
42001048	Ge dape, ndii hoɗegeya ge na moor kale ne. Kuwa go, ge sego nda duwana ma ge doŋ pe ma go peɗ Mbo gaa janna go, mbi gwale ge see wa tare ne.
42001049	Ge dape Ba ge pool waɗe-waɗe Kê kaŋ ge ɓaŋlaŋ ma ge mbi pe. Ne dḭḭl Ba ge Harcal .
42001050	Ngay kuwa a̰se ge na ne ge nda ge chiya na voo ma ta, Doŋ pe ma ge doŋ pe ma.
42001051	Ge tok pool ge na ne ta, Nda ge no ge dwaɗɗa ge pagal ga̰a̰l Ge maa dul wa zì ma be seɗ sok ge ee maa ko se to.
42001052	Yin̰a gan ga̰a̰l ma gezi Ge maa hòol muluk ma pagal ge tok pool ge na ne no, Ɗaŋɗe, hê nda ge suul lɔlɔgwaɗ ma pagal digi no.
42001053	Ge camal ma, Ee num an̰n̰a ge kaŋ kwaɗa ma, Num ge gan ma me ɗe, N̰a num no tok bam-bam me.
42001054	Chiya Izrayel na ndu ge tèmel kṵwa̰ no, Ge kuwa a̰se ge na ne pe, Be vyale ge ne to.
42001055	Ano a wa tii ge ke nè baŋ Abraham Mage na rusu ma nee ne, Ge ndwa ɗiŋ ge din.
42001056	Mari kaɗ ge Elizabeɗ, guwa ge saba taa, guwa̰, gwan mbo na sok kàɗɗa yà.
42001057	Sok ge Elizabeɗ dwam kee twàl mbiya go, mbo ya tol van son.
42001058	Ne nda ge zok pe mage ne rusu ma za̰a̰ go, Bagezok ngay kuwa a̰se ge na ne ya ne ta, àa kee laa saal ɓanna ge ne.
42001059	Ɗeɗ-ɗa dwam ge wa gezi zi, ne tolla guwa̰, àa mbo ya vyan van bḛḛ, àa ɓyare hon ne dḭḭl ge ne ba ta, ndwa go Zakari.
42001060	Ɗaŋɗe, ne na̰ hee fare, jan num go: To, ɓyare nè too ne Yohana.
42001061	Àa gwan ge ne janna go: Ge ḛ rusu zì, a huɗi ge àa ka tol ne ge dḭḭl mbe no ne de?
42001062	Àa ɗege kaa ne ba tok ele ne ndwa kuwaya go, ne ɓyare tol ne gyana de?
42001063	Zakari ele byalga van ɗu, njaŋe ya ne go go: Ne dḭḭl Yohana. Nda peɗ mbo ya kee ajab.
42001064	Ge sok mbe go gaw, ne wa hage, ne ɗel fen digi, ɗege faa wa, ee pe sale Dok.
42001065	Voo mbo ya wan nda ge num zok pe ma peɗ. Nda ge kaa no njal kin̰a ge Jude ne go ma peɗ gaa ge fare mbe siɗigiya.
42001066	Nda peɗ ge fare mbe ma dee num tɔgwa zì ma koy num ge maa dul wa ma zì. Àa ka ele ta go: Van jiyale mbe mbo kaɗ de gyana de? Ago, pool ge Bagezok ne kaa dagre ge ne.
42001067	On̰om ge Harcal mbo ya huy van kaare ba Zakari, sok mbe go, ɗege jan fare ge ka̰a̰l ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma way go:
42001068	Bagezok, Dok ge Izrayel van ma way Dḭḭl see uwareya, Ge dape duwa ge nè, Ɓase ge na ne ma, zû nè no.
42001069	Ho̰ ne Ndu ge mon nda ge mbyaɗɗa tab, Ge na ndu ge tèmel Daviɗ rusu zì,
42001070	Dinna ge dee jin̰a fare mbe ge zḛḛ ya day Ge na nda ge zwagre na wa ge harcal ma wa zì go:
42001071	Na mbo mon nè ge nè nda ge ho̰o̰l ma tok zì ya, Ge nè nda ge kone nè ma tok ya peɗ me.
42001072	A go mbe no, ngay kuwa a̰se ge na ne ge nè baŋ ma ta no. Be vyale ge na wa tii ge harcal ge na vuwa to,
42001073	Ajo̰o̰ na guni tene ge nè baŋ Abraham ta,
42001074	A go mbe no, guwa̰ ge mo̰o̰ nè ge nè nda ge ho̰o̰l ma tok zì ya, Hon nè pool ndwa kee na tèmel be voo no,
42001075	Ge harcal zì, ge temel pagal me, ge na ndwa se, Ge dwam kàɗɗa ge nè ne ma zì peɗ.
42001076	Kaɗɗa ge mo ɗe, van jiyale, Mo mbo kaɗ ndu ge zwagre Dok ge no pḭḭ ma zì yà wa, Ago mo mbo mbo ya nè Bagezok ndwa zḛḛ, Ndwa nuusi ne vin̰a ma.
42001077	Ndwa tyan ɓase ma pagal gezi go, Bagezok mbe ge pool mon num, Sok pore num num sone ma go.
42001078	Ano mbe dee ya keeya ge kuwa a̰se Ge be walape ge Dok ge nè ne ta. Mbo ee kɔn̰al zen ge pḭḭ zì ya nè pagal, Dinna ge gyala ge ndaa ge mbii ya go,
42001079	Tyan kɔn̰al ya, Ge num ge kaa no ge tṵṵ ge ɗeɗeg ge swày ne zì ma ta, Ndwa ee nè ko ma mboya ge vin̰a pul ge halas ne go.
42001080	Kaɗɗa ge van jiyale ɗe, ka donna, ka haɗ pool ge na on̰om zì. Ka walla ge babur pul yà, ɗiŋ ge dwam ge dee ya ngay tene ge ɓase ge Izrayel ne ma ta.
42002001	Ɗeɗ-ɗa ge zaman mbe ma go go, Sezar Ogust hoɗ na wa go àa isi nda ge suwa pagal go ma peɗ.
42002002	Isi nda mbe kaa isiya ge zḛḛge ne, ge zaman ge Kiriniyus ne go, wa ya goformo̰ ne ge suwa ge Siri ne pagal.
42002003	Ge wa hoɗɗa mbe pagal, nda peɗ ka mboya go àa isi maa, ndu ge diige ge na baŋ ma suwal sḛ diŋ.
42002004	Jozef sḛ waɗme ɗege ge suwal ga̰a̰l Nazareɗ diŋ, ge no suwa ge Galile ne go, ndwa mbo ge Jude yà, ge suwal ga̰a̰l ge Daviɗ ne diŋ, ge àa tol ne Betlehem, ge dape wuwa ge vuwal pe ge Daviɗ ne zì.
42002005	Mbo yà ndwa mbo njaŋe na dḭḭl ɓanna ge Mari ge na ka dwam ne, Mari kaa ge na sḛ.
42002006	Sok ge àa dee ya suwal Betlehem diŋ, dwam twàl ge Mari ne ma mbyaɗ,
42002007	tol na van son ge pul sway mbe, laa ne zì ge ba̰a̰, fii ne ge kaŋ kan kaŋ kogor ma kaŋ zam go, ge dape sok be kaɗ ge num pe ge zok gɔswal zì to.
42002008	Ge suwa mbe go waɗme, nda ge koy tame ma kaa ful zì yà, dwamma ge ndwa, sok koy maa vwag kaŋ kogor ma go ɗaal zì.
42002009	Malayka ge Bagezok ne a̰me ɗu dyan tene ge num ta, pool ge Dok ne dinna ge kɔn̰al go mbo ya kulbi num se. Voo mbo ya waɗ ge num zì cɔcwab.
42002010	Ɗaŋɗe, malayka jan num go: Ḛ chiya voo to, ago mbi mbo ya wuwage ḛ Fare ge Kwaɗa, ge mbo ee ɓase ge Izrayel ma way ma peɗ kee laa saal gḛḛ.
42002011	Ḛ kuwa go, ge ɗaal mbe no zì, ge suwal ga̰a̰l ge Daviɗ ne diŋ, àa tol Ba ge mon ḛ ya go, ne sḛ Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne, Ndu ge Dok taa nee ne, kaɗ Bagezok me.
42002012	Ḛ mà seɗ van kaare a̰me laaya zì ge ba̰a̰, fiiya ge kaŋ kan kaŋ kogor ma kaŋ zam go, a ge ano mbe ma no ta, ḛ mà mbo kuwa ne.
42002013	Tugcug, malayka mbe ɓanna ge ɓaraŋ vwag twam ma nɔnɔg, ge mbô no ge digi zì ya ma ɗege uware Dok, àa ka janna go:
42002014	Dok ge no pḭḭ ma zì yà mbiya seɗ hormo, Nda duwana ge suwa pagal, Ge Dok za̰a̰ tii no ge num pe ma, Halas ne kaa num pagal me.
42002015	Sok ge malayka ma n̰a num, àa gwan mbo pḭḭ zì yà, nda ge koy tame ma ɗege jan ta ta buwal zì go: Ḛ mbo nè suwal Betlehem yà, nè mbo kuwa kaŋ ge a kê, ge Bagezok teme malayka ya jan nè.
42002016	Àa haa ta vun cab mboya, àa seɗ sok ge Mari mage Jozef no go, van kaare fiiya, ge kaŋ kan kaŋ kogor ma kaŋ zam go me.
42002017	Sok ge àa kuwa ne, àa wan fare ge malayka jin̰a maa num, ge van jiyale mbe pe ma pe.
42002018	Nda peɗ ge za̰a̰ fare ge nda ge koy tame ma ka wanna ma, kee ajab.
42002019	Kaɗɗa ge Mari ɗe, ka koy fare mbe ma peɗ na dul wa zì, ka ele tene fare gḛḛ ge num pagal me.
42002020	Nda ge koy tame ma gwan mbo ful zì, àa ka sale Dok, àa ka gwan ge mersi hon ne, ge kaŋ ge maa za̰a̰ ma pe, ge maa dee ya kuwa num no ma pe peɗ me, ndwa go fare mbe ma kee tetem ge mojo̰o̰ àa wuwage maa num go.
42002021	Sok ge dwam ge wa gezi zi ma mbiya go, àa vyan ne bḛḛ, àa hon ne dḭḭl go Zeso, dḭḭl ge malayka ngay Mari ne, zḛḛ ge go ne hê ne emel.
42002022	Sok ge dwam ma mbiya go, Jozef mage Mari kee vḛḛso ge haɗ ta kɔn̰al, ge eeya ge Moyiz ne pagal, àa gene van jiyale mbe ya ge Jerusalem diŋ, ndwa ngay Bagezok ne.
42002023	Ge mojo̰o̰ eeya ge Bagezok ne jin̰a go: «Van son ge pul sway ge diige peɗ, àa mbo mbege ne gezi caɗ ge Bagezok pe.»
42002024	Àa mbo ya ndwa hon bobo ge tuwaleya pe, ge mojo̰o̰ eeya ge Bagezok ne jin̰a go: «Ndwa go tugtug ma kab koo maale van ma zi.»
42002025	Ge del mbe ma go, ge Jerusalem diŋ, ndu a̰me ɗu àa ka tol ne Simeyo̰. Kaa ndu ge temel, kaɗ ge voo ge Dok ne na zì, ka jobre zuuya ge Izrayel van ma way, On̰om ge Harcal kaɗ ne zì me.
42002026	On̰om ge Harcal mbe tin̰a ne pagal gezi no go: Zḛḛ ge go mo see swày, mo mbo kuwa Krist, Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne, ne ge no temeya ge Bagezok Dok ne ɓiya.
42002027	On̰om ge Dok ne gene ne mbo ge zok ge Dok ne zì yà, ge dwam ge van jiyale Zeso ba ma gene ne ge Dok ndwa se yà go, ge mojo̰o̰ nda ha̰a̰le keeya ge eeya ma pagal go.
42002028	Simeyo̰ wan ne ge na tok go, kee mersi hon Dok, jan go me:
42002029	«Ge sego, Bagezok, mo huy wa tii ge mo ya go, N̰a mo ndu ge tèmel ne mbo ge dul wa eyalla.
42002030	A fareba go mbi kuwa Ndu ge mon nda ya go ge mbi ndwa
42002031	Ne ge nuusi nuusi no ge Mo ta ya go Rusu ge suwa pagal ma peɗ num kuwa Ne.
42002032	Kɔn̰al mbe ge mbo ee nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma ya kuwa mo ge Dok, Pate ɓase ge amo, Izrayel van ma me.»
42002033	Ne ba mage ne na̰ ka kee ajab ge fare ge Simeyo̰ ka janna ge ne pe.
42002034	Simeyo̰ kee wa tare ge num pagal, guwa̰, jan ne na̰ Mari go: Kuwa go: Dok temeya ge teme van mbe no ya, mbo ee nda gḛḛ ge Izrayel van ma buwal zige ma deɗɗa me no, nda gḛḛ ɗege digi me. Mbo kaɗ kaŋ ge ngay ne go Dok go, nda mbo kuri ne me.
42002035	Mbo ee nda kuɗ fare ge way no maa dul wa zì ma ya zum, kaɗɗa ge mo ɗe, gwale, dwaɗɗa mbo kun mo dul wa se ɓaɓaɗ ge kasagar vḛḛne kaŋ go.
42002036	Ge del mbe ma go waɗme, ndu gwale ge zwagre Dok wa a̰me ɗu kaa, ne dḭḭl Hanatu. A Fanuwel ge no ge vuwal pe ge Azer ne zì van ge gwale ne. Sabe go gɔgwa. Kê del ɓỳala ge na obe ge maa ge ne kaa zok ge pe swala day,
42002037	gaa kumu no. Sok ge kee del kis wa gezi zi pɔgwa ndà, gaa kàɗɗa ɗaɗag ge zok ge Dok ne zì, ɗaal mage gyala ka kee ne tèmel, sok wan mam njuwal mage kaɗeya go.
42002038	Ne sḛ deɗ-ɗa ge sok mbe go waɗme, ɗege gwan ge mersi hon Dok, ka faa fare ge Zeso ne, ge num ge ka da̰a̰re zuuya ge Jerusalem ne ma ta peɗ.
42002039	Guwa̰ ge Jozef mage Mari huy kaŋ ge eeya ge Bagezok ne ɓyare ge maa ta ma wa go peɗ, àa gwan ge maa sok kàɗɗa Nazareɗ yà, ge no suwa ge Galile ne go.
42002040	Sok mbe go, van jiyale ka donna, ka haɗ pool ge fare kuwaya zì. Kaɗ ndu ge andaŋ, kuwa a̰se ge Dok ne kaɗ ne pagal me.
42002041	Del ma tatab, ne ba ma ka mbo Jerusalem, ge vḛḛso ge Paska ne pe.
42002042	Ge mojo̰o̰ nda ha̰a̰le keeya dwam vḛḛso mbe go go, sok ge Zeso haa ge del wol pɔgwa zi, ɓan mbo Jerusalem dagre ge na ba ma.
42002043	Guwa̰ ge dwam ge vḛḛso ne ma aa go, àa gwan ndwa mbo maa sok kàɗɗa yà, van jiyale Zeso gaa Jerusalem diŋ. Ɗaŋɗe, ne ba mage ne na̰ be wan pe go, ne gaa ya se yà to.
42002044	Àa ka dwaɗ go, ne kaɗ mà nda ge maa ge num ɓa̰a̰ mbo gɔswal ma buwal zì. Guwa̰ ge àa kê dwam ɗu sok mboya vin̰a zì go, àa ɓyare ne ge maa sele mage maa nda ge kuwaya ma buwal zì.
42002045	Ɗaŋɗe, àa seɗ ne to, àa gwan mbo Jerusalem mbo ɓyare ne.
42002046	Ge dwam ge taa pagal, àa mbo seɗ ne ge zok ge Dok ne zì, kàɗɗa ge Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma buwal zì za̰a̰ num, ka ele num fare me.
42002047	Nda ge ka za̰a̰ ne ma peɗ ka kee ajab ge fare kuwaya mage ne fare gwanna ge ka gwan nda pe me.
42002048	Sok ge ne ba ma kuwa ne ɗe, num wa a̰a̰le, ne na̰ jan ne go: Mbi van, mo daa kê i kaŋ mbe go gyana de? Kuwa go, i ge mo ba iigiya digi sok ɓyare mo go.
42002049	Ne sḛ gwan ge num janna go: Ḛ ɓyare mbi ge dape de? Ḛ wan pe go mbi hon tene ge mbi Ba tèmel pe to de?
42002050	Ɗaŋɗe, àa wan fare ge ne ɓyare jan maa pe to.
42002051	Guwa̰, ɓan mbo Nazareɗ dagre ge num, ndwa go, guwa̰ na pagal ge num pe se. Ne na̰ ka koy fare mbe ma peɗ ge na dul wa zì.
42002052	Kaɗɗa ge Zeso ɗe, ka donna, ka haɗ andaŋ ɗogle-ɗogle, ka donna ge kwaɗa keeya zì, Dok laa wan ne, nda duwana ma laa wan ne me.
42003001	Del ge wol pɔgwa nuwan̰ ge Sezar Tiber ne, ge muluk ge na ne zì, sok mbe go, Pons Pilaɗ wa ya goformo̰ ge Jude ne, Heroɗ ge gan ga̰a̰l ge Galile ne, ne na̰ van Filib gan ga̰a̰l ge suwa ge Iture mage Trakoniɗ ne, Lisaniyas gan ga̰a̰l ge Abilen ne me,
42003002	ge zaman ge An mage Kayf ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ma ne go, Dok mbo ya ɓyan na fare ge Yohana ge Zakari van tok go, babur pul yà.
42003003	Yohana ɗege anna ge suwa ge mangaɗam ga̰a̰l Urdun ziya guguwa ma go peɗ, ka oy fare gezi waŋ go: «Ḛ kee baptem ge ngay go ḛ seŋe ta ja se, Dok wa pore ḛ ge ḛ kaŋ keeya ge sone ma go gezi.»
42003004	Sok kee ano mbe go, kee fare ge maktub ge Nda ge zwagre Dok wa Ezay ne jan no go: «Ano a ka̰a̰l ge ndu ge oy no ge babur pul go nee ne, Ḛ ca vin̰a ge Bagezok pe, Ḛ haa vin̰a ma temel ge ne pe me.
42003005	Ḛ mbuu sok ge baal ge diige ma peɗ, Ḛ haa sok njal ma se yà sataɗ, Ḛ seŋe vin̰a ge wargal gɔgɔrɔŋ ma temel taɗ, Ḛ haa sok ɓuɓugur ma ta̰a̰sal
42003006	Ndu ge diige peɗ mbo kuwa monna ge Dok ne gezi tyatyaɗ.»
42003007	Nda gḛḛ ka mbo ya ge Yohana ta, ne kê maa baptem, ne sḛ ka jan num go: Rusu ge dḭḭ ta ge gole go ma, a huɗi hate ḛ chiya twam ge Dok ne ge mbo no ya voo ne de?
42003008	Ḛ mbo mboya ge jwab ge ngay go ḛ seŋe ta ja se. Ḛ kaa ge be ee ḛ pagal zì go: I mbo seɗ monna, ge dape i sḛ ma daa Abraham baŋ ma ne kade to. Ago mbi jan ḛ zum waŋ go, Dok ge pool seŋe njal ge ḛ kuwa num mbe ma no ma Abraham baŋ ma.
42003009	Cay ee ya ee zoo ge ɔwara ma pe go, ɔwara ge diige peɗ ge tol ndwa ge kwaɗa to, àa chal ne gezi, àa dol ne ol zì.
42003010	Ɓase ma ka ele ne go: Dok ɓyare ge i ta ma̰ kaŋ de?
42003011	Gwan ge num janna go: Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me ge ḛ buwal zige go ge ba̰a̰ zi, ne ɔwabe ɗu hon ndu ge no be ba̰a̰, ndu ge no go ge kaŋ zam na diŋ, ne ke mbe go ca.
42003012	Nda ge chal siyal ma mbo ya waɗme go Yohana ke maa baptem, àa ele ne go: Ba ge hate nda, Dok ɓyare ge i ta ma̰ kaŋ de?
42003013	Jan num go: Ḛ ele kaŋ ge àa ho wa ge eeya ma ta go àa kê num ma ɗeŋew.
42003014	Asagar ma ele ne waɗme go: I ɗe, Dok ɓyare ge i ta ma̰ kaŋ de? Gwan ge num janna go: Ḛ harge ndu a̰me kaŋ to, ḛ kun hày ge ndu pagal to, ɗaŋɗe, ḛ ke tii ge poɗɗa ge àa poɗ ḛ ɗeŋew.
42003015	Ajo̰o̰ ɓase ma sok da̰a̰reya go, ndu ge diige ka ele tene go Yohana mbe sḛ no ne kaɗ mà Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne, Ndu ge Dok taa nee ne to de.
42003016	Sok mbe go, Yohana gwan ge nda mbe ma peɗ janna go: Kaɗɗa ge mbi, mbi kee ḛ baptem ge mam se ge, ɗaŋɗe, Ndu ge pool gḛḛ waɗeya, mbo ya, mbi be mbyaɗ ge saa ne tyako ma tàal to peɗ. Ne sḛ mbo kee ḛ baptem ge On̰om ge Harcal mage ol.
42003017	A ge ta̰a̰l in̰ale swa ge na tok go, mbo in̰ale na swa gezi mɔɗwag, gisi mboo mbo kan ne ge ol ge piri to zì yà, ɗaŋɗe, kwate na swa ndwa ge hal se.
42003018	Sok faa ɓase ma fare ge ɗogle ma gḛḛ-gḛḛ go, dee ya jan num Fare ge Kwaɗa ge Dok ne no.
42003019	Yohana mḛḛre Heroɗ ge gan ga̰a̰l waɗme, ge ne hee Herodiyaɗ, ge na na̰ van gwale pe, ge kaŋ keeya ge ne ne ge sone ge dogle ma pe peɗ me.
42003020	Ge fare mbe no pe, gwan waɗ sone ge waɗe mbe ge zḛḛge zì iya, sok dibi Yohana ge daŋay zì go.
42003021	Sok ge Yohana ke ɓase ma peɗ baptem go, kee Zeso baptem waɗme. Guwa̰ ge ke baptem go, Zeso ɗege kaɗeya, pḭḭ tyan gezi,
42003022	On̰om ge Harcal siri ge digi ya gelel ne pagal dinna ge maale go. Nda za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l a̰me ge pḭḭ zì ya, janna go: Mo mbi van ne, mbi laa wa̰a̰ mo gḛḛ, mbi sḛ kee tii ge mo pe.
42003023	Sok ge Zeso ee pe kee na tèmel go, ne del ka guwa ge del tapool ɗu. Nda ka dwaɗɗa go ne Jozef van ne, Jozef ge Eli van,
42003024	Eli ge Mataɗ van, Mataɗ ge Levi van, Levi ge Melki van, Melki ge Yanay van, Yanay ge Jozef van,
42003025	Jozef ge Matatiyas van, Matatiyas ge Amos van, Amos ge Nahum van, Nahum ge Esli van, Esli ge Nagay van,
42003026	Nagay ge Maɗ van, Maɗ ge Matatiyas van, Matatiyas ge Semeyin van, Semeyin ge Yosek van, Yosek ge Yoda van,
42003027	Yoda ge Yohana van, Yohana ge Reza van, Reza ge Zorobabel van, Zorobabel ge Salasiyel van, Salasiyel ge Neri van,
42003028	Neri ge Melki van, Melki ge Adi van, Adi ge Kosam van, Kosam ge Elmadam van, Elmadam ge Er van,
42003029	Er ge Zeso van, Zeso ge Eliyazar van, Eliyazar ge Yorim van, Yorim ge Mataɗ van, Mataɗ ge Levi van,
42003030	Levi ge Simeyo̰ van, Simeyo̰ ge Yudas van, Yudas ge Jozef van, Jozef ge Yonam van, Yonam ge Eliyakim van,
42003031	Eliyakim ge Meleya van, Meleya ge Mena van, Mena ge Matata van, Matata ge Natan van, Natan ge Daviɗ van,
42003032	Daviɗ ge Jese van, Jese ge Obeɗ van, Obeɗ ge Buwaza van, Buwaza ge Sala van, Sala ge Nason van,
42003033	Nason ge Aminadab van, Aminadab ge Admin van, Admin ge Arni van, Arni ge Esrom van, Esrom ge Perez van, Perez ge Juda van,
42003034	Juda ge Jakob van, Jakob ge Isak van, Isak ge Abraham van, Abraham ge Tera van, Tera ge Nakor van,
42003035	Nakor ge Serug van, Serug ge Rehu van, Rehu ge Peleg van, Peleg ge Eber van, Eber ge Sala van,
42003036	Sala ge Kaynum van, Kaynum ge Arpakaɗ van, Arpakaɗ ge Sem van, Sem ge Nowe van, Nowe ge Lemeg van,
42003037	Lemeg ge Matusalem van, Matusalem ge Enok van, Enok ge Yereɗ van, Yereɗ ge Malaleyel van, Malaleyel ge Kaynum van,
42003038	Kaynum ge Enok van, Enok ge Seɗ van, Seɗ ge Adam van, Adam Dok kaŋ dolla ne.
42004001	Guwa̰ ge Zeso biri ge On̰om ge Harcal go, ɗege ge mangaɗam ga̰a̰l Urdun wa ya, On̰om ge Dok ne mbe gene ne ɗiŋ ge babur pul yà.
42004002	Ge sok mbe go, Ba ge ho̰o̰l hee ne pe ɗiŋ dwam warndà. Ge dwam mbe ma pul zì, be zam a̰me to, num wa aaya go, camal wan ne.
42004003	Sok mbe go Ba ge ho̰o̰l jan ne go: Kaɗɗa go fareba mo Dok Van ne, ho njal mbe mo wa go ne seŋe kaŋ zam.
42004004	Zeso gwan ge ne janna go: Njaŋeya ge Dok ne jan go: «A be kaŋ zam ɗeŋew mbo ee ndu duwana kaɗ ge ndwa ne to.»
42004005	Ba ge ho̰o̰l gene ne ge sok ge haal waɗeya digi ya, baŋ go velgeteg ngay ne muluk ge dunin̰a ne ma peɗ.
42004006	-
42004007	Ba ge ho̰o̰l mbe jan ne go: Kaɗɗa mo guu mo ko ya mbi ndwa se, mbi mà hon mo pool mage kaŋ kwaɗa ge muluk mbe ma way ma no peɗ. Àa mbo gaa amo ma ge ɓul mɔɗwag. Ago àa ho̰ num mbi, mbi ge pool hon ne ndu ge diige ge mbi laa ɓyare hon ne ne.
42004008	Zeso gwan ne janna go: «Àa njaŋe go: “Mo mbo uware Bagezok, Dok ge amo, mo mbo kee ne sḛ ɗu kikiɗ tèmel.”»
42004009	Guwa̰, Ba ge ho̰o̰l gene ne ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem yà iya, ee ne ge zok ge Dok ne sok a̰me ge haal waɗeya pagal digi, jan ne go: Kaɗɗa go fareba mo Dok Van ne, doo tene ge digi ya se,
42004010	ago Njaŋeya ge Dok ne jan go: «Mbo hoɗ na malayka ma na wa ge mo pe go, num cage mo.
42004011	Àa mbo wan mo ge maa tok digi caɗ, ge go mo ko chiya ge njal sok van a̰me ta to.»
42004012	Zeso gwan ne janna go: Njaŋeya ge Dok ne jan zì go: «Mo mbo hee Bagezok, Dok ge amo pe to.»
42004013	Guwa̰ ge Ba ge ho̰o̰l aa na zwam ge hee Zeso pe ma go peɗ, ɔwabe tene ge ne ta ndwa da̰a̰re vin̰a a̰me ge ɗogle.
42004014	Zeso gwan-na ge Galile go, ge pool ge On̰om ge Dok ne mbe ge ka ɗeme ne ta, ne dḭḭl mbo ya faa ge suwa mbe go mɔɗwag.
42004015	Ka hate nda Fare ge Kwaɗa, ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way ma zì, nda peɗ ka dore ne.
42004016	Mbo ge Nazareɗ yà, ge sok ge na wuwa ne go. Ge mojo̰o̰ na ha̰a̰le keeya ge dwam sabaɗ ma go go, waɗ ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way zì, ɗege digi ndwa isi nda maktub ge Dok ne.
42004017	Àa hon ne maktub ge Nda ge zwagre Dok wa Ezay ne. Hage ne se, seɗ sok ge na ɓyare ne ge njaŋe no zì go:
42004018	«On̰om ge Bagezok ne ge mbi pagal, Ge dape a ne sḛ taa mbi ne [Ndwa zon nda ge dul wa vḛḛne ma] Ndwa faa Fare ge Kwaɗa ge nda ge a̰se ma ta; Teme mbi ya ndwa oy fare ge zuuya ne, Ge num ge àa wan num moor ma ta, Ee ɓaal ma kuwa sok me. Haɗ nda ge àa njon̰ num ge yal ma suli,
42004019	Ndwa wuwage nda go del mbe no, Bagezok Dok ngay kuwa a̰se ge na ne Ge nda duwana ma ta.»
42004020	Guwa̰, Zeso dibi maktub digi, gwan ge ne hon ndu ge tèmel, kaɗ se ndwa hate kaŋ. Nda peɗ ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way zì ma ndwa kaɗ-ɗa ge ne ta.
42004021	Sok mbe go ɗege jan num go: Fare janna mbe ge Njaŋeya ge Dok ne jin̰a num, ge ḛ za̰a̰ num no ma, wa huy mà ne.
42004022	Nda mbo ya haɗ digi go giliw, àa ka kee ajab ge fare ge ngay kwaɗa keeya ge Dok ne ge ka ndage ge ne wa zì ma pe. Àa ka ele ta go: Daa be Jozef van ne to de?
42004023	Zeso jan num go: Mbi ge kuwaya go, ḛ mà mbo isi mbi fare sḭḭ ge jan go: Ba ge zon nda, ee pe zon sḛ tene. Kaŋ ge i za̰a̰ go mo kê num ge Kapernawom go ma peɗ, ke num mbe go ca mo suwal diŋ go waɗme.
42004024	Guwa̰ jan num go iya: Fareba, mbi jan ḛ waŋ go, Nda ge zwagre Dok wa a̰me ge àa ame ne kwaɗa ge na suwal diŋ ɗu to.
42004025	Mbi jan ḛ ne gezi kɔn̰al, a fare ge fareba ne, ge zaman ge ndu ge zwagre Dok wa Eli ne go, sok ge pḭḭ kuri be suwa mam, del taa ge saba menengal, camal baktar deɗ ge suwa pagal peɗ, kumu ma kaa gḛḛ ge suwa ge Izrayel ne pagal,
42004026	go no puy ɗe, Dok be teme Eli ge gwale kumu a̰me ge maa suwa go ge ta ɗu to, ɗaŋɗe, ge gwale kumu ge Sarepta ne ta yà ɗeŋew, ge suwa ge Sido̰ ne go.
42004027	Nda ge kṵṵ swàm ma kaa gḛḛ ge suwa ge Izrayel ne pagal ge zaman ge ndu ge zwagre Dok wa Elize ne go, ano puy ɗe, a̰me ɗu ge num buwal zige, be seɗ zonna ndwa haɗ kɔn̰al to, ɗaŋɗe, kaa Naama̰, ndu ge suwa ge Siri ne ɗeŋew see zonna ne.
42004028	Sok ge nda ge kaa zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way zì ma za̰a̰ Zeso fare janna mbe ma go, laa hoɗɗa waɗe num pool.
42004029	Àa ɗege digi mɔɗwag, àa yan ne ge suwal ga̰a̰l diŋ ya zum, àa gene ne ge njal ge àa sḭḭ maa suwal no ne pagal digi, ndwa ɓyan ne ge digi ya se.
42004030	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ge ne sḛ ɗe, ɓû ge num buwal zì ya no, mbo na mboya no.
42004031	Guwa̰, mbo ge suwal ga̰a̰l Kapernawom ge no suwa ge Galile ne go yà, ka hate nda ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way zì, ge dwam sabaɗ ma go.
42004032	Àa ka kee ajab ge hateya ge ne ne mbe ma pe, ago ka hate ge pool ge Dok hon na ne.
42004033	Ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way mbe zì, ndu a̰me ɗu kaa ge on̰om ge sone na zì, ka oyya digi ge ka̰a̰l ndaal:
42004034	Mo! Zeso ge suwal Nazareɗ ne, Mo ɓyare da ge i ta de? Mo mbo ya ndwa ban i gezi de? Mbi kuwa mo kuwa tyatyaɗ, Mo Ndu ge Harcal ge Dok teme ne ya ne.
42004035	Zeso ngwabe ne, jan ne go: Zane mo wa, wuwa zum ge ndu mbe zì. On̰om ge sone mbe dol ne nda buwal zì ɗaɗar, waɗ-ɗa zum ge ne zì, ɗaŋɗe, kee ne a̰me to.
42004036	Voo mbo ya wan nda ge kaa sok mbe go ma peɗ, àa ka ele ta ta buwal zì go: Ḛ gale ndi fare ma ɗoo me! Hoɗ on̰om ge sone ma na wa ge pool, àa ka waɗ zum ba!
42004037	Sok mbe go, ne dḭḭl mbo ya dasare ge suwal ge no Kapernawom ziya ma go peɗ.
42004038	Sok ge Zeso ɗege ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way zì ya, mbo ge Simo̰ yà. Mbɔgwam dol ne tisi ge gwale ya se, àa mbo ya kaɗe Zeso ne ke a̰me ge ne pe.
42004039	Hugi ya ne ta se, ngwabe mbɔgwam, mbɔgwam jay ge ne ta. Ge sok mbe go gaw, ɗege digi kee kaŋ zam ge num pe.
42004040	Guwa̰ ge gyala dḭḭ se go, àa gene nda ge tuguɗi ma ya Zeso ta, num ge ka njoɗ yal ge tuguɗi ma pe hini-hini ma. Ee na tok ma ge num pagal ɗu ɗu peɗ, ka zon num me.
42004041	On̰om ge sone ma ka waɗ lee gḛḛ, ge num ge tuguɗi ma buwal zige ma zì ya zum waɗme, àa ka oyya go: Mo Dok Van ne. Ɗaŋɗe, sok ngwabe num go, be ka n̰a num vin̰a jan fare to, ge dape, àa kuwa kuwa go ne Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne, Ndu ge Dok taa nee ne.
42004042	Zeso n̰a sok ya ɓaaya gezi, waɗ zum ge suwal diŋ, mbo ge sok babur a̰me, ge kṵwa̰ no go to yà. Ɓase ma ɗege ɓyare ne pe, àa deɗ-ɗa ge ne ta, àa ɓyare vin̰a go ne gaa maa ta, ne daa gwan n̰a maa to.
42004043	Ɗaŋɗe, jan num go: Ɓyare go mbi oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge muluk ge Dok ne pe, ge suwal ga̰a̰l gegene ma diŋ waɗme. A ge ano mbe no pe Dok teme mbi ya no.
42004044	Ɗege hate Fare ge Kwaɗa mbe ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way ge no suwa ge Galile go ge ma zì.
42005001	Ɗeɗ-ɗa dwam a̰me go go, Zeso mḛḛ mangaɗam ga̰a̰l ge Jenezareɗ ne wa go, ɓase ma ndaa ta ya ne ta zì ndwa za̰a̰ fare ge Dok ne, àa terse ne ya zì.
42005002	Kuwa faa ma zi yabeya ge wa kal go, nda ge swaɗ soso ma kan maa ko ja digi usi maa kuwal ma.
42005003	Zeso ndee ge faa a̰me go ɗu, a Simo̰ nee ne, kaɗe ne go ne ɓin̰a maa ge wa kal zì ya zum nde. Guwa̰ kaɗ na pe se, ka hate nda mbe ma ge faa mbe pul-la.
42005004	Sok ge aa na fare hateya go, jan Simo̰ go: Ḛ ɗiibi, ḛ mbo dol kuwal ge ɗugul zum ya gale.
42005005	Simo̰ gwan ge ne janna go: Ba ge hateya, i duwa ɗaal ge ndwa petere sok swaɗ soso go, i be wan a̰me to, ɗaŋɗe, ge fare ge mo jin̰a no pe ɗe, i ge mbi ka̰a̰m ma mbo dol kuwal-la gale.
42005006	Sok ge àa doo kuwal go, num kuwal mbo ya ceŋe ge sini, ge go ɓyare ka taabe gezi.
42005007	Àa tol maa ka̰a̰m ge no faa ge ɗogle go ma go, num mbo ya mbaa maa ndwa zwal kuwal mbe ya digi. Àa mbo ya mbaa num ge zwal kuwal-la digi, àa huy faa mbe ge zi ma lalabaɗ, guwa ge ɗimiya.
42005008	Sok ge Simo̰ ge Zeso ho̰ ne dḭḭl go Piyer kuwa kaŋ mbe ma go, guu na ko ge Zeso ndwa se, jan ne go: Bagezok, hiri tene ge ziya nde, ge dape, mbi ndu ge kee sone ne.
42005009	Sok mbe go, voo mbo ya wan Simo̰, ɓanna ge na ka̰a̰m ge kaa dagre ge na ma, ge sini ge maa wa̰a̰ ge gḛḛ ceɗeɗ mbe pe.
42005010	Voo mbo ya wan Jak mage Yohana ge Zebede van ma, num ka̰a̰m ge mbo ya wan num tok ma waɗme. Ɗaŋɗe, Zeso jan Simo̰ go: Chiya voo to, a gaa mbo zḛḛ no, mo mbo kaɗ ba ge gene nda duwana ma ya ge mbi ta.
42005011	Sok mbe go, àa zwal maa faa ma ya wa kal digi, àa n̰a maa kaŋ ma peɗ, àa ɓan mboya dagre ge Zeso.
42005012	Dwam a̰me ɗu, Zeso kaa ge suwal ga̰a̰l a̰me ge no suwa ge na no ne go diŋ, ndu a̰me ge kṵṵ swàm njɔnjwaɗ deɗ-ɗa ne ta. Sok ge kuwa Zeso go, kubi na pul ge suwa se, ka gwarge tene ne ta, janna go: Bagezok, kaɗɗa mo vinna, mo ge pool zon mbi, mbi wa haɗ kɔn̰al.
42005013	Zeso ee na tok ge ne ta, jan ne go: Mbi vinna go, see zonna. Ge sok mbe go gaw, ndu ge kṵṵ swàm mbe bol haɗ somndol mbambala, haɗ kɔn̰al me.
42005014	Guwa̰ Zeso tele ne go, ne jin̰a ndu a̰me fare mbe to. Ɗaŋɗe, ne mbo ngay tene ge ba ge kee tuwaleya ta, ne wa gaa hon bobo ge Moyiz ho na wa go, ne kaa sayda ge nda ta peɗ go, na zon-na go, na haɗ-ɗa kɔn̰al.
42005015	Sok mbe go, nda ka faa ne fare ɗogle-ɗogle, nda ka mbwaɗɗa lulum za̰a̰ ne mage ka ɓyare vin̰a ge zonna ne ge ne ta, ge maa tuguɗi ma go.
42005016	Kaɗɗa ge Zeso ɗe, ge mojo̰o̰ a ha̰a̰le keeya go, mbo go yalaŋ, ge sok ge kṵwa̰ no go to yà, ka kee kaɗeya.
42005017	Ɗeɗ-ɗa go, dwam a̰me go ɗu Zeso wa ya ka hate nda, Farisi mage Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma kaa ne ziya guwa. Àa mbo ge suwal van ge jiyale ge Galile ne mage Jude ne ma yà, ge Jerusalem yà me. Bagezok Dok ka hon ne pool ge zon nda ge tuguɗi ma.
42005018	Sok mbe go, nda a̰me ma in ndu ge looɗeya a̰me ya ɗu, ge saŋal go, àa ka ɓyare vin̰a ge maa wuwa ge ne diŋ yà, maa wa mbo ee ne ge Zeso ndwa se.
42005019	Ajo̰o̰ nda kaa gḛḛ ge be ɗoo to ɗe, àa seɗ vin̰a ge waɗ ge ne, ne ta zì yà to. Àa ndee ge ne zok pagal digi, àa zuɗ zok pagal, àa siri ne ge digi fiiya na saŋal go ge tàal, ge Zeso ndwa se, nda buwal zì.
42005020	Sok ge Zeso kuwa hoɗ fareba ge num way go, jan ndu ge looɗeya mbe go: «Mbi pore mo sone ma ya go.»
42005021	Nda ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne mage Farisi ma mbo ya iigi digi giliw, ndu ge diige ɗege ka ele tene go: Ndu mbe daa jan fare ge go mbe ge dape de? Daa jan fare ge sone kakatag ge Dok pagal ge dape de? A huɗi ne ge pool ge pore sone ma, a be Dok sḛ ɗu to de?
42005022	Ge sok mbe go waɗ, Zeso kuwa num dwaɗɗa ma, gwan ge num janna go: Ge dape dwaɗɗa ge go mbe ma wa kaɗ ḛ dul wa ma zì de?
42005023	Jan ndu go: Mbi pore mo sone ma go me no, Ɗege digi mḛḛya mo ko ma pagal me ɗe, a ge diige dṵṵl gḛḛ ne zoo de?
42005024	Ge sego, mbi kee ḛ kuwaya go, Van ge Ndu ne ge pool ge suwa pagal, ge pore nda duwana ma num sone ma. Guwa̰, jan ndu ge looɗeya mbe go: Ɗege digi, hê mo kaŋ fiiya, mo mbo mo yà.
42005025	Ge sok mbe go baba, ɗege digi ge num ndwa go, hee saŋal ge na fii tuguɗi ne go mbe, ka sale Dok na ndwa zḛḛ yà, sok mbo na yà go.
42005026	Nda peɗ ka kee ajab, voo wan num, àa ɗege sale Dok, àa ka janna go: Màno, i kuwa kaŋ ge i kuwa num dwam ɗu to ma ya no!
42005027	Ge fare mbe guwa̰, Zeso waɗ-ɗa zum, kuwa ndu ge chal siyal a̰me, ge àa ka tol ne Levi, kàɗɗa ge na sok tèmel ge chal siyal ne go. Zeso jan ne go: Mbo ya mbi pe go.
42005028	Levi ɗege ge na sok mbe go, n̰a na tèmel ge seɗ na bware mbe, mbo ge ne pe yà.
42005029	Guwa̰, Levi kee vḛḛso kaŋ zam ge ga̰a̰l ge Zeso pe ge na diŋ. Nda ge chal siyal mage nda ge ɗogle ma kaɗ nɔnɔg ge sok mbe go, àa ka zam kaŋ zam ge num dagre.
42005030	Farisi mage maa ka̰a̰m ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma iigi digi, àa ka jan Zeso nda ge ame hateya ma go: Ge dape ḛ wa ka zam kaŋ zam dagre ge nda ge chal siyal mage nda ge kee sone ma me de?
42005031	Sok ge num fare mbe ma dee ge Zeso tɔgwa zì go, jan num go: «A be nda ge duul pool ma ɓyare ndu ge zon nda pe ne to, ɗaŋɗe, a num ge tuguɗi ma.
42005032	Mbi be mbo ya, ge nda ge temel ma pe to, ɗaŋɗe, tol nda ge kee sone ma, go num dee ya seŋe ta se.»
42005033	Farisi ma jan Zeso go: Nda ge ame hateya ge Yohana ba ge kee nda baptem ne ma wan mam njuwal mage kee kaɗeya, ge i i ma kee mbe go waɗme. Sok mbe go me ɗe, mo nda ma zam kaŋ zam ge maa ɓyare go.
42005034	Zeso gwan ge num janna go: Ḛ ge pool ee gwale jin̰al obe kondore ma wan mam njuwal teg ge gwale jin̰al obe gale no go ge num de?
42005035	Dwam ma mbo mbo ya, nda duwana ma mbo wan gwale jin̰al obe ge num buwal zì, sok mbe go gale, àa wa ɗege wan mam njuwal go.
42005036	Zeso jan num fare sḭḭ a̰me ɗu waɗme go: Ndu a̰me ge ɔwabe ba̰a̰ wa ge jin̰al wa dyan ba̰a̰ ge haɗ-ɗa kamal ge ne go de? Kaɗɗa na keeya mbe go, ba̰a̰ wa ge jin̰al mbe gwan taabe ge kamal na ta yà mɔɗwag, àa ame ta to.
42005037	Ndu a̰me ge kan on̰or jìn̰al ge jin̰al ge ɗutulu ge kamal ma zì go de? Kaɗɗa na keeya mbe go, on̰or jìn̰al ge jin̰al fol ɗutulu mbe ma gezi, ɓul suwa zì, ɗutulu mbe ma daa gwan mbaa a̰me to.
42005038	Ɗaŋɗe, ke kwaɗa go àa kan on̰or jìn̰al ge jin̰al ge ɗutulu ge jin̰al ma zì.
42005039	Nè ge kuwaya go, ndu a̰me ge gwan ee na dwaɗɗa ge on̰or jìn̰al ge jin̰al pagal to, kaɗɗa na tare on̰or jìn̰al ge puuri ya go. Ago, gaa janna go: Mbi laa wa̰a̰ on̰or jìn̰al ge puuri.
42006001	Deɗ-ɗa dwam sabaɗ a̰me go go, Zeso ka kale ge gaaso ge geme ne wa go ge na nda ge ame hateya ma dagre. Sok mboya go, ne nda ge ame hateya ma ka orbe geme pagal sulla.
42006002	Sok ge Farisi ma kuwa num, àa jan num go: Ge dape ḛ wa ka kee kaŋ ge àa ho̰ ḛ vin̰a kee ne to ge dwam sabaɗ go de?
42006003	Zeso gwan ge num janna go: Ḛ be isi Maktub ge Dok ne pul sok ge jin̰a fare ge Daviɗ kaŋ ge ne kê ne to de? Dwam a̰me go ɗu, sok ge camal wa̰a̰ num ge na nda ma go,
42006004	wuwa ge gur seɗ ta ge Dok ne zì no, zâ dupḛ ge àa nuusi num ge Dok pe ma no, ho̰ na nda ma no me to de? Dupḛ mbe ge àa ho̰ vin̰a go nda ge kee tuwaleya ma mbiya zam num ne ɗeŋew.
42006005	Zeso gwan jan num iya go: Ḛ kuwa go mbi, Van ge Ndu ne, mbi ne ge pool ge faa fare ge dwam sabaɗ pagal.
42006006	Ɗeɗ-ɗa dwam sabaɗ a̰me ge ɗogle go, Zeso waɗ ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way zì yà, ɗege hate nda. Ndu a̰me ɗu kaɗ sok mbe go tok matoson looɗeya.
42006007	Nda ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne mage Farisi ma dol maa ndwa keceɗ ge Zeso pagal go ne mà zon ndu ge dwam sabaɗ mbe go de, ge dape àa kaa ge dwaɗɗa ge wan ne ge fare a̰me.
42006008	Ɗaŋɗe, kuwa num dwaɗɗa ma kuwa, jan ndu ge tok looɗeya go: Ɗege digi, mo mḛḛ ya nda tuwal zì go. Ne sḛ ɗege digi, mḛḛ ya nda tuwal zì me.
42006009	Guwa̰ Zeso jan num go: Mbi ɓyare ele ḛ fare no: Nè eeya ma ho̰ vin̰a hon go, ge dwam sabaɗ go, àa ke ndu kwaɗa koo àa n̰a ne suuya de? Àa mo̰o̰ ndu on̰om koo àa n̰a ne banna de?
42006010	Sok mbe go, an na ndwa ndil num peɗ, guwa̰ jan ndu ge tok looɗeya mbe go: Mwaɗe mo tok se yà. Kee mbe go me, ne tok seŋe ge mojo̰o̰ na kaa wal go.
42006011	Ge ano mbe no pe, laa hoɗɗa waɗe nda ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne mage Farisi ma pool. Àa ka ele ta ta buwal zì go maa see ma̰ fare ge ne pe de.
42006012	Ɗeɗ-ɗa ge dwam mbe ma pul zì go, Zeso mbô ge njal kin̰a yà mbo kee kaɗeya, dwam ge na ndwa teŋleŋ, sok kaɗe Dok go.
42006013	Sok ge sok kon̰ ya gezi, tol nda ge ame hateya ma ya, tal wol pɔgwa zi, hon num dḭḭl go nda ge temeya ma:
42006014	Nda ge temeya mbe ma kaa Simo̰, ge ne sḛ chiya ne dḭḭl Piyer mage na na̰ van Andre, Jak, Yohana, Filib, Bartelemi,
42006015	Mata, Tomas, Jak ge Alfe van, Simo̰ ge iyal kyarga ge na suwal pe,
42006016	Jude ge Jak van, Yudas Iskariyoɗ me, ge mbo dee yaɗ Zeso ya gezi.
42006017	Zeso ndee ge njal kin̰a digi ya se ɓanna ge na nda ge ame hateya ma, mbo ya mḛḛ sok ta̰a̰sal ge nda ge ame hateya ma kaa go. Ɓase ge suwa Jude ma way ma, ge Jerusalem ne mage suwal ge mam wa go ge ma, ndwa go Tir mage Sido̰, àa kaɗ nɔnɔg ge sok mbe go waɗme.
42006018	Àa mbo ya ndwa za̰a̰ fare mage ɓyare zonna pe, ge maa tuguɗi ma go. Nda ge kaa ge on̰om ge sone maa zì ma seɗ zonna waɗme.
42006019	Ndu ge diige ka ɓyare vin̰a go na taa ne, ge dape pool a̰me ge zon nda ka waɗ ge ne zì ya zum, ka zon num peɗ me.
42006020	Sok mbe go, Zeso hee na ndwa digi, ndil na nda ge ame hateya ma, jan num go: Ḛ kee laa saal, ḛ ge no a̰se zì ma, Ago muluk ge Dok ne ḛ ḛ ne.
42006021	Ḛ kee laa saal, ḛ ge no camal ge sego ma, Ago ḛ mbo hoɗege kaŋ zam to. Ḛ kee laa saal, ḛ ge seɗ tiɗiya no ge sego ma, Ago, Dok mbo iyal ḛ laa.
42006022	Sok ge nda mbo kaɗ-ɗa ka sen ḛ, àa ka ɓyare ḛ ke baan ge maa to, àa ka jan fare ge sone ge diige pe peɗ, ndwa vḛḛne ḛ dḭḭl ge Van ge Ndu ne pe ɗe, ḛ ke laa saal.
42006023	Ḛ ke laa saal, sok ge kaŋ mbe ma mbo deɗ ja ḛ pagal, ḛ kaa ge fafan̰ me, ge dape, poɗɗa ge ɓaŋlaŋ da̰a̰re ḛ go ge pḭḭ ma zì yà. Nda ge zwagre Dok wa ge ḛ ndwa zḛḛge ma, àa kê num mbe go waɗme.
42006024	Woo! Ḛ ge gan njonjon̰ ma, Ago ḛ see ḛ laa eyalla no gaw.
42006025	Woo, ḛ ge an̰ no ge sego ma, Ago camal mbo hun ḛ! Woo, ḛ ge man no ge sego ma, Ago ḛ mbo kaɗ ge kiimi zì, Ge miim njɔnjwab ḛ ndwa go me!
42006026	A kaŋ a̰se ne, Kaɗɗa nda duwana ma peɗ kaɗ ge ḛ doreya. Ago, num ba ma ka kee nda ge kee ta nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma mbe go no ba!
42006027	Ɗaŋɗe, mbi jan ḛ ge za̰a̰ mbi ma go: Ḛ ngay laa wanna ge ḛ nda ge ho̰o̰l ma ta, ḛ kee nda ge sen ḛ ma kwaɗa me.
42006028	Ḛ tare nda ge gene yal ya ḛ pagal ma wa. Ḛ kaɗe ge num ge kun hày ḛ pagal ma pe.
42006029	Mbi jan ndu ge diige go: Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me byare mo ya gasa zì, seŋe ne lee gene waɗme. Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me harge mo ba̰a̰ ge yee gḛḛ ya, kaa ge be tele ne go ne ame mo ba̰a̰ ge pul zige to.
42006030	Ndu ge diige ge ele a̰me ya ge mo tok go, ho̰ ne kaŋ mbe ge ele. Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me harge mo kaŋ seɗɗa ma, ele num pe daa to peɗ.
42006031	Mbi jan ḛ iya go, ḛ ke nda ge ɗogle ma be go ca, kaŋ ge ḛ ɓyare go num kee ḛ num ma.
42006032	Kaɗɗa go ḛ laa wan num ge laa wan ḛ ma ɗeŋew ɗe, ḛ kee ma̰ kaŋ ge ciciliŋ de? Nda ge kuwa Dok ge fareba to ma puy, num laa wan nda ge laa wan maa ma wan waɗme.
42006033	Kaɗɗa ḛ ngay kwaɗa keeya ge nda ge kee ḛ kwaɗa ma ta ɗeŋew ɗe, ḛ kee ma̰ kaŋ ge ciciliŋ de? Nda ge kuwa Dok ge fareba to ma puy àa kee mbe go waɗme ɗe.
42006034	Kaɗɗa ḛ hon gobso num ge ḛ ee ḛ jobreya no go num kin̰are poɗ ḛ ḛ gobso ma no, ḛ kee ma̰ kaŋ ge ciciliŋ de? Nda ge mbo laa ɓyareya ge Dok ne pagal to ma hon maa ka̰a̰m gobso mbe go waɗme ge dwaɗɗa ge go num kin̰are guwa̰re maa kaŋ mbe tem.
42006035	Nde-nde ge ḛ laa wan ḛ nda ge ho̰o̰l ma, ḛ ke nda duwana ma kwaɗa mage hon nda gobso be ge dwaɗɗa ge go àa kin̰are guwa̰re ḛ num byalam go to. Ḛ poɗɗa mbo kaɗ ɓaŋlaŋ, go mbe no, ḛ mbo kaɗ Dok ge no pḭḭ ma zì yà van ma me, ge dape, ne sḛ kwaɗa ge nda ge kuwa kwaɗa to mage nda ge laa pisil ma ta.
42006036	Ḛ kaa nda ge kuwa nda a̰se ma ge mojo̰o̰ ḛ Ba no ndu ge kuwa nda a̰se go.
42006037	Ḛ kṵṵ sariya ge ndu a̰me pagal to, Dok mbo kun ḛ sariya to me. Ḛ ee dṵṵl ge ndu pagal to, Dok mbo ee dṵṵl ge ḛ pagal to waɗme, ḛ pore nda, Dok mbo pore ḛ waɗme.
42006038	Ḛ ho̰ nda kaŋ, Dok mbo hon ḛ waɗme. Dok mbo ngay ḛ kaŋ ma ngayya ge go ḛ mbyaɗ kwate num digi to, ibi num, gasage num, gaa surliya pipiw. Ago Dok mbo kee ḛ kaŋ ge ḛ kee nda gegene ma ne me.
42006039	Guwa̰, Zeso gwan kee num fare sḭḭ a̰me ɗu waɗme go: Ndu ge ɓaal ge pool wan na kon ɔwara de? Num sḛ ma jwàg ge pool deɗ ge tugul se to de?
42006040	Ndu ge ame hateya kaɗ ge ba ge hate na pagal digi to, ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge ame hateya ge see hateya mbyaɗɗa tab ge diige, mbo kaɗ ge na ba ge hate na go.
42006041	Kee pe gyana, mo wa ka kuwa sugu ge mo na̰ van ndwa zige ɗag ɗoo, mo wa kuwa ɔwara murguli ge amo sḛ zige to me de?
42006042	Koo kee pe gyana mo wa jan mo na̰ van go: N̰a mbi he sugu van ge lerbeŋ ge mo ndwa zige gezi ɗoo, zane no, mo kuwa ɔwara murguli go mo ndwa zige to me de. Ge mbuɗi nda ndwa, ee pe ndage ɔwara murguli ge mo ndwa zige gale ɓiya, guwa̰ go mo wa kuwa gyana ge mbo ndage sugu ge mo na̰ van ndwa zige gezi me.
42006043	A fareba go ɔwara a̰me ge kwaɗa ge tol ndwa ge sone to, koo ge sone tol ndwa ge kwaɗa to me.
42006044	Ago nda kuwa ɔwara ge kwaɗa ge diige ge ne ndwa tolla ta. Ndu ge hel fere ge ɔwara baŋre digi koo hel on̰or ndwa tolla ge kore za̰a̰l digi go de?
42006045	Ndu ge ɗeŋer ngay kaŋ keeya ge kwaɗa, ndwa go ne dul wa kwaɗa. Ge sone, ngay kaŋ keeya ge sone ma, ndwa go ne dul wa sone me. Ago, a kaŋ ge pee no ndu dul wa zì ma, waɗ-ɗa ne wa zum ne.
42006046	Ge dape ḛ wa ka tol mbi ɗaɗag go: Bagezok! Bagezok ɗoo! Ḛ wa ka kee kaŋ ge mbi jan ḛ num ma to de?
42006047	Mbi ɓyare ngay ḛ go, ndu ge diige ge mbo ge mbi pe go, ame mbi fare ma, kee tèmel ge num pagal me, ne dḭḭ ge da go de:
42006048	A dinna ge ndu a̰me ge sḭḭ zok a̰me, al sok se yà ɗugul heleg, dol ne pe ge njal pagal go. Mam hḛḛreya mbo ya, muni soor ya zok mbe ta, be gul ne to, ge dape zok mbe sḭḭ kwaɗa.
42006049	Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge za̰a̰ mbi fare ma, ka kee tèmel ge num pagal go to, a dinna ge ndu ge sḭḭ zok ge suwa pagal ɓal, be al ne pe to go. Sok ge mam muni soor ya zok mbe ta, zok mbe kan se gaw, burmi burmiya ge go ndu daa gwan kuwa ne pe to peɗ.
42007001	Guwa̰ ge Zeso aa ge sok hon ɓase ma na hateya mbe ma go peɗ, waɗ ge suwal Kapernawom diŋ yà.
42007002	Ge sok mbe go me ɗe, ga̰a̰l ge asagar ge kis ma way ndu ge tèmel ge ne laa wa̰a̰ ne gḛḛ, wa ya kee tuguɗi ge gene ne mbo swày.
42007003	Sok ge za̰a̰ fare ge Zeso ne, teme Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme num a̰me ma, num ele ne go, ne mbo ya zon na ndu ge tèmel mbe nde.
42007004	Àa deɗ-ɗa ge Zeso ta, àa ka kaɗe ne ge aa ta, àa ka jan ne go: Ndu mbe ndu ge hormo ne, mbo ya chiya ne kṵwa̰ nde no de!
42007005	Ago ne laa wa̰a̰ nè pe rusu gḛḛ, a ne sḛ sḭḭ i zok kee kaɗeya ne.
42007006	Zeso vin mboya dagre ge num, sok ge àa yin̰a guwa ge zok, ga̰a̰l ge asagar ge kis ma way teme na kondore ge wa kag ma ya ge ne ta ndwa jan ne go: Lwage tene to, Bagezok-goo, ago mbi be mbyaɗ ge go mo waɗ mbi zok wa to.
42007007	A ge pe, mbi ndi tene no go, mbi be mbyaɗ ge mbo ya ge mbi ndwa mbo seɗ mo to waɗme. Ɗaŋɗe, ho mo wa gagag, mbi ndu ge tèmel mà seɗ zonna.
42007008	Ago mbi sḛ waɗme, mbi ge ga̰a̰l ma ge mbi ndwa zḛḛ, mbi kaɗ ge asagar ma ge mbi pe se me. Mbi jan a̰me ya go: Mbo sok gene yà go! Ne sḛ mbo ɓal. Ndu gegene: Mbo ya go go! Mbo ya me. Mbi jan mbi ndu ge tèmel ya go: Ke mbi kaŋ gegene mbe no! Kee ne ɓal.
42007009	Sok ge Zeso za̰a̰ ga̰a̰l ge asagar ge kis ma way mbe fare janna ma go, kee ajab gḛḛ. Seŋe tene ge ɓase ge ka kàre na pe ma ta, jan num go: Mbi jan ḛ go, ge Izrayel suwa pagal mɔɗwag, mbi be seɗ ndu ge hoɗ fareba ge na dul wa zì ya ge go mbe pe ɗu to.
42007010	Ne kondore mbe ge teme num ya mbe ma gwanna diŋ, àa kuwa go ne ndu ge tèmel mbe seɗ zonna ya go ge na tuguɗi zì.
42007011	Dwam ma guwa̰ kwaɗa lag, Zeso mbo ge suwal ga̰a̰l ge àa tol ne Nen yà. Ne nda ge ame hateya mage ɓase ma nɔnɔg kaa ɓanna ge ne.
42007012	Sok ge yin̰a guwa ge gulum ga̰a̰l wa, nda yan ja in swày mbo mbulla. Ndu ge suu, a van son mbe ne ɗu kikiɗ ge gwale kumu a̰me tok go. Nda ge suwal ga̰a̰l diŋ-ge ma mbo ya nɔnɔg dagre ge kumu mbe.
42007013	Sok ge Bagezok kuwa ne go, ngay kuwa a̰se ge na ne ge ne ta, jan ne go: Kirgi tene ge fiyaso daa to!
42007014	Zeso mbo ya ge duul swày mbe ta zì guwa, taɗ ne, nda ge in ne ma mḛḛ se, jan ne go: Mbi hoɗ mo mbi wa no, ta̰a̰ digi, van dore!
42007015	Ndu ge suu za̰a̰me digi kàɗɗa ge na pe, ɗege faaya me. Zeso jan ne na̰ go: Nà mo van no!
42007016	Voo mbo ya wan nda peɗ, àa ɗege sale Dok, àa ka janna go: Ndu ge zwagre Dok wa a̰me ge ga̰a̰l yan ja ge nè buwal zì no, ago Dok duwa ge ɓase ge na ne ma.
42007017	Nda mbo ya faa ge kaŋ ge Zeso kê ma ge suwa ge Jude ne go mɔɗwag, ge suwal ge vê ne se ma go peɗ waɗme.
42007018	Yohana mbo ya za̰a̰ fare mbe ma peɗ ge na nda ge ame hateya ma wa zì.
42007019	Tol a̰me ma zi ge maa ka̰a̰m buwal zì, teme num mbo ge Bagezok ta mbo ele ne go, ne ndu ge maa no ge kuwaya go Dok teme ne ya mbe sḛ ne ɗer ɓade? Koo maa da̰a̰re go ge ɗogle de?
42007020	Sok ge nda ge ame hateya ge zi mbe ma dee ya ge Zeso ta, àa jan ne go: Yohana ba ge kee nda baptem teme i ya ne ndwa ele mo go: Mo ndu ge i no ge kuwaya go Dok mbo teme ne ya, mbe sḛ ne ɗer ɓade? Koo i da̰a̰re go ge ɗogle de?
42007021	Ge sok mbe go gaw, Zeso wa ya ka zon nda ge tuguɗi ma, nda ge za̰a̰ yal mage num ge no ge on̰om ge sone ma gḛḛ, tyan ɓaal ma ndwa gḛḛ me.
42007022	Guwa̰, gwan ge num janna go: «Ḛ guwa̰ mbo wan Yohana kaŋ ge ḛ kuwa no mage ḛ za̰a̰ num no ma pe: Ɓaal ma kuwa sok no, giɗi ma mbo vin̰a no, nda ge kṵṵ swàm ma bol haɗ-ɗa somndol no, àa haɗ-ɗa kɔn̰al no, gisil ma za̰a̰ fare no, nda ge suu ma tan-na no, nda ge a̰se ma za̰a̰ Fare ge kwaɗa no me.
42007023	Laa saal a ge ndu ge mbi mbo kaɗ-ɗa kaŋ chal ko ge ne pe to.»
42007024	Sok ge nda ge Yohana teme num ya ma n̰a num go, Zeso ɗege jan ɓase ma fare ge ne pagal, ele num go: «Ḛ daa mbo babur pul yà ndil huɗi zoo de? Ndu ge dḭḭ ge kɔn̰a go, ge sa̰a̰m fii ne se, ka mḛḛ ne digi de?
42007025	Kaɗɗa na mbe go to ɗe, ḛ mbo ndil sḛ ma̰ kaŋ tem de? Ndu a̰me ge ka̰a̰ ba̰a̰ ge siŋli ma de? Ḛ za̰a̰ gale! Nda ge kan ba̰a̰ ge siŋli ma àa nda ge an̰ ma ne, àa kaɗ zok ge gan ma way ma diŋ.
42007026	Go mbe no, ḛ mbo ndil ma̰ kaŋ sḛ tem de? Ndu ge zwagre Dok wa a̰me de? Ḛ ɓyare kuwa ndu ge zwagre Dok wa, mbi jan ḛ go, ndu ge ḛ kuwa ne waɗe ndu ge zwagre Dok wa waɗe.
42007027	Ago ne sḛ ndu ge maktub ge Dok ne jin̰a fare ne pagal ne go: “Kuwa, mbi doo yà mbi ndu ge vin̰a ndwa go, Ne nuusi vin̰a ge mo pe, ge mo ndwa zḛḛ.”
42007028	«Mbi jan ḛ gezi waŋ go, Yohana ciciliŋ waɗe nda ge wuwa no ge laa zì ma kakaɗag. Go no puy ɗe, ndu ge fare a̰me pe to peɗ, ge mbo seɗ vin̰a ya waɗ muluk ge Dok ne zì, mbo kaɗ ciciliŋ waɗe ne.
42007029	Ɓase ma peɗ ge za̰a̰ ne ma, koo nda ge chal siyal ma, àa kuwa go Dok ne Dok ge temel taɗ ne, àa vin kee baptem ge Yohana ne.
42007030	Kaɗɗa Farisi mage Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma ɗe, àa kuri kaŋ ge Dok ɓyare go num ke ne, sok ge àa vḭḭ kee baptem to go.
42007031	-
42007032	«Mbi jan ḛ go, nda ge màge mbe ma no, àa dinna ca ge nda jabso ge vḛḛ no dàa se ma go, sok siɗigi fare ta buwal zì go, àa ka janna go: I sṵṵ gal go ḛ mà ndal kaŋ ne wa go de puy, ḛ ko be hee digi to. I mbaa baŋay no puy me ɗe, ḛ gwan be fyal to peɗ.
42007033	Ago, Yohana ba ge kee nda baptem mbo ya, vḭḭ tene no go na taa swa kaso na wa zì to me no, na tare on̰or jìn̰al to me, ḛ jan no go: Ne sḛ ge on̰om ge sone.
42007034	Van ge Ndu ne mbo ya no, ka zam kaŋ zam mage njoɗ kaŋ ma no, ge nda duwana gegene ma go, ḛ jan no go: Àa ndi ndu ge vagal gale no, ndu ge fere jìn̰al gale no, a nda ge chal siyal mage nda ge kee sone ma kondore ne me.
42007035	Ano puy, Dok Van ge andaŋ ma peɗ kuwa vin̰a ge temel ge Dok ne ma no.»
42007036	Farisi a̰me tol Zeso mbo zam kaŋ zam ge na. Zeso mbo ge ne diŋ yà, kaɗ kaŋ zam wa go.
42007037	Sok mbe go, gwale a̰me ɗu ge no suwal ga̰a̰l diŋ, ge zam tene, za̰a̰ go ne zam kaŋ zam ge Farisi mbe diŋ. Waɗ-ɗa diŋ ge koblo ge àa ca ne ge njal Albatr ge na tok go, huyya ge idiir.
42007038	Kaɗ ge ne ko se yà, ɗege fyalla, ne miim ka kan Zeso ko go, guwa̰ go ka tigɗi num gezi ge na pagal susu, ka wan ne ko ma digi ɓaɓaram, ka kan idiir mbe ge num ta.
42007039	Sok ge Farisi mbe ge too ne ya na diŋ kuwa kaŋ mbe ma go, ka dwaɗ na dul wa zì go: Daa go ndu mbe ndu ge zwagre Dok wa|Nda ge zwagre Dok wa ge fareba ne, daa ma kuwa go gwale mbe ge ee na tok na ta no, ne gwale ge zam tene ne.
42007040	Ge ne dwaɗɗa mbe pagal, Zeso gwan ge ne janna go: Simo̰, mbi ɓyare siɗigi fare ge mo. Simo̰ jan ne go: Ba ge hateya, fa fare.
42007041	Dwam a̰me go ɗu, ndu a̰me hon nda a̰me ma zi gobso. Ge ɗu mbiya poɗ silay kikis nuwan̰, gegene silay warnuwan̰ me.
42007042	Ajo̰o̰ num vin̰a ge poɗ ne bware mbe ma to ɗe, kuwa num a̰se jwàg. Ge sego jin̰a mbi gale, ge diige laa wan ne mà gḛḛ ne de?
42007043	Simo̰ gwan ge ne janna go: Mbi dwaɗ go, a ndu ge àa kuwa ne a̰se, mbe ge see gobso gḛḛ. Zeso jan ne go: Mo va fare ma buwal kwaɗa.
42007044	Seŋe na ndwa gwale ta, jan Simo̰ go: Mo kuwa gwale go ɓaa? Mbi se ge mo diŋ no puy, mo be hon mo dore ma mo wa go num ho̰ mbi mam usi mbi ko to; ɗaŋɗe, ne sḛ mbe lwaɗe mbi ko ma ge na miim, tigɗi num gezi ge na pagal susu no.
42007045	Mo be ame mbi ge hormo to, ɗaŋɗe, ne sḛ vare zoo, ge mbi ko ndaa mo zok pul go day, a go sok ngay hormo mbi ta go.
42007046	Mo be kan nùm ge huu tii ge mbi pagal digi to, ɗaŋɗe, ne sḛ ka̰a̰ idiir ge mbi ko ma ta.
42007047	A ge pe mbi jan mo no go, ne hormo ge ngay ne gḛḛ no, a ge àa pore ne sone ge gḛḛ ceɗeɗ ma pe. Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge ngay hormo hoɗege guwa, a ge àa pore ne ne sone ge hoɗege guwa ma pe.
42007048	Jan gwale go: Mbi pore mo sone ma go.
42007049	Nda ge àa too num ya ge kaŋ zam vḛḛso pe ma ka dwaɗɗa maa dul wa ma zì go: Ndu mbe daa huɗi ne ge mà kaɗ ge pool ge pore ɗiŋ sone ma de?
42007050	Ɗaŋɗe, jan gwale go: Hoɗ fareba ge amo mon mo ya go. Mbo ge halas.
42008001	Guwa̰, Zeso gaa an suwal ga̰a̰l mage suwal jiyale ma diŋ, ka wan nda fare mage oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge muluk ge Dok ne pe. Nda ge ame hateya ge wol pɔgwa zi ma kaa ɓanna ge ne.
42008002	Nda zaab a̰me ge Zeso ee on̰om ge sone ma waɗ ge num zì ya zum ma, ge a zo̰o̰ num ma kaa dagre ge ne waɗme. Nda zaab mbe ma buwal zì, Mari ge àa tol ne Magdala, ge on̰om ge sone ma wuwa ge ne zì har ɓỳala kaa,
42008003	Johana ge Kuza ndu ge koy Heroɗ kaŋ gan ma gwale, Suzan mage nda zaab ge ɗogle ma gḛḛ-gḛḛ. Nda zaab mbe ma mɔɗwag ka mbaa Zeso mage na nda ge ame hateya ma ge maa kaŋ seɗɗa ma me.
42008004	Ajo̰o̰ nda mbo ge suwal ga̰a̰l ma diŋ ya hini-hini, ɓase ma kwate ya ne ta nɔnɔg, ɗege kee num fare sḭḭ mbe no go:
42008005	Ge dwam a̰me go ɗu, ba ge gaa kaŋ a̰me zuɗ ge na diŋ ya mbo dol swa. Sok ge ka cigi swa go, a̰me ma kale ge vin̰a pul yà, nda ndal num ge maa ko se, njoole ge pḭḭ zige ma coɗ num gezi me.
42008006	A̰me ma deɗ ge sok her go. Sok ge àa tiya digi, àa fin̰a gezi gaw, ge dape suwa be kaɗ num pe zì tɔgwal to.
42008007	A̰me ge ɗogle ma me ɗe, àa deɗ ge kore ma buwal zì, kore ma don digi ge num dagre, àa kage num se me.
42008008	Ɗaŋɗe, ge cùb ma deɗ ge suwa ge kwaɗa go, àa don digi, ge diige kan pagal ge ndwa na ta ngoyon̰. Zeso hee na ka̰a̰l digi, jan num iya go: Kaɗɗa ndu ge tɔgwa ge za̰a̰ fare mbe ma, ne za̰a̰ num kwaɗa!
42008009	Ne nda ge ame hateya ma ele ne go, fare sḭḭ mbe pe wanna gyana de.
42008010	Gwan num janna go: «Dok ngay fare ɗimil ge muluk ge na ne ma ḛ, ɗaŋɗe, ge nda ge ɗogle ma pe, àa jan num ne ge fare sḭḭ “Kaŋ mbe ma dee ya keeya ndwa go num ndi sok, Ɗaŋɗe, num kuwa sok to, Num za̰a̰ fare me, Ɗaŋɗe, num wa̰a̰ ne pe to.” »
42008011	Ḛ za̰a̰ fare sḭḭ mbe pe wanna no: Kaŋ rusu a fare ge Dok ne.
42008012	Vin̰a pul ge kaŋ rusu dee ne go mbe, ngay diir ge nda ge za̰a̰ fare ge Dok ne ma way, guwa̰ go Ba ge ho̰o̰l mbo ya tele num vin̰a ge hoɗ fareba, ndwa go num see monna to.
42008013	Her pagal ma, ngay diir ge num ge za̰a̰ fare ge Dok ne ma way, àa ame ne ge laa saal ɓame, ɗaŋɗe, àa n̰a ne vin̰a ge kee tèmel maa zì to. Ago, hoɗ fareba ge num way swag boo, sok ge pe heeya ma deɗ-ɗa num pagal, àa tigri ge guwa̰.
42008014	Suwa ge kore do̰ no ge ne pagal, ngay diir ge num ge za̰a̰ fare ge Dok ne ma way, guwa̰ go, iigiya ma, yan kaŋ seɗɗa pe ma, ɓyare tii ge kàɗɗa ge dunin̰a ne ma kale num pagal, àa daa mbo mboya ge jwab to.
42008015	Suwa ge kwaɗa, ngay diir ge num ge za̰a̰ fare ge Dok ne ma way, àa ame ne ge maa dul wa ma zì, àa koy ne kwaɗa, ge deŋel ge num way zì, àa ka mbo mboya ge jwab.
42008016	Zeso gwan jan num go iya: Ndu a̰me ge dun lampe ol ɗoo, kubi ne sòo zì koo ee ne ge saŋal pe zì go de? Ɗaŋɗe, ee ne kaŋ ee lampe pe pagal, ndwa go nda ge waɗ-ɗa zok zì ma kuwa ne hon kɔn̰al.
42008017	Ago kaŋ a̰me ge way no ge sego ma peɗ mbo dyan zum kɔn̰al go. Kaŋ ge kee ge ɗimil zì ma, nda mbo kuwa num benna kɔn̰al.
42008018	Ḛ ndi fare ge Dok ne mbe ge ḛ za̰a̰ num no ma kwaɗa, ago ndu ge no go ge a̰me, Dok mbo gwan hon ne kon pagal, ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge no be a̰me, Dok mbo ame ge fyalag mbe ge dwaɗ no go na go ge ne gezi.
42008019	Zeso na̰ mage ne na̰ van ge soɗob ma mbo ya ndil ne, ɗaŋɗe, àa seɗ vin̰a ge deɗ ne ta zì yà guwa to, ge dape nda yagle gḛḛ.
42008020	Nda mbo ya kee ne kuwaya go ne na̰ mage ne na̰ van ma go zum, num ɓyare ndil ne.
42008021	Sok mbe go, gwan num janna go: Mbi na̰ mage mbi na̰ van ma, a num ge za̰a̰ fare ge Dok ne ma, àa kee tèmel ge ne pagal me.
42008022	Ɗeɗ-ɗa ge dwam a̰me go ɗu, Zeso mage na nda ge ame hateya ma ndee ge faa ga̰a̰l go, jan num go: Ke kwaɗa go nè haa mbo ge mangaɗam ga̰a̰l wa lee gene yà. Àa ɓyan zum mboya me.
42008023	Sok haaya go, fii dwam, sa̰a̰m ɗege ya labreya ge mangaɗam ga̰a̰l pul go, ka ndàa mam ya faa go, àa gaa guwa ge ɗimiya.
42008024	Ne nda ge ame hateya ma mbo ya kore ne digi, àa jan ne go: Ba ge hateya, Ba ge hateya, mo kuwa go nè mbo swày no to de! Zeso kore digi, ngwabe sa̰a̰m mage sḭ̀ḭl, àa iyal se, sok kale mḛḛ cub.
42008025	Guwa̰ jan num go: Hoɗ fareba ge ḛ ḛ mbe ma dii no de? Voo wan num, àa ka kee ajab me, àa ka jan ta ge ta buwal zì go: Ndu mbe no ɗaa, a huɗi ne, ge go wa ka hoɗ sa̰a̰m mage sḭ̀ḭl ma na wa ɗoo, àa wa ka za̰a̰ ne me de.
42008026	Àa deɗ-ɗa yabeya ge suwa ge suwal ga̰a̰l Geraza ne go, kaa ge suwa ge Galile ne ndwa nga.
42008027	Sok ge Zeso ka̰a̰ na ko ya wa kal digi gaw, ndu ge suwal a̰me ɗu ge no ge on̰om ge sone ma gḛḛ-gḛḛ ge na zì mbo ya seɗ ne. Kee ya kaal ge gaa ya an swala, ne sok kàɗɗa kaɗ ge sḭḭ ma buwal zì me.
42008028	Sok ge ka̰a̰ na ndwa kuwa Zeso, ɗege poɗ luuluu, guu na ko ge ne ndwa se, hee na ka̰a̰l digi jan ne go: Mo Zeso ge Dok ge digi vyaw Van, Mo ɓyare da ge mbi ta de? Mbi kaɗe mo kaɗe, za̰a̰ mbi yal to.
42008029	Ndu mbe jin̰a ano mbe no ge dape, Zeso ho na wa ge on̰om ge sone pagal, ne wuwa zum ge ndu mbe zì. Ago kee ya kaal ge on̰om ge sone mbe tandaŋe ne no go. Àa ka koy ne vwalla se ge zul mage ɓyala walam ma, ɗaŋɗe, ka hal num gezi, on̰om ge sone mbe ka ee ne chiya mbo ge babur pul ma yà.
42008030	Zeso ele ne go: Mo dḭḭl gyana de? Gwan ge ne janna go: Mbi dḭḭl vwag twam jan. Ago on̰om ge sone ma kaa gḛḛ ge ne zì.
42008031	Àa kaɗe Zeso ge aa ta go, ne yin̰a maa ge ndu mbe zì mbo kan maa ge tugul ga̰a̰l ge ɗugul heleg se yà to.
42008032	Ajo̰o̰ sok mbe go, vwag ge kosoŋ ma way ka zam kaŋ zam ge njal kin̰a go, on̰om ge sone mbe ma gwan kaɗe ne go ne ho maa vin̰a waɗ ge kosoŋ mbe ma zì. Ne sḛ hon num vin̰a.
42008033	On̰om ge sone mbe ma ndage ge ndu mbe zì ya, àa waɗ ge kosoŋ ma zì. Kosoŋ mbe ma ɗege soo ge digi ya, àa zon ge wa kal digi mbo mangaɗam ga̰a̰l se yà, àa njoɗ mam gezi mɔɗwag.
42008034	Sok ge nda ge koy num ma kuwa kaŋ mbe ge kê ma go, àa jay soo, àa mbo dasare fare mbe ge suwal ga̰a̰l diŋ, ge suwal ge jiyale ma diŋ me.
