42008035	Nda ge fare mbo seɗ num ma mbo ya, ndwa kuwa kaŋ ge kê mbe ma ge maa ndwa. Àa deɗ-ɗa ge Zeso ta, àa seɗ ndu ge on̰om ge sone ma ndage ge ne zì mbe kàɗɗa ge ne ko pul se, ne angal eeya se, ge ba̰a̰ ma na ta. Voo wan num me.
42008036	Num ge kuwa zonna ge ndu mbe ne ge maa ndwa ma, ka wan maa ka̰a̰m fare pe go ndu ge kaa ge on̰om ge sone ma na zì mbe, ne see zonna pe gyana de.
42008037	Ajo̰o̰ voo wuwa nda ge suwal ga̰a̰l ge Geraza diŋ-ge ma zì gḛḛ go ɗe, àa mbo ya jan Zeso go ne ɗege ge maa suwa go. Sok ge ndee faa ndwa gwanna go ɗe,
42008038	ndu mbe ge on̰om ge sone ma ndage ge ne zì mbe, ka kaɗe ne ge aa tene go, ne n̰a na mboya dagre ge na. Ɗaŋɗe, Zeso vin ne to, jan ne go:
42008039	Guwa̰ ge mo ka̰a̰m buwal zì yà, dasare kaŋ ge Dok kê mo num ma peɗ ge num ta. Ndu mbe gwan diŋ, dasare kaŋ ge Zeso kê ge na mbe ma ge nda ge suwal ga̰a̰l diŋ-ge ma ta peɗ.
42008040	Sok ge Zeso gwan deɗ-ɗa lee gene go, ɓase ge kaa se kaɗ da̰a̰re ne ma mbo ya kun ne.
42008041	Sok mbe go, ndu a̰me ge àa ka tol ne Jayrus, ge kaa ga̰a̰l ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way pagal deɗ-ɗa me. Mbo ya guu na ko ne ndwa se, ka gwarge tene sok kaɗe ne go go, ne mbo ya na diŋ,
42008042	ge dape ne van ge gwale guwa ge del wol pɔgwa zi, ɗu kikiɗ ge ne tok go, ka kee tuguɗi ge gene ne mbo swày. Zeso sok mbo ge ne yà go, ɓase ma terse ne ya zì.
42008043	Ge sok mbe go, gwale a̰me ɗu waɗme ge keeya del wol pɔgwa zi ge swàm na ta, [ge aa na kaŋ seɗɗa ma ya banna kakaɗag ndwa zon tene], ge ndu a̰me see vin̰a zon ne to me,
42008044	ɓirsi yà baba mbo taɗ Zeso ba̰a̰ wa ge ne guwa̰. Ge sok mbe go gaw, swàm ge ka kan ne ta mbo ya aaya.
42008045	Zeso ele sok go: Ndu a̰me taɗ mbi ya go, a huɗi de? Ndu ge diige ka janna go ne na to. Piyer jan ne go: Ba ge hateya, nda ɓase, àa terse mo ja zì, àa ɓyan mo no lee gene me-lee gene me ɗe!
42008046	Ɗaŋɗe, Zeso gwan ge ne janna go: Ndu a̰me taa mbi ɗaŋ, ago mbi ge kuwaya go pool a̰me waɗ ja zum ge mbi zì ya.
42008047	Sok ge gwale mbe see go, àa kuwa kaŋ ge na kê mbe ya go, mbo ya guu na ko ne ndwa se ndaɗɗa ririg, ka wan fare ge ee na taɗ Zeso pe gezi kɔn̰al ge nda ndwa go peɗ, pe gyana ge na seɗ zonna ya no gaw.
42008048	Zeso jan ne go: Mbi van, hoɗ fareba ge amo zon mo ya go. Mbo ge halas.
42008049	Zeso gale be aa na fare faaya to peɗ, ndu a̰me ɗu ge ɗege no ge ga̰a̰l ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way Jayrus diŋ ya, jan ne go: Lwage Ba ge hateya to, mo van wa dibi ya yà.
42008050	Ɗaŋɗe, Zeso za̰a̰ fare mbe ma, jan ga̰a̰l ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way go: Iigi tene to, ɗeŋew go mo kaa ge hoɗ fareba, mo van mà mon ge swày zì.
42008051	Sok ge yin̰a diŋ yà, tele nda ge ɓase ma ya zum, n̰a diŋ yà ɗeŋew Piyer, Yohana, Jak me no, van gwale ba mage ne na̰ me.
42008052	Nda ge sok mbe go ma ka fyalla, àa ka kiimi ta. Zeso jan num go: «Ḛ fiya to, be suu suu to, fii go dwam.»
42008053	Sok mbe go, àa ka coɗ ta ge ne, ajo̰o̰ àa ge kuwaya tytyaɗ go van mbe suu suu.
42008054	Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge àa wuwa zì yà, Zeso wan van gwale tok, tol ne ndaal ɗaɗ go: Van kale, kore digi.
42008055	Sok mbe go, on̰om gwan-na ge ne zì, van gwale ɗege digi gaw, Zeso hoɗ na wa go àa ho̰ ne kaŋ zam.
42008056	Van gwale ba ma ka kee ajab, ɗaŋɗe, Zeso hoɗ num na wa go, num jin̰a ndu a̰me fare mbe to.
42009001	Zeso tol na nda ge ame hateya ge wol pɔgwa zi ma ya se, hon num pool mage vin̰a ge on̰om ge sone ma pagal peɗ, vin̰a ge zon nda ge tuguɗi ma me.
42009002	Guwa̰, teme num mbo oy fare ge muluk ge Dok ne mage mbo zon nda ge tuguɗi ma me.
42009003	Jan num go: «Ne kaa ge ḛ he a̰me ɗu ge ḛ tok go ge vin̰a pe to, koo calaŋ, koo galam ge mbo gɔswal, koo kaŋ zam, koo bware saal. Ndu a̰me ɗu ge ḛ buwal zige mbo ge ba̰a̰ zi to me.
42009004	Zok ge diige ge mbo ame ḛ ya, ḛ kaa ge ne diŋ bàba ɗiŋ ḛ dwam waɗ zum go.
42009005	Sok ge diige peɗ ge nda mbo ame ḛ ya to, ḛ n̰a num suwal mbe. Sok waɗ zum ge num suwal mbe diŋ go, ḛ poy ḛ ko kuci ma ne diŋ, ne kaa kaŋ ngayya ge num ta.»
42009006	Nda ge ame hateya ma ɗege, àa mbo, àa ka zwagre ta ge suwal ge jiyale ma diŋ peɗ oy Fare ge Kwaɗa, àa ka zon tuguɗi ma ge sok ma go peɗ me.
42009007	Sok mbe go, fare ge Zeso ne mbe ma peɗ deɗ-ɗa ge Heroɗ, gan ga̰a̰l ge suwa Galile ne tɔgwa zì, iigi digi giliw. Ago nda a̰me ma ka faaya go, ne Yohana ge ka kee nda baptem ta̰a̰ ya ne ge sok swày se ya.
42009008	Ge cùb ma ka janna go, ne Eli ngay tene ne, ge ɗogle ma me ɗe, ne ɗu ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ge dee suu ya ma, a̰me ge num buwal zige ta̰a̰ ya ne me.
42009009	Ɗaŋɗe, Heroɗ ka ele tene go: Mbi dee vyan Yohana go me ɗaŋ-noo, ndu mbe ge mbi za̰a̰ ne kaŋ keeya sḛ, daa na ne huɗi ne zoo de? Ka ɓyare vin̰a ge na kuwa Zeso mbe mbḛḛ.
42009010	Sok ge nda ge temeya ma guwa̰ ya Zeso ta, àa wan ne kaŋ ge maa kê ma pe peɗ. Ɔwabe num, gene num gezi yà caɗ ge nda ge ɓase ma, mbo ndwa suwal ga̰a̰l ge àa tol ne Betsayda yà go.
42009011	Ɗaŋɗe, ɓase ma kuwa go num n̰a maa n̰a, àa kàre num pe ya. Zeso ame num, ka faa num fare ge muluk ge Dok ne pagal, zon nda ge tuguɗi ge ka ɓyare go ne zo̰o̰ maa ma waɗme.
42009012	Gyala mbo din din, ne nda ge ame hateya ge wol pɔgwa zi ma gwan ta ya ne ta zì guwa, àa jan ne go: Jin̰a ɓase ma, num mbo ge suwal van mage zok ge no ziya guguwa ma diŋ, ndwa ɓyare sok dwamma mage kaŋ zam. Ago sok ge nè no ne go babur ne.
42009013	Ɗaŋɗe, Zeso jan num go: Ḛ sḛ ma ho̰ num kaŋ zam ɗe. Num sḛ gwan ge ne janna go: I go ge dupḛ ma nuwan̰, sini ma zi bàŋ me ɗe. Mo ɓyare go i mbo yaɗ kaŋ zam ya ge ɓase mbe ge nɔnɔg ma pe de?
42009014	Ago, nda soɗob ge sok mbe go ma, kaa guwa ge dudubu nuwan̰. Sok mbe go, Zeso jan na nda ge ame hateya ma go: Ḛ ee nda ve pul kàɗɗa warnuwan̰ warnuwan̰.
42009015	Àa kee fare ge ne jin̰a maa mbe, àa ee num se kàɗɗa mɔɗwag.
42009016	Zeso ɔwabe dupḛ mbe ge nuwan̰ mage sini mbe ge zi ma, ee na ndwa pḭḭ digi, kee mersi hon Dok, guwa̰ siɗi num se, hon nda ge ame hateya ma num, ndwa go num va ɓase mbe ma num.
42009017	Ndu ge diige zam kaŋ zam huriya, àa ɔwabe kaŋ zam pe ge gaa ma gwal pul wol pɔgwa zi.
42009018	Dwam a̰me go ɗu, Zeso ka kee kaɗeya gezi yà hini caɗ, ne nda ge ame hateya ma mbo ya ge ne ta, ele num go: Ɓase ma jan go zum gyana ge mbi pe de?
42009019	Num sḛ ma gwan ge ne janna go: Nda a̰me ma jan go go, mo Yohana ba ge kee nda baptem ne, gegene ma go, mo Eli ne, ge ɗogle ma me ɗe, mo ɗu ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ge dee suu ya ma, a̰me ge num buwal zige ta̰a̰ ya ne me.
42009020	Gwan jan num go: O̰o̰, ḛ sḛ ma ɗe, ḛ dwaɗ go mbi huɗi sḛ ne ɗaŋ de? Piyer hee fare, gwan ge ne janna go: Mo Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne, Ndu ge Dok taa nee ne.
42009021	Zeso hoɗ num na wa ndaa kaka go, ne kaa ge num jin̰a ndu a̰me fare mbe to.
42009022	Gwan jan num iya go: Mbiya go Mbi, Van ge Ndu ne za̰a̰ yal gḛḛ, Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme num ma, ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way mage Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma kuri ne gezi, ne see swày, ge dwam taa guwa̰ ne ta̰a̰ digi me.
42009023	Guwa̰, Zeso jan nda peɗ ge kaa sok mbe go ma go: Kaɗɗa ndu ɓyare mbo ya ge mbi pe go, ne duwa tene to, ne he dṵṵl ge in na kaŋre dwam ma zì mɔɗwag, ne kare mbi pe me.
42009024	Ago, ndu ge diige ge mbo kaɗ-ɗa ka kwacware tene ge ndwa ge na ne, mbo ban ne gezi. Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge diige ge mbo hon tene ya gezi ge mbi pe, mbo seɗ ndwa ge fareba me.
42009025	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me seɗ kaŋ gan ge suwa pagal ma ya mɔɗwag ɗoo, ban ndwa ge na ne gezi no, ano mbe mba ne ge da de?
42009026	Ago, ndu a̰me ge mbo ngwabe tene ya, be kee sayda ge ambi, Mbi, Van ge Ndu ne mbo kuri go, ne ge na nee ne to waɗme, ge dwam gwanna ge na ne ya go, ge pateya ge na ne mage na Ba ne zì, ɓanna ge malayka ge harcal ma way waɗme.
42009027	Fareba, mbi jan ḛ ne no, nda ge no ge sego sok mbe go ma, a̰me ge num buwal zige ma mbo suu to, zḛḛ ge go num kuwa Dok kee muluk ge na ne.
42009028	Deɗ-ɗa go, guwa ge dwam wa gezi zi, ge ne fare janna mbe ma guwa̰, Zeso jan Piyer, Yohana mage Jak ma go num mbo ya, ndee mbo njal pagal digi ndwa kee kaɗeya.
42009029	Sok kee kaɗeya go, ne ndwa mbo ya eyaya, ne ba̰a̰ seŋe saal taɗag ge go gaa seeya cicim.
42009030	Kuwa gale, nda a̰me ma zi dyan ta ne ta sok mbe go, àa ka siɗigi fare ge ne: Nda mbe ma kaa Moyiz mage Eli.
42009031	Àa kaa ge pateya ge mbo no ge Dok ta ya pe se, àa ka faa fare ge ne dwam gɔswal ge suwa pagal go ne, ne wa ge mbo huyya ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem yà.
42009032	Piyer mage na ka̰a̰m ma dol dwam galgatag. Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge àa kore digi go, àa kuwa Zeso seeya kɔn̰al, nda ge zi mbe ma ɓanna ge ne me.
42009033	Guwa̰ ge num mbe ge zi ma ɗege n̰a Zeso go, Piyer jan ne go: Ba ge hateya, a kwaɗa ge nè kaɗ go go, nè ɗùu gur ma taa, ɗu ge mo pe, ɗu ge Moyiz pe, ɗu ge Eli pe me. Ɗaŋɗe, be kuwa fare ge na jan mbe pe go tem to.
42009034	A sok jan na fare mbe go gale, pḭḭ mbo ya kulbi num se gaw. Voo mbo ya wan nda ge ame hateya ma, sok ge àa ba̰a̰ pḭḭ zì go.
42009035	Ka̰a̰l a̰me mbo ge pḭḭ zì ya, jan go: Ndu mbe no a mbi Van ne, mbi taa ne tal, ḛ ke tèmel ne fare janna ma pagal.
42009036	Guwa̰ ge ka̰a̰l mbe fâ fare mbe ma go, Zeso gaa hini ɗu. Nda ge ame hateya mbe ge kuwa kaŋ ge kê ma, koy num maa dul wa ma zì, àa wan ndu a̰me ɗu num pe dwam mbe go to.
42009037	Dwam ge na kon pagal ge go, Zeso mage na nda ge ame hateya ge taa mbe ma, sok gwan ge njal pagal digi ya se go, nda ɓase nɔnɔg mbo ya seɗ ne.
42009038	Kuwa gale, ge ɓase ma buwal zì ya, ndu a̰me ɗege oyya digi go: Bagezok, mbi kaɗe mo kaɗe, kuwa mbi van a̰se nde, a nee ne ɗu kikiɗ mbi tok go.
42009039	On̰om ge sone a̰me deɗ ne vun go cab, ee ne ka aa na pe, ka pil ne zazan̰, ne wa ka zam hore gigib. On̰om mbe ɗege mbo n̰a ne, kee ne ya go liliɗ.
42009040	Mbi kaɗe mo nda ge ame hateya ma no go num yin̰a ne zum, num pool be mbyaɗ ge yan ne to.
42009041	Zeso gwan jan num go iya: Ḛ mbe ge màno, ge be hoɗ fareba mage kee sone ma! Mbi gaa kaɗ ge ḛ dagre mbo diya ga de? Mbi in ḛ dṵṵl ma mbo diya ga me de? Guwa̰ jan ndu mbe go: Gene mo van ya go go.
42009042	Van gale be yan-na ne ta zì guwa to peɗ, on̰om ge sone mbe dol ne suwa se, ka pil ne zazan̰. Ɗaŋɗe, Zeso ngwabe on̰om mbe, zon van jiyale mbe, hon ne ne ba me.
42009043	Nda peɗ ka kee ajab ge pool ge ɓaŋlaŋ ge Dok ne mbe pe. Nda gale ge sok kee ajab ge kaŋ keeya mbe ge Zeso ne ma pagal peɗ, seŋe tene na nda ge ame hateya ma ta jan num go:
42009044	Kaɗɗa ge ḛ ɗe, ḛ ee ḛ tɔgwa kwaɗa za̰a̰ fare ge mbi ɓyare janna mbe ma no: Àa mbo ɓyan mbi, Van ge Ndu ne ge nda duwana ma tok go.
42009045	Ɗaŋɗe, nda ge ame hateya mbe ma be ka wan fare janna mbe pe to. Dok way num fare mbe way ndwa go num wa̰a̰ ne pe to. Àa ka chiya voo ge ele ne fare ge fare mbe pagal me.
42009046	Ago, nda ge ame hateya ma ka ele ta go, ne huɗi sḛ mbiya kaɗ ga̰a̰l ne maa buwal zì de.
42009047	Ajo̰o̰ Zeso kuwa num dwaɗɗa mbe ma ya sok, wan van jiyale a̰me ɗu, ee ne na ziya guwa,
42009048	jan num go: Ndu ge diige, ge mbo ame ndu ge hoɗegeya a̰me ya ɗu dinna ge van jiyale mbe no go ge na diŋ, ge mbi pe, ago ame mbi sḛ ge mbi pagal. Ndu ge ame mbi sḛ ya me ɗe, ame Ndu ge teme mbi ya me. Ago, ndu ge fare a̰me pe to ge ḛ buwal zì peɗ, a ndu mbe ga̰a̰l ne.
42009049	Guwa̰ Yohana jan Zeso go: Ba ge hateya, i kuwa ndu a̰me ɗu ka yan on̰om ge sone ma ge mo dḭḭl. I ɓyare no go i tele ne, ge dape kàre mo pe ge mojo̰o̰ i go to.
42009050	Zeso gwan ge ne janna go: Ḛ daa gwan tele ne to, ago ndu ge sal tèmel ge ḛ kee to, a ge ḛ pe go.
42009051	Ɗeɗ-ɗa go, dwam ge àa hee Zeso mbo pḭḭ zì terse ja zì, vin tene go ne kaa yal daa puy na mbo Jerusalem.
42009052	Teme nda ge vin̰a ma ge na ndwa zḛḛ yà. Num sḛ mbe ma kan ta ge vin̰a go mboya, àa mbo waɗ ge suwal ge jiyale a̰me ge no suwa ge Samari ne go diŋ, ndwa nuusi sok ge ne wa dwam go.
42009053	Ɗaŋɗe, àa vin ame ne to, ge dape, ka kale mbo suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem.
42009054	Sok ge nda ge ame hateya ge zi ma, Jak mage Yohana za̰a̰ fare mbe go, àa jan Zeso go: Bagezok-goo, Mo vin vin go i ho̰ i wa go ol mbo ge pḭḭ ziya burmi num gezi de?
42009055	Seŋe tene ge num ta, mḛḛre num ol kekeŋ, jan num go: [Ḛ kuwa on̰om ge ee ḛ jan ano mbe no kuwa ɗer ɓade?
42009056	Ago, Van ge Ndu ne mbo ya ndwa ban ndwa ge nda duwana ma way gezi to, ɗaŋɗe, ndwa mon num.] Guwa̰, àa kan ta mbo suwal ge jiyale a̰me ge ɗogle yà.
42009057	Àa vin̰a zì gale, ndu a̰me ɗu zuɗ-ɗa, jan Zeso go: Mbi mbo kàre mo pe sok ma peɗ ge mo mbo mbo ya go.
42009058	Zeso jan ne go: Bole ma ge maa tàal ma, njoole ge pḭḭ zige ma ge maa zok ma, ɗaŋɗe, Mbi, Van ge Ndu ne be sok a̰me ge paa na pagal go.
42009059	Gwan jan ndu a̰me ge ɗogle go: Nè ɓa̰a̰ mboya dagre. Ndu mbe gwan ge ne janna go: Ho̰ mbi vin̰a, mbi gale mbuu mbi ba ɓiya.
42009060	Ɗaŋɗe, Zeso jan ne go: N̰a nda ge suu suu paŋ ma mbul maa swày ma, ɗaŋɗe, mbo, mo mbo jan nda duwana ma vare zoo go, Dok kee muluk go.
42009061	Ndu a̰me ge ɗogle ɗu jan ne go: Mbi mbo dagre ge mo Bagezok, ɗaŋɗe, ho̰ mbi vin̰a ge mbo san mbi zok wa guy.
42009062	Zeso gwan ge ne janna go: Ndu ge ɗege gaa kaŋ ge chari, ka seŋe tene ndil sok na guwa̰ go, mbaa a̰me ge tèmel ge muluk ge Dok ne pe to.
42010001	Guwa̰ ge fare mbe ma way go, Bagezok gwan twaɗ nda ge temeya ge ɗogle ma ta warɓỳala, ka teme num kakab ge na ndwa zḛḛ yà, ge suwal ga̰a̰l ge diige diŋ peɗ, sok ge diige go peɗ ge ne sḛ mbiya mbo num go ma.
42010002	Jan num go: Tèmel ge siyal ne danjan̰, ɗaŋɗe, nda ge kee tèmel ma hoɗege. Ḛ kaɗe Ba ge kan na siyal ɗaŋ, ne teme nda ge tèmel ma ge gaaso zì yà.
42010003	Ḛ mbo, ḛ kaa ge kuwaya go, mbi teme ḛ no ɗe, ḛ dinna ge tame van ge waɗ ge bagomso ma buwal zì yà ma go.
42010004	Ḛ hee bware ge ḛ patar ma zì to, ḛ hee galam ge mbo gɔswal, koo tyako ma ḛ tok-ga to, ḛ mḛḛ se bàŋ tata san ndu a̰me wa ge vin̰a zì to me.
42010005	Ge zok a̰me ge ḛ mbo kaɗ-ɗa ka waɗ num diŋ ma, ḛ ee pe jan zḛḛ go: Halas ne kaa ge zok no diŋ.
42010006	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me ge yan halas pe ge zok mbe diŋ ɗe, halas ge ḛ gene ya mbe kee tèmel ge ne dul wa zì. Kaɗɗa go to, ḛ wa guwa̰ ya ḛ pagal.
42010007	Ḛ kaa ge zok mbe diŋ, ḛ zam kaŋ zam ge àa mbo kaɗ-ɗa ka hon ḛ ma. Ago ndu ge kee tèmel mbiya seɗ poɗɗa ge na tèmel ge na kee pagal tem. Ḛ kaa ge be zwagre ta lee gene me-lee gene me to.
42010008	Sok ge ḛ waɗ-ɗa ge suwal ga̰a̰l a̰me ge diige diŋ, kaɗɗa nda ge suwal ma ame ḛ ya, kaŋ zam ge àa hon ḛ ya ma, ḛ za num.
42010009	Ḛ zo̰o̰ nda ge tuguɗi ge suwal ga̰a̰l mbe diŋ-ge ma, ḛ ka jan num go: Sok ge Dok mbo ya kee muluk ḛ pagal mbyaɗ-ɗa go.
42010010	Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge ḛ waɗ-ɗa suwal ga̰a̰l a̰me diŋ, kaɗɗa àa ame ḛ ya to, ḛ mbo ge sok seɗ ta ge ɓase ma way ma yà, ḛ jin̰a num go:
42010011	«Koo kuci ge ḛ suwal ga̰a̰l ne ge i ko ta ma puy, i poy num ge ḛ pagal. Ɗaŋɗe, ḛ kaa ge kuwaya go, sok ge Dok kee muluk ḛ pagal mbyaɗ-ɗa go.»
42010012	Mbi jan ḛ go, ge dwam ge Dok kun sariya ge nda duwana ma pagal go, dṵṵl ge yan̰a ge nda ge Sodom diŋ-ge ma pagal mbo kaɗ nde-nde waɗe ge num ge suwal ga̰a̰l mbe ne ma.
42010013	Woo ge ḛ ḛ, nda ge suwal Korazḛ mage suwal Betsayda ma! Daa no go kaŋ ajab ge àa kê num mbe ma no, àa kê num ge nda ge suwal Tir mage Sido̰ diŋ-ge ma buwal zì, àa dee seŋe ta ja se ge maa sone keeya ma go, sok kan kacigri mage ɔwabe siyam kanna ge maa pagal digi go.
42010014	Ge ano mbe no ta, ge dwam ge Dok kun sariya ge nda duwana ma pagal go, dṵṵl ge yan̰a ge àa mbo ee ne ya Tir mage Sido̰ pagal mbo kaɗ nde-nde waɗe ge ḛ ḛ.
42010015	Ḛ ge suwal Kapernawom diŋ-ge ma! Ḛ dwaɗ go Dok mbo hee ḛ suwal pḭḭ digi ya caɗ de? To! Mbo ɓyan ḛ ɗiŋ ge sok kàɗɗa ge nda ge swày ma way se yà.
42010016	Gwan jan na nda ge ame hateya ma go: Ndu ge kaɗɗa ka ame fare janna ge ḛ ḛ ma, ame mbi fare ma. Ndu kaɗɗa ka kuri fare janna ge ḛ ḛ ma, kuri mbi fare ma. Ndu ge kuri mbi fare ya, kuri Ba ge teme mbi ya me.
42010017	Guwa̰, nda ge ame hateya ge warɓỳala ma gwan-na fereya ge laa saal, àa ka janna go: Bagezok-goo, on̰om ge sone ma puy, àa ka za̰a̰ i, sok ge i ka tol dḭḭl ge mo, sok hoɗ num i wa go.
42010018	Jan num go: Mbi ka kuwa, sok mbe go Saytan deɗɗa ge pḭḭ zì ya dinna ge pḭḭ see go.
42010019	Ḛ kuwa go, Mbi ho̰ ḛ pool ge mbo ge bwam mage ndecege ma pagal, ge pool ge Ba ge ho̰o̰l ne ma pagal peɗ me. A̰me mbo kee ḛ yal to baɗ.
42010020	Go no puy ɗe, ḛ kaa ge be kee laa saal go ḛ daa ho̰ on̰om ge sone ma wa ɗaa, num za̰a̰ ḛ no kade to, ɗaŋɗe, ḛ ke laa saal ge ḛ dḭḭl waɗ ja nda ge Dok ne ma way ma buwal zì ge pḭḭ zì yà pe.
42010021	Ge sok mbe go gaw, On̰om ge Harcal huy Zeso ge laa saal, ɗege janna go: Mbi ke mo mersi Baa, Mo ɗu, ge kee muluk no pḭḭ zì yà, ge suwa pagal me. Ago, Mo way kaŋ keeya ge amo ma ge nda ge andaŋ mage nda ge no ge kuwaya ɗugul ma ndwa zḛḛ, mo din̰a num ya ge nda ge no ge mojo̰o̰ nda jabso go ma ta no. O̰o̰ Baa, kaŋ mbe ma kê go no ɗe, Mo ɓyare ne go num dee ya keeya mbe go.
42010022	Mbi Ba n̰a fare ma mbi tok go mɔɗwag. Ndu a̰me ge wan pe go, Van no ne huɗi ne de to, a Baa ɗeŋew kuwa ano mbe ne, koo ndu a̰me ge wan pe go mbi Ba ne huɗi ne de to me, a Van ɗeŋew me no, ndu ge Van ɓyare tyan ne ndwa gezi ge na Ba ta me.
42010023	Guwa̰ seŋe tene ge na nda ge ame hateya ma ta, faa fare mbe num sḛ ma ɗeŋew: «Laa saal a ge ḛ ge ndwa kuwa kaŋ mbe ge ḛ kuwa num ma no pe ɗaŋ!»
42010024	Ago, mbi kee ḛ kuwaya go nda ge zwagre Dok wa mage gan ga̰a̰l ma gḛḛ kê ene kuwa kaŋ mbe ge ḛ kuwa num mbe ma no ma, àa be seɗ vin̰a to ba! Àa kê ene za̰a̰ fare mbe ge ḛ za̰a̰ num ma no, àa be seɗ vin̰a za̰a̰ num to me.
42010025	Ḛ kuwa gale, sok ɓyare hee Zeso pe ge fare go, ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne a̰me ɗege digi, ele ne fare go: Ba ge hateya, a ma̰ kaŋ ge mbiya mbi kee nee ne ndwa hon mbi vin̰a ge mbo kaɗ ge ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din ge Dok de?
42010026	Zeso gwan ge ne eleya go: Njaŋe ge eeya ge Moyiz ne ma zì gyana de? Mo sḛ ya isi go da ma zoo de?
42010027	Gwan ge Zeso janna, eeya ma jan go: «Mbiya mo laa wan mo Bagezok, Dok ge amo, ge mo dul wa mɔɗwag, ge mo sḛ mɔɗwag, ge mo pool mɔɗwag, mo dwaɗɗa mɔɗwag me. Mbiya mo laa wan mo ka̰a̰m, dinna ge mo laa wa̰a̰ tene go me.»
42010028	Zeso jan ne go: Mo guwa̰ fare vinna kwaɗa. Mo kaɗ-ɗa keeya mbe go, mo mbo kaɗ ge ndwa.
42010029	Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne mbe ɓyare ngayya go na fare eleya temel, ele Zeso go: «A huɗi ma mbiya kaɗ mbi ka̰a̰m ma ne de?»
42010030	Zeso hee fare, jan ne go: Dwam a̰me go, ndu a̰me ɗege ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ ya, ndwa mbo Jeriko. Deɗ ge nda ge fiiri vin̰a ma tok zì, àa harge ne kaŋ ma ge ne tok go mɔɗwag, àa poɗ ne iyalla cɔcɔm, àa ee ne wa ge swày, àa mbo maa mboya.
42010031	Ɗeɗ-ɗa go, ndu ge kee tuwaleya a̰me ɗu hee vin̰a mbe ya waɗme. Kuwa ndu mbe, coŋle vin̰a gezi yà.
42010032	Ndu a̰me ɗu ge no rusu ge Levi ne zì, deɗ-ɗa ge sok mbe go waɗme, kuwa ne, coŋle vin̰a gezi yà.
42010033	Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge no suwa ge Samari ne go a̰me ɗu, ge ka mbo gɔswal, deɗ-ɗa ge sok mbe go, kuwa ndu mbe, ngay kuwa a̰se ge na ne ge ne ta gḛḛ maam to.
42010034	Mbo ya ne ta zì guwa, kan nùm mage on̰or jìn̰al ge ne jwaŋ ma wa zì, taa num zì. Guwa̰ go, ee ne ge na kwar pagal, gene ne mbo ge zok ge gɔswal ma way zì yà, hee ne dṵṵl ma ge na pagal.
42010035	Sok yan kin̰are, hon ga̰a̰l ge zok gɔswal ne bware ge tèmel dwam zi ne, jan ne go: Koy ndu mbe kwaɗa, kaɗɗa kaŋ ge mo mà kee ya ge ne, kale ya ge bware ge mbi ho̰ mo pagal puy ɗe, mbi mbo poɗ mo ne, sok ge mbi mbo seŋe ja.
42010036	Zeso gwan ele ne go: Ge nda ge taa mbe ma buwal zì, mo dwaɗ go ne ge diige ndi ndu mbe ge chala ma tase cɔcɔm ne ge na sḛ go de?
42010037	Gwan ge ne janna go: A ba mbe ge kuwa ndu mbe a̰se. Zeso jan ne go: Mo sḛ waɗme, mbo, mo gaa keeya mbe go.
42010038	Zeso mage na nda ge ame hateya ma sok mboya go gale, àa waɗ-ɗa ge suwal jiyale a̰me diŋ, gwale a̰me ɗu ge àa ka tol ne Marta ame ne ge na diŋ.
42010039	Ne na̰ van ge gwale a̰me kaa ɗu, ge àa ka tol ne Mari, mbo ya kaɗ ge Bagezok ko pul se, ame hateya ge ne ne ma.
42010040	Tèmel ge zok diŋ-ge ma mbo ya hee Marta sok ma mɔɗwag. Seɗ vin̰a hoɗege guwa, ge mbo ya Zeso ta, jan ne go: Bagezok-goo, Mo dwaɗ gyana ge mbi na̰ van swaɗɗa ge swaɗ mbi ya kaŋ zam ta keeya no de? Jin̰a ne, ne mbo ya mbaa mbi ɗaŋ.
42010041	Bagezok gwan ne janna go: Mo Marta, tèmel ge gḛḛ ceɗeɗ mbe ma iigi mo ya digi, mo za̰a̰ yal gḛḛ ge num pe no.
42010042	Zane no, tèmel ge mbiya melaw ɗu, Mari taa lee ge kwaɗa, ge ndu mbo mbyaɗ ame ne gezi ge ne tok go to.
42011001	Ɗeɗ-ɗa go Zeso kee kaɗeya sok a̰me go. Sok ge aa go, ne ndu ge ame hateya a̰me ɗu kaɗe ne go: Bagezok, hate i go, i mbiya ele Dok kaŋ ge mojo̰o̰ Yohana hate na nda ge ame hateya ma go pe gyana de.
42011002	Jan num go: Sok ge ḛ ɗege kaɗe a̰me, ḛ jin̰a go: Baa! N̰a mo dḭḭl ne ka harcal, N̰a muluk ne mbo ya!
42011003	Ho̰ i kaŋ zam mà ge mbyaɗ dwam,
42011004	Pore i sone ma. A fareba, i sḛ ma waɗme, I pore nda ge kee i n̰aal ma mbe go. N̰a i deɗ ge pe heeya zì to.
42011005	Gwan jan num go iya: A huɗi ne ge ḛ buwal zì, ge wa mbo ge na kondore ge wa kag ta yà ɗaal ga̰a̰l zì ndwa ele ne go: Kondore, mbi ɓyare dupḛ taa ge mo tok go,
42011006	ndwa go mbi kondore a̰me ɗu mbo mbi gɔswal ya ne, mbi a̰me ge hon ne zamma to.
42011007	Mà kaɗɗa go, ne kondore mbe gwan ge ne janna ja ge zok zì ya go: Mbiya mbi sḛ go to, mbi feɗ zok wa ja digi, i ge mbi van ma fii ya se, mbi daa gwan ɗege digi hon mo dupḛ to.
42011008	Ḛ kuwa, mbi jan ḛ ne no, ndu mbe ɗege digi mà hon ne dupḛ mbe ma, ge ne no na kondore pe to, ɗaŋɗe, mà ɗege digi hon ne num peɗ, ge wanna ge ne wa̰a̰ tene deŋel pe.
42011009	Go no, mbi jan ḛ go: Ḛ ele kaŋ ge ḛ ɓyare, Dok mbo hon ḛ ne. Ḛ ɓyare, ḛ mbo seɗ me. Ḛ dabe zok wa, Dok mbo hage ḛ ne.
42011010	Ago ndu ge diige ge ele a̰me, àa hon ne ne hon. Ndu ge ɓyare a̰me, seɗ ne seɗ. Ndu ge dabe zok wa, àa hage ne ne hage.
42011011	A huɗi ne ge ḛ buwal zì, ge ne van wa ele ne [dupḛ ɗoo, wa mbo hon ne njal de?] Kaɗɗa na ele ne sini ɗoo, wa ɔwabe bwam hon ne, ge go na ho̰ ne sini de?
42011012	Koo ele ne baare fà̰a̰ ɗoo, wa mbo hon ne ndecege de?
42011013	Kaɗɗa ḛ ge sone gene mbe ma no, ḛ kuwa kaŋ ge kwaɗa ma hon ḛ van ma kuwa, kee mà pe gyana, ḛ Ba ge kaa no pḭḭ ma zì yà dee wa mbo kuri nda ge ele na On̰om ge harcal ma de.
42011014	Dwam a̰me ɗu, Zeso mbo ya yan on̰om ge sone ge taa ndu a̰me ɗel se. Sok ge on̰om ge sone wuwa zum go, ndu mbe ɗege faa wa, ɓase ge kaa sok mbe go ma ka kee ajab.
42011015	Ɗaŋɗe, a̰me ma ka janna go: A Belzebul, ga̰a̰l ge on̰om ge sone ma way hon ne pool ge yan on̰om ge sone ma ne.
42011016	Ge ɗogle ma me ɗe, sok ɓyare vin̰a ge hee ne pe ge fare go, àa ele ne, ne kê kaŋ ngayya a̰me ɗu ge ngay go ne pool mbe mbo ge Dok ta ya.
42011017	Ajo̰o̰ na ka kuwa num dwaɗɗa ma kuwa, jan num go: Muluk ge diige, ge ne nda ma kee ta ho̰o̰l ge ta ta buwal zì burmi gezi, ge go zok ge àa sḭḭ ma gaa gul ge ta pe ya me.
42011018	Mà kaɗɗa Saytan nda ma ho̰o̰l ta ta buwal zì no, kee pe gyana ne muluk mbe mà gwan mḛḛ digi de? Mbi jan ano mbe ndwa ge dape, ḛ jan go Belzebul hon mbi pool ge yan on̰om ge sone ma ne.
42011019	Kaɗɗa na mbe go ɗe, nda ge no ḛ pe go ma sḛ seɗ pool ge yan on̰om ge sone ma ge huɗi ta de? A ge pe, num kaŋ keeya ma ngay no go, ḛ fare janna mbe ma ge maa vin̰a go to.
42011020	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ne ge tok pool ge Dok ne ɗoo, mbi yan on̰om ge sone ma no ɗe, Dok kee muluk go ge sego ḛ buwal zì.
42011021	Sok ge ndu a̰me ge pool, ge no ge kaŋ twam mbyaɗ tene koy na sok, a̰me ge mbo ya dabe ne kaŋ gan ma to.
42011022	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ndu ge waɗe ne ge pool mbo ja deɗ ne, waɗe ge ne pagal, ɔwabe ne kaŋ walam ge isi ge num pagal mbe ma mɔɗwag, vaa na nda ge na pe go ma kaŋ paal ge na harge num ge ne tok go ma me.
42011023	Kaɗɗa ndu sal tèmel ge mbi kee, a ho̰o̰l ge mbi, ndu ge ɓan nda duwana ma pagal digi dagre ge mbi to, ɓasare se num.
42011024	Sok ge on̰om ge sone ndage zum ge ndu zì ya, aa babur pul nanna na pagal, ndwa ɓyare sok ge ɗwabe tene. Sok ge seɗ sok to, jan tene go: Mbi gwan ge sok ge mbi mbô no ge ne ya.
42011025	Sok ge gwan-na, seɗ ndu mbe ge mojo̰o̰ zok ge pul pella kɔn̰al ɗaɗaŋ go, kaŋ ma nuusiya kwaɗa,
42011026	ago, ne guwa̰ mbo ɔwabe na ka̰a̰m ge sone waɗe na ma ya ɓỳala, àa ge num ɓan-na mbo kaɗ ɗagleya ge ndu mbe zì. Go mbe no, kàɗɗa ge ndu mbe ne ge guwa̰ go ge, kaɗ sone kakatag waɗe ne kàɗɗa ge wal.
42011027	Sok ge Zeso ka jan fare mbe go ɗe, gwale a̰me ndage na ka̰a̰l ge nda ge ɓase ma buwal zì ya, jan ne go: Ndu gwale mbe ge ḭḭ mo emel, ge wuwa mo ge na pam, a ge laa saal ɗaŋ!
42011028	Ɗaŋɗe, Zeso gwan ge ne janna go: Mo jan daa vare zoo go nda ge za̰a̰ Fare ge Dok ne ma, àa ka mboya ne pagal ma, num ne ge laa saal me kade!
42011029	Ajo̰o̰ ɓase ma ka mbwaɗɗa lulum Zeso pe go, ɗege jan num go: Doŋ pe ge màno mbe doŋ pe ge sone ne. Ɓyare kaŋ a̰me ɗu ge ngay tok pool ge Dok ne, ɗaŋɗe, Dok gaa ngay num ɗeŋew kaŋ ngayya ge kê ndu ge zwagre na wa Jonas ne, be a̰me ge ɗogle to.
42011030	Ago, Jonas kaa kaŋ ngayya ge nda ge suwal ga̰a̰l Niniv ma pe, Van ge Ndu ne mbo kaɗ kaŋ ngayya a̰me ne ɗu, ge nda ge doŋ pe mbe ge màno ma pe waɗme.
42011031	Ge del ge kale zḛḛ ya ma go, gan ga̰a̰l ge gwale ge lee ham ya ge, ɗege dee ge suwa wa aa ndegeɗe ma ya, mbo ya za̰a̰ fare andaŋ ge ka waɗ ge gan ga̰a̰l Salomo̰ wa zì ma no. Zane no ndu ge waɗe Salomo̰ gale no go go no, ḛ za̰a̰ ne go to. A ge pe, dwam ge Dok dee ɗege ya kun sariya, gan ga̰a̰l ge gwale mbe kan fare ge nda ge doŋ pe mbe ge màno ma pagal.
42011032	Go mbe waɗme, ge dwam kun sariya go, nda ge suwal ga̰a̰l Niniv ma mbo kan fare ge nda ge doŋ pe ge màno mbe ma pagal, ndwa go maa seŋe ta se sok za̰a̰ fare ge ndu ge zwagre Dok wa|Nda ge zwagre Dok wa Jonas dee oy maa ne go. Ge sego, mbi jan ḛ go, ndu ge waɗe Jonas gale no go go no, num vin seŋe ta se go to.
42011033	Ndu a̰me ge dun lampe digi go ɗoo, wa mbo way koo mbo kubi ne sòo zì go de. Ee ne vare zoo ge kaŋ ee lampe pe digi, ndwa go nda ge waɗ-ɗa zok zì ma ndwa kuwa sok kɔn̰al.
42011034	Mo ndwa ma ge mojo̰o̰ lampe go ge mo sḛ duul pe. Sok ge mo ndwa ma gale kaɗ pool, mo sḛ duul mɔɗwag kaɗ kɔn̰al go waɗme. Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa go àa tuguɗi, mo sḛ duul waɗme a ge tṵṵ ge ɗeɗeg zì.
42011035	Koy tene kwaɗa, ne kaa ge tṵṵ ge ɗeɗeg laa kɔn̰al ge no mo ta se to.
42011036	Kaɗɗa mo sḛ duul mɔɗwag ge kɔn̰al go, be ge mo lee a̰me ɗu kaɗ ge tṵṵ ge ɗeɗeg zì to, mo sḛ duul mbo kaɗ kɔn̰al mɔɗwag, dinna ge lampe hon mo kɔn̰al go.
42011037	Zeso sok jan fare go gale, Farisi a̰me ɗu tol ne, maa mbo na yà zam kaŋ zam ge gyala. Mbo ge ne yà, a ge ne ɓan zam kaŋ zam dagre.
42011038	Sok ge Farisi mbe see go ne za kaŋ zam be usi na tok ge nda kee ya day go to, fare mbe kee ne ajab.
42011039	Ɗaŋɗe, Bagezok kuwa ne dwaɗɗa mbe jan ne go: Ḛ Farisi ma ɗe, ḛ usi gezi seɗe mage sufra guwa̰ ɗag ɗoo, ḛ dul wa ma kaɗ pella zì cocwag ge dwaɗɗa ge sone ma, ḛ kaɗ laa pisil me ɗe.
42011040	Nda ge fare kuwaya hoɗege num ma! Ḛ daa kee fare ma gyana ge mojo̰o̰, ndu mbe ge kê kaŋ ge nè kuwa num no ma, be kee ndu duwana dul wa ne waɗme to go de?
42011041	Ḛ mbaa vare zoo nda ge a̰se ma be tumriya ge ḛ dul wa ma zì, go mbe no, kaŋ ma mbo kaɗ kɔn̰al ge ḛ pe.
42011042	Woo ge ḛ ḛ! Farisi ma! Ḛ hon ḛ kaŋ wa ge be fare pe to ge ḛ gaaso ne ge mojo̰o̰ gefere mage ɗeme ndwa go ma go ɓame, zane no, ḛ vyale kaŋ ge ḛ mbiya kee num ge temel taɗ mage laa wan Dok ya go. A kaŋ ge ḛ mbiya kee num ma ne, be ḛ vyale gegene ge gaa ma to me.
42011043	Woo ge ḛ ḛ, Farisi ma! Ḛ laa wa̰a̰ sok kàɗɗa ge nda ndwa zḛḛge ma, ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way ma zì mage wa sanna ge hormo ma ge sok ɓase ma go me.
42011044	Woo ge ḛ ḛ! Ḛ dinna ge sḭḭ ge ndu mbyaɗ kuwa kaŋ ge ne pul zige to go, nda ka anna num pagal be wan pe to.
42011045	Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne a̰me ɗu, hee fare, jan Zeso go: Ba ge hateya, ge mo fare janna mbe ma zì, mo daa luguy go i no waɗme ba!
42011046	Zeso gwan ge ne janna go: Woo ge ḛ ḛ waɗme, ḛ mbe ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma! Ḛ ee dṵṵl ge neneg ma nda duwana ma pagal gḛḛ, a̰me ge ḛ kee ne no go ge mbaa num in dṵṵl mbe ma to peɗ.
42011047	Woo ge ḛ! Ḛ sin nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma sḭḭ ge siŋli ma, num sḛ mbe ma ḛ baŋ ma sḛ hṵṵ num ne me.
42011048	Ano mbe no, ḛ ngay go go, ḛ wa dagre ge ḛ baŋ ma. Num sḛ ma hṵṵ nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma hun, ḛ me ɗe, ḛ sḭḭ num sḭḭ ma no me!
42011049	Ge andaŋ ge na ne zì, Dok jin̰a fare ḛ pagal no go: Mbi mbo teme num nda ge zwagre mbi wa mage mbi nda ge temeya ma ya, àa mbo hun a̰me ma, àa kee ge cùb ma yal me.
42011050	A ge pe no, swàm ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma way ma peɗ ge kan no se ge dunin̰a pe dolla ya day, mbo kaɗ num mbe ge doŋ pe ge màno ma pagal.
42011051	Ge swàm ge Abel ne ya day, ɗiŋ deɗ-ɗa ge swàm ge Zakari ne go, ne ge àa hṵṵ ne ge sok ge harcal mage twal tuwaleya buwal zì. A fareba go Dok mbo ele num swàm ge doŋ pe mbe no tok go.
42011052	Woo ge ḛ, ḛ Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma ! Ḛ dibi vin̰a ge tyan nda ndwa ge kuwaya ta ya digi, ḛ sḛ ma daa hee vin̰a mbe to me no, ḛ tele nda ge ɓyare hee vin̰a mbe ma ya me.
42011053	Sok ge wuwa ya zum ge Farisi mbe zok diŋ ya, nda ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne mage Farisi ma laa vḛḛne ge ne ta, àa ɗege ele ne fare ma se batraŋ,
42011054	ndwa ɓyare vin̰a ge wan ne ge fare, ge fare ge ndage ge ne wa zige ma ta.
42012001	Guwa̰ ge fare mbe ma way go, ɓase ma nɔseya nɔnɔg ge be isiya to, àa mbo ya yagle ta digi, ge go ndu seɗ vin̰a ge on̰n̰a to. Zeso ee pe ge na nda ge ame hateya ma guy, jan num go: Ḛ koy ta kwaɗa, ge kaŋ keeya ge Farisi mbe ge mbuɗi nda ndwa ma ta, ge num kaŋ keeya mbe ge zwage nda ge mojo̰o̰ jìn̰al hore ɗege kaŋ go ma ta me.
42012002	Ago, kaŋ a̰me ge way no ge sego ma peɗ, nda mbo kuwa num. Kaŋ ge kee ɗimil zì ma, nda mbo kuwa num benna kɔn̰al.
42012003	Go mbe no, fare ge ḛ mbo faa num ya ge nda ndwa go to ma, nda mbo za̰a̰ num gyala ɗeɗel. Fare ge ḛ mbo wuwase ta num ya wuwase ge piyal-la ma, nda mbo sun num tuŋ.
42012004	Mbi jan fare mbe no ḛ, mbi kondore ma: Ḛ kaa ge be chiya nda duwana ge hun sḛ duul ma voo to, guwa̰ go, àa gwan kee a̰me ge waɗeya sḛ to peɗ.
42012005	Mbi ɓyare tyan ḛ pagal gezi go, ndu ge mbiya ḛ chiya ne voo no: Ḛ chiya voo Dok, guwa̰ ge ndage ndu on̰om go, a ge pool ge gwan dol ne ge sok njoɗ yal zì yà. Mbi jan ḛ go, ḛ chiya voo Ne.
42012006	Ḛ kuwa kuwa go, nda yaɗ njoole ban gezi har go nuwan̰ ge silay zi pe bàba to de? Go no puy, ɗu vyale gezi to, Dok ndwa fà̰a̰ num pagal mɔɗwag.
42012007	Koo susu ge no ḛ pagal digi ma, Dok kuwa kuwa go num go gyana ga de. Ḛ chiya voo to ɗaŋ! Ge Dok ta, ḛ waɗe njoole ban ge gḛḛ ceɗeɗ mbe ma waɗe.
42012008	Mbi jan ḛ go iya, ndu ge diige ge mbo wan na wa ya ngangaɗ ge nda duwana ma ndwa se go, na ge ambi ne, Van ge Ndu ne mbo jan zum waŋ waɗme ge malayka ge Dok ne ma ndwa se go, ne ge na nee ne.
42012009	Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge mbo jan-na nda duwana ma ndwa se go, na kuwa mbi to, Van ge Ndu ne, mbo jan ge malayka ge Dok ne ma ndwa se go, ne ge na ne nee to waɗme.
42012010	Ndu ge diige, ge mbo kaɗ-ɗa ka vḛḛne Van ge Ndu ne dḭḭl, àa mbo pore ne, ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge mbo jan fare ge sone kakatag ya ge On̰om ge Harcal pagal, mbo seɗ poreya to.
42012011	Sok ge àa mbo gene ḛ ya ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way ma zì, ge ga̰a̰l ge kun sariya mage nda ga̰a̰l ma ndwa se yà, ḛ iigi ta ge fare ge ḛ mà mbo ya mbo faaya, ndwa ben ta ge fare zì pe to.
42012012	Ago On̰om ge Harcal mbo hon ḛ ge sok mbe go gaw, fare ge mbiya ḛ faa num ma.
42012013	Ndu a̰me ge ɓase ma buwal zì ya, jan Zeso go: Ba ge hateya, jin̰a mbi na̰ van ge son go, ne va i kaŋ joo ma se nde no de!
42012014	Gwan ge ndu mbe fare janna go: Kondore, a huɗi ho̰ mbi vin̰a ge kun ḛ sariya koo vaa ḛ kaŋ joo ma ne de?
42012015	Guwa̰, jan ɓase mbe ma go: Nà! Ḛ koy ta kwaɗa ge aham ge kaŋ seɗɗa ma way ma ta, ago, a be ge mo kaŋ seɗɗa ge gḛḛ ma ta ɗoo, wa ee mo mbo kaɗ ge ndwa to.
42012016	Sok mbe go kee num fare sḭḭ a̰me ɗu go: Ndu ge seɗ kaŋ a̰me ɗu, ne kaŋ kyarga ma see ne kaŋ zam gḛḛ.
42012017	Ka dwaɗɗa, ele tene go: Sok ge mbi wa kwate mbi kaŋ zam go to me ɗaŋ-noo, mbi sḛ kee gyana de?
42012018	Jan tene go, mbi kuwa kaŋ ge mbi keeya ya no: Mbi mbo gul mbi hal ma se, mbi sin ge ga̰a̰l waɗeya ma, mbi wa kwate mbi geme mage mbi kaŋ kwaɗa ge mbi see ge ɗogle ma se me.
42012019	Mbi mbo jan tene go: A huɗi ndu ne, mo ge kaŋ seɗɗa ma gḛḛ, ge àa ee no digi ge mo pe, in mo del ma gḛḛ, ɗigli tene, za, njoo, an̰.
42012020	Ɗaŋɗe, Dok jan ne go: Ndu ge fare kuwaya hoɗege ne! Ge ɗaal mbe no zì bàba, àa mà hee mo on̰om. O̰o̰, mo mbo n̰aa kaŋ ge mo kwate num mbe ma huɗi de?
42012021	Zeso gwan jan num go iya: A mbe go no ca, ge ndu ge kwate kaŋ gan ma ge na sḛ pe, ge Dok ndil num no ge a̰me ma to boo go.
42012022	Guwa̰ go, Zeso jan na nda ge ame hateya ma go: «A ge pe, mbi jan ḛ no go: Ne kaa ge ḛ iigi ta ge kaŋ ge mbiya ḛ zamma mage njoɗɗa pe ɗoo, ḛ wa mbo kaɗ ge ndwa to, koo ge ba̰a̰ ge ḛ laa ḛ pe pe to me.»
42012023	Ago, kàɗɗa ge ndwa waɗe kaŋ zam waɗe, sḛ duul waɗe ba̰a̰ waɗe me.
42012024	Ḛ doo ḛ ndwa ge ga̰a̰ ma pagal ndilla gale: Àa zare kaŋ rusu to, àa syaɗ a̰me to me, num sok koy kaŋ koo hal to, ano peɗ puy, Dok ka wal num ba. Gyana ga ge ḛ waɗe njoole ma no go de!
42012025	A huɗi ne ge ḛ buwal zì, sok iigi tene go ɗoo, wa seɗ vin̰a ge dol dwam ya koo ɗu ge dwam kàɗɗa ge Dok ho̰ na num ma pagal de?
42012026	Kaɗɗa ḛ mbyaɗ a̰me pe go fyalag ge kee kaŋ ge hoɗege guwa mbe no to ɗe, ge dape ḛ wa gwan ka iigi ta ge fare ge ɗogle ma pe de?
42012027	Ḛ kuwa buu ge don no ge ful zì ma wa folla ma kale gale! Àa kee tèmel to me no, àa paare ba̰a̰ to me, go no puy ɗe mbi jan ḛ go koo gan ga̰a̰l Salomo̰ sḛ ge na pagal, ge kaŋ kwaɗa ge na no ge num ma peɗ puy, be kan ba̰a̰ ge siŋli dinna ge a̰me ɗu ge num buwal zige wa folla go to.
42012028	Kaɗɗa Dok nuusi buu ge don no ful zì ma siŋli mbe go, num ge nè kuwa num màno ma, kin̰are àa goole num kan ol zì, laa ḛ pe walay mà ndwa gyana ga de, nda ge hoɗ fareba hoɗege guwa ma?
42012029	Ḛ sḛ ma waɗme, ḛ iigi ta sok ɓyare kaŋ ge ḛ mà mbo zamma, koo kaŋ ge ḛ mà mbo njoɗɗa pe to me.
42012030	Ago, kaŋ mbe ma no peɗ, a nda ge kuwa Dok to ge no dunin̰a zì ma iigi ta ne sok ɓyare num pe go. Ḛ Ba kuwa kuwa go ḛ ɓyare kaŋ mbe ma ɓyare waɗme.
42012031	Ḛ yin̰a vare zoo ne muluk pe, mbo hon ḛ kaŋ ge ḛ ɓyare num ma kon pagal.
42012032	Ḛ chiya voo to, ḛ ge no ge mojo̰o̰ vwag kaŋ kogor ge hoɗege guwa ma go, ago, ḛ Ba ndi kwaɗa go na gene ḛ muluk ge na ne zi yà.
42012033	Ḛ yiya ḛ kaŋ kwaɗa ma gezi, ḛ ho̰ num bware mbe a̰se ma bobo. Ḛ nuusi ta kaŋ kan bware ge pe day zuɗɗa to ma, ḛ kwate kaŋ gan ge be aaya to ma, ge pḭḭ ma zì yà, sok ge chala ma dale yà go to koo buli ge vḛḛne kaŋ ma to me.
42012034	Ago sok ge ḛ kaŋ gan ma no ne go, ḛ dwaɗɗa ma mɔɗwag gaa sok mbe yà waɗme.
42012035	Ḛ kaa ge ba̰a̰ tèmel ma ḛ ta, ɓyare go ḛ lampe ma ka digi dunna me.
42012036	Ɓyare go ḛ kaŋ keeya ma kaa ge mojo̰o̰ dore ge da̰a̰re maa ba ge zok ma go, ge mà seŋe ja ge sok vḛḛso sanna ya, ndwa hage ne zok wa gaw, sok ge mà dabe zok wa ya go.
42012037	Ndu ge tèmel mbe mà kee laa saal, sok gwanna ge num ba ge zok ne ya, kaɗɗa na see num kàɗɗa ge ndwa ɗaŋ! Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no, num ndu ge zok mbe eya kan ba̰a̰ tèmel ne, hon num sok kàɗɗa, wa gaa vaa ndu ge diige kaŋ zam.
42012038	Àa mbo kee laa saal, kaɗɗa na yan ja seɗ num ɗaal ga̰a̰l koo lee aaram pagal ge ndwa mbe go!
42012039	Ḛ kuwa ano mbe kwaɗa, daa go ndu ge zok ge kuwaya go chala mà mbo ya ler gene go ga, daa mà kaɗ ge na ndwa, n̰a na zok àa zuɗ ne to me.
42012040	Ḛ sḛ ma waɗme, ḛ kaa jejew, ago Van ge Ndu ne mbo mbo ya ge ler ge ḛ dwaɗ ge ne pagal to go.
42012041	Piyer jan ne go: Bagezok, mo kee fare sḭḭ mbe ge i pagal ɗeŋew koo a ge nda pe peɗ de?
42012042	Zeso gwan ge ne janna go: Mà kaɗɗa go ndu ge koy kaŋ ge n̰a wa to, gwan kaɗ ndwa ndaa go no, ne ndu ge zok mbo ee ne na ka̰a̰m ge tèmel ma pagal, ndwa go ne ka vaa num kaŋ ge mbiya ge dwam pe to de?
42012043	Laa saal go ge ndu ge tèmel mbe pe, dwam gwanna ge ne ndu ge zok ne ya, kaɗɗa na seɗ ne ya tèmel ta keeya mbe go!
42012044	Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no, mbo ee ne, ne gaa na kaŋ kwaɗa ma wa go ne peɗ.
42012045	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ne ndu ge tèmel mbe dwaɗɗa na dul wa zì go: Mbi ndu ge zok pagal gale wanna go wan na sok mbe ya, kaɗɗa mà ɗege ya iyal na ka̰a̰m ge soɗob mage zaab ge tèmel ma, ka an̰n̰a ge kaŋ zam, ka buyya ge jin̰al no,
42012046	ne ndu ge zok mbe mà mbo ja tan ne tugcug ge dwam mage ler ge ne sḛ dwaɗ ne pagal to go, mbo njaa ne mamaɗ, ɓan za̰a̰ yal ge nda ge mbô eeya ge Dok ne pagal to ma dagre.
42012047	Ndu ge tèmel mbe ge kuwa laa ɓyareya ge na ndu ge zok ne ma, ɗaŋɗe, nuusi a̰me koo kee kaŋ ge ne ɓyare mbe ma to, mbo seɗ iyalla ge gḛḛ.
42012048	Kaɗɗa ge dore ge kuwa laa ɓyare ge na ndu ge zok ne ma to ɗoo, kee kaŋ ge mbiya seɗ mḛḛreya num pagal ma, mbo seɗ iyalla hoɗege guwa. Ndu ge Dok hon ne gḛḛ, mbo ɓyare ge ne ta gḛḛ me, ndu ge Dok ee ne kaŋ ge gḛḛ ma pagal, mbo ele kaŋ gḛḛ waɗeya ge ne ta waɗme.
42012049	Zeso jan ɓase ma go: Mbi mbo ya dun ol suwa pagal. Mbi ɓyare go go ne dṵṵ ge sego.
42012050	Mbi ɓyare mbo waɗ yal njoɗɗa zì ge mojo̰o̰ àa waɗ nda mam se kee nda baptem go. Mbi ge iigiya zì ɗiŋ ge go ne dee ya.
42012051	Ḛ dwaɗ go mbi gene ya halas ge suwa pagal de? To baɗ, mbi jan ḛ ne no, a caɗeya ne vare zoo.
42012052	Ago a gaa mbo zḛḛ no, nda nuwan̰ ge zok ge ɗu diŋ, àa mbo caɗe se. Nda ge taa ma mbo kaɗ ho̰o̰l ge nda ge zi ma.
42012053	Ba mbo kaɗ ho̰o̰l ge na van, van mbo kaɗ ho̰o̰l ge na ba me. Na̰ mbo kaɗ ho̰o̰l ge na van ge gwale, van ge gwale kaɗ ho̰o̰l ge na na̰. Van son na̰ mbo kaɗ ho̰o̰l ge na tisi, ne van gwale kaɗ ho̰o̰l ge ne.
42012054	Zeso jan ɓase ma waɗme go: Sok ge ḛ kuwa pḭḭ mbeeya ge lee kuu ya, ḛ jan gaw go: Mam mà suwa, mbo ya kee mbe go tem.
42012055	Sok ge ḛ kuwa sa̰a̰m ɗege kwalla ge ham ya, ḛ ka janna go: Sok mà zale, mbo ya kee mbe go tem.
42012056	Nda ge mbuɗi nda ndwa ma! Ḛ kuwa kaŋ ge ɓyare keeya suwa pagal mage pḭḭ digi ma buwal vaaya kuwa ɗag, ge dape ḛ wa wan kaŋ ge kee màno ge sego ma buwal vaaya to de?
42012057	Ge dape, ḛ sḛ ma ge ḛ pagal, ḛ wa mbyaɗ vaa kaŋ ge mbiya ḛ keeya ge temel ma buwal to de?
42012058	Sok ge ḛ ge mo kon ge huur kaɗ ge fare ge ee ne mbo ge mo nda ge kun sariya ma ndwa se yà, ɓyare vin̰a ge ḛ eyal ta buwal zḛḛ be ge go ḛ dee yà, ne kaa ge go ne gene mo ge ba ge kun sariya ndwa se yà to, ba ge kun sariya ne ɓin̰a mo ge asagar ma ga̰a̰l tok zì, asagar ma ga̰a̰l me, ne dibi mo ge daŋay zì to me.
42012059	Mbi jan mo ne no, mo mbo waɗ-ɗa zum to ge sok mbe zì ya, be ge mo poɗ bware mbe ge no mo pagal papandaŋ to.
42013001	Ge sok mbe go me ɗe, nda a̰me ma deɗ-ɗa wan Zeso fare ge see nda ge Galile ma go: Dwam a̰me go, Goformo̰ Pilaɗ hṵṵ num sok kirgi num swàm digi kirwiɗ ge kaŋ kogor ge àa vyan kee tuwaleya hon Dok ma way.
42013002	Gwan ge num janna go: Ḛ dwaɗ go, ge yal mbe ge dee ge nda ge Galile mbe ma pagal pe, num sone gḛḛ waɗe maa ka̰a̰m gegene ma peɗ de?
42013003	To, mbi jan ḛ go, fare mbe be fare ge fareba ne to. Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ḛ seŋe ta ja se to, ḛ mbo suu mbe go ca.
42013004	O̰o̰ num ge wol pɔgwa wa gezi zi ge zok ge haal ge Silowe ne guu num pagal ma ɗoo, hṵṵ num no ma ɗe, ḛ dwaɗ go num sone waɗe maa ka̰a̰m ge ɗogle ge ka no suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ ma peɗ de?
42013005	To, Mbi jan ḛ go fare mbe be fare ge fareba ne to, ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ḛ seŋe ta ja se to, ḛ peɗ ḛ mbo ban gezi ge num sḛ mbe ma go.
42013006	Guwa̰, Zeso ɗege kee num fare sḭḭ iya go: Ndu a̰me ɗu, a ge fere ge ka donna ge na gaaso on̰or zì. Mbo ya ge dwaɗɗa ge ɓyare ndwa tolla, seɗ a̰me digi to.
42013007	Sok mbe go jan ndu ge kee tèmel gaaso on̰or zì go: Kuwa gale, del mà no taa ge mbi mbo ya ɓyare fere ndwa ge fere mbe digi, mbi be seɗ a̰me digi dwam ɗu to. Chiya ne gezi: Ge dape wa ame sok bàŋ kay de?
42013008	Ndu ge kee tèmel gaaso on̰or zì mbe gwan ge ne janna go: Bagezok, n̰a ne aa del ge madel mbe no, mbi wa nuusi ne pe, mbi kan kaŋ kogor ma njoo ne pe zì me,
42013009	ge dwam ge mbo no ge zḛḛ ya ma zì mbo tol ndwa mekyala de. Kaɗɗa go to, mo gaa chal ne gezi.
42013010	Ge dwam sabaɗ a̰me go ɗu, Zeso ka hate nda fare ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way zì.
42013011	Dasene no, gwale ge sulgu a̰me ɗu ge on̰om ge sone ngwage ne ya se har del wol pɔgwa wa gezi zi, ge go ne pool ge mḛḛ digi temel go fyalag to, wa ya ge num buwal zì.
42013012	Sok ge Zeso kuwa ne, tol ne jan ne go: Gwale, mo tuguɗi mbe aa mà ne.
42013013	Ee na tok ma ge ne pagal. Sok mbe go gaw, ne gòŋ mwaɗe digi temel, ee pe sale Dok.
42013014	Ɗaŋɗe, ga̰a̰l ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way laa vḛḛne, ge zonna ge Zeso zo̰o̰ ndu ge dwam sabaɗ go pe. Ɗege jan ɓase ma go: Eeya ma ho̰ ne vin̰a go, ndu ge diige mbiya kee tèmel ge dwam ge menengal ma pul zì, a ma̰ kaŋ tele ne go ndu mbo ya ge dwam mbe ma pul zì zon tene waɗme to de? A be ge dwam sabaɗ go to!
42013015	Bagezok gwan ge ne janna go: Nda ge mbuɗi nda ndwa ma! Dwam sabaɗ go no, ndu a̰me ge ḛ buwal zige, day saa na nday koo na tisi ge na kir go, gene ne mbo hon mam to de?
42013016	Mà kaɗ ge gwale mbe ge no rusu ge Abraham ne zì, ge Saytan vuwa ne no se, har del wol pɔgwa wa gezi zi de. Be kee kwaɗa ge go, àa saa ne digi ge tuguɗi ge na ne zì, ge dwam sabaɗ go to de?
42013017	Sok jan fare mbe ma no go ɗe, daŋso mbo ya wan ne nda ge ho̰o̰l ma peɗ. Kaɗɗa ge ɓase ma me ɗe, laa saal waɗe num pool ge kaŋ ajab ge ne sḛ ga kee num ma pe.
42013018	Zeso jin̰a no go iya: Muluk ge Dok ne dḭḭ sḭḭ ge da go de? Mbi ngay ne mà ge ma̰ kaŋ go de?
42013019	A dinna ge sugu ge àa tol ne mutard ndwa, ge ndu ge gaa kaŋ hê ne, doo ne na gaaso zì no go. Do̰o̰ digi no, seŋe no ge mojo̰o̰ ɔwara go, njoole ge ɗege pḭḭ digi ma gaa mbo ya ee vum ge ne tok ma digi no.
42013020	Gwan jan no go iya: Mbi ngay muluk ge Dok ne mà ge ma̰ kaŋ de?
42013021	A dinna ge jìn̰al hore ge ndu gwale hee ne, kan ne ge swam peɗem koro taa ndwa zì go, ɗiŋ mbo ɗege ne digi ge ɓul mɔɗwag.
42013022	Zeso sok mbo mbo Jerusalem yà go, ka kale mbo suwal ga̰a̰l mage suwal jiyale ma diŋ, ka hate fare ge Dok ne me.
42013023	Ndu a̰me ɗu ele ne go: Bagezok, a nda hoɗege guwa mbo seɗ monna ne no kade? Gwan num mbe ge kaa sok mbe go ma janna go:
42013024	Ḛ harge ta mbo waɗ ge zok wa ge gwarse go. Ago, mbi jan ḛ ne no, nda gḛḛ ge ḛ buwal zige ma mbo ɓyare go ma wuwa zok wa mbe, àa mbo seɗ vin̰a to.
42013025	Dwam ma mbo ya, ge ndu ge zok mbo ɗege digi, wa dibi zok wa. Ge zum ya, ḛ wa ɗege dabe zok wa, ḛ ka janna go: Bagezok-goo! Hage i zok wa! Mbo gwan ge ḛ janna go: Mbi kuwa sok ge ḛ mbo no ge ya to.
42013026	Sok mbe go ḛ mbo ɗege janna go: I ka zamma mage njoɗɗa ge mo dagre, mo ka hate nda fare ge sok seɗ ta ge i suwal ga̰a̰l ne ma go.
42013027	Mbo gwan ge ḛ janna iya go: Mbi kuwa sok ge ḛ mbo no ge ya to, ḛ mbo kaal ge mbi, ḛ peɗ mbe ge kee fare ge maa vin̰a go to ma.
42013028	Sok mbe ge àa dibi ḛ ge ne zum yà, gaa sok ge fiyaso mage kin̰a sulla ma mbo kàɗ-ɗa ne go ne. Ge sok mbe yà, ḛ mbo kuwa Abraham, Isak, Jakob mage nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma peɗ ge muluk ge Dok ne zì yà.
42013029	Nda mbo mbo ge lee mbii ya, ge lee kuu ya, ge lee chiya ya, ge lee ham ya me, àa mbo kaɗ ge taabul wa go ge muluk ge Dok ne zì yà.
42013030	Ḛ kuwa go, nda ge no guwa̰ yà ge sego ma, àa mbo seŋe ya zḛḛ, ge no zḛḛ ge sego ma me ɗe, àa mbo gwan guwa̰ yà me.
42013031	Ge sok mbe go me ɗe, Farisi a̰me ma gwan ta ya Zeso ta guwa, àa jan ne go: Ɗege ge sok mbe go, mo ɓyare sok mo pagal, ago Heroɗ ɓyare vin̰a go hun mo.
42013032	Ne sḛ gwan ge num janna go: Ḛ mbo jan An̰a mbe go: Ne za̰a̰ kwaɗa: Mbi yan on̰om ge sone ma go, màno mage kin̰are, mbi zon nda, dwam ge taa me ɗe, a mbi tèmel ma wa aaya ne.
42013033	Ɗaŋɗe, màno, kin̰are, dwam ge ne pagal go ge, ɓyare go mbi mbo zḛḛ ge mbi tèmel. Ago, wa̰a̰ ndwa go ndu ge zwagre Dok wa|Nda ge zwagre Dok wa seɗ swày ge Jerusalem yà ge go ne see swày ge sok ge ɗogle go.
42013034	Ḛ nda ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ-ge ma! Ḛ nda ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ-ge mbe ge hun nda ge zwagre Dok wa mage mbal nda ge temeya ma gezi ge njal ma! Ndwa gyana ga ge mbi ɓyare kwate ḛ ya mbi ta, dinna ge baare na̰ kwate na van ma ge na faa pul zì go, ano peɗ puy, ḛ be vin sok mbe to.
42013035	Ḛ kuwa, Dok mbo swaɗ zok ge ḛ tok go. Ɗaŋɗe, mbi jan ḛ waŋ go, ḛ mbo daa gwan kuwa mbi ndwa to baɗ, ɗiŋ ge go ḛ jin̰a ge ḛ wa zì go: «Dok ke wa tare ge ndu ge mbo ya ge dḭḭl ge Bagezok ne pagal.»
42014001	Ɗeɗ-ɗa ge dwam sabaɗ a̰me go ɗu go, Zeso waɗ ge ga̰a̰l ge Farisi ma way a̰me diŋ mbo zam kaŋ zam. Nda ge kaa sok mbe go ma dol ndwa ne pagal keceɗ.
42014002	Ḛ kuwa, ndu a̰me ge ne ko kaa hḛḛreya jindiliŋ mḛḛ no ne ndwa zḛḛ no.
42014003	Sok mbe go Zeso ele nda ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne mage Farisi ma go: Vin̰a, hage hage koo tele tele go àa zo̰o̰ ndu ge dwam sabaɗ go de?
42014004	Ɗaŋɗe, àa gwan ge ne fare janna byalam go to. Sok mbe go seŋe tene ge ndu ge tuguɗi mbe ta, zon ne, n̰a ne mboya me.
42014005	Guwa̰ jan num go: Mà deɗ ja go, ne ndu a̰me ge ḛ buwal zige van koo ne nday dee tub se ne, dwam sabaɗ go no, mà haa tene mbo wan ne ya digi vun cab gaw to de?
42014006	Àa seɗ fare ge gwan ge ne janna pagal to.
42014007	Guwa̰, kee nda ge àa too num ya ma fare sḭḭ ɗu, ndwa kee num kuwaya pe gyana ge num kaɗ tal sok kàɗɗa ge zḛḛge ma de. Sok mbe go, jan num go:
42014008	Sok ge ndu a̰me tol mo ya, ge sok vḛḛso sanna go, kaa ge be mo tal sok kàɗɗa ge zḛḛge to. Tamekyala, ndu ge ciciliŋ a̰me ge pool deɗ-ɗa ge sok mbe go,
42014009	ndu ge too ḛ ge ne ya mbe, mbo ya jan mo go: N̰a ne sok kàɗɗa. Sok mbe go, daŋso mà wan mo, sok mbo kaɗ ge pe ge dwab se yà go.
42014010	Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge àa tol mo ya, mbo ɓyare sok kàɗɗa ge guwa̰ se yà ge, ndwa go, sok ge ndu ge too mo ya mà yan ja, ne jin̰a mo go: Kondore, mbo ya kaɗ zḛḛ go. Sok mbe go, mo mà seɗ hormo ge nda gegene ge àa too num ya ma ndwa go peɗ.
42014011	Ago ndu ge diige ge hee na pagal digi, Dok mbo gwan ge ne nda guwa̰ se yà, ge gwan na pagal se, mbo hee ne pagal digi me.
42014012	Guwa̰, Zeso jan ndu ge too na ya mbe go: Sok ge mo tol nda ya zam kaŋ gyala koo gasamal, too mo kondore ge wa kag ma, mo na̰ van ma, mo sele ma, koo mo nda ge zok pe ge tok seɗɗa ma to, ge go num sḛ ma too mo waɗme, ne seŋe poɗɗa to.
42014013	Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge mo kee vḛḛso kaŋ zam, too ya nda ge hoɗegeya ma, nda ge looɗeya ma, nda ge giɗi mage nda ge ɓaal ma.
42014014	Mo mbo kaɗ ge laa saal, ajo̰o̰ num a̰me ge gwan ge mo byalam go to. Ago Dok mbo poɗ mo ge dwam ge na mbo ɗege ja tan nda ge mbo mboya ge temel ma go.
42014015	Ndu a̰me ɗu, ge num mbe ge àa too num ya zam kaŋ zam ma buwal zige, guwa̰ ge za̰a̰ Zeso fare mbe ma go, jan ne go: Laa saal kee ndu ge mbo dee mbo zam kaŋ zam ge muluk ge Dok ne zì yà!
42014016	Zeso gwan ge ne janna go: Ndu a̰me ɗu nuusi vḛḛso kaŋ zam ge gasamal, tol nda ya gḛḛ-gḛḛ.
42014017	Sok ge sok mbiya go àa zam kaŋ zam ge gasamal mbe ɗe, teme na ndu ge tèmel mbo jan nda ge àa too num ma go: Ḛ mbo ya, ago kaŋ ma nuusi ya go.
42014018	Ɗaŋɗe, ge num ge see tolla ma mɔɗwag, ge diige puy ɗege jan geŋeya ge tele na be mbo ya. Ndu ge zḛḛge jan ne go: Mbi yiya gaaso go ɗu, a ngaɗ go mbi mbo ndil ne. Mbi kaɗe mo kaɗe, jin̰a mo ndu ge zok go, ne pore mbi nde.
42014019	Gegene jan ne go: Mbi yiya nday gaa kaŋ go mbɔmbwag nuwan̰, mbi ɓyare kugi num. Mbo jan ne go, mbi kaɗe ne, ne pore mbi.
42014020	Ge ɗogle jan ne go: Mbi kaa zok kaɗ no gale, go mbe no mbi seɗ vin̰a mbo yà mà to.
42014021	Sok ge ndu ge tèmel mbe guwa̰ ya diŋ, wan na ndu ge zok fare mbe ma pe, sok mbe go ndu ge zok laa hoɗ, jan na ndu ge tèmel go: Guwa̰ vun cab ge sok ɓan pagal ma yà, ge suwal ga̰a̰l vin̰a pul ma zum yà, gene nda ge a̰se ma, nda ge looɗeya ma, nda ge ɓaal mage nda ge giɗi ma ya go go.
42014022	Guwa̰ swag, ndu ge tèmel mbe jan ne go: Mbi ndu ge zok, mbi kee ja ge wa hoɗɗa ge amo pagal tem, sok gwan gaa go iya.
42014023	Ndu ge zok mbe jan na ndu ge tèmel go: He vin̰a mbo suwal ge ful zige ma yà, ge ɗagarta ma kin̰a ma go, mo mà seɗ nda ya, ke num mboya ya mbi diŋ vun cab, ndwa go mbi zok ne huy.
42014024	Ago mbi jan ḛ ne no: Ndu a̰me ɗu ge nda mbe ge zḛḛge ge see tolla ma mbo taɗ kaŋ zam ge gasamal mbe na wa zì to.
42014025	Dwam ma guwa̰ kwaɗa lag, Zeso sok mboya go, nda ɓase nɔnɔg ka mboya ge ne dagre, seŋe tene ya num ta se, jan num go:
42014026	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me ɓyare mbo ge mbi dagre, ɓyare go ne laa wa̰a̰ mbi waɗe na ba mage na na̰, na gwale mage na van ma, na na̰ van ge soɗob mage gwale ma, ɓyare go ne duwa ge tene to me, kaɗɗa go to, mbyaɗ kaɗ mbi ndu ge ame hateya to.
42014027	Ndu ge diige ge hee dṵṵl ge in na kaŋre, ndwa kàre mbi pe to, mbyaɗ kaɗ mbi ndu ge ame hateya to me.
42014028	A huɗi ne ge ḛ buwal zì, sok ɓyare sin zok ge haal ɗoo, wa gale kaɗ se wan kaŋ ge na mbiya ban num ma guy to de, ndwa ndilla go na kin̰are mbo deɗ ge na tèmel mbe wa aaya yà ko ɓade.
42014029	Kaɗɗa na go to, a ge voo ge go na doo zok pe, na pool ge aa ne kaa to ɗoo, nda peɗ ge kin̰are kaɗ-ɗa ka kuwa ne ma, num ka coɗ na, num ka janna go:
42014030	Ḛ kuwa gale, ndu mbe ee zok pe sinna, ne pool a̰me ge aa ne to peɗ.
42014031	Tamekyala, gan ga̰a̰l a̰me ɓyare mbo mbal twam ge na kon ge ɗogle, a ge nda dudubu wol. Ɓyare go ne kaa se gale guy ndilla go, ge nda dudubu wol no, na ge pool mḛḛ na kon ge no ge nda dudubu warzi ndwa zì kode?
42014032	Kaɗɗa na seɗ-ɗa go na pool to, ajo̰o̰ gan ga̰a̰l gegene mbe gale yà kaal nde ɗe, mà teme nda mbo ne ndwa zì yà, mbo ɓyare vin̰a ge halas ne pe.
42014033	Zeso gwan jan num iya go: Ndu ge diige ge ḛ buwal zige ge kuri kaŋ seɗɗa ma ya peɗ to, mbyaɗ kaɗ mbi ndu ge ame hateya to.
42014034	Ḛ kuwa kuwa go nuwam kaŋ ge kwaɗa ne, ɗaŋɗe, mà kaɗɗa nuwam camam gaa daa ya to no, a ge da ta ɗoo ndu wa mbo gwan ge ne camam mbe ya de?
42014035	Daa gwan mbaa a̰me to, koo ge suwa pe, koo ge kaŋ hubi suwa pe, àa gaa kan ne gezi. Kaɗɗa ndu ge tɔgwa ge za̰a̰ fare mbe ma, ne za̰a̰ num kwaɗa.
42015001	Ago, nda ge chal siyal ma, ɓanna ge nda ge kee sone ge ɗogle ma peɗ, ha̰a̰le ta ge gwan-na Zeso ta zì guwa, za̰a̰ ne.
42015002	Nda ge no ɓan pagal ge Farisi ma way zì mage Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma kaɗ ka faa laa hoɗɗa go: Ne sḛ mbe no ame nda ge sone ma, ka zam kaŋ zam ge num dagre me ba!
42015003	Dwam a̰me go ɗu Zeso kê num fare sḭḭ no go:
42015004	Mà deɗ ja go, ndu ge ḛ buwal zige ge tame kis, ɗu wa ban, mà n̰a ge kis wa gezi ɗu pɔgwa wa gezi ɗu ma ɗoo, mbo babur pul yà mbo ɓyare ge ɗu mbe, ɗiŋ ge go na see ne ya mbḛḛ to de?
42015005	Sok ge seɗ ne ya, dol ne ya na ka̰a̰l pagal ge laa saal.
42015006	Yan ja diŋ, tol na kondore ge wa kag mage na nda ge zok pe ma, jan num go: Ḛ ke laa saal dagre ge mbi, ago mbi tame ge ba̰a̰ mbe, mbi see ya ne.
42015007	Mbi jan ḛ no go, ne mbe go ca, laa saal mbo kaɗ gḛḛ pḭḭ zì yà, ge ndu ge sone ɗu seŋe tene ya se pe, ge num ge kis wa gezi ɗu pɔgwa wa gezi ɗu ge temel ge gwan ɓyare seŋe ta se to ma.
42015008	Tamekyala gwale a̰me mà kaɗ-ɗa na ge silay wol, silay ɗu ban no, ee lampe digi ɗoo, poy zok pul, ndwa ɓyare ne liliɗ ɗiŋ na see ne mbḛḛ to de?
42015009	Sok ge seɗ ne go, tol na koŋ kale mage na ka̰a̰m zaab ge zok pe ma, jan num go: Ḛ ke laa saal dagre ge mbi, ge dape mbi seɗ mbi silay ge ba̰a̰ ya go.
42015010	Mbi jan ḛ no go, ne mbe go ca, malayka ge Dok ne ma kee laa saal ge ndu ge sone ɗu seŋe tene ya se pe.
42015011	Zeso jan num go iya: Ndu a̰me kaa ge van son ma zi.
42015012	Ge jiyale jan na ba go: Baa, ho̰ mbi mbi kaŋ joo ma ndwa. Go mbe me, num ba mbe vaa num na kaŋ gan ma se.
42015013	Dwam ma kaal to peɗ, van ge jiyale mbe kwate na kaŋ joo ma mɔɗwag, mbo gɔswal suwa ge kaal ndiɗ yà, gaa kee kaŋ keeya ge batraŋ ma, vḛḛne na kaŋ gan mbe ma gezi mɔɗwag.
42015014	Sok ge aa na kaŋ ma banna gezi mɔɗwag go, camal baktar deɗ ge suwa mbe pagal, kaŋ ma peɗ ɗege hoɗege ne.
42015015	Sok mbe go, mbo din tene ge ndu ge suwal a̰me ɗu diŋ. Ndu mbe teme ne mbo koy kosoŋ ma ge na gaaso ma zì yà.
42015016	Camal ee ne ɓyare vin̰a ge ndal na dul pe ge kaŋ zam ge kosoŋ ma way, ɗaŋɗe, ndu a̰me ge hon ne vin̰a ge zam-ma kaɗ to.
42015017	Ge sok mbe go, ɗege dwaɗ na kàɗɗa ge wal, jan tene go: Nda ge kee tèmel bware ma gyana ga ge mbi ba diŋ yà, ge àa an̰ no ge kaŋ zam har pe gaa de! Mbi me, mbi wa ka fiɗɗa go go ge camal me de.
42015018	Mbi vin tene ya go mbi guwa̰ mbi ba diŋ yà, mbi mà jan ne go: Baa, mbi kee sone ge Dok ndwa se, ge mo ta me.
42015019	Mbi be mbyaɗ daa ge àa gwan tol mbi mo van to. Ndi mbi dinna ca, ge ɗu ge mo nda ge kee tèmel bware ma buwal zige go.
42015020	Guwa̰, ɗege, gwan mbo ge na ba ta yà: Ajo̰o̰ na gale ge zum ya kaal puy ɗe, ne ba kuwa ne, ngay kuwa a̰se ge na ne ge ne ta gḛḛ, chiya mbo dol tene ge ne kṵwa̰l zì, àa buu ta zì.
42015021	Sok mbe go, ne van jan ne go: Baa, mbi kee sone ge Dok ndwa se, ge mo ta me. Mbi be mbyaɗ daa ge àa gwan tol mbi mo van to.
42015022	Ɗaŋɗe, ne ba jan na nda ge tèmel ma go: Ḛ gene ba̰a̰ ga̰a̰l ge waɗe ge siŋli ya vun cab, ḛ hon mbi van ne ka̰a̰ na ta, ḛ paa ne kyaɗa ne tok zì, tyako ma ge ne ko zì me.
42015023	Ḛ wa̰a̰ nday van ge so̰o̰l ya, ḛ hun ne se, nè za, nè an̰ ɗaŋ.
42015024	Ago, ḛ kuwa mbi van mbe no, suu dee suu, a tan ja no. Ba̰a̰ dee ban, mbi seɗ ne ja no. Àa ee pe kee laa saal.
42015025	Sok mbe go me ɗe, ne van ge pul sway gale sok kee tèmel gaaso yà. Sok gwanna ya diŋ, yan na guwa ge zok, za̰a̰ kaŋ haleya mage kaŋ mballa ma.
42015026	Tol ndu ge tèmel a̰me ya ɗu, ndwa eleya go ne ma̰ kaŋ kee ne diŋ tem de.
42015027	Ndu ge tèmel mbe jan ne go: A mo na̰ van guwa̰ ya ne, ajo̰o̰ na dee ya kwaɗa bàŋ, mo ba hṵṵ nday van ge so̰o̰l no ɗu.
42015028	Sok mbe go, ne laa vḛḛne, ɓyare waɗ-ɗa diŋ to. Ne ba waɗ-ɗa zum, ndwa lwabe ne waɗ diŋ.
42015029	Ɗaŋɗe, gwan ge na ba janna go: Za̰a̰ gale, del ma bergete, ge mbi no, sok kee mo tèmel ma go, mbi be hele mo wa hoɗɗa ma pagal dwam ɗu to baɗ. Dwam ɗu mo be hon mbi ɓin̰a van ɗu go mbi kê vḛḛso ge mbi kondore ma to me.
42015030	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ge mo van mbe no, ne ge vḛḛne mo kaŋ gan ma ja gezi mɔɗwag ge nda zaab ge zam ta ma ta, yin̰a ya, mo hṵṵ ne nday van ge so̰o̰l no ba!
42015031	Ne ba jan ne go: Mbi van, mo dagre ge mbi ɗaɗag, mbi kaŋ ma no peɗ, àa mo ma ne.
42015032	Ɗaŋɗe, mbiya go nè kee vḛḛso mage kee laa saal, ago mo na̰ van mbe no suu dee suu, a tan ja no, ba̰a̰ dee ban, nè seɗ ne ja no.
42016001	Zeso gwan jan na nda ge ame hateya ma go iya: Ndu ge gan njonjon̰ a̰me kaa ge ndu ge koy kaŋ ɗu, àa mbô ya taa ne no go ne ndu ge koy ne kaŋ mbe vḛḛne ne kaŋ gan ma go.
42016002	Tol na ndu ge koy kaŋ mbe ya, jan ne go me: Mbi za̰a̰ fare ge sone ma go mo pagal! Wa̰a̰ mbi kaŋ ge no mo tok go, ge mo koy ma pe gale, ago mo vin̰a ge daa gwan koy mbi kaŋ ma to baɗ.
42016003	Ndu ge koy kaŋ mbe ele tene go: Mbi ba ge zok ndage mbi ge mbi sok koy na kaŋ ma go ɗaŋ-noo, mbi ke tene gyana de? Kee tèmel suwa me de! Mbi pool to me. Anna buwal kaɗe kaŋ me de! A daŋso ge mbi pe me.
42016004	Gyala ge àa kin̰are yan mbi ya ge mbi sok koy kaŋ go, sok ge nda ɔwabe mbi ge maa zok ma diŋ ɗe, na̰! Mbi kuwa kaŋ ge mbi keeya ya no!
42016005	Sok mbe go, ɗege tol nda ge ame gobso ge na ba ge zok ne ma ya ɗu ge ɗu, jan ndu ge zḛḛge go: Mo mbiya poɗ mbi ba ge zok gyana ga de?
42016006	Gwan ge ne fare janna go: Nùm birmil wol. Ndu ge koy kaŋ jan ne go: Ame mo kaɗkaɗ no, kaa se vun cab, mo njaŋe zì: Birmil nuwan̰.
42016007	Guwa̰, jan ge ɗogle go: Mo ɗe, mo mbiya poɗ gyana ga de? Gwan ge ne fare janna go: Suwal geme kis. Ndu ge koy kaŋ jan ne go: Ame mo kaɗkaɗ no, njaŋe zì kis wa gezi zi.
42016008	Bagezok dore ndu ge koy kaŋ koyya ge na vin̰a go to mbe, ge ne kaŋ keeya ge ke ge zwam mbe pe. Ago nda ge zaman mbe zì ma, àa nda ge zwam ma ne ge maa ka̰a̰m ta, waɗe kɔn̰al van ma.
42016009	Kaɗɗa ge mbi, mbi jan ḛ go: Ge ḛ kaŋ gan ge ḛ see num koo ge na vin̰a go to mbe ma waɗme, ḛ wan kondore ge num, ge go, dwam ge ḛ deɗ ja hoɗegeya zì, Dok ame ḛ ge na sok kàɗɗa ge ɗiŋ ge din zì yà.
42016010	Ndu ge no ɗeŋer ge kaŋ ge hoɗege guwa ma zì, a ɗeŋer ge kaŋ ge gḛḛ ceɗeɗ ma zì waɗme. Ndu ge koy kaŋ koyya ge na vin̰a go to, ge kaŋ ge hoɗege guwa ma zì, a ndu ge koy kaŋ koyya ge na vin̰a go to ne, ge kaŋ ge gḛḛ ceɗeɗ ma zì waɗme.
42016011	Kaɗɗa ḛ be ngay go ḛ nda ge ɗeŋer ma ne, ge kaŋ gan ge maa vin̰a go to mbe ma zì no, a huɗi mbo vin ee ḛ ne kaŋ gan ge fareba ma wa go de?
42016012	Kaɗɗa ḛ be kaɗ ɗeŋer to, ge kaŋ ge ndu ne wa go no, a huɗi mbo vin ne go na n̰a ḛ kaɗ ḛ ḛ ma wa go de?
42016013	Moor a̰me ge kee tèmel nda zi diŋ jwàg to. Ago mbo seŋe ge ɗu na guwa̰, ne laa wan gegene me. To puy, mbarge tene ge ɗu, kuri gegene me. Ḛ ge pool kee tèmel ge Dok mage bware pe go jwàg to.
42016014	Farisi mbe ge laa wa̰a̰ bware gḛḛ ma ka za̰a̰ Zeso fare mbe ma, àa ka man ne.
42016015	Jan num go: Ḛ, ḛ nda ge ndil ta go, ḛ nda ge temel ma ne ge nda duwana ma ndwa se, ɗaŋɗe, Dok kuwa ḛ dul wa ma kuwa. Ago kaŋ ge nda duwana ma ndil ne ngaraŋ, kaɗ kaŋ ge sone kakatag ge Dok ta.
42016016	Eeya ge Moyiz ne mage fare ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma hate num ma dee ya ɗiŋ ge zaman ge Yohana ba ge kee nda baptem ne go. Ge zaman ge Yohana ne go no me ɗe, àa oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge faa fare ge muluk ge Dok ne no, ndu ge diige harge tene ge pool ndwa waɗ ne zì.
42016017	A fogol waɗeya ge go pḭḭ mage suwa burmi gezi, ge go kḭḭliya a̰me ge eeya ge Dok ne ma buwal zì go ɗu ne kale gezi.
42016018	Ndu ge diige ge yan na gwale ya, gwan san ge ɗogle ya, kee zina . Ndu ge diige ge san gwale ge ne obe n̰a ne ya, kee zina waɗme.
42016019	Ndu ge seɗ kaŋ a̰me ɗu, ka kan ba̰a̰ ge kàal sasaw mage ba̰a̰ ge lɔgwa lalan̰ ge bware ma jajan, ka an̰n̰a dwam ma mɔɗwag ge laa saal zì.
42016020	Ndu ge a̰se kaa ɗu waɗme, ge àa ka tol ne Lazar, duul jwaŋ jan, ka fiiya ge ne ndaa wa pagal zum yà.
42016021	Ka ɓyare vin̰a ge ndal na dul pe ge kaŋ zam pe ge gaa taabul pagal ge ndu ge seɗ kaŋ ne ma. Ano puy, juu ma ka mbo ya ɗaa ne jwaŋ ma iya.
42016022	Ɗeɗ-ɗa go, ndu ge a̰se wa̰a̰, suu no, malayka ma gene ne ge Abraham kṵwa̰l zì yà. Ndu ge seɗ kaŋ suu no waɗme, àa mbuu ne no.
42016023	Ge sok kàɗɗa ge nda ge swày ma way yà, kuwa go na iigiya ma zì, hee na ndwa digi, ge kaal ya, kuwa Abraham, Lazar kàɗɗa ne kṵwa̰l zì.
42016024	Sok mbe go oy digi go: Mbi baŋ Abraham, kuwa mbi a̰se nde no de, jin̰a Lazar ne pa na tok wa mam pagal, teme ne mbo ya ɗele mbi ka̰a̰l pe, ago mbi za̰a̰ go yal ge ol swala mbe no zì.
42016025	Abraham gwan ge ne janna go: Mbi van, kuwa go mo dee seɗ mo kaŋ gan ma ya go ge kàɗɗa ge amo zì ge suwa pagal. Dinna ge amo go, ge Lazar ne ka yal njoɗɗa. Ge sego, seɗ laa eyalla ya go ge go go, ɗaŋɗe, ge amo gaa yal njoɗɗa.
42016026	Ta iya, tugul ga̰a̰l ge heleg a ge nè ge ḛ ma buwal zì, ndwa go, nda ge ɓyare ɗege ge go go mbo ḛ ta yà ma, num see vin̰a mbo yà go to, ndu see vin̰a ge ya go mbo ya ge i ta to me.
42016027	Ndu ge seɗ kaŋ gwan jan ne go, kaɗɗa na mbe go: Mbi kaɗe mo kaɗe, Baŋ, teme Lazar ge mbi ba diŋ yà,
42016028	ago mbi yà ge na̰ van ge soɗob ma nuwan̰, ne mbo ndiri num tɔgwa, ne kaa ge go num sḛ ma waɗme, num dee ya ge sok iigiya mbe no zì to.
42016029	Abraham gwan jan ne go: Àa ge eeya ge Moyiz ne mage kaŋ ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma njaŋe ma, n̰a num ke tèmel num pagal.
42016030	Ndu ge seɗ kaŋ gwan jan ne go: To, baŋ Abraham, daa na go ndu a̰me ɗu ge nda ge swày ma buwal zì mbo ne ge num ta yà, àa mà seŋe ta ya se.
42016031	Abraham jan ne go me: Kaɗɗa àa kee tèmel ge eeya ge Moyiz ne mage nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma kaŋ ge njaŋe ma pagal to, àa vin fare ge ndu a̰me ge ta̰a̰ ge nda ge swày ma buwal zì ne to.
42017001	Guwa̰, Zeso jan na nda ge ame hateya ma go: A ngaɗ go kaŋ ge ee nda deɗɗa ma num kaa. Ɗaŋɗe, woo ge ndu ge kaŋ ge ee nda deɗɗa mbe ma mbo ɗege ya ge ne ta!
42017002	A nde-nde ge ne pe ge go, àa vwal njal ga̰a̰l ge ne ka̰a̰l zì, àa dol ne ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam se yà, zḛḛ ge go ne kaa kaŋ ge ee ɗu ge nda jabso mbe ma buwal zige deɗɗa.
42017003	Ḛ sḛ ma, ḛ koy ta kwaɗa! Kaɗɗa mo na̰ van deɗ-ɗa ge sone zì, mḛḛre ne. Kaɗɗa na seŋe tene ja se, pore ne ne sone mbe.
42017004	Kaɗɗa kê sone mo ta ndwa ɓỳala ge dwam ge ɗu pul zì, gwan-na ge mo ta ndwa ɓỳala waɗme, jan mo go: Mbi kuwa mbi sone ya go, ago mo pore ne pore.
42017005	Nda ge temeya ma jan Bagezok go: Ho̰ i pool ta iya ge fareba hoɗɗa ge i i ma zì.
42017006	Bagezok gwan ge num janna go: «Kaɗɗa hoɗ fareba ge ḛ ḛ ma hoɗege guwa ge mojo̰o̰ sugu ge àa tol ne mutard ndwa go puy, kaɗɗa ḛ jan ɔwara ga̰a̰l mbe no ya go: “Ndage ge mo too ɗereɗ, mo mbo mḛḛ ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam se yà, mbo kee ge mojo̰o̰ ḛ ɓyare go.”
42017007	«Tamekyala, ndu a̰me ge ḛ buwal zige a ge dore ge kee na tèmel gaaso koo ge koy na vwag kaŋ kogor ma. Mà kaɗɗa go ndu ge tèmel mbe jaɗ ge ful zì ya no, mà jan ne go: Kale ya zam kaŋ zam gaw de?
42017008	Jan ne mà vare zoo go: Ke mbi kaŋ zam ge gasamal, ka̰a̰ mo ba̰a̰ tèmel ge mo ta, mo hon mbi kaŋ zam ya, ɗiŋ ge go mbi aa kaŋ zam zamma. Guwa̰, mo wa gaa zam amo.
42017009	Mà kee mersi hon na ndu ge tèmel mbe, ge ne kê tèmel ge na ho̰ na wa ne kê na ne pe de?
42017010	Ḛ sḛ ma mbe go ca, sok ge ḛ kee kaŋ ge àa hoɗ ḛ wa num pagal ma go peɗ, ḛ jin̰a go: “I nda ge tèmel ge be fare a̰me pe to ma ne boo, kaŋ ge i kee ma no, a kaŋ ge i mbiya kee num ma sḛ ne.”»
42017011	Ɗeɗ-ɗa go, sok mbo gɔswal Jerusalem yà go, Zeso kale walape ge vaa Samari mage Galile buwal se.
42017012	Sok waɗ suwal ge jiyale a̰me diŋ go, nda ge kṵṵ swàm ma wol mbo ya seɗ ne. Àa mḛḛ gezi yà kaal nde.
42017013	Àa ɗege hee maa ka̰a̰l digi, sok tol Zeso go: «Ba ge hateya, kuwa i a̰se nde no de!»
42017014	Sok ge Zeso kuwa num go, jan num go: «Ḛ mbo ngay ta ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma ta.» Sok mbo ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma ta yà go, num bol ma haɗ somndol gaw, àa haɗ kɔn̰al me.
42017015	Sok ge àa see go maa zonna go, a̰me ge num buwal zige ɗu gwan-na ge na ko pagal, ge Dok saleya ge ka̰a̰l ndaal.
42017016	Guu na ko Zeso ndwa se, ka kee ne mersi. Ndu mbe, a van ge suwa Samari nee ne.
42017017	Sok mbe go, Zeso ele sok go: «Num mbe ge wol ma daa be seɗ zonna mɔɗwag, àa haa kɔn̰al no to wa? Gegene ge wa gezi ɗu ma gaa diya no de?
42017018	Ndu a̰me be seɗ go na guwa̰ ya kee Dok mersi to, a van gɔswal mbe no ɗu guwa̰ ya gwan ge mersi hon Dok ne ɗeŋew-wa?»
42017019	Guwa̰ jan ne go: «Ɗege digi, mo mbo. Ge mo ho fareba mbi ta pe, mo mon-na go.»
42017020	Dwam a̰me ɗu, nda ge no ɓan pagal ge Farisi ma way zì ma ele Zeso go: Dok mbo ya kee muluk ma̰ del de. Gwan ge num janna go: «Dwam ge Dok mbo ya kee muluk, ndu a̰me mbo kuwa ne ge na ndwa to.
42017021	Ndu a̰me mbo jan go to: “Ḛ kuwa gale, a ee pe ya go go no!” Koo “A ee pe ya yà go no!” Ago, ḛ za̰a̰ kwaɗa, Dok kee muluk go ḛ buwal zì.»
42017022	Gwan jan nda ge ame hateya ma iya go: «Dwam ma mbo mbo ya, ge go ḛ mbo kee ene kàɗɗa go swag dagre ge mbi, Van ge Ndu ne, ge ne dwam mbe ma go, ɗaŋɗe, ḛ mbo seɗ vin̰a to.
42017023	Nda mbo jan ḛ go: “Ne ge yà go!” Koo “Ne ge go go”. Ḛ za̰a̰ num to, ḛ mbo num pe yà to me.
42017024	Ago, mbo kaɗ kɔn̰al go, dinna ge mam see ge pḭḭ wa aaya ge ɗu go, mbo ge pḭḭ wa aaya gene yà, dwam ge Van ge Ndu ne, mbo kaɗ mbe go no ca.
42017025	Ɗaŋɗe, ɓyare go ne gale njoo yal gḛḛ guy, nda ge doŋ pe mbe go ma kuri ne gezi me.
42017026	«Kaŋ ge mbo keeya ge dwam ge Van ge Ndu ne go ma, mbo kaɗ dinna ca ge kaŋ ge kê ge dwam ge Nowe ne ma yà go.
42017027	Nda ka zamma, àa ka njoɗɗa, àa ka kaɗ zok, àa ka san maa van ge soɗob ma gwale, àa ka hon ge gwale ma zok kàɗɗa, ɗiŋ ge go dwam ge Nowe waɗ faa ga̰a̰l zì, mam yḛḛreya dee ya, ne puu nda gezi mɔɗwag.
42017028	Koo mbo kaɗ dinna ca ge dwam ge Loɗ ne go go: Nda ka zamma, àa ka njoɗɗa, àa ka yaɗ kaŋ ma, àa yaɗ maa kaŋ ma gezi, àa ka dol kaŋ rusu suwa zì, àa ka sin zok me,
42017029	ɗaŋɗe, ge dwam ge Loɗ wuwa ya zum ge Sodom diŋ ya go, Dok kan ol mage ɓoo ge ol bibiliw ge pḭḭ digi ya ge mam suwa go, puu nda gezi mɔɗwag.
42017030	Mbo kaɗ mbe go ca, ge dwam ge Van ge Ndu ne mbo dyan ja zum go.
42017031	«Ge dwam mbe go, ndu ge mbo kaɗ-ɗa ge na zok pagal digi, ne ka̰a̰ na ko ya se ndwa mbo ɔwabe kaŋ ge na zok zige ma to. A mbe go ca ge ndu ge mbo kaɗ-ɗa ge gaaso zì yà pe, ne guwa̰ ya zok diŋ to.
42017032	Ḛ duwa ge fare ge see Loɗ gwale .
42017033	Ndu ge mbo ɓyare ya kwacware ndwa ge na ne, mbo ban ne. Ndu ge mbo ban na ndwa ya, mbo seɗ ne me.
42017034	Mbi jan ḛ gezi waŋ go, ge ɗaal mbe no zì, nda zi mà kaɗ ge saŋal ge ɗu go, àa mà hee ɗu, àa n̰a gegene me.
42017035	Nda zaab zi ge mbo kaɗ-ɗa nan swa sok ge ɗu go, àa mbo hee ɗu, àa n̰a gegene me.»
42017036	[Nda soɗob zi mà kaɗ kee maa tèmel gaaso, àa mà hee ɗu, àa n̰a gegene me.]
42017037	Nda ge ame hateya ma ele ne go: «Mbo kee go mbe lee diya yà de, Bagezok-goo?» Gwan ge num janna go: «Sok ge kaŋ suu no go, boge ma tabe ya ge sok mbe go.»
42018001	Zeso jan num fare sḭḭ a̰me ɗu, ndwa ngay num go, num mbiya kee kaɗeya ɗaɗag be ge num kan ta se to baɗ.
42018002	Jan num go: Ndu ge kun sariya a̰me ɗu kaa ge suwal ga̰a̰l diŋ, voo ge Dok ne ne zì to, vin ndu fare na sḛ zì to me.
42018003	Ge suwal ga̰a̰l mbe diŋ, gwale a̰me ge kumu kaa waɗme, ka mbo ya ne ta jan ne go: Vaa i ge mbi kon ge huur buwal nde no de.
42018004	Kuri ne fare mbe dwam ma kaal swag. Ɗaŋɗe, guwa̰ go, jan tene go: Koo voo ge Dok ne no mbi zì to no puy, mbi vin ndu fare mbi sḛ zì to puy me ɗe,
42018005	go no puy ɗe, ajo̰o̰ kumu mbe mbyaɗ mbi go sḛ, ɓyare mbi vaa num buwal, ge go fare mbe mbo aaya, ne ka gwan-na ɓaa mbi pagal bàŋ ɗoɗoo to.
42018006	Bagezok gwan jan num go iya: Ḛ kuwa ndu ge kun sariya ge na vin̰a go to mbe fare ge jin̰a gale.
42018007	Kaɗɗa ge Dok ɗe, a ge pool kun sariya ge temel ge na nda ge talla, ge tol na ɗaal mage gyala ma pagal to de? Mà kee dṵṵl ge chiya num kṵwa̰ kode?
42018008	Mbi jan ḛ ne no, mbo kun num sariya avun cab. Ɗeŋew go, sok ge Van ge Ndu ne mbo gwan ja, mbo seɗ nda ge hoɗ fareba ma ge suwa pagal ɓade?
42018009	Dwam a̰me go ɗu, Zeso gwan kee num fare sḭḭ iya, ge nda a̰me ge ndil ta go maa nda ge temel ma ne, àa ka sen maa ka̰a̰m ma pagal go:
42018010	Nda a̰me ma zi mbô ge zok ge Dok ne zì yà ndwa mbo kee kaɗeya. Ge ɗu ge Farisi ne, gegene ndu ge chal siyal ne me.
42018011	Farisi mbe mḛḛya digi, ka kaɗeya na dul wa zì go: Dok ge mbi, mbi kee mo mersi ge dape, mbi dinna ge mbi ka̰a̰m gegene mbe ge chala ma, num mbe ge kee kaŋ keeya ge maa vin̰a go to ma, num mbe ge kee zina ma go to, koo dinna ge ndu ge chal siyal mbe no go to me.
42018012	Mbi wan mam njuwal ndwa zi ge Dumas ge ɗu pul zì, mbi hon kaŋ wa ge kaŋ seɗɗa ge ambi ma way ma peɗ me.
42018013	Kaɗɗa ge ndu ge chal siyal ɗe, mḛḛ guwa̰ yà kaal nde ge nda gegene ma, ɓyare hee na ndwa pḭḭ digi to peɗ, ɗaŋɗe, kan na tok na laa go, ka janna go: Dok ge ambi, mbi ndu ge sone ne, kuwa mbi a̰se nde.
42018014	Mbi jan ḛ go: A ne sḛ mbe gwan ge na diŋ yà ne be dṵṵl na pagal, a be ndu ge no ɓan pagal ge Farisi ma way zì mbe to. Ago, ndu ge diige ge hee na pagal digi, Dok mbo gwan ne nda guwa̰ yà, ndu ge gwan na pagal se, Dok mbo hee ne digi me.
42018015	Nda a̰me ma, koo van kaare ma puy, àa gene num ya ndwa go Zeso ee na tok ma num pagal kee num wa tare . Sok ge nda ge ame hateya ma kuwa kaŋ mbe ma go, àa ɗege mḛḛre num.
42018016	Zeso tol nda jabso ya na ta, jan na nda ge ame hateya ma go: Ḛ n̰a nda jabso, num mbo ya ge mbi ta, ḛ kaa ge be tele num to. Ago, muluk ge Dok ne, a ge num ge dḭḭ ta ge nda jabso mbe go ma pe.
42018017	Fareba mbi jan ḛ ne no: Ndu ge mbo gwan na pagal ya ge Dok pe se, dinna ge van jiyale go, ndwa go ne kee muluk na pagal, a ne sḛ ɗeŋew mbo waɗ ge muluk zì ne.
42018018	Ga̰a̰l ge Yahuɗ ma way a̰me ɗu ele Zeso go: Ba ge hateya ge kwaɗa, a ma̰ kaŋ ge mbiya mbi kee nee ne ndwa hon mbi vin̰a ge mbo kaɗ ge ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din ge Dok de?
42018019	Zeso jan ne go: Ge dape mo wa tol mbi ndu ge kwaɗa de? Ndu a̰me ge kwaɗa ɗu to, ɗeŋew Dok.
42018020	Mo kuwa wa yuwaleya ma kuwa: «Ke zina to, hṵṵ swày to, chee kaŋ to, ke sayda ge hày ndu pagal to, ho̰ mo ba mage mo na̰ hormo.»
42018021	Ndu mbe jan Zeso go: Mbi mbo go num pagal peɗ ge mbi bogol ya day.
42018022	Guwa̰ ge Zeso za̰a̰ ne fare mbe ma go, jan ne go: A̰me ɗu hoɗege mo go gale iya: Yiya mo kaŋ gan ma gezi mɔɗwag, va a̰se ma num bware mbe, go mbe no, mo mbo seɗ kaŋ gan ge pḭḭ ma zì yà. Guwa̰, mbo ya, mo kàre mbi pe me.
42018023	Sok ge za̰a̰ fare ge Zeso jin̰a na mbe ma go, ne ndwa mbo ya suu se leɗeɗ, ago kaa gan njonjon̰.
42018024	Sok ge Zeso kuwa go ne ndwa suu ya se leɗeɗ, jan go: A haŋle ge go nda ge no ge kaŋ gan ma wuwa ge muluk ge Dok ne zì!
42018025	Ago, a fogo waɗeya, ge jambal ge jujul zi waɗ ge libra ndwal zì, ge go ndu ge gan waɗ ge muluk ge Dok ne zì.
42018026	Num ge ka za̰a̰ ne ma jan go: Kaɗɗa na mbe go, a huɗi ge pool seɗ monna ne ɗaŋ de?
42018027	Zeso gwan ge num janna go: Kaŋ ge ndil haŋle ge nda duwana ma ndwa zì, Dok ge pool ne pagal.
42018028	Sok mbe go, Piyer jan ne go: O̰o̰, i n̰a i kaŋ ma ya ya peɗ, i kàre mo pe ya no.
42018029	Zeso gwan ge num janna go: Mbi jan ḛ fare ge fareba, a huɗi ne ge wa n̰a na zok, na gwale, na na̰ van ma, na sele ma, koo na van ma, ge muluk ge Dok ne pe ɗoo,
42018030	wa mbo seɗ num waɗeya ge sego, gwan mbo seɗ ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din ge Dok ta yà ge zaman ge mbo no ya go to de?
42018031	Zeso gene nda ge ame hateya ge wol pɔgwa zi ma ya gezi nde, jan num go: Ḛ kuwa go, nè mbo go Jerusalem, ge go fare ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma njaŋe num ge mbi, Van ge Ndu ne pagal ma, wa mà mbo huyya.
42018032	Ago, àa mà mbo ɓyan ne ge nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma tok go, num sḛ mbe ma mbo lasage ne, àa mbo kee ne yal, àa mbo too watwa ge ne ta.
42018033	Guwa̰ ge àa mà dwagle ne ya ge bol go, àa mà hun ne. Ge dwam ge taa pagal, mbo tan digi.
42018034	Ɗaŋɗe, àa wan fare mbe pe go fyalag to. Ajo̰o̰ fare mbe pe wanna way way, àa be kuwa go Zeso ɓyare jan gyana de to me.
42018035	Ɗeɗ-ɗa go, Zeso yan ja guwa ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jeriko, sok mbe go me ɗe, ɓaal ɗu wa ya kàɗɗa vin̰a kin̰a go, kaɗe kaŋ me.
42018036	Sok ge kṵwa̰ ge ɓase ge kale ma way dee ya ne tɔgwa zì go, ele sok go: A ma̰ kaŋ kee ne de?
42018037	Nda kee ne kuwaya go, ne Zeso ge suwal Nazareɗ ne yin̰a ya ne.
42018038	Sok mbe go, ka oyya go: Zeso ge Daviɗ Baŋ, kuwa mbi a̰se nde no de!
42018039	Nda ge ka mbo ya vuwa̰ zḛḛ ma ɗege ngwabe ne, ne dibi na wa, ɗaŋɗe, gwan ka aa na pe oyya digi ndaal waɗeya go: Gan ga̰a̰l Daviɗ Baŋ, kuwa mbi a̰se nde no de!
42018040	Zeso mḛḛ se, hoɗ na wa go àa gene ne ya na ta. Sok ge yin̰a ya ne ta zì guwa, ele ne go:
42018041	Mo ɓyare go mbi ke mo da de? Ndu ge ɓaal gwan ge ne janna go: Bagezok, n̰a go mbi kuwa sok!
42018042	Zeso jan ne go: Kuwa sok ɗaŋ! Ge mo ho fareba mbi ta pe, mo zon go.
42018043	Sok mbe go gaw, ɓaal kuwa sok, ka kàre Zeso pe, ka sale Dok. Ɓase ma peɗ kuwaya ge àa kuwa kaŋ mbe ma go, àa ɗege uware Dok waɗme.
42019001	Guwa̰ ge Zeso wuwa ya suwal ga̰a̰l Jeriko diŋ, kale digi ge na ko.
42019002	Sok mbe go me ɗe, ndu a̰me ɗu, ne dḭḭl Zache, a nda ge chal siyal ma ga̰a̰l ne, ge seŋe ya ndu ge pwal.
42019003	Ka ɓyare go na kuwa Zeso, ɗaŋɗe, seɗ vin̰a to, ge dape nda kaa ɓase me no, ago kaa doŋ jiyale iya me.
42019004	Chiya zḛḛ yà, ndee ge ɔwara ga̰a̰l ge àa tol ne sikomor digi, ndwa go na kuwa Zeso, ge dape kale mà vin̰a mbe go.
42019005	Sok ge Zeso dee ya ge sok mbe go, ndil sok digi, jan Zache go: Ka̰a̰ mo ko ya se vun cab, Zache, ago màno, ɓyare go mbi kaa ge mo diŋ.
42019006	Zache kan na ko ya se vun cab, gene ne ge laa saal ge na diŋ yà.
42019007	Nda peɗ ge kuwa kaŋ mbe ma ka faa laa hoɗɗa, àa ka janna go: Ḛ kuwa gale, a mbo ya kaɗ ge ndu ge kee sone diŋ yà ɗoo me!
42019008	Sok mbe go, Zache mbo ya Bagezok ndwa se, jan ne go: Za̰a̰ mbi gale Bagezok, mbi hon a̰se ma mbi kaŋ gan ma buwal go cḛḛ. Kaɗɗa mbi zâ ndu a̰me go, mbi gwan ne ne kaŋ mbe poɗɗa ndwa ndà.
42019009	Zeso gwan ge ne janna go: Màno Dok mon nda ge zok mbe diŋ-ge ma ya go. Ge dape mo sḛ, mo rusu ge Abraham nee ne waɗme.
42019010	Ago mbi, Van ge Ndu ne mbo ya ɓyare nda ge ba̰a̰ ma, ndwa mon num.
42019011	Sok ge Zeso yin̰a ya guwa ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem, nda ka dwaɗ go sok ge muluk ge Dok dyan-na zum mbiya mbyaɗ no gaw. Ɗege kee nda mbe ge mbo ya za̰a̰ na ma fare sḭḭ iya, ndwa kee num kuwaya go num dwaɗɗa mbe ma ge maa vin̰a go to.
42019012	Ḛ kuwa fare ge a wa̰a̰ num no: Ndu a̰me ɗu ge rusu ge gan ma way zì, ɗege mbo ge maa suwa sok a̰me ge kaal ndiɗ yà, ndwa go gan ga̰a̰l ge waɗe ho̰ na vin̰a ge mbo ya kaɗ gan ge na suwal go.
42019013	Zḛḛ ge go ne mbo, tol na nda ge tèmel ma ya wol, hon num bware dinar wol, jan num go me: Ḛ seŋe ḛ tok, ɗiŋ mbi gwanna ya.
42019014	Ɗaŋɗe, ne ka̰a̰m kuri ne gezi. Àa teme maa nda ge vin̰a ma ge ne pe yà, ndwa mbo jan gan ga̰a̰l ge waɗe go: I ɓyare go ndu mbe kaa i gan to.
42019015	Guwa̰ ge àa ho̰ ne vin̰a kaɗ gan go, gwan-na na suwa go. Ee tèmel tol nda ge na ho̰ num bware ma ya, ndwa kuwaya go ndu ge tèmel ge diige kee ma̰ kaŋ ge na bware tem de.
42019016	Ndu ge zḛḛge, yan-na, jan ne go: Mbi ndu ge zok-goo, mbi seɗ mam ja bware dinar wol ge bware dinar ge mo ho̰ mbi pagal.
42019017	Gan ga̰a̰l mbe jan ne go: A gag, ndu ge tèmel ge kwaɗa. Ajo̰o̰ mo kaa ndu ge ɗeŋer ge kaŋ ge hoɗege guwa ma zì, ke muluk ge suwal ga̰a̰l ma pagal wol.
42019018	Ndu ge zi yan-na, jan ne go: Mbi ndu ge zok-goo, mbi seɗ mam ja bware dinar nuwan̰ ge bware ge mo ho̰ mbi pagal.
42019019	Gan ga̰a̰l mbe jan ne go: Mo sḛ waɗme, mo mbiya kaɗ ga̰a̰l ge suwal ma pagal nuwan̰.
42019020	Ndu ge tèmel ge ɗogle yan-na, jan ne go: Mbi ndu ge zok-goo, mo bware dinar no. Mbi warge ne ba̰a̰ wa zì jan.
42019021	Ago, mbi ka chiya mo voo, ge dape mo ndu ge ndaa kaka ne, mo ɔwabe kaŋ ge mo ee ne digi to, mo syaɗ kaŋ ge mo zare ne to me.
42019022	Gan ga̰a̰l gwan ge ne janna go: Ndu ge tèmel ge laa pisil, mbi kun mo sariya ge fare ge ndage ge mo wa zì pagal. Mo kaa ge kuwaya go mbi ndu ge ndaa kaka ne, mbi ɔwabe kaŋ ge mbi ee ne digi to, mbi syaɗ kaŋ ge mbi zare ne to me.
42019023	Mo kuwa fare mbe ma kuwa go ko, ge dape, mo wa mbo kan mbi bware mbe ge sok koy bware zì yà to gyana de. Mbi daa gwan-na no ɗe, mbi daa mà mbo ame ne ya zum ge mam to de?
42019024	Guwa̰, jan num mbe ge kaa na ziya mbe ma go: Ḛ ame ne bware dinar mbe gezi ge ne tok go ɗaŋ, ḛ hon ne ndu ge see bware dinar wol.
42019025	Àa gwan ge ne janna go: Bagezok, a go ge bware dinar wol iya me ɗe.
42019026	Mbi jan ḛ ne no, ndu ge go na ge a̰me, àa mbo hon ne kon pagal. Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge go na be a̰me, koo ne ne ge hoɗege guwa mbe puy, àa mbo ame ne ne gezi.
42019027	Kaɗɗa mbi ka̰a̰m ge ho̰o̰l ma, num mbe ge ɓyare go mbi kê muluk ge maa pagal to ma ɗe, ḛ gene num ya go go, ḛ vyan num mbi ndwa go.
42019028	Guwa̰ ge Zeso jin̰a na fare mbe ma go, dol tene ya nda vuwa̰ zḛḛ, ndwa mbo ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem.
42019029	Ɗeɗ-ɗa go, Zeso yan ja guwa ge suwal van ge zi ma, Betfaje mage Betani, ge no njal ge ɔwara oliv ma do̰o̰ no ne pagal digi kin̰a go, teme na nda ge ame hateya ma zi ge maa ka̰a̰m buwal zì,
42019030	jan num go: Ḛ mbo ge suwal van ge no ge nè ndwa nga diŋ yà. Sok waɗ ne diŋ yà go gaw, ḛ mà seɗ kwar van ge ndu ndâ ne dwam ɗu to vwalla se. Ḛ saa ne, ḛ gene ne ya.
42019031	Mà kaɗɗa ndu a̰me ele ḛ ya go: Ḛ saa ne ge dape? Ḛ jin̰a ne go: A Bagezok ɓyare nee ne.
42019032	Nda mbe ge tèmel ma mbô, àa seɗ kaŋ mbe ma ge mojo̰o̰ Zeso jin̰a maa num mbe go tetem.
42019033	Sok ge àa ɗege saa kwar van go, ne ba ma ele num go: Ḛ saa kwar van mbe ge dape de?
42019034	Àa gwan ge num janna go: A Bagezok ɓyare nee ne.
42019035	Àa gene Zeso kwar van mbe ya, àa kan maa ba̰a̰ ma ge ne guwa̰ digi, àa ee Zeso ndaa ge ne pagal.
42019036	Zeso gale sok mboya go, nda ka zen maa ba̰a̰ ma ge vin̰a pul go, ge ne ndwa zḛḛ.
42019037	Ajo̰o̰ na yan ja guwa ge Jerusalem, ge vin̰a ge soole no ge njal ge ɔwara oliv ma do̰o̰ no ne pagal kin̰a digi ya se, laa saal mbo ya fere nda ge ame hateya ge gḛḛ mbe ge ka kàre ne pe ma peɗ, àa ɗege uware Dok ge ka̰a̰l ndaal, ge kaŋ ajab mbe ge maa kuwa num ge ne ta ma pe.
42019038	Àa ka janna go: Dok ke wa tare ge gan ga̰a̰l pagal, Ne ge mbo no ya ge dḭḭl ge Bagezok ne pagal! Halas go ge pḭḭ zì yà, Saleya ge Dok ge no pḭḭ ma digi yà dḭḭl pagal me.
42019039	Farisi a̰me ma, ge ɓase ma buwal zì ya, àa ka jan Zeso go: Ba ge hateya, mḛḛre mo nda ge ame hateya ma go nde no de!
42019040	Gwan ge num janna go: Mbi jan ḛ ne no, kaɗɗa num zane wa daal puy, njal ma mbo kee kṵwa̰!
42019041	Sok ge Zeso dee ya zì guwa, kuwa suwal ga̰a̰l, laa pisil ɓyare ka hun ne, ge num ge no ne diŋ ma pe, jan go:
42019042	Mà kaɗ kwaɗa, daa no go ḛ sḛ ma wan kaŋ ge gene halas màno ya ma pe wan! Ɗaŋɗe, kaŋ mbe ma ge sego, àa way way ge ḛ ndwa zḛḛ.
42019043	Dwam ma mbo deɗ-ɗa ḛ pagal, ge go ḛ nda ge ho̰o̰l ma mbo hee tok ge sok ma ya peɗ, àa mbo vee ḛ se, ge go ndu seɗ vin̰a ge ɓuuya to. Àa mbo waɗ-ɗa ḛ pe diŋ ge sok ma ya peɗ.
42019044	Àa mbo burmi ḛ ge ḛ suwal genjem. Àa mbo n̰a njal ge ḛ zok ma way a̰me ge na kon pagal digi to. Kaŋ mbe ma mbo kee go ge dape, mo be vin sok mbe ge Dok mbo ya ḛ ta mon ḛ mbe to.
42019045	Zeso waɗ-ɗa ge zok ge Dok ne pul diŋ, ɗege yan nda ge kee suk ma zum,
42019046	jan num go: «Njaŋe ge maktub ge Dok ne zì go: “Mbi zok mbo kaɗ zok kee kaɗeya ne.” Ɗaŋɗe, ḛ me ɗe, ḛ seŋe ne ya sok way ta ge chala ma way no.»
42019047	Ka hate nda dwam ma tatab ge zok ge Dok ne zì. Ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ma, Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma, ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme ɓase ma ka ɓyare vin̰a ge ban ne gezi,
42019048	ɗaŋɗe, àa be kuwa kaŋ ge maa keeya tem ge maa wa ee tok ne pagal to, ge dape ɓase ma peɗ ho̰ ta mɔɗwag sok za̰a̰ ne go.
42020001	Deɗ-ɗa dwam a̰me go ɗu, Zeso sok hate ɓase ma ge zok ge Dok ne zì go, ka jan num Fare ge Kwaɗa. Ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ma, Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma, ɓanna ge Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme num ma deɗ-ɗa ge sok mbe go me.
42020002	Àa ele ne go: Jin̰a i gale, a ge ma̰ pool ɗoo, mo kee kaŋ mbe ma no de, koo a huɗi ho̰ mo vin̰a ge kee num ne de?
42020003	Gwan ge num janna go: Mbi sḛ waɗme, mbi mà ele ḛ fare ɗu. Ḛ jin̰a mbi gale:
42020004	A huɗi ho̰ Yohana vin̰a ge kee nda baptem ne, a Dok koo nda duwana ma de?
42020005	Sok mbe go, àa ɗege pee ta ta buwal zì, àa ka janna go: Mà kaɗɗa nè gwan ge ne vinna ya go: A Dok ho̰ ne vin̰a ne, mà jan nè no go: Ge dape ḛ wa hoɗ fareba ge ne ta to de?
42020006	Mà kaɗɗa nè gwan ge ne vinna ya go: A nda duwana ma ho̰ ne vin̰a ne, ɓase ma peɗ mà mbal nè ge njal, ge dape num sḛ ma ge kuwaya tyatyaɗ go Yohana ndu ge zwagre Dok wa|Nda ge zwagre Dok wa ne.
42020007	Sok mbe go àa gwan ge Zeso janna go: I kuwa ndu ge ho̰ ne vin̰a kee baptem to.
42020008	Zeso jan num go me: Mbi sḛ waɗme, mbi jan ḛ go, mbi see pool mbe ge kee kaŋ mbe ma ge dii de to me.
42020009	Guwa̰ go, Zeso ɗege kee ɓase ma fare sḭḭ mbe no go: Ndu a̰me ɗu ɗḭḭ on̰or, guwa̰, hon nda ge kee tèmel gaaso on̰or ma ne wanna. N̰a suwal, mbo kee ge na sok gɔswal yà dwam ma kaal swag.
42020010	Sok ge sok kan siyal ge on̰or ne mbiya, teme na dore a̰me ya ɗu, ge nda ge kee gaaso on̰or tèmel ma ta, ndwa go num ho̰ na na on̰or ndwa ya. Ɗaŋɗe, nda ge kee gaaso on̰or tèmel ma iyal ne, àa yan ne tok bàŋ.
42020011	Gwan teme na ndu ge tèmel ge ɗogle ya iya, ne sḛ mbe waɗme, àa ndil ne ge mojo̰o̰ ne ndu ne to go, àa iyal ne, àa yan ne tok bàŋ.
42020012	Vin tene, teme ndu ge taa, àa tase ne cɔcɔm, àa fiyage ne ya zum.
42020013	Guwa̰, Ba ge gaaso on̰or ele tene go: Mbi ke sḛ gyana de? Mbi van no, mbi laa wa̰a̰ ne gḛḛ, mbi gaa teme ne, mbi dwaɗ go àa mà hon ne hormo.
42020014	Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge nda ge kee gaaso on̰or tèmel ma kuwa ne ya mboya, àa jan ta ta buwal zì go: A ndu ge zam ne joo ne no, nè hṵṵ ne, ndwa go joo mbe wa gaa nè ne.
42020015	Àa mbô ge ne ge gaaso on̰or guwa̰ zum yà, àa hun ne gezi. Ge sego, ba ge gaaso on̰or gaa kee num gyana de?
42020016	Mbo mbo ya, mbo puu nda ge kee gaaso on̰or tèmel mbe ma gezi, hee gaaso on̰or mbe hon nda ge ɗogle ma ne wanna. Sok ge ɓase ma za̰a̰ fare mbe ma go, àa jan go: Ne dee ya keeya mbe go to!
42020017	Ɗaŋɗe, Zeso ndil num bàa, jan go: Fare ge njaŋe no maktub ge Dok ne zì go: «Njal ge nda ge sin zok ma doo ne gezi, A ne gaa ya njal ge gag ge zok keŋ pe ne.»
42020018	Ndu ge diige ge mbo deɗ-ɗa ge njal mbe pagal, mbo hal na sok ma kɔkɔcwa. Kaɗɗa njal ne dee ge ndu pagal ne me ɗe, mbo roɗ ne gezi njaɗaɗ me.
42020019	Ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ma, Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma ka ɓyare vin̰a ge ee tok ne pagal ge sok mbe go gaw, ge dape àa see go ne kê na fare sḭḭ mbe ge maa pagal. Ɗaŋɗe, àa ka chiya voo ge ɓase ma pe.
42020020	Ge sok mbe go, àa dol ndwa ge Zeso pagal keceɗ. Àa teme nda ge hee nda ka̰a̰l ma ya, àa kee ta ge mojo̰o̰ nda ge be fare ma go anna ge ne, ndwa wan ne ge fare, ge ne fare janna ma ta, maa wa gaa ɓyan ne ge goformo̰, ndu ge pool tok go ndwa kun ne sariya me.
42020021	Nda mbe ma ele ne go: Ba ge hateya, i kuwa kuwa go mo fare janna mage mo kaŋ hateya ma fare ge fareba ma ne. Mo vare ndu to. Ago mo hate vin̰a ge Dok ne ge fareba pagal.
42020022	Jin̰a i gale, ge eeya ge nè ne ma pagal ɗe, vin̰a hage hage go àa poo siyal hon Sezar, koo àa poo ne to de?
42020023	Ɗaŋɗe, Zeso, kuwa num son mbe ma, gwan ge num janna go:
42020024	Ḛ ngay mbi silay ɗu gale. Pagal mage kaŋ njaŋeya ge ne ta mbe ma huɗi ne ma ne de? Àa gwan ge ne janna go: A Sezar ne ma ne.
42020025	Sok mbe go, jan num go: Kaŋ ge go na ge Sezar nee ne, ḛ ho̰ Sezar ne. Kaŋ ge go na ge Dok nee ne, ḛ ho̰ Dok ne kaŋ me.
42020026	Àa be seɗ vin̰a ge wan ne ge fare ge ɓase ma ndwa go, ge ne fare janna ma ta ɗu to. Ne fare gwanna ma ka kee num ajab vare zoo, àa seɗ fare ge janna daa to.
42020027	Sok mbe go, Saduki a̰me ma, num mbe ge vin tanna ge nda ge suu ma way to ma mbo ya ge Zeso ta, àa jan ne go:
