43021023	Ge sok mbe go, kṵwa̰ ge fare mbe ne dasare se ge na̰ van ge ho fareba ma ta go go ndu ge ame hateya mbe mbo suu to. Zane no, Zeso be jan Piyer go, ne mbo suu to de ɗe, be jan ne go to. Ɗaŋɗe, jin̰a go: Kaɗɗa mbi ɓyare ya go ne kaa ge na ndwa ɗiŋ mbi gwan-na wa go puy no, paa mo zì de?
43021024	A ndu ge ame hateya mbe kee sayda ge fare ge na kuwa num ge na ndwa ma ne peɗ, njaŋe num no me. I kuwa kuwa go ne fare mbe ma fare ge fareba ma ne.
43021025	Zeso gwan kee kaŋ ge ɗogle ma ta gḛḛ-gḛḛ waɗeya. Daa no go àa njaŋe num njaŋe kakaɗag ɗe, mbi dwaɗ go, sok ge kan kaŋ njaŋeya mbe ma mà kaɗ daa to ge dunin̰a zì.
44001001	Kondore Tewofil, ge mbi maktub ge zḛḛge zì, mbi wa̰a̰ mo kaŋ ge Zeso ee pe kee num mage hate num ma pe zum peɗ,
44001002	ɗiŋ deɗ-ɗa ge dwam ge Dok hê ne mbo pḭḭ zì yà go. Zḛḛ ge go ne mbo digi, ho na nda ge temeya ge na taa num ma na wa no, ge pool ge On̰om ge Harcal ne ta.
44001003	Guwa̰ swày ge ne ne go, ɗiŋ dwam warndà, ka ngay tene sok ma go pe hini-hini ge num ta, ndwa kee num kuwaya go, na tanna go, na ge na ndwa. Ka wan num fare ge muluk ge Dok ne ma pe zum me.
44001004	Ge dwam a̰me go ɗu, sok zam kaŋ ge num go, hoɗ num na wa go: Ḛ wuwa zum ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ to, ɓyare go ḛ wa̰a̰ ta da̰a̰re bobo ge mbi wuwage ḛ ne fare, ge mbi Ba dee kee wa tii ndwa hon ḛ ne, On̰om ge Harcal .
44001005	Ago Yohana kee nda baptem ge mam se, ɗaŋɗe, gaa dwam ma kwaɗa lag, ḛ mbo seɗ baptem ge On̰om ge Harcal ne.
44001006	Ajo̰o̰ Zeso mage na nda ge temeya ma kaa sok ge ɗu go, àa ele ne go: Bagezok, a ge dwam mbe go ɗoo, mo wa gwan pool ge kee muluk ya ge Izrayel van ma tok go de?
44001007	Gwan ge num janna go: Dwam mbe mage sok mbe ma, a Dok Ba vḭḭ tene ee num ne, kuwa wa huyya ge num way ma ne me. Ago vin̰a be hage ge ḛ pagal, ge ḛ wa deɗ-ɗa kuwa num to.
44001008	Ɗaŋɗe, On̰om ge Harcal mbo mbo ya se ge ḛ pagal, ḛ mbo seɗ pool mbyaɗɗa tab, ḛ seŋe nda ge mbo jan mbi fare ge ḛ kuwa num ma, ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ, ge suwal ge Jude suwa ne ma go peɗ, mbo ge suwa ge Samari ne yà, deɗ ɗiŋ ge suwa wa aaya dwab ma yà.
44001009	Guwa̰ ge ne wa aa go, Dok hee ne mbo pḭḭ zì yà, num sḛ ma ka ndil ne ɗiŋ, pḭḭ ge laaya gutub mbo ya ban ne ge num ndwa zì gezi.
44001010	Ajo̰o̰ num ndwa ma kaa gwaɗeya ndil mboya ge Zeso ne, mbo pḭḭ zì yà, àa tan ta ge nda zi mḛḛya ge maa ziya ge ba̰a̰ saal, àa jan num go:
44001011	Nda ge Galile ma, ge dape ḛ wa kaɗ mḛḛya ndil sok ge pḭḭ zì yà go ɗa? Zeso mbe ge Dok hê ne ge ḛ buwal zì mbo pḭḭ zì yà no, mbo gwanna mbe go ca, ge ḛ kuwa ne mbo digi no go.
44001012	Guwa̰, àa ɗege ge njal ge àa tol ne, njal ge ɔwara oliv ma way pagal digi ya, ndwa go ɔwara oliv ma do̰o̰ ne pagal digi, àa gwan-na ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ. Num buwal kaal gḛḛ to, kaa guwa ge tok biyal dubu ɗu go.
44001013	Sok ge àa dee ya diŋ go, àa ndee mbo ge zok ge kon pagal digi-ge yà, sok ge àa kaɗ ka seɗ ta ge ne go. Nda ge kaa ge sok mbe go ma dḭḭl ma no: Piyer, Yohana, Jak mage Andre, Filib mage Tomas, Bartelemi mage Mata, Jak ge Alfe van, Simo̰ ge iyal kyarga ge na suwal pe, Jude ge Jak van me.
44001014	Àa peɗ wa dagre ɗu, àa ka seɗ ta ɗaɗag kee kaɗeya, ge nda zaab ma kwaɗa lag, ɓanna ge Zeso na̰ van mage ge ne na̰ Mari me.
44001015	Ge num dwam kee kaɗeya a̰me go ɗu, nda ge ho fareba ma seɗ ta guwa ge kis ge ziya warzi go. Ge sok mbe go, Piyer ɗege digi, hee fare, jan go:
44001016	Na̰ van ma, ɓyare go fare ge Njaŋeya ge Dok ne jin̰a ge Yudas pagal go, ne mbo ngay nda ge ho̰o̰l ma vin̰a wan Zeso, ne wa huy ne. Fare mbe, On̰om ge Harcal ee Daviɗ wuwage ne, ge zḛḛ ya wal day.
44001017	A nè kon ge tèmel ne, ne sḛ waɗme, kaa ndu ge temeya ne, ge nè sḛ ma go. Ge tèmel ge Dok ho̰ nè ge num keeya ma zì, ne ne ndwa kaa waɗme.
44001018	Ge bware ge àa poo ne, ge sone ge ne kê sok yaɗ Zeso gezi pe, yiya tene gaaso no ɗu. Ge ne zì, mbeɗe no, mbaa se ge na pagal no, ne laa foo no, ne laa zaaso ma busugi ya zum no peɗ me.
44001019	Nda ge Jerusalem diŋ-ge ma peɗ, àa kaa ge fare mbe kuwaya, a ge pe, àa too gaaso mbe ge maa wa no go: Hakeldama, ne pe wanna go, gaaso ge swàm ka̰a̰ ne zì.
44001020	Ago a njaŋe ge Maktub ge kaŋ mballa ma way zì go: «“N̰a zok ge ne ne gaa pṵṵl, Ndu a̰me ɗu ne kaa ge ne zì to me.” Gwan njaŋe no iya go: “Ndu ge ɗogle he ne tèmel keeya digi.” »
44001021	-
44001022	Go mbe no, ɓyare go nè taa ndu ɗu, ge ne wa ɓan kee tèmel dagre ge nè, ge mojo̰o̰ ndu ge kaa sayda ge tanna ge Bagezok Zeso ne go. Ɓyare go ne kaa ndu ge nè buwal zige, ge ka an sok dagre ge nè, ge Bagezok Zeso Krist pe go, ge sok ge Yohana ndu ge kee nda baptem kê ne baptem ya go day, ɗiŋ deɗ-ɗa ge dwam ge Dok hê ne mbo pḭḭ zì yà go.
44001023	Àa mbo ya hee nda zi: Ge ɗu dḭḭl Jozef ge àa tol ne Barsabas, ge àa chiya ne dḭḭl go Justus, ge zi dḭḭl Matiyas.
44001024	Guwa̰, àa kee kaɗeya go: Bagezok, mo ge mo kuwa dul wa ge nda way peɗ, ngay i ndu ge mo taa ne, ge nda ge zi mbe ma no buwal zì,
44001025	ndwa go, ne eya Yudas ge ne tèmel temeya zì, tèmel ge ne sḛ n̰a ne, mbo ge sok ge na kaŋ keeya ge sone ma gene na yà no.
44001026	Ge sok mbe go, àa mbo ya ee daŋ, daŋ deɗ Matiyas, waɗ-ɗa ge Zeso nda ge temeya ge wol pɔgwa ɗu ma buwal zì.
44002001	Sok ge dwam vḛḛso ge Pantekoɗ (dwam kee vḛḛso ge siyal) ne mbiya go, nda ge ho fareba Zeso ta ma peɗ kaa dagre ge sok ge ɗu go.
44002002	Tugcug, kṵwa̰ a̰me mbo ge pḭḭ zì ya dinna ge sa̰a̰m ge labre ndaal go. Kṵwa̰ mbe mbo ya huy zok ge àa kaa ne zì pul peɗ.
44002003	Ge sok mbe go, àa kuwa a̰me dinna ge ol wa swala go, ge dḭḭ ge ɗel go, vaa se, kaɗ ge ndu ge diige pagal ɗu ɗu.
44002004	On̰om ge Harcal mbo ya huy num mbyaɗɗa tab, àa ɗege faa wa ge ɗogle ma, ge mojo̰o̰ On̰om ee maa janna go.
44002005	Ge dwam mbe go, Yahuɗ ge no ge voo ge Dok ne ge maa zì ma, ge mbo ge rusu ge ɗogle ma zì ya peɗ, àa kaa ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ.
44002006	Sok ge àa za̰a̰ kṵwa̰ mbe go, nda kan soo ya ɓase, àa mbo ya kee ajab waɗeya. Ndu ge diige ka za̰a̰ num faa na wa twàl.
44002007	Num pagal mbo ya banna ge ɓul mɔɗwag, àa kee ajab, àa ka ele ta go: Nda ge faa fare mbe ma no peɗ, àa be nda ge Galile ma ne to de?
44002008	Kee pe gyana, nda mbe ma wa ka faa nè wa twàl, ge nè sḛ ma faa num ma de?
44002009	Ge nè buwal zì, nda mbo ge sok ma ya pe hini-hini, ge suwa Partes ya, ge Medes ya, ge Elam ya, ge Mezopotami ya, ge suwa ge Jude mage Kapados ne ya, ge Po̰o̰ mage suwa ge Azi ne ya,
44002010	ge Frigi koo ge Pamfili ya, ge Ejypt koo ge Libi ge no guwa ge suwal Cyren ya, ge nda ge mbo no ge Rom ya ma me. Yahuɗ van twàl koo dwag ge ho fareba ma ge Dok ge num way ta.
44002011	Nda ge Kreɗ koo Arab ma, nè peɗ wa ka za̰a̰ num jan kaŋ ajab ge Dok ne ma, ge nè wa twàl ma zì de?
44002012	Num pagal mbo ya banna ge ɓul mɔɗwag, ge ajab keeya ge num way zì, àa ka ele ta ge ta buwal zì go: Fare mbe pe wanna gyana de?
44002013	Ɗaŋɗe, nda a̰me ma ka coɗ ta ge nda mbe ge ho fareba ma, àa ka janna go: Nda mbe ma fere fere ge on̰or jìn̰al ge tii.
44002014	Ge sok mbe go, Piyer mḛḛ digi ɓanna ge nda ge temeya ge wol pɔgwa ɗu ma, hee na ka̰a̰l digi gwan ge num janna go: I nda Yahuɗ ma, ḛ peɗ ge kaa no suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ ma, ḛ ee ḛ tɔgwa za̰a̰ mbi, ḛ wa wan fare ge kee no pe kwaɗa.
44002015	Nda mbe ma be fere fere ge mojo̰o̰ ḛ dwaɗ go to, ago sok gale horom ge be ndu fereya to.
44002016	Ɗaŋɗe, ge sego a fare ge Jowel, ndu ge zwagre Dok wa|Nda ge zwagre Dok wa ne, ge dee jin̰a ne ge zḛḛ ya wa huy ne go:
44002017	«Dok jin̰a go, fare mbe ma no, num mbo kee ge dwam wa aaya ma go: Mbi mbo kan mbi On̰om ge nda duwana ma pagal peɗ. Ḛ van ma, nda soɗob mage nda zaab, àa mbo seŋe nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma. Ḛ van dore ma ɓanna ge ḛ van kale ma, àa mbo ka kuwa gḭḭl ge kaŋ a̰me ma way, Àa seɗ fare taaya a̰me ma ge num ta. Ḛ sabar ma me, kin̰a ma mbo ka jan num, àa ka seɗ fare taaya a̰me ma ge num ta me.
44002018	O̰o̰, ge dwam mbe ma go, mbi mbo kan mbi On̰om, Ge nda soɗob, koo ge nda zaab ge kee mbi tèmel ma pagal, Àa mbo seŋe nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma.
44002019	Mbi mbo kee kaŋ ajab ma ge pḭḭ digi, Kaŋ ngayya ma me, ge suwa pagal, Dinna ge swàm go, ge ol go, Ge ol swàm ge pisil keketeg ge ndage ge se mbo digi go.
44002020	Gyala mbo seŋe tṵṵ, saba mbo seŋe kàal ge swàm go me. Zḛḛ ge go dwam ge Bagezok ne mbo ya, Dwam mbe ge ɓaŋlaŋ ge waɗe.
44002021	Sok mbe go, ndu ge mbo tol Bagezok ya go, ne chiya na kṵwa̰, mbo seɗ monna .»
44002022	Izrayel van ma! Ḛ za̰a̰ fare ge mbi ɓyare jan ḛ num ma no: Zeso ge suwal Nazareɗ ne, a ndu ge Dok kee kaŋ ajab ma, kaŋ haŋle mage kaŋ ngayya ma ne ge ne ta ḛ buwal zì, ndwa ngayya go, ne ndu ge na taa nee ne. Ḛ sḛ ma peɗ, ḛ ge num kuwaya.
44002023	A ge laa ɓyareya ge Dok ne pagal tem, àa ho̰ Zeso ge ḛ tok go no. Ḛ sḛ ma ɓin̰a ne ge nda ge kuwa Dok to ma tok go no, àa pee ne ge ɔwara kaŋre ta digi no, àa hṵṵ ne no me.
44002024	Ɗaŋɗe, Dok harge ne ge pool ge swày ne ge sa̰a̰ ne se kakag tok zì ya no, ta̰a̰ ne digi no. Ago, swày kaa be pool a̰me go fyalag ge wan ne se.
44002025	Ago, Daviɗ jin̰a fare ge Zeso pe go: «Mbi kuwa Bagezok go, ge mbi ndwa zḛḛ ɗaɗag, chiya mbi kṵwa̰ ne, ndu mbo kee mbi a̰me to me.
44002026	Ge ano mbe pe, mbi ge laa saal fafan̰, Mbi wa kaɗ ɗen kaŋ mballa, mbi ge suu suu ge nda gegene ma go, Mbi ee mbi jobreya ge kaŋ ge Dok mbo keeya ge mbi sḛ duul pe pagal.
44002027	Ago mo mbo n̰a mbi sḛ ge sok kàɗɗa ge nda ge swày ma way se to, Mo mbo n̰a duul ge mo ndu ge tèmel ge n̰a wa to ne, hubiya to me.
44002028	Mo ee mbi kuwa vin̰a ge mbo ge ndwa ge fareba zì, Mo mbo huy mbi ge laa saal.»
44002029	Piyer gwan hee fare jan go: «Mbi na̰ van ma, ḛ ho̰ mbi vin̰a, mbi jin̰a ḛ fare mbe zum waŋ, nè baŋ Daviɗ suu ge nda gegene ma suu mbe go, àa mbuu ne no, ɗiŋ màno, ne sḭḭ gale go nè buwal zì.
44002030	Ɗaŋɗe, Daviɗ kaa ndu ge zwagre Dok wa|Nda ge zwagre Dok wa, kaa ge kuwaya go Dok kê na wa tii sok guni tene go go: “Mbi mbo hee ndu a̰me ɗu ge mo pe rusu zì, kaɗ gan ga̰a̰l ge mojo̰o̰ mo sḛ dee kaa go.”
44002031	Daviɗ kaa ge fare mbe kuwaya zḛḛ wal, a ge pe, jin̰a fare ge tanna ge Krist, Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne pe no go: “Mo mbo n̰a ne sḛ ge sok kàɗɗa ge nda ge swày ma way se to, koo ne sḛ duul hubiya to me.”
44002032	Zeso ge mbi jan ḛ ne fare no, Dok ta̰a̰ ne ge nda ge swày ma buwal zì, i sḛ ma peɗ, i kuwa kaŋ mbe ge i ndwa.
44002033	Dok hê ne digi, ee ne kàɗɗa ge na tok matoson pagal no, seɗ On̰om ge Harcal ya ge Dok Ba tok go, ndwa hon nè ne, dinna ge ne sḛ kê wa tii go. A ge pe, ḛ kuwa kaŋ ma keeya no, ge mojo̰o̰ àa deɗ-ɗa ge ḛ tɔgwa ma zì no go waɗme.
44002034	Daviɗ sḛ be mbo Dok ta digi to, go no puy ɗe jin̰a no go: «“Bagezok Dok jin̰a mbi Bagezok go: Mbo ya kaɗ ge mbi tok matoson pagal ɗiŋ ge go,
44002035	Mbi seŋe mo nda ge ho̰o̰l ma mo kaŋ ee mo ko ma.”
44002036	«N̰a Izrayel van ge diige, ne kuwa tyatyaɗ go, Zeso mbe ge ḛ pee ne ge ɔwara kaŋre ta digi, Dok ee ne ya kaɗ Bagezok mage Krist, Ndu ge na taa ne.»
44002037	Guwa̰ ge ɓase ma za̰a̰ fare mbe ma go, deɗ ge num dul wa go, àa ele Piyer mage nda ge temeya gegene ma go: Na̰ van ma! I kee gyana de?
44002038	Piyer gwan ge num janna go: Ḛ seŋe ta ya se, ge kaŋ keeya ge ḛ ḛ ge sone ma go. Ndu ge diige ne ke baptem ge dḭḭl ge Zeso Krist ne, ge poreya ge sone ge na ne ma pe. Go mbe no, ḛ wa mbo seɗ bobo ge On̰om ge Harcal ne me.
44002039	Ago, wa tii mbe ge ḛ pe, ge ḛ van ma pe, ge num peɗ ge no zum yà kaal ma pe, ge nda ge nè Bagezok Dok mbo tol num ja ma pe peɗ waɗme.
44002040	Piyer gwan jan num fare ta gḛḛ nde, ndwa moɗege num mage ee num eya fare. Gwan jan num go: Ḛ ɔwabe ta gezi ge kaŋ keeya ge doŋ pe ge sone mbe ne ma go, ḛ wa seɗ monna .
44002041	Nda ge ame ne fare ma, àa kee num baptem. Ge dwam mbe go, nda ge ho fareba mbe ma kanna ge wal ma wa go, guwa ge dudubu taa go.
44002042	Ge sok mbe go gaw, àa hon ta ge ɓul mɔɗwag ame hateya ge nda ge temeya ma way, àa ka kaɗ dagre ge ta, àa ka zam baan dagre, àa ka kee kaɗeya dagre me.
44002043	Nda ka kee ajab gḛḛ, voo wan num ge kaŋ haŋle mage kaŋ ngayya ge nda ge temeya ma ka kee num ma pe.
44002044	Nda ge ho fareba ma peɗ, àa kaa digi dagre ɗu, àa ka vaa ta maa kaŋ ma ge ta buwal zì.
44002045	Àa ka yaɗ maa sok ma ge maa kaŋ kwaɗa ma gezi, àa ka vaa ta kaŋ ge maa see num ma ge ta buwal zì, ge hoɗegeya ge ndu ge diige ne pagal.
44002046	Dwam ma tatab, wa dagre ɗu, àa wan ta deŋel ka seɗ ta ge zok ge Dok ne pul diŋ. Àa ka zam baan dagre ge zok a̰me ma diŋ, àa ka kee ne ge laa saal, ge dul wa eeya se me.
44002047	Àa ka uware Dok, kaŋ keeya ge num way ma ka deɗ ge nda ge ɗogle ge ho fareba to ma ndwa zì kwaɗa. Dwam ma tatab, Bagezok ka kan nda ge na mo̰o̰ num ma ya, ge ɓase ge Dok ne ge wal ma pagal.
44003001	Ge dwam a̰me go ɗu, Piyer mage Yohana ɗege mbo ge zok ge Dok ne zì, mbo kee kaɗeya ge gyala swa saa go.
44003002	Sok ge àa dee ya, àa kuwa ndu a̰me ge ko looɗol ge na tolla go day, àa wa ya ka gene ne ya eeya, ge mojo̰o̰ maa ee ne dwam ma pagal tatab go, ge zok ge Dok ne wa ge waɗɗa, ge àa tol ne go: Zok wa waɗɗa ge siŋli go, ndwa go, ne wa ka kaɗe bware ge nda ge mbo waɗ ne zì ma tok go.
44003003	Sok ge ka̰a̰ na ndwa kuwa Piyer mage Yohana mbo waɗ ge gulum ge zok ge Dok ne wa zì go, kaɗe num go, num ho̰ na a̰me nde.
44003004	Piyer mage Yohana seŋe maa ndwa ya ndil ne, Piyer jan ne go: Ndi i kwaɗa!
44003005	Ee na ndwa ya ge num ta, ge dape, kaa ge dwaɗɗa go, na mà seɗ a̰me ge num tok go.
44003006	Ɗaŋɗe, Piyer jan ne go, bware koo dinar, a ge mbi tok go to, kaŋ ge mbi no ge ne, mbi hon mo ne: Ge dḭḭl ge Zeso Krist ge suwal Nazareɗ ne, ɗege digi, mo mbo vin̰a!
44003007	Guwa̰, wan ne tok matoson, ndwa mbaa ne ɗege digi mḛḛya. Ge sok mbe go gaw, ne ko mage ne ko ndwal pe ma haɗ pool.
44003008	Za̰a̰me digi avun cab, ɗege mbo vin̰a. Waɗ dagre ge num ge zok ge Dok ne zì yà, gaa mboya, ka zon digi ko jɔjwag ge laa saal, ka uware Dok me.
44003009	Nda ge kaa go ma peɗ kuwa ne mboya, ka uware Dok me.
44003010	Sok ge àa dee ya kuwaya go, ne ndu ge ka kàɗɗa ge zok ge Dok ne wa, ge àa tol ne go zok wa waɗɗa ge siŋli go, ndwa kaɗe kaŋ ne, voo mbo ya wan num, àa kee ajab gḛḛ ge ndu mbe mbo vin̰a ya pe.
44003011	Ndu ge see zonna mbe ɓyale tene ge Piyer mage Yohana. Sok ge ɓase ma kuwa num, àa kan soo ya mbo seɗ num, ge pag wa ge àa tol ne pag wa ge Salomo̰ ne zì. Àa ka kee ajab.
44003012	Sok ge Piyer kuwa ano mbe go, gwan ge num janna go: Izrayel van ma, ge dape, ḛ wa ka kee ajab ge zonna ge ndu ge ko looɗol mbe ne pe de? Ge dape, ḛ wa ka ndil i ge mojo̰o̰ ndu mbe ɗege ya mbo vin̰a no, ne ge pool ge i i ta koo ge mboya dagre ge i i ge Dok ta de?
44003013	Dok ge Abraham ne, ge Isak mage Jakob ne me, Dok ge nè baŋ ma way, pate Zeso na ndu ge tèmel, ge ḛ ɓin̰a ne gezi, ḛ ee fare ge ne pagal no ge Pilaɗ ndwa se, sok ge ne sḛ vḭḭ tene go na dol ne digi.
44003014	Ɗaŋɗe ḛ, ḛ ɓyare to Ba ge Harcal mage temel, ḛ kaɗe no zoo go kaɗɗa àa kuwa ḛ a̰se, àa doo ḛ ya digi ndu ge hun swày.
44003015	A go mbe no, ḛ gene Ba ge hon nda ndwa mbo swày no, ɗaŋɗe, Dok ta̰a̰ ne ge swày se no, i sḛ ma kuwa kaŋ mbe ma ge i ndwa.
44003016	Ndu ge ḛ ndil ne, ge ḛ kuwa ne mbe no, a hoɗ fareba ge Zeso dḭḭl ta, ee nee ne seɗ zonna. A hoɗ fareba ge Zeso ta ee nee ne haɗ pool ɗiɗiŋ ge mojo̰o̰ ḛ kuwa ne no go.
44003017	Ge sego, na̰ van ma, mbi kuwa go ḛ ke ne be wan pe, ḛ, ɓanna ge ḛ ga̰a̰l ma me.
44003018	Ɗaŋɗe, fare ge Dok dee wuwage ne zḛḛ wal ge na nda ge zwagre na wa ma ta go: Krist, Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne mbo njoɗ yal, ne wa huy ne.
44003019	Ḛ seŋe ta se ɗaŋ, ḛ eya fare, ndwa go ḛ wa seɗ poreya ge ḛ sone ma way.
44003020	Go mbe no, Bagezok Dok mbo hon ḛ dwam ma, ge go ḛ wa seɗ ɗwabeya, wa teme ḛ ndu ge na mbege ne gezi ge ḛ pe ya waɗme, ndwa go Krist, Ndu ge na taa ne.
44003021	Ge sego, Zeso Krist mbiya kaɗ ge pḭḭ zì ya gale, ɗiŋ ge go dwam mbe ma wa huy. Kaŋ ma dee ya keeya tetem ge maa sok ma go, ge mojo̰o̰ Dok wuwage ne ge zḛḛ ya day, ge na nda ge harcal ge zwagre na wa ma ta go.
44003022	Ago, Moyiz jin̰a go: «Bagezok Dok ge ḛ ḛ, mbo ndage ndu ge zwagre na wa a̰me ɗu, ge ḛ buwal zì dinna ge mbi go, ḛ mbo gwan ḛ pagal ge fare ge ne mbo jan ḛ num ya ma pe se peɗ.»
44003023	Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge mbo gwan na pagal ya ge ne pe se to, àa mbo daa gwan isi ne ge nda ge Dok ne ma buwal zì to.
44003024	Ge ndu ge zwagre Dok wa|Nda ge zwagre Dok wa Samiyel ta ya day, ɗiŋ deɗ-ɗa ge nda ge ne guwa̰ se ma ta, kaŋ ge kee no dwam ge màno ma pul zì, àa wuwage num fare ge zḛḛ ya wal waɗme.
44003025	Nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma van mage van ge wa tii vwalla ne ma! Dok vuwa wa tii ge ḛ baŋ ma ge ḛ pe, sok ge jin̰a Abraham go: «Pe rusu ge suwa pagal ma peɗ mbo seɗ wa tare ge mo rusu ta.»
44003026	Go mbe no, sok ge Dok ta̰a̰ na ndu ge tèmel ge swày se, ee pe teme ne zḛḛ wal gale ge ḛ ta, ndwa go, ne ke ḛ wa tare, ndu ge diige ge ḛ buwal zige seŋe tene se, ge kaŋ keeya ge na ne ge sone ma go.
44004001	Piyer mage Yohana gale sok jan ɓase ma fare ge Dok ne go, nda ge kee tuwaleya ma, nda ge koy zok ge Dok ne wa ma ga̰a̰l, ɓanna ge Saduki ma waɗ-ɗa ge num pagal diŋ.
44004002	Num laa mbo ya hoɗɗa gḛḛ, ge hateya ge àa ka hate ɓase ma fare pe. Ge hateya ge num way ma zì, àa ka janna go: Zeso tanna digi ge swày se, ndwa ngayya go, nda ge suu ma mbo tan ge swày se mbe go waɗme.
44004003	Àa wan num, ajo̰o̰ gyala dinna, àa kan num ge zok daŋay zì, àa gaa dwamma zì ɗiŋ mbo aaram.
44004004	Kaɗɗa ge ɓase ge za̰a̰ fare ge Dok ne mbe ma, nda gḛḛ mbo ya hoɗ fareba, num peɗ ge ho fareba ma ɓan digi guwa ge dudubu nuwan̰.
44004005	Sok yan kin̰are, Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme num ma, ge nda ga̰a̰l ge ndil ɓase ma, Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma, mbo ya twageya ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ,
44004006	ɓanna ge An, ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe, Kayf, Yohana, Alekzandr, ge num ge no rusu ge ga̰a̰l ge kee tuwaleya ne zì ma peɗ me.
44004007	Àa gene nda ge temeya ma ya ge num ndwa se, àa ele num go: Ḛ see pool ge kee kaŋ mbe no ge dii koo ge huɗi dḭḭl ta de?
44004008	Ge sok mbe go, On̰om ge Harcal mbo ya biri Piyer, hee fare, gwan ge num janna go:
44004009	Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme num mage ga̰a̰l ge ndil ɓase ma! Màno kaɗɗa ḛ ele i fare ge kwaɗa ge i kê ndu ge ko looɗol ne pagal, ge vin̰a ge ne see zonna no pe ɗe,
44004010	fare ge mbi ɓyare jan ḛ ne no, ḛ za̰a̰ ne kwaɗa, ḛ Izrayel van ma peɗ: «Ndu mbe ge mḛḛ no ge ḛ ndwa se pool no ɗiɗiŋ, a ge pool ge dḭḭl ge Zeso Krist ge suwal Nazareɗ ne ta, see zonna no. A Zeso mbe ge ḛ pee ne ge ɔwara kaŋre ta digi, ge Dok ta̰a̰ ne ge nda ge swày ma buwal zì ne.
44004011	“Ne sḛ, a njal ge ḛ nda ge sin zok ma doo ne gezi ne, A ne gaa ya njal ge gag ge zok keŋ pe ne.” »
44004012	Vin̰a ge seɗ monna ge ndu a̰me ge ɗogle ta to, ago dḭḭl a̰me ge ɗogle ge mo wa tol ne ge suwa pagal, mo wa seɗ monna ge ne ta to me.
44004013	Sok ge Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge kun sariya ma kuwa go, Piyer mage Yohana jan fare be voo, num nda ge see hateya to ma ne, àa kee ajab. Àa kaa ge kuwaya go, num nda ge ka an dagre ge Zeso ma ne.
44004014	Ajo̰o̰, àa kuwa ndu ge see zonna mḛḛya ge num ziya, fare janna mbo ya rase num.
44004015	Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge kun sariya ma hoɗ Piyer mage Yohana maa wa go, num wuwa zum ge zok seɗ ta ge maa way zì. Guwa̰, àa seɗ ta, àa ele ta ge ta buwal zì go:
44004016	Nè kee ge nda mbe ma fare gyana de? Ago kaŋ ajab mbe no, àa kê ne ge ɓase ge Jerusalem diŋ-ge ma ndwa go peɗ, fare a̰me ge nè pee to.
44004017	Ɗaŋɗe, ge go kṵwa̰ ge fare mbe ne dasare se ge nda ta to ɗe, ɓyare go nè ngwabe num ndwa go, num daa gwan jan ndu a̰me fare ge dḭḭl mbe ne to.
44004018	Sok mbe go, àa tol nda ge temeya ma ya, àa hoɗ num maa wa ndaa kaka go, num daa gwan jan nda fare koo hate nda fare ge Zeso dḭḭl pagal to.
44004019	Piyer mage Yohana gwan ge num janna go: Ḛ kuwa fare mbe buwal vaaya temel gale, a kwaɗa ge go i kuri Dok wa ɗoo! I wa za̰a̰ ḛ de?
44004020	Kaɗɗa ge i sḛ ma ɗe, ge kaŋ ge i kuwa mage i za̰a̰ num ma, i mbo ka jan num zum be ngwabeya.
44004021	Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge kun sariya ma mḛḛre num ol kekeŋ, guwa̰, àa n̰a num mboya. Àa be seɗ fare ge ee dṵṵl ge num pagal to, ge dape, ɓase ma ka sale Dok ge kaŋ ge kee no pe.
44004022	Ago, ndu ge nda ka kee ajab ge ne zonna pe, kaa ge del waɗe del warndà.
44004023	Guwa̰ ge àa doo Piyer mage Yohana go, àa mbo ge maa ka̰a̰m ma buwal zì yà, àa wan num fare ge ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way mage ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme ɓase ma jin̰a maa num ya ma peɗ.
44004024	Sok ge àa za̰a̰ fare mbe ma go, àa ndage maa ka̰a̰l digi wa dagre ɗu, kee kaɗeya ge Dok ta janna go: Ba ge Hateya, mo ge mo ke pḭḭ, suwa, mam ga̰a̰l nuwam, ge kaŋ ge no ge num pul zì ma peɗ,
44004025	mo ho̰ Daviɗ, mo ndu ge tèmel ge i baŋ, On̰om ge Harcal ne, ge ne ta, ee ne janna no go: «Ge dape, rusu ma wa ka iigi ta go de? Ge dape, ɓase ma wa kaɗ ge dwaɗɗa ge vḛḛne fare ma ge maa zì go de?
44004026	Gan ga̰a̰l ge suwa pagal ma nuusi ta ya ndwa mbal twam, Gan ga̰a̰l van ma vwal pe ya digi, Kee ho̰o̰l ge Bagezok Dok mage Krist, Ndu ge na taa ne.»
44004027	Ge mojo̰o̰ Daviɗ jin̰a ne go, a fareba go, gan ga̰a̰l Heroɗ mage goformo̰ Pons Pilaɗ ɓa̰a̰ pe digi ge suwal ga̰a̰l mbe no diŋ, ge nda ge gɔswal ma, ge ɓase ge Izrayel ne ma, kee ho̰o̰l ge Zeso mo ndu ge tèmel ge Harcal, ne ge mo taa ne.
44004028	Àa dee ya huy kaŋ ge mo dee nuusi num ge zḛḛ ya day ma wa, ge pool mage laa ɓyareya ge amo pagal.
44004029	Ge sego, Bagezok, ge mo kuwa num kee i ho̰o̰l no go, ho̰ mo nda ge tèmel ma pool ge oy fare ge amo be voo go fyalag.
44004030	Ngay pool ge amo zum, ndwa go nda see zonna, kaŋ ajab ma, kaŋ ngayya ma num gwan ka keeya, ge ndu ge tèmel ge amo ge Harcal, Zeso dḭḭl pe.
44004031	Guwa̰ ge num wa aa ge sok kee kaɗeya go, suwa ndaɗ ge num ko zì, On̰om ge Harcal mbo ya biri num mɔɗwag, àa gaa oy fare ge Dok ne be voo a̰me go fyalag.
44004032	Ɓase ge ho fareba ma peɗ, àa ka za̰a̰ ta ge ta buwal zì, àa kaɗ ge dul wa ge ɗu me. Ndu a̰me ɗu ge num buwal zige be ka cage a̰me ndwa ge tene pe to, ɗaŋɗe, àa ka vaa ta maa kaŋ ma ge ta buwal zì.
44004033	Nda ge temeya ma ka jan fare ge pool, ge tanna ge Bagezok Zeso ne pagal. Dok ngay kwaɗa keeya ge na ne gḛḛ ge num ta peɗ.
44004034	Ndu a̰me ɗu ge num buwal zì be hoɗege ge a̰me to. Ago num ge kaa ge gaaso ma koo ge zok ma, àa ka yaɗ num gezi,
44004035	àa gene num bware ma ya ge nda ge temeya ma ndwa se. Num sḛ ma peɗ ka vaa num ge ta buwal zige, ge hoɗegeya ge ndu ge diige ne pagal.
44004036	A mbe go no, ndu a̰me ɗu ge àa ka tol ne Jozef, ge no pe rusu ge Levi ne zì, ge too ge til ge Chipr ne go, ge nda ge temeya ma chiya ne dḭḭl Barnabas, ne pe wanna go: Van ge ca̰a̰me duul,
44004037	ne sḛ waɗme, kaa ge gaaso ɗu, yiya ne gezi no, gene ne bware ya ge nda ge temeya ma ndwa se no me.
44005001	Ɗaŋɗe, ndu son a̰me ɗu ge àa ka tol ne Ananiyas ɓanna ge na gwale Safira, àa za̰a̰ ta go maa yiya maa sok a̰me gezi.
44005002	Za̰a̰ tene ge na gwale, caɗe bware gezi nde, ge gaa, gene ne ya ge nda ge temeya ma ndwa se.
44005003	Piyer jan ne go: Ananiyas, mo daa ho̰ Saytan vin̰a ge lase mo gyana, wa ee mo kun On̰om ge Harcal hày, ɗiŋ mo wa caɗe bware ge mo gaaso ne lee ɗu gezi yà de?
44005004	Gaaso mbe amo ne, mo daa ɓyare yaɗ ne gezi to puy, mo ge pool koy ne, koo ge mo vḭḭ tene yaɗ ne gezi no puy, mo ge pool ge koy ne bware mbe ge tene pe. Ge dape, mo wa vin tene kee ano mbe no de? Mo be kun hày nda duwana ma to, mo kṵṵ hày Dok.
44005005	Sok ge Ananiyas za̰a̰ fare mbe ma go peɗ, mbeɗe, deɗ, suu. Voo ge ɓaŋlaŋ mbo ya wan nda ge kaa sok mbe go ma peɗ.
44005006	Nda ge bogol ma mbo ya, àa taa ne ge ba̰a̰ mbul ta zì, àa in ne mbo mbulla me.
44005007	Ler taa guwa̰ swày ge ne obe ne go, ne gwale waɗ-ɗa ge sok ge Piyer ma kaa no ge ne go, be wan kaŋ ge kê ge na ndwa zḛḛ pe to.
44005008	Piyer ele ne go: Jin̰a mbi gale, a ge yee mbe no pagal, ḛ yiya ḛ gaaso mbe gezi no de? Gwan ge ne vinna go: O̰o̰ a yee mbe ne.
44005009	Sok mbe go, Piyer jan ne go: Ḛ daa za̰a̰ ta gyana kun On̰om ge Bagezok ne hày de? Za̰a̰ gale, bogol ge mbo mbul mo obe ma yan ja ge zok wa go no, àa mà in mo mbo mbulla mbe go waɗme.
44005010	Ge sok mbe go waɗ, mbeɗe ge ndu ge temeya ndwa go, deɗ se, suu me. Sok ge bogol ma wuwa ge Piyer ta zì yà, àa seɗ ne suu ya, àa in ne mbo mbulla ge na obe ziya yà.
44005011	Voo ge ɓaŋlaŋ mbo ya wan ɓase ge Krist ne ma peɗ, ge nda ge ɗogle ma peɗ ge za̰a̰ fare mbe ma me.
44005012	Nda ge temeya ma ka kee kaŋ ngayya mage kaŋ ajab ma gḛḛ ge ɓase ma buwal zì. Nda ge ho fareba ma peɗ, àa ka seɗ ta kee kwateya ge pag wa ge àa tol ne pag wa ge Salomo̰ ne zì.
44005013	Ndu a̰me go ɗu ge nda ge ɗogle ma buwal zì ya be mbo ya ɓan tene ge num to. Ɗaŋɗe, ɓase ma ka dore kaŋ keeya ge num way ma gḛḛ nde.
44005014	Ɓase ma, nda soɗob ge nda zaab, ge ho fareba ge Bagezok ta jin̰al ma, ka kan-na ge wal ma pagal.
44005015	Àa ka gene nda ge ka kee tuguɗi ma ya fiiya ge saŋal mage daŋ ma go, ee ya ge vin̰a kin̰a ma go, ndwa go, sok ge Piyer mà ɗege ya kaleya, ɓyare go, ne gḭḭl kale ge nda a̰me ma pagal.
44005016	Nda ge no ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem ziya ma ka mbo ya gḛḛ-gḛḛ ge maa nda ge kee tuguɗi ma, ɓanna ge maa nda ge no ge on̰om ge sone maa zì ma, àa peɗ ka seɗ zonna me.
44005017	Ge sok mbe go, yil mbo ya waɗ ge ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe mage nda ge ne pe go ge ma zì peɗ, ndwa go saduki ma, àa ɗege digi ge ho̰o̰l ɓal.
44005018	Àa mbo ya wan nda ge temeya ma, àa kan num ge zok daŋay zì.
44005019	Sok yan ɗaal, malayka ge Bagezok ne mbo ya hage zok daŋay wa ma gezi, kan num ya zum, jan num go:
44005020	Ḛ mbo ge zok ge Dok ne zì, ḛ mbo oy fare ge hon nda ndwa ge jin̰al ne ma peɗ, ge ɓase ma ta.
44005021	Sok ge àa za̰a̰ ne go, àa ɗege aaram pe vḛḛ mbo ge zok ge Dok ne zì yà, àa ɗege hate nda fare me. Ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe ɓanna ge nda ge na pe go ge ma, tol Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge kun sariya mage ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme ɓase ge Izrayel van ma way ma se peɗ, àa seɗ ta kee kwateya ge ga̰a̰l. Àa hoɗ maa wa go, àa gene nda ge temeya ma ya ge maa ndwa se.
44005022	Sok ge asagar ge mbo tèmel ma dee yà, àa seɗ num ge zok daŋay zì to. Àa gwan-na ge maa ga̰a̰l ma ta, àa wan num fare pe go:
44005023	Sok ge i dee yà, i see zok daŋay wa ma dibiya ɓeɓereɗ, asagar ma kaɗ mḛḛya ge zok wa ma go, ɗaŋɗe, guwa̰ ge i hage zok wa ma se go, i be seɗ ndu a̰me zì ɗu to.
44005024	Sok ge ga̰a̰l ge nda ge koy zok ge Dok ne wa ma way ɓanna ge ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ma za̰a̰ fare mbe go, num pagal mbo ya banna ge fare ge see nda ge temeya ma pe. Àa ele ta go, fare mbe pe wanna gyana de.
44005025	Guwa̰, ndu a̰me mbo ya ge num ta zì jan num go: Ge sego, nda mbe ge ḛ ka̰a̰ num ge daŋay zì ma, àa hate ɓase ma ge zok ge Dok ne zì yà.
44005026	Ge sok mbe go, ga̰a̰l ge koy zok ge Dok ne wa ɓanna ge na nda ma, mbo wan nda ge temeya ma ya be kee num a̰me. Àa ka chiya ɓase ma voo, ge dape, num mà haɗ mbal maa ge njal.
44005027	Sok ge àa gene num ya ge Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge kun sariya ma ndwa se, ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe hee fare, ele num go:
44005028	I ho ḛ i wa ndaa kaka go, ḛ daa hate nda fare ge ndu mbe dḭḭl to. Ndi, ḛ gwan dasare fare mbe ya se ge Jerusalem diŋ peɗ me. Ḛ ɓyare go swàm ge ndu mbe ne kaa ge i pagal de?
44005029	Piyer mage na ka̰a̰m ge temeya gegene ma gwan ge num janna go: Nde-nde ge i gwan i pagal ge Dok pe se, ge go i gwan ne ge nda duwana ma pe se.
44005030	Zeso mbe ge ḛ pee ne ge ɔwara kaŋre ta, ḛ hṵṵ ne no, Dok ge nè baŋ ma way,
44005031	ta̰a̰ ne no, ee ne ge na tok matoson pagal no, ge mojo̰o̰ gan ga̰a̰l ge gan ga̰a̰l ma way mage Ba ge monna no go. Kê ano mbe ndwa go, Izrayel van ma see vin̰a ge seŋe ta ya se, num see poreya ge sone ge maa way ma pe me.
44005032	I jan fare ge i kuwa num ge i ndwa ma, On̰om ge Harcal ge Dok ho̰ nda ge gwan maa pagal ge na pe se ma ngay num fare mbe ma go waɗme.
44005033	Sok ge ga̰a̰l ge Yahuɗ ma way ge kun sariya ma za̰a̰ num fare mbe ma go gaw, twam mbo ya ceŋe num, àa ɓyare vin̰a ge hun num gezi.
44005034	Ɗaŋɗe, ge num buwal zì, Farisi a̰me ɗu, ge àa tol ne Gamaliyel, ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne, ge Izrayel van ma peɗ hon ne hormo, ɗege digi ge na ka̰a̰m ge ga̰a̰l ma buwal zì, hoɗ na wa go, àa n̰a nda ge temeya ma waɗ zum gale.
44005035	Guwa̰, jan num go: Ḛ Izrayel van ma, ḛ ke maam ge kaŋ ge ḛ ɓyare kee ge nda mbe ma no.
44005036	Ago, gale be kee kaal to, ndu a̰me ɗu ge àa ka tol ne Tedas, ge ka ndil tene go na ndu a̰me ge ciciliŋ ne, mbo ya muwa̰le nda guwa ge kikis ndà ge na pe go no, guwa̰, see swày no. Nda ge muwa̰le num ge na pe go ma peɗ, àa ɓasare se no, ne fare mbe tḭḭli gezi yà bàŋ no.
44005037	Ge ne guwa̰ go, ge sok ge àa ka njaŋe nda dḭḭl ndwa isi nda go, ndu a̰me ɗu ge suwal Galile ne, ge àa tol ne Yudas, mbo ya muwa̰le nda ɓase ge na pe go no. Ɗaŋɗe, ne sḛ see swày no waɗme, ne nda ge muwa̰le num ge na pe go ma peɗ ɓasare se no.
44005038	Ge sego, mbi jan go, ḛ ka̰a̰ ḛ tok digi ge nda mbe ma ta, ḛ n̰a num mboya. Kaɗɗa nuusiya mage fare keeya ge num way mbe ma no, mbo ge nda duwana ma ta, àa mbo mbo pe yà to.
44005039	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa go na mbo ge Dok ta ya, ḛ ge pool ge mbyaɗ tele num to. Ḛ ke maam, ne kaa ge ḛ ke ho̰o̰l ge kaŋ ge Dok ɓyare keeya to. Ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme Izrayel van ma vin ne fare mbe.
44005040	Àa gwan ge nda ge temeya ma ya zì, àa ee asagar ma iyal num ge calaŋ, àa hoɗ num maa wa go, num daa gwan jan nda fare ge Zeso dḭḭl to. Guwa̰, àa n̰a num mboya.
44005041	Sok ge nda ge temeya ma wuwa ge zok kun sariya zì ya zum, àa kee laa saal gḛḛ, ge Dok vḭḭ go, maa see lasageya ge dḭḭl ge Zeso ne pe.
44005042	Dwam ma pagal tatab, àa ka hate nda mage oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge Zeso ne ɗaɗag, ge zok ge Dok ne zì, ge zok ma diŋ me go, ne Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne, Ndu ge Dok taa nee ne.
44006001	Ge sok mbe go, ajo̰o̰ nda ge ame hateya ma zuli ya se, Yahuɗ ge faa wa Grek ma ɗege ge ho̰o̰l ge Yahuɗ ge faa maa wa hebre ma ta, ge dape, àa ka ndil num nda zaab ge kumu ma solom, dwam ma pagal tatab, ge sok vaa kaŋ zam go.
44006002	Nda ge temeya ge wol pɔgwa zi ma tol ɓase ge ame hateya ma ya se mɔɗwag, àa jan num go: Be kee kwaɗa go, i n̰a fare ge Dok ne be oyya ge kaŋ zam vaaya pe to.
44006003	Na̰ van ma, kee kwaɗa vare zoo go, ḛ tuwa nda ɓỳala ge ḛ buwal zi, nda ge àa dore num ma, ge andaŋ ma, ge On̰om ge Dok ne kee tèmel no ge num zì ma, i wa hon num tèmel mbe no keeya.
44006004	Keeya mbe go ɗe, i mbo foge digi, i gaa hon ta ge tèmel ge kaɗeya mage fare oyya ne pe.
44006005	Ɓase ma vin fare mbe. Àa tal Etiyen ndu ge ho fareba mbyaɗɗa tab, ge kee tèmel no ge On̰om ge Harcal pagal, ɓanna ge Filib, ge Prokor, ge Nikanor, ge Timon, ge Parmenas, ge Nicolas me, van ge suwal Antiyoch ne, ge ho fareba ge Dok ge Yahuɗ ma way ta.
44006006	Àa mbo ge num ya ge nda ge temeya ma ta. Nda ge temeya ma kee kaɗeya ge num, àa ee maa tok ma ge num pagal.
44006007	Fare ge Dok ne ka dasare se, nda ge ame hateya ma ka zuli se ge suwal Jerusalem diŋ, nda ge kee tuwaleya ma gḛḛ deɗ-ɗa hoɗ fareba me.
44006008	Etiyen, ndu ge àa ee maa tok ma ge ne pagal sok kee kaɗeya go, kaa pool gḛḛ ge kwaɗa keeya ge Dok ne ta, ka ee ne kee kaŋ ajab mage kaŋ haŋle ge ɓaŋlaŋ ma ge ɓase ma buwal zì.
44006009	Ge sok mbe go, nda a̰me ma mbo ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way zì yà, ge àa tol ne go, zok kee kwateya ge moor ge gaa ya suli ma way, àa mḛḛ piliya ge ne. Ge num buwal zì, Yahuɗ a̰me ma mbo ge suwal Siren mage Alekzandri ya, gegene ma mbo ge suwal Silisi mage sok ge Azi ne ma ya me. Àa ɗege pee ta ge ne.
44006010	Ɗaŋɗe, àa seɗ fare ge janna ge ne wa byalam go to, ge dape, ne fare janna ma kaa fare janna ge andaŋ ma ne, ka jan num ge pool ge On̰om ge Dok ne, ge ho̰ na ne ta.
44006011	Ge sok mbe go, àa lwaɗe nda a̰me ma wa, àa waɗ fare ge num zì ndwa go num mbo jan ge ɓase yà go: I za̰a̰ ne jan fare ge sone kakatag ge Moyiz mage Dok pagal.
44006012	Àa tun ɓase ma, ge ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme num mage Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma digi. Ge sok mbe go, àa mbo wan Etiyen ya, àa gene ne ya ge Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge kun sariya ma ndwa se.
44006013	Àa gene nda ge kee sayda ge hày ma ya, àa ka janna go: Ndu mbe no kaɗ ge fare janna ge sone kakatag ma ɗaɗag ge zok ge Dok ne ge harcal mage eeya ge Moyiz ne ma pagal.
44006014	Ago, i za̰a̰ ne wa janna go: Zeso ge suwal Nazareɗ ne, mbo gul zok ge Dok ne mbe no se, mbo eya kaŋ keeya ge nè baŋ ma way ge Moyiz n̰a nè num ma waɗme.
44006015	Nda ge kaa ge zok yuwaleya zì ma peɗ, àa ee ndwa ya ge Etiyen ta, àa kuwa ne diir eyaya ge mojo̰o̰ malayka go.
44007001	Sok mbe go, ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe ele Etiyen go: Fare ge àa ee num ge mo pagal mbe ma no, àa fare ge fareba ma ne de?
44007002	Etiyen hee, jan go: «Mbi na̰ van mage mbi ba ma! Ḛ za̰a̰ mbi gale, Dok ge pateya din̰a tene dee wal ge nè baŋ Abraham ta, sok ge ne sḛ wa ya gale kàɗɗa ge suwa Mezopotami go, zḛḛ ge go ne zwagre tene mbo ya kàɗɗa ge suwa ge Haran ne go.
44007003	Jin̰a ne no go: “N̰a mo rusu mage mo suwa, ɗege mbo zum, mo mbo ge suwa ge mbi mbo ngay mo ne ya yà.”
44007004	Sok mbe go, waɗ zum ge suwa ge Kalde ma way go, mbo ya kàɗɗa ge suwal Haran diŋ. Guwa̰ swày ge ne ba ne go, Dok ee ne ɔwabe zum no, ɗeme ne ya ge suwa ge ḛ kaa no ne pagal màno go no.
44007005	Dok be hon ne sok a̰me joo ge suwa mbe go to, koo sok a̰me van go fyalag ge ne kaɗ ne go to, ɗaŋɗe, kee wa tii ndwa hon ne suwa mbe no ɓanna ge ne rusu ma, ge ne guwa̰ go. Ge zaman mbe go Abraham wa ya be van.
44007006	Dok gwan jan ne go: “Kuwa go mo pe rusu mbo kaɗ mbày ge suwa ge ɗogle yà, àa kaɗ moor ge ne diŋ, àa kee num yal ɗiŋ del kikis ndà.”
44007007	Ɗaŋɗe, gwan jan ne go, mbi mbo kun sariya ge pe rusu ge ɗogle mbe ge kee num moor ya pagal, guwa̰, mbi mbo gwan ge num ya ge suwa mbe no go, àa mbo gaa kee tèmel hon mbi ge sok mbe no go me.
44007008	Guwa̰, sok vwal wa tii ge Abraham go, Dok jan ne go, bḛḛ vyanna no mbo kaɗ kaŋ ngayya ne, ge nè ge mo ɓanna ge mo rusu ma buwal zì. Abraham tol Isak, vyan ne bḛḛ ge dwam wa gezi zi go, Isak tol Jakob, kee ge ne mbe go me. Jakob mbo ya kee ge na van ge son ge wol pɔgwa zi ge nè baŋ ma go mbe waɗme.
44007009	« Jakob van ma, ka kee maa ba van Jozef yil, àa yiya ne gezi ge nda ge Ejypt ma tok go no, gaa mbo kee num moor no. Ɗaŋɗe, Dok kaa dagre ge ne,
44007010	ndage ne ge ne yal ma zì no peɗ, ho̰ ne andaŋ no, ee ne fare kaɗ kwaɗa ge Farawo̰, gan ga̰a̰l ge Ejypt ne ndwa zi no, ne sḛ mbo ya ee ne goformo̰ ge suwa Ejypt pagal go no, ge na zok gan pagal no waɗme.
44007011	Guwa̰, camal baktar mbo ya deɗ ge suwa Ejypt mage suwa Kana pagal peɗ, ee nda za̰a̰ yal gḛḛ me. A̰me zam be kaɗ go karag ge nè baŋ ma pe to.
44007012	Sok ge Jakob za̰a̰ go swa geme go ge Ejypt yà, ee pe teme na van ge nè baŋ ma mbo ge sok mbe yà no.
44007013	Sok ge teme num ge ndwa zi gwan mbo Ejypt, Jozef mbo ya ngay tene ge num ta. A ge sok mbe go, Farawo̰ ee pe kuwa Jozef pe rusu no.
44007014	Guwa̰, Jozef doo tèmel mbo jan na ba Jakob no go, ne mbo ya na ta ɓanna ge na zok mɔɗwag. Ɓase ge num way kaa ge nda warɓỳala pɔgwa nuwan̰.
44007015	A go mbe no, Jakob mbo ya ge Ejypt go no. Guwa̰, gaa kàɗɗa ge sok mbe go no, wa̰a̰ suu no, ne van ge nè baŋ ma mbo ya suuya ge sok mbe go no waɗme.
44007016	Àa mbo ya gene num duul swày mbo suwal Sichem yà no. Àa mbo mbul num ge sok mbul ta ge Abraham dee yiya ne ge bware saal ge Hamor van ma tok go no.
44007017	«Sok ge sok gaa guwa ge go Dok huy na wa tii ge na dee kee Abraham ne wa, Izrayel pe rusu zuli ya se lalan̰ ge Ejypt suwa pagal.
44007018	Dee ya no go, gan ga̰a̰l ge kuwa Jozef to, mbo ya kee muluk ge suwa Ejypt pagal.
44007019	See zwam a̰me ndwa lasage nè baŋ ma no, ke num ge na tok go no liliɗ, ee num ge pool dol maa van ge soɗob ge kaare ma gezi no, ndwa go num suu gezi.
44007020	A ge sok mbe go, àa mbo ya tol Moyiz no, kaa van kaare ge siŋli ge Dok laa wa̰a̰ ne, ge na na̰ tok go. Àa way ne ge maa tok go no ɗiŋ saba taa.
44007021	Guwa̰ ge àa mbo way ne gezi yà, Farawo̰ van ge gwale, mbeɗe ne ya no, gaa wal ne no ge na van go.
44007022	Moyiz see hateya ge ɗugul ge nda ge Ejypt ma mbiya kuwa num ma peɗ, kaa pool ge fare janna mage tèmel keeya ma zì peɗ me.»
44007023	«Sok ge Moyiz ke del warndà, vḭḭ tene no go, na mbo ndil na na̰ van Izrayel ma.
44007024	Sok ge dee ge num ta yà, kuwa ndu ge Ejypt ne a̰me wa ya ka kee ne sele yal, ɗege ne pagal no, hṵṵ ne ndwa gele na sele mbe no.
44007025	Ne sḛ kaa ge dwaɗɗa go, sok kee ano mbe no go, na na̰ van ma kuwa go, Dok mbo mon maa ge na ta. Ɗaŋɗe, àa be deɗ-ɗa wan fare mbe pe to.
44007026	Sok yan kin̰are, gwan luwaɗeya ge num ta, seɗ a̰me ma zì, àa wa ya ka iyal ta. Sok ɓyare gene halas ya num buwal zì go, jan num go: “Ḛ na̰ van me, ḛ kee ḛ na̰ van mbe yal go ge dape de?”
44007027	Ɗaŋɗe, ge ka kee na kon yal gace ne go: “A huɗi ee mo ga̰a̰l mage ndu ge kun sariya ne ge i pagal de?
44007028	Mo ɓyare hun mbi ge mojo̰o̰ mo dana hṵṵ ndu ge Ejypt go de?”
44007029	Sok ge Moyiz za̰a̰ fare mbe go, chiya, gaa mbo kàɗɗa ge suwa ge Madin̰a ne yà. Ge sok mbe yà, tol van soɗob ma zi.
44007030	«Guwa̰ ge kee ta del warndà ge babur pul go, dwam a̰me go ɗu, mbo ya guwa ge njal Sinay, “ malayka mbo ya dyan tene ge ne ta, ge kore za̰a̰l ge ka ɗaabe ol sooya zì.”
44007031	Sok ndil kaŋ mbe go, Moyiz mbo ya kee ajab ge kaŋ mbe ge kee no pe, ka ndaa tene ya ge ne ta zì, ndwa go na kuwa ne hetel me. Za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l ge Bagezok ne janna go:
44007032	“A mbi, Dok ge mo baŋ ma way ne, Dok ge Abraham ne, ge Isak ne, ge Jakob ne me.” Voo mbo ya wan ne, gaa ndaɗɗa, seɗ pool ge ndil ne daa to.
44007033	Ge sok mbe go, Bagezok jan ne go: “Fwage mo tyako ma gezi, ago sok ge mo mḛḛ no ne go, a suwa ge harcal ne.”
44007034	Mbi kuwa yal ge mbi nda ma za̰a̰ ne no ge Ejypt diŋ ya go, sun ta ge num way ma deɗ ja ɗiŋ ge mbi tɔgwa zì, a ge pe, mbi mbo ya se ndwa mon num no: “Ge sego, mbo ya, mbi wa teme mo mbo Ejypt.” »
44007035	Moyiz mbe, ge ne ka̰a̰m ma dee kuri ne, sok jan ne go go: «A huɗi ee mo ga̰a̰l mage ndu ge kun sariya ge i pagal ne de? Dok gwan teme ya ne, ge mojo̰o̰ ga̰a̰l mage ndu ge zuuya go, ge pool ge malayka ge Bagezok ne, ge din̰a tene ge ne ta, ge kore za̰a̰l zì.
44007036	A ne sḛ mbe ee num waɗ zum ne, sok kee kaŋ ngayya mage kaŋ haŋle ma ge suwa Ejypt go, ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam ge kàal pul se, ge babur pul go ɗiŋ del warndà.
44007037	A ne sḛ mbe ge dee jin̰a Izrayel van ma ne go: “Dok mbo ndage ndu a̰me ɗu ge zwagre na wa ge ḛ buwal zì, dinna ge mbi go.”
44007038	Sok ge ɓase ma ka kwateya ge babur pul go, a ne sḛ mbe iya ge kaa ne ge malayka ge ka jan ne fare ge njal Sinay pagal digi ya mage nè baŋ ma buwal zì. A ne sḛ ge ka ame fare janna ge no ge ndwa ɗiŋ ne ge Dok ta ya, ndwa zwagre nè num.
44007039	«Ɗaŋɗe, nè baŋ ma be vin ne fare ge maa sḛ zì to, àa kuri ne gezi no, num dul wa gwan ee ge kaŋ ge maa ka kee num ge Ejypt ya ma pagal.
44007040	Àa mbo ya ge Aaro̰ ta, àa jin̰a ne no go: “Ɗeere i kaŋ a̰me ma dinna ge dok ma go, ge num wa ka ɗeme i ge i sok mboya ma go, ago Moyiz mbe ge ɔwabe i ge suwa ge Ejypt ne ya zum, i wan fare ge seɗ ne ya yà pe to.”
44007041	Ge sok mbe go, àa ɗeere ta siim nday van a̰me ɗu, àa kee ne tuwaleya. Àa mbo ya kee laa saal gḛḛ, ge kaŋ ge maa sḛ ma kê ne ge maa tok zì pe.
44007042	Ɗaŋɗe, Dok ɔwabe tene gezi ge num ta no, suwa num ge siim keeya ta no, àa gaa uware kaŋ dolla ge pḭḭ zige ma no dinna ge a njaŋe no ge maktub ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma way zì go: “ Izrayel van ma! Sok ge ḛ ka vyan swàm mage Kee tuwaleya ge kaŋ kogor ma ge babur pul go, Del warndà no, ḛ ka kee num hon mbi de?
44007043	Ago ḛ ka teŋre ta ge gur ge dok Molok ne Mage gùwa̰ ge dok Refan ne ma inna. Ḛ ka uware kaŋ ge ḛ sḛ ma ke num ge ḛ tok zì ma. Mbi mbo swaɗ ḛ, àa gaa ɔwabe ḛ mbo moor, Ge sok ge kaal waɗe Babilon ma yà.”
44007044	«Ge babur pul go, nè baŋ ma ka in gur ge sayda ne ge ka ngayya go, Dok dagre ge num. Àa nuusi ne dinna ge Dok ho Moyiz na wa ge ne pe go.
44007045	Guwa̰, nè baŋ ma n̰a gur hon maa van ma ne no, num sḛ ma gaa zwagre ta ge ne inna no. Sok ge Jozuwe ka ɗeme num mbo mbal twam go, àa ame suwa ge Dok kê wa tii hon num ne no, ge pe rusu ge ɗogle ge Dok yin̰a num ge num ndwa zḛḛ ma tok go no. Gur mbe gaa ge num buwal zì no ɗiŋ deɗ-ɗa zaman ge Daviɗ ne go.
44007046	Daviɗ see kuwa a̰se ge Dok ta, kaɗe ne no go, ne ho̰ na vin̰a, na sḭḭ ne ge Dok ge Jakob ne zok.
44007047	Go no puy ɗe, a ne van Salomo̰ gaa sin nee ne.
44007048	Ḛ kuwa kuwa go, Dok ge no pḭḭ ma zì yà, kaɗ ge zok ge nda duwana ma sin num ge maa tok ma zì to, dinna ge maktub ge ndu ge zwagre Dok wa|Nda ge zwagre Dok wa jan ne no go:
44007049	Bagezok Dok jan go: “ Pḭḭ mbi sok kàɗɗa ge kee muluk ne, Suwa me, a ge mbi kaŋ ee ko bàŋ go. Ḛ sin mbi mà ma̰ zok ge wa mbo ame mbi zì, Koo ḛ nuusi mbi mà ma̰ sok ge wa mbo mbyaɗ mbi kàɗɗa de?
44007050	A mbi sḛ kê kaŋ mbe ma ne ge mbi tok zì to wa?”
44007051	«Etiyen gwan ge num janna go: Ḛ nda ge pagal ndaa ma, ge dul wa deŋel ma, ge kee ta ya gisil be za̰a̰ Dok wa ma! Ḛ mḛḛ piliya ɗaɗag ge On̰om ge Harcal, ḛ sḛ ma hini to me no, ḛ baŋ ma kaɗ hini to me.
44007052	Nda ge ka zwagre Dok wa ma, a ge diige see njon̰n̰a to ne, ge ḛ baŋ ma ta de? Koo nda ge ka wuwage mboya ge ndu ge temel ne ya ma, ḛ baŋ ma hṵṵ num gezi no. Ge sego, sok ge ndu ge temel mbo ya, ḛ ee fare ge ne pagal no, ḛ hṵṵ ne gezi no waɗme.
44007053	O̰o̰ ago ɓa! Ḛ nda ge ame eeya ge Dok ne ma ne, ge malayka ma tok go, ɗaŋɗe, ḛ be gwan ḛ pagal ge eeya mbe ma pe se to.»
44007054	Sok ge Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge kun sariya ma za̰a̰ fare mbe ma go, àa mbo ya ceŋe ge twam, àa ka ɔwabe maa wa ge Etiyen pagal.
44007055	Ɗaŋɗe, On̰om ge Harcal mbo ya huy ne, sok ndil na ndwa pḭḭ digi go, kuwa Dok seeya kɔn̰al paɗag, Zeso mḛḛya ge ne tok matoson pagal me.
44007056	Ge sok mbe go, ndage na ka̰a̰l digi, jan num go: Ḛ ndi, pḭḭ ma hage ta ya gezi no, mbi kuwa Van ge Ndu ne ya mḛḛya ge Dok tok matoson pagal no.
44007057	Ge sok mbe go, àa suwa̰le ya pyanna digi ge Etiyen pagal, àa dibi maa tɔgwa ma digi, àa daa gwan za̰a̰ ne to. Àa dol ɓateya ya mɔɗwag ge ne pagal.
44007058	Àa wan ne, àa mbo ge ne ge suwal ga̰a̰l guwa̰ zum yà, àa mbal ne ge njal ɗiŋ seɗ swày wa go. Nda ge mbaa ne ma fwage maa ba̰a̰ ga̰a̰l ma koyya ge van bogol ge àa tol ne Sol tok go.
44007059	Sok mbal ne ge njal go, ne sḛ ka kee kaɗeya go: Bagezok Zeso, he on̰om ge ambi.
44007060	Guwa̰ go, guu na ko se, oy ge ka̰a̰l ndaal go: Bagezok, isi sone mbe ge num pagal to! Sok ge ne wa aa go, suu.
44008001	Sol vḭḭ hunna ge Etiyen nee ne. A ge dwam mbe go gaw, àa ɗege njon̰ ɓase ge Krist ne ge Jerusalem diŋ-ge ma gḛḛ no. Ɓase ge Krist ne mbe ma peɗ mbo ya ɓasare se no ge Jude mage Samari sok ma go sasar, nda ge temeya ma gaa ne ɗeŋew ge suwal diŋ.
44008002	Yahuɗ ge no ge voo ge Dok ne ge maa zì ma mbul Etiyen, àa kee ne kiimi gḛḛ me.
44008003	Ge sok mbe go, Sol ka ɓyare vin̰a ge burmi ɓase ge Krist ne ma gezi, ka mbo zok wa ge zok wa, wan nda soɗob mage nda zaab mbe ma, mbo kan num ge daŋay zì.
44008004	Num mbe ge ho fareba ge ɓasare se ma, àa ka mbo ge sok ma go peɗ oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge Zeso ne.
44008005	Filib sḛ me, mbo ge suwal ga̰a̰l a̰me ɗu ge Samari ne diŋ, jan num fare ge Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne, Ndu ge Dok taa nee ne.
44008006	Ɓase ma ee maa dwaɗɗa ma jwab za̰a̰ fare ge ne ka jan maa num ma, àa ka kuwa kaŋ ajab ge ne kee num ma me.
44008007	Ago nda a̰me ma gḛḛ, ge kaa ge on̰om ge sone ma, on̰om mbe ma, sok ndage zum go, àa ka ee num poɗ luuluu. Nda ge looɗeya mage nda ge giɗi ma gḛḛ, àa seɗ zonna waɗme.
44008008	Nda ge suwal ga̰a̰l mbe diŋ ma mbo ya kee laa saal gḛḛ.
44008009	Zḛḛ ge go Filib dee ge suwal ga̰a̰l Samari mbe diŋ yà, ndu a̰me ɗu ge àa ka tol ne Simo̰, kaa ndu ge ka kee mbole ne ge suwal mbe diŋ, ne kaŋ keeya mbe ma ka ee pe rusu ge suwal mbe diŋ-ge ma kee ajab. Go mbe no, ka ndil tene ndu a̰me ge ciciliŋ.
44008010	Nda peɗ, ge jiyale se ɗiŋ mbo ga̰a̰l digi, àa ee maa dwaɗɗa ma jwab za̰a̰ ne, àa ka janna go: Ndu mbe no, a ge pool ge Dok ne, ndwa go pool ge waɗe-waɗe.
44008011	Ajo̰o̰ na kee ja kaal swag, sok ee nda kee ajab ge na kaŋ keeya ge mbole mbe ma ta ɗe, a ge pe, nda ka ee dwaɗɗa jwab za̰a̰ ne no.
44008012	Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge àa za̰a̰ fare janna ge Filib ne ma go, àa hoɗ fareba, sok oy num Fare ge Kwaɗa ge Zeso Krist ne mage fare ge muluk ge Dok ne go, nda soɗob mage nda zaab mbo ya kee baptem.
44008013	Simo̰ sḛ waɗme, mbo ya hoɗ fareba, àa kee ne baptem. Sok ndil kaŋ ajab mage kaŋ haŋle ge Filib ka kee num ma go, kee ajab, daa gwan n̰a ne pe to.
44008014	Sok ge nda ge temeya ge suwal Jerusalem diŋ-ge ma za̰a̰ go, nda ge suwal Samari diŋ-ge ma ame fare ge Dok ne ya go, àa teme Piyer mage Yohana mbo ge num ta yà.
44008015	Sok ge àa dee yà, àa kee kaɗeya ge nda ge ho fareba ma pe, ndwa go num see On̰om ge Harcal .
44008016	Num sḛ mbe ge ho fareba ma mɔɗwag be seɗ On̰om ge Harcal to, ge dape, àa kee num baptem ɗeŋew ge dḭḭl ge Bagezok Zeso ne.
44008017	Ge sok mbe go, Piyer mage Yohana ee maa tok ma ge num pagal sok kee kaɗeya go, àa mbo ya seɗ On̰om ge Harcal.
44008018	Sok ge Simo̰ kuwa go, nda ame On̰om ge Harcal mbe ge tok eeya ge nda ge temeya ma way ma ta, gene num bware ya,
44008019	jan num go: Ɓyare go, mbi see pool mbe ge ḛ ta waɗme, ndwa go ndu ge mbi mbo ee mbi tok ma ya ge ne pagal sok kee kaɗeya go, ne see On̰om ge Harcal.
44008020	Ɗaŋɗe, Piyer gwan ge ne janna go: Ajo̰o̰ mo ee mo pagal zì go, nda seɗ bobo ge Dok ne ge bware ta, n̰a ḛ ge mo bware vḛḛne gezi.
44008021	Mo vaaya a̰me koo mo mam ndwa go fyalag ge fare mbe zì to, ago mo dul wa temel ge Dok ndwa se to.
44008022	Kuwa mo sone ma, mo seŋe ya se, kaɗɗa vin̰a go, mo kaɗe Bagezok ne pore mo, ge dwaɗɗa ge sone ge no mo dul wa zì pe,
44008023	ago mbi kuwa kuwa go, mo laa zwala babag, mo kaɗ moor ge sone keeya ne me.
44008024	Simo̰ gwan jan Piyer mage Yohana go: Ḛ sḛ ma kee kaɗeya ne ge Bagezok ta ge mbi pe. Ne kaa ge fare ge ḛ jin̰a ne mbe no, ne dee mbi pagal to.
44008025	Guwa̰ ge àa kee sayda mage oy fare ge Bagezok ne go ge suwal Samari diŋ, àa gwan-na ge suwal Jerusalem diŋ. Sok gwanna ge num way go, àa ka oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ya ge maa ndwa zḛḛ, ge suwal van ge jiyale ge Samari ne ma diŋ.
44008026	Malayka ge Bagezok ne mbo ya ge Filib ta jan ne go: Ɗege digi, mo mbo ndwa ham, ge babur pul yà, mo hee vin̰a ge ɗege ge suwal Jerusalem go mbo suwal Gaza.
44008027	Ɗege, mbo ge sok mbe yà, seɗ ndu a̰me ɗu ge suwa Etiyopi ne. Ne sḛ ajibaŋ ne, ndu ga̰a̰l ge kee tèmel koy bware, ge gan ga̰a̰l ge ndu gwale ge àa tol ne Kandas ge suwa Etiyopi ne. Mbo ya ge suwal Jerusalem diŋ ndwa uware Dok.
44008028	Sok gwan mbo dii go, kaa ge na pus go, ka isi maktub ge ndu ge zwagre Dok wa|Nda ge zwagre Dok wa Ezay ne.
44008029	On̰om jan Filib go: Guwa̰ tene ge ne ta zì, mo ɓan mboya dagre ge ne.
44008030	Filib chiya ya ne ta zì, ka za̰a̰ ne isi maktub ge ndu ge zwagre Dok wa Ezay ne. Jan ne go: Mo wan kaŋ ge mo isi ne pe wan de?
44008031	Gwan ge ne janna go: Mbi mà mbyaɗ wan ne pe gyana, kaɗɗa ndu be wan mbi ne pe ne to. Jan Filib go: Ndee ya kaɗ ge mbi ziya go.
44008032	Njaŋeya ge Dok ne pul ge ka isi ne, a sok ge jan go: «Àa ka gene ne dinna ge àa gene tame Mbo ge sok ge àa hun kaŋ kogor ma ne yà go, Ge mojo̰o̰ ge tame van ge fii wa daal, Ge ndu ge koɗ na susu tok go go, ago be fyal to me.
44008033	Ge pagal gwanna se lɔlɔgwaɗ ge ne ne ta puy, Àa be ndil ne ndu ge temel sok mbe zì to, A huɗi ne, ge wa mbo wan laa pisil Ge nda ge ne doŋ pe ma way ne de? Ago àa burmi kàɗɗa ge ne ne ge suwa pagal go ge ya gezi.»
44008034	Ajibaŋ kaɗe Filib go: Mbi kaɗe mo kaɗe, wa̰a̰ mbi ne pe gale, fare ge ndu ge zwagre Dok wa|Nda ge zwagre Dok wa jan ne no, jan ne ge tene pe koo ge ndu ge ɗogle pe de?
44008035	Ge sok mbe go, Njaŋeya ge Dok ne pul ge ne isi ne ta, Filib ee pe wuwage ne Fare ge Kwaɗa ge Zeso ne no.
44008036	Ge sok mboya go, àa deɗ-ɗa ge mam a̰me wa go. Ajibaŋ jan ne go! O̰o̰ mam no, a ma̰ kaŋ tele ne go, àa kê mbi baptem to de?
44008037	[Filib jan ne go: Kaɗɗa mo hoɗ fareba ya ge dul wa ɗu, a̰me ge tele mo to. Ajibaŋ jan ne go, mbi hoɗ fareba ya go, Zeso Krist ne Dok Van ne.]
44008038	Ge sok mbe go gaw, ajibaŋ hoɗ na wa go, àa yabe pus se. Àa kan maa ko ya se jwàg, àa mbo mam se yà, Filib kee ne baptem.
44008039	Sok ge àa ndee ge mam se ya, On̰om ge Bagezok ne fwaɗ Filib sok, ajibaŋ daa gwan kuwa sok ge ne mbo go to, guwa̰, gaa mboya ge laa saal fafan̰.
44008040	Filib sḛ tan tene deɗ ja ge suwal Azoɗ diŋ, ge sok mbe go, hee vin̰a mbo suwal Sezare. Ge ne sok mboya go, ka oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge na ndwa zḛḛ ge suwal ga̰a̰l ge diige diŋ peɗ, ɗiŋ deɗ ge ne yà.
44009001	Ajo̰o̰, ge sok mbe ya day, Sol kaa ge dwaɗɗa ge sone ge na zì, ge kee nda ge ame hateya ge Bagezok ne ma yal mage hun num, dwam a̰me go ɗu, mbo ge ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe ta,
44009002	ele ne go, ne ho̰ na lawayta, ge hon na vin̰a mbo ge ga̰a̰l ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way, ge no suwal ga̰a̰l Damas diŋ-ge ma ta, ndwa go, sok ge na seɗ nda soɗob koo nda zaab ge hee ko pul ge Bagezok ne ma, na wa̰a̰ num, na vuwa num, na wa gene num ya ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ.
44009003	Sok ge ame na lawayta mbe go, zuɗ mbo suwal ga̰a̰l Damas. Sok ge yin̰a ya guwa ge ne, tugcug, kɔn̰al a̰me see ge pḭḭ zì ya ge ne pagal ge mam see go, mbo ya vee ne se.
44009004	Deɗ suwa se, za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l a̰me janna go: Sol, Sol ge dape mo wa ka kee mbi yal go de?
44009005	Ele ne go: Bagezok-goo a mo huɗi ne de? Bagezok gwan ge ne janna go: A mbi Zeso ge mo kee ne yal ne: [Mo mbo za̰a̰ tene yal sok n̰aɗe ɔwara wa zwabal ge mo ko go. Ge sok mbe go voo wan ne, ɗege ndaɗɗa, jan ne go: Bagezok, mo sḛ ɓyare go, mbi kee da de? Sok mbe go Bagezok jan ne go]:
44009006	Ɗege digi, mbo ge suwal ga̰a̰l diŋ, ge sok mbe yà, àa mà mbo jan mo kaŋ ge mo mbiya kee ne.
44009007	Ne ka̰a̰m ge àa ge num mbo ya dagre ma, àa mḛḛ se, àa zane wa daal cub, àa kee ajab. Àa ka za̰a̰ ndu a̰me ka̰a̰l faaya, ɗaŋɗe, àa kuwa ndu mbe sḛ to.
44009008	Sol ɗege digi ge suwa se, kan na ndwa zum ndil sok, ɗaŋɗe, ne ndwa kaɗ laaya. Àa wan ne tok, àa ɗeme ne mbo suwal ga̰a̰l Damas diŋ yà.
44009009	Gaa kàɗɗa dàma ɗiŋ dwam taa, zam kaŋ to, njoɗ a̰me to me.
44009010	Ago, ndu ge ame hateya a̰me ɗu ge àa tol ne Ananiyas wa ya ge suwal ga̰a̰l Damas mbe diŋ. Bagezok dyan tene ge ne ta, ge fare taaya zì, tol ne go: Ananiyas! Ne sḛ gwan ge ne vinna go: Mbi no, Bagezok!
44009011	Bagezok jan ne go: Ɗege digi, mo mbo ge vin̰a ge àa tol ne go, vin̰a ge temel yà, mo mbo ge zok ge Yudas ne diŋ, mo ele ndu a̰me ge suwal ga̰a̰l Tars ne ge àa tol ne Sol pe.
44009012	Ago, ne sḛ ge sok kee kaɗeya go, see fare taaya no. Ge ne fare taaya mbe zì, kuwa ndu a̰me ge àa tol ne Ananiyas waɗ-ɗa ge na pagal zì no, ka ee na tok ma ge ne pagal, ndwa go ne ndwa ma tin̰a.
44009013	Ananiyas gwan ge ne janna go: Bagezok, mbi za̰a̰ nda ya gḛḛ faa fare ge ndu mbe ne, ge yal ge a kee nda ge ho fareba mo ta ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ-ge ma.
44009014	Mbo ya go go bàŋ to, ago ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ma ho̰ ne pool ya ne go, ne wa̰a̰ nda ge ho fareba ge no suwal Damas diŋ-ge ma peɗ.
44009015	Ɗaŋɗe, Bagezok jan ne go: Mbo, ago ndu mbe kaŋ tèmel ge mbi taa nee ne, ndwa go ne mbo oy fare ge ambi ge rusu ge ɗogle ma ta peɗ, ge num ga̰a̰l ma ta, ge Izrayel van ma ta me.
44009016	Mbi mbo ngay ne yal ge ne sḛ mbo njoɗ num ya ma peɗ ge mbi pe.
44009017	Ananiyas ɗege mbo, sok ge dee ge Sol ta diŋ yà, ee na tok ma ge ne pagal jan ne go: Sol, mbi na̰ van, Bagezok Zeso ge din̰a tene ge mo ta, ge vin̰a mbo Damas go, teme mbi ya ne ge mo ta, ndwa go mo ndwa ne tin̰a gezi, mo kuwa sok, mo see On̰om ge Harcal mbyaɗɗa tab me.
44009018	Ge sok mbe go waɗ, kaŋ a̰me ma, dinna ge sini ɔswa ma go fwage ge Sol ndwa zì ya, ge sok mbe go, ee pe kuwa sok. Ɗege digi, àa kee ne baptem.
44009019	Guwa̰, zam kaŋ zam, seɗ pool me. Sol gaa kàɗɗa ge Damas diŋ, dwam ma kwaɗa lag ge nda ge ame hateya ma ta.
44009020	Ge sok mbe go gaw, ɗege oy fare ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way ma zì, ka janna go: Zeso ne Dok Van ne.
44009021	Nda peɗ ge ka za̰a̰ ne ma ka kee ajab, àa ka janna go: A be ndu ge ka kee nda ge ka tol dḭḭl mbe ma yal ne ge suwal Jerusalem diŋ to de? Daa be mbo ya ndwa wan num, gene num mbo hon ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ma to de?
44009022	Ge sok mbe go, Sol ka jan fare ndaa kaka ndwa ngayya go: Zeso ne Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne, Ndu ge Dok taa nee ne, Yahuɗ ge Damas diŋ-ge ma seɗ sok ge ee maa ko to.
44009023	Dwam ma guwa̰ kaal nde, Yahuɗ ma tol ta kwateya ge ne fare pe, àa vin ta go maa hṵṵ ne gezi.
44009024	Ɗaŋɗe, num fare mbe mbo ya ɓul ge Sol tɔgwa zì. Àa za̰a̰ ta koy gulum ga̰a̰l wa ge waɗɗa ge suwal ne ma, ɗaal mage gyala ndwa ban ne gezi.
44009025	Ge ɗaal a̰me zì ɗu, Sol nda ge ame hateya ma ee ne ge gwal ga̰a̰l a̰me zì, àa siri ne ge gulum pagal digi ya se, ge ne lee ge zum-ge pe yà.
44009026	Sok ge Sol dee ya ge Jerusalem diŋ, ɓyare vin̰a ge go na ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge nda ge ame hateya ge Zeso Krist ne ma, ɗaŋɗe, num sḛ ma peɗ ka chiya ne voo, àa be hoɗ fareba go ne seŋe ya ndu ge ame hateya dinna ge maa sḛ ma go to.
44009027	Ge sok mbe go, Barnabas wan ne, gene ne mbo ge Zeso nda ge temeya ma ta yà. Wan num fare pe ge Bagezok din̰a tene ge ne ta, sok mbo suwal Damas go, ge fare ge Bagezok jin̰a ne ma, ge pool ge ne sḛ see ne ndwa oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge Zeso dḭḭl ne ge suwal ga̰a̰l mbe diŋ.
44009028	Ge sok mbe ya day, Sol mage num gaa kee tèmel dagre, àa ka waɗ zum mage gwan-na ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ, ge fare ge Bagezok Zeso dḭḭl ne oyya be voo.
44009029	Ne sḛ ka jan Yahuɗ ge mbo ge suwa ge Grek ma way ya ma Fare ge Kwaɗa ge Zeso ne waɗme, àa ge num ka pee ta fare gḛḛ, num sḛ ma ka ɓyare vin̰a ge ban ne gezi.
44009030	Sok ge na̰ van ge ho fareba ma za̰a̰ fare mbe go, àa ɗeme ne mbo suwal Sezare yà, àa ee ne ge baaburi ge mam se ge go, mbo ge suwal Tars yà.
44009031	Guwa̰, ɓase ge Krist ne ge no suwa Jude go ma, ge Galile go ma, ge Samari go ma dul wa mbo ya ee se. Àa ka don zḛḛ ge hoɗ fareba zì, àa ka gwan maa pagal ge Bagezok pe se, àa ka zuli se ge mbaaya ge On̰om ge Harcal ne ta.
44009032	Ajo̰o̰, Piyer ka luwaɗe ndil nda ge ho fareba ge no ge suwa ge Jude ne go ma peɗ, dwam a̰me go ɗu, deɗ-ɗa ge num ge suwal Lida diŋ-ge ma ta.
44009033	Mbo ya seɗ ndu ge looɗeya a̰me ɗu ge àa tol ne Ene, fiiya ge saŋal pul go. Ne sḛ kee tuguɗi ya del wa gezi zi.
44009034	Piyer tol ne Ene, jan ne go: Zeso Krist zon mo ya go! Ɗege digi, mo pwage mo saŋal. Ne sḛ za̰a̰me digi avun cab me.
44009035	Nda ge kaa ge suwal Lida diŋ mage ful pul ge Charon ne go ma peɗ, àa kuwa Ene, àa seŋe ta ya se ge Bagezok ta.
44009036	Ndu gwale a̰me ɗu ge suwal Yafa diŋ-ge, kaa ndu ge ame hateya ne, àa ka tol ne ge wa hebre go Tabita, ne wa Grek Dorkas, ndwa go Maaɗe. Ka kee tèmel ge kwaɗa ma gḛḛ, ka mbaa nda ge hoɗegeya ma gḛḛ me.
44009037	Ge dwam mbe ma zì, tuguɗi wan ne, suu. Guwa̰, àa son ne gezi, àa mbo ee ne ge zok ge no kon pagal digi ya-ge zì.
44009038	Ajo̰o̰ suwal Lida mage suwal Yafa buwal kaal to, nda ge ame hateya ma za̰a̰ go Piyer go ge suwal Lida diŋ. Àa teme nda zi mbo ge ne ta yà, ndwa kaɗe ne go, ne ha tene ya avun cab, mboya ge maa ta.
44009039	Sok ge àa mbo ya jan Piyer tèmel mbe, ne sḛ ɗege digi mbo ɓanna ge num gaw. Sok ge àa dee ya, àa ɗeme ne mbo ge zok ge kon pagal digi yà. Nda ge kumu ma peɗ, àa mbo ya ge ne ta zì ge fiyaso, àa ka ngay ne maa rob mage ba̰a̰ ge ɗogle ge Dorkas zô maa num ma, sok ge ne sḛ gale wa ya ge na ndwa.
44009040	Ge sok mbe go, Piyer yan nda zum peɗ, guu na ko se kee kaɗeya. Guwa̰, seŋe tene ge duul swày ta, jan go: Tabita ɗege digi, ge sok mbe go, hage na ndwa gezi, kuwa Piyer, ɗege digi kàɗɗa ge na pe.
44009041	Tare ne na tok, wan ne digi mḛḛya, guwa̰, tol nda ge ho fareba mage nda zaab ge kumu ma ya, ngay num ne ge na ndwa.
44009042	Fare mbe deɗ ge nda ge Yafa ma ta peɗ, ee nda gḛḛ hoɗ fareba ge Bagezok ta me.
44009043	Piyer kee dwam ma kaal swag ge Yafa diŋ, ge ndu a̰me ɗu ge àa tol ne Simo̰, ndu ge wan gwabal kwalte diŋ.
44010001	Ndu a̰me ɗu, ge àa ka tol ne Korney, kaa ge suwal Sezare diŋ. Ne sḛ kaa ga̰a̰l ge asagar ge kis ma way, ge asagar ge ɗogle ge kikis menengal ma buwal zì, ge àa tol ne Itali.
44010002	A ndu ge kaa ge voo ge Dok ne ge na zì ne, ka kee uwareya ɗaɗag hon Dok ge Yahuɗ ma way ɓanna ge na zok mɔɗwag. Ka mbaa Yahuɗ ge hoɗegeya ma gḛḛ, ka kee kaɗeya ɗaɗag ge Dok ta me.
44010003	Dwam a̰me go ɗu, ge ler taa ge gyala tok gasamal ne mbiya go, kuwa gḭḭl ge malayka ge Dok ne gezi kɔn̰al yaɗaɗ, waɗ-ɗa ge na diŋ tol na go: Korney!
44010004	Sok ge Korney ka̰a̰ na ndwa kuwa ne, voo mbo ya wan ne, jan go: Mo mbo ya kwaɗa ɓade Bagezok? Malayka jan ne go: Mo kaɗeya mage mbaaya ge mo mbaa nda ge hoɗegeya ma deɗ-ɗa ge Dok ndwa se yà dinna ge kaŋ dwaɗ pagal go.
44010005	Teme nda ge sego mbo suwal Yafa, num too Simo̰ ge àa chiya ne dḭḭl Piyer ya.
44010006	Kaa gɔswal ge ndu a̰me ge àa tol ne Simo̰ ba ge wan gwabal diŋ, ne zok ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam wa go.
44010007	Sok ge malayka ge ka jan ne fare doo tene mboya go, Korney tol na dore ma ya zi, ɓanna ge asagar a̰me ɗu ge kee na tèmel ma buwal zì, ne ge kaa ge voo ge Dok ne ge na zì.
44010008	Wan num fare ge kee ma pe mɔɗwag, guwa̰, teme num mbo suwal Yafa.
44010009	Sok yan kin̰are, ajo̰o̰ àa gale sok mboya go, sok ge àa gaa guwa ge waɗ suwal diŋ, Piyer ndee ya ge sok kàɗɗa ge no zok pagal digi yà, gyala pɔgwa taɗ ndwa kee kaɗeya.
44010010	Camal ɗege kee ne, ɓyare a̰me ge ndal na dul pe, sok ge àa ka kee ne kaŋ zam go, kaŋ a̰me dyan tene ge ne ndwa go.
44010011	Kuwa pḭḭ hageya gezi, kaŋ a̰me ɗu dinna ge ba̰a̰ fiyal vwalla go, ne keŋ ge ndà ma kaa vwalla ge tàal, ka siri ge digi ya suwa pagal se.
44010012	Kaŋ ge ko ndà ge diige pe peɗ, kaŋ ge saa ge maa pul ma ɓanna ge njoole ge ɗege no pḭḭ digi ge diige pe peɗ me, àa kaɗ ge ne pul go.
44010013	Ka̰a̰l a̰me ɗu jan ne go: Piyer ɗege digi, hṵṵ ɗu, mo zam.
44010014	Ɗaŋɗe, Piyer gwan ge ne janna go: To, Bagezok, kaŋ ge àa tele ne koo ge harcal to gale be waɗ ge mbi wa zì dwam ɗu to.
44010015	Ka̰a̰l mbe gwan jan ne ge ndwa zi go, kaŋ ge Dok haɗ ne ya harcal, kaa ge mo gwan ndil ne harcal to to.
44010016	Fare mbe dwage keeya ɗiŋ ndwa taa, avun cab, àa zwal ba̰a̰ mbe ge ne ndwa se gwan mbo pḭḭ zì yà.
44010017	Ajo̰o̰ Piyer be wan fare taaya ge na see ne pe to, kaɗ ge iigiya ge na sḛ zì. Ɗaŋɗe, nda mbe ge Korney teme num ya ma, sok ele Simo̰ zok pe go, àa deɗ-ɗa ge ne zok wa go.
44010018	Àa ele sok diŋ yà go, Simo̰ ge àa chiya ne dḭḭl go Piyer no, ne kaa gɔswal zok mbe no diŋ-go de?
44010019	Piyer gale sok dwaɗ ge na fare taaya mbe pagal, On̰om jan ne go: Nda taa ndil mo go zum.
44010020	Ɗege digi, mo mbo ya ge num ta se, gii tene to, ḛ ge num ɓan mboya. Ago, a mbi sḛ teme num ya ne.
44010021	Piyer mbo ya ge num ta se, jan num go, mbi ndu mbe ge ḛ ɓyare nee ne, ḛ ɓyare mbi ge dape de?
44010022	Àa gwan ge ne janna go: Ga̰a̰l ge asagar ge kis ma way Korney teme i ya ne ge mo ta. A ndu ge temel ne, kaɗ ndu ge no ge voo ge Dok ne ge na zì, ge pe rusu ge Yahuɗ ma way peɗ dore ne me. Malayka ge harcal a̰me ɗu din̰a tene ge ne ta, jin̰a ne no go, ne ee tèmel tol mo ya, ndwa go ne wa za̰a̰ fare ge mo wa zige.
44010023	Guwa̰ ge za̰a̰ num go, ɔwabe num ya diŋ, hon num sok fiiya. Sok yan aaram, àa ee ta ge vin̰a pe go mboya, ɓanna ge na̰ van a̰me ge ho fareba ge suwal Yafa diŋ-ge ma.
44010024	Ge dwam ge zi pagal, àa deɗ-ɗa ge suwal Sezare go, Korney wa ya ka da̰a̰re num ɓanna ge na sele mage na kondore ge na too num ya ma me.
44010025	Sok ge Piyer dee ya diŋ, Korney mbo ya ge ne ndwa zì kun ne, guu na ko se san ne wa ndwa hon ne hormo.
44010026	Ɗaŋɗe, Piyer wan ne digi, jan ne go: Ɗege digi, mbi ndu duwana ne bàŋ ge mo go me.
44010027	Guwa̰, àa ge ne gaa ya siɗigi fare ɗiŋ, àa waɗ-ɗa diŋ, Piyer seɗ go nda kwate se gḛḛ.
44010028	Hee fare, jan num go: Ḛ kuwa kuwa go, ge wa yuwaleya ge Dok ho̰ i ne pagal, tele tele go, Yahuɗ kee kondore ge ndu ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to koo mbo ne diŋ to, ɗaŋɗe, Dok ke mbi kuwaya no go, ne kaa ge mbi ndi ndu a̰me seŋre koo harcal to.
44010029	A ge pe no, sok ge ḛ ee tèmel mbo tol mbi ya, mbi be giɗ tene to. Ge sego, mà kaɗ ge go ḛ jan mbi fare ge ḛ too mbi ya ge pe nde de?
44010030	Korney gwan ge ne janna go: Dwam keeya taa ge mbi kee kaɗeya no go ge mbi diŋ, ge ler taa ge gyala tok gasamal, ge nè no ne zì mbe go tem, mbi ta̰a̰ tene ge ndu a̰me ɗu, ge ba̰a̰ ga̰a̰l seeya cicim dyan tene ge mbi ta, jin̰a mbi no go:
44010031	Korney, Dok za̰a̰ kaɗeya ge mo ya go, be vyale ge mbaaya ge mo mbaa nda ge hoɗegeya ma to me.
44010032	Doo tèmel mbo tol Simo̰ ge àa chiya ne dḭḭl go Piyer ge suwal Yafa yà. Kaa gɔswal ge na kane Simo̰, ndu ge wan gwabal diŋ, ne zok ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam wa go.
44010033	Ge sok mbe go gaw, mbi doo tèmel mbo tol mo ya no, mo me, mo be kee dṵṵl ge mboya to. Ge sego, i no mɔɗwag, i ge Dok ndwa se ge sok no go, i kwate ya ndwa za̰a̰ fare ge Bagezok ho mo na wa num pagal ma go mo jin̰a i num ma.
44010034	Ge sok mbe go, Piyer hee fare, jan go: Fareba, mbi gale wan fare mbe pe ya no, Dok zane vare ndu to.
44010035	Ɗaŋɗe, pe rusu ge diige, ge no ge voo ge Dok ne ge na zì, ge mbo ge temel pagal, Dok laa wan ne wan.
44010036	Dok ho̰ Izrayel van ma na fare ndwa wuwage num Fare ge Kwaɗa ge halas ne, ge mbo ge Zeso Krist ta. Ne sḛ a Bagezok ge nda duwana ma way ne peɗ.
44010037	Ḛ za̰a̰ fare ge Yohana ne, sok ge ka oy fare ge kee nda baptem ne, ḛ kuwa kaŋ ge kê ge suwa ge Izrayel ne pagal peɗ, ee pe ge Galile go deɗ-ɗa ge suwa ge Jude ne go.
44010038	Ḛ ge kuwaya tyatyaɗ go, Dok ho̰ Zeso ge suwal Nazareɗ ne On̰om ge Harcal, ho̰ ne pool no me. Ne sḛ ka anna ge suwa ge Izrayel ne pagal go peɗ, ka kee nda kwaɗa, ka zon nda ge ka kee moor hon Ba ge ho̰o̰l ma me. Ago Dok kaa dagre ge ne.
44010039	Nè kuwa kaŋ keeya ge ne ne ma peɗ ge nè ndwa, ge kee num ge Yahuɗ ma suwa pagal peɗ, ge num suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ me. Àa pee ne ge ɔwara kaŋre ta digi, guwa̰, see swày no.
44010040	Ɗaŋɗe, Dok ta̰a̰ ne digi ge swày se no ge dwam ge taa pagal, ho̰ ne pool ge ngay tene ge nda ta no.
44010041	Be ge nda ta peɗ to, ɗaŋɗe, ge i nda ge Dok tuwa i ge zḛḛ ya wal day go i kaa nda ge sayda ge na ne ma. I nda ge zâ, ge njoo dagre ge ne ma ne, guwa̰ tanna ge ne ne ge swày se go.
44010042	Ho i na wa go, i oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge Izrayel van ma ta, i jin̰a num zum waŋ go, ne ndu ge Dok taa nee ne ndwa kun sariya ge nda ge ndwa mage nda ge swày ma pagal.
44010043	Nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma peɗ jin̰a fare ge Zeso pe go: Ndu ge mbo hoɗ fareba ya ge ne ta, Dok mbo pore ne sone ma ge dḭḭl ge ne ne pe.
44010044	Piyer gale sok jan fare go, On̰om ge Harcal mbo ya ge num ge ka za̰a̰ ne fare janna ma pagal peɗ.
44010045	Yahuɗ ge ho fareba ge ɗeme Piyer ya ma peɗ, mbo ya kee ajab ge Dok ho̰ bobo ge On̰om ge Harcal ge na ne ya, ge nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma pagal pe waɗme.
44010046	Ago, àa ka za̰a̰ num faa wa ge ɗogle mage mbal Dok gagso. Sok mbe go, Piyer hee fare ele go:
44010047	Nè ge pool kuri be kee nda ge ame On̰om ge Harcal dinna ge nè go ma baptem de?
44010048	Hoɗ na wa go, a kee num baptem ge dḭḭl ge Zeso Krist ne. Ge sok mbe go, num sḛ ma kaɗe ne go, ne gale kaa ge maa ta dwam ma kwaɗa lag.
44011001	Nda ge temeya ge Zeso ne ma, ɓanna ge na̰ van ge ho fareba ge kaa no suwa ge Jude ne go ma, àa za̰a̰ go nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma ame fare ge Dok ne ya go waɗme.
44011002	Sok ge Piyer guwa̰ ya ge suwal Jerusalem diŋ, Yahuɗ ge ho fareba ge Zeso ta ma ɗege ne pagal, àa jan ne go:
44011003	Ge dape, mo wa mbo ɗiŋ ge pe rusu ge ɗogle ma buwal zì yà, mo wa zam kaŋ zam ge num de?
44011004	Ge sok mbe go, Piyer hee fare, ɗege wan num fare ma pe zum ɗu ge ɗu.
44011005	Ge dwam a̰me go ɗu, mbi ka kee kaɗeya ge suwal Yafa diŋ, mbi kuwa kaŋ a̰me ɗu dyan tene ge mbi ndwa go. Mbi kuwa kaŋ a̰me dinna ge ba̰a̰ fiyal go, ne keŋ ge ndà ma kaa vwalla ge tàal, ka siri ge pḭḭ digi ya, mboya ge mbi ta se guwa.
44011006	Mbi dol mbi ndwa ne ta ndilla kaal swag, mbi kuwa kaŋ kogor ma, kaŋ kavaar ma, kaŋ ge saa ge maa pul ma ɓanna ge njoole ge ɗege no pḭḭ digi ma.
44011007	Mbi za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l a̰me ɗu, jan mbi go: Piyer ɗege digi, hṵṵ ɗu, mo zam.
44011008	Ɗaŋɗe, mbi gwan ge ne janna go: To Bagezok! Kaŋ ge àa tele ne koo ge harcal to be gale waɗ ge mbi wa zì dwam ɗu to.
44011009	Ka̰a̰l mbe dwage mbi janna ge pḭḭ zì ya go: Kaŋ ge Dok haɗ ne ya harcal, kaa ge mo gwan ndil ne harcal to to.
44011010	Fare mbe dwage keeya ɗiŋ ndwa taa, guwa̰, a hee ne gwan mbo ge pḭḭ zì yà.
44011011	Mbi ɗege tan tene, nda taa yan ja ɓyare mbi pe, ge zok ge i kaa gɔswal ne diŋ wa zum no gaw, àa teme num ge suwal Sezare ya.
44011012	Ge sok mbe go, On̰om ge Harcal jan mbi go, ɓa̰a̰ mboya dagre ge num be giɗɗa. Na̰ van ge menengal mbe ma no ɗeme mbi ne mbo suwal Sezare, i ge num ɓa̰a̰ mbo ge Korney diŋ yà no.
44011013	Sok ge i dee yà, ne sḛ ɗege wan i fare pe ge na kuwa malayka mḛḛya ge na diŋ, ge ka janna go: Doo tèmel mbo tol Simo̰ ge àa chiya ne dḭḭl go Piyer ge suwal Yafa ya.
44011014	Mbo jan mo fare ge mo mbiya seɗ monna, mo, ɓanna ge mo zok mɔɗwag.
44011015	Sok mbi hee fare janna go, On̰om ge Harcal mbo ya ge num pagal dinna ge dee ee pe mbo ya wal ge nè pagal go.
44011016	Ge sok mbe go gaw, mbi pagal kale dwaɗ fare ge Bagezok ne ge jin̰a go: Yohana kee nda baptem ge mam se, kaɗɗa ge ḛ, ḛ mbo seɗ baptem ge On̰om ge Harcal ne.
44011017	Mà kaɗɗa go Dok ho̰ num bobo ge mojo̰o̰ na ho̰ nè ne go, sok ge nè dee ya hoɗ fareba ge Bagezok Zeso Krist ta go no, mbi kaɗ huɗi ge mḛḛ piliya ge Dok de?
44011018	Sok ge àa za̰a̰ ne fare mbe ma go, num dul wa ma mbo ya ee se, àa ka sale Dok janna go: O̰o̰ a fareba, Dok zane hage vin̰a ya ge nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma pagal waɗme, ndwa go num seŋe ta se, num wa ame ndwa ge jin̰al.
44011019	Guwa̰ swày ge Etiyen ne go, nda ge ame hateya ma gwan seɗ yal ge ɗogle ge ee num ɓasare se. Nda a̰me ma chiya ɗiŋ mbo ge suwa ge Fenesi ne yà, ge til Chipr zì yà, ge suwal Antiyoch yà me. Ɗaŋɗe, àa ka oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge Bagezok Zeso ne ge Yahuɗ ma ta ɗeŋew.
44011020	Go no puy ɗe, nda a̰me ge num buwal zige ma, ge num suwal no Chipr mage Siren, ge àa mbo ya ge suwal Antiyoch diŋ, àa ka oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge Bagezok Zeso ne ge Grek ma ta me.
44011021	Ajo̰o̰ pool ge ɓaŋlaŋ ge Bagezok ne kaa dagre ge num, nda gḛḛ mboya hoɗ fareba, àa seŋe ta ya se ge ne ta me.
44011022	Ɓase ge Krist ne ge suwal Jerusalem diŋ-ge ma za̰a̰ fare mbe, ge sok mbe go gaw, àa teme Barnabas mbo Antiyoch.
44011023	Sok ge dee yà, kuwa kwaɗa keeya ge Dok ngay ne ge num ta, kee laa saal gḛḛ, ka moɗege num peɗ go, num ho̰ ta Bagezok ge dul wa ɗu.
44011024	Ajo̰o̰ Barnabas ndu ge nda dore nee ne, kee tèmel ge On̰om ge Harcal pagal, kaɗ ndu ge ho fareba mbyaɗɗa tab me ɗe, ɓase ma gḛḛ mbo ya hoɗ fareba ge Bagezok ta.
44011025	Guwa̰, Barnabas hee vin̰a mbo ɓyare Sol pe, ge suwal Tars yà.
44011026	Sok ge see ne go, a ge ne ɓan-na mboya ge suwal Antiyoch diŋ. Del ɗu jan, àa ka kee kwateya ge ɓase ge Krist ne ma, àa ka hate ɓase ma gḛḛ me. A ge suwal Antiyoch diŋ, àa ee pe tol nda ge ame hateya ma no go Kretiyḛ ma.
44011027	Ge dwam a̰me go ɗu, nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma mbo ge suwal Jerusalem ya, ge suwal Antiyoch diŋ.
44011028	A̰me ɗu ge num buwal zì, ge àa tol ne Agabus, On̰om ge Harcal ee ne wuwage fare ge camal baktar ne, ge mbo mbo ja ge suwa pagal peɗ. Camal mbe mbo ya deɗɗa ge zaman ge gan ga̰a̰l ge waɗe Kloɗ ne go.
44011029	Nda ge ame hateya ma za̰a̰ ta go, ndu ge diige ho̰ kaŋ ge na mbiya honna, ndwa go maa wa teme mbaaya mbo hon na̰ van ge ho fareba, ge kaa no ge suwa ge Jude ne go ma.
44011030	Àa mbo ya kee mbe go tem, àa teme maa bobo mbe ge Barnabas mage Sol tok go, mbo hon nda ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme tèmel ge suwa Jude go ma.
44012001	Ge zaman mbe go, gan ga̰a̰l Heroɗ, ɗege kee ɓase ge Krist ne a̰me ma yal ge suwal Jerusalem diŋ.
44012002	Hoɗ asagar ma na wa go, num hṵṵ Jak ge Yohana na̰ van gezi ge kasagar .
44012003	Sok ge kuwa go, fare mbe kee Yahuɗ ma sḛ ya tii ɗe, gwan taale na tok, wan Piyer dol ne daŋay zì. Kê na fare mbe ge dwam vḛḛso ge dupḛ ge be jìn̰al hore na ndwa zì ne go.
44012004	Guwa̰ ge doo ne daŋay zì, vaa asagar ma se ndà ndà pe ndà, ndwa koy ne. Ne sḛ kê na dwaɗɗa go, na gene ne ya ge ɓase ma ndwa se, ndwa kun ne sariya, guwa̰ dwam vḛḛso ge Paska ne go.
44012005	Sok ge Piyer kaa dibiya ge daŋay zì, ɓase ge Krist ne ma ka kee kaɗeya ge aa ta ge Dok ta, ge ne pe.
44012006	Ajo̰o̰ àa gene Piyer ya zum kin̰are aaram ndwa kun sariya ge ne pagal, ge ɗaal mbe zì, kaa vwalla se ge zul ma zi, ge asagar ge zi ge ka koy na ma ta. Lee ɗu, ge asagar ge ɗu ta, lee gene ge asagar gegene ta me. Asagar ge koy zok daŋay wa ma gwan kaɗ mḛḛya ge zum iya.
44012007	Tugcug, malayka ge Bagezok ne a̰me ɗu, dyan tene ge zok daŋay zì, kɔn̰al zen, ame zok pul se mɔɗwag. Malayka dabe Piyer ge ne ziya wa go, kore ne digi, jan ne go: Ɗege digi avun cab, bàŋ go helo, zul ma kale fen ta ge ne tok ma ta gezi ɓal.
44012008	Guwa̰, Malayka gwan jan ne go: Vuwa mo hoo ge mo pul go, pa mo tyako ma. Piyer kee mbe go tem. Gwan jan ne go: Ka̰a̰ mo ba̰a̰ ga̰a̰l kapoɗ ge mo ta, mbo ya ge mbi pe go.
44012009	Piyer waɗ ge daŋay zì ya zum ge malayka pe go, be ge wan pe fareba go na waɗ go zum ge daŋay zì to. Ɗaŋɗe, ka dwaɗ go ne kin̰a jan na ne.
44012010	Àa mbo ya kale asagar ge koy zok wa ge zḛḛ ge ma, ge zi ma, àa deɗ-ɗa ge zok wa ge walam, ge hage waɗ mbo suwal diŋ go. Zok wa mbe kale hage tene se ɓal, àa waɗ-ɗa zum, àa hee vin̰a a̰me ɗu. Ge num sok mboya go, Piyer tan tene, malayka fwaɗ-ɗa sok.
44012011	Guwa̰ go, Piyer ndwa tyan gezi, jan tene go: A fareba mbi kuwa ya go go, Bagezok teme ya na malayka ndwa mon mbi ge Heroɗ mage Yahuɗ ma yal ge daa mà kee mbi num ya ma zì.
44012012	Guwa̰ ge ne sḛ duwa nde, hee vin̰a mbo ge Mari ge Yohana na̰ yà, Yohana ge àa chiya ne dḭḭl go Mark. Nda ge ho fareba ma gḛḛ wa ya seɗ ta kee kaɗeya ge ne diŋ.
44012013	Sok ge Piyer dee ya, dabe zok wa ge zum-ge, moor kale ge àa tol ne Rode mbo ya ndwa ndil ndu ge dabe zok wa.
44012014	Sok ge za̰a̰ Piyer ka̰a̰l, kee ne laa saal gḛḛ, ge go na hage zok wa se ɗe, gwan soo, mbo wuwage ɓase ma go, ne Piyer ne zok wa zum.
44012015	Àa jan ne go: Seger kee mo ne de? Wan na wa bàba go, ne nee ne.
44012016	Àa gwan jan ne go: Kaɗ mà ne malayka ne. Ɗaŋɗe, Piyer gwan ka dabe zok wa, sok ge àa mbo ya hage zok wa, àa kuwa ne, àa kee ajab.
44012017	Kee num na tok ndwa go num zane, ɗege wan num fare pe ge kaŋ ge Bagezok kê ge na, ge ne doo na ge daŋay zì ya zum. Gwan jan num go, fare mbe no, ḛ mbo wuwage Jak mage na̰ van gegene ma ne waɗme. Guwa̰, waɗ-ɗa zum mbo sok ge ɗogle.
44012018	Sok yan aaram, asagar ge ka koy Piyer ma mbo ya iigi digi giliw, àa ka ele ta ge fare ge seɗ ne ya pe.
44012019	Heroɗ kan na asagar ma mbo ɓyare ne sok ma go peɗ, ɗaŋɗe, àa seɗ ne to. Guwa̰ ge ele asagar ge koy zok daŋay wa ma fare go, hoɗ na wa go, àa hṵṵ num gezi. Ge sok mbe go, Heroɗ ɗege ge suwa ge Jude ne go, mbo kaɗ ge suwal Sezare yà swag.
44012020	Ajo̰o̰ Heroɗ mage nda ge suwal Tir mage Sido̰ ma be ka za̰a̰ ta to, num sḛ ma mbo ya vin ta wa dagre ɗu teme nda ya ge ne ta. Àa za̰a̰ ta ge Blastus, gan ga̰a̰l wa ge se ge, ndwa seɗ vin̰a ge mbo ge gan ga̰a̰l ta gene halas ya maa buwal zì, ge dape, num suwal ma ka seɗ kaŋ zam ge suwal ge gan ga̰a̰l Heroɗ ne ta.
44012021	Sok ge dwam ge àa ge num za̰a̰ ta ge ne pagal go mbiya, Heroɗ kan na ba̰a̰ gan ge na ta, kaɗ ge na hòol kun sariya pagal. Ndage na ka̰a̰l digi ge ɓase ma pagal, ka sage fare janna.
44012022	Ɓase ma ka oyya digi go: A ka̰a̰l ge dok a̰me nee ne me to no, a ka̰a̰l ge ndu duwana nee ne ɗer ɓade!
44012023	Ge sok mbe go gaw, malayka ge Bagezok ne a̰me ɗu iyal ne ge tuguɗi, ge dape, ne sḛ ame hormo ge Dok daa mà seɗ ne ya. Chabso ma zam ne ge na ndwa, gaa suuya.
44012024	Go no puy, fare ge Bagezok Dok ne ka dasare se, nda ka hoɗ fareba.
44012025	Guwa̰ ge Barnabas mage Sol huy tèmel ge àa teme maa ya ge ne pe wa, ge Jerusalem diŋ, àa wan Yohana ge àa chiya ne dḭḭl go Mark ya ge maa pe go, sok ge àa seŋe ya gwanna go.
44013001	Ge ɓase ge Krist ne ge suwal Antiyoch diŋ-ge ma buwal zì, nda ge zwagre Dok wa mage nda ge hate nda ma kaa: Barnabas, Simeyo̰ ge àa tol ne go Ndu ge pisil, Lukiyus ndu ge suwal Siren ne. Manayḛ ge gan ga̰a̰l Heroɗ kondore wa kag, ge a ge ne wuwa dagre, Sol me.
44013002	Dwam a̰me go ɗu, sok ge àa see ta uware Bagezok Dok mage wan mam njuwal go, On̰om ge Harcal mbo ya jan num go: Ḛ mbege mbi Barnabas mage Sol gezi caɗ, ge tèmel ge mbi too num ya ge ne pe keeya.
44013003	Guwa̰ ge àa wa̰a̰ mam njuwal mage kee kaɗeya go, àa ee maa tok ma ge num pagal, àa n̰a num mboya.
44013004	Nda ge On̰om ge Harcal teme num ya ma, ndwa go Barnabas mage Sol, àa deɗ-ɗa ge suwal Selesi go, ge sok mbe go, àa ndee ge baaburi ge mam se ge go, mbo ge til Chipr yà.
44013005	Sok ge àa dee ge suwal Salamin diŋ yà, àa ee pe oy fare ge Dok ne ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way ma zì. Yohana Mark kaa ndu ge in num galam.
44013006	Guwa̰, Barnabas mage Sol gaa mboya maa ndwa zḛḛ ɗiŋ, àa deɗ-ɗa ge suwal ga̰a̰l Pafos ge til Chipr mbe ne diŋ. Àa seɗ Yahuɗ a̰me ɗu, ge kee mbole ge àa tol ne dḭḭl go Bar-Zeso, ge kee tene go, na ndu ge zwagre Dok wa|Nda ge zwagre Dok wa ne.
44013007	Ne sḛ kaa ge Sergiyus Polus, goformo̰ ge til Chipr ne diŋ. Goformo̰ kaa ndu ge andaŋ ne, ee tèmel mbo tol Barnabas mage Sol ya, ge dape, kaa ge ene gḛḛ, ge za̰a̰ fare ge Dok ne.
44013008	Ɗaŋɗe, Bar-Zeso ge àa tol ne waɗme go Elimas, ndu ge kee mbole, ka mḛḛ piliya ge num, ka ɓyare vin̰a ge vḛḛne num fare mbe ge Goformo̰ ndwa zì, ndwa go ne ho fareba ge num fare janna mbe ma ta to.
44013009	Ge sok mbe go, Sol ge àa tol ne Pol waɗme, ge On̰om ge Harcal biri ne, dol na ndwa ge Elimas ndwa zì,
44013010	jan ne go: Mo ge kee Ba ge ho̰o̰l moor, mo kaa ge hày pe kunna, mo kaa ge nda pe laseya, mo ho̰o̰l ge kaŋ ge go maa kwaɗa ma peɗ. Dee ma̰ del, mo wa n̰a be batame laa ɓyareya ge Bagezok ne ge temel de?
44013011	Ge sego, mo zwal twam ge Bagezok ne ja ge mo pagal, mo ndwa ma gaa dame-dame, mo mbo gwan kuwa sok daa to, ɗiŋ fare ge ɗogle dun ne mbḛḛ. Ge sok mbe go gaw, sok mbo ya sibi se ge ne ndwa zì, gaa kàɗɗa dàma, ka dol na tok lee gene me-lee gene me, ndwa go na see ndu ge wan na tok.
44013012	Sok ge goformo̰ kuwa kaŋ mbe ma keeya go, mbo ya kee ajab ge fare hateya ge Bagezok ne pagal. Ge sok mbe go, hoɗ fareba.
44013013	Pol mage na ka̰a̰m ge maa ge num mbo sok ya ma, ndee baaburi ge mam se ge go, ge Pafos go mbo ge suwal Perg ge no ge suwa ge Pamfili ne yà. Sok ge àa dee yà, Yohana Mark swaɗ num, gwan mbo Jerusalem.
44013014	Nda ge gaa ma ɗege ge Perg go, àa deɗ-ɗa ge suwal Antiyoch diŋ, ge suwa ge Pisidi ne go. Àa waɗ ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way zì, ge dwam sabaɗ go, àa kaɗ se kee kwateya ge num.
44013015	Guwa̰ ge àa isi fare ge maktub ge eeya mage maktub ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma way go, ga̰a̰l ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way ma jan Pol mage Barnabas go: «Na̰ van ma, kaɗɗa fare ge ḛ mbiya moɗege ɓase ma go, fare gaa ḛ tok go.»
44013016	Pol ɗege digi, kee num na tok ndwa go num zane, guwa̰, jan num go: «Na̰ van Izrayel ma, ḛ ge chiya Dok voo ma, ḛ za̰a̰ mbi.
44013017	Dok ge pe rusu ge Izrayel ne, taa nè baŋ ma ne, ee num zuli ta se ge suwa Ejypt, ge àa kaa gɔswal ne go no. Guwa̰, ɔwabe num ge suwal mbe diŋ ya zum no, ge pool ge na ne ge ɓaŋlaŋ ta.
44013018	Ge sok mboya ge num way ge babur pul go, ḭḭ tene ge num no ɗiŋ del warndà ta guwa.
44013019	Guwa̰ ge burmi rusu ge ɗogle ma pe ɓỳala ge suwa ge Kana ne go gezi, ho̰ nè baŋ ma num suwa mbe joo no,
44013020	àa gaa kàɗɗa ne go no ɗiŋ guwa ge del kikis ndà ge ziya warnuwan̰. «Guwa̰, Dok mbo ya ee nda ge kun sariya ma kaɗ ga̰a̰l ge num pagal no, ɗiŋ deɗ-ɗa ge ndu ge zwagre Dok wa|Nda ge zwagre Dok wa Samiyel ta.
44013021	Nè baŋ ma mbo ya ele Dok no go, ne ho̰ maa gan ga̰a̰l a̰me ɗu. Sok ge àa ele ne mbe go ɗe, ho̰ num Sol ge Kis van no, ge no pe rusu ge Benjamḛ ne zì. Ke ge hòol gan pagal no del warndà.
44013022	Guwa̰ ge Dok ndage ne gezi go, eya ne ge Daviɗ no, jin̰a fare ge Daviɗ pe no go: “Jese van ge àa tol ne Daviɗ, a ndu ge mbi see go, ne fare kwaɗa ge mbi ndwa zì ne, ne sḛ mbo kee kaŋ ge mbi laa ɓyare num ma ne peɗ.”
44013023	Ge pe rusu ge Daviɗ ne zì, ge wa tii ge Dok kê pagal, pate Zeso no, ne kaa Ba ge mon Izrayel van ma.
44013024	Zḛḛ ge go Zeso mbo ya, Yohana ba ge kee nda baptem oy fare ge Izrayel van ma ta go: Ḛ mbo ya kee baptem ge ngay go ḛ seŋe ta ja se ge Dok ta.
44013025	Sok ge dee ya na tèmel ma wa aaya go, ka janna go: “Mbi be ndu ge ḛ ee ḛ dwaɗɗa ma no ge ne pagal ne to. Ɗaŋɗe, ne sḛ mbe ge mbo no ge mbi guwa̰ ya, a ne ge ḛ da̰a̰re nee ne, mbi be mbyaɗ ge fwage ne tyako ma ge ne ko zì to peɗ.”
44013026	«Na̰ van ma, ḛ ge no ge pe rusu ge Abraham ne zì ma koo ḛ ge no ge voo ge Dok ne ḛ zì ma, fare janna ge monna mbe ne mbo ya ge nè pe.
44013027	Ago, nda ge kaa ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ ma ɓanna ge maa ga̰a̰l ma be kuwa go Zeso ne huɗi ne de to, koo àa wan fare janna ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma way, ge àa ka isi ne dwam sabaɗ go tatab pe to me. Ɗaŋɗe, àa zane huy fare janna ge maktub ne ma wa, àa wan ne ge sariya ge gene ne mbo swày no.
44013028	Ajo̰o̰ àa be seɗ fare a̰me ge sone ge ee ne mbo swày to puy ɗe, àa kaɗe Pilaɗ no go, ne hṵṵ ne gezi.
44013029	Sok ge àa huy kaŋ ge njaŋe no ge maktub ge Dok ne zì ge ne pe ma wa peɗ, àa fwage ne ge ɔwara kaŋre ta digi ya se no, àa mbuu ne no me.
44013030	Ɗaŋɗe, Dok ta̰a̰ ne ge nda ge swày ma buwal zì no.
44013031	Dwam ma gḛḛ, ka ngay tene ge nda ge ɗeme na ge Galile go mbo Jerusalem yà ma ta. Ge sego, num sḛ mbe ma gaa ne sayda ma ne ge ɓase ma ta.
44013032	I sḛ ma waɗme, i wuwage ḛ Fare ge Kwaɗa mbe, ndwa go wa tii ge Dok kê nè baŋ ma ne.
44013033	«Dok huy wa tii mbe ge nè ge num van ma ta, sok tan Zeso ge swày se, dinna ge a njaŋe no ge Maktub ge kaŋ mballa ma way zì, ne caɗeya zi zì go: “Mo mbi Van ne, Màno mbi gaa mo Ba ne.”
44013034	«Dok ta̰a̰ ne ge nda ge swày ma buwal zì, mbo daa gwan suu to. A fare ge Dok dee jin̰a nee ne go: “Mbi mbo hon ḛ kaŋ ge harcal ge mbi kê wa tii hon Daviɗ num ma, Àa kaŋ ge mbiya ee ndu hoɗ fareba ma ne.”
44013035	«A ge pe, gwan jan ge sok ge ɗogle zì no go: “Mo mbo n̰a mo ndu ge Harcal duul hubiya ge tugul swày se to.”
44013036	«Ago, sok ge Daviɗ kaa ge na ndwa, kaa ndu ge tèmel ge Dok ne, ka kee ne laa ɓyareya ma, sok ge suu go, àa mbuu ne ge ne baŋ ma ziya, ne duul hubi ge tugul swày se no me.
44013037	Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge Dok ta̰a̰ ne ge nda ge swày ma buwal zì, ne duul be hubi to.
44013038	Mbi na̰ van ma, ḛ kuwa ne kwaɗa: A ge Zeso mbe ta, àa wuwage ḛ poreya ge ḛ sone ma way no,
44013039	ge dape, eeya ge Moyiz ne ma be mbyaɗ ge Dok ndil ḛ temel na ndwa se to. Ge ne ta, ndu ge diige ge hoɗ fareba ya, Dok ndil ne ge ndu ge temel go ge na ndwa se.
44013040	Go no, ḛ kaa dàle to, ne kaa ge fare mbe ma see ḛ to, fare ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma dee jin̰a ḛ num ma go:
44013041	Ḛ za̰a̰: “Ḛ nda ge pagal ga̰a̰l ma, Ḛ mbo kee ajab, ḛ burmi gezi me. Ago mbi, mbi mbo kee kaŋ a̰me ge walay nde ge ḛ zaman go, Kaɗɗa àa wa̰a̰ ḛ ne pe puy, Ḛ mbyaɗ ge hoɗ fareba ge ne ta to.”»
44013042	Sok ge Sol mage Barnabas ɗege waɗ zum go, àa kaɗe num ge aa ta go, num guwa̰ ya hate maa ge fare mbe ma pagal ge dwam sabaɗ ge guwa̰ go ge go.
44013043	Guwa̰ twageya ge num way go, Yahuɗ ma gḛḛ ɓanna ge pe rusu ge ɗogle ge ho fareba ge Dok ge Yahuɗ ma way ta ma, ka kàre Pol mage Barnabas pe. Pol mage Barnabas ka siɗigi fare ge num, àa ka moɗege num ndwa go, num wa̰a̰ maa tok ge Dok ge kuwa nda a̰se.
44013044	Dwam ge dwam sabaɗ ge guwa̰ go ge mbe mbiya, nda lee gḛḛ ge suwal ga̰a̰l diŋ-ge ma mbo ya za̰a̰ fare ge Bagezok Dok ne.
44013045	Sok ge Yahuɗ ma kuwa go nda kwate ja gḛḛ, àa ɗege kee yil, àa ka besere fare janna ge Pol ne ma ɓanna ge saaso jɔjwag.
44013046	Pol mage Barnabas jan num zum waŋ go: «Wa̰a̰ ndwa go, fare ge Dok ne ee pe janna daa ge ḛ Yahuɗ ma ta. Ajo̰o̰ ḛ sḛ ma kuri ne gezi ne, ḛ kun ta sariya go go ḛ mbyaɗ deɗ-ɗa ge ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din go to. Ḛ kuwa go, i seŋe ta ja ge nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma ta.
44013047	Ago Bagezok ho ne na wa go: “Mbi taa mo go, mo kaa kɔn̰al ge nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma way, ndwa go mo mbo ge fare ge monna ne ge suwa wa ndegeɗe ma yà.”»
44013048	Sok ge nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma za̰a̰ fare mbe go, àa kee laa saal, àa ka sale Bagezok ge ne fare dee ya maa ta pe. Nda ge Dok taa num ma ndwa go num dee ya ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din go ma mbo ya hoɗ fareba me.
44013049	Go mbe no, fare ge Bagezok ne mbo ya dasare ge num sok ma go peɗ.
44013050	Ɗaŋɗe, Yahuɗ ma kan nda zaab ge pagal kɔn̰al go ge ma, ge uware Dok ge Yahuɗ ma way ma cece, ɓanna ge nda soɗob ge pwal ge suwal ga̰a̰l diŋ-ge ma me. Àa ɗege digi ge ho̰o̰l ge Pol mage Barnabas ta, àa yan num ge maa suwa go.
44013051	Nda ge zi mbe ma poy maa ko kuci ma ge num pagal, guwa̰, àa hee vin̰a mbo suwal Ikoniyom.
44013052	Kaɗɗa ge nda ge ame hateya ge no suwal Antiyoch diŋ ma ɗe, àa gaa ge laa saal, àa biri ge On̰om ge Harcal me.
44014001	Sok ge Pol mage Barnabas dee ya ge suwal Ikoniyom diŋ, àa mbo ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way zì, ge mojo̰o̰ maa kê ge suwal Antiyoch ya go. Ge fare oyya ge num way ta, Yahuɗ mage Grek ma gḛḛ mbo ya hoɗ fareba ge Zeso ta.
44014002	Ɗaŋɗe, Yahuɗ ge kuri be hoɗ fareba ma kan nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma cece, àa ee num kee ho̰o̰l ge na̰ van ge ho fareba ma.
