44014003	Ge iigiya ma zì puy ɗe, nda ge temeya ma kee dwam ma kaal nde ge suwal mbe diŋ. Àa ka oy fare ge Bagezok ne be voo. Bagezok ka hon num pool kee kaŋ ajab mage kaŋ haŋle ma, ndwa ngayya zum go, fare janna ge num way ge kuwa a̰se ge na ne pagal, ne fare ge fareba ne.
44014004	Ɓase ge suwal ga̰a̰l mbe diŋ-ge ma mbo ya vaa se pe zi: Cùb ge Yahuɗ ma pe go, gegene ma ge nda ge temeya ma pe go me.
44014005	Guwa̰, nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to mbe mage Yahuɗ ma, ɓanna ge maa ga̰a̰l ma za̰a̰ ta go, maa kee nda ge temeya ge Zeso ne ma yal, maa mbaa num gezi ge njal me.
44014006	Sok ge nda ge temeya ma za̰a̰ fare mbe go, àa chiya mbo ge suwa ge Likawoni ne yà, ge suwal ga̰a̰l Listr mage Derb, ge num suwal ge vee num se ma go me.
44014007	Àa ka oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge Zeso ne ge suwa mbe ma go waɗme.
44014008	Ge sok oy fare ge suwal Listr diŋ go, àa mbo ya seɗ ndu a̰me ɗu ge ko looɗol, ge tolla ge ne ne ya day, ge gale mbo vin̰a dwam ɗu to, wa ya kàɗɗa.
44014009	Ka za̰a̰ fare ge Pol ka janna, Pol ee na angal ya ge ne ta, kuwa go, ge hoɗ fareba ge ne ne ta, ne ge vin̰a seɗ zonna.
44014010	Ge sok mbe go, Pol hee na ka̰a̰l digi, jan ne go: Ɗege digi mḛḛya temel. Ndu mbe mbo ya za̰a̰me digi ɓarta, ɗege mbo vin̰a.
44014011	Sok ge ɓase ma ka̰a̰ ndwa kuwa kaŋ ge Pol kê ne, àa oy digi ge ka̰a̰l ndaal ge wa Likawoni go: Dok ge hê diir ge nda duwana ma way ma, kan maa ko ja ge i buwal zì no.
44014012	Àa ka tol Barnabas go: Dok Zes, Pol me go: Dok Hermes, ge dape, ne sḛ ba ge ka oy fare ne.
44014013	Ndu ge kee tuwaleya ge dok Zes ne, ge ne zok siim no ge suwal ga̰a̰l lee ge zum-ge go, gene nday pool ma ya zi, ge zok siim mbe wa ge waɗɗa go, ge àa tii ɔwara wa folla ma no num ta. Ne sḛ ɓanna ge ɓase ma ɓyare go maa kee tuwaleya ge nda ge temeya ma pe.
44014014	Sok ge Barnabas mage Pol za̰a̰ fare mbe go, àa taabe maa ba̰a̰ ma gezi ge maa ta. Àa haa ta waɗ ge ɓase ma buwal zì yà ge oyya go:
44014015	Kondore ma, ḛ kee kaŋ mbe go ge dape de? I sḛ ma nda duwana ma ne ge ḛ sḛ ma go waɗme. I mbo ya oy ḛ Fare ge Kwaɗa ndwa go, ḛ n̰a kaŋ siim ge bàŋ yag ma gezi, ḛ seŋe ta ya se ge Dok ge ndwa ta, ne ge kê pḭḭ, kê suwa, kê mam ga̰a̰l nuwam mage kaŋ ge na pul se ge ma no peɗ me.
44014016	Ge doŋ pe ge kale ya ma go, Dok n̰a pe rusu ge diige kee laa ɓyareya ge na ne.
44014017	Go no puy ɗe, ka kee tene kuwaya ɗaɗag ge kaŋ keeya ge na ne ge kwaɗa ma ta. Ka suwa ḛ mam ge pḭḭ zì ya, ḛ ka kan siyal ge ḛ kaŋ kyarga ma way ge maa sok ma go tetem me. Ka hon ḛ kaŋ zam, ḛ ka an̰n̰a ge laa saal me.
44014018	A ge yal gḛḛ, àa ɗege tele ɓase ma be kee tuwaleya ge hon maa mbe no.
44014019	Guwa̰, Yahuɗ ma zuɗ ge Antiyoch ge no ge Pisidi go ya, ge Ikoniyom ya, àa mbo ya muwa̰le ɓase ma ge maa pe go, àa ɔwabe njal gṵṵ ma mbal Pol gezi. Guwa̰ ge àa mbaa ne go, àa zwal ne mbo dol ge suwal ga̰a̰l guwa̰ zum yà, ge dape, àa kaa ge dwaɗɗa go ne suu suu.
44014020	Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge nda ge ame hateya ma mbo ya vee ne se go, zwal tene digi, àa ge num ɓan mbo suwal ga̰a̰l diŋ. Sok yan kin̰are, àa ge Barnabas gaa mbo suwal Derb.
44014021	Barnabas mage Pol oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge suwal ga̰a̰l Derb diŋ, nda gḛḛ mbo ya seŋe nda ge ame hateya ma. Guwa̰, àa gwan mbo ge suwa ge Pisidi ne yà, ge ne suwal ga̰a̰l Listr, Ikoniyom mage Antiyoch diŋ.
44014022	Àa ka moɗege nda ge ame hateya ma ndwa go num see pool, ge maa fare janna ma ta. Àa ka dwage num janna go: Num ka̰a̰ maa tok ge hoɗ fareba ge maa way ma ta to, ge dape, ne ge yal njoɗɗa ma ta, nè wa seɗ vin̰a ge waɗ muluk ge Dok ne zì go.
44014023	Ge ɓase ge Krist ne ma buwal zì, ge suwal ge diige diŋ, àa ka ee num ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme tèmel ma. Guwa̰ ge àa kee kaɗeya mage wan mam njuwal ge num go, àa deŋe num ge Bagezok ge àa ho fareba ge ne ta tok go.
44014024	Nda ge temeya ma kale mboya ge suwa ge Pisidi ne pagal, àa deɗ-ɗa ge suwa ge Pamfili ne go.
44014025	Sok ge àa dee ya ge suwal Perg diŋ, àa oy fare ge Dok ne, àa ɗege ge ne go kale mbo ge suwal Atali yà.
44014026	Ge sok mbe go, àa ndee baaburi ge mam se ge go gwan mbo suwal ga̰a̰l Antiyoch ge no Siri go, suwal ga̰a̰l ge àa dee ee pe deŋe num ge Dok tok go, ndwa go ne ho̰ num pool ge kee na tèmel. Tèmel mbe ge àa deɗ ja aa ne pe keeya ge sego no.
44014027	Guwa̰ ge Pol mage Barnabas dee ya ge suwal ga̰a̰l Antiyoch diŋ, àa kwate ɓase ge Krist ne ma ya se, àa wan num fare ge Dok kee ge maa ma pe peɗ, ge hageya ge ne hage vin̰a ge nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma pagal pe, ndwa go num dee ya hoɗ fareba.
44014028	Àa gaa kàɗɗa kaal nde ge nda ge ame hateya ma ta, ge suwal ga̰a̰l mbe diŋ kee tèmel ge num.
44015001	Nda a̰me ma mbo ge suwa ge Jude ne ya ge Antiyoch go. Àa ka hate na̰ van ge ho fareba ma go: Kaɗɗa ḛ vyan bḛḛ ya ge wa yuwaleya ge Moyiz ne ma pagal to, ḛ seɗ monna to.
44015002	Pol mage Barnabas pee num fare mbe, gool ge ga̰a̰l mbo ya ɗege ge num buwal zì. Sok mbe go, àa vin ta go maa teme Pol mage Barnabas ɓanna ge na̰ van ge ɗogle ge ho fareba ma mbo Jerusalem, mbo seɗ nda ge temeya mage nda ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme tèmel ma, ge fare mbe pe.
44015003	Sok ge àa ɗege mboya, ɓase ge Krist ne ma ɓyare num a̰me fyalag ge num tok go. Sok kale mboya ge suwa ge Fenesi mage Samari ne pagal, àa wan num fare pe ge seŋe ya ge nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma seŋe ta ja se ge Bagezok pe go. Fare mbe mbo ya kee na̰ van ge ho fareba ma peɗ laa saal gḛḛ me.
44015004	Sok ge àa dee ya ge Jerusalem diŋ, ɓase ge Krist ne mage nda ge temeya ma ɓanna ge nda ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme tèmel ma ame num. Num sḛ ma wan num kaŋ ge Dok ka kee num ma peɗ, ge sok ge maa ka oy fare ge ne ne go.
44015005	Ɗaŋɗe, Farisi a̰me ge ho fareba ma mḛḛ piliya, àa jan go: Ɓyare go àa ho̰ nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma, ge ho fareba ma wa go num vin̰a bḛḛ mage mboya ge eeya ge Moyiz ne ma pagal.
44015006	Nda ge temeya mage nda ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme tèmel ma mbo ya kaɗ se ndwa hale fare mbe pe.
44015007	Sok ge àa geleŋe fare mbe kaal nde ge ta buwal zì, Piyer mbo ya ɗege digi jan num go: Na̰ van ma! Ḛ ge kuwaya go: Dok taa mbi ne ge ḛ buwal zì, ge zḛḛ ya day, ndwa go mbi oy Fare ge Kwaɗa, ge nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma ta, num za̰a̰ ne, num wa deɗ-ɗa hoɗ fareba me.
44015008	Dok ge kuwa dul wa ge nda duwana ma way, ngay zum no go, na ame num ya go, ho̰ num On̰om ge Harcal no, ge mojo̰o̰ ne sḛ ho̰ nè ne go waɗme.
44015009	Ndi nè ge num ge nda ge ɗu ma go, be vare ndu a̰me to. Haa num dul wa ma harcal no, sok ge àa ho fareba go.
44015010	Ge sego, a ma̰ kaŋ ee ḛ ne hee Dok pe, sok ee dṵṵl ge go mbe no ge nda ge ame hateya ma pagal, dṵṵl ge nè baŋ ma koo ge nè sḛ ma mbiya in ne to de?
44015011	Nè dee ya ge hoɗ fareba go, nè mo̰o̰ mon ge kwaɗa keeya ge Bagezok Zeso ne ta, ge mojo̰o̰ num sḛ ma dee ya no go waɗme.
44015012	Ɓase ge ho fareba ma mbo ya zaneya segeg, sok ge Barnabas mage Pol ka wan num kaŋ ajab mage kaŋ ngayya, ge Dok ka kee num ge maa ta ma go, ge nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma buwal zì.
44015013	Sok ge num wa aa go, Jak hee fare, jan go: «Na̰ van ma, ḛ za̰a̰ mbi gale!
44015014	Simo̰ wa̰a̰ nè fare pe gyana, ge pe eeya go gaw, ge Dok daleya ge pe rusu ma ta, ndwa tal pe rusu a̰me ɗu ge num buwal zì, ne kaa mbegeya gezi caɗ ge na pe.
44015015	Fare janna mbe mage nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma way ma ge sok ge ɗu go, ge mojo̰o̰ maktub ge Dok ne njaŋe go:
44015016	“Dwam ɗu, mbi mbo gwan-na, Mbi mbo sin zok ge Daviɗ ne ge guu se digi, Mbi mbo gwan ge ne na byalam go, Mbi mbo gwan ɗû ne ndiŋ.
44015017	A ge pe no, nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma peɗ, Mbo mbo ya ɓyare mbi ge Bagezok pe waɗme, Ɓanna dagre ge num ge mbi taa num go, Num gaa mbi nda ma peɗ me.
44015018	Ano, a fare janna ge Bagezok ne, Ne ge kee kaŋ mbe ma deɗ-ɗa kɔn̰al go, Ge zḛḛ ya wal day.”
44015019	«A ge pe, mbi Jak, mbi duwa no go, ne be kee kwaɗa ge go, a ka seŋe nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to, ge gwan ja ge Dok ta ma ndwa to.
44015020	Ɗaŋɗe, àa njaŋe num lawayta ndwa jan num go, num daa gwan zam duul ge no harcal to ge àa hun num kee siim ma tuwaleya to, num ɔwabe ta gezi ge ene sḛ duul keeya ge batraŋ ma ta, num za duul ge kaŋ kogor ge àa muwa̰se num ka̰a̰l ma to, koo swàm num za ne to me.
44015021	Ago, ge doŋ pe ge zḛḛge ma ta ya day, àa ka hate nda eeya ge Moyiz ne ma, ge suwal ga̰a̰l ge diige diŋ peɗ, ge dape, àa ka isi num ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way ma zì, ge dwam sabaɗ ma go tatab.»
44015022	Sok mbe go, nda ge temeya ma, nda ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme tèmel ma ɓanna ge ɓase ge Krist ne ma mɔɗwag vin ta go, maa see nda a̰me ma ndwa teme num mbo suwal ga̰a̰l Antiyoch ɓanna ge Pol mage Barnabas. Àa mbo ya tal Jude ge àa tol ne Barsabas mage Silas, num ge na̰ van ma hon num hormo gḛḛ.
44015023	Àa hon num lawayta mbe ge num tok go, ge a njaŋe no ne zì go: I, Zeso nda ge temeya ma ɓanna ge nda ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme tèmel ge no ḛ na̰ van ma sa̰a̰ ḛ wa gḛḛ, ḛ na̰ van ge ho fareba ma, ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma, ge kaa no ge suwal ga̰a̰l Antiyoch diŋ, ge suwa ge Siri mage Silisi ne go ma.
44015024	I za̰a̰ go nda a̰me ge i buwal zige ma, ge i ho num i wa ge fare a̰me pagal to ma peɗ, num vuuɗi ḛ ya digi, num vaa ḛ dwaɗɗa ma ya se, ge hateya ge maa way ma ta.
44015025	A ge pe, i vḭḭ ta no go, ne keeya kwaɗa, i taa nda a̰me ma, i wa teme ḛ num ya ɓanna ge na̰ van ge laa wanna ma, Barnabas mage Pol,
44015026	num ge ho̰ ta swày ge tèmel ge Bagezok Zeso Krist ne pe ma.
44015027	I teme ḛ na̰ van Jude mage Silas ya ndwa go, num mbo ya ge maa ndwa gwan wan ḛ fare mbe ma pe.
44015028	On̰om ge Harcal ɓanna ge i, i vḭḭ ta no go, ne keeya kwaɗa ɗe, i daa gwan ee dṵṵl a̰me ge ɗogle ma ḛ pagal to, ɗeŋew fare ge kwaɗa ge mbiya mbaaya mbe ma no:
44015029	Num daa gwan zam duul ge àa hun num kee siim ge ɗogle ma tuwaleya to, num ɔwabe ta gezi ge ene sḛ duul keeya ge batraŋ ma ta, num za duul ge kaŋ kogor ge àa muwa̰se num ka̰a̰l ma to, koo swàm num za ne to me. I wa aa ne, ḛ sa̰a̰ ta wa.
44015030	Àa ee nda ge àa taa num ma mboya, sok ge àa dee ge Antiyoch yà, guwa̰, àa kwate ɓase ge ho fareba ma ya se, àa hon num lawayta mbe.
44015031	Sok ge àa isi lawayta mbe go, àa kee laa saal gḛḛ ge maa see pool ge ne ta pe.
44015032	Ajo̰o̰ Jude mage Silas ma sḛ nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma ne, àa faa na̰ van ma fare ma gḛḛ, ndwa moɗege num, ee num cirsiya ge hoɗ fareba ge maa way ma zì.
44015033	Àa kee dwam ma kwaɗa lag ge num buwal zì, guwa̰, na̰ van ma n̰a num mboya halas, àa jan num go: Dok mbo ge ḛ. Àa gwan ge nda ge teme num ya ma ndwa zì.
44015034	[Ɗaŋɗe, Silas vin tene go, na gaa kàɗɗa swag ge na̰ van ge Suwal Antiyoch diŋ-ge ma ta. Jude gwan mbo Jerusalem hini.]
44015035	Pol mage Barnabas gaa kàɗɗa ge suwal Antiyoch diŋ. Num sḛ ma ɓanna ge na̰ van ge ɗogle ma ka hate mage oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge Bagezok ne.
44015036	Dwam ma guwa̰ kwaɗa lag, Pol jan Barnabas go, n̰a ne guwa̰ mbo suwal ga̰a̰l ge nè oy fare ge Bagezok ne ge num diŋ ma go peɗ, ndwa ndilla go na̰ van ma don go maa hoɗ fareba zì kode?
44015037	Barnabas ka ɓyare go na wan Yohana ge àa chiya ne dḭḭl go Mark ge maa pe yà.
44015038	Ɗaŋɗe, Pol ɓyare fare mbe to, ge dape, Yohana dee suwa num ge suwa Pamfili go go, na daa mbo ge num pe ya, mbo kee tèmel ge num to.
44015039	Za̰a̰ ta to ge num way kee ɗiŋ, àa mbo ya vaa ta se. Barnabas wan Mark, àa ge ne ndee ge baaburi go gwan mbo til Chipr.
44015040	Pol wan Silas ge na pe go me. Guwa̰ ge na̰ van ma ee sok mboya ge num way ge Bagezok tok go, àa n̰a num mboya.
44015041	A ge Silas an ge suwa Siri mage Silisi ne go, ndwa cirsi ɓase ge Krist ne ma, ge hoɗ fareba ge num way ma zì.
44016001	Pol mage Silas ɗege ge sok mbe go, àa deɗ-ɗa ge suwal Derb go, àa gwan zwagre ta mbo suwal Listr. Àa seɗ ndu ge ame hateya a̰me ɗu ge suwal mbe diŋ ge àa tol ne Timote. Ne na̰ Yahuɗ ma van gwale ge ho fareba ne, ne ba Grek ne me.
44016002	Na̰ van ge ho fareba ge suwal Listr mage Ikoniyom diŋ-ge ma ka dore ne gḛḛ.
44016003	Pol ɓyare go ne ɗeme maa. Zḛḛ ge go maa ge num ɓa̰a̰ dagre ɗe, àa vyan ne bḛḛ ge Yahuɗ ge kaa ge sok mbe go ma pe, ago num sḛ ma peɗ, àa kaa ge kuwaya go ne ba Grek ne.
44016004	Ge suwal ga̰a̰l ge àa ka mbo ge num diŋ ma peɗ, àa ka zwagre fare ge nda ge temeya mage nda ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme tèmel ge Jerusalem diŋ-ge ma vḭḭ ta ge num pe pagal ma. Àa ka hoɗ num maa wa go, num gaa mboya ge fare mbe ma no pagal.
44016005	A go mbe no, ɓase ge Krist ne ma ka seɗ pool ge hoɗ fareba ge maa way ma zì no, dwam ma pagal tatab, àa gwan ka zuli se.
44016006	Pol mage nda ge ɗeme na̰ van ma ɗege ge sok mbe go, àa kale mboya digi ge suwa ge Frigi mage Galati ne pagal, ge dape, On̰om ge Harcal be hage vin̰a ge num pagal, ge oy fare ge Dok ne ge suwa ge Azi ne go to.
44016007	Sok ge àa dee ya ge walape ge suwa Mizi mage suwa Bitini ne go, àa ɓyare go maa hee vin̰a ge mbo suwa ge Bitini ne yà. Go no puy, On̰om ge Zeso ne gwan tele num.
44016008	Sok mbe go, àa kale mboya digi ge suwa ge Mizi ne pagal, àa deɗ-ɗa ge suwal ga̰a̰l Trowas diŋ.
44016009	Ge ɗaal zì, kin̰a mbo ya jan Pol. Ge ne kin̰a mbe zì, kuwa van Maseduwan a̰me ɗu mḛḛya, ka gwarge tene ne ta janna go: Ha ya ge suwa Maseduwan go, mo chiya i kṵwa̰ nde ɗe!
44016010	Ge ne kin̰a mbe guwa̰ gaw, i ɓyare vin̰a ge haa mbo suwa Maseduwan yà, ge dape i vḭḭ ta go, Dok tol i ne mbo oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge sok mbe yà.
44016011	I ndee baaburi ge Trowas go, i haa mbo til Samotras zì yà, ge dwam ge zi pagal, i deɗ-ɗa ge suwal Neyapolis go.
44016012	I kan i ko ya digi, i mbo ya ge suwal ga̰a̰l Filib diŋ, ne ge no suwal ga̰a̰l ge zḛḛge, ge suwa Maseduwan ne. Suwal ga̰a̰l mbe, nda ge Rom ma sḭḭ nee ne, àa kaɗ gḛḛ ge ne diŋ me. I dwam dwam ma kwaɗa lag ge suwal ga̰a̰l mbe diŋ.
44016013	Ge dwam sabaɗ go, i waɗ zum ge suwal ga̰a̰l diŋ ndwa mbo ge mangaɗam wa yà. I kaa ge dwaɗɗa go, i mà seɗ sok a̰me ɗu ge Yahuɗ ma seɗ ta kee kaɗeya ne go de. Sok ge i dee yà, i seɗ nda zaab a̰me ma kwateya ge sok mbe go, i kaɗ num ta se, i ee pe hate num fare ge Zeso ne.
44016014	Gwale a̰me ɗu ge num buwal zige, ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to, ne dḭḭl Lidiya, a ndu ge seŋe na tok ge ba̰a̰ tob ge kàal sasaw ge bware gḛḛ ma ne, ne suwal Tyatir. A gwale ge uware Dok ge Yahuɗ ma way ne. Bagezok mbo ya hage ne dul wa gezi, ndwa go ne ame fare janna ge Pol ne ma.
44016015	Guwa̰, àa mbo ya kee ne baptem ɓanna ge ne zok mɔɗwag. Ne sḛ kaɗe i go, kaɗɗa i dwaɗ-ɗa go na ndu ge n̰a wa to ne ge Bagezok pe, ɓyare go i mbo ya ndal na zok pul mbḛḛ. Wan tene ge i wa go ɗiŋ, i mbo ya vin ne.
44016016	Dwam a̰me go ɗu, sok ge i ka mbo ge Yahuɗ ma sok seɗ ta kee kaɗeya yà, i seɗ moor kale a̰me ɗu. Ne sḛ kaa ge on̰om ge dok a̰me ge àa tol ne Pito̰ ne ge na zì, ge ee ne jan nda fare ge mbo keeya ma. Ge ne kaŋ keeya ge go mbe ma ta, ka seɗ kaŋ ma gḛḛ hon na ba ge na kee num tèmel moor ma.
44016017	Ɗege kàre i ge Pol ma pe, ka oyya go: Nda mbe ma no, àa nda ge kee tèmel ge Dok ge waɗe-waɗe ne ma ne, àa wuwage ḛ vin̰a monna .
44016018	Dwam ma gḛḛ, ka jan na fare mbe, ne fare janna mbe mbo ya mbyaɗ Pol duul teteb. Dwam a̰me go ɗu, seŋe tene ge on̰om ge siim ta, jan ne go: Mbi hoɗ mo mbi wa no, ge dḭḭl ge Zeso Krist ne pe, ndage zum ge van gwale mbe zì! Ge sok mbe go gaw, on̰om mbe ndage zum ge ne zì.
44016019	Sok ge ne ba ge kee num tèmel moor ma kuwa go maa daa seɗ mbaaya ge ne ta ge maa ee jobreya ne pagal ge wal go to, num laa mbo ya hoɗɗa ge Pol mage Silas ta. Àa wan num, àa gene num ge sok seɗ ta ge ɓase ma way yà, ge ga̰a̰l ge suwal ne ma ndwa se.
44016020	Guwa̰ ge àa kaŋe num ge nda ge Rom ge kun sariya ma ndwa se, àa ee fare ge num pagal go: Nda mbe ma no, àa Yahuɗ ma ne, àa gene ya iigiya ge ne suwal diŋ.
44016021	Àa hate nda go fare ge ɗogle ma, ge nè wa yuwaleya ho̰ vin̰a go, àa ame num koo àa kee num to ma, nè ge van Rom ma.
44016022	Ɓase ma ɗege ho̰o̰l ge Pol mage Silas pagal waɗme. Guwa̰, nda ge kun sariya ma fwage num ba̰a̰ ma ge num ta gezi, àa hoɗ maa wa go, àa iya num ge calaŋ.
44016023	Sok mbe go, àa iyal num mamaɗ, àa kan num ge daŋay zì. Àa hoɗ maa wa ge ndu ge koy zok daŋay wa ta go, ne koy num kwaɗa.
44016024	Ndu ge see wa hoɗɗa mbe, kan num ge zok daŋay pul ge piyal zige yà, feɗ num ko ma se ge ɓyala.
44016025	Ge ɗaal ga̰a̰l zì, Pol mage Silas ka kee kaɗeya, àa ka mbal kaŋ sale Dok, nda ge daŋay gegene ma ka za̰a̰ num me.
44016026	Tugcug, àa tan ta ge suwa ndaɗ ndaɗɗa ge ndaal, zok daŋay mbo ya saseya ɗiŋ mbo ge ne pe dolla se yà. Ge sok mbe go gaw, zok wa ge zok daŋay ne ma mɔɗwag mbo ya hage ta gezi, zul mage ɓyala ma fen gezi ge daŋay ma ta peɗ.
44016027	Ndu ge koy zok daŋay wa labre ge sok dwam se, sok ge kuwa zok daŋay wa ma hageya gezi, zoɗ na kasagar ndwa go na hṵṵ tene, ge dape, ka dwaɗ go nda ge daŋay ma chiya ya sok.
44016028	Ɗaŋɗe, Pol oy ne ge ka̰a̰l ndaal, janna go: A̰me he mo ndwa kee tene yal gale, i go mɔɗwag!
44016029	Sok mbe go, ba ge koy zok daŋay wa ele go, a ho̰ na ol ya. Sok ge see ol go, haa tene waɗ ge Pol mage Silas ta zì yà, guu na ko se san num wa ge bagre jɔjwag, ndwa hon num hormo.
44016030	Guwa̰, kan num ya zum, jan num go me: Kondore ma, mbi kee gyana ɗoo mbi wa seɗ monna de?
44016031	Àa gwan ge ne janna go: Ho fareba ge Bagezok Zeso ta, mo mà seɗ monna koo mo zok, kaɗɗa na keeya mbe go me.
44016032	Àa jan num ge na nda ge na zok diŋ-ge ma mɔɗwag fare ge Bagezok ne.
44016033	Ge ɗaal mbe zì bàba, gene num mbo usi num jwaŋ ma wa gezi ge sok ge mam no ne go. Sok mbe go gaw, àa kee ne baptem ɓanna ge na nda ma peɗ.
44016034	Guwa̰, ɔwabe num ya na diŋ, hon num kaŋ zam. Ne sḛ ɓanna ge na zok mɔɗwag, àa kee laa saal ge maa dee ya hoɗ fareba ge Dok ta pe.
44016035	Sok ge sok kon̰-n̰a gezi, nda ge Rom ge kun sariya ma teme asagar ma ga̰a̰l ya ge ndu ge koy zok daŋay wa ta go, ne ka̰a̰ nda mbe ma zum.
44016036	Ndu ge koy zok daŋay wa jan Pol ma go: Nda ge kun sariya ma hoɗ maa wa ja no go, mbi doo ḛ. Ge sego, ḛ wuwa zum, ḛ mbo ge halas fare ḛ pagal to.
44016037	Ɗaŋɗe, Pol gwan ge nda ge àa teme num ya ma janna go: Dana, àa iya i ge nda ndwa go be za̰a̰ fare ge i wa zige. I sḛ ma van twàl ge suwal Rom ne ma ne, kee pe gyana, àa wa kan i daŋay zì, àa wa gwan ɓyare go maa kan i zum chala jan be ge kun i sariya to de? Num fare mbe ge na vin̰a go to, ge sego, i ɓyare go num sḛ ma mbo ya kan i zum ne ge maa ndwa.
44016038	Asagar ma ga̰a̰l gwan mbo wan nda ge kun sariya ma fare pe. Sok ge àa za̰a̰ go num van twàl ge suwal Rom ne ma ne, voo mbo ya wan num.
44016039	Ge sok mbe go, num sḛ ma mbo ya ge maa ndwa ge Pol mage Silas ta, àa jan num go num iya maa laa se. Guwa̰, àa kan num zum, àa kaɗe num go, num wuwa zum ge suwal diŋ.
44016040	Sok ge àa wuwa ge daŋay zì ya zum, àa mbo ge na̰ van ge gwale ge ho fareba Lidiya yà. Sok ge àa ge na̰ van ge ho fareba gegene ma kuwa ta ndwa go, àa moɗege num, guwa̰, àa waɗ zum ge suwal diŋ.
44017001	Guwa̰ ge Pol mage Silas ɗege ge suwal Filib diŋ ya zum go, àa kale ya ge suwal Amfipolis mage Apoloni pagal, àa deɗ-ɗa ge suwal Tesalonik go, sok ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way no ge ne diŋ.
44017002	Ge mojo̰o̰ Pol ha̰a̰le keeya go, mbo ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way mbe zì. Àa ge num ka pee ta ɗiŋ Dumas taa, ge dwam sabaɗ ma go nga-nga, ge fare ge no Njaŋeya ge Dok ne zì ma pagal.
44017003	Ka wan num fare pe go, Krist, Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne wa̰a̰ ndwa njoɗ yal mage tan digi ge mojo̰o̰ maktub ma jin̰a num no go. Gwan ka jan num go: Zeso mbe ge mbi wuwage ḛ ne fare no, a Krist mbe ne.
44017004	Yahuɗ a̰me ma, Grek ma gḛḛ ge ka uware Dok ge Yahuɗ ma way, ɓanna ge nda zaab ge pagal kɔn̰al ma gḛḛ mbo ya vin Pol mage Silas fare mbe, àa seŋe ta ya se ge num pe go.
44017005	Ɗaŋɗe, yil mbo ya waɗ ge Yahuɗ gegene ma zì, àa mbo ya ɔwabe nda jabso ge an buwal ma ge maa pe go, àa ka kee kṵwa̰ ge suwal ga̰a̰l diŋ, àa iigi ne digi me. Àa mbo ya deɗ Jason zok, ndwa wan Pol mage Silas gene num mbo ge ɓase ma ndwa se yà.
44017006	Ɗaŋɗe, àa seɗ num to. Ge sok mbe go, àa seŋe maa ndwa ge Jason mage na̰ van a̰me ge ho fareba ma ta, àa wan num gene ya ge nda ge kun sariya ge suwal ga̰a̰l ne ma ndwa se. Sok mbo ge num go, àa ka oyya digi go: Ḛ gale ndi ɗoo me, nda mbe ge iigi dunin̰a ya digi giliw ma mbo ja ge go go ba!
44017007	Jason ame num ya ge na diŋ. Num sḛ ma peɗ kee tèmel ge Sezar wa hoɗɗa ma pagal to. Àa jan go, gan ga̰a̰l a̰me ge ɗogle go, ge àa tol ne Zeso.
44017008	Fare mbe ma mbo ya iigi ɓase mage nda ge kun sariya ge suwal ga̰a̰l ne ma digi.
44017009	Zḛḛ ge go num n̰a Jason mage na̰ van gegene ma mboya, nda ge kun sariya ma ee num poɗ kaŋ dṵṵl nde, ndwa ngayya go fare daa to.
44017010	Sok ge ɗaal wa̰a̰ se go gaw, na̰ van ge ho fareba ma ee Pol mage Silas ge vin̰a go mbo Bere. Sok ge àa dee yà gaw, àa mbo ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way zì.
44017011	Yahuɗ ge suwal Bere diŋ-ge ma fare kwaɗa waɗe num ge suwal Tesalonik diŋ-ge ma. Àa kaa ge uwaseya sɔswag ge za̰a̰ fare ge Dok ne, àa ka hale maktub pul dwam ge dwam ndwa ndilla go, fare ge Pol hate num ma, num mbo ge fare njaŋeya ma pagal tetem ko ɓade.
44017012	Ge sok mbe go, nda mbo ya hoɗ fareba gḛḛ. Grek ma zaab ge pagal kɔn̰al mage Grek soɗob ma kaa gḛḛ ge num buwal zì me.
44017013	Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge Yahuɗ ge Tesalonik diŋ-ge ma za̰a̰ go, Pol oy fare ge Dok ne go, ge suwal Bere diŋ yà waɗme, àa mbo ya ge sok mbe go, àa waɗ fare ge num zì, àa tun num digi waɗme.
44017014	Sok mbe go, na̰ van ge ho fareba ma haa ta avun cab, ee Pol ge nda a̰me ma ɗeme ne mbo mam ga̰a̰l nuwam wa yà, ge sok ndee baaburi go. Ɗaŋɗe, Silas mage Timote gaa kàɗɗa ge suwal Bere diŋ.
44017015	Nda ge ɗeme Pol ma gene ne ɗiŋ ge suwal Aten yà. Guwa̰ go, àa seŋe ya gwanna ge tèmel, ge Pol ho na wa ya go, Silas mage Timote kàre na pe yà avun cab.
44017016	Sok ge Pol ka da̰a̰re Silas mage Timote ge suwal ga̰a̰l Aten diŋ go, ne on̰om kaa iigiya gḛḛ ge ne sḛ zì, ge dape, kaŋ siim ma kaa gḛḛ ge suwal mbe diŋ.
44017017	Àa ge Yahuɗ mage nda ge uware Dok ge num way ma ka pee ta fare ge zok kee kaɗeya ge num way zì. Dwam ma tatab, àa ge nda ge ɗogle ma ka pee ta ge sok seɗ ta ge ɓase ma way go.
44017018	Nda ge hate kuwaya ɗugul ge Epikur mage Setoyig ne ma, ɗege pee ta ge ne. Ge pee ta ge num way zì, a̰me ma ka janna go, ge kabe na wa mbe ɓyare jan sḛ gyana tem de? Gegene ma ka janna go: Ndil ge mojo̰o̰ ne faa dok a̰me ge gɔswal ma fare go. Ge dape, Pol ka oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge Zeso ne mage tanna ge nda ge swày ma way ne me.
44017019	Ge sok mbe go, àa ɗeme Pol mbo ya ge sok seɗ ta ge nda ga̰a̰l ge andaŋ ge suwal ne ma ndwa se, ndwa go Areyopage. Nda ga̰a̰l ele ne go: Mà kaɗ ge mo wan i hateya ge jin̰al ge mo hate ne fare pe zum nde de?
44017020	Ago, fare janna ge amo ma deɗ ge i ta ge mojo̰o̰ fare ge i za̰a̰ num dwam ɗu to ma go. I ɓyare no go mo wa̰a̰ i num pe zum kɔn̰al yaɗaɗ.
44017021	Ago nda ge suwal Aten diŋ-ge ma peɗ, ɓanna ge nda ge kaa mbày ge num buwal zì ma, àa ka hee sok ge maa pagal, sok jan fare koo za̰a̰ fare paageya ge mbo ya jin̰al ma go.
44017022	Ge sok mbe go, Pol ɗege mḛḛya num ndwa digi ge Areyopage go, jan num go: Nda ge suwal Aten ma, mbi ge kuwaya go, ḛ nda ge laa wa̰a̰ kee dok gḛḛ ma ne, ge kaŋ keeya ge ḛ ḛ ma zì peɗ.
44017023	Ago, sok ge mbi ka anna ndil suwal go, mbi kuwa kaŋ ge ḛ uware num ma peɗ. Mbi see twal tuwaleya a̰me no ɗu, ge kaŋ njaŋeya no ge ne ta go: A ge dok ge nda kuwa ne to pe. Dok ge ḛ uware ne, be ge ḛ wan ne pe to, a ne ge mbi mbo ya jan ḛ ne fare ne.
44017024	Dok ge doo dunin̰a ge kaŋ ge no ge na pul zì ma peɗ, ne sḛ Bagezok ge kee muluk no ge pḭḭ mage suwa pagal ne, kaɗ ge zok ge nda duwana ma sḭḭ num ge na pe ma zì to.
44017025	Ɓyare mbaaya a̰me ge nda duwana ma ta to. Ɗaŋɗe, a ne sḛ ee nda duwana ma kaɗ ge ndwa ne, ho̰ num on̰om ge on̰n̰a mage kaŋ ma no peɗ me.
44017026	A ge ndu ɗu ta, pe rusu ma wuwa ya se no, àa dasare kàɗɗa ge suwa pagal no peɗ. Vaa somo̰ mage mamasege ma buwal no, caɗe walape ge sok kàɗɗa ge num way ma no ge num pe me.
44017027	Kê ano mbe ndwa go num dee ya ɓyare na, num ɓyare na liliɗ, tamekyala num dee ya seɗ na. A fareba go, a kaal ge ndu ge diige to.
44017028	«Ago, a ge ne ta, ndu kaɗ ge ndwa no, an no, kuwa tene kàɗɗa ge na ne zì no. Ano, a kaŋ ge ḛ nda ge njaŋe kaŋ ma jin̰a num ma ne waɗme. Àa jin̰a no go: “Nè sḛ ma ne van ma ne waɗme.”
44017029	Kaɗɗa nè ne van ma ne ɗe, be kee kwaɗa go ne dwaɗ go Dok ne dinna ca, ge dok a̰me ge nda duwana ma ɗeere num ge dinar, ge bware walam koo ge àa caa num ge njal ma go to, ge andaŋ mage zwam ge maa way ma ta.
44017030	Ḛ ge kuwaya go Dok be ka isi ge kaŋ keeya ge nda duwana ma way, ge àa ka kee num wal ge kuwaya zì to ma pagal to, ɗaŋɗe, ge sego, Dok ho̰ nda duwana ma na wa ge sok ma go peɗ no go, num seŋe ta ya se,
44017031	ge dape, ee dwam a̰me go ɗu, ge go na wa mbo kun sariya kunna ge temel taɗ ge dunin̰a pagal, ge ndu a̰me ɗu ge na taa ne ta. Ngay fare ge ndu mbe ne ya ge nda ta peɗ, sok tan ne ge nda ge swày ma buwal zì go.»
44017032	Guwa̰ ge àa za̰a̰ fare janna ge Pol ne, ge fare ge tanna ge nda ge swày ma way ne pagal, a̰me ma ka coɗ ta ge ne, gegene ma jan ne go: Gaa dwam ge ɗogle gale i wa gwan za̰a̰ mo fare mbe.
44017033	Ge sok mbe go, Pol n̰a num, mbo.
44017034	Go no puy ɗe, nda a̰me ma vin ne fare mbe, àa mbo ya hoɗ fareba. Ge nda mbe ma buwal zì, Denis, ndu ge kee tèmel ge nda ga̰a̰l ge andaŋ ge suwal ne ma buwal zige, gwale ge àa tol ne Damaris ɓanna ge nda a̰me ge ɗogle ma me.
44018001	Guwa̰, Pol ɗege ge Aten go mbo suwal Korent yà.
44018002	Sok ge dee yà, seɗ Yahuɗ a̰me ɗu, ge too ge suwa ge Po̰o̰ ne go, ge àa tol ne Akilas mage na gwale Prisil, gale mbo ya mbo no ge suwa Itali ya, ge dape, Kloɗ, gan ga̰a̰l ge waɗe ge suwa Itali ne ho na wa go, a yin̰a Yahuɗ ma ge suwal ga̰a̰l Rom diŋ. Pol mbo ya ge num ta.
44018003	Ajo̰o̰ àa ka kee tèmel ge ɗu pe, gaa kàɗɗa kee tèmel ge num dagre. Num tèmel kaa tèmel ge wan dab ge gur pe ma yaɗ gezi.
44018004	Ge dwam sabaɗ ma go tatab, àa ge nda ka pee ta fare ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way zì, ka ɓyare vin̰a go na ee Yahuɗ mage Grek ma eya fare.
44018005	Sok ge Silas mage Timote mbô ge suwa Maseduwan ya ge suwal Korent diŋ, Pol mbo ya hon tene ge ɓul mɔɗwag ge fare oyya ta, ka jan Yahuɗ ma zum waŋ go, Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne, ndu ge Dok taa nee ne.
44018006	Ajo̰o̰ Yahuɗ ma ka mḛḛ piliya ge ne, àa ka sal ne me, ge sok mbe go, gasage na ba̰a̰ kuci ma ge num pagal, jan num go: Ḛ swàm kaa ge ḛ pagal, mbi tok zì to. Ge sego, mbi gaa seŋe tene ge nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma ta.
44018007	Ɗege ge sok mbe go, mbo ge ndu a̰me ge àa tol ne Titus Justis diŋ yà, a ndu ge ka uware Dok ge Yahuɗ ma way, ge ne zok no guwa ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way.
44018008	Krispus ga̰a̰l ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way mbe ne, mbo ya hoɗ fareba ge Bagezok ta ɓanna ge na zok mɔɗwag. Nda gḛḛ ge suwal Korent diŋ, ge ka za̰a̰ Pol ma mbo ya hoɗ fareba, àa mbo ya kee num baptem waɗme.
44018009	Dwam a̰me ɗu, Bagezok mbo ya jan Pol fare ge kin̰a zì go: Kaa ge mo chiya voo to, ɗaŋɗe, mbo ndwa zḛḛ ge fare oyya zì, mɔge to.
44018010	Ee mo ndwa se, mbi go, ndu a̰me ge kee mo fare to. Ago, mbi nda ma go gḛḛ ge suwal mbe diŋ.
44018011	Kee ge num buwal zì del ɗu ge saba menengal, ka hate num fare ge Dok ne.
44018012	Sok ge Galiyo̰ kaa goformo̰ ge suwa ge Akay ne go, Yahuɗ ma za̰a̰ ta ge Pol pagal, àa wan ne, àa mbo ge ne ge nda ge kun sariya ma ndwa se yà.
44018013	Àa jan go: Ndu mbe no, ɓyare ee nda uware Dok, be ge eeya ge Moyiz ne ma pagal to.
44018014	Sok ge Pol ɓyare faaya ndwa ben tene, Galiyo̰ vee ne be hage na wa, jan Yahuɗ ma go: Daa go ne fare ge swày hunna nee ne koo n̰aal a̰me ge kakatag ne, mbi daa mà za̰a̰ ḛ,
44018015	ajo̰o̰ ḛ pee ta ge fare ma pagal, ge dḭḭl mage eeya ge ḛ ḛ ma pagal, mbi ɓyare vaa ḛ buwal to, ḛ sḛ ma ndi fare mbe nuusiya ta buwal zì.
44018016	Yan num ge sok kun sariya zì ya zum.
44018017	Sok mbe go, àa wan Sosten, ga̰a̰l ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way ne, àa ɗege ne ta iyalla ge zok kun sariya wa zum, ɗaŋɗe, Galiyo̰ iigi tene ge fare mbe pe to.
44018018	Pol kaɗ kaal swag ge suwal Korent diŋ. Guwa̰, n̰a na̰ van ma, ndee baaburi go mbo Siri ɓanna ge Prisil mage na obe Akilas. Zḛḛ ge go ne ndee baaburi ge sok ndee baaburi ge Saŋkre ne go, soɗ na pagal gezi, ge dape, kê wa tii a̰me go.
44018019	Sok ge àa dee ya ge suwal Efez diŋ, a ge sok mbe go, Pol n̰a Prisil mage na obe Akilas no. Kaɗɗa ge ne sḛ ɗe, mbo ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way zì yà, àa ge num ka pee ta fare.
44018020	Àa kaɗe ne go, ne kaa ge maa swag, ɗaŋɗe, vin num fare mbe to.
44018021	Sok n̰a num go, jan num go: Kaɗɗa Dok mbo hage vin̰a ya ge mbi pagal, mbi mbo gwan-na ge ḛ ta. Ge Efez go, ndee baaburi go mbo zḛḛ.
44018022	Sok ge Pol dee ya ge Sezare go, kan na ko mbo ge suwal Jerusalem yà, ndwa san ɓase ge Krist ne ma wa. Guwa̰, gwan-na mbo Antiyoch.
44018023	Guwa̰ ge kaa swag ge suwal Antiyoch diŋ, ɗege ge sok mbe go, ka zwagre tene zḛḛ zḛḛ ge suwa ge Galati mage Frigi ne ma go. Ka sal nda ge ame hateya ma peɗ pul ge hoɗ fareba ge num way ma zì.
44018024	Ge dwam mbe ma go, Yahuɗ a̰me ɗu ge àa tol ne Apolos, too ge suwal Alekzandri go, ne ka̰a̰l ka faa fare sawal, kaa ndu ge kuwa Njaŋeya ge Dok ne ma gezi kwaɗa hetel, mbo ya ge suwal Efez go no.
44018025	See hateya ge vin̰a ge Bagezok ne pagal kwaɗa, kaa fogol cacaf sok oy fare mage hate fare ge Zeso ne go, ge temel pagal. Ɗaŋɗe, ka kuwa ɗeŋew baptem ge Yohana ne.
44018026	Ka jan fare be ndwa baaya ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way zì. Sok ge Prisil mage na obe Akilas za̰a̰ ne fare hateya go, àa wan ne ya ge maa ta, àa hate ne vin̰a ge Dok ne zum kɔn̰al yaɗaɗ.
44018027	Ajo̰o̰ na kaa ge dwaɗɗa ge mbo suwa Akay, na̰ van ma vin ne fare mbe, àa teme lawayta mbo hon nda ge ame hateya ma, ndwa go num ame ne. Sok ge dee yà, na̰ van ge ho fareba ma seɗ pool gḛḛ ge ne ta, ge kwaɗa keeya ge Dok ngay ne ge ne ta pe.
44018028	Ago, ge fare janna ge ne ne ge gag ma ta, ka pee tene ge Yahuɗ ma, ge sok seɗ ta ge num way ge sok ɓase go ge ma, ka ngay num ge Njaŋeya ge Dok ne ma ta go, Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne, Ndu ge Dok taa nee ne.
44019001	Sok ge Apolos kaa ge suwal Korent diŋ gale, Pol kale ya ge Azi sok njal ma go, deɗ-ɗa ge suwal Efez diŋ. Àa ge nda ge ame hateya a̰me ma seɗ ta, ele num go:
44019002	Ḛ ame On̰om ge Harcal sok ge ḛ ho fareba go ɓade? Àa gwan ge ne janna go: I be za̰a̰ On̰om ge Harcal fare faaya dwam ɗu to.
44019003	Pol ele num go: Àa kê ḛ ma̰ baptem pe de? Àa gwan ge ne janna go: Baptem ge Yohana ka hate nda ne.
44019004	Ge sok mbe go, jan num go: Yohana kee baptem ge seŋe ta se ne, ka jan Izrayel van ma go, num ho fareba ge ndu ge mbo no ge na guwa̰ ya ta, ndwa go, Zeso.
44019005	Sok ge nda mbe ma za̰a̰ fare ge Pol jin̰a maa num ma go, àa gwan kee num baptem ge dḭḭl ge Bagezok Zeso ne.
44019006	Pol ee na tok ma ge num pagal kee kaɗeya, On̰om ge Harcal mbo ya biri num, àa ɗege faa wa ge ɗogle ma, àa ka zwagre fare ge Dok jan maa num ma zum me.
44019007	Nda soɗob mbe ma mɔɗwag wol pɔgwa zi.
44019008	Ɗiŋ saba taa, Pol ka mbo ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way zì, ka jan num fare be voo. Àa ge num ka pee ta fare ge muluk ge Dok ne pagal, ka ɓyare vin̰a ge ee num vin na fare mbe ma go, num fare ge fareba ma ne.
44019009	Ɗaŋɗe, nda a̰me ma vin fare mbe ma ge maa sḛ zì to, àa kuri be hoɗ fareba, àa ka vḛḛne vin̰a ge Bagezok ne ge ɓase ma ndwa zì. Ge sok mbe go, Pol ɔwabe tene ge num ta gezi, kwate nda ge ame hateya ma gezi yà jan, ka hate num fare dwam ge dwam ge zok hate nda ge Tiranus ne zì.
44019010	Hon na hateya mbe ɗiŋ del zi, ge go Yahuɗ mage Grek ge Azi go ma peɗ deɗ-ɗa za̰a̰ fare ge Bagezok ne.
44019011	Dok hon Pol pool ge kee kaŋ ajab ge waɗe ge nda duwana ma dwaɗɗa ma pagal.
44019012	Àa ka ɔwabe ne ba̰a̰ wa ge tigɗi uwa̰se mage ne ba̰a̰ ge ka̰a̰ num na duul ta ma, mbo taɗ nda ge tuguɗi ma ge num, nda ge tuguɗi ma ka seɗ zonna, on̰om ge sone ma ndage zum ge num zì me.
44019013	Yahuɗ a̰me ma, ge ka anna kee mbole ge sok ma go peɗ ndwa yan on̰om ge sone ma, àa ɗege tol dḭḭl ge Bagezok Zeso ne waɗme ge nda ge no ge on̰om ge sone ma pagal, àa ka janna go: Mbi hoɗ ḛ mbi wa ge dḭḭl ge Zeso ge Pol oy ne fare ta! On̰om ge sone ma, ḛ ndage zum.
44019014	Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l a̰me ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way, ge àa tol ne Seba, ne van ge soɗob ge ɓỳala ma ka kee ano mbe ne.
44019015	Ɗaŋɗe, ge dwam a̰me go ɗu, ndu ge no ge on̰om ge sone na zì gace num janna go: Mbi kuwa Zeso kuwa, mbi kuwa Pol me, ḛ sḛ ma, ḛ huɗi ma ne de?
44019016	Ndu mbe ge no ge on̰om ge sone na zì mbe ɓole ya ge num pagal iyalla, ne pool waɗe ge num pagal, àa jay maa pe soo ge zok mbe zì ya pe swala, ge jwaŋ ma ge maa ta.
44019017	Nda ge kaa ge suwal ga̰a̰l ge Efez ne diŋ-ge ma peɗ, Yahuɗ mage Grek ma za̰a̰ fare mbe, voo mbo ya wan num, dḭḭl ge Bagezok Zeso ne mbo ya seɗ uwareya.
44019018	Lee gḛḛ ge nda ge ho fareba ma buwal zige mbo ya jan kaŋ ge maa kê num ge sone ma zum ge ɓase go.
44019019	Nda ge ka kee mbole ma lee gḛḛ, gene maa maktub ge kee mbole ma ya, àa til num gezi, ge nda ndwa go peɗ me. Àa wan yee ge maktub mbe ma way digi, àa seɗ go num bware mbo digi ge silay dudubu warnuwan̰.
44019020	A ge ano mbe ma no ta, Dok ngay pool ge na ne zum no, fare ge Bagezok ne dasare se no me.
44019021	Guwa̰ ge fare mbe ma way go, Pol vin tene ge na on̰om zì go na kale mboya ge suwa Maseduwan mage Akay go, ndwa mbo Jerusalem yà. Ka janna go: Sok ge na mbo deɗ-ɗa yà, ne ɓyare go na mbo suwal ga̰a̰l Rom waɗme.
44019022	Teme nda ge mbaa na ma zi, Timote mage Eras mbo suwa Maseduwan, ɗaŋɗe, ne sḛ gaa gale kàɗɗa swag ge suwa ge Azi ne go.
44019023	Ge zaman mbe go, suwal ga̰a̰l Efez mbo ya seɗ iigiya gḛḛ ge vin̰a ge Bagezok ne pe.
44019024	Ndu ge ɗeere fool a̰me ge àa tol ne go Demetriyus, ka ɗeere zok siim van ge dok ge gwale Artemis ne ma ge bware walam, nda ge ka kee tèmel ge ne ma, ka seɗ poɗɗa ge kwaɗa.
44019025	Tol na nda ge tèmel mage nda ge ɗeere fool gegene ma ya se, jan num go: Mbi kondore ma, ḛ kuwa kuwa go, nè kaa kwaɗa ge nè ka̰a̰m buwal zì, ge tèmel mbe no ta.
44019026	Ɗaŋɗe, Pol mbe jan go: Dok ge nda duwana ma kee num ge maa tok zì ma, num be din ta ge Dok ge fareba to. Muwa̰le nda ya gḛḛ ge na pe go, be ge suwal ga̰a̰l ge Efez ne diŋ ɗeŋew to, ɗaŋɗe, ge suwa ge Azi ne pagal mɔɗwag. Ḛ ge fare mbe ma za̰a̰ya mage num kuwaya waɗme.
44019027	Ano mbe no, vḛḛne be nè tèmel ɗeŋew to, ɗaŋɗe, zok siim ge dok ge gwale Artemis ne mbe mbo seŋe a̰me pe to. Go mbe no, dok ge gwale Artemis mbo ban hormo ge na ne, ne sḛ ge nda uware ne, ge suwa ge Azi ne go peɗ, ge dunin̰a zì peɗ me.
44019028	Sok ge àa wa̰a̰ num fare mbe ma pe go, àa ceŋe ge twam, àa ɗege oyya digi go: Artemis ge Efez ma way, a̰me ge mbyaɗ tene ge ne go to.
44019029	Sok mbe go, suwal ga̰a̰l mbo ya iigi digi giliw, àa za̰a̰ ta, àa muwa̰le mbo ge sok seɗ ta ge ɓase ma way yà, àa zoore van Maseduwan ge zi ma, Gayus mage Aristark, num ge ka ɗeme Pol ma ge maa ndwa zḛḛ yà.
44019030	Pol sḛ kaa ge dwaɗɗa ge mbo ge ɓase ma buwal zì yà, ndwa jan num fare. Ɗaŋɗe, nda ge ame hateya ma tele ne gezi.
44019031	Ne kondore a̰me ma ge kaa ga̰a̰l ge suwa ge Azi ne go ma dol tèmel ya jan ne go: A̰me he mo ndwa ge mbo ge sok seɗ ta ge ɓase ma way mbe yà gale ɓaca.
44019032	Ge sok seɗ ta ge ɓase ma way mbe go, nda ɗege oyya digi batraŋ, ge dape, nda gḛḛ be wan fare ge ee maa mbo ya ge sok mbe go pe to.
44019033	Yahuɗ a̰me ma ge ɓase ma buwal zì, ɓyan maa kon ge àa tol ne Alekzandr ya ge nda ndwa zḛḛ, àa wan ne fare pe ge ndwa jan ɓase ma. Ne sḛ mbo ya hee na tok digi ndwa kee nda kuwaya go num zane. Ɓyare hee fare janna ndwa ben tene ge ɓase ma ndwa se.
44019034	Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge ɓase ma kuwa go ne Yahuɗ ne, àa ɗege digi oyya wa dagre ɗu go: Artemis ge Efez ma way, a̰me ge mbyaɗ tene ge ne go to. Oyya ge num way mbe mbo ɗiŋ guwa ge ler zi.
44019035	Guwa̰, ndu ge njaŋe kaŋ ge suwal ga̰a̰l ne seɗ vin̰a ge ee nda angal se, jan go: Ɓase ge suwal Efez ne ma, nè ge kuwaya go, suwal ga̰a̰l Efez, ne suwal ge koy zok ge dok Artemis mage kḭḭ caaya ge ne ne ge dee no ge pḭḭ zì ya ne to de?
44019036	Ajo̰o̰ na fare ge mbiya ndu pee ne to ne, be kee kwaɗa go, ḛ hee ta digi to, ɓyare go ḛ iya ḛ laa se.
44019037	Ago nda soɗob ge ḛ gene num ya ge sok mbe go ma, àa be chel a̰me ge nè zok siim zì to, koo àa jan fare a̰me ge sone kakatag ge dok ge gwale Artemis ne pagal to me.
44019038	Go mbe no, Demetriyus mage na nda ge tèmel ma, kaɗɗa maa ge fare eeya ge ndu a̰me pagal ɗe, ɓyare go num mbo ya kaŋeya, àa wa kare num fare ge dwam ge àa ee num kee sariya ma go.
44019039	Kaɗɗa ḛ fare ge ɗogle gegene ma go me ɗe, ḛ ge vin̰a ge mbo ge num ya ge ɓase ge suwal ne ma ndwa se, àa wa nuusi ḛ num.
44019040	Kaɗɗa go to, nda mà ndil nè kwateya ge màge mbe ge mojo̰o̰ nè ɓyare ɗege digi ge ho̰o̰l a̰me go, ndwa go fare a̰me ge mbiya ben nè gezi ge kwateya mbe pe to. Guwa̰ ge aa na fare mbe janna go, hoɗ ɓase ma na wa go, num mbyare.
44020001	Sok ge ho̰o̰l wa wa̰a̰ se go, Pol kwate nda ge ame hateya ma ya se, moɗege num me. Guwa̰ ge moɗege num go, san num wa, hee vin̰a mbo suwa Maseduwan.
44020002	Sok mboya go, ka dwage nda ge ho fareba ma moɗegeya ge na ndwa zḛḛ, ɗiŋ deɗ ge suwa Gres ne yà.
44020003	Gaa kàɗɗa ge sok mbe go ɗiŋ saba taa. Sok ge dee ya nuusi tene go, na gaa ndee baaburi mbo suwa Siri ɗe, za̰a̰ go Yahuɗ ma vwal wa ya ge na pagal go. Vin tene go, na hee na ko pul gwan mbo suwa Maseduwan.
44020004	Nda ge ɗeme ne ma kaa gḛḛ. Ge num buwal zì: Sopater ge Pyrus van, ndu ge suwal Bere ne, Aristark mage Sekondus, nda ge suwal Tesalonik ne ma, Gayus ndu ge suwal Derb, Timote, Tichig mage Trofim, van ge suwa Azi ne ma.
44020005	Nda mbe ma mbo ge i ndwa zḛḛ yà, àa mbo da̰a̰re i ge suwal Trowas diŋ no.
44020006	Ge vḛḛso ge dupḛ ge be jìn̰al hore ma ne guwa̰, i sḛ ma gaa ndee baaburi ge num pe ya ge suwal Filib go no. I kê no dwam nuwan̰ ge vin̰a zì, i dee ya ge num ta no, ge suwal Trowas diŋ. Ge sok mbe go, i kê no dwam ɓỳala.
44020007	Dwam Dumas go, i kwate ya se ndwa siɗi dupḛ no. Ajo̰o̰ Pol kaa ge dwaɗɗa ge mbo kin̰are, ka hon hateya, ndiri na hateya mbe ɗiŋ mbo ge ɗaal ga̰a̰l zì yà.
44020008	Ge zok ge kon pagal digi-ge, ge i kwate ge ne zì, lampe ma kaa digi eeya gḛḛ-gḛḛ.
44020009	Van bogol ge àa tol ne Etikus, kaa ge zok ndwal go, ajo̰o̰ Pol ndiri na fare mbe kaal nde, dwam ge tii mbo ya wan van mbe ɗiŋ, ee ne fwageya ge zok ge kon pagal ge taa digi ya se. Sok ge àa mbo ya wan ne digi, àa seɗ go ne suu suu.
44020010	Ɗaŋɗe, Pol ndee ya se, hugi ge ne pagal go, ɔwabe ne ge na kṵwa̰l zì, jan go: Ḛ iigi ta to, on̰om gale ne zì.
44020011	Guwa̰, Pol ndee digi, siɗi dupḛ se, a ge num zam me. Gwan ndiri na hateya mbe ɗiŋ mbo aaram, gaa ɗege mbo ya.
44020012	Guwa̰, àa gene van bogol mbe mbo diŋ yà ge na ndwa. Ano mbe kaa kaŋ eyal laa ge ga̰a̰l ne ge nda ta peɗ me.
44020013	Ajo̰o̰ Pol vḭḭ tene go na mbo suwal Asos ge na ko, i sḛ ma hee baaburi ge mam se ge zḛḛ, jaŋe mbo ge suwal mbe yà, ndwa go i wa ame ne ge i pe go.
44020014	Sok ge mbo ya seɗ i ge Asos go, i ame ne, i ge num ɓan jaŋeya mbo suwal ga̰a̰l Mitilen.
44020015	I ɓyan zum ge sok mbe go, i jaŋe mbo ge til Chiyo zì yà. Ge dwam ge zi pagal, i haa mbo ge til Samos zì yà. Ge dwam ge taa pagal, i ɗege ge Samos go, i deɗ-ɗa ge suwal ga̰a̰l Mile go.
44020016	Ago, Pol vḭḭ tene go, na yabe ge suwal ga̰a̰l Efez diŋ to, sok mà kee ge kale na ge suwa ge Azi ne go. Ka haa tene ge dwaɗɗa ge go, kàɗɗa vin̰a go, na kaa ge dwam vḛḛso ge Pantekoɗ ne go, ge Jerusalem diŋ.
44020017	A go mbe no, Pol doo tèmel ge suwal Mile go mbo tol nda ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme tèmel ge no ɓase ge Krist ne pagal ma ge suwal ga̰a̰l Efez diŋ ya no.
44020018	Sok ge àa mbo ya ge ne ta, jan num go: Ḛ kuwa mboya mage tèmel keeya ge ambi ḛ buwal zì, ge dwam ge mbi ka̰a̰ mbi ko ge suwa Azi go, ge pe eeya ya day ɗiŋ deɗ-ɗa ge dwam ge mbi n̰a ḛ go.
44020019	Mbi kê tèmel ge Bagezok ne, ge pagal gwanna se lɔlɔgwaɗ, ge miim mage yal ge Yahuɗ ma ka gene num ya ge mbi pagal ma ta.
44020020	Ḛ kuwa go, mbi be ka koy a̰me ge mbiya mbaa ḛ ge mbi sḛ pe to, sok oy ḛ mage hate ḛ fare ge Bagezok Zeso ne go, ge sok ɓase ma go, ge zok ma diŋ me.
44020021	Mbi ka jan Yahuɗ mage Grek ma fare zum waŋ go, num seŋe ta ya se ge Dok ta, num ho fareba ge nè Bagezok Zeso ta me.
44020022	Ge sego, mbi mbo Jerusalem ge laa ɓyareya ge On̰om ge Harcal ne pagal. Mbi wan kaŋ ge nda duwana ma mbo kee ge mbi ya pe to.
44020023	Mbi kuwa ɗeŋew go, ge suwal ga̰a̰l ge diige ge mbi ka mbo ge ne diŋ, On̰om ge Harcal ka wuwage mbi go, nda duwana ma mbo wan mbi dol daŋay, àa ee mbi za̰a̰ yal ma gḛḛ me.
44020024	Go no puy, ndwa ge ambi be fare a̰me pe ne ge mbi ta to, kaŋ ge mbi ɓyare ɗeŋew, ago mbi huy tèmel ge Bagezok ɓin̰a ne ge mbi tok go keeya wa. Tèmel mbe ge àa ho̰ mbi ne keeya, ago mbi jin̰a Fare ge Kwaɗa ge kwaɗa keeya ge Dok ne pagal ge nda ta.
44020025	Ge sego, ḛ za̰a̰ gale, ḛ ge mbi ka an oy muluk ge Dok ne ḛ ta ma peɗ, mbi ge kuwaya tyatyaɗ go, a gaa no mbo zḛḛ, ḛ mbo daa gwan kuwa mbi ndwa to.
44020026	Màno, mbi jan ḛ ne zum waŋ go: Ḛ swàm kaa ge ḛ pagal, mbi tok zì to.
44020027	Ago mbi wuwage ḛ nuusiya ge Dok ne ya zum peɗ, be ge way ḛ fare a̰me ɗu to.
44020028	Ḛ nda ga̰a̰l ge On̰om ge Harcal ee ḛ ɗeme ɓase ge Dok ne ma, ḛ doo ḛ ndwa kwaɗa ge ḛ sḛ ma pagal, ge nda ge ḛ ɗeme num ma pagal mɔɗwag me. Dinna ge nda ge koy tame kwaɗa ma go, ḛ koy nda ge Dok ne ma kwaɗa, ge ne sḛ ee num ya gaa na ne ma, ge swàm ge na Van ne ta.
44020029	Mbi kuwa kuwa go, guwa̰ ge mbi mbo kàɗɗa to, nda duwana ge dḭḭ ta ge bagomso cole-cole go ma, mbo waɗ ta ya ge ḛ buwal zì, àa mbo eyan vwag ge tame ma way to.
44020030	Koo nda a̰me ge ḛ buwal zige ma, àa mbo ɗege jan fare ge hày ma, àa zwal nda ge ame hateya ma ge maa pe yà.
44020031	Go mbe no, ḛ kaa yaŋ-yaŋ! Ḛ duwa ge del taa ge mbi kê num ḛ buwal zì ma pagal, ɗaal mage gyala, ge miim ma ge mbi ndwa go, mbi be kan tene se to, mbi ka yuwale ndu ge diige ge ḛ buwal zige.
44020032	Ge sego, mbi deŋe ḛ ge Dok tok go, mbi kaɗe go ne fare ge kwaɗa mba ḛ me. Ne sḛ ge pool ge ee ḛ donna ge hoɗ fareba zì, hon ḛ kaŋ kwaɗa ge na kê wa tii ge nda ge na ne ge seŋe ya harcal ma pe peɗ me.
44020033	Mbi be ee mbi ene ge kaŋ a̰me ge ndu ne pagal to: Koo ne bware, koo ne dinar, koo ne ba̰a̰ ma.
44020034	Ḛ sḛ ma kuwa gyana ge mbi ka kee tèmel ge mbi tok zì, ndwa seɗ kaŋ ge mbaa tene koo ge mbaa mbi ka̰a̰m ge tèmel ma.
44020035	Mbi ngay ḛ ge kaŋ ma zì peɗ go, ḛ ho̰ ta kee tèmel mbe go waɗme, ndwa mbaa nda ge hoɗegeya ma. Nè duwa ge fare janna ge Bagezok Zeso ne pagal, ge jin̰a go: Laa saal go gḛḛ ge ndu ge ɓyan na tok pe zum pe, waɗe ndu ge tok doo no ge ame ya pe.
44020036	Guwa̰ ge Pol aa na fare janna ma go, guu na ko se ge num dagre, kee kaɗeya.
44020037	Num sḛ ma paa maa wa fiyaso zì peɗ, àa ka buu ne zì, sok san ne wa ge guwa̰ dwab go.
44020038	Kaŋ ge ee num ka fyal fiyaso ge kirgi ta, a ne fare ge jin̰a go, maa ge num daa gwan kuwa ta ndwa to. Ge guwa̰ go, àa ɗeme ne ya ɗiŋ mbo ya sok ndee baaburi ge mam se ge go.
44021001	Guwa̰ ge i n̰a nda ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme nda ge ho fareba ge no suwal ga̰a̰l Efez diŋ ma go, i ndee ge baaburi ge mam se ge go, i dusi jaŋeya i ndwa zḛḛ temel sin̰ag mbo ge til Kos yà. Ge dwam ge zi pagal, i deɗ-ɗa ge til Rode go. I ɓyan zum ge sok mbe go, mbo suwal Patara.
44021002	Ge sok mbe go, i seɗ baaburi ge mbo ge suwa ge Fenesi ne ya. I ndee ne, i ɓyan zum jaŋeya haa mam ga̰a̰l nuwam pul.
44021003	Sok ge i yin̰a ya guwa ge til Chipr, i ndal ne ge i tok magul pagal, i kale jaŋeya mbo ya yabeya ge suwal Tir ge no ge suwa ge Siri ne go, sok ge àa wa ɔwabe kaŋ ge baaburi pul go ge ma kan digi.
44021004	Ge suwal mbe diŋ, i seɗ nda ge ame hateya ma, i kee num ta dwam ɓỳala. On̰om ge Harcal ee num wuwage Pol go a̰me hê ne ndwa ge mbo suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem gale ɓaca.
44021005	Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge i dwam mbe ma aa go, i ɗege zum mboya. Àa ɗeme i ɓanna ge maa gwale mage maa van ma peɗ, mbo zum ge suwal ga̰a̰l diŋ, ɗiŋ mbo ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam wa yà. Ge sok mbe go, i guu i ko se kee kaɗeya ge wa kal go.
44021006	Guwa̰ ge i ge num sa̰a̰ ta wa ɗu ge ɗu go, i ndee ge baaburi ge mam se ge go, num sḛ ma gwan mbo maa zok ma diŋ yà.
44021007	I ɓyan zum ge suwal Tir go, i jaŋe i ndwa zḛḛ ɗiŋ i deɗ-ɗa ge suwal Tolemayis go. I kan i ko ya digi san na̰ van ma wa, i kee dwam ɗu ge num ta.
44021008	Sok yan kin̰are, i kale mbo suwal Sezare, sok ge i dee yà, i mbo ge Filib, ndu ge oy fare ge Dok ne diŋ. Ne sḛ kaa ge nda ge ɓỳala ge àa taa num mbaa Zeso nda ge temeya ma buwal zì, i kaɗ gɔswal ge ne diŋ.
44021009	Kaa ge van gwale ge gale kaa zok to ma ndà. Àa kaɗ ge bobo ge zwagre Dok wa.
44021010	Ajo̰o̰ i kee ya dwam ma kaal ge sok mbe go, ndu ge zwagre Dok wa|Nda ge zwagre Dok wa a̰me ɗu, ge àa tol ne Agabus, mbo ge suwa Jude ya ge i ta.
44021011	Ɔwabe biɗ ge Pol ka taa na pul ge ne, vwal na ko mage na tok ma ge ne, jan go: On̰om ge Harcal jan fare ndu ge ne biɗ no ge mbi tok go no go, Yahuɗ ma mbo mbo vwal ne mbe go ca ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ. Àa mbo ɓyan ne ge nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma tok go.
44021012	Sok za̰a̰ fare mbe go, i sḛ ma ɓanna ge nda ge ho fareba ge suwal Sezare diŋ ma, i ka gwarge ta ge Pol ta go, a̰me hê ne ndwa mbo suwal Jerusalem to.
44021013	Ɗaŋɗe, gwan ge i janna go: Ge dape, ḛ wa ka fyal fiyaso a̰se ge ɓyare kun mbi dul wa go de? Ago, mbi vḭḭ tene go, àa doo mbi daŋay bàŋ to, koo àa gwan hun mbi ge Bagezok Zeso pe, mbi mbo mbo suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ.
44021014	Ajo̰o̰ i fare ma be deɗ ne dul wa zì ge ee ne eya fare to, i daa be gwan dwage ne fare mbe ma to, i gaa gwan jan ne bàŋ go: N̰a Bagezok ne kee na laa ɓyareya.
44021015	Sok ge i dwam gɔswal ma aa go, i nuusi ta mbo suwal Jerusalem.
44021016	Nda ge ame hateya a̰me ge ɗeme i ge suwal Sezare ya ma, gene i ya ge Nason ta, a ndu ge mbo mbo ame i kaɗ gɔswal ya ne ge na diŋ. Ne sḛ a van Chipr ne, kaɗ ndu ge kee ya kaal ge hoɗ fareba zì me.
44021017	Sok ge i dee ya suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ, na̰ van ge ho fareba ma ame i ge laa saal.
44021018	Sok yan kin̰are, i ge Pol ma ɓan mbo ge Jak ta yà. Nda ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme tèmel mage nda ge ho fareba ma kwateya ge sok mbe go mɔɗwag me.
44021019	Guwa̰ ge àa ge Pol ma komre ta go, ee pe wan num fare pe zum ɗu ge ɗu ge tèmel ge Dok kee ge nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma buwal zì, ge na ta.
44021020	Sok ge àa za̰a̰ ne fare mbe ma go, àa sale Dok. Guwa̰, ndu ɗu hee fare ge num buwal zì, jan ne go: Na̰ van, mo kuwa gyana ge Yahuɗ ma dudubu gyana ga ge deɗ ja hoɗ fareba de! Go no puy, àa mḛḛ maa ko ndaa kaka ge eeya ge Moyiz ne pagal.
44021021	Ɗaŋɗe, àa za̰a̰ nda go janna go, mo hate Yahuɗ ma peɗ ge kaa no ge nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma suwa ya ma go go, num mbo ge eeya ge Moyiz ne ma pagal to, num vin̰a maa van ma bḛḛ to, num mbo ge kaŋ ge maa baŋ ma ee num keeya ma pagal to me.
44021022	A fareba, Yahuɗ ma mbo za̰a̰ go mo yan ja, gaa go nè sḛ kee gyana de?
44021023	Ge sego, fare ge i yuwale mo ne pagal no. Nda ge kee wa tii ge Dok ndwa se ma go ndà ge i buwal zì.
44021024	Mbo ge num pe yà ge zok ge Dok ne zì, mo ɓan tene ge num kee tuwaleya ge haɗ ta kɔn̰al ge Dok ndwa se. Mo poɗ num pagal ndwa go num soo maa pagal ma gezi. Go no, nda mbo kuwa go, fare ge àa ee num no mo pagal ma, num ge maa vin̰a to. Àa mbo gwan deɗ-ɗa kuwaya go, mo sḛ ge mo pagal, mo mbo go ge eeya ge Moyiz ne pagal.
44021025	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ge num ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to, ge ho fareba ma ɗe, i njaŋe num lawayta ge fare ge i vḭḭ ta ge num pagal ma go go, num daa gwan zam duul ge àa hun num kee tuwaleya hon siim ma to, num za duul ge kaŋ kogor ge àa muwa̰se num ka̰a̰l ma to, koo swàm a̰me num za ne to, num ɔwabe ta gezi ge ene sḛ duul keeya ge batraŋ ma ta me.
44021026	Pol vin num fare mbe, sok yan kin̰are, ɓan tene dagre ge nda ge ndà mbe ma, ndwa ɓyare vin̰a ge haɗ tene kɔn̰al. Guwa̰, Pol mbo ge zok ge Dok ne zì yà wuwage dwam ge maa haɗ ta kɔn̰al mbo aaya ne go, ge bobo ge na mbo hon ne ya ge tuwaleya keeya ge nda gegene ma way pe me.
44021027	Sok ge dwam ɓỳala ge haɗ ta kɔn̰al ma ne wa gaa guwa ge aaya, Pol waɗ ge zok ge Dok ne zì, Yahuɗ ge mbô ge suwa Azi ya ma kuwa ne. Àa tun ɓase ma digi ge fare, àa ɗege kee ho̰o̰l ge Pol.
44021028	Àa ka oyya tol ta go: Izrayel van ma, ḛ mbo nè mà ya zì! Ndu mbe hate nda ge sok ma go peɗ, fare ge sone ma ge pe rusu ge Izrayel ne pagal, ge eeya ge Moyiz ne ma pagal, ge zok ge Dok ne pagal me. Ge sego, gene van Grek ma ja ɗiŋ ge zok ge Dok ne pul zì, sok kee ano mbe no go, haɗ zok ge Dok ne ge harcal seŋre .
44021029	Àa ka jan ano mbe ge dape, àa kuwa Pol mage Trofim ge van gɔswal ge suwal Efez ne anna ge suwal ga̰a̰l diŋ, àa duwa no go, ne waɗ ge ne ya ge zok ge Dok ne pul zì.
44021030	Bàŋ go helo ɗe, suwal ga̰a̰l ge ɓul mɔɗwag mbo ya iigi digi, nda chiya ge sok ma ya kakaɗag. Àa wan Pol, àa zwal ne ge zok ge Dok ne pul zì ya zum. Àa dibi zok wa ma ya digi ge maa pe go.
44021031	Guwa̰, àa ɗege Pol ta iyalla ndwa go maa hun ne gezi. Sok ɓyare hun ne go, fare mbo ya seɗ asagar ma ga̰a̰l ge waɗe ge kaa no ge Jerusalem diŋ go, suwal ga̰a̰l iigiya digi ge ɓul mɔɗwag.
44021032	Avun cab, ɔwabe asagar ma ɓanna ge maa ga̰a̰l ma, àa ge num chiya ge ɓase ma pe yà. Sok ge ɓase ma ka̰a̰ ndwa kuwa asagar ma ga̰a̰l ge waɗe ɓanna ge asagar ma ge na pe go, àa daa gwan iyal Pol to.
44021033	Sok ge asagar ma ga̰a̰l ge waɗe dee ya, mbo ge Pol ta yà, wan ne, hoɗ na wa go àa vuwa ne ge zul ma zi. Hale fare pe ge ndu mbe ne ge ɓase ma ta ndwa kuwaya go, ne huɗi ne, ne kee ma̰ kaŋ de.
44021034	Ɗaŋɗe, ge ɓase ma buwal zì, nda ka oyya digi batraŋ. Kṵwa̰ ka keeya ge go, ne seɗ fare a̰me ge jwab to. Go no, ho asagar ma na wa no go, num gene ne ge maa gerger zì yà.
44021035	Sok ge àa yin̰a ge Pol ya, sok ndee mbo waɗ gerger zì go, asagar ma mbo ya mbeɗe ne digi, ge laa ol ge ɓase ma way pe.
44021036	Ago, ɓase ma peɗ ge ka kàre ne pe ya ma, àa ka oyya go: Ḛ hṵṵ ne gezi!
44021037	Sok ge asagar ma ɗege go maa waɗ ge Pol mbo gerger zì, ele asagar ma ga̰a̰l ge waɗe go: Vin̰a mà kaɗ ge mbi jan mo fare nde de? Gwan ge ne janna go: Mo zane faa wa grek no de!
44021038	Mo be van Ejypt ge dee zuu na pagal zum kee ho̰o̰l ge hakuma, sok ɔwabe nda ge iyal kyarga ge maa suwal pe ma dudubu ndà mbo ge babur pul yà ne to de?
44021039	Pol gwan ne janna go: Mbi be nee ne to. Mbi Yahuɗ ne, ge too ge suwal Tars, ge no ge suwa ge Silisi ne go. Mbi van twàl ge suwal ga̰a̰l mbe ge nda kuwa nee ne peɗ. Mbi kaɗe mo kaɗe, mà kaɗ ge mo hon mbi vin̰a ge jan ɓase mbe ge vin ta pe ya, mbi pagal ma fare nde de?.
44021040	Asagar ma ga̰a̰l ge waɗe vin ne, Pol mḛḛ ge na sok mbe go, kee ɓase ma na tok go num zane. Nda mbo ya zaneya kirib. Ge sok mbe go, Pol jan num fare ge wa hebre go:
44022001	Mbi ba mage mbi na̰ van ma, ge sego, ḛ za̰a̰ fare ge mbi ɓyare ben tene ge fare ge tol-la se ceɗeɗ mbi pagal pe no.
44022002	Sok za̰a̰ ne jan maa fare ge wa hebre go, ɓase ma gwan mbo ya zaneya segeg. Pol ɗege janna go:
44022003	Mbi Yahuɗ ne, mbi too ge suwal Tars ge no suwa ge Silisi ne go. Ɗaŋɗe, mbi wuwa ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem mbe no diŋ. Mbi ame hateya ge Gamaliyel wa zì, ndwa mbo ge eeya ge nè baŋ ma way ma pagal tetem. Mbi kaa ge uwaseya sɔswag ge fare ge Dok ne pe, dinna ge ḛ peɗ ḛ kee ne mà no go.
44022004	Mbi ka kee nda ge ka kàre ko pul ge Bagezok ne ma yal, ɗiŋ àa seɗ swày wa go. Mbi ka gene nda soɗob mage nda zaab ma ya vwalla kan daŋay zì.
44022005	Koo ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe ɓanna ge nda ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme ɓase ma peɗ, àa ge pool jan fare mbe no ge mbi pagal. Ge dwam a̰me go ɗu, mbi sḛ ame lawayta ma ge num tok go ne, mbo ge nè na̰ van Yahuɗ ge no suwal ga̰a̰l Damas diŋ-ge ma ta yà, ndwa go mbi wa wan nda ge kàre ko pul ge Bagezok ne, ge no sok mbe yà ma gene ya, ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ ndwa kee num yal.
44022006	Ge vin̰a mbo suwal ga̰a̰l Damas go, deɗ-ɗa go sok keeya gyala pɔgwa, sok ge mbi yin̰a ya guwa ge ne, tugcug kɔn̰al a̰me ge paɗag mbô ge pḭḭ zì ya, see mbi ndwa priɗ, gaa zenna ge mbi pagal.
44022007	Mbi deɗ se, mbi za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l a̰me jan mbi go: Sol, Sol, ge dape, mo wa ka kee mbi yal go de?
44022008	Mbi guwa̰ ge ne eleya no go: Bagezok, a mo huɗi ne de? Ka̰a̰l mbe guwa̰ ge mbi janna no go: A mbi Zeso ge suwal Nazareɗ, ge mo kee ne yal ne.
44022009	Nda ge kaa ɓanna ge mbi ma kuwa kɔn̰al mbe, ɗaŋɗe, àa za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l ge ndu ge ka jan mbi fare ne to.
44022010	Ge sok mbe go, mbi gwan ge ne eleya go: Bagezok, mo ɓyare go mbi kee gyana de? Guwa̰ ge mbi janna no go: Ɗege digi, mo mbo suwal ga̰a̰l Damas diŋ, ge sok mbe yà, àa mà mbo jan mo kaŋ ge Dok ho na wa go mo ke num ma.
44022011	Ajo̰o̰ kɔn̰al ge paɗag ge zḛḛ mbi pagal dame mbi ndwa ma ya digi ɗe, àa gaa wan mbi tok wan ɗeme mbi mbo suwal ga̰a̰l Damas mbe diŋ.
44022012	Ndu a̰me ɗu ge kaa suwal mbe diŋ ge àa ka tol ne dḭḭl Ananiyas, a ndu ge no ge voo ge Dok ne na zì ne, ge mbo no tetem ge eeya ge Moyiz ne ma pagal, ka seɗ doreya gḛḛ ge Yahuɗ ge kaa ge suwal Damas diŋ ma ta peɗ.
44022013	Mbo ya ge mbi ta, jan mbi go: Mbi na̰ van Sol, kuwa sok. Ge sok mbe go gaw, mbi ndwa kale kan ge ne ta!
44022014	Guwa̰, jan mbi go: Dok ge nè baŋ ma ka uware ne, taa mo ne ge zḛḛ ya day, ndwa kuwa na laa ɓyareya mage Zeso na ndu ge temel, mo za̰a̰ fare ge ne sḛ wa zì me.
44022015	Ago, mo mbo kaɗ ndu ge wuwage ne fare ge nda ta peɗ, ge kaŋ ge mo kuwa mage fare ge mo za̰a̰.
44022016	Ge sego, daa gwan kee dṵṵl to, ɗege digi, àa ke mo baptem, mo see poreya ge mo sone ma way, sok kee kaɗeya ge Bagezok ta.
44022017	Guwa̰, mbi guwa̰ ya ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ no. Ge dwam a̰me go ɗu, mbi mbo kee kaɗeya ge zok ge Dok ne zì no. Sok kee kaɗeya go, kaŋ a̰me mbo ya dyan tene ge mbi ndwa go no.
44022018	Mbi kuwa Bagezok ka jan mbi fare go: Ha tene avun cab waɗ zum ge suwal Jerusalem diŋ, ago nda ge suwal mbe diŋ-ge ma mbo vin fare ge mo jan ne ge mbi pe to.
44022019	Mbi guwa̰ ge ne janna no go: Bagezok, num sḛ ma kuwa kuwa tyatyaɗ go, mbi ka mbo ge zok kee kaɗeya ge i i ma zì, mbi ka wan nda ge ho fareba mo ta ma dol daŋay no, ndwa go àa iya num.
44022020	Sok ge àa ka hun Etiyen mo ndu ge sayda go, mbi sḛ wa ya. Mbi wa kaa dagre ge num, mbi ka koy num ba̰a̰ ma ne me.
44022021	Ɗaŋɗe, Bagezok jin̰a mbi no go: Ɗege zum, ago mbi mbo teme mo mbo sok kaal, ge nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma ta.
44022022	Ɓase ma za̰a̰ ne ɗiŋ deɗ-ɗa ge ne fare janna ge guwa̰ dwab ge mbo ge nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma ta go. Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge àa za̰a̰ ne fare mbe ma go, àa peɗ, àa hee maa ka̰a̰l digi oyya go: Be wan ndwa ndu mbe kaɗ ge ndwa to, ḛ hṵṵ ne gezi.
44022023	Àa gwan ka poɗ luuluu digi ndaal, àa ka cigi maa ba̰a̰ kanna ma digi, àa ka ɔwabe suwa kanna digi me.
44022024	Asagar ma ga̰a̰l ge waɗe hoɗ na wa go, àa gene Pol ge gerger zì yà, àa nja ne ge bol ndwa ee ne jan fare ge na wa zige, ge ee ɓase ma no pyanna gḛḛ-gḛḛ ge ne pagal pe.
44022025	Sok ge àa vuwa ne se ge tàal ndwa njaa ne, Pol ele asagar ma ga̰a̰l ge tèmel dee ne mà keeya go: A eeya ge diige ho̰ ḛ vin̰a ge dwagle van twàl ge Rom nee ne, be ge àa kun sariya ge ne pagal gale to de?
44022026	Sok ge asagar ma ga̰a̰l za̰a̰ fare mbe go, chiya mbo wuwage ma ga̰a̰l ge waɗe go: Mo daa mà kee ge tene gyana de? Ndu mbe zane van twàl ge Rom nee ne.
44022027	Sok mbe go, asagar ma ga̰a̰l ge waɗe mbo ya ge Pol ta, ele ne go: Jin̰a mbi gale, a fareba go mo van twàl ge Rom nee ne de? Gwan ge ne vinna go: Mbi nee ne.
44022028	Asagar ma ga̰a̰l ge waɗe gwan ge ne janna go: Ge go mbi seŋe van twàl ge Rom ne ɗe, mbi ba̰a̰ bware gḛḛ. Pol gwan ge ne janna go: Mbi van twàl ne ge tolla ge mbi ya day.
44022029	Avun cab, nda ge daa ɓyare njaa ne ndwa ee ne jan fare ge na wa zige ma mbo ya ɔwabe ta gezi. Koo asagar ma ga̰a̰l ge waɗe, sok ge dee ya kuwaya go na zane vuwa se van twàl ge Rom ne, voo mbo ya wan ne.
44022030	Ajo̰o̰ asagar ma ga̰a̰l ge waɗe ɓyare go, na kuwa fare ge Yahuɗ ma ee ne ge Pol pagal zum hetel ɗe, sok yan kin̰are, hoɗ ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ɓanna ge Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge kun sariya ma na wa go, num mbo ya, saa Pol digi, gene ne ya ge num ndwa se.
44023001	Pol dol na ndwa ge Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge kun sariya ma ndwa zì, jan go: Na̰ van ma, mbi kuwa kuwa go mboya ge ambi kwaɗa ge Dok ndwa se ɗiŋ màno. Mbi dul wa gale be wan mbi ge fare dwam ɗu to.
44023002	Ananiyas, ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe kale pal fare gaw, hoɗ nda ge mḛḛ na ta zì guwa ma na wa go, num ya ne ge ne wa zì.
44023003	Sok mbe go, Pol jan ne go: A mo sḛ ge mbo seɗ iyalla ya ne ge Dok ta, mo gulum ge ndil ge zum somndol mbambala! Mo kaa se ndwa kun mbi sariya ge eeya ge Moyiz ne ma pagal. Ɗaŋɗe, mo gwan hoɗ mo wa ya go, àa iya mbi. Mo batame go eeya mbe ma to de.
44023004	Nda ge kaa sok mbe go ma kiiri digi go: Ḛ ndi! A sal ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe ge Dok ne ya ba!
44023005	Pol gwan ge num janna go: «Na̰ van ma, mbi wan pe go ne ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe ne to. Ago mbi ge kuwaya ge maktub sok ge jan go: “Mo mbo jan fare ge sone ge ga̰a̰l ge kee muluk no ge ɓase ge amo ma pagal to.” »
44023006	Pol kaa ge kuwaya go Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme ɓase ma zì pe zi: Saduki ma go, Farisi ma me. Sok mbe go, oy digi ge ka̰a̰l ndaal go: Mbi na̰ van ma, mbi Farisi ne dinna ge mbi ba ma dee kaa go. Ajo̰o̰ mbi ee mbi jobreya go, nda ge suu ma mbo tan digi, a ge pe, àa gene mbi ya ge sok sariya se no.
44023007	Guwa̰ ge jin̰a fare mbe go gaw: Gool mbo ya ngurmi digi ge Farisi mage Saduki ma buwal zì, ɓase mbe mbo ya vaa se pe zi.
44023008	Ago Saduki ma jan go: Malayka mage on̰om ma to, koo nda ge suu ma, Dok mbo tan num to. Ɗaŋɗe, Farisi ma ge hoɗ fareba go, kaŋ mbe ge Saduki ma vin num to ma, num go mɔɗwag.
44023009	Gool gwan mbo ya ngurmi digi kon pagal ge num ge pe zi mbe ma buwal zì. Nda a̰me ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma, ge no Farisi ma buwal zì ma ɗege sal fare ndwa ɗege Pol pe janna go: I be seɗ fare a̰me ge sone ge ndu mbe ta to. Tamekyala a on̰om koo malayka a̰me jin̰a ne fare ne.
44023010	Sok ge asagar ma ga̰a̰l ge waɗe kuwa go, gool mbe ɗegeya seŋe fare ge ɗogle ɗe, ɗege kee voo go num mà kee ge hun Pol ge maa buwal zì. Ge sok mbe go, hoɗ na asagar ma na wa go, num mbo se wan ne ge nda mbe ma tok zì ya, num gene ne ya ge gerger zì.
44023011	Sok yan ɗaal, Bagezok dyan tene ge Pol ta, jan ne go: Wa̰a̰ tene deŋel, dinna ge mo kee sayda ge ambi no ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ no go, ɓyare go mo ke ne ge suwal Rom diŋ mbe go waɗme.
44023012	Sok yan aaram, Yahuɗ ma vwal maa wa ge Pol pagal, àa guni ta go, maa hṵṵ ne gezi, zḛḛ ge go maa za kaŋ koo maa njoo mam.
44023013	Nda mbe ge guni ta ma kaa waɗe nda warndà.
44023014	Àa mbo seɗ ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way mage Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme num ma ndwa jan num go, maa guni ta ya go ndwa hun Pol gezi, zḛḛ ge go maa dee ya taɗ a̰me zam ge maa wa zì.
44023015	Ge sego, gaa go ḛ za̰a̰ ta ge Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge kun sariya ma, ḛ doo tèmel mbo jan asagar ma ga̰a̰l ge waɗe, ge zwam ge ndwa pe zige go, ḛ mà seɗ vin̰a ge ne ta, ge go ne gene Pol ya ḛ ndwa se ɗo, ḛ wa gwan za̰a̰ fare ge ne wa zige kɔn̰al hetel nde de. I sḛ ma me, i mbo kaɗ jejew huliya ndwa hun ne, zḛḛ ge go, ne dee ya ḛ ta.
44023016	Ɗaŋɗe, Pol nà ge son mbo ya za̰a̰ fare ge num sok huliya mbe ne, ɗege mbo wuwage Pol ne ge gerger ge asagar ma way zì yà.
44023017	Sok ge Pol za̰a̰ fare mbe go, tol asagar ma ga̰a̰l ya ɗu, jan ne go, ne mà kaɗ ge vin̰a ge ɗeme van dore mbe no mbo ge asagar ma ga̰a̰l ge waɗe ta ya ɗoo, ne wa jan ne fare nde de.
44023018	Ge sok mbe go, asagar ma ga̰a̰l mbe vḭḭ ɗeme ne mbo ge maa ga̰a̰l ge waɗe ta yà no, jin̰a ne no go: Pol, ndu ge àa wa̰a̰ ne daŋay ele mbi ne go, mbi ɗeme van bogol no ya ge mo ta, ndwa go ne go ge fare ge jan mo.
44023019	Asagar ma ga̰a̰l ge waɗe wan ne tok, mbo ge ne gezi yà, jan ne go: «A mà fare ge mo ɓyare taa mbi nee ne de?»
44023020	Gwan ge ne janna go: « Yahuɗ ma za̰a̰ ta ya go, maa kaɗe mo, mo gene Pol ya kin̰are ge Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge kun sariya ma ndwa se, ge zwam ge ndwa pe zige go, maa ɓyare za̰a̰ ne fare gezi kɔn̰al hetel.
44023021	Ɗaŋɗe, mbi kaɗe mo go mo vḭḭ num fare mbe to, ge dape, nda go ge num buwal zì waɗe warndà, ge huli no go ndwa kee ne fare. Àa guni ta guni go, be ge maa hun ne to ɗe, maa zam kaŋ koo njoɗ mam ge maa wa zì to. Ge sego, àa kàɗɗa jejew ndwa da̰a̰re fare ge mo mà vin tene ya ge ne pagal.»
44023022	Asagar ma ga̰a̰l ge waɗe gwan ge ne janna go: «Daa ke ndu a̰me ge ɗogle kuwaya go, mo jan mbi fare mbe ya go to.» Guwa̰, n̰a van dore mbe mboya.
44023023	Guwa̰, asagar ma ga̰a̰l ge waɗe tol na asagar ma ga̰a̰l ge kis ma way ma zi, jan num go: Ḛ nuusi asagar ma kikis zi, ge jaŋe tisi ma warɓỳala, ge ko ge mbal ran̰ ma kikis zi, ndwa mbo suwal ga̰a̰l Sezare ler wa gezi ɗu ge ɗaal.
44023024	Ḛ nuusi tisi ge gene Pol mbo hon goformo̰ Feliks be fare.
44023025	Asagar ma ga̰a̰l ge waɗe njaŋe lawayta ɗu mbo hon goformo̰ waɗme. Ge ne zì, jin̰a go:
44023026	A mbi Kloɗ Liziyas njaŋe mo lawayta ne, mo Feliks, ndu ga̰a̰l ge hormo gḛḛ, mbi sa̰a̰ mo wa.
44023027	Ndu ge mbi teme mo ne ya no, Yahuɗ ma wa̰a̰ ne go maa hun ne gezi. Sok ge fare mbo ya seɗ mbi go ne van twàl ge Rom nee ne, mbi ɔwabe asagar ma mbo mon ne ge num tok zi ya no.
44023028	Guwa̰, mbi gene ne ge Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge kun sariya ma ndwa se yà no, ndwa hale fare pe ge kaŋ ge ne sḛ kê ne go tem.
44023029	Mbi see no go, fare a̰me ge ngwaɗ ge àa dol ne daŋay zì koo ge àa hun ne ge pe ne to. Ɗaŋɗe, num fare ɗe, a fare pee ta ge eeya ge Moyiz ne ma pagal.
44023030	Guwa̰, sok ge mbi za̰a̰ go, Yahuɗ ma vwal wa ya ge ne pagal hun ne, mbi haa tene teme mo ne yà no. Mbi jin̰a nda ge ee fare ge ne pagal ma no go, num mbo kaŋe ge mo ta yà.
44023031	Asagar ma mbo ya kee fare mbe ge maa ga̰a̰l ho na wa ge ne pagal go tem, àa gene Pol ge ɗaal mbe zì bàba mbo suwal ga̰a̰l Antipatris yà.
44023032	Sok yan kin̰are, asagar ge ko ma gwan-na ge gerger zì, àa n̰a nda ge jaŋe tisi ma ɗeme ne mbo ndwa zḛḛ.
44023033	Sok ge àa dee ya ge suwal ga̰a̰l Sezare diŋ, àa gene Pol mbo hon goformo̰, àa hon ne lawayta mbe waɗme.
44023034	Guwa̰ ge goformo̰ Feliks isi lawayta mbe go, ele ne go, mo Yahuɗ ge diige ne de? Sok ge za̰a̰ go, ne van Silisi ne,
44023035	jan ne go: Mbi mbo za̰a̰ mo, sok ge nda ge ee fare ge mo pagal ma mbo yan ja. Hoɗ na wa go, àa koy ne ge gan ga̰a̰l Heroɗ sok kun sariya zì.
44024001	Dwam nuwan̰ guwa̰, Ananiyas, ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe yan-na ge suwal Sezare diŋ waɗme, ge nda ga̰a̰l a̰me ge ɗeme tèmel ma ge na pe go, ɓanna ge ndu a̰me ɗu ge ɗeŋre fare, ge àa tol ne Tertulus. Àa mbo ya kaŋe Pol ge Goformo̰ ta.
44024002	Guwa̰, àa tol Pol ya zḛḛ, Tertulus hee fare kareya, ee fare ge ne pagal go go:
44024003	Ba ge hormo gḛḛ Feliks, a ge mo ta, ge kaŋ a̰me ge mo ɗwabe num ma ta ge kwaɗa ge pe rusu mbe no pe me, i seɗ halas ge mbyaɗɗa tab ya no. I ge kuwaya tyatyaɗ ge kaŋ kwaɗa ge mo kee num ya ma, ge sok ma go peɗ. Àa dee i ta kwaɗa, i ke mo mersi gḛḛ ge be ɗoo to.
44024004	Ɗaŋɗe, ge go mbi haa mo gòŋ to ɗe, mbi kaɗe mo kaɗe, mà kaɗ ge mo hon i sok van go fyalag ndwa za̰a̰ i nde de, kaɗɗa mo vinna.
44024005	Ndu mbe no, i see go, ne ge mbɔgwam ge puu nda go. Waɗ fare ya ge Yahuɗ ge kaa no ge dunin̰a zì ma zì, ee num kee ta ho̰o̰l ge ta buwal zì. A ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kàre Zeso ge suwal Nazareɗ ne pe ma way ne.
44024006	Ɓyare vin̰a ge vḛḛne zok ge Dok ne ge harcal ge nda ndwa zì. A ge pe no, i wan ne no. [I ɓyare kun ne sariya ge wa yuwaleya ge i i ma pagal,
44024007	ɗaŋɗe, asagar ma ga̰a̰l ge waɗe, Liziyas zuu ya harge ne ge pool no ge i tok go.
44024008	Ho na wa ge nda ge ee fare ne pagal ma ta no go, num mbo ya ge mo ndwa se.] Sok ele ne fare go, mo sḛ ge mo pagal, mo mà seɗ go, fare ge i ee num ge ne pagal ma no, num be fare ge hày ma ne to.
44024009	Yahuɗ ma vin co̰o̰ go, ne fare ge fareba ne.
44024010	Pol hee fare, guwa̰ ge goformo̰ ho̰ ne vin̰a go, jan go: Mbi kuwa kuwa go del ma gḛḛ, mo ba ge kun pe rusu mbe no sariya ne ge temel pagal. A ge pe, mbi kàre fare ndwa ben tene ge mo ndwa se no, ge dul wa eeya se.
44024011	Dwam gale be waɗe wol pɔgwa zi to, ge mbi mbô Jerusalem, ndwa mbo uware Dok. Mo ge pool hale fare mbe pe.
44024012	A be seɗ mbi ge zok ge Dok ne zì koo ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way zì, pee fare ge ndu to koo ge suwal ga̰a̰l diŋ ee ɓase ma ɗege digi ge ho̰o̰l to me.
44024013	Ge sego, àa mbyaɗ ngay fare ge jwab, ge maa ee ne ge mbi pagal to.
44024014	Ɗaŋɗe, mbi jan zum waŋ ge mo ndwa se go, mbi kee tèmel hon Dok ge i ba ma way, sok mboya ge ko pul ge jin̰al go, ge num sḛ ma tol ne go: Nda ge kàre Krist pe ma. Mbi ho fareba ge eeya ge Moyiz ne mage kaŋ ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma njaŋe num ma ta peɗ.
44024015	Mbi ge jobreya mbe ge Dok ta go: Nda ge temel mage nda ge temel to ma mbo tan. Num sḛ ma ge jobreya mbe no waɗme.
44024016	A ge pe no, mbi waɗme, mbi hon tene pool no ɗaɗag ndwa go, mbi kaa ge on̰om ge kwaɗa ge vaa fare buwal, ge Dok ndwa se, ge nda duwana ma ta me.
44024017	Guwa̰ ge mbi kê del ma bergete go ge zum ya, mbi guwa̰ ya ge Jerusalem diŋ ge bobo ma no, ndwa mbaa mbi pe rusu ge no hoɗegeya zì ma, kee tuwaleya hon Dok me.
44024018	A ge sok mbe go, àa see mbi no, mbi wa ya haɗ tene kɔn̰al ge zok ge Dok ne zì. Ɓase ma be kaɗ ge mbi ziya koo kṵwa̰ a̰me be kaɗ to me.
44024019	Ɗaŋɗe, Yahuɗ a̰me ma ge mbô ge Azi sok ma ya ma kaa ne ɗeŋew. Num sḛ ma mbo daa ya ne ge mo ndwa se, kaɗɗa maa ge fare ge eeya ge mbi pagal.
44024020	Kaɗɗa go to, num ge mḛḛ no ge mo ndwa se ma, num jin̰a n̰aal ge maa see ne ge mbi ta, sok ge àa gene mbi ge Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge kun sariya ma ndwa se yà go.
44024021	Tamekyala, kaɗ mà fare ge mbi hê mbi ka̰a̰l digi ge num buwal zì ge sok kee sariya go, ge tanna ge swày ma way pe, mbi mḛḛ mà ge mo ndwa se, ge sok kun sariya go no de.
44024022	Ajo̰o̰ goformo̰ Feliks kaa ge fare ge nda ge kàre Krist pe ma ne mbe kuwaya, dol sariya mbe digi, jan num go: Sok ge asagar ma ga̰a̰l ge waɗe Liziyas mbo mbo ja, mbi mbo kun ḛ sariya mbe.
44024023	Hoɗ na wa ge ga̰a̰l ge asagar ge kis ma way ta go, ne koy Pol ge ndu ge daŋay go, ɗaŋɗe, ne n̰a ne pe sa̰a̰m nde, ndwa go nda ge kuwa ne ma wa ka mbo ya mbaa ne.
44024024	Dwam ma guwa̰ kwaɗa lag, goformo̰ Feliks mage na gwale Drusil ge Yahuɗ ma van gwale deɗ-ɗa suwal diŋ, àa dol tèmel mbo tol Pol ya, ndwa za̰a̰ ne fare, ge vin̰a hoɗ fareba pagal, ge Zeso Krist ta.
44024025	Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge Pol ɗege jan fare ge ndu mbiya mbo mboya ge temel, ge vin̰a wan ta pagal, ge dwam ge mbo mbo ja, ge Dok wa mbo kun sariya ge nda duwana ma pagal ne, voo mbo ya wan Feliks, jan go: Ge sego, mo ge pool mboya, sok ge mbi mbo seɗ vin̰a ya, mbi mbo gwan tol mo ya.
44024026	Ee na jobreya waɗme go Pol mà hon na bware, a ge pe, ka tol ne no zazag ndwa siɗigi fare ge ne.
44024027	Del zi guwa̰, Porkiyus Festus eya kaɗ goformo̰ ge Feliks byalam go. Ajo̰o̰ Feliks ɓyare go na kee Yahuɗ ma sḛ tii ɗe, n̰a Pol ge daŋay zì.
44025001	Sok ge Festus dee ya ge suwal ga̰a̰l Sezare diŋ ndwa wan na tèmel go, kee dwam taa, guwa̰, ɗege mbo Jerusalem.
44025002	Ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way mage Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge kun sariya ma mbo ya kaŋe Pol ge ne ta. Àa gwarge ta ge ne ta,
44025003	àa kaɗe ne go, ne mà kaɗ ge kuwa maa a̰se, ne n̰a Pol gwan mbo Jerusalem yà nde de. Àa kaɗe ne ge dape, àa vwal wa ya go, maa huli ne ge vin̰a zì ndwa ban ne gezi.
44025004	Festus gwan ge num janna go: Pol kee daŋay ge Sezare ya go, mbi sḛ gaa guwa ge gwan-na.
44025005	Kaɗɗa go fare a̰me ge sone ge ne kê ge mbiya ḛ kaŋe ne go, n̰a ga̰a̰l ge ḛ buwal zige ma, i ge num ɓa̰a̰ mboya dagre.
44025006	Festus be kee ge num buwal zì waɗe dwam wa gezi zi koo wol to, gwan-na ge suwal Sezare go. Sok yan kin̰are, mbo ge zok kee sariya zì yà, sok ge kaa se, hoɗ na wa go, àa gene Pol ya.
44025007	Sok ge yin̰a ya, Yahuɗ ge mbo ge Jerusalem ya ma vee ne se, àa ee fare ge dṵṵl neneg ma gḛḛ ge ne pagal, ɗaŋɗe, num sḛ ma be seɗ fare ge ngay zum go, fare ge maa ee num ge ne pagal ma, num fare ge fareba ma ne to.
44025008	Pol sok ben tene ge fare zì go, jan go: Mbi be kee sone go fyalag ge ee mbi ho̰o̰l ge eeya ge Yahuɗ ma way ma to, koo ge zok ge Dok ne to, koo ge Sezar to me.
44025009	Festus ka ɓyare go na kee Yahuɗ ma sḛ tii, gwan ge Pol eleya go: Mo vin vin go àa mbo kun mo sariya ge Jerusalem yà ge mbi ndwa se de?
44025010	Pol gwan ge ne janna go: Mbi mḛḛ ge Sezar ndwa se, àa kun mbi sariya ge sok mbe no go. Mbi be za̰a̰ Yahuɗ ma yal a̰me to ge mo sḛ kuwa ne hetel no go.
44025011	Kaɗɗa mbi kee a̰me ge sone go, kaɗɗa mbi kee kaŋ a̰me ge mbiya gene mbi mbo swày go, mbi kuri swày to. Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa fare ge àa ee num ge mbi pagal ma no, num be fare ge fareba ma ne to, ndu a̰me ge ɓyan mbi ge num tok go to. Mbi ɓyare go àa mbo kun mbi sariya ge Sezar ndwa se.
44025012	Ge sok mbe go, Festus mage nda ge yuwale na ma za̰a̰ ta, gwan ge ne janna go: Ge mojo̰o̰ mo ɓyare go, mo gaa mbo Sezar ndwa se yà.
44025013	Guwa̰ go swag, gan ga̰a̰l Agripa mage Bernis mbo ya ge Sezare go ndwa san Festus wa.
44025014	Ajo̰o̰ àa kê dwam ma kaal swag ge sok mbe go, Festus wan gan ga̰a̰l fare ge Pol ne pe go: Feliks n̰a ndu a̰me go ge daŋay zì,
44025015	ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ma, Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme num ma kaŋe ne ge mbi ta no, ge sok ge mbi mbo Jerusalem ya go. Àa kaɗe mbi no go, mbi wa̰a̰ ne ge sariya.
44025016	Mbi guwa̰ ge num janna no go, ge mojo̰o̰ nda ge Rom ma ha̰a̰le keeya go, kaɗɗa àa ee fare ya ge ndu pagal, ɓyare go àa za̰a̰ fare ge ne wa zige ɓiya, ge nda ge ee fare ge ne pagal ma ndwa go, àa wa ɗege kun sariya ge ne pagal go.
44025017	Sok ge i ge num dee ya ge Sezare go gaw, mbi be kee dṵṵl to. Ge dwam ge zi pagal, mbi mbo ya kaɗ se ge zok kee sariya zì no, mbi ho mbi wa no go, àa gene ndu mbe ya.
44025018	Ne nda ge ho̰o̰l ma mbo ya ee fare ma ne pagal no. Sok ee maa fare mbe ma go, mbi duwa no go, num mà ee fare a̰me ge wan ne ge ndaa kaka.
44025019	Zane no, àa ge num ka pee ta ge vin̰a ge Dok ne ge maa way sḛ pagal mage fare ge ndu a̰me ge àa tol ne Zeso ge suu, ge Pol jan no go, ne ge na ndwa.
44025020	Fare mbe mbo ya tane mbi ndwa ge be janna no, a ge pe, mbi ele ne no go, kaɗɗa ne vinna, àa mbo kun ne sariya ge Jerusalem yà.
44025021	Ɗaŋɗe, Pol haa sariya se no go, na ɓyare go àa mbo kun na sariya ge Sezar ndwa se yà. A go mbe no, mbi ho asagar ma mbi wa no go, num koy ne ɗiŋ ge go mbi teme ne mbo hon Sezar.
44025022	Gan ga̰a̰l Agripa jan goformo̰ Festus go: Mbi ɓyare go mbi za̰a̰ ne waɗme. Gwan ge ne janna go, mo kin̰are za̰a̰ ne.
44025023	Sok yan kin̰are, Agripa mage Bernis mbo ya ge nda ɓase nɔnɔg ge maa pe go, àa waɗ ge zok kun sariya zì, ɓanna ge asagar ma ga̰a̰l ge waɗe mage ga̰a̰l ge ɓase ma way, ge no suwal ga̰a̰l diŋ, ge ɗeme num ya ma. Festus hoɗ na wa go, àa gene Pol ya.
44025024	Sok mbe go, Festus hee fare jan go, gan ga̰a̰l Agripa, ḛ ge mḛḛ no sok mbe go ma peɗ, ḛ kuwa ndu mbe ge mḛḛ no, ge Yahuɗ ma mbo ya kakaɗag kaŋe ne ge mbi ta, ge suwal Jerusalem ya koo ge suwal Sezare diŋ go, pyanna ɓiɓḭḭ go, ndu mbe be wan ndwa kaɗ ge ndwa to.
44025025	Ge mbi ta, mbi be seɗ n̰aal a̰me ge ndaa kaka ge mbiya gene ne mbo swày to. Ɗaŋɗe, ajo̰o̰ ne sḛ hal sariya ya se go, àa gene na ge gan ga̰a̰l ge waɗe ndwa se yà, mbi vin tene ya teme ne mbo ne ndwa se yà.
44025026	Go no puy, mbi be seɗ fare ge njaŋe lawayta ne pagal tem, mbo hon gan ga̰a̰l ge waɗe to. A ge pe, mbi gene ne ya ge ḛ ndwa se no, ge mo gan ga̰a̰l Agripa ndwa se no me, ndwa go, guwa̰ ge mo mà ele ne fare ya go, mbi mà seɗ fare ge njaŋeya ge lawayta zì.
44025027	Ago, tane mbi go ndwa, ge go mbi teme ndu ge daŋay zì, mbo ge gan ga̰a̰l ge waɗe ndwa se yà, be ngay ne fare ge àa ee ne no tem ge ndu mbe pagal.
44026001	Agripa jan Pol go: Mo ge vin̰a ge faaya. Ge sok mbe go, Pol hee na tok digi, jan go:
44026002	Gan ga̰a̰l Agripa, màno mbi ge laa saal kàre fare, ndwa ben tene ge mo ndwa se, ge Yahuɗ ma fare ge ee num ya ge mbi pagal ma pe peɗ.
44026003	Ago, mo kuwa Yahuɗ ma ha̰a̰leya ge ha̰a̰le ta, ge kaŋ keeya ge maa baŋ ma way ma zì kuwa kɔn̰al yaɗaɗ, ge num fare ge àa kaɗ pee ta ge num pagal ma waɗme. A ge pe, mbi kaɗe mo no go, mo wa̰a̰ tene za̰a̰ mbi nde.
44026004	Yahuɗ ma peɗ kuwa mboya ge ambi ge mbi bogol ya day kuwa, ge mbi pe rusu ma buwal zì, ge Jerusalem diŋ.
44026005	Ge mojo̰o̰ àa kuwa mbi ya din no go, àa ge vin̰a ge jan fare ge maa kuwa num ge mbi ta ma. Mbi ndu ge kaa ge za̰a̰ ta ge uware nè Dok ndaa kaka, waɗe gegene ma zì ne, ge àa tol ne Farisi.
44026006	Màno kaɗɗa àa gene mbi ya ge sok sariya se, a ge jobreya ge mbi ee ne ge wa tii ge Dok kê nè ba ma ne pagal pe,
44026007	ge nè pe rusu ge wol pɔgwa zi ma kee tèmel hon ne no ɗaal mage gyala be ɗwabeya, sok da̰a̰re wa tii mbe wa huyya go. Gan ga̰a̰l, a ge jobreya mbe no pe, Yahuɗ ma ee fare ge mbi pagal no.
44026008	Ḛ Yahuɗ ma! Dok tan nda ge swày ma tan, ge dape ḛ wa ka dwaɗɗa go ne fare ge fareba ne to de?
44026009	Mbi sḛ no gaw, mbi kaa ndu mbe ge ka ɓyare go, dḭḭl ge Zeso ge suwal Nazareɗ ne too ge mbi tɔgwa zì to ne.
44026010	Mbi ka kee mbe go ge Jerusalem diŋ, ge wa hoɗɗa ge ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ma pagal, mbi sḛ ge mbi ndwa, mbi ka wan nda ge ho fareba ma gḛḛ mbo kan num ge daŋay zì. Sok ge àa ka vwal wa hun num go, mbi ka vin num fare mbe ma.
44026011	Mbi ka an ge zok kee kaɗeya ge Yahuɗ ma way ma zì peɗ ndwa kee num yal, ee num ge pool jan fare sone kakatag ma ge vin̰a hoɗ fareba pagal. Ajo̰o̰ num fare mbe ka hoɗ mbi laa gḛḛ go ɗe, mbi ka kàre num pe ɗiŋ ge suwal ga̰a̰l ge gɔswal ma yà.
44026012	A ge kaŋ keeya ge go mbe ma ta, mbi see vin̰a mage wa hoɗɗa ge ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ma ta no, mbi zuu mbo suwal Damas no.
44026013	A ge sok mboya go, guwa ge gyala pɔgwa, gan ga̰a̰l-loo, mbi kuwa kɔn̰al ge pḭḭ zì ya zenna waɗe kɔn̰al ge gyala ne, vê i ge mbi ka̰a̰m ge ka ɗeme mbi ma se no.
44026014	Kɔn̰al mbe mbo ya kabre i ge suwa se ya no peɗ, mbi za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l a̰me jan mbi fare ge wa hebre no go: Sol, Sol, ge dape, mo wa ka kee mbi yal go de? Mo hon tene jwaŋ ge mo tok, sok n̰aɗe ɔwara wa zwabal go.
44026015	Mbi ele no go: A mo huɗi ne Bagezok de? Bagezok guwa̰ ge mbi janna no go: A mbi Zeso mbe ge mo za̰a̰ ne yal ne.
44026016	Ge sego, ɗege digi mḛḛya, ago mbi din̰a tene ge mo ta ndwa go, mo kaa mbi ndu ge tèmel mage ndu ge mbo jan nda kaŋ ge mo kuwa num ge mbi ta ma, ge kaŋ ge mbi mbo gwan dyan num ya ge mo ta ma me.
44026017	Mbi mbo ka mon mo ge Izrayel van ma tok go, ge pe rusu ge ɗogle ma tok go waɗme, sok ge mbi mbo kaɗɗa ka teme mo ge num ta yà ma go,
44026018	ndwa hage num ndwa, ee num seŋe ta ge tṵṵ ge ɗeɗeg zì ya mbo ya ge kɔn̰al go, ge pool ge Saytan ne pe se ya mbo ya ge Dok ta, ndwa go num see poreya ge maa sone ma way, ge hoɗɗa ge àa ho fareba ge mbi ta pe, num zâ joo ɓanna dagre ge nda ge seŋe ya harcal ma me.
44026019	Ge dwam mbe ya day, gan ga̰a̰l Agripa, mbi daa be gwan kee girtiŋ ge fare ge Bagezok din̰a num ge pḭḭ zì ya ge mbi ta ma pe to.
44026020	Mbi ee pe oy fare ge nda ge Damas ma ta, ge nda ge suwal Jerusalem diŋ-ge ma ta, ge suwa ge Jude ne go peɗ, ge nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma ta waɗme. Mbi ka jan num go, num eya kàɗɗa ge maa way, num seŋe ta ya se ge Dok ta, num mbo mboya ge jwab ge ngay go num seŋe ta ja se.
44026021	A ge fare mbe ma no pe, Yahuɗ ma wa̰a̰ mbi ge zok ge Dok ne zì no, àa ɓyare mbo hun mbi no.
44026022	Ɗaŋɗe, a ge mbaaya ge Dok ne ta, mbi kaa ge ndwa no ɗiŋ màno, ndwa kee sayda ge nda jabso mage nda ga̰a̰l ta. Mbi jan go fare ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa mage Moyiz ma dee wuwage num ge zḛḛ ya go: Num mbo mboya ma:
44026023	Ago Krist, Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne mbo njoɗ yal, kaɗ ndu ge zḛḛge ge tan ge nda ge swày ma buwal zì, mbo oy Yahuɗ mage nda ge no num rusu zì to ma vin̰a ge kɔn̰al ne.
44026024	Ajo̰o̰, Pol sok wan fare ge ɗeŋre na fare go, goformo̰ Festus hee na ka̰a̰l digi jan go. Mo pagal gaa kee mo ge ne kee de, Pol! Mo kuwaya ge gḛḛ mbe seŋe mo ya fare ge dogle!
44026025	Pol gwan ge ne janna go: Ba ge hormo, mbi pagal kee mbi to. Fare ge mbi jan ma no, àa fare ge fareba ma ne, a be ndu ge pagal keeya fare janna ma ne to.
44026026	Gan ga̰a̰l Agripa ge fare mbe ma kuwaya, a ge pe, mbi jan ne fare mbe ma be daŋso no. Mbi ge hoɗ fareba go a̰me ɗu ge n̰aame ne to, ago kaŋ mbe ma kee ge nda ndwa go peɗ.
44026027	Mo hoɗ fareba hoɗ ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma fare ta de gan ga̰a̰l Agripa? Mbi ge kuwaya go mo hoɗ fareba go!
44026028	Gan ga̰a̰l Agripa jan Pol go, bàŋ go velgeteg, mo ɓyare seŋe mbi ndu ge Krist ne de?
44026029	Pol gwan ge ne janna go: Ge sego koo dee, mbi kaɗe Dok go, ne kaa be mo ɗeŋew to, ɗaŋɗe, num peɗ ge za̰a̰ mbi màno ma, num seŋe nda ge Krist ne ma dinna ge mbi sḛ no go, be ge tok ma feɗɗa se to.
44026030	Guwa̰ ge Pol wa̰a̰ na fare mbe ma go, gan ga̰a̰l ɗege digi ɓanna ge goformo̰ mage Bernis, ge num ge mbo ya za̰a̰ fare ge zok kee sariya zì ma peɗ.
44026031	Sok ge àa wuwa zum yà go, àa ɗege jan ta ge ta buwal zì go: Ndu mbe be kee fare a̰me ge mbiya mbo swày koo daŋay to.
44026032	Gan ga̰a̰l Agripa jan goformo̰ Festus go: Ndu mbe no, daa ge ne haa sariya mbo ge Sezar ndwa se ya to ɗe, mbiya go àa dol ne digi.
44027001	Sok ge goformo̰ vḭḭ tene go i ndee baaburi ge mam se ge mbo suwa Itali, àa hon Pol koyya ge asagar ma ga̰a̰l ge àa tol ne Juliyus tok go ɓanna ge daŋay gegene ma. Ne sḛ a ga̰a̰l ge asagar ge gan ga̰a̰l ge waɗe, Sezar nee ne.
44027002	I ndee ge baaburi ge mbo ge suwal Adramiɗ ya go, ge mbo suwa Azi wa kal ge yabe baaburi yà, i ɓyan zum. Aristark van Maseduwan, ge suwa Tesalonik ne go ge, kaa ɓanna dagre ge i.
44027003	Sok yan kin̰are, i deɗ-ɗa ge suwal Sido̰ go, ajo̰o̰ Juliyus kaa kwaɗa ge Pol, hon ne vin̰a ge mbo ndil na kondore ma, ndwa go ne see mbaaya ge num ta.
44027004	Sok ge i ɓin̰a ge sok mbe go, ajo̰o̰ sa̰a̰m ka kwal-la ge i ndwa zì, i gwan ta jaŋeya ge til Chipr lee ge mbii-ge pe go, ndwa cage ta.
44027005	Guwa̰, i gaa ya jaŋeya ɗiŋ ge wa kal ge suwa ge Silisi mage Pamfili ne go, i deɗ ge suwal Mira yà, ge no ge suwa ge Lusi ne go.
44027006	Ge sok mbe go, ga̰a̰l ge asagar ge kis ma way, seɗ baaburi ge suwal Alekzandri ne, ge ka mbo suwa Itali, i ge num zwagre ta ne go.
44027007	Ajo̰o̰ sa̰a̰m ka kwal-la ge i ndwa zì ndaal, i kee dwam ma kaal, i gaa bwaɗe-bwaɗe, a ge yal gḛḛ i dee ya guwa ge suwal ga̰a̰l Kenide no. Ge sok mbe go, i daa be seɗ vin̰a ge jaŋe i ndwa zḛḛ temel to, i gwan ta jaŋeya ge til Kreɗ kin̰a zì ndwa cage ta. I kale ya ge sok yabe baaburi ge Salmone ne go.
44027008	Sok mbe luwaɗeya kee i yal gḛḛ ɗiŋ ge go i dee ya ge sok a̰me go ɗu ge àa tol ne go, sok yabe baaburi ge kwaɗa ge no guwa ge suwal ga̰a̰l Laze.
44027009	Ajo̰o̰ i kee ya dwam ma bergete ge vin̰a zì, sok mboya ge i mbe ɗege seŋe haŋle, ago sok wan mam njuwal ge somo̰ pagal ne kale ya. A ge pe no, Pol yuwale num no go:
44027010	Kondore ma! Mbi see go nè sok mboya mbe mbo kaɗ haŋle. Baaburi mbo hal gezi, kaŋ ge ne pul go ma peɗ vḛḛne gezi, koo nè sḛ ma mbyaɗ seɗ swày waɗme.
44027011	Ɗaŋɗe, ga̰a̰l ge asagar ge kis ma way, ka za̰a̰ gḛḛ nda ge jaŋe baaburi ma ga̰a̰l mage ndu ge baaburi waɗe Pol.
44027012	Ajo̰o̰ sok yabe baaburi ge sok mbe go ge, kaɗ kwaɗa somo̰ to ɗe, a ge pe no, nda gḛḛ ge baaburi pul go ma vḭḭ ta no go: Kaɗɗa vin̰a go, maa kale mbo kee somo̰ ge Feniks yà, ge sok yabe baaburi ge suwa Kreɗ ne go. Sok yabe Baaburi ge ne lee ge ham-ge mage ne lee ge chiya-ge seŋe no ndwa kuu.
44027013	Guwa̰, sa̰a̰m ɗege lan̰ ge ham ya, àa dwaɗ go maa ɓin̰a zum ge maa vḭḭ ta go. Àa hee maa gyaɗamal digi, àa gaa luwaɗe jaŋeya ge wa kal kin̰a ge Kreɗ ne zì.
44027014	Ɗaŋɗe, ge num pe go gaw, sa̰a̰m ge labreya ge àa tol ne Erakilon ɗege kwalla ge til zì ya,
44027015	zwal baaburi zum yà, i daa seɗ vin̰a ge gwan-na zì to, i n̰a ta ne pe yà.
44027016	Sok ge i kale ya ge til van ge àa tol ne Kawuda lee ge ham-ge go, i cage ta ge ne kin̰a zì no, ge yal ma zì puy, i see vin̰a ge saa faa van ge baaburi ziya go ge no.
44027017	Sok ge àa zuwa ne ya ge baaburi pul digi go, nda ge kee tèmel ge baaburi pul go ma, ɔwabe tàal dwageya, àa vwal baaburi see luwaɗeya ge ne. Ajo̰o̰ maa ka chiya voo go ne mbo yabe maa ge kaa wa ge suwa ge Libi ne yà, ge sok mbe go, àa saa ba̰a̰ ge àa vuwa ne baaburi pagal digi ya se, àa n̰a ta sa̰a̰m pe yà.
44027018	Ajo̰o̰ sa̰a̰m ge labreya sok poɗ i go, sok yan kin̰are, àa kan kaŋ a̰me ge baaburi go ma gezi nde.
44027019	Ge dwam ge taa pagal, nda ge kee tèmel ge baaburi go ma, ɔwabe ne kaŋ tèmel ma ge maa tok, àa kan num mam yà.
44027020	I kee dwam ma kaal be kuwa gyala koo gùwa̰ zenna. Sa̰a̰m ge labreya ka kwal-la ndwa zḛḛ zḛḛ, i gaa dwaɗ go, vin̰a a̰me ge i seɗ monna daa to.
44027021	Dwam ma kale bergete, ndu ɗu be taɗ kaŋ zam ge na wa zì to, Pol ɗege digi nda buwal zì jan num go: Mbi kondore ma, daa go ḛ za̰a̰ mbi fare ɗe, ḛ ɗege daa ya zum ge til Kreɗ diŋ ya to, ḛ daa mà za̰a̰ yal koo kaŋ ma daa mà vḛḛne gezi mbe go to me.
44027022	Ge sego, mbi moɗege ḛ go, ḛ wa̰a̰ ta deŋel, ago ndu a̰me ɗu ge ḛ buwal zige seɗ swày to, baaburi vḛḛne ne ɗeŋew.
44027023	Ago, Dok ge ambi ge mbi kee ne tèmel moor malayka a̰me ɗu, mbo ya ge mbi ta ɗaal mbe no zì,
44027024	jin̰a mbi no go: Chiya voo to, Pol, ɓyare go mo mḛḛ kee sariya ge Sezar ndwa se. Ago, Dok ngay kwaɗa keeya ge na ne ya ge mo ta, nda ge no ge baaburi go ma peɗ wa uusi ol ya go waɗme.
44027025	Go no me, ḛ wa̰a̰ ta deŋel mbi kondore ma, ago, mbi ho fareba ge Dok ta go, kaŋ ma mbo kee tetem, ge ne sḛ jin̰a mbi num no go.
44027026	Ɗaŋɗe, sa̰a̰m mbo hal nè ge til a̰me pagal ɗu.
