Ɗaŋɗe, a fareba go, wa̰a̰ ndwa num kee ne mbe go, ge dape, Yahuɗ ge ho fareba ma mbaa num ge no maa rusu zì to ma seɗ kaŋ kwaɗa ge wal maa on̰om ma, go no me ɗe, num mbe ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma wa̰a̰ ndwa hon num kaŋ ge mbiya num mbaa ta ge num ma waɗme.
45015028	Sok ge mbi mbo nuusi fare mbe ya aaya, a ndwa go, sok ge mbi mbo hon num kaŋ siyal mbe ya ge ɓul mɔɗwag ɗe, guwa̰ sok ɗege zum mbo Espan̰ go ɗe, mbi mbo kun-na ndil ḛ.
45015029	Mbi kuwa kuwa go, sok ge mbi mbo deɗ-ɗa yà kuwa ḛ ndwa, mbi mbo mbo yà ge wa tare ge Krist ne ma ge ɓul mɔɗwag.
45015030	Na̰ van ma, ge fareba ge nè ho nè Bagezok Zeso Krist ta pe me no, ge laa wanna ge On̰om ge Harcal hon nè ne pe me ɗe, mbi moɗege ḛ go, ḛ mbaa twam dagre ge mbi, sok kaɗe Dok go ge mbi pe.
45015031	Ḛ kaɗe ndwa go sok gene mbaaya mbo Jerusalem go ɗe, mbi dee ge Yahuɗ ge ho fareba to ge no suwa Jude go ma tok zì to. Ḛ kaɗe ndwa go nda ge ho fareba ge ne diŋ-ge ma ame mbaaya mbe ge sḛ tii me.
45015032	Go mbe no, mbi mbo mbo yà kuwa ḛ ndwa ge laa saal. Kaɗɗa Dok vinna ɗe, mbi mbo seɗ ɗwabeya ge ḛ ta swag me.
45015033	Mbi kaɗeya Dok ta go, ne ge hon nda halas, ne kaa ɓanna dagre ge ḛ peɗ. Amin !
45016001	Mbi ɓyare ngay nè na̰ van ge gwale Fobe ge n̰a wa to ḛ ta no ɗe, a ndwa go, ḛ kuwa go ne ndu ge mbaa tèmel ne, ge ɓase ge Krist ne ge no suwal ga̰a̰l Saŋkre diŋ-ge ma buwal zì ne.
45016002	Ajo̰o̰ na ge Bagezok nee ne ɗe, ḛ ame ne ge mojo̰o̰ nda ge ho fareba ma wa̰a̰ ndwa ame ta go. Ɗaɗag ge mbo ka ele mbaaya ya ge ḛ ta ɗe, ḛ ho̰ ne ne, ge dape, mbaa nda gḛḛ maam to. Mbi sḛ puy, mbi see mbaaya ge ne ta waɗme.
45016003	Ḛ sa̰a̰ Prisil mage na obe Akilas wa, àa mbi ka̰a̰m ge i ge num kee tèmel ge Zeso Krist ne ma ne.
45016004	Àa ho̰ ta swày ge mbi pe, a ge pe, mbi kee mersi gḛḛ hon num no. A be mbi ɗeŋew to, ɓase ge Krist ne ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma peɗ waɗme.
45016005	Ḛ sa̰a̰ ɓase ge Krist ne ge kwate no num diŋ ma wa waɗme. Ḛ sa̰a̰ mbi na̰ van ge laa wanna Epayneɗ wa, ne ge ee pe hoɗ fareba zḛḛ ge Krist ta ge suwa Azi go.
45016006	Ḛ sa̰a̰ Mari wa, ne ge ho̰ tene sok kee tèmel go gḛḛ ge ḛ pe.
45016007	Ḛ sa̰a̰ Andronikus mage Juniyas, mbi kontwal ge i ge num kaa daŋay zì dagre ma wa. Àa nda ge temeya ge Krist ne ge num fare dee nda laa zì gḛḛ ma ne, àa ho fareba ge mbi ndwa zḛḛ.
45016008	Ḛ sa̰a̰ Ampiliyatus wa, mbi kondore ge laa wanna ge i ge ne no baan ge Bagezok dagre.
45016009	Ḛ sa̰a̰ Urbanus, mbi kon ge i ge ne kee tèmel ge Krist ne wa, ḛ sa̰a̰ mbi kondore ge laa wanna Itakis wa me.
45016010	Ḛ sa̰a̰ Apeles ge ngay tene ya zum go na ndu ge n̰a wa to ge Krist nee ne wa. Ḛ sa̰a̰ nda ge no Aristobul diŋ ma wa waɗme.
45016011	Ḛ sa̰a̰ Herodin̰o ge mbi kontwal wa, ḛ san nda ge ho fareba ge Narsis diŋ-ge ma wa waɗme.
45016012	Ḛ sa̰a̰ Trifen mage Trifoz, num ge kee Bagezok tèmel ɓyare hun ta ma wa, ḛ san na̰ van ge laa wanna ge gwale Persiɗ, ge kee tèmel ɓyare hun tene wa waɗme.
45016013	Ḛ sa̰a̰ Rufus, ndu ge Bagezok taa ne wa, ḛ san ne na̰, ge mbi ndil ne ge mbi na̰ go wa waɗme.
45016014	Ḛ sa̰a̰ Asinkriɗ, Flego̰, Hermes, Batrubas, Hermas mage na̰ van ge àa ge num no dagre ma wa waɗme.
45016015	Ḛ sa̰a̰ Filolog, Juli, Neere mage na na̰ van ge gwale, Olympa mage nda ge ho fareba ge no dagre ge num ma wa waɗme.
45016016	Ḛ sa̰a̰ ta wa ge hormo ge ta ta buwal zì ɗu ge ɗu dinna ge nda ge ho fareba ma wa̰a̰ ndwa kee ne go. Ɓase ge Krist ne ma peɗ sa̰a̰ ḛ wa me.
45016017	Mbi kaɗe ḛ kaɗe na̰ van ma, hateya mbe ge ḛ see ne ɗe, nda a̰me ma ɓyare ne to, ḛ koy ta kwaɗa ge num ta. Àa gene ya caɗeya mage ee nda ko challa. Ḛ ɔwabe ta gezi yà kaal ge num ta!
45016018	A fareba go nda mbe ma kee tèmel hon Krist ge nè Bagezok to, ɗaŋɗe, àa kee ne ge maa laa pe. Ge num wa bale mage num fare janna ge zwam ge ndwa pe zige ma ta, àa vuuɗi fare ge nda ge wan fare ma pe kwaɗa to ma pagal zì.
45016019	Kaɗɗa ge ḛ ɗe, nda kuwa kuwa peɗ go, ḛ nda ge gwan ḛ pagal ge Bagezok pe se ma ne. Ge pe no ɗe, mbi ge laa saal ge ḛ pe, ɗaŋɗe, mbi gwan ɓyare go ḛ kaa nda ge andaŋ ma ndwa kee kaŋ ge kwaɗa ma, be n̰a sone a̰me go fyalag vin̰a ge waɗ-ɗa zì to.
45016020	Dok ge hon nda halas gaa guwa ge roɗ Saytan ḛ ko se. N̰a kwaɗa keeya ge nè Bagezok Zeso ne kaa ɓanna ge ḛ!
45016021	Timote mbi kon ge tèmel sa̰a̰ ḛ wa. Lukiyus, Jason mage Sosipater mbi kontwal ma sa̰a̰ ḛ wa waɗme.
45016022	Mbi Tartiyus, ndu ge njaŋe Pol lawayta mbe no, mbi sa̰a̰ ḛ wa, mbi ge Bagezok ɓan nè ya no dagre.
45016023	Gayus, ndu ge mbi kaa no ge ne diŋ sa̰a̰ ḛ wa, a ndu ge ɓase ge Krist ne ma kwate no peɗ ne diŋ ne. Eras, ndu ge koy bware ge suwal ga̰a̰l ne sa̰a̰ ḛ wa ɓanna ge nè na̰ van Kartus waɗme.
45016024	[N̰a kwaɗa keeya ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist ne kaa ɓanna dagre ge ḛ peɗ. Amin !]
45016025	Nè uware Dok! Ne ge mbiya ee ḛ ɗuuya ndiŋ ge hoɗ fareba ge ḛ ḛ ma zì, ge Fare ge Kwaɗa ge mbi oy ne no ḛ ta ge Zeso Krist pe. Ge Fare ge Kwaɗa mbe no ta, Dok ee nda kuwa na nuusiya ge ɗimil ge kaa dee wayya ge zḛḛ ya day mbe.
45016026	Ɗaŋɗe, ge sego, ben ja zum waŋ ge kɔn̰al go ge Njaŋeya ge Dok ne ge nda ge zwagre na wa ma way ta. Dok ge ɗiŋ ge din ho na wa go, nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma peɗ ge pool za̰a̰ nuusiya mbe fare, ndwa go rusu ge suwa pagal ma mɔɗwag, num ho fareba ge ne ta, num guwa̰ maa pagal ge ne pe se me.
45016027	Nè ho̰ Dok hormo, ne ge no ɗu Ba ge andaŋ ge na kaŋ keeya ma zì mɔɗwag. Nè uware ne ge Zeso Krist pe, ge zaman mage zaman ma go peɗ! Amin .
46001001	A mbi Pol, ndu ge Dok too ne ya ge laa ɓyareya ge na ne pagal, ne gaa ndu ge temeya ge Zeso Krist ne, ɓanna ge na̰ van Sosten njaŋe lawayta mbe ne,
46001002	hon ɓase ge Krist ne ge suwal ga̰a̰l Korent diŋ-ge ma, num ge seŋe ya harcal ge Zeso Krist ta ma. Dok too num ya ne gezi caɗ ge na pe, ge num gegene ge tol Bagezok Zeso Krist dḭḭl no sok ma yà pe hini-hini ma me. Ne sḛ ne ɗu num Bagezok, kaɗ nè Bagezok me.
46001003	N̰a Dok ge nè Ba mage nè Bagezok Zeso Krist ngay kwaɗa keeya ge maa way ḛ ta, num ho̰ ḛ halas me.
46001004	Mbi gwan ge mersi keeya ɗaɗag hon Dok, ge ḛ pe, ge kwaɗa keeya ge ne ne, ge kê go ḛ ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Zeso Krist pe.
46001005	A fareba go, ge Krist ta me ɗe, Dok hon ḛ kuwaya ma ya mɔɗwag, kaŋ ma zì peɗ me.
46001006	Mbiya kaɗ mbe go, ge dape sayda ge Krist pagal mbe ge àa kee ḛ ne, san na too ya ḛ zì kakag.
46001007	Go mbe no, bobo a̰me daa be gwan hoɗege ḛ to, ḛ ge da̰a̰re dyanna ya zum ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist ne ma.
46001008	Ne sḛ Dok mbo ee ḛ ne ɗuuya ndiŋ, deɗ wa yà be fare a̰me ḛ pagal, ge dwam ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist ne mbe go.
46001009	Dok ge too ḛ ya, ɓa̰a̰ ḛ dagre ge na Van Zeso Krist, ge nè Bagezok no mbe, Ba ge n̰a wa to ne.
46001010	Mbi kaɗe ḛ kaɗe, na̰ van ma, ge dḭḭl ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist ne pe, ḛ ka nda ge wa dagre ɗu ma. Ɓyare go vaaya se a̰me ne kaa ḛ buwal zì to, ḛ mḛḛ ko ge sok ge ɗu go, ḛ kaɗ ge dwaɗɗa ge ɗu me.
46001011	Na̰ van ma, mbi jan ano mbe ge dape, mbi za̰a̰ fare ge ḛ ḛ ge nda ge Klowe diŋ-ge ma wa zì go, za̰a̰ ta daa ge ḛ buwal zì yà to.
46001012	Mbi za̰a̰ sok mbe go no go, ge ḛ buwal zì, nda a̰me ma jan go go, maa gegene ma Pol nda ma ne. Gegene ma me ɗe, maa ge Apolos ne ma ne. Ge ɗogle ma me ɗe, maa ge Kefas ne ma ne. Ge ɗogle a̰me ma iya, maa Krist nda ma ne me.
46001013	Ḛ dwaɗ go Krist va go se vaa de? Ndu ge àa pee ne ɔwara kaŋre ta digi ge ḛ pe, a Pol de? A ge dḭḭl ge Pol ne pe ɗoo, àa kê ḛ baptem no de?
46001014	Mbi gwan ge mersi keeya hon Dok, ge mbi kê ndu a̰me ge ḛ buwal zige baptem to pe. Nda ge mbi so̰o̰ num ma, a Krispus mage Gayus ɗeŋew.
46001015	Go mbe no, ndu a̰me see vin̰a ge janna go ne ge mbi dḭḭl pe, ḛ kê na baptem no to.
46001016	Ɓame, mbi kê zok ge Estefanus ne baptem waɗme. Mbi dwaɗ go, mbi daa be kee ndu ge ɗogle baptem to.
46001017	Ago, Krist be teme mbi go mbi mbo mbo kee nda baptem to, ɗaŋɗe, teme mbi go mbi mbo oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge nda ta, be faa fare ge andaŋ ge nda duwana ma way to, ndwa go swày ge Krist ne ɔwara kaŋre digi, ne ndi nda duwana ma ndwa zì kaŋ ge bàŋ kay to.
46001018	A fareba go, fare faaya ge swày ge Krist ne, ge kaŋre ta digi ge, fare ge dàle ne ge nda ge mbo ban gezi ma ta. Ɗaŋɗe, a pool ge Dok nee ne, ge nè ge Dok mo̰o̰ ne ma pe me.
46001019	A fareba go, Dok jin̰a ge na maktub zì waɗme go: «Mbi mbo ban andaŋ ge num ge andaŋ ma way ma gezi. Mbi mbo ban zwam ge num ge zwam ma way ma gezi me.»
46001020	Kaɗɗa na mbe go, nda ge andaŋ ma gwan dii no de? Nda ge hate nda ma gwan dii no de? Nda ge ɗwabe nda ge doŋ pe mbe go ma gwan dii no de? Dok be ngay go go, andaŋ ge dunin̰a ne be a̰me pe ne to to de?
46001021	O̰o̰, nda duwana ma ge andaŋ ge maa way ma ta puy ɗe, àa be deɗ-ɗa kuwa Dok, ge kaŋ keeya ge na ne ge andaŋ mbe ma ta to. A ge pe no, Dok vḭḭ tene no go, Fare ge àa oy ne, ge nda ndil ne ge sigi boo go mbe, nda ge za̰a̰ ne, àa hoɗ fareba ma, na mo̰o̰ num.
46001022	Yahuɗ ma ɓyare no go maa kuwa kaŋ ngayya ma mbḛḛ maa wa ame fare go ɗe, Grek ma ɓyare go maa kuwa ne ge maa andaŋ ta.
46001023	I i go, i oy Krist ge àa pee ne ɔwara kaŋre ta digi fare. Fare ge ee Yahuɗ ma ko challa mbe, rusu ge ɗogle ma ndil ne ge fare a̰me ge dàle bàŋ go mbe me.
46001024	Ɗaŋɗe, ge num ge Dok too num ya ma, koo a Yahuɗ ma de, koo a Grek ma de ɗe, Krist a pool ge Dok nee ne, kaɗ andaŋ ge Dok ne me.
46001025	Ago, kaŋ keeya ge Dok ne ge nda ndil ne kaŋ ge dàle boo mbe, waɗe kaŋ keeya ge andaŋ ge nda duwana ma way ma waɗe. Kaŋ keeya ge tuguɗi ge Dok ne me ɗe, waɗe pool ge nda duwana ma way waɗe me.
46001026	Na̰ van ma, ḛ kuwa go Dok too ḛ ya pe gyana de. Ge nda duwana ma ta ɗe, nda ge andaŋ ma, nda ge pool ma, koo nda ge pwal ma, àa go gḛḛ ge ḛ buwal zì to.
46001027	Ɗaŋɗe, Dok taa kaŋ ge nda duwana ma ndil num kaŋ ge dàle dunin̰a zì boo ma, ndwa hon nda ge andaŋ ma daŋso. Dok taa kaŋ ge nda duwana ma ndil num tuguɗi dunin̰a zì ma no, ndwa hon nda ge pool ma daŋso me.
46001028	Dok taa kaŋ ge be fare pe to ge dunin̰a zì, ge nda sen num, ge nda ndil num go num a̰me pe ne to ma, ndwa vḛḛne kaŋ ge ciciliŋ ma,
46001029	ge dape, ndu a̰me go ɗu, ne see vin̰a ge uware tene ge na ge Dok ndwa se to.
46001030	Ago, a ge ne Dok ta, nè ɓan-na dagre ge Zeso Krist no. Ne sḛ gene andaŋ ja ge Dok ta ya, nè haɗ-ɗa nda ge temel ma, nda ge harcal ma, nda ge see zuuya no ge sone ge maa way ma go ma, ge Dok ndwa se me,
46001031	ndwa go, dinna ge a njaŋe no ge maktub ge Dok ne zì go: «Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me uware tene go, ne uware tene ge Bagezok Dok kaŋ ge kee no ge na pe.»
46002001	Kaɗɗa ge mbi sḛ ɗe, na̰ van ma, sok ge mbi dee mbo ge ḛ ta yà, ndwa tyan ḛ pagal gezi ge fare ɗimil ge Dok ne ma pagal, mbi be bwaɗe ḛ ge mbi fare janna ge ka̰a̰l sawal to me no, mbi faa ḛ fare ge andaŋ ge nda duwana ma way to me.
46002002	Ago, mbi vḭḭ tene zḛḛ wal, sok ge mbi kaa ḛ buwal zì yà go go, mbi ɓyare fare a̰me ge ɗogle to, ambi ɗeŋew Zeso Krist, pella ge ne ne kaŋre digi me.
46002003	Mbi kaa ndu ge tuguɗi ge ḛ buwal zì yà, mɔgeya digi, ndaɗɗa rarag.
46002004	Fare ge mbi hate mage mbi oy ma, àa zuwa ḛ ya no, be kaɗ ge fare janna ge andaŋ ge nda duwana ma way ma to, ɗaŋɗe, a ge pool ge ɓaŋlaŋ ge On̰om ge Harcal ne.
46002005	Go mbe no, fareba hoɗɗa ge ḛ ḛ ma pe daa be gwan dol ge andaŋ ge nda duwana ma way pagal to, ɗaŋɗe, ge pool ge Dok ne pagal.
46002006	Ge sego no ɗe, i hate go andaŋ ge Dok ne ge nda ge ndwa siiriya ma buwal zì, be andaŋ ge zaman mbe no ne to me no, be andaŋ ge ga̰a̰l ge zaman ge màge ne to me, num mbe ge àa mbo burmi num ya gezi ma.
46002007	Fare andaŋ mbe ge i hate ne, a ɗimil ge Dok ne ge way way ne. Dok nuusi ne ge zḛḛ ya day go nè dee ya pateya ge na ne zì.
46002008	Ga̰a̰l a̰me ge zaman mbe go ge go ɗu, be wan andaŋ mbe pe to. Daa no go àa wa̰a̰ ne pe wan, àa daa ma pel Bagezok ge pate pate mbe ge ɔwara kaŋre digi to.
46002009	Ɗaŋɗe, a dinna ge a njaŋe no maktub ge Dok ne zì go: «Kaŋ ge ndu a̰me gale kuwa ne ge na ndwa to, kaŋ ge dee ya ge ndu a̰me tɔgwa zì to gale, kaŋ ge ndu a̰me duwa ne pagal to, a kaŋ ge Dok nuusi nee ne ge nda ge laa wa̰a̰ na ma pe.»
46002010	Dok mbo ya dyan na Fare ɗimil mbe ge i sḛ ma ta ɗaŋ, ge pool ge On̰om ge Harcal ne ta ba. A fareba go On̰om mbe hale fare ma pe hale mɔɗwag, mbo ɗiŋ ge dwaɗɗa ge ɗugul ge Dok ne ma zì yà.
46002011	A huɗi ne, ge nda duwana ma buwal zì, ge kuwa kaŋ ge na kon dwaɗ ne no na dul wa zì ne de? A ndu mbe sḛ ɗeŋew kuwa kaŋ ge na sḛ dwaɗ ne. A mbe go ca, ndu a̰me ɗu ge kuwa kaŋ ge Dok dwaɗ ne to, kaɗɗa na be On̰om ge Dok ne sḛ ɗeŋew to.
46002012	Kaɗɗa ge nè ɗe, On̰om ge nè see ne, a be on̰om ge dunin̰a nee ne to, ɗaŋɗe, a On̰om sḛ ge mbo no ge Dok ta ya ne. Go mbe no, On̰om mbe ee ne wan kaŋ ge Dok ho̰ nè num, ge kuwa a̰se ge na ne zì ma pe.
46002013	Sok ge nè ɗege faa fare mbe ma, nè fare janna ma be ge andaŋ ge nda duwana ma way to. Ɗaŋɗe, a On̰om ge Dok ne hate nè ne, ee nè wan nda ge na ne ma na fare ge On̰om ne ge fareba ma pe zum me.
46002014	Ndu ge no be On̰om ge Dok ne vin fare ge On̰om hon nda ge na ne ma num ma to, ndwa go fare mbe ma fare ge dàle ma ne, ge ne ta, mbyaɗ ge wan num pe to. A fareba go, On̰om ee ndu ne mbo vaa fare ma buwal.
46002015	Ndu ge no ge On̰om ge Dok ne, vaa fare ma buwal vaa mɔɗwag vare zoo, ɗaŋɗe, ndu a̰me ɗu ge ee fare ge ne pagal to me.
46002016	Ago, njaŋe ge maktub ge Dok ne zì go: «A huɗi kuwa dwaɗɗa ge Bagezok ne ma ne ɗoo, wa hon ne yuwaleya de.» Kaɗɗa ge nè ɗe, nè ge dwaɗɗa ge Krist ne.
46003001	Na̰ van ma, mbi be ka hate ḛ fare ge mojo̰o̰ ḛ nda ge no ge On̰om ge Dok ne ma ne go to. Mbi ka hate ḛ fare vare zoo, ge mbi hate nda ge be On̰om ge Dok ne ma go, ndwa go ḛ kaa dinna ge van kaare ma go, ge hoɗ fareba ge ḛ ḛ zì, ge Krist ta.
46003002	Fare ge mbi ka hate ḛ num ma kaa ge pam boo go, dana go num dḭḭ sḭḭ ge kaŋ zam ge dṵṵl ma go ɗe, ḛ mbyaɗ dana ge zam num to. Ko ge sego, ḛ mbyaɗ go to,
46003003	ndwa go ḛ be On̰om ge Dok ne. Ge ḛ gale no ge yil ma ta ta, ḛ kaɗ ge gool ma ta buwal zì me no, ḛ gale go be On̰om ge Dok ne, ḛ mbo go mboya ge duul go ge me to de?
46003004	Sok ge ḛ kaɗ janna go: Mbi, mbi Pol ndu ne! Ndu gene jan go: Mbi, mbi Apolos ndu ne! A be fare janna ge nda duwana ma way ma ne no to de?
46003005	Apolos huɗi ne ɗaŋ de, Pol huɗi ne me de? Àa nda ge tèmel ge Dok ne ma ne. Àa ge num ta, ḛ dee ya hoɗ fareba no, ge vin̰a ge Bagezok ho̰ ndu ge diige ne keeya tem.
46003006	Mbi ɗḭḭ ɗḭḭ, Apolos ka̰a̰ mam no, ɗaŋɗe, a Dok ba ge kee ne go tèmel do̰o̰ zḛḛ.
46003007	Kaɗɗa na mbe go, ndu ge ɗḭ̀ḭ me no, ndu ge kan mam me ɗe, num fare a̰me pe to, ɗaŋɗe, Dok ɗu isi ne, ne ge ee tèmel donna.
46003008	Ndu ge ɗḭ̀ḭ mage ndu ge kan mam ɗe, a̰me ge waɗe na kon to. Ndu ge diige mbo seɗ poɗɗa ge tèmel keeya ge na kê pagal tem.
46003009	Ago, i jwàg, i wa̰a̰ ta tok ge tèmel ge Dok ne ta keeya, ḛ sḛ ma me ɗe, ḛ kaŋ kyarga ge Dok nee ne, ḛ kaɗ zok ge Dok ne me.
46003010	Dok ngay kuwa a̰se ge na ne mbi ta, haa mbi no ge mojo̰o̰ ndu ge sin zok ge ɗalla go. Mbi doo pe, ndu ge ɗogle mbo ya ee gulum no. Ɗaŋɗe, n̰a ndu ge diige ne ee na ndwa kwaɗa ge vin̰a ge na hê ne no sok sinna go.
46003011	Ago, pe dolla ge no go ge sego, a Zeso Krist. Ndu a̰me ge gwan dol pe ge ɗogle daa to.
46003012	Kaɗɗa ge pe dolla mbe pagal digi, ndu a̰me ee gulum ge dinar, ge bware walam, ge njal sergeleŋ ma, ge ɔwara ge siŋli, ge sugu, ge gyaɗa kal puy, tèmel ge ndu ge diige ne mbe mbo dyan kɔn̰al go.
46003013	Ago, ge dwam kun sariya go, Dok mbo kugi kaŋ keeya ge ndu ge diige ne ge ol, ndwa ngayya go, tèmel ge ndu ge diige kee mbe gag ɓade.
46003014	Kaɗɗa tèmel keeya ge ndu ne ge kê pe dolla mbe pagal digi be til to, ago ndu mbe see poɗɗa.
46003015	Kaɗɗa tèmel ge ndu kê tii til, ndu mbe mbo seɗ poɗɗa to. Ne sḛ mbo seɗ monna, ɗaŋɗe, mbo kaɗ dinna ge ndu ɓû ge ol zì ya zum go.
46003016	Ḛ wan pe go ḛ zok ge Dok ne ma ne, On̰om ge Dok ne go ḛ zì to de?
46003017	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me vḛḛne zok ge Dok ne ya, Dok mbo vḛḛne ndu mbe me. Ago zok ge Dok ne harcal, zok ge Dok ne mbe, a ḛ sḛ ma.
46003018	N̰a ndu a̰me ne vuuɗi tene to. Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me ge ḛ buwal zige ndil tene ndu ge andaŋ ɗoo, kaɗ andaŋ ge dunin̰a ne boo ɗe, ke kwaɗa go, ne seŋe ge ndu ge dàle boo go, wa ɗege haɗ ndu ge andaŋ ge fareba go.
46003019	Ago, kaŋ ge nda duwana ge suwa pagal ma dwaɗ go ne kaŋ keeya ge andaŋ ne suwa pagal, ge Dok ta, a kaŋ ge dàle ne boo. A ge pe, njaŋe maktub ge Dok ne sok a̰me zì no go: «Dok wan nda ge andaŋ ma, ge son keeya ge maa way ma zì.»
46003020	Njaŋe ge sok a̰me ge ɗogle zì no go: «Bagezok kuwa dwaɗɗa ge nda ge andaŋ ma way ma kuwa. Kuwa kuwa go num aa bàŋ me.»
46003021	Go mbe no, ne kaa ge ndu a̰me ne uware tene ge na kon pe to, kaŋ ma peɗ àa ḛ ḛ ma ne.
46003022	Koo a mbi Pol, a Apolos, a Kefas, koo a dunin̰a ge ḛ no ne zì, koo a kaɗ ge ndwa, ko a swày, koo a kaŋ ge màge ma, koo a kaŋ ge mbo no ya ma puy, kaŋ mbe ma no peɗ àa ḛ ḛ ma ne.
46003023	Kaɗɗa ge ḛ ɗe, ḛ ge Krist ne ma ne, Krist me ɗe a ge Dok ne ne me.
46004001	Ɓyare nda kuwa go, i nda ge tèmel ge Krist ne ma ne, i kaɗ nda ge koy kaŋ ɗimil ge Dok ho̰ i num keeya ma me.
46004002	Kaŋ ge àa ɓyare ge ndu ge koy kaŋ ta, a go àa see go ne ndu ge n̰a wa to ne.
46004003	Kaɗɗa ge mbi, ge tèmel ge mbi kee no pe, be paa mbi zì ge sariya ge ḛ kun ne no mbi pagal, koo ge nda ge ɗogle ma kun no mbi pagal to me. Mbi be kuwa fare a̰me ge mbi dul wa wan mbi no ne pagal to me.
46004004	A fareba, mbi dul wa wan mbi go ge fare to, ɗaŋɗe, a be ge ano mbe no ta ɗoo, mbi wa mbo kaɗ ndu ge temel to. Ndu ge kun mbi sariya, a Bagezok.
46004005	A ge pe no, ne kaa ge ḛ kṵṵ sariya ndu a̰me pagal, ge dwam gwanna ge Bagezok ne ya ndwa zḛḛ to. Ge dwam mbe go, ne sḛ mbo ben fare ge way no tṵṵ zì ma ya kɔn̰al go ne, ee nda kuɗ fare ge way maa dul zì ma ya zum me. Ago, ndu ge diige mbo seɗ doreya ge na ne tem ge Dok ta.
46004006	Na̰ van ma, mbi kee fare sḭḭ mbe ma no ge i ge Apolos pagal, ge ḛ pe, ndwa go, ḛ dee ya kuwa fare a̰me ma, ge go ḛ wa mbo hele kaŋ ge njaŋe no maktub ge Dok ne zì ma pagal to. Ne kaa ge ndu a̰me hṵṵ tene ge hày sok mḛḛ ndu a̰me pe go ɗoo, ɗḭḭ sḭḭl ge ndu gegene to.
46004007	A ma̰ kaŋ ngay ne go mo waɗe nda gegene ma waɗe de? Kaŋ a̰me ge mo see ne, be Dok hon mo ne ne to diya de? Kaɗɗa mo see num seɗ no, ge dape mo wa ka uware tene, ge mojo̰o̰ mo see num seɗ to go de?
46004008	Ḛ ndi gale, bàŋ go velgeteg ḛ huri ya! Bàŋ go velgeteg, ḛ seŋe ya nda ge njonjon̰ ma! I gale be deɗ-ɗa sok no go to peɗ, ḛ seŋe ya ga̰a̰l mɔɗwag gaw-wa! I ɓyare go ḛ dee ya kaɗ ga̰a̰l ge fareba ma, i sḛ ma waɗme, i wa kaɗ ga̰a̰l ge ḛ dagre me ba!
46004009	Ndil mbi ndwa zì ge mojo̰o̰ Dok ee nè ge temeya ma nda duwana ma guwa̰ ge dwab yà go. Nè ge mojo̰o̰ nda ge àa kun fare ya num pagal, da̰a̰re mbal gezi ma go. Nè gaa ya ge kaŋ lasageya ma bàŋ go, ge nda duwana ge suwa pagal go ge ma, ge malayka mage nda duwana ge ɗogle ma ndwa zì.
46004010	Ge Krist pe, i gaa ge nda ge dàle ma go, ge ɓanna ge ḛ ɓa̰a̰ ge ne pe me ɗe, ḛ gaa nda ge andaŋ ma me. I gaa ge nda ge tuguɗi ma go, kaɗɗa ge ḛ sḛ ma ɗe, ḛ nda ge pool ma ne. Nda sen i sen, ḛ sḛ ma me ɗe nda hon ḛ hormo.
46004011	Ɗiŋ mà ge sego, i camal, mam njuwal hun i no, i an go swala. Nda duwana ma sok njon̰ i go, i mondoŋe go mondoŋe.
46004012	I uwa̰se pisil kan se ne mbḛḛ, i wa ɗege seɗ kaŋ zam go. Nda sal i no puy, i gwan ka kee num wa tare, àa njon̰ i no puy, i kaɗ deŋel.
46004013	Nda jan fare ge sone ma i pagal no puy, i ka gwan num fare janna ge ee num angal se ma. Ɗiŋ mà ge sego, nda duwana ge dunin̰a zige ma ndil i go ge gubu pagal bàŋ go. Àa ndil i ge mojo̰o̰ kaŋ ge mbaa a̰me daa to, ge nda gisi num kan gezi yà ma go.
46004014	Mbi njaŋe ḛ lawayta mbe ge dwaɗɗa ge hon ḛ daŋso to. Ɗaŋɗe, mbi nda jabso ge laa wanna ma, mbi njaŋe ḛ ne vare zoo, ndwa tyan ḛ angal ma gezi, ge fare a̰me ma pagal.
46004015	Ago, nda mbo kaɗ-ɗa ka eya ta, ɗeme ḛ ko pul ge Krist ne go, har dubu wol puy, ḛ ge ba ɗu kikiɗ. Ḛ ba mbe, a mbi sḛ mbe ge ee ḛ ɓanna dagre ge Zeso Krist, sok ge mbi ka oy Fare ge Kwaɗa go.
46004016	Kaɗɗa na mbe go, mbi kaɗe ḛ kaɗe, ḛ kaa nda ge bole mbi kaŋ keeya ma.
46004017	A ge pe no, mbi teme ḛ Timote yà no, mbi van ge laa wanna, ne ge n̰a wa to ge ko pul ge Bagezok ne go. Mbo voɗ ḛ pagal, ge vin̰a kàre Zeso Krist pe pagal ge ɓanna ge ḛ ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge ne pe, ge mbi dee hate ḛ num ma go, ge mojo̰o̰ mbi hate num no sok ma go, ge ɓase ge Krist ne ma ta peɗ go me.
46004018	Nda a̰me ge ḛ buwal zige ma kee ta ya hày kurub, dinna ge mbi mbo daa gwan deɗ ḛ buwal zì yà to go.
46004019	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa Dok vin-na, mbi mbo ge ḛ ta yà ge sego. Sok ge mbi mbo deɗ-ɗa yà, mbi mbo kuwa go num ge ma̰ pool sḛ tem me de, be ge num fare faaya ma to.
46004020	Mbi jan ano mbe ndwa go, muluk ge Dok kee no ndu pagal, àa kuwa ne ge ne fare janna ma ta ɗeŋew to, ɗaŋɗe, ge ne kaŋ ge kee ma ta.
46004021	Ḛ jin̰a mbi kaŋ ge ḛ ɓyare gale. Mbi mbo ḛ ta yà ge bol mbi tok go, koo ge laa wanna mage on̰om ge suul de?
46005001	Ḛ dḭḭl faa go ge sok ma go peɗ, ge ḛ kaŋ keeya ge batraŋ ma pe. Koo nda ge kuwa Dok to ma puy, àa kee kaŋ keeya ge go mbe ma pe to. Àa jan go ndu a̰me ge ḛ buwal zige mbo ɗiŋ mbo hee na ba gwale.
46005002	Ge go ḛ gwan ka jegre jegre ɗe, ḛ kee daa vare zoo kiimi, ndwa go, ndu ge go mbe no, mbiya ndwa ḛ yan ne ge ḛ buwal zì.
46005003	Kaɗɗa ge mbi ɗe, mbi ge ḛ buwal zì yà ge mbi ndwa ngaraf to, ɗaŋɗe, mbi ge ḛ ge on̰om zì. Mbi ee dṵṵl-la sok, ge ndu mbe ge go mbe no pagal.
46005004	Ago, ge dḭḭl ge nè Bagezok Zeso ne pe, sok ɓanna dagre ge ta go, mbi on̰om ge ḛ, ge pool ge Bagezok Zeso ne ta. Nè jan go:
46005005	Ndu ge go mbe no, àa suwa ne ge Saytan tok-ga, ne vḛḛne ne sḛ duul gezi, ndwa on̰om ge ne ne see monna, dwam gwanna ge Bagezok Zeso ne ya go.
46005006	Be wan ndwa ge ḛ ka jegreya to ɗaŋ! Ḛ wan pe go, jìn̰al hore hoɗege go guwa puy, ne ɗege swam ge àa wuwa ne digi ge ɓul mɔɗwag to de?
46005007	Ɓyare go ḛ haa ta kɔn̰al, sok ndage sone mbe ge dḭḭ ge jìn̰al hore go mbe ge ḛ buwal zì gezi, ndwa go, ḛ wa gaa ge swam waɗɗa ge jin̰al go. Ago, ḛ be jìn̰al hore ge ḛ zì, ndwa go àa hun tame van ge kee tuwaleya ge vḛḛso ge Paska ne Krist ya go, ge nè pe.
46005008	Kaɗɗa na mbe go, ḛ kee nè vḛḛso ge dupḛ ge jìn̰al hore, ge way laa pisil mage zwam ge ndwa pe zige no ge maa zì to. Ɗaŋɗe, ge dupḛ ge be jin̰al hore, ge ee nda kaɗ nda ge harcal mage nda ge fareba ma me.
46005009	Ge lawayta a̰me ge mbi njaŋe ḛ yà zì ɗe, mbi jin̰a ḛ zì go, ḛ kee baan ge nda ge an batraŋ ma to.
46005010	Mbi faa fare ge nda ge an batraŋ ma, nda ge aham ma, nda ge harge nda kaŋ mage nda ge kee siim no dunin̰a zì ma peɗ to. Daa no go mbi faa ge num peɗ ɗe, mà ee daa go ḛ gwan kaɗ dunin̰a zì to peɗ.
46005011	Mbi jin̰a ḛ zì yà go, ndu ge isi tene go na na̰ van ne, kaɗ ndu ge kee batraŋ de, ndu ge aham de, ndu ge kee siim de, ndu ge sal nda de, ndu ge fere jìn̰al de, koo ndu ge harge nda kaŋ ma de ɗe, ḛ kee baan ge a̰me ɗu to. Nda ge go mbe ma no, koo kaŋ zam, ḛ za ge num to peɗ.
46005012	A ma̰ kaŋ ee mbi ne, ge mbi wa mbo kun sariya ge ɓase ge Krist ne ma pagal de? Ḛ sḛ ma mbiya kun sariya ge nda ge ḛ ge num no dagre ma pagal to de?
46005013	Nda ge kàre Krist pe to ma ɗe, Dok kun num sariya ne. Njaŋe ge maktub ge Dok ne zì go: «Ḛ yin̰a nda ge laa pisil ma zum ge ḛ buwal zì.»
46006001	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me ge ḛ ge ho fareba ma buwal zige go ge fare ge na na̰ van no, kaŋe ne ge nda ge dunin̰a ma ta de? Gene ne vare zoo ge nda ge Dok mbege num gezi caɗ ge na pe ma ndwa se yà to de?
46006002	Ḛ wan pe go, nda ge Dok mbege num gezi caɗ ge na pe ma mbo kun sariya ne ge nda ge dunin̰a ma pagal to de? Kaɗɗa go ne ḛ sḛ ma mbiya kun sariya ne ge nda ge dunin̰a ma pagal no, fare ge mbiya fare pe to ma mà tane ḛ pe gyana de?
46006003	Ḛ wan pe go ne nè sḛ ma mbo kun malayka ma sariya ne to de? Kaɗɗa na mbe go no, a ma̰ kaŋ tane nè ne be nuusi fare ge kàɗɗa ge suwa pagal go ge ma way ma de?
46006004	Kaɗɗa, fare a̰me gene ho̰o̰l ja ge ḛ buwal zì no, ḛ gwan tol-la nda ge ɓase ge Krist ne ma ndil num be fare a̰me pe to ma vaa ḛ buwal de?
46006005	Daŋso kee ḛ to de! Ndu a̰me ge andaŋ ge ḛ buwal zì, ge wa ka vaa ḛ ge no na̰ van ma buwal ɗu to gaw de?
46006006	Ɗaŋɗe, ḛ gwan gene ta ɗiŋ nda ge ho fareba to ma ndwa se yà. Be kee kwaɗa ge go na̰ van mage na na̰ van mbo kaŋe ta to.
46006007	Kaɗɗa ge ḛ, koo ḛ kaŋe ta ge ta buwal zì puy, ngay go ḛ dage yà dage. Ge dape ḛ wa vin go àa za̰a̰ ḛ yal to de? Ge dape ḛ wa vin go àa chee ḛ to de?
46006008	Ɗaŋɗe, ajo̰o̰ ḛ sḛ ma mbyaɗ wan ta to ɗe, ḛ za̰a̰ ḛ ka̰a̰m ge ɗogle ma yal mage chel num go ne zoo. Num sḛ ma ḛ na̰ van ge Krist zige ma ne.
46006009	Nda ge kee sone ma waɗ ge muluk ge Dok ne zì to me ɗe, ḛ wan pe to de? Ɓyare ḛ vyale to! Nda ge fii ge ta batraŋ ma, nda ge kee siim ma, nda ge kee zina ma, nda soɗob ge fii ge ta ta buwal zì ma,
46006010	chala ma, nda ge aham ma, nda ge fere jin̰al ma, nda ge sal nda ma, nda ge harge nda kaŋ ma, àa mbo seɗ sok kàɗɗa ge muluk ge Dok ne zì to me.
46006011	Ḛ kuwa go, nda a̰me ge ḛ buwal zige ma kaa dee ya wal mbe go. Ɗaŋɗe ge sego, Dok ge nè ne usi ḛ ya go, haɗ ḛ ya harcal, seŋe ḛ ya nda ge temel ma ge On̰om ge na ne mage dḭḭl ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist ne pe.
46006012	Nda a̰me ge ḛ buwal zige ma jan go go, maa ge vin̰a ge kee kaŋ ma peɗ, ɗaŋɗe, kaŋ keeya a̰me ge mbaa num to ma go waɗme. Mbi ge pool jan go kaŋ ma peɗ num mbiya keeya, ɗaŋɗe, mbi ɓyare go, mbi kaa moor ge kaŋ keeya a̰me ne to.
46006013	Ḛ ha̰a̰le janna go: Dok ee kaŋ zam ma ge laa pe, ne ee laa no ge kaŋ zam pe me. A fareba, me ɗaŋɗe, Dok mbo burmi num gezi jwàg. Kaɗɗa ge sḛ duul ɗe, a ge batraŋ pe to, a ge Bagezok pe, Bagezok sḛ ge sḛ duul pe me.
46006014	Dok ge ta̰a̰ Bagezok, ge pool ge na ne mbe, mbo tan nè sḛ mbe go waɗme.
46006015	Ḛ wan pe wan go, sḛ duul ge ḛ ḛ ma num sok van a̰me ge duul ge Krist ne ma ne ɗer ɓade? A kwaɗa ge ndu hee sok a̰me ɗu ge duul ge Krist ne, mbo ɓan ne ge duul ge gwale ge zam tene ne de? Kee go mbe to.
46006016	Ḛ wan pe wan go, ndu ge ɓan ge gwale ge zam tene no, num ge ne seŋe duul ge ɗu to de? Ago njaŋe maktub ge Dok ne zì go: «Num sḛ ma jwàg mbo seŋe ge ndu ɗu go.»
46006017	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ge ndu ge ho̰ tene Bagezok, ne on̰om mage Bagezok ne sok ge ɗu go.
46006018	Ge ano mbe no pe, ḛ in̰a ta gezi ge ene ge sḛ duul ne ma go. Sone ge ɗogle ge nda kee num ma ame duul ge ɓul mɔɗwag to. Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge hon tene ge ene sḛ duul ta, wuwa go na duul mɔɗwag ge sone zì.
46006019	Ḛ wan pe wan go, ḛ sḛ duul ma no num zok ge harcal ge On̰om ge Harcal pe ne to de? On̰om ge Harcal mbe ge ḛ see ne ge Dok ta ge ḛ zì, ḛ sḛ duul daa be gaa ḛ ḛ ma to.
46006020	A fareba go Dok zu ḛ zuu ge yee gḛḛ, mbiya go ḛ sale Ne ge ḛ duul mɔɗwag.
46007001	Ge sego, mbi gwan ḛ fare janna ge fare ge ḛ ele mbi ge lawayta ge ḛ njaŋe mbi ya zì pagal. A kwaɗa ge ndu kaɗ zok to.
46007002	Ɗaŋɗe, ge go ndu dee ge ene sḛ duul zì to ɗe, a kwaɗa go ndu son ge diige kaa ge na gwale, ndu gwale ge diige me ɗe, ne kaa ge na obe waɗme.
46007003	Ɓyare go ndu son ke na gwale kaŋ ge ndu mbiya kee na gwale num tem. Ndu gwale me ɗe, ne kee mbe go ca.
46007004	Ndu gwale be fare ge na sḛ duul pagal, ɗaŋɗe, ne duul ne obe nee ne. A mbe go ca, ge ndu son pe, a be fare ge na sḛ duul pagal, ne duul ne gwale nee ne waɗme.
46007005	Kaɗɗa na mbe go, ḛ kaa ge be kuri ta to, ɗaŋɗe, ne kaa go ḛ sḛ ma za̰a̰ ta ne ge ta buwal zì mbḛḛ, ndwa seɗ vin̰a ge kee kaɗeya. Guwa̰, ḛ ɓa̰a̰ dagre vun cab, ndwa go, ḛ mbyaɗ wan ta to, Saytan seɗ vin̰a seɗ hee ḛ pe.
46007006	Fare ge mbi jan no, mbi ee ḛ mbi dwaɗɗa boo, a be go mbi ho ḛ mbi wa ge ne pagal to.
46007007	Daa ge mbi go, mbi daa mà ɓyare go nda soɗob peɗ, num kaa dinna ge mbi kaa no go, ɗaŋɗe, Dok hon nda bobo ma hini-hini. Nda a̰me ma, bobo ge hee ko pul mbe no, ge ɗogle ma bobo ge hee ko pul gegene me.
46007008	Ano mbi jan fare ḛ nda ge kaa zok to mage kumu ma. A kwaɗa ge ḛ kaɗ be gwale koo be obe, dinna ge mbi go.
46007009	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ḛ mbyaɗ wan ta to, ḛ kaa zok. Nde-nde ge ndu kaɗ zok, ge go ne ka za̰a̰ tene yal.
46007010	Ge num ge kaa zok ma pe, mbi hon num mbi wa no, mbo ge mbi ta to, ɗaŋɗe, a fare janna ge Bagezok nee ne go: Ndu gwale ne saa ge na obe to.
46007011	Kaɗɗa na deɗ ja saa tene ge na obe, ne gwan kaɗ zok to, kaɗɗa ne go to, ne ɓyare vin̰a ge maa eyal ta buwal. N̰a ndu son ne yin̰a na gwale to me.
46007012	Ge nda ge ɓase ma pe ɗe, a be Bagezok to, a mbi sḛ jan ne go: Kaɗɗa na̰ van ge son a̰me kaa go ge gwale ge ho fareba to, gwale mbe vḭḭ tene no go na kaɗ kaɗ ge ne, ne yin̰a ne to.
46007013	Kaɗɗa na̰ van ge gwale kaa go ge obe ge ho fareba to, obe mbe vḭḭ tene no go na kaɗ kaɗ ge ne, gwale mbe n̰a na obe mbe to.
46007014	Ago, ge gwale mbe ta, ndu son ge ho fareba to mbe gaa ne obe ge gagan̰ ne. Ge obe ta me ɗe, gwale ge ho fareba to mbe, gaa ne gwale ge gagan̰ ne me. Daa na go to, num van ma mà kaɗ van ge harcal to ma ne, zane no àa van ge gagan̰ ma ne.
46007015	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa lee ge ho fareba to ɓyare ya go na saa tene ge na kon gene ta, n̰a ne saa tene. Ge sok no zì, a na̰ van ge son de, koo a ge gwale de, gaa suli. Dwaɗɗa ge Dok ne, ge ee nè deɗ-ɗa ge sok no go go: Nè kaa halas ge ta.
46007016	Na̰ van ge gwale, mo wan pe ge dii go, ge mo ta, Dok ge pool mon mo obe de? Mo sḛ ge son, mo wan pe ge dii waɗme go, ge mo ta, Dok ge pool mon mo gwale de?
46007017	Kaŋ ge mbiya, ago ndu ge diige kaa ge mojo̰o̰ na kaa go, sok ge Bagezok Dok dee too na go. Ano, a wa hoɗɗa ge mbi hoɗ ne ge ɓase ge Krist ne ge diige ma buwal zì ne.
46007018	Kaɗɗa go, Dok too ndu ya na vyan bḛḛ ya ɗe, ne eya fare to. Kaɗɗa go Dok too ndu ya wa ya be vyan bḛḛ, ne kaa ge ɓyare vin̰a ge mbo vyan bḛḛ to me.
46007019	Koo mo vin̰a bḛḛ, mo vin̰a bḛḛ to, eya fare a̰me go ɗu to. Ɗaŋɗe, kaŋ ge ga̰a̰l ge Dok isi ne pagal, a mboya ge wa yuwaleya ge na ne ma pagal.
46007020	N̰a ndu ge diige ne kaa ge mojo̰o̰ Dok dee too na ya go.
46007021	Sok ge Dok too mo ya, mo wa ya moor kyala ɗe? Mɔge tene digi to. Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa mo seɗ vin̰a ge haɗ suli ya, vḭḭ waɗ gaw.
46007022	A fareba go, moor ge see tolla, gaa suli ge Bagezok ta. Ge ndu ge suli ge Bagezok too ne ya me ɗe, seŋe moor ge Krist ne me.
46007023	Dok poo kaŋ ge ɓaŋlaŋ, zuu ḛ ya no. Be wan ndwa ge ḛ kaɗ ḛ ka̰a̰m nda duwana ma moor to.
46007024	Na̰ van ma, ge ano mbe no pe, n̰a ndu ge diige, ne kaa ge mojo̰o̰ Dok dee ee pe tol na ya go.
46007025	Ge nda ge kaa zok to ma fare pagal ɗe, a be Bagezok ho mbi na wa ne to. Ɗaŋɗe, mbi jan mbi dwaɗɗa ne, ge mojo̰o̰ ndu ge Bagezok seŋe ne ya na ndu ge n̰a wa to go, ge kuwa a̰se ge na ne pe.
46007026	Ḛ kuwa kaŋ ge mbi ndil ne mbaaya no: Ge haŋle ge nè seɗ num gwase ma pe ɗe, kee kwaɗa go ndu kaɗ ge mojo̰o̰ na kaa mbe no go.
46007027	Mo kaɗ zok go de? Ɓyare vin̰a ge saaya ne to. Kaɗɗa mo be kaɗ zok to, wa̰a̰ tene kàɗɗa mbe go me.
46007028	Kaɗɗa na deɗ ja go mo, ndu son kaa zok puy, mo be kee sone to. Kaɗɗa ndu gwale ge na na̰ tok jan kaa zok ne puy me ɗe, be kee sone to me. Ɗaŋɗe, ḛ kuwa go haŋle ma go, sok ge nda a̰me ma seŋe duul ge ɗu. Sok jan ano mbe no go, mbi ɓyare vare zoo eyan ḛ ge haŋle mbe ma zì.
46007029	Na̰ van ma, mbi jan fare mbe ma ndwa tyan ḛ pagal gezi go, dwam ma chal ja zì. A gaa no ge sego mbo zḛḛ, nda ge kaa zok ma, num ke tèmel ge Dok ne ge mojo̰o̰ maa nda ge be gwale ma ne go.
46007030	Nda ge no ge miim maa ndwa go ma, num kee tèmel ge mojo̰o̰ ma fyal go fyal to go. Ge laa saal zì ma, ge mojo̰o̰ maa kee go laa saal to go. Ge yiya kaŋ ma, num ndi maa kaŋ ge maa yiya ma ge mojo̰o̰ num be a̰me pe ne to go.
46007031	Nda ge an̰ no ge kaŋ dunin̰a ma, ge mojo̰o̰ maa an̰ go to go. Ago, dunin̰a mbe ge nè kuwa ne no, deɗ ja na wa aaya go.
46007032	Mbi ɓyare go ḛ see tiɗiya to. Ndu ge kaa zok to, ee na dwaɗɗa ma mɔɗwag ge tèmel ge Bagezok ne ma pagal, kee go mbe ndwa kee Bagezok duul tii.
46007033	Ndu ge kaa zok, kaɗ yan kaŋ dunin̰a ma pe, ndwa kee na gwale duul tii me.
46007034	Go mbe no, ne dwaɗɗa ma va se vaa. A mbe go ca, ge ndu gwale ge be obe mage van kale pe. Àa ee maa dwaɗɗa ma mɔɗwag ge tèmel ge Bagezok ne ma pagal, ndwa haɗ ta harcal, ge maa sḛ duul mage maa on̰om mɔɗwag. Num ge kaa zok ma me ɗe, àa yan kaŋ ge dunin̰a ne ma pe, ɓyare vin̰a ge kee maa obe ma duul tii me.
46007035	Sok deɗ-ɗa jan ḛ fare mbe ma no go ɗe, mbi ɓyare vin̰a ge mbaa ḛ, a be go mbi tele ḛ ge fare a̰me ta to. Ɗaŋɗe, mbi gene ḛ ya kee kaŋ ge jwab, ndwa ee ḛ vwalla digi ge Bagezok dagre, be gwan ge guwa̰ to.
46007036	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me dwam van gwale a̰me ge na na̰ tok jan go ɗoo, ndil go, na kin̰are haɗ ge vḛḛne ne, dwaɗ maa ha ta digi vun cab kaɗ zok, ne ke na laa ɓyareya, be kee sone to. N̰a num kaa zok ɗaŋ!
46007037	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ndu vḭḭ tene go, na gale ame na van gwale ge na dwam ne to, kaɗɗa na duwa fare mbe sḛ ne ge na dul wa zì, be ge ndu a̰me ee ne eya fare ne to, kee kwaɗa boo.
46007038	Ḛ kuwa go, ndu ge ame van gwale ge na dwam ne kaɗ zok, kee fare ge kwaɗa boo. Ndu ge wan tene be kaɗ zok me ɗe, gwan kee fare ge walay nde me.
46007039	Ndu gwale mbarge mbarge ge na obe, kaɗɗa ne sḛ mbe gale go ge na ndwa. Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ne obe suu ya, gaa suli, a ge vin̰a ge kaɗ zok ge ndu ge na laa ɓyare ne. Ɗeŋew go, ne kaa ndu ge kàre Bagezok pe.
46007040	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ge mbi dwaɗ go, wan tene ya kaɗɗa be obe, gaa kaɗ kàɗɗa ge laa saal vare zoo. Ago, mbi ge kuwaya go On̰om ge Dok ne ɗeme mbi ne waɗme.
46008001	Ge sego, mbi faa fare ge duul ge kaŋ kogor ma way, ge àa hun num kee tuwaleya hon siim ma. A fareba, ge mojo̰o̰ ḛ ha̰a̰le janna go: «Nè peɗ nè ge kuwaya». Ɗaŋɗe, kuwaya ee ndu jegreya, laa wanna kwate nda pagal digi ne.
46008002	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me dwaɗ go go, kuwaya mbiya na mbyaɗ, gale be kuwaya a̰me ge mbiya.
46008003	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ndu a̰me laa wa̰a̰ Dok wan, Dok kuwa ne kuwa me.
46008004	Ge fare ge duul ge kaŋ kogor ma way zamma, num ge àa hun num kee tuwaleya hon siim ma ɗe, nè kuwa kuwa go, siim ma go ge dunin̰a zì ɓa, àa dok ge fareba ma ne to peɗ. Dok sḛ melaw ɗu.
46008005	Ge nda a̰me ma ta, dok ma go ge pḭḭ ziya, ge suwa pagal me. A fareba dok mage ba ge zok ma waɗe pool ɗaŋ.
46008006	Me ɗaŋɗe, ge nè sḛ ma pe ɗe, Dok melaw ɗu. A Ba ge doo kaŋ ma ne peɗ, nè kaa ge ndwa ge ne pe me. Bagezok melaw ɗu, Zeso Krist, ne ge kaŋ ma peɗ, ge àa kee no ge ne ta, ge nè sḛ ma kaa ge ndwa no ge ne pe me.
46008007	Ɗaŋɗe, a be nda peɗ ne ge kuwaya mbe to. A fareba go nda a̰me ma, àa ge dwaɗɗa mbe ge maa ka uware siim mbe ma maa pagal zì. Àa zam duul mbe ma mà ge sego ge dwaɗɗa mbe ge go, àa kee tuwaleya hon siim ma ge num. Ajo̰o̰ maa sḛ ma ge on̰om ge tuguɗi ɗe, àa ndil go, maa haɗ ta ya seŋre .
46008008	A be kaŋ zam ndaa ne ya guwa ge Dok ne to. Koo nè za ne, mbo ge nè zḛḛ to. Koo nè za ne to puy me ɗe, eya fare a̰me to me.
46008009	Ḛ ge vin̰a ge zam kaŋ ma peɗ ɓame, ɗaŋɗe, ḛ koy ta kwaɗa, ne kaa ge ano mbe no ee nda ge no tuguɗi ge ko pul ge Dok ne go ma ko challa to.
46008010	Mà deɗ ja go, ndu a̰me see mo ge no ge kuwaya, kàɗɗa zok ge siim ma way a̰me zì, ge kaŋ zam wa go, kaɗ go ne ndu ge no ge on̰om ge tuguɗi ne no, mà dwaɗ go vin̰a hage hage ge zam duul ge kaŋ kogor ge àa hun num kee tuwaleya hon siim mbe ma to de?
46008011	Go mbe no, ge kuwaya ge amo mbe pe, na̰ van ge hoɗege kuwaya, ge Krist suu ge ne pe mbe, ge pool ban gezi to de?
46008012	Sok kee ano mbe no go, ḛ kee sone go na̰ van mbe ge no tuguɗi maa on̰om zì ma ta ɗeŋew, ee num dul wa ma vaaya to, ḛ kee sone mbe go Krist ta waɗme.
46008013	A ge pe, mbi jan no go, kaɗɗa duul ge mbi zam mbe ge pool ee mbi na̰ van deɗ ge sone zì ɗe, mbi daa gwan zam ne to baɗ, ndwa go mbi ee mbi na̰ van banna to.
46009001	Mbi ge vin̰a ge kee kaŋ ma peɗ to de? Mbi be ndu ge temeya ne to de? Mbi be kuwa Zeso ge nè Bagezok mḛḛya mbi ndwa go geŋeŋ to de? Ḛ dee ya seŋe Bagezok nda ma ge mbi ta to de?
46009002	Kaɗɗa ge nda ge ɗogle ma ta, mbi be ndu ge temeya ne to puy ɗe, ḛ sḛ ma kuwa kuwa go mbi ndu ge temeya ne, ndwa go ḛ mbi logom ma ne, ge deɗɗa ge ḛ dee ya tèmel temeya ge Bagezok Krist ne zì keeya no pe.
46009003	Ḛ kuwa vin̰a ge mbi mbiya ben tene ge fare zì, sok ge nda kaŋe mbi go ma no:
46009004	I ge vin̰a ge seɗ zamma mage njoɗɗa, ge tèmel ge i kee pe to de?
46009005	Ndu ge diige be vin̰a ge gene na̰ van ge gwale ge maa ge ne kaa zok na pe yà ge mojo̰o̰ nda ge temeya gegene ma, Bagezok na̰ van mage Piyer ma gene go to de?
46009006	Koo ḛ dwaɗ go i ge Barnabas ne ɗeŋew ge vin̰a ge kee tèmel ge i wa zamma pe de?
46009007	A ma̰ asagar ne ɗoo, sok kee na tèmel go, wa ka wal tene ne ge na pagal de? A huɗi ne ge wa ɗḭḭ ɔwara on̰or ɗoo, wa zam ne ndwa tolla ma to de? Koo a huɗi ge koy kaŋ kogor ma ne ɗoo, wa wal tene ge num pam to de?
46009008	Fare janna ge mbi jan mbe ma no, àa kaŋ keeya ge nda duwana ma way ma ne boo de? Ago eeya ge Moyiz ne ma faa fare mbe ma go waɗme to de?
46009009	Ago, ge maktub ge Dok ne zì, eeya ge Moyiz ne ma jan zì go: «Ḛ vuwa nday ge kee tèmel sok poɗ swa go wa digi, tele ne ge swa ta to.» Fare ge nday ma way za̰a̰ Dok yal me de?
46009010	Faa na fare mbe sḛ tem ge nè sḛ ma pe to de? Fareba, a ge nè pe, àa njaŋe kaŋ mbe ma no. Ɓyare go ndu ge gaa kaŋ kaa ge jobreya ge seɗ kaŋ zam, ndu ge poɗ swa, ne kaa ge jobreya ge seɗ na kaŋ ndwa waɗme.
46009011	Kaɗɗa go i zare kaŋ kwaɗa ge On̰om ne ma ya ḛ dul wa ma zì ge nda zare kaŋ rusu go no, a sone maɗ ge i seɗ kaŋ ge mbiya, i mbaa ta ge num ma ge ḛ tok go de?
46009012	Kaɗɗa nda a̰me ge ɗogle ma go ge vin̰a ge seɗ kaŋ ge mbaa ta ma ge ḛ tok go no, i sḛ ma seɗ vin̰a daa ne vare zoo to de? Ɗaŋɗe, i be ɓyare kee ano mbe ma no to, i dṵṵl ma mɔɗwag i gwan hee num ne vare zoo, ndwa go ne kaa ge kaŋ keeya ge i i ma seŋe kaŋ ge tele Fare ge Kwaɗa ge Krist ne vin̰a ge zam zḛḛ to.
46009013	Ḛ sḛ ma wan pe go, nda ge kee tèmel ge zok ge Dok ne zì ma, wal ta ge kaŋ ge àa gene ya ge zok ge Dok ne zì ma to de? Num ge kee tuwaleya ge twal pagal ma me ɗe, num wal ta ge kaŋ ge àa hon ge twal tuwaleya pagal ma me to de?
46009014	A mbe go no waɗme, Bagezok ho na wa ge nda ge oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ma pe no go, num see wa zamma ge tèmel ge maa kee ma ta.
46009015	Kaɗɗa na mbe go puy, mbi be ɓyare go ndu a̰me ḭḭ tene ne ge mbi to. A be go, mbi njaŋe ḛ lawayta yà go, ḛ ke mbi mbe go to me. Ne nde-nde go, swày mbo ya wan mbi, ndu a̰me see vin̰a ge gul kaŋ ge ee mbi mà uware tene mbe no to.
46009016	Fare ge kwaɗa oyya hon mbi vin̰a ge uware tene to, ago a tèmel ge mbi mbiya kee nee ne ge mbi see wa hoɗɗa go. Woo ge mbi, kaɗɗa mbi oy Fare ge kwaɗa mbe ya to.
46009017	Daa ne mbi sḛ duwa ya ne kee tèmel mbe no, a ngaɗ go mbi see poɗɗa. Ɗaŋɗe, ajo̰o̰ a dṵṵl ge àa ee ne mbi pagal ne, mbi kee ne ge àa ho̰ mbi ne keeya go.
46009018	Mbi seɗ sḛ ma̰ poɗɗa ge sok no zì de? A laa saal ge mbi seɗ ne no, sok oy Fare ge Kwaɗa be seɗ poɗɗa a̰me, be yan kaŋ ge mbiya mbi seɗ num ma pe.
46009019	A fareba, mbi go suli ge fare ma zì peɗ, mbi vḭḭ tene kaɗ ge ndu ge kee tèmel hon na ka̰a̰m peɗ go no, ndwa go mbi zuwa nda lee gḛḛ ya hoɗ fareba Krist ta.
46009020	Sok ge mbi kaɗ Yahuɗ ma buwal zì, mbi kaɗ ge num sḛ ma go, ndwa ee num hoɗ fareba Krist ta. Sok ge mbi kaɗ num ge mbo eeya ge Moyiz ne ma pagal ma buwal zì me ɗe, mbi kaɗ ge num go me. Ano peɗ puy ɗe, eeya ge Moyiz ne be pool a̰me mbi pagal. Mbi kee ndwa gene num ya hoɗ fareba Krist ta.
46009021	Sok ge mbi kaɗ nda ge kuwa eeya ge Moyiz ne to ma buwal zì, mbi kee ge mojo̰o̰ ndu ge kuwa eeya mbe ma to go, ndwa gene num mbe ge kuwa eeya ge Moyiz ne to ma ya hoɗ fareba Krist ta. Ano mbe ngay go mbi ndu ge kuri eeya ge Dok ne ma ne to, ago, mbi mbo go ge eeya ge Krist ne ma pagal.
46009022	Sok ge mbi kaɗ ge Krist nda ge no tuguɗi ma buwal zì, mbi seŋe tene ge num sḛ ma go, ndwa gene num ya hoɗ fareba. Mbi eya fare sok ma go peɗ, ndwa ee nda a̰me ma seɗ monna .
46009023	Mbi kee ano mbe ma no peɗ go, Fare ge Kwaɗa ne dasare se, ndwa go mbi see mam ndwa sok no zì.
46009024	Ḛ kuwa kuwa go, nda kan ta soo ge dàa se ɗe, nda chiya soo peɗ ɓame, ɗaŋɗe, ɗu ge ne ko ndage zḛḛ yà seɗ poɗɗa ne to de? Ḛ chiya soo chiyaya ge mbo seɗ poɗɗa.
46009025	Ndu ge kee kyarga ge diige, sok nuusi tene go, tele tene ge kaŋ a̰me ma ta. Num sḛ mbe ma kee ndwa seɗ balme ge vḛḛne gezi boo. Kaɗɗa ge nè sḛ ma, nè seɗ balme ge vḛḛne to.
46009026	A ge pe, mbi chiya soo no, ɗaŋɗe, a be soo ge bàŋ go kay ne to. Mbi fee mbi tok guɗumul iyal kyarga, ɗaŋɗe, mbi cigi mbi tok sa̰a̰m zì boo to.
46009027	Mbi za̰a̰ mbi duul go yal vare zoo, wan tene ndindiŋ, ndwa go, ne kaa ge mbi sḛ doo tene gezi to, guwa̰ ge Fare ge Kwaɗa ne oyya go.
46010001	Na̰ van ma, mbi ɓyare go ḛ kaa dàle ge fare ge see nè baŋ ma to. Pḭḭ lu gyala luu num pagal mɔɗwag, àa wuwa mam ga̰a̰l nuwam pul se yà no mɔɗwag kale mbo lee gene yà me.
46010002	Sok mboya pḭḭ pe se mage kale mboya mam ga̰a̰l nuwam pul se mɔɗwag go, a ge mojo̰o̰ àa kee baptem go. Ano ɓa̰a̰ num dagre ge Moyiz.
46010003	Num sḛ ma mɔɗwag zaa kaŋ zam ge ɗu ge On̰om ho̰ num ne mbe.
46010004	Num sḛ ma mɔɗwag njoo mam ge ɗu mbe ge On̰om ho̰ num ne. Ago àa ka njoɗ mam ge On̰om ho̰ num ne ge ɗu mbe ge ka ɓul ge njal ge ka ɗeme num zì ya. Njal mbe kaa Krist.
46010005	Àa kuwa kaŋ ajab mbe ma no peɗ puy, lee gḛḛ ge num buwal zige ma ka mbo mboya ge kee Dok duul tii to, a ge pe, àa see swày ge babur pul go no.
46010006	Ḛ kuwa go, kaŋ mbe ma hate nè fare, ndwa go nè kaa ge dwaɗɗa ge sone ma nè zì, dinna ge nè baŋ ma kaa ge num go to.
46010007	Ne kaa ge ḛ uware siim ma, dinna ge a̰me ge num buwal zige ma kê go to. Go mbe no, njaŋe maktub ge Dok ne zì no go: «Ɓase ma mbo ya kaɗ se zam kaŋ zam mage njoɗ on̰or jin̰al, guwa̰, àa ɗege digi ndal kaŋ.»
46010008	Ne kaa ge nè ho̰ ta ge ene sḛ duul ta keeya, dinna ge nda a̰me ge num buwal zige ma kê go to. Ge dwam ge ɗu pul zì bàba, nda see swày no dudubu warzi pɔgwa taa.
46010009	Ne kaa ge ḛ vḛḛne Bagezok laa, dinna ge nda a̰me ge num buwal zige ma kê go to. Bwam ma ka coɗ num no, àa pû gezi no.
46010010	Ne kaa ge ḛ ɗege digi ge fare sone ma janna to, dinna ge nda a̰me ge num buwal zige ma kê go, malayka ge swày boo ne pû num gezi no me.
46010011	Yal mbe ma dee ya nè baŋ ma pagal dinna ge kaŋ ngayya a̰me go, njaŋe ge maktub ge Dok ne zì no, ndwa tyan nè pagal gezi go nè guwa ge dunin̰a wa aaya.
46010012	Ge ano mbe no pe, ndu ge dwaɗ go na mḛḛ go pool, ne koy tene kwaɗa ndwa go na dee to.
46010013	Pe heeya a̰me ge deɗ-ɗa ḛ pagal ma, àa deɗ go mbe ge nda pagal peɗ me. Dok Ba ge n̰a wa to ne, vin go pe heeya ma waɗe ge ḛ pagal to. Sok ge pe heeya ma deɗ-ɗa ḛ pagal, Ne sḛ hon ḛ pool ge wan ta ge num zì mage vin̰a ge ɓuu ge num zì ne waɗme.
46010014	Na̰ van ge laa wanna ma, a ge pe mbi jan ḛ no go, ḛ seŋe siim mbe ma ḛ guwa̰.
46010015	Mbi jan ḛ fare ndwa go, ḛ nda ge kuwa fare ma ne. Ḛ sḛ ma ge ḛ pagal, ḛ gaa vaa fare ge mbi jin̰a mbe ma buwal ne.
46010016	Dupḛ ge nè siɗi ta ne zamma no, a be ne ee nè kaɗ baan ge Krist ne, ge ne sḛ duul pe to de? Kob wa tare ge nè njoɗ ne, ge ee nè gwan ge Dok mersi no, a be baan ne ge nè ge Krist ma, ge swàm ge ne ne pe to de?
46010017	Ajo̰o̰ dupḛ ɗu kikiɗ, nè ge zam ne ma ɓase puy ɗe, nè ge mojo̰o̰ sḛ duul ge ɗu go, ge dape nè ɓa̰a̰ ge dupḛ ge ɗu mbe wa go.
46010018	Ḛ kuwa rusu ge Izrayel ne ma gale, num ge zam duul ge kaŋ kogor ge àa hun num ge tuwaleya pe ma, àa baan ge Dok ge àa kee ne tuwaleya twal pagal to de?
46010019	Sok mbe go mbi ɓyare jan gyana de? Ago, duul ge kaŋ kogor ge àa hun num kee tuwaleya hon siim ma way ma mbaa fare a̰me ɗaŋ de? Siim mbe ma mbaa fare a̰me sḛ me ɗaŋ de? To baɗ.
46010020	Ɗaŋɗe, kaŋ kogor mbe ge àa hun num kee tuwaleya ma, àa hun num kee tuwaleya hon on̰om ge sone ma, be hon Dok to. Kaŋ ge mbi ɓyare, ago ḛ kee baan ge on̰om ge sone mbe ma to.
46010021	Ḛ ge pool njoɗ on̰or jin̰al ge kob ge Bagezok ne, ḛ gwan njoɗ ge kob ge on̰om ge sone ma way me de? Ḛ ge pool kee baan ge Bagezok me no, ḛ kee baan ge on̰om ge sone ma waɗme de?
46010022	Nè ɓyare twa̰se digi Bagezok ge ne yil zì de? Nè sḛ ma waɗe ne ge pool de?
46010023	Ḛ ha̰a̰le janna go, ndu ge vin̰a ge kee kaŋ ge na ɓyare ma peɗ, ɗaŋɗe, a kaŋ keeya ma ge ɓul mɔɗwag mbaa ndu ne to. Ndu ge vin̰a ge kee kaŋ ge na ɓyare ma peɗ, ɗaŋɗe, a kaŋ keeya ma mɔɗwag ee ndu donna ne to me.
46010024	Ne kaa ge ndu a̰me ka ɓyare kwaɗa ge tene pe ɗeŋew to, ɗaŋɗe, ɓyare waɗme go ne kee kaŋ ge mbiya mbaa nda gegene ma.
46010025	Ḛ za kaŋ zam ge nda ee num yaɗ gezi suk zì ma peɗ, be ge ḛ ele ta fare a̰me ge num pagal, ndwa go ḛ dul wa wa̰a̰ ḛ to,
46010026	ge kuwaya go, «suwa mage kaŋ ge no na pagal ma mɔɗwag, num Bagezok ne ma ne.»
46010027	Kaɗɗa ndu ge ho fareba Zeso Krist ta to, tol ḛ ya mbo zam kaŋ zam na yà, kaɗ go ḛ vḭḭ mboya, ḛ za kaŋ zam ge àa mà hon ḛ ya ma peɗ, be ge ḛ ele ta fare a̰me num pagal to, ndwa go ḛ dul wa wa̰a̰ ḛ to.
46010028	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa àa jan ḛ ya go, ne kaŋ kogor ge àa hṵṵ num kee tuwaleya hon dok ge ɗogle ma duul ne, ḛ za ne to, ge ndu ge tâ ḛ fare mbe pe me no, ndwa go ḛ dul wa wa̰a̰ ḛ to me.
46010029	Mbi faa fare ge dul wa wanna ne, be ge ḛ ḛ ma to, ɗaŋɗe, ge ndu ge tâ ḛ fare ne. Ago mbi kee mbi laa ɓyareya ɗoo, pe gyana, ndu ge ɗogle dul wa wa mbo wan ne de?
46010030	Kaɗɗa mbi gwan ge mersi hon Dok ge kaŋ zam ge mbi zâ pe no, kee pe gyana, àa mà wa mbo jan fare ge sone mbi pagal ge kaŋ zam mbe ge mbi gwan mersi ne pagal pe de?
46010031	Koo ne kaa go ḛ zam kaŋ zam, koo ḛ njoɗ a̰me, koo ḛ kee kaŋ a̰me, ḛ kee ne keeya ge ee Dok dḭḭl seɗ hormo.
46010032	Ɓyare go ḛ kaŋ keeya ma num ee Yahuɗ ma, koo Grek ma, koo ɓase ge Dok ne ma deɗɗa to.
46010033	A ge pe, mbi sḛ ɓyare no go kaŋ keeya ge ambi ma mɔɗwag num dee nda ta peɗ kwaɗa, ge dwaɗɗa ge ɓyare kwaɗɗa ge mbi pe to, ɗaŋɗe, ɓyare kwaɗa ge nda way peɗ, ndwa go num see monna .
46011001	Ḛ he mbi ko pul, dinna ge mbi sḛ hê Krist ko pul no go me.
46011002	Mbi dore ḛ ge ḛ dwaɗ ge mbi dwam ma zì mɔɗwag pe, ge ḛ mbo kaŋ ge mbi dee hate ḛ num ma pagal pe me.
46011003	Ɗaŋɗe, kaŋ ge mbi ɓyare ḛ dee ya kuwa ne ge sego no: Krist ge ndu son ge diige pagal digi, ndu son ge ndu gwale pagal digi, ndu ge Krist pagal digi-ge a Dok me.
46011004	Kaɗɗa ndu son kee kaɗeya, koo zwagre Dok wa, kaɗ ge jum na pagal, be gwan na pagal ge ndu ge na pagal digi-ge mbe pe se to.
46011005	Kaɗɗa ndu gwale kee kaɗeya ne, koo zwagre Dok wa, pagal vwalla zì to, be gwan na pagal ge na kon ge na pagal digi-ge pe se to. A ge mojo̰o̰ na soo na pagal gezi soɗ go.
46011006	Kaɗɗa, ndu gwale vwal na pagal-la zì to, ɓyare go ne koo ne gezi. Kaɗɗa na daŋso ge ndu gwale koɗ na pagal, koo soɗ na pagal me ɗe, ne vuwa ne zì ɗaŋ.
46011007	Be wan ndwa ge ndu son kubi jum sok kaɗe Dok go to, ge dape, a ge diir ge ne ne, ngay hormo ge ne ne me. Ɗaŋɗe, ndu gwale ngay hormo ge ndu son ne me.
46011008	Ḛ ge kuwaya go, Dok be kee ndu son ge ndu gwale sḛ duul to, ɗaŋɗe, Dok kee ndu gwale ge ndu son sḛ duul.
46011009	Dok be dol ndu son ge ndu gwale pe to, ɗaŋɗe, a ge ndu son pe, doo ndu gwale no.
46011010	Ge ano mbe no pe, mbiya go ndu gwale vuwa na pagal zì, kaŋ ge ngay go ne ge pagal gwanna ge ndu ge na pagal digi pe se, ge malayka ma pe.
46011011	Kaɗɗa na go puy ɗe, nè ge ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Bagezok ma, be ndu son to ɗe, mbaa ndu gwale to. Be ndu gwale to me ɗe, mbaa ndu son to me.
46011012	Ajo̰o̰ Dok kee ndu gwale ge ndu son ta puy ɗe, ndu son gwan waɗ ge ndu gwale laa zì ya. Ɓyare nè kaa ge kuwaya go kaŋ ma peɗ mbo ge Dok ta ya.
46011013	Ḛ va fare mbe buwal gale, a kwaɗa ge ndu gwale ka kaɗe Dok, be pagal vwalla zì de?
46011014	Kàɗɗa ge suwa pagal go ge ngay go, ne kaŋ daŋso ne ge ndu son pe, ge ne n̰a na pagal susu twala sutug,
46011015	ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ge ndu gwale ɗe, a kaŋ hormo ne ge ne pe. Ago, Dok ho̰ ne pagal susu twala sutug ge kaŋ laa pagal go.
46011016	A gaa mbo zḛḛ no, kaɗɗa ndu a̰me gwan kee peeya fare mbe ma pagal, ne kuwa go, ne daa be gwan paa nè zì ge kee peeya to, koo ne kaɗ fare ge ɓase ge Dok ne ma way to me.
46011017	Mbi ɓyare hoɗ ḛ mbi wa ge fare a̰me pagal, mbi dore ḛ sok no zì to. Ge dape, sok ge ḛ kaɗ ka seɗ ta go, ge go ḛ za zḛḛ ɗe, ḛ gwan dage go dage.
46011018	Fare ge zḛḛge, mbi za̰a̰ go, sok ge ḛ, ɓase ge Krist ne ma seɗ ta go, ḛ wa dagre ɗu to, mbi hoɗ fareba go ne ge pool kaɗ fare ge fareba mɔɗwag to.
46011019	Ɓyare go vaaya ma ka ḛ buwal zì ɗaŋ, ndwa go nda dee ya kuwa num ge mbiya seɗ doreya, ge ḛ buwal zige ma.
46011020	Sok ge ḛ seɗ ta ɓase mbe go ɗe, àa tol ge go mbe no kaŋ zam ge Bagezok ne zamma ɗaŋ de?
46011021	Sok ge ḛ kaɗ ge kaŋ zam mbe wa go, ndu ge diige haa tene zam na kaŋ zam sḛ gaw, sok mbe go nda a̰me ma gale camal, nda gegene ma me ɗe àa fere ya sok me.
46011022	Ḛ be zok ge ḛ zam kaŋ zam mage njoɗ jin̰al num diŋ ma de? Ḛ coɗ ɓase ge Dok ne ma, koo ḛ luguy go nda ge hoɗegeya ma de? Mbi jin̰a ḛ sḛ ma̰ fare de? Ḛ dwaɗ go mbi mà dore ḛ ɗaŋ de? Ge sok mbe no zì, fareba mbi dore ḛ to.
46011023	Ḛ kuwa go, fare mbe ge mbi hate ḛ num ma, mbi see num ge Bagezok ta. Bagezok Zeso sḛ, ɗaal ge àa mà mbo ɓyan ne gezi go àa hṵṵ ne, hee dupḛ,
46011024	guwa̰, kee mersi hon Dok, siɗi ne se, jan na nda ge ame hateya ma go: Ano mbe no a mbi sḛ duul, ge mbi hon ne gezi ge ḛ pe ne. Ḛ gaa keeya mbe go, ndwa go ḛ wa ka dwaɗ mbi.
46011025	Guwa̰ ge num tok aa ge kaŋ zam zamma go, hee kob ge on̰or jin̰al ne, jan num mbe go waɗme: Kob mbe no, ngay wa tii vwalla ge jin̰al, ge Dok mbo kee ne no ge mbi swàm. Ḛ gaa keeya mbe go, ḛ wa ka dwaɗ mbi, ɗaɗag ge ḛ kaɗ njoɗ ne go.
46011026	Ḛ kuwa go, ɗaɗag ge ḛ kaɗ-ɗa ka zam dupḛ mbe mage ka njoɗ on̰or jin̰al mbe ge no kob zì me ɗe, ḛ oy go swày ge Bagezok ne, ɗiŋ gwanna ge ne ne ya.
46011027	A ge pe no, ndu ge kaɗ zam dupḛ zamma ge kwaɗa to, koo njoɗ on̰or jin̰al ge kob ge Bagezok ne zige njoɗɗa ge kwaɗa to, gene ya dṵṵl na pagal. Sok mbe go kee sone sḛ duul mage swàm ge Bagezok ne.
46011028	Kaɗɗa na mbe go, n̰a ndu ge diige ne hale na dul wa kwaɗa, go mbe no, ne wa ɗege zam dupḛ mage njoɗ kob on̰or jin̰al go.
46011029	Ago, ndu ge zam dupḛ mage njoɗ on̰or jin̰al, be ge hon kaŋ zam mbe ga̰a̰l go ne Bagezok duul sḛ ne tem to, sok zamma mage njoɗɗa mbe go, zwal-la dṵṵl sḛ ge na pagal.
46011030	A ge pe no, ge ḛ buwal zì, nda gḛḛ no tuguɗi mage sulugu no, a̰me ma gḛḛ suu ya sok no me.
46011031	Kaɗɗa nè sḛ ma ge nè pagal, nè kun sariya ta pagal ne, Dok mbo ee dṵṵl daa nè pagal to.
46011032	Ɗaŋɗe, Bagezok kun nè sariya no ɗe, mḛḛre nè, ndwa go sariya wa̰a̰ nè dagre ge nda ge dunin̰a ma to.
46011033	Kaɗɗa na mbe go, na̰ van ma, sok ge ḛ seɗ ta zam kaŋ zam ge Bagezok ne go, ḛ da̰a̰re ta ya zì mɔɗwag.
46011034	Kaɗɗa ndu camal, ne za kaŋ ge na diŋ ya gaw, ndwa go, sok ge ḛ deɗ-ɗa sok ɓan pagal go, ne kaa ge ḛ zuwa dṵṵl ya ḛ pagal to. Mbi mbo nuusi fare gegene ge gaa ma, sok ge mbi mbo deɗ-ɗa ḛ ta yà.
46012001	Na̰ van ma, kaɗɗa ge bobo ge nè seɗ num ge On̰om ge Harcal ta ma ɗe, mbi ɓyare go ḛ duwa daame pagal digi to.
46012002	Ḛ kuwa kuwa tyatyaɗ go, sok ge ḛ gale wa ya be kuwa Dok fareba to ɗe, siim mbe ge faa wa to ma ka gondoŋe ḛ lee gene me-lee gene me.
46012003	A ge pe, mbi tyan ḛ pagal gezi no go: Ndu a̰me kaɗɗa na jan fare ge pool ge Dok ne ɗe, mbyaɗ jan «fare ge sone kakatag ge Zeso pagal to.» Ndu a̰me mbyaɗ janna go: «Zeso Bagezok ne» to me, kaɗɗa On̰om ge Harcal mbe be hon ne pool ne to.
46012004	Bobo ge nda seɗ num ge tèmel pe ma hini-hini ge ta, ɗaŋɗe, a On̰om ge Harcal ge ɗu mbe hon nda num ne.
46012005	Tèmel keeya ge Dok pe ma pe hini-hini, ɗaŋɗe, a Bagezok ge ɗu mbe ne.
46012006	Vin̰a ge kee tèmel ma hini-hini ge ta, ɗaŋɗe, a Dok ge ɗu mbe hon nda peɗ, pool ge kee kaŋ mbe ma ne mɔɗwag me.
46012007	Ago, On̰om ge Harcal dyan tene ge ndu ge diige zì, ge kwaɗa ge na ka̰a̰m way pe peɗ.
46012008	A fareba go, On̰om ge Harcal hon ndu ge ɗu bobo ge faa fare ge andaŋ ma, On̰om ge Harcal ge ɗu mbe hon gegene bobo ge faa fare ge na wan ne ne pe ya me.
46012009	On̰om ge Harcal ge ɗu mbe hon a̰me ge ɗogle bobo ge kaɗ ge hoɗ fareba. Ge ɗogle iya, On̰om ge Harcal mbe hon ne bobo ge zon nda ge tuguɗi ma me.
46012010	On̰om ge Harcal mbe hon ndu ge ɗogle bobo ge kee kaŋ ajab ma. Hon gegene bobo ge zwagre Dok wa. Hon ge ɗogle bobo ge vaa on̰om ge kwaɗa mage ge sone ma buwal. Hon ge ɗogle bobo ge faa wa ge ɗogle ma. Hon a̰me ge ɗogle bobo ge zwagre wa mbe ge ɗogle ma me.
46012011	A On̰om ge Harcal ge ɗu kikiɗ mbe kee kaŋ mbe ma ne mɔɗwag. A ne vaa nda pool mbe ma ne pe hini-hini ge na ɓyare go me.
46012012	Nè kuwa kuwa go, sḛ duul ne ɗu, ne kaɗ ge sok van ma pe hini-hini ge na ta. Sok van ge sḛ duul ta mbe ma no gḛḛ ceɗeɗ puy ɗe, a num ɓa̰a̰ ne digi sḛ duul ge ɗu. A mbe go waɗme ge Krist pe.
46012013	A ge On̰om ge ɗu mbe ta, nè peɗ àa kê nè baptem no, ndwa deɗ-ɗa kaɗ sḛ duul ge ɗu. Nè mɔɗwag, koo a Yahuɗ, koo a Grek, koo a moor, koo a ndu ge suli, a On̰om ge ɗu mbe ne nè zì peɗ me.
46012014	A fareba, sḛ duul ge sok van ɗu na ta boo to, ɗaŋɗe, sok van ma gḛḛ ge sḛ duul ge ɗu mbe ta.
46012015	Daa go ko ka janna go: «Mbi be tok ne to, ago mbi be sḛ duul sok van a̰me ne to» no, mà tane ne be kaɗ sḛ duul sok van a̰me de?
46012016	Daa go tɔgwa ka janna go: «Mbi be ndwa ne to, ago mbi be sḛ duul sok van a̰me ne to» no, mà tane ne be kaɗ sḛ duul sok van a̰me de?
46012017	Daa na go sḛ duul no mɔɗwag ne ka ndwa ɗeŋew no, ndu mà za̰a̰ fare ge da de? Daa no me go sḛ duul no mɔɗwag ne tɔgwa ne no, ndu mà huu kaŋ ge da me de?
46012018	Ɗaŋɗe, Dok ee sok van ge duul ta ge diige ge na duwa ee ne go.
46012019	Daa no go sok van a̰me ɗu ge sḛ duul ta ge ne sḛ duul ge ɓul mɔɗwag no, daa mà kaɗ sḛ duul sḛ pe gyana de?
46012020	Ge sego, sok van ge sḛ duul ta ma gḛḛ-gḛḛ, ɗaŋɗe, a sḛ duul mbe ne ɗu.
46012021	Kaɗɗa na mbe go, ndwa mbyaɗ jan tok go: «Mbi ɓyare mo to» to. Pagal mbyaɗ jan ko ma me go: «Mbi ɓyare ḛ to» to me.
46012022	Nè ndil-la kwaɗa, sok van ge sḛ duul ta ge mbyaɗ fare pe to ma, kaɗ sok ge mbaa fare ma ne vare zoo.
46012023	Num mbe ge nè ndil num go num be mbyaɗ fare a̰me pe to ge sḛ duul ta ma, nè ee nè angal kwaɗa gḛḛ ge num pagal. Go no me, nè sok van ge nè sḛ duul ta, ge way way nda ndwa go ma, nè ndwa ge num pagal keceɗ.
46012024	Kaɗɗa ge num ge no nda ndwa kɔn̰al go ma me ɗe, nè ndil num bàŋ kay me. Dok nuusi sḛ duul ge go, ne sok van ge ne ta, ge mbyaɗ fare pe a̰me to ma, nè ndwa ka num pagal keceɗ.
46012025	Go mbe no, vaaya a̰me kaɗ ge sḛ duul ta to, ɗaŋɗe, sok ge no sḛ duul ta ma kaɗ ka mbaa ta mbaa vare zoo.
46012026	Kaɗɗa sḛ duul sok a̰me za̰a̰ yal, sok ge sḛ duul ta gegene ma mɔɗwag za̰a̰ yal ge ne me. Kaɗɗa sḛ duul sok a̰me ɗu seɗ hormo ya, gegene ma peɗ, àa kee laa saal ge ne.
46012027	Kaɗɗa ge ḛ sḛ ma ɗe, ḛ ɓa̰a̰ digi ge duul ge Krist ne go. Ndu ge diige me ɗe, a sok van a̰me ɗu ge ne duul ta ge ne me.
46012028	Ago mbe no, nda ge Dok ee num zḛḛ cecew ge ɓase ge Krist ne ma buwal zì ma, a nda ge temeya ma, ge zi, a nda ge zwagre na wa ma, ge taa ɗe, a nda ge hate nda ma. Guwa̰ go, hon a̰me ma bobo ge kee kaŋ ajab ma, pool ge zon tuguɗi ma, bobo ge mbaa nda, bobo ge ɗeme nda, bobo ge faa wa ge ɗogle ma me.
46012029	O̰o̰ ḛ sḛ ma ɗe, nda peɗ àa kaɗ nda ge temeya ma de? Nda peɗ àa kaɗ nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma de? Nda peɗ àa kaɗ nda ge hate nda ma de? Nda peɗ àa kaɗ nda ge kee kaŋ ajab ma me de?
46012030	A nda peɗ ne ge bobo ge zon nda de? A nda peɗ ne ge bobo ge faa wa ma pe hini-hini ge On̰om ge Harcal hon nda num ma de? A nda peɗ ne ge bobo ge zwagre wa mbe ge pe hini-hini ma de?
46012031	Ḛ kaa ge ene ge ɓyare bobo mbe ge On̰om hon nda num ma. Ge sego, mbi mà gwan ngay ḛ vin̰a ge kwaɗa waɗe na ka̰a̰m daday.
46013001	Kaɗɗa mbi faa wa ge ɗogle ma go gḛḛ-gḛḛ puy, koo mbi faa ge malayka ma way ma puy, kaɗɗa mbi ngay laa wanna ge mbi ka̰a̰m ta to, mbi dḭḭ sḭḭ ge walam kàal ge vin go, koo ge gergeleŋ ge kee kṵwa̰ boo go me.
46013002	Sok ge mbi mbo kaɗ-ɗa ge bobo ge zwagre Dok wa, mbi kaɗ ge kuwaya ma peɗ, mbi kaɗ ge bobo ge wan kaŋ ajab ge Dok ne ma pe, sok ge mbi mbo kaɗ-ɗa ge fareba hoɗɗa tyatyaɗ ge Dok ta, ge ee mbi hoɗ njal ma mbi wa go num ndage ge sok mbe no go gezi, kaɗɗa mbi ngay laa wanna mbi ka̰a̰m ta to, mbi be mbyaɗ fare a̰me pe to.
46013003	Mbi ge pool vaa nda ge hoɗegeya ma mbi kaŋ gan ma gezi mɔɗwag, koo mbi hon mbi duul go àa tii ne gezi, kaɗɗa go mbi ngay laa wanna ge mbi ka̰a̰m ta to, mbaa mbi ge a̰me pe to.
46013004	Laa wanna ee ndu wan tene, ee ndu kee kwaɗa, ee ndu kee ene ge na kon kaŋ pe to, ee ndu jegreya to, ee ndu kee pagal ga̰a̰l to me.
46013005	Laa wanna ee ndu kee a̰me ge daŋso to, ee ndu ɓyare kwaɗa ge tene pe ɗeŋew to, ee ndu juliliya ge twam to, ee ndu dwaɗ sone ge na kon pagal to.
46013006	Laa wanna ee ndu kee laa saal ge kaŋ keeya ge ndu ne ge kee na vin̰a go to pe to, ɗaŋɗe, kee laa saal vare zoo ge kaŋ keeya ge fareba ge ndu kee ne pe.
46013007	Laa wanna ee ndu pore nda ge kee na sone ma peɗ, ee ndu hoɗ fareba ge Dok ta dwam ma zì mɔɗwag, ee ndu jobreya ge ne pagal dwam ma zì mɔɗwag, ee ndu wan tene ge fare ma zì peɗ me.
46013008	Laa wanna aa vin̰a zì to. Kaɗɗa ge fare ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma jin̰a ma ɗe, àa mbo aa dwam ɗu. Ge fare ge faa wa ge ɗogle ge On̰om ge Harcal hon nda num ma ɗe, àa mbo mḛḛ dwam ɗu. Kuwaya ma mbo aa dwam ɗu waɗme.
46013009	Ago, kuwaya ge nè ne ma hoɗege guwa. Dok wa ge nè zwagre num ma be aa zum janna papandaŋ to me.
46013010	Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge kaŋ ge mbiya tab mbo mbo ja, sok mbe go, kaŋ ge ne wa huy to mbo aa gezi yà.
46013011	Sok ge mbi ka jiyale, mbi fare faaya ma kaa fare faaya ge nda jabso way, mbi ka dwaɗ dwaɗɗa ge nda jabso way, mbi wan fare ma pe to ge nda jabso go me. Sok ge mbi haa ndu pool go, kaŋ keeya ge ambi ge nda jabso way ma aa go.
46013012	Ge sego, nè kuwa kaŋ ma go ge mojo̰o̰ nè kuwa kaŋ ma gḭḭl ge a̰me ge seeya ta go. Dwam a̰me dee ɗu, nè mbo kuwa kaŋ ma ge nè ndwa gegel. Ge sego, mbi kuwaya ma hoɗege guwa, ɗaŋɗe, dwam ma mbo mbo ya, mbi pagal mbo tyan gezi kuwa kaŋ ma, dinna ge Dok sḛ kuwa mbi no go.
46013013	Ḛ kuwa ge sego, kaŋ ge taa mbe ma no, num mbo zḛḛ gale: Fareba hoɗɗa, jobreya, laa wanna. Ɗaŋɗe, ge waɗe ge ga̰a̰l, ge num ge taa ma buwal zì, a laa wanna.
46014001	Ḛ ɓyare gale vin̰a ge kee laa wanna ge nda. Ḛ kaa ge ene, ge yan bobo ge On̰om ge Harcal hon nda num ma pe waɗme, ɗaŋɗe, ge waɗe, ne kaa bobo ge zwagre Dok wa.
46014002	Ḛ kuwa go, ndu ge faa wa ge ɗogle ma, faa fare na ka̰a̰m to, ɗaŋɗe, faa fare go Dok. Ago, ndu a̰me ge za̰a̰ ne to. On̰om ge Harcal hon ne pool ne faa fare ɗimil mbe ma.
46014003	Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge zwagre Dok wa|Nda ge zwagre Dok wa, faa fare na ka̰a̰m, ee num donna, hon num pool, ee num cirsiya me.
46014004	Ndu ge faa wa ge ɗogle ma, ne sḛ ɗeŋew don ne ge na hoɗ fareba zì. Kaɗɗa ge ndu ge zwagre Dok wa ɗe, ee vare zoo ɓase ge Krist ne ma mɔɗwag donna ge hoɗ fareba ge maa way ma zì.
46014005	Kaɗɗa ge mbi, a kwaɗa go ḛ mɔɗwag, ḛ dee ya faa wa ge ɗogle ma, ɗaŋɗe, mbi gwan ɓyare zoo go ḛ zwagre Dok wa. Ago, ndu ge zwagre Dok wa waɗe ndu ge faa wa ge ɗogle ma waɗe, kaɗɗa ndu ge wan ɓase ge Krist ne ma num pe, wa ee num donna ge hoɗ fareba ge maa way ma zì.
46014006	Ge sego, na̰ van ma, kaɗɗa mbi deɗ-ɗa ḛ buwal zì yà, ɓyare go, mbi faa ḛ fare ge tyan ḛ pagal gezi ge fare ɗimil ma pagal ma, ge ee ḛ kuwa kaŋ a̰me ma, koo zwagre ḛ Dok wa ma, ge hate ḛ fare ma me. Mà kaɗɗa mbi faa ḛ fare ge wa ge ɗogle ma no, mbi mba ḛ mbaa no ɗaŋ de?
46014007	Kaɗ mbe go ca, ge kaŋ ge nda hale num, dinna ge gal mage biliŋ go ma. Mà kaɗɗa num ka̰a̰l ame ta kwaɗa to no, ndu mà mbo wan pe gyana go àa hale kaŋ gene kaŋ gene de?
46014008	Mà kaɗɗa tuŋ ge twam ne vin vinna ge jwab to no, a huɗi mà mbo nuusi tene ne ge twam mballa pe de?
46014009	Ḛ sḛ ma mbe go waɗme, kaɗɗa go ḛ faa wa ge ɗogle ge nda za̰a̰ num to ma no, a huɗi mà wan fare ge ḛ faa pe ne de? Ḛ fare mbe faa ge sa̰a̰m zì boo.
46014010	A fareba go, wa ma rusu pe hini-hini, baŋneya bindig ge dunin̰a zì puy ɗe, ge diige puy, wan fare ma pe zum hetel.
46014011	Kaɗɗa mbi wan wa a̰me ge ndu faa ne pe to ɗe, mbi gaa mà ge van gɔswal go, ge ndu ge faa wa mbe ndwa zì. Ndu ge faa wa mbe me ɗe, a ge van gɔswal go mbi ndwa zì me.
46014012	Mbi jan fare mbe vare zoo ḛ, ge dape, ḛ uwaseya sɔswag, ge bobo ge On̰om ge Harcal hon nda num mbe ma pe. Ɓyare ḛ laa wa̰a̰ gḛḛ num ge mbiya mbaa ḛ ma, àa ee ɓase ge Krist ne ma donna ge hoɗ fareba ge maa way ma zì ma me.
46014013	Go mbe no, ndu ge faa wa ge ɗogle ma, n̰a ne kaɗe Dok, ne ho̰ na bobo ge zwagre num zum me.
46014014	Ago, kaɗɗa mbi kee kaɗeya ge wa ge ɗogle ma zì ɗe, ano mbe mbo ge mbi on̰om zì, ɗaŋɗe, mbi dwaɗɗa ma ge sok no zì to.
46014015	O̰o̰ mbi kee mà gyana? Mbi kee kaɗeya ge mbo ge mbi on̰om zì ya me no, mbi kee kaɗeya ge mbi dwaɗɗa ma waɗme. Kaɗɗa mbi mbal kaŋ puy me ɗe, ano mbe mbo ge mbi dul wa zì ya, mbi mbal ne ge mbi dwaɗɗa ma waɗme.
46014016	Kaɗɗa na go to, mà kaɗɗa go mo kee mersi hon Dok ge mo on̰om zì ya no, kee mà pe gyana, ndu ge wan fare ge mo jan mbe pe to, ge no nda buwal zì wa mbo vin « Amin » bàŋ kay ge mo mersi keeya mbe pagal de?
46014017	A fareba go, mersi ge mo kee hon Dok ngaraŋ ɓame, ɗaŋɗe, mbaa mo kon gegene donna ge hoɗ fareba ge na ne zì to.
46014018	Mbi gwan ge mersi keeya hon Dok, ge dape mbi faa wa ge ɗogle mbe ma waɗe ḛ peɗ.
46014019	Go mbe no, kaɗɗa mbi ge ɓase ge Krist ne ma buwal zì ɗe, mbi ɓyare vare zoo, jan fare wa pul zi ge kuwaya ge ambi, ndwa tyan mbi ka̰a̰m pagal gezi, ge go mbi jin̰a fare se gḛḛ ceɗeɗ ge wa ge ɗogle mbe ma.
46014020	Ḛ duwa dwaɗɗa ge nda ga̰a̰l way, na̰ van ma. Ḛ duwa dwaɗɗa ge nda jabso ma way to, ɗaŋɗe, lee ge sone keeya ne go, ḛ kaa dinna ge nda jabso ge kuwa sone keeya to ma go.
46014021	Njaŋeya ge Dok ne jan zì go: «Ɓase mbe ma mbo gaa za̰a̰ fare ge mbi ɓyare jan maa ge wa ge ɗogle ma zì. Mbi mbo ee rusu ge ɗogle ma jan num fare. Ano peɗ puy ɗe, àa mbo za̰a̰ mbi sḛ to» Bagezok jan ne.
46014022	Go mbe no, ndu kaɗɗa faa wa ge ɗogle ma, a kaŋ ngayya ne, ge nda ge ho fareba to gale ma pe, ɗaŋɗe, a be ge nda ge ho fareba ma pe to. Kaɗɗa ndu zwagre Dok wa me ɗe, a kaŋ ngayya ne ge nda ge ho fareba ma pe, be ge nda ge ho fareba to ma pe to.
46014023	Mà kaɗɗa go, ɓase ge Krist ne ma mbo ja kee kwateya ɗoo, num sḛ ma mɔɗwag ka faa wa ge ɗogle ma no, nda ge wan fare mbe pe to mage num ge gale ho fareba to ma mà waɗ ja num pagal zì no, àa mà dwaɗ go num nda ge pagal keeya ma ne to de?
46014024	Ɗaŋɗe, mà kaɗɗa num sḛ mbe ma mɔɗwag zwagre go Dok wa ɗoo, deɗ-ɗa go, ndu a̰me ge gale ho fareba to, koo ndu ge wan fare mbe pe to, waɗ-ɗa ge num pagal zì no, sok mbe go, ge fare ge num sḛ ma faa ma ta, ne dul wa mà wan ne ɗoo, ee ne kuwa na sone ma to de?
46014025	Mà ben fare ɗimil ge way no ge na dul wa zì ma ya zum. Ge sok mbe go, mà mbo guu na ko, ndwa cɔgeya se, uware Dok, ka janna go: «Dok go fareba ge ḛ buwal zì!»
46014026	O̰o̰ mbi jan ḛ mà gyana de, na̰ van ma? Sok ge ḛ mbo ya kee kwateya go, ndu a̰me ge ḛ buwal zige ɗu ge pool mbal kaŋ, gegene hate fare, ge ɗogle jan fare ge Dok tâ na a̰me, gegene iya faa wa ge ɗogle ma, gegene ge ɗogle iya zwagre wa mbe ge ɗogle ma me. N̰a kaŋ mbe ma no peɗ, num kee ge dwaɗɗa ge ee ɓase ma donna.
46014027	Kaɗɗa ḛ ka̰a̰m ge faa wa ge ɗogle ma go, n̰a ne kaa zi, ne waɗe taa to. Num n̰a ta faaya ɗu ɗu, ndu a̰me ge zwagreya kaa me.
46014028	Kaɗɗa go ndu a̰me ge zwagreya to, ge ɓase ge Krist ne ma buwal zì, num zane ɓal. Ndu ge diige kee ne na dul zì, ne jin̰a fare Dok me.
46014029	Kaɗɗa ge num ge zwagre Dok wa ma ɗe, n̰a nda zi koo taa faa fare ne, num gegene ma va num fare faaya mbe ma buwal kwaɗa.
46014030	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me ge zi seɗ fare taaya ya ge Dok ta, ndu ge faa na fare taaya no zḛḛ wal zane gale.
46014031	Ḛ ge pool zwagre Dok wa mɔɗwag ɓame, ḛ n̰a ta faaya ɗu ɗu, ndwa go nda peɗ num ame hateya mbe maa pagal zì, num see pool me.
46014032	Nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma ge pool ge maa on̰om ge ee maa zwagre Dok wa zì pagal.
46014033	A fareba go, Dok vin kaŋ keeya ge batraŋ ma to, ɗaŋɗe, ɓyare halas. Ge mojo̰o̰ a kee no ge ɓase ge Krist ne ge harcal ma peɗ buwal zì go.
46014034	N̰a nda zaab kaa wa daal ge ɓase ge Krist ne ma buwal zì. Ago, àa be hon num vin̰a ge faaya to, ɗaŋɗe, num kaa ge pagal gwanna se ge mojo̰o̰ eeya ge Moyiz ne ma hate go.
46014035	Kaɗɗa maa ɓyare seɗ kuwaya a̰me ma ge fare a̰me ma pagal, num ele sḛ maa obe ma ge zok diŋ yà. Be wan ndwa ge go ndu gwale faa fare ge ɓase ge Krist ne ma pagal digi to.
46014036	Ḛ dwaɗ go, Fare ge Dok ne ɗege ge ḛ ta ya de? Koo Fare mbe dee ḛ ta yà ɗeŋew de?
46014037	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me ndil tene go na ndu ge zwagre Dok wa|Nda ge zwagre Dok wa ne, koo ka dwaɗɗa go ne On̰om ge Harcal ɗeme na ne, ɓyare ne kuwa go, kaŋ ge mbi njaŋe num mbe ma no, num wa yuwaleya ge Bagezok ne ma ne.
46014038	Kaɗɗa ndu vin num to, Dok mbo vin ne sḛ to waɗme.
46014039	Kaɗɗa na mbe go ɗe, na̰ van ma, ḛ laa wa̰a̰ gḛḛ bobo ge zwagre Dok wa, ne kaa ge ḛ tele nda go num faa wa ge ɗogle ma to to me.
46014040	Ɗeŋew go, kaŋ ma peɗ, àa kee num keeya ge hormo, ge maa vin̰a ma go jajan me.
46015001	Na̰ van ma, mbi voɗ ḛ pagal ge Fare ge Kwaɗa ge mbi dee oy ḛ ne pe, ḛ vḭḭ ne no, ge ḛ no ɗuuya ndiŋ ge ne zì me.
46015002	Kaɗɗa ḛ koy ne kwaɗa ge mojo̰o̰ mbi dee oy ḛ ne go, a ge ne ta, ḛ seɗ monna me. Kaɗɗa go to, hoɗ fareba ge ḛ ḛ jiya boo.
46015003	Mbi ee pe hate ḛ zḛḛ wal gaw, fare ge mbi sḛ vḭḭ num ma: A ge fare ge Krist swày ge see ne ge nè sone ma pe pagal, ge mojo̰o̰ ano ge Njaŋeya ge Dok ne ma zì go.
46015004	Àa mbuu ne, ta̰a̰ digi ge dwam ge taa pagal no, ge mojo̰o̰ ano ge Njaŋeya ge Dok ne mbe zì go.
46015005	Ngay tene ge Kefas ndwa go no, gwan ngay tene ge nda ge ame hateya ge wol pɔgwa zi ma ndwa go no me.
46015006	Guwa̰, ngay tene ge na̰ van ma waɗe kikis nuwan̰ ndwa go no, num ndwa ka̰a̰ ne ta no mɔɗwag me. A̰me ma mbuɗ suu go me no, lee gḛḛ gale go ge ndwa me.
46015007	Gwan ngay tene Jak ndwa go no, ge nda ge temeya ma ndwa go no mɔɗwag me.
46015008	Guwa̰ ge ngay tene num ta mɔɗwag go, ngay tene mbi ta no waɗme, ndu ge guwa̰ dwab. Mbi dḭḭ sḭḭ ge van kɔwa go.
46015009	A fareba, mbi waɗe jiyale ne, ge nda ge temeya ma buwal zì. Mbi be mbyaɗ nda tol mbi ndu ge temeya to peɗ, ndwa go mbi za̰a̰ ɓase ge Dok ne ma yal gḛḛ.
46015010	A ge kuwa a̰se ge Dok ne ta, mbi seŋe mà ya ndu ge ḛ kuwa ne mbe no. Bobo ge ne ne ge ho̰ mbi mbe bàŋ kay to, a ne ee mbi ne kee tèmel waɗe nda gegene ma peɗ. A be mbi kee num ne to, ɗaŋɗe, a kuwa a̰se ge Dok ne ge no mbi zì mbe.
46015011	A guwa go, ne kaa mbi, koo àa nda ge temeya gegene ma, i oy Fare ge Kwaɗa mbe ge ɗu, ee ḛ hoɗ fareba no.
46015012	Fare ge nè oy nda ne, a go Dok ta̰a̰ Krist ge nda ge swày ma buwal zì. Kee pe gyana nda a̰me ge ḛ buwal zige ma wa ka janna go, tanna ge nda ge swày ma way to de?
46015013	Kaɗɗa na fareba go tanna ge nda ge swày ma way to ɗe, Krist sḛ be tan zane to ɗaŋ.
46015014	Kaɗɗa go Krist sḛ be tan to ɗe, fare ge i oy no mage fareba hoɗɗa ge ḛ ḛ ma fare a̰me pe to ɗaŋ.
46015015	Kaɗɗa na mbe go, nè seɗ mà go nè kee go sayda ge hày ge Dok pagal, ge dape, nè kee sayda go go Dok ta̰a̰ Krist. Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa fareba go nda ge suu ma tan to ɗe, Dok zane be tan Krist mà to peɗ me.
46015016	Kaɗɗa Dok tan ndu go ɗu ge swày se to ɗe, zane be tan Krist to waɗme.
46015017	Kaɗɗa go Krist sḛ be tan to ɗe, hoɗ fareba ge ḛ ḛ jiya boo, ḛ gale zane ge ḛ sone keeya ma zì.
46015018	Go mbe no me ɗe, nda ge ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Krist ge suu ya ma ba̰a̰ go ban waɗme.
46015019	Kaɗɗa go nè jobreya ge nè ee ne no Krist pagal, ne mba nè ge kàɗɗa swag ge suwa pagal go ge ɗeŋew ɗe, nè mbiya ndwa kee kiimi waɗe nda duwana ge ɓase gegene ma peɗ.
46015020	Ɗaŋɗe, Krist tanna go fareba ge nda ge swày ma buwal zì, ne sḛ ba ge zḛḛge ge hage vin̰a ge tanna ne ya ne, ge nda ge suu ma pe.
46015021	Ajo̰o̰ go, ne ndu ɗu gene swày ya nda pagal ne ɗe, go mbe me, a ge ndu ge ɗogle ɗu ta, vin̰a ge tanna ne hage no waɗme.
46015022	Ajo̰o̰ nda peɗ suu suu ge kaŋ ge Adam kê pe ɗe, nda ge ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Krist ma mbo kaɗ ge ndwa, ge ne sḛ Krist kaa no go waɗme.
46015023	Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge diige ge na sok go tem: Krist ee pe tanna ne, guwa̰ go nda ge ɓan dagre ge Krist ma, dwam ge mbo gwan ja, àa mbo tan me.
46015024	Sok mbe go, a dwam pe aaya ne. Go no me, Krist mbo hal ge on̰om ge sone ma pagal peɗ, num ga̰a̰l ma pagal peɗ, pool ge kee muluk no nda duwana ma pagal ma peɗ, guwa̰, wa mbo n̰a muluk ge na Ba Dok tok go me.
46015025	Ɓyare go, Zeso Krist ke muluk ɗiŋ ge go Dok dee ya ee ne nda ge ho̰o̰l ma ge ne ko pul se.
46015026	Ba ge ho̰o̰l ge guwa̰ dwab ge àa mbo burmi ne ya gezi, a swày.
46015027	A fareba, njaŋe go: «Dok ee kaŋ ma ya peɗ ge ne ko pul se». Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge faa fare ge peɗ ne, a kɔn̰al go, ndu ge ee kaŋ ma peɗ ge ne ko pul se mbe, mbo gaa zum ne ɗeŋew.
46015028	Sok ge kaŋ ma peɗ mbo gaa ya ge Van ko pul se, go no me, ne sḛ wa mbo n̰a tene ge Dok ge a ee kaŋ mbe ma peɗ na ko pul se tok go, ndwa go ne sḛ ge Dok gaa ge num pagal ge ɓul mɔɗwag.
46015029	Ḛ duwa ge nda a̰me ge kee baptem no go, nda ge suu ma byalam go ma gale? Daa na go, nda ge suu ma tan to baɗ ɗe, ge dape àa wa mbo son baptem ge num byalam go de?
46015030	O̰o̰, nè sḛ ma me ɗe, ge dape nè wa ka mbo ge swày ndwa zì yà, ge dwam ma pul zì mɔɗwag me de?
46015031	Ge dwam ge diige zì peɗ, mbi swày zì. Na̰ van ma, mbi jan ḛ fareba go, ḛ hee mbi pagal-la digi, ge ɓanna ge nè ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist pe.
46015032	Kyarga ge mbi iya ne ge nda ge dḭḭ ta ge kavaar go ma, suwal Efez diŋ ɗe, kaɗɗa na ge dwaɗɗa ge nda duwana ma way no, mbâ mbi ge da de? Kaɗɗa nda ge suu ma mbo tan to ɗe, «nè za, nè njo, ndwa go, kin̰are nè suu suu.»
46015033	Ne kaa ge ḛ vyale ta to: «Sok kàɗɗa ge kondore ge birtiŋ gene ndu ge hal kwaɗa vḛḛneya zì.»
46015034	Ḛ guwa̰ ya ḛ ko pul ge kwaɗa ge wal go, ḛ ke sone to. Ago, nda a̰me ge cùb ge ḛ buwal zige ma gale be deɗ-ɗa kuwa Dok to. Mbi jan ano mbe no, a daŋso ge ḛ pe.
46015035	Tamekyala, ndu a̰me ge pool eleya go: «Nda ge suu ma tan digi pe gyana-gyana de? Àa tan digi ge ma̰ duul sḛ ɗaŋ de?»
46015036	Ge fare kuwaya hoɗege ne! Kaŋ rusu ge mo dol ne suwa zì ɗe, mà kaɗɗa mo mbuu ne suwa zì ge kaŋ ge suu suu go to no, mà tyal-la digi de?
46015037	Kaŋ ge mo dol ne suwa zì, a kaŋ rusu. A ge pool kaɗ geme koo kaŋ rusu a̰me ge ɗogle, a be ne kal mbe sḛ ɓal to.
46015038	Guwa̰, Dok ee kaŋ rusu mbe tyalla ya digi kal, hon kaŋ rusu ge diige kal ge wa̰a̰ ne sḛ tem.
46015039	Kaŋ ge on̰ ma mɔɗwag, num duul ma be din ta to. Ɗaŋɗe, sḛ duul ge nda duwana ma way hini ge sḛ duul ge kaŋ kogor ma way, hini ge sḛ duul ge njoole ma way, hini ge sḛ duul ge sini ma way me.
46015040	Kaŋ ge pḭḭ digi ma go me no, kaŋ ge suwa pagal ma me. Ɗaŋɗe, kaŋ ge pḭḭ digi ma zen kɔn̰al hini me no, kaŋ ge suwa pagal ma zen kɔn̰al hini waɗme.
46015041	Kɔn̰al zenna ge gyala ne hini, kɔn̰al zenna ge saba ne hini me, kɔn̰al zenna ge gùwa̰ ma way kaɗ hini me. Gùwa̰ ma ta buwal zì puy, num kɔn̰al zenna ma hini-hini ge ta.
46015042	Kaɗɗa ge tanna ge nda ge swày ma way, mbo kaɗ mbe go me. Duul ge àa mbul ne, ge seŋe hubul njɔnjɔrɔb, tan-na digi hubul daa to.
46015043	Sḛ duul ge àa mbul ne seŋre, tan digi pateya, àa mbul ne tuguɗi labcag, tan digi pool ɗiɗiŋ.
46015044	Àa mbul ndu ge sḛ duul ge too ge ne, tan digi ge sḛ duul ge On̰om ge Harcal hon nda ne me.
46015045	A ge pe no, maktub ge Dok ne jan no go: «Adam ge zḛḛge ndu duwana ne, see on̰om ge kaɗ ge ndwa no.» Kaɗɗa ge Krist, Adam ge guwa̰ dwab ɗe, a On̰om ge ee nda kàɗɗa ge ndwa ne.
46015046	Ndu duwana ge mbô ge On̰om ta zḛḛ ne to, a ndu duwana ge àa kê ne ge suwa zḛḛ ne. Ɗaŋɗe, ge mbo ge On̰om ta gaa guwa̰ dwab no.
46015047	Ndu duwana ge zḛḛge mbe, àa kee ne ge suwa luguɗum. Ndu duwana ge zi, mbo ge pḭḭ zì ya.
46015048	Ge mojo̰o̰ nè no ge diir ge Adam, ndu ge àa kê ne ge suwa luguɗum ne go ɗe, nda ge pḭḭ zì yà ge ma ge diir ge Krist, ndu ge mbô no ge pḭḭ zì ya ne waɗme.
46015049	Ge sego, nè ge diir ge ndu ge àa kê ne ge suwa luguɗum ne, nè mbo hee diir ge ndu ge mbo no ge pḭḭ zì ya ne waɗme.
46015050	Na̰ van ma, mbi jan ḛ go: Ndu duwana ge pool ge waɗ ge muluk ge Dok ne zì ge sḛ duul ge na no ge ne to, kaŋ ge hubi hubi ɓan ge kaŋ ge hubi to to me.
46015051	Ḛ kuwa gale, mbi ngay ḛ fare ɗimil a̰me: Nè mbo suu peɗ to, ɗaŋɗe, nè peɗ nè mbo eya duul.
46015052	Mbo kaɗ go gamaɗ, ge mojo̰o̰ ndwa baa bàŋ go, dwam ge burji ge guwa̰ dwab mbo sunna go. Ago, mbo sun, nda ge suu ma mbo tan ge duul ge hubi to, nè ge gaa gale ge ndwa ma, nè mbo eya duul me.
46015053	Ɓyare go sḛ duul ge hubi mbe, ne eya ge sḛ duul ge hubi to. Sḛ duul ge suu suu, ne seŋe sḛ duul ge daa gwan suu to me.
46015054	Sok ge sḛ duul ge hubi mbe mbo eya ya ge sḛ duul ge hubi to, sḛ duul ge suu suu mbo seŋe ya duul ge daa gwan suu to, a ge sok mbe go, maktub ge Dok ne fare ge jin̰a wa ya mbo huyya go. Jin̰a go: «Swày a̰me daa to, pool a̰me waɗe ya ne pagal!»
46015055	«Mo ge swày-yoo, mo pool gwan gaa dii no de? Mo ge swày-yoo, mo pe ge ɗenjeŋ ge mo kee nda yal ge ne mbe gwan gaa dii no de?»
46015056	Pe ge ɗenjeŋ ge swày ne seɗ pool ge sone ge nda kee ma ta. Sone me ɗe, ne pool ge eeya ma ta me.
46015057	Nè ke mersi hon Dok ɗaŋ, ge a ee nè ya waɗe swày pagal, ge pool ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist ne ta pe!
46015058	Go no me ɗe, na̰ van ge laa wanna ma, ḛ mḛḛ pool ndiŋ, ḛ guwa̰ ge guwa̰ to, ḛ ka zam zḛḛ ɗaɗag ge tèmel keeya ge Bagezok ne zì, ge kuwaya go tèmel ge ḛ kee no ge Bagezok pe, jaɗ bàŋ to.
46016001	Kaɗɗa ge kaŋ challa ge mbo mbaa nda ge ho fareba ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ yà ge ma ɗe, ge mojo̰o̰ mbi yuwale ɓase ge Krist ne ge suwa ge Galaɗ ne go ge ma go ɗe, ḛ mbiya kee mbe go waɗme.
46016002	Ɓyare go, ge dwam Dumas ma go tatab, ndu ge diige ge ḛ buwal zige, ee a̰me gezi caɗ na diŋ yà, ge na pool pagal tem. Ḛ da̰a̰re go mbi yin̰a ya ne ɓiya, ḛ wa ɗege chal kaŋ to.
46016003	Sok ge mbi mbo deɗ-ɗa ḛ ta yà, mbi mbo teme nda ge ḛ mbo tal num ya ma, ge lawayta maa tok go, ndwa gene bobo ge ḛ chiya ma ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem yà.
46016004	Kaɗɗa na wa̰a̰ ndwa go i ge num ɓa̰a̰ dagre, i ge num ge pool mboya.
46016005	Mbi ɓyare mbo ge suwa Maseduwan yà go gale guy, guwa̰, mbi wa gaa kale ge ḛ ta yà.
46016006	Tamekyala mbi mbo kaɗ ge ḛ ta swag, mbi mbyaɗ aa somo̰ ḛ ta, ɗiŋ ge go ḛ sḛ ma vḭḭ ta ee mbi zum ne, ndwa mbo sok ge mbi ɓyare mbo ne yà.
46016007	Gegene mbe no, mbi ɓyare kale digi ge mbi ko to, ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa Bagezok hage vin̰a ya mbi pagal go ɗe, mbi ee mbi jobreya kàɗɗa ge ḛ swag.
46016008	Ge sego, mbi dwaɗ kaɗ ge suwal ga̰a̰l Efez diŋ gale, ɗiŋ ge go vḛḛso pantekoɗ kale ne mbḛḛ.
46016009	Ago, vin̰a hage go mbi pagal, ge tèmel ge Dok ne pe me no, nà! Mbi nda ge ho̰o̰l ma waɗe ja pool no me.
46016010	Sok ge Timote mbo deɗ-ɗa ḛ ta yà, ḛ ke a̰me ge ee ne mɔgeya digi to, ndwa go, kee go tèmel ge Bagezok ne ge mbi sḛ kee ne mbe.
46016011	Ne kaa ge ndu a̰me ɗu ndi ne bàŋ kay to, ɗaŋɗe, ḛ mba ne, ne guwa̰ ya seɗ mbi ge halas, ndwa go i ge na̰ van gegene ma da̰a̰re ne go.
46016012	Kaɗɗa ge na̰ van Apolos ɗe, mbi voɗ ne pagal ya ndwa gḛḛ go num ge na̰ van ma mbo ge ḛ ta yà ndil ḛ, be vin tene deɗ ḛ ta yà ge sego to. Mbo mbo yà, sok ge mbo seɗ vin̰a ya.
46016013	Ḛ kaa jejew, ḛ mḛḛ pool ge fareba hoɗɗa ge ḛ ho zì, ḛ kaa nda soɗob, ḛ kaɗ deŋel me.
46016014	Kaŋ ge ḛ kee ma peɗ, laa wanna ɗeme ḛ ne num zì keeya.
46016015	Ḛ kuwa Estefanus kuwa ge na zok mɔɗwag go num nda ge zḛḛge ge ee pe hoɗ fareba ma ne, ge suwa ge Akay ne go, num ho̰ ta no mɔɗwag ge tèmel ta, ndwa mbaa nda ge ho fareba ma. Na̰ van ma, mbi kaɗe ḛ kaɗe go,
46016016	num nda ge mbiya ḛ za̰a̰ num ma ne, ḛ za̰a̰ nda ge hon ta tèmel ta, àa za̰a̰ yal ge num dagre ma me.
46016017	Estefanus, Fortunatus mage Akaykus ma mboya ge mbo ya ndil mbi, kê mbi laa saal gḛḛ. Deɗɗa ge num way ya mbi ta, a ge mojo̰o̰ mbi kuwa ḛ mɔɗwag go.
46016018	Ago, a ge num ta, mbi on̰om ee ya se, àa ka hon ḛ pool mbe go waɗme. Ḛ kuwa go, nda mbe ma mbiya seɗ doreya.
46016019	Ɓase ge Krist ne ge suwa ge Azi ne go ge ma sa̰a̰ ḛ wa. Akilas mage Prisil, ɓanna ge ɓase ge Krist ne ge maa ge num kwate no ge maa zok diŋ ma sa̰a̰ ḛ wa gḛḛ waɗme, ge dḭḭl ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist ne pe ɗu.
46016020	Na̰ van ge ɗogle ge go go ge ma sa̰a̰ ḛ wa. Ḛ sa̰a̰ ta wa ɗu ɗu peɗ, ḛ bu ta zì ge laa saal.
46016021	Wa sanna ge guwa̰ dwab mbe ma no, mbi sḛ Pol njaŋe num ne ge mbi tok zì.
46016022	Kaɗɗa go ndu laa be wan Bagezok to, wa vḛḛneya ne kaa ge ne pagal! Marana ta (I Bagezok mbo ya)
46016023	N̰a Bagezok Zeso Krist ne ngay kwaɗa keeya ge na ne ge ḛ ta.
46016024	Mbi laa wa̰a̰ ḛ ge ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Zeso Krist ma mɔɗwag.
47001001	A mbi Pol, ndu ge Dok taa ne ge laa ɓyareya ge na ne pagal, ne gaa ndu ge temeya ge Zeso Krist ne, ɓanna ge na̰ van Timote njaŋe lawayta mbe ne, hon ɓase ge Krist ne ge suwal ga̰a̰l Korent diŋ-ge ma me no, hon nda ge ho fareba ma peɗ ge no suwa ge Akay ne pagal mɔɗwag me.
47001002	N̰a Dok ge nè Ba mage nè Bagezok Zeso Krist ngay kwaɗa keeya ge maa way ḛ ta, num ho̰ ḛ halas me.
47001003	Nè uware Dok ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist Ba, Ba ge kuwa nda a̰se, eyal nda laa dwam ma zì mɔɗwag me.
47001004	Eyal nè laa ne ge nè tiɗiya ma zì peɗ, ndwa go, laa eyalla mbe ge nè seɗ ne ge Dok ta, nè sḛ ma, nè see vin̰a ge eyal nda ge ɗogle ge seɗ tiɗiya no go ma laa waɗme.
47001005	Ago, i seɗ yal njoɗɗa ge gḛḛ mbe ma ge ɓanna ge i ɓa̰a̰ ge Krist pe, go mbe waɗme, i seɗ laa eyalla ge ɓanna ge i ɓa̰a̰ ge ne pe me.
47001006	Kaɗɗa i seɗ tiɗiya ma go, a ndwa eyal ḛ laa mage gene ḛ ya monna go me. Kaɗɗa go i dul wa ma ee go se, a ge laa eyalla ge ḛ see ne mbe, ge ee ḛ wan ta deŋel no ge yal njoɗɗa mbe ge i see num pe ma zì pe.
47001007	Jobreya ge i no ge ne ge ḛ pagal mḛḛ pool ndiŋ. Ago, i kuwa kuwa go, ḛ ɓanna dagre ge i ge yal ge i seɗ num ma zì, ḛ kaɗ dagre ge i ge laa eyalla ge i seɗ num ma zì waɗme.
47001008	Na̰ van ma, ge yal ge i za̰a̰ ne, ge suwa ge Azi ne go ge pe ɗe, i ɓyare n̰a ḛ ɗimil to. Ago, yal mbe ma ɓerse i, àa waɗe i pagal no, ee i gaa dwaɗɗa no go, vin̰a a̰me ge i ɓuu ge swày zì to.
47001009	A fareba, i sḛ ma see go i mbo swày. A ge ano mbe no ta, ee i kuwaya no me go, i mbiya isi i pool ma pagal to, i mbiya isi vare zoo ge Dok mbe ge tan nda ge suu ma pagal.
47001010	O̰o̰, ne sḛ Dok, Ba ge mo̰o̰ i ge swày mbe zì ya ne, mbo gwan mon i ne. I ge jobreya go ne mbo gwan zuu i iya.
47001011	Ḛ sḛ ma mbaa i go ge ḛ kaɗeya ma zì waɗme. Go mbe no, kuwa a̰se ge i seɗ ne ge Dok ta no, a ge nda gḛḛ kaɗeya ge kaɗe ge i pe ma ta. Ge ano mbe ta, nda gḛḛ mbo gwan ge mersi keeya hon Dok ge i pe me.
47001012	Ago, kaŋ ge ee i kee laa saal, a i on̰om ma ngayya ge ngay i go, kaŋ keeya ge i i ge dunin̰a zige ma, ge gwan waɗe, ge i kee num no ḛ ta go ma mbo ge pool ge Dok hon i ma ta. I kee num ge dul wa ɗu, ge hoɗ fareba me, be ge andaŋ ge nda duwana ma way to, ɗaŋɗe, ge kwaɗa keeya ge Dok ne ta.
47001013	Ḛ kuwa go, fare ge i njaŋe ḛ num lawayta zì ma no, num be fare a̰me ge ɗogle ma ne to, àa fare ge ḛ isi num ma, ḛ wan num pe kwaɗa ma ne me. Mbi ge jobreya go, ḛ mbo deɗ-ɗa kuwa num tyatyaɗ.
47001014	Kaŋ ge ḛ deɗ ja kuwaya fyalag ɗe, a go: Ḛ mbo kaɗ ge laa saal ge i pe, i sḛ ma kaɗ ge laa saal ge ḛ pe me, ge dwam gwanna ge nè Bagezok Zeso ne ya go.
47001015	A ge mbi no ge fare mbe ma kuwaya pe, mbi vḭḭ tene no go mbi mbo gale ge ḛ ta yà guy, ndwa go ḛ gwan seɗ pool ndwa zi.
47001016	Ge ḛ ta ɗe, mbi wa kale mbo suwa ge Maseduwan ne yà go. Sok seŋe ge suwa ge Maseduwan ne ya, mbi mbo gwan-na ḛ ta, ndwa go ḛ wa mbaa mbi ge mbo suwa ge Jude ne yà.
47001017	Sok vin tene go mbe go no, mbi ka ndil fare mbe solom ɗaŋ de? Koo, fare ge mbi vḭḭ tene num pagal mbe ma dwaɗɗa ge sḛ duul go ma ne boo, ge go mbi dul mà wa mbo kaɗ zi zi ge vin «O̰o̰» mage «To» jwàg de?
47001018	Ajo̰o̰ Dok Ba ge n̰a wa to ne, ne fare ge i ka jan ḛ num ma, a be «O̰o̰» mage «To» ne zi jwàg to.
47001019	Ago, Dok Van Zeso Krist mbe ge i ge Silvḛ mage Timote ma oy ne fare ge ḛ buwal zì yà, be kaɗ «O̰o̰» mage «To» ne jwàg to, ɗaŋɗe, ge ne ta, kaa «O̰o̰» ne ɗeŋew.
47001020	Go mbe no, ne sḛ «O̰o̰» mbe ge mbo ya huy wa tii ge Dok ne mbe ma wa ne peɗ. A ge ne ta waɗme, nè vin no go « Amin », ndwa ngay pateya ge Dok ne.
47001021	A ne sḛ Dok hon i pool ne, hon ḛ pool no waɗme ge Krist ta. A ne sḛ ee nè gezi ne caɗ ge na pe me.
47001022	A ne sḛ gwan ee na logom ne nè ta, ɓyale na On̰om ge Harcal nè dul wa ma zì no, ge mojo̰o̰ kaŋ kwaɗa ge zḛḛge ge na ee num koyya ge nè pe ma go.
47001023	Mbi kaɗe Dok go ne hee mbi on̰om, kaɗɗa mbi kun go hày. A vin̰a ge ɓyare eyan ḛ ne ge fare zì, mbi vḭḭ tene no go, mbi guwa̰ Korent yà to.
47001024	A be go i ee ḛ hoɗ fareba ge pool ge fare a̰me pagal to. Ɗaŋɗe, i vare hon ta tèmel ta go ḛ kaa ge laa saal, ndwa go ḛ mḛḛ pool ndiŋ ge hoɗ fareba ge ḛ ḛ ma zì.
47002001	A ge pe no, mbi duwa no go, kaɗɗa go mbi gene yà iigiya ma ḛ pagal-la iya ɗe, mbi daa gwan ḛ ta yà to.
47002002	Kaɗɗa mbi sḛ gwan gene yà iigiya ma ḛ pagal-la no, a huɗi mà gwan ee mbi angal se ne de? Daa be ḛ mbe ge mbi gene iigiya ḛ pagal-la ma to de?
47002003	A ge pe, mbi vḭḭ tene njaŋe ḛ lawayta gene mbe no go, sok ge mbi mbo deɗ-ɗa ḛ ta yà ɗe, mbi see go nda ge mbiya ndwa ee mbi angal se ma go be iigiya. Mbi ge hoɗ fareba go, kaŋ ge kee mbi laa saal, kee ḛ sḛ ma peɗ laa saal kee waɗme.
47002004	A ge tiɗiya ma, dul wa vḛḛneya mage miim mbi ndwa go njanjab, mbi njaŋe ḛ lawayta mbe no. A be go mbi njaŋe ḛ ne ndwa iigi ḛ to, ɗaŋɗe, ndwa go ḛ dee ya kuwaya go laa wanna ge ambi ḛ ta waɗe gḛḛ nde.
47002005	Mbi dwaɗ go, ndu a̰me kaɗ-ɗa na gene ya iigiya nda pagal ɗe, gene iigiya mbe ya mbi pagal ɗu to, ɗaŋɗe, iigi ḛ mɔɗwag vare zoo. Kaɗɗa na fare kabeya ne puy ɗe, iigi cùb ge ḛ buwal zige ma.
