47002006	Kaɗɗa ge ndu mbe sḛ ɗe, mḛḛreya ge nda lee gḛḛ mḛḛre ne no, mbiya ne mbyaɗ kakata.
47002007	Deɗ-ɗa sok no go, kee kwaɗa ḛ pore ne, ḛ ee ne dul wa se waɗme, ndwa go, ne kaa ge go dwaɗɗa waɗe ne pagal ɗoo, ne tḭḭli gezi yà to.
47002008	A ge pe no, mbi kaɗe ḛ no go, ḛ ngay laa wanna ge ne ta.
47002009	Ago, mbi njaŋe ḛ lawayta mbe ndwa ndilla waɗme go, sok kugi ḛ go no, ḛ mà kaɗ nda ge mbo yuwaleya ge ambi ma pagal mɔɗwag ma ne ko ɓade.
47002010	Ge sego, mbi jan ḛ go, ndu ge ḛ pore ne ya, mbi pore ne pore waɗme. Ano peɗ puy, kaɗɗa mbi pore poreya a̰me ma go, a ge ḛ pe, ge Krist ndwa se,
47002011	ndwa go nè n̰a Saytan, ne see pool ge nè pagal to. Ago nè daal ge ne zwam mbe ma to.
47002012	Mbi ɗege, mbi mbo suwal ga̰a̰l Trowas yà no, ge Fare ge Kwaɗa ge Krist ne oyya pe. Ajo̰o̰ Bagezok hage vin̰a ma hage ge mbi pagal puy ɗe, mbi on̰om be ee se to, ge dape mbi be seɗ mbi na̰ van Titus to.
47002013	A ge pe, i sa̰a̰ ta wa no, mbi n̰a num, mbi gaa mbo suwa maseduwan yà no me.
47002014	Mersi hon Dok, ne ge hon ne halla no ɗaɗag ge ɓanna ge nè ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Krist pe. A ge nè ta, a ee ya no go Krist fare dasare sok ma go peɗ, ge mojo̰o̰ dukan huri dasare se go.
47002015	A fareba go, ge Dok pe, nè sḛ ma dasare Krist fare se ge idiir ge huu tii go. A mbe go, ge nda ge mon ma buwal zì, koo ge ban ma buwal zì me.
47002016	Ge nda a̰me ge mbo banna ma pe ɗe, a huuya ge swày nee ne, ge gene nda mbo swày zì. Ge nda ge mbo monna ma pe me ɗe, a huuya ge ee nda kaɗ ge ndwa, ge gene nda mbo ge ndwa ge fareba zì ne me. A huɗi ge mbiya huy tèmel ge go mbe wa ne de?
47002017	Ago, i dinna ge nda ge ɓase a̰me mbe ge ɗuuli fare ge Dok ne pagal se, ndwa seɗ mam ge zì ma go to. Ɗaŋɗe, i, i nda ge Dok teme i ya ma ne, i jan go ne fare ge fareba pagal, ge Ne ndwa se, ge ɓanna ge i ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Krist pe.
47003001	Ḛ dwaɗ mà go, i gwan ɓyare go ngay ta ɗogle gale de? Koo, ɓyare go i kaa ge lawayta ge go i wa ngay ta ge ḛ ta, ge nda a̰me ma kee go, koo i sḛ ma see ne ge ḛ tok go mbo ngay ta swame yà de?
47003002	Ḛ i lawayta ngay ta mbe ma sḛ ne, ge njaŋe no i dul wa ma zì, ge nda peɗ kuwa ne no, àa isi ne no me.
47003003	Fare mbe kɔn̰al boo, ḛ lawayta ge Krist ne, ge i sḛ ma njaŋe ne ge tèmel keeya ge i i ma ta, be ge aliŋ to, ɗaŋɗe, ge On̰om ge Dok ge ndwa ne. Be njaŋe ge byalga njal ma ta to, ɗaŋɗe, ge byalga ge sḛ duul ma ta, ndwa go ḛ dul wa ma zì.
47003004	I ge fareba hoɗɗa ge fare mbe ma pagal ge Zeso Krist ta, ge Dok ndwa se.
47003005	A be go, i sḛ ma go ge pool ge kee a̰me ma ge i pagal to, ɗaŋɗe, i pool ge kee kaŋ mbe ma mbo ge Dok ta ya.
47003006	A ne sḛ kee ne go, ge wa tii vwalla ge jin̰al zì, i kaa nda ge tèmel ge mbiya mbyaɗ ma. Be wa tii vwalla ge njaŋe njaŋe ge eeya ma go to, ɗaŋɗe, ge On̰om ge Harcal ta. Ago eeya mbe ge njaŋe njaŋe ma gene nda ya swày, ɗaŋɗe, On̰om ge Harcal hon nda ndwa.
47003007	Ago, eeya mbe ge gene nda mbo swày, ge àa njaŋe num ge byalga njal ta ma, Moyiz ka kee tèmel ge num pagal. Àa ka kuwa kɔn̰al ge Dok ne ge ne ndwa digi, ge go Izrayel van ma mbyaɗ hee maa ndwa ma digi ndil ne to. Zane no me ɗe, kaa kɔn̰al ge swag ne boo.
47003008	Kaɗɗa na mbe go ɗe, tèmel ge On̰om ee nda kee num ma mà ee ndu pateya ndwa gyana ga de?
47003009	Kaɗɗa go eeya mbe ge wan nda ge sariya ee nda pateya ɗe, tèmel ge kee ge temel pagal ee ndu pateya mà ndwa gyana ga de?
47003010	Nè ge pool vin ta go, pateya ge dee wal mbe dage yà go dage ge pateya ge màge mbe ge pool waɗe-waɗe ndwa zḛḛ.
47003011	Kaɗɗa fareba go, kaŋ ge kee swag ka pate pate no, kaŋ ge mḛḛ no ge ndwa ɗiŋ mà pate ndwa gyana ga de?
47003012	Ajo̰o̰ nè ge jobreya ge go mbe ɗe, a ge pe nè faa fare ma ge kɔn̰al go waŋ no.
47003013	Nè ke ge Moyiz ka keeya go to: Ka kan ba̰a̰ ge na ndwa go, ge dape, ne kaa ge Izrayel van ma dee ya kuwa gulla ge pateya ge swag mbe ne to.
47003014	Ɗaŋɗe, àa kaa nda ge dul wa twagreya ma ne. Ɗiŋ mà ge sego, sok ge àa kaɗ isi maktub wa tii vwalla ge sabar ne go, àa kaɗ ge ba̰a̰ mbe ge maa ndwa go. Kaŋ keeya mbe be ban ge num pagal zì to, ɗeŋew num ge ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Krist ma.
47003015	A fareba go, ɗiŋ mà ge sego, sok isi eeya ge Moyiz ne ma go, a ge mojo̰o̰ ba̰a̰ mbe gale laaya ge num ndwa go go.
47003016	Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge ndu seŋe tene ya ge Bagezok ta, ba̰a̰ mbe ɔwabe gezi ɔwabe ge ne ndwa go.
47003017	Ago, Bagezok mage On̰om ge Harcal kaŋ ge ɗu ma ne. Sok ge On̰om ge Bagezok ne kee tèmel no go, nda duwana ma suli me.
47003018	Go mbe no, nè peɗ ge no be ba̰a̰ laaya ge ne ndwa go ma, nè kuwa pateya ge Bagezok ne seeya ge kuturaŋ go. Nè sḛ ma hee diir ge ne ne mbe, nè ka pateya ɗogle-ɗogle. Ano a tèmel keeya ge On̰om ge Bagezok nee ne.
47004001	A ge kuwa a̰se ge Dok ne pe, ho̰ nè tèmel mbe no, a ge pe nè kan ta se to no.
47004002	Nè kuri kaŋ keeya ge ɗimil zige mage daŋso ma gezi kuri. Nè kee fare ma be zwam ge ndwa pe zige, nè ɗuuli fare ge Dok ne pagal se to me. Ɗaŋɗe, nè jan go vare zoo fare ge fareba ge Dok ndwa se, nda peɗ num dee ya kuwaya go nè fare mbe ma fare ge fareba ma ne.
47004003	Kaɗɗa go Fare ge Kwaɗa ge nè oy ne mbe, nda a̰me ma gale wan ne pe to ɗe, nda mbe ma nda ge mbo ban gezi ma ne.
47004004	Àa num ge ho fareba to ma, num mbe ge Saytan, dok ge suwa pagal go ge kucugi num ndaco ya digi ma me, ndwa go num dee ya kuwa kɔn̰al ge Fare ge Kwaɗa ne, ge ngay nè Krist mbe to, ne ge no hehene ge Dok sḛ go.
47004005	Sok ge i oy fare, a be go i faa i fare ma to, i faa Zeso Krist, Bagezok ge nda way peɗ fare. Kaɗɗa ge i sḛ ma ɗe, i nda ge kee tèmel hon ḛ ma ne, ge Zeso pe.
47004006	A fareba go, Dok sḛ jin̰a ne go: «Kɔn̰al mbo ka zenna ge tṵṵ ge ɗeɗeg ma zì ya.» A ne sḛ zen ne ge nè dul wa ma zì, ndwa go nè dee ya kuwa pateya ge Dok ne ge see no ge Zeso Krist ndwa digi.
47004007	Ɗaŋɗe, i mbe ge no ge mojo̰o̰ il vyala bàŋ go ma, kaŋ kwaɗa ndwa go Fare ge Kwaɗa mbe ge i zì. Ano mbe ngay go, pool ge ɓaŋlaŋ ge waɗe-waɗe mbe mbo ge Dok ta ya, be ge i ta to.
47004008	I ge ɓerseya ge yal ge diige pe ma zì ɓame, ɗaŋɗe, yal mbe ma be waɗe i pagal to. I ge iigiya ma zì ɓame, ɗaŋɗe, i be ndage i ko to.
47004009	Nda duwana ma njon̰ i ge yal ma no puy ɗe, Dok be seŋe i na guwa̰ to. Àa naŋre i suwa se no puy ɗe, i be seɗ swày to.
47004010	Swày ge Zeso ne mbe ɓyaleya ge i duul ta dwam ma zì mɔɗwag, sok ma go peɗ me, ndwa go nda kuwa ndwa ge ne ne mbe ge i duul ta waɗme.
47004011	A fareba go, i no ge ndwa no puy ɗe, swày guwa ge i dwam ma zì mɔɗwag, i ge kàre Zeso pe ma, ndwa go, nda kuwa ndwa ge ne ne mbe waɗme ge i ta, i mbe ge i duul ma mbo gaa ya swày ma kaŋ ma.
47004012	Go mbe no, swày gyaɗ ne ge i dwam ma zì mɔɗwag, kaɗɗa ge ḛ ɗe, gene ḛ ya ndwa ge fareba me.
47004013	Njaŋe ge maktub ge Dok ne zì go: «Mbi ho fareba, a ge pe mbi faa no.» Ajo̰o̰ go na dwaɗɗa mbe ge ɗu ee nè ne hoɗ fareba, i sḛ ma ho fareba waɗme, a ge pe, i faa no me.
47004014	I ge kuwaya go, Dok ge ta̰a̰ Bagezok Zeso ge swày se, mbo tan i, mbo ɓan i dagre ge ne. Mbo gene i ɓanna ge ḛ dagre ge na ndwa se yà.
47004015	Ago, yal mbe ge i seɗ num ma no mɔɗwag, a ge ḛ pe, ndwa go kwaɗa keeya ge Dok ne ka zam zḛḛ zḛḛ, ne dasare nda lee gḛḛ ta, ge go num dee ya gwan ge mersi hon Dok, num ho̰ ne hormo me.
47004016	Koo sok ge i diir ma kaɗ ka banna fyafyalag no puy, Dok ka hon i pool ge jin̰al ge i zì dwam ma zì mɔɗwag, a ge pe, i kan ta se to no.
47004017	A fareba go, yal ge nè kuwa num no ge sego ma yal ge swag ma ne boo. Àa nuusi nè mbo deɗ ge pateya ge ɗiŋ ge din yà. Pateya mbe ge ee nè ya ndil yal ma ge fare a̰me pe to bàŋ go.
47004018	Kaŋ ge nè dwaɗ no num pagal ma, a be kaŋ ge nè kuwa num no ge ndwa ma to baɗ, ɗaŋɗe, a kaŋ ge nè gale kuwa num nè ndwa go to ma. Ago kaŋ ge nè kuwa num no nè ndwa go ma swag boo. Ɗaŋɗe, ge nè kuwa num ge ndwa to ma, àa ge ndwa ɗiŋ ge din.
47005001	I ge kuwaya go, sḛ duul ge i no ge ne suwa no pagal, ge dḭḭ sḭḭ ge gur go gul gul dwam ɗu boo. Ɗaŋɗe, Dok ee ge pḭḭ ma zì yà ge i pe, sḛ duul ge dḭḭ sḭḭ ge zok ge mbo kàɗɗa ge ndwa ɗiŋ ge din go. Ndu duwana be sin ne ne to.
47005002	Ge sego, i sun go ta, ge sḛ duul ge dḭḭ sḭḭ no ge gur go mbe zì, ge dape i ɓyare go vin̰a ge kan ba̰a̰ ge ɗogle mbe ge i ta, ndwa go zok ge no pḭḭ digi yà mbe.
47005003	Ɗeŋew go, àa dee ya seɗ i ge ba̰a̰ ge i ta, be swala to.
47005004	Sok ge i gale no gur mbe zì ɗe, i kaɗ ge sun ta ge mojo̰o̰ ne dṵṵl a̰me ne i pagal go. A fareba go, i ɓyare go i n̰a ta suli to, ɗaŋɗe, i kan ba̰a̰ ge i ta, ndwa go sḛ duul ge no ge ndwa ɗiŋ ge din la sḛ duul ge mbo swày zì.
47005005	Ndu ge nuusi i ge ndwa mbe no pe, a Dok sḛ. Ho̰ i On̰om ge Harcal no ge mojo̰o̰ kaŋ kwaɗa ge zḛḛge ge na ee num koyya ge nè pe ma go.
47005006	Go mbe no, i kan ta se go fyalag to, ajo̰o̰ i ge kuwaya go, kaɗɗa go i gale ge i sḛ duul mbe zì, i kaal ge sok kàɗɗa ge Bagezok ne.
47005007	A ge fareba hoɗɗa ge i pe, i zam zḛḛ no, a be go i kuwa ge i ndwa mbḛḛ to.
47005008	I daa kan ta se to, i ɓyare vare zoo go, i n̰a sḛ duul mbe no, i mbo kaɗ ge Bagezok ta yà.
47005009	Go no waɗme, i ɓyare zḛḛ wal guy go, i ke laa ɓyareya ge Bagezok ne, koo i kaa ge sḛ duul mbe no go, koo i n̰a sḛ duul mbe no.
47005010	A ngaɗ go i dee Krist ndwa se yà, ge sariya kunna pe. Go mbe no, ndu ge diige wa seɗ poɗɗa ge na kaŋ keeya ge na kê suwa pagal go ge, koo a ge sone de, koo a ge kwaɗa de.
47005011	Ajo̰o̰ i kuwa kuwa go àa chiya Dok voo pe gyana de ɗe, a ge pe, i ɓyare no go i tin̰a nda duwana ma pagal gezi. Kaɗɗa ge Bagezok Dok ɗe, kuwa kaŋ keeya ge i i ma kuwa, ge ḛ dul wa ma zì me ɗe, mbi dwaɗ go ḛ kuwa i kuwa waɗme.
47005012	I daa ngay go ta ḛ ta iya to. I hon ḛ go vin̰a ge go ḛ uware ta ge i pe. Go mbe no, nda ge ngay ta ge maa fare keeya ge nda ndwa go ge ma zì ma, be ge kaŋ ge no maa dul wa zì ma to ma, ḛ wa deɗ-ɗa kuwa fare gwan ge num pagal.
47005013	Kaɗɗa fareba go i ka dàle ḛ ndwa zì ɗe, a ge Dok pe. Kaɗɗa ḛ kuwa ya go i ngaraŋ me ɗe, a ge ḛ pe me.
47005014	Ago, Krist ngay laa wanna ge na ne gḛḛ i ta, ee i ya kuwaya tyatyaɗ no go: Ndu ɗu ne suu ge nda pe peɗ, go no me ɗe, nda peɗ ge ne swày mbe zì.
47005015	Ne sḛ suu ge nda pe peɗ, ndwa go nda ge gale no go ge ndwa ma ɗe, num daa kee a̰me ge maa pagal to, ɗaŋɗe, num kee laa ɓyareya ge ndu ge suu mage ta̰a̰ ge num pe ne.
47005016	Go mbe no me ɗe, i daa gwan ndil ndu a̰me ge mojo̰o̰ nda duwana ma ndil bàŋ go to. Kaɗɗa dee wal i ndi Krist bàŋ kay ge nda ge dunin̰a ma ndi ne go ɗe, ge sego i daa gwan ndil ne mbe go to.
47005017	Kaɗɗa na mbe go ɗe, ndu ge ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Krist seŋe ndu ge jin̰al. Ne kaŋ keeya ge wal ma kale kale, ne kaŋ ge gaa keeya ma eya eya.
47005018	A Dok sḛ kee vin̰a mbe ma ne peɗ, vwal nè buwal ya digi ge na no, ge Krist pe, hon nè tèmel ge mbo vwal maa ge nda duwana ma buwal digi ya no me.
47005019	Ago, Dok vuwa nda duwana ge suwa pagal ma buwal digi ge Krist ta. Be dwaɗ ge num sone keeya ma pagal to, ee tèmel ge vwal nda buwal digi ge maa, ge i zì no me.
47005020	Go mbe no, i tɔgwa ge Krist ne ma ne. A fareba go Dok ee na fare ne i wa pul zì, ndwa tol ḛ ya na ta. A ge pe, i gwarge ta ḛ ta ge dḭḭl ge Krist ne pe no go, ḛ n̰a Dok ne vuwa ḛ ge maa buwal digi ba!
47005021	Zeso Krist be kee sone a̰me pe go ɗu to, ɗaŋɗe, Dok ka̰a̰ nè sone ma ne pagal no, ndwa go, ge ɓanna ge nè ɓa̰a̰ ge ne, nè seŋe nda ge temel ma ge na ndwa se.
47006001	Ajo̰o̰ go nè ɓa̰a̰ ge tèmel no wa go ge Dok dagre ɗe, i kaɗe ḛ go bobo ge Dok ho̰ ḛ ne mbe, ne jiya boo to.
47006002	A fareba, Dok jin̰a ɓase ge na ne ma go: «Sok ge dwam ge kwaɗa ma mbo ya, mbi vḭḭ mo ne. Sok ge dwam monna ma dee ya me ɗe, mbi chiya mo kṵwa̰ ne me.» Ḛ za̰a̰ kwaɗa, ge sego dwam ge kwaɗa ma gale mbyaɗɗa no fareba. Na! Dwam monna mbe yan ja no me.
47006003	I ɓyare kee fare a̰me ge ee ndu ko challa to, ndwa go nda dee ya sen tèmel ge i kee no to.
47006004	Ge i kaŋ keeya ma zì, i ngay nda peɗ vare zoo go, i nda ge kee Dok tèmel ma ne fareba, sok wan ta deŋel gḛḛ go ge yal ma zì, ge wa nɔnna ma zì, ge iigiya ma zì,
47006005	ge njaaya ge bol ma zì, ge daŋay ma zì, ge kanna ge àa kan nda cece ya i ta ma zì, ge za̰a̰ya ge àa za̰a̰ i yal ge tèmel keeya ma zì, ge seɗ dwam fiiya i ndwa go to ma zì, ge seɗ a̰me ge ee i kin̰a pagal go to ma zì me.
47006006	I ngay go i nda ge tèmel ge Dok ne ma ne ge mboya ge i i ge kɔn̰al ta, i ge kuwaya, i nda ge wan ta ma ne, ge kee kwaɗa ma, ge no ge On̰om ge Harcal i zì ma, i kee laa wanna ge be ndwa mbuɗiya me.
47006007	Fare ge i jan ma fare ge fareba ma ne, ge pool ge Dok ne ta. I hê fare ge temel ge mojo̰o̰ kaŋ walam ge cage ta mage mbal twam go.
47006008	Nda a̰me ma hon i ga̰a̰l, gegene ma ka wan i ndwa ge daŋso. A̰me ma ka dore i, gegene ma ka sal i me. Àa ka ndil i ge nda ge hày ma go, zane no i nda ge fareba ma ne.
47006009	Àa kuwa i kuwa tyatyaɗ, ɗaŋɗe, àa ka ndil i ge nda ge so ya soo ma go. Àa ndil i ge nda ge mbo swày ma go, ḛ kuwa gale, i ge ndwa. Àa ndil i ge mojo̰o̰ nda ge àa kṵṵ fare ge num pagal ma go, ɗaŋɗe, àa be hun i gezi to me.
47006010	Ajo̰o̰ go i ge tiɗiya ma zì puy ɗe, i kaɗ ge laa saal ɗaɗag. I dinna ge nda ge a̰se ma go, ɗaŋɗe, i haɗ nda ya gḛḛ nda ge gan ma. I dinna ge nda ge be a̰me ma go, zane no me ɗe, kaŋ ma peɗ àa i i ma ne me.
47006011	I jin̰a ḛ fare ma kɔn̰al, ḛ nda ge suwal ga̰a̰l Korent diŋ-ge ma, i be way ḛ fare a̰me ge i dul zige go ɗu to.
47006012	I laa kaa saal taɗag ge ḛ ta, ḛ sḛ ma laa wa̰a̰ i to ne zoo.
47006013	Mbi jan ḛ fare dinna ge ḛ mbi van ma ne go. Ḛ way i a̰me to, ḛ ngay laa wanna ge i ta waɗme.
47006014	Nda ge ho fareba Krist ta to ma ɗe, ḛ ɓa̰a̰ ta ge num dinna ge nda dol zug ge nday ma ka̰a̰l zì go, kee a̰me ge n̰aal to. A ma̰ mam ndwa ne, ge kaŋ ge temel taɗ mage kaŋ ge wuwal gɔgɔrɔŋ buwal zì de? A ma̰ baan ne ge kɔn̰al mage tṵṵ ge ɗeɗeg buwal zì de?
47006015	Za̰a̰ ta a̰me go ge Krist mage Beliyal buwal zì de? Koo fare a̰me ge ɓan ndu ge ho fareba Krist ta mage ndu ge ho fareba Krist ta to digi go de?
47006016	A ma̰ kaŋ ge ee zok ge Dok ne mage kaŋ siim zok din ta ne de? A nè sḛ mbe ma ne, zok ge Dok ge ndwa ne ma. Ne sḛ Dok jin̰a go: «Mbi mbo kaɗ ge num buwal zì, mbi ka mboya ge num. Mbi mbo gaa num Dok, num sḛ ma gaa ɓase ge ambi ma me.»
47006017	A ge pe, Bagezok jan num no go iya: «Ḛ ɔwabe ta gezi ge num ta, ḛ mbo gezi yà kaal ge num. Ne kaa ge ḛ dabe a̰me ge haɗ ḛ seŋre to, go no Mbi mbo ame ḛ ge mbi diŋ.»
47006018	«Mbi mbo gaa dinna ge ḛ Ba go, ḛ sḛ ma me ɗe, ḛ gaa ge mbi van ge soɗob mage gwale ma go me.» A fare ge mbo no ge Bagezok Dok ge pool waɗe-waɗe wa zì ya ma ne.
47007001	Na̰ van ge laa wanna ma, a wa tii ge kee ge nè pe ne ɗe, mbiya nè usi nè duul ge harcal to mage nè dul wa ma gezi kɔn̰al harcal. N̰a mboya ge nè ne, ne ka mboya ge kwaɗa, ge pagal gwanna ge Dok pe se me.
47007002	Ḛ ngay laa wanna ge i ta ɗaŋ! I be za̰a̰ ndu a̰me yal to, i be vuuɗi ndu a̰me to, i aa ndu a̰me tok to me.
47007003	Mbi jan ano mbe ndwa wan ḛ ge fare to. A ge mojo̰o̰ mbi jan ḛ ne ya jan zoo go: I laa wa̰a̰ ḛ gḛḛ, a̰me ge vaa nè ge ḛ buwal to, koo a swày ne, nè suu dagre. Koo nè kaa ge ndwa, nè dagre.
47007004	Ḛ fare hal mbi njeel wa to, mbi za̰a̰ tii ge ḛ pe. Koo yal ge i seɗ num ma no peɗ puy ɗe, mbi seɗ vare zoo pool, mbi gwan ka fereya ge laa saal.
47007005	A fareba, sok ge i dee ya ge suwa Maseduwan go day, ge sḛ duul go, i be seɗ ɗwabeya to. I seɗ iigiya ge dwam ma zì mɔɗwag: Ho̰o̰l ma ge zum ya, voo kaɗ i dul wa ma zì me.
47007006	Ɗaŋɗe, Dok mbe ge ee nda ge num dul wa hee digi ma angal se, ee i angal-la se no me, ge deɗɗa ge Titus deɗ ja i buwal zì pe.
47007007	I be seɗ pool mbe ge ne deɗɗa ge dee ya i ta pe ɗeŋew to, me ɗaŋɗe, ge kaŋ ge ḛ kee ge ne pe waɗme. Wa̰a̰ i ene ge ḛ no ge ne, ge mbo ya kuwa mbi ndwa no, yal ge ḛ za̰a̰ ne no mage heeya ge ḛ hê mbi fare ma no ḛ pagal, àa num ee mbi kee laa saal gḛḛ ne.
47007008	A fareba go, lawayta ge mbi teme ḛ yà wal mbe vḛḛne ḛ dul wa, kee mbi yal to. Koo ne kee mbi yal puy ɗe, mbi kuwa kuwa go, dul wa vḛḛneya ge ḛ ḛ, ge lawayta mbe pe kaa swag boo.
47007009	Laa saal mbe ge mbi kee ne ge sok no go me ɗe, a be ge mbi ee ḛ dul wa vḛḛneya no pe to, ɗaŋɗe, ge dul wa vḛḛneya ge ḛ ḛ mbe ee ḛ dwaɗ seŋe ta ya se pe. Ago, dul wa vḛḛneya ge ḛ ḛ mbe, a laa ɓyareya ge Dok nee ne, i be kee ḛ yal a̰me go fyalag to.
47007010	A tem go, ge Dok ta, yal ma ee ndu seŋe tene ya se, deɗ-ɗa ge vin̰a monna go. Ano mbe kee ndu mbe yal to. Yal ge lee ge dunin̰a ne go me ɗe, tol-la swày me.
47007011	Ḛ kuwa, dul wa vḛḛneya ge ḛ ḛ mbe ge mbo ge Dok ta ya, kaŋ ge kee no ḛ buwal zì gale. A ma̰ fogol, ge a waɗ ne ja ne ge ḛ zì de! A ma̰ iyan ta ne, ge ee ḛ ya iyan ta ge sone ta ne de! A ma̰ tyanna ge ḛ pagal tyan-na gezi ne go ḛ nda ge sone ma de! A ma̰ voo wanna ge wan ḛ ya ne go, ḛ mbo go sok ge ɗogle go de! A ma̰ ene ne, ge ḛ ɓyare no kuwa mbi ndwa de! A ma̰ uwaseya sɔswag ne ge ḛ zì ge tèmel ge Dok ne pe de! A ma̰ vin̰a ge ɓyare mḛḛre nda ge kee sone ma ne de! Ḛ ngay ge kaŋ ma zì peɗ go, ḛ kɔn̰al ge fare mbe ma zì.
47007012	Kaɗɗa go mbi njaŋe ḛ lawayta ɗe, a be ge ndu ge kee sone pe to, koo ge ndu ge za̰a̰ yal pe to me. Ɗaŋɗe, a ndwa tyan ḛ pagal gezi tyatyaɗ go, ge Dok pe ɗe, ḛ ɔwabeya digi fogol cab ge i ta.
47007013	Na! Àa ḛ kaŋ keeya mbe ma eyal i laa ne no ɗaŋ. A fareba go, i be seɗ laa eyalla ɗeŋew to, ɗaŋɗe, i gwan kee laa saal gḛḛ ge Titus dagre, ge ne on̰om fii ya se ge kaŋ ge ḛ peɗ kee ge ne pe.
47007014	Kaɗɗa mbi sḛ uware tene fyalag, ge ne ndwa go ge ḛ pe ɗe, a ndwa go, mbi be seɗ daŋso ge ḛ ta to. Ajo̰o̰ fare ge i ka jan ḛ num ma fare ge fareba ma, ngay go, uwareya ge i uware ḛ ge Titus ndwa go be deɗ ziya se to waɗme.
47007015	Sok ge a dwaɗ pagal gwanna ge ḛ ka gwan ne na pe se mage honna ge ḛ ka hon na ga̰a̰l, ḛ ka za̰a̰ na wa me, sok ge na dee ḛ buwal zì yà go, ne laa gwan ka wan ḛ ɗogle-ɗogle.
47007016	Mbi kee tii gḛḛ, ge dape, kaŋ ma zì peɗ, mbi gaa isi ge ḛ pagal.
47008001	Na̰ van ma, i ɓyare ḛ dee ya kuwaya go, Dok ngay kwaɗa keeya ge na ne, ge ɓase ge Krist ne ge suwa Maseduwan ne go ge ma ta pe gyana de.
47008002	Yal ma iigiya ge iigi num no go ga puy, àa no a̰se kakatag no puy me ɗe, laa saal ge num way gwan waɗe no, àa ho̰ kaŋ honna ge dul wa ɗu, ge tèmel ge Dok ne pe no.
47008003	Mbi jan ḛ fareba, àa ho̰ kaŋ ge maa tok go ma kakaɗag, waɗeya ge maa pool pagal sḛ zoo, ge laa ɓyareya ge maa way tem.
47008004	Àa gwarge ta i ta gḛḛ go i kuwa maa a̰se ge go maa see vin̰a ge deɗ-ɗa mbaa nda ge ho fareba ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ yà ge ma waɗme.
47008005	Kaŋ ge gwan waɗe ge i dwaɗɗa ma pagal: Àa num eeya ge àa ee pe hon ta Bagezok gale guy, àa ho̰ ta i no me, ge mojo̰o̰ Dok laa ɓyare go.
47008006	A ge pe, i kaɗe Titus no go, ne guwa̰ mbo huy tèmel ge hon bobo ne, ge ne sḛ ee ne pe keeya ḛ buwal zì yà ge mbe wa.
47008007	Ḛ zam go zḛḛ zḛḛ, ge kaŋ keeya ge ḛ ḛ ma zì peɗ: Ge hoɗ fareba ge ḛ ḛ ma zì, ge ḛ fare janna ma zì, ge kuwaya zì me. Ḛ ol kekeŋ ge kaŋ ma zì peɗ, laa wanna ge ḛ ḛ ge i ta walay nde. Kaɗɗa na mbe go ɗe, ḛ gwan zam zḛḛ ta nde ge kwaɗa keeya ge ḛ ḛ mbe zì.
47008008	Sok jan ḛ go mbe go ɗe, mbi hoɗ ḛ mbi wa ge ne pagal to, ɗaŋɗe, mbi faa fare mbe ndwa kugi ḛ, ge kaŋ keeya ge ol kekeŋ ge nda ge ɗogle ma way, ndwa hon ḛ vin̰a ge ngay laa wanna ge ḛ ḛ ge fareba.
47008009	Ago, ḛ kuwa kwaɗa keeya ge nè Bagezok Zeso [Krist] ne kuwa. Ne sḛ ge gan njonjon̰, vḭḭ tene seŋe a̰se no, ge ḛ pe, ndwa go, ge a̰se ge na ne mbe zì, ḛ seŋe nda ge gan njonjon̰ ma.
47008010	Ano, a mbi dwaɗɗa ne, ge fare no pagal. A kwaɗa ge ḛ pe, ge dana dɔga day, ḛ nda ge ee pe zḛḛ ma ne, be ge kaŋ challa ma ɗeŋew to, ɗaŋɗe, ḛ vḭḭ ta vin kee ne gale guy.
47008011	A kwaɗa ge ḛ huy tèmel mbe wa ge sego gaw. Go mbe no, ḛ ka̰a̰ ta se to. Ge kaŋ ge no ḛ tok go ma, ḛ dee ya huy ne wa me.
47008012	A fareba go, kaɗɗa dwaɗɗa ge mbaa nda, mbo ge dul wa zì ya, Dok vin ne vin, ge kaŋ ge no mo tok go. Kaɗɗa mo be a̰me, Dok ɓyare go mo ho̰ a̰me mbḛḛ to.
47008013	A be go i aa ḛ tok, ndwa ee nda gegene ma seŋe pool to. Ɗaŋɗe, a bàŋ go num dee ya kàɗɗa ge ḛ go.
47008014	Ge sego, kaŋ zam ḛ tok go gḛḛ, ndwa mbaa nda ge no hoɗegeya zì ma. Sok ge ḛ sḛ ma mbo deɗ ja hoɗegeya zì ɗoo, àa kaɗ ge kaŋ gḛḛ ge maa tok go me ɗe, àa mbo mbaa ḛ waɗme. Go mbe no, ḛ wa deɗ-ɗa kàɗɗa ge num go.
47008015	Dinna ge a njaŋe no maktub ge Dok ne zì go: «Ge ɔwabe gḛḛ ma, num way ma gaa digi duwabeya to. Ge ɔwabe hoɗege guwa ma me ɗe, be hoɗege num to me.»
47008016	A kwaɗa ge mbi gwan ge Dok mersi, ge ne haɗɗa ge haɗ Titus ya fogol ge mojo̰o̰ i sḛ ma go, ge ḛ ta pe.
47008017	Be vin dwaɗɗa ge i ee na ne, ge mbo ḛ ndwa zì yà mbe ɗeŋew to. Ne sḛ ge na pagal, vḭḭ tene be giɗɗa go, na mbo ḛ ta yà ne ge na ndwa.
47008018	I teme ne yà ɓanna ge na̰ van ge ɓase ge Krist ne ma dore ne no ge tèmel ge Fare ge Kwaɗa oyya ne pe.
47008019	Ɓase ge Krist ne ma gwan tal nee ne iya go, ne kaa ndu ge ɗeme i, ge gɔswal mboya mbe zì, ndwa mbo kee tèmel ge siŋli mbe. Tèmel mbe ge mbo ee Bagezok dḭḭl ya seɗ hormo, ngay go i kee ne ge laa ɗu me.
47008020	Ge bware ge gḛḛ mbe ge àa teme i no ge ne mbe, i ɓyare go i see daŋso to.
47008021	I ɓyare go kaŋ keeya ge i i ma, num kaa kaŋ keeya ge maa vin̰a go ge ma, ge Bagezok ndwa se ɗeŋew to, ge nda duwana ma ta me.
47008022	Nè na̰ van ge ɓan-na ge num dagre ge ɗogle no iya, a ndu ge i ndi nee ne go, ge fare ma zì peɗ ɗe, ne fogol. A gwan fogol ge dape, ḛ kaŋ keeya ma gwan kwaɗa ne ndwa zì iya.
47008023	Kaɗɗa ge Titus ɗe, a mbi ndu ge baan ne, kaɗ mbi kon ge tèmel me, ge ḛ buwal zì yà. Kaɗɗa ge nè na̰ van ge zi ma ɗe, àa nda ge temeya ma ne, ge ɓase ge Krist ne ma teme num yà, ndwa go Krist dḭḭl see hormo ge num ta.
47008024	Ḛ ngay laa wanna ge num ta, ndwa go ɓase ge Krist ne ma dee ya hoɗ fareba, num kuwa waɗme go laa saal ge i kee ge ḛ pe, ne gag.
47009001	Kaɗɗa ge kaŋ ge àa ɓyare teme mbo mbaa nda ge ho fareba ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ yà ge ma pe ɗe, fare a̰me ge gḛḛ ge mbi njaŋe ḛ maktub zì ge ne pagal to.
47009002	Mbi kuwa dwaɗɗa ge ḛ ḛ ge kwaɗa keeya pe mbe kuwa. Kee mbi sḛ tii no, sok faa ne ge van Maseduwan ma ta go. Mbi kaɗ jan num go: Nda ge suwa ge Akay ne go ma jejew ge dana dɔga ya day ndwa ɓyan maa tok pe. Fogol ge ḛ ḛ mbe ɔwabe a̰me ge num buwal zige ma ya digi mulyṵg.
47009003	Mbi teme na̰ van ma yà, ndwa go, doreya mbe ge i dore ḛ no, ne dee hày to. Ge mojo̰o̰ mbi jan ḛ no go me ɗe, ḛ kaa nuusiya.
47009004	Kaɗɗa go to, sok ge i ge van Maseduwan ge ɗeme mbi ma mbo deɗ-ɗa yà, àa mbo seɗ-ɗa go ḛ be nuusi to, daŋso mbo wan i, daŋso wan ḛ me.
47009005	Go mbe no, mbi duwa no ne kwaɗa ge mbi kaɗe na̰ van mbe ma, num mbo mbi ndwa zḛḛ yà, ge dape, num wa ɓyare vin̰a ge kwate bobo ge gḛḛ ceɗeɗ ge ḛ kê wa tii ge num pagal mbe digi. Go mbe no wa din bobo ge ho̰ ge dul wa ɗu, be ge bobo ge àa ee ndu hon ne ge pool go to.
47009006	Mbi ɓyare tyan ḛ pagal gezi go: Ndu ge zare kaŋ rusu hoɗege guwa, mbo syaɗ hoɗege guwa. Ndu ge zare kaŋ rusu se gḛḛ ceɗeɗ, mbo syaɗ gḛḛ ceɗeɗ waɗme.
47009007	A kwaɗa ge ndu hon kaŋ ge na duwa na dul wa zì honna tem, be honna ge dul wa zi zi to, koo ge mojo̰o̰ àa ee na honna ge pool go to me. A fareba, Dok laa wan ndu ge hon ge laa saal.
47009008	Ago, Dok mbiya mbyaɗ ge hon ḛ kaŋ ge diige pe peɗ kon pagal. Go mbe no, a̰me mbo hoɗege ḛ to, ge go ḛ mbaa tèmel keeya ge kwaɗa ge diige pe peɗ me.
47009009	Dinna ge a njaŋe no ge maktub ge Dok ne zì go: «Va na kaŋ kwaɗa ma nda ge hoɗegeya ma no mɔɗwag, eya ge temel ge na ne mbe zì to ge ndwa ɗiŋ ge din.»
47009010	A ne sḛ Ba ge hon ndu ge zare kaŋ rusu ne, hon ne kaŋ zam ge wal ne me. Mbo hon ḛ kaŋ rusu, baŋne ne ḛ ta bindig me. Go mbe no, ee ḛ kaŋ keeya ge temel mbe ma zuli ya se.
47009011	Go mbe no, ḛ mbo seɗ wa tare kaŋ ma zì peɗ, ge ee ḛ mbaa nda ge dul wa ɗu, ee nda gwan ge mersi keeya hon Dok, ge kaŋ ge ḛ teme num i tok-ga ma pe.
47009012	Ago, tèmel keeya ge ḛ ḛ ge siyal ne mbe mbo mbaa nda ge ho fareba ma mbaa ɗeŋew to, ɗaŋɗe, mbo ee dwaɗa ge gwan ge Dok mersi gḛḛ ge num zì waɗme.
47009013	Sok kuwa mbaaya mbe ma no go, àa mà hon Dok hormo ge mboya ge ḛ mbo no ge Fare ge Kwaɗa ge Krist ne pagal pe. Àa mà uware ne ge ngayya ge ḛ ngay no go ḛ baan ge maa, ḛ kaɗ baan ge nda ge ɗogle ma peɗ no pe me.
47009014	Àa mà kaɗe ge ḛ pe, ngay laa wanna ge maa way ḛ ta, ge eeya ge Dok ee dwaɗɗa ge kwaɗa keeya ge gḛḛ ceɗeɗ ne mbe ḛ zì pe.
47009015	Nè kee mersi hon Dok, ge ne kwaɗa keeya ge be walape mbe pe.
47010001	Mbi sḛ kaɗe ḛ ne, ge dul wa lasas mage kwaɗa keeya ge Krist ne ma ta, mbi Pol ge nda a̰me ma jan go, mbi ndil suul lɔlɔgwaɗ, sok ge mbi kaɗ dagre ge ḛ go, ɗaŋɗe, mbi fare kaɗ ndaa kaka, sok ge mbi kaɗ kaal ge ḛ go me.
47010002	Mbi kaɗe ḛ kaɗe go: Ne kaa ge mbi seŋe ndaa kaka ge ḛ ta to, sok ge mbi mbo deɗ-ɗa ḛ buwal zì yà go. Ago, mbi mbo kaɗ ndaa kaka, ge num ge dwaɗ no go, kaŋ keeya ge nè ne ma kaŋ keeya ge sḛ duul go ge ma ne.
47010003	A fareba go nè nda duwana ma ne ɓame, ano puy ɗe, nè twam mballa be twam mballa ge sḛ duul go ge ne to.
47010004	Ge dape, ge nè twam mballa mbe zì, nè kaŋ walam ge mbaa nè mbal twam ma be ge nda duwana ma way ma ne to, ɗaŋɗe, a kaŋ walam ge Dok ne, ge no pool ge burmi gerger ge nda ge no ho̰o̰l ge Dok ma way gezi ne. Nè gul go dwaɗɗa ge hày
47010005	mage kuwaya ge diige ge mḛḛ sḭḭl no ge kuwaya ge Dok ne ma me. Nè ee nda eya dwaɗɗa, ndwa go, num dee ya mboya ge fare ge Krist ne ma pagal.
47010006	Sok ge ḛ mbo ngay i ya go ḛ nda ge gwan ḛ pagal se ma ne, i guwa ge mḛḛre ndu ge diige, ge ḛ buwal zige ge gwan na pagal se to.
47010007	Ḛ ndi fare mbe ma kwaɗɗa gale! Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me kuwa ya tyatyaɗ go na ge Krist nee ne, ne sḛ ge na pagal ne kuwa go, na no ge Krist ne me ɗe, i sḛ ma ge Krist ne ma ne waɗme.
47010008	Kaɗɗa mbi uware tene go gḛḛ ge pool ge Bagezok ho̰ mbi ne pe puy ɗe, daŋso kee mbi to. Ne pool mbe, ho̰ i ne, ndwa ee ḛ ɓase ge na ne ma donna, be ge ḛ burmiya pe to.
47010009	Ḛ duwa go mbi ɓyare ngwabe ḛ ngwabe ge mbi lawayta mbe ma zì to,
47010010	ge dape, nda a̰me ma kaɗ jan go: Ne fare mbe ma fare janna ge haŋle ma ne, àa kaɗ fare janna ge pool ma me, ɗaŋɗe, sok ge nè ge num kaɗ dagre, kaɗ tuguɗi, ne fare janna ma mbaa a̰me to peɗ me.
47010011	Nda ge dwaɗ go mbe ma ɗe, ɓyare num kuwa kwaɗa go: Koo i no kaal ge ḛ no puy, fare ge i jan num lawayta zì mbe ma no, i mbo deɗ-ɗa ḛ buwal zì yà, i mbo kee ge num pagal tem.
47010012	A fareba go, a̰me mbo ee i dwaɗɗa dwam ɗu go, i mbyaɗɗa leɗeɗ, koo ngay ta ge num mbe ge hon ta ga̰a̰l ma to. Num sḛ ma ndil ta ne, àa vin ta go maa waɗe ga̰a̰l. Sok ngay ta go mbe ɗe, àa hoɗege kuwaya.
47010013	Kaɗɗa ge i sḛ ma ɗe, i ɓyare uware ta kale lee gene yà to. I uware ta ge tèmel ge Dok ho̰ i ne keeya pagal tem, ne ge ee i ɗiŋ deɗ ḛ ta yà.
47010014	Sok ge i dee ḛ ta yà ge Fare ge Kwaɗa ge Krist ne ɗe, i be kale lee ge ɗogle zì yà to, dinna ge Dok tin̰a vin̰a i pagal go tem.
47010015	I ge vin̰a ge uware ta ge tèmel ge nda ge ɗogle ma kee pe kale lee gene yà to, ɗaŋɗe, i jobreya ge donna ge ḛ ḛ pagal, ge hoɗ fareba ge ḛ ḛ ma zì pagal, i wa deɗ-ɗa kuwaya go, i tèmel zam go zḛḛ i tok go ko ɓade, be ge kale ge lee ge ɗogle zì yà to.
47010016	Go mbe no, i ge vin̰a ge oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge suwa ge ɗogle ge kaal ma yà waɗme, ge go i kaa ge uware ta pe, ge tèmel ge nda a̰me ma kee num ya ge sok a̰me ma go ma pagal.
47010017	Njaŋe ge maktub ge Dok ne sok a̰me zì go: «Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me uware tene go, ne uware tene ge Bagezok Dok kaŋ ge kee no ge na pe.»
47010018	A be go Bagezok za̰a̰ tii ge ndu ge dol tene ga̰a̰l ge na pagal to, ɗaŋɗe, za̰a̰ tii ge ndu ge na sḛ dore ne.
47011001	Na! Mbi dwaɗ jan ḛ fare ge sego dinna ge ndu ge dàle go, ndwa ndilla go ḛ mà deɗ-ɗa ame fare janna ge ambi mbe ge dàle ma kode! O̰o̰, ɓyare go ḛ ame num ɗaŋ!
47011002	Ago, fare ge ḛ ḛ haɗ mbi ya yil waɗe pool ge mojo̰o̰ Dok no yil ge ḛ pe no go me. Mbi nuusi ḛ zok kàɗɗa go ge obe ɗu, a Krist. Mbi ɗeme ḛ mbo hon ne be fwaɗɗa, dinna ge van kale ge na na̰ tok jan go.
47011003	Ɗaŋɗe, dinna ge bwam lase Hawa ge zwam ge na ne go ɗe, mbi ge voo go, ḛ kin̰are n̰a ta vuuɗiya, àa gene ḛ kaal ge kɔn̰al ge Krist mbe ge ḛ kàre ne pe ne go.
47011004	A fareba, ndu a̰me ge pool mbo ya, hate ḛ fare ge ɗogle ge Zeso pagal, be ne mbe ge i hate ḛ ne to. Koo ḛ seɗ on̰om ge ɗogle, be On̰om ge ḛ see ne wal mbe to. Koo Fare ge kwaɗa ge ɗogle, be ne ge i ta, ḛ vḭḭ ne mbe to. Ano puy, ḛ ame num go ɓame.
47011005	Mbi kuwa kuwa tyatyaɗ go, nda ge temeya mbe ge ḛ dwaɗ go num waɗe ne ma, àa be waɗe mbi ge a̰me go fyalag to.
47011006	A fareba go mbi andaŋ ge fare faaya ma zì to, ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ge kuwaya ge lee ge Dok ne go, a fare ge ɗogle ne. Ḛ kuwa pool ge i i, ge fare ma zì peɗ, vin̰a ma go hini-hini.
47011007	O̰o̰, mbi ka oy ḛ Fare ge Kwaɗa ge Dok ne, be ge ele a̰me ge ḛ tok go. Mbi ele tene ele go, sok ndil tene ge ndu ge fare a̰me pe to go, ndwa go ḛ pagal he digi no, mbi gwan kee sone zoo de?
47011008	Sok ge mbi kaa ge ḛ buwal zì yà, mbi aa ɓase ge Krist ne ge sok ge ɗogle yà ge ma tok kakaɗag, ndwa seɗ kaŋ ge mbaa tene, ge tèmel ge mbi ka keeya ḛ buwal zì mbe pe.
47011009	Ge ḛ buwal zì yà, mbi kaɗ ge hoɗegeya ma puy, mbi be ee dṵṵl ge ndu a̰me pagal to. Ɗaŋɗe, àa na̰ van ge mbo no ge suwa Maseduwan ne ya ma, mbâ mbi ne, ge mbi hoɗegeya ma zì. Ge kaŋ ma zì peɗ, mbi ka wan tene go, ndu a̰me ge ḛ buwal zige he mbi dṵṵl to. Mbi mbo eya fare to me.
47011010	Mbi jan ḛ fare ge fareba, ge dḭḭl ge Krist ge no mbi zì pe go: Ge suwa ge Akay ne pagal mɔɗwag, ndu a̰me mbo tele mbi be kee laa saal ge fare mbe no pe to.
47011011	Mbi kee ano mbe no ge dape de? A ndwa go mbi laa be wan ḛ to de? Dok kuwa kuwa go mbi laa wa̰a̰ ḛ wan!
47011012	Mbi mḛḛ mbi ko ge mbi fare keeya mbe ma pagal, ɗiŋ ge sego mbi kee num, ge dape, num ge ɓyare go maa ngay ta ge i ma, num daa gwan seɗ vin̰a a̰me go fyalag ge uware ta to.
47011013	Nda mbe ma no, àa nda ge temeya ge fareba ma ne to. Àa kee ta ge mojo̰o̰ nda ge temeya ge Krist ne ma go, àa n̰aame nda boo.
47011014	Kaŋ a̰me ge ajab ge sok no go to, ge dape Saytan sḛ puy kee tene dinna ge malayka ge fareba go.
47011015	A̰me ge haŋle ge sok no zì to, ne nda ge tèmel ma waɗme, àa kee ta dinna ge nda ge tèmel ge temel taɗ ne ma go. Ɗaŋɗe, pe aaya ge num way, a seɗ poɗɗa ge kaŋ keeya ge maa way mbe ma sḛ tem.
47011016	Mbi dwage janna go: Ne kaa ge ndu a̰me ndi mbi dinna ge ndu ge dàle go to. Kaɗɗa na mbe go, ḛ vin ta go mbi ndu ge dàle ne ɗaŋ, go mbe no, mbi sḛ see vin̰a ge uware tene nde waɗme.
47011017	Fare ge mbi jan no, a be fare ge mbo ge Bagezok ta ya ne to, ɗaŋɗe, mbi jan ne dinna ge ndu ge dàle go, ge dape mbi kuwa kuwa tyatyaɗ go mbi mà seɗ fare a̰me ge mbiya mbi uware tene ne pagal mbḛḛ.
47011018	Ajo̰o̰ nda gḛḛ uware ta ge kaŋ ge nda duwana ma kee num ma pe ɗe, mbi sḛ mbiya uware tene waɗme.
47011019	Ḛ nda ge kuwa fare ma sḛ ne, ḛ ka vin nda ge dàle ma pe waɗme de!
47011020	Ḛ vin vin go nda ka kee ḛ moor, num ka aa ḛ tok zamma, num ka harge ḛ kaŋ ma, num ka jan ḛ ɔswar, num ka say ḛ pagal digi ba!
47011021	Mbi jan go ne daŋso. I kaa tuguɗi gḛḛ sok no go! Mbi jan fare ge ndu ge dàle go. Ge sego, nda kaɗ-ɗa ka uware ta, mbi sḛ uware tene waɗme.
47011022	Àa jan maa hebre van twàl ma ne ya? Mbi sḛ hebre van twàl ne waɗme. Àa jan maa Izrayel van ma ne ya? Mbi sḛ Izrayel van ne waɗme. Àa jan maa Abraham baŋ kon ma ne ya? Mbi sḛ Abraham baŋ kon ne waɗme.
47011023	Àa nda ge kee Krist tèmel ma ne ya? (A fareba go, mbi jan fare ge ndu ge pagal kwaɗa to go), mbi waɗe num waɗe daday. Ge tèmel ge Krist ne ɗe, mbi kee ne gḛḛ ge yal waɗe num, mbi za daŋay no ndwa gḛḛ, mbi see iyalla waɗe num no me. Lee gḛḛ nda ka ee mbi wa ge swày.
47011024	Mbi see iyalla ge Yahuɗ ma ga̰a̰l ma ta, bol wa warndà wa ge ɗu to har ndwa nuwan̰.
47011025	Àa nja mbi ndwa taa, àa mbaa mbi ge njal no ndwa ɗu, faa ga̰a̰l ɗimi mbi no ndwa taa, sḭ̀ḭl giwli mbi mam ga̰a̰l nuwam pul go no, ge aaram day gyala mbo dinna, ge ɗaal ɗiŋ sok kon̰n̰a.
47011026	Sok mbo gɔswal ma go, mbi ka seɗ yal ɗaɗag ge mam pul go, mbi ka seɗ yal ge nda ge fiiri vin̰a ma tok go, ge mbi ka̰a̰m ge suwal ma tok go, ge nda ge rusu ge ɗogle ma tok go, mbi ka za̰a̰ yal ge suwal ga̰a̰l ma diŋ, ge babur pul go, ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam pul go, mbi ka seɗ yal ge na̰ van ge kee ta go maa ge Dok ne ma buwal zì me.
47011027	Mbi kee tèmel keeya ge ndwa hun tene, mbi seɗ dwam fiiya mbi ndwa go to. Camal mage mam njuwal ɓyare ka hun mbi, mbi be ka seɗ kaŋ zam ge zam-ma to. Eyalam ɓyare ka hun mbi, mbi seɗ ba̰a̰ ge wan mbi eyalam to me.
47011028	Mbi daa mà isi yal ge ɗogle ma iya, fare ge mbi dwaɗ ne pagal dwam ma zì mɔɗwag, a ano mbe no ɗeŋew: A ngiɗim ge no mbi zì, ge ɓase ge Krist ne ma pe peɗ.
47011029	Ndu kaɗ-ɗa tuguɗi ge ko pul ge Dok ne go ɗe, kee mbi yal. Ndu deɗ-ɗa sone zì ɗe, ne fare mbe til mbi duul me.
47011030	Kaɗɗa vin̰a ge uware ta go, mbi mbiya uware tene ne, ge yal ge kee mbi ma pe.
47011031	Dok ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist ba, ge nda uware ne no ge ndwa ɗiŋ ge din, kuwa kuwa go mbi kun hày to.
47011032	Sok ge mbi kaa ge suwal ga̰a̰l Damas diŋ yà, Goformo̰ ge ka kee tèmel hon gan ga̰a̰l Aretas, ee nda suwal ga̰a̰l zok wa ge waɗɗa ma go ndwa ɓyare mbi wanna,
47011033	ɗaŋɗe, àa ee mbi ge gwal zì no, àa siri mbi ge gulum ga̰a̰l ndwal digi ya zum no. A go mbe no, mbi see vin̰a mon tene ge ne tok zì ya no.
47012001	Mbiya mbi uware tene ɗaŋ de? Mbaa fare a̰me go fyalag to! Ɗaŋɗe, mbi gwan-na ge kaŋ ge Bagezok ngay mbi num mage kin̰a ge jin̰a mbi ma pagal.
47012002	Kee ja del wol pɔgwa ndà, ge mbi kuwa ndu ge ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Krist a̰me, ge Dok gene ne ɗiŋ pḭḭ ge taa digi yà. Koo mbo ge na ndwa gegel de? Mbi kuwa to. Koo kee ne ndwa kin̰a kin̰a de? Mbi kuwa to waɗme. Dok ɗu kuwa ano mbe ne.
47012003	A fareba go mbi kuwa ndu mbe. Koo kaa ge na ndwa gegel de, koo kaa ge na ndwa gegel to de, mbi kuwa to. Dok ɗu kuwa ano mbe ne.
47012004	Mbi kuwa go Dok gene ne mbo paradis zì yà, za̰a̰ fare ge ndu mbiya wan num pe to ma no, ge ndu no ge vin̰a ge faa num to ma me.
47012005	Mbiya mbi uware tene ge ndu ge go mbe no pe. Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ge mbi sḛ ɗe, tamekyala mbi mà mbo uware tene ɗeŋew ge yal ge kee mbi ma pe.
47012006	O̰o̰, daa no go mbi uware tene ɗe, mbi daa gwan kaɗ ndu ge dàle to, ago mbi jan daa fare ge fareba. Ɗaŋɗe, mbi kee ne to, ne kaa ge ndu a̰me ndi mbi waɗe kaŋ ge na kuwa ge mbi ta, koo waɗe fare ge na za̰a̰ ge mbi wa zì ma to me.
47012007	Kaŋ ge Dok ngay mbi num mbe ma kaŋ ge kwaɗa waɗe-waɗe, ge ee mbi uware tene ma ne. Ɗaŋɗe, ge go mbi see vin̰a ge uware tene to ɗe, Dok chaɗe a̰me mbi duul zì no, ndwa go malayka ge Saytan ne a̰me ne za̰a̰ mbi yal.
47012008	Mbi gwarge tene ge Bagezok ta no, ndwa taa go ne hee yal mbe gezi ge mbi ta,
47012009	guwa̰ ge mbi janna no go: Kwaɗa keeya ge ambi mo ta mbiya mo mbyaɗ. Ago, ndu deɗ-ɗa kuwa pool ge ambi sok ge kaɗ yal zì go. Kaɗɗa na mbe go, mbiya mbi kee vare zoo laa saal ge mbi yal ma zì, ndwa go pool ge Krist ne mbe kaa ge mbi zì.
47012010	A ge pe, mbi kee laa saal, ge hoɗegeya ge ambi ma, ge saaso ge ambi ma, ge yal ge ambi ma, ge njon̰n̰a ge nda njon̰ mbi ma, ge iigiya ge ambi ma zì no, ge Krist pe. Ago, sok ge mbi haɗ tuguɗi, a ge sok mbe go, mbi wa seɗ pool go.
47012011	Na! Mbi gaa ya ge ndu ge dàle go, ḛ ee mbi ne deɗ-ɗa sok no zì ba! Mbiya ndwa go ḛ sḛ ma ɗeŋre mbi ne, ge dape, mbi no fare a̰me pe to no puy, mbi be hoɗege jiyale to, fare ma zì peɗ, ge nda ge temeya ge ḛ dwaɗ go num waɗe ne mbe ma buwal zì.
47012012	Ḛ kuwa, kaŋ keeya ge ambi ge ḛ buwal zì yà ge ma ka ngayya ne go mbi ndu ge temeya ne: Mbi ka wan tene ɗaɗag, Dok ka ngay pool ge na ne no, ka kee kaŋ haŋle ma no, ka kee kaŋ ajab ma no ge mbi ta me.
47012013	Ḛ sḛ ma ɗe, a ma̰ kaŋ ge kwaɗa ge mbi ngay ne ge ɓase ge Krist ne gegene ma ta, waɗe ge ḛ ḛ ne de? Ɗeŋew, ta ge ḛ hee mbi dṵṵl to pe de? Ḛ pore mbi yal mbe ke ḛ ne nde!
47012014	Ḛ kuwa gale, gaa mbi dwam ma kaal to, ge mbi dwaɗ no mbo ge ḛ ta yà, ge ndwa taa. Mbi mbo ele ḛ go ḛ hee mbi dṵṵl to. Mbi ɓyare be ḛ kaŋ gan ma to, ɗaŋɗe, ḛ sḛ ma. A be van ma koy kaŋ digi ne ge ba ma pe to, ɗaŋɗe, a ba ma mbiya kee ano mbe ne ge maa van ma pe.
47012015	Kaɗɗa ge mbi sḛ ɗe, koo mbi ba̰a̰ kaŋ ge mbi no ge num ma, ɗiŋ mbo hon tene gezi ge ḛ pe, mbi vin ne ya go. Kaɗɗa mbi laa wa̰a̰ ḛ gḛḛ go ɗe, mbiya ndwa ḛ uɗi mbi ḛ laa zì to de?
47012016	A fareba go, ḛ hee mbi dṵṵl to no puy, ge nda a̰me ma ta ɗe, mbi ndu ge lase ḛ bware ma wa ne.
47012017	Ge nda ge mbi teme num ḛ buwal zì yà ma no, a̰me ge mbi aa ḛ tok zamma ge ne ta go ɗu de?
47012018	Mbi gwarge tene Titus ta go ne mbo ge ḛ ta yà, mbi teme na̰ van mbe yà ge ne no me. Titus za ḛ tok de? I ge ne kaa ge dwaɗɗa ge ɗu to de? I ko pul mbe ge ɗu go to de?
47012019	Ya din mbe no, ḛ dwaɗ go i ɓyare vin̰a ge ɗeŋre i fare ma ge ḛ ndwa se. To! Ge ɓanna ge i ɓa̰a̰ ge Krist pe, i faa fare mbe ma Dok ndwa se. Ano mbe ma no peɗ, na̰ van ge laa wanna ma, i ɓyare go ḛ do̰o̰ ge hoɗ fareba ge ḛ ḛ ma zì.
47012020	Mbi dul wa hal mbi go, tamekyala mbi dee ḛ buwal zì yà ɗoo, mbi see ḛ ge mbi ɓyare go to. Ḛ sḛ ma me ɗe, ḛ see mbi ge ḛ ɓyare go to me. Mbi dul wa hal mbi iya go, mbi dee seɗ ḛ gool ma zì, yil ta ta, ho̰o̰l ge ta, dol ga̰a̰l ta ma, oo ta ma, fare ɗooya ma, pagal ga̰a̰l ma, batraŋ ma zì me.
47012021	Mbi ge voo iya go, mbi kin̰are dee ge ḛ buwal zì yà ɗoo, Dok ge ambi wa̰a̰ mbi ndwa ge daŋso ge ḛ pe to. Laa pisil mbo hun mbi, ge nda gḛḛ gale seŋe ta ya se to pe, àa bulmi no ge maa kaŋ keeya ge seŋre ma zì ge wal go, ge ene sḛ duul zì, kaŋ keeya ge sone ma zì me.
47013001	Ḛ kuwa go mbi mbo deɗ-ɗa ḛ buwal zì yà, a ge ndwa taa ne. «A kwaɗa ge go, sok deɗ-ɗa vaa fare a̰me ma buwal go ɗe, ne kaa ge sayda ge nda zi koo taa mà keeya pagal go mbḛḛ.»
47013002	Sok ge mbi dee mbo ḛ ta yà ge ndwa zi go, mbi ndiri nda ge ka kee sone ma tɔgwa me no, mbi ndiri nda gegene ma tɔgwa no peɗ waɗme. Ge sego, ge mbi gale dee ḛ buwal zì yà to no puy ɗe, mbi gwan dwage ḛ janna go, ge num mbe ge ke sone ma mɔɗwag, sok ge mbi mbo deɗ-ɗa ḛ buwal zì yà ɗe, mbi mbo ndil ndu a̰me daŋso to.
47013003	Ge sego, ḛ ɓyare kuwaya go, Krist n̰a na wa mbi ta de koo? Ḛ kuwa go, Krist mbe tèmel keeya ge ḛ buwal zì yà ge tuguɗi to, ɗaŋɗe, a tèmel ge pool gḛḛ ne.
47013004	A fareba go Krist mbe ge àa pee ne ɔwara kaŋre ta digi, seŋe tene ge ndu ge tuguɗi raraɗ boo go, ɗaŋɗe, ge sego, a ge na ndwa, ge pool ge Dok ne ta. I sḛ ma seŋe tuguɗi waɗme, ge ɓanna ge i ɓa̰a̰ ge ne pe, ɗaŋɗe, i ngay go i go ge ndwa ge ne dagre. Ge pool ge Dok ne ta, i tèmel mbo kaɗ pool ge ḛ buwal zì yà me.
47013005	Mbi jan ḛ go, ndu ge diige ne hale na dul wa kwaɗa, ndwa kuwaya go, na mbo go ge hoɗ fareba ge na ho̰ pagal ɓade. Ḛ kuwa kuwa go Zeso Krist ge ḛ zì. Kaɗɗa na go to, ago ḛ ele ta mà ɗoo, ḛ see no go ḛ dee deɗ.
47013006	Ɗaŋɗe, mbi ee mbi jobreya go, koo ne kaa pe gyana de puy, ḛ kuwa kuwa go i be deɗ to.
47013007	Ge sego, i kaɗe Dok go ne kaa ge ḛ ke a̰me ge n̰aal daa to. A be go, i ngay go i tèmel kee kwaɗa to, ɗaŋɗe, koo ne ndi ge mojo̰o̰ i tèmel kee kwaɗa to go puy ɗe, i i go ḛ dee ya kee kwaɗa.
47013008	Ago, i ge pool a̰me ge ɗḭ̀ḭ sḭḭl ge fare ge fareba to. I sḛ ma go ɗeŋew ge fare ge fareba pe.
47013009	A fareba go i kee laa saal, sok ge i sḛ ma haɗ tuguɗi, ḛ sḛ ma seɗ pool go me. Kaŋ ge i ele ne ge i kaɗeya ma zì ɗe, ago ḛ do̰o̰ ge ko pul ge Dok ne go.
47013010	A ge pe no, ajo̰o̰ mbi go ge ḛ buwal zì yà to puy ɗe, mbi njaŋe ḛ kaŋ mbe ma no, ndwa go, sok ge mbi kin̰are deɗ-ɗa ge ḛ buwal zì yà ɗe, mbi daa gwan mḛḛre ḛ ol kekeŋ to. Bagezok ho̰ mbi pool ge keeya mbe go, ndwa ee ḛ donna ge ko pul ge Dok ne go, be go mbi ee ḛ vḛḛneya to.
47013011	A gaa mbo zḛḛ no, na̰ van ma, ḛ kaa ge laa saal, ḛ za zḛḛ tèmel zì, ḛ ho̰ ta pool, ḛ kaa ge dwaɗɗa ge ɗu, ḛ kaa halas ge ta. Go no me, Dok ge laa wa̰a̰ nda, ge gene halas ya me, mbo kaɗ ɓanna dagre ge ḛ.
47013012	Ḛ sa̰a̰ ta wa ɗu ɗu peɗ, ḛ bu ta zì ge laa saal. Nda ge Dok mbege num gezi caɗ ge na pe ge go go ge ma peɗ sa̰a̰ ḛ wa waɗme.
47013013	N̰a kwaɗa keeya ge Bagezok Zeso Krist ne, laa wanna ge Dok ne mage baan ge On̰om ge Harcal num kaa dagre ge ḛ.
48001001	A mbi Pol njaŋe ḛ lawayta mbe no ne. Ndu ge too mbi ya, seŋe mbi kaɗ ndu ge temeya no, a Zeso Krist mage Dok ge nè Ba ge ta̰a̰ ne ge nda ge swày ma buwal zì, a be nda duwana ma koo ndu a̰me fare ne to.
48001002	Ḛ ɓase ge Krist ne ge no suwa Galaɗ go ma, mbi sa̰a̰ ḛ wa ɓanna ge mbi na̰ van ge i ge num kee tèmel oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ma no peɗ.
48001003	N̰a Dok ge nè Ba mage nè Bagezok Zeso Krist, num ngay kwaɗa keeya ge maa way ge ḛ ta, num ee ḛ kàɗɗa halas me.
48001004	Krist ho̰ tene mbo swày ndwa zuu nè ge nè sone ma zì, ge dape, nè daa gwan kee kaŋ ge nda kee num no ma ge zaman ge sone ge mà mbe no zì to. Sok kee ano mbe go, guwa̰ na pagal ge laa ɓyareya ge Dok ge nè Ba ne pe se.
48001005	Dok mbiya go nè ka sale ne zaman mage zaman ma. Amin !
48001006	Ḛ fare kee mbi ya ajab ge ḛ suwa Dok ge too ḛ ya ge kwaɗa keeya ge Krist ne ta avun bàŋ go cab, mbo ge fare a̰me ge ɗogle ma pe yà pe.
48001007	A fareba go, Fare ge Kwaɗa a̰me ge ɗogle daa to baɗ. Mbi kuwa ɗeŋew go, nda ge iigi ḛ no ma, àa ɓyare go maa eya Fare ge Kwaɗa ge Krist ne.
48001008	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me oy ḛ fare a̰me ge no hini ge Fare ge Kwaɗa mbe ge i oy ḛ ne ya no go, wa vḛḛneya kaa ne pagal! Koo ne kaa i, koo ne kaa malayka a̰me ge mbo no ge pḭḭ zì ya.
48001009	I jan ḛ ne ya go, ge sego mbi gwan dwage ḛ ne go: Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me oy ḛ fare ge hini ge Fare ge Kwaɗa mbe ge ḛ ame ne ya no peɗ go, wa vḛḛneya kaa ne pagal!
48001010	Ge sego ḛ dwaɗ gyana de? Ago mbi see doreya ge nda duwana ma ta koo ge Dok ta de? Mbi dwaɗɗa kee nda duwana ma sḛ tii de? Daa no go mbi gwan ɓyare kee nda duwana ma sḛ tii ɗe, mbi daa mà kaɗ ndu ge kee tèmel ge Krist ne to.
48001011	Na̰ van ma, mbi jan ḛ ne zum waŋ go: Fare ge Kwaɗa ge mbi ha̰a̰le tene ya oy ne no, be mbo ge nda duwana ma ta to.
48001012	Ndu a̰me be jan mbi Fare ge Kwaɗa mbe koo hate mbi ne fare ne to me. Ɗaŋɗe, a Zeso Krist ee mbi ne kuwa fare mbe.
48001013	Mbi kuwa go, ḛ za̰a̰ fare ge mbi ka kee num dee wal ma, sok ge mbi ka uware Dok ge mojo̰o̰ i Yahuɗ ma uware ne go go. Ḛ kuwa kuwa go mbi ka kee fare ge birtiŋ ma gḛḛ sok njon̰ ɓase ge Dok ne ma go, ge dwaɗɗa ge go mbi aa num pe gezi.
48001014	Mbi ka waɗe mbi ka̰a̰m ge goŋ ma waɗe sok kee Dok ge i Yahuɗ ma way go, mbi ka iyal kyarga gḛḛ sok ceme i baŋ ma hada ma keeya go me.
48001015	Ɗaŋɗe, ge kwaɗa keeya ge Dok ne ta, taa mbi no, zḛḛ ge go mbi gale wa ya be tolla, too mbi kee na tèmel no.
48001016	Sok ge vḭḭ tene dyan na van ya ge mbi ta, ndwa go mbi oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge ne ne ge nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma ta, mbi be ele yuwaleya ge ndu a̰me ta ɗu,
48001017	koo mbi be mbo seɗ num ge kaa Zeso nda ge temeya ge mbi ndwa zḛḛ ma, ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem diŋ yà to. Ɗaŋɗe, mbi ɗege avun cab mbo ge suwa Arabi yà. Guwa̰, mbi guwa̰ mbo ge suwal ga̰a̰l Damas yà no.
48001018	Del taa guwa̰, mbi mbo suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem no, ndwa ngay tene ge Kefas ge àa tol ne Piyer ta. Mbi kee ne ta no dwam wol pɔgwa nuwan̰.
48001019	Mbi be kuwa ndu ge temeya ge ɗogle to, ɗeŋew, Jak ge nè Bagezok na̰ van.
48001020	Fare ge mbi njaŋe ḛ ne no, Dok kuwa kuwa go mbi kun hày to.
48001021	Guwa̰, mbi mbo ge suwa Siri mage Silisi yà no.
48001022	Ɗaŋɗe, ɓase ge Krist ne ge no suwa Jude go ma be kuwa mbi ndwa dwam ɗu to.
48001023	Àa ka za̰a̰ ɗag nda gegene ma janna go: Ndu mbe ge ha̰a̰le tene njon̰ nè, ge sego, gaa ya jan nda vin̰a ge hoɗ fareba ge Krist ta ne, ge ne sḛ ka ɓyare dee wal burmi ne gezi.
48001024	Go mbe no, ɓase ge Krist ne ma ka sale Dok no ge kaŋ ge ne ee mbi kee num ma pe.
48002001	Del wol pɔgwa ndà guwa̰, mbi guwa̰ mbo Jerusalem yà no ɓanna ge Barnabas. Mbi wa̰a̰ Titus ge i pe yà no.
48002002	Mbi guwa̰ mbo suwal ga̰a̰l mbe yà ge Dok ho na wa mbi ta pe. Ge ne yà, i ge ga̰a̰l ge no ɓase ge Krist ne ma pagal ma see ta no hini jan, mbi wa̰a̰ num fare pe ge Fare ge Kwaɗa ge mbi oy ne ge nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma buwal zì no zum gagaraw. Mbi ɓyare, mbi kaa ge kuwaya tyatyaɗ go, tèmel ge mbi kee no ma, ge mbi dwaɗ keeya ma, num kaa kɔn̰al ge num pagal zì.
48002003	A go mbe no, àa daa be kee Titus, mbi kon ge tèmel, ge pool go ne vin̰a bḛḛ to koo ano van Grek, ndwa go ndu ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to.
48002004	Ɗaŋɗe, nda a̰me ge tol ta go maa na̰ van ge ho fareba ma ne, àa ɓyare go àa daa mà vin̰a ne bḛḛ. Nda mbe ma wuwa ta ya i buwal zì ge nda ge hale sok ma go, ndwa ndilla go sok ge i ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Zeso Krist go day no, i gaa kaɗ suli pe gyana de. Àa ɓyare go i seŋe dinna ge moor ma go, sok gwan i pagal ge eeya ge Yahuɗ ma way ma pe se.
48002005	Ɗaŋɗe, i be vin num fare a̰me ge i sḛ zì go fyalag to, ge dape, i be ɓyare go num ɗuuli Fare ge Kwaɗa ge fareba pagal se to, ndwa go ḛ wa za̰a̰ ne ge ne no mbe go.
48002006	Kaɗɗa ge ga̰a̰l ge no ɓase ge Krist ne ma pagal ma ɗe, àa be seɗ fare a̰me ge janna ge ɗogle ge fare ge mbi oy ne no pagal to. Ge mojo̰o̰ nda jan no go ɗe, kaɗɗa go nda kuwa go num ga̰a̰l ma ne koo num ga̰a̰l ma ne to puy ɗe, a be mbi fare ne to, ge dape, vareya a̰me ge Dok ta to.
48002007	Ga̰a̰l mbe ma gwan seɗ vare zoo go, ne Dok ho̰ mbi tèmel ge oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ne, ge nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma ta ne me no, ne ho̰ Piyer oy Fare mbe ge Yahuɗ ma ta no me.
48002008	Ago, Dok seŋe mbi ya ndu ge temeya ge nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma pe, dinna ge na seŋe Piyer ge Yahuɗ ma pe go me.
48002009	Jak, Kefas mage Yohana, ga̰a̰l ge no ɓase ge Krist ne ma pagal, ge nda kuwa num ma ne. Sok ge àa see go Dok ho̰ mbi tèmel ge ndele mbe ne, àa wa̰a̰ i ge Barnabas tok ge maa tok pul zì no ndwa ngayya go, i ge num ɓanna wa dagre ɗu ge tèmel mbe zì keeya. A go mbe no, i ge num za̰a̰ ta no go, i gaa mbo oy fare ge nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma buwal zì me no, num sḛ ma ge Yahuɗ ma buwal zì me.
48002010	Àa kaɗe i ɗeŋew go, i ka dwaɗ ge nda ge hoɗegeya ma. A kaŋ ge mbi ho̰ tene kee nee ne.
48002011	Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge Kefas mbo ya keeya swag ge suwal Antiyoch ge no suwa ge Siri ne go diŋ, mbi jin̰a ne fare ne wa zì waŋ, ge nda ge ho fareba ma ndwa go peɗ, ge fare wa̰a̰ ne pe.
48002012	Ago, zḛḛ ge go Jak ka̰a̰m ge tèmel a̰me ma mbo ya ɗe, Kefas ka zam kaŋ ge nda ge ho fareba ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma. Guwa̰ ge àa mbo ya go ɗe, ɗege ka ɔwabe tene gezi ge num ge ho fareba ma ta no, ge dape, ka chiya Yahuɗ ge ho fareba ma voo. Yahuɗ mbe ma mḛḛ maa ko go, àa vin̰a nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ge ho fareba ma bḛḛ mbḛḛ.
48002013	Yahuɗ gegene ge ho fareba ma ɗege kee fare a̰me ge wa̰a̰ ndwa keeya to ma dinna ge fare ge Kefas kê ne go. Barnabas sḛ puy, mbo ya waɗ tene ge num ndwa mbuɗiya mbe zì me.
48002014	Sok ge mbi kuwa go num mbo go temel ge Fare ge Kwaɗa ge fareba ne pagal to, mbi jin̰a Kefas ge num mbe ma ndwa go peɗ no go: Mo sḛ Yahuɗ ne, mo gwan kee fare ge ndu ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to go, be ge mojo̰o̰ Yahuɗ sḛ to go de? Kee pe gyana mo wa ɓyare ee nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma ge pool kee fare ma ge Yahuɗ ma kee go de?
48002015	A tem go nè Yahuɗ van suwal ma ne, be rusu ge ɗogle ge kee Dok to ma.
48002016	Go no puy, nè kuwa kuwa go àa ndil ndu duwana ndu ge temel ge Dok ndwa se ge ne hoɗ fareba Zeso Krist ta pe, be ge ne mbo ge eeya ge Moyiz ne ma pagal pe to. Nè sḛ ma waɗme, nè ho fareba ge Zeso Krist ta ndwa go àa ndi nè nda ge temel ma ge Dok ndwa se ge hoɗ fareba mbe ta, be ge nè mbo ge eeya mbe pagal pe to. Ago àa mbo ndil ndu a̰me ɗu temel ge Dok ndwa se sok mboya ge eeya ma pagal to.
48002017	Nè ɗe, nè ɓyare àa ndi nè temel ge Dok ndwa se ge ɓanna ge nè ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Krist pe. Ɗaŋɗe, mà kaɗɗa àa seɗ-ɗa go nè nda ge kee sone ma ne dinna ge num ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma go no, ngay go, Krist ee nda ne kee sone ɗaŋ de? Kaɗ go to!
48002018	Kaɗ vare zoo go, ndu mà n̰a eeya ma ya gezi peɗ, seŋe ya gwanna num pagal leɗ no, daa ɓyare ngay go, na ndu ge mbo eeya ma pagal to ne kade.
48002019	Kaɗɗa ge mbi ɗe, mbi suu suu ge fare ge eeya ma way pagal, ndwa go mbi gaa kàɗɗa ge Dok pe.
48002020	Ago, àa pee mbi dagre ge Krist ge ɔwara kaŋre ta digi. Mbi kaa ge ndwa ge mbi pagal to, ɗaŋɗe, a Krist ee mbi ne kaɗ ge ndwa. Kàɗɗa ge mbi ge sḛ duul go ge, ge sego no, mbi deŋe tene ge Dok Van ta. Ne ge laa wa̰a̰ mbi, ho̰ na ndwa gezi ge mbi pe no.
48002021	Mbi dol kwaɗa keeya ge Dok ngay ne ge nda duwana ma ta gezi to baɗ. Ago, kaɗɗa ndu seŋe temel ge Dok ndwa se ge eeya ge Moyiz ne ma ta ɗe, ngay go, Krist swày be fare a̰me pe ne to.
48003001	Yii! Nda ge Galaɗ ma, ḛ daa ba̰a̰ ḛ pagal gyana, ndu ma vuuɗi ḛ pagal vuuɗi de? Daa go to ɗe, mbi daa wan ḛ fare ge Zeso Krist swày ne ge see ɔwara kaŋre ta digi pe ya gezi kɔn̰al ba!
48003002	Mbi ɓyare go ḛ guwa̰ mbi fare janna ge fare ge mbi ele ḛ ne no pagal gale: Ḛ see On̰om ge Harcal ge ḛ mbo no eeya ge Moyiz ne ma pagal pe koo ge ḛ za̰a̰ Fare ge Kwaɗa pe ɗoo, ḛ ho fareba ne ta no de?
48003003	Ḛ daa ba̰a̰ ḛ pagal go gyana de? Sok ge ḛ see ndwa ge jin̰al pe eeya go ɗe, ḛ ka isi ge On̰om ge Dok ne pagal ba, ge sego no, ḛ ɓyare gaa isi ge ta pagal mbo deɗ wa ya kade?
48003004	Fare ge ḛ kuwa num mbe ma ya no nde-nde peɗ ɗe, ḛ dwaɗ go num bàŋ kay de? Mbi ge kuwaya tyatyaɗ go num kaɗ bàŋ kay to!
48003005	Ḛ za̰a̰ gale! Sok ge Dok hon ḛ na On̰om, gwan ka kee kaŋ ajab ma ge ḛ buwal zì no, kee num ge ḛ mbo ge eeya ge Moyiz ne ma pagal pe koo ge ḛ za̰a̰ Fare ge Kwaɗa pe ɗoo, ḛ ho fareba na ta no pe de?
48003006	Fare ge no Njaŋeya ge Dok ne zì ge Abraham pe, ḛ duwa ge ne pagal gale, jan go: «Abraham ho fareba ge Dok ta, ge ano mbe no pe, Dok ndi ne no ge ndu ge temel go ge na ndwa se.»
48003007	Ḛ kaa ge ne kuwaya gezi kɔn̰al go, num ge ho fareba ma, àa gaa Abraham rusu ge fareba ma ne.
48003008	Go no iya, jin̰a ge zḛḛ ya ge Njaŋeya ge Dok ne zì go, Dok mbo ndil nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma ge nda ge temel ma go ge na ndwa se ge hoɗ fareba ta. A ge pe, Dok jin̰a Abraham Fare ge Kwaɗa mbe no go: «Mbi mbo kee rusu ge suwa pagal ma peɗ wa tare ge mo ta.»
48003009	Go mbe no, dinna ge Dok kê Abraham wa tare ge ne ho fareba na ta pe go ɗe, kee num ge ho fareba na ta ma wa tare mbe go waɗme.
48003010	Kaɗɗa ge num ge ee no maa ndwa zḛḛ go, maa mbo seɗ benna Dok ndwa se ge maa mbo eeya ge Moyiz ne ma pagal pe ma ɗe, num kaa ge ne kuwaya go wa vḛḛneya ge Dok ne ge maa pagal. Ago Njaŋeya ge Dok ne jan zum waŋ go: «Ndu ge mbo ɗaɗag ge eeya ge Moyiz ne ma pagal peɗ to ɗe, wa vḛḛneya ge Dok ne ge ne pagal.»
48003011	Nè kuwa kuwa go, àa ndil ndu temel ge Dok ndwa se ge ne mbo eeya ma pagal pe to, ge dape, Njaŋeya ge Dok ne jan go: «Ndu ge Dok ndil ne na ndwa se temel seɗ ndwa ge hoɗ fareba ge na ne ta.»
48003012	Zane no, mboya ge eeya ma pagal mage hoɗ fareba fare ɓan ge ta wa go to. Ɗaŋɗe, dinna ge fare ge no Njaŋeya ge Dok ne zì jan go ɗe: «Ndu ge mbo no eeya ma pagal mɔɗwag, mbo kaɗ ge ndwa ge num ta.»
48003013	Ɗaŋɗe, Krist hee dṵṵl ge wa vḛḛneya ge eeya ma way ge kaa nè pagal ya ge nè byalam go, haɗ nè ya suli. Ago, Njaŋeya ge Dok ne jan zum waŋ go: «Ndu ge àa hun ne pella ge ɔwara kaŋre ta digi, wa vḛḛneya ge Dok ne ge ne pagal.»
48003014	Ano mbe kee ndwa go wa tare ge Dok kê Abraham wa tii ge ne pe dee ya ge nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma ta go, ge Zeso Krist ta. Go mbe no, ge hoɗ fareba ta, vin̰a hageya nè pagal peɗ ndwa go nè see On̰om ge Harcal ge Dok kê wa tii ge ne pe.
48003015	Mbi na̰ van ma, mbi wa̰a̰ ḛ fare a̰me no ɗu, ge nda kee num no go dwam ma zì mɔɗwag gale. Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me n̰a na wa swày ya ge vin̰a ge na mbiya n̰a ne go tem, ndu a̰me daa gwan eya fare mbe to me no, kan fare a̰me ya ge ne pagal to me.
48003016	Zane no, Dok kê wa tii ma ge Abraham mage na rusu pe. Njaŋeya ge Dok ne be jan go: «Ne ge ne rusu ma pe peɗ to», ɗaŋɗe, jin̰a go: «Ne ge ndu ɗu ge ne rusu zige pe», ndwa go Krist.
48003017	Fare ge mbi ɓyare janna no: Dok vuwa wa tii a̰me ɗu ge Abraham pe, kê wa tii ne pagal no go na mbo koy ne. Guwa̰ del kikis ndà ge ziya tapool ɗu, Dok ho̰ Yahuɗ ma eeya ma no. Ɗaŋɗe, eeya mbe ma mbyaɗ gul wa tii ge vuwa mbe to me no, gul wa tii ge kê mbe to me.
48003018	Ago, kaɗɗa Dok kee ndu wa tare ge ne mbo eeya ma pagal pe ɗe, ago daa be ge wa tii pe to. Zane no, Dok ngay kwaɗa keeya ge na ne ge Abraham ta ge na kê ne wa tii pe.
48003019	Kaɗɗa na mbe go no, Dok gwan hon Moyiz eeya ma ge ma̰ fare pe de? Ho̰ ne num ndwa ngay ndu ne n̰aal ge ne kee ne na ndwa se pe, ne ka mbo num pagal pe digi gale ɗiŋ ge go Krist, rusu mbe ge na kê Abraham wa tii ge ne pe dee ya. Eeya mbe ma, Malayka ma ho̰ num ne, ge ndu ge vin̰a ta.
48003020	Zane no, nda ɓyare ndu ge vin̰a go, vaaya popolow ma go. Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge Dok kê Abraham wa tii ɗe, kê ne be ndu ge maa buwal zì.
48003021	Fare mbe no ɓyare jan gyana de? A ndwa go eeya mage Dok wa tii ge kee num ma gage ta gage de? Àa gage ta to baɗ! Daa no go eeya a̰me ɗu ge Dok ho̰ ne mbyaɗ hon nda duwana ma ndwa hon fareba ɗe, go no me ɗe, nda duwana ma daa mà haɗ temel ge Dok ndwa se ge ne ta.
48003022	Ɗaŋɗe, Njaŋeya ge Dok ne jan go, sone keeya ee nda duwana ma ya ge ɓul mɔɗwag gaa bulmiya ge na tok go. Ano mbe ndwa go, bobo ge Dok kê wa tii hon nda ge ho fareba ma ne, num see ne ge maa hoɗ fareba Zeso Krist ta pe.
48003023	Zḛḛ ge go vin̰a hoɗ fareba Zeso Krist ta hage ge nda duwana ma pagal ɗe, eeya ma koy nè peɗ dibiya zì ge daŋay ma go, ɗiŋ ge go Dok tin̰a vin̰a hoɗ fareba mbe ne ge nè pagal mbḛḛ.
48003024	Go mbe no, eeya ma kaa dinna ge ndu ge koy nda go. Àa ka ngay nè vin̰a ne ɗiŋ deɗ-ɗa ge Krist ta, ndwa go Dok ndi nè temel na ndwa se ge hoɗ fareba mbe ta.
48003025	Ge sego, ajo̰o̰ vin̰a tyan-na nè pagal ge hoɗ fareba Krist ta pe ɗe, eeya ma daa ngay nè vin̰a ne to baɗ.
48003026	Ge sego ge ḛ hoɗ fareba ya Zeso Krist ta no ɗe, ḛ seŋe ya peɗ van ge Dok ne ma.
48003027	Ago, ḛ peɗ ge ɓanna ge ḛ ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Krist pe ge baptem keeya go ma, ḛ seŋe ya dinna ge ne sḛ go.
48003028	Mo kaa Yahuɗ koo mo kaa van Grek, mo kaa moor koo ndu ge gaa ya suli, mo kaa ndu son koo ndu gwale, vareya a̰me daa gaa to. Ago ḛ peɗ ḛ seŋe ya ɗu sok ɓanna dagre ge Zeso Krist go.
48003029	Kaɗɗa go ḛ ge Krist ne ma ne, a ndwa go ḛ seŋe Abraham rusu ma waɗme. Go mbe no, ḛ mbo seɗ kaŋ kwaɗa ge Dok kee wa tii ge num pe ma.
48004001	Fare ge mbi ɓyare gwan janna no: Van ge ne ba kee wa tii go na mbo hon ne na kaŋ kwaɗa ma, kaɗɗa go ne ndwa gale be siiri to, koo ano ba ge kaŋ mbe ma way no peɗ puy ɗe, ne kàɗɗa ge mojo̰o̰ moor go.
48004002	Ge ne ndwa siiriya to mbe zì, nda ge gaa koy ne mage koy ne kaŋ mbe ma, gaa kee ne kaŋ ma ne ɗiŋ deɗ-ɗa ge ne ba sok ge ee ge ne pe go tem.
48004003	Nè sḛ ma waɗme, sok ge nè kaa dinna ca ge nda ge ndwa siiriya to mbe ma go ɗe, on̰om ge wa̰a̰ dunin̰a maa tok go ma ka ee nè kee maa moor.
48004004	Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge Dok ee ne mbe mbiya go, teme na Van ya ge dunin̰a zì no. Seŋe tolla ge ndu gwale zì no ge Yahuɗ ma buwal zì, ka mboya ge num eeya ma pagal no me.
48004005	Mbô ya ndwa zuu num ge eeya ge Moyiz ne pool kaa num pagal ma ndwa gaa suli. Go mbe no, ee nè ya seŋe Dok van ma me.
48004006	Ndwa ngayya go ḛ na van ma sḛ ne ɗe, Dok teme On̰om ge na Van ne ya ge nè dul wa ma zì no peɗ, ne ge ee nè no tol Dok go: Abba! Ndwa go mbi Ba.
48004007	Go mbe no, ḛ daa be moor ma ne to, ḛ gaa vare zoo Dok van ma. Ajo̰o̰ ḛ gaa ya ne van ma ɗe, mbo hon ḛ kaŋ kwaɗa ge na kê wa tii ndwa hon na van ma num ma peɗ me.
48004008	Dee wal, sok ge ḛ gale wa ya be kuwa Dok to ɗe, ḛ ka kee tèmel ge moor ma go hon on̰om a̰me ma ge no dok ge fare a̰me pe to ma peɗ.
48004009	Ɗaŋɗe ge sego, ḛ kuwa ne ya kwaɗa, mbi ɓyare jan vare zoo go, Dok sḛ kuwa ḛ ne koo Dok ngay go, na kuwa ḛ kuwa. Kaɗɗa na mbe go no, kee pe gyana ḛ wa gwan seŋe ta ge on̰om ge wa̰a̰ dunin̰a maa tok go mbe ge lase nda ma, ge no be pool a̰me mage fare a̰me pe to peɗ ma pe yà de? Ge dape, ḛ wa gwan ɓyare kee num moor iya de?
48004010	Ḛ koy hon ga̰a̰l dwam a̰me ma, saba a̰me ma, ko pul a̰me mage del a̰me ma ɗag!
48004011	Mbi ge njeel wa go tèmel ge mbi ho̰ tene kee num ge ḛ pe ma jaɗ boo no kade!
48004012	Na̰ van ma, mbi kaɗe ḛ kaɗe ge aa tene go, ḛ daa mbo ge eeya ma pagal to ge mbi go, ajo̰o̰ mbi seŋe ya dinna ge ḛ sḛ ma go me. Ḛ fare keeya ma be za̰a̰ mbi yal to dee wal.
48004013	Ḛ kuwa kuwa go, mbi see vin̰a wal cecew ge oy ḛ Fare ge Kwaɗa ge mbi duul kaa tuguɗi go.
48004014	Yal ge gḛḛ ge mbi ka za̰a̰ ne ge sḛ duul go, kaa kugiya ne ge ḛ ta. Go no puy, ḛ be sen mbi koo ɔwabe ta gezi ge mbi ta to. Ḛ gwan ame mbi vare zoo ge mojo̰o̰ ḛ daa mà ame malayka ge Dok ne a̰me ya koo ge ḛ daa mà ame Zeso Krist sḛ ya go.
48004015	Ḛ kàɗɗa ge fafan̰ ge dee wal be diya de? A ma̰ fare gwan seɗ ḛ ne de? Mbi ge pool kee sayda mbe no ge ḛ pe go, daa no go a̰me ge ḛ mbiya kee ne ge mbi pe go ɗe, koo ne kaa go ḛ zagle ḛ ndwa ma hon mbi num puy, ḛ daa mà kee ne.
48004016	A ge mbi jin̰a ḛ fare ge fareba pe ɗoo, ḛ gaa ya ndil mbi ge sego ge ḛ ndu ge ho̰o̰l no go de?
48004017	Kaɗɗa ge num ge ɓyare ɗuuli Fare ge Kwaɗa pagal se ma ɗe, àa ɓyare vin̰a ɓyareya ge aa ta ndwa chal ḛ ya maa ta zì. Ɗaŋɗe, dwaɗɗa ge num way mbe ma be dwaɗɗa ge kwaɗa to ma ne. Fare ge àa ɓyare ne ge aa ta, ne ga̰a̰l ɗeŋew go nè buwal va se, ḛ ge num wa gaa san digi.
48004018	Sok ge ḛ ɓyare chal ndu ya ge ḛ ta zì ge dwaɗɗa ge kwaɗa ɗe, a kaŋ ge kwaɗa ne. Ɓyare go ḛ ka kee ne ɗaɗag, be ge mbi kaɗ ge ḛ buwal zì go ɗeŋew to.
48004019	Mbi van ma, mbi za̰a̰ go yal ge ḛ pe dinna ge ndu gwale ge kee twàl go ɗiŋ ge go, ḛ seŋe nda ge kàre Krist ko pul ge fareba ma.
48004020	Mbi ge ene gḛḛ ge kuwa ḛ ndwa ge sego, ndwa go mbi wa kuwa fare ge jan ḛ ge mbi wa zì ne, ge dape, fare ge janna ma tane mbi go tane.
48004021	Ḛ ge ɓyare no go ḛ mbo ngangaɗ ge Eeya ge Moyiz ne ma pagal ma ɗe, ḛ jin̰a mbi gale, ḛ wan kaŋ ge njaŋe no Eeya mbe ma zì pe wan ɓade?
48004022	Ḛ za̰a̰ fare a̰me ge njaŋe num zì no ɗu gale: Abraham too van ma zi, ɗu ge na moor kale ge àa ka tol ne Hagar, ɗu ge Sara, na gwale ga̰a̰l.
48004023	Ne moor kale van ge too ne kaa ge dwaɗɗa ge nda duwana ma way pagal. Ɗaŋɗe, van ge ne gwale ga̰a̰l too ne, dee ya ge wa tii ge Dok kê Abraham ne pagal tem.
48004024	Fare ge Abraham van ge zi ma way pe wanna ɗugul: Gwale ge zi mbe ma fare ge mojo̰o̰ wa tii ge vuwa ma ne zi go. Hagar ge Abraham kale fare ngay wa tii ge Dok vuwa ne ge njal Sinay pagal digi. Van ge tol ge wa tii mbe zì ma moor ma ne waɗme.
48004025	Hagar ge njal Sinay ge no suwa Arabi go go. Gwan kaɗ ge suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem ge màno go. Nda ge suwal mbe diŋ-ge ma peɗ ge moor keeya zì.
48004026	Ɗaŋɗe, Jerusalem ge no pḭḭ ma zì yà dinna ge gwale ga̰a̰l go, a nè na̰ ne.
48004027	Ago Njaŋeya ge Dok ne jan zum waŋ go: «Ḛ nda zaab ge ba̰a̰ gisil mage gale kuwa yal ge twàl ne dwam ɗu to ma! Ḛ ke laa saal, ḛ iya sṵṵri digi me. Ago gwale ge ne obe n̰a ne, mbo seɗ van ma gḛḛ waɗe gwale ge kaa no go ge na obe.»
48004028	Kaɗɗa ge ḛ, mbi na̰ van ma, ḛ van ge too ya se ma ne ge wa tii ge Dok kê ne pagal tem dinna ge Isak go.
48004029	Ɗaŋɗe, dee wal, Abraham van ge too ne ge na kale ge dwaɗɗa ge nda duwana ma way pagal, ka njon̰ van gegene ge too ge wa tii ge On̰om ge Dok ne pagal njon̰. Màno puy, kee mbe go ɗaɗag waɗme.
48004030	Ɗaŋɗe, Njaŋeya ge Dok ne gwan jan gyana de? «Yin̰a mo kale mage na van, ago gwale ga̰a̰l van mbo ame kaŋ ge na ba kee wa tii ge num pe ma ne peɗ, be van son ge moor kale mbe ne to.»
48004031	Go mbe no, na̰ van ma, nè be van ge moor kale mbe ne ma ne to, ɗaŋɗe, ge gwale ga̰a̰l ne ma.
48005001	Krist haɗ nè ya suli ndwa go nè daa gwan kaɗ moor keeya a̰me zì ɗu to baɗ. Go mbe no, ḛ wa̰a̰ ta mḛḛya ndiŋ, ḛ daa vḭḭ go ndu a̰me guwa̰ ge ḛ ya moor keeya a̰me zì iya to.
48005002	Ḛ ee ḛ tɔgwa za̰a̰ fare ge mbi Pol jan ḛ ne no kwaɗa: Kaɗɗa ḛ ɓyare waɗ ta ge bḛḛ vyanna zì, a ndwa go Krist kaŋ ge kê ge ḛ pe mbo mbaa ḛ go fyalag to kade.
48005003	Mbi gwan jan go iya, ndu ge na̰ tene ya go àa vin̰a na bḛḛ, mbiya go ne gaa mboya ge eeya ma pagal ge ɓul mɔɗwag.
48005004	Ḛ a̰me ma ge dwaɗ go Dok ndil ḛ temel na ndwa se ge ḛ mbo eeya ma pagal pe ɗe, ḛ vaa vaa ge Krist, ḛ ban ta ya ge kwaɗa keeya ge Dok ne ta.
48005005	Kaɗɗa ge i ge ho fareba ma ɗe, i ee i jobreya go Dok mbo haɗ i temel ge na ndwa se. On̰om ge Harcal ee i ne seɗ pool ge wan ta da̰a̰reya ndiŋ.
48005006	Ago, ndu ge ɓa̰a̰ no dagre ge Zeso Krist, koo ne vin̰a bḛḛ koo ne vin̰a bḛḛ to, mbaa fare a̰me to. Kaŋ ge mbaa fare a go nè ho fareba ge ne ta. A hoɗ fareba mbe ee nè ne ngay laa wanna ge nda ta.
48005007	Dee wal, ḛ ka mbo mboya ge kwaɗa! A huɗi gwan tele ḛ vin̰a ne daa be gwan ḛ pagal ge fare ge fareba ge Dok ne pe se de?
48005008	Fare mbe no be mbo ge Dok ge too ḛ ya ta to.
48005009	Nda ee fare janna go go: « Jìn̰al hore hoɗege guwa ge swam waɗɗa ndwa zì ee ne ɗegeya digi ge ɓul mɔɗwag».
48005010	Ge fare mbe no pagal ɗe, Bagezok ee mbi ya kaɗ ge kuwaya tyatyaɗ ge ḛ pe go, ḛ dwaɗɗa ma mbo kaɗ hini ge mbi dwaɗɗa to. Ɗaŋɗe, ndu mbe ge iigi ḛ no, koo ne kaa huɗi, a ngaɗ go Dok mbo wan ne ge sariya.
48005011	Na̰ van ma, kaɗɗa ge mbi ɗe, daa go sok oy fare go, mbi ka jan nda go num vin̰a bḛḛ no, àa mà gwan ka njon̰ mbi gale su de? Go mbe no, oy swày ge Krist see ne ɔwara kaŋre ta digi, gwan kaɗ daa kaŋ chal ko ge ndu a̰me pe to baɗ me.
48005012	O̰o̰, num mbe ge iigi ḛ no ma ɗe, àa pwaɗ ta dinna ge nda pwaɗ kaŋ kogor ma go to gyana de?
48005013	Na̰ van ma, Dok too ḛ ya go ḛ gaa suli. Ɗeŋew go suli ge ḛ mbe seŋe fare a̰me ge ɗogle ge wa gaa ee ḛ kee fare ma ge sḛ duul ge ḛ ḛ ma pagal to. Ɓyare vare zoo go, ḛ ka ngay laa wanna ge ta buwal zì, sok ka gwan ḛ pagal se kee ta tèmel ma ge ta buwal zì go.
48005014	Ago eeya ge pe hini-hini ge Moyiz ho̰ num ma mɔɗwag, num wa huy ge wa yuwaleya ge ɗu mbe no pagal go: «Ɓyare go mo laa wa̰a̰ mo kon dinna ge mo laa wa̰a̰ tene go.»
48005015	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ḛ kee fare dinna ge kavaar ma swarbe ta ta go, àa ka nun ta mage ka gan ta se babasag, kee ya kwaɗa to ɗe, ḛ mbo vḛḛne ta se kakasag.
48005016	Fare ge mbi ɓyare janna no: Ḛ n̰a On̰om ge Harcal vin̰a ge ɗeme ḛ ge kàɗɗa ge ḛ ḛ ma zì. Ḛ kee ya go mbe ɗe, ḛ mbo daa kee fare ma ge sḛ duul go to baɗ.
48005017	Ago kaŋ ge nè kee num ge sḛ duul go ma ɓan ge kaŋ ge On̰om ge Harcal ɓyare num ma to. Go no me ɗe, ge On̰om ne ma ɓan ge kaŋ ge kee ge sḛ duul pagal ma to me. Kaŋ ge zi mbe ma gage ta gageya ge go kaŋ ge ḛ ɓyare kee ne, ḛ daa gwan kee ne to.
48005018	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa go On̰om ge Harcal ɗeme ḛ ne ɗe, eeya ma daa be pool a̰me ge ḛ pagal.
48005019	Kaŋ ge nda kee num ge sḛ duul go ma, àa gwaɗeya kɔn̰al go waŋ: A foɗom keeya ma, kaŋ keeya ge haɗ ta seŋre ma, fii ge ta batraŋ ma,
48005020	siim keeya ma, mbole keeya ma, ɓyare ta to ma, gool keeya ma, yil keeya ma, laa ol ma, kone ta ma, caɗe ta ma, vaa ta se popolow ma,
48005021	aham ma, fere jìn̰al mage kee kaŋ ge batraŋ ma, kaŋ keeya ge ɗogle ge dḭḭ ano mbe ma no pe ma me. Ge sego mbi ndiri ḛ tɔgwa num pagal dinna ge mbi jan ne ja go: Nda ge bulmi no ge kaŋ keeya ge go mbe ma zì ma mbo kuwa muluk ge Dok ne ndwa to baɗ.
48005022	Ɗaŋɗe, dinna ge ɔwara tol ndwa go ɗe, On̰om ge Harcal kaŋ ge ee nda kee num ma no: Laa wanna, laa saal, kaɗ halas, wan ta kàɗɗa cɔgwaɗ, kwaɗa keeya, wuy keeya, n̰a wa to,
48005023	kàɗɗa suul, wan ta. Eeya a̰me ge wan nda ge kee kaŋ ge go mbe ma no ge fare to.
48005024	Zeso Krist nda ma kuri ene sḛ duul ge ol bibiliw ge sone mbe ma ya gezi ge maa ta, a ge mojo̰o̰ maa pee num pel ge ɔwara kaŋre ta go.
48005025	Ajo̰o̰ On̰om ge Harcal ee nè ya seɗ ndwa ge fareba ɗe, ɓyare go nè n̰a ne vin̰a ge ɗeme nè ge kàɗɗa ge nè ne ma zì waɗme.
48005026	Ne kaa ge nè jegre to, ɓyare go, ge nè buwal zì, nè tuwa̰se ta mage kee ta yil to.
48006001	Na̰ van ma, kaɗɗa ndu a̰me ɗu ge no ḛ buwal zì seɗ-ɗa go na ge sone zì, ḛ ge On̰om ge Harcal ɗeme ḛ no ma, ɓyare go ḛ ke ne ge on̰om ge suul ndwa gwan ge ne ya ge ko pul ge kwaɗa go. Mo ndu mbe ge mbaa ne ɗe, ɓyare go mo koy tene kwaɗa ge gwan deɗ ge pe heeya zì to.
48006002	Ḛ ka mbaa ta sok in ta dṵṵl ma go. Kaɗɗa ḛ kee mbe go ɗe, ngay go ḛ mbo ge eeya ge Krist ne ma pagal.
48006003	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me ndil tene ciciliŋ, dasene no ne fare a̰me pe to peɗ, lase na pagal boo.
48006004	N̰a ndu ge diige hale kàɗɗa ge na ne kwaɗa. Kaɗɗa na seɗ fare a̰me ge kee na laa saal ya, ne ke ne ge na sḛ pe, be ndil ge ndu a̰me ne to.
48006005	Ago, ndu ge diige mbo mḛḛ ne ge na fare wa go.
48006006	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me hate ḛ fare ge Dok ne go, a kwaɗa go ḛ ge num vaa ta kaŋ ge ḛ no ge num ma dagre.
48006007	Ḛ lase ḛ pagal to, ndu a̰me ge lasage Dok to. Kaŋ rusu ge ndu zare ne, a ngaɗ go mbo syaɗ ne.
48006008	Ago kaŋ keeya ge ndu duwana ne ge mojo̰o̰ ndu dol swa gaaso zì go. Kaɗɗa kaŋ keeya ge ne ne ma ge sḛ duul pagal, ne siyal mbo kaɗ swày. Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa na kee num ge On̰om pagal, ne siyal mbo kaɗ ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din.
48006009	Ge ano mbe no pe, nè ka̰a̰ ta se to sok kee kwaɗa go. Ago kaɗɗa nè kan ta ya se to, dwam a̰me ge kwaɗa mbo mboya ge nè wa syaɗ siyal.
48006010	Go mbe no, sok gale no waɗ, nè ke kwaɗa ge nda ta peɗ. Ge waɗe, nè ke ne ge nè na̰ van ge ho fareba ma ta.
48006011	Kaŋ mbe ge ḛ kuwa num njaŋeya ga̰a̰l ɓortoɗ lawayta mbe zì ma no, a mbi sḛ njaŋe ḛ num ne ge mbi tok zì.
48006012	Num mbe ge hoɗ ḛ wa go ḛ daa vin̰a bḛḛ mbḛḛ ma, àa ɓyare kee ta go nda kuwa maa ge dwaɗɗa ge nda duwana ma way pagal. Àa ɓyare go ndu njon̰ maa ge swày ge Krist se ne ɔwara kaŋre ta digi pe to.
48006013	Koo num mbe ge vin̰a bḛḛ ma, àa ɓyare mbo ge wa hoɗɗa ge eeya ma way ma pagal to peɗ. Àa ɓyare no go ḛ vin̰a bḛḛ ɗe, a ndwa go maa wa ka uware ta ge maa ee ḛ ya vinna vyan bḛḛ pe.
48006014	Kaɗɗa ge mbi, mbi sḛ kee tii ɗeŋew ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist swày ge see ne ɔwara kaŋre ta digi pe. Mbi sḛ waɗme, mbi suu suu pella kaŋre ta digi ge dunin̰a ta, dunin̰a sḛ puy, suu suu pella kaŋre ta digi ge mbi ta me.
48006015	Koo ndu a̰me vin̰a bḛḛ koo ne vin̰a bḛḛ to, mbaa fare a̰me to! Ɗaŋɗe, kaŋ ge mbaa fare, a kaɗ ndu ge Dok doo ne jin̰al.
48006016	N̰a halas mage kuwa a̰se ge Dok ne kaa ge num ge mbo hateya mbe ma no pagal ma ta peɗ, ge ɓase ge Dok ne ge fareba ma ta peɗ me.
48006017	A gaa mbo zḛḛ no, n̰a go ndu a̰me daa gwan iigi mbi to. Ago jwaŋ pyalaŋ ge no mbi duul ta ma, ngay yal ge mbi see num ma ge mbi no ndu ge Krist ne pe.
48006018	Na̰ van ma! Mbi kaɗeya go, nè Bagezok Zeso Krist ngay kwaɗa keeya ge na ne ge ḛ ta peɗ! Amin !
49001001	A mbi Pol, ndu ge Dok taa ne ge na laa ɓyareya pagal, ndwa go, mbi kaa ndu ge temeya ge Zeso Krist ne. Mbi njaŋe lawayta mbe no ne, hon ḛ nda ge ho fareba ge no suwal ga̰a̰l Efez diŋ ma, nda ge n̰a wa to ma, ge ɓanna ge ḛ ɓa̰a̰ dagre no ge Zeso Krist pe.
49001002	N̰a Dok ge nè Ba mage nè Bagezok Zeso Krist ngay kwaɗa keeya ge maa way ḛ ta, num ee ḛ kaɗ halas ge ta me.
49001003	Nè uware Dok ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist Ba! Ago ge ɓanna ge nè ɓa̰a̰ dagre no ge Krist pe, kê nè wa tare no, sok hon nè kaŋ kwaɗa ge On̰om ne ge diige pe peɗ, ge no pḭḭ zì yà ma.
49001004	Zḛḛ ge go Dok gale wa ya be dol dunin̰a, taa nè no go nè kaa nda ge na ne ma, ge ɓanna ge nè ɓa̰a̰ dagre no ge Krist pe, nè kaa nda ge harcal ma, nda ge be fare maa pagal ma me, ge na ndwa se. Ajo̰o̰ ne laa wa̰a̰ nè wan,
49001005	vḭḭ tene ge zḛḛ ya day no go, na mbo seŋe nè ge na van ma go, ge Zeso Krist ta. Ano, a kaŋ ge ne laa ɓyare kee nee ne,
49001006	ndwa go nè ngay pateya ge na ne zum, ge kwaɗa keeya ge na ne ge nè ta ge bàŋ hag, ge ɓanna ge nè ɓa̰a̰ dagre no, ge na Van ge laa wanna pe.
49001007	Ajo̰o̰ nè ɓa̰a̰ ɓan ge Krist me ɗe, nè seɗ zuuya ya go ge ne swàm tuwaleya ta, Dok haɗ nè ya suli, sok pore nè ge nè sone ma go. Go mbe no, Dok ngay nè kwaɗa keeya ge na ne ge be walape no.
49001008	Ngay na kwaɗa keeya mbe nè ta gḛḛ nde, sok hon nè andaŋ mage zwam go,
49001009	ndwa go nè dee ya kuwa nuusiya ge na ne ge ɗimil mbe. Nuusiya mbe ge vḭḭ tene kee ne ge dwaɗɗa ge kwaɗa ge zḛḛ ya day, ge na laa ɓyareya pagal, ge Krist ta.
49001010	Nuusiya mbe, Dok ɓyare go ne dee ya keeya ge sok ge na vḭḭ tene ge ne pagal go tem: Ɓan kaŋ dolla ge diige pe peɗ, ge no pḭḭ zì yà mage suwa pagal go ge ma ya digi dagre ɗu, ge ga̰a̰l ge ɗu pe se, ndwa go Krist.
49001011	Ge ɓanna ge nè ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Krist pe, ho̰ nè kaŋ ge ee ge nè pe no, ge dape, Dok taa nè ge zḛḛ ya day go nè kaa nda ge na ne ma. Dee ya kee kaŋ ma peɗ ge na vḭḭ tene kee num mbe go.
49001012	Dok kê ano mbe ndwa go, nè wa ka ngay pateya ge na ne zum, nè mbe ge zḛḛge ma ndwa go rusu Yahuɗ ma, ge nè ee jobreya no ge Krist pagal.
49001013	Ḛ sḛ ma waɗme, Dok seŋe ḛ na nda ma ge dape, sok ge ḛ za̰a̰ fare ge fareba ge ne pe go, ndwa go Fare ge Kwaɗa ge ee ḛ seɗ monna, ḛ ho fareba ge Krist ta no. Go mbe no, sok hon ḛ On̰om ge Harcal ge na dee kê ḛ wa tii ge ne pe go, Dok ee na logom ge ḛ ta.
49001014	On̰om ge Harcal kaŋ ge zḛḛge ne ge nè vaaya ndwa, ge kaŋ ge nè mbo seɗ num Dok ta yà ma ne, sok ge nè mbo seɗ zuuya ge ndwa fafa ya go. Go mbe no, nè ngay pateya ge Dok ne zum waɗme.
49001015	A ge pe no, mbi sḛ waɗme, sok ge mbi za̰a̰ go ḛ wan ta go ge fareba hoɗɗa ge ḛ ho zì ge Bagezok Zeso ta, ge ngayya ge ḛ ngay laa wanna no ge nda ge ho fareba gegene ma ta pe me ɗe,
49001016	mbi ka gwan ge mersi keeya ɗaɗag hon Dok ge ḛ pe, sok ge mbi dwaɗ ḛ mbi kaɗeya ma zì go.
49001017	Mbi kaɗe Dok ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist ne, Ba ge pate pate ta go, ne ho̰ ḛ on̰om ge ee ḛ kaɗ andaŋ mage tyan ḛ ndwa gezi ge na ta, ndwa go ḛ wa kuwa na kwaɗa hetel.
49001018	Mbi kaɗeya iya go, ne tin̰a ḛ pagal ma gezi ndwa go, ḛ wa̰a̰ pe go, tolla ge Dok too ḛ ya, ne ee jobreya ḛ zì. Mbi ɓyare waɗme go ḛ wa̰a̰ kaŋ kwaɗa ge gḛḛ waɗeya ge Dok mbo vaa nda ge ho fareba na ta ma num ya ma pe.
49001019	Mbi ɓyare gwan jan iya go, ḛ kuwa go pool ge ne ne mbe ge mbaa nè ge ho fareba Krist ta ma, ne pool ge waɗe-waɗe ne. Pool mbe, a pool ge ɗu mbe ge Dok ngay ne zum ne mbyaɗɗa tab,
49001020	sok ge ta̰a̰ Krist ge nda ge swày ma buwal zì go, ho̰ ne pool mbe no sok hee ne digi, ee ne kàɗɗa ge na tok matoson pagal ge pḭḭ ma zì yà go.
49001021	Ge sok mbe yà, Krist ge kaŋ ma pagal digi caɗ, kee muluk ge pool ge ɓaŋlaŋ ge malayka ma ge maa ga̰a̰l mage on̰om ge sone ma ge maa ga̰a̰l ma pagal peɗ. Dḭḭl ge ne ne ge tol no, waɗe dḭḭl ge ɗogle ge tol no suwa pagal ma peɗ waɗe, ge zaman ge màno go koo ge zaman ge mbo no ya ma go.
49001022	Dok ee Krist ya kee muluk ge kaŋ mbe ma pagal peɗ, ee ne ya kaɗ ga̰a̰l ge ɓase ge Dok ne ma way no waɗme.
49001023	Ɓase ge Dok ne mbe Krist sḛ duul ne, Krist ge ne zì ge ɓul mɔɗwag, ne ge Dok no ne zì ge ɓul mɔɗwag me.
49002001	Dee wal, ḛ kaa dinna ge nda ge suu suu ma go ge Dok ndwa se, ge n̰aal mage sone ge ḛ kee ma pe.
49002002	Ge zaman mbe ma yà, ḛ ka mbo mboya ge sone dinna ge nda ge dunin̰a mbe no zì ma go, ḛ ka gwan ḛ pagal ge ga̰a̰l ge on̰om ge sone ma way ge no ge pool ge sa̰a̰m digi pe se, on̰om mbe ge kee tèmel no ge sego, ge nda ge za̰a̰ Dok wa to ma zì.
49002003	A fareba go, nè sḛ ma peɗ, nè ka kee fare ma ge num sḛ ma ka keeya go waɗme, nè ka mbo dee wal ge ene ge nè nda duwana ma way ma pagal, nè ka kee fare ma ge laa ɓyareya ge sḛ duul ne mage nè dwaɗɗa ma way ma pagal me. Go mbe no, ajo̰o̰ nè nda duwana ma ne ge mojo̰o̰ nè too ya mbe go, a ngaɗ go nè mbo ɓuu ge sariya kunna ge Dok ne zì to, ge nda gegene ma go waɗme.
49002004	Ɗaŋɗe, kuwa a̰se ge Dok ne gḛḛ nè ta, ge ne laa wanna ge gḛḛ ge nè ta pe ɗe,
49002005	sok ge nè gale wa ya ge mojo̰o̰ nda ge suu suu ma go, ge n̰aal ge nè kê num ma pe, Dok ee nè ja gwan kaɗ ge ndwa ɓanna dagre ge Krist. A ge kwaɗa keeya ge Dok ne pe, ḛ see monna no.
49002006	Ge ɓanna ge nè ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Zeso Krist pe, Dok tan nè ya digi ge swày se, ee nè ya kaɗ dagre ge ne, ge pḭḭ ma zì yà.
49002007	Ge kwaɗa ge ngay ne nè ta ge ɓanna ge nè ɓa̰a̰ ge Zeso Krist pe, ɓyare ngay nda ge zaman ge mbo no ya ma go peɗ go, kwaɗa keeya ge na ne mbe be walape.
49002008	A fareba go, a ge kwaɗa keeya ge Dok ne mbe ta, ḛ see monna no, ge vin̰a hoɗ fareba ta. Ano mbe be mbo ge ḛ ta to, Dok ho̰ ḛ ne boo hag.
49002009	A be ge kaŋ keeya ge ḛ ḛ ge kwaɗa ma pe, ge go wa ee ndu jegreya to.
49002010	Ago, a ge Dok ta, nè seŋe ya màno kaŋ dolla ge ne ne ma, ge ɓanna ge ɓa̰a̰ nè dagre ge Zeso Krist pe, ndwa go nè gaa kee kaŋ keeya ge kwaɗa ma, ge ne sḛ Dok nuusi num ge zḛḛ ya day ma ge nè pe go, nè wa kee num.
49002011	Ge ano mbe no pe, ḛ duwa ḛ pagal zì go, ḛ ge too no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma, ḛ kaa dee wal nda ge be logom ge bḛḛ vyanna ne ma, ḛ mbe ge, num ge tol ta Dok nda ma, ge vyanna ge maa vin̰a num bḛḛ pe, àa ndil ḛ go ḛ be nda ge Dok ne ma ne to,
49002012	ḛ mbe ge dee wal ka kuwa Krist, Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne to ma, ḛ kaa be vin̰a ge àa isi ḛ ge Dok nda ma buwal zì, ḛ be kaɗ ge wa tii ge Dok kê ɓase ge na ne ma zì to, sok vwal wa tii ge num go. Ḛ kaa nda ge ee maa jobreya no a̰me pagal to ma ne me no, ḛ kaɗ be Dok ge fareba mbe me, suwa no pagal.
49002013	Dee wal, ḛ kaa kaal ge Dok mbe, ɗaŋɗe, ge sego, ge ɓanna ge ḛ ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Zeso Krist pe, àa gwan ge ḛ ja guwa ge ne, ge swàm ge ne ne ta.
49002014	Ago, Krist sḛ ee i ge rusu Yahuɗ zige mage ḛ ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma ya kaɗ halas ge ta, ɓan nè ya digi dagre ɗu. Ho̰ na sḛ duul no ge kaŋ tuwaleya go, guu sen ta ge dḭḭ ge gulum go gezi no.
49002015	Kee ge Eeya ma, ge wa yuwaleya mage hada ge Yahuɗ ma way ma ya go, nda daa gwan mbo ge num pagal mɔɗwag mbḛḛ ɗoo, ndu wa kaɗ baan ge Dok to. Krist kê ano mbe ndwa ɓan rusu ge zi mbe ma digi ɗu rusu ge jin̰al dagre ge na. Go mbe no, ee num ya kaɗ halas ge ta ta buwal zì.
49002016	Krist ɓyare vwal digi rusu ge zi mbe ma buwal ge Dok ge mojo̰o̰ ne rusu ge ɗu ne go, ge swày ge na ne ɔwara kaŋre ta digi. Go mbe no, guu gezi sen ta ge num buwal zige.
49002017	Krist mbo ya jan Fare ge Kwaɗa, ge ee nda kaɗ halas, ḛ ge no kaal ge Dok ma me no, num ge no guwa ge ne ma me.
49002018	A fareba go, ge kaŋ ge Krist kê ne ta, Yahuɗ mage nda ge no num rusu zì to ma seɗ vin̰a ja mbo ya Dok ge nè Ba ta no, ge mbaaya ge On̰om ge Harcal ge ɗu ta.
49002019	Go mbe no, ḛ daa be van gɔswal ma ne koo nda ge mbo ya kaɗ mbày ge nda ge ho fareba Dok ta ma buwal zì ma ne to. Ɗaŋɗe, ge sego, ḛ seŋe ya van suwal ma, nda ge no zok ge Dok ne diŋ ma.
49002020	Ḛ sḛ ma waɗme, ḛ seŋe ya ge mojo̰o̰ njal ge àa sin zok mbe ge num ma go. Zeso nda ge temeya mage nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma njal ge zok mbe pe dolla ne ma ne, njal ge vwal zok keŋ mbe Zeso Krist sḛ ne me.
49002021	Ge ɓanna ge nè ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Krist pe, zok mbe don digi sinna pool no ge na ɓul mɔɗwag. Zok mbe soo digi ga̰a̰l no ɗiŋ ge go, ne seŋe zok ge Dok ne, mbegeya gezi caɗ ge Bagezok pe.
49002022	Ge ɓanna ge ḛ ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge ne pe, Krist sin ḛ go sin digi waɗme, ɓanna dagre ge nda gegene ge ho fareba ma, ge go ḛ seŋe zok ge Dok wa kaɗ zì ge na On̰om ta.
49003001	Ge ano mbe no pe, mbi Pol, ndu ge kee tèmel ge Zeso Krist ne, ge àa wa̰a̰ ne no daŋay zì, ge tèmel ge mbi kee ne no ge ḛ nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma buwal zì pe.
49003002	Mbi ge kuwaya tyatyaɗ go, ḛ za̰a̰ fare ge tèmel mbe ge Dok ho̰ mbi ne ge ḛ pe ge kwaɗa keeya ge na ne ta ya go.
49003003	Dok tâ mbi fare ge na nuusiya ge ɗimil mbe ne, dinna ge mbi jan ḛ ne fare daa ya zḛḛ wa pul zi no go.
49003004	Sok isi lawayta ge mbi njaŋe mbe no go, ḛ mbo kuwa go mbi pagal tin̰a gezi tyan, ge nuusiya ge ɗimil mbe ge Dok ngay mbi ne ge Krist pagal.
49003005	Dee wal, Dok be kee nda duwana ma kuwa nuusiya ge ɗimil mbe to. Ɗaŋɗe, ge sego, ee na On̰om ge Harcal ja dyan ne ya zum ge Zeso nda ge temeya mage nda ge zwagre na wa ge harcal ma ta no.
49003006	Nuusiya ge ɗimil mbe fare no: Ge ameya ge ḛ ame Fare ge Kwaɗa pe, kaŋ ge Dok ee ge nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì ma pe, num ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma mbo seɗ ne waɗme. Num sḛ mbe ma ɓanna ge Yahuɗ ma seŋe ya ge sḛ duul ge ɗu go, àa deɗ ja seɗ kaŋ ge Dok kê wa tii hon ɓase ge na ne ma num ma, ge ɓanna ge num ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Zeso Krist pe.
49003007	Ge bobo ge Dok ho̰ mbi ne ge kwaɗa keeya ge na ne ta, ge ne pool ge waɗe-waɗe ge kee tèmel no ge mbi me, hon mbi tèmel ge oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ya no ge nda ta.
49003008	Mbi ndu ge ɗaɗaga ge mbyaɗ fare a̰me pe to ne ge nda ge ho fareba ma buwal zì. Ano peɗ puy ɗe, Dok ngay kwaɗa keeya ge na ne mbi ta no, ho̰ mbi vin̰a ge oy nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma Fare ge Kwaɗa, ge kaŋ kwaɗa ge nè seɗ ne no ge Zeso Krist pe, ge ndu mbyaɗ wan ne pe to ya go.
49003009	Ho̰ mbi vin̰a no waɗme, ge ee nda peɗ kuwaya go, Dok huy na nuusiya ge ɗimil mbe wa go gyana de. Nuusiya mbe ge ɗimil ge ne sḛ Dok, Ba ge doo kaŋ ma peɗ, way ne no ge zḛḛ ya day,
49003010	ndwa go, a gaa no mbo zḛḛ, malayka mage maa ga̰a̰l ma, on̰om ge gegene mage maa ga̰a̰l ge no pḭḭ zì yà ma, num dee ya kuwa andaŋ ge Dok ne ge no vin̰a ma go pe hini-hini, ge ɓase ge Krist ne ma ta.
49003011	Dok kê ano mbe ge mojo̰o̰ na dee vḭḭ tene ya kee ne ge zḛḛ ya wal day go. Ke no go na nuusiya mbe dee ya keeya ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist ta.
49003012	Ge ɓanna ge nè ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Krist pe, ge nè ho fareba ne ta pe me ɗe, nè gareya se tyatyaɗ be njeel wa halla ge mbo Dok ndwa se yà.
49003013	Ge ano mbe no pe, mbi kaɗe ḛ kaɗe go, ḛ haa eyalam ge yal ge mbi za̰a̰ no ge ḛ pe, pe to. Ɓyare vare zoo go, vinna ge ndu vḭḭ tene go, na za̰a̰ yal ge ḛ pe, ne kaa kaŋ hormo ge ḛ pe.
49003014	A ge pe, mbi kaɗe ge nè Ba ge no pḭḭ ma zì yà ta no,
49003015	ne ge rusu ge no pḭḭ zì yà mage rusu ge no suwa pagal ma kaa no ge ndwa ge ne pe.
49003016	Mbi kaɗeya Dok ta go, ajo̰o̰ kaŋ ajab ge ne ne ge no pḭḭ zì yà ma gḛḛ go ceɗeɗ ɗe, ne On̰om ge pool waɗe-waɗe ho̰ ḛ na pool ndwa go ḛ wa seɗ pool ge ḛ zì,
49003017	ndwa go Krist kaa ge ḛ dul wa ma zì ɗaɗag, ge hoɗɗa ge ḛ ho fareba ne ta pe. Mbi kaɗeya waɗme go, ḛ kaa ɗuuya ndiŋ mage mḛḛya pool ge laa wanna zì,
49003018	ndwa go ḛ sḛ ma ɓanna ge nda ge ho fareba gegene ma mɔɗwag, ḛ dee ya kuwa laa wanna ge Krist ne ge walay nde mbe gezi kwaɗa. Laa wanna mbe ge ndu mbyaɗ wan ne ɗugul, ne haal, ne twala mage ne fiiyal ma pe to.
49003019	Mbi kaɗeya iya go, ḛ dee ya kuwa laa wanna ge ne ne ge kale ge nda duwana ma kuwaya pagal mbe, ndwa go ḛ wa deɗ-ɗa kaɗ ge diir ge Dok sḛ no ge ne ge ɓul mɔɗwag.
49003020	Dok ge pool kee kaŋ ma waɗeya ge kaŋ ge nè kaɗe num mage nè dwaɗ num no ma pagal, ge pool ge na ne ge kee tèmel no ge nè zì ta.
49003021	Ɓase ge Dok ne ge ɓa̰a̰ no dagre ge Zeso Krist ma, nè ka sale Dok ɗaɗag, ge doŋ pe mage doŋ pe ma go, ge zaman mage zaman ma go peɗ. Amin !
49004001	Ge fare ge mbi jan ḛ num ya ma pe, mbi ge no daŋay zì ge tèmel ge Bagezok ne pe, mbi moɗege ḛ go ḛ mbo mboya ge jwab, ge tolla ge Dok too ḛ ya kaɗ na van ma pe.
49004002	Ḛ kaa ɗaɗag nda ge hee maa pagal digi to ma, nda ge suul ma, nda ge wan ta ge fare ma zì peɗ ma. Ḛ kaa nda ge in ta ma sok ngay ta laa wanna go.
49004003	Ḛ ho̰ ta sok koy kàɗɗa digi dagre ɗu ge On̰om ge Harcal hon nda ge ho fareba ne mbe go, sok yan halas ge ta ta buwal zige pe.
49004004	Sḛ duul ge Krist ne ɗu, On̰om ge Dok ne ɗu, go mbe no me, nè ee nè jobreya ge kaŋ ge ɗu mbe ge Dok too nè ya ge ne pe pagal waɗme.
49004005	Bagezok melaw ɗu, nè ho fareba ndu ge ɗu ta, baptem mbe ge ɗu ne ge nda pe peɗ,
49004006	Dok melaw ɗu, kaɗ Ba ge nda way peɗ, kee muluk nda pagal peɗ, kee na tèmel ge nè peɗ, a ge nè zì peɗ me.
49004007	Go no puy, Krist ho̰ ndu ge diige ge nè buwal zige bobo ge kee tèmel no ge mojo̰o̰ na vḭḭ tene hon ne go.
49004008	A ge pe no, àa njaŋe ge Maktub ge kaŋ mballa ma way sok a̰me zì no go: «Ndee ge sok ge waɗe haal digi yà, ɔwabe moor ma ge na tok yà no. Vaa nda duwana ma bobo ma no.»
49004009	Sok janna go, ne ndee ge sok ge waɗe haal digi yà, ɓyare ngayya go, ne mbo ya gale ɓiya ge suwa pe se.
49004010	Ndu mbe ge mbo ya se, a ne mbe ge mbo kaɗ ge pḭḭ sok ge waɗe haal caɗ digi yà ne waɗme, ndwa go ne ka kee muluk ya ge kaŋ ma pagal peɗ.
49004011	Krist bobo mbe ge ho̰ nda duwana ma kaa pe hini-hini: A̰me ma kaa ne nda ge temeya ma, gegene ma nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma, koo nda gegene ma iya kaɗ nda ge oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ma, nda ge ɗogle ma kaɗ nda ge ɗeme ɓase ge Dok ne ma, a̰me ma kaɗ nda ge hate num ma me.
49004012	Krist kê ano mbe ndwa go, nda mbe ma dee ya mbaa nda ge ho fareba ma ge go num huy maa tèmel ma wa keeya, ndwa ee ɓase ge Dok ne, ge no ge Krist sḛ duul go ka donna digi.
49004013	Go no me, nè sḛ ma peɗ wa deɗ-ɗa kaɗ digi dagre ɗu, ge vin̰a hoɗ fareba mage kuwa Dok Van go tyatyaɗ. Go no me, nè wa deɗ-ɗa zonna keŋ-keŋ, mbyaɗɗa tab dinna ge Krist go me.
49004014	Go mbe no, nè daa gwan kaɗ ge nda jabso ge dḭḭ faa van ge jiyale ma, ge sḭ̀ḭl poɗ num lee gene me-lee gene me ma go to, koo ge sa̰a̰m giwli num no go, sok vin hateya ge batraŋ go go to me. Go mbe no me ɗe, nda mbo zwal nè ge zwam ge maa ndwa pe zì ge ma gene nè vin̰a ge ɗogle go daa to baɗ.
49004015	Ɗaŋɗe, sok mboya ge fare ge fareba pagal mage ngay laa wanna ta ta, nè mbo ka donna, ɓanna digi dagre ɗu ge Krist, ne ge no ge pagal go, ge ɓase ge Dok ne ma way.
49004016	A ne sḛ Krist mbe ge no pagal, ɓa̰a̰ na ɓase ma digi ɗu ne, ge mojo̰o̰ tòo ma sa̰a̰ nda duwana ma kal wa ma no digi kakag ɗu go. Kaɗɗa ndu duwana sok van ge ne duul ta go ge, ge diige kee tèmel ge na mbiya keeya go ɗe, sḛ duul ge ɓul mɔɗwag ka don don, ka biriya me. A be go ca ge ɓase ge Dok ne. Kaɗɗa nda ge ne zì ma laa wa̰a̰ ta wan, ndu ge diige ka kee na tèmel, ɓase ge Dok ne ka don donna ge kwaɗa ge pool ge Krist ne ta.
49004017	Ḛ kuwa, fare ge mbi ɓyare ge ḛ ta ge sego ge aa ta ma no, mbi jan ḛ num ge pool ge Bagezok ho̰ mbi ne go: Ḛ daa mbo ge mojo̰o̰ nda ge kuwa Dok ge fareba to ma mbo go to, num dwaɗɗa ma dwaɗɗa ge mbaa fare to ma ne.
