49004018	Àa ame fare ge maa dul wa zì to, num mam ndwa a̰me go fyalag ge ndwa ge jin̰al ge Dok hon nda ne zì to, ge dape, fare kuwaya a̰me daa num ta go fyalag to, num dul wa ma twagre twagre.
49004019	Ajo̰o̰ àa daa vaa fare ma buwal to ɗe, àa gaa ya kee fare ge bàŋ yag ma be wan ta. Àa daa pee ta go fyalag sok kee kaŋ keeya ge seŋre ma go to.
49004020	Kaɗɗa ge ḛ ge ho fareba ma ɗe, a be kaŋ ge ḛ hate kee nee ne to, ge sego ge ḛ kuwa Krist ya no kwaɗa.
49004021	A fareba go, ḛ za̰a̰ fare ge Zeso ne mbe ma, àa hate ḛ fare ge fareba ge ne sḛ hate num mbe ma no me.
49004022	Go mbe no, ḛ daa mbo ge mojo̰o̰ ḛ ka mboya wal go to, ḛ fwage ḛ diir mbe ge dee wal ma ya gezi. Mboya ge ḛ ḛ mbe ge dee wal ka vḛḛne ḛ vḛḛne, sok ee ḛ kaɗ ge ene n̰aameya ge ee nda mbo banna.
49004023	Ɓyare go ḛ n̰a On̰om ge Dok ne eya ḛ ge ɓul mɔɗwag, ge ḛ dwaɗɗa ma zì.
49004024	Ḛ eya diir ge jin̰al, ge kee go, ne kaa dinna ca ge Dok ɓyare go. Diir ge jin̰al mbe ee ne go nè mbo mboya ge temel mage harcal ge mbo no ge fare ge fareba ta.
49004025	Ajo̰o̰ nè kaŋ dolla ge jin̰al ma ne, ɓyare go nè daa kṵṵ ta hày to: «Ɓyare vare zoo go, ndu ge diige jin̰a na na̰ van fare ge fareba, ge dape, nè sḛ duul ge ɗu sok van ma ne mɔɗwag .»
49004026	«Kaɗɗa ḛ laa hoɗ-ɗa ge ndu a̰me ta, ɓyare go ḛ n̰a laa hoɗɗa mbe ee ḛ kee fare koo jan fare a̰me ge sone to.» Ɓyare go mo kaa ge mo laa hoɗɗa mbe pagal ɗiŋ gyala mbo din se to,
49004027	ge go ne wa hon Ba ge ho̰o̰l vin̰a ge waɗe ge nè pagal to.
49004028	Ndu ge ka zam na wa ge chala, n̰a ne daa chee kaŋ to. Ne kwaɗa go, ne see tèmel keeya ge ne wa ka zam na wa, ne wa seɗ a̰me fyalag ge mbaa ndu ge no hoɗegeya zì me.
49004029	Ne kaa ge fare ge haɗ mo seŋre ma wuwa ge mo wa zì to, ne kaa ɗeŋew fare ge kwaɗa ma, ge wa̰a̰ ndwa go ndu mà za̰a̰ ne ya ge mo wa zì ɗe, ne dul wa mà ee se.
49004030	Ḛ ee On̰om ge Harcal ge Dok ne seɗ tiɗiya to, ago On̰om mbe logom ge Dok ne ge ngay ne go, ḛ gaa nda ge Dok ne ma, ge Dwam ge zuuya ge ndwa fafa ge ne ne go.
49004031	Ḛ seŋe nda ge uɗi zwala ma. Ḛ daa hoo ḛ laa koo ḛ jurli ge twam to. Ḛ n̰a gool goɗɗa mage sal ta ma gezi. Ḛ daa kee ndu a̰me laa pisil to baɗ.
49004032	Ḛ kaa nda ge kee ta kwaɗa ma ta buwal zì, nda ge laa hoɗ ge maa ka̰a̰m fare ma pe ma. Ḛ pore ta ta buwal zì, dinna ge Dok pore ḛ ge ɓanna ge ḛ ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Krist pe go.
49005001	Ajo̰o̰ ḛ Dok van ma ne ɗe, ne laa wa̰a̰ ḛ wan, mbiya go ḛ ka bole ne fare keeya ma.
49005002	Ge ḛ kàɗɗa ma zì, ḛ ka ngay laa wanna ge ta ta, ge mojo̰o̰ Krist sḛ laa wa̰a̰ nè go, n̰a tene mbo swày no ge nè pe, dinna ge bobo mage tuwaleya ge tilla ge num huuya huu tii ge Dok vuwa̰ zì go.
49005003	Ajo̰o̰ ḛ nda ge ho fareba ma ne, be wan ndwa go ḛ kee kaŋ keeya ge go mbe ma no, ge nda wa ka vḛḛne ḛ dḭḭl ge num pe ma to baɗ: Kee fare ge bàŋ yag, kee kaŋ ge seŋre ge diige pe peɗ koo aham keeya me.
49005004	Be wan ndwa go fare siɗigiya ge pe zì ma, ge fare janna ge dàle mage fare siɗigiya ge daŋso ma waɗ ge ḛ wa zì to baɗ. Wa̰a̰ ndwa vare zoo go, sok siɗigi fare go, ḛ ka gwan ge mersi keeya hon Dok ge kaŋ ge ne kee ge ḛ pe ma pe.
49005005	Mbi jan ano mbe ndwa go, ḛ dee ya kuwaya kwaɗa go: Ndu ge kee fare batraŋ, ge kee kaŋ keeya ge seŋre ge diige pe peɗ koo ge aham ndwa go ndu ge kee siim mbo seɗ sok go fyalag kaɗ dagre ge nda ge Krist ne mage Dok kee muluk no num pagal ma buwal zì to. Ago num mbe ge aham ma seŋe kaŋ seɗɗa ma ya ge dok ge maa way ma go.
49005006	Ḛ n̰a ndu a̰me lase ḛ sok kan na wa se ca ca ge ḛ ta to. A kaŋ keeya ge go mbe ma zwal twam ge Dok ne ya ne ge nda ge gwan maa pagal ne eeya ma pe se to ma pagal.
49005007	Ne kaa ge ḛ wuwa ḛ tok ge nda ge go mbe ma no fare ma keeya ma zì to baɗ.
49005008	Ago dee wal, ḛ kaa nda ge kee fare tṵṵ zì ma ne, ɗaŋɗe, ge sego, ge ɓanna ge ḛ ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Bagezok pe, kɔn̰al zenna ḛ pagal go. Kaɗɗa na go mbe, ḛ gaa mboya ge kɔn̰al mbe go,
49005009	ago a kɔn̰al mbe kee ne go nda gaa kee fare kwaɗa, kaɗ ndu ge temel mage kee fare ge fareba ge diige pe peɗ.
49005010	Ḛ ho̰ ta hale kaŋ ge Bagezok laa ɓyare num ma pe.
49005011	Ne kaa ge ḛ ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge nda ge kee kaŋ ge mbaa to ma to, ge àa kee num no tṵṵ zì ma. Ne nde-nde vare zoo go ḛ foo num pe zum ge kɔn̰al go.
49005012	Ago, kaŋ ge nda mbe ma kee num no sok wayya zì, ne daŋso ge be ndu hage na wa digi faa ne to peɗ.
49005013	Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge nda foɗ kaŋ mbe ma pe zum, go mbe no, nda ge pool kuwa num pe ge fareba ma, ge dape, kɔn̰al zenna ge num pagal.
49005014	Ago kaŋ ge diige, ge kɔn̰al dyan ja ne ta, seŋe kɔn̰al. A ge pe, nda ee fare janna no go: «Mo ge fii dwam no, kore digi. Ɗege digi ge nda ge swày ma buwal zì. Go no, Krist mbo ee na kɔn̰al ya zenna ge mo pagal.»
49005015	Go mbe no, ḛ doo ḛ ndwa kwaɗa ge mboya ge ḛ ḛ ma pagal. Ḛ daa mbo ge mojo̰o̰ nda ge kuwa fare to ma go to, ɗaŋɗe, ge nda ge andaŋ ma go.
49005016	Sok ge ḛ seɗ vin̰a ge kee a̰me ge kwaɗa, ḛ ke ne gaw, ge dape, dwam mbe ge nè deɗ ja num pul zì ma no, sok haɗ-ɗa sone.
49005017	Ge pe no, ɓyare go ḛ kaa dàle to, ɗaŋɗe, ḛ ho̰ ta hale kaŋ ge Bagezok ɓyare go, ḛ ke ne pe kwaɗa.
49005018	Ne kaa ge ḛ njoo on̰or jìn̰al fere ta to, ge dape, fereya gene nda mbo vḛḛneya. Ɗaŋɗe, ḛ n̰a On̰om ge Harcal, ne ka ɗeme ḛ ne kaŋ keeya ge ḛ ḛ ma zì ge ɓul mɔɗwag.
49005019	Go mbe no, ḛ ka hon ta pool, sok mbal kaŋ mballa ge diige pe ge mbiya uware Dok ma peɗ ɓanna ge gagso mage kaŋ mballa ge On̰om ee nda mbal num ma. Ḛ mbaa Bagezok kaŋ mage sale ne ge dul wa ɗu.
49005020	Ḛ ka gwan ge mersi keeya ɗaɗag ge fare ma zì peɗ hon Dok ge nè Ba, ge dḭḭl ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist ne pe.
49005021	Ḛ guwa̰ ḛ pagal ge ta pe se, ḛ ge no ge voo ge Krist ne ḛ zì ma.
49005022	Ḛ nda zaab ge kaa zok ma, n̰a ndu ge diige guwa̰ na pagal ge na obe pe se dinna ge ne gwan na pagal no ge Bagezok pe se go.
49005023	Ago ndu son ge diige, a ge na gwale pagal digi dinna ge Krist no ɓase ge Dok ne ma pagal digi go. Num sḛ ge no ne sḛ duul, ge na no num Ba ge monna me.
49005024	Ɗaŋɗe, ajo̰o̰ ɓase ge Dok ne gwan na pagal ge Krist pe se ɗe, wa̰a̰ ndwa go ndu gwale ge diige guwa̰ na pagal ge na obe pe se, ge kaŋ ma zì peɗ.
49005025	Kaɗɗa ge ḛ ge obe ma ɗe, n̰a ndu ge diige laa wa̰a̰ na gwale dinna ge Krist laa wa̰a̰ ɓase ge Dok ne go, vḭḭ tene no ɗiŋ mbo swày ge ne pe,
49005026	ndwa go ne kaa mbegeya gezi caɗ ge Dok pe, sok haɗ ne harcal guwa̰ ge usi ne gezi ge mam mage Fare ge Dok ne ta go,
49005027	ndwa ee ɓase ge na ne ma deɗ-ɗa ge na ta, ndwa kɔn̰al yɔrbɔb, be fwaɗɗa a̰me, be sok vḛḛneya a̰me koo be sok ɓɔcɔmeya a̰me. Ɗaŋɗe, be fare na pagal koo saaso a̰me go fyalag to me.
49005028	Go mbe no me, mbi jan go, ndu son ge diige laa mbiya wan na gwale ge na laa wa̰a̰ na sḛ duul go. Go mbe no, ndu ge ne laa wan na gwale, ne laa wa̰a̰ sḛ tene me.
49005029	Ago ndu a̰me ge sen tene go de? Zam vare zoo kaŋ zam ndwa wal na sḛ duul, ka koy ne kwaɗa dinna ge Krist in tene ge ɓase ge Dok ne go.
49005030	Nè sḛ ma daa be sok van ge ne sḛ duul ne ma ne to de?
49005031	Ge mojo̰o̰ Njaŋeya ge Dok ne jan no go: «A go mbe no, ndu son mbo n̰a na ba mage na na̰, mbo mbarge ge na gwale, num sḛ ma jwàg mbo seŋe ge ndu ɗu go.»
49005032	Fare ge mbi jan ḛ num daa ya mbe ma no, fare a̰me ge gag ge gale kaa ɗimil be ge nda wan num fare pe to ma go. Mbi, mbi jan ḛ zum waŋ go, fare ge ɗimil mbe jan fare ge Krist ne mage ɓase ge Dok ne fare.
49005033	A tem, fare mbe ma ge ḛ pe peɗ waɗme. Ɓyare go ndu son ge diige, ne laa wa̰a̰ na gwale ge mojo̰o̰ na sḛ duul go, ndu gwale ge diige me ɗe, ne ho̰ na obe ga̰a̰l me.
49006001	Ḛ nda jabso, ḛ za̰a̰ ḛ ba mage ḛ na̰ ma wa ge mojo̰o̰ Bagezok ɓyare ge ḛ ta go. Ano a kaŋ ge temel ge ḛ mbiya kee nee ne.
49006002	«Ho̰ mo ba mage mo na̰ hormo.» Ano a wa yuwaleya ge zḛḛge ge ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge wa tii ne.
49006003	Wa tii ge kê mbe no ɗe: «A ndwa go mo mbo kaɗ ge laa saal, mo kee kaal ge suwa pagal me.»
49006004	Ḛ van ba ma, ḛ ke fare a̰me ge ee ḛ van ma laa ka hoɗɗa ɗaɗag ḛ ta to me. Ɗaŋɗe, ḛ wuwa num sok hate num mage nuusi num ko mboya ge mojo̰o̰ Bagezok ɓyare go.
49006005	Fare no, mbi jan ḛ ge moor ma, ḛ za̰a̰ ḛ ba ge zok, num ge no nda duwana ge ḛ go ma wa, ḛ ke pagal ga̰a̰l num ta to, ḛ ho̰ num hormo honna ge dul wa ɗu, dinna ge ḛ kee ne no, ge fare janna ge Krist ne pagal go.
49006006	Ḛ ho̰ ta tèmel ta ge ḛ ba ge zok ma ndwa pe ɗeŋew, ndwa kee num duul tii to. Ɗaŋɗe, dinna ge moor ge Krist ne, ge huy laa ɓyareya ge Dok ne wa ge laa ɗu ma go.
49006007	Ḛ ka̰a̰ ḛ laa se sok kee tèmel hon num go, dinna ge ḛ daa mà kee ne ya hon Bagezok sḛ go, be ge mojo̰o̰ ḛ kee tèmel hon nda duwana ma bàŋ go to.
49006008	Ḛ kaa ge kuwaya tyatyaɗ go, koo ndu kaa moor koo ne kaa moor to, Bagezok mbo poɗ ndu ge diige ne tèmel kwaɗa ge ne kee no me.
49006009	Kaɗɗa ge ḛ ge moor ma ba ma ɗe, ḛ kee ḛ moor ma kwaɗa, ḛ ka ɓole num pagal ɓaɓal to. Ḛ kaa ge kuwaya go, ḛ sḛ ma ɓanna ge ḛ moor mbe ma, ḛ ge Bagezok mbe ge ɗu, ge no pḭḭ ma zì yà, ne mbe ge vare ndu to.
49006010	Ge go mbi dee ya aa mbi fare ma ɗe, mbi jan ḛ go: Ḛ see pool ge Bagezok ta, ge ne pool mbe ge ɓaŋlaŋ ta.
49006011	Ḛ ɔwabe kaŋ twam ge Dok ho̰ ḛ num ma peɗ, ndwa go ḛ see pool ge mḛḛ ge Ba ge ho̰o̰l ndwa zì, ḛ wa iyan ta ge ne zwam ma go me.
49006012	Ago, twam ge nè mbal no, nè ndu ge ho̰o̰l mbe be ndu duwana ne to, ɗaŋɗe, nè twam mballa ge on̰om ge sone ma ɓanna ge maa ga̰a̰l ge wa̰a̰ dunin̰a ge sone keeya ne no maa tok go ma. Nè mbal twam waɗme ge on̰om ma, ge num pool mbo no ge maa pe tòo ge kaa no sa̰a̰m zì ta ya.
49006013	Ge pe no, ḛ ɔwabe kaŋ twam ge Dok ho̰ ḛ num ma peɗ digi! Go mbe no, dwam ge gyala ge sone mbo ndaa ja puy ɗe, ḛ mbo kaɗ mḛḛ piliya ge Ba ge ho̰o̰l ndwa zì. Guwa̰ ge ḛ mbo mbal twam ya ge ḛ mbiya mbal ne go, ḛ ko mbo ndage digi ne ndwa zḛḛ to.
49006014	Ḛ kaa jejew, ḛ ka jan ɗaɗag fare ge fareba. Ḛ kaɗ-ɗa keeya mbe go, mbo kaɗ dinna ge biɗ ge ndu vwal ne na pul go go. Ḛ ka mbo ge temel pagal, ge dape, temel dḭḭ ge goŋroŋ ge ndu kan ne na ta ndwa tele walam be waɗ na duul zì go.
49006015	Ḛ kaa fogol cacaf ge mbo oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge gene nda halas ya. Ḛ kee ya mbe go ɗe, mbo kaɗ dinna ge ndu paa tyako na ko zì ndwa kere sok kaal go.
49006016	Ḛ kaa ge hoɗ fareba ɗaɗag ge Dok ta, ge fare ma ndwa zì peɗ. Go mbe no, mbo kaɗ dinna ge ɓiiya ge ndu wan ne na tok go cage tene, wa piri ɗeŋleŋta wa ol ge ba ge zwam mbal mo ya ge num ma peɗ go.
49006017	Ḛ ame monna ge mbo ge Dok ta ya no waɗme. Mbo cage ḛ dinna ge jum walam cage asagar ge kubi ne na pagal go go. Ḛ kaa nuusiya ge jan fare ge Dok ne ge nda ta. Mbo kaɗ dinna ge kasagar ge On̰om ge Harcal hon ne mo tok go go.
49006018	Ge fare ma zì peɗ, n̰a On̰om ge Dok ne mba ḛ ge kee kaɗeya ge diige pe mage kaɗeya ge gwarge ta ma. Ḛ ke taame to, ḛ kaa nda ge deŋel ma, ḛ ka kee kaɗeya ge nda ge ho fareba ma pe peɗ me.
49006019	Ḛ kaɗe Dok ge mbi pe waɗme, ndwa go ne ho̰ mbi fare ge mbiya mbi jan num ma be voo, sok oy fare ɗimil ge no Fare ge Kwaɗa zì zum go.
49006020	Mbi tɔgwa ge Dok nee ne, mbi see vin̰a ge oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge ne ta. Koo ge mbi no daŋay zì mà ge sego no puy ɗe, ago mbi oy go Fare ge Kwaɗa mbe be ngwabeya. Ḛ kaɗe ge mbi pe go, mbi see pool ge kee ne.
49006021	Tichig, nè na̰ van ge laa wanna mage nè kon ge tèmel ge Bagezok ne ge n̰a wa to, mbo wan ḛ mbi fare ma pe mɔɗwag, ge kaŋ ge mbi kee no ma me.
49006022	Mbi teme ḛ ne yà ne pool, ndwa go ḛ dee ya kuwaya kwaɗa go, i kaa go gyana de, go mbe no ɗe, ḛ dul wa ma wa ee se me.
49006023	Na̰ van ma, n̰a Dok ge nè Ba mage nè Bagezok Zeso Krist ee ḛ kaɗ halas, laa wan ta, kaɗ ge hoɗ fareba!
49006024	N̰a Dok ngay kwaɗa keeya ge na ne ge num ge laa wa̰a̰ nè Bagezok Zeso Krist no ma ta peɗ, ge laa wanna ge be eya fare.
50001001	Mbi Pol ɓanna ge Timote, moor ge Zeso Krist ne ma, i njaŋe lawayta no ne hon ḛ nda ge ho fareba ge ɓa̰a̰ no dagre ge Zeso Krist ma, ge kaa no ge suwal ga̰a̰l ge Filib ne diŋ ma peɗ me. I njaŋe lawayta mbe no ge nda ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme tèmel mage mbaa tèmel ge ɓase ge Krist ne ma pe peɗ waɗme.
50001002	Mbi kaɗeya go, Dok ge nè Ba ɓanna ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist, num ngay kwaɗa keeya mage halas ge maa way ge ḛ ta.
50001003	Sok ge mbi kaɗ dwaɗ ge ḛ pagal, mbi kaɗ ka kee mersi ɗaɗag hon Dok ge ambi ge ḛ pe.
50001004	Sok kee kaɗeya go ge ḛ pe peɗ, mbi tane to, mbi kee ne ge laa saal.
50001005	Ge dwam ge ḛ ho fareba ge Krist ta ya go day ɗiŋ màno, ḛ ge sok mbaa mbi go, ge Fare ge Kwaɗa oyya pe. A ge pe, mbi gwan ge mersi keeya hon Dok no.
50001006	Mbi ge kuwaya tyatyaɗ go, Dok ge ee tèmel ge kwaɗa mbe no pe keeya ge ḛ buwal zì, ne sḛ mbo ɗeme tèmel mbe ɗiŋ deɗ ge ne wa aaya yà, ge dwam ge Zeso Krist mbo gwan ja go.
50001007	A tem go, mbi kaa ge dwaɗɗa ge kwaɗa mbe no ge ḛ pagal peɗ. Ago mbi laa wa̰a̰ ḛ gḛḛ, ge dape, ḛ peɗ, ḛ deɗ ja ge kwaɗa ge Dok ngay ne ge mbi ta mbe zì. Ge sego ge mbi no ge daŋay zì puy, Dok ngay kwaɗa keeya ge na ne ḛ ta, ḛ ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge mbi no koo sok ge mbi dee ka mḛḛ wan Fare ge Kwaɗa pe zum go, ge nda ge kun sariya ma ndwa se, ndwa ngay num go ne fare ge fareba ne.
50001008	Dok kuwa kuwa go, fare ge mbi jan no, hày ne zì to. Ago mbi laa wa̰a̰ ḛ gḛḛ dinna ge Zeso Krist laa wa̰a̰ ḛ go.
50001009	Kaŋ ge mbi ele ne no ge Dok ta, ge mbi kaɗeya ma zì ge ḛ pe, ago ḛ laa gwan wan ta ge kon pagal waɗeya, ndwa go, ḛ wa deɗ-ɗa kuwa vaa fare ge fareba mage fare ge sone buwal me.
50001010	Go no me, ḛ dee ya vaa fare ma buwal ndwa tal kaŋ ge go na waɗe ge siŋli, ge go ḛ wa kaɗ nda ge kɔn̰al yaɗaɗ ma, nda ge be fare eeya ge maa pagal ma, ge dwam gwanna ge Krist ne ya pe.
50001011	Ge mbaaya ge Zeso Krist ne ta, ḛ kaŋ keeya ma mbo kaɗ kaŋ keeya ge temel ma. Go mbe no, àa mbo ka ee nda hon Dok hormo, àa ka sale ne me.
50001012	Na̰ van ma, mbi ɓyare go ḛ kaa ge ne kuwaya kwaɗa, fare ge see mbi no, mbaa vare zoo Fare ge Kwaɗa oyya vin̰a ge zam zḛḛ.
50001013	A ge pe no, asagar ge koy zok ge gan ga̰a̰l ne ma ɓanna ge nda ge ɗogle ge sok mbe go ma peɗ, àa kuwa kuwa go wanna ge ambi daŋay zì, ne ge tèmel moor ge Krist ne ge mbi kee pe.
50001014	Wanna ge ambi ge daŋay zì, ee na̰ van ge ho fareba ma ya gḛḛ deŋe ta ge Bagezok ta. Go no me, àa seɗ pool ya ge oy fare ge Dok ne mbo zḛḛ, be ge voo daa go fyalag ge maa zì to.
50001015	A̰me ma me, a fareba, àa oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge Krist ne ge yil mage dwaɗɗa ge pili ta ge mbi. Ɗaŋɗe, gegene ma, àa oy ne ge dwaɗɗa ge kwaɗa.
50001016	Num ge guwa̰ mbe ma no, ajo̰o̰ àa ge laa wanna ge maa zì ɗe, àa ge kuwaya go, daŋay ge mbi kee no, ne ge mbi ngay zum go Fare ge Kwaɗa ne fare ge fareba ne pe.
50001017	Kaɗɗa ge nda ge zḛḛge mbe ma ɗe, àa oy Krist ge yil mage dwaɗɗa ge sone, dwaɗɗa ge num way go nda kuwa maa sḛ ma ɗeŋew. Àa dwaɗ gene ya iigiya ge ɗogle ma ge mbi pagal, ge kàɗɗa ge ambi no zì.
50001018	Num kaŋ keeya mbe ma no peɗ kee a̰me to! Go no puy ɗe, ne kaa ge dwaɗɗa ge fareba ma zì koo ge hày ma zì, àa wuwage zum Krist. Go no me, mbi kee laa saal, mbi mbo gwan kee laa saal.
50001019	Ago mbi ge kuwaya go, fare mbe ma no peɗ deɗ-ɗa ge monna ge ambi go, ge kaɗeya ge ḛ ḛ ma ta, ge mbaaya ge On̰om ge Zeso Krist ne ta me.
50001020	Mbi dwaɗɗa ge ga̰a̰l mage mbi jobreya, ago, mbi mbo kee kaŋ a̰me ɗu ge gene daŋso ya ge mbi pagal to. Ge zḛḛ ya day koo ge sego, mbi ɓyare ge mbi pool mɔɗwag vare zoo go, nda kuwa pool ge Krist ne ge ɓaŋlaŋ ge mbi ta. Koo mbi kaa ge ndwa koo mbi see swày,
50001021	ago ge kàɗɗa ge ambi zì, Krist ndwa ge mbi ne, seɗ swày, a kaŋ kwaɗa ne ge mbi pe.
50001022	Kaɗɗa mbi gale kaa go ge mbi ndwa, mbi ge pool ge kee tèmel ge kwaɗa ge nda pe. Ɗaŋɗe, mbi wan kaŋ ge mbi tal ne pe to.
50001023	Mbi dwaɗɗa ma vaaya se pe zi. Mbi ge ene go, mbi n̰a suwa mbe no, mbi mbo mbo kàɗɗa dagre ge Krist. A ne ge gwan waɗe ge siŋli ne.
50001024	Ɗaŋɗe, ne kwaɗa waɗeya go mbi gale kaa suwa pagal swag ge ḛ pe.
50001025	Mbi kuwa kuwa tyatyaɗ go, mbi mbo gale kaɗ ge ndwa. Mbi mbo kaɗ ɓanna dagre ge ḛ peɗ, ndwa mbaa ḛ zam zḛḛ ge kàɗɗa ge ḛ ḛ ge hoɗ fareba zì, ge laa saal zì me.
50001026	Go mbe no, gwanna ge ambi ya ge ḛ buwal zì mbo ee ḛ uware Zeso Krist gḛḛ waɗeya ge mbi ta ge ɓanna ge ḛ ɓa̰a̰ ge ne pe.
50001027	Ɗeŋew go, ḛ mbo mboya ge mbyaɗɗa tab, ge Fare ge Kwaɗa ge Krist ne pagal, ndwa go, koo mbi mbo yà ndil ḛ koo mbi mbo yà to, mbi za̰a̰ janna ge ḛ pe go, ḛ go mḛḛya ndiŋ ge on̰om ge ɗu zì, ge twam mballa ge dul wa ɗu zì, ge fareba hoɗɗa ge ne pe doo no ge Fare ge Kwaɗa pagal me.
50001028	Ne kaa ge ḛ n̰a ta ngwabeya go fyalag ge ḛ nda ge ho̰o̰l ma tok go to. Go mbe no, àa mbo kuwa go maa ge vin̰a banna go, ḛ me ɗe, ḛ ge vin̰a monna go. Ano mbe no, mbo ge Dok ta ya.
50001029	Ago, Dok ngay kwaɗa keeya ge ḛ ta ndwa go, ḛ ke tèmel moor hon Krist. Be go ḛ ho fareba ge ne ta ɗeŋew to, ɗaŋɗe, ḛ njoo yal ge ne pe waɗme.
50001030	Ge sego, twam mbe ge ḛ dee kuwa mbi mbal ne, ge mbi gale mbal ne no ɗiŋ màno, dinna ge ḛ kuwa ne no go, ḛ waɗ ja dagre ge mbi ge twam mballa mbe zì.
50002001	Ge ɓanna ge ḛ ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Krist pe, ḛ seɗ pool ya go. Ajo̰o̰ Krist laa wa̰a̰ ḛ wan, ḛ seɗ laa eyalla ya go. Ajo̰o̰ On̰om ge Dok ne ɓan ḛ ya digi dagre, ḛ gaa ya nda ge zam baan ge ne ma, zam baan ge ta me, nda ge kuwa ta a̰se ma, nda ge kee wuy ge ta ta ma me. Ajo̰o̰ na mbe go ɗe,
50002002	mbi kaɗe ḛ go, ḛ kaa ɓanna digi dagre ɗu, ḛ kaa ge laa wanna ge ta buwal zì, ḛ kaa ge dul wa ge ɗu, ḛ kaa ge dwaɗɗa ge ɗu me. Sok kee ano mbe no go, ḛ huy laa saal ge ambi wa tab me.
50002003	Ḛ kee a̰me ɗu ge on̰om ge gage ta to, koo ge dwaɗɗa ge kee ta kuwaya to me. Ɗaŋɗe, ḛ kaa ge on̰om ge suul, ḛ ndi nda ge ɗogle ma dinna ge num waɗe ḛ waɗe go.
50002004	Ne kaa ge ndu a̰me ɗu ɓyare kwaɗa ge tene pe ɗeŋew to. Ɗaŋɗe, ne ɓyare kwaɗa ge nda ge ɗogle ma pe waɗme.
50002005	Ḛ kaa ge dwaɗɗa ge kwaɗa ma ge ta buwal zì dinna ge nda ge ɓa̰a̰ dagre ɗu ge Zeso Krist ma go.
50002006	Ajo̰o̰ ge dee wal ya day, na Dok sḛ ne ge na pagal puy ɗe, ne sḛ be dwaɗ mbḛḛ go na kaa mbyaɗɗa leɗeɗ ge Dok go to.
50002007	Ɗaŋɗe, ne sḛ ge na pagal kuri kaŋ ge go num na ne ma ne peɗ gezi, mbo ya hee diir ge moor ne no, seŋe ge nda duwana ma sḛ no go, nda duwana ma kuwa no go ne ndu duwana ne me.
50002008	Ne sḛ guwa̰ na pagal se lɔlɔgwaɗ, za̰a̰ Dok wa no ɗiŋ mbo swày, suu swày daŋso ge ɔwara kaŋre ta digi no.
50002009	A ge pe, guwa̰ tanna ge ne ne go, Dok hê ne eeya ge sok ge waɗe haal digi no, ho̰ ne dḭḭl ge ngay pateya ge ne ne no, ge dḭḭl ge ɗogle ma pagal digi peɗ me,
50002010	ndwa go, ge hormo ge dḭḭl ge Zeso ne pe, kaŋ dolla ge pḭḭ zì yà ge ma peɗ, ge no ge suwa pagal ma koo ge no ge suwa pe se ma, num gu maa ko ma se ndwa uware ne.
50002011	Ndu ge diige peɗ jin̰a zum waŋ go, Zeso Krist ne Bagezok ne. Go no me, hormo wa mbo kaɗ ge Dok ge ne Ba dḭḭl pagal waɗme.
50002012	Mbi na̰ van ge laa wanna ma, ajo̰o̰ ḛ za̰a̰ mbi wa za̰a̰ ɗaɗag, ḛ ke tèmel ge ngay go ḛ seɗ monna ya go. Sok kee ne go, ḛ kaa ge voo ge Dok ne ge ḛ zì mage pagal gwanna se. Koo ge mbi no go to no puy ɗe, ḛ ke ne dinna ge mbi ge ḛ buwal zì go.
50002013	Ago, Dok sḛ kee tèmel ge ḛ zì ne, ge dape, ḛ laa wa̰a̰ kaŋ ge mbiya kee na sḛ duul tii ma, ndwa go na sḛ wa ka hon ḛ pool kee num waɗme.
50002014	Ge tèmel keeya ge ḛ ḛ ma zì peɗ, ḛ ke num be tunna mage kee peeya,
50002015	ndwa go, ḛ kaa nda ge be fare eeya ge ḛ pagal ma, nda ge kɔn̰al yaɗaɗ ma me, van ge Dok ne ge be fwaɗɗa ma, ge doŋ pe ge nda ge vuuɗi nda mage sone kakatag mbe ma way no go. Ḛ kaa ge num buwal zì dinna ge kɔn̰al ge zen no ge tṵṵ ge ɗeɗeg zì ya go,
50002016	sok jan num fare ge hon nda duwana ma ndwa go. Kaɗɗa ḛ keeya mbe go, dwam ge Zeso Krist mbo gwan ja, mbi mbo kee laa saal ge ḛ pe, ndwa go tèmel yal ge mbi kê num ma peɗ, àa mbo jaɗ mbi ta bàŋ to.
50002017	Fareba ge ḛ ho ne no ge Zeso Krist ta, dḭḭ sḭḭ ge tuwaleya ge ḛ kee ne hon Dok go. Tamekyala, àa mbo hun mbi, swàm ge ambi mbo kaɗ ge tuwaleya ge mbi kan ne no ge ḛ ḛ ma pagal go. Kaɗɗa na mbe go, mbi sḛ kee tii, mbi mbo kee laa saal ɓanna dagre ge ḛ peɗ me.
50002018	Go mbe no, mbiya go ḛ kee laa saal, ḛ kee ne ɓanna dagre ge mbi waɗme.
50002019	Ge sego, kaɗɗa Bagezok Zeso Krist vin-na, mbi jobre go teme Timote ge ḛ ta yà, ndwa go, sok ge ne sḛ mbo gwan ja wan mbi ḛ fare ma pe, mbi mbo seɗ dul wa eeya se.
50002020	Ndu a̰me dinna ge Timote go, ge dwaɗ ge mbi dwaɗ go tem koo hon tene mɔɗwag ge fare ge ḛ ḛ pe ɗe, a to.
50002021	Ɗaŋɗe, nda gegene ma peɗ, àa ɓyare fare ma ge ta pe, be ge Zeso Krist pe to.
50002022	Ḛ kuwa kuwa go, Timote, ge tèmel keeya ge na ne ma ta, ngay tene zum go, na van ge mḛḛ na ba ziya kerteŋ ne, ho̰ tene no mɔɗwag ge Fare ge Kwaɗa ta oyya dagre ge mbi me.
50002023	Go mbe no, a ne sḛ ge mbi jobre no go teme ḛ ne yà ne, guwa̰ ge mbi mbo kuwa mbi fare ma pe ya gezi kɔn̰al hetel.
50002024	Mbi ge hoɗ fareba tyatyaɗ ge Bagezok ta go, zḛḛ fyalag, mbi sḛ mbo mbo ge ḛ ta yà ne, ge mbi ndwa.
50002025	Mbi na̰ van Epafrodiɗ, mbi kon ge tèmel, ge i ge ne mbaa twam dagre, ge ḛ teme ne ya ge a̰me ge na tok go ndwa mbaa mbi, keeya kwaɗa ɗe, mbi gwan teme ḛ ne yà.
50002026	Ne sḛ kaa ge iigiya gḛḛ na zì, sok ge za̰a̰ go tuguɗi ge kee na fare deɗ-ɗa ge ḛ ta yà. Ge ano mbe no pe, kee ene no go na mbo ge ḛ ndwa zì yà.
50002027	Tuguɗi ge kê ne, ee ne wa guwa ge swày, ɗaŋɗe, Dok kuwa ne a̰se no, ndaa ne tok digi no. Be kuwa ne a̰se ɗeŋew to, kuwa mbi a̰se no waɗme ndwa go mbi wuwa ge tiɗiya ge ɗogle zì to.
50002028	A ge pe, mbi haa tene ee ḛ ne yà avun cab no, ndwa go, sok ge ḛ mà kuwa ne ya, ḛ mà kee laa saal, mbi sḛ waɗme mbi dul wa mà ee se me.
50002029	Sok ge mbo deɗ-ɗa yà, ḛ ame ne ge laa saal mbyaɗɗa tab, ndwa go, a ḛ na̰ van ge ho fareba ge Bagezok ta ne. Nda ge go mbe ma pe no, ḛ ho̰ num hormo me.
50002030	Ago, sok hon tene ge tèmel ge Krist ne pe keeya go, gaa guwa ge seɗ swày. Huy tèmel ge ḛ daa mà kee mbi num ya ma wa ge ḛ byalam go no.
50003001	A gaa no, na̰ van ma, ḛ kee laa saal ge ɓanna ge ḛ ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Bagezok pe. Fare ge mbi dee njaŋe ḛ wal ma, mbi be seɗ yal a̰me sok dwage ḛ num njaŋeya go to. Ano mbe no, a kwaɗa ge ḛ pe, ndwa go, ne kaa ge yal a̰me dee ge ḛ pagal to.
50003002	Ḛ ɔwabe ta gezi ge nda ge kee kaŋ dinna ge juu go ma ta, num mbe ge kee kaŋ ge sone ma, àa jan go, ndu vin̰a bḛḛ mbḛḛ ne wa seɗ monna go.
50003003	Ago, nda ge vin̰a bḛḛ ge fareba ma, àa nè ge kee tèmel moor hon Dok ma, ge mbaaya ge ne On̰om ta, àa nè ge kee laa saal no go, ge ɓanna ge nè ɓa̰a̰ ge Zeso Krist pe, ge nè deŋe ta no ge ne ta pe, be ge kaŋ keeya ge nda duwana ma way ma ta to baɗ.
50003004	Daa no go kaŋ keeya ge nda duwana ma way ma kwaɗa ge ndu deŋe tene ge num ta ɗe, mbi daa mà deŋe tene ge num ta waɗeya ge kon pagal waɗme.
50003005	Mbi hebre van twàl ne, ge too ge hebre ma zì, ge vuwal pe ge Benjamḛ ne go, ge pe rusu ge Izrayel ne zì, àa vin̰a mbi bḛḛ ge dwam ge wa gezi zi go no. Kaɗɗa ge eeya ge Yahuɗ ma way ma pagal ɗe, mbi Farisi ne.
50003006	Mbi kaa ndu ge uwaseya sɔswag ge tèmel keeya ge Yahuɗ ma way zì, ee mbi no ɗiŋ mbo njon̰ ɓase ge Krist ne ma. Mbi kaa ndu ge temel ne ge eeya ge Yahuɗ ma way ma zì peɗ. Ndu ge be fare eeya ge na pagal me.
50003007	Kaŋ mbe ma peɗ ndi ge mbi ndwa zì ge kaŋ seɗ mam a̰me go. Ge sego, ge ɓanna ge mbi ɓa̰a̰ ge Krist dagre no, ee mbi ya gaa ndil num ge kaŋ ge be fare a̰me pe to ma go.
50003008	-
50003009	Kaŋ ge waɗe ge siŋli, a kuwaya ge mbi kuwa ya no go Zeso Krist mbi Bagezok ne. Ge mbi ta, kaŋ ge nda seɗ num ma peɗ, àa mbyaɗ a̰me pe ge kuwaya mbe ta to. Ge Krist pe, mbi n̰a kaŋ ma ya gezi peɗ. Ge go mbi kuwa Krist, mbi kaa ɓanna dagre ge ne me, mbi ndil kaŋ mbe ma no peɗ dinna ge gubu pagal bàŋ go, mbi seŋe ndu ge temel ge mbi ho fareba ge Zeso Krist ta pe, be ge gwanna ge mbi ka gwan mbi pagal ge eeya ge Yahuɗ ma way ma pe se to. Ago, a Dok sḛ ee ndu ge ho fareba haɗ temel ne.
50003010	Kaŋ ge mbi ee no ge mbi ndwa zḛḛ, ago mbi kuwa Krist gezi hetel, mbi kuwa pool ge ɓaŋlaŋ ge ee ne tanna ge swày se, ago mbi za̰a̰ yal dagre ge ne dinna ge ne sḛ za̰a̰ yal go, mbi kaa guwa ge seɗ swày ge ne pe waɗme,
50003011	ndwa go, kaɗɗa Dok vin-na, mbi dee ya tanna ge ne sḛ ta̰a̰ ge nda ge swày ma buwal zì go.
50003012	Mbi jan go mbi uni uni gaw to, koo go mbi deɗ ja ge mbyaɗɗa tab go to me. Ɗaŋɗe, mbi chiya go chiya gale mbo ame poɗɗa ge Zeso Krist tok go. Ago ne sḛ wa̰a̰ mbi na tok pe zì ne.
50003013	Na̰ van ma, ḛ kaa ge kuwaya go mbi gale be uni to. Ɗaŋɗe, kaŋ a̰me ge mbi kee ne go ɗu, ago mbi vyale kaŋ ge mbi dee ka kee num wal ma, mbi harge tene mbo wan kaŋ ge no ge mbi ndwa zḛḛ me.
50003014	Mbi chiya go mbi dee ge wa yà, ndwa ame poɗɗa ge Dok ee ne no ge pḭḭ ma zì yà ge mbi pe, ge ɓanna ge mbi ɓa̰a̰ ge Zeso Krist pe.
50003015	Nè peɗ ge nè ndwa siiriya ge fare ge Dok ne keeya ma, nè kaa ge dwaɗɗa ge zḛḛge mbe no ge nè zì. Kaɗɗa go ḛ go ge dwaɗɗa ge ɗogle, Dok mbo tyan ḛ dwaɗɗa ma gezi ge ne pagal.
50003016	Sok ge nè deɗ ja ge ne go no, ne ga̰a̰l go nè ka mboya dagre ge ko pul ge nè ka mboya wal ma go tetem.
50003017	Na̰ van ma, ḛ bole kaŋ keeya ge ambi ma, ḛ mbo ge ko pul ge nda ge i go ma way go waɗme.
50003018	Mbi jan ḛ ne ya ndwa gḛḛ, ge sego, mbi dwage ḛ ne janna ge miim ge mbi ndwa go. Ago, nda gḛḛ kee kaŋ keeya ge no ho̰o̰l ge kaŋre ge Krist ne ma.
50003019	Pe aaya ge num way banna, dok ge num way a num laa. Àa ɓyare doreya ge maa kaŋ keeya ge daŋso mbe ma pagal. Ɗeŋew, àa ee maa dwaɗɗa ge kaŋ ge kwaɗa ge dunin̰a ne ma pagal.
50003020	Kaɗɗa ge nè sḛ ma ɗe, nè sok kàɗɗa ge Dok ta pḭḭ zì yà. Nè ge mḛḛ no ge ko ma da̰a̰re nè Bagezok Zeso Krist, Ba ge monna ge mbo mbo ja ge sok mbe ya.
50003021	Sok ge mbo gwan ja, mbo seŋe sḛ duul ge nè ne ge be fare pe to ma, sḛ duul ge pateya ge mojo̰o̰ na ne go. Ne sḛ mbo kee ano mbe no, ge pool ge na ne ge waɗe-waɗe ta, ndwa gwan ge kaŋ ma ya peɗ ge na ko pul se.
50004001	Go mbe no, na̰ van ge laa wanna ma, mbi ge ene gḛḛ ge kuwa ḛ ndwa. Ago tèmel keeya ge ḛ ḛ ma kee mbi laa saal. A ge ḛ ta mbi seɗ doreya ge nda ta no go tèmel keeya ge ambi ma kwaɗa. Go mbe no, na̰ van ma, ḛ ka dwage gwan ḛ pagal ɗaɗag ge Bagezok pe se.
50004002	Evodi mage Syntich, mbi kaɗe ḛ kaɗe ḛ iya ta buwal, ḛ kaa halas ge ta, ge dape, ḛ Bagezok nda ma ne.
50004003	Mo waɗme, mbi kon ge n̰a wa to, o̰o̰, mbi kaɗe mo go mo mba nda zaab ge zi mbe ma, ge mbaa twam ɓanna dagre ge mbi ma, ge Fare ge Kwaɗa pe oyya, ɓanna ge Klema mage mbi ka̰a̰m ge tèmel ge ɗogle ma, ge num dḭḭl ma njaŋe no ge maktub ge nda ge see ndwa ge fareba ma way zì.
50004004	Ḛ kee laa saal ɗaɗag ge ɓanna ge ḛ ɓa̰a̰ digi dagre ɗu ge Bagezok pe. Mbi gwan dwage ḛ janna go ḛ kee laa saal.
50004005	Gwanna ge Bagezok ne ya gaa guwa. Kwaɗa ge ḛ ḛ din̰a ge nda ta peɗ.
50004006	Ḛ sṵṵ ta ge a̰me pe to, ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ḛ go hoɗegeya ge kaŋ a̰me ma, ḛ deŋe num ge Dok ta ge kaɗeya mage gwarge ta. Ḛ ka kee ne mersi waɗme.
50004007	Go mbe no, halas ge Dok ne, ge waɗe dwaɗɗa ge nda duwana ma way ma pagal peɗ, mbo koy ḛ dul wa mage ḛ dwaɗɗa ma ɓanna dagre ge Zeso Krist.
50004008	Na̰ van ma, mbi fare janna ge pe aaya go, ḛ ee ḛ dwaɗɗa ge kaŋ ge go na fareba pagal, kaŋ ge go na hormo, kaŋ ge go na temel, kaŋ ge go na kɔn̰al yaɗaɗ, kaŋ ge dee nè ndwa zì, ge mbiya nè dore ne, kaŋ ge nè laa wan ne, ge nè vḭḭ ta ge ne pagal, kaŋ ge go saleya wa̰a̰ ne wan, num kaa ne ge dwaɗɗa ge nè ne ma zì.
50004009	Kaŋ ge mbi hate ḛ num ma, fare ge ḛ za̰a̰ num ge mbi wa zì ma, ge ḛ ame num ma, ge ḛ ka kuwa mbi kee num ma, ḛ ke tèmel ge num pagal. Go no me, Dok Ba ge hon nda halas mbo kaɗ dagre ge ḛ.
50004010	Mbi kee laa saal, mbi gwan kee mersi hon Bagezok, ge dape, ḛ gwan ngay laa wanna ge ḛ ḛ sok mbaa mbi yà ne. A fareba, dee wal ḛ ka dwaɗ ge mbi, ɗaŋɗe, keeya kaal nde ḛ be seɗ vin̰a ge daa gwan dwaɗ ge mbi to.
50004011	A be hoɗegeya ge ambi ma ee mbi jan fare mbe ne to, ago, mbi ha̰a̰le ha̰a̰le kee laa saal ge kaŋ ma zì peɗ.
50004012	Mbi hate wan tene kàɗɗa ge hoɗegeya zì, koo ge seɗɗa zì. Ge dwam ma zì mɔɗwag, koo mbi kaa fa̰meya ge camal, koo kaŋ zam zuli mbi ta bindig, koo kaŋ a̰me hoɗege mbi, ge sok ge diige go peɗ, mbi ha̰a̰le ha̰a̰le ge num zì.
50004013	A ge pool ge Krist ne ge ho̰ mbi ta, mbi mbyaɗ kee kaŋ mbe ma no peɗ.
50004014	Go no puy ɗe, ḛ kaa dagre ge mbi ge yal ge ambi ma zì.
50004015	Ḛ nda ge Filib ma, ḛ kuwa kuwa go sok ge mbi ee pe oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge suwa Maseduwan go, mbi ɗege ge sok mbe go no ɗe, ɓase ge Krist ne a̰me be mbaa mbi koo hon mbi a̰me to. Mbi see mbaaya ge ɓase ge Krist ne ma ne ge ḛ ta ɗeŋew. Mbi ɓanna ge ḛ, nè ka kee tèmel dagre sok hon ta mage ame mbaaya ma go ge ta buwal zì.
50004016	Sok ge mbi kaa ge suwal Tesalonik diŋ, ḛ teme mbi kaŋ ge mbi ɓyare mbaa tene ge num ma ya ndwa zi koo ndwa taa.
50004017	A be go mbi ɓyare bobo ge ḛ ḛ ma to. Ɗaŋɗe, kaŋ ge ga̰a̰l ge mbi ɓyare ne, ago Dok poo ḛ kon pagal ge mbaaya ge ḛ ḛ ma pe.
50004018	Mbi jan ḛ go, kaŋ ge ḛ teme mbi num ya ma, mbi see num. Àa waɗe waɗe ge hoɗegeya ge ambi ma pagal. Sok ge mbi gwan seɗ ge ɗogle ge Epafrodiɗ tok go, ago a̰me be gwan hoɗege mbi zum to. Bobo ge ḛ ḛ mbe ma, àa dinna ge dukan ge huu tii, àa kaɗ ge tuwaleya ge Dok vin num ma go, ge kee ne sḛ duul tii go me.
50004019	Dok ge ambi mbo hon ḛ kaŋ ge hoɗege ḛ ma peɗ, ge Zeso Krist ta, ge dape, a Dok ge kaŋ gan njonjon̰ ma ne.
50004020	Dok ge nè Ba mbiya saleya zaman mage zaman ma. Amin !
50004021	Ḛ sa̰a̰ ta wa ɗu ɗu peɗ, ḛ nda ge ho fareba ge ɓa̰a̰ no dagre ge Zeso Krist ma. Na̰ van ge i ge num no go dagre ma sa̰a̰ ḛ wa me.
50004022	Nda ge ho fareba ge no i ta ma sa̰a̰ ḛ wa. Ge gwan san ḛ wa gḛḛ ma, a num ge kee tèmel no ge Sezar diŋ ma.
50004023	Mbi kaɗeya go, nè Bagezok Zeso Krist ngay kwaɗa keeya ge na ne ge ḛ ta peɗ!
51001001	A mbi Pol, ndu ge Dok taa ne ge laa ɓyareya ge na ne pagal, ndwa go mbi kaa ndu ge temeya ge Zeso Krist ne. Mbi njaŋe lawayta mbe no ne, ɓanna ge na̰ van Timote,
51001002	hon ḛ, nda ge Dok mbege ḛ gezi ge na pe ge suwal Kolos diŋ-ge ma, ḛ, na̰ van mbe ge n̰a wa to, ge ɓa̰a̰ no dagre ge Zeso Krist ma. N̰a Dok ge nè Ba, ne ngay kwaɗa keeya ge na ne ge ḛ ta, ne ee ḛ kaɗ halas ge ta me.
51001003	Sok ge i kaɗ kee kaɗeya ge ḛ pe go, i gwan ge mersi keeya ɗaɗag hon Dok ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist Ba ge ḛ pe.
51001004	I kee mersi mbe ge dape, àa faa i fare ge hoɗ fareba ge ḛ ḛ, ge ḛ ho̰ ge Zeso Krist ta me no, ge ngayya ge ḛ ngay laa wanna no, ge nda ge Dok mbege num gezi caɗ ge na pe ma ta peɗ me.
51001005	Sok ge Fare ge Kwaɗa, ge fareba mbe dee ya ḛ ta go day, ee ḛ ya kuwa kaŋ kwaɗa ge Dok mbege num no, ge pḭḭ ma zì yà ge ḛ pe ma. Hoɗ fareba ge ḛ ḛ mage laa wanna ge ḛ ḛ mbe ee ḛ ya jobreya ge num pagal-la.
51001006	Fare ge Kwaɗa mbe ge dee ya ḛ ta, dasare go se ɗogle-ɗogle ge dunin̰a zì peɗ. Ee nda ya eya kaŋ keeya ge maa way ge sone ma, dinna ge a kee no ḛ buwal zì go, ge dwam ge ḛ ee pe za̰a̰ ne mage kuwa ne kuwaya ge fareba ya day go, Dok ngay na kwaɗa keeya ḛ ta.
51001007	Ḛ ame fare hateya mbe ma ge i kon ge tèmel ge laa wanna Epafras ta. Ne sḛ ndu ge tèmel ge n̰a wa to ge Krist nee ne, ge kee tèmel no ḛ buwal zì, ge mojo̰o̰ i daa mà kee ne ya go waɗme.
51001008	A ne sḛ wa̰a̰ i fare ma pe ne go, On̰om ge Harcal ee ḛ ngay laa wanna pe gyana de.
51001009	Ge ano mbe no pe, i sḛ ma waɗme, ge dwam ge àa fâ i ḛ fare go day, i lwage sok kaɗe Dok go to, ge ḛ pe. I kaɗe ne go, On̰om ge ne ne ho̰ ḛ andaŋ mage zwam ge ɓul mɔɗwag, ge ḛ wa deɗ-ɗa kuwa laa ɓyareya ge ne ne ma mɔɗwag me.
51001010	Go no me, ḛ wa gaa mbo mboya ge mbiya hon Bagezok hormo, sok kee kaŋ ge kee ne duul tii ma go. Ḛ wa ka kee kaŋ keeya ge kwaɗa ma, ḛ wa ka donna ge fare kuwaya ge Dok ne zì me.
51001011	Dok ne cirsi ḛ, ge pool ge na ne ge waɗe-waɗe, go mbe no, ḛ wa kaɗ nda ge wan ta deŋel ma, ge wan ta ma me ge kaŋ ma zì peɗ.
51001012	Ge laa saal zì, ḛ guwa̰ ge mersi keeya hon Dok ge nè Ba, ne ge seŋe ḛ ya nda ge mbyaɗɗa tab ma, ndwa go ḛ dee ya zam joo, ge na mbege ne no ge na muluk ge kɔn̰al zì yà, ge nda ge ho fareba na ta ma pe.
51001013	Harge nè ge pool ge tṵṵ ge ɗeɗeg ne tok zì ya, gene nè ja ge muluk ge na van ge laa wanna ne zì no.
51001014	A ge ne ta, nè see zuuya no, àa pore nè ne sone ma ya no me.
51001015	Ne sḛ Krist, a diir ge Dok ge ndu a̰me mbyaɗ kuwa ne ge na ndwa to nee ne. Ne sḛ go, zḛḛ ge go kaŋ a̰me wa ya be dolla. Ne sḛ kaŋ dolla ma pagal digi mɔɗwag me.
51001016	Ago, Dok ho̰ pool ge dol kaŋ ge no pḭḭ zì yà mage suwa pagal ma peɗ ge ne tok go: Kaŋ ge kuwa ge ndwa ma, ge kuwa ge ndwa to ma, malayka mage maa ga̰a̰l ge no ge pool ge kee muluk ma, ge ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme suwal no suwa pagal ma peɗ me. Kaŋ ma peɗ, àa doo num ge ne ta, ge ne pe me.
51001017	Ne sḛ Krist go ge zḛḛ ya day, àa gale wa ya be dol a̰me go ɗu to peɗ. Kaŋ ma peɗ ge no go ma, num peɗ mbe ge mḛḛ no maa sok ma go ma, àa mḛḛ ge ne ta.
51001018	Ne sḛ a pagal ne, ge ɓase ge na ne ge dḭḭ sḭḭ no ge na sḛ duul go ma ta. Ne sḛ pe dolla ge ndwa ge jin̰al nee ne, kaɗ ba ge zḛḛge ge ta̰a̰ ge ndwa fafa ge nda ge swày ma buwal zì, ndwa ngayya go ne kaŋ dolla ma pagal digi peɗ.
51001019	A mbe go, Dok ɓyare no go na kaa ge na van zì ɓul mɔɗwag mbe go waɗme.
51001020	A mbe go, vḭḭ tene no go, ge ne ta, na vuwa maa ge kaŋ dolla ma buwal digi. Ne ge ka̰a̰ na swàm se, sok n̰a tene mbo swày ge kaŋre digi go. Go mbe no me, Dok gene halas ya maa ge kaŋ ge no suwa pagal, koo ge pḭḭ zige ma buwal zì no.
51001021	Ḛ sḛ ma, ḛ kaa dee wal ge van gɔswal ma go Dok ndwa se, ḛ kaɗ ho̰o̰l ge ne, ge dwaɗɗa ge ḛ ḛ mage kaŋ keeya ge ḛ ḛ ge sone ma ta.
51001022	Ge sego, Dok vwal ḛ ge maa buwal ya go, ge swày ge na van ge no ge sḛ duul ge ndu duwana ne ta. Ke ano mbe ge dape, ḛ dee ya ge na ge Dok ndwa se kɔn̰al harcal, be fwaɗɗa, be fare a̰me ḛ pagal me.
51001023	Ɓyare go, ḛ kaa nda ge pe dolla ge pool ma, ɗuuya ndiŋ ge hoɗ fareba zì, ge go ḛ mbo gezi yà kaal to, ge jobreya ge ḛ ee ne no Fare ge Kwaɗa ge ḛ za̰a̰ ne pagal, ne ge àa oy ne no nda duwana ma ta, sok ma go mɔɗwag, ge mbi Pol, mbi gaa ya ndu ge tèmel ge Fare ge kwaɗa mbe ne pe me.
51001024	Ge sego, mbi kee laa saal ge yal ge mbi za̰a̰ ne no, ge ḛ pe. Go mbe no, mbi ame mage huy go yal ge Krist too mbi ya za̰a̰ya ma mbi sḛ duul zì, ge ɓase ge ne ne mbe ge dḭḭ sḭḭ no ge sḛ duul go ma pe.
51001025	Mbi seŋe ya ndu ge tèmel ge ɓase ge Krist ne ma way, ge dape a tèmel ge Dok ɓyare mbi kee ne ne ge ḛ pe. Mbi huy go tèmel ge oy Fare ge Dok ne mbe ge ɓul mɔɗwag.
51001026	Fare ge Kwaɗa mbe, a nuusiya ge ne ne ge ɗimil, ge way no ya day, ge doŋ pe ma ta peɗ, Dok ben num ja zum ge nda ge ho fareba na ta ma ta no.
51001027	Dok vḭḭ tene ngay na nda ma na nuusiya ge ɗimil ge ɓaŋlaŋ ge pe rusu ma pe peɗ no. Ne nuusiya ge ɗimil mbe go, Krist ge ḛ zì ge sego. A ne mbe ge ee ḛ jobreya ne go, ḛ mbo seɗ pateya ge Dok ne.
51001028	A Krist mbe, i oy ne fare, sok wuwage nda zḛḛ mage tyan nda pagal ge ne fare pagal, ge andaŋ ge Dok ho̰ i ne, ge go num dee ya zonna kekeŋ, ge ɓanna ge num ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Krist pe.
51001029	A ge pe no, mbi ho̰ tene tèmel ta no, mbi ge mbal twam no ge pool ge ɓaŋlaŋ ge Krist ne ge kee tèmel no mbi zì me.
51002001	Ge sego, mbi ɓyare ḛ dee ya kuwaya go, ne ma̰ kyarga ge ndaa kaka ge mbi iyal ne no go ge ḛ pe ne de. Mbi iyal kyarga go ge na̰ van ge suwal ga̰a̰l Lawdise diŋ-ge ma pe, ge num peɗ ge i ge num gale dee ya kuwa ta dwam ɗu to ma pe waɗme,
51002002	ndwa go num see pool, laa wanna dee ya ee num kàɗɗa dagre ɗu. Num kaa huyya mbalal ge zwam me. Ge ano mbe no ta, num wa mbo kuwa ɗimil ge Dok ne, ndwa go Krist sḛ ge na pagal.
51002003	Ago, ndu seɗ andaŋ mage kuwaya ge Dok ne mbe ge way way ma ge Krist ta.
51002004	Mbi njaŋe ḛ ano mbe no, ndwa go ndu a̰me ɗu see vin̰a ge ee ḛ vin na fare janna ge bale ma to.
51002005	Ge sego, kaɗɗa ge duul go, mbi go ge ḛ buwal zì to puy ɗe, a ge mojo̰o̰ mbi ɓanna dagre ge ḛ, ge on̰om zì go. Mbi sḛ ge laa saal, sok ge mbi za̰a̰ go kaŋ ma kee ge maa vin̰a go, hoɗ fareba ge ḛ ho̰ ge Krist ta pool.
51002006	Dinna ge ḛ ame Bagezok Zeso Krist no go, ḛ mbo ge nda ge ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge ne ma go me.
51002007	Ḛ mbo zḛḛ, ɗuuya ndiŋ ge ne, ḛ doo ḛ mboya pe ge ne pagal me, mḛḛya ndiŋ ge hoɗ fareba zì ge mojo̰o̰ ḛ see hateya go. Ḛ kaa nda ge gwan ge mersi keeya hon Dok ma me.
51002008	Ḛ koy ta kwaɗa, ne kaa ge ndu a̰me wa̰a̰ ḛ ge faɗe ge na zwam ge ndwa pe zige mage andaŋ ge nda duwana ma way ge bàŋ yag ma to. Hateya ge go mbe ma no, àa doo ge kaŋ keeya ge nda duwana ma way mage hateya ge on̰om ge wa̰a̰ dunin̰a no maa tok go ma way ma pagal me, be ge Krist ne ma pagal to.
51002009	Mbi jan ḛ go mbe ge dape, Dok go ge ɓul mɔɗwag ge Krist zì, ge ne sḛ duul go.
51002010	Ḛ sḛ ma waɗme, ge ɓanna ge ḛ ɓa̰a̰ no dagre ge Krist pe ɗe, ḛ ge kaŋ ma ge ɓul mɔɗwag me. Ago, ne sḛ ge malayka mage maa ga̰a̰l ge no ge pool ge kee muluk mage ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme suwal no suwa pagal ma pagal digi me.
51002011	Ge ɓanna ge ḛ ɓa̰a̰ digi dagre ɗu ge ne pe, ḛ see bḛḛ vyanna . Ḛ be seɗ bḛḛ vyanna ge nda duwana ma way ge duul go ge to, ɗaŋɗe, bḛḛ vyanna ge mbo no ge Krist ta ya, haɗ nè ya suli ge pool ge sone ne ge waɗe ne pagal mbe go.
51002012	Sok ge àa kee ḛ baptem go, ngay go àa mbuu ḛ mbul ɓanna dagre ge Krist, ngay go ḛ ta̰a̰ digi tan ɓanna dagre ge ne waɗme, ge dape ḛ ho fareba ge pool ge Dok ne mbe ge ta̰a̰ Krist ge nda ge swày ma buwal zì ta.
51002013	Ḛ kaa dee wal ge nda ge suu suu ma go ge Dok ndwa se, ge kaŋ keeya ge ḛ ḛ ge sone ma ta, ge dape ḛ kaa nda ge vin̰a bḛḛ ge duul go to ma ne. Ge sego, Dok gwan ge ḛ ja ge ndwa zì, ɓanna dagre ge Krist. Pore nè ne sone ma go peɗ.
51002014	Ago, maktub ge nè sone ma njaŋe no ne zì, num mbe ge wan nè ge fare ma, Dok guu num gul. Guu num sok n̰a na van mbo pella ɔwara kaŋre ta digi go.
51002015	Dok fwage pool-la go ge on̰om ge sone mage maa ga̰a̰l ma ta, ge nda ge pool no num tok go ɗeme suwal, ge no suwa pagal ma ta, ge swày ge Krist ne ta ge kaŋre digi. Ka zwal num bibil ge moor ge àa wan num ge twam zì ma go.
51002016	Go mbe no, ḛ n̰a ndu a̰me kṵṵ sariya ḛ pagal, ge kaŋ ge ḛ zam mage ḛ njoɗ ma pe to, koo ge dwam vḛḛso ge Yahuɗ ma way ma pe de, koo ge vḛḛso ge saba ee pe ndaaya ne de, koo vḛḛso ge dwam sabaɗ ne de to me.
51002017	Kaŋ mbe ma no peɗ, àa gḭḭl ge kaŋ ge mbiya mbo ya ma way ma ne boo. Ɗaŋɗe, kaŋ ge no go fareba, a Krist sḛ ge na ndwa geŋeŋ.
51002018	Ḛ n̰a ndu a̰me ee ḛ vinna go, halla ge Krist hon nda ne mbe, ḛ ne go to. Mbi jan ge nda ge ndil ta kee dok gḛḛ ma nda ndwa go, àa ka kee uwareya hon malayka ma me. Àa n̰a ta ge kaŋ ge maa kuwa num ge kin̰a zì ma pe yà. A fare ge nda duwana ma dwaɗ num maa pagal zì ma ne boo, àa ka jegreya bàŋ kay.
51002019	Àa daa sa̰a̰ go digi ge pagal to. A pagal mbe sḛ kee ne go duul ne kaa digi dagre ɗu biriya, kal wa ma sanna digi kakag ge too ta, Dok wa ka ee ne donna ge na ɓyare go me.
51002020	Ḛ kuwa kuwa go, sok ge ḛ ɓan dagre ge Krist go, ago ḛ suu suu ge ne waɗme. Pool ge kee muluk ge on̰om mbe ge wa̰a̰ dunin̰a maa tok go ma daa be vin̰a a̰me ge ḛ pagal. Ajo̰o̰ na mbe go, ḛ gwan kee gyana ge mojo̰o̰ num ɗeme ḛ go ne go iya de? Ḛ n̰a ta mboya ge eeya ge nda way ma pe yà, num mbe ge jan go:
51002021	«Kee tèmel ge kaŋ ano mbe no to!» «Taa kaŋ ge ano mbe no mo wa zì to!» «Taa mo tok kaŋ gegene mbe no ta to!»
51002022	Eeya mbe ma no peɗ, àa ge kaŋ ge kale gezi ma pe, guwa̰ ge ndu kee tèmel ge num go to wa? Ḛ kuwa go num wa yuwaleya mage hateya ge nda duwana ma way ma ne boo.
51002023	A fareba go, eeya ge go mbe ma, ge pool din kaŋ keeya ge andaŋ ma, ago, àa ɓyare ge nda ta go, nda kaa nda ge kee dok gḛḛ ma, nda ge pagal gwanna se mage za̰a̰ duul yal me. Ano peɗ puy ɗe, num fare pe a̰me to me, àa ee nda duwana ma jegreya boo, ge maa kaŋ keeya mbe ma ta.
51003001	Ajo̰o̰ ḛ ta̰a̰ tan ge Krist dagre ɗe, gaa go ḛ laa ɓyare kaŋ ge pḭḭ zì yà ge ma, num ge no ge sok ge Krist kaa no go, ge tok matoson ge Dok ne pagal-la ma.
51003002	Ḛ duwa ɗaɗag ge kaŋ ge pḭḭ zì yà ge ma pagal, ḛ kaa ge be ee ḛ dwaɗɗa halŋaŋ ge kaŋ ge dunin̰a ne ma pagal to.
51003003	Ge dape, ḛ suu suu ge kaŋ keeya ge ḛ ḛ ge wal ma go, ndwa ge ḛ see ge jin̰al way way, ge Krist dagre, ge Dok ta digi yà.
51003004	Sok ge Krist mbe ge ho̰ ḛ ndwa ge fareba mbe, mbo dyan ja zum, a ge sok mbe go, ḛ sḛ ma dee wa dyan-na zum ge ne dagre, ḛ wa seɗ pateya ge ne ne mbe me.
51003005	Ge ano mbe no pe, ḛ ba̰a̰ kaŋ keeya ge sḛ duul ne ma gezi ge ḛ pagal zì: Kaŋ keeya ge bàŋ yag, kaŋ keeya ge seŋre ma, ene sḛ duul, dwaɗɗa ge kee sone ge ɗogle ma, ene ge kaŋ dunin̰a ma pe, ge seŋe ge mojo̰o̰ siim go ma me.
51003006	A kaŋ keeya ge go mbe ma, zwal twam ge Dok ne ya ne ge nda ge gwan maa pagal ne eeya ma pe se to ma pagal.
51003007	Ḛ sḛ ma puy, ḛ ka mboya dee wal mbe go, ndwa go kàɗɗa ge ḛ ḛ ge dee wal, kaŋ keeya ge go mbe kaa ge pool ge ḛ pagal go.
51003008	Ɗaŋɗe ge sego, ḛ sḛ ma waɗme, ḛ ɔwabe ta ge kaŋ keeya ge sone mbe ma ta gezi: Laa hoɗɗa, twam juliliya, laa pisil, sal nda, fare janna ge asar ge ndage no ge ḛ wa zì ma me.
51003009	Ḛ daa gwan kun ta hày to, ndwa go ḛ fwage diir ge wal-la gezi yà, ge na kaŋ keeya ma.
51003010	Ge sego, ḛ hee go diir ge jin̰al ge Dok ge doo ḛ ne. A ne sḛ ge ho̰ ḛ diir ge jin̰al mbe sḛ kee tèmel ne ɗogle-ɗogle ge ḛ dul wa ma zì, ge go ḛ dee ya din na, ḛ wa deɗ-ɗa kuwa na kwaɗa tyatyaɗ me.
51003011	Ge diir ge jin̰al mbe ge ḛ no ge ne mbe zì me ɗe, Dok daa gwan vare ndu a̰me to. Nda mbiya ta peɗ, fare a̰me ge Yahuɗ daa to, Grek daa to me. Nda ge vin̰a bḛḛ ma daa to, nda ge vin̰a bḛḛ to ma daa to me. Van gɔswal ma daa to me no, van suwal ma daa to me, nda ge ndwa zo̰o̰ ma daa to me no, nda ge ndwa zo̰o̰ to ma daa to me, moor ma daa to me no, nda ge suli ma daa to me. Krist gaa kaŋ ge mbiya ne ɗu, ne sḛ go ge ndu ge diige ge no ge diir ge jin̰al zì.
51003012	Ḛ kuwa go, ḛ nda ge Dok taa ḛ tal ma ne, mbege ḛ gezi no caɗ ge na pe, ne laa wa̰a̰ ḛ wan me. Ajo̰o̰ na mbe go, ḛ kaa nda ge kuwa nda a̰se ma, nda ge kee nda kwaɗa ma, nda ge suul lɔlɔgwaɗ ma, nda ge suul ma, nda ge wan ta fare ma zì peɗ ma me.
51003013	Ḛ kaa nda ge deŋel ma sok in ta go. Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me go ge fare ge na kon ta, ḛ pore ta ge ta buwal zì. Ge mojo̰o̰ Bagezok sḛ pore ḛ no go, ḛ sḛ ma pore ta mbe go waɗme.
51003014	Ɗaŋɗe, kaŋ ge waɗe, ago ḛ kaa nda ge laa wan ta ma, ndwa go laa wanna ee nda sanna digi kakag ne.
51003015	Ɓyare go halas mbe ge Krist gene ne ya, ne ɗeme ḛ ge kaŋ ge ḛ dwaɗ kee num ma zì. Dok too ḛ ya ne, dinna ge sḛ duul go, kàɗɗa halas ge ta. Ge ano mbe no pe, ḛ guwa̰ ge mersi keeya ɗaɗag hon ne me.
51003016	N̰a fare ge àa hate ḛ num Krist pagal ma, num ee vum ge ḛ zì gḛḛ ceɗeɗ. Ḛ hate ta fare mbe mage mḛḛre ta mḛḛreya ge na vin̰a go ma me. Ḛ mbaa Dok kaŋ mballa ge dul wa ɗu, ge dwaɗɗa ge gwan ge ne mersi. Ḛ mbaa ne kaŋ mballa ge uware ne ma, ḛ mbaa ne gagso mage kaŋ mballa ge On̰om ee nda mbal num ma me.
51003017	Kaŋ ge ḛ mbiya kee num ma peɗ, koo a fare janna zì, koo a tèmel keeya zì, ḛ kee num ge dḭḭl ge Bagezok Zeso ne pe. Ge ne dḭḭl zì, ḛ guwa̰ ge mersi keeya ɗaɗag hon Dok ge nè Ba me.
51003018	Mbi jan fare ḛ nda zaab ge kaa zok ma, n̰a ndu ge diige ne guwa̰ na pagal ge na obe pe se, a kaŋ ge num ge ame Bagezok ma mbiya kee nee ne.
51003019	Mbi jan ḛ nda soɗob ge kaa zok ma go, n̰a ndu ge diige laa wa̰a̰ na gwale, ne kaa ge be kee ne sone to.
51003020	Mbi jan ano mbe ḛ nda jabso, ḛ za̰a̰ ḛ ba ma wa, dwam ma zì mɔɗwag. A ano mbe no mbiya keeya ne ge Bagezok ta.
51003021	Ḛ ge ba ma, ne kaa ge ḛ ee ḛ van ma haɗ n̰ama ɗoo, ee num duul eyalla to.
51003022	Mbi jan ḛ moor ma go, ḛ za̰a̰ ḛ ba ge zok ge dunin̰a zige ma wa. Be ge sok ge àa kaɗ ge ḛ ta ge maa ndwa ngaraf go ɗeŋew, ge dwaɗɗa ge kee num duul tii to. Ɗaŋɗe, ḛ ho̰ ta ge dul wa ɗu ge tèmel keeya ta, ge dape ḛ hon Bagezok hormo.
51003023	Ḛ ho̰ ta ge tèmel ge diige ta keeya ge dul wa ɗu, ge mojo̰o̰ nda kee ne hon Bagezok go, be ge nda kee nda duwana ma way boo go to.
51003024	Ḛ sḛ ma kuwa kuwa go ḛ mbo seɗ poɗɗa ge Bagezok ta, ndwa go kaŋ ge kê wa tii num pagal ge na nda ma pe ma. Ago, Ba ge ḛ mbiya kee ne tèmel fareba, a Zeso Krist.
51003025	Ndu ge kee sone, mbo seɗ poɗɗa ge kaŋ keeya ge na ne ge sone ma way ngaɗ, mbo vare ndu a̰me to baɗ.
51004001	Ḛ ge moor ma ba ma, ḛ ke ḛ moor ma kaŋ keeya ge temel ma, ḛ ndil num ge ḛ sḛ ma go. Ḛ sḛ ma waɗme, ḛ kuwa kuwa go, ḛ go ge Ba a̰me ɗu ge kaa no pḭḭ ma zì yà.
51004002	Ḛ kaa nda ge deŋel ma ge kaɗeya zì. Ḛ kaa yaŋ-yaŋ, sok kee kaɗeya go, ḛ ka gwan ge mersi ɗaɗag hon Dok me.
51004003	Ḛ ke kaɗeya ge i pe go, Dok tin̰a vin̰a kwaɗa ge i pagal, ndwa oy fare ge na ne, ndwa ben fare ɗimil ge Krist ne ma ya zum, num ge ee mbi za̰a̰ yal no ge daŋay zì, mà ge sego ma.
51004004	Ḛ kee kaɗeya waɗme go, mbi see pool ge faa fare ɗimil mbe ge nda ta gezi kɔn̰al yaɗaɗ, ge mojo̰o̰ Dok sḛ ɓyare ne ge mbi ta go.
51004005	Ḛ mbo mboya ge kwaɗa, ge nda ge ame Krist to ma buwal zì, sok ge ḛ seɗ vin̰a ge kee a̰me ɗe, ḛ kee ne waɗ gaw.
51004006	N̰a fare janna ge ḛ ḛ ma, num kaa fare janna ge ngay kwaɗa keeya ge Dok ne ma ɗaɗag, ge fare ge mbaaya ma gḛḛ ge maa zì me, ndwa go ḛ wa kaɗ nda ge kuwa gwan ndu ge diige fare janna ge na vin̰a ma me.
51004007	Tichig, nè kon ge tèmel, nè na̰ van ge laa wanna, ne ge n̰a wa to mbe, ne mbe ge mbaa nè no ge tèmel ge Bagezok ne zì, mbo wan ḛ mbi fare ma pe mɔɗwag.
51004008	Mbi teme ḛ ne ya ne pool, ndwa go ḛ dee ya kuwaya kwaɗa go i kaa go gyana de. Go mbe no ɗe, ḛ dul wa ma wa ee se me.
51004009	Mbi teme num yà dagre ge na̰ van ge laa wanna ge n̰a wa to Onezim, ge ḛ van. Àa mbo wan ḛ kaŋ ge kee no i ta go ma pe peɗ.
51004010	Aristark, mbi kon ge i ge ne no ge daŋay zì sa̰a̰ ḛ wa. Mark ge Barnabas ba van, sa̰a̰ ḛ wa waɗme. I hoɗ i wa ya go ge ne pe, kaɗɗa na deɗ-ɗa ge ḛ buwal zì yà, ḛ ame ne kwaɗa me.
51004011	Zeso ge ne dḭḭl ge zi no go justis sa̰a̰ ḛ wa waɗme. Ge van Yahuɗ ge ame fare ge Krist ne ma buwal zì, a num mbe ge taa ma ɗeŋew mbaa mbi go ne, oy fare ge muluk ge Dok ne pe. Àa hon mbi pool gḛḛ gaw.
51004012	Epafras ge ḛ van sa̰a̰ ḛ wa waɗme. Ndu ge tèmel ge Zeso Krist ne, kee kaɗeya ɗaɗag ge ḛ pe, ndwa go ḛ dee ya ɗuuya ndiŋ, zonna kekeŋ Dok zì, ḛ ge ho̰ ta hon ndwa huy laa ɓyareya ge Dok ne wa mɔɗwag ma go me.
51004013	Mbi ge pool kee sayda mbe no go, ne ho̰ tene mɔɗwag ge tèmel ta, ge ḛ pe, ge nda ge ho fareba ge Krist ta, ge suwal Lawdise mage Hiyerapolis diŋ-ge ma pe waɗme.
51004014	Luk, nè kondore ge laa wanna ge doktor mage Demas sa̰a̰ ḛ wa.
51004015	Ḛ sa̰a̰ na̰ van ge soɗob mage zaab ge no suwal ga̰a̰l Lawdise diŋ-ge ma wa, ḛ sa̰a̰ Nimfa mage ɓase ge Krist ne ge kwate no ne diŋ ma wa waɗme.
51004016	Guwa̰ ge ḛ mbo isi lawayta mbe ya ta buwal zì, ḛ teme ne mbo hon ɓase ge Krist ne ge suwal ga̰a̰l Lawdise diŋ-ge ma. Ḛ ɓyare vin̰a ge isi lawayta ge mbi teme nda ge Lawdise ma ne yà waɗme.
51004017	Ḛ jin̰a Archib, ne doo na ndwa ge tèmel ge Bagezok ho̰ na ne keeya pagal, ne huy ne wa kwaɗa me.
51004018	Mbi wa sanna ma no ɗe, mbi sḛ Pol, mbi njaŋe num ne ge mbi tok zì. Ɓyare go ḛ vyale to, mbi ge daŋay zì. Mbi kaɗeya go Dok ngay kwaɗa keeya ge na ne ge ḛ ta.
52001001	A mbi Pol, ɓanna ge Silvḛ mage Timote njaŋe lawayta mbe no ne, hon ḛ ɓase ge Krist ne ge kaa no suwal ga̰a̰l Tesalonik diŋ ma, ge seŋe ya Dok ge nè Ba mage nè Bagezok Zeso Krist nda ma. Mbi kaɗe Dok go, ne ngay kwaɗa keeya ge na ne ge ḛ ta, ne ho̰ ḛ halas me.
52001002	I gwan ge mersi keeya ɗaɗag hon Dok ge ḛ pe peɗ, i ka kee kaɗeya ge ḛ pe waɗme.
52001003	Sok ge i kaɗ kee kaɗeya ge Dok ge nè Ba ta, i dwaɗ ɗaɗag ge kaŋ keeya ge ḛ ḛ ge ngay go, ḛ ho fareba ge Zeso Krist ta, ge laa wanna ge ḛ ngay ne no ge nda ta mage jobreya ge ḛ ḛ ge ɗû no ndiŋ ge gwanna ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist ne ya pe.
52001004	Na̰ van ma, i kuwa kuwa go Dok laa wa̰a̰ ḛ wan, taa ḛ no go ḛ kaa nda ge na ne ma.
52001005	I kuwa ano mbe ge dape, i be wuwage ḛ Fare ge Kwaɗa ge Zeso ne, ge i wa bàŋ go cuɗ to, ɗaŋɗe, a ge pool ge waɗe-waɗe ge On̰om ge Harcal ne ta waɗme. I kaa ge kuwaya tyatyaɗ go, fare janna ge i i ma, num fare ge gag ma ne. Sok ge i kaa ḛ buwal zì yà, ḛ kuwa kaŋ keeya ge i i ma, i ka kee num ndwa go, ḛ see mbaaya ge num ta.
52001006	Kaɗɗa ge ḛ sḛ ma ɗe, ḛ deɗ ja kee kaŋ ge i kee num ma, ge Bagezok ne ma me. Ge iigiya ge gḛḛ ma zì puy, ḛ ame Fare ge Bagezok ne, On̰om ge Harcal ee ḛ gwan ka kee laa saal no.
52001007	Go mbe no, ḛ seŋe ya kaŋ ko pul ge nda ge ho fareba ma way peɗ, ge suwa ge Maseduwan mage Akay ne go.
52001008	Ge ḛ ta, nda gḛḛ za̰a̰ fare ge nè Bagezok ne ya go, be ge suwa ge Maseduwan mage Akay ne go ɗeŋew to, ɗaŋɗe, hoɗ fareba ge ḛ ḛ ge Dok ta, ne fare deɗ-ɗa ge sok ma go peɗ, i daa gwan jan nda ne jan to.
52001009	Ndu ge diige, faa fare ge ameya ge ḛ ame i, ge n̰aaya ge ḛ n̰a kaŋ siim keeya ma gezi, sok seŋe ta ya ge Dok ge ndwa ge fareba ta, ndwa kee ne tèmel,
52001010	mage da̰a̰re go Zeso, Van ge Dok ne ge mbo no ge pḭḭ ma zì ya, ne ge Dok ta̰a̰ ne ge nda ge swày ma buwal zì, ge mbo mon nè ya, sok ge Dok mbo ɗegeya kun sariya ge nda duwana ma pagal, ge dape, ne laa hoɗ-ɗa ge num ta, ge sone ge num way ma pe.
52002001	Na̰ van ma, ḛ sḛ ma kuwa kuwa tyatyaɗ go, mboya ge i i ya ge ḛ buwal zì, be kaɗ mboya ge bàŋ kay ne to.
52002002	Ḛ ge kuwaya go, zḛḛ ge go i dee ya ge ḛ ta ɗe, i see saaso mage iyalla ge suwal Filib diŋ ya. Ɗaŋɗe, ge ho̰o̰l mbe ma buwal zì puy ɗe, Dok ge nè ne, ho̰ i pool ge wuwage ḛ Fare ge Kwaɗa ge na ne no.
52002003	I fare moɗegeya mbe ma be fare ge hày ma ne to, àa kaɗ fare ge seŋre ma koo ge zwam ge ndwa pe zige ma to me.
52002004	Ɗaŋɗe, i jan fare ge Dok jin̰a i go, i jin̰a num ma ɗeŋew, ge dape, kugi i kugi, see no go i nda ge n̰a wa to ma ne, n̰a Fare ge Kwaɗa mbe ge i tok go no, ndwa go i oy ne ge nda ta. Dok ge kuwa i dwaɗɗa ma, i kee ne laa ɓyareya, be laa ɓyareya ge nda duwana ma way ma to.
52002005	Ḛ kuwa kuwa tyatyaɗ go, i be jan fare mbe ma ndwa bwaɗe ḛ, ge go i wa seɗ a̰me ge ḛ ta to. Ago Dok i sayda ne.
52002006	I be ɓyare go nda duwana ma ho̰ i hormo ne to, koo ḛ sḛ ma, koo nda ge ɗogle ma. Ajo̰o̰ i nda ge temeya ge Zeso Krist ne ma ne, i daa mà ɓyare go ḛ ho̰ i hormo mbe go no.
52002007	Go no puy, i kaa suul ge ḛ buwal zì dinna ge van ma na̰ kwacware tene ge num, sok hon num pam go go.
52002008	Ge laa wanna ge i no ge ne ge ḛ pe, i ka zeɗ zeɗ, be ɓyare hon ḛ Fare ge Kwaɗa ge Dok ne ɗeŋew to, ɗaŋɗe, i ho̰ ta ge ɓul mɔɗwag ge ḛ pe, ge dape, i laa hê ḛ gḛḛ.
52002009	Ago na̰ van ma, ḛ be vyale ge yal ge i ka za̰a̰ ne ge ḛ buwal zì, sok kee tèmel ma go to. I ka kee tèmel ɗaal mage gyala, ge dape, i be ɓyare go ndu a̰me he dṵṵl ge wal i ge na pagal to, sok ge i ka oy ḛ Fare ge Kwaɗa ge Dok ne go.
52002010	Ḛ ge ne kuwaya, Dok sḛ ge ne kuwaya waɗme go, sok ge i kaa ge ḛ ge hoɗ fareba ma buwal zì, mboya ge i i kaa kwaɗa, kaɗ temel, fare a̰me ge sone be kaɗ ge i pagal to me.
52002011	Ḛ ge kuwaya waɗme go, i ka in ta ge ndu ge diige dinna ge van ma ba hon tene ge na van ma pe go.
52002012	I be lwage ge sok moɗege ḛ mage hon ḛ pool go to, sok kaɗe ḛ ge aa ta, ḛ mbo ge laa ɓyareya ge Dok ne pagal, ne ge too ḛ ya kee muluk ge na, ge pateya ge na ne pe.
52002013	I kee mersi ɗaɗag hon Dok ge ano mbe no pe waɗme: Sok ge i dee kaa ge ḛ buwal zì yà oy ḛ fare ge Dok ne go, ḛ za̰a̰ ne, ḛ ame ne no, ge kuwaya tyatyaɗ go, ne be fare ge mbo no ge nda duwana ma ta ne to, ɗaŋɗe, ge Dok ta ya, ndwa mbaa ḛ ge ho fareba ma, mbo mboya ge kee na duul tii.
52002014	Na̰ van ma, ago yal ge ḛ ka̰a̰m kee ḛ ne no, a dinna ca ge yal ge ɓase ge Dok ne ge ɓa̰a̰ no dagre ge Krist ma, ge no ge suwa ge Jude ne go ma za̰a̰ ne, ge maa ka̰a̰m Yahuɗ ma tok go go waɗme.
52002015	Yahuɗ mbe ge hṵṵ Bagezok Zeso mage nda ge zwagre Dok wa a̰me ma, àa num sḛ ma kee i yal ne me. Dok duul za̰a̰ tii ge num kaŋ keeya mbe ma to, àa ho̰o̰l ge nda duwana ma peɗ me.
52002016	Àa tele i be oy nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma fare ge mbiya ee num deɗ-ɗa ge monna go. Sok kee ano mbe go, àa gwan kee go sone ge ɗogle ma kon pagal. Go mbe no, àa zwal twam ge Dok ne ja zwal zoo ge maa pagal.
52002017	Na̰ van ma, kaɗɗa ge i sḛ ma ɗe, ge vaaya ge nè va swag no pe, i ge ḛ buwal zì yà to puy ɗe, i dwaɗ go ge ḛ pagal. I ɓyare vin̰a ya tata gwan mbo kuwa ḛ ndwa, ge dape, ḛ wan i ya ene gḛḛ.
52002018	A ge pe, i ɓyare gwan-na mbo ndil ḛ no, kaɗɗa ndu ge mbi Pol go, mbi ɓyare vin̰a ndwa ɗu koo zi go deɗ ḛ ta yà, ɗaŋɗe, Saytan be n̰a i vin̰a to.
52002019	I ee i jobreya ge ḛ pagal go, ḛ mbo kaɗ mḛḛya ndiŋ ge hoɗ fareba ge ḛ ḛ ma zì. I kee laa saal, ge dape, i mbo ame balme ge Bagezok ta, ge ḛ pe, ge dwam gwanna ge ne ne ya go.
52002020	O̰o̰, i seɗ pateya mage laa saal ge ḛ ta ba!
52003001	A ge pe, i mbiya wan ta to no, i vḭḭ ta no go, i gaa kàɗɗa hini ge suwal Aten diŋ.
52003002	I teme ḛ nè na̰ van Timote, i kon ge tèmel ge Dok ne, ge no ge Fare ge Kwaɗa ge Krist ne pe oyya, ne moɗege ḛ mage ee ḛ ɗuuya ge hoɗ fareba ge ḛ ḛ ma zì,
52003003	ndwa go ndu a̰me see iigiya ge pe heeya ma zì to. Ago, ḛ ge ne kuwaya tyatyaɗ go, nè kaa ge yal mbe ma zì.
52003004	Sok ge i kaa ge ḛ buwal zì yà go, i tin̰a ḛ pagal gezi go, nè mbo seɗ yal ma. A num mbe ma yin̰a ya ne, ge mojo̰o̰ ḛ kuwa num no go.
52003005	A ge pe, sok deɗ-ɗa wan ta to mbe go, mbi teme ḛ Timote yà no go, ne hale fare ma pe ge vin̰a hoɗ fareba ge ḛ ḛ ma pagal go, ge dwaɗɗa ge go Ba ge hee nda pe doo ḛ ɗoo, tèmel ge i kê ḛ buwal zì jiya bàŋ i ta to.
52003006	Ge sego, Timote deɗ ja ge i ta. Wan i ḛ fare ge kwaɗa mbe ma pe ya go, ge vin̰a hoɗ fareba mage laa wanna ge ḛ ḛ mbe ma way. Wa̰a̰ i fare pe ge dwaɗɗa ge ḛ dwaɗ i no mage vin̰a ge ḛ ɓyare no kuwa i ndwa ge mojo̰o̰ i iigi ta ge ḛ pe no go waɗme.
52003007	Ago na̰ van ma, i dul wa ee ya se, ge i yal mage i iigiya ma zì, sok ge i za̰a̰ go ḛ gale mḛḛ go ndiŋ ge ḛ hoɗ fareba ma zì.
52003008	Ge sego, i duul ɔwabe ya digi poliyom ge kàɗɗa ge i i zì, ge dape, ḛ be tigri ge guwa̰ to, sok mboya ge ko pul ge Bagezok ne go.
52003009	Laa saal ge i kee ne ge Dok ndwa se ge ḛ pe no, koo i uware ne pe gyana-gyana de puy, mbyaɗ a̰me pe to.
52003010	I kee kaɗeya ge aa ta ɗaal mage gyala go, vin̰a tin̰a ge i pagal, ge i wa mbo kuwa ḛ ndwa mage mbo hon ḛ hateya ge ee fareba hoɗɗa ge ḛ ḛ wa huyya tab.
52003011	I kaɗeya go, Dok sḛ ge nè Ba mage nè Bagezok Zeso, num hage vin̰a ge i pagal ndwa go i dee ge ḛ ta yà.
52003012	I kaɗeya go, Bagezok ee laa wanna, ge ḛ ḛ wa ka zamma zḛḛ zḛḛ, ge ta buwal zì, ge nda ta peɗ, ge mojo̰o̰ laa wanna ge i ngay ne ge ḛ ta go.
52003013	Go mbe no, Dok ge nè Ba cirsi ḛ waɗme, ndwa go ḛ kaa nda ge ne mbege ḛ gezi ge na pe ma, ge be fare ge maa pagal ma ge na ndwa se, ge dwam gwanna ge nè Bagezok Zeso ne ya ɓanna ge na nda ge harcal ma peɗ.
52004001	Na̰ van ma, fare ge ɗogle ge mbi ɓyare jan ḛ num ma no, ḛ see hateya ge mbo mboya ge kee Dok sḛ tii ge i ta, ḛ kee go num no. Ɗaŋɗe, ḛ gwan kee waɗeya ge kon pagal. A kaŋ ge i ele ge ḛ ta mage yuwale ḛ ge num pagal ma ne, ge ɓanna ge nè ɓa̰a̰ ge nè Bagezok Zeso pe.
52004002	I yuwale ḛ mbe go ge dape, ḛ kuwa kuwa go, fare ge i hate ḛ ge num pagal ma, num fare ge i see num ge nè Bagezok Zeso ta ma ne.
52004003	Laa ɓyareya ge Dok ne go: Ḛ kaa harcal, ḛ ɔwabe ta gezi ge ene sḛ dṵṵl ne go,
52004004	ndu ge diige wa̰a̰ tene ge na gwale bàba, ndu ge kee go mbe, kaɗ harcal, seɗ hormo,
52004005	be ge ne n̰a tene waɗ ge ene ge gḛḛ zì, dinna ge rusu ge ɗogle ge kuwa Dok to ma kee go to.
52004006	Ge fare mbe no pe, n̰a ndu a̰me lasage na na̰ van, sok chel ne guwa̰ go to. Ḛ kuwa go, num ge kee kaŋ ge go mbe ma, Bagezok mbo gene yal ya ge num pagal. I dee jan ḛ num ya go, i ndiri ḛ tɔgwa ge num pagal no me.
52004007	Ago Dok be tol nè ya go, nè kaa nda ge kee kaŋ keeya ge seŋre ma to, ɗaŋɗe, nda ge mbegeya gezi caɗ ge na pe ma.
52004008	A ge pe no, ndu ge kuri hateya mbe ma no ya, be kuri nda duwana ma fare to, ɗaŋɗe, kuri eeya ge Dok ne ma, ne ge ho̰ ḛ na On̰om ge Harcal waɗme.
52004009	Kaɗɗa ge fare ge laa wanna ge na̰ van ma way ge ta buwal zige pe ɗe, ḛ gwan ɓyare go i njaŋe ḛ a̰me ne pagal mbḛḛ de! Ago fare ge Dok ne, ge àa hate ḛ num ma, tyan ḛ angal ma ya gezi go, ḛ ge ho fareba ma laa mbiya wan ta ta buwal zì pe gyana de.
52004010	A fareba, ḛ kee ne sḛ go ge na̰ van ma ta peɗ, ge no ge suwa ge Maseduwan ne go mɔɗwag. Ɗaŋɗe, na̰ van ma, i gwan kaɗe ḛ go, ḛ gwan kee waɗeya kon pagal.
52004011	I gwan moɗege ḛ iya go, ḛ kaa halas ge ta, ḛ dḭḭ gyala ge nda fare ma pe wanna to, ḛ ke tèmel ge ta pe, ge mojo̰o̰ i dee ho ḛ i wa go.
52004012	Kaɗɗa ḛ kee mbe go, ḛ mbo da̰a̰re ndu tok to, nda ge ho fareba to ma mbo hon ḛ hormo me.
52004013	Na̰ van ma, i ɓyare go ḛ dee ya kuwa fare ge nda ge ho fareba ge suu ma way gezi hetel, ndwa go, ḛ ke kiimi dinna ge nda ge no be jobreya ma go to.
52004014	Kaɗɗa nè hoɗ fareba ya go Zeso suu, ne ta̰a̰ ge swày se no, go mbe no, nè ho fareba waɗme go, num ge ho fareba ge suu ma, Dok mbo tan num ge swày se, àa kaɗ ɓanna dagre ge Zeso.
52004015	Ge ano mbe no pe, mbi jan ḛ fare ge ndage ge Bagezok wa zì. Dwam ge Bagezok mbo gwan ja, nè ge mbo gaa ya ge ndwa ma, nè mbo mbo ɓan dagre ge ne, ge nda ge suu ma ndwa zḛḛ to baɗ.
52004016	Ago, Dok mbo hoɗ malayka ma na wa, num ga̰a̰l mbo oy ge ka̰a̰l ndaal, burji ge Dok ne mbo sun, Bagezok sḛ mbo mbo ge pḭḭ digi ya mḛḛya ge sa̰a̰m zì. Nda ge ho fareba ge Krist ta, ge suu ma mbo tan zḛḛ ne ɓiya.
52004017	Guwa̰, nè mbe ge mbo gaa ya ge ndwa ge suwa pagal ma, nè ge num peɗ mbo ɓan mbo seɗ ne ge sa̰a̰m digi yà. Nè mbo gaa kaɗ dagre ɗaɗag ge Bagezok.
52004018	Ḛ ka hon ta pool ta ta buwal zì ge fare mbe ma no.
52005001	Na̰ van ma, kaɗɗa ge dwam mage sok ge kaŋ mbe ma kin̰are ɗegeya keeya go ɗe, ḛ gwan ɓyare go i njaŋe ḛ a̰me num pagal mbḛḛ de.
52005002	Ago, ḛ sḛ ma ge kuwaya tyatyaɗ go, dwam gwanna ge Bagezok ne ya, mbo tan nè tugcug dinna ge chala mbo ya ge ɗaal zì go.
52005003	Sok ge nda ge ho fareba to ma, mbo ɗegeya janna go: Sok eyalla se i ta, ho̰o̰l daa to! A ge sok mbe go, yal ma wa deɗ-ɗa ge num pagal tugcug dinna ge yal ge twàl ne seɗ ndu gwale ge emel go, ɗaŋɗe, àa mbo ɓuu gezi to.
52005004	Na̰ van ma, kaɗɗa ge ḛ sḛ ma ɗe, ḛ be ge tṵṵ ge ɗeɗeg ne ma ne to, ge go dwam mbe ta̰a̰ ḛ dinna ge chala tan nda go to.
52005005	Mbi jan ḛ ano mbe no ge dape, ḛ sḛ ma peɗ, ḛ ge kɔn̰al ne ma ne, ḛ kaŋ keeya ma ge kɔn̰al go. Nè be ge ɗaal ne ma to koo ge tṵṵ ge ɗeɗeg ne ma to me.
52005006	Be mbyaɗ go nè fii dwam dinna ge nda mbe ge ho fareba to ma go to, ɗaŋɗe, nè kaa jejew, nè kaa nda ge wan ta ma me.
52005007	Ne kaa ge ḛ fii dwam dinna ge nda ge fii dwam ɗaal zì ma go to, ḛ fere ta ge mojo̰o̰ nda ge fere jin̰al ma fere ta ge ɗaal zì go to me.
52005008	Kaɗɗa ge nè sḛ ma ɗe, nè ge kɔn̰al ne ma ne, nè kaa nda ge wan ta ma. Ɓyare go hoɗ fareba mage laa wanna ge nè ne ma cage nè dinna ge goŋroŋ cage ndu ge mbal twam go, jobreya ge jwab ge go Zeso mbo mon nè, ne cage nè dinna ge jum walam cage ndu ge mbal twam go waɗme.
52005009	Ago, Dok be tol nè ya go, nè dee ya ge sariya ge na mbo kun ne ya, ge nda pagal zì to, ɗaŋɗe, taa nè go nè dee ya ge monna go, ge kaŋ ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist kê pe,
52005010	ne sḛ ge see swày ge nè pe, ndwa go, koo nè gale kaa ge ndwa koo nè suu ya, nè kaa ɓanna dagre ge na.
52005011	Go mbe no, ḛ ka hon ta pool ta ta buwal zì, ḛ ka mbaa ta dinna ge ḛ kee ne ya day go.
52005012	Na̰ van ma, i kaɗe ḛ kaɗe go, ḛ ho̰ nda ge ho̰ ta ge tèmel ge Dok ne pe, ge no ḛ buwal zì ma hormo. Num ge ɗeme ḛ mage yuwale ḛ ge wa hoɗɗa ge Bagezok ne pagal ma.
52005013	Ḛ ngay hormo mage laa wanna ge ɓaŋlaŋ ge num ta, ge tèmel ge num kee pe. Ḛ kaa halas ge ta.
52005014	Na̰ van ma, i gwan kaɗe ḛ go, ḛ mḛḛre nda ge za̰a̰ wa to ma, ḛ ka mbaa nda ge tuguɗi ma, ḛ ka kwate nda ge mɔgeya ma, ḛ ka in ta ge nda peɗ.
52005015	Ḛ ke angal, ne kaa ge ndu a̰me poo sone ge sone to, ɗaŋɗe, ḛ yin̰a kwaɗa keeya pe ɗaɗag ge ta ta buwal zì, ge nda ta peɗ me.
52005016	Ḛ ke laa saal ɗaɗag.
52005017	Ḛ ka kee kaɗeya ɗaɗag.
52005018	Ge fare ma zì peɗ, ḛ ke mersi hon Dok, ge dape, ne sḛ ɓyare go, ḛ ke kaŋ mbe ma peɗ ge mojo̰o̰ a ngay nè num ge kaŋ ko pul go ge Zeso Krist ta.
52005019	Kaŋ ge tele On̰om ge Harcal vin̰a ge kee tèmel, ḛ ke ne to,
52005020	ge mojo̰o̰ ndil fare janna ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma way ma solom gaw go.
52005021	Ɗaŋɗe, ḛ hale fare mbe ma pe hale hetel, ḛ koy ge go maa kwaɗa ma.
52005022	Ḛ wuwa ta ge sone a̰me zì ɗu to.
52005023	Mbi kaɗeya ge Dok ge hon nda halas ta go, ne haa ḛ harcal mɔɗwag, ndwa go, ḛ on̰om mage ḛ sḛ duul ma mɔɗwag, num kaa be fare ge maa pagal ge dwam gwanna ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist ne ya go.
52005024	Dok ge too ḛ ya, mbo huy na wa tii, ge dape, a Ba ge n̰a wa to ne.
52005025	Na̰ van ma, ḛ ka kee kaɗeya ge i pe waɗme.
52005026	Ḛ sa̰a̰ na̰ van ma wa wa sanna ge hormo mɔɗwag.
52005027	Mbi hoɗ ḛ mbi wa ge laa ɓyareya ge Bagezok ne pagal go, àa isi lawayta mbe no ge na̰ van ma ndwa go peɗ.
52005028	Mbi kaɗeya go, nè Bagezok Zeso Krist ngay kwaɗa keeya ge na ne ge ḛ ta mɔɗwag me.
53001001	A mbi Pol ɓanna ge Silvḛ mage Timote, njaŋe lawayta ne, hon ḛ ɓase ge Krist ne ge kaa no suwal ga̰a̰l Tesalonik diŋ ma, ge seŋe ya Dok ge nè Ba mage Bagezok Zeso Krist nda ma.
53001002	I kaɗeya go, Dok ge nè Ba mage Bagezok Zeso Krist, num ngay kwaɗa keeya ge maa way ge ḛ ta, num ho̰ ḛ halas me.
53001003	Na̰ van ma, mbiya go, i ka gwan ge mersi ɗaɗag hon Dok ge ḛ pe. A tem, i ke mbe go, ge dape, hoɗ fareba ge ḛ ḛ zam zḛḛ zḛḛ, laa wanna ge ḛ ngay ne no ge ta buwal zì zam zḛḛ zḛḛ waɗme.
53001004	A ge pe, sok ge i mbo ge ɓase ge Dok ne ge ɗogle ma buwal zì yà, i kaɗ ge ḛ doreya, ge dape, ḛ wa̰a̰ ta go mḛḛya ndiŋ, ḛ ka zam zḛḛ zḛḛ ge hoɗ fareba ge ḛ ḛ ma zì, ge iigiya mage yal ge àa kee ḛ num ma buwal zì.
53001005	Ano mbe ma ngay zum waŋ go, Dok mbo kun sariya kunna ge temel taɗ, ge nda duwana ma pagal, ge yal ge ḛ za̰a̰ ne no ge sego, ge muluk ge Dok ne pe. Ne sḛ mbo kee vin̰a ge go ḛ kaa mbyaɗɗa tab, sok deɗ-ɗa ge ɓase ge na mbo kee muluk ya ge num pagal ma buwal zì.
53001006	A ngaɗ go Dok ge temel taɗ gele ḛ, sok gene iigiya ya ge num ge iigi ḛ ma pagal.
53001007	Ḛ ge za̰a̰ yal no ge sego ma, ne sḛ mbo hon ḛ ɗwabeya ɓanna ge i sḛ ma dagre, ge sok ge nè Bagezok Zeso mbo dyan ja kɔn̰al go ge pḭḭ zì ya ɓanna ge na malayka ge pool waɗe-waɗe ma.
53001008	Ne sḛ mbo mbo ya ge ol wa ɗaabeya tuwal zì, ee nda ge seŋe Dok maa guwa̰ ma njoɗ yal ɓanna ge num ge kuri Fare ge Kwaɗa ge nè Bagezok Zeso ne ma.
53001009	Àa mbo njoɗ yal ge gene num ge burmiya ge ɗiŋ ge din zì, ge go num daa gwan kuwa Bagezok ndwa mage ne pateya ge ɓaŋlaŋ to.
53001010	Kaŋ ano mbe ma mbo kee ge dwam gwanna ge ne sḛ mbege ne gezi ge na pe go, ndwa go, na see uwareya mage hormo ge nda ge na ne ma, num ge ho fareba ge na ta ma ta. Ḛ sḛ ma mbo kaɗ ge num buwal zì, ge dape, ḛ ho fareba ge fare ge i jin̰a ḛ num ma ta me.
53001011	A ge pe, i kee kaɗeya no ɗaɗag ge ḛ pe. I kaɗe Dok go, ne ke ge ḛ van ge na ɓyare go num mbiya kaɗ ge mojo̰o̰ van ge na too num ya ge na sḛ pe go ma. Ne huy kaŋ keeya ge kwaɗa ma peɗ, ge ḛ ɓyare num ma wa, ɓanna ge tèmel ge ḛ kee num ma, ge pool ge na ne ge ɓaŋlaŋ ta, ge dape, ḛ ho fareba ge ne ta.
53001012	Go mbe no, nda mbo hon dḭḭl ge nè Bagezok Zeso ne hormo ge ḛ pe, ḛ sḛ ma me, ḛ seɗ doreya ge ne pe. Ano mbe mbo kee, ge dape, Dok ge nè ne mage Bagezok Zeso Krist ngay kwaɗa keeya ge maa way gḛḛ ge ḛ ta.
53002001	Na̰ van ma, ge gwanna ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist mage kwateya ge nè mbo kwateya ge ne ndwa se yà pagal, i ɓyare jan ḛ go:
53002002	Ne kaa ge ḛ ba̰a̰ ḛ pagal avun cab to, ge fare ge nda jan ge dwam gwanna ge nè Bagezok ne ya pagal go, ne mbo dee ja mbo zoo. Ḛ iigi ta ge ḛ on̰om ma zì to, kaɗɗa ne ndage ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma wa zì koo ḛ za̰a̰ ne ge num ge oy fare ge Dok ne ma wa zì koo tamekyala, àa jan go go mbi sḛ njaŋe nee ne ge lawayta a̰me zì, ḛ vḭḭ fare mbe to.
53002003	Ne kaa ge ḛ n̰a ndu a̰me lase ḛ ge fare a̰me ge ɗogle pe yà to baɗ. Zḛḛ ge go dwam mbe mbo ya, ɓyare go nda seŋe ho̰o̰l ge Dok, ge laa pisil keketeg ge Dok mbo burmi ne ya gezi, zuu ya kɔn̰al go ne ɓiya.
53002004	Ne sḛ mbo tele dok koo kḭḭ caaya ge àa uware num ma peɗ, mbo hee tene ge kaŋ ge àa tol num Dok ma pagal digi peɗ. Go mbe no, mbo mbo ɗiŋ kaɗ ge zok ge Dok ne ge ga̰a̰l zì, kee tene go na sḛ Dok ne.
53002005	Ḛ dwaɗ go ge fare mbe ge mbi dee jin̰a ḛ num ma pagal kade, sok ge mbi gale wa ya ge ḛ buwal zì yà.
53002006	Ge sego, ḛ kuwa kaŋ ge wan ne ge laa pisil keketeg wa se kuwa kwaɗa. Go mbe no, mbo zuɗ-ɗa zum ge sok ge àa ee ne, ge ne sḛ pe go tem.
53002007	O̰o̰, ge laa pisil keketeg kee fare ma go kee zoo sok wayya zì, ndwa go, nda daa mbo ge wa yuwaleya ge Dok ne ma pagal to. Sok ge kaŋ ge gale wan ne wa no go mbo kaɗɗa to, mbo gaa kee na fare ma kɔn̰al go.
53002008	Sok mbe go, ge laa pisil keketeg mbo zuɗ-ɗa zum. Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge Bagezok Zeso mbo mbo ja, mbo burmi ne gezi ge sa̰a̰m ge na mbo uusi ne ya ge na wa zì ta mage mboya ge na ne ge pool ɓaŋlaŋ ta.
53002009	Kaɗɗa ge mboya ge ne ge laa pisil keketeg ne ya ɗe, mbo kaɗ ge pool ge Saytan ne, mbo kee kaŋ ajab ma, kaŋ ngayya mage kaŋ haŋle ge hày ge diige ma pe peɗ,
53002010	ɓanna ge kaŋ berme ndwa ge temel taɗ to ma peɗ, ge num ge no banna zì ma pe. Ago, àa be ame koo num laa wan fare ge fareba ge Dok wa mon num to.
53002011	A ge pe no waɗme, Dok n̰a num n̰aameya zḛḛ zḛḛ no, ndwa go num gaa hoɗ fareba ge fare ge hày mbe ma ta.
53002012	Go mbe no, Dok mbo wan nda ge ho fareba ge fare ge na ne ta to ma peɗ ge sariya, ge hon ta ɗeŋew ge fare ge bàŋ yag ge temel to ma ta.
53002013	Na̰ van ge Bagezok Zeso laa wa̰a̰ num ma, kaɗɗa ge i ɗe, mbiya i gwan ge mersi ɗaɗag hon Dok ge ḛ pe, ago, Dok taa ḛ ge pe dolla ya day, ndwa go, ḛ see monna ge On̰om ge haɗ nda harcal ta, ge hoɗ fareba ge ḛ ho ge fare ge fareba ta me.
53002014	A ge monna mbe no pe waɗme, Dok too ḛ ya no, ge Fare ge Kwaɗa ge i oy ḛ ne ta, ndwa go, ḛ dee ya pateya ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist pate go.
53002015	Ge ano mbe no pe, na̰ van ma, ḛ mḛḛ ndiŋ, ḛ koy fare ge i dee hate ḛ num ma, sok ge i dee kaa ḛ buwal zì yà go koo ge lawayta ge i njaŋe ḛ num ma ta.
53002016	I kaɗeya go, nè Bagezok Zeso Krist sḛ mage nè Ba Dok, ge laa wa̰a̰ nè, ge ngay kwaɗa keeya ge na ne ge nè ta, ge ho̰ nè pool ge zam zḛḛ ge ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din mage jobreya ge kwaɗa,
53002017	num iya ḛ dul wa, num hon ḛ pool ge kee kaŋ mage jan fare ge kee Dok duul tii ma ɗaɗag.
53003001	Na̰ van ma, fare ge i jan ḛ num ge guwa̰ dwab ma no: Ago ḛ kaɗe ge i pe, ndwa go fare ge nè Bagezok ne ka dasare se sok ma go peɗ, nda ke tèmel ne pagal ge mojo̰o̰ ḛ sḛ ma kee tèmel ge ne pagal no go waɗme.
53003002	Ḛ kaɗe waɗme go i see vin̰a ge ɓuu ge nda ge dàle mage nda ge laa pisil ma tok zì ya zum, ago, a be nda ge za̰a̰ Fare ge Kwaɗa ma hoɗ fareba ne peɗ to.
53003003	Ɗaŋɗe, Bagezok, Ba ge n̰a wa to ne, mbo hon ḛ pool mage cage ḛ ge ba ge zwam tok go.
53003004	Ge ḛ pe, Bagezok tyan i pagal ya gezi, ge fare ge i ho ḛ i wa num pagal ma pe go, ḛ mbo go, ḛ mbo gwan ka mbo ge num pagal.
53003005	I kaɗeya go, Bagezok ee ḛ deɗ-ɗa kuwa laa wanna ge Dok ngay ne ge ḛ ta mage ee ḛ wan ta ge mojo̰o̰ Krist sḛ wa̰a̰ tene go.
53003006	Na̰ van ma, i hoɗ ḛ i wa ge dḭḭl ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist ne pe go, ḛ ɔwabe ta gezi ge na̰ van ge uwal ma ta, ge àa mbo no ge fare ge i hate ḛ num ma pagal to.
53003007	Ḛ sḛ ma kuwa kuwa ge ḛ pagal zì go, ḛ mbiya zam zḛḛ zḛḛ, sok bole kaŋ keeya ge i i ma go pe gyana de? Ago, sok ge i kaa ge ḛ buwal zì yà go, i be kaɗ nda ge uwal ma to,
53003008	i kaɗ nda ge kaa tok ta ma to me. Ago, i ka kee tèmel ge uwa̰se, be gyala ɗeŋew to, ɗaal waɗme, ndwa go, ndu a̰me ge ḛ buwal zige ḭḭ tene ge i to.
53003009	A fareba go, ḛ ge vin̰a ge in ta dana ge i ne, ɗaŋɗe, i ɓyare no go, i kaa kaŋ ko pul ge mbiya ḛ bole ne.
53003010	Ago, sok ge i dee kaa ge ḛ, i ka hoɗ ḛ i wa go: Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me ɓyare tèmel keeya to, a ho̰ ne kaŋ zam to waɗme.
53003011	I jan ano mbe no ge dape, i za̰a̰ go nda a̰me ge ḛ buwal zige ma haɗ-ɗa uwal sabtag, ge go num ke tèmel ɗe, àa gaa kaɗ ɔwara pe ge nda.
53003012	Ge pool ge Bagezok Zeso Krist ho̰ i ne ta, i kaɗe mage moɗege na̰ van mbe ge go ma go, num ho̰ ta tèmel ta be iigiya, num see kaŋ zam ge ta pe.
53003013	Na̰ van ma, kaɗɗa ge ḛ sḛ ma ɗe, ḛ ka̰a̰ ta se to, sok kee kwaɗa go.
53003014	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me mbo ge fare ge i njaŋe ḛ num ge lawayta mbe zì ma pagal to, ḛ wuwage ne ge ɓase ma ta peɗ, ḛ kaɗ baan ge ne to, ndwa go daŋso wa̰a̰ ne.
53003015	Ano peɗ puy ɗe, ḛ ndi ne ge ndu a̰me ge ho̰o̰l go to, ɗaŋɗe, ḛ mḛḛre ne dinna ge na̰ van go.
53003016	I kaɗeya go, Bagezok ge hon nda halas, ne sḛ ho̰ ḛ halas ne ge sok ma go peɗ, ge fare ma zì peɗ me. I kaɗeya go, ne kaa ɓanna ge ḛ peɗ waɗme!
53003017	Wa sanna ge guwa̰ dwab mbe ma no, a mbi sḛ Pol njaŋe num ne ge mbi tok zì. Mbi njaŋe mbi dḭḭl mbe go, ge mbi lawayta ma wa aaya ma go peɗ.
53003018	I kaɗeya go, nè Bagezok Zeso Krist ngay kwaɗa keeya ge na ne ḛ ta peɗ.
54001001	A mbi Pol njaŋe lawayta mbe no ne. Mbi ndu ge temeya ge Zeso Krist nee ne. A Dok ge mo̰o̰ nè, ɓanna ge Zeso Krist ge nè ee nè jobreya no ge ne pagal, àa num ho mbi maa wa ne go mbi kaa ndu ge temeya ge Zeso Krist ne.
54001002	Mbi njaŋe lawayta hon mo Timote. Mo dinna ge mbi van ge wuwa ge mbi sḛ zì go, ge dape, mo ho fareba ge Krist ta. Mbi sa̰a̰ mo wa. Mbi kaɗeya go, Dok ge nè Ba mage Zeso Krist ge nè Bagezok, num ngay kwaɗa keeya mage kuwa a̰se ge maa way ge mo ta, num ho̰ mo halas ge mo dul wa zì me.
54001003	Mbi voɗ mo pagal ge fare ge mbi dee jin̰a mo go mo ke ne, sok ge mbi ɗege mbo suwa Maseduwan go. Mbi jin̰a mo go, mo gaa kàɗɗa ge suwal ga̰a̰l Efez diŋ, ge dape, mo wa tele nda a̰me ge hon hateya ge hày ma.
54001004	Jin̰a num go: Ne kaa ge num ho̰ ta ge fare ge bàŋ kay ma ta janna mage pe rusu cemeya wanna ge be aaya ma ta to. Ano mbe ma no peɗ, àa gene ya pee ta ge bàŋ yag ma. Ago, àa mbaa nuusiya ge Dok nuusi ne ge monna pe ge hoɗ fareba ta to.
54001005	Fare ge ee go i ho i wa ge ano mbe ma no pe, a ndwa go num laa wa̰a̰ ta ge ta buwal zì ge dul wa ge kɔn̰al, on̰om ge vaa fare buwal ge num way kaa kwaɗa. Fareba hoɗɗa ge num way kaa be ndwa mbuɗiya ge na zì.
54001006	Nda a̰me ma mbo ya gezi yà kaal ge ko pul mbe go, ɗeŋew àa gaa faa go fare ge bàŋ yag ma.
54001007	Àa ɓyare ngay nda go maa Ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne ma ne. Ɗaŋɗe, num sḛ ma ge maa pagal wan fare ge maa jan ne koo ge maa ɗû maa ko no ge ne pagal hateya pe to.
54001008	Nè kuwa kuwa tyatyaɗ go, eeya ge Dok ne kwaɗa, kaɗɗa ndu kee tèmel ya ge ne pagal tetem.
54001009	Ɓyare go nè kaa ge kuwaya go, Dok ho̰ na eeya mbe ge nda ge temel ma pe to. Ɗaŋɗe, ge nda ge gwan maa pagal se to ma pe, ge nda ge kuri hoɗ fareba go, Dok ne go to ma pe, ge nda ge kee sone ma pe, ge nda ge tɔcwage kaŋ ge harcal ge maa ko se ma pe, eeya mbe, àa ho̰ ne ge nda ge ndil kaŋ ge Dok ne ma dinna ge kaŋ ge bàŋ yag go ma pe, ge nda ge hun maa na̰ mage maa ba ma pe,
54001010	ge nda gegene ge hun swày ma pe, ge nda ge fii ge ta batraŋ ma pe, ge nda soɗob ge fii ta ge ta buwal zì ma pe, ge nda ge chel nda duwana ma ndwa kee num moor ma pe, ge nda ge kun hày ma pe, ge nda ge kee sayda ge hày ma pe. Dok ho̰ eeya ge kaŋ ge ɗogle ge sone ma pe peɗ, ge vḛḛne hateya ge kwaɗa ge ne ne ma pe waɗme.
54001011	Hateya mbe no mbo ge Fare ge Kwaɗa ge àa ɓin̰a ne ge mbi tok go pagal tetem, ne ge din̰a pateya ge Dok ge kaa ɗaglag ne ya zum.
54001012	Mbi kee mersi hon nè Bagezok Zeso Krist ge ne pool ge ho̰ mbi pe, ndwa go, mbi ke tèmel ge na ne. Mbi gwan ge ne mersi keeya ge dape, ndi mbi ndu ge n̰a wa to, a ge pe, wa̰a̰ mbi ya kee na tèmel no.
54001013	Mbi kaa dee wal ndu ge jan fare ge sone kakatag ma ge ne dḭḭl pagal, mbi kaa ndu ge ka kee nda yal, mbi ka sal ne sḛ waɗme. Go no puy ɗe, Zeso ngay kuwa a̰se ge na ne ge mbi ta no, ge dape, mbi be ka wan kaŋ ge mbi ka kee ne pe to. Ge dape, mbi be hoɗ fareba ge ne ta to me.
54001014	Kwaɗa keeya ge nè Bagezok ne ge kê mbi waɗe waɗe ge mbi pagal, ee mbi hoɗ fareba ge ne ta no, ne sḛ gwan hon mbi pool ge go mbi laa wa̰a̰ nda ge ɗogle ma no, ge ɓanna ge nè ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Zeso Krist pe.
54001015	Nè kuwa kuwa go Zeso Krist mbo ya ge dunin̰a zì mon nda ge kee sone ma. Ano, a fare ge gag ge mbiya go nda peɗ, num ame ne ge dul wa ɗu ne. Ge nda ge kee sone mbe ma buwal zì, mbi tiya num vuwa̰ ne.
54001016	Ɗaŋɗe, Zeso Krist ngay kuwa a̰se ge na ne ge mbi ta. Go mbe no, ngay wan ta ge na ne ge mbi ta no. Mbi ge sone waɗe nda peɗ. Ano mbe no, a kaŋ ko pul ne ge num ge mbo hoɗ fareba ya ge ne ta ma pe. Àa mbo seɗ ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din.
54001017	N̰a go nda peɗ ho̰ gan ga̰a̰l ge zaman ma way hormo, ne ge kaa no go, a ne sḛ ne melaw ɗu Dok, ndu ge kuwa ne ge na ndwa to. Ḛ sale ne zaman mage zaman ma. Amin !
54001018	Mbi van Timote, ano a yuwaleya ge mbi hon mo nee ne no, dinna ge ka̰a̰l ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma dee jin̰a num dee wal ge mo pe go. Ke tèmel ge num fare mbe ma pagal, ge dape, mo wa mbal twam mballa ge kwaɗa.
54001019	Koy hoɗ fareba ge amo mage on̰om ge kwaɗa ge vaa fare buwal me. Nda a̰me ma kuri be za̰a̰ maa on̰om ge vaa fare buwal ma wa. A ge pe, àa ɗimi ya no, ge hoɗ fareba ge maa way ma zì.
54001020	Himene mage Alekzandr ge nda mbe ma buwal zì. Mbi suwa num ge Saytan tok yà, ndwa go, num kuwa go Dok be ndu ge nda jan fare ge sone kakatag ge ne pagal ne to.
54002001	Kaŋ ge zḛḛge ge mbi ɓyare, mbi ho mbi wa zoo go, àa kaɗe Dok ge nda pe peɗ, àa ke kaɗeya ge gwarge ta ma, ge mersi keeya ma me.
54002002	Àa ke kaɗeya ge gan ga̰a̰l ma pe, ge num ge kee muluk no ge nda pagal ma pe peɗ, ge dape, nè wa seɗ vin̰a ge kàɗɗa be iigiya, kàɗɗa halas me. Go no me, nè wa seɗ vin̰a kaɗ ɓanna ge Dok, mboya ge nè ne ma wa kaɗ kwaɗa ge ne ndwa se me.
54002003	Kee kaɗeya ge nda pe kaŋ ge kwaɗa ne, kaɗ kaŋ ge siŋli ge Dok Ba ge mo̰o̰ nè ta me.
54002004	Ne sḛ ɓyare go nda peɗ see monna, num dee ya kuwa fare ge fareba.
54002005	Fare mbe no ge nda pe peɗ, ago Dok a melaw ɗu. Ndu a̰me go ɗu, a ndu ge vin̰a ne ge Dok mage nda duwana ma buwal zì, ndu mbe, a Zeso Krist.
54002006	Ne sḛ mbo ya, n̰a tene mbo swày no, ndwa go na zû nda peɗ. Ano mbe no, a sayda ge Zeso ngay nee ne, sok ge sok mbiya go, ge laa ɓyareya ge Dok ne pagal. Dok ɓyare go nda peɗ see monna.
54002007	A ge pe no, Dok ee mbi no go mbi kaa ndu ge oy fare mage ndu ge temeya ge na ne. Jin̰a mbi no go mbi oy fare ge na ne, ge nda ge no rusu Yahuɗ zì to ma ta, ndwa ee num hoɗ fareba mage kuwa fare ge fareba. Mbi kun hày to, mbi jan fare ge fareba.
54002008	Mbi ɓyare go, nda kee kaɗeya ge sok ma go peɗ, tok ge hee digi kee kaɗeya ma kaa tok ge kɔn̰al ma, be laa ol, be dwaɗɗa ge kee gool ge maa zì me.
54002009	Mbi ɓyare waɗme go, nda zaab ka̰a̰ ba̰a̰ ge maa ta kanna ge kwaɗa, be jegreya, ne kaa kaŋ chal ko ge nda ta to. Ne kaa ge num mboo pagal mbolla ge jalaw to. Num pa fool dinar ma, yìn̰a ma, koo ba̰a̰ ge bware gḛḛ ma ge maa ta to me.
54002010	Ɗaŋɗe, nda kuwa kale ge num way ge gwanna ge àa gwan maa pagal ge fare ge Dok ne pe se ta. Ano mbe kwaɗa ge nda zaab ge gwan maa pagal ge fare ge Dok ne pe se ma pe.
54002011	A kwaɗa go, ge sok hon hateya ge zok ge Dok ne zì go, nda zaab ame hateya wa daal. Num guwa̰ maa pagal se ge sok ame hateya go.
54002012	Mbi vin go nda zaab hate koo num kaa ge nda soɗob pagal digi to me. Ɓyare go num kaa wa daal.
54002013	Ago Dok kê wal Adam, guwa̰ gaa kee Hawa no.
54002014	A be Adam n̰a tene laseya ge Saytan tok go ne to, ɗaŋɗe, a ndu gwale n̰a tene laseya ne, hele wa hoɗɗa ge Dok ne pagal no.
54002015	Ɗaŋɗe, ndu gwale mbo seɗ monna ge van tolla ta, kaɗɗa na wan tene deŋel ya ge hoɗ fareba zì, ge laa wanna zì, ge harcal zì, ge kaŋ keeya ge maa vin̰a go jajan ma zì me.
54003001	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me ɓyare kaɗ ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme ɓase ge Krist ne ma, taa tèmel ge kwaɗa. Fare mbe fare ge gag ne.
54003002	Ɓyare go ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme ɓase ge Krist ne ma, ne kaa ndu ge be fare ge na pagal, ndu ge no ge gwale ɗu, ndu ge njoɗ kaŋ mage zam kaŋ zam ge na vin̰a, ndu ge hormo, ndu ge no ge hal ge kwaɗa ge nda ta peɗ, ndu ge ame nda ge na diŋ, ndu ge mbiya hate nda,
54003003	ndu ge fere jin̰al to, ndu ge laa ol to, ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge nuusi nda fare, ndu ge ɓyare gool to, ndu ge aham ge bware pe to,
54003004	ndu ge kuwa na zok inna, ge ne van ma mbo no cɔcɔgwaɗ ge ne ko pul zì.
54003005	Ago, kaɗɗa ndu kuwa zok ge na ne inna to, kee pe gyana wa mbo kuwa ɓase ge Dok ne inna de?
54003006	Kaɗɗa ḛ ɓyare hon ndu a̰me tèmel ga̰a̰l ge zok ge Dok ne zì, ɓyare go ne kaa ndu ge gale ho fareba ge Zeso Krist ta jin̰al to, ge go on̰om ge jegreya wuwa ge ne zì to. Ne kaa ge go Dok wa̰a̰ ne ge sariya dinna ge ne wa̰a̰ Ba ge ho̰o̰l no ge sariya go to me.
54003007	Ɓyare go ndu ge kaɗ ga̰a̰l ge zok ge Dok ne pagal, ne kaa ndu ge no ge sayda ge kwaɗa ge nda ge zum-ge ma ta me. Kaɗɗa go to, nda mbo sen ne, Ba ge ho̰o̰l me, mbo wan ne ge faɗe ge na ne.
54003008	Ɓyare go nda ge mbaa tèmel no ge zok ge Dok ne zì ma kaa nda ge hormo ma waɗme, nda ge wa zi zi to ma, nda ge njoɗ jin̰al gḛḛ to ma, nda ge ɓyare bware ge maa vin̰a go ma.
54003009	Ɓyare go num kaa mbargeya ge fare ge fareba, ge Dok din̰a ne ya zum ge fare ge hoɗ fareba ne pagal, ge on̰om ge vaa fare buwal ge kwaɗa me.
54003010	Sok ee nda ge mbaa tèmel ma ge tèmel ga̰a̰l wa go, ɓyare go àa gale kugi num kugi guy, kaɗɗa àa seɗ fare a̰me ya ge num pagal go to, guwa̰, àa wa ɗege hon num tèmel go.
54003011	Ɓyare go nda zaab ge mbaa tèmel ma kaa nda ge hormo ma waɗme, nda ge jan fare ge sone to ma, nda ge njoɗ kaŋ mage zam kaŋ zam ge maa vin̰a ma me. Num kaa nda ge n̰a wa to ma, ge kaŋ ma zì peɗ.
54003012	Ɓyare go nda ge mbaa tèmel ma kaa ge gwale ɗu ɗu, num kaa nda ge yuwale maa van ma yuwaleya ge kwaɗa ɓanna ge nda ge ɗogle ge kaa ge num ta ma me.
54003013	Ago nda ge mbaa tèmel, ge kee maa tèmel siŋli ma seɗ doreya ge nda ta ge fare mbe ma no pe. Àa seɗ vin̰a ge jan fare ge Zeso Krist ne be voo, ge dape, hoɗ fareba ge num way ɓan num ya dagre ge ne.
54003014	-
54003015	Mbi ee jobreya ge mbo mo ta yà go ge dwam a̰me go ɗu. Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa mbi pagal wan-na be seɗ mo avun cab to, ɓyare go ge lawayta mbe ge mbi njaŋe mo ne no ta, mo kuwa go mo wa̰a̰ ndwa mboya ge ɓase ge Dok ne ma buwal zì gyana de? Ɓase mbe zok ge Dok ge hon ndwa nee ne, ge koy fare ge fareba, mbyale ne digi dinna ge ɔwara ga̰a̰ mbyale zok digi go.
54003016	Fare ɗimil ge Krist ne, ge kaa dee wayya ndindiɗ, Ge Dok din̰a ne ya zum, a ga̰a̰l, A ne ge nè ho fareba ge ne ta ne, ndu ge pee ne to, Krist din̰a ya zum ge ndu duwana go, On̰om ge Harcal ngay zum no go, Ne ndu ge temel ne, malayka ma kuwa ne no, Nda duwana ma oy fare ge ne ne ge rusu ma ta no. Nda ge dunin̰a zì ma ho fareba ge ne ta no, Guwa̰, Dok hê ne ge na ta digi yà no, Ee ne pateya ge na no me.
54004001	On̰om ge Harcal ge Dok ne jan zum waŋ go: Ge dwam pe aaya go, nda a̰me ma mbo n̰a maa vin̰a hoɗ fareba gezi. Àa mbo gaa za̰a̰ nda ge hon hateya ge no ge on̰om ge hày ma way, àa gaa ame num fare hateya ge hày ge mbo no ge on̰om ge sone ma ta ya me.
54004002	Àa mbo n̰a ta n̰aameya ge vin̰a ge nda ge mbuɗi nda ndwa ma way pe go, ge kaa no ge hày kunna pe ma ta, num ge num dul wa wan num go fyalag sok kun hày go to ma ta.
54004003	Nda mbe ma hate go nda kaa zok to, àa ka janna waɗme go kaŋ zam a̰me ma sone ge zamma to. Ɗaŋɗe, Dok sḛ ge na pagal kê kaŋ mbe ma ne go, num kaa kaŋ zam zamma ge nda pe peɗ. Nda ge ho fareba ge Krist ta ma, ge dee ya kuwa fare ge fareba ma me, kaɗɗa àa gwan ge mersi ya keeya hon Dok ge kaŋ mbe ma pe, sok zam num go, a̰me ge sone ge num zì to.
54004004	Ago, kaŋ ge Dok kê num ma peɗ kwaɗa. A̰me ge dol gezi to, kaɗɗa nè zam num, nè guwa̰ ge mersi keeya hon Dok ge num pagal.
54004005	Kaŋ mbe ma haɗ harcal ge fare ge Dok ne mage kaɗeya ge nè ne ma ta me.
54004006	Hate na̰ van ma kaŋ mbe ma, go no me, mo mbo kaɗ moor ge kwaɗa ge Zeso Krist ne. Mo mbo ngay nda go mo donna mbyaɗɗa tab ge ko pul ge hoɗ fareba ne go, ge hateya ge kwaɗa ge mo ame ne ta me.
54004007	Kaa ge mo za̰a̰ sigi ge bàŋ yag, ge kee ho̰o̰l ge fare ge fareba ma to. N̰a mboya ge amo ne do̰o̰ zḛḛ zḛḛ ge mojo̰o̰ Dok laa ɓyare go.
54004008	Kan ta ba̰a̰re haɗ sḛ duul digi fogol ɓame, mbaaya ge ne ne hoɗege guwa, ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ndu mbo ge laa ɓyareya ge Dok ne pagal, gwan mbaa waɗeya ge kaŋ ma zì peɗ. Ago, sok kee ano mbe no go, ee nè kaɗ ge kuwaya tyatyaɗ go nè go ge ndwa ge jin̰al ge sego, nè mbo seɗ ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din me.
54004009	Fare mbe no, a fare ge gag ne, mbiya ndu ame ne ge ɓul mɔɗwag.
54004010	Kaɗɗa go nè kee tèmel go ndaa kaka, nè ka hon ta pool me, ago nè jobreya ma ee ge Dok ge hon nda ndwa pagal. Ne sḛ Ba ge mon nda ne peɗ. Ne ga̰a̰l nda ge ho fareba ge Zeso Krist ta ma.
54004011	Dwage fare mbe no janna, mo hate num ne peɗ me.
54004012	N̰a ndu a̰me sḛ bogol ge amo to. Ɗaŋɗe, kaa kaŋ ko pul ge nda ge ho fareba ge Zeso Krist ta ma way peɗ: Ge fare janna ge amo ta, ge mboya ge amo ta, ge laa wanna ge amo ta, ge hoɗ fareba ge amo ta, ge kàɗɗa kɔn̰al ge amo ta me.
54004013	Ho̰ tene ge fare isiya ge no Njaŋeya ge Dok ne zì ta, mo ka isi nda ne kɔn̰al zum waŋ me. Mo ka moɗege num, mo ka hate num ɗiŋ gwanna ge ambi ya.
54004014	Kaa ge mo ndil bobo ge Dok ho̰ mo ne solom to. A kaŋ ge mo see nee ne, ge nda ga̰a̰l ge zwagre Dok wa ma jin̰a ne ge mo pe, ge nda ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme tèmel ge zok ge Dok ne zì ma ee maa tok ma ge mo pagal ge ne pe ne me.
54004015	Ano mbe ma no, àa kaŋ ge mo mbiya kee num ma ne. Ho̰ tene ge num ta keeya ge dul wa ɗu, ge dape, nda peɗ num kuwa go, mo zam go zḛḛ zḛḛ ge ko pul ge Dok ne go.
