54004016	Doo mo ndwa kwaɗa ge mboya ge amo pagal, ge kaŋ hateya ge amo pagal me. Za zḛḛ ge ne keeya. Kaɗɗa mo kee ne ya mbe go, mo mbo mon tene, mo mon num ge za̰a̰ mo ma waɗme.
54005001	Kaɗɗa ndu ge sabar kee a̰me ge sone ya, kaa ge mo mḛḛre ne ol kekeŋ to. Ɗaŋɗe, jin̰a ne fare ge suul jajan dinna ge mo mà jan mo ba ge tolla fare ya go. Moɗege nda ge bogol ma dinna ge mo na̰ van ge ḛ ge num wuwa ge sḛ duul ge ɗu zì ya ma go.
54005002	Moɗege nda zaab ge sḛ ga̰a̰l ma dinna ge mo na̰ ge too mo ma go. Moɗege nda zaab ge sḛ jiyale ma dinna ge mo na̰ van ge gwale ge ḛ ge num wuwa ge sḛ duul ge ɗu zì ma go. Kaa ge dwaɗɗa a̰me ge sone ge num pagal ge mo zì to.
54005003	Koy nda zaab ge kumu ge no ge ɔg go ma ge mo tok pe zì kwaɗa.
54005004	Kaɗɗa kumu mbe ge van koo kaɗ ge na̰ gà̰a̰ ma, ɓyare go num sḛ ma ge maa pagal, num hate gwan maa pagal ge maa nda ge maa ge num no go ge rusu ge ɗu zì ma pe se. Mbiya go num in ta ge maa sele mbe ma dinna ge num sḛ ma ḭḭ ta ya ge maa de wal go waɗme. Ge mojo̰o̰ eeya ge Dok ne ma jan nè ge ho fareba ma go, sok kee ano mbe go, kee Dok sḛ duul tii.
54005005	Gwale kumu ge gaa no ge ɔg go, ge a̰me no ge ne pe to, ee na jobreya ma mɔɗwag ge Dok pagal, ka kee kaɗeya, ka gwarge tene ge ne ta ɗaal mage gyala, ndwa go na see mbaaya ge ne ta.
54005006	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ge gwale kumu ge kee kaŋ ge kee na sḛ duul tii ɗeŋew, ago, ano ge na ndwa no puy ɗe, suu suu.
54005007	Hate nda mbe ma fare mbe ma no, jin̰a num go, num ḭḭ dṵṵl ge maa pe rusu ge peɗeɗ ma way, ge dape, ne kaa ge àa fa fare ge sone ma ge num pagal to.
54005008	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me hee dṵṵl ge na sele ma way to, ndwa go nda ge ne pe rusu zì peɗeɗ ma, ago kuri vin̰a pul ge Dok ne kuri. Sone ge ne ne waɗe ndu ge ho fareba ge Zeso Krist ta to waɗe.
54005009	Mbi jan ḛ go, gwale kumu ge mbiya ḛ mbaa num ma no: Ne kaa gwale ge no ge del warmenengal go mbo digi, ne kaɗ gwale ge kaa zok wal ge obe ɗu.
54005010	Ɓyare go, ne kaa gwale ge nda dore kaŋ keeya ge ne ne ma, ge wuwa na van ma kwaɗa, ge ame nda ge na diŋ, ge usi nda ge ho fareba ma ko, ge mbaa nda ge za̰a̰ yal ma, ge ho̰ tene mɔɗwag ge tèmel keeya ge kwaɗa pe me. Kaɗɗa ne mbe go, njaŋe ne dḭḭl ge kumu ge mbiya seɗ mbaaya ma buwal zì.
54005011	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ge kumu ge sḛ jiyale ma ɗe, njaŋe num dḭḭl to. Ge dape, sok ge ene ge zok kàɗɗa ne mbo waɗ ja ge num zì, àa mbo n̰a vin̰a pul ge Zeso Krist ne.
54005012	Kaɗɗa àa kee ya mbe go, Dok mbo wan num ge sariya, ge dape, àa guu gezi wa tii ge maa way ge maa kê ne ge Dok ta go: Maa gaa kaɗ ge tèmel ge Krist ne pe keeya.
54005013	Fare ge ɗogle ge mbiya ge mo njaŋe num dḭḭl to ma no: Kaɗɗa mo njaŋe num dḭḭl ma ya ge kumu ge mbiya seɗ mbaaya ma buwal zì, àa mbo gaa nda ge uwal ma, àa gaa ge anna pe ge nda wa go. Àa gaa nda ge uwal ma bàŋ ɗeŋew to, ɗaŋɗe, àa gaa ge oo nda pe, ge faa fare ge nda way ge pâ maa zì to ma pe waɗme.
54005014	A ge ano mbe no pe, mbi ɓyare no go, nda zaab ge kumu ge sḛ jiyale ma num kaa zok, num too van ma, num duwa ge maa zok ma pagal kwaɗa. Ge dape, nda ge no ho̰o̰l ge nè ma, num see vin̰a ge jan fare ge sone ge nè pagal to.
54005015	Mbi jan ano mbe no ge dape, nda zaab ge kumu ge sḛ jiyale a̰me ma, àa sele vin̰a ge Dok ne ya go, àa gaa kàre go Saytan pe.
54005016	Kaɗɗa ndu gwale a̰me ge ho fareba ge Zeso Krist ta go ge kumu ma ge na pe rusu go, ɓyare go ne mba num, ne n̰a dṵṵl mbe ge ɓase ge Krist ne ma pagal to, ge dape, ɓase ge Krist ne ma mbiya hee kumu ge kaa no ge ɔg go ma dṵṵl ɗeŋew.
54005017	Nda ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme tèmel ge zok ge Dok ne zì kwaɗa ma, ke kwaɗa go num seɗ poɗɗa ge kon pagal. Ne ga̰a̰l nda ge ho̰ ta no mɔɗwag ge Fare ge Kwaɗa pe oyya mage ne hateya.
54005018	Ago, Njaŋeya ge Dok ne jin̰a zum waŋ go: «Nday pool sok kee tèmel ndal swa go, ndu a̰me ge pool ge tele go, ne suu swa pagal to to.» Ta iya jin̰a no go: Ke kwaɗa àa poɗ ndu ge tèmel ne uwa̰se.
54005019	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me ee fare ya ge ndu ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme tèmel ge zok ge Dok ne zì pagal, kaa ge mo vin ne fare gaw to. Ɓyare go mo hale fare mbe pe kwaɗa, mo dee ya za̰a̰ fare mbe ge nda zi koo taa wa zì, go no, mo wa ɗege kee tèmel ge ne pagal gale go.
54005020	Kaɗɗa nda a̰me ma kaɗɗa ka dwage sone ma keeya, mḛḛre num ge nda ndwa go, ndwa go, nda ge ɗogle ma wa wan voo waɗme.
54005021	Mbi jan mo zum waŋ ge Dok ndwa se, ge Zeso Krist ndwa se, ge Malayka ge Dok ne ma ndwa se waɗme go: Ke tèmel ge fare ge mbi jan mo num ma pagal. Kaa ge mo vare ndu a̰me to, mo ɗege ndu pe ge kaŋ keeya ge amo ma zì to me.
54005022	Ne kaa ge mo ha tene avun cab ee mo tok ma ge ndu a̰me pagal to, sok hon ne tèmel ga̰a̰l ge zok ge Dok ne zì go. Ɓyare go mo kugi ne kugi gale guy. Nda a̰me ge kee n̰aal ma, ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge num to. Ɗaŋɗe, koy tene kɔn̰al.
54005023	Ge tuguɗi ge kaɗ kee mo ndwa wowol ge mo laa zì pe, kaa ge mo njoɗ mam ɗeŋew to, ɗaŋɗe, njoo on̰or jìn̰al dodo.
54005024	Sone keeya ge nda a̰me ma way ma benna zum ge nda ndwa kɔn̰al go waŋ, be ge àa gale kun sariya ge num pagal to. Ɗaŋɗe, sone keeya ge nda a̰me ge ɗogle ma way ma wayya ndindiɗ, ɗeŋew àa gaa ben-na zum guwa̰ ge sariya kunna ge num way go.
54005025	A go mbe me, kaŋ keeya ge kwaɗa ma benna zum ge kɔn̰al go, koo num bḛḛ ya zum ge nda ndwa go to puy, àa mbo kaɗ wayya bàba to.
54006001	Ɓyare go moor ge ho fareba ma peɗ ho̰ maa ba ge yiya maa ma hormo ge mbyaɗɗa tab. Sok kee ano mbe ma no go, nda mbo jan fare sone kakatag ge Dok dḭḭl pagal to, ge fare ge nè hate ne pagal to me.
54006002	Kaɗɗa moor mbe ma ba ge yiya num ma nda ge ho fareba ge Krist ta ma ne, ɓyare go, num sḛḛ num to, ge dape, num kaa ge janna go maa ge num seŋe ya na̰ van ge ɓanna ge maa ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Krist pe to. Ke kwaɗa vare zoo go, num gwan ka kee num tèmel moor ge kon pagal kwaɗa waɗeya, ndwa go, num ba ge yiya num ge num kee num tèmel moor ma, àa nda ge Krist ne ma ne, àa kaɗ nda ge Dok laa wa̰a̰ num ma ne waɗme. Ndi kaŋ ge mbiya go mo hate ne mage mo moɗege nda ge num pagal ma no:
54006003	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me hate go fare ge ɗogle, be fare ge fareba ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist ne, gwan kuri hateya ge nè hate ne, ge mboya ge ndu mbiya mbo ge Dok ndwa se pagal,
54006004	ago, a ndu ge hufugiya ne. Kuwa a̰me ɗu to, kaa go ɗeŋew ge fare peeya pe, ge gool ge fare ma pagal pe me. Ge ano mbe no ta, nda ge za̰a̰ ne ma seŋe nda ge kee yil ma, nda ge kee gool ma, nda ge sal nda ma, nda ge dwaɗ sone ge nda pagal ma me.
54006005	Àa kaɗ ɗaɗag ge pee ta pe, ge dape, àa ge dwaɗɗa ge sone ma, ndwa go fare ge fareba ge num zì daa to baɗ. Àa dwaɗ go mboya ge ko pul ge Dok ne go vin̰a ge kee ta gan ne.
54006006	Ndu ge kaɗɗa na wa̰a̰ na tok ɗeŋew ge kaŋ ge na no go ge ne, ge ne pe, fareba hoɗɗa ge ne ne ge Dok ta kaŋ seɗɗa ge ɓaŋlaŋ ne.
54006007	Ḛ kuwa, nè mbo ya dunin̰a zì be a̰me ge nè tok go, go no me, nè mbo gwan digi be a̰me ge nè tok go waɗme.
54006008	Kaɗɗa na mbe go, mbiya go nè ka kee laa saal, kaɗɗa nè go ge kaŋ zam mage ba̰a̰ ge laa pe.
54006009	Kaɗɗa ge num ge ɓyare mbḛḛ go maa seŋe nda ge seɗ kaŋ ma, àa deɗ ge pe heeya zì dinna ge faɗe wan kaŋ go. Num laa wa̰a̰ kaŋ ge bàŋ yag, ge gḛḛ-gḛḛ ma, ge vḛḛne nda ɗiŋ burmi num gezi ge ɓul mɔɗwag.
54006010	Ago, laa wan bware, a pe tòo ge sone ma way ne peɗ. Nda a̰me ma gaa yan go bware pe ge aa ta. Go mbe no, àa dol hoɗ fareba ge maa way ma ya gezi yà kaal, àa ge iigiya ma gḛḛ ge maa dul wa ma zì.
54006011	Ɗaŋɗe mo, ndu ge Dok ne, ɔwabe tene gezi ge kaŋ keeya ge sone mbe ma ta peɗ. Yin̰a temel taɗ pe ge aa tene, wa̰a̰ mo tok mḛḛya ndiŋ ge ko pul ge Dok ne go. Koy hoɗ fareba ge amo, mo laa wa̰a̰ mo kon ge dul wa ɗu. Wa̰a̰ tene deŋel ge fare ma zì, mo kaɗ suul waɗme.
54006012	Mbaa twam mballa ge kwaɗa ge nda ge hoɗ fareba ma way, wa̰a̰ tene ɗiŋ mo seɗ ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din. Ago, Dok too mo ya ge ne pe, dinna ge mo dee kê sayda ge kwaɗa ge hoɗ fareba ge amo pagal ge ɓase ma ndwa go peɗ go.
54006013	Ge sego, mbi jan mo fare mbe no ge Dok ge hon ndwa ge kaŋ dolla ma zì peɗ ndwa se, ge Zeso Krist ndwa se me, ne ge kee sayda ge kwaɗa ge Pons Pilaɗ ndwa se.
54006014	Koy tene kɔn̰al yaɗaɗ, mo kaɗ be fare eeya ge mo pagal, guwa̰ mo pagal ge wa yuwaleya ma pe se, koy num cemeɗ ɗiŋ deɗ-ɗa ge dwam ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist mbo dyan ja zum go.
54006015	Krist mbo gwan-na ge dwam ge Dok ee ne, ge ne pe go. Ne ge kaa no go ɗaglag, ne ge no melaw ɗu ge pool ge ɓaŋlaŋ, a Gan ga̰a̰l ge gan ga̰a̰l ma way ne, kaɗ Bagezok ge ba ge zok ma way me.
54006016	Ne sḛ melaw ɗu Ba ge be suuya ne, kaa ge kɔn̰al zì, a kɔn̰al ge go ndu mbiya ndaa tene ya ge ne ta zì guwa to ne. Ndu a̰me ɗu be kuwa ne to, ndu a̰me ge pool ge kuwa ne gale to me. Hormo mage pool ge ɓaŋlaŋ ge ɗiŋ ge din, àa ne ne ma ne. Amin !
54006017	Jin̰a nda ge no ge kaŋ seɗɗa gḛḛ ge dunin̰a zì ma go: Ne kaa ge num jegre ge maa kaŋ seɗɗa mbe ma pe to, num ee maa jobreya ge kaŋ seɗɗa ge mbo burmiya gezi ma pagal to, ɗaŋɗe, num ee maa jobreya ma ge Dok pagal. Ne ge hon nda kaŋ ma zuliya se lalan̰, ndwa go nè wa kee laa saal ge num pe.
54006018	Gwan jan num go: Num ngay kwaɗa keeya ge nda ta, num ka zam zḛḛ zḛḛ ge kaŋ keeya ge kwaɗa ma zì, num kaa nda ge wuy gḛḛ ma ge nda ta, nda ge vaa maa kaŋ seɗɗa ma ge nda dagre me.
54006019	Sok kee ano mbe no go, àa kwate ge ta pe go kaŋ gan ge kwaɗa ge be vḛḛneya ge maa ndwa ge zḛḛ ge pe, àa wa mbo seɗ ndwa ge fareba.
54006020	Mbi van Timote, koy kaŋ ge Dok ho̰ mo ne ge mo tok go cemeɗ, ɔwabe tene gezi kaal ge fare janna ge bàŋ yag ge uware Dok dḭḭl to ma ta. In̰a tene gezi ge hateya ge nda haɗ num go, num kuwaya ge ɗugul ma ne ma ta, zane no, àa hateya ge hày ma ne.
54006021	Ago, nda a̰me ma kaa ge dwaɗɗa go, maa ge kuwaya ge ɗugul mbe ge maa zì. Go mbe no, àa n̰aame ko pul ge hoɗ fareba ne. N̰a Dok ngay kwaɗa keeya ge na ne ge ḛ ta. Mbi wa aa ne, gaa kwaɗa.
55001001	Mbi Pol, ndu ge Dok taa ne ge laa ɓyareya ge na ne pagal ndwa go, mbi kaa ndu ge temeya ge Zeso Krist ne. Teme mbi ya no go, mbi jin̰a nda fare ge hon nda ndwa ge Dok kee wa tii ge ne pagal, ge num ge ɓa̰a̰ dagre no ge Zeso Krist ma pe.
55001002	Wa sanna ge mo ta, Timote, mbi van ge laa wanna. Mbi njaŋe mo lawayta mbe ne. N̰a Dok ge nè Ba mage nè Bagezok Zeso Krist, num ngay kwaɗa keeya ge maa way ge mo ta. Num ngay kuwa a̰se ge maa way ge mo ta, num ee mo kàɗɗa halas me.
55001003	Mbi kee mersi hon Dok ge mbi kee tèmel ge ne ne no ge on̰om ge vaa fare buwal ge kwaɗa, dinna ge mojo̰o̰ mbi baŋ ma ka kee ne go. Mbi kee kaɗeya go ge mo pe ɗaɗag, ɗaal mage gyala.
55001004	Mbi dwaɗ ge fiyaso ge mo fiya ne pagal, sok ge nè vaa ge ta go. Mbi ge ene gḛḛ ndwa kuwa mo ndwa iya, go no me, mbi wa kee laa saal.
55001005	Mbi dwaɗ ge hoɗ fareba ge amo ge be ndwa mbuɗiya ge na zì, ge mo ho ne ge Zeso Krist ta pagal. Hoɗ fareba ge amo mbe, a dinna ge mo na̰ gà̰a̰ Luwiz ne go, kaɗ ge mo na̰ Enis ne go waɗme.
55001006	A ge pe no, mbi dwage mo janna no go: Bobo ge Dok ho̰ mo ne, ge mbi ee mbi tok ma ge mo pagal ge ne pe, ɓyare go mo n̰a ne se suuya to.
55001007	Kuwa go Dok be hon nè on̰om ge mɔgeya to. Ɗaŋɗe, ho̰ nè on̰om ge pool, ge laa wanna mage andaŋ ndwa kee tèmel ge na ne.
55001008	Kaa ge mo kee daŋso sok jan fare ge Bagezok ne go to, mo kee ne ge mbi pe to me, mbi ge no daŋay zì, ge fare ge ne ne pe. Ɗaŋɗe, vḭḭ tene njoɗ yal ge Fare ge Kwaɗa pe, ge mojo̰o̰ mbi sḛ njoɗ no go me. Ke ne ge pool ge ɓaŋlaŋ ge Dok ho̰ mo ne ta.
55001009	Dok mo̰o̰ nè ne, too nè ya no go nè kaa nda ge na ne ma, a ge tèmel kwaɗa ge nè kee num ma pe to. Ɗaŋɗe, ne sḛ vḭḭ tene ne go, na ngay kuwa a̰se ge na ne ge nè ta. Vḭḭ tene ne go na ho̰ nè ne ge ɓanna ge nè ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Zeso Krist pe, zḛḛ ge go dunin̰a wa ya be dolla to day.
55001010	Ge sego, ajo̰o̰ go nè Ba ge monna Zeso Krist mbo ja, kuwa a̰se ge ne ne mbe dyan ja zum ge kɔn̰al go. A ne sḛ ge haa ne, ge pool ge swày ne pagal. Ge Fare ge Kwaɗa ta, ngay nè no go, nè ge ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din.
55001011	A ge Fare ge Kwaɗa mbe pe oyya, Dok taa mbi no go, mbi kaa ndu ge temeya mage ndu ge hate nda.
55001012	A ge fare mbe no pe, mbi za̰a̰ yal no. Go no puy ɗe, daŋso kee mbi to ge dape, mbi kuwa ndu ge mbi ho fareba ge ne ta kuwa. Ge fare ge mbo seɗ mbi ya ma pul zì peɗ puy ɗe, mbi ge hoɗ fareba go, kaŋ ge Dok ho̰ mbi ne mbe no, a ge pool koy ne ɗiŋ deɗ dwam kun sariya ge na ne yà.
55001013	Fare ge fareba ge mbi hate mo num ma, n̰a num kaa kaŋ ko pul ma ge mo ta. Koy hoɗ fareba mage laa wanna ge nè see num ge ɓanna ge nè ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Zeso Krist pe.
55001014	Ge On̰om ge Harcal ge no ge nè zì ta, koy Fare ge Kwaɗa mbe ge àa ho̰ ne mo tok go cemeɗ.
55001015	Ge mojo̰o̰ mo kuwa no go, na̰ van ge suwa Azi go ma peɗ seŋe mbi ya maa guwa̰. Koo Fijel mage Hermojen, àa swaɗ mbi ya go waɗme.
55001016	Kaɗɗa ge Onesifor ɗe, a ndu ge ka hon mbi pool ne ɗaɗag, sok ge mbi kaa ge daŋay zì go, be ka chiya nda ndwa voo to. Ge pe no, mbi kaɗe Bagezok no go, ne ngay kuwa a̰se ge na ne ge ne zok ta.
55001017	Ge waɗe ge kwaɗa, ago sok ge dee ge suwal ga̰a̰l Rom diŋ yà gaw, hâ tene sok ɓyare mbi pe go ɗiŋ see mbi no.
55001018	Mbi kaɗeya go nè Bagezok ngay kuwa a̰se ge na ne ge ne ta, ge na dwam kun sariya go. Ge mojo̰o̰ mo kuwa ne no go, sok ge mbi kaa ge suwal ga̰a̰l Efez diŋ, mba mbi gḛḛ.
55002001	Mo mbi van, cirsi mḛḛya pool ge kuwa a̰se ge nè see ne no ge ɓanna ge nè ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Zeso Krist ta.
55002002	Fare ge mo dee za̰a̰ mbi hate nda ge ɓase ma ne, ɓyare go mo ame ne, mo hate nda ge n̰a wa to ma ne, ndwa go num sḛ ma, num wa gaa hate nda ge ɗogle ma ne waɗme.
55002003	Dinna ge asagar ge kwaɗa ge Zeso Krist ne go, kaɗɗa yal seɗ mo ya ge sok kee ne tèmel go, wa̰a̰ tene ge ne zì.
55002004	Ndu ge mbo asagar, ge ɓyare go na kee na ga̰a̰l ge wa̰a̰ na ya sḛ tii, daa waɗ na pagal ge kaŋ ge nda kee num no zum ma zì to.
55002005	Go no me, ndu ge chiya soo, ge go ne dee ya unin̰a go, ɓyare go ne chiya soo ge eeya ge soo ne ma pagal tetem.
55002006	Go no me, ndu ge za̰a̰ yal no ge sok gaa kaŋ go, a ne sḛ ee pe zam kaŋ zam ge kaŋ kyarga mbe nee ne.
55002007	Duwa ge fare ge mbi jan mo ne no pagal kwaɗa. Nè Bagezok mbo hon mo pool ge kuwa ɗugul ge fare mbe ma way peɗ.
55002008	Duwa ge Zeso Krist pagal, ne ge wuwa no ge rusu ge Daviɗ ne zì ya, suu no, ta̰a̰ ge nda ge swày ma buwal zì no me. A Fare ge Kwaɗa ge mbi oy nee ne ge nda ta peɗ.
55002009	A ge Fare ge Kwaɗa mbe pe mbi za̰a̰ yal no, ɗiŋ àa vuwa mbi dinna ge ndu ge fiiri vin̰a no go. Ɗaŋɗe, fare ge Dok ne, ndu vuwal ne se to.
55002010	A ge pe no, mbi in dṵṵl mbe ma no peɗ, ge nda ge Dok taa num ma pe, ndwa go num sḛ ma me, num see monna ge Zeso Krist ta. Num wa seɗ vin̰a ge waɗ ge muluk ge pateya ge ɗiŋ ge din ge Dok ne zì.
55002011	Fare ge nda jan mbe ma no, àa fare ge gag ma ne, àa jan go: Kaɗɗa nè suu ɓanna ge Krist, Nè mbo kaɗ ge ndwa ɓanna ge ne waɗme.
55002012	Kaɗɗa nè wan ta deŋel ya, Nè mbo kee muluk ɓanna ge ne dagre waɗme. Kaɗɗa nè kuri ne ya, ne sḛ mbo kuri nè waɗme.
55002013	Kaɗɗa nè nda ge n̰a wa ma ne ge ne ta, Ne sḛ Ba ge n̰a wa to ne. Ago ne sḛ kee a̰me ge vḛḛne tene to.
55002014	Voo nda pagal ge fare ge mbi jin̰a mo num ma pagal. Jin̰a num ge Dok ndwa se waŋ go: Ne kaa ge num ka pee ta ge fare ma pagal to, ge dape, fare mbe ma mbaa a̰me to. Ɗaŋɗe, àa vḛḛne nda ge za̰a̰ num ma vḛḛne.
55002015	Ke kwaɗa go mo ngay tene ge Dok ndwa se dinna ge ndu ge mbiya tab go, ge kee tèmel moor be daŋso, ge oy fare ge Dok ne ge nda ta ge fareba pagal.
55002016	In̰a tene gezi ge fare janna ge bàŋ yag mage fare ge kee Dok sḛ duul tii to ma ta. Ge dape, nda ge paa maa wa ge fare mbe zì ma, àa sele, àa kaɗ mboya lalam ɗiŋ àa mbo kaal ge Dok.
55002017	Num fare hateya mbe ma dinna ge jwaŋ ndoɗe go, àa mbo ka zam se se ɗiŋ vḛḛne sḛ duul gezi ge ɓul mɔɗwag. Himene mage Fileɗ ge nda mbe ma buwal zì.
55002018	Àa sele ya ge vin̰a ge fareba go, àa jan go: Dok dee tan nda ge swày ma ya tan sok zoo. Go mbe no, ge hateya ge num way mbe ma ta, àa ee nda a̰me ma ya gḛḛ batame hoɗ fareba ge maa way ma digi.
55002019	Ɗaŋɗe, fare ge fareba ge Dok ne eya to. A dinna ge zok pe ge doo no ge gon̰ pagal go, ndaɗ to. Àa njaŋe ge ne pagal go: Bagezok kuwa nda ge na ne ma kuwa. Gwan njaŋe no go iya: Ndu ge diige ge jan go na ge Bagezok nee ne ɗe, ɓyare go ne ɔwabe tene gezi ge sone keeya ta.
55002020	Ge zok pul ge ga̰a̰l zì, àa ee zì ɗuli ge dinar mage ɗuli ge bware walam ma ɗeŋew to. Ɗaŋɗe, ɗuli ge àa sḭḭ num ge njiyal ma, ge àa ca num ge ɔwara ma waɗme. Ge zḛḛge ma, àa ee num ge dwam vḛḛso ma pe, gegene ma, àa kee tèmel ge num dwam ma pagal tatab.
55002021	Kaɗɗa ndu ɓyare haɗ tene kɔn̰al, ne koy tene kwaɗa, ne ɔwabe tene ya gezi ge hateya ge hày mbe ma ta, mbo kaɗ dinna ge ɗuli ge dinar mage ɗuli ge bware walam ma go. Nè Bagezok mbo mbege ne gezi ge tene pe, ago mbaa na Bagezok mbaa. Àa ee ne ge kaŋ keeya ge kwaɗa ge diige pe peɗ.
55002022	Iya ɔwale, ɔwabe tene gezi ge ene keeya ge sone ge bogol ne ma go. Mbo mboya ge temel, ho fareba ge dul wa ɗu ge Zeso Krist ta. Kaa ge laa wanna ge nda ta, kaa halas ge num ge dul wa kɔn̰al ma, ge num ge kaɗe nè Bagezok ta ma me.
55002023	Pa tene ge pee ta ge dàle mage bernde ma zì to. Kuwa go num tol gool.
55002024	Be kee kwaɗa go moor ge Bagezok ne kaɗ ndu ge kee gool to. Wa̰a̰ ndwa kaɗ ndu ge fogol ge nda ta peɗ. Ne kaa ndu ge mbiya hate nda kwaɗa. Ndu ge wan tene ge fare ge sone ge àa kee na num ma zì peɗ me.
55002025	Mbiya go ne ɗwabe nda ge pee fare ma ge suul, ge jobreya go Dok mbo hage num vin̰a ge seŋe ta ya se, ge dape, num dee ya kuwa fare ge fareba.
55002026	Go mbe no, Ba ge ho̰o̰l ge wa̰a̰ num ge na faɗe zì, ndwa ee num kee na tèmel moor, àa mbo harge ta ge ne tok zì ya, àa gaa ndwa ɗermel.
55003001	Kuwa go, ge dwam pe aaya ma go, yal ma mbo mboya.
55003002	Ago, nda duwana ma mbo seŋe zon̰, nda ge yan bware pe ma, ge pagal ga̰a̰l ma, ge jegreya ma, ge jan fare ge sone kakatag ge Dok pagal ma, ge ho̰o̰l ge maa ba ma, ge kuwa kwaɗa gwanna ge byalam go to ma, ge ndil kaŋ ge Dok ne ma solom ma,
55003003	ge duul til ge maa sele ma yal ma pe to ma, ge kuwa nda a̰se to ma, ge jan fare ge sone ge nda pagal ma, nda ge wan ta to ge fare ma zì ma, nda ge birtiŋ ma, nda ge kee ho̰o̰l ge nda ge kwaɗa ma,
55003004	ge chal nda ko ma, ge laa ol ma, ge hufugiya ma, ge laa wa̰a̰ sḛ tii keeya ma waɗe Dok me.
55003005	Àa mbo ka kee kaŋ ma dinna ge nda ge Dok ne ma go. Ɗaŋɗe, àa mbo kuri pool ɓaŋlaŋ ge Dok ne gezi. Wa̰a̰ tene gezi yà kaal ge nda ge go mbe ma no ta.
55003006	Nda a̰me ge num buwal zige ma mbo go ge zok ma diŋ ndwa lase nda zaab ge hoɗ fareba ge num way ma mḛḛ no pool ndiŋ to, ge ho̰ ta no ge sone pe keeya ma. Nda zaab mbe ma nda ge ene ge ol bibiliw iigi num no ge vin̰a ma go pe hini-hini ma ne me.
55003007	Àa yan go hateya ge jin̰al ma pe ɗaɗag, ɗaŋɗe, àa mbyaɗ deɗ-ɗa kuwa fare ge Dok ne ge fareba pe to baɗ.
55003008	Dinna ge Janes mage Jambres mḛḛ piliya ge Moyiz go ɗe, go mbe no me, nda mbe ma mḛḛ piliya ge fare ge Dok ne ge fareba. Nda soɗob mbe ma dwaɗɗa ma dwaɗɗa ge sone ma ne, hoɗ fareba ge num way ma hetel ge Dok ta to.
55003009	Ɗaŋɗe, àa mbo daa gwan zam zḛḛ to. Ago, nda peɗ mbo kuwa go num nda ge dàle ma ne dinna ge Janes mage Jambres dee kaa go.
55003010	Kaɗɗa ge mo ɗe, mo kuwa tèmel keeya ge ambi ma kuwa peɗ, ge mbi kee num no ge Krist pe: Hateya ge ambi ma, mboya ge ambi ma, honna ge mbi ho̰ tene ge tèmel pe keeya ma, hoɗ fareba ge ambi, wan tene ge ambi, laa wanna ge ambi, wan tene deŋel ge ambi me.
55003011	Mo kuwa njon̰n̰a ge ambi ma, yal njoɗɗa ge ambi ma me. A ma̰ yal njoɗɗa ge mbi see ne ge suwal Antiyoch, Ikoniyom, Listr diŋ to ne de? O̰o̰ a fareba mbi za̰a̰ yal gḛḛ, go no peɗ puy ɗe, nè Bagezok ndage mbi ge num zì no.
55003012	A ngaɗ go, num peɗ ge vḭḭ ta go maa mbo mboya ge jwab, ge laa ɓyareya ge Dok ne pagal, ge ɓanna ge nè ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Zeso Krist pe, àa mbo seɗ yal ma.
55003013	Ɗaŋɗe, nda ge laa pisil mage nda ge lase nda ma mbo ka zam zḛḛ zḛḛ ge sone keeya ma zì. Àa mbo ka ee nda n̰aameya, guwa̰, nda mbo ee num n̰aameya waɗme.
55003014	Kaɗɗa ge mo ɗe, kaa vwalla mece ge kaŋ ge mo hate num ma ta, ame num ge dul wa ɗu. Mo kuwa ndu ge hate mo kaŋ mbe ma kuwa hetel.
55003015	Ge jiyale ge mo ya day ɗiŋ màno, mo kuwa Njaŋeya ge Dok ne ma pul kuwa. Àa ge pool hon mo andaŋ ge mbiya ee mo hoɗ fareba ge Zeso Krist ta ndwa go, mo dee ya ge monna go.
55003016	Njaŋeya ge Dok ne ma peɗ, nda ge njaŋe num ma, a On̰om ge Dok ne mbâ num ne, sok njaŋe kaŋ mbe ma go. Àa kwaɗa ge hateya pe, ge ee ndu kuwa n̰aal ge na ne pe, ge mḛḛreya pe, ge yuwaleya ee ndu mboya temel ge laa ɓyareya ge Dok ne pagal pe me.
55003017	Go mbe no, ndu ge Dok ne mbo kaɗ nuusiya mbyaɗɗa tab, ge tèmel keeya ge siŋli ge diige pe peɗ.
55004001	Mbi jan mo ne ge Dok ndwa se, ge Zeso Krist ndwa se me, ne ge mbo kun sariya ya nda ge ndwa mage nda ge swày ma pagal. Mbi jan mo ne ge gwanna ge ne ne ya mage muluk keeya ge ne ne pe me.
55004002	Ɓyare go mo oy fare ge Dok ne, dwage fare oyya mbe ge sok ma go peɗ, sok ge kwaɗa mage sok ge sone ma go peɗ me. Ee num kuwa maa n̰aal ma, mḛḛre num, mo moɗege num me. Kaa ndu ge wan tene, mo ka hate num ɗaɗag me.
55004003	Ago dwam ma mboya go, ge go nda duwana ma mbo za̰a̰ nda ge hon hateya ge fareba ma daa to. Ɗaŋɗe, àa mbo gaa kee kaŋ ge sone ge maa laa ɓyare num ma. Àa mbo seɗ ta nda ge hon hateya ge hày ma gḛḛ-gḛḛ. Sok za̰a̰ num hateya mbe ma go, num duul ma mbo ka zam num mumuɗug.
55004004	Àa mbo ee maa tɔgwa ma gezi ya ge fare ge fareba ta be za̰a̰ ya. Àa seŋe ta ge sigi ge bàŋ yag ma ta yà.
55004005	Kaɗɗa ge mo ɗe, koy tene kwaɗa, mo wan tene ge yal njoɗɗa ma zì waɗme. Ke tèmel ge ndu ge oy Fare ge Kwaɗa mbiya kee ne. Huy tèmel ge Dok ho̰ mo ne keeya wa kwaɗa.
55004006	Kaɗɗa ge mbi ɗe, mbi dwam ma mbyaɗ-ɗa go, mbi gaa mbo swày. Mbi dinna ge kaŋ kogor ge àa mbo hun ne ya ge tuwaleya pe keeya go.
55004007	Ge mojo̰o̰ asagar ge kwaɗa go, mbi mbaa twam ɗiŋ mbi dee ya wa aaya go no. Ge mojo̰o̰ ndu ge chiya soo ge kwaɗa go, mbi aa soo chiyaya ge ambi ya go. Mbi koy hoɗ fareba ge ambi cemeɗ.
55004008	Ago, a gaa mbo zḛḛ no, mbi ge kuwaya go, Bagezok, Ba ge kun sariya ge temel taɗ mbege poɗɗa ge mbi halla ne ya gezi. Dwam ge mbo ɗegeya kun sariya, mbo hon mbi ne. Hon ne mbi ɗeŋew to, ɗaŋɗe nda peɗ, ge num laa mbo ɓyareya go ne guwa̰ ya.
55004009	Ha tene ya avun cab, mo mbo ya seɗ mbi.
55004010	Ago, Demas n̰a mbi ya go, ge dape, ne laa wa̰a̰ kaŋ ge dunin̰a ne ma gḛḛ, mbo ya suwal Tesalonik, Kresen mbo ya suwa ge Galaɗ ne yà, Titus mbo ya suwa ge Dalmati ne yà no,
55004011	Luk gaa ne hini ɗu ge mbi ziya. Sok ge mo ɗege mbo ya, ḛ ge Mark ɓa̰a̰ ya dagre. Ne sḛ ndu ge mbiya mbaa mbi ne ge mbi tèmel keeya ma zì.
55004012	Kaɗɗa ge Tichig ɗe, mbi teme ne ya mbo suwal Efez.
55004013	Sok ge mo dee ɗege ya mbo ya, mbo ge suwal Trowas yà, ge Karpus diŋ, mo ɔwabe mbi ba̰a̰ kapoɗ ge eyalam pe ya ge mo tok go. Ɔwabe maktub ma ya ge mo tok go, mo vyale maktub ge gwabal, ge kaŋ njaŋe no ge num ta ma to me.
55004014	Alekzandr, ba ge kee sòo, kê mbi yal gḛḛ. Bagezok mbo poɗ ne ge ne kaŋ keeya ma pagal.
55004015	Koy tene kwaɗa ge ne ta. Ago mḛḛ piliya ndaa kaka ge fare ge nè hate ne no pagal.
55004016	Fare gegene go, sok ge mbi ee pe mbo ge nda ge kun sariya ma ndwa se yà, ndwa ben tene ge fare zì, ge wanna ge àa wa̰a̰ mbi daŋay pe, ndu a̰me ɗu be vin mbi pe to. Àa suwa mbi hini ɗu ge mbi fare wa go, go no puy ɗe, fare a̰me ɗu ne kaa num pagal to.
55004017	Ɗaŋɗe, nè Bagezok sḛ ɗu mba mbi ne. Ho̰ mbi pool no go mbi oy fare ge na ne be voo, ge nda ge kuwa Dok to ma, ge kaa dwam mbe go ma ta mɔɗwag. Ge mbaaya ge Bagezok ne ta, mbi see vin̰a ge ɓuuya ge swày zì ya no, dinna ge àa harge ndu ge sòne ma wa zì ya go.
55004018	Mbi ge kuwaya go Bagezok mbo n̰a a̰me ge sone ɗu deɗ ge mbi pagal to. Mbo mon mbi ɗiŋ gene mbi ge muluk ge na ne, ge no pḭḭ zì yà yà. Pateya a ne nee ne, ge zaman mage zaman ma go. Amin !
55004019	Sa̰a̰ Prisil mage na obe Akilas wa. Mo vyale ge zok ge Onesifor ne to.
55004020	Eras sḛ gaa kàɗɗa ge suwal Korent yà. Mbi n̰a Trofim ge suwal Mile yà ge dape, ne duul tuguɗi.
55004021	Ɓyare vin̰a ge mo mbo ya ge sok eyalam ndwa zḛḛ. Na̰ van Ebulus, Pudens, Linus, Klodiya ɓanna ge na̰ van gegene ma sa̰a̰ mo wa gḛḛ.
55004022	Mbi kaɗe go, Bagezok kaa ɓanna ge mo. N̰a ne ngay kwaɗa keeya ge na ne ḛ ta peɗ me. Amin !
56001001	Mbi Pol, mbi ndu ge kee tèmel ge Dok nee ne, mbi kaɗ ndu ge temeya ge Zeso Krist ne me. Dok teme mbi ya ne go, mbi mba nda ge na taa num ma deɗ-ɗa ge vin̰a hoɗ fareba go. Mbi hate num fare ge na ne ge fareba ge mbiya ee num mbo mboya ge jwab, ge vin̰a hoɗ fareba mbe go.
56001002	Mbi kee ano mbe ndwa go, num ee maa jobreya go maa seɗ ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din ya go. Dok ge kun hày to, zḛḛ ge dunin̰a gale wa ya be dolla, kee wa tii ndwa hoɗ nè ndwa mbe ge ɗiŋ ge din.
56001003	Sok ge sok ma mbiya go, din̰a ne ya zum no, ge fare ge na ne ta. Ne sḛ Dok Ba ge mon nda, ho mbi na wa no go mbi jin̰a ne ge nda ta.
56001004	Mbi njaŋe lawayta no hon mo Titus, mo dinna ge mbi van ge son ge wuwa ge mbi duul zì go, ge fareba ge nè ge mo ho ne ge Zeso Krist ta pe. Mbi kaɗeya go, Dok ge nè Ba mage Zeso Krist Ba ge mo̰o̰ nè, num ngay kwaɗa keeya ge maa way mo ta, num ee mo kàɗɗa halas me.
56001005	Mbi n̰a mo ge suwa Kreɗ yà ndwa go, mo nuusi tèmel wa ge gaa ma, mo ee nda ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme tèmel ma ge ɓase ge Krist ne ge no ge suwal ga̰a̰l ge diige diŋ, ge wa hoɗɗa ge ambi pagal.
56001006	Ndu ge mo tal ne ndwa ɗeme ɓase ge Krist ne ma, ɓyare go ne kaa ndu ge àa seɗ fare a̰me ge sone ge ne pagal to, ndu ge gwale ɗu, ge ne van ma ho fareba no ge Zeso Krist ta, ge gwan maa pagal no ge maa ba ma pe se, ge mbo mboya ge jwab ma me.
56001007	Ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme ɓase ge Krist ne, a ndu ge dol na ndwa ge tèmel ge Dok ne pagal ne. Ɓyare go ne kaa ndu ge be fare na pagal, ndu ge jegre to, ndu ge laa ol to, ndu ge fere tene to, ndu ge kee gool to, ndu ge aham ge yan bware pe ge na vin̰a go ge.
56001008	Ɗaŋɗe, ne kaa ndu ge kee gɔswal, ndu ge laa wa̰a̰ kee kaŋ ge kwaɗa ma, ndu ge no ge dwaɗɗa ge kwaɗa ma, ndu ge temel, ndu ge harcal, ge wan tene gezi ge ene sḛ duul ne ma ta keeya,
56001009	ge ho̰ na dul wa ge ɓul mɔɗwag ge fare ge mbiya ndu hoɗ fareba ge ne ta, ge nè hate nda ne me. Kaɗɗa na hon tene ya mbe go, mbo seɗ vin̰a ge hate nda ge ɗogle ma fare mbe, ee num seɗ pool ge ne ta me. Go mbe no, mbo kaɗ ndu ge ngay zum waŋ go, nda ge ɓyare vuuɗi fare ma, num fare mbe ma ge maa vin̰a go to.
56001010	Ge nda ge gwan maa pagal no ge fare ge fareba ge Krist ne pe se to ma, ge lase nda ge fare janna ge maa way ge mbaa fare to ma, gḛḛ Yahuɗ ge ho fareba no ge Zeso Krist ta ma.
56001011	Ɓyare go mo n̰a num sok go fyalag ge faaya to. Ago, àa hon hateya ge no ge maa vin̰a go to ma. Ge ano mbe no ta, àa ee nda a̰me ma go gḛḛ iigiya ge maa zok ma diŋ. Àa kee ano mbe no ndwa go maa wa seɗ wa zamma ge ne zì. Ɗaŋɗe, a kaŋ daŋso ne ge num pe.
56001012	Ndu a̰me ɗu ge ka kuwa fare ma gḛḛ, ge nda ge Kreɗ ma buwal zì, jin̰a go: Nda ge Kreɗ ma nda ge kaa ge hày pe kunna ma ne, nda ge vagal ma, ge uwal ma me. Àa dinna ge kavaar ge ful zì ge ma go.
56001013	Fare mbe ge ndu mbe jin̰a ne, a fare ge fareba ne. Ge ne pe, ɓyare go mo mḛḛre num ol kekeŋ, ndwa go num guwa̰ ya ge vin̰a hoɗ fareba ge jwab go.
56001014	Num ho̰ ta ge sigi isiya ge bàŋ yag ge Yahuɗ ma way ma ta to, ge wa yuwaleya ge nda ge sele gezi ge vin̰a hoɗ fareba go ma way ta to me.
56001015	Nè kuwa kuwa go nda ge dul wa no kɔn̰al ma, kaŋ ma peɗ kɔn̰al ge num pe. Ɗaŋɗe, nda ge num dul wa no kɔn̰al to ma, ge ho fareba no ge Krist ta to ma, a̰me ge kɔn̰al ge num pe to. Àa dwaɗ ɗaɗag kee kaŋ ge seŋre ma, sok kee kaŋ mbe ma go, daŋso kee num to.
56001016	Àa isi ta go maa nda ge kuwa Dok ma ne, ɗaŋɗe, num kaŋ keeya ma ngay nda go, num nda ge kuwa Dok to ma zane ne. Àa gwan maa pagal ge fare ge Dok ne pe se to, àa kee kaŋ ge Dok laa ɓyare num to ma, àa mbyaɗ kee a̰me ge kwaɗa ɗu to me.
56002001	Kaɗɗa ge mo ɗe, kaŋ ge mo hate nda ne no, ne kaa ge fare ge fareba ge Dok ne pagal ɗeŋew.
56002002	Jin̰a nda ga̰a̰l ge sabar ma go, ne kaa ge num fere ta to, num mbo mboya ge kwaɗa ge ee nda hon num hormo, num kaa nda ge dwaɗ fare kwaɗa ma, nda ge ho fareba ge dul wa ɗu ge Dok ta ma, nda ge ngay laa wanna ge nda ta ma, num kaɗ nda ge wan ta ge yal njoɗɗa zì ma me.
56002003	Jin̰a nda zaab ge sabar ma waɗme go, num mboya kaa mboya ge harcal ge Dok ndwa se. Num kaa nda ge jan fare ge sone kakatag ge nda pagal to ma, num ho̰ ta ge on̰or jin̰al ta njoɗɗa satag to me. Ke kwaɗa go, num ho̰ hateya ge maa vin̰a go ma,
56002004	ndwa yuwale nda zaab ge sḛ jiyale ma go: Num laa wa̰a̰ maa obe ma, ge maa van ma,
56002005	num kaa nda ge kuwa fare ma, ge ɔwabe ta gezi ge ene sḛ duul go ma, ge doo maa ndwa no ge maa zok ma pagal ma, ge laa wa̰a̰ kee kaŋ ge kwaɗa ma, ge gwan maa pagal ge maa obe ma pe se ma me. Sok kee ano mbe no go, nda mbo jan fare ge sone kakatag ge fare ge Dok ne pagal to.
56002006	Moɗege nda ge bogol ma waɗme go, num kaa nda ge eyan ta gezi ge kaŋ keeya ge sone ma ta me.
56002007	Mo sḛ waɗme, ke kaŋ keeya ge kwaɗa ma ɗeŋew, ndwa go mo kaa kaŋ ko pul ge num way. Hate kaŋ ge dul wa ɗu. Ge ne ta, àa wa gaa hon fare ge mo hate ne ga̰a̰l.
56002008	N̰a fare janna ge amo ma kaa fare janna ge gag ma. Ge go ndu a̰me jin̰a fare ge sone ge num pagal to. Go no me, nè nda ge ho̰o̰l ma wa seɗ fare a̰me ge sone janna ge nè pagal to. Go mbe no, daŋso wa gaa kee num.
56002009	Moɗege moor ma go, num guwa̰ maa pagal ma ge maa ba ge yiya maa ma pe se. Ge kaŋ keeya ge num way ma zì peɗ, num ke kaŋ ge mbiya kee maa ba ge yiya maa ma sḛ tii. Ne kaa ge num pe ta ge num to.
56002010	Ne kaa ge num chee num kaŋ ma to. Ɗeŋew, ago num ke tèmel kwaɗa, ge ne ta, wa ee num ba ge yiya num ma kuwaya go, num nda ge ɗeŋer ma ne. Sok kee ano mbe no go, àa mbo hon fare ge nè hate ne, ge Dok Ba ge mo̰o̰ nè ne ga̰a̰l me.
56002011	Dok ngay kuwa a̰se ge na ne ya zum ge nda ta, ge dape, num peɗ dee ya ge monna go.
56002012	Kuwa a̰se mbe hate nè go, nè kuri kaŋ ge sone mage ene ge dunin̰a ne ma gezi. Ge ne ta, nè wa mbo mboya ge jwab, nè wa kaɗ nda ge temel ma, ge n̰a wa to ma ge Dok ndwa se ge doŋ pe mbe no go me.
56002013	Sok da̰a̰re laa saal ge nè ee nè jobreya no ge ne pagal mage dyanna ya zum ge Ba ge mon nè ne, Zeso Krist, Dok ge ɓaŋlaŋ ge pateya ge na ne zì.
56002014	Vḭḭ tene mbo swày ge nè pe, ndwa go nè see zuuya ge nè n̰aal ma zì, na haa nè harcal ge na ndwa se, nè seŋe nda ge na ne ma, kàɗɗa fogol cacaf ge tèmel keeya ge kwaɗa ma pe.
56002015	Hate nda ge fare mbe ma no pagal. Ge mo hateya ma zì, moɗege num, mo mḛḛre num ndaa kaka, ge kuwaya ge Dok ho̰ mo ne ta. Ne kaa ge mo n̰a tene ndu a̰me sḛḛ mo to.
56003001	Nda peɗ, voo num pagal go: Num guwa̰ maa pagal ge nda ge kaɗ ga̰a̰l no ge suwa pagal ma pe se, ge nda ge kun sariya ma pe se me. Num vḭḭ num wa, num laa wa̰a̰ kaŋ keeya ge kwaɗa ma me.
56003002	Num jin̰a fare ge sone ndu a̰me pagal to. Num kaa nda ge ɓyare gool to ma. Ɗaŋɗe, nda ge ɓan nda digi ma, nda ge suul ma ge nda ta peɗ.
56003003	Ago, nè sḛ ma waɗme, dee wal, nè kaa nda ge be kuwa fare ma, nda ge pagal ndaa ma, nda ge kuwa vin̰a ge kwaɗa to ma, moor ge ene ne, ge aham ge diige pe peɗ ne keeya. Nè laa wa̰a̰ kee kaŋ keeya ge sone ma, ene mage laa mam. Nda ka sen nè, nè sḛ ma ka sen ta ge ta buwal zì waɗme.
56003004	Ajo̰o̰ nè ka kee kaŋ ge sone ma puy ɗe, sok ge sok ma mbiya go, Dok Ba ge monna ngay kwaɗa keeya mage laa wanna ge na ne ya ge nda duwana ma ta,
56003005	mo̰o̰ nè no. Be mon nè ge tèmel keeya ge temel ge nè ne ma pe to. Ɗaŋɗe, ngay kuwa a̰se ge na ne ge nè ta. Usi nè ge nè sone ma go no, ge dape nè see tolla ge jin̰al, nè see ndwa ge jin̰al waɗme, ge pool ge On̰om ge Harcal ta.
56003006	On̰om ge Harcal mbe, Dok ho̰ nè ne gḛḛ ceɗeɗ ge Zeso Krist Ba ge mo̰o̰ nè ta.
56003007	Kê ano mbe ge dape, ge kuwa a̰se ge na ne ta, nè seŋe nda ge temel ma, ndwa go nè dee ya seɗ ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din ge nè ee nè jobreya ma no ge ne pe.
56003008	Fare ge mbi jan mo num mbe ma no, àa fare janna ge gag ma ne. Mbi ɓyare go mo dwage num fare hateya mbe ma no ndaa kaka, ge dape, nda ge ho fareba ge Dok ta ma ho̰ ta ge ɓul mɔɗwag ge tèmel ge kwaɗa ma ta keeya. Ago fare hateya mbe ma no, àa kwaɗa, àa mbaa nda duwana ma mbaa waɗme.
56003009	Ɗaŋɗe, ɔwabe tene gezi ge pee ta ge dàle ma go, ge pe rusu cemeya ma go, ge gool goɗɗa ma ta, ge za̰a̰ ta to ge eeya ge Moyiz ne ma pagal ma go. Ago, àa mbaa a̰me to, àa kaŋ ge bàŋ yag ma ne.
56003010	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me gene ya caɗeya ge ɓase ge Krist ne ma buwal zì ge na fare hateya a̰me ta, ɓyare go mo mḛḛre ne ndwa ɗu, ge ndwa zi, kaɗɗa na za̰a̰ mo ya to, yin̰a ne zum ge ɓase ge Krist ne ma buwal zì.
56003011	Ago, mo kuwa kuwa go, ndu ge go mbe no, ne sele ya gezi ge vin̰a ge kwaɗa go. Ne ndu ge kee sone ne, ne sḛ ge na pagal kun tene sariya ya kun zoo.
56003012	Sok ge mbi mbo teme Artemas koo Tichig ya ge mo ta yà, ha tene ya avun cab, mo seɗ mbi ge suwal Nikopolis go, ago, a sok ge mbi vḭḭ tene ne kaɗ ne go, sok ge sok eyalam mbo mbo ja.
56003013	Sok ge Zenas ndu ge hate eeya ge Moyiz ne mage Apolos, àa dee ɗege ja mboya ge ḛ ta ya, ɓyare go mo mba num ge vin̰a pe, ndwa go, a̰me hoɗege num to.
56003014	Ɓyare go na̰ van ge ho fareba ge Zeso Krist ta ma, ge no ge suwal Kreɗ go ma, num hate kee kaŋ ge kwaɗa ma waɗme, ndwa ee num mbaa nda ge deɗ ge hoɗegeya ge diige zì ma peɗ. Go no me, kàɗɗa ge num way, wa kaɗ kàɗɗa ge tok ta keɗ to.
56003015	Nda ge i ge num no go ɓanna dagre ma peɗ sa̰a̰ mo wa. Wa sanna ge nè kondore ge ho fareba ge laa wanna ma ta. Mbi kaɗeya go Dok ngay kwaɗa keeya ge na ne ḛ ta peɗ.
57001001	Mbi Pol, ndu ge no ge daŋay zì ge tèmel ge Zeso Krist ne pe, ɓanna ge na̰ van Timote, i njaŋe lawayta mbe no ne hon mo Filemo̰, i na̰ van ge laa wanna ge kee tèmel no dagre ge i, i sa̰a̰ mo wa.
57001002	I njaŋe ne ge ɓase ge Krist ne ge kwate no ge mo diŋ ma pe, ge nè na̰ van ge gwale Afiya pe, ge Archib nè na̰ van ge mbal twam no go dagre ge nè pe waɗme.
57001003	Mbi kaɗeya go, Dok ge nè Ba mage nè Bagezok Zeso Krist ngay kwaɗa keeya ge maa way ge ḛ ta, num ee ḛ kàɗɗa halas me.
57001004	Na̰ van Filemo̰, mbi gwan ge mersi keeya ɗaɗag hon Dok ge ambi ge mo pe, sok ge mbi kaɗ kee kaɗeya ma go.
57001005	Ge dape, mbi za̰a̰ fare ge kwaɗa ge mo kee num ma go, ndwa go laa wanna ge mo ngay ne no ge nda ge ho fareba ma ta, ge hoɗ fareba ge amo ge mo ho ne no ge nè Bagezok Zeso ta me.
57001006	Mbi kaɗe Dok go, hoɗ fareba ge amo, ge ɓa̰a̰ mo no ge i ge Zeso Krist ta, ne kaa hoɗ fareba ge kee tèmel. Go mbe no, ngay kaŋ ge kwaɗa ge nè no go ge num ma peɗ zum, ge ɓanna ge nè ɓa̰a̰ ge Zeso Krist pe.
57001007	Mbi kaa ge laa saal, mbi see laa eyalla no gḛḛ me, ge dape, na̰ van, laa wanna ge amo ee nda ge ho fareba ma ya seɗ pool.
57001008	Mbi Pol, mbi go ge kaŋ a̰me ɗu ge mbi ɓyare ele ne no ge mo ta. Ajo̰o̰ mbi see vin̰a mbe ge Krist ta ɗe, mbi ge pool ge hoɗ mo mbi wa go, mo ke kaŋ ge mo mbiya kee ne.
57001009	Ge go mbi jin̰a mo ne ge pool ɗe, ne nde-nde go mbi jan mo ne ge laa wanna ge nè no ge ne, ge Krist ta. Mbi ge sabe ya no paŋ, ge no daŋay zì ge tèmel ge Zeso Krist ne pe,
57001010	mbi kaɗe mo ge mbi van Onezim pe, ne ge mbi seŋe ya ne ba ge on̰om zì, ge sok kee daŋay no go.
57001011	Dee wal, ne sḛ kaa ndu ge be mbaa mo ge fare ne. Ge sego, seŋe ya ndu ge mbaa fare ge nè ge mo pe.
57001012	Ge sego, mbi gwan teme mo ne yà, ame ne ge mojo̰o̰ van ge wuwa ge mbi sḛ zì go.
57001013	Ajo̰o̰ mbi ge daŋay zì ge Fare ge Kwaɗa pe oyya ɗe, mbi duwa no go mbi daa mà koy Onezim ge mbi ta, ndwa go ne mba mbi ge mo byalam go dinna ge mo sḛ daa mà mbaa mbi ya go.
57001014	Ɗaŋɗe, mbi ɓyare go mbi kee a̰me ge mbi pagal to. Ne kaa ge mo duwa go mbi ee mo ne ge pool kee kaŋ ge kwaɗa mbe no to. Ɓyare go mo vḭḭ tene ne kee ne.
57001015	Dwam ma kee ya kwaɗa lag ge ḛ ge Onezim buwal vaa se go, ge sego, mo gaa seɗ ne kàɗɗa ge mo ta ɗiŋ ge din.
57001016	Ago ge sego, ge ameya ge ne ame Krist pe, seŋe ya nde-nde waɗe moor gegene ma, gaa na̰ van ge laa wanna ne ge Krist ta. Kaɗɗa ge mbi ɗe, mbi laa wa̰a̰ ne gḛḛ. Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ge mo, mo laa gwan wan ne mà gḛḛ waɗeya ge kon pagal ge dape, a ndu duwana ne, gwan kaɗ ge na̰ van go, ge Bagezok pe me.
57001017	Kaɗɗa mbi mo kondore ge laa ɗu ne, ɓyare go mo ame ne dinna ge mo daa mà ame mbi ya go.
57001018	Kaɗɗa ne tèmel keeya a̰me za̰a̰ mo yal go koo ne sḛ vḛḛne mo a̰me ge mbiya ne poɗ mo ne go ɗe, ee ne dṵṵl ge mbi pagal.
57001019	Mbi Pol, mbi njaŋe mo sok ano mbe ne ge mbi tok zì go, mbi sḛ gaa poɗ mo kaŋ mbe ne. Mbi jan ano mbe no puy ɗe, mo kuwa kuwa go mbi wul ge mo pagal, ge dape, ndwa ge mo see ne no, mo see ne ge mbi ta.
57001020	Na̰ van, mbi kaɗe mo kaɗe go, mo ke mbi tèmel no ge laa wanna ge nè Bagezok ne pe, ndwa go mbi dul wa ee se, ge baan ge nè no ge ne ge Krist ta pe.
57001021	Mbi ge kuwaya tyatyaɗ go, sok njaŋe mo lawayta mbe no go, a fareba go, mo mbo kee kaŋ ge mbi kaɗe ne no ge mo ta. Ge mbi kuwa mo no go, mo mbo gwan kee ne ge kon pagal waɗeya zoo.
57001022	Ge fare mbe ma no zì waɗme, ɓyare go mo nuusi zok dwamma a̰me ɗu ge mbi pe. Ago, ge kaɗeya ge ḛ ḛ ma ta, mbi ge jobreya go Dok mbo hage vin̰a ge mbi pagal, àa mbo dol mbi zum, mbi wa mbo ge ḛ ta yà.
57001023	Epafras ge no daŋay zì ge mbi dagre, ge ɓanna ge nè ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Zeso Krist pe sa̰a̰ ḛ wa.
57001024	Mark, Aristark, Demas ɓanna ge Luk, mbi ka̰a̰m ge tèmel ma sa̰a̰ ḛ wa waɗme.
57001025	Mbi kaɗeya go Bagezok Zeso Krist ngay kwaɗa keeya ge na ne ge ḛ ta peɗ. Mbi wa aa ne, mbi sa̰a̰ ḛ wa.
58001001	Dee wal, Dok ka jan nè baŋ ma fare ge nda ge zwagre na wa ma wa zì, ndwa gḛḛ-gḛḛ, ge vin̰a ma go pe hini-hini me.
58001002	Ɗaŋɗe, ge sego, ge dwam pe aaya mbe ma no go ɗe, jin̰a nè fare ge na Van wa zì gaw. Ne ge Dok doo kaŋ ma no peɗ ge ne ta, ee num no peɗ ge ne pe waɗme.
58001003	Van mbe ngay zum pool ɓaŋlaŋ ge Dok ne, a ne diir ne hehene me. Hon kaŋ ge na doo num ma peɗ pool ne mḛḛya ndiŋ, ge fare ge ndaa kaka ge waɗ ge na wa zì ma ta me. Guwa̰ ge haa nda duwana ma kɔn̰al, sok usi num ge num sone ma go, kaa ge Dok ge pool waɗe-waɗe tok matoson pagal no, ge pḭḭ ma zì yà.
58001004	A ge pe, Dok hê ne digi waɗe malayka ma no dinna ge na ho̰ ne dḭḭl ge pate pate waɗe ge num way ma no go me.
58001005	Ago, fare mbe ge Dok jan na Van ne no, be jan na malayka a̰me ne ɗu to baɗ go: «Mo mbi Van ne, màno, mbi ngay zum go, mbi mo Ba ne.» Be jan ne ge na malayka a̰me pe ɗu to baɗ me go: «Mbi mbo kaɗ ne Ba ne, ne sḛ mbo kaɗ mbi Van me.»
58001006	Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge ɗege go na teme ya na Van ge no kaŋ ma pagal digi peɗ ge dunin̰a zì ɗe, jin̰a no go: «Ḛ mbi malayka ma peɗ, ḛ uware ne.»
58001007	Kaɗɗa ge ne malayka mbe ma ɗe, jin̰a ge num pe go: «Mbi ee mbi malayka ma kee tèmel ge mojo̰o̰ mbi kee ge sa̰a̰m go, mbi ee num kee tèmel ge mojo̰o̰ ol ge ɗaabe go me.»
58001008	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ge ne Van ɗe, jin̰a ne no go: «Mo, mo Dok ne. Mo hòol gan mbo kaɗ zaman mage zaman ma. Mo calaŋ ge kee muluk doo ge temel pagal.
58001009	Mo laa wa̰a̰ fare ge temel, mo ɓyare fare ge n̰aal to baɗ. A ge pe, Dok ge amo mbege mo gezi sok kan nùm ge mo pagal no, huy mo ge laa saal no, he mo digi ge mo ka̰a̰m ge tèmel ma buwal zì no me.»
58001010	Dok gwan jan na Van no go iya: «Bagezok! A mo ge mo doo suwa ne, ge pe eeya ge kaŋ ma way go. Pḭḭ kaŋ ge mo kê ne ge mo tok zì ne me.
58001011	Kaŋ mbe ma mbo ban sok mɔɗwag, ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ge mo, mo kàɗɗa ɗiŋ ge din. Pḭḭ mage suwa mbo vḛḛne gezi dinna ge ba̰a̰ vḛḛne go.
58001012	Mo mbo warge num digi dinna ge ndu warge ba̰a̰ ga̰a̰l kapoɗ go, mo mbo eya num dinna ge nda eya ba̰a̰ kamal ge ba̰a̰ jin̰al go. Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ge mo, mo eyaya to baɗ, mo del ma aa to me.»
58001013	Ago, fare mbe ge Dok jan ne no, be jan ne ge na malayka a̰me pe ɗu to baɗ go: «Mbo ya kaɗ ge mbi tok matoson pagal, ɗiŋ ge go, mbi seŋe mo nda ge ho̰o̰l ma mo kaŋ ee mo ko ma.»
58001014	Malayka ma on̰om ge kee tèmel hon Dok ma ne, ka teme num me. Teme num ndwa mbaa num ge mbo seɗ monna ya ma.
58002001	Ge ano mbe no pe, mbiya go nè ndi fare mbe ge nè za̰a̰ num ma solom daa to baɗ, ge go ne wa gene nè gezi yà kaal ge num to.
58002002	Nè kuwa kuwa go, fare ge malayka ge Dok ne ma jin̰a num dee wal ma, num fare ge gag ma ne. Nda a̰me ge doo maa tɔgwa gezi ge fare mbe ma ta ma, àa mbo ge num pagal to ma me ɗe, mbiya go àa ee dṵṵl ge num pagal.
58002003	Kaɗɗa ge nè ɗe, nè mà ndil monna ge waɗe mbe ya solom no, nè kee mà pe gyana, nè wa ɓuu ge sok mbe no zì de? Monna mbe, Bagezok ee pe wuwage ne zḛḛ ne, num ge za̰a̰ ne ma jin̰a i no go fare mbe ne go.
58002004	Dok sḛ waɗme, sok kee kaŋ ngayya ma, kaŋ haŋle ma, kaŋ ajab ge pe hini-hini mage hon nda bobo ge On̰om ge Harcal ne ma go, ge laa ɓyareya ge na ne pagal ɗe, ɓyare ngay go, num fare mbe ma fare ge fareba ma ne.
58002005	Go mbe no, Dok be hon malayka ma pool ge kee muluk ge dunin̰a ge jin̰al ge mbo no ya pagal to, ne ge nè faa ne fare màno.
58002006	Ɗaŋɗe, Njaŋeya ge Dok ne sok a̰me jan zum waŋ go: «Dok-goo! Ndu duwana daa pe ne ɗoo, Mo wa ka dwaɗ ge ne de? Adam van huɗi ne ɗoo, Mo wa ka daleya ge ne ta me de?
58002007	Mo guwa̰ ge ne ya malayka ma pe se no swag, Mo kubi ne balme ge hon ne pool, Mage hormo no.
58002008	Mo ee ne ga̰a̰l ge kaŋ ma pagal digi no peɗ me.» Sok hon kaŋ ma peɗ ge Adam van tok go, Dok be n̰a a̰me zum ɗu to. Ge sego, nè ge kuwaya go, kaŋ mbe ma peɗ gale ge ne tok go to.
58002009	Ɗaŋɗe, kaŋ ge nè kuwa ne ge sego no, ago Dok guwa̰ ge Zeso malayka ma pe se swag ndwa go, ge kwaɗa keeya ge na ne ta, ne suu ge nda duwana ma pe peɗ. Ge yal ge za̰a̰ ne mage swày ge se ne pe ɗe, Dok hon ne ga̰a̰l mage hormo ya no.
58002010	Ago, Dok ge doo kaŋ ma peɗ ge na sḛ pe, ge ee num no go mḛḛya ndiŋ, ɓyare ne go nda gḛḛ seŋe na van ma, na wa pate num ge na dagre me. Ajo̰o̰ Zeso Ba ge hage num vin̰a monna ne ɗe, wa̰a̰ ndwa go Dok seŋe ne mbyaɗɗa tab ge yal ge ne njoo ge tèmel mbe ta.
58002011	A Zeso sḛ mbege nda duwana ma gezi ne caɗ ge Dok pe, num mbe ge mbege gezi ma me ɗe, àa ge num mɔɗwag ge Ba mbe ge ɗu. A ge pe, Zeso tol num na na̰ van ma be daŋso no.
58002012	Jan zum waŋ no go: «Dok-goo! Mbi mbo jan mbi na̰ van ma go mo huɗi ne de, Mbi mbo mbal mo kaŋ ge mo ɓase ma buwal zì.»
58002013	Gwan jan no go iya: «Mbi, mbi mbo ka deŋe tene ge mo ta.» Gwan jan no go iya: «Mbi no ɓanna dagre ge van ge Dok ho̰ mbi num ma.»
58002014	Ajo̰o̰ van mbe ma ɓa̰a̰ ɗu ge duul ge swàm ta, Zeso sḛ waɗme seŋe ndu duwana no, ge duul ge swàm, dinna ca ge num go. Seŋe ge num go ndwa go, ge swày ge na ne ta, na roo pool ge Ba ge ho̰o̰l ne, ne ge no ga̰a̰l ge swày ne,
58002015	na zuu nda duwana ge seŋe ya moor sok chiya swày voo go, ge maa dwam kàɗɗa ma zì mɔɗwag.
58002016	Ago, be mbo ya mbaa malayka ma to, mbo ya mbaa vare zoo rusu ge wuwa no ge Abraham zì ma.
58002017	Ge pe no ɗe, wa̰a̰ ndwa go, ne seŋe ge na na̰ van ma sḛ go ge kaŋ ma zì peɗ, ndwa kaɗ ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe ge num pe, ne ge ne dul wa huy no ge kuwa a̰se, ndu ge n̰a wa to ge tèmel ge Dok ne zì ndwa pore sone ge ɓase ma way.
58002018	Ge sego, Zeso ge pool chiya nda ge no pe heeya zì ma kṵwa̰, ge dape, ne sḛ za̰a̰ yal ge pe heeya ma zì.
58003001	Ge fare mbe ma pagal ɗe, na̰ van ge ho fareba ma, Dok sḛ too ḛ ya ne waɗme go, ḛ kaa nda ge na ne ma. Ḛ ee ḛ ndwa Zeso ta, ndu ge Dok teme ya ndwa kaɗ ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe ge nè ge vḭḭ go num fare ge fareba ma ne peɗ.
58003002	A ndu ge n̰a wa to ge Dok ee ne tèmel pagal ne, dinna ge Moyiz dee kaa ge ne zok pagal mɔɗwag go.
58003003	Go mbe no me ɗe, Zeso mbiya seɗ pateya ge ga̰a̰l waɗe ge Moyiz ne, dinna ge ndu ge sin zok seɗ doreya gḛḛ waɗe zok ge na sḭḭ ne go.
58003004	Ago, zok ge diige ge na ba ge sḭḭ na, zane no, a Dok ba ge sḭḭ kaŋ ma ne peɗ.
58003005	Kaɗɗa ge Moyiz ɗe, kaa ndu ge n̰a wa to ne ge Dok zok pagal ge ɓul mɔɗwag dinna ge ndu ge tèmel ge mbiya kee sayda ge kaŋ ge Dok ɓyare mbo jan num ma go me.
58003006	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ge Krist ɗe, a ndu ge n̰a wa to ne, Van ge no ne zok pagal. Ne zok mbe, a nè sḛ ma, kaɗɗa nè koy wan ta deŋel mage kaɗ ge fafan̰ ya, ge kaŋ ge nè ee nè jobreya no ne pagal.
58003007	A ge pe no, On̰om ge Harcal jan no go: «Dwam ge màge, sok ge ḛ za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l ge Dok ne,
58003008	Ḛ twagre ḛ dul wa ma to dinna ge ḛ baŋ ma dee ɗege ho̰o̰l ge ne, Sok kugi ne ge babur pul go go.
58003009	Dok jin̰a no go: “Ḛ baŋ ma vḛḛne mbi laa sok kugi mbi go, Koo guwa̰ ge àa kuwa kaŋ ge mbi kê num ma hetel ɗiŋ del warndà.”
58003010	A ge pe no, mbi laa vḛḛne ge ɓase mbe ma ta no, Mbi jin̰a tene no go: “Àa ɓyare wan kaŋ ge mbi da̰a̰re ge maa ta ma pe to, Àa n̰aame n̰aame ɗaɗag.”
58003011	Ge dul wa vḛḛne ya ge ambi zì, mbi guni tene no go: A ngaɗ go, àa mbo waɗ ge sok ɗwabeya ge mbi nuusi ne ge num pe zì yà to.»
58003012	Na̰ van ma, ḛ koy ta kwaɗa, ne kaa ge ndu a̰me ɗu ge ḛ buwal zige, kaa ge dul wa ge sone ge wa tane ne be hoɗ fareba ɗoo, wa seŋe Dok ge hon nda ndwa na guwa̰ to.
58003013	Ɗaŋɗe, ḛ ho̰ ta pool ta buwal zì dwam ma zì mɔɗwag teg ge: «Dwam ge màge» ge nè no ne zì, ge Njaŋeya ma faa ne fare no, ndwa go ne kaa ge ndu a̰me ɗu ge ḛ buwal zige n̰a tene n̰aameya ge sone pe ya ɗoo, ne dul wa twagre to.
58003014	Ajo̰o̰ nè seŋe ya Krist ka̰a̰m ge tèmel ma ɗe, ne ga̰a̰l go, nè koy hoɗ fareba ge nè ne ge nè ee pe hoɗ num ge pe eeya go day ma cemeɗ, ɗiŋ mbo nè dwam wa aaya ma yà.
58003015	A go mbe no, Njaŋeya ge Dok ne jan no go: «Dwam ge màge, sok ge ḛ za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l ge Dok ne, Ḛ twagre ḛ dul wa ma dinna ge ḛ baŋ ma dee ɗege ho̰o̰l ge ne go to.»
58003016	A huɗi ma za̰a̰ Dok ka̰a̰l ne ɗoo, guwa̰, àa ɗege ho̰o̰l ge ne no de? Àa num ge Moyiz ɔwabe num ge Ejypt diŋ ya zum ma mɔɗwag.
58003017	Ne laa vḛḛne ge huɗi ma ta ɗiŋ del warndà de? A num mbe ge kê sone ma, num duul swày ma gaa babur pul go no.
58003018	Guni tene ge huɗi ma pe go, num mbo waɗ ge na sok ɗwabeya zì yà to de? A ge num mbe ge za̰a̰ ne wa to ma pe.
58003019	Nè kuwa no waɗme go, num be seɗ vin̰a ge waɗ sok ɗwabeya mbe zì to, ge dape, num kuri be hoɗ fareba.
58004001	Kaɗɗa ge nè ɗe, Dok n̰a nè na wa tii go, nè ge vin̰a ge waɗ ge na ɗwabeya mbe ge nuusi ge nè pe zì. Vin̰a mbe gale go hageya ge nè pagal, nè koy ta kwaɗa, ne kaa ge ndu a̰me ge ḛ buwal zige ɗu hoɗege tene to.
58004002	Ago, nè za̰a̰ fare ge kwaɗa ge ɗwabeya mbe ge Dok ne dinna ge num ge kaa babur pul go ma za̰a̰ ne go waɗme. Ɗaŋɗe, fare mbe ndi num ndwa zì ngwaɗ to no, ago àa za̰a̰ ne za̰a̰ bàŋ cuɗ, àa be hoɗ fareba ge ne ta to.
58004003	Kaɗɗa ge nè ge ho fareba ma ɗe, nè mbo waɗ ge sok ɗwabeya mbe zì ne, ge Dok jin̰a fare ge ne pe go: «Mbi laa vḛḛne, ge mbi laa vḛḛneya mbe zì, mbi guni tene no go: A ngaɗ go, àa mbo waɗ ge mbi sok ɗwabeya ge mbi nuusi ge num pe mbe zì to!» Nè kuwa kuwa go, ɗwabeya mbe go, ajo̰o̰ Dok dee huy na tèmel ma wa ya go, sok ge ne tok aa ge sok dol pḭḭ mage suwa go.
58004004	Ge Njaŋeya ge Dok ne sok a̰me zì, jin̰a ge dwam ge ɓỳala pe no go: «Ge dwam ge ɓỳala mbe pagal, Dok ɗwabe tene ge na tèmel ge na kê num ma go no mɔɗwag.»
58004005	Gwan jan ge Njaŋeya mbe ge no nè ndwa se zì no go iya: «A ngaɗ, àa mbo waɗ ge ɗwabeya ge mbi nuusi ge num pe mbe zì to.»
58004006	Num ge za̰a̰ Fare ge Kwaɗa ge ɗwabeya mbe ne wal ma, àa be waɗ ge ne zì to ge dape àa kuri be za̰a̰ wa. Ajo̰o̰ Dok ee sok ɗwabeya go nda wuwa ne zì ɗe, go mbe no, vin̰a go ge nda a̰me ma pe ge waɗ ne zì.
58004007	A ge pe, Dok gwan ee dwam ge ɗogle ge jin̰al no, tol ne no go: «Dwam ge màge». Kê ne mbe go del ma guwa̰ kaal tata, mbo ya jan fare mbe ge gan ga̰a̰l Daviɗ wa zì no go: «Dwam ge màge, sok ge ḛ za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l ge Dok ne, Ḛ twagre ḛ dul wa ma to.» Ge mojo̰o̰ daa jan ja ge digi ya no go.
58004008	Daa no go Jozuwe ɗeme Izrayel van ma mbo waɗ ge ɗwabeya mbe zì ɗe, Dok daa mà gwan faa fare ge dwam a̰me ge ɗogle ne to.
58004009	Ano mbe ɓyare jan go, ɗwabeya ge ɗogle a̰me go ge ɓase ge Dok ne ma pe. Dḭḭ ge ɗwabeya ge dwam ge ɓỳala ne mbe go.
58004010	Ago ndu ge waɗ-ɗa ge ɗwabeya ge Dok ne mbe zì, ɗwabe tene ge tèmel keeya ge na ne ma ta dinna ge Dok sḛ ɗwabe tene ge na ne ma ta go waɗme.
58004011	Ge ano mbe no pe, ɓyare go ḛ harge ta waɗ ge ɗwabeya mbe zì yà. Ne kaa ge ndu a̰me ɗu dee dinna ge Izrayel van ma dee swày go, sok ge àa kuri be za̰a̰ Dok wa go.
58004012	Ago, fare ge Dok ne, a ge na ndwa ɗiŋ, kaɗ pool me. A zam waɗe kasagar ge ɗel zi ge diige, zam ɗiŋ mbo vaa sḛ mage on̰om buwal, kal mage kal pul nùm ma buwal me. Kun sariya ge kaŋ ge ndu ɓyare num mage dwaɗ kee num ma pagal peɗ.
58004013	Kaŋ dolla a̰me ɗu ge no wayya ge Dok ndwa se to. Kaŋ ma peɗ gwaɗeya kɔn̰al go, àa kanna paran̰ ge ne ndwa se. Ne ndwa kuwa kaŋ ma peɗ, nè mbo wan kaŋ ge nè kee num ma pe zum ne, ge ne ndwa se.
58004014	Go mbe no, ajo̰o̰ Zeso ge Dok Van, nè ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe-waɗe ge mbo ya pḭḭ ma zì yà ne ɗe, ɓyare go nè mḛḛ pool ndiŋ ge sayda ge nè kee ne ge kaŋ ge nè ho fareba num pagal ma ta.
58004015	Nè ge ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe-waɗe, ge mbiya kuwa nè a̰se ge nè hoɗegeya ma zì. Ago, see pe heeya ma ge nè sḛ ma seɗ no go ge kaŋ ma zì peɗ, ɗaŋɗe, be kee sone to.
58004016	Ge ano mbe no pe, ḛ mbo nè ya be voo ge gan ga̰a̰l Dok ge ngay kwaɗa keeya ndwa se, ge dape, nè wa seɗ ne kuwa a̰se mage ne kwaɗa keeya, ge sok ge wa̰a̰ ndwa go ne chiya nè kṵwa̰ go tem.
58005001	Ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe ge diige, àa tal ne ge ɓase ma buwal zì, ndwa kee tèmel ge kwaɗa ge num pe ge Dok ndwa se. Kee tèmel ge hon bobo ma pe hini-hini mage kee tuwaleya ge sone ge num way ma pe.
58005002	A ge kuwa a̰se ge num ge wan fare pe to mage num ge n̰aame no ma ta, ge dape, ne sḛ ndu duwana ne ge na hoɗegeya ma ge num sḛ ma go.
58005003	Ge ne hoɗegeya mbe ma pe ɗe, a ngaɗ go ne kee tuwaleya ge sone ge na ne ma sḛ pe me no, ne kee ge ɓase ma way pe waɗme.
58005004	Ndu dol tene kaɗ ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ndwa ɓyare hormo ge na pagal ne ɓal to, ɗeŋew, Dok tal ndu ne dinna ge na taa Aaro̰ go.
58005005	A mbe go ca ge Krist pe, be dol tene kaɗ ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe ndwa ɓyare hormo ge na pagal to. Ɗaŋɗe, a Dok sḛ ee nee ne, sok janna zum waŋ go: «Mo mbi Van ne, màno mbi ngay zum go, mbi mo Ba ne.»
58005006	Gwan jan ge Njaŋeya ge Dok ne sok a̰me zì no go: «Mo Ba ge kee tuwaleya ne ge ndwa ɗiŋ ge din, dinna ge Melkisedek dee kaa go.»
58005007	Go mbe no, sok ge Zeso gale wa ya suwa pagal ge ndu duwana go ɗe, kaa ge kuwaya go Dok ge pool mon na ge swày zì. Kê kaɗeya ne ta ge aa tene no, sok kirgi tene ge fiyaso go jɔjwag. Dok za̰a̰ ne no, ge ne ho̰ na ga̰a̰l pe.
58005008	A fareba go, Krist Dok Van ne, ano peɗ puy ɗe, sok njoɗ yal ma go pe hini-hini, hate wa za̰a̰ya no.
58005009	Sok hee ne digi go mbyaɗɗa tab ge kaŋ ma zì peɗ, seŋe vin̰a monna ge ndwa ɗiŋ ge din, ge num ge gwan maa pagal ge na pe se ma pe no.
58005010	Go mbe no, Dok jin̰a zum waŋ ge ne pe no go: «Mo ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe ne dinna ge Melkisedek dee kaa go.»
58005011	Nè go ge fare ma gḛḛ ge janna ge fare ge Melkisedek ne mbe pagal. Ɗaŋɗe, a haŋle ge go i wa̰a̰ ḛ fare mbe pe zum kɔn̰al, ge dape, ḛ seŋe ya nda ge pagal daa ame fare vun to ma.
58005012	Sok ma kale ya gḛḛ no go ga, ḛ seŋe daa ya nda ge hate nda ma de ɗaa! Ge sego, ḛ gwan ɓyare go nda hate ḛ fare ge Dok ne jin̰al ge mojo̰o̰ fare ge àa ee pe hate nda ge deɗ-ɗa hoɗ fareba jin̰al ma go de? Ge go ḛ kaa daa nda ge sul kal ma ɗe, ḛ seŋe ya ge van kaare ge ɓyare pam ma go.
58005013	Ndu ge gale njoɗ pam, a van kaare ne, gale be siiri ge kuwa fare ge temel to.
58005014	Kaɗɗa ge kal sulla ɗe, a ge num ge siiriya ma pe, ndwa go, àa deɗ ja vaa kwaɗa mage sone buwal ge dape, àa kee ne go ɗaɗag.
58006001	Ge ano mbe no pe, ɓyare go nè ka zam zḛḛ sok ame hateya ge nda ge ndwa siiriya ma pe go, be ge ḛ kaɗ mḛḛya ge fare hateya ge zḛḛge ge Krist pagal ma ta duɗ to. Fare ge nè hoɗ fareba doo num pagal ma ɗe, ɓyare go i gwan hate ḛ num daa jin̰al to ndwa go: Seŋe ta se, n̰a kaŋ keeya ge gene ndu duwana on̰om mbo banna gezi, hon Dok nè dul wa ma,
58006002	hateya ge baptem keeya ge pe hini-hini mage kee kaɗeya sok ee tok ma ge ndu pagal, tanna ge nda ge swày ma way mage sariya kunna ge Dok ne ge ndwa ɗiŋ ge din.
58006003	Kaɗɗa Dok vinna, nè za zḛḛ sok ame hateya ge nda ge ndwa siiriya ma ne pe go.
58006004	-
58006006	Nè ndi fare ge num ge swaɗ hoɗ fareba ge maa way ma ya gezi, ge gwan-na ge kàɗɗa ge maa way ge wal ma pagal ma gale. Mbo kaɗ gyana ge num pe de: Num mbe ma nda ge fareba ge Dok ne dyan ja num ta ge kɔn̰al go ma, ge tare bobo ge mbo ge ne ta ma ya, àa see On̰om ge Harcal no, ge kuwa ya go fare ge Dok ne kwaɗa ma, ge kuwa pool ge waɗe-waɗe ge dunin̰a ge mbo no ya ge Dok mbo kee muluk ya ne ma me. Nda mbe ma, guwa̰ ge àa gwan-na ge kaŋ keeya ge maa way ge wal mbe ma zì no ɗe, vin̰a a̰me ge ee num gwan-na seŋe ta se daa to baɗ, ge dape, a ge mojo̰o̰, num sḛ ma dwage Van ge Dok ne pella ge ɔwara kaŋre ta go go, àa hon nda duwana ma vin̰a ge gwan sal ne iya me.
58006007	Ḛ kuwa fare ge suwa ne no gale, sok ge Dok mam mbyaɗ ne, don kaŋ ya kwaɗa ge nda ge gaa na ma pe ɗe, ago Dok kee suwa mbe wa tare .
58006008	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa na do̰o̰ kore mage kilbiŋ ma, mbaa a̰me pe to, Dok gaa vḛḛne na wa ge ne pagal, ne pe aaya gaa til gezi.
58006009	I jan ḛ fare mbe no go puy ɗe, kondore ge laa wanna ma, i ge kuwaya tyatyaɗ go ḛ ge vin̰a pul ge kwaɗa, ge gene ḛ mbo monna go.
58006010	Ajo̰o̰ na Dok ge temel taɗ ne, mbo vyale kaŋ keeya ge ḛ ḛ ge kwaɗa ma to baɗ koo vyale laa wanna ge ḛ ngay ne no ge na ta, sok mbaa nda ge ho fareba gegene ma go no me.
58006011	Ɗaŋɗe, i ɓyareya ge aa ta go, ndu ge diige ge ḛ buwal zige, ne kaa fogol cacaf ɗiŋ deɗ ge na dwam wa aaya ma yà, ndwa go, kaŋ ge ḛ ee ḛ jobreya no num pagal ma wa huy mbalal.
58006012	Ḛ ka̰a̰ ta se to, ɗaŋɗe, ḛ kaa dinna ge num ge wa̰a̰ ta no ndiŋ ge hoɗ fareba ge maa way ma zì go mbo wa yà, àa dee ya seɗ kaŋ ge Dok kee wa tii ge num pe ma no.
58006013	Sok ge Dok kê Abraham wa tii go ɗe, guni tene ge na dḭḭl no, ge dape, ndu a̰me ge waɗe ne ge ga̰a̰l ge ne wa guni tene ge ne dḭḭl to.
58006014	Jin̰a zum waŋ no go: «A ngaɗ go, mbi mbo kee mo wa tare gḛḛ go ga. Mbi mbo ee mo pe rusu ma zuli se lalan̰ me.»
58006015	Abraham wa̰a̰ tene deŋel da̰a̰reya no, a ge pe, see kaŋ ge Dok kê na wa tii ge ne pe no.
58006016	Sok ge nda duwana ma kee wa tii ge guni ta go ɗe, àa kee ne ge ndu ge waɗe maa ge ga̰a̰l dḭḭl. Wa tii ge guni ta mbe ee nda ne kaɗ ge kuwaya tyatyaɗ go fare ge gage ta ma gwan gaa to.
58006017	Koo Dok sḛ puy, ɓyare ngay nda ge na kee num wa tii ma gezi kɔn̰al yaɗaɗ no go na mbo eya fare to ɗe, a ge pe, kee wa tii ge guni tene no waɗme.
58006018	Wa tii keeya mage guni ta, kaŋ ma ne zi ge ndu mbyaɗ eya num to baɗ. Dok mbyaɗ kun hày to baɗ ge wa tii ge guni ta ge na kee ne pagal. Ge ano mbe no pe, nè ge see sok way ta ge ne ta ma, nè seɗ pool gḛḛ sok tare nè tok mbo wan kaŋ ge Dok ee ne no nè ndwa zḛḛ, ge nè ee nè jobreya no ne pagal ndindiŋ.
58006019	A jobreya mbe mḛḛ ge nè ne ndiŋ dinna ge gyaɗamal mḛḛ ge baaburi ge mam se ge ndiŋ go. Jobreya mbe kale ɗiŋ ge ba̰a̰ zok pul lee ge pul zige yà, mbo waɗ ge sok ge harcacal zì yà.
58006020	Zeso hage vin̰a mbe ya nè pagal, wuwa ge ne zì yà nè ndwa zḛḛ no. A go mbe no, a seŋe ya ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe ge ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din no dinna ge Melkisedek dee kaa go.
58007001	Melkisedek mbe, kaa gan ga̰a̰l ge suwal Salem nee ne, kaɗ Ba ge kee tuwaleya ge Dok ge waɗe-waɗe ne me. Sok ge Abraham ka jaɗ-ɗa ge twam ge na haa ge gan ga̰a̰l ma pagal go ya, Melkisedek mbo ne ndwa zì yà no, kee ne wa tare no me.
58007002	Abraham ho̰ ne ɗu ge wol buwal zige ge kaŋ ge na paa num ya ma no peɗ. Melkisedek dḭḭl pe wanna go: «Gan ga̰a̰l ge temel taɗ.» Ajo̰o̰ na kaa gan ga̰a̰l ge suwal Salem ne ɗe, ago a «gan ga̰a̰l ge halas nee ne.»
58007003	Njaŋeya ge Dok ne be faa fare ge ne ba ne koo ge ne na̰ ne to, be ceme rusu ge ne baŋ ma way to, be faa fare ge ne tolla ne koo ge ne swày ne to me. Kaa dinna ca ge Dok Van go. Gaa ne kàɗɗa ba ge kee tuwaleya ge ndwa ɗiŋ ge din.
58007004	Ḛ kuwa go ga̰a̰l ge Melkisedek kaa ne, kaa be ga̰a̰l ge guwa ne to ɗaŋ! Abraham ge nè baŋ ge ga̰a̰l sḛ puy, ho̰ ne ɗu ge wol buwal zige, ge na kaŋ paal ge twam zì ge ma way.
58007005	Levi van ge kee tuwaleya ma see wa hoɗɗa ge eeya ge Moyiz ne ma ta go, num ame ɗu ge wol buwal zige, ge ɓase ge Izrayel van ma kaŋ seɗɗa ma way ma. Àa ka ame kaŋ mbe ma ge maa na̰ van, ge no Abraham baŋ ge maa sḛ go ma tok go.
58007006	Zane no, Melkisedek ge pe rusu ge Levi ne zì to peɗ. Go no puy, Abraham ho̰ ne ɗu ge wol buwal zige ge kaŋ ge na paa num ma no. Melkisedek kê ne wa tare no, ne mbe ge Dok kê ne wa tii ma.
58007007	Fare mbe no ndu pee ne to, ago ndu ga̰a̰l kee wa tare ne ge ndu jiyale pagal.
58007008	Levi van ge kee tuwaleya ge ame ɗu ge wol buwal zige ma no ɗe, àa nda duwana ge suu suu ma ne. Ɗaŋɗe, Melkisedek ge ame ɗu ge wol buwal zige ɗe, a ge na ndwa, dinna ge nda jan ne no go.
58007009	Ge guwa̰ dwab ɗe, nè ge pool janna go: Sok ge Abraham hê ɗu ge wol buwal zige hon Melkisedek go ɗe, a Levi ho̰ nee ne waɗme, ne ge ame ɗu ge wol buwal zige ma peɗ.
58007010	Ago, kaɗɗa Levi gale wa ya be tolla to puy ɗe, kaa ge Abraham gòŋ zì sok ge Melkisedek mbo ne ndwa zì yà go.
58007011	Ge eeya ge Dok ho̰ Izrayel van ma num ma pagal ɗe, àa tal nda ge kee tuwaleya ma ge rusu ge Levi ne ma buwal zì. Num tèmel tuwaleya dinna ge Aaro̰ ka keeya go. Ɗaŋɗe, daa no go num tèmel tuwaleya mbe ma ka ee nda kaɗ mbyaɗɗa tab ɗe, ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge hini dinna ge Melkisedek go gwan kaɗ daa to.
58007012	Kaɗɗa àa eya Levi van ge kee tèmel tuwaleya ma eya ge ndu ge ɗogle ɗe, ago, eeya ma eya waɗme.
58007013	Fare mbe ma no, àa faa fare ge nè Bagezok ne. Ne sḛ ɗe, a ge pe rusu ge Levi ne zì to. Ndu a̰me ɗu ge nè Bagezok pe rusu zige gale be kee tèmel tuwaleya ge twal pagal dwam ɗu to.
58007014	Nè kuwa kuwa go, nè Bagezok wuwa ge pe rusu ge Juda ne zì yà. Sok ge Moyiz ka jan fare ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ɗe, be faa fare ge pe rusu mbe ne to.
58007015	Fare ge haɗ fare mbe ma gezi kɔn̰al iya no: Ba ge kee tuwaleya mbe ge hini ge mbo ja no ɗe, a dinna ca ge Melkisedek go.
58007016	Ndu mbe be seŋe ndu ge kee tuwaleya ge wa yuwaleya ge nda duwana ma way ma pagal to, ɗaŋɗe, ge pool ge ndwa ge be aaya to ne ta.
58007017	Ago Njaŋeya ge Dok ne ma jan zum waŋ ge ne pe go: «Mo Ba ge kee tuwaleya ne ge ndwa ɗiŋ ge din, Dinna ge Melkisedek kaa go.»
58007018	Go no, wa yuwaleya ge dee wal ge no ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma pe ma fare gulla gezi, ge dape, num pool be kaɗ to me no, àa mbaa fare a̰me to me.
58007019	Eeya ge Moyiz ne ma be seɗ vin̰a ge gene nda ya mbyaɗɗa tab to. Ɗaŋɗe ge sego, Dok hon nè ya jobreya ge siŋli waɗeya, ge ne ta, nè ge vin̰a ge gwan ta ya ge ne ta zì guwa.
58007020	Ta iya ɔwale, fare ge ɗogle ge kaa ɗe, a wa tii ge Dok kê ne ge guni ta. Ɗaŋɗe, nda ge ɗogle ge seŋe nda ge kee tuwaleya ma ɗe, àa be seŋe ne ge wa tii ge guni ta mbe pagal to.
58007021	Kaɗɗa ge Zeso ɗe, Dok ee ne kaɗ ba ge kee tuwaleya sok kee wa tii ge guni ta ta, jin̰a zum waŋ ge ne pe no go: «Bagezok guni tene guni, mbo eya na fare mbe to: Mo Ba ge kee tuwaleya ne ge ndwa ɗiŋ ge din.»
58007022	Ge guni ta mbe ta ɗe, Zeso ee nè ya kaɗ ge kuwaya tyatyaɗ go, nè ge wa tii vwalla ge siŋli waɗe ge wal.
58007023	Ta iya ɗe: Ago nda ge kee tuwaleya ge wa tii ge wal pagal ma kaa gḛḛ ge dape, swày ka hun num hun.
58007024	Ɗaŋɗe, kàɗɗa ge Zeso ɗe, a ge na ndwa ɗiŋ ge din, ndu a̰me ge eya ne ge na tèmel tuwaleya mbe zì to baɗ.
58007025	A ge pe, ano ge pool mon nda ge mbo ya Dok ndwa se ge na ta ma monna ge ndwa fafa no. Ajo̰o̰ a ge na ndwa ɗiŋ ge din ɗe, kaɗe Dok no ɗaɗag ge num pe me.
58007026	Zeso ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe ge wa̰a̰ ndwa nè kaɗ ge nee ne. A ndu ge Dok za̰a̰ tii ge ne pe ne, a be fwaɗɗa, be kee sone a̰me to me. A ge nda ge kee sone ma be din ta to. Dok hê ne digi no kàɗɗa haal caɗ ge pḭḭ ma zì yà.
58007027	Kaɗɗa ge ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe gegene ma ɗe, àa kee tuwaleya dwam ma mɔɗwag. Zḛḛ ɓiya ge maa sone ma sḛ pe, guwa̰, ge ɓase ma way ma pe me. Ɗaŋɗe, Zeso be kee go mbe to, kee ne ndwa ɗu kikiɗ ge sone ge ɓase ma way ma pe mɔɗwag, sok hon tene kee ne go ge na pagal.
58007028	Ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe ma, àa ee num ge eeya ge Moyiz ne ma pagal, àa nda duwana ma ne, ge maa hoɗegeya ma me. Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge Dok ee ne kaɗ ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way, ge wa tii ge na guni tene ne pagal, guwa̰ ge eeya ge Moyiz ne ma go, a ne Van sḛ. A ne sḛ seŋe ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way mbe ne ge Dok ɓyare go, ne kaa mbe go ɗiŋ ge din.
58008001	Fare ge gag ge nè ɓyare jan ne no: Nè ge ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe ge go mbe no pe, ge kaa no ge Dok ge pool waɗe-waɗe tok matoson pagal, ne ge kee muluk no ge pḭḭ ma zì yà.
58008002	Kee na tèmel tuwaleya ge sok ge nda uware Dok no ne go zì, ndwa go, gur ge fareba ge Bagezok Dok sḛ ɗû nee ne, be ge nda duwana ma to.
58008003	Ago, ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge diige, àa ee ne tèmel pagal ndwa tare bobo ma hon Dok me no, kee tuwaleya ma me. Ɓyare go nè ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe kaa ge na bobo sḛ waɗme, ndwa tare ne hon Dok.
58008004	Daa no go Krist kaa ge suwa pagal se ɗe, kaɗ daa ndu ge kee tuwaleya sḛ to peɗ, ge dape, nda ge kee tuwaleya ge ɗogle ge tare bobo hon Dok ma go. Àa kee ne ge wa hoɗɗa ge eeya ge Moyiz ne ma pagal tem.
58008005	Tèmel keeya ge num mbe ge kee tuwaleya ma way kaŋ diir ne boo, a gḭḭl ge kaŋ ge fareba ma way ge kee no pḭḭ digi yà ma ne. A dinna ge fare ge Dok yuwale Moyiz ne pagal go waɗme. Sok ge ɗege go na ɗuu gur ge wa tii vwalla ne ɗe, Dok jin̰a ne no go: «Ee mo ndwa ndilla kwaɗa! Mo mbo kee ne ge ɓul mɔɗwag hehene ge diir ge mbi din̰a ne mo ndwa go ge njal pagal digi ya go.»
58008006	Ɗaŋɗe ge sego, Dok ho̰ Krist tèmel tuwaleya gezi hini caɗ ge nda ge ka kee tuwaleya wal ma way. Ago, a ndu ge vin̰a ne ge Dok mage nda duwana ma buwal zì ndwa vwal wa tii ge ne fare no waɗe ge wal. A ge wa tii vwalla ge jin̰al mbe no pagal, Dok kee wa tii ma ge num fare ma no waɗe ge wal ma.
58008007	Daa no go, wa tii vwalla ge zḛḛge mbiya huy kaŋ ge na mbiya kee num ma wa ɗe, ge zi ge eya ne kaɗ daa to.
58008008	Ɗaŋɗe, Dok mḛḛre na ɓase ma zum waŋ go: «Ḛ za̰a̰ Bagezok jan go: Dwam ma mbo mboya, Ge go mbi mbo vwal wa tii ge jin̰al, Ge ɓase ge Izrayel van ma ɓanna ge ɓase ge Juda ne ma.
58008009	Mbo kaɗ ge wa tii ge mbi dee vuwa ne ge num baŋ ma ne go to, Ge dwam ge mbi wa̰a̰ num tok ɗeme num ge suwa ge Ejypt ne ya zum go. Bagezok jan go iya: “Ajo̰o̰ maa be wan ta mboya wa tii mbe pagal to ɗe, Ge ano mbe no pe, mbi sḛ waɗme, mbi seŋe num mbi guwa̰ ya no.”
58008010	Bagezok jan go iya: Wa tii ge mbi mbo vwal ne ya, Ge ɓase ge Izrayel van ma mɔɗwag ge dwam mbe ma guwa̰ no: Mbi mbo waɗ mbi eeya ma ge num pagal zì, Mbi mbo njaŋe mbi eeya mbe ma ge num dul wa ma zì me. Mbi mbo kaɗ num Dok, Num sḛ ma kaɗ ɓase ge ambi ma me.
58008011	Go mbe no, ndu a̰me mbo daa gwan hate na ka̰a̰m ge suwal ma, Koo jan na na̰ van go: “Hate kuwa Bagezok to, to!” Ago nda peɗ mbo kuwa go mbi maa Dok ne, Koo nda ga̰a̰l koo nda jabso.
58008012	Ge dape, mbi mbo ngay kwaɗa keeya ge ambi ge num ta, ge num kaŋ keeya ge temel to ma pe, Mbi mbo daa gwan dwaɗ ge num sone ma pagal to baɗ me.»
58008013	Sok ge Dok faa fare ge wa tii vwalla ge jin̰al ne no ɗe, a ndwa ngayya go, ge wal haɗ-ɗa kamal. Go no me, kaŋ ge wal ge sabe ya, ge haɗ-ɗa kamal, ta zḛḛ nde, mbo daa gwan kaɗ to baɗ.
58009001	Wa tii ge vuwa wal kaa ge na eeya mage na zok ge kee tèmel hon Dok ge suwa pagal me.
58009002	Ago gur ge Dok ne ge àa ɗû ne pul ma caɗeya se pe zi ge ba̰a̰ zok pul. Ne pul ge zum ge, àa tol ne sok ge harcal . Ge ne go, walam ge ee lampe pe ge tok ɓỳala kaa, taabul ge dupḛ hon Dok ma ee no ne pagal kaɗ me.
58009003	Ne ba̰a̰ zok pul lee ge zige, àa tol ne sok ge harcacal .
58009004	Ge ne go, twal tuwaleya ge til ɔwara ge huu tii ma ge dinar kaa, sandu ge wa tii vwalla ne son̰n̰a se hɔlwaɗ ge dinar kaɗ me. Ge sandu mbe zì, kṵṵri dinar a̰me ɗu ge àa ka̰a̰ man no ne zì kaa, calaŋ ge Aaro̰ ne ge dee ɗufi kaa, byalga njal ge àa njaŋe wa yuwaleya ge wa tii vwalla ne ma num ta kaɗ me.
58009005	Ge sandu ge wa tii ne mbe pagal digi, kḭḭ caaya ge malayka kerubim ma way ge ngay go Dok ge sok mbe go kaa. Num gaŋ wa ma kaa bareya ta ta ndwa zì, ge sandu pagal digi, num soŋon̰ lâ sok ge ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way cigi swàm no ne go ndwa pore sone ge nda way ma me. Ɗaŋɗe, gale be sok ge go nè wan fare mbe ma pe zum gagaraw ne to.
58009006	Sok ge gur ge Dok ne mbe ɗû se go ɗe, nda ge kee tuwaleya ma ka waɗ mbo ne pul ge zum ge go ndwa kee maa tèmel ma dwam ge dwam.
58009007	Ɗaŋɗe, ɗeŋew ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe, waɗ ge ne pul ge zige zì yà ne, ndwa ɗu ge del ge ɗu pul zì. Waɗ ge sok mbe zì yà ge swàm ge kaŋ kogor ma way ge na tok go mbḛḛ. Gene ne ya ndwa pore hoɗegeya ge na ne ma me no, pore ɓase ma num sone ge kee be wan pe to ma me.
58009008	On̰om ge Harcal ɓyare ngay nè go, teg ge gur ge wal gale no go no ɗe, vin̰a a̰me ge nda waɗ mbo ge sok ge harcacal zì yà gale to.
58009009	A diir ge kaŋ ge kee màno ma way ne. Ne pe wanna go, bobo mage tuwaleya ge àa ka tare num hon Dok ge go mbe ma pe ma, num pool ge haɗ nda ge mbo ya kee tèmel hon Dok mbe ma dul wa mbyaɗɗa tab to.
58009010	Vin̰a ge uware Dok ge go mbe, a fare ge kaŋ zam way, ge kaŋ njoɗɗa mage vin̰a ge usi ta pe hini-hini ma way ndwa haɗ ta kɔn̰al . Eeya mbe ma dabe nda duwana ma ge zum boo. Eeya mbe ma, Dok ɓyare go nda ka mbo num pagal ɗiŋ ge go, na eya kaŋ ma peɗ jin̰al.
58009011	Ɗaŋɗe, Krist, ndu ge talla ge Dok ne, mbo ya ge ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe go, ɓanna ge kaŋ kwaɗa ge no go ma. Wuwa ge gur ge Dok ne ge ga̰a̰l walay nde mage mbyaɗɗa tab zì yà no. Gur mbe, a be ndu duwana kê nee ne to, ndwa go àa isi ne ge kaŋ dolla ge Dok doo num suwa pagal ma buwal zì to.
58009012	Sok ge Krist wuwa ge sok ge harcacal zì yà ndwa melaw ɗu kikiɗ ɗe, be hon Dok swàm ge bemjere mage nday van ma way to, ɗaŋɗe, ho̰ na swàm sḛ. A go mbe no, zû nè no ge ndwa ɗiŋ ge din ge nè sone ma zì ya.
58009013	Ge hada ge nè ne ma pagal ɗe, àa cigi swàm ge bemjere, ge nday pool ma way mage suusi siyam ge nday kale ge àa tii ne, ge nda mbe ge haɗ ta ya seŋre ma ta ndwa haɗ num gezi kɔn̰al . Guwa̰ ge num duul ma haɗ kɔn̰al ge n̰aal mbe ge àa kê ne go ɗe, àa ge vin̰a ge gwan-na ge Dok ndwa se.
58009014	O̰o̰ kaɗɗa go swàm ge kaŋ kogor ma way kaa ge pool ge go mbe ɗe, swàm ge Krist ne kaɗ mà pool gḛḛ ndwa gyana ga de! Ago, ge On̰om ge ɗiŋ ge din ta, Krist sḛ ho̰ tene Dok no, dinna ge kaŋ tuwaleya ge be saaso, ge nda kee tuwaleya ge ne go. Go mbe no, ne swàm mbo usi nè dul wa ma gezi ge kaŋ keeya ge gene nè mbo swày ma go, ndwa go, nè wa gaa kee tèmel hon Dok ge hon nda ndwa.
58009015	A ge ano mbe no pe, Krist no ndu ge vin̰a ge Dok mage nda duwana ma buwal zì ndwa vwal wa tii ge jin̰al, ndwa go num ge Dok too num ya ma see kaŋ kwaɗa ge ɗiŋ ge din ge na vuwa wa tii ge num pe ma. Àa ge pool seɗ num, ge dape, Krist suu, ge ne swày mbe ta, nda duwana ma see zuuya no, ge mboya ge maa mbo ge eeya ma pagal to pe, sok ge àa gale wa ya ge wa tii ge zḛḛge ge kê pe se.
58009016	Sok ge ndu n̰a na wa swày, ge go nda kee tèmel ne pagal ɗe, ɓyare go ndu ge n̰a na wa swày mbe suu ne mbḛḛ.
58009017	Ago, ndu mbyaɗ kee tèmel ge wa swày pagal to, kaɗɗa go ndu ge n̰a na wa swày mbe gale go ge na ndwa. Kaɗɗa go na suu ya ɗe, ne fare mbe wa ɗege hee digi go.
58009018	A ge pe no, koo wa tii vwalla ge zḛḛge puy, nda ɗege kee tèmel ne pagal sok ge kaŋ kogor swàm ka̰a̰ se go.
58009019	Ago, Moyiz gale wa̰a̰ ɓase ma peɗ wa yuwaleya ma pe zum ɗu ge ɗu guy, dinna ge àa njaŋe no ge eeya ma zì go. Guwa̰, hê swàm ge nday van mage bemjere ma way kirgiya ge mam no, paa sugu hizop ge àa tâ ne pe ge tàal kàal ge àa paare ne ge tame susu ge num pagal no, cigi num ge maktub ge eeya ne mage ɓase ma ta no peɗ.
58009020	Sok janna no go: «Ano, a swàm wa tii vwalla ge Dok ho ḛ na wa ne go, ḛ mbo ne pagal.»
58009021	Guwa̰, cigi swàm mbe ge gur ge Dok ne ta no, ge kaŋ ge nda kee tèmel ge num ndwa uware Dok ma ta no peɗ me.
58009022	Ge kaŋ ge njaŋe no eeya ma pagal ɗe, kaŋ ma peɗ lee gḛḛ, àa cigi swàm num ta ndwa haɗ num kɔn̰al harcal . Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa àa kan swàm ya se to, vin̰a ge nda duwana ma seɗ poreya ge sone ma way go to.
58009023	Nè kuwa daa ja go àa haɗ diir ge kaŋ mbe ma way kɔn̰al harcal sok cigi swàm ge num ta. Kaŋ mbe ma diir ge kaŋ ge no pḭḭ digi yà ma way ma ne. Ɗaŋɗe, kaŋ ge fareba mbe ge pḭḭ digi yà ma ɓyare tuwaleya ge kwaɗa gḛḛ waɗeya.
58009024	Ago, Krist be waɗ ge gur sok ge harcacal ge nda duwana ma nuusi nee ne zì to. Sok mbe, a diir ge sok uware Dok ge fareba ne ge no pḭḭ zì yà ne. Ɗaŋɗe, wuwa ge pḭḭ sḛ zì yà, ge sego mḛḛ ge Dok ndwa se ge nè pe.
58009025	Del tatab, ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe waɗ ge sok ge harcacal zì ge swàm ge kaŋ kogor ma way ne ge na tok go. Kaɗɗa ge Krist ɗe, be waɗ ge pḭḭ zì yà ndwa hon tene kee tuwaleya ndwa gḛḛ-gḛḛ to.
58009026	Daa na go to ɗe, mà za̰a̰ yal ndwa gḛḛ-gḛḛ ge pe dolla ge dunin̰a ne ya go day. Ɗaŋɗe, ge dwam pe aaya mbe ma no go, Krist ngay tene ndwa ɗu fafa ndwa gul sone gezi sok hon tene sḛ kee tuwaleya go.
58009027	Ee go ndu duwana suu ndwa ɗu, guwa̰ swày ge ne ne go, gaa da̰a̰re sariya kunna ge Dok ndwa se yà.
58009028	Go mbe no ca, Krist ho̰ tene kee tuwaleya ndwa ɗu kikiɗ, ndwa hee sone ge nda duwana ma way gezi mɔɗwag. Mbo gwan-na ge ndwa zi, be hee sone ma daa to, ɗaŋɗe, ndwa mon num ge da̰a̰re na no ma ge ɓul mɔɗwag.
58010001	Eeya ge Moyiz ne ma be kaŋ kwaɗa ge mbo no ya mbe ma diir ge gagan̰ ma ne to, ɗaŋɗe, àa num gḭḭl ma ne bàŋ. A ge pe no, àa haɗ nda ge gwan ta ya Dok ta zì ge eeya mbe ma ta ma mbyaɗɗa tab ge ne ndwa se to no, ge dape, àa ee nda ka kee tuwaleya mbe ge ɗu ma pe, del tatab boo, be aaya to.
58010002	Daa no go num ge gwan ta ya Dok ta zì kee tèmel ge go mbe no pe ma sone ma usi gezi usi ndwa ɗu gaw ɗe, num dul wa ma gwan wan num daa ge sone a̰me pe to me no, num tok ma ɔwabe ɔwabe gezi ge tuwaleya keeya mbe ma ta me.
58010003	Ɗaŋɗe, tuwaleya keeya mbe ma gwan ka gwan ge sone ma ya num pagal zì del tatab,
58010004	ge dape, a haŋle ge go swàm ge nday pool mage bemjere ma way ma hee sone ma gezi.
58010005	A ge pe no, sok ge Krist ɗege mbo ya ge dunin̰a zì ɗe, jin̰a Dok no go: «Mo be ɓyare tuwaleya koo bobo to, Ɗaŋɗe, mo nuusi sḛ duul ge mbi no ge ne nuusi.
58010006	Mo be za̰a̰ tii ge tuwaleya ge tilla mɔɗwag ma, Koo ge tuwaleya ge sone ma way pe to.
58010007	Sok mbe go, mbi jin̰a mo no go: “Dok-goo, mbi no, Mbi mbo ya ndwa kee kaŋ ge mo laa ɓyare ne. Dinna ge fare ge njaŋe no ge mbi pe ge mo maktub zì go.”
58010008	Krist fare ge jin̰a ne zḛḛ ɓiya go: Mo be ɓyare tuwaleya ma koo bobo ma, Koo tuwaleya ge tilla mɔɗwag ma, Koo tuwaleya ge sone ma way pe to. Mo za̰a̰ tii ge num to me.» Zane no ɗe, àa ka kee tuwaleya mbe ma ge eeya ma pagal tetem.
58010009	Guwa̰, gwan jan no go: «Mbi no, mbi mbo ya ndwa kee kaŋ ge mo laa ɓyare ne.» A go mbe no, Dok hee vin̰a uware na ge zḛḛge ya gezi no, eya ne ya no ge vin̰a ge jin̰al.
58010010	Zeso Krist kee kaŋ ge Dok ɓyare ne, ho̰ tene sḛ kee tuwaleya no ndwa ɗu fafa. A ge pe no, nè seŋe ya nda ge mbegeya gezi caɗ ge Dok pe ma no.
58010011	Nda ge kee tuwaleya ma kaɗ mḛḛya digi sok kee maa tèmel go dwam ma pagal tatab. Àa kee ndwa wowol tuwaleya ge ɗu mbe pe ma, ge mbyaɗ hee sone ge nda way ma gezi go fyalag to peɗ.
58010012	Kaɗɗa ge Krist ɗe, ho̰ tene sḛ ne kee tuwaleya, tuwaleya ge mbiya hee sone ge nda way ma gezi ndwa ɗu gaw. Guwa̰, kaa ge Dok tok matoson pagal no.
58010013	Ge sego, ge sok mbe yà, da̰a̰re go Dok seŋe na nda ge ho̰o̰l ma na kaŋ ee ko.
58010014	Go mbe no, sok hon tene kee tuwaleya go ndwa ɗu kikiɗ, haɗ num ge na usi num gezi ge num sone ma go ma ya harcal ge ndwa ɗiŋ ge din.
58010015	On̰om ge Harcal kee i ne sayda mbe go waɗme, sok janna zḛḛ ɓiya go:
58010016	Bagezok jan go: «Ano a wa tii ge mbi mbo vwal ne ge mbi nda ma ne ge dwam mbe ma no guwa̰. Mbi mbo ee mbi eeya ma ge num dul wa ma zì, mbi mbo njaŋe num ge num pagal ma zì me.»
58010017	Guwa̰, jin̰a no waɗme go: «Mbi mbo daa gwan dwaɗ ge num sone mage num n̰aal ma pagal to baɗ.»
58010018	Ajo̰o̰ ge sego, Dok pore nda num sone ma ya go ɗe, tuwaleya a̰me ge ndu gwan ɓyare ne ndwa hee sone ma gezi daa gaa to.
58010019	Go mbe no, na̰ van ma, nè ge vin̰a saɗag ge mbo waɗ ge sok ge harcacal zì yà, ge swàm ge Zeso ne ge ho̰ tene kee tuwaleya ta.
58010020	Zeso hage vin̰a ge jin̰al mage vin̰a ge hon nda ndwa ya ge nè pagal, vin̰a mbe gene nda mbo ɗiŋ ge ba̰a̰ zok pul lee ge pul zige yà. Kê ano mbe sok ge ho̰ na sḛ duul go dinna ge kaŋ tuwaleya go.
58010021	Go mbe no, nè ge ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe, ge àa ee ne no ge zok ge Dok ne ge no pḭḭ ma zì yà pagal.
58010022	Ge ano mbe ma no pe, nè guwa̰ ta ya ge Dok ta zì ge dul wa ɗu, ge hoɗ fareba ge be giɗɗa, ge dul wa usiya gezi ge fare ge nè dul wa kaa wan nè ge num pagal ma, nè sḛ duul usiya gezi ge mam ge kɔn̰al me.
58010023	Nè za zḛḛ sok mḛḛ nè ko pool ndindiŋ ge jobreya ge nè kee sayda no ne pagal, ge dape, Dok Ba ge n̰a wa to ne, huy wa tii ge na kee num ma huy ɗaɗag.
58010024	Ḛ doo nè ndwa ta pagal sok hon ta pool go ndwa ngay laa wanna ge ta ta buwal zì mage kee kaŋ ge go maa kwaɗa ma.
58010025	Nda a̰me ma ha̰a̰le ta ya daa be mbo ya ge nè kwateya ma go. Ɗaŋɗe, ḛ ke nè dinna ge num go to! Ḛ moɗege nè ta ta buwal zì gḛḛ, gwan waɗe ge wal ge mojo̰o̰ ḛ kuwa no go ɗe, dwam ge Bagezok ne gaa guwa.
58010026	Sok ge nè ɗeɗ-ɗa seɗ kuwaya ge fare ge fareba pagal, kaɗɗa go nè gwan ka zam zḛḛ sok kee sone pool go, guwa̰ ge ano mbe no go ɗe, tuwaleya a̰me ge nè pe ge wa hee nè sone ma gezi daa gaa to baɗ.
58010027	Ɗaŋɗe, kaŋ ge gaa nè ndwa zḛḛ ɗu, a kaɗ ge voo halla ngingiɗ da̰a̰re sariya ge Dok mbo kun ne ya mage ol ɗaabeya ge bibiliw ge mbo til nda ge ɗege ho̰o̰l ge ne ma ya gezi.
58010028	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me ɗu kuri ya go na mbo ge eeya ge Moyiz ne ma pagal to, nda zi koo taa kee sayda ya ge fare mbe pagal, a ngaɗ go, ndu mbe a hṵṵ ne be kuwa ne a̰se.
58010029	Kaɗɗa na mbe go no, mbo kaɗ gyana ge ndu ge tɔcwage Van ge Dok ne no na ko se, ge ndil swàm ge wa tii vwalla ne ge mbege ne ya gezi caɗ ge Dok pe no kaŋ solom, ge gwan sal On̰om ge Dok ne ge ee nè ya no kuwa kwaɗa keeya ge Dok ne de? Ḛ dwaɗ go ndu ge go mbe no no, mbiya go àa ee dṵṵl ge ndaa kaka ne pagal waɗeya to de?
58010030	O̰o̰, nè kuwa Dok kuwa, ne ge jin̰a go: «Mbi ba ge gele nda ne, mbi mbo poɗ ndu ge diige kaŋ ge ne mbiya seɗɗa ge sone ge na ne mbe pe. Gwan jan no waɗme go: “Bagezok mbo kun sariya ge na ɓase ma pagal.”»
58010031	A kaŋ hon voo ge gḛḛ ne ge go Dok ge hon nda ndwa ee na tok ge ndu pagal!
58010032	Ḛ duwa ge ḛ dwam ge dee wal pagal gale, sok ge Dok zḛḛ kɔn̰al ge na ne ya ge ḛ ta go. Ge num guwa̰ gaw, ḛ za̰a̰ yal njoɗɗa ma maam to, ɗaŋɗe, ḛ wa̰a̰ ta mḛḛya no ndiŋ sok iyal kyarga go ndaa kaka.
58010033	Sok a̰me ma go ɗe, nda ka sal ḛ mage kee ḛ yal ge nda ndwa go, sok gegene ma go me ɗe, ḛ ka ɓan ta za̰a̰ yal ge nda ge àa kee num yal no ma me.
58010034	A fareba, ḛ kuwa nda ge àa wa̰a̰ num daŋay zì ma a̰se. Sok ge àa ka ee pool ḛ pagal ame ḛ kaŋ kwaɗa ma go, ḛ kaa n̰a nda mbe ma num ge laa saal, ge dape, ḛ kuwa kuwa go, ḛ go ge kaŋ ge Dok kee wa tii num pagal ma, ge no gwan siŋli waɗe ḛ kaŋ kwaɗa ma, àa gwan kaɗ ge ndwa ɗiŋ ge din me.
58010035	Go mbe no, ḛ suwa deŋe ta ge ḛ ḛ Dok ta pe ge vin̰a zì to, ge dape, poɗɗa ge ḛ ḛ mbo kaɗ ɓaŋlaŋ ge ne ta.
58010036	Ɓyare go ḛ gwan ka wan ta deŋel ndwa kee kaŋ ge Dok laa ɓyare ne, ge ḛ wa seɗ kaŋ ge ne kê wa tii no ge ne pe me.
58010037	Ago, Njaŋeya ge Dok ne ma jan go: «Sok gaa guwa, gaa ta hoɗege guwa, Ndu ge mbiya mbo ya, wa mboya go, mbo kee kaal to.
58010038	Ndu ge mbi Dok ndil ne temel mbi ndwa se, Mbo kaɗ ge ndwa ge hoɗ fareba ge na ne ta, Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ne gwan-na yà ge na guwa̰, mbi sḛ mbo kee tii ge ne to.»
58010039	Kaɗɗa ge nè ɗe, nè be num ge gwan-na yà ge guwa̰ ma, ge wa mbo banna ma ne to, ɗaŋɗe, nè nda ge no ge hoɗ fareba ma ne, ndwa mbo seɗ monna .
58011001	Kaɗ ge hoɗ fareba Dok ta, a vin̰a ge nè seɗ kaŋ ge nè ee nè jobreya no num pagal ma ne, a kaɗ ge kuwaya tyatyaɗ go kaŋ ge nè kuwa num no ge nè ndwa to ma num go fareba.
58011002	A ge nè baŋ ma kaa ge hoɗ fareba mbe no Dok ta pe, àa see sayda keeya ge kwaɗɗa ge maa pagal no.
58011003	A ge hoɗ fareba ta, nè wan pe no go dunin̰a doo ge fare ge Dok ne ta, ge go kaŋ ge nè kuwa num no ge nè ndwa ma, àa kee num ge kaŋ ge nè kuwa num ge nè ndwa to ma ta.
58011004	A ge hoɗ fareba ta, Abel kê tuwaleya hon Dok ge kee ne sḛ tii no waɗe ge Kayḛ ne. A ge hoɗ fareba mbe ta, Dok ndi ne ndu ge temel na ndwa se no, kee sayda sḛ no go na vḭḭ ne bobo ma vin. A ge ne ta, kaŋ keeya ge Abel ne ma jan fare mà ge sego gale no koo ge ne suu ya no.
58011005	A ge hoɗ fareba ta, Dok hê Enok ge na ta yà no, be ge go ne kuwa swày to. Ndu daa be seɗ ne to, ge dape, Dok hee ne ya sok. Njaŋeya ge Dok ne jan ge Enok pe go: «Zḛḛ ge ne heeya go ɗe, see sayda ge kwaɗa go na kee Dok sḛ tii.»
58011006	Be ge go ndu kaɗ ge hoɗ fareba to ɗe, Dok sḛ kee tii ge ne pe to. Ago, ndu ge gwan tene ya ge Dok ta zì ɗe, ɓyare go ne kaa ge hoɗ fareba go Dok go, ne poɗ num ge ɓyare na pe ma poɗ.
58011007	A ge hoɗ fareba ta, Nowe pee faa ga̰a̰l no ɗu ndwa mon zok ge na ne. Daa be gwan ndil fare mbe ge Dok wuwage na num go, num mbo kee, ge nda gale kuwa num to ma solom to. Sok kee ano mbe go, wa̰a̰ nda ge dunin̰a zì ma ge sariya no, ge ne hoɗ fareba mbe ta me ɗe, Dok ndi ne no ndu ge temel ge na ndwa se.
58011008	A ge hoɗ fareba ta, Abraham vḭḭ tolla ge Dok too na no, za̰a̰ ne wa no, ɗege ndwa mbo suwa ge Dok mbiya hon na ne joo yà no, be wan pe go na mbo ge ma̰ sok yà de to peɗ.
58011009	A ge hoɗ fareba ta, mbo kàɗɗa ge suwa ge Dok kee na wa tii ge ne pe mbe yà no, ge ndu ge mbày go. Ka kàɗɗa ge gur ma zì. Isak mage Jakob, nda ge no wa tii mbe zì dagre ge ne ma, àa ka kàɗɗa ge gur ma zì ge ne go waɗme.
58011010	Ago Abraham ka da̰a̰re mbo kaɗ ge suwal ga̰a̰l ge ɗû no mḛḛya pool ndiŋ yà, ne ge Dok duwa ne, sḭḭ ne no me.
58011011	A ge hoɗ fareba ta, Sara sḛ waɗme, gwale ge ba̰a̰ gisil, ge na sabar gɔgwa zì, see pool ge tol rusu no ɗu, ge dape, kaa ge kuwaya tyatyaɗ go ba ge kê wa tii ndu ge n̰a wa to ne.
58011012	Ge ano mbe no pe, Abraham sḛ waɗme, ne ge seŋe ya no dinna ge ndu ge suu suu no go paŋ, ge ne ta ɗu, ne rusu ma zuli ta ya se no gḛḛ ceɗeɗ dinna ge gùwa̰ ge pḭḭ zige ma go me no, dinna ge kafeɗem ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam wa se, ge ndu mbyaɗ isi num to ma go me.
58011013	Nda mbe ma peɗ kaa ge hoɗ fareba ge Dok ta ɗiŋ àa suu no, be ge seɗ kaŋ kwaɗa ge Dok kee maa wa tii ge num pagal ma. Ɗaŋɗe, àa kuwa num ge zum ya kaal, àa ka kee laa saal ge num pe no. Àa jin̰a zum waŋ no go maa nda ge an gɔswal mage nda ge kaa mbày ma ne ge suwa pagal.
58011014	Num mbe ge jan fare mbe ma no ɓyare ngay zum kɔn̰al go, maa ɓyare go suwa a̰me ɗu ge ne wa kaɗ maa way.
58011015	Daa no go àa ka dwaɗ ge suwa ge maa ɗege zum ge ne ya pagal ɗe, àa daa mà seɗ vin̰a a̰me ge gwan ge ne yà.
58011016	A fareba go, àa ka ɓyare suwa ge siŋli a̰me, ndwa go ne ge no pḭḭ digi yà. A ge pe, kee Dok daŋso to no, sok ge àa tol ne go Dok ge num way. Ngay no go na nuusi suwal ga̰a̰l a̰me go ɗu ge num pe.
58011017	A ge hoɗ fareba ta, Abraham ho̰ na van Isak ndwa kee tuwaleya no, sok ge Dok kugi ne go. Kaa guwa guwa ge hon na van ge melaw ɗu kikiɗ kee tuwaleya, zane no seɗ wa tii mbe ge kê ma ya sok.
58011018	Ago Dok jin̰a ne go: «A ge Isak ta, mo wa seɗ rusu ge mo dḭḭl mbo gaa ya tolla ge num ta ma.»
58011019	Ɗaŋɗe, Abraham ka jan tene go, Dok ge pool tan ndu ge suu ge swày se. A ge pe, Dok guwa̰ ge ne ne van Isak no: Ano mbe ngay diir ge fare ge mbo dee kee ya ne.
58011020	A ge hoɗ fareba ta, Isak kê na van Jakob mage Eso wa tare no ge num ndwa ge zḛḛge pe.
58011021	A ge hoɗ fareba ta, Jakob sok ge gaa guwa ge mbo swày ɗe, kê Jozef van son ge zi ma wa tare no, «sok kubi tene ge na calaŋ pagal, ka uware Dok no me.»
58011022	A ge hoɗ fareba ta, Jozef sok ge dee ya na dwam wa aaya ma go, jin̰a Izrayel van ma fare ge num waɗ zum ne ge suwa Ejypt go no, ho num na wa ge kaŋ ge num mbo kee ya ge na kal ma pe no.
58011023	A ge hoɗ fareba ta, Moyiz ba ma way ne no ɗiŋ saba taa, guwa̰ ge ne too ya se go. Sok ge àa kuwa go van mbe siŋli go ɗe, àa daa be chiya fare ge gan ga̰a̰l ho na wa ne pagal voo to.
58011024	A ge hoɗ fareba ta, sok ge Moyiz haa gezi ga̰a̰l, be ɓyare go nda ndi na ge mojo̰o̰ na Farawo̰, gan ga̰a̰l ge Ejypt ne van ge gwale van ne go to.
58011025	Vḭḭ tene no, ne nde-nde go, nda kee na yal dagre ge ɓase ge Dok ne ma, ge go na za̰a̰ tii swag ge na kàɗɗa zì sok kee sone go.
58011026	See no go na seɗ saaso ya dinna ge Krist, ndu ge talla ge Dok ne mbo seɗ-ɗa go ɗe, ne mbaaya gḛḛ waɗe kaŋ seɗɗa ge gḛḛ ge suwa Ejypt ne ma. Ago, ee na ndwa ge poɗɗa ge mbo no ge zḛḛ ya pagal.
