58011027	A ge hoɗ fareba ta, Moyiz wuwa zum ge suwa Ejypt diŋ no. Gan ga̰a̰l ge suwa mbe ne ɗege juliliya ge twam no, ɗaŋɗe, be chiya ne voo to. Ago wa̰a̰ tene ndindiŋ dinna ge na ka kuwa Dok ge ndu mbyaɗ kuwa ne ge na ndwa to kuwa go.
58011028	A ge hoɗ fareba ta, Moyiz ee vḛḛso ge Paska ne keeya mage hoɗ na wa no go, nda cigi swàm ge zok wa ma ta digi. Go no, ndu ge Dok teme ne ya puu nda, mà mbo ja ɗe, hun van pul sway ge Izrayel van ma way ma to.
58011029	A ge hoɗ fareba ta, Izrayel van ma kale mboya ge suwa fin̰al pagal ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam ge kàal pul se no, ge sok ge mam ma kaa wal ne go. Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge nda ge Ejypt ma ɓyare kee ge num sḛ ma kê go ɗe, mam tḭḭ num gezi no.
58011030	A ge hoɗ fareba ta, gulum ga̰a̰l ge suwal Jeriko ne ma guu se no ge dwam ge ɓỳala pagal, sok ge Izrayel van ma luwaɗe ne se ɗiŋ dwam ɓỳala go.
58011031	A ge hoɗ fareba ta, Rahab, gwale ge zam tene, be seɗ swày ge num ge kuri be hoɗ fareba Dok ta ma to, ge dape, ame Izrayel van ge mbo ya hale sok ma kwaɗa ge na diŋ.
58011032	Mbi mà mbo jan gyana ge num gegene mbe ma no pe iya de? Ago, sok hoɗege mbi mà hoɗege, ge wan fare ma pe zum gagaraw ge Jedeyo̰ pe, ge Barak pe, ge Samso̰ pe, ge Jefte pe, ge Daviɗ pe, ge Samiyel mage nda ge zwagre Dok wa gegene ma pe.
58011033	A ge hoɗ fareba ge num way pe, àa mbaa twam ge suwa gegene ma go no, àa haa ge num pagal no, àa see fare ge ee sariya kunna ge temel ma keeya no, àa see wa tii ge Dok kee maa num ma no, àa dibi sòne ma wa ma no,
58011034	àa piri ol ge ɗaabeya bibiliw ma se no, àa ɓû ge kasagar ma wa zì ya no. Àa kaa tuguɗi, àa seŋe ya pool no, àa seŋe nda ge gwan ge guwa̰ to ma no ge twam zì, àa ee vwag twam ge ho̰o̰l ma ya ndage maa ko ge maa ndwa zḛḛ no me.
58011035	A ge hoɗ fareba ta, nda zaab a̰me ma see maa nda ge dee suu ma gwan-na kàɗɗa ge maa ndwa no. Kaɗɗa ge nda gegene ma ɗe, àa za̰a̰ num yal no ɗiŋ mbo ee num wa ge swày, ɗaŋɗe, àa be vin go àa ndage maa ge yal mbe ma zì ya to. Àa ka kee go mbe ndwa go, maa ta̰a̰ ge swày mbe se, seɗ ndwa ge kwaɗa waɗeya.
58011036	Kaɗɗa ge nda a̰me ge ɗogle ma iya ɗe, àa za̰a̰ num yal maam to sok lasage num mage dwagle num ge bol go. Àa mbo no ɗiŋ feɗ nda a̰me ge num buwal zige ma se ge zul mage dibi num ge daŋay zì no.
58011037	Àa mbaa num nda a̰me ma gezi ge njal gṵṵ ma no, àa kṵṵ gegene ma se buwal no zi zi koo hun num ge kasagar me. Num nda a̰me ge ɗogle ma gaa muuli anna lee gene me-lee gene me, ge tame koo ge ɓin̰a gwabal ma ge maa ta no, àa kaa tok bàŋ papaga, àa ka njon̰ num, àa ka kee num yal maam to me.
58011038	Àa gaa tandaŋeya ge babur pul ma go, ge njal ma pagal digi, num sok kàɗɗa gaa ge njal kin̰a ma zì, ge tugul ma zì me. Nda mbe ge suwa pagal ma kaa kwaɗa maam to. Num ge ka njon̰ num ma wa̰a̰ ndwa kaɗ ge num ge kwaɗa mbe ma no, ge maa buwal zì to peɗ.
58011039	Num mbe ma peɗ, ajo̰o̰ maa kaa ge hoɗ fareba ɗe, a ge pe, Dok kee sayda ge kwaɗa ge num pagal no. Ɗaŋɗe, àa be deɗ-ɗa seɗ kaŋ ge Dok kee maa wa tii ge ne pe mbe to gale.
58011040	Ago, kaŋ a̰me ge gwan waɗe ge kwaɗa iya, ge Dok ee ne no ge nè pe go. A ge pe, ɓyare no go nè dee ya ɓanna dagre ge num sok huy ne wa go.
58012001	Kaɗɗa ge nè ɗe, nè veeya se ge nda mbe ge kee sayda ge hoɗ fareba ge maa way ma no peɗ. Ge ano mbe no pe, mbiya go nè dol kaŋ ge nege nè se be mbo ndwa zḛḛ ma gezi peɗ mage sone ge fiŋli nè se avun cab gezi me. Nè wa̰a̰ ta deŋel chiya soo ge nè ka̰a̰ ta chiya ne no ɗiŋ mbo wa yà.
58012002	Nè ee nè ndwa ɗaɗag ge Zeso ta, ne ge nè hoɗ fareba pe doo no ge ne pagal mage gwan haɗ ne ya no mbyaɗɗa tab me. Ge laa saal ge da̰a̰re ne no yà pe ɗe, vḭḭ tene no mbo swày ge ɔwara kaŋre ta digi, sok ndil daŋso ge swày mbe ne fare a̰me pe to go. Ge sego, a ge tok matoson ge Dok ge kaa no na hòol muluk pagal ne go.
58012003	Ḛ duwa ge Zeso gale, ne ge wa̰a̰ tene deŋel za̰a̰ yal ge go mbe no pe, ge num ge kee sone ma tok go, num mbe ge ɗege digi ge ho̰o̰l keeya ge ne ma. Go mbe no, ne kaa ge ḛ haa tuguɗi lɔfwag ɗoo, ḛ duul wa suu se leɗeɗ to.
58012004	Sok iyal kyarga go, ge fare ge sone keeya ne pagal ɗe, ḛ gale be mḛḛ piliya ɗiŋ ge go swàm kan se wa go to.
58012005	Ḛ vyale fare ge Dok moɗege ḛ ge num ma dinna ge na van ma go ya sok de? Jan fare mbe ma no ge Njaŋeya ma zì go: «Mbi van, ndi fare ge Bagezok mḛḛre mo ge num pagal ma solom to. Sok ge aa mo fare go me ɗe, ka̰a̰ tene se to me.
58012006	Ago Bagezok mḛḛre ndu ge na laa wa̰a̰ ne, Dwagle ndu ge diige ge na kuwa go ne na van ne me.»
58012007	Ḛ wa̰a̰ ta ge mḛḛreya ge Dok mḛḛre ḛ no num pagal ma zì. Kee ḛ dinna ge na kee na van ma go. Ago a van ge diige ne ɗoo, ge ne ba wa mḛḛre ne to de?
58012008	Go mbe no, kaɗɗa go Dok mḛḛre ḛ to ɗe, a ndwa go ḛ be ne van twàl ma ne to, ḛ dinna ge van buwal pe ma go.
58012009	Kaɗɗa ge nè ba ge sḛ duul go ge ma ɗe, àa kaɗ mḛḛre nè, nè gwan ka hon num hormo. Go mbe no, mà kaɗɗa ge Dok, Ba ge nè on̰om ma way no, ne gwan nè pagal mà ne pe se ndwa gyana ga ɗoo, nè wa seɗ ndwa ge fareba de?
58012010	Nè ba mbe ma ka mḛḛre nè mbo kaal to, ge fare ge deɗ kwaɗa num ndwa zì ma pagal. Ɗaŋɗe, Dok mḛḛre nè ge kwaɗa ge nè ne pe, ndwa go nè dee ya kaɗ nda ge harcal ma dinna ge na sḛ no go.
58012011	Sok ge nè seɗ mḛḛreya go ɗe, ge tok ol go gaw, kee nè laa saal to, gwan kee nè yal vare zoo. Ɗaŋɗe, zḛḛ yà kaal nde ɗe, num ge see mḛḛreya ge go mbe ma seŋe nda ge temel mage nda ge dul wa eeya se ma me.
58012012	Ge pe no: «Ḛ zuwa ḛ tok ge kanna se labcag ma digi, ḛ ndaa ḛ ko ge daa hee digi to ma se me.»
58012013	Ḛ nuusi ta ko pul ge temel ge ḛ wa ka mbo num go ma. Go mbe no, ndu ge hele no, ne ko mbe mbo vḛḛne to, mbo zon digi vare zoo.
58012014	Ḛ ɓyare vin̰a ge kaɗ sok halas ge nda peɗ mage kaɗ kàɗɗa ge harcal . Kaɗɗa go to, ndu a̰me ɗu mbo kuwa Bagezok ndwa to.
58012015	Ḛ koy ta kwaɗa, ne kaa ge ndu a̰me ɗu ge ḛ buwal zige, ne hoɗege tene gezi ge kwaɗa keeya ge Dok ne ta to. Ne kaa ge ndu a̰me ɗu ge ḛ buwal zige seŋe ge ɔwara tòo ge zwala ge tyal ge se, wa ee nda gḛḛ waɗ ge iigiya ma zì mage zwage nda to.
58012016	Ḛ koy ta kwaɗa, ne kaa ge ndu a̰me ɗu ge ḛ buwal zige ka kee fare ge batraŋ ma koo ka tɔcwage kaŋ ge mbege gezi ge Dok pe ma ge na ko se to. Ḛ ke kaŋ ge Eso ne pe to, ne ge yiya na ga̰a̰l tolla gezi ge kaŋ zam ge ndwa ɗu pe bàba.
58012017	Zḛḛ ya kaal nde ɗe, ḛ kuwa go sok ge ɓyare go na ba kê na wa tare ɗe, ne ba kuri ne gezi. Daa be seɗ vin̰a ge ee na ba eya fare to me no, seɗ wa tare mbe to me, koo ge a ɓyare ne ge fiyaso jɔjwag go.
58012018	Sok ge ḛ gwan ta ja ge Dok ta zì no ɗe, ḛ be gwan ta ya ge njal ge nda mbiya dabe ne ge maa tok, ne ge ol ka sooya njunjulug ne pagal ge sok tṵṵ mage tṵṵ ge ɗeɗeg kaa ne pagal, ge sa̰a̰m labreya kaa ne pagal,
58012019	ge kṵwa̰ ge burji ne ge ka vinna mage ka̰a̰l a̰me ge ka faaya ne pagal dinna ge Izrayel van ma ka kee ne go ne to. Sok ge Izrayel van ma za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l mbe go, voo wan num, àa jan go maa daa gwan ɓyare za̰a̰ ne fare a̰me go fyalag to baɗ.
58012020	Ago wa hoɗɗa ge Dok ho num ne mbe ge jan go: «Ndu ge diige ge mbo dabe tene ya ge njal mbe, koo ne kaa kaŋ kogor, àa mbo mbal ne gezi ge njal.» Ano mbe seŋe haŋle gḛḛ ge num ndwa zì.
58012021	Kaŋ mbe ge ka keeya sok mbe go ma kaa kaŋ ge hon nda voo gḛḛ ma ne. Ge sok mbe go, Moyiz jin̰a no go: «Voo waɗe mbi ya pool, mbi ndaɗ go ndaɗ.»
58012022	Ɗaŋɗe, ḛ gwan ta ja ge njal ge Siyo̰ ne mage suwal ga̰a̰l ge Dok ge hon nda ndwa ne ta zì. A suwal ga̰a̰l Jerusalem ge no pḭḭ digi yà ne, ge malayka ge ndu mbyaɗ isi num to ma kee vḛḛso no ne diŋ ne.
58012023	Ḛ gwan ta ja ge ɓase ge no ge mojo̰o̰ van pul sway ge Dok ne go ma ta zì, num ge num dḭḭl ma njaŋe no ge pḭḭ ma zì yà. Ḛ gwan ta ja ge Dok ba ge kun nda duwana ma peɗ sariya ta zì. Ḛ gwan ta ja ge nda ge temel ge dee wal ma, ge Dok seŋe num mbyaɗɗa tab ma ta zì.
58012024	Ḛ gwan ta ja ge Zeso ba ge ka̰a̰ na swàm se ndwa usi nè gezi kɔn̰al ta zì. A ndu ge vin̰a ne Dok mage nda duwana ma buwal zì, ge vuwa wa tii ge jin̰al ge nè ne. Ne swàm ge ka̰a̰ se jan fare pool waɗe ge Abel ne.
58012025	Ḛ koy ta kwaɗa ge dol ḛ tɔgwa gezi ge ndu ge jan ḛ fare no ta! Izrayel van ge kuri be za̰a̰ ndu ge ka wan maa tɔgwa suwa pagal wa ma be ɓuu gezi ge dṵṵl ge àa daa mà ee ne ya num pagal to. Mbo gwan kaɗ waɗeya ndwa gyana ga ge nè sḛ ma wa ɓuu gezi, kaɗɗa go nè kuri ndu ge jan nè fare no ge pḭḭ ma zì yà wa ya.
58012026	Dee wal, ka̰a̰l ge Dok ne ka kee suwa ndaɗɗa, ɗaŋɗe, ge sego, kee nè wa tii mbe no go: «Ta ɗu iya, mbi mbo kee suwa ndaɗɗa, be ne ɗeŋew to, mbi mbo kee pḭḭ ndaɗɗa waɗme.»
58012027	Fare mbe ge jin̰a go: «Ta ɗu iya», ngay go kaŋ ge àa doo num ma mbo ka ndaɗɗa, àa burmi gezi, ndwa go kaŋ ge ba̰a̰le mage burmi to ma gaa ne ɗeŋew.
58012028	Go mbe no, nè guwa̰ ge mersi hon Dok, ge dape, ne muluk ge kee ne no nè pagal, a muluk ge be saseya ne. Ɓyare go nè kee tèmel hon Dok keeya ge go ne sḛ kee tii, nè ho̰ ne ga̰a̰l, nè chiya ne voo me.
58012029	A fareba go, Dok ge nè uware ne no, a ge ol ɗaabeya bibiliw ge til kaŋ ma gezi hɔhɔrɔg go.
58013001	Ḛ koy laa wanna ge na̰ van ma ngay ne pe ge ta ta buwal zì.
58013002	Nda ge mbo gɔswal ya ḛ ta ma, mbiya go ḛ ame num kwaɗa. Ne kaa ge ḛ vyale ano mbe no to, ago nda a̰me ma sok kee ne go, àa ame malayka ma ge maa diŋ be wan pe.
58013003	Ḛ duwa ge nda ge no daŋay zì ma dinna ge ḛ sḛ ma ge daŋay zì ɓanna dagre ge num go. Ḛ duwa ge nda ge àa kee num yal no ma ge dape, ḛ sḛ ma ge duul ge mbiya za̰a̰ yal ge num go waɗme.
58013004	N̰a go nda peɗ, num ho̰ san ta hormo. Obe ge diige mage na gwale, ndu a̰me ne chee na kon guwa̰ to. Ago Dok mbo kun sariya ge nda ge kee kaŋ ge batraŋ mage kee zina ma pagal waɗme.
58013005	Ḛ n̰a go laa wan bware gaa ɗeme ḛ ne to. Ḛ ke laa saal ge kaŋ ge ḛ no ge num ḛ tok go ma. Ago Dok sḛ jin̰a go: «Mbi mbo n̰a ḛ koo seŋe ḛ mbi guwa̰ to baɗ.»
58013006	A ge pe, nè seɗ pool ge jan fare be giɗɗa no go: «Bagezok ba ge chiya mbi kṵwa̰ ne, mbi mbo chiya a̰me voo to. Ndu duwana kee mbi mà da de?»
58013007	Ḛ duwa ge ga̰a̰l ge ka ɗeme ḛ fare ge Dok ne zì wal ma, num mbe ge oy ḛ fare ge Dok ne ma. Ḛ ndi kàɗɗa ge num way ɗiŋ mbo swày, ne kaa pe gyana, ḛ bole hoɗ fareba ge num way.
58013008	Zeso Krist eyaya to baɗ, koo ge dwam ge kale ya ma go, koo màno, ge ndwa ɗiŋ ge din.
58013009	Ḛ n̰a ta n̰aameya ge hateya ge pe hini-hini ge mbo ya jin̰al ma pe yà to. Kaɗɗa go, nè seɗ pool nè zi ge kwaɗa keeya ge Dok ne ta ɗe, a fare ge kwaɗa ne, be ge eeya ge fare ge kaŋ zam ne ma pagal to. Ɗaŋɗe, num ge ka mbo eeya mbe ma pagal ma be mbaa num ge fare a̰me ɗu to peɗ.
58013010	Nè go ge twal tuwaleya ɗu, ɗaŋɗe, nda ge kee tuwaleya ge kee tèmel no ge gur ge Dok ne zì ma, be vin̰a ge zam kaŋ ge àa kee tuwaleya no ge ne ge twal mbe pagal.
58013011	Ago, ga̰a̰l ge nda ge kee tuwaleya ma way ge waɗe gene swàm ge kaŋ kogor, ge àa hṵṵ num kee tuwaleya ge sone pe ma way ge sok ge harcacal zì yà ne. Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ge duul ge kaŋ kogor mbe ma way ma, àa til num ge sok ge nda kaa no ne go guwa̰ zum yà.
58013012	Ge ano mbe no pe, Zeso sḛ see swày no waɗme, ge suwal ga̰a̰l guwa̰ zum yà, ndwa haɗ ɓase ma kɔn̰al harcal ge num sone ma go, ge na swàm ta.
58013013	Go mbe no, ḛ wuwa nè zum ge suwal diŋ mbo ge ne ta yà, sok ka tigɗi saaso ma nè ta ge ne go.
58013014	Ago, ge suwa no pagal, nè be sok kàɗɗa ge ndwa ɗiŋ ge nè pe. Ɗaŋɗe, suwal ge nè yan ne pe ɗe, a ne ge no nè ndwa zḛḛ yà.
58013015	Na̰ nè sale Dok ɗaɗag ge Zeso pe dinna ge tuwaleya ge àa ka kee ne go, ndwa go saleya ge ngay go ne Bagezok ne.
58013016	Ḛ ka kee ta kwaɗa mage mbaa ta ta buwal zì, ḛ vyale ano mbe no to, ge dape, a ge tuwaleya ge go mbe ma ta, Dok sḛ kee tii no.
58013017	Ḛ za̰a̰ ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme ḛ fare ge Dok ne zì ma wa, ḛ guwa̰ ḛ pagal num pe se me. Ago, àa num dol maa ndwa go ḛ pagal ne, ajo̰o̰ go num sḛ ma mbo wan fare pe ne ge Dok ndwa se. Go mbe no, kaɗɗa ḛ za̰a̰ num wa ya, àa mbo kee maa tèmel ge laa saal. Kaɗɗa go to, àa gaa kee ne ge sun ta, go mbe no, fare a̰me ge mbaa ḛ mbo kaɗ ne zì to.
58013018	Ḛ kaɗe ge i pe, ge dape, i ge kuwaya tyatyaɗ go i dul wa wan i ge fare a̰me pe to. Ago i ɓyare mbo mboya ge kwaɗa ma ɗaɗag ge fare ma zì peɗ.
58013019	Mbi gwarge tene ḛ ta ge aa tene iya go, ḛ kaɗe Dok ta go, ne hage vin̰a mbi pagal ge gwan ḛ ta yà avun cab.
58013020	Dok ge hon nda halas, a ne ge guwa̰ nè Bagezok Zeso ne ge nda ge swày ma buwal zì ya. Ee ne ya seŋe ga̰a̰l ge nda ge koy tame ma way no, ge swàm ge na tuwaleya ne ge àa vuwa wa tii ge ɗiŋ ge din no ge ne ta.
58013021	N̰a Dok haa ḛ pool ge mbiya ee ḛ kee kaŋ ge kwaɗa ma peɗ ndwa kee laa ɓyareya ge na ne. N̰a ne ke kaŋ ge na sḛ kee tii ge ne nè zì ge Zeso Krist ta. Pateya wa̰a̰ Zeso Krist wan zaman mage zaman ma! Amin !
58013022	Na̰ van ma, mbi njaŋe ḛ lawayta mbe no ndwa hon ḛ pool. Mbi kaɗe go, ḛ ame fare ge hon nda pool mbe ma no kwaɗa ḛ dul wa zì, ago mbi njaŋe ḛ ne ɗegteg boo.
58013023	Fare ge mbi ɓyare wuwage ḛ ne pagal go, nè na̰ van Timote daa ge daŋay zì to, àa dol ne ya go. Kaɗɗa na deɗ ja mbi ta avun cab ɗe, i ge ne mbo ɓan-na ndil ḛ.
58013024	Ḛ sa̰a̰ ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme ḛ ma wa, ḛ san nda ge ho fareba ma wa peɗ me. Na̰ van ge no suwa Itali go ma sa̰a̰ ḛ wa.
58013025	N̰a kwaɗa keeya ge Dok ne kaa ge ḛ ta peɗ!
59001001	A mbi Jak, moor ge Dok mage Bagezok Zeso Krist ne, njaŋe lawayta mbe ne hon nda ge ho fareba ge Zeso Krist ta ma peɗ, ge dasare no dinna ge gɔswal go ma, ge pe rusu ge ɗogle ma buwal zì kàɗɗa ge suwa pagal peɗ. Mbi sa̰a̰ ḛ wa.
59001002	Mbi na̰ van ma, sok ge yal ma deɗ-ɗa pe hini-hini ge ḛ pagal, ḛ ke laa saal.
59001003	Ago, ḛ kuwa kuwa go, kaɗɗa hoɗ fareba ge ḛ ḛ ma mḛḛya pool ndiŋ ge yal njoɗɗa ma zì, àa ge vin̰a ge ee ḛ deɗ-ɗa wan ta deŋel.
59001004	Ɓyare go, ḛ wa̰a̰ ta ɗiŋ deɗ ge wa yà. Kaɗɗa na mbe go, ḛ seŋe nda ge mbyaɗɗa tab ma, ge be fwaɗɗa ma, nda ge a̰me hoɗege num to ma me.
59001005	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me ɗu go ge ḛ buwal zige wan kaŋ ge na mbiya kee ne pe to, ɓyare go ne kaɗe andaŋ ge Dok ta, Dok wa hon ne ne me. Ago, ne sḛ hon nda kaŋ ma peɗ ge tok lwaga. Hon ndu ge kaɗe na kaŋ be tumriya.
59001006	Ɗaŋɗe, ɓyare go ne kaɗe ne ge hoɗ fareba go, na seɗ kaŋ mbe ya seɗ zoo, be ge giɗɗa a̰me ge na dul wa zì. Ago, ndu ge giɗ ge na dul wal zì, a dinna ge sḭ̀ḭl ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam ne ge sa̰a̰m mbeɗe ne digi, ka gene ne lee gene me-lee gene me go.
59001007	Ndu ge go mbe no, ne kaa ge kuwaya go na mbo seɗ a̰me ge Bagezok ta to.
59001008	Ge dape, a ndu ge eya fare ne, kaɗ ndu ge a̰a̰re no ge kaŋ keeya ge na ne ma zì ne me.
59001009	Ɓyare go na̰ van ge a̰se, ne ke laa saal ge Dok mbo hee na pagal ya digi pe.
59001010	Na̰ van ge pwal ke laa saal koo Dok guwa̰ ne pagal se. Ge dape, kuwa kuwa go na mbo kale gezi ge sugu wa folla bàŋ go.
59001011	Ago, sok ge gyala ndaa ya, deɗ se, zaleya ge ne ne loɗe sugu. Sugu wa folla loɗe, kan gezi, kale ge ne ne ban me. Na̰ van ge pwal mbo ban gezi mbe go ca, ge sok yan kaŋ gan ma pe go, ge kaŋ keeya ge na ne ma zì.
59001012	Laa saal kee ndu ge wan tene deŋel ge yal njoɗɗa ma zì. Ge kugiya mbe zì, wan tene ya ɗiŋ mbo halla, poɗɗa ge ne ne mbo kaɗ ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din, ge Bagezok kee wa tii ge num ge laa wa̰a̰ na ma pe.
59001013	Sok ge pe heeya deɗ-ɗa ge ndu a̰me pagal, ne kaa ge ee fare ge Dok pagal to. A̰me ge ee Dok kee sone to. Ne sḛ hee ndu a̰me pe to me.
59001014	Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge diige seɗ pe heeya, ge dape, a ene ge ne zige zwal nee ne, lase ne me.
59001015	Sok ge ndu deɗ-ɗa kee sone ge na duwa num ge na dul wa zì ma, kaɗɗa na zam zḛḛ zḛḛ ge num zì keeya, gaa ee ne mbo swày.
59001016	Na̰ van ge laa wanna ma (ge fare mbe no pagal), ne kaa ge ḛ n̰a ta laseya to.
59001017	Kaŋ ge nè seɗ num ma peɗ, bobo ge siŋli ma, àa mbo ge pḭḭ zì ya, ge Dok Ba ge kê kaŋ ge zen kɔn̰al ma ta ya. Ne sḛ eya to, mesege to, koo sok a̰me ge daalam ge ne ta go fyalag to me.
59001018	Dok ɓyare ne go, nè see ndwa ge fare ge na ne ge fareba ta, ndwa go nè see hormo ge Dok ta waɗe kaŋ dolla gegene ma, ge ne sḛ doo nè ge num buwal zì ma peɗ.
59001019	Na̰ van ge laa wanna ma, ḛ kuwa fare mbe ma kuwa peɗ. Ɓyare go ndu ge diige ha tene za̰a̰ fare ge Dok ne. Ɗaŋɗe, ne ke dṵṵl sok jan fare go, ge sok kee twam go me.
59001020	Ago, sok ge ndu duwana seŋe twam, daa gwan deɗ-ɗa kee fare a̰me ge temel ge Dok ndwa se to.
59001021	Kaɗɗa na mbe go, ḛ ɔwabe ta gezi ge kaŋ keeya ge diige ge seŋre ta, ge kaŋ keeya ge diige ge haɗ nda sone ta me. Ḛ ame fare ge Dok zare ne no ge ḛ dul wa ma zì ge pagal gwanna se. A ne sḛ ge mbiya mon ḛ ne.
59001022	Ne kaa ge ḛ lase ḛ pagal za̰a̰ fare ge Dok ne za̰a̰ bàŋ cuɗ to, ɓyare go ḛ ke tèmel ge ne pagal.
59001023	Ago, sok ge ndu a̰me za̰a̰ fare ge Dok ne go, kee tèmel ne pagal to, dḭḭ ge ndu ge ndil na ndwa ge kuturaŋ zì kuwa tene go.
59001024	Ne sḛ, guwa̰ ge ndi tene go, seŋe tene mboya avun cab, vyale diir ge na ne gezi.
59001025	Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge feɗege eeya ge Dok ne ge haɗ nda suli, wan ne pe kwaɗa, mbarge tene ge ne ta, vyale ne to, ɗaŋɗe, ka mboya ge ne pagal, ndu mbe no, Dok mbo kee ne wa tare ge kaŋ keeya ge ne ne ma zì.
59001026	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me dwaɗ go na ndu ge kee tèmel ge Dok ne ge fareba ne, ɗaŋɗe, koy na ɗel ge fare janna ma zì to, ne sḛ ge na pagal lase go tene. Tèmel keeya ge ndu mbe ne kaŋ bàŋ ne.
59001027	Tèmel keeya ge Dok ne ge fareba, ge Dok Ba ndil ne na ndwa zì kwaɗa, a mbaa kḛḛne mage kumu ma ge maa yal njoɗɗa ma zì. A be n̰a tene laseya ge kaŋ ge dunin̰a ne ma pe yà ndwa haɗ tene seŋre to.
59002001	Na̰ van ma, ajo̰o̰ ḛ ho fareba ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist ge pateya ta, go no me, ne kaa ge ḛ vare nda to.
59002002	Mà kaɗɗa ndu a̰me ge pwal waɗ ja ge zok kwateya ge ḛ ḛ zì, ge kyaɗa dinar ge na tok zì mage ba̰a̰ ge siŋli ge na ta, guwa̰, ndu a̰me ge a̰se waɗ-ɗa zì waɗme ge ba̰a̰ kamal ge na ta,
59002003	kaɗɗa sok ndil ndu ge ka̰a̰ ba̰a̰ ge siŋli go, ḛ jan ne go: Kaa ge sok ge hormo go, ɗaŋɗe, ḛ jan ndu ge a̰se go: Mo, mḛḛ yà go, koo kaa ge mbi ko se go.
59002004	Kaɗɗa ḛ kee mbe go, ḛ sḛ ma ge ḛ pagal, ḛ nda ge vare nda ma ne to de? Ḛ nda ge kun sariya ge no ge dwaɗɗa ge sone ma ne me to de?
59002005	Ḛ za̰a̰ mbi kwaɗa na̰ van ge laa wanna ma: Dok be tal nda ge a̰se ge dunin̰a zige, ge ho fareba no Zeso Krist ta ma, ndwa go num seŋe nda ge pwal ma, ge hoɗ fareba zì, num zâ joo ge muluk ge na kee wa tii ge ne pagal, ndwa hon nda ge num laa wa̰a̰ na ma ne to de?
59002006	Kaɗɗa ge ḛ ɗe, ḛ sen nda ge a̰se ma go sen. A be nda ge pwal ma kee ḛ yal go ne, àa gene ḛ mbo ge nda ge kun sariya ma ndwa se yà ne to de?
59002007	A be num sḛ ma iya jan fare ge sone kakatag ma ne ge dḭḭl ge Zeso Krist ne, ge àa ho̰ nè ne pagal ne me to de?
59002008	Eeya ge Dok ge kee muluk ne ge gag, jan ge Njaŋeya ge Dok ne zì go: «Mo laa wa̰a̰ mo kon dinna ge mo laa sḛ wa̰a̰ tene go.» A tem, kaɗɗa ḛ gwan ge ḛ pagal ya ge ne pe se, ḛ kee kwaɗa.
59002009	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ḛ nda ge vare nda ma ne, ago ḛ dee ge n̰aal zì. Eeya ge Dok ne wan ḛ wan ge sariya, ge dape, ḛ be gwan ḛ pagal ge ne pe se to.
59002010	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me gwan na pagal go ge wa yuwaleya ge no eeya ge Dok ne zì ma pe se peɗ, ɗaŋɗe, hele wa yuwaleya a̰me ɗu, ago ne sḛ hele gegene ma hele mɔɗwag.
59002011	Ago, Dok ge jin̰a go: «Ke zina to», a ne sḛ jin̰a ne waɗme go: «Hṵṵ swày to.» Kaɗɗa mo kee zina ya to puy, mo hun swày ɗe, ago mo be gwan mo pagal ge eeya ge Dok ne ma pe se to.
59002012	Ge ano mbe no pe, ge fare janna ge ḛ ḛ ma zì peɗ, ge kaŋ ge ḛ kee ma zì peɗ, kaɗɗa go ḛ gwan ḛ pagal ya ge eeya ge mbiya haɗ ḛ suli pe se to, ḛ kaa ge kuwaya go Dok mbo kun sariya ge ḛ pagal.
59002013	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me kuwa na ka̰a̰m a̰se to, ge dwam kun sariya ge Dok ne go, mbo kun sariya ge ne pagal be kuwa ne a̰se waɗme. Ɗaŋɗe, Dok Ba ge ngay kuwa a̰se ne, ge sariya kunna ge na ne zì.
59002014	Mbi na̰ van ma, kaɗɗa ndu janna go na ho fareba ge Zeso Krist ta, ɗaŋɗe, kee tèmel kwaɗa ge hoɗ fareba ge na ne pagal to, hoɗ fareba ge ne ne mbe ge pool mon ne de?
59002015	Kaɗɗa na̰ van ge son koo ge gwale hoɗege be seɗ ba̰a̰ ge laa pe, koo kaŋ zam ge zamma dwam ma pagal tatab,
59002016	ɗeɗ-ɗa me go ɗu ge ḛ buwal zige jin̰a ne go: Mbo ge halas, eyalam ke mo to, camal ke mo to me! Ɗaŋɗe, hon ne a̰me ge mbiya mbaa ne to, ano mbe no, mbaa ge da de?
59002017	A mbe go tem, kaɗɗa mo ho fareba ge Krist ta ɗeŋew, mo kee tèmel ge kwaɗa ge hoɗ fareba ge amo mbe pagal to, hoɗ fareba ge amo mbe kaŋ bàŋ ne.
59002018	Mà kaɗɗa ndu a̰me janna go: Mo, mo ge hoɗ fareba, mbi, mbi ge tèmel keeya ma. Ge sok mbe go, mbiya ge mo gwan ge ne fare janna go: Ngay mbi hoɗ fareba ge mo no go ge ne, be tèmel keeya ma, mbi me, mbi mà ngay mo hoɗ fareba ge ambi, ge mbi tèmel keeya ma ta.
59002019	Mo hoɗ fareba hoɗ go Dok ne ɗu de? Kaɗɗa na mbe go, mo kee kwaɗa. On̰om ge sone ma hoɗ fareba mbe go waɗme. Ɗaŋɗe, àa ka ndaɗɗa ge voo.
59002020	Mo ge dàle mbe, mo ɓyare go a ngay mo ngay mbḛḛ go, hoɗ fareba be tèmel keeya kaŋ ge bàŋ ne to de?
59002021	Abraham ge nè baŋ, kee pe gyana, dee ya kaɗ ndu ge temel ge Dok ndwa se no de? A sok ge dee ya hon na van Isak gezi ge tuwaleya pe, ge twal tuwaleya pagal.
59002022	Ge sego, mo kuwaya go go, hoɗ fareba ge ne ne mage tèmel keeya ge ne ne ma gaa mbo dagre. Sok keeya go mbe no, ngay go Abraham ho̰ Dok na dul wa ge ɓul mɔɗwag.
59002023	Njaŋeya ge Dok ne fare ge jin̰a ma num wa ma dee ya huyya mbe go: «Abraham ho fareba ge Dok ta, Dok isi ne no ge ndu ge temel go ge na ndwa se.» Ge ano mbe no ta, too ne no go ne na kondore ne.
59002024	Go mbe no, ḛ kuwa ya go, ndu duwana deɗ-ɗa kaɗ temel ge Dok ndwa se waɗme ge tèmel keeya ge na ne ma ta, be ge hoɗ fareba ta ɗeŋew to.
59002025	Ḛ duwa ge gwale ge zam tene Rahab fare pagal. Dee ya kaɗ ndu ge temel ge Dok ndwa se, ge tèmel keeya ge na ne ma pe, sok ge ame Izrayel van ge àa teme num ya hale sok ma go ge na diŋ. Ee num hee vin̰a ge ɗogle no.
59002026	Ge sego, nè kuwa ya go go sḛ duul ge be on̰om ge na zì suu suu, a mbe go tem, hoɗ fareba ge be tèmel keeya suu suu waɗme.
59003001	Mbi na̰ van ma, ɓyare go nda ge hate nda ma kaa gḛḛ ge ḛ buwal zì to. Ago, ḛ kuwa kuwa go, àa mbo kun sariya ge ndaa kaka ge nè ge hate nda ma pagal.
59003002	Ge dwam ma pul zì peɗ, nè peɗ, nè deɗ go n̰aal zì ndwa wowol. Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me ge deɗ ge n̰aal ge fare janna ne zì to go, a ndu ge mbiya mbyaɗ tab ne, koy tene ge fare ma zì peɗ.
59003003	Ḛ kuwa go, nè kan harjam ge tisi ma wa zì, ndwa go num haa lɔlɔgwaɗ ge nè ko zì, go no me, nè wa deɗ-ɗa ɗeme sḛ duul ge num way ma ge ɓul mɔɗwag waɗme.
59003004	Ḛ kuwa gale, baaburi ge mam se ma, ajo̰o̰ maa ga̰a̰l go ɗe, a sa̰a̰m ge labreya ɓyan num ne mbḛḛ. Go no puy ɗe, sok ge sa̰a̰m ge labreya kaɗ ka ɓyan num go, nda ge jaŋe num ma ee num seŋe ya se ge fiɗigo van ge feltew ma ta bàba.
59003005	Ɗel ge ndu ne, a mbe go ca. Ne sḛ, a sḛ duul sok van a̰me ge jiyale guwa ne, ɗaŋɗe, a ge pool ge gene fare na̰ ge ɓaŋlaŋ ma ya. Ḛ kuwa gyana ge ol van ge felel tilla ge til murum gale.
59003006	Ɗel ge ol swala go waɗme. A yaŋal ge sone keeya ma way ne. A sok van a̰me ɗu ge sḛ duul nee ne. Haɗ sḛ duul seŋre ge ɓul mɔɗwag. Ɗel dun ol ge mbiya vḛḛne ndu duwana ge kàɗɗa ge na ne zì, ge dwam ma zì peɗ suwa pagal. Ne pool ge vḛḛne ndu mbe, mbo ge sok njoɗ yal zì ya.
59003007	Nda duwana ma ge pool ee kaŋ dolla ge diige pe peɗ gwan na pagal ge maa pe se: Kavaar ge ful zige ma, njoole ma, kaŋ ge kan̰ mage kaŋ ge saa ge maa pul ma, sini ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam se ma waɗme. A fareba, àa ge pool ge num pagal.
59003008	Ɗaŋɗe, ndu duwana ge pool ge na ɗel pagal to. A n̰aal ge ndu mbyaɗ wan ne se to ne. A huy ya ge jiyam ge hun nda.
59003009	A ge ɗel ta nè sale Bagezok ge nè Ba no, a ge ne ta me, nè vḛḛne nè wa ge nda duwana ge Dok kê num ge diir ge na ne zì ma pagal no me.
59003010	A ge wa ge ɗu mbe zì ya, wa tare mage wa vḛḛneya ma ndage ya zum no. Mbi na̰ van ma, ɓyare go ne kaa go to.
59003011	Mam ge lasas mage mam ge nuwam ge pool chiya ge tub ge ɗu se jwàg de?
59003012	Fere ge pool tol ɔwara oliv ndwa de? Ɔwara on̰or ge pool tol fere de? A mbe go ca, mbi na̰ van ma, mam ge lasas day chiya ge tub ge mam ge nuwam chiya ne se to.
59003013	A huɗi ge andaŋ mage zwam ne ge ḛ buwal zi de? Kaɗɗa ndu ge go mbe go, ne ngay ne zum ge mboya ge na ne ge kwaɗa ta, ge kaŋ keeya ge na ne ge suul ma ta me. Ge ano mbe no ta, ee nda ne kuwaya go ndu mbe no ne ge andaŋ ge na zì.
59003014	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ḛ huyya ge yil ge sone ge ḛ zì, ḛ kaɗ nda ge ɓyare kwaɗa ge ta pe ma ne ɗeŋew, ɓyare go ḛ hufugi ḛ pagal to. Ḛ kuwa go ḛ ɗuuli fare ge fareba pagal ya se.
59003015	Andaŋ ge go mbe no, a be andaŋ ge mbo ge Dok ta digi ya ne to. A andaŋ ge suwa pagal se ge ne. A kaŋ keeya ge nda duwana ma way ne, mbo ge on̰om ge sone ne ta ya.
59003016	Sok ge nda kaɗ kee yil mage ɓyare kwaɗa ge ta pe ɗeŋew go, a sok ge batraŋ mage kaŋ keeya ge sone ge diige pe peɗ ma way ne waɗme.
59003017	Ɗaŋɗe, andaŋ ge mbo ge Dok ta ya kɔn̰al yaɗaɗ, kaɗ halas, a suul lɔlɔgwaɗ, ka ɓan nda digi ɓan, kaɗ huyya ge kuwa a̰se mage kaŋ ge kwaɗa ma. A be vareya, kaɗ be ndwa mbuɗiya me.
59003018	Ago, nda ge laa wa̰a̰ yan halas pe ma zare halas ge maa ziya dinna ge nda zare kaŋ rusu go. Kaŋ ge àa syaɗ num ma, a kaŋ keeya ge temel ma.
59004001	Gool mage kyarga ma zuɗ ge dii ya ge ḛ buwal zì de? Àa mbo ge ene ge ḛ ḛ ge sone ge mbal twam no ɗaɗag, ge ḛ sḛ duul zì ma ta to de?
59004002	Ḛ ee ḛ laa mam ge nda kaŋ ma pagal, ɗaŋɗe, ḛ seɗ num to. Go mbe no, ḛ guguwa ge hun swày. Ḛ nda ge aham ma ne, ḛ vin̰a ge seɗ kaŋ mbe ma to. Go mbe no, ḛ gaa kee kyarga mage ho̰o̰l ma ge ta buwal zì. Kaŋ ge ḛ ɓyare num ma, ḛ seɗ num to ge dape, ḛ be kaɗe num ge Dok ta to.
59004003	Kaɗɗa go ḛ kaɗe kaŋ ma go ge Dok ta, ḛ ka seɗ num to ɗe, ago ḛ kaɗeya mbe ma ge maa vin̰a go to. Ḛ kaɗe kaŋ mbe ma ndwa kee laa ɓyareya ge ḛ ḛ ma.
59004004	Ḛ ge mbo laa ɓyareya ge Dok ne pagal to ma! Ḛ kuwa kuwa go, nda ge num laa wa̰a̰ kaŋ ge dunin̰a ne ma ho̰o̰l ge Dok to de? Ndu ge ne laa wa̰a̰ kaŋ ge dunin̰a ne ma, seŋe ho̰o̰l ge Dok.
59004005	Ḛ dwaɗ go Njaŋeya ge Dok ne hate fare bàŋ kay de? Jin̰a ne go, Dok yil ge On̰om ge na wuwa ne no ge nè zì pe.
59004006	Ɗaŋɗe, Dok ngay kuwa a̰se ge na ne ge waɗe kon pagal ge nè ta. Ge dape, Njaŋeya jan go: «Dok ho̰o̰l ge kaŋ keeya ge nda ge jegre ma way, ɗaŋɗe, ngay kuwa a̰se ge na ne ge nda ge lɔlɔgwaɗ ma ta.»
59004007	Kaɗɗa na mbe go, ḛ guwa̰ ḛ pagal ge Dok pe se, ḛ mḛḛ piliya ge Ba ge ho̰o̰l, ne sḛ mbo jay na pe soo kaal ge ḛ ta.
59004008	Ḛ guwa̰ ta ya ge Dok ta, ne sḛ wa gwan tene ya ge ḛ ta me. Nda ge sone ma! Ḛ usi ḛ tok ma gezi. Nda ge a̰a̰reya ma! Ḛ haa ḛ dul wa ma kɔn̰al .
59004009	Ḛ kee kiimi, ḛ fyal ge ḛ sone ma pe. N̰a maam ge ḛ ḛ ma seŋe fiyaso, laa saal ge ḛ ḛ ma seŋe laa pisil me.
59004010	Ḛ guwa̰ ḛ pagal lɔlɔgwaɗ ge Dok pe se, ne sḛ mbo hee ḛ digi.
59004011	Na̰ van ma! Ne kaa ge ndu jin̰a fare ge sone ge na na̰ van pagal to. Ndu ge jan fare ge sone ge na na̰ van pagal, koo kun sariya ge ne pagal, jan fare ge sone ge eeya ma pagal, kṵṵ sariya ge num pagal me. Ago, kaɗɗa mo kun sariya ge eeya ma pagal, mo ndu ge mbo ge eeya ma pagal to ne. Ɗaŋɗe, mo gaa ba ge kun sariya ne.
59004012	Dok sḛ melaw ɗu Ba ge hon eeya ma ne, kaɗ Ba ge kun sariya ne me. A ne sḛ ge mbiya mon nè ne me no, ban nè gezi me. Ɗaŋɗe, mo ndu duwana, mo huɗi ne ge mo wa ka kun sariya ge mo kon pagal de?
59004013	Ge sego, ḛ za̰a̰ fare ge mbi ɓyare jan ḛ ne no, ḛ ge jan go: Màno koo kin̰are, i mbo mbo ge suwal ga̰a̰l a̰me yà ɗu, i kaɗ ne diŋ del ɗu, i seŋe i tok, i seɗ mam gḛḛ me.
59004014	Ḛ sḛ ma, ḛ kuwa kaŋ ge mbo keeya dwam ge kin̰are pul zì to. Ḛ dinna ge pḭḭ van ge mbee ya go, guwa̰ swag, borwe gezi.
59004015	Wa̰a̰ ndwa ḛ jan go: Kaɗɗa Bagezok vin-na, i mbo kaɗ ge ndwa, i kee kaŋ ma pe hini-hini me.
59004016	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ge ḛ ɗe, ḛ ke go to. Ḛ gwan uware go ta ge kaŋ ge ḛ ɓyare kee num ma zì. Uware ta ge go mbe no, a sone.
59004017	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me kuwa kaŋ ge kwaɗa ge na mbiya kee ne kuwa, kee ne to, kee sone.
59005001	Ge sego, ḛ nda ge pwal ma, ḛ za̰a̰ mbi gale! Ḛ fiya ge luuluu eeya ge yal ge mbo deɗ-ɗa ge ḛ pagal ma pe!
59005002	Ḛ kaŋ gan ma hubi go hubi, wagal ma zâ ḛ ba̰a̰ ma go zam.
59005003	Ḛ dinar mage ḛ bware walam ma kaare ya go. Kaareya ge num way mbe mbo kaɗ dinna ge ol go, mbo kaɗ kaŋ sayda ho̰o̰l ge ḛ ta, mbo til ḛ duul ma dinna ge ol til kaŋ go. Kaŋ gan ge ḛ goole num ge sego ge ta pe màno ma, àa ḛ kaŋ gan ge tok dwab ma ne.
59005004	Nda ge kee tèmel no ge ḛ gaaso zì ma, ḛ kuri be poɗ uwa̰se ge num way ma. Ḛ za̰a̰ sun ta ge num way ma gale, fiyaso ge num way ma jaɗ bàŋ to. Dok, Bagezok ge pool waɗe-waɗe za̰a̰ num go.
59005005	Kàɗɗa ge ḛ ḛ ge suwa pagal, ḛ ka an̰ an̰, ḛ ka za̰a̰ tii me. Ḛ wal ta kwaɗa, ḛ son-na mulumtum, ḛ gene ta ja swày wa zì dinna ge kaŋ kogor ge àa wal num kwaɗa, ndwa hun num zamma ma go.
59005006	Ḛ wa̰a̰ nda ge temel ma ge sariya, ḛ hṵṵ num no me. Ɗaŋɗe, àa be mḛḛ piliya ge ḛ ndwa zì to.
59005007	Ge sego, na̰ van gegene ma, ḛ wa̰a̰ ta ɗiŋ da̰a̰re gwanna ge Bagezok Zeso ne ya. Ḛ duwa ge ndu ge gaa kaŋ pagal gale, pe gyana ge wan tene da̰a̰re kaŋ wa tolla ge siŋli, ge na kaŋ kyarga ne ma. Ago, wan tene da̰a̰re mam suwaya ge zḛḛge mage mam ge guwa̰ ge.
59005008	Ḛ sḛ ma waɗme, ḛ wa̰a̰ ta da̰a̰reya, ḛ ka̰a̰ ta se to, ago dwam gwanna ge Bagezok ne ya gaa guwa.
59005009	Na̰ van ma, ne kaa ge ḛ jin̰a fare ge sone ma ge ta pagal to. Sok jan fare ge sone mbe ma go, Dok mbo kun sariya ge ḛ pagal. Ḛ kuwa gale, Ba ge kun sariya mḛḛ no ge zok wa go no.
59005010	Na̰ van ma! Ḛ duwa ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa, ge ka jan fare ge dḭḭl ge Dok ne zì ma pagal. Àa njoo yal, àa wa̰a̰ ta ge num pul zì no. Ḛ sḛ ma waɗme, ḛ ke ge num sḛ ma ke go.
59005011	Ḛ ndi! Nda ge wa̰a̰ ta ge yal njoɗɗa zì ma, i jan go, num nda ge Bagezok kê num wa tare ma ne. Ḛ za̰a̰ yal njoɗɗa ge Job ne fare, ge wanna ge wa̰a̰ tene ge num pul zì no me. Ḛ kuwa kaŋ ge Bagezok ho̰ ne ne ge guwa̰ go. Ago, ne sḛ Ba ge kuwa nda a̰se ne, kaɗ Ba ge ngay kwaɗa keeya ge num ge njoɗ yal ma ta ne me.
59005012	Mbi na̰ van ma! Ge fare ma zì peɗ, ne kaa ge ḛ guni ta to: Koo ge pḭḭ, koo ge suwa, koo ge kaŋ dolla a̰me ge ɗogle to me. Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ḛ vin fare ya, ḛ vḭḭ ne vin, kaɗɗa ḛ kuri fare ya, ḛ kuri ne kuri. Go mbe no, àa mbo wan ḛ ge sariya to.
59005013	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me njoɗ yal go ge ḛ buwal zì, ne kaɗe ge Dok ta. Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me go ge laa saal zì ge ḛ buwal zì, ne mbaa kaŋ uware Dok.
59005014	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me kee tuguɗi go ge ḛ buwal zì, ne too nda ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme tèmel ge ɓase ge Krist ne ma ya, num ke kaɗeya ge ne pe. Guwa̰, num ka̰a̰ nùm ge ne pagal ge dḭḭl ge Bagezok ne zì.
59005015	Ago, kaɗeya ge hoɗ fareba mbo mon ndu ge kee tuguɗi mbe, Bagezok mbo ɗege ne digi. Kaɗɗa na ke sone ma go, Dok mbo pore ne num me.
59005016	Ge sego, ḛ jin̰a ḛ sone ma ge ta ta buwal zì, ḛ kee kaɗeya ge ta pe ndwa go ḛ wa seɗ zonna. Kaɗeya keeya ge ndu ge temel ne ge pool gḛḛ ge kee tèmel ma.
59005017	Ḛ duwa ge Eli fare pagal gale, ne sḛ ndu duwana ne ge nè sḛ ma go, ke kaɗeya ge dul wa ɗu no go mam suwa to. Mam mḛḛ be suwaya ge suwa pagal no ɗiŋ del taa ge saba menengal.
59005018	Ge fare mbe ma guwa̰, gwan kee kaɗeya no ge mam pe. Ge sok mbe go, mam ɗege kan ge pḭḭ zì ya se no, sugu ndwa ka̰a̰ digi ge suwa pagal no.
59005019	Na̰ van ma, kaɗɗa ndu a̰me ge ḛ buwal zige sele ya ge vin̰a ge fareba go, guwa̰, ndu ge ɗogle gwan ge ne ya,
59005020	ḛ kuwa go ndu ge mbo gwan ge na kon ge sele gezi ge vin̰a ge fareba go ja, mo̰o̰ ne ge swày zì ya. Kaɗɗa ne sone ma gḛḛ puy, Dok mbo pore ne num gezi.
60001001	A mbi Piyer, ndu ge temeya ge Zeso Krist ne njaŋe lawayta mbe no ne hon nda ge Dok taa num ma, ge kaa mbày no ɓasareya ge nda buwal zì, ge suwa ge Po̰o̰ ne go, ge Galaɗ ne go, ge Kapados ne go, ge Azi ne go, ge Bitini ne go me.
60001002	Ajo̰o̰, Dok Ba taa ḛ ge zḛḛ ya wal day, ge mojo̰o̰ na nuusi ne go, ndwa go ḛ kaa nda ge mbegeya gezi ge na pe ma, ge On̰om ge na ne ta, ge dape, ḛ guwa̰ ḛ pagal ge Zeso Krist pe se, ḛ see poreya ge swàm ge ne ne ge ka̰a̰ se ta me. Mbi kaɗeya go, Dok ngay kwaɗa keeya ge na ne ge ḛ ta, ne ee ḛ kàɗɗa halas mbyaɗɗa tab me.
60001003	Uwareya hon Dok ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist Ba. Ge laa wanna ge ne ne ge ɓaŋlaŋ ta, kuwa nè a̰se, ee nè ya seɗ tolla ge jin̰al no, ge tanna ge Zeso Krist ta̰a̰ ge nda ge swày ma buwal zì pe. Ge ano mbe no ta, ee nè ya ee nè jobreya ma ge ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din pagal.
60001004	Nè ka̰a̰ nè saareya ma ge Dok pagal waɗme go, nè mbo seɗ kaŋ kwaɗa ma, ge ne sḛ koy num no ge nda ge na ne ma pe, ge pḭḭ zì yà. Kaŋ mbe ma hubi to, àa vḛḛne to, àa ban diir ge maa way ma to me.
60001005	Ḛ ge ho fareba ge ne ta ma, ajo̰o̰ na Dok ge pool waɗe-waɗe ne, mbo koy ḛ be fare, ndwa go ḛ see monna ge na mbo dyan ne ja zum, ge dwam pe aaya ma go.
60001006	Ge ano mbe no pe, ḛ ge fafan̰ zì, koo kaɗɗa go ḛ gale seɗ kugiya ma go swag ge sego vin̰a ma go hini-hini.
60001007	Kugiya mbe ma ngay ne go, hoɗ fareba ge ḛ ḛ ma gag. Dinar ge vḛḛne gezi sḛ puy, a ɗiyage ne ge ol. A mbe go ca, hoɗ fareba ge ḛ ḛ, ge ne siŋli waɗe dinar, a kugi ne ndwa ndilla go ne jwab ɓade. Go mbe no, sok ge Zeso Krist mbo dyan ja zum, ḛ mbo seɗ doreya, hormo mage pateya .
60001008	Ḛ laa wa̰a̰ ne be ge ḛ kuwa ne. Ge sego ge ḛ gale kuwa ne to no puy, ḛ hoɗ fareba ya ge ne ta. Go mbe no, ḛ ge laa saal ge ga̰a̰l zì, ḛ ke ne keeya ge go ne pe mbyaɗ wanna to,
60001009	ge dape, ḛ seɗ monna ya go, ano a poɗɗa ge ḛ see nee ne, ge hoɗɗa ge ḛ ho fareba ge Zeso ta pe.
60001010	A ge monna mbe no pe, nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma ɓyare sok ma no liliɗ ge zḛḛ ya wal day, ndwa kuwa gyana ge Dok mbo mon nda duwana ma ya de. Àa wuwage fare ge bobo mbe ne zḛḛ wal, ge Dok nuusi ne ge ḛ pe.
60001011	On̰om ge Krist, Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne kaa ge num zì ne, ee num wuwage yal ge Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne mbo njoɗ num ma ya ɓanna ge pateya ge mbo mbo ja guwa̰ ge yal njoɗɗa ge ne ne mbe ma go. Nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma ɓyare go maa kuwa sok ge kaŋ mbe ma mbo keeya go, gyana ge num wa ma mbo huyya go waɗme.
60001012	Dok wa̰a̰ nda ge zwagre na wa ma ne pe no go: Kaŋ mbe ma ge num sḛ ma pe to, ɗaŋɗe, ge ḛ pe. Ge sego, nda ge oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ma jan ḛ fare mbe ma ya go. Àa jin̰a ḛ ne ge pool ge On̰om ge Harcal ge Dok teme ne ge pḭḭ zì ya ta. Malayka ge Dok ne ma sḛ puy, àa kee ene go maa dee ya kuwa kaŋ mbe ma waɗme.
60001013	Ge ano mbe no pe, ɓyare go dwaɗɗa ge ḛ ḛ ma kaa nuusiya, ge dape, ḛ wa kaɗ jejew ge tèmel ge Dok ne pe keeya. Ḛ kaa jejew ḛ ee ḛ jobreya ma ge kuwa a̰se ge Dok ne pagal, ge ḛ mbo seɗ ne ya dwam ge Zeso Krist mbo gwan ja go.
60001014	Dee wal, ajo̰o̰ ḛ be za̰a̰ Fare ge Kwaɗa ge Zeso Krist ne to, ḛ kaa ge dwaɗɗa ge sone ma ge ḛ zì. Ge sego, ḛ guwa̰ ḛ pagal ge Dok pe se, ne kaa ge ḛ daa gwan mbo ge ḛ dwaɗɗa ge wal mbe ma pagal to.
60001015	Ajo̰o̰ Ba ge too ḛ ya harcal, ḛ sḛ ma waɗme, ɓyare go ḛ kaa harcal ge kaŋ keeya ge ḛ ḛ ma zì peɗ, dinna ge ne sḛ go.
60001016	Njaŋeya ge Dok ne jan go: «Ḛ kaa nda ge harcal ma, ge dape mbi, mbi Ba ge harcal ne.»
60001017	Sok kee kaɗeya ge Dok ta go, ḛ tol ne Baa, ge ano mbe no pe, mbiya go ḛ hon ne hormo. Kàɗɗa ge ḛ ḛ ge suwa pagal go ge swag boo, ḛ mbo mboya ge jwab. Ḛ kuwa go Dok kun ndu ge diige sariya ge kaŋ keeya ge ne ne ma pagal be vareya.
60001018	Kaŋ keeya ge ḛ ame num keeya ge ḛ baŋ ma tok go ma kaŋ keeya ge bàŋ yag ma ne. Ḛ kuwa kuwa go, Zeso Krist zuu ḛ ge num zì ya, be ge dinar mage bware walam ge vḛḛne gezi ma ta to.
60001019	Ɗaŋɗe, zû ḛ ge swàm ge na ne ge yee gḛḛ ta. Krist dinna ge tame van ge be saaso ge na ta, ge be fare a̰me ge na pagal go, ge àa hṵṵ ne ge tuwaleya pe.
60001020	Dok taa ne zḛḛ ge dunin̰a gale wa ya be dolla to go day. Ge sego, ge zaman ge màge wa aaya no go, dyan ne ja zum kɔn̰al go, ge monna ge ḛ ḛ pe.
60001021	A ge ne ta, ḛ dee ya hoɗ fareba ge Dok ta no. Ne ge ta̰a̰ ne ge nda ge swày ma buwal zì, ee ne kaɗ pateya no. Go mbe no, hoɗ fareba ge ḛ ḛ ma, ge jobreya ge ḛ ḛ ma me, num kaa ge Dok pagal.
60001022	Ge sego, ḛ haɗ ḛ dul wa ma ya kɔn̰al, ge dape, ḛ gwan ge ḛ pagal ya ge fare ge Dok ne pe se. Keeya ge go mbe no, ee ḛ laa gwan wan ḛ na̰ van ge ho fareba ma be ndwa mbuɗiya. Go mbe no, ɓyare go ḛ laa wanna mbe ka zam zḛḛ zḛḛ ge dul wa ɗu.
60001023	Ḛ kuwa kuwa go, a ge fare ge Dok ne ge ɗiŋ ge din, ge hon nda duwana ma ndwa ta, ḛ see tolla ge jin̰al no. Ḛ be seɗ ne ge nda duwana ge suu suu ma ta to, ɗaŋɗe, ge Dok ge ɗiŋ ge din ta.
60001024	O̰o̰ maktub ge Dok ne jan go: «Nda duwana ma peɗ dḭḭ ge sugu go, siŋli ge num way peɗ dḭḭ ge sugu wa folla ge kan gezi go me. Sugu fin̰a, ne wa folla looɗe, kan gezi.
60001025	Ɗaŋɗe, fare ge fareba ge Bagezok ne ge ndwa ɗiŋ ge din. Fare ge Dok ne mbe ge nè jan nda ne no, a Fare ge Kwaɗa ge àa dee wuwage ḛ nee ne.»
60002001	Ajo̰o̰ ḛ seɗ ndwa ge jin̰al ya ge Dok ta, ḛ ɔwabe ta gezi ge sone keeya ma ta. Ḛ daa kṵṵ hày to, ḛ mbuɗi nda ndwa to, ḛ ke ene ge nda kaŋ ma pe to, ḛ oo nda to me.
60002002	Dinna ge van kaare ma ɓyare maa na̰ ma pam ge kirgi to ge aa ta go ɗe, ḛ sḛ ma waɗme, ḛ ɓyare fare ge Dok ne ge aa ta, ndwa go, ḛ wa don digi ge ne ta, ne wa ee ḛ deɗ-ɗa ge monna go.
60002003	Ge mojo̰o̰ maktub ge Dok ne jan ne no go, ḛ sḛ ma ge ḛ pagal waɗme, ḛ deɗ ja kuwaya go, Bagezok Ba ge kwaɗa ne.
60002004	Ḛ guwa̰ ta ya ge ne ta zì, ne ge hon nda ndwa, ne sḛ njal ge nda duwana ma doo ne gezi ne. Ɗaŋɗe, Dok ndi ne siŋli gḛḛ ge na ndwa zì, taa ne no.
60002005	Ḛ sḛ ma waɗme, ajo̰o̰ ḛ ame ndwa ge jin̰al ya go, ḛ dinna ge njal ma go, ndwa go Dok ɔwabe ḛ, sḭḭ zok ge ḛ no, ge ne On̰om wa mbo kaɗ ge ne zì. Ḛ mbo seŋe ne nda ge kee tuwaleya ma, ge zok mbe zì. Ḛ mbo gaa kee ne tèmel ge dul wa ɗu. Dok mbo ame num ge kaŋ ge Zeso Krist kê ne pe.
60002006	Ago Njaŋeya ge Dok ne jan fare ge ne pagal go: «Ḛ za̰a̰, njal ge yee gḛḛ ge mbi taa ne, mbi ee ne ge suwal ga̰a̰l Siyo̰ diŋ dinna ge njal ge vwal zok keŋ go. Ndu ge mbo deŋe tene ya ge ne ta, daŋso mbo kee ne to.»
60002007	Ḛ ge ho fareba ge ne ta ma, a kaŋ hormo ne ge ḛ pe. Ɗaŋɗe, ge num ge ho fareba ne ta to ma, Njaŋeya ge Dok ne jan zì go: «Njal ge nda ge sin zok ma doo ne gezi, a ne gaa njal ge gag ge zok keŋ pe ne.»
60002008	«A njal ge nda ko chal ge ne ta ne, kaɗ gon̰ ge ee nda deɗɗa me.» Nda ko chal ge ne ta ge dape, àa be gwan maa pagal ge fare ge Dok ne pe se to, a kaŋ ge ee ge num pe ne ge zḛḛ ya day.
60002009	Kaɗɗa ge ḛ sḛ ma ɗe, ḛ pe rusu ge Dok taa ḛ tal ne, ḛ nda ge kee tèmel tuwaleya ge gan ga̰a̰l ne ma ne, ḛ pe rusu ge ɓase ge Dok mbege ne gezi caɗ ge na sḛ pe ne, ḛ gaa ya ne nda ma me. Ne sḛ taa ḛ ya ne ndwa go, ḛ jin̰a kaŋ ge na kee num ge ɓaŋlaŋ ma zum peɗ ge nda ta. A ne sḛ ge too ḛ ge tṵṵ ge ɗeɗeg ge sone keeya zì ya zum ne, gene ḛ ya ge kɔn̰al ge na ne ge yaɗaɗ go no.
60002010	Dee wal, ḛ be Dok nda ma ne to, ge sego, ḛ seŋe ya ne nda ma. Dee wal, ḛ be deɗ-ɗa ge kuwa a̰se ge Dok ne go to, ge sego, ḛ deɗ ja ge ne go.
60002011	Na̰ van ge laa wanna ma, ḛ kaa ge kuwaya go, ḛ dinna ge gɔswal mage nda ge kaa mbày ma go ge suwa pagal. A ge pe, mbi moɗege ḛ no go, ne kaa ge ḛ n̰a ta mboya ge ene ge sḛ duul ne ma pe yà to, àa kaŋ ge vḛḛne ndwa ge jin̰al ge Dok ho̰ nè nee ne.
60002012	Ḛ mbo mboya ge kwaɗa ge nda ge kuwa Dok to ma buwal zì. Go mbe no, koo àa kaɗɗa ka ee fare ma ge ḛ pagal dinna ge nda ge kee kaŋ ge sone ma go puy, sok ge àa mbo kaɗɗa ka kuwa kaŋ keeya ge ḛ ḛ ge kwaɗa ma, àa mbo sale Dok dwam ge ne sḛ mbo mbo ja ge num ta.
60002013	Ajo̰o̰ ḛ kàre go nè Bagezok pe, ḛ guwa̰ ḛ pagal ge nda ge àa ee num ga̰a̰l no ma, ge gan ga̰a̰l ge kee muluk no suwa pagal ma pe se waɗme.
60002014	Ḛ guwa̰ ḛ pagal ge goformo̰ ma pe se, num ge gan ga̰a̰l ee num ma, ndwa mḛḛre nda ge kee sone ma, dore nda ge kee kwaɗa ma me.
60002015	Kaŋ ge Dok ɓyare ne ge ḛ ta, ago ḛ ke kaŋ keeya ge kwaɗa ma, ndwa go, nda ge dàle mage nda ge kuwa fare to, ge ee fare ḛ pagal ma, num wa dibi.
60002016	Ḛ mbo mboya ge nda ge gaa ya suli ma way. Ɗaŋɗe, ne kaa ge suli ge ḛ ḛ kaa kaŋ a̰me ge laa kaŋ keeya ge ḛ ḛ ge sone ma pagal se to. Ke kwaɗa go, ḛ mbo dinna ge nda ge kee tèmel moor hon Dok ma go.
60002017	Ḛ ngay hormo ge nda ta peɗ. Ḛ laa wa̰a̰ ḛ na̰ van ge ho fareba ge Krist ta ma. Ḛ kaa ge voo ge Dok ne ge ḛ zì, ḛ guwa̰ ḛ pagal ge gan ga̰a̰l ma pe se waɗme.
60002018	Mbi jan fare ḛ ge kee tèmel ge nda tok go ma, ḛ guwa̰ ḛ pagal ge num pe se ge ɓul mɔɗwag. Ḛ ngay ne ge num ge kee ḛ kwaɗa mage num ge hal suul ma ta ɗeŋew to, ɗaŋɗe, ge num ge hal sone ma ta waɗme.
60002019	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me njoɗ yal ge Dok pe, be ge ne kee a̰me ge sone to, Dok mbo ngay kwaɗa keeya ge na ne ge ne ta.
60002020	Kaɗɗa ḛ za̰a̰ yal ge kaŋ ge sone ge ḛ kê num ma pe, ḛ mbo seɗ doreya ge huɗi ta de? Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ḛ za̰a̰ yal bàŋ kay ge kaŋ keeya ge kwaɗa ge ḛ kê num ma pe, a kaŋ ge kwaɗa ne ge Dok ta.
60002021	A ge ano mbe no pe, Dok too ḛ ya no, ge dape, Krist sḛ waɗme, za̰a̰ yal ge ḛ pe. Ne sḛ n̰a ḛ kaŋ ko pul ndwa go, ḛ gaa bole kaŋ keeya ge na ne ma.
60002022	«Ne sḛ be kee a̰me ge sone ɗu to. A be seɗ fare a̰me ge hày ge ne wa zì ɗu to me.»
60002023	Sok ge àa ka sal ne go puy, ne sḛ be gwan ge saaso ge byalam go to. Sok ge àa ka kee ne yal go puy, ne sḛ be kee ndu ho̰o̰l to. Ɗaŋɗe, ka deŋe yal ge na ne ma ge Dok Ba ge kun sariya ge temel ta.
60002024	Zeso sḛ hê sone ge nè ne ma ge na pagal, ḭḭ tene ge num no ɗiŋ mbo suu ge ɔwara kaŋre ta digi ge sone mbe ma pe no, ndwa go, sone daa gwan kaɗ ge pool ge nè pagal to, nè gaa mbo mboya ge temel. O̰o̰ a ge jwaŋ ge ne ne ma ta, nè see zonna ge nè sone ma way no ge ɓul mɔɗwag.
60002025	Dee wal, ḛ kaa dinna ge tame ge be ba ge koy maa ma go, muuliya ge vin̰a ma go. Ɗaŋɗe ge sego, ḛ gwan ja ge Ba ge koy on̰om ge ḛ ḛ ma ta.
60003001	Ḛ nda zaab waɗme, ajo̰o̰ ḛ gaa ya Krist nda ma, ndu ge diige guwa̰ na pagal ge na obe pe se. Kaɗɗa ḛ keeya mbe go, ḛ ge pool ee ḛ obe a̰me ge gale ame Krist to ma, deɗ-ɗa hoɗ fareba ge ne ta. Koo ḛ jin̰a num fare ge Dok ne to puy, kaŋ keeya ge ḛ ḛ ge kwaɗa ma mbo zwal num ya ge Krist ta.
60003002	Go mbe no, mbo ee num kuwa mboya ge ḛ ḛ ge kɔn̰al mage pagal gwanna se ge ḛ ḛ ma me.
60003003	Ḛ ngay kale ge ḛ ḛ ma zum ge kaŋ pare ta ma ta ɗeŋew to dinna ge pagal mbolla ge jalaw ma go, paa kaŋ ge dinar go ma, kan ba̰a̰ ge bware gḛḛ go ma me.
60003004	Ɗaŋɗe, ḛ ngay num zum ge kaŋ keeya ge ḛ ḛ ge kwaɗa ma ta. Ḛ kaa ge on̰om ge suul, ḛ kaɗ sok kwaɗa me, ndwa go pare ta ge go mbe no, a pare ta ge mbyaɗɗa tab ne, kaɗ kwaɗa ge Dok ndwa se.
60003005	Dee wal, nda zaab ge kaa zok ge no ge voo ge Dok ne maa zì, ge ka ee maa jobreya ma ge ne pagal ma, àa ka pare ta mbe go, àa ka gwan maa pagal ge maa obe ma pe se me.
60003006	Ḛ duwa ge Sara ge Abraham gwale fare pagal gale, ne sḛ guwa̰ na pagal ge na obe pe se, ka tol ne no go: Mbi ba ge zok. Ḛ seŋe ge mojo̰o̰ ne van ge gwale ma go, sok kee kaŋ ge kwaɗa ma go, ḛ n̰a ta iigiya ge fare a̰me pagal go to me.
60003007	Ḛ nda soɗob ge kaa zok ma waɗme, ɓyare go ndu ge diige mage na gwale ge maa zok diŋ, num za̰a̰ ta. Ḛ kaa ge kuwaya go, àa kwate nda zaab kwate ge num kaŋ keeya ma zì peɗ. Ɓyare go nè ngay hormo ge num ta, ge dape, num sḛ ma waɗme, àa mbo seɗ bobo ge ndwa ge fareba ne ɓanna dagre ge ḛ. Kaɗɗa ḛ kee mbe go, a̰me mbo tele kaɗeya ge ḛ ḛ ma to.
60003008	Mbi fare pe aaya ge na̰ van ge hoɗ fareba ma ta go, ḛ peɗ ḛ za̰a̰ ta ge ta buwal zì, ḛ ngay kuwa a̰se ge ta ta, ḛ laa wa̰a̰ ta ge ta buwal zì, ḛ ngay kwaɗa keeya ge nda ta, ḛ kaa nda ge suul lɔlɔgwaɗ ma waɗme.
60003009	Ne kaa ge ḛ poo sone ge sone koo saaso ge saaso to. Ne nde-nde go, ḛ kee num wa tare sok ge àa kee ḛ sone go. Ge dape, Dok too ḛ ya ne go, ḛ seŋe na nda ma, na wa kee ḛ wa tare.
60003010	Maktub ge Dok ne jin̰a go: «Ndu ge ɓyare go na za̰a̰ tii ge kàɗɗa ge na ne zì, na kaa kàɗɗa ge laa saal me, ɓyare go ne koy na ɗel ge fare janna ge sone ma ta go, ne kṵṵ hày to me. Go mbe no, ne kàɗɗa mbo kaɗ kàɗɗa ge sḛ tii.
60003011	Ɓyare go ne ɔwabe tene gezi ge sone keeya ta, nde-nde go ne kee kwaɗa, ne yin̰a halas pe ge aa tene me.
60003012	Ago, Dok doo na ndwa keceɗ ge nda ge temel ma pagal. Kaɗeya ge num way ma peɗ deɗ ge ne tɔgwa zì yà. Kaɗɗa ge num ge kee sone ma ɗe, ne sḛ ho̰o̰l ge num.»
60003013	Kaɗɗa ḛ yan kwaɗa keeya pe go ge aa ta, a huɗi mbo kaɗ ho̰o̰l ne ge ḛ de?
60003014	Kaɗɗa ḛ za̰a̰ yal go, ge tèmel ge temel ge ḛ kee num ma pe, Dok mbo kee ḛ wa tare . Go mbe no, ne kaa ge ḛ chiya nda ge ɓyare kee ḛ yal ma voo to, ḛ dul wa ma iigi to me.
60003015	Ḛ kuwa ḛ dul wa ma zì go, Krist Bagezok ne, ḛ ho̰ ne hormo me. Sok ge àa ele ḛ fare ge jobreya ge ḛ ḛ ge ḛ ee ne no ge Ne pagal pe, ḛ ke dṵṵl sok wan num fare pe go to.
60003016	Sok wan num fare pe go, ḛ wa̰a̰ num ne ge suul jajan, be jegreya. N̰a on̰om ge vaa fare buwal ge ḛ ḛ ne kaa a̰a̰reya to, ndwa go, sok ge nda kaɗ jan fare ge sone ma ge ḛ pagal, guwa̰ ge àa kuwa mboya ge ḛ mbo kwaɗa no ge ɓanna ge ḛ ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Krist pe go ya, daŋso ne wa̰a̰ num.
60003017	Nde-nde go ndu njoɗ yal sok kee kwaɗa go, kaɗɗa go na ge laa ɓyareya ge Dok ne pagal, ge go ne ka njoɗ ne be ge laa ɓyareya ge Dok ne pagal to.
60003018	Ago Krist sḛ suu ndwa melaw ɗu, ge sone ge nda duwana ma way ma pe. Ne sḛ, ndu ge temel, n̰a tene mbo swày ge nda ge temel to ma pe no, ndwa go na gene num ya ge Dok ta. Ne sḛ see swày ge sḛ duul go, ɗaŋɗe, ge On̰om ge Harcal ta, ta̰a̰ digi no.
60003019	Sok ge suu go, ge pool ge On̰om ge Harcal ne ta, mbo oy fare ge Dok ne no, ge on̰om ge swày ge no daŋay zì ma ta, ge tugul swày se yà.
60003020	On̰om mbe ma, dee wal, àa nda ge kuri Dok wa ma ne, sok ge ne sḛ ka wan tene da̰a̰re num, ge zaman ge Nowe ka nuusi na faa ga̰a̰l go. Nda ge wuwa ne zì ma hoɗege guwa, ndwa go nda wa gezi zi, a num mbe ma see monna ne, ge mam yḛḛreya go.
60003021	Mam yḛḛreya mbe, a diir ge baptem ge ḛ kee ne no ge sego ne, ge ḛ seɗ monna ge ne ta ne. Baptem mbe keeya, usi pisil ge no ge sḛ duul ta ma to, ɗaŋɗe, a hon ta ge Dok ta ge ɓul mɔɗwag, ge on̰om ge vaa fare buwal ge yaɗaɗ. Kaɗɗa baptem mon nè mon, a ge tanna ge Zeso Krist ne ta.
60003022	Ne sḛ ge ta̰a̰, gwan-na ge pḭḭ zì yà, kàɗɗa ge Dok tok matoson pagal. A ne sḛ kee muluk ne ge malayka ge Dok ne ma, ge on̰om ge pool ma ɓanna ge pool ge waɗe maa ka̰a̰m ma pagal.
60004001	Ajo̰o̰ Krist za̰a̰ yal ge na sḛ duul go, ḛ sḛ ma waɗme, ḛ kaa ge nuusiya mbe go me. Ago ndu duwana ge za̰a̰ yal ge na sḛ duul go, daa gwan dabe tene ge sone avun go cab to.
60004002	Ge sego, a gaa mbo zḛḛ no, ge kàɗɗa ge ḛ ḛ ge suwa pagal go ge, ḛ daa gwan mbo mboya ge sḛ duul pagal go ge to, ḛ gaa kee laa ɓyareya ge Dok ne.
60004003	Ḛ hee sok ya gḛḛ ɓa, sok kee kaŋ keeya ge nda ge kuwa Dok to ma way ma go, ge sego mbyaɗ ḛ ya go. Ḛ kaa ge ene ge sḛ duul ne ge ol bibiliw ma ge ḛ zì, ḛ ka mbo laa ɓyareya ge ḛ ḛ ma pagal: Nda ge fere jin̰al ma, nda ge zam kaŋ zam kale maa pagal ma, nda ge njoɗ kaŋ kale maa pagal ma, ge uware kaŋ siim ma, ge kee kaŋ ge ndu mbiya kee num to ma me.
60004004	Ge sego, ajo̰o̰ ḛ ge num tok daa ɓan dagre to ɗe, kee num ya ajab, ndwa go, ḛ daa gwan kee kaŋ keeya ge batraŋ ge num way ma pe to. A ge pe, àa seŋe ya sal ḛ no.
60004005	Ɗaŋɗe, ge dwam a̰me go ɗu, àa mbo wan kaŋ ge maa kee num ma pe, ge Dok ndwa se, ne ge kaa no jejew kun sariya ge nda ge ndwa mage nda ge swày ma pagal.
60004006	A ge pe no, àa oy Fare ge Kwaɗa ge nda ge suu ma ta no waɗme, ndwa go, ge On̰om ge Harcal ta, num kaa ge ndwa dinna ge Dok sḛ go, koo kaɗɗa go ne sḛ kun sariya ya wal ge num pagal, ge kàɗɗa ge num way ge dunin̰a zì, dinna ge ne sḛ kun sariya no ge nda duwana ma pagal peɗ go.
60004007	Kaŋ ge kee no ge sego ma peɗ, pe aaya ge num way gaa guwa. Ge ano mbe no pe, ḛ kaa nda ge andaŋ ma, ḛ kaɗ jejew ndwa go, ḛ wa ka kee kaɗeya hon Dok.
60004008	Kaŋ ge waɗe ge ga̰a̰l, ago ḛ kaa ge laa wanna ɗaɗag ge ta buwal zì ge dul wa ɗu. Kaɗɗa laa wanna ge go mbe ge ḛ zì, mbo ee ḛ ka pore sone ge nda ge kee ḛ num ma.
60004009	Ḛ kaa nda ge kee ta gɔswal ge ta buwal zì ma be tunna.
60004010	Ḛ ho̰ ta kee tèmel ndwa mbaa nda ge ɗogle ma, ge bobo ge ndele ge ndu ge diige see ne ge Dok ta. Ḛ kaa dinna ge nda ge koy kaŋ kwaɗa ma go, ge kee tèmel no go kwaɗa ge num, ajo̰o̰ bobo ge pe hini-hini mbe ma ḛ see num ge Dok ta.
60004011	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me see bobo ge oy fare ge Dok ne go, ne jin̰a zum tem fare ge mbo no ge Dok ta ya. Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me see bobo ge mbaa nda go, ne mba nda ge pool ge na see ne ge Dok ta. Sok kee ano mbe ma go, mbo ee nda hon Dok hormo ge kaŋ ma zì peɗ, ge Zeso Krist pe. A ne sḛ ge mbiya seɗ hormo mage pool ge ɓaŋlaŋ ne, ge zaman mage zaman ma go. Amin !
60004012	Na̰ van ge laa wanna ma, ajo̰o̰ ḛ ge kugiya ge haŋle ma zì, ḛ ndi num ge a̰me ge jin̰al ge ḛ ta go to.
60004013	Ke kwaɗa go ḛ kee laa saal, kaɗɗa ḛ njoɗ yal go ɓanna ge Zeso Krist, ndwa go, sok ge mbo dyan ja zum ge pateya ge na ne zì, ḛ mbo gwan kee laa saal ge ga̰a̰l.
60004014	Kaɗɗa nda jan fare ge sone kakatag ma go ge ḛ pagal ge Krist pe, ḛ ke laa saal ndwa go, On̰om ge Dok ne ge pateya go ɓanna dagre ge ḛ.
60004015	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me ɗu ge ḛ buwal zige njoɗ yal go, ge dape, na kee kaŋ a̰me ge sone koo na hṵṵ swày, koo na chee a̰me, koo na pa tene ge fare ge nda way zì, njoɗ yal ge go mbe no, a kwaɗa ge num ge ho fareba ma pe to.
60004016	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa na njoɗ yal go na ge Krist nee ne, ne kaa ge ne ke daŋso to. Ke kwaɗa vare zoo go, ne hon Dok hormo ge tolla ge nda tol ne go, ne ndu ge Krist nee ne pe.
60004017	Sok mbyaɗɗa go ge sariya kunna ge Dok ne pe, ee pe gale ge nda ge na ne ma ta. O̰o̰ mà kaɗɗa go sariya mbe ee pe ge nè ta no, num ge kuri be hoɗ fareba ge Fare ge Kwaɗa ta ma, sariya mbe mbo kaɗ gyana ge num pe de?
60004018	Dinna ge Njaŋeya ge Dok ne jan no go: «Mà kaɗɗa go, ne haŋle ge go ndu ge temel dee ya monna go no, mbo kaɗ gyana ge nda ge kee sone ge ɓyare kuwa Dok to ma pe de?»
60004019	Ge ano mbe no pe, nda ge njoɗ yal no ge laa ɓyareya ge Dok ne pagal ma, num ka zam zḛḛ zḛḛ ge kaŋ keeya ge kwaɗa ma zì. Go no me, num ho̰ ta ge ɓul mɔɗwag ge Dok ge doo maa ta, ne ge n̰a wa to.
60005001	Ge sego, mbi jan fare nda ge ɗeme tèmel, ge no ḛ buwal zì ma. Mbi, mbi ndu ge ɗeme tèmel ne dinna ge ḛ sḛ ma go. Sok ge Krist ka za̰a̰ yal go, mbi wa ya. Sok ge Dok mbo dyan pateya ge Krist ne ja zum ge nda ta, mbi mbo kaɗ ge mam ndwa num buwal zì waɗme.
60005002	Ḛ koy ɓase ge Dok ne, ge ne sḛ ho̰ num koyya no ge ḛ tok go ma. Ḛ doo ḛ ndwa kwaɗa ge num pagal, ge mojo̰o̰ Dok sḛ ɓyare ne go. Ḛ ke tèmel mbe ge mojo̰o̰ àa ee ḛ kee ne ge pool go to. Ɗaŋɗe, ḛ ho̰ ta ge ɓul mɔɗwag ge ne ta keeya. Ḛ ee ḛ dwaɗɗa ma ge bware ge àa kaɗ poɗ ḛ num ma pagal ge tèmel mbe pe to, ɗaŋɗe, ḛ ho̰ ta kee ne ndwa mbaa nda.
60005003	Ḛ ge ɗeme nda ma, ne kaa ge ḛ ke num ge mojo̰o̰ ḛ kaa gan ge num pagal go to. Ɗaŋɗe, ne kwaɗa go ḛ kaa kaŋ ko pul ge num way.
60005004	Go mbe no, sok ge Zeso Krist, Ba ge koyya ge ɓaŋlaŋ mbo gwan ja, num ge mbo halla ma mbo seɗ balme ge pateya.
60005005	Kaɗɗa ḛ ge bogol ma ɗe, mbi jan ḛ go, ḛ guwa̰ ḛ pagal ge nda ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme tèmel ge ɓase ge Krist ne ma pe se. Ḛ sḛ ma peɗ, ge baan ge ḛ ḛ ma zì, ḛ kaa suul lɔlɔgwaɗ ge ta ta. Ge dape, Njaŋeya ge Dok ne jan zì go: «Dok ho̰o̰l ge nda ge pagal ga̰a̰l ma, ɗaŋɗe, ka ngay kuwa a̰se ge na ne ge nda ge suul lɔlɔgwaɗ ma ta.»
60005006	Ge ano mbe no pe, mbi jan ḛ go, ḛ guwa̰ ḛ pagal ge Dok ge chiya nda kṵwa̰ pe se, ge dape, ne sḛ mbo hee ḛ pagal digi, ge dwam ge ne sḛ mbo vin tene ya, ge ne pagal go.
60005007	Ge iigiya ge ḛ ḛ ma zì peɗ, ḛ ka̰a̰ num ge Dok pagal, ge dape, a ne sḛ in tene ge ḛ ne.
60005008	Ḛ kaa ge ḛ ndwa, ḛ kaɗ jejew, ge dape, Ba ge ho̰o̰l hole dinna ge sòne pyan wan kaŋ ndwa kicigi ne zamma go.
60005009	Ḛ kaa mḛḛya ndiŋ ge hoɗ fareba ge ḛ ḛ ma zì, ne kaa ge ḛ n̰a Saytan vin̰a go fyalag to. Ḛ kuwa kuwa go, na̰ van ge ho fareba dinna ge ḛ go ma ɓasareya ge dunin̰a zì, àa za̰a̰ yal ge mojo̰o̰ ḛ za̰a̰ ne no go waɗme.
60005010	Ge sego ḛ za̰a̰ yal, guwa̰ ge ḛ mbo za̰a̰ yal ya swag, Dok ge ngay kuwa a̰se ge na ne ge ḛ ta, ge too ḛ ya ge pateya ge na ne ge ɗiŋ ge din go, ne ge ɓa̰a̰ ḛ dagre ge Krist, ne sḛ mbo hee ḛ digi, mbo seŋe ḛ mbyaɗɗa tab, mbo hon ḛ pool, mbo ɗùu ḛ mḛḛya ndiŋ ge pe dolla ge ndaa kaka pagal.
60005011	A ne sḛ ne ge pool ge kee muluk ge zaman mage zaman ma go. Amin !
60005012	Fare ge ɗegeɗ ge mbi jin̰a ḛ num mbe ma no, a Silvḛ, na̰ van ge n̰a wa to, mbâ mbi ne sok njaŋe ḛ num go. Mbi teme ḛ lawayta mbe no yà ndwa hon ḛ pool, ee ḛ kuwaya go: Dok ngay kwaɗa keeya ge na ne ge fareba ya ḛ ta. Ɓyare go ḛ kaa mbargeya ndindiŋ ge ne ta.
60005013	Ɓase ge Dok ne ge no suwal ga̰a̰l Babilon diŋ ma, ge Dok taa num ge mojo̰o̰ ḛ go ma sa̰a̰ ḛ wa. Mark, ge mbi ndil ne ge mbi van go sa̰a̰ ḛ wa waɗme.
60005014	Mbi sa̰a̰ ḛ wa. Ḛ sa̰a̰ ta wa ge ta buwal zì, ḛ kaa buu ta zì ge laa saal, dinna ge na̰ van ge ho fareba ma mbiya kee ta ne go. Mbi kaɗeya go halas ge Dok ne kaa ge ḛ ge ɓa̰a̰ no dagre ge Krist ma peɗ.
61001001	A mbi Simo̰ Piyer, ndu ge tèmel mage ndu ge temeya ge Zeso Krist ne njaŋe lawayta mbe ne, hon nda ge ho fareba ge Zeso Krist ta ma dinna ge i sḛ ma go. Ano mbe no, a kaŋ ge kwaɗa ne, ge ḛ pe, ge i pe me. Zeso Krist kê kaŋ ge kwaɗa mbe ne, ge nè pe peɗ, ge dape, ne sḛ ndu ge temel ne. Ne sḛ ge na pagal, a Dok ne, kaɗ Ba ge mo̰o̰ nè ne waɗme.
61001002	Mbi kaɗeya go, Dok ngay kwaɗa keeya ge na ne ge gḛḛ ge ḛ ta, ne ee ḛ kàɗɗa halas me, ge kuwaya ge ḛ deɗ ja kuwa Dok mage nè Ba ge monna Zeso no pe.
61001003	Dok, ge pool ge na ne ge waɗe-waɗe ta, hon nè kaŋ ge kwaɗa ma ya peɗ, ge mbiya mbaa nè ge kàɗɗa ge nè ne ge ndwa ge jin̰al zì, mboya dagre ge Dok me. Ee nè ya kuwa Dok ge too nè ya, ndwa go nè dee ya kaɗ dagre ge pateya mage kwaɗa keeya ge ne ne zì.
61001004	Ge num ta, bobo ge ga̰a̰l mage siŋli ge gḛḛ ma, ge ne sḛ kê wa tii dee wal ndwa hon nè num ma, nè deɗ ja seɗ num. Kê ano mbe ndwa go, ḛ dee ya ɓuu gezi ge kaŋ ge sone ge dunin̰a mbe no ne zì ma go, ge nda ee maa ene no ge num pagal ma. Ḛ mbo seŋe ge diir ge Dok ne.
61001005	Ge ano mbe no pe, ḛ ho̰ ta pool ge mbiya go, ḛ mbo mboya ge kwaɗa ge hoɗ fareba ge ḛ ḛ pagal, ge mboya kwaɗa pagal, kuwa Dok hetel,
61001006	ge kuwa Dok hetel pagal, wan ta, ge wan ta pagal, wan ta deŋel ge pe heeya ma zì, ge wan ta deŋel pagal, mboya dagre ge Dok,
61001007	ge mboya dagre ge Dok pagal, laa wan na̰ van ma, ge laa wan na̰ van ma pagal, ngay laa wanna me.
61001008	Kaŋ keeya ge kwaɗa ge go mbe ma no, àa kaɗ-ɗa ge ḛ zì, àa zuli ge ḛ zì me, àa mbo haɗ ḛ fogol cacaf, àa ka ee ḛ zam zḛḛ zḛḛ ɗiŋ ḛ deɗ-ɗa kuwaya ge hetel ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist ne go.
61001009	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa kaŋ mbe ma ge ndu zì to, dḭḭ ge ɓaal go, ne ndwa kuwa sok to. Ne sḛ vyale ya go go, Dok haɗ na ya kɔn̰al ge sone ge na ne ge na dee kê num wal ma go.
61001010	Ge ano mbe no pe, na̰ van ma, ḛ gwan hon ta pool kon pagal, ndwa go ḛ wa deɗ-ɗa huy tolla ge Dok too ḛ mage talla ge taa ḛ wa me. Kaɗɗa ḛ keeya mbe go, ḛ mbo deɗ to.
61001011	Go mbe no, Dok mbo hage ḛ zok wa a̰a̰l go ga, ge ḛ wa waɗ ge muluk ge ɗiŋ ge din ge nè Bagezok mage nè Ba ge monna Zeso Krist ne zì.
61001012	Ge ano mbe no pe, mbi mbo ka voɗ ḛ pagal ɗaɗag ge kaŋ mbe ma pagal. Ajo̰o̰ ḛ kuwa num ya wal puy ɗe, ḛ kaa ɗuuya no ndiŋ ge fare ge fareba ge àa hate ḛ num ya mbe ma zì no waɗme.
61001013	A kwaɗa ge go mbi ka voɗ ḛ pagal ge fare mbe ma pagal, ge go ḛ kaa yaŋ-yaŋ, ajo̰o̰ mbi gale go ge sḛ duul ge ambi mbe ge dḭḭ sḭḭ ge gur go mbe zì.
61001014	Ge mojo̰o̰ nè Bagezok Zeso Krist tâ mbi ne no go, mbi kuwa kuwa go sok ge mbi n̰a sḛ duul mbe ge dḭḭ sḭḭ ge gur go mbe gaa guwa.
61001015	Ɗaŋɗe, ɓyare go mbi ke kaŋ ge mbi mbiya kee num ma ge sego waɗ, ndwa go, guwa̰ swày ge ambi go, ḛ wa ka dwaɗɗa ge num pagal.
61001016	Ago, fare ge i dee jin̰a ḛ num ma, ge gwanna ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist ne ya pagal, ge pool ge waɗe-waɗe ge na ne zì mbe, ḛ ndi num solom ge mojo̰o̰ sigi ge nda duwana ma isi num ma go to. A fareba go, i kuwa ne ge i ndwa ge pateya ge na ne zì.
61001017	Sok ge Dok ge nè Ba ngay hormo mage pateya ge ne ne zum go, i wa ya ge sok mbe go. I za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l ge Dok ge pate pate ne janna go: Ano, a mbi van ne, mbi laa wa̰a̰ gḛḛ, mbi za̰a̰ tii ge ne ta.
61001018	Ɗaŋɗe, ka̰a̰l mbe ge mbo ge pḭḭ zì ya, i sḛ ma za̰a̰ ne ge i tɔgwa ma, sok ge i ge num wa ya dagre ge njal ge harcal pagal.
61001019	Ge ano mbe no pe, fare ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma dee jin̰a ge zḛḛ ya, ne wa huy ge i ndwa go. Kaɗɗa ge i sḛ ma ɗe, i deŋe ta kon pagal ge fare janna ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma ne pagal. A ge pe, ɓyare no go, ḛ kuwa fare mbe kwaɗa. A dinna ge lampe ge zen no ge sok tṵṵ zì ya go, ɗiŋ ge go sok ne ɓaa ya gezi. Krist gùwa̰ ga̰a̰l ge kon̰ sok, tyan kɔn̰al ya ge ḛ dul wa ma zì.
61001020	Zḛḛ ɓiya, ḛ kuwa go fare janna ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma way a̰me ɗu, ge no Njaŋeya ge Dok ne zì, ne be fare janna ge ndu a̰me ne ge na pagal bàŋ war ne to.
61001021	Ago, fare janna ge ndu ge zwagre Dok wa ne, a be fare ge ndu jan ne ge na laa ɓyareya pagal ne to. Ɗaŋɗe, a On̰om ge Harcal biri num ne, ee num jan fare ge mbo ge Dok ta ya zum no.
61002001	Dee wal, nda ge kee ta nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma kaa ge Izrayel van ma buwal zì. Nda ge hon hateya ge maa vin̰a go to ma, mbo kaɗ ge ḛ buwal zì mbe go ca. Àa mbo kaɗ ge ḛ guwa̰ ya, ge maa hateya ge hày mbe ma, àa mbo ban nda gezi, ɗiŋ deɗ-ɗa go num mbo kuri nè Ba ge hateya ge zuu maa gezi. Sok kee kaŋ mbe ma go, àa mbo zwal banna ya ge maa pagal tugcug.
61002002	Nda gḛḛ mbo mbo ge num pe yà, àa mbo ka kee kaŋ ge seŋre ge num sḛ ma kee num ma. Ge num pe, nda mbo ka jan fare ge sone kakatag ma ge vin̰a ge fareba ne pagal.
61002003	Ge ene ge bware ne pe, àa mbo ka lase ḛ, àa ame ḛ kaŋ ma ge fare janna ge maa way ge hày ma ta. Dok ge kun nda sariya, da̰a̰re num go ge zḛḛ ya day, ndwa wan num ge sariya. Burmiya ge num way gaa guwa me, mbo hoɗege be mbo ya to.
61002004	Ago dee wal, koo malayka ge Dok ne ge kê sone ma, a ngaɗ go Dok kṵṵ sariya ge num pagal. Dibi num ge tugul ga̰a̰l ge tṵṵ ɗeɗeg se no, vwalla ge zul ndwa da̰a̰re dwam kun sariya ge ga̰a̰l.
61002005	Nda ge ka kee sone dee wal suwa pagal ma, a ngaɗ go Dok kṵṵ sariya ge num pagal mbe go waɗme. Ee mam yḛḛreya ya ndwa puu num gezi no ge dape, àa be gwan maa pagal ge fare ge Dok ne pe se to. Ɗaŋɗe, cage Nowe ge ka oy fare ge temel taɗ gezi no ɓanna ge nda ge na diŋ-ge ma ɓỳala.
61002006	Dok kṵṵ sariya ge suwal ga̰a̰l Sodom mage Gomor pagal, tii num gezi ge ol no, ɗiŋ àa seŋe siyam no. Ano mbe no, a ndwa ngay nda ge gwan maa pagal ge na ge Dok pe se to ma go, na mbo burmi num gezi mbe go waɗme.
61002007	Ɗaŋɗe, Loɗ kaa ndu ge temel ge Dok ndwa se, ɓû ne ge suwal Sodom diŋ ya zum no, ge dape, kaŋ keeya ge seŋre ge maa vin̰a go to ma, ge nda mbe ma way ka iigi ne dul wa.
61002008	Ajo̰o̰ na ndu ge temel ge kaa ge nda ge kee sone ma buwal zì ne, kaŋ keeya ge num way ge sone ma, ka kuwa num, ka za̰a̰ num me. Ɗaal mage gyala, kaa ge iigiya ge na dul wa zì, ge kaŋ keeya ge sone kakatag ge num way ma pe.
61002009	Go mbe no, Bagezok kuwa vin̰a ge ɓuu nda ge na ne, ge no kugiya zì ma kuwa, ka ndil nda ge temel to ma solom ndwa kun sariya ge num pagal, ge dwam kun sariya go.
61002010	Nda ge Dok mbo kun sariya ya walay nde ge num pagal ma, àa num ge ha̰a̰le maa duul kee kaŋ keeya ge seŋre ge laa ɓyareya ge maa way ma pagal ma, ge kuri muluk ge Bagezok Dok ne gezi ma me. Nda ge hon hateya ge na vin̰a go to ge mbi jin̰a ḛ num fare ma, àa ndil ta go, ndu a̰me ge waɗe maa to, àa pagal ga̰a̰l, àa hon on̰om ge pateya ge pḭḭ zì yà ge ma hormo to, go no puy, àa wan ta be sal num to me.
61002011	Koo malayka ge Dok ne ge pool waɗe num waɗe ma puy, àa ge pool ee fare ge on̰om mbe ma pagal ge Dok ndwa se, ɗaŋɗe, àa sal num to.
61002012	Ɗaŋɗe, nda mbe ma dḭḭ ta ge kaŋ kavaar ge dwaɗ fare to, ge nda wan num ge faɗe mbo hunna ma go. Kaŋ ge àa wan num pe to ma puy, àa ka sal num bàŋ ceceɗ. Àa mbo hun num gezi dinna ge nda hun kaŋ kavaar ma go.
61002013	Yal ge ḛ kee nda num ma, àa mbo poɗ ḛ ge num. Kaŋ ge kee num sḛ duul tii ma, a sone keeya ma. Àa kee num gyala ɗeɗel. Mboya ge num way ya ge ḛ sok kee vḛḛso kaŋ zam ma go, a kaŋ daŋso ne, kaɗ kaŋ haɗ nda seŋre me, a vin̰a ge ee kaŋ chal nda ko ne, kee num sḛ duul tii me.
61002014	Num pagal huy ge zina keeya, àa lwage ge sok kee sone go to. Àa bwaɗe num ge mḛḛ no cɔcwab ge hoɗ fareba ge maa way zì ma, deɗ-ɗa ge maa faɗe ma zì. Dwaɗɗa ge num way ma mɔɗwag, àa ge kaŋ seɗɗa pagal. Ge num kaŋ keeya mbe ma pe, Dok vḛḛne na wa ya vḛḛne zoo, ge num pagal.
61002015	Àa n̰a vin̰a ge fareba ge Dok ne ya gezi, àa ka n̰aame n̰aame sok hee ko pul ge Balam ge Bosor van ne go, ne ge laa wa̰a̰ bware seɗɗa ge na vin̰a go to.
61002016	Ɗaŋɗe, see mḛḛreya ge za̰a̰ya ge na za̰a̰ Dok wa to pe. Go no, Dok ee kwar na̰ faa ndu ge zwagre na wa no, tele ne be kee kaŋ ge sone, ge ne duwa kee num ma no me.
61002017	Nda ge hon hateya ge maa vin̰a go to mbe ma dḭḭ ge tub ge pul fin̰al ma go, àa kaɗ ge pḭḭ ge sa̰a̰m in ne gigiriw be suwa mam go me. Dok nuusi sok kàɗɗa ge num way ge tṵṵ ge ɗeɗeg zì yà.
61002018	Fare janna ge num way ma fare janna ge jegreya ma ne, àa kaɗ fare janna ge be mbaa fare to ma ne me. Ge ene sḛ duul ge num way ge daŋso mbe ma ta, àa ee num ge gale ɓû no ge nda ge mbo mbo banna ma buwal zì ya ma deɗ ge faɗe ge maa way ma zì.
61002019	Àa ka kee num wa tii ge hateya ge maa way ma zì go, num gaa nda ge suli ma ne, zane no ɗe, num sḛ ma ge maa pagal, àa moor ge sone keeya, ge gene num mbo ge banna zì ma way ne. Ago, kaɗɗa kaŋ a̰me kee muluk go ge ndu pagal, ndu mbe sḛ gaa moor ge kaŋ mbe nee ne.
61002020	Kaɗɗa nda a̰me ma deɗ ja kuwa Zeso Krist go, ne nè Bagezok mage nè Ba ge monna ne, guwa̰, àa n̰a ta zwal-la ge kaŋ ge dunin̰a ne ma pe yà, kaŋ mbe ma gwan hal ge num pagal, kàɗɗa ge num way ge mà, a seŋre gḛḛ waɗe kàɗɗa ge num way ge dee wal.
61002021	Ne nde-nde dana go, àa kuwa vin̰a ge temel to, ge go àa kuwa ne, àa gwan swaɗ ne. Àa daa gwan mbo ge wa yuwaleya ge harcal ge Dok ne, ge àa hate num ne pagal to.
61002022	Kaŋ keeya ge sone ge nda mbe ma way no, dḭḭ tene ge fare sḭḭ ge fareba ge jan go: «Juu gwan-na ɗaa na kuu koo kosoŋ ge àa so̰o̰ ne gwan-na viŋri tene ge gɔgɔbal zì.»
61003001	Mbi kondore ge laa wanna ma, ano, a lawayta ge zi ge mbi njaŋe ḛ nee ne. Ge num zì jwàg, mbi voɗ ḛ pagal ge hateya ge ḛ see num wal ma pagal, ndwa go ne ee ḛ dwaɗɗa kwaɗa ge fare mbe ma pagal.
61003002	Ḛ duwa ge fare janna ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ge harcal ma dee jin̰a ḛ num ma pagal, ge wa yuwaleya ge Bagezok, Ba ge monna Zeso Krist, ne nda ge temeya ma hate ḛ num ma pagal me.
61003003	Fare ge ga̰a̰l ge ḛ mbiya kuwa ne zḛḛ no, ge dwam pe aaya ma go, nda a̰me ma mbo mbo ya, àa mbo ka mboya ge ene maa way ge sone ma pagal, àa mbo ka coɗ ta ge ḛ,
61003004	àa ka janna go: Zeso Krist kê wa tii go na mbo gwan-na kade? Gwan ja ɗaŋ de? Guwa̰ swày ge nè baŋ ma way ya day ɗiŋ màno, kaŋ a̰me ɗu be eya to, àa ge mojo̰o̰ Dok dee doo maa go.
61003005	Nda ge jan fare ge go mbe ma no, àa kee ge mojo̰o̰ maa vyale pool ge ne ne ya go go: Ge pe dolla ge kaŋ ma way go, dee wal, Dok kê pḭḭ mage suwa ge fare janna ge na ne ta. Vâ suwa mage mam buwal se no, ndâ suwa ge mam ma pul se ya digi no.
61003006	O̰o̰, a mbe go ca, Dok pû dunin̰a dee wal gezi ge mam yḛḛreya no.
61003007	Ɗaŋɗe, Dok jin̰a no go, pḭḭ mage suwa ge mà ma no, na mbo burmi num gezi ge ɓul mɔɗwag ge ol. N̰a num gale da̰a̰re dwam ge na mbo kun sariya ya ge num ge kee sone ma pagal, ndwa burmi num gezi.
61003008	Ɗaŋɗe, mbi kondore ge laa wanna ma, kaŋ a̰me go ɗu ge ḛ mbiya vyale ne to ge Bagezok ta, dwam ɗu, a ge mojo̰o̰ del dubu go, del dubu me, kaɗ ge mojo̰o̰ dwam ɗu go me.
61003009	Nda a̰me ma dwaɗ go Bagezok kee dṵṵl be huy wa tii ge na kê num ma wa. Ge ḛ pe, wan tene da̰a̰reya bàŋ go, ndu ɗu ne ba̰a̰ to, ɗaŋɗe, ɓyare go nda peɗ dee ya n̰a maa sone ma gezi, num seŋe ta ya se ge na ta.
61003010	Dwam gwanna ge nè Bagezok ne ya mbo tan nè dinna ge ndu ge chala go. Ge dwam mbe go, pḭḭ mbo fwaɗ sok ge kṵwa̰ ge ɓaŋlaŋ, kaŋ ge pḭḭ zige ma peɗ mbo til gezi. Àa mbo kun sariya ge suwa mage kaŋ ge kaa no ge ne pagal ma, pagal peɗ.
61003011	Mà kaɗɗa go kaŋ mbe ma peɗ mbo burmi gezi mbe go no, mboya ge ḛ ḛ wa̰a̰ ndwa kaɗ gyana de? Ɓyare go ḛ ho̰ ta Dok ge ɓul mɔɗwag, ḛ kaa nda ge harcal ma me.
61003012	Ajo̰o̰ ḛ da̰a̰re go dwam gwanna ge Dok ne ya, ḛ ge kee go ne mboya digi avun cab ma, ḛ kuwa go, ge dwam mbe go, pḭḭ mbo til gezi mɔɗwag ge ol, hogeya ge ne ne mbo ɗese kaŋ ge pḭḭ zige ma gezi, ban num gezi me.
61003013	Ɗaŋɗe, nè da̰a̰re go wa tii ge Dok kê ne go, na mbo kee pḭḭ mage suwa ge jin̰al, sok ge kaŋ ge temel taɗ ma mbo kaɗ-ɗa ka keeya ne ge num pagal.
61003014	Ge pe no, mbi kondore ge laa wanna ma, sok da̰a̰re dwam mbe go, ḛ aa ta kee kaŋ ge ee ḛ kaɗ nda ge harcal ma, ne see ḛ nda ge be fare ge maa pagal ma, ge kaa no dul wa eeya se ma me.
61003015	Ḛ kuwa go, kaɗɗa nè Bagezok gale wan tene go da̰a̰reya ɗe, a ndwa go ḛ dee ya ge monna go. Pol, nè na̰ van ge laa wanna, ge lawayta ge na ne zì, njaŋe ḛ fare mbe ma waɗme, njaŋe ḛ num ge andaŋ ge Dok ho̰ na ne ta.
61003016	Fare ano mbe ma no peɗ, Pol njaŋe num sok a̰me ge lawayta ge na ne ma zì mbe go ca. Sok a̰me ma, ge kaŋ njaŋeya mbe ma zì, pe wanna ge num way ma mbiɗigil. Nda ge be andaŋ mage nda ge mḛḛ no cɔcwab ge vin̰a hoɗ fareba go ma, àa vuuɗi fare mbe ma vuuɗi, àa muwa̰se pe wanna ge num way dinna ge àa vuuɗi sok a̰me ge ɗogle ge maktub ge Dok ne zige ma no go waɗme. Sok kee ano mbe no go, nda mbe ma gene ta mbo banna.
61003017	Mbi kondore ge laa wanna ma, kaɗɗa ge ḛ sḛ ma ɗe, àa wuwage ḛ fare mbe ma ya zḛḛ, ḛ kaa jejew, ḛ n̰a ta laseya ge nda ge besere fare ge Dok ne ge n̰aame ma pe yà to, ḛ mḛḛ ndiŋ, ḛ ka̰a̰ tok digi ge hoɗ fareba ge ḛ ḛ ta to.
61003018	Ɗaŋɗe, ḛ ka zam zḛḛ zḛḛ ge kwaɗa keeya mage kuwaya ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist Ba ge mo̰o̰ nè, ngay num ge nè ta ma zì. Mbi kaɗeya go, ne dḭḭl see hormo ge sego, ge zaman ge ɗiŋ ge din ge mboya ma go me. Amin !
62001001	Fare ge no go ge pe dolla ya day, i dee ya za̰a̰ ne no, i kuwa ne ge i ndwa no, i ndi ne no jɔbol mage deɗ-ɗa dabe ne ge i tok no: Fare mbe, a Fare ge èe nda kaɗ ge ndwa ne.
62001002	Ago, ndwa mbe din̰a ya zum, i jin̰a ḛ fare ge i kuwa mbe mage tyan ḛ pagal gezi ge ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din mbe pagal no me. Fare mbe kaa dee ge Ba dagre, guwa̰, ngay tene ge i ta no.
62001003	Kaŋ ge i kuwa num ma, ge i za̰a̰ num ma, i wuwage ḛ num sḛ no, ndwa go ḛ sḛ ma waɗme ḛ ɓa̰a̰ baan dagre ge i. Ago baan ge i i a ɓanna dagre ge nè Ba Dok, kaɗ ge ne van Zeso Krist me.
62001004	Kaŋ mbe ma no, i sḛ ma njaŋe ḛ num ndwa go, laa saal ge i i wa huy tab.
62001005	Ḛ za̰a̰ fare janna ge i za̰a̰ ne ge Zeso Krist ta, ge i ɓyare go i wuwage ḛ ne no: Dok a kɔn̰al, tṵṵ a̰me go fyalag ge ne ta to.
62001006	Sok ge nè jan go nè ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge ne, nè kaŋ keeya ma kaɗ kɔn̰al to, nè nda ge hày ma ne, nè mbo ge fare ge fareba pagal to me.
62001007	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa nè kaŋ keeya ma ge kɔn̰al go, dinna ge Dok sḛ no kɔn̰al go, go no me ɗe, nè baan ge ta, swàm ge ne Van Zeso ne haɗ nè kɔn̰al harcal ge nè sone ma go peɗ me.
62001008	Kaɗɗa nè janna go: Nè nda ge sone no ne ta to ma ne, nè sḛ ma lase go nè pagal, fare ge fareba ge nè zì to.
62001009	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa nè ben sone keeya ge nè ne ma ja zum, a ndu ge n̰a wa to ne, kaɗ ba ge temel taɗ me, mbo pore sone keeya ge nè ne mbe ma, haɗ nè kɔn̰al ge nè kaŋ keeya ge diige pe peɗ ge maa vin̰a go to ma go me.
62001010	Kaɗɗa nè janna go: Nè nda ge kee sone to ma ne, nè seŋe Dok ndu ge hày, ne fare ge nè zì to.
62002001	Mbi van ma, mbi njaŋe ḛ ano mbe no ndwa go ḛ gwan kee sone to. Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ndu a̰me deɗ ja kee sone, nè ge ndu ge ɗege nè pe, ge nè Ba ta ya, ndwa go Zeso Krist, Ba ge temel taɗ.
62002002	Ago, ne sḛ ge na pagal, ho̰ tene gezi ge kaŋ ge kee tuwaleya a̰me go, ndwa pore nè sone ma, be nè sone ma ɗeŋew to, ɗaŋɗe, ge nda ge dunin̰a zige ma way ma mɔɗwag waɗme.
62002003	Kaɗɗa nè mbo ge wa yuwaleya ge Dok ne ma pagal tetem, ge ano mbe no ta, nè wa vin ta go nè kuwa Dok mbe kuwa.
62002004	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me janna go: Na kuwa ne kuwa, ɗaŋɗe, mbo ge wa yuwaleya ge ne ne mbe ma pagal to, a ndu ge hày ne, fareba ge ne zì to.
62002005	Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge mbo ge fare janna ge ne ne ma pagal, laa wanna ge Dok ne mbyaɗɗa tab ge ne zì. A ge ano mbe no ta, nè wa kuwa tyatyaɗ go nè ɓanna dagre ge Dok.
62002006	Ndu ge jan zum waŋ go: Na dagre ge ne, mbiya go ne mbo dinna ca ge Bagezok sḛ mbô go waɗme.
62002007	Mbi nda ge laa wanna ma, a be go mbi njaŋe ḛ wa yuwaleya a̰me ge jin̰al to, ɗaŋɗe, a wa yuwaleya ge sabar ge ḛ kuwa ne ge pe dolla ya day mbe ne. Wa yuwaleya ge sabar mbe no, a fare ge ḛ za̰a̰ ne ya ne.
62002008	Ano puy waɗme ɗe, mbi njaŋe ḛ wa yuwaleya a̰me ge jin̰al. Kaŋ keeya ge Krist ne mage ḛ ḛ ma ngay nda ne go ne eeya ge jin̰al ge fareba ne. Ge dape, tṵṵ ge ɗeɗeg kale go kale, kɔn̰al ge fareba zen ja zen zoo.
62002009	Ndu ge jan go, na kee kaŋ keeya ge kɔn̰al go ge ma ɗoo, ka ɓyare na na̰ van ge ho fareba ma to, a tṵṵ ge ɗeɗeg zì gale.
62002010	Ndu ge ne laa wan na na̰ van ge ho fareba ma, ka kaɗ ge kɔn̰al go, a̰me ge ee ne deɗɗa to.
62002011	Ndu ge ɓyare na na̰ van ge ho fareba ge na go to, a ge tṵṵ ge ɗeɗeg zì, wan sok ge na mbo go pe to, ge dape, tṵṵ ge ɗeɗeg dame ne ndwa ma dame.
62002012	Mbi njaŋe kaŋ hon ḛ mbi van ma, ge dape, ge dḭḭl ge Zeso ne pe, àa pore ḛ sone ma ya gezi.
62002013	Mbi njaŋe kaŋ hon ḛ ge ba ma, ge dape ḛ kuwa ndu ge no ge pe dolla ya day kuwa. Mbi njaŋe kaŋ hon ḛ ge bogol ma, ge dape ḛ hal-la ge ba ge zwam pagal.
62002014	Mbi njaŋe kaŋ gwan hon ḛ ge bogol ma, ge dape ḛ kuwa ḛ Ba kuwa. Mbi njaŋe kaŋ gwan hon ḛ ge ba ma, ge dape ḛ kuwa ndu ge no ge pe dolla ya day kuwa. Mbi njaŋe kaŋ gwan hon ḛ ge bogol ma, ge dape ḛ pool, ḛ ame fare ge Dok ne ame ge ḛ zì, ḛ haa hal ge ba ge zwam pagal.
62002015	Ne kaa ge ḛ laa wa̰a̰ dunin̰a to, koo kaŋ ge dunin̰a ne ma to me. Kaɗɗa ndu laa wan dunin̰a ya, ago ne laa daa gwan wan Dok ge nè Ba to.
62002016	Ago kaŋ ge no ge dunin̰a zì ma peɗ: Ene ge kee sḛ duul tii, dwaɗɗa ge go kaŋ ma mɔɗwag num kaa amo mage jegreya ge kaŋ seɗɗa ge dunin̰a ne ma pe, àa mbo ge Baa ta ya to, ɗaŋɗe, àa mbo ge dunin̰a zum ya.
62002017	Dunin̰a kale kale, ne ene ma waɗme, ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge kee laa ɓyareya ge Dok ne, a kàɗɗa ge ndwa ɗiŋ ge din.
62002018	Mbi van ma, dwam wa aaya ma yan ja guwa. Ḛ ge ne kuwaya, àa hate ḛ go: Ndu ge no ho̰o̰l ge Krist mbo mbo ya. Ge sego, nda ge no ho̰o̰l ge Krist ma waɗe ja pool. A ge ano mbe ma ta, nè kuwaya no go, dwam wa aaya ma yan ja guwa.
62002019	Nda mbe ma zuu ge nè buwal zì, ɗaŋɗe, àa be kaɗ nè ne ma to. Ago, daa no go maa kaa nè ne ma ɗe, àa daa mà kaɗ dagre ge nè. Dee ya keeya mbe go, nè kuwa tyatyaɗ go num ge nè ne ma ne to.
62002020	Kaɗɗa ge ḛ sḛ ma ɗe, ḛ seɗ On̰om ge Harcal ya ge Krist ta, ge go ḛ mɔɗwag, ḛ ge kuwaya mbe.
62002021	Kaɗɗa mbi njaŋe kaŋ hon ḛ ɗe, a be go ḛ hoɗege kuwa fare ge Fareba to, ɗaŋɗe, ago ḛ kuwa waɗme go, fare ge hày a̰me waɗ ge fare ge fareba ndwa zì ya to.
62002022	A tol huɗi ndu ge ho̰o̰l de? A ndu ge vin go Zeso ne Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne, Ndu ge Dok taa nee ne to. Ndu ge go mbe no, a ho̰o̰l ge Krist, a ndu ge kuri Ba mage Van ne jwàg.
62002023	Ndu ge diige ge kuri Van ya, kuri Ba waɗme. Ndu ge diige ge ame Van ya, ame Ba waɗme.
62002024	Kaɗɗa ge ḛ ɗe, fare ge ḛ za̰a̰ num ge pe dolla ya day ma, ḛ mbiya koy num kwaɗa ge ḛ dul wa ma zì. Kaɗɗa ḛ koy fare mbe ge ḛ za̰a̰ num ge pe dolla ya day ma ya ge ḛ dul wa ma zì ɗe, ago ḛ sḛ ma mbo kaɗ dagre ge Van mage Ba waɗme.
62002025	Ḛ kuwa, wa tii ge Krist kê nè ne mbe no: A ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din.
62002026	Fare ge ee mbi njaŋe ḛ kaŋ mbe ma no, a ge nda ge ɓyare vin̰a ban ḛ ma pe.
62002027	Kaɗɗa ge ḛ sḛ ma ɗe, On̰om ge Harcal ge ḛ see ne ge Krist ta mbe ge ḛ zì, ḛ gwan ɓyare go ndu a̰me mbo ya hate ḛ fare a̰me ge ɗogle mbḛḛ de. Ɗaŋɗe, ago On̰om ge Harcal ge ḛ see ne ge ne ta mbe go ge ḛ zì. Ḛ daa gwan ɓyare go àa hate ḛ hate to. Ɗaŋɗe, a On̰om mbe gaa hate ḛ kaŋ mbe ma ne peɗ. Hate ḛ fare ge Fareba, be fare ge hày to. Go mbe no, ḛ kaa dagre ɗu ge Krist, ge mojo̰o̰ On̰om hate ḛ ne go.
62002028	Ge sego, mbi van ma, ḛ kaa ɓanna dagre ɗu ge Krist, ge dape, sok ge mbo dyan ja zum, nè kaa be voo. Ge dwam gwanna ge ne ne mbe ya go me ɗe, ne kaa ge nè see daŋso ge ne ndwa se to me.
62002029	Ajo̰o̰ ḛ ge kuwaya go Krist ndu ge temel taɗ ne, ḛ kuwa waɗme go ndu ge diige ge mbo ge temel pagal, a van ge Dok nee ne.
62003001	Ḛ kuwa gale, a ma̰ laa wanna ne, ge Dok ngay ne no ge nè ta, ge go àa gaa tol nè Dok van ma de! A fareba nè Dok van ma ne. Ḛ kuwa go, nda ge dunin̰a ma kuwa nè to, ge dape num sḛ ma kuwa Dok to me.
62003002	Mbi kondore ge laa wanna ma, ge sego nè gaa Dok van ma ne, nè mbo eya gyana-gyana de puy, nè wan ne pe to. Ɗaŋɗe, nè ge kuwaya go dwam ge Krist mbo dyan ja kɔn̰al go, nè mbo hee diir ge ne ne, ge dape, nè mbo kuwa ne mbe go tetem.
62003003	Ndu ge diige ge ee na jobreya no ge Krist pagal, ne haa tene kɔn̰al ge mojo̰o̰ Bagezok sḛ no kɔn̰al harcal go.
62003004	Ndu ge diige ge kee sone, hele eeya ge Dok ne ma pagal, ago sone keeya mbe, a hele eeya ge Dok ne ma pagal.
62003005	Ḛ ge kuwaya go, Zeso Krist mbo ya hee nè sone ma, ne sḛ, sone a̰me ge ne ta to.
62003006	Ndu ge diige, ge ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Krist, daa kee sone to. Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge diige ge kee sone, wan Krist mbe pe to, kuwa ne to me.
62003007	Mbi van ma, n̰a ndu a̰me ne ee ḛ n̰aameya to. Kaɗɗa ndu mbo ge temel taɗ pagal, ne sḛ temel waɗme dinna ge Zeso Krist sḛ no temel no go.
62003008	Ndu ge bulmi sone zì, a ge Ba ge ho̰o̰l nee ne, ago Ba ge ho̰o̰l kee sone ge pe dolla ya day. Dok Van din̰a ya zum ndwa go na vḛḛne kaŋ keeya ge Ba ge ho̰o̰l ne ma gezi.
62003009	Ndu ge seŋe ya Dok van kee sone to, ge dape, pool ge Dok ne ge hon nda ndwa, a ge ne zì. Ne vin̰a ge daa gwan kee sone to, ndwa go Dok ne Ba ne.
62003010	Ḛ kuwa kaŋ ge vaa Dok van mage Ba ge ho̰o̰l nda ma buwal no: Ndu ge diige ge mbo ge temel taɗ pagal to, koo ne laa wan na na̰ van ma to, a be ge Dok nee ne to.
62003011	Ago, ḛ za̰a̰ fare janna ge àa jin̰a ne ge pe dolla ya day go: N̰a nè laa wa̰a̰ ta ge ta buwal zì.
62003012	Ne kaa ge nè kee kaŋ ge Kayḛ kee ne pe to, vḭḭ ba ge zwam wa, hṵṵ na na̰ van gezi no. Hṵṵ ne gezi ge ma̰ kaŋ pe de? Ndwa go ne kaŋ keeya ma kaa sone, ge ne na̰ van Abel ne ma kaa kaŋ keeya ge temel ma me.
62003013	Na̰ van ma, kaɗɗa nda ge dunin̰a ma ɓyare ḛ to, ne kaa ge fare mbe ke ḛ ajab to.
62003014	Kaɗɗa ge nè ɗe, nè ge kuwaya go, nè kaa wal nda ge swày ma ne, ge sego nè waɗ ja ge ndwa ge fareba zì, ge dape, nè laa wa̰a̰ nè na̰ van ma wan. Ndu ge no be laa wanna, a ge pool ge swày ne pe se.
62003015	Ndu ge diige ge ɓyare na na̰ van to, a ndu ge hun swày ne. Ḛ ge kuwaya go, ndu ge hun swày be ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din ge na zì.
62003016	Ge sego nè kuwa ya go go, laa wanna, ne ma̰ kaŋ ne de: A ge honna ge Zeso ho̰ tene swày ge ne pe ta. Ne sḛ ma waɗme, mbiya go, nè hon ta swày ge nè na̰ van ma pe me.
62003017	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me ge kaŋ seɗɗa ge dunin̰a ne ma, ne sḛ kuwa na na̰ van ge no hoɗegeya zì, chiya ne kṵwa̰ to, laa wanna ge Dok ne mà mbo kaɗ ge ne zì pe gyana de?
62003018	Mbi van ma, n̰a nè laa wa̰a̰ ta ge wa wala boo to, koo ge fare janna ge dolom ma ta to, ɗaŋɗe, nè ngay laa wanna ge fareba ge nè kaŋ keeya ma ta.
62003019	A ge ano mbe no ta, ne wa mbo kuwaya go, fareba ge Dok ne ge nè zì. Ago mbe me, nè dul wa ma wa mbo ee se ge Dok ndwa se me.
62003020	Tamekyala, kaɗɗa nè dul wa ma deɗ ja wan nè ge fare a̰me pagal, Dok ga̰a̰l gḛḛ waɗe nè dul wa ma, kuwa kaŋ ma kuwa peɗ.
62003021	Mbi kondore ge laa wanna ma, kaɗɗa nè dul wa wan nè ge fare to, nè ge kuwaya tyatyaɗ go nè mbo ya Dok ndwa se be voo.
62003022	Kaŋ ge nè kaɗe ne num ma peɗ, nè seɗ num seɗ, ge dape, nè mbo ge wa yuwaleya ge ne ne ma pagal, nè kee kaŋ ge kee ne duul tii ma me.
62003023	Ḛ kuwa go ne wa yuwaleya go: Nè ho fareba ge na Van Zeso Krist ta, nè laa wan ta ge ta buwal zì ge mojo̰o̰ ne wa yuwaleya mbe sḛ hate nè go.
62003024	Ndu ge mbo ge wa yuwaleya ge Dok ne ma pagal, a ɓanna dagre ge Dok, Dok dagre ge ne me. A ge ano mbe no ta, nè wa kuwa go Dok nè zì, ge On̰om ge ne ho̰ nè ta.
62004001	Mbi kondore ge laa wanna ma, ḛ kaa ge be hoɗ fareba ge fare ge nda jan num ma pagal peɗ to go: «I ge On̰om ge Dok ne.» Ɗaŋɗe, ḛ kugi num kugi guy, ndwa kuwaya go num on̰om ge Dok ne ma ne ɗer ɓade. Ago nda ge kee ta nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma waɗe ja pool ge dunin̰a zì.
62004002	Ḛ kuwa pe gyana, ge ḛ wa mbo seɗɗa go ano mbe no, ne On̰om ge Dok nee ne de: Ndu ge diige ge vin go Zeso Krist ne seŋe ndu duwana fareba, a Dok ndu ne.
62004003	Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge diige ge vin fare ge àa jin̰a ge Zeso pe mbe to, a be ndu ge Dok nee ne to, a ba ge no ho̰o̰l ge Krist ndu ne. Ḛ ge kuwaya go: Ndu ge no ho̰o̰l ge Krist, ne mbo ya, ḛ kuwa ge sego yan ja sok ge dunin̰a zì.
62004004	Kaɗɗa ge ḛ sḛ ma ɗe, mbi van ma, ḛ Dok nda ma ne, ḛ haa hal ge ne nda ma pagal. Ago On̰om ge kee tèmel no ge ḛ zì pool gḛḛ, waɗe on̰om ge kee muluk no ge nda ge dunin̰a ma pagal.
62004005	Num mbe ma no, àa ge dunin̰a ne ma ne, àa faa fare ge dunin̰a ne ma, a ge pe num ka̰a̰m ge dunin̰a ma za̰a̰ num no me.
62004006	Kaɗɗa ge nè sḛ ma ɗe, nè Dok nda ma ne. Ndu ge go na kuwa Dok kuwa, za̰a̰ nè za̰a̰. Ndu ge go na be ge Dok nee ne to, za̰a̰ nè to me. A ge ano mbe no ta, nè wa mbo vaa On̰om ge fareba mage on̰om ge hày buwal go.
62004007	Mbi kondore ge laa wanna ma, n̰a ne laa wa̰a̰ ta ge ta buwal zì. Ajo̰o̰ laa wanna mbo ge Dok ta ya, ndu ge diige ge ngay laa wanna na ka̰a̰m ta, a van ge Dok nee ne, kuwa Dok kuwa me.
62004008	Ndu ge ngay laa wanna ge na ka̰a̰m ta to, be kuwa Dok to gale, ndwa go Dok a laa wanna ne.
62004009	Ḛ kuwa go Dok ngay laa wanna ge na ne nè ta pe gyana de: Dok teme ya na van ge melaw ɗu kikiɗ ge dunin̰a zì, ndwa go nè see vin̰a ge kaɗ ge ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din, ge ne ta.
62004010	Ḛ kuwa go laa wanna, ne ma̰ kaŋ ne de: A be nè sḛ ma laa wa̰a̰ Dok ne to, ɗaŋɗe, a ne sḛ laa wa̰a̰ nè ne. Teme na van mbo ya hon tene swày no, ge kaŋ kee tuwaleya go ndwa pore nè sone ma.
62004011	Mbi kondore ge laa wanna ma, ajo̰o̰ go Dok laa wa̰a̰ ne mbe go ɗe, mbiya go nè sḛ ma waɗme, nè laa wan ta ge ta buwal zì.
62004012	Ndu a̰me ɗu be kuwa Dok ge na ndwa to baɗ. Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa nè laa wan ta ya ge ta buwal zì ɗe, Dok ge nè zì, ne laa wanna mbyaɗɗa tab ge nè zì me.
62004013	A ge ano mbe no ta, nè kuwa no go nè ɓanna dagre ge Dok, ge sego a ge nè zì: Ndwa go ho̰ nè na On̰om ge Harcal .
62004014	I sḛ ma kuwa ne ge i ndwa, a ge pe i kee sayda no go, Dok Ba teme na Van ya ge suwa pagal dinna ge ndu ge mon nda go.
62004015	Kaɗɗa ndu vin-na go Zeso ne Dok Van ne, Dok ɓanna dagre ge ne, ne sḛ me, a ɓanna dagre ge Dok.
62004016	Kaɗɗa ge nè sḛ ma ɗe, nè kuwa laa wanna ge Dok ngay ne no ge nè ta kuwa, nè ho fareba no me. Dok a laa wanna: Ndu ge ngay laa wanna ya, a ɓanna dagre ge Dok, Dok dagre ge ne me.
62004017	Ḛ kuwa go laa wanna ge Dok ne mbyaɗɗa tab ge nè zì ge ma̰ kaŋ pe de: A ndwa go, nè kaa be voo, ge dwam ge Dok mbo ɗege ya kun sariya go. Nè mbo kaɗ be voo ge dape de! Ndwa go nè mboya dinna ca ge mboya ge Zeso Krist ne suwa pagal go.
62004018	Kaɗɗa mo ge laa wanna ge Dok ne, voo a̰me ge mo zì to me. Ɗaŋɗe, laa wanna ge mbyaɗɗa tab yan voo zum ge mo zì. Ago voo kee ndu ge da̰a̰re mḛḛreya, ndu ge chiya voo kuwa tèmel ge mbyaɗɗa tab ge laa wanna kee no na zì to.
62004019	Kaɗɗa ge nè sḛ ma ɗe, nè ngay laa wanna ndwa go Dok sḛ laa ee pe wan nè wal ne.
62004020	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me jan na go: Mbi laa wa̰a̰ Dok wan, ɓyare na na̰ van to, a ndu ge hày ne. Kaɗɗa ne laa wan na na̰ van ge na kuwa ne ge na ndwa no go ya to, kee mà pe gyana, ne laa wa mbo wan Dok ge a kuwa ne ge ndwa to de.
62004021	Ḛ kuwa wa yuwaleya ge Dok ho̰ nè ne no: Ndu ge ne laa wa̰a̰ Dok, ɓyare go ne laa wa̰a̰ na na̰ van waɗme.
62005001	Ndu ge diige ge hoɗ fareba ya go Zeso ne Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne, Ndu ge Dok taa nee ne, a Dok van ne. Ndu ge ne laa wa̰a̰ Dok, ne laa wa̰a̰ ne Van wan waɗme.
62005002	Kaɗɗa nè laa wa̰a̰ Dok wan, nè ka mbo ge ne wa yuwaleya ma pagal, a ne ngay ne go nè laa wa̰a̰ Dok van ma wan me.
62005003	Ago laa wanna ge Dok ne, ɓyare go ndu mbo ge ne wa yuwaleya ma pagal. Wa yuwaleya ge ne ne mbe ma dṵṵl to,
62005004	ge dape, Dok van ge diige peɗ haa hal ge kaŋ ge dunin̰a ne ma pagal. Ago, vin̰a ge hon ndu pool ge halla, ge kaŋ ge dunin̰a ne ma pagal no: A hoɗ fareba ge nè ne ma.
62005005	A huɗi ne ge pool ge hal ge kaŋ ge dunin̰a ne ma pagal de? A be ndu ge ho fareba go Zeso ne Dok Van ne to de?
62005006	A ne sḛ Zeso Krist mbo ya ne nè ta, ge mam, ndwa go na baptem, ge swàm ndwa go na swày, be ge mam ɗeŋew to, ɗaŋɗe, ge mam mage swàm. A On̰om ge Harcal kee sayda mbe ne, ndwa go On̰om mbe sḛ fareba ne.
62005007	Ago kaŋ ge kee sayda ma go taa. [Ge pḭḭ zì yà: Dok ba, ndu ge àa tol ne Fare, On̰om ge Harcal me. Num ge taa mbe ma ɗu.]
62005008	On̰om, mam mage swàm. Num mbe ge taa ma kee sayda ge ɗu mbe, num wa dagre ɗu me.
62005009	Kaɗɗa go, nda duwana ma kee sayda ma go ɗoo, nè ame num no ɗe, ago sayda ge Dok ne waɗe ge nda duwana ma way ma ge ga̰a̰l ba. Sayda ge Dok ne mbe, a sayda ge kee no na Van pagal.
62005010	Ndu ge hoɗ fareba ge Dok Van ta, a ge sayda mbe no na dul wa zì. Ɗaŋɗe, ndu ge hoɗ fareba ge fare ge Dok jin̰a ne pagal to, haa ne ndu ge hày, ge dape, be hoɗ fareba ge sayda ge Dok kee na Van pagal go to me.
62005011	Ḛ kuwa kaŋ ge Dok kee sayda ne pagal no: Ho̰ nè ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din, nè seɗ ndwa mbe sḛ ge ne Van ta.
