62005012	Ndu ge ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Dok Van, a ge ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din, ndu ge ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge ne to, seɗ ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din mbe to me.
62005013	Mbi njaŋe ḛ lawayta mbe ndwa go ḛ kuwa go, ḛ ge ho fareba ge Dok Van ta ma ge ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din.
62005014	Ḛ kuwa, nè ge hoɗ fareba tyatyaɗ ge Dok ta go go, a̰me ge nè kaɗe ne ne ya, ge laa ɓyareya ge ne ne pagal, ne sḛ za̰a̰ nè za̰a̰.
62005015	Kaɗɗa nè ge kuwaya go ne za̰a̰ nè za̰a̰, ge kaŋ ge diige ge nè ele ne num ma pe, nè kuwa tyatyaɗ waɗme go, nè seɗ kaŋ ge nè ele mbe ma ya seɗ zoo.
62005016	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me kuwa na na̰ van ya kee sone a̰me ge gene ne mbo swày zì to, ɓyare go ne kaɗe ge ne pe, ge ano mbe no ta, Dok mbo hon ne ndwa. Fare ge mbi jan no, a ge num ge kee sone ge gene num mbo swày zì to ma pe. Ago sone ge gene nda mbo banna zì, a be ge sone mbe sḛ pe, mbi jan no go àa kee kaɗeya ge ne pe to.
62005017	Kaŋ keeya ge na vin̰a go to ge diige pe peɗ, a sone ne, ɗaŋɗe, a be sone keeya ma peɗ gene nda mbo swày ne to.
62005018	Nè ge kuwaya go ndu ge diige peɗ ge ndil tene go na Dok van ne, daa gwan kee sone to. Ago Dok Van koy nee ne, ba ge zwam be pool ge ne pagal me.
62005019	Nè ge kuwaya go nè Dok van ma ne, dunin̰a ge na ɓul mɔɗwag mḛḛ ge pool ge ba ge zwam ne pe se.
62005020	Nè ge kuwaya waɗme go, Dok Van mbô ya, ne ho̰ nè zwam ge tin̰a nè ndwa kuwa Dok ge fareba no. Nè ɓanna dagre ge Dok ge fareba mbe, ge ne Van Zeso Krist pe. A ne sḛ ne Dok ge fareba, kaɗ ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din me.
62005021	Mbi van ma, ḛ koy ta kwaɗa ge mbo siim ma wa go.
63001001	A mbi, ndu ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme tèmel ge ɓase ge Krist ne ma buwal zige njaŋe lawayta ne, hon Gwale ge Dok taa ne tal mage na van ma, num ge mbi laa wa̰a̰ num no fareba ma. Mbi laa be wan ḛ ne ɗeŋew to, ɗaŋɗe, nda ge pagal tin̰a no ge Fareba pagal ma peɗ me.
63001002	I laa wa̰a̰ ḛ ge fareba eeya ge ee vum ya nè zì mage gaaya ge gaa ya no nè buwal zì ge ndwa ɗiŋ ge din pe.
63001003	N̰a Dok ge nè Ba mage Zeso Krist ge ne Van, num ngay kwaɗa keeya mage kuwa a̰se ge maa way nè ta, num pore nè mage hon nè halas, ndwa go nè kaa ge fareba mage laa wanna zì me.
63001004	Mbi kee laa saal gḛḛ, ge seɗɗa ge mbi see go, mo van a̰me ma mbo go ge fare ge fareba pagal, ge mojo̰o̰ nè Ba ho̰ nè na wa yuwaleya ge ne pagal go go pe.
63001005	Gwale, kuwa ge sego, kaŋ ge mbi ele ne ge mo ta, ge a njaŋe no lawayta zì go: Nè laa wa̰a̰ ta ta buwal zì mbe no, ne be wa yuwaleya ge jin̰al ne to. Ɗaŋɗe, a ne ge nè see ne ge pe dolla ya day mbe ne.
63001006	Laa wanna ɓyare mboya ge wa yuwaleya ge Dok ne ma pagal. Ano, a eeya ge mbiya ḛ mbo ge ne pagal ne, ge mojo̰o̰ ḛ sḛ ma ame ne ge pe dolla ya day go.
63001007	Nda ge hon hateya ge maa vin̰a go to ma waɗe ja pool ge dunin̰a zì, àa vin go Zeso Krist ne seŋe ndu duwana fareba to. A ge dwaɗɗa ge num way mbe ma ta, nda ge hon hateya ge maa vin̰a go to mbe, ge no ho̰o̰l ge Krist ma kee ta kuwaya no.
63001008	Ḛ koy ta kwaɗa, ndwa go ne kaa ge ḛ ba̰a̰ kaŋ ge nè see num ge tèmel keeya ge nè ne ma ta ma to, ɗaŋɗe, ḛ see vare zoo poɗɗa ge mbyaɗɗa tab.
63001009	Ndu ge diige, ge mbo ge hateya ge àa hon ge Zeso Krist pagal ma pagal to, ge hee vin̰a ge ɗogle, ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Dok to. Ndu ge mbo ge hateya mbe ma pagal, ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Ba mage Van jwàg.
63001010	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me mbo ja ḛ ta, hon ḛ hateya ge ɗogle ɗe, ḛ ame ne ge ḛ zok ma diŋ to, ḛ sa̰a̰ ne wa to me.
63001011	Ago, ndu ge san ne wa ya ɗe, a ge mojo̰o̰ a ge ne wa ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge ne kaŋ keeya ge sone mbe ma zì go.
63001012	Mbi sḛ go ge fare ma gḛḛ, ge mbiya mbi jan ḛ num ma, ɗaŋɗe, mbi ɓyare njaŋe ḛ num ge lawayta mbe zì peɗ to. Mbi jobreya ge mbo ḛ ta yà go, ndwa go ne faa ta fare mbe ma ta wa ma zì, laa saal ge nè ne ma wa huy tab.
63001013	Mo Na̰ van ge gwale ge kwaɗa, ge Dok taa ne tal mbe, ne van ma sa̰a̰ mo wa waɗme.
64001001	A mbi, ndu ga̰a̰l ge ɗeme tèmel ge ɓase ge Krist ne ma buwal zige njaŋe lawayta ne hon Gayus ge mbi laa wa̰a̰ ne wanna ge fareba.
64001002	Mbi kondore ge mbi laa wa̰a̰ ne gḛḛ, mbi ɓyareya go mo za zḛḛ kaŋ ma zì peɗ. Mo duul kaa mo ta kwaɗa dinna ge mo sḛ no ge on̰om ge kwaɗa go.
64001003	Mbi kê laa saal gḛḛ, sok ge na̰ van a̰me ma dee ya ge mbi ta, àa kê mbi kuwaya no go mo mḛḛ go pool ndindiŋ, mo mbo go mboya ge fareba.
64001004	A̰me ge gwan kee mbi laa saal gḛḛ waɗeya daa to, ge za̰a̰ya ge mbi kaɗ za̰a̰ya go, mbi van ma mbo go ge fare ge fareba pagal.
64001005	Mbi kondore ge laa wanna, mo ndu ge n̰a wa to ne, ge kaŋ keeya ge mo kee num ma, ge na̰ van ma pe peɗ, koo na̰ van ge gɔswal ma, mo ḭḭ tene ge num ne.
64001006	Àa num mbô ya kee sayda ge laa wanna ge amo mbe ne, ge ɓase ge Krist ne mbe ge kwate no ma ta. Mbi kaɗe mo kaɗe, mba num ge gɔswal mboya ge num way zì, ge mojo̰o̰ Dok ɓyare go.
64001007	Ago, àa an go ge dḭḭl ge Krist ne pe, a ge pe, àa ame a̰me ge num ge kuwa Dok ge fareba to ma tok go to no.
64001008	Mbiya go, nè mbaa nda ge go mbe ma no, ndwa ngayya go nè ɓanna dagre ge num ge tèmel keeya ge num way, ge oy Fare ge fareba mbe zì.
64001009	Mbi njaŋe lawayta van a̰me dee yà ɗegteg hon ɓase ge Krist ne ge kwate no, ḛ ta yà ma, ɗaŋɗe, Diyotref ge ne laa wa̰a̰ kaɗ nda vuwa̰ zḛḛ gḛḛ, vin i fare go na sḛ zì to.
64001010	A ge pe no, sok ge mbi mbo mbo ya yà, mbi mbo wan ḛ ne kaŋ keeya ge sone mbe ma zum. Ka jan fare ge sone kakatag mage kun hày ma ge i pagal. A kee num no peɗ puy ɗe, be mbyaɗ ne to, gwan ame na̰ van ma to me no, ka mḛḛre nda ge ɓyare ame num ma go, kaɗɗa num kee ne ya, na yan num ge ɓase ge Krist ne ge kwate no ma buwal zì me.
64001011	Mbi kondore ge laa wanna, bole kaŋ keeya ge sone ma to, ɗaŋɗe, bole kaŋ keeya ge kwaɗa ma. Ndu ge kee kaŋ keeya ge kwaɗa ma, a ndu ge Dok nee ne, ndu ge kee kaŋ keeya ge sone ma kuwa Dok to.
64001012	Kaɗɗa ge Demetriyus ɗe, nda peɗ kee sayda ge kwaɗa ne pagal. Mboya ge ne ne, ge Fareba pagal ngay go ne kwaɗa. I sḛ ma waɗme, i kee sayda mbe go ge ne pagal, ge mojo̰o̰ mo kuwa no go, i sayda ma sayda ge fareba ma ne.
64001013	Mbi sḛ go ge fare ma gḛḛ, ge mbiya mbi jan mo num ma, ɗaŋɗe, mbi ɓyare faa mo num ge lawayta mbe zì peɗ to.
64001014	Mbi jobreya ge mbo mo ta yà go ge sego, nè mbo kaɗ ta ta ndwa zì siɗigi ta num.
64001015	Mbi kaɗeya go halas ge Dok ne, ne kaa ge mo pagal. Nè kondore ge go go ma sa̰a̰ mo wa gḛḛ. Sa̰a̰ nè kondore ge yà go ge ma wa ɗu ɗu peɗ waɗme.
65001001	A mbi Jude ge Jak na̰ van, ndu ge tèmel ge Zeso Krist ne me, mbi njaŋe lawayta no ne hon nda ge Dok ge nè Ba too num ya ma. Ne laa wa̰a̰ num ne, doo na ndwa num pagal no ge Zeso Krist pe.
65001002	N̰a Dok ge nè Ba, ne ngay kuwa a̰se mage laa wanna ge na ne ge ḛ ta gḛḛ ceɗeɗ, ne ho̰ ḛ halas me.
65001003	Na̰ van ge laa wanna ma, mbi kaa ge ene gḛḛ, njaŋe ḛ lawayta no, tyan ḛ pagal gezi ge monna ge nè dee ya ne zì mɔɗwag mbe pagal. Mbi vḭḭ tene no, ne ngaɗ go mbi njaŋe ḛ lawayta mbe, ndwa hon ḛ pool ge mbal twam, mḛḛya ndiŋ ge fare ge ḛ ho fareba num pagal ma zì, ne mbe ge Dok ɓin̰a ne ya ge nda ge ho fareba na ta ma zì, ndwa ɗu kikiɗ.
65001004	Ago, nda a̰me ge sone ge maktub fâ num fare ge zḛḛ ya day go sariya wa̰a̰ num wan ma waɗ ja ge ḛ buwal zì. Àa num mbe ge tɔcwage kaŋ ge harcal ge maa ko zì ma, sok ɗuuli fare ge kwaɗa keeya ge Dok ne pagal se go. Sok kee ano mbe ma no go, àa kuri gezi Zeso Krist, nè Ndu ge zok ge melaw ɗu kikiɗ, kaɗ nè Bagezok me.
65001005	Ajo̰o̰ ḛ kuwa fare ge mbi ɓyare janna ma kuwa kwaɗa hetel puy ɗe, ɓyare mbi gwan dwaɗ ḛ pagal, pe gyana ge Bagezok Dok mo̰o̰ ɓase ge Izrayel ne ma, ge suwa ge Ejypt ne ya de? Guwa̰, pû num ge kuri be hoɗ fareba ma gezi no me.
65001006	Ḛ duwa ge fare cemeya ge malayka a̰me ma way pagal gale: Àa be za̰a̰ tii ge pool ge maa no ge num ma to, ɗaŋɗe, àa suwa sok kàɗɗa ge maa way ge sasag-ga no. Ge ano mbe no pe, Dok fee num no kakaŋ ge zul ge tugul ga̰a̰l ge tṵṵ ɗeɗeg se yà ge ndwa no, da̰a̰re dwam kun sariya ge ga̰a̰l.
65001007	Ḛ duwa ge kaŋ keeya ge nda ge suwal ga̰a̰l Sodom mage Gomor ɓanna ge suwal ga̰a̰l ge num ziya guguwa ma way ma gale. Àa ka̰a̰ ta mbe go ca, ge kaŋ keeya ge batraŋ mage ene sḛ duul ge be na vin̰a go to ma zì. Dṵṵl ge num pagal go ge, ge ol ge ɗiŋ ge din zige mbe, a kaŋ ngayya ne ge nda ta peɗ.
65001008	Nda mbe ge dee ya ḛ buwal zì ma waɗme, num kaŋ keeya ma mbe go ca. Àa kee kin̰a ge ee maa kee kaŋ keeya ge sḛ duul go, ge haɗ maa seŋre ma, ee maa kuri muluk ge Bagezok kee ne maa pagal gezi, ee maa jan fare ge sone kakatag ge kaŋ dolla ge pateya ge pḭḭ zige ma pagal me.
65001009	Koo ga̰a̰l ge malayka ma way Mikayel sḛ puy, sok kee gool ge duul swày ge Moyiz ne pagal ge Ba ge ho̰o̰l go, be jegre ɗiŋ mbo jan ne fare ge sone kakatag to. Ɗaŋɗe, jin̰a guwa go: Ɓyare go Bagezok mḛḛre mo.
65001010	Kaɗɗa ge nda mbe ma ɗe, àa jan go fare ge sone kakatag, ge kaŋ ge maa wan num pe to ma pagal. Àa kee fare ge waɗ-ɗa maa pagal zì ma dinna ge kaŋ kogor ma boo go. Sok kee go mbe go, àa gene ta mbo banna zì.
65001011	Woo ge num way, ago àa kàre go Kayḛ ko pul. Àa n̰aame go n̰aame ge Balam go, sok yan bware pe go. Àa pû gezi ge dape, àa ɗege digi ge ho̰o̰l ge Dok ge mojo̰o̰ Kore ɗege go.
65001012	Nda mbe ge waɗ ja ḛ buwal zì ma seŋe ḛ baan zamma ya kaŋ daŋso. Àa dwaɗ ge ta ɗeŋew, àa ka an̰n̰a sok njoɗ kaŋ ge bandal mage zam kaŋ zam ge be wan ta me. Àa dḭḭ sḭḭ ge pḭḭ ge be mam ma, ge sa̰a̰m in num lee gene me-lee gene me ma go. Àa kaɗ ge ɔwara ge waɗ somo̰ zum-ma be ndwa tolla ma go, sok ge àa ndage digi ge maa tòo ma ɗereɗ go, àa suu yà suu ge ndwa fafa.
65001013	Àa ngay kaŋ keeya ge maa way ge daŋso mbe ma kɔn̰al go, ge mojo̰o̰ sḭ̀ḭl ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam ne ndaa hore ya wa kal digi go. Àa ge mojo̰o̰ gùwa̰ ge chiya batraŋ ma go. Tṵṵ ge ɗeɗeg sok kàɗɗa ge num way ge ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din, ge Dok ee ge num pe ne.
65001014	Enok, doŋ pe ge ɓỳala ne ge nè baŋ Adam ta ya, jin̰a ka̰a̰l ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma way ge zḛḛ ya day ge num pagal no go: Ḛ za̰a̰ gale, Bagezok mbo mbo ya dagre ge na malayka ge harcal ma, bub mage bub ma,
65001015	ndwa ee num kun sariya ge nda pagal peɗ. Àa mbo ee nda ge kee sone ma kuwa maa kaŋ keeya ge maa kê ge sone mage fare janna ge num mbe ge tɔcwage kaŋ ge harcal maa ko se ma way, sok jan fare ɔswar ma go ge ne pagal ma me.
65001016	Àa nda ge fare a̰me huri num to ma ne, àa kaɗ ge sun ta dwam ma zì mɔɗwag. Àa mbo ge laa ɓyareya ge maa way ma pagal. Num wa ɗebce fare janna ge kwaɗa ma, lase nda go num vḭḭ maa pe.
65001017	Na̰ van ge laa wanna ma, kaɗɗa ge ḛ ɗe, ḛ duwa ge fare janna ge nda ge temeya ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist ne ma jin̰a ḛ num ge zḛḛ ya day ma.
65001018	Àa ka jan ḛ go: Ge dwam pe aaya ma go, nda ge coɗ sok ma mbo ka mbo mboya ge sone, ge fare ge maa dul wa ma ngay maa ma pagal, sok sen fare ge Dok ne go.
65001019	Na! Àa num mbe ma ɗaŋ, àa num gene caɗeya ya ne ge nda ge Krist ne ma buwal zì. Àa mbo mboya ge sḛ duul pagal go ge, àa be On̰om ge Harcal ge maa zì.
65001020	Ɗaŋɗe, ḛ sḛ ma ge ḛ pagal, na̰ van ge laa wanna ma, ḛ ho̰ ta pool zam-ma zḛḛ ge fare ge ḛ fareba hoɗɗa ge harcal doo no ge ne pagal go zì. On̰om ge Harcal ho̰ ḛ pool ge kee kaɗeya ɗaɗag me.
65001021	Ḛ wan ta ge laa wanna ge Dok ne zì, sok da̰a̰reya go nè Bagezok Zeso Krist hon nè ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din, ge kuwa a̰se ge na ne pe.
65001022	Nda ge no ge tumriya maa dul wa zì ma, ḛ kuwa num a̰se me,
65001023	àa mbo go ol, ḛ mo̰o̰ num. Ge ɗogle ma me ɗe, ḛ kuwa num a̰se, ḛ in̰a ta nde ge num ta. Koo num ba̰a̰ kanna ma, ḛ ee ḛ tok num ta to ge dape àa haɗ num ya seŋre ge maa kaŋ keeya ge sḛ duul ne ma.
65001024	Nè kee mersi hon Dok ge mbiya cage ḛ go ḛ dee sone zì to, ge wa ee ḛ deɗ-ɗa be fwaɗɗa, ge na ndwa se, ge pateya ge na ne zì, ge laa saal fafan̰.
65001025	Ne Dok ɗu, Ba ge mo̰o̰ nè ge nè Bagezok Zeso Krist ta. Pateya, ga̰a̰l ge waɗe-waɗe, pool ge ɓaŋlaŋ, pool ge kee muluk ne ne ma ne, ge pe dolla ya day ɗiŋ mà no, ge ndwa ɗiŋ ge din me. Amin .
66001001	Ano a kaŋ ge ɗimil zì ge din̰a ya zum, ge Dok ho̰ Zeso Krist vin̰a, ndwa tyan na nda ge tèmel ma pagal gezi ma ne, ge kaŋ ge gaa guwa mbo keeya ma pe. Go mbe no, Krist teme na malayka ya ngay na ndu ge tèmel Yohana num no.
66001002	Ne sḛ Yohana ngay nda no go, kaŋ ge na kuwa num ma mɔɗwag, num fare ge Dok ne ma ne fareba, num sayda ge Zeso Krist ne ma ne me.
66001003	Ndu ge isi maktub ge Dok ne mbe mage num ge za̰a̰ fare janna mbe ge ndage no ge Dok wa zì ma, àa ka mboya ge num pagal ma ge laa saal. Ago, sok ge kaŋ mbe ma deɗ-ɗa keeya gaa guwa.
66001004	A mbi Yohana teme lawayta ne, hon ɓase ge Krist ne ge pe ɓỳala, ge no ge suwa ge Azi ne go ma. N̰a Dok ge dee no ya din, ge no ɗiŋ mà, ge mbo no ya mage na on̰om ge ɓỳala, ge no ne hòol muluk ndwa se ma, num ngay kwaɗa keeya ge maa way ge ḛ ta, num ee ḛ kàɗɗa halas ge ta me.
66001005	N̰a num mbo ge Zeso Krist ta ya waɗme, Ba ge sayda ge fareba, ne ge n̰a wa to, van ge zḛḛge ge ta̰a̰ ge nda ge swày ma buwal zì, ga̰a̰l ge no gan ga̰a̰l ge suwa pagal go ge ma pagal digi. Ne laa wa̰a̰ nè wan, zû nè ge nè sone ma zì no, ge swàm ge na ne.
66001006	Seŋe nè ya nda ge kee muluk ge na dagre ma, nda ge kee tuwaleya ge na ba Dok ne ma. Pateya mage pool ne ne ma ne, zaman mage zaman ma. Amin !
66001007	Ḛ kuwa gale, Krist mbo mbo ya ge pḭḭ ma zì. Ndu ge diige mbo kuwa ne, koo num ge tṵṵ ne ma. Rusu ge suwa pagal ma peɗ, àa mbo fyal fiyaso ge yaga. Mbo kee mbe go, Amin !
66001008	Bagezok Dok ge no ya din, ge no ɗiŋ mà, ge mbo dee mbo ya, ne ge pool waɗe-waɗe kaŋ ma pagal peɗ jan go: Mbi Alfa, mbi kaɗ Omega .
66001009	A mbi Yohana ge ḛ na̰ van, ḛ kon ge tèmel, ge za̰a̰ yal no ge ḛ dagre ge muluk ge ɗu zì, ge wa̰a̰ tene deŋel no go, ge ɓanna ge nè ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge Zeso Krist pe ne. Mbi kaa daŋay ge til ge àa tol ne Paɗmos zì, ge fare ge Dok ne ge mbi oy pe, ge sayda ge mbi kee Zeso pagal pe me.
66001010	A dwam ge Bagezok nee ne, On̰om ge Dok ne mbô ya hee mbi, mbi za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l a̰me ge ndaal ge mbi guwa̰, ge mojo̰o̰ burji vin go,
66001011	jan mbi go: Njaŋe kaŋ ge mo kuwa num mbe ma no, ge maktub zì, teme ne mbo hon ɓase ge Krist ne ge pe ɓỳala ma, ndwa go: Ge Efez, ge Smirn, ge Pergam, ge Tyatir, ge Sardes, ge Filadelfi mage Lawdise diŋ-ge ma .
66001012	Mbi seŋe tene se ndwa ndil ndu mbe ge jan mbi fare, mbi kale kuwa kaŋ ge ee lampe pe ge àa ɗeere num ge dinar ma ɓỳala gaw.
66001013	Mbi kuwa ndu a̰me ɗu, dinna ge Van ge Ndu ne go, mḛḛya ge kaŋ ee lampe pe mbe ma tuwal zì me. Ka̰a̰ ba̰a̰ ga̰a̰l, kaɗ ge hoo dinar vwalla ge na tuwal go me.
66001014	Ne pagal susu kaa saal taɗag dinna ge tame saal susu go, ge kakḭḭli sa̰a̰m go me. Ne ndwa pul ka ɗaabeya ge ol wa swala go.
66001015	Ne ko ma kaa ge fool kàal ge àa gale ɗeere ne jin̰al go, ne ka̰a̰l ka ngoreya dinna ge sḭ̀ḭl ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam ma way ma go.
66001016	Kaɗ ge gùwa̰ ma ɓỳala ge na tok matoson zì, kasagar ge ɗel zi, wa zɔbal cḛḛɗ ka ndage ge ne wa zì ya. Ne ndwa kaɗ dinna ge gyala ge mḛḛ pɔgwa deɗ se njinjil go.
66001017	Sok ge mbi kuwa Krist, mbi deɗ ge ne ndwa se ge mojo̰o̰ ndu ge suu suu go. Sok mbe go, ee na tok matoson ge mbi ta, jan mbi go: Chiya voo to! Mbi zḛḛ, mbi gwan kaɗ ge guwa̰ ge dwab yà me.
66001018	Mbi ndu ge wa̰a̰ ndwa no mbi tok go ne, mbi suu no. Ḛ kuwa gale, ge sego mbi ge ndwa ɗiŋ, zaman mage zaman ma go. Mbi ge lakle ge swày mage sok kàɗɗa ge nda ge swày ma way ge mbi tok go.
66001019	Njaŋe kaŋ ge mo kuwa num mbe ma no ɗaŋ, kaŋ ge kee no ge sego ma, ge mbo no ge num guwa̰ ya ma me.
66001020	Kaɗɗa ge gùwa̰ ge ɓỳala ge mo kuwa num ge mbi tok matoson zì mage kaŋ ee lampe pe ge dinar ge ɓỳala mbe ma me ɗe, num pe wanna no: Gùwa̰ ge ɓỳala ma malayka ge ɓỳala ge koy ɓase ge Krist ne ge pe ɓỳala ma ne, kaŋ ee lampe pe ge ɓỳala ma me ɗe, àa ɓase ge Krist ne ge pe ɓỳala mbe ma ne me.
66002001	Njaŋe lawayta hon malayka ge koy ɓase ge Krist ne ge suwal ga̰a̰l Efez diŋ-ge ma go: Fare janna ge ndu ge wa̰a̰ gùwa̰ ge ɓỳala ma, ge na tok matoson zì, ka an ge kaŋ ee lampe pe ge dinar ge ɓỳala ma buwal zì ne ma no:
66002002	Mbi kuwa kaŋ keeya ge ḛ ḛ ma kuwa, ḛ see haŋle ma, ḛ kaa deŋel no. Mbi ge kuwaya go, ḛ vin kaŋ keeya ge nda ge laa pisil ma way ma to. Ḛ kugi nda ge tol ta go maa nda ge temeya ma ne ma, zane no àa nda ge temeya ma ne to peɗ me. Ḛ see no go num nda ge hày ma ne.
66002003	Ḛ nda ge deŋel ma ne, ḛ za̰a̰ yal ge mbi dḭḭl pe, ḛ be kan ta se to.
66002004	Ɗaŋɗe, mbi laa vḛḛne ge ḛ ta, ge n̰aaya ge ḛ n̰a laa wanna ge ḛ ḛ ge wal-la gezi pe.
66002005	Ḛ duwa, a ge ma̰ sok-ga day ge ḛ dee de. Ḛ seŋe ta se, ḛ mbo ge kaŋ keeya ge ḛ ḛ ge wal ma pagal. Kaɗɗa go ḛ seŋe ta ja se to, mbi mbo ya, mbi hee ḛ kaŋ ee lampe pe ge na byalam go gezi.
66002006	Ano peɗ puy ɗe, ḛ kaŋ keeya ge kwaɗa no: Ago ḛ kuri kaŋ keeya ge nda ge no ɓan pagal ge Nikolayiɗ ma way zì ma gezi kuri babaɗ, ge mbi sḛ kuri num gezi no go waɗme.
66002007	Ndu ge no ge tɔgwa, n̰a ne za̰a̰ fare ge On̰om ge Harcal jan ɓase ge Krist ne ma num ma: Ndu ge mbo hal-la, mbi mbo hon ne ɔwara ge no paradis ge Dok ne zì yà, ge ee nda kaɗ ge ndwa zamma.
66002008	Njaŋe lawayta hon malayka ge koy ɓase ge Krist ne ge suwal ga̰a̰l Smirn diŋ-ge ma go: Fare janna ge ndu ge zḛḛge, gwan kaɗ guwa̰ ge dwab se yà, ne ge suu, gwan tan no ne ma no:
66002009	Mbi kuwa yal ge ḛ za̰a̰ ne kuwa, ḛ gwan kaɗ a̰se me, zane no ḛ gan njonjon̰. Mbi za̰a̰ fare janna ge sone kakatag ge num mbe ge tol ta go maa Yahuɗ ma ne, àa kaɗ Yahuɗ ma to peɗ ma way ma go, ɗaŋɗe, àa nda ge no zok kee kaɗeya ge Saytan ne zì ma ne.
66002010	Ḛ chiya yal ge da̰a̰re ḛ ma voo to. Ḛ kuwa go, Ba ge ho̰o̰l mbo ee ḛ ka̰a̰m a̰me ge ḛ buwal zige ma mbo daŋay, ndwa kugi ḛ, ḛ mbo kaɗ iigiya ma zì dwam wol. Ḛ wa̰a̰ ta deŋel ɗiŋ mbo swày, ḛ mbo seɗ poɗɗa ge mbi ta ndwa ge ɗiŋ ge din, ge mojo̰o̰ nda kubi balme ge ndu ge haa hal pagal go.
66002011	Ndu ge no ge tɔgwa, n̰a ne za̰a̰ fare ge On̰om ge Harcal jan ɓase ge Krist ne ma num ma: Ndu ge mbo hal-la, swày ge ndwa zi mbo seɗ pool ge ne pagal to baɗ.
66002012	Njaŋe lawayta hon malayka ge koy ɓase ge Krist ne ge suwal ga̰a̰l Pergam diŋ-ge ma go: Fare janna ge Ndu ge no ge kasagar ge ɗel zi, wa zwabal cḛḛɗ ne no:
66002013	Mbi kuwa sok ge ḛ kaa no go kuwa. Saytan kee muluk ge sok mbe go. Koo ge dwam ge àa hṵṵ Antipas, mbi ndu ge kee mbi sayda ge n̰a wa to, ge ḛ sok mbe ge Saytan kee muluk ne go mbe no peɗ puy ɗe, ḛ be swaɗ mbi to, ḛ be giɗ to me ge fareba hoɗɗa ge ḛ ḛ zì, ge ḛ ho mbi ta.
66002014	Ano puy ɗe, mbi laa vḛḛne ge ḛ ta, ge fare a̰me ma pagal: Ḛ go ge nda a̰me ma, ge ame hateya ge Balam ne ma: Hateya mbe ge ee Balag hul faɗe ge Izrayel van ma ko se, ndwa ee num zam duul ge kaŋ kogor ge àa hun num kee tuwaleya hon siim ma, ee num kee kaŋ ge batraŋ ma me.
66002015	Ḛ go ge nda a̰me ma iya, àa ho̰ ta hateya ge nda ge no ɓan pagal ge Nikolayiɗ ne zì ma way ma ta mɔɗwag.
66002016	O̰o̰ ḛ seŋe ta se, kaɗɗa go to, mbi mbo ya vun cab seɗ ḛ, mbi mbo mbal twam ge nda mbe ma, ge kasagar ge waɗ no ge mbi wa zì ya.
66002017	Ndu ge no ge tɔgwa, n̰a ne za̰a̰ fare ge On̰om ge Harcal jan ɓase ge Krist ne ma num ma: Ndu ge mbo hal-la, mbi mbo hon ne man ge ndu gale kuwa ne ɗu to. Mbi mbo hon ndu ge diige ɓoo saal ge dḭḭl a̰me ge jin̰al njaŋe no ge ne ta, ge ndu a̰me mbyaɗ kuwa ne to, ɗeŋew num ge seɗ ne ma.
66002018	Njaŋe lawayta hon malayka ge koy ɓase ge Krist ne ge suwal ga̰a̰l Tyatir diŋ-ge ma go: Fare janna ge Dok Van ne ma no, ne ge ndwa pul ɗaabe no ge ol wa swala go, ne ko ma kaɗ seeya ge fool kàal go:
66002019	Mbi kuwa kaŋ keeya ge ḛ ḛ ma kuwa, ḛ ge laa wanna, hoɗ fareba ge ḛ ḛ ma pool, ḛ nda ge mbaa ta ma ne, ḛ nda ge wan ta deŋel ma me. Ḛ tèmel keeya ge gwase ma waɗe ge wal ma waɗe.
66002020	Ɗaŋɗe, mbi laa vḛḛne ḛ ta go ge Jezabel pe. Kee tene go na gwale ge zwagre Dok wa ne, ḛ ka n̰a ne hon mbi nda ge tèmel ma hateya ge ee num kee batraŋ mage zam duul ge kaŋ kogor ge àa hun num kee tuwaleya hon siim ma way ma me.
66002021	Mbi n̰a ne dwam ma gale go ne seŋe tene ya se, ɗaŋɗe, ɓyare seŋe tene ya se ge na kaŋ keeya ge sone mbe ma go to.
66002022	Ḛ kuwa go, mbi mbo dol ne se, za̰a̰ yal daŋ pul, nda ge kee zina ge ne ma me. Àa mbo waɗ ge iigiya zì. Ɗeŋew go num seŋe ta ya se ge kaŋ keeya ge sone ge gwale mbe ee maa kee num ma go mbḛḛ.
66002023	Mbi mbo puu ne van ma gezi, go mbe no, ɓase ge Krist ne ma peɗ wa kuwa go, mbi, mbi ndu ge kuwa dwaɗɗa mage laa ɓyareya ge nda duwana ma way ma ne. Ago, mbi poɗ ndu ge diige ge kaŋ keeya ge ne ne ma pagal tem.
66002024	Kaɗɗa ḛ gegene ge no suwal ga̰a̰l Tyatir diŋ, ge vḭḭ hateya mbe ge sone ma to ma, ḛ ge wan kaŋ ge nda tol ne go: «Fare ɗimil ge Saytan ne» pe to ma, mbi sḛ jan ḛ go, mbi ee dṵṵl a̰me ge ɗogle daa ge ḛ pagal to.
66002025	Ɗeŋew go, kaŋ ge ḛ no go ge ne, ḛ fiŋli ḛ tok ne ta kaŋ-kaŋ, ɗiŋ dwam gwanna ge ambi ya.
66002026	Num ge mbo hal-la ma, àa ka kee laa ɓyareya ge ambi ma, ɗiŋ deɗ ge wa aaya yà, mbi mbo hon num vin̰a ge kee muluk ge rusu ge ɗogle ma pagal peɗ.
66002027	Àa mbo ka ɗeme rusu ge ɗogle mbe ma ge calaŋ walam ge pagal wargal, àa ɓaa num dinna ge nda ɓaa seɗe ge àa sḭḭ ne ge njiyal mboo boo go.
66002028	Ajo̰o̰ mbi see pool mbe ge mbi Ba tok go, mbi sḛ waɗme mbi mbo hon num gùwa̰ kɔn̰ sok.
66002029	Ndu ge no ge tɔgwa, n̰a ne za̰a̰ fare ge On̰om ge Harcal jan ɓase ge Krist ne ma num ma ɗaŋ!
66003001	Njaŋe lawayta hon malayka ge koy ɓase ge Krist ne ge suwal ga̰a̰l Sardes diŋ-ge ma go: Fare janna ge ndu ge wa̰a̰ on̰om ge ɓỳala ge Dok ne mage gùwa̰ ge ɓỳala na tok go ne ma no: Mbi kuwa kaŋ keeya ge ḛ ḛ ma kuwa. Nda dwaɗ go, ḛ nda ge ndwa ma buwal zì, zane no ḛ suu suu.
66003002	Ḛ kore digi vun cab, ḛ ka̰a̰ ta se ge go ḛ wa mbo swày ge ndwa fafa to. Ago, mbi seɗ-ɗa go go, ḛ kaŋ keeya ma wan ndwa daa Dok ge ambi ndwa se to.
66003003	Ḛ duwa fare ge ḛ za̰a̰ num ma, ḛ kuwa go ḛ ame num pe gyana de. Ḛ guwa̰ ya num pagal, ḛ seŋe ta se me. Kaɗɗa ḛ kore ya digi to, mbi mbo gwan-na tan ḛ tugcug, dinna ge ndu ge chala go, be ge ḛ wan pe go mbi mbo mà ya ma̰ ler de to.
66003004	Go no puy, ge suwal ga̰a̰l Sardes diŋ ɗe, ḛ go ge nda a̰me ge àa fuwa maa ba̰a̰ ma to ma. Kaɗɗa ge num mbe ma no, àa mbo mbo dagre ge mbi, ge ba̰a̰ saal ma maa ta, ge dape àa mbiya kee mbe go.
66003005	Go mbe no, ndu ge mbo hal-la, mbi mbo kan ne ba̰a̰ saal ne ta, mbi mbo gul ne dḭḭl ge maktub ge nda ge see ndwa ge fareba ma dḭḭl njaŋe no ne zì to baɗ. Ge mbi Ba mage na malayka ma ndwa se yà, mbi mbo jan zum waŋ go num mbi nda ma ne.
66003006	Ndu ge no ge tɔgwa, n̰a ne za̰a̰ fare ge On̰om ge Harcal jan ɓase ge Krist ne ma num ma ɗaŋ!
66003007	Njaŋe lawayta hon malayka ge koy ɓase ge Krist ne ge suwal ga̰a̰l Filadelfi diŋ-ge ma go: Fare janna ge Ba ge Harcal, kaɗ Ba ge Fareba me, ne ge no ge lakle ge gan ga̰a̰l Daviɗ ne na tok go, kaɗɗa na hage zok wa ya, ndu a̰me ge mbyaɗ dibi ne to, kaɗɗa na dibi ne ya me ɗe, ndu a̰me ge mbyaɗ hage ne to, ne ma no:
66003008	Mbi kuwa kaŋ keeya ge ḛ ḛ ma kuwa. Mbi ge kuwaya go, ḛ pool gaa hoɗege, ano puy, ḛ mbo ya mbi eeya ma pagal day, ḛ be kuri mbi gezi to. Ḛ kuwa gale, mbi hage zok wa ya go ge ḛ ndwa zḛḛ, ndu a̰me ɗu ge mbyaɗ dibi ne daa to.
66003009	Ḛ za̰a̰ gale, mbi mbo ɓyan nda ge no zok kee kaɗeya ge Saytan ne zì mbe ge tol ta go maa Yahuɗ ma ne, àa kaɗ Yahuɗ ma to peɗ ma ḛ tok go, ge dape àa nda ge hày ma ne. Ḛ kuwa go mbi mbo ee num mbo ya guu maa ko ma ge ḛ ndwa se, ndwa ee num kuwaya go, mbi laa wa̰a̰ ḛ wan.
66003010	Pe heeya ma mbo deɗ ndu ge diige pagal, ndwa kugi nda duwana ge suwa pagal ma mɔɗwag. Ajo̰o̰ ḛ wa̰a̰ ta deŋel mboya fare ge ambi ma pagal ɗe, mbi sḛ waɗme, mbi mbo koy ḛ ge pe heeya mbe ma zì.
66003011	Mbi dwam gwanna ya gaa guwa. Kaŋ ge ḛ see mbe no, ḛ fiŋli ḛ tok kaŋ-kaŋ ge ne, ne kaa ge ndu a̰me harge poɗɗa ge ḛ ḛ ma ge no ge mojo̰o̰ balme go mbe to.
66003012	Ndu ge mbo hal-la, mbi mbo seŋe ne dinna ge kaŋ mbyale zok ge Dok ne tuwal digi go, a̰me ge gwan ndage ne gezi mbo kaɗ to baɗ. Mbi mbo njaŋe mbi Dok dḭḭl mage ne suwal ga̰a̰l dḭḭl, ndwa go Jerusalem ge jin̰al ge mbo no ge pḭḭ zì ya, ge Dok ta ya, ge ne ta. Mbi mbo njaŋe mbi dḭḭl ge jin̰al ne ta waɗme.
66003013	Ndu ge no ge tɔgwa, n̰a ne za̰a̰ fare ge On̰om ge Harcal jan ɓase ge Krist ne ma num ma ɗaŋ!
66003014	Njaŋe lawayta hon malayka ge koy ɓase ge Krist ne ge suwal ga̰a̰l Lawdise diŋ-ge ma go: Fare janna ge ndu ge àa tol ne Amin, ndu ge sayda ge n̰a wa to, ndu ge fareba, ne ge kaŋ dolla ge Dok ne ma peɗ mbô ge ne ta, ne ma no:
66003015	Mbi kuwa kaŋ keeya ge ḛ ḛ ma kuwa: Ḛ eyalam to me no, ḛ kaɗ ol to me. Ḛ ma̰ kaŋ ma pe ne, eyalam to me no, ol to me de!
66003016	Go mbe no, ajo̰o̰ ḛ eyalam to me no, ḛ kaɗ ol to me, ḛ ol susug boo ɗe, mbi mbo kuɗ ḛ ya gezi.
66003017	Ajo̰o̰ ḛ dwaɗ ḛ dul wa zì go: I gan njonjon̰, i ge kaŋ seɗɗa ma gḛḛ, be paa i zì ge ndu to, zane no ḛ wan pe go go, ḛ za̰a̰ go yal, ḛ tuguɗi, ḛ a̰se kakatag, ḛ ɓaal, ḛ kaɗ swala me to de!
66003018	Mbi yuwale ḛ go, ḛ yiya vare zoo dinar ge àa ɗiyage ne ge ol, ge mbi tok go, ndwa go ḛ seŋe nda ge kaŋ gan ge fareba ma. Ḛ yiya ba̰a̰ ge saal ma laa ḛ pe waɗme, ge go ḛ gaa swala ɗoo, daŋso wa̰a̰ ḛ to. Ḛ yiya jiyam kan ḛ ndwa zì me, ndwa go ḛ dee ya kuwa sok.
66003019	Kaɗɗa ge mbi, mbi yuwale mage mḛḛre num ge mbi laa wa̰a̰ num ma. Ḛ wa̰a̰ ta digi, ḛ seŋe ta ya se.
66003020	Ḛ kuwa go, mbi mḛḛ zok wa go, mbi dabe ne no. Kaɗɗa ndu za̰a̰ mbi ka̰a̰l ya, hage zok wa se ɗe, mbi mbo waɗ ge ne diŋ yà, i ge ne zam dagre.
66003021	Mbi, mbi haa, mbi mbo kaɗ dagre ge mbi Ba ge ne hòol muluk pagal no. Ago nda ge mbo hal-la ma, mbi mbo hon num vin̰a ge kaɗ ge mbi dagre, ge mbi hòol muluk pagal me.
66003022	Ndu ge no ge tɔgwa, n̰a ne za̰a̰ fare ge On̰om ge Harcal jan ɓase ge Krist ne ma num ma ɗaŋ!
66004001	Guwa̰, mbi Yohana, mbi sok ndil kaŋ mbe ma go, mbi kuwa kaŋ ge ɗogle ma iya. Mbi kuwa zok wa hageya ya gezi ge pḭḭ zì ya. Sok mbe go, mbi za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l ge ka faa mbi fare, dinna ge burji go mbe, jan mbi go: Ndee ya go go, mbi mbo ngay mo kaŋ ge mbo deɗ ja keeya ma.
66004002	On̰om ge Dok ne kale hee mbi pḭḭ zì yà gaw, sok mbe go mbi ndwa kan ge hòol muluk a̰me ta, ndu a̰me kàɗɗa ge ne pagal me.
66004003	Ndu mbe ge kaa hòol muluk pagal duul ka see ge njal sergeleŋ ge àa tol ne jaspe mage sarduwan go. Bakḭ on dok a̰me seeya ge njal ge àa tol ne emerod go, vee hòol muluk mbe se me.
66004004	Hòol muluk mbe veeya se ge hòol muluk ge ɗogle ma warzi pɔgwa ndà, ga̰a̰l ma warzi pɔgwa ndà me, kàɗɗa ge hòol mbe ma go, ge ba̰a̰ saal ma maa ta, ge balme ge dinar ma kubiya ge maa pagal me.
66004005	Mam seeya ma, kṵwa̰ mage mam ban̰n̰a ma ka ndage ge hòol muluk mbe pe se ya. Lampe ma ɓỳala ka sooya njunjulug ge hòol muluk mbe ndwa zḛḛ, àa on̰om ge Dok ne ge ɓỳala ma ne.
66004006	Ge hòol muluk mbe ndwa zḛḛ iya, a̰me kaɗ ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam go, ɗermel jargalag ge ndu kuwa sok ge digi ɗiŋ mbo se yà. Hòol muluk ge tuwal go ge mbe veeya se iya ge kaŋ ge kaa no ge ndwa a̰me ma ndà, ge ndwa fà̰a̰ ma pella maa ta, baŋan̰ yà me no, sḭḭl zḛḛ me.
66004007	Kaŋ dolla ge zḛḛge dḭḭ sòne. Ge zi dḭḭ ge nday van zlub go. Ge taa ndwa dḭḭ ndu duwana ndwa. Ge ndà ge mojo̰o̰ dòn̰ kaɗ ge sok ɗegeya go go.
66004008	Kaŋ ge kaa no ge ndwa mbe ge ndà ma, ge diige kaa ge gaŋ wa memenengal, ge ndwa fà̰a̰ ma pella ge maa ta, baŋan̰ yà me no, sḭḭl zḛḛ me. Ɗaal mage gyala, àa sok mbal kaŋ uware Dok go, be zaneya go: Ge Harcal, ge harcal, ge harcal, a Bagezok Dok ge pool waɗe-waɗe, Ne ge dee no ya din, ge no ɗiŋ mà, ge mbo no ya me!
66004009	Sok mbe go, kaŋ dolla mbe ma ka hee ga̰a̰l hon ndu ge kaa no hòol muluk pagal, ne mbe ge kaa no ge ndwa, zaman mage zaman ma, àa ka hon ne hormo, àa ka gwan ge mersi hon ne me.
66004010	Ɗaɗag ge kaŋ dolla mbe ge ndà ma kaɗ kee go mbe go, ga̰a̰l mbe ge warzi pɔgwa ndà ge vee hòol muluk se ma ka guu maa ko ge ndu ge kaa no ge hòol muluk pagal ndwa se, àa ka uware ne mbe ge kaa no zaman mage zaman ma, àa ka kan maa balme ma ge ne ndwa se, sok janna go:
66004011	Mo mbiya mbyaɗ, i Bagezok, mo kaɗ i Dok me, Nda hee ga̰a̰l hon mo, nda hon mo hormo, Nda jan go mo pool waɗe waɗe, Ndwa go mo sḛ kê kaŋ ma ne peɗ. Mo ɓyare ne dol num, a ge pe àa mḛḛ no.
66005001	Guwa̰, mbi Yohana, mbi kuwa maktub ge kaŋ njaŋe no ne ta lee ma jwàg, wa ɓyaleya se pe ɓỳala ge logom na ta. Maktub mbe kaa ge ndu ge kaa no ge hòol muluk pagal mbe tok matoson zì.
66005002	Mbi kuwa malayka ge no ge pool a̰me ɗu, ka oyya ge ka̰a̰l ndaal go: A huɗi mbiya ne hage sok ɓyaleya ge pe ɓỳala ge no ge logom maa ta ma ɗoo, wa mbo ben maktub mbe se de?
66005003	Ɗaŋɗe, ndu a̰me ɗu, ge pḭḭ zì yà, ge suwa pagal, koo suwa pe se yà, ge wa mbyaɗ ben ne se ɗoo, wa dol na ndwa ne pul zì to.
66005004	Mbi fyal, ge dape, àa be seɗ ndu a̰me ge mbiya ben maktub mbe se, wa dol na ndwa ne pul zì to.
66005005	Ɗu ge ga̰a̰l mbe ge warzi pɔgwa ndà ma buwal zige, jan mbi go: Fiya to. Kuwa gale, Sòne ge no ge vuwal pe ge Juda ne zì, ge gan ga̰a̰l Daviɗ Baŋ hal-la no. A ne sḛ mbiya ne hage sok ɓyaleya mbe ge pe ɓỳala ge no ge logom maa ta ma, wa ben maktub mbe se.
66005006	Mbi kuwa tame van mḛḛya digi ge hòol muluk mage kaŋ ge kaa no ge ndwa ge ndà ma tuwal zì, veeya se ge ga̰a̰l ge warzi pɔgwa ndà ma. A ge mojo̰o̰ àa vin̰a ne vyan go, kaɗ ge kḭḭ ma ɓỳala, ge ndwa fà̰a̰ ma ɓỳala me. Ndwa fa̰a̰ ge ɓỳala mbe ma on̰om ge Dok ne ge ɓỳala ge kee tèmel no suwa pagal ma ne.
66005007	Tame van mbo ya ame maktub ge ndu ge kaa no hòol muluk pagal tok zì.
66005008	Sok ge Tame van ame maktub mbe go, kaŋ ge kaa no ge ndwa ge ndà mage ga̰a̰l ge warzi pɔgwa ndà ma guu maa ko ge ne ndwa se. Ndu ge diige kaɗ ge biliŋ, seɗe dinar huyya ge ɔwara ge huu tii ma, kaɗeya ge nda ge àa mbege num gezi caɗ ge Dok pe ma way ma, ge na tok go me.
66005009	Àa ka mbal kaŋ mballa ge jin̰al go: Mo mbiya ne ame maktub mbe no, Mo wa hage ne sok ge ɓyale se ge logom maa ta ma wa digi. Ge dape àa vin̰a mo, Mo zû nda duwana ge vuwal pe ge diige zì ma no peɗ, Wa faaya ge pe hini-hini ma, Ɓase ge diige pe peɗ, Pe rusu ge diige pe peɗ, Ge mo swàm, mo gene num ya hon Dok no.
66005010	Mo seŋe num-ma nda ge kee muluk ge Dok dagre ma, Nda ge kee tuwaleya ge Dok ne ma, Ge dee mbo kee muluk ge suwa pagal ma me.
66005011	Mbi sok ndil kaŋ mbe ma go, mbi za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l ge malayka ge ndu mbyaɗ isi num to ma way. Àa vee hòol muluk, kaŋ dolla mage ga̰a̰l mbe ma se. Ɓase ge num way kaa dubu mage dubu, bub mage bub ma.
66005012	Àa ka oyya digi ge ka̰a̰l ndaal go: Tame van ge àa vin̰a ne mbe no, Mbiya ne seɗ pool ge waɗe-waɗe, Kaŋ gan, andaŋ, pool ge kee muluk, Hormo, pateya mage saleya me.
66005013	Mbi za̰a̰ kaŋ dolla ge diige ge no pḭḭ zì yà, suwa pagal, suwa pe se, ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam se, num peɗ ka janna go: Saleya, hormo, pateya, Pool ge kee muluk, a Ba ge kaa no hòol muluk pagal Mage Tame van ma way ma ne, zaman mage zaman ma!
66005014	Kaŋ ge kaa no ge ndwa mbe ge ndà ma ka vinna go: Amin ! Ga̰a̰l mbe ma ka guu maa ko se, àa ka uware ne mbe ge kaa no hòol muluk pagal mage Tame van me.
66006001	Guwa̰, mbi Yohana, mbi kuwa Tame van hage sok ge ɓyale se ge logom na ta, ge zḛḛge ge ɓỳala ma buwal zige digi. Mbi za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l ndaal, ge mojo̰o̰ mam ban̰ go, ge ɗu ge kaŋ ge kaa no ge ndwa ge ndà ma buwal zige janna go: Mbo ya!
66006002	Mbi sok ndil kaŋ mbe ma go, na! Tisi saal no gaw. Ndu ge ndâ ne, wa̰a̰ ɗeŋleŋta na tok go, àa hon ne balme me. A ndu ge haa hal ne, gwan mbo ɓyare halla pe iya.
66006003	Sok ge Tame van hage sok ge ɓyale se ge logom na ta ge zi digi, mbi za̰a̰ kaŋ dolla ge zi janna go: Mbo ya!
66006004	Sok mbe go, tisi ge ɗogle kàal ge ol wa swala go waɗ-ɗa zum. Ndu ge ndâ ne see pool ge gene halas ge ziya ya kaal ge suwa pagal, ndwa go nda duwana ma gaa ta ta hunna. Àa hon kasagar ge ga̰a̰l ne tok go.
66006005	Sok ge a hage sok ge ɓyale se ge logom na ta ge taa digi, mbi za̰a̰ kaŋ dolla ge taa janna go: Mbo ya! Na! Mbi ndwa kan ge tisi pisil gaw. Ndu ge ndâ ne wa̰a̰ kaŋ ngay kaŋ ge na tok go.
66006006	Mbi za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l dinna ge ndu duwana ka̰a̰l go, ge kaŋ ge kaa no ge ndwa ge ndà ma buwal zì ya, ka janna go: Bware ge tèmel dwam ɗu ne, gaa yaɗ geme kilo ɗu boo. Bware ge tèmel dwam ɗu ne, gaa yaɗ garta kilo taa boo. Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa ge nùm mage on̰or jìn̰al ɗe, kaa ge mo ee mo tok num ta to.
66006007	Sok ge Tame van mbe hage sok ge ɓyale se ge logom na ta ge ndà digi, mbi za̰a̰ kaŋ dolla ge ndà janna go: Mbo ya!
66006008	Na! Mbi ndwa kan ge tisi bolo a̰me. Ndu ge ndâ ne, ka tol tene swày bòo, gegene ge àa tol ne sok kàɗɗa ge nda ge swày ma way kaɗ ne guwa̰ gaw me. Àa hon num pool ge ɗu ge caɗeya pe ndà ge suwa ne pagal. Go mbe no, àa gaa hun nda duwana ma ge kasagar, ge camal baktar, ge mbɔgwam ma, ge kaŋ kavaar ge suwa pagal go ge ma ta me.
66006009	Sok ge hage sok ge ɓyale se ge logom na ta, ge nuwan̰ digi go, ge twal tuwaleya pe se ya, mbi ndwa kan ge nda ge àa hṵṵ num ge fare ge Dok ne mage num sayda ge àa ka keeya ge ne pagal ma pe me.
66006010	Nda mbe ma ka oyya digi ge ka̰a̰l ndaal go: Ba ge hateya ge harcal, ge fareba, dee ma̰ del, mo wa kee nda ge suwa pagal mbe ge ka̰a̰ i swàm se ma sariya ɗoo, mo wa mbo ee dṵṵl ge num pagal de?
66006011	Àa hon ndu ge diige ba̰a̰ ga̰a̰l ɗu ɗu saal taɗag ge ne ta. Àa jan num go, num wa̰a̰ ta kàɗɗa cɔgwaɗ ta nde gale, ɗiŋ ge go num na̰ van gegene mage num ka̰a̰m ge tèmel ge mbo seɗ swày ya ge num go ma dee ya mɔɗwag ne mbḛḛ.
66006012	Mbi sok ndil kaŋ mbe ma go, Tame van mbo ya hage sok ge ɓyale se ge logom na ta, ge menengal digi: Suwa mbo ya ndaɗ ndaɗɗa ge sone. Gyala mbo ya seŋe tṵṵ ɗiglim dinna ge ba̰a̰ kiimi go, saba ge ɓul mɔɗwag seŋe ge swàm go,
66006013	gùwa̰ ma deɗ-ɗa suwa se ge pḭḭ zì ya, dinna ge sa̰a̰m ge ga̰a̰l kabre fere ndwa ge gale zo̰o̰ to ma ge fere digi ya se go.
66006014	Pḭḭ mbo ya ban sok dinna ge maktub ge àa warge ne digi boo go. Njal mage til ma mbo ya fwaɗ sok, ge maa sok ge maa mḛḛ ma go.
66006015	Gan ga̰a̰l ge suwa pagal go ge ma, nda ga̰a̰l ge tèmel ma, ga̰a̰l ge asagar ma way ma, nda ge gan njonjon̰ ma, nda ge pool ma, nda peɗ, moor ma koo num ge suli ma chiya mbo way ta ge njal pṵṵl ma zì, ge gon̰ mage njal ma buwal zì me.
66006016	Àa ka jan njal mage gon̰ ma go: Ḛ guu ya i pagal se, ḛ way i ge ndu ge kaa no ge hòol muluk pagal ndwa zḛḛ, kaal ge laa hoɗɗa ge Tame van ne.
66006017	O̰o̰, dwam ge num laa hoɗɗa mbe mbyaɗ ja ɗaŋ, a dwam ge yaga ne, a huɗi ne ge wa mbo mḛḛ sok mbe go de?
66007001	Guwa̰ go iya, mbi Yohana, mbi kuwa malayka ma mḛḛya digi ndà ge suwa keŋ ge ndà ma go. Àa mḛḛ ndwa tele sa̰a̰m, ne daa kuwa suwa pagal, mam ga̰a̰l nuwam se, koo ge ɔwara a̰me pagal to me.
66007002	Mbi kuwa malayka ge ɗogle, ka mbo ge lee ge mbii-ge ya, wan kaŋ ge ee logom ge Dok ge hon nda ndwa ne ge na tok go. Oy malayka ge ndà ge àa ho̰ num vin̰a vḛḛne suwa mage mam ga̰a̰l nuwam gezi ma ge ka̰a̰l ndaal,
66007003	jan num go: Teg ge nè gale ee logom ge nè Dok nda ge tèmel ma sḭḭl go to ɗe, ḛ kaa ge be vḛḛne suwa, mam ga̰a̰l nuwam, koo ɔwara ma gezi to.
66007004	Ka̰a̰l deɗ-ɗa mbi tɔgwa zì, ge vuwal pe ge diige ge Izrayel van ma way go peɗ, nda ge àa ee logom num ta ma ɓase ge num way kaa nda dudubu kis ge ziya warndà pɔgwa ndà.
66007005	Ge vuwal pe ge Juda ne go, nda ge àa ee num logom ma dudubu wol pɔgwa zi. Ge vuwal pe ge Ruben ne ma dudubu wol pɔgwa zi. Ge vuwal pe ge Gaɗ ne ma dudubu wol pɔgwa zi.
66007006	Ge vuwal pe ge Azer ne ma dudubu wol pɔgwa zi. Ge vuwal pe ge Neftali ne ma dudubu wol pɔgwa zi. Ge vuwal pe ge Manase ne ma dudubu wol pɔgwa zi.
66007007	Ge vuwal pe ge Simeyo̰ ne ma dudubu wol pɔgwa zi. Ge vuwal pe ge Levi ne ma dudubu wol pɔgwa zi. Ge vuwal pe ge Isakar ne ma dudubu wol pɔgwa zi.
66007008	Ge vuwal pe ge Zabulon ne ma dudubu wol pɔgwa zi. Ge vuwal pe ge Jozef ne ma dudubu wol pɔgwa zi. Ge vuwal pe ge Benjamḛ ne ma dudubu wol pɔgwa zi me.
66007009	Ge ano mbe guwa̰, nà! Mbi ndwa gwan kan ge ɓase ge nɔnɔg, ge ndu mbyaɗ isi num to. Nda mbe ma ge pe rusu ge diige pe peɗ zì ya, vuwal pe ge diige pe peɗ zì ya, ɓase ge diige pe peɗ zì ya, wa ge diige pe peɗ ma zì ya me. Àa kaɗ mḛḛya ge ndu ge kaa no hòol muluk pagal mage Tame van ndwa se me. Àa kaɗ ge ba̰a̰ ga̰a̰l saal ma maa ta, ge kùɗi tok ma ge maa tok zì me.
66007010	Àa ka oyya digi ge ka̰a̰l ndaal go: Dok ge i i ge kaa no ge hòol muluk pagal mage Tame van mo̰o̰ i ne.
66007011	Malayka ma mɔɗwag vee hòol muluk, ga̰a̰l mage kaŋ ge ndwa ge ndà ma se. Àa guu maa ko hòol muluk mbe ndwa se, àa ka uware Dok me,
66007012	àa ka janna go: A fare ge fareba ne, saleya ma, pateya ma, andaŋ ma, mersi keeya ma, hormo ma, pool ge waɗe-waɗe ma, pool ge kee muluk ma Dok ge i i ne ma ne, zaman mage zaman ma! Amin .
66007013	Sok mbe go, ɗu ge ga̰a̰l mbe ma buwal zige ele mbi go: Num mbe ge ka̰a̰ ba̰a̰ ga̰a̰l saal ma no, àa huɗi ma ne, àa mbo ge dii ya de?
66007014	Mbi gwan ge ne janna go: Mbi Bagezok-goo, mo kuwa fare mbe ma mà ne me kaɗe. Gwan ge mbi janna go: Àa num ge mbô no ge yal njoɗɗa ge gḛḛ ma zì ya ma ne. Àa usi ma ba̰a̰ ga̰a̰l ma usi, àa haa num saal no taɗag ge swàm ge Tame van ne.
66007015	A ge pe, àa no ge hòol muluk ge Dok ne ndwa se no, ge ne Zok zì, àa kee ne tèmel ɗaal mage gyala no me. Ndu ge kaa no ge hòol muluk pagal mbo laa soŋon̰ ge num pagal.
66007016	Camal mbo daa gwan kee num to baɗ, mam njuwal mbo kee num to me. Gyala mbo gwan til num daa to baɗ, koo sa̰a̰m ge ol hug mbo kwal-la num ta to me.
66007017	Ago, Tame van ge no ge hòol muluk tuwal go mbo kaɗ num Ba ge koyya ne, mbo gene num ge mam ɓulla ge hon nda ndwa wa yà. Go mbe no, Dok mbo tigɗi miim ge num ndwa go gezi.
66008001	Tame van gwan hage sok ge ɓyale se ge logom na ta, ge ɓỳala wa digi, sok mbo ya eyal selel ge pḭḭ zì, guwa ge miniɗ tapool ɗu.
66008002	Mbi kuwa malayka ma mḛḛya ɓỳala ge Dok ndwa se, àa hon num burji ɓỳala me.
66008003	Malayka a̰me ge ɗogle ɗu, mbo ya mḛḛ twal tuwaleya ta guwa, wan ɗuli dinar ge àa til ɔwara ge huu tii ma ge ne, na tok go. Àa hon ne ɔwara ge huu tii ma gḛḛ-gḛḛ, ndwa go ne tii num, ɓanna ge kaɗeya ge nda ge àa mbege num gezi caɗ ge Dok pe ma way ma peɗ, ge twal tuwaleya ge dinar, ge no hòol muluk ndwa se pagal.
66008004	Ol swàm ge ɔwara ge huu tii ma way ndugi digi, ge malayka ge mḛḛ Dok ndwa se mbe tok zì, ɓanna ge kaɗeya ge nda ge mbege gezi caɗ ge Dok pe ma way ma me.
66008005	Malayka mbe hee ɗuli ge àa til ɔwara ge huu tii ma ge ne mbe, huy ne ge ol wa yaŋa ge twal tuwaleya pe zige, dol ne ya ge suwa pagal se. Sok mbe go gaw, a mam ban̰n̰a ne, a kṵwa̰ ne, a mam seeya ne, suwa ndaɗ me.
66008006	Guwa̰, malayka mbe ge ɓỳala ge àa no ge burji ɓỳala maa tok zì ma nuusi ta ndwa sun burji mbe ma.
66008007	Ge zḛḛge sun burji, tuwa ndaa mage ol jwàg, kirgiya ge swàm suwa ge digi ya ge suwa pagal. Ɗu ge caɗeya pe taa ge suwa ne mage ɗu ge vaaya pe taa ge ɔwara ge suwa pagal go ge ma way mbo ya til gezi, sugu tɔgwal mbo ya til gezi ge ɓul mɔɗwag me.
66008008	Malayka ge zi sun burji, a̰me fwage ge digi ya meg dinna ge njal ge zo̰o̰ keŋ-keŋ ge ol zì ya go, mbo deɗ ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam se yà. Ɗu ge caɗeya pe taa ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam ma way seŋe swàm.
66008009	Ɗu ge caɗeya pe taa ge kaŋ dolla ge on̰ no mam ga̰a̰l nuwam se ma suu gezi. Ɗu ge caɗeya pe taa ge faa ga̰a̰l ma way mbo ya vḛḛne gezi.
66008010	Malayka ge taa sun burji, gùwa̰ ga̰a̰l a̰me deɗ ge pḭḭ zì ya, ka sooya ge ol gil go. Gùwa̰ ga̰a̰l mbe deɗ ge ɗu ge caɗeya pe taa ge mangaɗam mage sin̰ale ma pagal me.
66008011	Gùwa̰ ga̰a̰l mbe dḭḭl Zwala. Ɗu ge caɗeya pe taa ge mam ma way mbe seŋe zwala babag. Nda gḛḛ ge ka njoɗ ne ma ka seɗ swày ge ne seŋeya ge seŋe zwala pe.
66008012	Malayka ge ndà sun burji, ɗu ge caɗeya pe taa ge gyala ne, ge saba ne, ge gùwa̰ ma way me, àa mbo ya haɗ tuguɗi. Num lee mbe ge ɗu ɗu ge taa buwal zige ma saa se tṵṵ ɗiglim. Gyala ban kɔn̰al ge na ne ɗu ge caɗeya taa buwal zì, ɗaal kee mbe go me.
66008013	Mbi Yohana, mbi sok ndil kaŋ mbe ma go, mbi kuwa dòn̰ ɗegeya ge pḭḭ pul kuɗi digi ya, ka janna ge ka̰a̰l ndaal go: Ano me ta, ano me ta, ano me ta, Malayka ge taa ma mà gwan sun burji ya gag ɗaa, kaɗ mà yal nde ge kaŋ dolla ge suwa pagal go ge ma pe tàa!
66009001	Guwa̰, malayka ge nuwan̰ sun burji. Mbi kuwa gùwa̰ chiyaya ge pḭḭ zì ya, mbo ya deɗ suwa pagal. A hon ne lakle ge tugul ga̰a̰l ge ɗugul heleg ne wa.
66009002	Hage tugul ga̰a̰l ge ɗugul heleg mbe wa gezi, ol swàm ndaa ge ne se ya, dinna ge ol swàm ge ol duwa̰ ne go, laa gyala zì, sa̰a̰m haɗ dṵṵl neneg.
66009003	Tere baktar ma ndaa ge ol swàm mbe zì ya, àa mbo bàa suwa pagal didib. Àa hon num pool ge nun nda dinna ca ge ndecege mbal nda go.
66009004	Àa hon num wa go num dabe sugu tɔgwal ge suwa pagal go ge to, num dabe kaŋ tɔgwal ge diige peɗ koo ɔwara ge diige peɗ to me, ɗaŋɗe, num seŋe ndwa ɗeŋew ge nda duwana ge no be logom ge Dok ne ge maa sḭḭl go ma ta.
66009005	Vin̰a be hon go num hṵṵ num hun to, ɗaŋɗe, num iigi num iigi saba nuwan̰. Iigiya ge num way mbe kaa dinna ge ndecege mbal ndu go.
66009006	Ge dwam mbe ma go dee ɗe, nda duwana ma mbo ɓyare swày, àa mbo seɗ ne to baɗ. Àa mbo ɓyare go swày hṵṵ maa, swày mbo chiya kaal ge num ta.
66009007	Tere baktar mbe ma kaa dinna ge tisi ge àa nuusi num jejew ge twam mballa pe ma go. Kaŋ a̰me ma kaɗ dinna ge balme dinar ma go kubiya ge num pagal ma digi, num ndwa ma din nda duwana ma ndwa ma me.
66009008	Num pagal susu ma kaɗ gwaɗeya sutug ge nda zaab pagal susu go. Num kin̰a ma kaɗ dinna ge sòne ma way ma go me.
66009009	Num kṵwa̰l ma kaɗ dinna ge goŋroŋ walam go, kṵwa̰ ge num gaŋ wa ma way kaɗ dinna ge kṵwa̰ ge pus ma way ge tisi ma zwal num twam zì go.
66009010	Num pasa̰a̰l ma kaɗ hehene ge ndecege ma pe pe go. Num pool ge kee nda duwana ma yal saba har nuwan̰, kaɗ num sa̰a̰l mbe ma zì me.
66009011	Ga̰a̰l ge tere baktar mbe ma way, a malayka ge kee muluk no ge tugul ga̰a̰l ge ɗugul heleg pagal. Ne dḭḭl wa Hebre go Abado̰, ge wa grek kaɗ Apoliyo̰ me.
66009012	Yal ge zḛḛge kale go, kuwa go yal ma mbo ge ano mbe no guwa̰ ya pe zi iya.
66009013	Malayka ge menengal sun burji, twal tuwaleya dinar ge ee no Dok ndwa se, kaŋ kḭḭ ge no ne keŋ ge ndà ma go, mbi za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l ndageya ge num pul zì ya.
66009014	Ka̰a̰l mbe jan malayka ge menengal mbe ge sṵṵ burji go: Saa malayka ge ndà ge àa vuwa num no ge mangaɗam ga̰a̰l Efraɗ wa go ma digi.
66009015	Malayka mbe ge ndà ma da̰a̰re go del mbe, saba mbe, dwam mbe, ler mbe ge ndwa hun nda duwana ma, ɗu ge caɗeya pe taa ge suwa pagal go ge gezi. Malayka mbe, guwa̰ ge za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l mbe go, mbo ya saa num digi.
66009016	Ka̰a̰l deɗ-ɗa mbi tɔgwa zì, ɓase ge nda ge mbal twam ge tisi ma way ka miliyo̰ kikis zi.
66009017	Ge kaŋ ɗimil ge din̰a mbi ndwa go mbe ma zì, mbi kuwa tisi mage maa ba ge ndâ maa ma. Àa kaɗ ge goŋroŋ kaal jḭḭ ge ol go, sel ɗirgilig, gorom me ge maa ta. Tisi mbe ma pagal kaɗ dinna ge sòne ma way ma go. Ol, ol swàm mage ɓoo ge ol bibiliw ka ndage ge num wa pul zì ya.
66009018	Ɗu ge vaaya pe taa ge nda duwana ma way mbo ya seɗ swày ge mbɔgwam ge taa mbe ma ta: Ol me no, ol swam me no, ɓoo ge ol bibiliw mbe ge ka waɗ ge num wa zì ya mbe me.
66009019	Ago pool ge tisi mbe ma way kaa ge num wa pul mage num sa̰a̰l ma zì. Num sa̰a̰l mbe ma kaa ge pagal ma maa ta dinna ge bwam ma way ma go. A ge num ta, àa kee nda duwana ma yal no.
66009020	Nda ge suu ge mbɔgwam mbe ge taa ma ndwa zì to ma puy, àa be vin seŋe ta ya se ge kaŋ keeya ge maa way mbe ma go to. Àa gwan ge guwa̰ to sok uware on̰om ge sone mage siim ge àa ɗeere num ge dinar, ge bware, ge walam kaal, ge àa ca num ge njal, ge ɔwara, num mbe ge mbyaɗ kuwa sok, za̰a̰ fare koo mbo vin̰a to ma go me.
66009021	Àa be seŋe ta ya se ge maa swày hunna mbe ma go, ge maa kaŋ keeya ge mbole ma go, ene sḛ duul ma zì ma go, ge chala keeya ge maa ka kee num ma go to me.
66010001	Guwa̰, mbi Yohana, mbi kuwa malayka ge pool a̰me ɗu kan na ko ge pḭḭ zì ya, pḭḭ ge laaya gutub kulbi ne se, ge nda kan ba̰a̰ go. Bakḭ on dok kaɗ ge ne pagal digi ge mojo̰o̰ balme go. Ne ndwa kaɗ dinna ge gyala go, ne ko ma kaɗ ge kaŋ mbyale zok ge ol zo̰o̰ ne go.
66010002	Kaɗ ge maktub van ge jiyale hageya se ge na tok go. Ee na ko matoson ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam pagal, ge magul ge suwa pagal me.
66010003	Oy digi ge ka̰a̰l ndaal dinna ge sòne pyan go. Guwa̰ ge oy go, mam ban̰ ndwa ɓỳala.
66010004	Guwa̰ ge mam ban̰n̰a ge ndwa ɓỳala ma way go, mbi ɓyare njaŋe a̰me, ɗaŋɗe, mbi za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l ge pḭḭ zì ya, jan mbi go: Koy fare mbe ge mo kuwa num ge mam ban̰n̰a ma pagal ma no, njaŋe num gale ɓaca.
66010005	Sok mbe go, malayka ge mbi kuwa ne mḛḛya ko lee ɗu mam ga̰a̰l nuwam pagal, ko lee ɗu suwa pagal mbe tare na tok matoson ge pḭḭ digi,
66010006	guni tene ge Ba ge no go zaman mage zaman ma dḭḭl, ne ge kê pḭḭ mage kaŋ ge no na pul zì ma, suwa mage kaŋ ge no na pagal ma, mam ga̰a̰l nuwam mage kaŋ ge no na pul se ma, jan go: Sok mbyaɗ-ɗa.
66010007	Ɗaŋɗe, dwam ge nda dee za̰a̰ malayka ge ɓỳala ya sun burji, sok mbe go, fare ɗimil ge Dok ne ma wa huy ne, dinna ge a wuwage na nda ge tèmel mage na nda ge zwagre na wa ma Fare ge Kwaɗa zḛḛ wal go.
66010008	Guwa̰, ka̰a̰l mbe ge mbi za̰a̰ ne daa faa mbi fare ge pḭḭ zì ya mbe gwan jan mbi go iya: Mbo, mo ame maktub van ge jiyale ge hage se mbe ge malayka ge mḛḛ no, ko lee ɗu mam ga̰a̰l nuwam pagal, ko lee ɗu suwa pagal me tok zì ya.
66010009	Mbi gwan tene ya malayka mbe ta zì guwa, mbi kaɗe ne go ne ho̰ mbi maktub van ge jiyale mbe. Ne sḛ gwan ge mbi janna go: Ame ne, mo uɗi ne. Mbo seŋe mo dul se yà zwala babag. Ɗaŋɗe, ge mo wa pul zì kaɗ tii dinna ge daram nùm go.
66010010	Mbi ame maktub van ge jiyale mbe ge malayka tok zì, mbi uɗi ne. Ge mbi wa pul zì kaɗ tii dinna ge daram nùm go. Ɗaŋɗe, sok ge mbi uɗi ne go, seŋe mbi dul se yà zwala babag.
66010011	Guwa̰, àa jan mbi go: Mbiya mo gwan zwagre fare ge Dok jin̰a ge ɓase ge gḛḛ-gḛḛ ma ta, ge maa rusu ma pe go, ge maa wa faaya ge pe hini-hini ma zì ɓanna ge maa gan ga̰a̰l ma.
66011001	Guwa̰, àa hon mbi tiya, dinna ge calaŋ van ge ngay sok go, àa jan mbi go: Ɗege digi, mo mbo ngay zok ge Dok ne mage twal tuwaleya, mo isi nda ge uware Dok no ne zì ma me.
66011002	Kaɗɗa ge zok ge Dok ne pul ge zum-ge ɗe, n̰a ne bàŋ, ngay ne to, ago, a ge rusu ge ɗogle ma pe: Àa mbo tɔcɔge suwal ga̰a̰l ge harcal maa ko zì ɗiŋ saba warndà pɔgwa zi.
66011003	Mbi mbo hon mbi nda ge sayda ma zi vin̰a, àa mbo zwagre Dok wa ge ba̰a̰ kiimi ge maa ta, ɗiŋ dwam dubu ɗu ge kikis zi ge ziya warmenengal.
66011004	Nda ge sayda ge zi mbe ma, àa ɔwara oliv ge zi mage kaŋ ee lampe pe ge zi, ge àa no Bagezok ge kee muluk suwa pagal go ge ndwa se ma ne.
66011005	Kaɗɗa go ndu ɓyare kee num yal ɗe, ol ndage ge num wa zì ya, til num nda mbe ge ho̰o̰l ma gezi. A fareba go, nda ge ɓyare kee num yal ma, seɗ swày mbe go.
66011006	Nda mbe ge sayda ma ge pool ge tele pḭḭ, dwam ge àa kaɗ zwagre Dok wa ma zì mɔɗwag go ne suwa mam ya se to. Àa ge pool ge seŋe mam ma swàm, àa kan mbɔgwam ge diige pe peɗ ya suwa pagal ge laa ɓyareya ge maa way pagal tem.
66011007	Sok ge àa mbo aa ya ge maa sayda keeya, kavaar ge ndee no ge tugul ga̰a̰l ge ɗugul heleg se ya, mbo mbal twam ge num, waɗe num pagal go, hun num gezi.
66011008	Num duul swày ma mbo gaa kanna ge sok ɓan pagal ge suwal ga̰a̰l ne go, suwal ga̰a̰l ge num Bagezok see pella ɔwara kaŋre ta digi ne go mbe. Suwal ga̰a̰l mbe dḭḭl ge ɗimil ma Sodom mage Ejypt.
66011009	Nda ge ɗege no ge ɓase ge diige ma buwal zì ya, ge rusu ge diige ma buwal zì ya, ge nda ge faa wa pe hini-hini ma buwal zì ya, ge vuwal pe ge diige ma ya peɗ ma mbo kuwa num duul swày ma ɗiŋ dwam taa ge ziya. Àa mbo vin go àa ee num duul swày ge tàal zì to.
66011010	Nda duwana ge suwa pagal go ge ma mbo kee laa saal, tii mbo hun num ge nda ge zwagre Dok wa mbe ge zi ma swày pe. Laa saal mbo ee num teme ta mbaaya ma ge ta buwal zì, ndwa go nda ge zwagre Dok wa mbe ge zi ma ho̰ maa yal gḛḛ ge maa fare ge Dok ne mbe.
66011011	Ɗaŋɗe, ge dwam ge taa ge ziya mbe ma guwa̰, Dok ɓyan on̰om ge hon nda ndwa ge fareba ya num zì, àa tan digi, voo ge ɓaŋlaŋ wan nda ge mḛḛ ndil num ma.
66011012	Nda ge zwagre Dok wa mbe ge zi ma za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l ge pool a̰me jan maa fare ge pḭḭ zì ya go: Ḛ ndee ya go go! Àa ndee mbo digi yà, ge pḭḭ ge laaya gutub zì, ge maa ka̰a̰m ge ho̰o̰l mbe ma ndwa go.
66011013	Ge sok mbe go, suwa ndaɗ ndaɗɗa ge sone. Ɗu ge wol buwal zì, ge vaaya ge suwal ga̰a̰l mbe ne burmi gezi, nda duwana ma dudubu ɓỳala mbo ya puu gezi me. Voo mbo ya wan nda ge gaa ge ndwa ma, ee num hon Dok ge kee muluk no ge pḭḭ zì yà hormo me.
66011014	Yal ge zi kale ya go. Ḛ kuwa go, ge taa gaa guwa.
66011015	Guwa̰, malayka ge ɓỳala sun burji. Ka̰a̰l a̰me ge ndaal ma ka suwa̰le ge pḭḭ zì ya, àa ka janna go: Muluk ge dunin̰a ne gwan ja ge nè Bagezok Dok mage Krist, Ndu ge na taa ne tok go. Àa gaa kee muluk ne zaman mage zaman ma.
66011016	Ga̰a̰l mbe ge warzi pɔgwa ndà mbe ge kaa no maa hòol muluk ma pagal, ge Dok ndwa se ma guu maa ko se, ndwa cɔgeya suwa pagal, àa ka uware Dok,
66011017	àa ka janna go: Bagezok Dok ge pool waɗe-waɗe, Mo ge dee no ya din, ge no ɗiŋ mà, I ke mo mersi. Ge pool ge amo ge waɗe-waɗe mbe ta, Mo kee muluk ya kaŋ ma pagal peɗ.
66011018	Pe rusu ge ɗogle ma laa hoo, Àa ɗege ge ho̰o̰l no, Ɗaŋɗe, laa hoɗɗa ge mo deɗ gale ja no, A sok ge go mo wa kun sariya nda ge swày ma pagal ne. Sok ge mo poɗ mo nda ge tèmel ge zwagre mo wa ma, Nda ge mbege gezi caɗ ge mo pe Mage nda ge chiya mo voo ma, Nda jabso, ge nda ga̰a̰l yin̰a ya gale ne. A sok ge mo burmi num ge vḛḛne dunin̰a ma ne me.
66011019	Sok mbe go, zok ge Dok ne wa ge pḭḭ zì ya hage gezi, sandu wa tii vwalla dyan-na zum kɔn̰al go. Pḭḭ ka seeya, ka̰a̰l ma ka faaya, mam ka ban̰n̰a, suwa ka ndaɗɗa, tuwa ndaa ka kabre ge digi me.
66012001	Guwa̰, kaŋ ngayya a̰me dyan-na zum ge pḭḭ digi: Gwale a̰me ɗu ne ba̰a̰ kanna gyala ne, ee na ko ma saba pagal, balme ge àa tii ne tiɗ ge gùwa̰ wol pɔgwa zi ne pagal digi me.
66012002	Kaa ge emel, yal ge twàl keeya ne ee ne poɗ luuluu me.
66012003	Kaŋ ngayya a̰me ge ɗogle dyan-na zum ge pḭḭ digi iya: Na! Drago̰ ga̰a̰l a̰me no, kaal jḭḭ ge ol go, kaɗ ge pagal ɓỳala, kḭḭ wol. Pagal mbe ge ɓỳala ma, ge diige kaɗ ge bul ɗu ɗu na digi waɗme.
66012004	Ne sa̰a̰l ka fete ɗu ge vaaya pe taa ge gùwa̰ ge pḭḭ zige ma, ka kan num ya suwa pagal se. Drago̰ mbe mḛḛ ge gwale ge gaa guwa ge tolla ndwa zì, ndwa go van mbe ma waɗ ja se, na wa kicigi ne.
66012005	Gwale mbe mbo ya tol van son, van ge mbo ɗeme pe rusu ma ya peɗ ge calaŋ walam ge pagal wargal. Sok ge too ya se, àa gene ne avun cab ge Dok ge kaa no na hòol muluk pagal ta yà me.
66012006	Kaɗɗa ge gwale mbe me ɗe, chiya mbo ndwa babur pul yà, sok a̰me ge Dok nuusi ne no ge ne pe, ndwa go àa ka wal ne ge ne go, ɗiŋ dwam dubu ɗu ge kikis zi ge ziya warmenengal.
66012007	Sok mbe go ɗe, twam ɗege ka mbal ge pḭḭ zì yà me. A Mikayel mage na malayka ma ka mbal twam ne ge Drago̰ mage na malayka ma.
66012008	Ɗaŋɗe, Drago̰ seɗ ko ge ɗuuya se to, àa ge na malayka ma seɗ vin̰a ge kaɗ ge pḭḭ zì yà daa to baɗ.
66012009	Àa fiyage Drago̰ ga̰a̰l ja zum, bwam ge dee teteg mbe ge àa ka tol ne Ba ge ho̰o̰l koo Saytan, ne ge n̰aame dunin̰a genjem. Àa fiyage num ge na malayka ma ja suwa pagal se.
66012010	Sok mbe go, mbi Yohana, mbi za̰a̰ ndu faaya ge ka̰a̰l ndaal ge pḭḭ zì ya, ka janna go: Na! Sok mon nda, pool ge ɓaŋlaŋ mage pool ge kee muluk ge nè Dok ne yan ja no! Ge sego, pool ge Krist, Krist, Ndu ge Dok taa ne tok go. Ago fiyage Ba ge ee fare ge nè na̰ van ma pagal ja zum, ne ge ee fare ge num pagal ge Dok ndwa se yà, ɗaal ge gyala mbe.
66012011	Ago, nè na̰ van mbe ma haa ne pagal ge swàm ge Tame van ne mage fare ge Dok ne ge maa ka oyya ta. Àa ndi kàɗɗa ge maa way ma ge a̰me pe to go, àa vḭḭ swày no.
66012012	Mbiya go pḭḭ mage num ge kaa no na pul digi ma kee laa saal! Ɗaŋɗe, a ma̰ yal ne ge suwa mage mam ga̰a̰l nuwam pe de! Ago, Ba ge ho̰o̰l kan na ko ja ge ḛ ta se, juliliya ge twam. Kuwa kuwa go sok daa ge na pe to.
66012013	Sok ge Drago̰ kuwa go àa fiyage na ja ge suwa pagal se, aa sok ma na pagal yan gwale mbe ge too van son pe.
66012014	Sok mbe go, gwale mbe seɗ gaŋ wa ge dòn̰ ga̰a̰l ne ma, ndwa ee ne ɗegeya ɗiŋ mbo babur pul yà, sok ge Dok nuusi ne no ge ne pe, àa wa ka wal ne del taa ge ziya, be bwam ndwa kuwa ne.
66012015	Bwam mbe mbal mam ge na wa zì ya ge gwale mbe pe yà, dinna ge mangaɗam go, ndwa go ne ɗigli gezi.
66012016	Ɗaŋɗe, suwa chiya gwale mbe kṵwa̰, ngon̰ tene gezi, uɗi mangaɗam mbe ge Drago̰ mbaa ne ge na wa zì ya mbe kacab.
66012017	Sok mbe go, Drago̰ laa hoɗ ge gwale mbe ta, seŋe na ndwa ne van ge gaa ma ta mbal twam ge num. Ne van ma num ge mbo ge wa yuwaleya ge Dok ne ma pagal mage kee sayda no ge Zeso pe ma me.
66012018	Guwa̰, Drago̰ mbe mbo ya mḛḛ ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam wa go.
66013001	Guwa̰, mbi Yohana, mbi kuwa kavaar a̰me ndeeya ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam se ya. Kaɗ ge pagal ma ɓỳala, kḭḭ wol. Dḭḭl ge sal Dok ma kaɗ njaŋeya ge ne pagal ge diige digi, ne kḭḭ ge diige me ɗe, kaɗ ge bul na digi me.
66013002	Kavaar ge mbi kuwa ne kaa dinna ca ge geler go, ne ko ma din lɔfɔgɔm ko ma, ne wa ge sòne ne go me. Drago̰ hon ne na pool ge waɗe, na hòol muluk mage pool ge kee muluk me.
66013003	Mbi kuwa ɗu ge ne pagal ma buwal zige ge jwaŋ born̰og ge na ta, ɗaŋɗe, ne jwaŋ ge mbiya gene ne mbo swày mbe wa zon digi. Dunin̰a ge ɓul mɔɗwag ka kee ajab gḛḛ, àa gaa kàre kavaar mbe pe me.
66013004	Àa ɗege uware Drago̰ mbe, ndwa go ne ne ho̰ kavaar pool ge kee muluk ne. Àa ka uware kavaar me, àa ka janna go: A huɗi ne dinna ca ge kavaar mbe no go de? A huɗi ge pool mḛḛ ne ndwa zì mbal twam ge nee ne de?
66013005	Àa hon kavaar mbe vin̰a ge uware tene mage sal Dok me. Àa hon ne pool ge kee laa ɓyareya ge na ne ɗiŋ saba warndà pɔgwa zi.
66013006	Ɗege sal Dok, ka jan fare ge sone kakatag ma vḛḛne ne dḭḭl, vḛḛne ne sok kàɗɗa mage nda ge kaa no ge pḭḭ zì yà ma me.
66013007	Àa hon ne vin̰a ge mbal twam ge nda ge mbege gezi caɗ ge Dok pe ma, ne waɗe ge num pagal me. Àa hon ne pool ge vuwal pe ge diige pagal, ge ɓase ge diige pagal, ge wa faaya ge pe hini-hini ge diige ma pagal, ge pe rusu ge diige pagal me.
66013008	Nda duwana ge suwa pagal ma peɗ mbo uware kavaar mbe. Nda ge mbo uware ne ya to ma, àa num ge dḭḭl njaŋe ge maktub ge nda ge see ndwa ge fareba ma way zì, ge Tame van ge àa kee tuwaleya ge ne ne, ge dunin̰a pe dolla ya day ma mɔɗwag.
66013009	Ndu ge no ge tɔgwa, n̰a ne za̰a̰ fare mbe ma kwaɗa!
66013010	Kaɗɗa na ee ja go àa wa̰a̰ ndu mbo moor, a ngaɗ go ne mbo moor. Kaɗɗa na ee ja go ne see swày walam, mbo seɗ swày walam. Ge ano mbe no pe, nda ge mbege gezi caɗ ge Dok pe ma mbiya wan ta deŋel ge hoɗ fareba ge maa way ma zì.
66013011	Guwa̰, mbi gwan kuwa kavaar a̰me ge ɗogle zuɗ ge suwa pe se ya. Kaa ge kḭḭ zi dinna ge tame van ne ma go, ka faa ge mojo̰o̰ Drago̰ faa go.
66013012	Kavaar mbe kaɗ ge pool ge na kon ge zḛḛge ne pe, ka kee kaŋ ma ne ndwa go. Ee nda duwana ge suwa pagal mage kaŋ ge ɗogle ma uware na kon ge zḛḛge ge ne jwaŋ wa zo̰o̰ digi mbe me.
66013013	Kavaar ge zuu ge suwa pe se ya mbe ka kee kaŋ ngayya ma. Ee pḭḭ kan ol ge digi ya, ge suwa pagal, ge nda ndwa go peɗ.
66013014	Go mbe no, ka n̰aame nda ge suwa pagal go ge ma, ge kaŋ ngayya ge àa ho̰ na vin̰a kee num ge na kon ge zḛḛge ndwa go ma ta. Ka waɗ fare num zì go, num ca kḭḭ ge kavaar mbe ne, ge àa ho̰ ne jwaŋ walam ɗoo, suu to no.
66013015	Kavaar ge zi seɗ vin̰a ge hon on̰om ge kḭḭ caaya ge na kon ge zḛḛge ne zì, ndwa go ne kḭḭ caaya mbe gaa faa wa, ne ee nda a̰me ma hun nda ge mbo kuri ya be uware na ma me.
66013016	Ee nda peɗ, nda jabso ge nda ga̰a̰l, nda ge gan mage nda ge a̰se ma, nda ge suli mage moor ma seɗ logom ge maa tok matoson ma go, koo ge maa sḭḭl ma go.
66013017	Ndu ge kaɗ-ɗa be logom, koo dḭḭl, ko nimero ge dḭḭl ge kavaar ne ge na ta to, vin̰a a̰me ge ne yaɗ kaŋ, koo yaɗ a̰me gezi to.
66013018	Sok mbe no, a sok ge ɓyare andaŋ ne. Ɓyare go ndu ge go na zwam, ne wa̰a̰ nimero ge kavaar ne mbe pe kwaɗa. Ago, a nimero ge nda duwana ma way ne, ne nimero kikis menengal ge ziya warmenengal pɔgwa menengal (666).
66014001	Mbi Yohana, mbi sok ndil kaŋ mbe ma go gale, na! Tame van mḛḛ no ge njal ge Siyo̰ ne pagal digi no, ge nda dudubu kis ge ziya warndà pɔgwa ndà, ge ne dḭḭl mage ne Ba dḭḭl njaŋeya maa sḭḭl ma go.
66014002	Mbi za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l a̰me ge pḭḭ zì ya, dinna ge kṵwa̰ ge sḭ̀ḭl ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam ma way ma go, dinna ge kṵwa̰ ge mam ban̰n̰a ge ndaal kunjun̰ ne go me. Ka̰a̰l mbe kaɗ tii, dinna ge nda hale biliŋ go me.
66014003	Nda mbe ma ka mbal kaŋ mballa ge jin̰al ge hòol muluk ge Dok ne ndwa se, ge kaŋ ge kaa no ge ndwa ge ndà mage ga̰a̰l ge warzi pɔgwa ndà ma ndwa se me. Ndu a̰me ge ɗogle ge mbal kaŋ mballa mbe to, àa num mbe ge dudubu kis ge ziya warndà pɔgwa ndà ge àa see zuuya ge suwa pagal se ya ma ɗeŋew.
66014004	Num mbe ma be ɓan ge nda zaab haɗ ta seŋre to, àa ge maa na̰ ma tok jan. Àa kàre Tame van pe sok ge a mbo ma go peɗ. Àa zû num zuu ge maa ka̰a̰m buwal zì ya, ge kaŋ wa ge zḛḛge go, ge Dok mage Tame van pe.
66014005	Fare ge hày be waɗ ge num wa zì dwam ɗu to. Àa nda ge be fare a̰me maa pagal ma ne.
66014006	Mbi kuwa malayka a̰me ge ɗogle ka ɗegeya ge pḭḭ pul kuɗi digi ya. Kaa ge Fare ge Kwaɗa ge mbo gaa ya ge ndwa ɗiŋ ge din, ndwa wuwage nda ge no suwa pagal ma peɗ: Pe rusu ge diige pe peɗ, vuwal pe ge diige pe peɗ, wa faaya ge pe hini-hini ge diige pe peɗ, ɓase ge diige pe peɗ ma me.
66014007	Malayka mbe ka oyya ge ka̰a̰l ndaal go: Ḛ chiya Dok voo nde, ḛ ngay pateya ge ne ne zum! Ago sok ma mbyaɗ ja ge go ne kun nda duwana ma sariya. Ḛ uware Ba ge kee pḭḭ, kee suwa, kee mam ga̰a̰l nuwam mage mam ɓulla ma!
66014008	Malayka ge ɗogle yan-na guwa̰, a ge zi ne, jan go: Na! A deɗ-ɗa no, a deɗ-ɗa no, Babilon ge danjan̰ mbe! Ne mbe ge ee pe rusu ge ɗogle ma peɗ njoɗ on̰or jìn̰al ge na kaŋ keeya ge sḛ duul ne ge ol bibiliw ma.
66014009	Malayka ge ɗogle gwan yan-na iya, a ge taa ne, jan fare ge ka̰a̰l ndaal go: Kaɗɗa ndu guu na ko ya ge kavaar mbe mage na kḭḭ ndwa se, seɗ logom ge na sḭḭl koo ge na tok go,
66014010	ne sḛ mbo njoɗ on̰or jìn̰al ge laa hoɗɗa ge Dok ne waɗme, ge àa ka̰a̰ ne no ge seɗe ge ne laa hoɗɗa ne go be kirgiya. Mbo za̰a̰ yal gḛḛ ge ol mage ɓoo ge ol bibiliw zì, ge malayka ge harcal mage Tame van ndwa se me.
66014011	Ol swàm ge ol mbe ne, ge ee num iigiya mbe mbo ka ɗege mbo digi, zaman mage zaman ma. Num mbe ge guu maa ko ge kavaar mbe mage na kḭḭ caaya ndwa se ma, num mbe ge see logom ge ne dḭḭl ne ma peɗ, ɗwabeya ge num pe to ɗaal mage gyala.
66014012	Ge ano mbe no pe, ḛ ge mbege gezi caɗ ge Dok pe ma, ḛ ge mbo wa yuwaleya ge Dok ne pagal ma, ḛ ge ho fareba ge Zeso ta ma mbiya ḛ wan ta deŋel.
66014013	Guwa̰, mbi za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l ge pḭḭ zì ya, jan mbi go: Njaŋe go: Num ge suu no ge Bagezok tèmel maa tok go, ge sego ɗiŋ mbo zḛḛ ma, laa saal num way ne ɗaŋ! On̰om vin go ne mbe go, ndwa go àa see ɗwabeya ge tèmel yal ge maa kee ma go. Ago num kaŋ keeya ge kwaɗa ge num way mbe ma mbo kaɗ dagre ge num.
66014014	Mbi sok ndil kaŋ mbe ma go gale, na! Pḭḭ saal no. Kaŋ a̰me ge ndu duwana go, kàɗɗa ge pḭḭ mbe pagal digi. Kaɗ ge balme dinar ge na pagal digi, ge ngwaɗiŋ ge ɗel zam camam ge na tok go me.
66014015	Malayka ge ɗogle, waɗ-ɗa zum ge zok ge Dok ne zì ya, ka oy ndu ge kaa no ge pḭḭ pagal ge ka̰a̰l ndaal go: Hee ngwaɗiŋ, swa zon-na go ge suwa pagal, mbo syaɗ ne, a sok kan siyal mbiya ne.
66014016	Ndu ge kaa no ge pḭḭ saal pagal mbe, hee na ngwaɗiŋ, syaɗ swa ge no suwa pagal me.
66014017	Guwa̰, mbi gwan kuwa Malayka ge ɗogle ge pḭḭ zì ya, waɗɗa ge zok ge Dok ne zì ya. Kaɗ ge ngwaɗiŋ ge ɗel zam camam na tok go waɗme.
66014018	Malayka ge ɗogle, ge no ge pool ge ol pagal, mbo na ndwa ge twal tuwaleya ta ya, jan ndu ge wa̰a̰ ngwaɗiŋ ge ɗel zam camam fare ge ka̰a̰l ndaal go: He mo ngwaɗiŋ, on̰or ndwa tolla mbwaɗɗa kukutug ge suwa pagal go ge ma zon-na no, vin̰a num ya se mɔɗwag.
66014019	Malayka mbe hee na ngwaɗiŋ, vyan on̰or ndwa tolla ge suwa pagal ma, kan num ge kaŋ ɓerse on̰or ge ga̰a̰l ge laa hoɗɗa ge Dok ne pul go.
66014020	Àa ɓerse on̰or ge kaŋ ɓerse on̰or go, ge suwal ga̰a̰l guwa̰ zum yà. Swàm ɓul ɗiŋ kilometr kikis taa, ne haal mbo ɗiŋ mbo wan tisi wa yiw.
66015001	Mbi Yohana, mbi sok ndil kaŋ mbe ma go ba, ge pḭḭ zì yà, mbi gwan kuwa kaŋ ngayya a̰me ge ndu kuwa ne pe dwam ɗu to, ge hun nda ge ajab me: Malayka ɓỳala, àa kaɗ ge mbɔgwam ma ɓỳala ge maa tok go. Mbɔgwam mbe ma mbɔgwam ge guwa̰ dwab ma ne. A ge num ta, Dok wa aa na laa hoɗɗa berge-berge.
66015002	Mbi kuwa a̰me ge ɗogle, dinna ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam go, ɗermel jargalag ge ndu kuwa sok ge digi ɗiŋ mbo se yà, kaɗ kirgiya ge ol dagre me. Nda ge waɗe ge kavaar, ne kḭḭ caaya mage nimero ge ne dḭḭl ne pagal ma kaɗ mḛḛya digi ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam mbe pagal. Àa wan biliŋ ge Dok ne ma ge maa tok go.
66015003	Àa ka mbal kaŋ mballa ge Dok ndu ge tèmel Moyiz ne mage Tame van ne go: Bagezok Dok Ge pool waɗe-waɗe ! Mo kaŋ keeya ma ga̰a̰l, Àa kaɗ kaŋ ge kee nda ajab ma me ba! Gan ga̰a̰l ge nda way peɗ-ɗoo! Mo kaŋ keeya ma, Àa kaŋ keeya ge temel taɗ ma ne, Àa kaɗ ge fareba ma me ba!
66015004	Bagezok-goo, a huɗi Ge mbiya chiya mo voo mage Sale mo dḭḭl to ne de? Ago, a mo ne ɗu kikiɗ harcal . Pe rusu ge suwa pagal ma peɗ Àa mbo mbo ya guu maa ko ma ge mo ndwa se, Ge dape kaŋ keeya ge amo ge temel taɗ ma dyan ja zum.
66015005	Ge ano mbe guwa̰, mbi sok ndil kaŋ mbe ma go, ge pḭḭ zì yà, mbi kuwa zok ge Dok ne wa hageya gezi, gur sayda kaɗ ge ne pul zì yà me.
66015006	Malayka mbe ge ɓỳala ge wa̰a̰ mbɔgwam ge ɓỳala ge maa tok go ma waɗ ge zok ge Dok ne zì ya. Àa kaɗ ge ba̰a̰ ge lɔgwa lalan̰, seeya cicim ma maa ta, ge hoo dinar vwalla ge maa tuwal ma go.
66015007	Ɗu ge kaŋ ge kaa no ge ndwa ge ndà ma buwal zige hon malayka mbe ge ɓỳala ma seɗe dinar ma ɓỳala, huyya ge laa hoɗɗa ge Dok ge kaa no zaman mage zaman ma ne.
66015008	Ol swàm ndage ge se, huy zok ge Dok ge harcal ne pul, ge kɔn̰al mage pool ge Dok ne pe. Ndu a̰me ge pool ge waɗ ge sok ge harcal mbe zì to, ɗiŋ mbɔgwam ge ɓỳala mbe ge malayka ge ɓỳala ma gene ya ma aa ne mbḛḛ.
66016001	Mbi Yohana, mbi za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l a̰me ge ndaal, ge zok ge Dok ne zì ya, ka jan malayka mbe ge ɓỳala ma go: Ḛ mbo kan laa hoɗɗa ge Dok ne ge no seɗe ge ɓỳala ma pul go ma ge suwa pagal se yà!
66016002	Malayka ge zḛḛge kan kaŋ ge na seɗe pul go ge suwa pagal se yà. Sok ge ka̰a̰ ne go, mbɔgwam ge sone, ge yaga mbo ya wan nda ge no ge logom ge kavaar ne maa ta ma, num mbe ge uware ne kḭḭ ma me.
66016003	Ge zi kan kaŋ ge na seɗe pul go ge ya mam ga̰a̰l nuwam pul se, mam seŋe swàm dinna ge àa vin̰a a̰me na se go. Kaŋ ge on̰ no ge ne pul se ma peɗ suu gezi.
66016004	Ge taa kan kaŋ ge na seɗe pul go ge ma ya, ge mangaɗam mage sin̰ale ma pul se, mam mbe ma seŋe swàm.
66016005	Mbi gwan za̰a̰ malayka ge no ge fare ge mam ma way na tok go janna go: Mo temel taɗ, mo ge dee no ya din, mo ge no ɗiŋ mà, mo ge Harcal, mo kun sariya ge na vin̰a go ge.
66016006	Ajo̰o̰, àa ka̰a̰ swàm ge mo nda ge mbege gezi caɗ ge mo Dok pe mage mo nda ge zwagre mo wa ma way ma se ɗe, ago mo hon num swàm njoɗɗa me. A kaŋ ge àa mbiya seɗ nee ne tem.
66016007	Mbi za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l ge twal tuwaleya zì ya, ka janna go: A fareba, Bagezok Dok ge pool waɗe-waɗe, mo kun sariya kunna ge fareba mage temel taɗ.
66016008	Ge ndà kan kaŋ ge na seɗe pul go ge ya gyala pagal, ne sḛ seɗ pool ge til nda duwana ma ge mojo̰o̰ ol go.
66016009	Gyala tiwri ɗege til nda duwana ma, àa ɗege jan fare ge sone kakatag ma ge Dok pagal, ge dape, ne sḛ ne ge pool mbɔgwam ma pagal. Ano puy àa seŋe ta ya se ge go Dok dḭḭl wa seɗ hormo to baɗ.
66016010	Ge nuwan̰ kan kaŋ ge na seɗe pul go ge ya ge hòol muluk ge kavaar ne pagal se, ne muluk saa se tṵṵ ɗeɗeg. Nda duwana ma ɗege sul kin̰a, ge yal ge maa za̰a̰ ne pe.
66016011	Àa ka jan fare ge sone kakatag ma ge Dok ge pḭḭ zì yà ge pagal ge yal ge maa za̰a̰ mage maa jwaŋ ma pe, ɗaŋɗe, àa seŋe ta ya se ge kaŋ keeya ge maa way ge sone ma go to baɗ.
66016012	Ge menengal kan kaŋ ge na seɗe pul go ge ya mangaɗam ga̰a̰l Efraɗ pul se, mam fin̰a digi tecege. Go mbe no, hage ya vin̰a ge gan ga̰a̰l ge lee mbii-ge ma pe.
66016013	Guwa̰, mbi kuwa on̰om ge sone ma, ge ɗu waɗɗa ge Drago̰ wa zì ya, ge zi ge kavaar wa zì ya, ge taa ge ndu ge kee tene ndu ge zwagre Dok wa|Nda ge zwagre Dok wa wa zì ya me. Àa kaɗ hehene ge bereŋ ma go.
66016014	Àa on̰om ge sone ma ne, àa kee ɗaɗag kaŋ ajab ma. Àa mbo ge gan ga̰a̰l ge dunin̰a zì ma ta, ndwa ɓan num digi dagre ɗu, mbal twam ge Dok ge pool waɗe-waɗe, ge ne dwam kun sariya mbe go.
66016015	Bagezok jan go: Ḛ za̰a̰ kwaɗa, mbi mbo ya tan ḛ dinna ge ndu ge chala go. Ndu ge kaa yaŋ-yaŋ, koy na ba̰a̰ ma na ta, ndwa go na mbo swala ɗoo, daŋso wa̰a̰ na nda ndwa go to, kaɗ ge laa saal.
66016016	Guwa̰, On̰om ge sone mbe ge taa ma kwate num ya sok a̰me ge àa tol ne ge wa hebre go Harmagedo̰ go.
66016017	Ge ɓỳala kan kaŋ ge no na seɗe pul go ge sa̰a̰m zì yà. Ka̰a̰l a̰me ge ndaal ndage ge hòol muluk ge no zok ge Dok ne zì ta ya, ka janna go: A ne aa ne!
66016018	Guwa̰, mam ka seeya, ka̰a̰l ma ka faaya, mam ka ban̰n̰a, suwa ka ndaɗ ndaɗɗa ge sone, ge ndu gale kuwa ne pe dwam ɗu to.
66016019	Suwal ge ga̰a̰l mbe kale vaa se pe taa. Suwal ga̰a̰l gegene ge suwa pagal ma mɔɗwag mbo ya burmi gezi. Sok mbe go, Dok seŋe tene ya Babilon ge fiyal danjan̰ ta, ndwa hon ne seɗe ge on̰or jìn̰al ge na laa hoɗɗa ge ol bibiliw ne.
66016020	Til ma ban sok, njal ma fwaɗ sok ge nda ndwa zì.
66016021	Tuwa ndaa fegem ge ne dṵṵl guwa ge kilo kis ka deɗ ge pḭḭ zì ya ge nda duwana ma pagal. Nda duwana ma ka jan fare ge sone kakatag ma ge Dok pagal, ge jwaŋ ge tuwa ndaa hon maa num ma pe, ge dape yal mbe waɗe gḛḛ nde.
66017001	Guwa̰, malayka a̰me ɗu ge num mbe ge ɓỳala ge kaa ge seɗe maa tok go ma buwal zige mbo ya jan mbi go: Mbo ya, mbi mbo ngay mo go àa kun gwale ge nda pul kub mbe sariya pe gyana de, ne mbe ge kaa no mangaɗam ga̰a̰l ma wa go.
66017002	Gan ga̰a̰l ge suwa pagal go ge ma haa ta seŋre ge ne. Nda ge suwa pagal ma ge sok fere ta ge ne on̰or jìn̰al ge ne kaŋ ge sḛ duul go ge ma, àa haa ta seŋre no waɗme.
66017003	Malayka mbe gene mbi on̰om zì, ge babur pul a̰me yà. Mbi kuwa gwale a̰me kàɗɗa kavaar ge kaal sasaw pagal digi. Kavaar mbe kaɗ ge dḭḭl ge sal Dok ma gḛḛ-gḛḛ na ta, kaɗ ge pagal ɓỳala, ge kḭḭ ma wol me.
66017004	Gwale mbe ka̰a̰ ba̰a̰ ge bware ge kàal citaɗ na ta, peɗɗa ge dinar, ge njal sergeleŋ mage yìn̰a ge ɗogle ma me. Wan seɗe dinar ge na tok go, huyya ge na kaŋ keeya ge bàŋ yag mage kaŋ keeya ge sone kakatag mbe ge na mboya ge sḛ duul go ge ne ma.
66017005	Dḭḭl a̰me njaŋeya ge ne sḭḭl go, a fare ɗimil ne go: Babilon ge danjan̰ mbe, nda zaab ge zam ta mage kee kaŋ keeya ge sone kakatag ge suwa pagal go ge ma na̰.
66017006	Mbi kuwa gwale mbe fereya ge swàm ge nda ge mbege gezi caɗ ge Dok pe ma way me no, num ge see swày ge sayda keeya ge Zeso pe ma way me. Sok ge mbi kuwa kaŋ mbe ma, mbi kee ajab gḛḛ.
66017007	Malayka mbe jan mbi go: Mo daa kee ajab ge dape de? Gwale mbe me no, kavaar mbe ge pagal ɓỳala, kaɗ ge kḭḭ wol mbe ge in ne me ɗe, mbi mà mbo wan mo num fare ɗimil ma pe.
66017008	Kavaar ge mo kuwa ne mbe kaa dee ge na ndwa, ge sego ban-na sok. Mbo ndee ge tugul ga̰a̰l ge ɗugul heleg se ya, Dok mbo ban ne gezi. Ge dunin̰a pe dolla ya day, nda a̰me ge num dḭḭl njaŋe no maktub ge nda ge see ndwa ge fareba ma way zì to ma, àa mbo kee ajab sok kuwa kavaar mbe go. Ndwa go, ne sḛ kaa dee, ba̰a̰ sok no, mbo dee gwan dyan-na kɔn̰al go.
66017009	Sok mbiya ne ge go, ndu kaɗ ndu ge andaŋ ndwa wan fare mbe ma pe. Pagal mbe ge ɓỳala ge kavaar ne ma njal ge ɓỳala ge gwale kaa no ge num pagal digi ma ne.
66017010	Àa ngay gan ga̰a̰l ma ɓỳala waɗme, gan ga̰a̰l ge nuwan̰ ma muluk kale ya yà, ge menengal kee muluk ne ge sego, ge ɓỳala gale be yan-na to. Sok ge mbo yan ja, mbo kee muluk swag boo.
66017011	Kavaar ge kaa dee, ba̰a̰ sok no, a ne sḛ mbe gan ga̰a̰l ge wa gezi zi ne. A ɗu ge num ge ɓỳala ma buwal zige ne waɗme, ge sego Dok mbo ban ne gezi.
66017012	Kaɗɗa kavaar kḭḭ mbe ge wol ge mo kuwa num ma me ɗe, àa gan ga̰a̰l ma ne wol, àa be deɗ-ɗa kee muluk to gale. Ɗaŋɗe, àa mbo seɗ pool ge kee muluk ler ɗu ge kavaar mbe dagre.
66017013	Gan ga̰a̰l ge wol mbe ma mɔɗwag ge dwaɗɗa ge ɗu, àa vḭḭ ta hon maa pool mage maa pool ge kee muluk ma ge tèmel ge kavaar mbe ne pe no.
66017014	Àa mbo mbal twam ge Tame van, ne sḛ mbo hal ge num pagal, ge dape, ne sḛ Bagezok ge bagezok ma way ne, kaɗ Gan ga̰a̰l ge gan ga̰a̰l ma way me. Ne nda ge a too num ya ma, num ge talla ma, num mbe ge n̰a wa to ge no dagre ge ne ma mbo hal ge gan ga̰a̰l mage kavaar mbe ma pagal waɗme.
66017015	Malayka mbe gwan jan mbi go: Mam mbe ge mo kuwa num no ma, num mbe ge gwale ge nda pul kub kaa no ge num wa go ma, àa pe rusu ma ne, ɓase ma ne, ɓase ge nɔnɔg ma ge maa wa faaya ge pe hini-hini ma me.
66017016	Kavaar kḭḭ mbe ge wol ge mo kuwa num ma, kavaar sḛ waɗme, àa mbo sen gwale ge nda pul kub mbe, àa mbo fwage ne kaŋ ma ge ne ta, àa n̰a ne swala, àa zam ne duul, àa dol ne sok ge gaa ma ol zì yà.
66017017	Ago, Dok ee ge num dul wa ma zì go, num kee laa ɓyareya ge na ne ma, num kaa ge dwaɗɗa ge ɗu ge kee tèmel hon kavaar ge ne muluk zì, ɗiŋ ge go fare janna ge na ge Dok ne ma wa huy.
66017018	Gwale ge mo daa kuwa ne mbe no me ɗe, àa suwal ge ga̰a̰l ge no ge pool ge gan ga̰a̰l gegene ge suwa pagal go ge ma pagal ne.
66018001	Ge ano mbe ma no guwa̰, mbi Yohana, mbi kuwa malayka ge ɗogle ɗu kan na ko ge pḭḭ zì ya. Kaɗ ge pool ge waɗe, suwa pagal haɗ kɔn̰al ge seeya ge ne ne ta.
66018002	Oy digi ge ka̰a̰l ndaal go: A deɗ-ɗa no, a deɗ-ɗa no, Babilon ge danjan̰ mbe! Ge sego seŋe ya sok kàɗɗa ge on̰om ge sone ma way, sok way ta ge on̰om ge sone ge diige pe peɗ ma way me. A sok way ta ge njoole ge sone ge diige pe peɗ ge nda ɓyare num to ma way ne waɗme.
66018003	Ago, rusu ge suwa pagal ma peɗ fere ta ge on̰or jìn̰al ge ne kaŋ keeya ge sḛ duul ge ol bibiliw ma, gan ga̰a̰l ge suwa pagal ma waɗ-ɗa ene sḛ duul zì dagre ge ne, nda ge seŋe maa tok ma haɗ-ɗa gan ge ne kaŋ gan ge berme nda ndwa mbe ma ta.
66018004	Mbi gwan za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l ge ɗogle ge pḭḭ zì ya, ka janna go: Ɓase ge ambi ma, ḛ wuwa ya zum ge suwal ga̰a̰l mbe diŋ ya. Ge ne sone mbe ge kee ma ta, ne kaa ge ḛ ɓa̰a̰ dagre ge ne ɗoo, ḛ ge num wa vaa ta yal mbe ge mbo deɗ-ɗa ne pagal ma to.
66018005	Ago, ne sone ge kee ma don-na ɗiŋ mbo pḭḭ digi yà, ee Dok ya dwaɗ ne kaŋ keeya ge na vin̰a go to mbe ma me.
66018006	Ḛ kee ne kaŋ ge ne sḛ ka kee nda num ma ɗaŋ! Ḛ dwage ne num poɗɗa ba! Ge on̰or jin̰al ta̰a̰l pul ɗu ge ne sḛ ka ee nda njoɗ ne, ḛ ka̰a̰ ne ge twam piw ta̰a̰l pul ɗu me.
66018007	Ajo̰o̰, na ka yan hormo mage kaŋ gan ma pe gḛḛ go ɗe, ḛ poo ne num ge iigiya mage kiimi! Dwaɗ ge na dul wa zì go: Mbi gaa ge gan ga̰a̰l ge gwale go, mbi be kumu ne to, mbi daa gwan kuwa fare ge kiimi ne to me.
66018008	Ge ne dwaɗɗa mbe ma no pe, dwam ge ɗu pul zì bàba, yal mbe ge ee ge ne pe ma mbo deɗ-ɗa ne pagal go: Swày ma, kiimi ma, camal baktar ma. Ol mbo til ne gezi waɗme. Ago, Bagezok Dok ge kun sariya ne pagal pool waɗe-waɗe.
66018009	Gan ga̰a̰l ge suwa pagal ma peɗ, num mbe ge ka̰a̰ ta no kaŋ keeya ge batraŋ mage yan kaŋ gan pe zì ma, sok ge àa mbo kuwa ol swàm ge tilla ge suwal ga̰a̰l mbe ne ya ndage mbo pḭḭ zì ɗe, àa mbo fyal fiyaso ge yaga mage sun ta ge ne pe.
66018010	Àa mbo mḛḛ ge zì yà kaal ge voo tok go, ge iigiya ge ne ne pe, àa mbo jan go: Na̰a̰! Na̰a̰! Babilon ge danjan̰, suwal ga̰a̰l ge pool-lo! Ler ɗu gagag, àa kun mo sariya ya no me ya!
66018011	Nda ge seŋe maa tok ge suwa pagal ma puy, àa fyal go fyal, àa kee go kiimi ge ne pe waɗme, ge dape ndu a̰me ɗu ge daa gwan yaɗ num kaŋ suk ma to baɗ.
66018012	Num kaŋ suk ge mojo̰o̰ dinar go ma, bware walam ma, njal sergeleŋ ma, yìn̰a ma, ba̰a̰ ge kaal sasaw mage lɔgwa lalan̰ ma, ba̰a̰ ge kagaa jon̰ɔn̰ mage seeya cicim ma, ɔwara ge huu tii ge diige pe peɗ, ge kaŋ ge diige pe peɗ ge àa nuusi ne ge ndale kin̰a ma, kaŋ ge àa ca num ge ɔwara ge siŋli ma, kaŋ ge ɗogle ge àa ɗeere num ge fool kàal, ge walam mage njal ma me.
66018013	Ɔwara ge àa tol kanel ma, ɔwara ge huu tii ma, ge idiir ma, ge idiir ge àa tol ne mir, ɔwara ge huu tii ge kan ol wa zì ma, on̰or jìn̰al ma, nùm ma, swam ge peɗem larwaɗ ma, geme ma, nday mage gini ma, tisi mage pus mbal twam ma, moor mage nda ge àa paa num twam zì ma me.
66018014	Nda ge seŋe maa tok ma ka faa suwal ga̰a̰l mbe fare go: Ɔwara ndwa ge zonna hihiliw ge mo laa wa̰a̰ num gḛḛ ma ndiri ya kaal ge mo. Kaŋ ge bware mage seeya cicim ma ba̰ ban ge mo ndwa sok. Mo daa gwan seɗ num to baɗ.
66018015	Nda ge seŋe maa tok ge haɗ-ɗa gan njonjon̰ sok gene maa kaŋ suk mbe ma ya suwal ga̰a̰l mbe diŋ ma mbo ɔwabe ta gezi yà kaal ge ne. Voo mbo hun num sok kuwa iigiya ge ne ne mbe ma go, àa mbo fyal, àa waɗ kiimi zì me.
66018016	Àa mbo ka janna go: Ano me! Ano me! A suwal ga̰a̰l ge ka kulbi tene ge ba̰a̰ ge lɔgwa lalan̰ ma, ba̰a̰ ge kaal citaɗ ma, ge kaal sasaw seeya cicim ge dinar go ma ne ba! Kaɗ ge njal sergeleŋ mage yìn̰a ma me ba!
66018017	Ge ler ge ɗu pul zì bàba, kaŋ gan ge gḛḛ mbe ma aa ya sok no mɔɗwag ba! Nda ge jaŋe baaburi ma, nda ge an no ge baaburi van ge jiyale ge wa kal ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam ne zì ma, nda ge kee tèmel ge baaburi pul go mage num ge seŋe maa tok ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam pul go ma peɗ puy, àa ɔwabe ta ya gezi yà kaal ge ne.
66018018	Sok ge àa kuwa ol swàm ge ndugi no ge suwal ga̰a̰l mbe diŋ ya, àa ka poɗ luuluu sok janna go: A ma̰ suwal ga̰a̰l ge dḭḭ tene ne ge suwal ge ga̰a̰l mbe go de?
66018019	Àa ka kan suwa ge maa pagal digi, àa ka fyalla, àa ka kee kiimi, àa ka poɗ luuluu go: Ano me! Ano me! Suwal ge ga̰a̰l ge ee nda ge no ge baaburi, ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam pul go ma seŋe gan njonjon̰ mbe-yoo, ler ge ɗu pul zì bàba, mo seŋe ya piibo ba!
66018020	Nda ge pḭḭ zì yà ma, nda ge mbege gezi caɗ ge Dok pe ma, nda ge temeya mage nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma, ḛ kee laa saal ɗaŋ! Suwal ge ga̰a̰l mbe burmi ya go. Ago, Dok ɗege ḛ pe go, sok kun sariya ge ne pagal.
66018021	Sok mbe go, malayka ge pool a̰me, hee njal ɗu, dinna ge njal nan swa go, fiyage ne ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam pul se yà, jan go: Àa fiyage suwal ge ga̰a̰l Babilon kin̰are mbe go me, ndu mbo daa gwan kuwa ne to baɗ.
66018022	Ndu mbo daa gwan za̰a̰ kṵwa̰ ge nda ge hale biliŋ mage nda ge mbal kaŋ ma way mo diŋ to, ndu za̰a̰ ge nda ge sun gal mage nda ge sun burji ma way to baɗ me. Nda mbo gwan seɗ ndu ge kee tèmel a̰me ge andal, ge kaŋ caaya, kaŋ ɗereya mage kaŋ zooya zì go ɗu, ge mo diŋ to. Ndu mbo gwan za̰a̰ njal nanna to me.
66018023	Kɔn̰al ge lampe ne mbo gwan zen daa ge mo diŋ to, ndu daa gwan za̰a̰ gwale jin̰al obe mage gwale jin̰al ka̰a̰l mo diŋ to me. Ndwa go, dee wal, mo nda ge seŋe maa tok ma kaa nda ge ciciliŋ ge suwa pagal go ge ma ne, mo kaŋ keeya ge mbole ma ka n̰aame rusu ma no mɔɗwag me.
66018024	A ge suwal ge ga̰a̰l Babilon mbe diŋ, nda kuwa nda ge zwagre Dok wa mage nda ge mbege gezi caɗ ge Dok pe ma swàm kan se no, nda ge àa vyan num suwa pagal ma way ma peɗ waɗme.
66019001	Guwa̰ ge kaŋ mbe ma way go, mbi Yohana, mbi za̰a̰ kṵwa̰ a̰me ge gḛḛ, dinna ge ka̰a̰l ge nda ɓase nɔnɔg ma way go, ge pḭḭ zì ya ka janna go: Aleluya! Monna, pateya mage pool ma, Àa ge nè Dok ne ma ne,
66019002	Ge dape, ne sariya kunna ma Àa sariya kunna ge fareba ma ne, Àa kaɗ temel taɗ me. Kun sariya ge gwale ge nda pul kub mbe Ge vḛḛne nda ge suwa pagal ma ya, Ge na ene sḛ duul ta, Ndwa gele na nda ge tèmel Ge ne ka̰a̰ num swàm se ma.
66019003	Ɓase mbe ma gwan ka janna go iya: Aleluya! Ol swàm mbe gaa ndugi mbe go zaman mage zaman ma.
66019004	Ga̰a̰l ge warzi pɔgwa ndà mbe ma, ɓanna ge kaŋ ge kaa no ge ndwa ge ndà ma guu maa ko se, àa ka uware Dok ge kaa no ge hòol muluk pagal, àa ka janna go: Amin ! Aleluya!
66019005	Sok mbe go, ka̰a̰l a̰me ndage ge hòol muluk digi ya janna go: Ḛ uware Dok ge nè ne, ḛ peɗ ne nda ge tèmel ma, ḛ ge hon ne ga̰a̰l ma, nda jabso, ge nda ga̰a̰l.
66019006	Mbi gwan za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l dinna ge ɓase ge nɔnɔg ma way go, dinna ge kṵwa̰ ge mam so̰o̰l ge ɓul ge njal pagal digi ya ne go, dinna ge kṵwa̰ ge mam ban̰n̰a ma way go, ka janna go: Aleluya! Ago Bagezok Dok ge pool waɗe-waɗe, Kaɗ-ɗa go na muluk pagal.
66019007	Nè ke laa saal, nè kaa fafan̰, nè sale ne, Ge dape vḛḛso sanna ge Tame van ne sok mbyaɗ-ɗa, Gwale jin̰al nuusi tene ya go me.
66019008	Àa hon ne vin̰a ge kan ba̰a̰ ge lɔgwa lalan̰ ge be fwaɗɗa ya go. Ba̰a̰ mbe, a tèmel keeya ge temel taɗ ge nda ge mbege gezi caɗ ge Dok pe ma way.
66019009	Malayka mbe jan mbi go: Njaŋe go: Laa saal kee num ge àa too num ya ge kaŋ zam vḛḛso sanna ge Tame van ne pe ma. Gwan jan mbi go iya: Fare janna ge Dok ne mbe ma no, àa fare ge fareba ma ne.
66019010	Sok mbe go, mbi guu mbi ko ne ndwa se, ndwa uware ne, ɗaŋɗe, jan mbi go: Kaa ge be kee ano mbe no to. Ago, mbi mo kon ge tèmel ne, ge mojo̰o̰ ḛ ge mo na̰ van gegene, ge ḛ ge num wa̰a̰ ta no go kee sayda ge Zeso ne ma go. Uware vare zoo Dok! Sayda ge Zeso kê, a fare janna ge on̰om ee nda ge zwagre Dok wa ma jan ne mbe ne.
66019011	Guwa̰, mbi kuwa pḭḭ hageya ya gezi, na! Tisi saal a̰me no ɗu gaw. Ndu ge kaa ne pagal digi dḭḭl «Ba ge n̰a wa to» me no, «Ndu ge Fareba» me. Kun sariya mage mbal twam mballa ge temel pagal go ge ma.
66019012	Ne ndwa pul ma ge ol swala go. Kaɗ ge bul ma gḛḛ-gḛḛ ge na pagal digi. Kaɗ ge dḭḭl a̰me njaŋeya ge na ta, ge ndu mbyaɗ wan ne pe to, ne sḛ ɗu wan ne pe ne.
66019013	Kaɗ ge ba̰a̰ kapoɗ ge paa ge swàm pagal, ne dḭḭl «Fare ge Dok ne.»
66019014	Vwag twam ge pḭḭ zige ma ka kàre ne pe, àa kaɗ ge tisi saal ma pagal digi mɔɗwag. Àa kaɗ ge ba̰a̰ saal ge lɔgwa lalan̰ be fwaɗɗa ma maa ta me.
66019015	Kasagar ndage ge ba mbe ge kaa tisi saal pagal digi wa zì ya, ndwa ee ne halla ge rusu ge suwa pagal go ge ma pagal peɗ. Ne sḛ mbo ɗeme num ge calaŋ walam ge pagal wargal. Mbo ngay laa hoɗɗa ge ol bibiliw ge Dok ge pool waɗe-waɗe ne, sok roɗ num se njaɗaɗ ge nda ɓerse on̰or ge kaŋ ɓerse on̰or go go.
66019016	A ge dḭḭl a̰me njaŋeya ge na ba̰a̰ kapoɗ mage na ko hul ta go: Gan ga̰a̰l ge gan ga̰a̰l ma way, Bagezok ge bagezok ma way me.
66019017	Mbi kuwa malayka ɗu mḛḛya digi ge gyala zì ya, ka oy njoole ge ɗege no pḭḭ digi ma ge ka̰a̰l ndaal go: Ḛ mbo ya, ḛ kwate ya ge vḛḛso kaŋ zam ge ga̰a̰l ge Dok ne pe,
66019018	ndwa zam duul ge gan ga̰a̰l ma way, duul ge asagar ma ga̰a̰l ma way, duul ge nda ge pwal ma way, duul ge tisi mage nda ge num pagal digi ma way, duul ge nda duwana ma way peɗ, num ge suli mage moor ma, nda jabso, ge nda ga̰a̰l.
66019019	Guwa̰, mbi kuwa kavaar ge ndee ge mangaɗam nuwam se ya mbe mage gan ga̰a̰l ge suwa pagal go ge ma, ge maa vwag twam ma ɓan pe digi dagre ɗu, ndwa mbal twam ge ndu ge kaa no tisi saal pagal digi mage na vwag twam me.
66019020	Àa wan kavaar mbe ɓanna ge ndu ge kee tene ndu ge zwagre Dok wa|Nda ge zwagre Dok wa mbe ge ka kee kaŋ ajab ge ne ndwa se me. Ne mbe ge ka ee nda ge see logom ge kavaar mbe ne ma n̰aameya, àa ka guu maa ko ge kavaar kḭḭ caaya ndwa se no me ma. Àa dol num ge sok ge ol ge sooya njunjulug mage ɓoo ge ol bibiliw se ya jwàg ge maa ndwa.
66019021	Num nda gegene ge num pe go ge ma seɗ swày ge kasagar ge ka waɗ ge ndu ge kaa no tisi pagal digi wa ziya ya mbe ta. Njoole ma peɗ ka huri ta ge num duul ma me.
66020001	Guwa̰, mbi Yohana, mbi kuwa malayka ge ɗogle mboya ge pḭḭ zì ya se, kaɗ ge lakle ge hage tugul ga̰a̰l ge ɗugul heleg wa mage zul ga̰a̰l ge na tok go.
66020002	Wan Drago̰, bwam ge no ge pe dolla ya day, ge àa tol ne Ba ge ho̰o̰l, to puy Saytan, mbo ya feɗ ne se kakaŋ, ndwa ne kee ɗiŋ del dubu ɗu.
66020003	Dol ne ge tugul ga̰a̰l ge ɗugul heleg se yà, dibi ne wa digi, fwaɗ ne se hɔlɔɗ, ndwa go ne daa gwan seɗ vin̰a ge n̰aame rusu ge no suwa pagal ma to baɗ, ɗiŋ ge go del dubu ɗu mbe ma mbiya. Guwa̰ go, àa wa dol ne ya digi swag.
66020004	Mbi gwan kuwa hòol muluk ma, àa hon nda ge kaa ge num pagal ma vin̰a ge kun sariya. Mbi kuwa on̰om ge nda ge àa vin̰a num pagal gezi, ge sayda ge num ka keeya ge Zeso mage Fare ge Dok ne pe, on̰om ge num ge vḭḭ guu maa ko ge kavaar ndwa se to, koo ne kḭḭ caaya ndwa se to, àa seɗ ne logom maa sḭḭl go, koo ge maa tok go to ma way ma me. Àa seŋe kàɗɗa ge ndwa, àa kee muluk ɓanna ge Krist ɗiŋ del dubu ɗu.
66020005	Ano a tanna ge zḛḛge ne. Kaɗɗa ge nda ge swày gegene ma ɗe, àa tan ge del dubu ɗu mbe ndwa zḛḛ to.
66020006	Laa saal ge num mbe ge mbege no gezi caɗ, mbe ge ta̰a̰ tanna ge zḛḛge ma pe. Swày ge ndwa zi be pool a̰me ge num pagal go. Àa mbo kaɗ nda ge kee tuwaleya ge Dok mage Krist na ndu ge talla ne ma, àa mbo kee muluk ɓanna ge Krist dagre, del mbe ge dubu ɗu ma pul zì.
66020007	Sok ge del dubu ɗu mbe ma wa mbo huy ya, àa mbo dol Saytan ge daŋay zì ya zum.
66020008	Mbo waɗ-ɗa zum, gwan mbo n̰aame rusu ge dunin̰a keŋ ge ndà ma go mɔɗwag, ge suwa ge Gog mage Magog ne ma go, ndwa ɓan num digi dagre ɗu ge twam mballa pe. Ɓase ge num way ge kafeɗem ge mam ga̰a̰l nuwam wa go ge go.
66020009	Nda ge ɓa̰a̰ digi dagre ɗu ma ame sok ma mɔɗwag ge suwa pagal go, àa vee sok ɓan pagal ge nda ge mbege gezi caɗ ge Dok pe ma way mage Suwal ga̰a̰l ge Dok laa wa̰a̰ ne ma ya se. Ɗaŋɗe, ol a̰me mbo ge pḭḭ zì ya, til num gezi mɔɗwag.
66020010	Àa mbo ya dol Ba ge ho̰o̰l ge ka n̰aame num mbe ge sok ge ol ge sooya njunjulug mage ɓoo ge ol bibiliw pagal se ya, sok ge kavaar mage ndu ge kee tene ndu ge zwagre Dok wa|Nda ge zwagre Dok wa no ne zì mbe. Àa mbo za̰a̰ yal gḛḛ, zaman mage zaman ma, ɗaal mage gyala.
