66020011	Guwa̰, mbi kuwa hòol muluk ge saal dagsag ɗu, ndu ge kaa no ne pagal me. Suwa mage pḭḭ fwaɗ ge ne ndwa sok, num byalam daa gwan gaa go fyalag to.
66020012	Mbi kuwa nda ge suu ya ma, nda jabso mage nda ga̰a̰l, mḛḛya ge hòol muluk ndwa se. Àa hage maktub ma se, àa hage maktub ge ɗogle se ɗu iya, ge dḭḭl ge nda ge see ndwa ge fareba ma way no ne zì. Sok mbe go, àa kun nda ge suu ma sariya ge fare ge njaŋe no ge maktub mbe ma zì pagal, ge tèmel keeya ge ndu ge diige ne ma pagal tem me.
66020013	Mam ga̰a̰l nuwam hon swày ge no na pul se ma ya digi, Swày mage Sok kàɗɗa ge nda ge swày ma way hon maa way ma me. Àa ka kun ndu ge diige sariya ge kaŋ keeya ge ne ne ma pagal.
66020014	Guwa̰, àa fiyage Swày mage Sok kàɗɗa ge nda ge swày ma way ge sok ge ol ge sooya njunjulug zì yà. Sok ge ol ge sooya njunjulug mbe swày ge ndwa zi ne ɗaŋ!
66020015	Àa fiyage ndu ge diige, ge ne dḭḭl njaŋe no maktub ge nda ge see ndwa ge fareba ma way zì to, ge sok ge ol ge sooya njunjulug mbe zì yà waɗme.
66021001	Guwa̰, mbi Yohana, mbi kuwa pḭḭ ge jin̰al mage suwa ge jin̰al. Ago pḭḭ ge wal mage suwa ge wal fwaɗ-ɗa sok, mam ga̰a̰l nuwam puy daa to me.
66021002	Mbi kuwa suwal ga̰a̰l ge harcal siriya ge pḭḭ zì ya, ge Dok ta ya, ndwa go Jerusalem ge jin̰al. Suwal ga̰a̰l ge nuusi no go nuusi ɓal, ge mojo̰o̰ van gwale nuusi tene ɗeɗem da̰a̰re na obe go.
66021003	Mbi za̰a̰ ka̰a̰l ban̰n̰a ge hòol muluk digi ya, jan mbi go: Kuwa gale, Dok ee na sok kàɗɗa ya nda duwana ma buwal zì no! Mbo gaa kaɗ ge num buwal zì, num sḛ ma mbo gaa ne nda ma me. Ne sḛ Dok sok ɓanna dagre ge num go, mbo gaa num Dok.
66021004	Mbo tigɗi miim gezi mɔɗwag ge num ndwa go. Àa mbo daa gwan kuwa swày to, kiimi mbo kaɗ to, koo sun ta, koo yal njoɗɗa mbo kaɗ to baɗ me. Ago kaŋ ge dee wal ma kale ya kale.
66021005	Sok mbe go, ndu ge kaa no hòol muluk pagal jan mbi go: Kuwa, mbi kee kaŋ ma peɗ jin̰al no. Gwan jan mbi go iya: Njaŋe fare mbe ma no, ge dape àa fare ge gag ma ne, àa kaɗ fare ge fareba ma me.
66021006	Gwan jan mbi go: Mbi tok aa go! Mbi Alfa, mbi kaɗ Omega. Mbi pe eeya, mbi kaɗ pagal aaya. Ndu ge mam njuwal kee ne, mbi, mbi mbo hon ne mam ɓulla ge ee nda kaɗ ge ndwa boo.
66021007	Ano mbe mbo kaɗ poɗɗa ge ndu ge haa nee ne. Mbi mbo kaɗ ne Dok, ne sḛ kaɗ mbi van me.
66021008	Ɗaŋɗe, kaɗɗa num ge vwalla mɔgɔɗɔg ma, num ge eya fare ma, num ge kee kaŋ keeya ge sone kakatag ma, num ge hun swày ma, ge an anna ge batraŋ ma, ge kee mbole ma, ge kee siim ma ɓanna ge num ge hày ma peɗ, poɗɗa ge num way, a sok ge ol ge sooya njunjulug mage ɓoo ge ol bibiliw no ne se. Sok mbe se yà, a swày ge ndwa zi ne.
66021009	Guwa̰, malayka mbe ge ɓỳala ge kaa ge seɗe ge ɓỳala huyya ge yal njoɗɗa ge guwa̰ dwab maa tok go ma, ɗu ge num buwal zige jan mbi go: Mbo ya, mbi ngay mo gwale jin̰al, ge Tame van gwale.
66021010	Malayka mbe gene mbi on̰om zì, ge njal ga̰a̰l a̰me ge haal pagal digi yà. Ngay mbi suwal ga̰a̰l ge harcal, ndwa go Jerusalem ge siri no ge pḭḭ zì ya, ge Dok ta ya.
66021011	Kɔn̰al ge Dok ne zen-na ge suwal ga̰a̰l pagal paɗag. Ka seeya ge mojo̰o̰ njal sergeleŋ ge àa tol ne jaspe go, ge ndu kuwa sok ɗiŋ deɗ ne lee gene yà.
66021012	Vê se ge gulum ga̰a̰l ge haal, fiyal danjan̰. Kaɗ ge zok wa waɗɗa wol pɔgwa zi, malayka wol pɔgwa zi zok wa mbe ma pagal nga-nga koyya me. Dḭḭl ge vuwal pe ge wol pɔgwa zi ge Izrayel van ma way ma kaɗ njaŋeya ge num ta digi.
66021013	Zok wa taa lee ma nga-nga: Taa lee mbii, taa lee chiya, taa lee ham, taa lee kuu me.
66021014	Ge njal ge àa doo gulum ga̰a̰l ge suwal ga̰a̰l mbe pe num pagal digi ma, njal ga̰a̰l ma wol pɔgwa zi, dḭḭl ge nda ge temeya ge wol pɔgwa zi ge Tame van ne ma njaŋeya ge num ta me.
66021015	Malayka ge ka jan mbi fare kaa ge kaŋ ngay sok ge tiya dinar, ndwa ngay suwal ga̰a̰l, ne zok wa mage ne gulum ga̰a̰l ma me.
66021016	Suwal ga̰a̰l mbe kaa ge lee ma ndà, mbyaɗ ta mɔɗwag. Ngay suwal ga̰a̰l ge na tiya mbe: Kaɗ ge kilometr dudubu zi ge ziya kikis ndà. Ne fiyal mage ne haal ma kaɗ mbyaɗ ta jwàg.
66021017	Gwan ngay gulum ga̰a̰l: Ne haal kaɗ ge metr warmenengal pɔgwa menengal. Malayka ngay sok mbe ge kaŋ ge nda duwana ma kaɗ ngay sok din ge ne.
66021018	Àa sḭḭ gulum ga̰a̰l mbe ge njal sergeleŋ ge àa tol jaspe, suwal ga̰a̰l me ɗe, kaɗ ge dinar ge ɗiyage-ɗiyage, ɗermel jargalag ge ndu kuwa sok ɗiŋ deɗ lee gene yà.
66021019	Gulum ga̰a̰l ge suwal ga̰a̰l ne mbe pe dolla ɗebce ge njal sergeleŋ ma pe hini-hini: Ge pe se dwab ge njal sergeleŋ ge àa tol jaspe, ge zi ge njal sergeleŋ ge àa tol ne safir, ge taa ge njal kalseduwan, ge ndà ge njal sergeleŋ ge àa tol emeroɗ,
66021020	ge nuwan̰ ge njal Sardoniks, ge menengal ge njal sarduwan, ge ɓỳala ge njal Krizoliɗ, ge wa gezi zi ge njal beril, ge wa gezi ɗu ge njal topaz, ge wol ge njal krizopraz, ge wol pɔgwa ɗu ge njal eyasent, ge wol pɔgwa zi ge njal Ametist me.
66021021	Zok wa ge wol pɔgwa zi ma yìn̰a ga̰a̰l ma ne wol pɔgwa zi me. Zok wa ge diige kaa ge yìn̰a ge ga̰a̰l seeya ɗu. Sok ɓan pagal ge suwal ga̰a̰l ne dinar ge ɗiyage-ɗiyage ne, ɗermel jargalag ge ndu kuwa sok ɗiŋ deɗ lee gene yà.
66021022	Mbi be gwan kuwa zok ge Dok ne ge suwal ga̰a̰l mbe ne to. Ago, Bagezok Dok ge pool waɗe-waɗe kaŋ ma pagal peɗ sḛ ne na zok mbe, kaɗ Tame van sḛ me.
66021023	Suwal ga̰a̰l mbe ɓyare kɔn̰al ge gyala mage saba ne mbḛḛ to. Ago kɔn̰al ge Dok ne zen ne pagal ne, Tame van kaɗ ne ol gil me.
66021024	Rusu ge ɗogle ma mbo gaa mboya ne kɔn̰al go, gan ga̰a̰l ge suwa pagal go ge ma, ge kaŋ kwaɗa ge maa way ma puy, àa mbo pwage ya Dok ta.
66021025	Zok wa ge suwal ga̰a̰l mbe ne ma mbo dibi digi to baɗ, ndwa go ɗaal mbo kaɗ to.
66021026	Àa mbo gene ya ge sok mbe go kaŋ kwaɗa mage hormo ge rusu ge ɗogle ma way ma.
66021027	A̰me ge seŋre, koo ndu ge ho̰ tene no ge kaŋ keeya ge sone kakatag mage hày ma ta mbo waɗ ge suwal ga̰a̰l mbe diŋ to baɗ me. Ɗeŋew num ge dḭḭl njaŋe no ge maktub ge nda ge see ndwa ge fareba ma way zì ma, ge no Tame van ne me.
66022001	Malayka mbe ngay mbi mangaɗam ge ne mam ee nda kaɗ ge ndwa, kaɗ ɗermel jargalag ge ndu kuwa sok ge digi ɗiŋ deɗ ne se yà. Mam mbe ka ɓul ge hòol muluk ge Dok ne mage Tame van ne pe se ya.
66022002	Mangaɗam mbe ka ɓul suwal ga̰a̰l mbe buwal diŋ yà, ɔwara ge hon nda ndwa kaɗ mḛḛya ne wa go, lee ma jwàg. Tol ndwa wol pɔgwa zi del zì, saba tatab, ne gàa ma zon nda ge tuguɗi ma ge rusu ma zì peɗ.
66022003	A̰me ge wa vḛḛneya no ne pagal mbo daa gwan kaɗ to baɗ. Hòol muluk ge Dok mage Tame van ne mbo kaɗ ne suwal ga̰a̰l mbe diŋ. Ne nda ge tèmel ma mbo kee tèmel hon ne me.
66022004	Àa mbo kuwa ne ndwa, ne dḭḭl mbo kaɗ njaŋeya num sḭḭl ma go.
66022005	Ɗaal mbo daa gwan kaɗ to baɗ. Àa mbo daa gwan ɓyare kɔn̰al ge lampe ne, koo kɔn̰al ge gyala ne mbḛḛ to me, ge dape Bagezok Dok sḛ kɔn̰al mbe ne. Àa mbo gaa kee muluk zaman mage zaman ma.
66022006	Malayka mbe gwan jan mbi go: Fare mbe ma fare ge fareba ma ne, àa kaɗ fare ge nda mbiya ee jobreya num pagal ma me. Bagezok Dok ge ɗeme nda ge zwagre na wa ma ge na on̰om, teme na malayka ya ne, ndwa tyan na nda ge tèmel ma pagal gezi, ge kaŋ ge ɓyare mbo keeya ge sego ma pe.
66022007	Zeso jan go: Kuwa go mbi mbo ya ge sego. Laa saal mbo kee ndu ge mbo kaɗ-ɗa ka mboya ge fare ge ndu ge zwagre Dok wa|Nda ge zwagre Dok wa jin̰a num no maktub mbe zì ma pagal.
66022008	A mbi sḛ Yohana za̰a̰ fare mbe ma ne, mbi kuwa num ge mbi ndwa no me. Sok ge mbi za̰a̰ num mage kuwa num go, mbi deɗ ge malayka ge ka ngay mbi kaŋ mbe ma ndwa se ndwa uware ne.
66022009	Ɗaŋɗe, jan mbi go: A̰me hee mo ndwa kee ano mbe no to. Mbi mo kon ge tèmel ne, mbi kaɗ ge mo na̰ van ge zwagre Dok wa ma way, ge num ge mbo ge fare ge njaŋe no ge maktub mbe zì ma pagal ma way go me. Ndu ge mo uware ne, a Dok!
66022010	Gwan jan mbi go: Kaa ge be koy fare ge ndu ge zwagre Dok wa|Nda ge zwagre Dok wa jin̰a num maktub mbe zì ma ɗimil to, ago sok chal ja zì guwa.
66022011	N̰a ndu ge kee fare ge na vin̰a go to, ne dwage na fare keeya ge na vin̰a go to mbe ma kon pagal. Ndu ge haɗ tene seŋre, ne haa tene seŋre ta iya. Ndu ge kee kaŋ keeya ge temel ma, ne kee num kon pagal. Ndu ge go na harcal me ɗe, ne haa tene harcal ta iya me.
66022012	Zeso gwan jan no go: Kuwa go mbi mbo ya ge sego, mbi wa poɗ nda, ge dape ndu ge diige wa seɗ poɗɗa ge tèmel ge na kee pagal tem.
66022013	Mbi Alfa mage Omega jwàg, ndu ge zḛḛge mage guwa̰ dwab, pe eeya mage pagal aaya.
66022014	Laa saal kee num ge usi maa ba̰a̰ ga̰a̰l ma, ndwa go maa ge vin̰a ge waɗ ge zok wa ma go, ndwa mbo suwal ga̰a̰l diŋ yà. Go mbe no, àa ge vin̰a ge zam ɔwara ge hon nda ndwa me.
66022015	Kaɗɗa ge num ge dḭḭ ta ge juu go ma, num ge kee mbole ma, num ge an anna ge batraŋ ma, num ge hun nda ma, num ge kee siim ma, koo ndu ge diige ge ne laa wa̰a̰ hày kunna, num sok ge suwal ga̰a̰l guwa̰ zum yà.
66022016	Mbi Zeso, mbi teme mbi malayka ya ge dape, ne din̰a fare mbe ma ya ḛ ta ge ɓase ge Krist ne ma pe. Mbi, mbi van ge wuwa no ge vuwal pe ge Daviɗ ne zì ya ne, gùwa̰ ga̰a̰l kon̰ sok ge aaram pagal.
66022017	On̰om mage gwale jin̰al jan go: Mbo ya! Ɓyare go ndu ge diige ge za̰a̰ fare mbe, ne jin̰a mbe go waɗme: Mbo ya! Ndu ge mam njuwal kee ne, ne mbo ya. Ndu ge ɓyare mam ge ee nda kaɗ ge ndwa, seɗ ne bàŋ!
66022018	Mbi Yohana, mbi jan ḛ zum waŋ go: Ndu ge diige, ge za̰a̰ fare janna ge ndu ge zwagre Dok wa|Nda ge zwagre Dok wa jin̰a num ge maktub mbe zì ma go: Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me kan a̰me ja fare mbe ma pagal, Dok mbo kan yal mbe ge àa faa num fare no ge maktub mbe zì ma ya ge ne yal njoɗɗa ma pagal me.
66022019	Kaɗɗa ndu a̰me kun fare janna ge ndu ge zwagre Dok wa jin̰a ge maktub mbe zì a̰me ja gezi me ɗe, Dok mbo kun vaaya ge ne ne ge ɔwara ge ee nda kaɗ ge ndwa ta gezi, tele ne vin̰a ge waɗ mbo suwal ga̰a̰l ge harcal diŋ me. Num mbe ge njaŋe no maktub mbe zì ma.
66022020	Ndu mbe ge jan fare mbe ma no, jan go: A fareba, mbi gwan-na ge sego! Amin ! Ne kaa mbe go! Mbo ya, Bagezok Zeso!
66022021	N̰a Bagezok Zeso, ne ngay kwaɗa keeya ge na ne ge nda ge ho fareba ma ta peɗ!
